verse_text: Havah Abraham Chapa, tidit tah David Chapa Jisu Khrista rilam ki laika ava'.
Abraham mih Aijek pluwda, Aijek ki Jakob pluwda, Jakob pih Judah le' mu'umnau rek pluw lamda.
Judah ngi Perej le' Jera pluwda. Mmaanve nuh avah Tamar. Perej tih Hejron pluwda, ungta Hejron nih Aram pluwda.
Aram mih Aminadab pluwda. Aminadab pih Nahshon pluwda, ungta Nahshon nih Salmon pluwda.
Salmon nih Rahab tu' Boaj pluw lamda. Boaj tih Ruth tu' Obed pluw lamda. Obed tih Jessi pluwda.
Ungta Jessi ngi paamkruwng David pluwda. Paamkruwng David tih mma' tu' tidit tah Uriah snu, ava'tu' Solomon pluw lamda.
Solomon nih Rehoboam pluwda. Rehoboam mih Abijah pluwda, ungta Abijah ngi Asa pluwda.
Asa ngi Jehoshaphet pluwda, Jehoshaphet tih Jehoram pluwda, ungta Jehoram mih Ujjiah pluwda.
Ujjiah ngi Jotham pluwda, Jotham mih Ahaj pluwda, ungta Ahaj tih Hejekiah pluwda.
Hejekiah ngi Manasseh pluwda, Manasseh ngi Amon pluwda, ungta Amon nih Josiah pluwda.
Josiah ngi Jekoniah le' mnaupa rek avah paamsuwk ki Babylon thah mvanqhi dokin ki mpha arveel lih pluw lamda.
Ungta mmaan avah Babylon thah mvanqhi dokin dilli Jekoniah ngi Shealtiel pluwda, ungta Shealtiel lih Jerubbabel pluwda.
Jerubbabel lih Abiud pluwda, Abiud tih Eliakim pluwda, ungta Eliakim mih Ajor pluwda.
Ajor rih Jadok pluwda, Jadok ki Akim pluwda, ungta Akim mih Eliud pluwda.
Eliud tih Eleajar pluwda, Eleajar rih Matthan pluwda, ungta Matthan nih Jakob pluwda.
Ungta Jakob pih Joseph pluwda, Joseph tidit avah Jisu tidit tah Khrista mdodit ava' kuplu Mary innpu ava'.

Avaleiyi, suruwl mkheng rek avah, Abraham ki ngi David kpha ki suruwl sowm leipli. David thung ki ngi Babylon thung ngi paamsuwk ki ma'amin ava ngi suruwl sowm leipli. Ungta Babylon thung ngi paamsuwk ki ma'amin thung ki ngi Khrista kpha ki ava ngi suruwl sowm leipli.
'Tunnu Jisu Khrista ki qouna' avah hanto': Ava' dilli Mma' nuh Mary hinni Joseph pih pau pthlengda. Mmaanve mkurdut duhn nih mma ngi Pthla Kchiir nau hor chda.
Pdainu mi'innpu Joseph avah mii kindit khat mkurthuh leiyi, ungta mma ngi Mary a mii dodeh ngi ningkya mdopiik nuwmma leiyi, tuprut tih mma' avah kmapthi rang ngi plung reelda.

Mma ngi hava' dow rek leiyi, kirbinda ma'am arlaan nih, Asuwn! Kruwng hinki vaantamsi khat tih mhin nih mmer rih kperdehda, ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “David chapa Joseph, nang ngi anuwn rang ngi Mary tko'onqhi rang avah ningpqitma'. Mleiya mma ngi kurmuwngda mdohor nau avah Pthla Kchiir hin ki.
Ungta mma ngi Chapa khat kuplu rah ungta nang ngi Mma' miing avah ‘Jisu’ dinadih. Mleiya Mma ngi Mma' mii rek avah mupnu rekin thung ki ksan chlam rah.”
'Tunnu Kruwng ngi khulpu hinni mdothe dok pau ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni hava' dow mkheng rek avah kthuwk.

Khulpu ava ngi hanto'theda: “Asuwn, nlakinrim khat avah kurmuwng rah Ungta mma ngi, Chapa khat kuplu rah, Ungta mmaan nih, Mma' miing avah‘Emmanuel’ kdi lamrah'. (Is. 7:14) Ava' ki mningleiya: ‘Isowr rah neentu' ka'am a,’ mdoditna'.
Audilli Joseph pih ki'iip mkerdel thungta, Kruwng vaantamsi ngi mhin nih paupiik mdopiik heppi tlow chda. Mma ngi Mary avah mnuwn rang ngi ko'onqhida.
Ungta mma ngi mkhatna' kqou Chapa ava' muplukduh kpha thung ngu, mma' avah iiqhivot meh. Ungta Joseph pih Mma' miing avah ‘Jisu’, dida, phuwk chda.

'Tunnu Herod tih paamkruwng mkurthuh arlaan nih Mary ngi Jisu avah Judia paamkuwl thung ki Bethlehem khuw thung ngi mupluk dilli, Asuwn! knithuhna' ki mii kinrit rek, Jerusalem khuwpii thung ngi thleng lamda.
Mmaan nih the lamda: “Jihudi rekki paamkruwng, khat qouna' munna tva'thungda? Mleiya neen nih knithuhna' thah Mma' bursi dei innu, avaleiyi Mma' luwkbuh chrah kthleng inping.”
Paamkruwng Herod tih hava' marjaak thungta mma' ruk ungta Jerusalem thung ki mii mkheng rukka mma' tu' muplungin kdung ngi yada.
Mma ngi thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek mkheng purkuwk lam thida mma ngi Mesaiah mdoplukna' rang avah tva'thungda, tidit kheel lamda?
Mthungta mmaan nih mhin nih: “Judia paamkuwl ki Bethlehem khuw thung rah,” dilamda. Mleiya khulpu ngi hanto' mdokjit dok.
“Judah paam thung ki Bethlehem, Nang nga Judah paamkpu rek arlak ki Mikdilsi ptipmeh. Mleiya nang athung ki Nei kmii, Isreel rek kqhi rah luwkqhi khat kthuwk rah.” (Mai. 5:2)
Audilli Herod tih mii kinrit rek avah tuprut tih mo'own lam dilli, mma ngi bursi thuhna' mpha avah mmaan hinni kmin nih kheel chda.

Ungta mma ngi Bethlehem thah mmaan avah heipthla lamda, ungta hanto ngi mhin inni theda: “Vaan ungta Nau ava' ki mlei avah kqhajik ki akheelin. Ungta naan nih Mma' avah adeh dokin dilli, nei rukku chetda Mma' avah luw kdobuk chaakna' rah, kihin nih pau marvanson piik chaan.”
Mmaan nih paamkruwng pauthe ava' marjaakin dilli sun lamda. Asuwn, knithuhna' thah mdodehn bursi ava ngi Nau ava' amna' mun phada mriduh khimkheiyi mmaan duh thah chetda.
Mmaan nih bursi ava' mdehn thungta kdung dok ki kanpa chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih inn ava' thuh mvanluw chaakin thungta, Nau avah Mnuh Mary tung ngi ka'am daat dei lamda. Ungta mmaan nih tlu lamda Mma' avah luwbuk chlamda, ungta mmaan nih msumbuwr rekin pvang lamda ungta Mhin nih chla rek tidit tah jiiring le' namreng ungta myrrh reidii parlaan chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Herod hinni mvan kenlet mana' raan, mmer inni Isowr rih paupiik khat mdopiikin leiyi, mmaan nih 'lam morson qowi lamda mpaam thaan nih sun chlamda.

Mmaan nih msun dokin dilli Kruwng vaantamsi khat tih Joseph hinni mmer rih kandan piikda ungta hanto'theda: “Kerdel rang ngi Nau avale' Mnuh avah aqhi rang ngi Egypt paam thah ichen dokin. Ungta Neiyi pau akthe piikduhn khimkheiyi, ava' thah, i'am daatin. Mleiya Herod tih Nau Mma' avah ke'eyou rang ngi kthlambei rah.”
Joseph pih kerdelda, Nau avale' Mnuh avah jaan nih qhi lamda Egypt paam thah sunqhi lamda.

Ungta Herod mdiyow duh kpha thung ngi ava' thah am lamda. Kruwng khulpu nehr rih mdothe pau ava' tlunna' rang leiyi, mmaan nih ava' thah am lamda. Mleiya “Neiyi Kchapa avah Egypt paam thung ki own pthuwk nuh,” mdodit. (Hos. 11:1)

Herod tih mii kinrit rekki mdohuwn chaak lam ava' mdeh thungta mei kquwng ngi plung pthitda. Mma ngi Bethlehem thuh ka'am ungta merveel lih ka'am khuw rek thung ki pselnau kum 'knii kurduh ki rek mkheng avah mii pthlada eyou lamda. Havah mma ngi mii kinrit rek hinni kindit jik ki mpha ava' mdokheel lam ava' dilkqowiyi mdotlot.
Audilli hanto' heppi khulpu Jeremaiah ngi mdothe avah kurkhumda.

Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Ramah khuw thung ngi archam klou le' kqap Ungta kurnung karbaang krowl khat arja lamda. Rachel lih mnau rekki thenni Qapqeida archam lou chda. Mma ngi mii rekki mdopthlai raan avah matda Mleiya mmaan avah ka'am porson lam pemeh.” (Jer. 31:15)
Pdainu Herod mdiyow thungta Kruwng vaantamsi khat ava ngi Egypt paam thung ngi Joseph hinni mmer rih kandangda.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kerdel, Nau avale' Mnuh avah aqhilam rang ngi Isreel khuwpaam thah asunqhi doklam. Mleiya Nau ava' ke'eyou rang ngi kthlam mii rek avah kdiyou doklam a.”
Audilli mma ngi ripda Nau avale' Mnuh avah qhida Isreel khuwpaam thah arvanqhi lamda.

Pdainu Arkelas tih mpa Herod kchang ngi Judia paam avah mpuwk a tidit marjaak thungta ava' thuh tuluw rah qi chda. Ungta Isowr rih mmer rih paupiik mpiik dilli mma ngi Galily paamkuwl ki paamklek thung ngi luwt chda.
Ungta mma ngi Najareth tidit khuw khat phada ava' thung ngi am chda. Mleiya havah Khulpu rekki, “Mii rekki Mma' avah Najareth ki mii, kdi lamrah,” mdodit ava' kurkhumna'.
Mpha ava' thung ngi dii kupluwt Johon thuwkda, Judia paamkuwl ki paamkbiik laiyi pau parjaamda.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih plung aperthleng chaan mleiya parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah knaitek kcha' a.”

Mleiya havah khulpu Isaiah ngi mlei mdothe dok mma' ava'. Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Paamkbiik laiyi ko'owng krowl ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kruwng thenni 'lam aporthlongin! Mma' 'lam avah kirji deek ki aportlotin!’ ” (Is. 40:3)
Ungta Johon mdakkat avah uwtmul dona nada. Mma ngi morkowl thah saavun arkowlke pkehda. Ungta mma' then chaak avah khausor le' nowm pkhuidii daat.
Audilli Jerusalem khuwpii ki Judia paamkuwl mkheng thung ki ungta Jordon kreng arveel ki paamklek rek thung ki mii mkheng rekki mma' hinni va lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mupnu arve rekin mthethut chaakin dilli mma ngi mmaan avah Jordon kreng thung ngi diipluwt chlamda.

Pdainu mma ngi mma' diipluwna' thung ngi Pharisy rekle' Saddusy rek knempok mthlenin avah dei lamda. Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Kruknei pruwl suruwl rek naan! Karvang bei rang plungthit mei kquwng thung ki achen chaakna' raan ki thenni kuw ngi atpilqhit inda?
Avaleiyi, plung kperthleng dok kcha' ki mtik kcha ngi naan nih achei chaak raan.

Ungta aplungrilin thung ngi athinaan nih hanto' tethe rah bin chmaan. ‘Tidit tah neenna k'paan kurthuwk Abraham ka'am dichmaan.’ Mleiya neiyi ahinin nih kthe a. Isowr rih Abraham thenni nau rek avah hava' lung rek thung ki rukku mdopurthuh pchaan.
Ungta 'tunkat rukku ding rek ava' arjung rek 'leenni qhi avah moplot dok a. Avaleiyi, mchei kqha kchei kma' ding rek khimkhei avah kphuwr pthi rah ungta avah mei thuh kvarpthi rah.

Dakkat tih neivah plung tperthlenna' thuh dii'apluwt innu. Pdainu, nei kdil thah karvang Mma' avah nei kihin nih mruh ktang. Neiya Mma' khuhkok rek kokdom ki mtik kcha pmaang. Mma ngi Pthla Kchiir rih ungta mei thung ngi dii'akupluwt chraan.

Mma ngi buhjaab klin khat, Mkhut thuh sinda ungta Mma ngi msikthi avah kyungdang kapchai rah. Ungta Mma ngi Mma' chavui rek avah ktom thung ngi kdaal chrah. Pdainu mpirvi rek avah Mma ngi kqiim liit kma' mei thuh kapkapthi rah.”
Audilli Jisu ngi Galily paamkuwl ki Jordon kreng thah Johon nih dii mdopluw chaakna' rah thlengda.
Pdainu Johon nih Mma' avah pkhaanda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi neiya dii adotupluw chaak rang kmah! Taluleiyi Nang ngi nei kihin nih kthleng pti?”

Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “'Tunnu hanto ngi mheirot piik chdaat. Mleiya neen nih rinkinditna' mkheng avah hanto'hep kat tih tpurkhum rah.” Audilli Johon nih Mma' avah rotpiikda.

Audilli Jisu ngi dii mluw dok daat le' m'tunkat daat tih dii thung ki hungthuwk tengda. Ungta Asuwn! Mma' hinni parvaan rek kparvangda. Ungta Mma ngi Isowr Pthla avah uqhu heppi arjung qumda Mma' 'leenni kchuw deida.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih parvaan ki krowl khat arjuda, ungta hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kvonsat low chaak Kchapa ava', Mma' 'leenni kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha' a.”
Audilli Jisu avah tarnampii ngi mdopthleem rang ki thenni Pthla Kchiir rih paamkbiik lai thah qhidokda.
Ungta Mma ngi nii somplii le' jaan somplii then mngowl chaak dilli Mmah mpowi tham chda.
'Tunnu kepthleem ava ngi Mma' hinni thlengda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi, Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi, hava' lung rek ava ngi thenpen mkurthuhna' rah paupiik apii lam.”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Hanto' kjitda ka'am: ‘Dultimii ngi thenpen chrel daat tih mrin rang pemeh, Pdainu Isowr hinki pauna khimkhei rek ava ngi mrin chaak raan.’” ( Knl. 8:3)
Audilli tarnampii ava ngi Mma' avah khuwpii kchiir thah hanqhida. Ungta Luwbuk'inn ki makparthaangsi 'leenni Mma' avah pkalda.

Ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “ ‘Nang ngi, Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi athina junjuwng.’ Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: ‘Mma ngi Mma' vaantamsi rek avah Nang aleiyi paupiik kpii lamrah. Ungta Nang ngi, lung 'leenni akhuh ado'etmana' rah, Mmaan nih mkhut inni Akkarlaang chlam rah.’ ” (Luw. 91:11,12)
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Hanto' kjit nowlda ka'am: ‘Nang ngi, nang ki Kruwng Nang ki Isowr avah Adoperten rang pemeh.’ ” (Knl. 6:16)
Ungta veikhat tarnampii ava ngi Mma' avah kdungsi ngi kparthaang lown 'leenni kalqhida. Ungta mma ngi dultipaam ki kruwngpaalna' mkheng rekle' mmaan ki mkonlorna' rek avah Mma' hinni tepdehda.
Ungta mma ngi Mma' hinni theda: “Nang ngi tluda luw'atbuk chaak bih, hava' dow mkheng avah neiyi apii nikdi'.”

Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Seitan, ikorsown dok! Mleiya, hanto' kjitda ka'am. ‘Nang ngi nang ki Kruwng, Isowr avah luw'adobuk chaak rah Ungta nang ngi Mma' daat chrel Sop'adolow chaak rah.’” (Knl. 6:13)
Audilli tarnampii ava ngi Mma' avah mapthida, ungta asuwn! vaantamsi rek arjung qumda Mma' avah soplow chlamda.
'Tunnu Jisu ngi Johon avah rowng thuh mdaal dok inna tidit marjaak thungta Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl thah sun chda.
Ungta Mma ngi Najareth khuw mapthida chetda truwnpii beh ki Jebulun le' Napthali paamklek rek thung ki Kapernaum khuw thuh am chda.
Mleiya havah khulpu Isaiah ngi mdothe dok ava' kurkhumna':
“Jebulun paam ungta Napthali paam Jordon raalpha ki truwnpii 'lam, Chaatktlei rekki Galily!.

Kjiingnu thung ngi ka'am kcha' mii rekki Mar'aang klin khat avah mdeh chaak inna. Ungta paam ava' thuh ka'am rek, Ungta tidina' arlim thung ngi kok'ong kcha' rek 'leenni Mar'aang avah khu kvaar heppi kvaar kcha' a,” dida. (Is. 9:1-2)
Mpha ava' ki kupqhun nih Jisu ngi pau tparjaam pqhunda ungta hanto'theda: “Plung aperthleng chaan, mleiya parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah knaitek kcha' a!”

'Tunnu Jisu ngi Galily truwnpii biing thah mhei thungta unau 'knii rek dei lamda. Mmaanve avah Pitar mdoditin Simon le' mnaupa Andria. Mmaanve a truwnpii thung ngi 'leen kdeeng meeksli lam, tidit tah mmaanve a tuwlvah kse mii reklam.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve a nei mheiqowiyin! Ungta Neiyi mii kokyowng rek ayupurthuhn nih.”
Audilli mmaanve ngi m'tunkat daat tih mleenin mapthi lam thida, Mma'dil qowi chlamda.

Ungta Mma ngi ava' thung ki mhei thungta, morson unau 'knii rek deinowl lamda. Mmaanve avah Jebedi chapa rek James ungta mnaupa Johon. Mmaan nah m'paan Jebedi tung ngi arkuwng 'leen am lamda mleenin mdotphut meekin. Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve a own lamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi m'tunkat daat tih arkuwng le' m'paan mapthi lam thida Mma'dil qowi chlamda.

'Tunnu Jisu ngi Galily paamkuwl mkheng pervelda ungta Mma ngi mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi purchuk lamda ungta kruwngpaalna' ki kqhapaumin avah parjaamda. Ungta Mma ngi mii rek arlak ki mdetmdet tih kkowi rek mkheng ungta mdetmdet ki omlai mkheng avah pdamda.

Audilli Mma' laarneena' avah Siria paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi karjaamda. Ungta mmaan nih kkowi rek mkheng ungta mdetmdet ki omlaiyi mdosow rek ungta kdungksaan rek ungta ram doqhi mii rek ungta arngol kervei rek ungta kyeng kkhowi kcha' mii rek avah Mma' hinni arheiqhi lamda. Ungta Mma ngi avale' avah pdam chlamda.
Ungta Galily paamkuwl ki, Dekapolis, tidit tah khuwpii sowm, thung ki, Jerusalem khuwpii thung ki, Judia paamkuwl thung ki ungta Jordon kreng raalpha ki miipii knempok rekki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
'Tunnu Mma ngi miipii knempa rek mdeh thungta lown 'leenni hangkalda. Ungta Mma ngi mko'on dok le' Msikhu rek avah Mhin nih thleng lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi Mnehr pvangda tpau pqhunda ungta mmaan avah hanto'theda purchuk lamda.
“Pthla kyuwm mih ka'am kcha' rekka Msuwkin kqha. Mleiya parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah Mmaan dow ngi ka'am kcha' a.
Kqapkqei kcha' rek mmaan avah Msuwkin kqha. Mleiya mmaan nah muplungin kapngam piik chrah.
Plung kdowng kohor kcha' rekka Msuwkin kqha. Mleiya dulti avah mmaan nih Alrouchom mih kchom chlam rah.
Rinkinditna' ki thenni Powitham ningkraal kperteel kcha' rekka Msuwkin kqha. Mleiya mmaan nah kipdimpiik chlam rah.
Plungqhat ktedet kcha' rekka Msuwkin kqha. Mleiya plungqhat avah Mmaan hinni ktedet chlam rah.
Muplung kertleu rekka msuwkin kqha. Mleiya mmaan nih Isowr rah mmikin nih kdei chlam rah.
Tkalqhatna' ktlow kcha' rek Mmaan avah msuwkin kqha. Mleiya mmaan avah Isowr chapa rek kdi chlam rah.
Rinkinditna' leiyi, Tyatchiireelna' kduh kcha' rekka Msuwkin kqha. Mleiya parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah Mmaan thenni ka'am kcha' a.
Dultimii ngi Nei kleiyi mmeel kthi ngi mdobiik chaak ungta chii mdopreel ungta anto' kma'pa mdetmdet ki kqha kma' mkheng ava' a'leenin nih adotthe psukin naan avah asuwkin kqha.

Naan ikanpa chaan, ungta kerkheelsi ngi plung apngam chaan. Mleiya parvaan thah naan anongqhat'lotin klin nih ka'am. Ava' heppi naan aduhn ki khulpu rek avah mmaan nih tyat chiireelna' mdopiik dokin.”

Naanna dultipaam ki ptiin ptih. Pdainu pti ava ngi ma'al ava' mse chaakku taluhep pih avah veikhat tpa'al rang ngo? Ava'dil vah avah dow khatleh 'leenni mqhatna' ammeh. Pdainu varpthida ungta mii rekki avah mkhuhn nih mdochown pthi raan daat a.
Naanna dultipaam ki mar'aangin ptih. Lown khat 'leenni ka'am dok kcha' khuwpii avah kordowl pchaang pemeh.
Ungta mii rekki meila plengthida tomkal khat tih khumpthi kchok meh. Pdainu meilakuwng 'leenni mdothiiklu ungta ava ngi inn thuh ka'am mkheng rek hinni mar'aang mdopiiklu.
Ava' hep pih, mii rekki naan anongqhatin deilam donni, parvaan ki A'paan mdoponlor chaakna' raan ki thenni, naan nih ar'aangin avah mii rek hinni aplengin.
Neiya, nowlam rekle' khulpu rek kpenvei rah kurjung ngi mbinmaan. Neiya kpenvei rah kurjung pmaang pdainu avale' kpurtluwm rah kurjung ping.

Neiyi mkindit kat ava' akthepiik inna. Parvaan le' dultipaam mqut chaakduh kpha thung ngi ungta dow mkheng kpurkhum duh khimkheiyi, nowlam thung ki kbih khat mditmata tikjit khadaat ruk kenveivot nimeh.

Avaleiyi, kuwku yoso hava' paupiik rek arlak ki kdilsi khat pkuithida mii morson rek hin rukku ava' heppi mpurchuh bih ava' hep mii avah parvaan kruwngpaalna' thung ngi mikdilsi kdi rah. Pdainu kuwku yoso hava' paupiik rek ava' kopqowi kcha' ungta ava' kpurchuk kcha' mii avah parvaan kruwngpaalna' thung ngi klinsi kdi rah.

Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Mleiya naan ki arinkindit naan ava ngi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy mii rekki lop rek rinkinditna' avah adopkheelin kma'donle naan nih parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah luwt pchaang liit nimaan tih.

Naan nih miipli rek hinni nowlam mih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi mii ado'eyow rang pemeh,” (Mpk. 20:13 Knl. 5:17) mdodit avah ado'arjaak dokin. Ungta kuwku yoso miike'eyou rek avah pau tpinditna' thung ngi ka'am kcha'lam a.

Pdainu Neiyi akthepiik inna kuwku yoso mlei ktaak ki mu'umnau hinni plung kipthit rekka pau tpinditna' ktor'owi chrang ngi ka'am chrah. Ungta kuwku yoso mu'umnau hinni Raca! mdit bih, mma' avah luwsang ktor'owi chrang ngi ka'am a. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih, Ka'aak, mdit bih, mma' avah Simmei ktor'owi chrang ngi ka'am a.
Avaleiyi, nang ngi rintparlaanna' khaan 'leenni chla sinda arhei thung ngi a'leen nih a'uanau vih plung adotupdun psukna' abinphaak cheentung ngi,
Nang ngi achlasin avah tparlaanna' khaan ava' aang ngi ama rah isun. Audilli nang ngi rukrirep pih vang rang ngi a'uanau tung ngi ikalqhat dok thirang ngi arva rah achlasin avah aparlaan cha'.

Nang ngi adokarnaakqhi mii ava' tu' 'lam thuh akilqhi meekin thung ngi kbeisek ki ikolrow dokin. Mditma bih adokarnaakqhi mii ava ngi paukpinditpa hinni akparlaan rah. Ungta paukpinditpa ava ngi nongmii klin hinni nang nga akparlaan rah, ungta nang nga rowng'inn thuh akdaal pthirah.
Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, nang ngi mqutna'dek sumqiit ava' apiikdok duh kpha ngi nang nga ava' thung ki athuh dok pchaanna' m'lam amvot nimeh.
Naan nih miipli rek hinni, nowlam mih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi lowsang adoqhi rang pemeh,” (Mpk. 20:14 Knl. 5:18) mdodit avah ado'arjaak dokin.
Pdainu Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a, tidit tah kuwku yoso snu khat avah daksa dongei miksut tih msut bih, mma ngi muplungril thung ngi mma' avah lowsang mqhi chaak dok a.

Avaleiyi, nang ngi achang ki amik ki khuhsiir atpirthit cheentung ngi avah akhor rah ahin ki avarpthidok. Mleiya adaksa mkheng avah Simmei thuh adotvar pthi rang hinvah adaksa paang khat mkenvei chaak ava ngi nang athen vah kqhasi.

Ungta achang ki akhut tih khuhsiir atpirthit cheentung ngi, areen pthi rah ahin ki avarpthidok. Mleiya adaksa mkheng avah Simmei thuh adotvar pthirang hinvah, adaksa paang khat mkenvei chaak ava ngi nang athen vah kqhasi.
Hava' han'tun nih nowlam mih hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso mnuwn kmapthi mma' ava ngi Tkenqhenna' ki rittikjit khat mhin nih mdopiik rah,” (Knl. 24:1) mdodit.

Pdainu Neiyi kthe a talutalu lei yoso, yowltpurjutna' lei kma'don, mnuwn mkenqhenqhi bih mma ngi mma' avah lowsang mipqhi a. Ungta kuwku yoso tkenqhen qhidok snu ava' kok'onqhi mma' ava' rukku lowsang mqhi a.
Ungta veikhat nowl lih miipli rek hinni nowlam mih mdothe, nang ngi mlangkma'pa ngi pau reelma'. Pdainu nang ngi apaureel avah Kruwng hinni adoparlaan chaak rah mdodit avah naan nih ado'arjaakin.
Pdainu Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a: “Pau reel liit maan. Parvaan thamda pau ruk reelmaan tidit tah havah Isowr kruwng longkhom.
Dulti ruk thamda pau reelmaan, mleiya havah Mma' khuhtherna'. Jerusalem ruk thamda pau reelmaan. Mleiya havah paamkruwng klinsi amna' khuwpii.
Aluwn ruk kmeida pau reelmaan. Mleiya nang ngi asam chai khadaat ruk toppowl mditmata topvom adopchaan pemeh.
Pdainu apauna, ong ngi, adoditin avah ong rah ungta immeh adoditin avah immeh rah! Mleiya talutalu yoso ava' heihin ki avah kqha kma' khat ava' hin ki.”
Naan nih nowlam mih hanto'theda: “Mik khat ki thenni mik khat ungta haa khat ki thenni haa khat,” (Mpk. 21:24 Lev. 24:20 Knl. 19:21) mdodit avah ado'arjaak dokin.
Pdainu Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a: “Kqha kma' miikhat avah pkhaanmaan. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih achang ki aluwbeeng thah atetpeenta, mhin nih mpaang khat thang ruk adowipiik.
Kuwmiikhat tih pau tpinditna' thuh apthuwkda aphriktluwn tolow chaak rah mngei cheentung ngi abuwklum rukka mhin nih apiipthi.
Ungta kuwmiikhat tih mma' tu' kilomitar khat atepche nuwm cheentung ngi, kilomitar 'knii ichet.
Ahin nih akqhil kcha' mma' avah apii. Ungta nang ahin nih turpuwk rah kngei kcha' avah penle pthima'.”
Naan nih nowlam mih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi a'innveen vonsat adolow rah ungta amiihal avah ahalcha',” (Lev. 19:18)mdodit avah ado'arjaak dokin.

Pdainu Neiyi ahin nih kthe a: “Araalmii rekka von'apsatin. Pauhor akbuk rekin avah suwqhat apiin. Aksunum kma' rekin hinni kqha atlown. Ungta mmeel kthi dok ki ako'owrin ungta chii'akpreel rekin ki thenni rin'iktham piikin.

Naan nih parvaan ki A'paan ava' chapa rek akurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni havah atlown. Mleiya, Mma ngi kqha kma' mii rek 'leen ruk kqha mii rek 'leen rukku Mma' hinki kni avah pthuwkda. Ungta Mma ngi mrinkinrit rek 'leen ruk mrinkindit kma' rek 'leen rukku khu prada.
Mleiya naan nih vonsat aklow rekin daat vonsat alow chaak innu, taluda naan nih anongqhat'lotin adophan chaak raanna? Ava' hep avah sumkqhai rek rukku mdotlotin kmah?
Ungta naan nih a'uanau rekin daat arvuwi chaak innu, ava' thung ngi naan nih morson rek heihin nih kqha adotlotin talu ka'am a? Ava' hep avah sumkqhai rek rukku mdotlotin, kmah?
Avaleiyi, parvaan ki A'paan mqhat kurkhum heppi naan rukka aqhatin avah mkurkhum rah.”
Naan nih tpiik chaakna' nong adotlot chaakin avah mii rek dodeh rang ki thenni adotlotmana' raan ikilrin chaan! Mditma bih, parvaan ki A'paan hinki nongqhat'lot adophan raan am nimeh.

Avaleiyi, naan nih tpiik chaakna' nong atlot chaakin thung ngi kqha kpurhuwi rekki sinegog thung ngi ungta khuwpii 'lam rek thung ngi mii rek hinki tkonlorna' mdophan chaakna' raan ki thenni mdotlotin heppi mduh ngi puwtit 'dum maan. Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, mmaan ava' vah mnongqhat'lotin avah marlaan chaak dok inna.
Pdainu naan nih tpiik chaakna' nong atlot chaakin thung ngi, alee ki akhut tih mdotlot avah achang ki akhut pdehma'.
Nang ngi tpiik chaakna' nong avah kordowl lih adotlot chaak rah, ungta kordowl lih ksutpqowi Apa ngi nang anongqhat'lot avah kurphuwng ngi akpii chrah.

Ungta nang ngi rin'aktham chaak thung ngi, kqha kpurhuwi rek hep daat nimtih, tidit tah mmaan nih mii rek dodeh rang ki thenni sinegog thung ngi ungta khuwpii 'lamsiir rek thung ngi rip leekda rintaktham chaak rah mdongei chaakin. Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah mmaan ava' vah mnongqhat'lotin avah marlaan chaak dok inna.

Pdainu nang ngi rin'aktham chaak thung ngi, athina ki a'innkhaar thung ngi iluwt cha'. Ungta nang ngi thurngut arkam dok dilli kordowl lih ka'am Apa hinni rin'iktham cha'. Ungta kordowl lih ka'am, Apa ngi anongqhat'lot avah kurphuwng ngi akpii chrah.
Pdainu rin'aktham chaakin thung ngi Chaatktlei rek heppi msit ktaak pau rek nowl nowlda themaan. Mleiya mmaan nih knempok ki mpauin leiyi, mmaan nah karjaak piik lamrah tidit tih mdobinin.
Avaleiyi, naanna mmaan hep daat maan. Mleiya naan nih adokriinin dow rek avah naan nih aqhil chaak duhn nih A'paan nih avah mdodeh dok.
Avaleiyi, naan nih hanto' heppi rin'aktham chaak raan: “Parvaan thah ka'am Apa, Nah amiing nga Kchiir ikurthuwkso!
Nah akruwngpaalna' kurjung ikurthuwkso. Parvaan thah Aplungngam mdotlotin heppi, Dultipaam thung rukku ikurthuwkso!
Mnitmnit ki kthen chaak raan avah Tuni ngi mheipii chaan.
Ungta neen nih kleenleiyin kervei rek Kdoptlot piikin heppi, Neen kupnu arve rekin avah Mheiptlot piik chaan!
Ungta kepthleem thuh mqhi chmaan, Pdainu kqha kma' khat ava' hinki Mheiqenthuh chaan. Mleiya kruwngpaalna' le' Ruhtanna' ungta tkonlorna' avah Ktlangknai liit kmah ngi Nah adow. Amen.
Mleiya naan nih mii rekki ahinin nih mdoparma dok rekin ava' aptlotpiikin bih, parvaan thah ka'am A'paan rukku akoptlot piik raan.
Pdainu naan nih mii rekki mdoparma dok rekin aptlotpiik maanbi, naan nih adoparmah dok rekin avah A'paan rukku aptlotpiikin nimeh.”

Ungta naan nih then angowlin thung ngi kqha kpurhuwi rekki kya rekrek ruwngchen mdohorin heppi ayatin pandangmaan. Mleiya mmaan nih then mdongowlin avah mii rekki mdodehna' rah mruwngchenin pthit lamda. Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, mmaan ava' vah mnongqhat'lotin avah marlaan chaak dok inna.
Pdainu nang ngi then angowl thung ngi asam avah reidii apubul deek ungta amai aphiit deek.

Mleiya ava ngi nang ngi then angowl a tidit avah mii rek hinni kandang nimeh, pdainu kordowl lih ka'am Apa hin daat tih kandang rah ungta kordowl lih aksutpqowi Apa ngi nang anongqhat'lot avah kurphuwng ngi akpii chrah.
Naan nih reiqha le' thiir'eek dochaakkre rah ungta kupru rekki khordon mdoprut chaak rang ki thenni dulti thuh athen inni alrou purtuwlmaan.
Pdainu reiqha le' thiir'eek dochaakma ungta kupru ngi pkuida mdoprut pchaanmah parvaan thah athen inni alrou apurtuwl chaan.
Mleiya alrou adothiikna' mun ava' thung ngi aplungrin rukka ma'am rah.
Mik avah daksa ki meila. Avaleiyi, amik rinchan mqhat bih, daksa mkheng avah mar'aang ngi kdim rah.

Pdainu amik rinchan mqhatma bih, adaksa mkheng nga kjiingnu ngi kdim rah. Avaleiyi, nang athung ngi ka'am mar'aang avah kjiingnu mkurthuh chaak bih, ava' kjiingnu avah tya klin nih kjiing kcha' daat a.

Kuwkhat leh ngi mukpu 'knii soplow pchaang meh. Mleiya mma ngi khat hal chdon ktlok khat avah vonsat klow chrah. Mditmata, mma ngi khat 'leenni popdon ktlok khat avah tuksut nimeh. Ava' heppi naan nih Isowr le' sum'alrou panthlaangda soplow pchaang nimaan tih.

Avaleiyi, Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a, naan nih arinkumin ki thenni plung pyamaan, talu chanikdi mditmata talu neenikdi tidit leiyi, plung pyamaan. Mditmata adaksa ki thenni talu hilna nikdi' tidit leiyi, plung pyamaan. Mleiya rinkum a thendam han'tun ki ungta daksa avah buwdiir han'tun ki pemeh mow?

Naan nih parvaanlai ki pva rekki rinkum avah asuwn. Mmaan nah chii ruk pqau lammeh mditmata turkun ruk arkun lammeh mditmata ktom rek thung rukku thendam daal lammeh. Pdainu parvaan ki A'paan nih mdopmaal lam. Naanna pva rek han'tun nih asit'in ka'am bet pemeh mow?
Naan arlakin ki kuwda, muplungyat tih mdung khutup khatpang daat yoso kapsaang pchaang nga?

Mdittu' taluleida naan nih, buwdiir leiyi aplungin myat tah. Naan nih paamlai ki duwmrei rek avah kqhajik ki abinphaakin, tidit tah mmaan avah taluhep pih kmowng lam, mmaan nah nong lou lammeh mditmata buw ruk arkhowng lammeh.
Ungta Neiyi ahinin nih akthe a, tidit tah Solomon kpha rukku mokporchon chaakna' mkheng rek thung ngi hava'le' khatpang heppi korthlong pchaang chmeh.

Oh, mlamrin kdil'suwn rek naan, hanto ngi, tuni vah paamlaiyi ke'er rih mowngda ka'am ungta pduknii vah meiqhuwm thung ngi tvarpthi rang nowm rek avah Isowr rih hanto ngi buwdiir mapnaak lammu, naan ngaalla kerkheelsi ngi apnaakin nimeh mow?
Avaleiyi, naan nih plung pyamaan. Talu tchaak rang? Talu tneek rang? Mditmata, talu tnaak rang? dimaan.
Mleiya Chaatktlei rekki hava' dow mkheng rek avah thlaam kchok lamda. Parvaan ki A'paan nih hava' dow rek mkheng akriin inna tidit tah mdodeh.
Pdainu rukrirep pih, naan nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' ungta Mma' rinkinditna' ava' athlaam chaan ungta ava' 'leenni naan ahin nih dow mkheng avah akthlol piik chraan.
Ava'leiyi pduknii ki thenni plung pyamaan. Mleiya pduknii ki a pduknii ngi kilrinqhi chdaat rah. Mnitmnit ki myatna' ava ngi mnit ava' ki thenni kkhom kcha'.
A'leen nih mii ngi pau mdopindit mana' rah mii 'leenni pau pinditma'.
Mleiya nang ngi mii rek hinni pau adopindit heppi mii rek rukku a'leen nih pau kpindit rah. Ungta nang ngi adopertetna' kat ava ngi nang rukka akpertet perheel lamrah.
Ungta nang ngi amik thung ki siktu ka'am kdei kmah taluhep pih nang ngi a'uanau rek mik thung ki ktobor ka'am avah adosutto?
Ungta asuw, amik thung ki siktu ka'am daat tih taluhep pih a'uanau rek hinni, amik thung ki ktobor ayulowpiik nih dipchaang na?
Kqha kpurhuwi rek naan! Rukrirep pih amikin thung ki siktu avah aloupthiin, ungta audilli a'uanau rek mik thung ki ktobor ka'am avah kindit tih deinaan.

Naan nih dow kchiir avah ui rek hinni piimaan, ungta vak rek hinni pearllung avah pthipiikmaan. Mleiya mmaan nih mkhuhn nih therkrep lam thidon kerheel lamdon nih naanna mikqiik mikqiik ki akakvai krep raan.
Aqhil chaan ungta naan ahin nih avah akpii raan. Athlaam chaan, naan nih phang chnaandi'. Ungta inn aqhil chaan, thurngut akpvanpiik chraan.
Mleiya kqhil kcha' khimkhei rekki mdo'arlaan chaakin. Ungta kthlaam kcha' mma' ava ngi kphang chrah. Ungta inn kqhil kcha' mma' hinni thurngut kapvanpiik rah.
Naan arlak inni mchapa ngi thenpen mqhilna mhin nih lung kpii kuw ka'am?
Mditmata tuwlvah mqhil thung ngi mhin nih pruwl kpii rang mow?

Mdittu' kqha kma' naan maklu ngi anau rekin hinni chla kqha rek avah taluhep pih tpiik rang tidit deiyin tinu. Ava' vah parvaan thah ka'am A'paan nih kqhil kcha' rek hinni chla kqha rek avah tya knem mih kpii rang ngo!
Avaleiyi, talutalu yoso mii rekki naan ahin nih mdotlot raan adongeiyin avah naan rukku mii rek hinni atlown. Mleiya havah Nowlam mih ungta Khulpu rekki mdothe ava'.
Paltong ktirbik thung ngi iluwt chaan. Tkenvei chaakna' thah kqhi paltong avah kquwm ungta 'lam avah kparja. Ungta ava' thuh kluwt mii knem.
Mleiya rinkum tphanna' thah kqhi paltong avah ktirbik ungta 'lam avah kdil ungta mii ktlowm 'suwn nih 'lam avah mdophan chaak.
Naan nih yaudona hilnada naan ahin nih kthleng mlangkma' khulpu rek hinki ikilrin chaan. Mleiya mmaan nah, mthung innu tiqit kervei tkeikraang rek hep daat lam.
Naan nih mmaan avah mcheiyin ava ngi tin naandi'. Mii rekki riithlum chei avah turmuw tirlingbul rek thung ki mditmata kduwt tah lingkhubul 'leen ki myau kchown mow?
Ava' heppi mdingbul kqha khimkheiyi mchei kqha kcheilu. Ungta kqha kma' ding ava ngi kqha kma' kcheilu.
Dingbul kqha ava ngi mchei kqha kma' kchei pchaang pemeh, mditmata kqha kma' dingbul ava ngi mchei kqha chei pchaang meh.
Kqha kchei kma' ding khimkhei rek avah phuwr pthida ungta mei thung ngi tbunpthilu.
Avaleiyi, mmaan ki mcheiyin ava ngi mmaan avah deinaandi'.
Nei kihin nih, ‘Kruwng, Kruwng’ kdi kcha' khimkhei rek ava ngi parvaan kruwngpaalna' thuh kluwt rang ava' pemeh. Pdainu parvaan thah ka'am Kpa plungbin ktlow kcha' mma' ava' rah.

Nit ava' thung ngi mii knempok ki kihin nih, ‘Kruwng, Kruwng, neen nih Nah amiing 'leenni pau purphuwng chmaan ring mowi? Nah amiing 'leenni tarnam rek avah reipthi maanring mow, ungta Nah amiing 'leenni ruhtannong rek knempok ki tlow maanring mow?’ kdi lamrah.
Ungta audilli, Neiyi mmaan hinni hanto' pandang nikdi'. ‘Neiyi teden rukku naanna adei maanring. Nowlam tukksut kma' rek naan kihin ki isun dokin!’
Avaleiyi, Nei kihin ki hava' pauna rek arja chda ungta ava' kopqowi kcha' rek mmaan avah Neiyi lungpii 'leenni mi'inn ksa kcha' mii kinrit ava' hep daat purthuh nikdi'.
Ungta khu rada dii linda ungta tirthli raangda ungta inn avah eida pdainu inn avah tluwmeh. Mleiya mma ngi mi'innmun avah lung 'leenni mdophun dok.
Ungta 'tunnu hava' Nei kpauthe arja chthida ava' kopqowi kma' mmaan khimkhei rek avah sitphui 'leenni mi'inn ksa, kokmok khat ava' hep daat lamrah.
Ungta khu rahda ungta dii linda ungta tirthli raangda ungta inn avah eida ungta inn avah tluw chda. Ungta mtluk avah kdung ngi mmeel kthi ngi ktluw kcha'.”
Ungta Jisu ngi hava' pauna rek mthepqut dok le' hanto' thuwkda tidit tah miipii rekki Mma ngi mdopurchuh lam ava' 'leenni ngakyou chlamda.
Mleiya Mma ngi mpurchuh lam thung ngi nowlam chukpu rek dopurchuh hep daat kmah ngi ruhtanna' ksin kat heppi purchuk lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi lown 'leen ki murjungqum thung ngi miipii knempok rekki Mma'dil qowi lamda.
Ungta asuwn, raichi ktong miikhat thlengda Mhin nih luwbu chda ungta hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi abin bih, Nang ngi neiya mpertleu pchaang nadi'!”
Audilli Jisu ngi mkhut heikhiingda mdak kmei thida hanto'theda: “Ou, Neiyi kbin a, Nang nga ikertleu cha'!” Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi mma' avah mraichii arve thung ki pertleu chda.

Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Asuw o, kuwkhat leh hinni havah thema'. Pdainu nang ngi vang rang ngi thimpu hinni adaksa avah ikterdet cha'. Ungta mmaan thenni rinpaumin khat mkurthuhna' rah Moses paupiik dilkqowiyi chla avah aparlaan cha'.”
'Tunnu Jisu ngi Kapernaum khuwpii thuh mvanluw thungta raalmii arja khat kpu khat tih Mhin nih thlengda mdobom chaakna' rah qhil chda.
Ungta hanto'theda: “Kruwng ksuwk khat avah kyengrii ngi kowida inn thah koplowm chdaat. Ungta mmah kdung ngi kdung perteel chda.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Neiyi arvada mma' avah pdam nikdi'.”

Ungta raalmii arja khat kpu ava ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Kruwng nei ki'inn thah Nang athlenna' ki mtik kcha pmaang. Pdainu pau hehe daat tih mheithe piikcha' ungta ava ngi ksuwk avah kdam chdaat rah.

Mleiya nei rukka ruhtan kpu khat tih ka'am kcha' miikhat ping. Nei kti thah raalmii rek kdothlowi lam. Ungta Neiyi hava'le' khat hinni thenu, Va! kdit cheu, kva. Ungta hava'le' morson khat hinni, Arvang! kdit cheu, karvang, ungta neiyi ksuwk hinni havah atlow, kdit cheu mma ngi avah mdotlot.”

Jisu ngi hava' marjaak thungta ngakda ungta Mma'dil kqowimeek rek hinni theda: “Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat kthe a. Neiyi hava' hep daat tih klin nih lamkrin kcha' mii avah Isreel mii rek arlak rukku ka'am deimaang.

Ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah knithuhna' le' knitlaakna' ktong ki mii knempok ki kthleng lamrah. Ungta parvaan kruwngpaalna' thung ngi mmaan nih, Abraham le' Aijek ungta Jakob le' tung ngi kok'ongsap lamrah.
Pdainu kruwngpaalna' ki mii rek avah duwn ki kjiing thung ki kjiingnu thung ngi, kvarpthi lamrah, Mun ava' thung ngi kqap le' haa tikriilna' kthuwk chrah.”
Audilli Jisu ngi raalmii arja khat kpu ava' hinni theda: “Vangsun chdaat. Nang ngi lam'adorin chaak ava' heppi nang athenni avah ikurthuwkso. Ungta qhang ava'kat thung ngi msuwk avah dam chda.”
'Tunnu Jisu ngi Pitar inn thuh mthlen thungta Mma ngi Pitar ktarnuh avah rih doknow ngi kowida kowm 'leenni ki'iip daat deida.
Ungta Mma ngi mkhut kmeipiikda ungta rih ngi mdoknow avah qha chda. Audilli mma ngi kerdelda Mma' avah soptolow chaak pqhunda.

Ungta klu ki mpha mve thungta mmaan nih ram kervei mii knempok rek avah Mma' hinni paphaak lamda. Ungta Mma ngi pthla rek avah pau daat tih reipthi lamda. Ungta Mma ngi kkowi rek mkheng avah pdam lamda.
Khulpu Isaiah ngi hanto'theda: “Mma ngi neen ki tyentkhowina' rek avah milowpiikda. Ungta no'omlai rekin avah mihorpiik inda,” (Is. 53:4) mdodit ava' kurkhumna ngi Mma ngi havah mdotlot.
'Tunnu Jisu ngi miipii rekki Mma' mdotkhul doklam ava' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi truwnpii raalpha khat thah mvansunna' raan ki thenni paupiik khat pii lamda.
Audilli nowlam chukpu khat thlengda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Chukpu, neiyi tva'tva' thang yoso Nah achena' thung ngi aqowi chnikdi'.”
Mthungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Tkei rekka mkhorin ka'am ungta parvaanlai ki pva rekka mbuwn ka'am. Pdainu Mii Chapa avah mluw thiik chaakna' rang mun kpha rukka ka'am pemeh.”
Audilli Msikhu ktlok khat tih Mhin nih theda: “Kruwng rukri ngi kpa kdo'alruwl rah mheirot piikcha'.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Nei mheiqowi, tidit tah kdiyou ava ngi mmaan ki kdiyou rek avah kulruwl chdaat lamrah.”
'Tunnu Mma ngi arkuwng thuh mkal thungta, Msikhu rekki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih truwnpii 'leenni tchangkhu kdung ngi raangda. Ungta diinuk ki arkuwng avah pkhum pthida pdainu Jisu a ki'iip chdaat.
Audilli Msikhu rekki Mhin nih thleng lamda, perdel lamda ungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng mheisan chaan! Neenna kdiyou chrah ktheen a.”

Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mlamrin kdil'suwn rek naan, taluleiyi aninginkqi a?” Audilli Mma ngi kerdelda tirthli rekle' truwnpii avah raida. Ungta ava' thuh mmaan avah kdung ngi dairimsi ngi am chlamda.
Ungta mii rekka ngak lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Taluhep kduh ki mii daatda havah, tirthli rekle' truwnpii kpha rukku mpauthe mdopqowi a!”

Ungta Mma ngi mraalpha khat ki Gadara mii rek khuwpaam mheiphaak thungta Mma ngi ram kervei mii'knii rek kurdutqhi lamda. Mmaanve avah thlaan thung ki kthuwk lam, ungta kdungreen nih eenghal mdotlot kchown leiyi, kuwkhat leh rukka ava' 'lampii thung ngi korlon pchaang pemeh.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaanve ngi owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Isowr Chapa Jisu, Nang ngi neenna talu mporlownaan? Nang nga, neenve suwk mkupthuwk raanni mpha mveduh ngi kthleng ptimow?”
'Tunnu mheihin set inni vakluwng knempok khat kmaal daat lam.
Ungta tarnam rek ava ngi hanto' the lamda Mma' hinni ktham chlamda: “Nang ngi atvarpthiin cheentung ngi wva' vakluwng rek hinni mheisi chaan.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Vangin!” Ungta mmaan nih arvang thuwk dok lam thida vakluwng rek hinni luwt chlamda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih vakluwng rek mkheng avah kaptrak lamda truwnpii biing ki khamkuwk thung ngi jungluwt ter chlamda ungta mkheng inni dii kporlowter kcha'lam.

Audilli mmaan kapmaal rek avah chen chalamda. Mmaan nih khuwpii thuh vangchen lamda ungta vak rek hinki kthuwk dow khimkhei avah vansong lamda. Ungta mmaan nih ram kervei mii rek 'leenni talu kthuwk tidit rukka vansong lamda.
Ungta asuwn! Khuwpii thung ki mii mkheng avah Jisu kurdutqhi rang ki thenni thuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mdeh chaak dokin dilli, Mma' hinni mmaan paamkuwl thung ki msundokna' rah ktham chlamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi arkuwng 'leenni kalda raalpha vangklaanda ungta mkhuwpii vangtlung chda.

Ungta asuwn, mmaan nih kyengrii ktong kcha' miikhat avah kpher 'leenni ki'iip daat tih Mma' hinni paphaak lamda. Ungta Jisu ngi mlamrinin mdeh thungta kyengrii ktong kcha' ava' hinni theda: “Kchapa, plung pyama' apnu arve rek avah atoptlot piik dok a.”
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih nowlam Chukpu rek aangqhe ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “Hava' mii ava' vah pauleh mthe a.”
Ungta Jisu ngi muplungbin rekin avah deithida hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih aplungril inni kqha kma' adobin inda?
Mleiya tva ngi tethe ko'olbet tah? Apnu arve rek avah atoptlot piik dok a, tidit ava' mow, Irip rang ngi isun cha', tidit tih ko'olbet tah?

Pdainu havah naan nih Mii Chapa ava ngi dultipaam thuh pnu rek toptlot piikna' ruhtan mdothlowi tidit adodehna' raan ki then.” Audilli Mma ngi kyengrii ktong kcha' mii ava' hinni theda: “Ikerdel rang ngi a'iina' kpher akyul rah a'inn thah isun cha'.”
Ungta mma ngi ripda mi'inn thah sun chda.
Miipii rekki ava' mdeh thuwnta ngak lamda ungta dultimii rek hinni hava' hep daat ruhtanna' mdopiik leiyi, Isowr rah ponlor chlamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi ava' thung ki mchethlen thungta, Mma ngi mmiing Metthiu mdodit miikhat avah sum tqhaina'inn thung ngi kok'ong daat deida. Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih: “Nei mheiqowi!” dida. Ungta mma ngi ripda Mma'dil qowi chda.

Ungta Mma ngi inn thuh kmaal rah khaan 'leenni ko'ongda ma'am daat arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah asuwn, sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek knempok rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Jisu le' Msikhu rek tung ngi kmaal rah khaan 'leenni ko'ongsap lamda.
Ungta Pharisy lop thung ki mii rekki ava' mdehn thungta Msikhu rek hinni the lamda: “Taluleiyi naan ki chukpu vah sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rektu' kmaalsap lam mow?”
Pdainu Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mruh ktang rek thenvah, riipu a msit ka'am pemeh. Pdainu kkowi rekki thennu msit ka'am.

Pdainu naan nih vangin rang ngi, ‘Neiyi rintparlaan ava' pemeh plungnee ava' kdongeen chaak,’ (Hos. 6:6) mdodit havah talu mdothena, tidit ava' ikurchuk chaan. Mleiya Neiya mrinkindit rek ko'own rah kurjung pmaang pdainu plung tperthlenna' thuh pnu kervei rek ko'own chrah kurjung ping.”
Audilli Johon sikhu rek arva lamda ungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Pharisy lop thung ki mii rekle' neenna then ngowl tlit kchok innu. Pdainu taluleiyi Nah asikhu rekka then mdongowlin pemeh?”

Mthungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kmoukpu ava ngi mmaan tu' ma'am daat arlaan nuh kmoukpu plap rekka kqapkqei chlam rang mow? Pdainu kmoukpu avah mmaan hinki mdo’arjuk low pthina' mpha karvang rah, ungta audilrow ngi mmaan nih then kngowlrow lamrah.
Kuwkhat leh ngi buwpli 'leennu buwlaak kkerqen mlai avah kleng ngi lot kchok meh. Mleiya tutphutna' kleng ava ngi ngi buwpli avah kpotdon kdungbet tih kpilqi rah.

Ungta thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel pli thung ngi tadaal kcho pemeh. Mditma bih saavun thowldiibeel avah kqe chrah ungta thowldii avah kyaanter chrah ungta saavun thowldiibeel avah kartlai chrah. Pdainu thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel ren thung ngi tdaal rah, mdit bih ava ngi mikniing ngi karkhaal chrah.”

Mma ngi mmaan hinni hava' dow rek mthemeek arlaan nih asuwn paamkpu khat thlengda Mma' hinni luwbuk chda. Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kchanu a 'tunkat diyou chda. Pdainu arva rang ngi m'leen nih akhut mheithiik piikcha', mdit bih mmah kring chrah.”
Mthungta Jisu ngi ripda mdil vanqowida ungta Msikhu rek rukku vanqowi lamda.
Ungta asuwn, kum sowm lei'knii thung ngi hii ngi yaanda suwk kthuwk kcha' snu khat ava ngi mdilpang thah thuwkda ungta Mma' buwdiir mowr avah kmei chda.
Mleiya mma ngi mthina hanto' kerthe chda: “Neiyi Mma' buwdiir hehe kthown chaak bih, neiya dam chnikdi'.”
Ungta Jisu ngi kerheelda ungta snu ava' mdehkhot thungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kchanu plung pyama' alamrin chaak ki atapdam chaak dok a.” Ungta snu avah mpha ava' kat thung ngi dam chda.
Ungta Jisu ngi paamkpu ava' inn mphaak thungta Mma ngi spirthiil kdum rek ungta vaangklum dok ki miipii rek kqapkqei avale' avah deida.
Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Ikorsown dokin, mleiya snunau havah kdiyou pemeh, mmah ki'iip chngaal.” Ungta mmaan nih mningqhuwm inni pnichaak lamda.
Pdainu miipii rek avah duwn mupthuh dok lam dilli, Mma ngi vangluwtda mma' avah mkhut thah kyowngda qenpripda, ungta snunau avah kerdelda.
Ungta hava' pauson avah mpaam mkheng thung ngi karjaam dokda.
Jisu ngi ava' thung ki msun dok thungta mmikktot chai 'knii rekki Mma'dil qowi lamda. Mmaanve ngi owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “David Chapa, neenve a plung mheipnee chaan.”

Ungta Mma ngi inn thuh mluw dok thungta mmikktot rek avah Mhin nih thleng lamda. Ungta Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi, Neiyi havah ktlow pchaang rah tidit lam'arin chaak inna?” Mmaanve ngi the lamda: “Ou, Kruwng.”
Audilli Mma ngi mmaanve mik avah kmeida ungta hanto'theda: “Naanve alamrin chaakin ki dilkqowiyi ahinin nih ikurthuwkso!”
Ungta mmaanve mik avah anto ngi har chda. Ungta Jisu ngi mmaanve avah, hanto'theda, kdung ngi pilqhit lamda. “Asuwn, kuwkhat leh ngi hava' avah dei mso.”
Pdainu mmaanve ngi msun dokin thungta Mma' leiki pau avah khuwpaam mkheng thung ngi parjaam lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih anto ngi mvanin thungta, asuwn, mmaan nih Mma' hinni ram kervei ungta mpau kthuwk kma' miikhat paphaak lamda.

Ungta tarnam ava' mreipthi dok dilli mpau kthuwk kma' mii avah pauda. Ungta miipii rekka mningin ngak chda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Kuwkhat leh ngi hava' hep daat avah Isreel khuwpaam thung ngi tdehmlaiyin.”
Pdainu Pharisy lop thung ki mii rekvah hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi havah tarnampii amleiyi tarnam rek avah mdorei pchaan.”

Ungta Jisu ngi khuwpii rek mkheng thuh ungta khuw rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda, mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi purchuk lamda. Ungta kruwngpaalna' ki kqhapaumin avah parjaamda, ungta mii rek arlak ki mdetmdet tih kkowi rek ungta mdetmdet ki omlai rek mkheng avah pdamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi miipii rek mdeh thungta mmaan 'leenni plung pkham chlamda. Mleiya mmaan avah kya dok ki kerjeiter chda ka'am ungta kqhi chrah yauqhi ktaak yau rek hep daat lam.
Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni theda: “Dakat tih turkun rang nga knempok ki ka'am a, pdainu kurkun rang rekka ktlowm 'suwn lam a.
Avaleiyi, kurkun chrah Kruwng ava' hinni, Mma' louthuh nong klou rek mdopthlatna' rah rin'iktham chaan.”

Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu sowm lei'knii rek avah Mhin nih mo'own doklam dilli, tarnam ktobor rek treipthina' ruhtan pii lamda. Ungta Mma ngi, mmaan hinni mdetmdet tih kkowi rek ungta mdetmdet ki omlai rek tapdamna' ruhtan pii lamda.
'Tunnu hava'le' avah tamsi sowm lei'knii rekki mmiing rekin ava'. Mkhatna' avah Pitar mdoditin Simon ungta mnaupa Andria ungta Jebedi chapa James le' mnaupa Johon.
Philip le' Bartholomio, Thomas le' sumkqhai Metthiu, Alphius chapa James ungta mphung miing Thadias mdoditin Lebbias.
Jealot mdoditin Simon le' Jisu kyur kcha' Kerioth ki Judas.

Hava' sowm lei'knii rek avah Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto' paupiik khat piilam thida mmaan avah pthla lamda. “Naan nih Chaatktlei rek 'lam, qowida chetmaan ungta Samaria mii rekki khuwpii rek thung ngi luwtmaan.
Pdainu naan nih Isreel innkhor rek thung ki kenvei dok kcha' yau ava' hinni ichetin.
Ungta naan nih aheicheen chunni, parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah knaitek kcha' a, adiin rang ngi pau aparjaamin.
Kkowi rek apdamin. Raichi kervei rek apertleuin. Kdiyou rek aperdelin. Tarnam rek areipthiin. Mkhon ktaak ki naan nih ado'arlaan chaakin avah mkhon ktaak ki apiin.
Arkowljeelin sumbuwr thung ngi jiiring mditmata jiipowl mditmata jiisen horda chetmaan.
Naan nih kipjiin rang ngi thowngya horda chetmaan. Naan nih phrik 'knii mditmata khuhkok 'knii mditmata kchung sinda chetmaan, tidit tah ‘nong klou kcha' mma' avah thendam kphang kcha' ki mtik kcha.’

Ungta tva'tva' thung yoso naan nih aluwnaan khuwpii mditmata khuwklin thung ngi, naan nih atlun naan ava' thung ngi takyat chaak mtik kcha kuw ka'am a, tidit akheel chaan. Ungta asuwn, naan nih mmun ava' amaakduhn kpha thung ngi ava' thuh i'am daatin.
Ungta naan nih inn khat thuh aluwn thung ngi inn avah kqha ngi arvuwi chaan.

Ungta inn ava ngi karlaang rang mtik kcha mkurthuh cheentung ngi naan aplungdaiyin avah ava' 'leenni i'amso. Pdainu karlaang ki mtik kcha kma' rang mkurthuh cheentung ngi aplungdaiyin avah a'leenin nih ikenle chso.
Ungta kuwku yoso naan akarlaang kma' mditmata apauthe rekin karja kma' rek avah naan nih khuwpii mditmata inn ava' thung ki asunin thung ngi naan nih akhuh arbaatin avah akqhot psukin.
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah pau tpinditna' nit ava' thung ngi khuwpii ava' hinvah Sodom le' Gomorah paam rek pleh ngi mraal suwkthuhna' avah ko'olbet tih kdiil chlam rah.
Asuwn! Neiyi naan avah yausuwn heppi tkeikraang rek arlak ki akapthlat inna. Avaleiyi, naan nih pruwl rek heppi ikinritin ungta uqhu rek heppi mqhatma ktaak ikurthuwkin.
Pdainu mii rek hinki ikilrin chaan. Mleiya mmaan nih luwsang thuh akparlaan raan. Ungta mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi khuikin kchung ngi akbun raan.
Ungta mmaan hinni ungta Chaatktlei rek hinni rinpaumin tpiikna' rang ki thenni Nei kleiyi naan avah paamkpu rekle' paamkruwng rek hinni akqhi raan.
Pdainu mmaan nih atparlaanin ki mpha thung ngi naan nih taluhep pih mditmata talu the nikdi' tidit leiyi, aplungin pyamaan, tidit tah mpha ava' thung ngi adothe raan avah akpii chdaat raan.
Mleiya kpau rang avah naan pemeh, pdainu A'paan Pthla ava ngi naan athung inni kpau chrah.

'Tunnu mu'umnau vih mu'umnau khat avah tidiyowna' thuh kparlaan chrah. Ungta mpa ngi mnau avah kparlaan pthi rah. Ungta nau rekki mnuhmpa kepteng ngi krip rah. Ungta mmaan mdo'eyowna' raan ktlow lamrah.
Ungta Nei kmiing leiyi, mii mkheng ngi akahal chraan. Pdainu mqutna' kpha thung ngi kdiil kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah.

Pdainu mmaan nih hava' khuwpii thung ngi chii'atepreelin thung ngi naan nih morson khat thah ichenin. Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya Mii Chapa ava' murjun duh kpha ngi naan nih Isreel khuwpii rek mkheng thung ngi kthleng ngi chetthuh dok nimaan tih.
Sikhu khat avah mma' chukpu karthak ki pemeh mditmata suwk khat ava' ruk mma' kpupa karthak ki pemeh.

Sikhu ava ngi mma' chukpuhep mkurthuh chaak rang ungta suwk ava ngi mma' kpupahep mkurthuh chaak rang avah anto'kat tih mkurthuh rah. Mmaan nih inn kpupa avah Beeljibub mdit innu, mi'inn thuh ka'am rek ngaalla tya knem mih kthepsuk lam rang ngo!
Avaleiyi, mmaan avah qi chmaan. Mleiya pkhumda kandang kma' rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh, ungta kordowlda kandang kma' rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
Talutalu yoso kjiingnu thuh ahinin nih kdothe avah mar'aang thuh atheen. Ungta aknaan nih ado'arjaakin avah, inntun thah aparjaamin.
Ungta naan nih daksa ke'eyou pchaang pdainu pthlarin ke'eyou pchaang kma' avah qi chmaan. Pdainu daksa le' pthlarin mikniing ngi Simmei thung ngi kpenvei pchaang Mma' avah naan nih aqi chaan.
Chaichvi 'knii rek avah jiisen sumqiit 'suwn khat khonda tyur chaak lupda? Pdainu naan ki A'paan plungbin kma'don mmaan arlak ki khadaat ruk dulti thah ktla lam pemeh.
Pdainu naan aluw chaiyin 'leen ki asamin avah mkheng ngi ttaidok.
Avaleiyi, ningpqit maan. Naanna chaichvi knempok rek hinni asit'in ka'am bet.
Avaleiyi, kuwku yoso mii rek aang ngi Nei mek the thuh kcha' mma' avah Nei rukku parvaan thah ka'am Kpa aang ngi mma' avah thethuh chnikdi'.
Pdainu kuwku yoso mii rek aang ngi Nei makmat kcha' mma' avah, Nei rukku parvaan thah ka'am Kpa aang ngi mma' avah mat chnikdi'.
Dultipaam thuh Neiya plung kdai horda kurjung rah mbinmaan. Neiya plung kdai kohor rah kurjung pmaang pdainu raal'kaang kpii rang ki ping.
Mleiya Neiya: ‘Miikhat tih mpa kepteng ngi Ungta chanu khat tih mnuh kepteng ngi Ungta kmou khat tih maktarnuh kepteng ngi ma'amna' rah’ kurjung ping.
Ungta ‘Miikhat ki mmiihal rang rek avah Mi'inn kat thung ki mii rek ava' rah.’ (Mai. 7:6)

Nei vonsat mdotolow chaak han'tun nih mnuh mditmata mpa vonsat klow kcha' mma' avah Nei kthen nuh msit amna' ammeh. Nei vonsat mdotolow chaak han'tun nih mchanu mditmata mchapa vonsat klow kcha' mma' avah Nei kthen nuh mtik chameh.
Ungta mdaksa ki khros kohor kmah ngi Nei kdilkqowi kcha' mma' avah Nei kthen nuh mtik chameh.
Mrinkum kphang kcha' mma' ava ngi kpartlai chrah. Ungta Nei kthen nih mrinkum kpartlai kcha' mma' ava ngi avah kphang chrah.
Naan akarlaang kchaan mma' ava ngi Nei ruk mtarlaan chaak a. Ungta Nei mkarlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi Mma' avah marlaan chaak a.

Khulpu khat avah khulpu khat miing 'leenni karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi khulpu khat ki nongqhat'lot avah karlaang chrah. Ungta mrinkindit khat avah mrinkindit khat miing 'leenni karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi mrinkindit khat ki nongqhat'lot avah karlaang chrah.

Ungta kuwku yoso hava' kdil'suwn rek hinni diisik tong khatpang daat yoso sikhu khat miing 'leenni mdoneek rah kpii kcha' ma'am bih, Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah Mma ngi mnongqhat'lot avah partlaivot chnimeh.”
Jisu ngi Msikhu sowm lei'knii rek hinni paupiik mpiik dok lam dilli, Mma ngi mmaan khuwpii rek thung ngi kpurchuk rah ungta kparjaam rang ki thenni Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki sun chda.
Ungta Johon nih rowng'inn thuh ma'am chaak daat chunni, Khrista nongtlot rek ava' marjaak thungta mma ngi msikhu 'knii rek avah heipthla lamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' hinni the lamda: “Nang nga kurjung rang Khat ava' ptimow, mmow neen nih morson khat sutthlaam nikaandi o?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi vangin rang ngi ado'arjaakin ungta amikdeh rekin avah Johon hinni vansongin.

Mleiya mmikktot rekki khudei chlamda ungta mkhuh kyeng rek chet lamda. Ungta raichi ktong rek kertleu chlamda ungta kna kbeeng rekki khu'arja chlamda. Ungta kdiyou rek kerdel lamda ungta srah rek hinni kqhapaumin avah karjaam chda.
‘Ungta Nei kleiyi khuhsiir kpirthi kcha' kma' mma' avah msuwkqha a.’ ”
Ungta mmaanve mvansunin arlaan nih Jisu ngi miipii rek hinni Johon leiyi, tpau pqhunda. “Naan nih paamkbiik lai thah talu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Tirthli ngi mdoknow piipe ksuw rah kchetin ptimow?
Pdainu naan nih talu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Buwdiir kperneem mih korthlong miikhat ksuw rah kchet inpti? Mkindit kat tih buwdiir kperneem kna rek avah paamkruwng inn thuh ka'am kcha' lam.
Pdainu naan nih talu ksuw rah kchet inpti, ‘khulpu khat mow?’ Ou, Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a, ungta avah khulpu khat kkheel.
Mleiya havah mma' leiyi, hanto' kjitda ka'am mma' ava': ‘Asuw, Neiyi aduh thah Nei kpausikhu khat kapthlat a Mma ngi Nang alam rang avah adusuk ki akporthlon piik rah,’ (Mal. 3:1) mdodit.
Neiyi mkindit kat ahinin nih kthe a. Snu thung ki kqou rek arlak ki dii kupluwt Johon hinni klin khadaat ruk qou mlai. Pdainu parvaan kruwngpaalna' thung ngi kdilsi mma' ava ngi mma' hinni klin rah.
Pdainu dii kupluwt Johon ki mpha thung ki ngi 'tun kpha thung ngi parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah eenghal thuh suwk thuwk chda. Ungta eenghal kthe rekki avah raanni mlow chaak inna.
Mleiya Khulpu rekle' Nowlam mkheng ngi Johon ki mpha arvankpha ki avah mdopurphuwn dokin.
Ungta naan nih ava' tarlaan chaak rah abinin bih, mmah karvang bei rang Elaijah ava'.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.
Pdainu Neiyi hava' tunpha ki suruwl rek avah talutu' portol lam nikdi o? Mmaan avah kyurkren mun thung ngi ko'ongda mmiiqhi ownda hanto' kthe, nau rek hep daat lam.

Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: ‘Neen nih naan athenni spirthiil a'dumpiik innu, Ungta naanna kardaam maan tinu. Ungta neen nih naan ahin nih, Plung kdung ngi archam lou innu Pdainu naanna archam loumaan tinu.’
Mleiya Johon thlengda ungta thendam ruk chameh ungta tneek ruk neemeh. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah ‘ram merve a’, dilamda.

Ungta Mii Chapa ava' arjungda, chada, needa. Ungta mmaan nih, ‘asuwn, hava' mii avah mpowibuwr kparja ungta thowldii buwr,’ dilamda. Ungta ‘Mmah sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek plap,’ dilamda. Pdainu luwkinritna' avah kindit tidit tih mnau leh ngi mpandan chaak inna.’ ”
Audilli Mma ngi Mma' ki ruhtannong rek knem mih mdotlotna' khuwpii rek avah trai chaak pqhunda. Mleiya mmaan nih plung mdoperthlen chaakin pemeh.

Korasin nang a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a! Bethsaida nang a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a! Mleiya naan athung ngi totlot ruhtannong rek avah Tair le' Sidon thung ngi ntlotpleh bih, choduduh ngi mmaan nih plung perthleng chlamdon mqamqei chaak inni buwkthi hilna lamdon purvuwt kurbuk dok thuh chlam rah.
Pdainu Neiyi kthe a, Tair le' Sidon nih pau tpinditna' nit ava' thung vah, naan ahin innu ko'olbet tih kdiil pchaang chlam rah.

Ungta parvaan kpha ngi kakparthaang kcha', Kapernaum nang avah Kdikhuw thah akapthla pthi rah. Mleiya nang athung ngi totlot ruhtannong rek avah Sodom thuh ntlotpleh bih, tuni kpha mmaan avah ka'am daat lamrah.
Pdainu Neiyi kthe a, Sodom paam pleh ngi pau tpinditna' nit ava' thung vah naan ahin innu ko'olbet tih kdiil pchaang chrah.

Mpha ava' thung ngi Jisu ngi arthaangda hanto'theda: “Parvaan le' dultipaam ki Kruwng, O Apa! Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah mii kinrit rekle' luwkinrit rek hinni dowl thitih nau rek hinni adopandan piiklam leiyi, akpanpaak chaak a.
Kqha a, Apa, tidit tah Nang amiksut thung ngi aplung kngam mih adobin ava' heppi ikurthuwkso!

Kpa ngi, dow mkheng avah Nei kihin nih mparlaan chda. Pa ava' kma'don Chapa avah morson kuwkhat leh ngi deimeh. Ungta Chapa ava' kma'don Pa avah morson kuwkhat leh ngi deimeh. Ungta Chapa ava ngi tpandan piik rah mdongeina' mma' hinni Pa avah mdopandan chaak.
Kya ngi nong klou kcha' ungta bowrkrik kohor kcha' rek naan akhengin avah, Nei kihin nih arva chaan, Neiyi tkarngatna' ayupii chaan nih.
Nei kreengkol avah a'leen inni alouin ungta Nei kihin ki ikurchuk chaan. Mleiya Neiya kuplung kdowng ungta kuplung kqha ungta naan nih apthlarinin ki thenni tkarngat chaak phang chnaandi'.
Mleiya Nei kreengkol avah karmang deek ungta Nei kbowrrii avah kthowm.”
Mpha ava' thung ngi Jisu ngi tkarngatnit tih chapaar amna' loulai rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda. Ungta Msikhu rekka mpowiyin tham chda, chapaar mowr rek avah jauda tchaak pqhun lamda.
Pdainu Pharisy rekki ava' mdehn thungta Mhin nih the lamda: “Asuw o, Nah asikhu rekvah tkarngatnit tih nowlam mih totlot mdorotma ava' mtlot inna.”
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih David le' mma' tu' kilqhi mmiiqhi rekki mpowiyin mtham thuh talu mtlotin tidit avah parcham maan timow?

Mma ngi taluhep pih Isowr inn thung ngi luwtda, ungta nowlam mih, mma ngi mdochaak krow kma' mditmata mma' tu' kilqhi rek mmaan ava' rukku mdochaakin krow kma' pdainu thimpu rek daat chrel lih mdochaakin krow, tetdet thenpen avah mdochaak inno?
Mditmata naan nih tkarngatnit tih luwbuk'inn thuh thimpu rekki tkarngatna' pkui lamda pdainu mmaan nah mraalin ammeh mdodit nowlam avah parcham maan timow?
Pdainu Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a, ‘hava' mun thung ngi luwbuk'inn ava' hinni klin, khat avah ka'am daat a.’

Pdainu naan nih hava' pauna rek, tidit tah, ‘Neiyi rintparlaan kdongeen pemeh plungnee ava' kdongeen,’ (Hos. 6:6)mdodit ava' ki mlei adeh daat tlaangin bih, naan nih mraal ktaak rek avah psul chnimaan tih.
Mleiya Mii Chapa avah Tkarngatnit ki Kruwng rukka Mma'.”
'Tunnu Mma ngi ava' thung ki msundil lih Mma ngi mmaan ki sinegog thung ngi luwtda.

Ungta asuwn, mkhut paang khat kqong kcha' miikhat avah ava' thung ngi am daatda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mraal mdopiikna' raan ki thenni hanto' the lamda Mhin nih paukheel khat kheel lamda. “Tkarngatnit tih tapdam avah nowlam mih mrot mow?”
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Arlakin ki kuwmiikhat yau khat thlowi chthida tkarngatnit tih khor thuh mtlaak dokna, ava' kyowngda kqen turthuh kma' rang nga, kuw rang ngo?
Mdit bih, dultimii khat avah yau khat hinni msit knembet tih ka'am pemeh mow? Avaleiyi, tkarngatnit tih kqha totlot avah nowlam mih mdorot.”
Audilli Mma ngi mii ava' hinni theda: “Akhut arhei arji.” Ungta mma ngi arji chda. Ungta mkhut avah mpaang khat ki heppi tapqhat piikda.
Audilli, Pharisy rekki sun lamda ungta Mma' kepteng ngi lop kurtuwlna' lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Jisu avah taluhep pih tpenvei rang tidit leiyi, kerseel lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi hava' mdeh dok thungta Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki korlouda sun chda. Ungta miipii knempok ki Mma'dil avah qowi chlamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan mkheng avah pdam chlamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni Mma' avah mdopandan mana' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda.
Mleiya havah khulpu Isaiah ngi hanto' mdothe dok ava' mkurkhumna':

‘Asuwn, havah Neiyi kdokchol dok ksuwk ava'! Mma' avah Neiyi vonkdopsat chaak ungta Mma' thung ngi kapthlarin avah Kdung ngi kanpa kcha'a, Neiyi Mma' hinni Kapthla avah pii nikdi', Ungta Mma ngi Chaatktlei rek hinni Kindit Pau tpinditna' avah kparjaak rah.
Mma ngi tkalraina' the nimeh Ungta eeng ngi owng nimeh, Ungta khuwpii'lam rek thung ngi Kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' krowl avah arjaakpiik nimeh.
Mma ngi tapchaanna' thuh kindit ava' mapthlatduh kpha thung ngi Te'ekre dok ksa piipe rek avah krum nimeh. Ungta Mma ngi meikhut kukhu diildiil avah ardedek nimeh.
Ungta Mma' miing 'leenni Chaatktlei rekki Lamkrin chlam rah.’ (Is. 42:1-4)

Audilli mmaan nih ram kervei miikhat avah Jisu hinni arheiqhi lamda. Ungta mma' avah mmik ruk jiingda ungta mpau ruk kthuwk pemeh. Jisu ngi mmah pdam chda. Ungta mma ngi tpau ruk pau chda ungta mmik rukku khudei chda.
Ungta miipii rek mkheng avah ngakyou chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Havah David Chapa ava' pemeh mow?”
Pdainu Pharisy rekki ava' mdotheen marjaakin thungta hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi tarnampii Beeljibub amlei kma'don tarnam rek avah mdorei pthi pchaan pemeh.”

Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan plungbin avah deida ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Msingreel lih kurkhui kcha' kruwngpaalna' khimkhei rek avah mkenvei chaakna ngi mdophaak. Ungta msingreel lih kurkhui kcha' khuwpii mditmata inn khimkhei rek avah rip pchaang nimeh.
Ungta Seitan nih Seitan mreipthi chaak bih, mmah mthina kurkhui kcha' a. Ava' mkurthuh u, taluhep pih mma' kruwngpaalna' avah ka'am pchaang rang ngo?
Ungta Neiyi Beeljibub amleiyi tarnam rek avah kreipthiu, naan anau rekin vah kuw miing ngi kreipthi lam rang ngo? Avaleiyi, mmaan nah naan a'leen nih paukpindit rek kurthuwk lamrah.
Pdainu Neiyi Isowr Pthla ngi tarnam rek avah kreipthi bih, dakat tih Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin nih knaitek ki kurjung a.

Mditmata kuwmiikhat tih mruh ktang langlang miikhat avah mdobowljab kma'don nih, taluhep pih miikhat tih mruh ktang miikhat inn thuh luwtdon molrou rek avah kolrowt pchaang rang ngo? Ungta ava' dilrow ngi mma ngi mma' inn thung ki malrou rek avah kolrowt chrow rah.
Nei tu' kilqhi kma' mma' avah Nei mkepteng. Ungta Nei tu' kpurkuwksap kma' mma' ava ngi mdo'arjei pthi.
Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Mleiya dultimii ki pnu rek ungta pthitda tpauna' rek mkheng avah koptlotpiik rah. Pdainu Pthla Kchiir ptengda pthitda kpau mii rek avah ptlotpiik nimeh.

Ungta kuwmiikhat Mii Chapa ava' ptengda kpau kcha' mma' avah koptlotpiik rah. Pdainu kuwku yoso Pthla Kchiir ptengda kpau kcha' mma' avah 'tun ki mpha hava' thung ruk ungta karvang beirang mpha thung rukku ptlotpiik vot nimeh.
Dingbul avah apqhatin mdit bih mchei rukka kqha rah. Mditmata dingbul avah apthitin mdit bih mchei rukka kthi chrah. Mleiya dingbul avah mchei ava ngi kandang kcha'lu.

Kruknei pruwl rek thung ki kthuwk nau rek! Kqha kma'pa naanvah taluhep pih kqha avah the pchaang daat naandi? Mleiya plung thung ngi kepleet tih ka'am ava' thung ki kthuwk avah nehr ava ngi mdothe thut.
Miikqha khat ava ngi muplungril thung ngi kqha mdo'arkhiik ava' thung ki kqha ava' mdopthuh. Ungta kqha kma' mii ava ngi muplungril thung ngi kqha kma' mdo'arkhiik thung ki kqha kma' ava' mdopthuh.
Pdainu Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a tidit tah dultimii rekki paudak kma' khimkhei rek avah kthelam krow pdainu ava' ki mlei avah pau tpinditna' nit tih mmaan nih kpii chlam rah.
Mleiya naan apautheen kat rek ava ngi a'leenin nih pau akpindit raan, ungta naan adak kat inni adotheen, apau rekin ava ngi akupsul raan.”
Audilli nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki hanto' the lamda arthaang lamda: “Chukpu neen nih Nang ahin ki titinna' khat tedeh rah kbin inna.”

Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mrilkqha kma' ungta lowsangkqhi suruwl, naan nih titinna' khat thlaamin tinu. Pdainu khulpu Jonah ki titinna' kma'don titinna' morson piinimeh.
Mleiya Jonah ngi tuwlvah klin powi thung ngi nii kdum jaan kdum ma'am heppi Mii Chapa avah dultiril thung ngi nii kdum jaan kdum ka'am rah.

Ninevah khuwpii thung ki mii rekki pau tpinditna' nit tih hava' suruwl ki mii rektu' kripsap lamrah, ungta mmaan avah kupsul lamrah. Mleiya Jonah ngi mparjaam thuh mmaan nih plung mdoperthlen chaakin. Ungta asuwn, hava' thuh Jonah hinni klinbet khat avah ka'am daat a.

Kurduh ktong ki paamkruwngnu ava ngi pau tpinditna' nit tih hava' suruwl rektu' kripsap lamrah ungta mma ngi mmaan avah kupsul lamrah. Mleiya Solomon luwkinritna' karja rang ngi dultipaam mdonna' thung ki mmah thleng chda. Ungta asuwn, hava' thuh Solomon hinni klinbet khat avah ka'am daat a.
'Tunnu tarnam ktobor ava ngi miikhat thung ki mthuh dok thungta mma ngi paamkbiik rek thung ngi tkarngatna' kthlaam mih chetda, pdainu khadaat ruk phangmda.
Audilli mma ngi theda: “Neiyi choduh ki kthuhdokna' ki'inn thah kerheel nikdi!” Ungta mma ngi marvan kerheel thungta avah ktlong daat tih, truw deek ungta tparnaak deek ki arvanphada.

Audilli mma ngi vangda mma' hinni mril kqhaset kma' tarnam morson tikhiu rek avah ava' thuh luwqhisap lamda. Ungta mmaan nih luwt lamda ava' thuh am chlamda. Ungta 'tunnu mii ava' qutna' mrinchan avah choduh ki hinni kdung ngi mmeel thi chda. Ava' vah hava' mrilkqha kma' suruwl ava' rukka hava' hep daat rah.”
Mma ngi miipii rek hinni mpausli arlaan nih, asuwn, Mnuh le' Mnaupa rekki duwn thah rip lamda, Mma' tu' pau tsaam rah ngei lamda.
Ungta miikhat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Asuw o, Anuh le' Anaupa rekki, duwn thah rip lamda Nang tu' pau tsaam rah mngei inna.”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta Mma' hinni pau ksonpiik khat ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwda knuh a, ungta kuw le'da ku'knau rekka?”
Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek ktong thah mkhut heikhiing thida hanto'theda: “Knuh le' knaupa rek avah hava'le'!
Mleiya parvaan thah ka'am Kpa plungbin ktlow kcha' khimkhei avah Nei ku'knau ungta kcharkyur ungta knuh,” dida.
Mnit ava'kat thung ngi Jisu ngi inn ava' thung ki thuwkda truwnpii beh ngi ko'ongda.
Ungta miipii knempok rekki Mma' avah klowmpok lamda. Mthungta Mma ngi arkuwng 'leenni kalda ko'ongda. Ungta miipii rek mkheng avah vaubiing ngi rip daat lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni dow knempok avah pauportol lih theda: “Asuwn, chiimuw kapqau khat tih chiimuw kapqau rah chetda.
Ungta Mma ngi hanto ngi mapqau thungta chiimuw aangqhe rekka 'lamsiir thah tlada, ungta pva rek thuwk lamda avah chomter chdok lamda.
Ungta chiimuw aangqhe rekka lungchelre mun thuh duldak knem mih ka'am kma' thung ngi tla chlamda. Ungta duldak kdertek ki ma'am leiyi, chiimuw rek avah m'tunkat daat tih mowng tengda.
Pdainu kni tangda msat thungta chiibul rek avah murjungin mtlumma leiyi, qong chlamda.
Ungta chiimuw aangqhe rekka tirling arlak ki tla chda. Ungta tirling avah linda ungta ava ngi kchip krep lamda.
Pdainu chiimuw aangqhe rek avah duldak thung ngi tla lamda ungta cheida. Aangqhe rekki mchei arja khat, aangqhe ngi somtruk ungta aangqhe ngi somkdum cheida.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.”
Ungta sikhu rek thleng lamda ungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi mii rek hinni pauportol lih kpau pti o?”

Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni theda: “Mleiya naan ahinnu parvaan kruwngpaalna' ki paukordowl ava' tedeh pinditna' ki luwkinritna' avah adotpiik dokin. Pdainu mmaan morson rek hinvah avah mdopiik pemeh.
Mleiya kuwku yoso, kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni kpiikpom rah ungta mma ngi kepleet tih kthlowi chrah. Pdainu kuwku yoso, kthlowi kma' mma' avah mma ngi mdothlowi chaak kpha rukka kloupthi rah.

Avaleiyi, Neiyi mmaan hinnu pau tportol rekki kdothe. Mleiya mmaan nih mmikin nih dei lamda. Pdainu dei dakat lammeh. Ungta arja lamda Pdainu mmaan nih arjadakat lammeh, Ungta tedeh ruk deipindih lammeh.

Ungta khulpu Isaiah ngi mdothe dok avah mmaan thung ngi kurkhumda. Mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Naan nih tarjaakka arja naandi' Ungta tedeh a dei pindih vot nimaan tih. Ungta naan nih amikin nih tedeh a dei naandi' Ungta dei pchuk vot nimaan tih.

Mleiya hava' mii rek plung avah Kepneel luwi kcha' a. Ungta makna rekin avah Mdo'arjaak naan nih kthaluwi kcha' a. Ungta mmaan nih mmik rekin avah Mipjiinpthi dok inna. Mditma bih, mmaan nih mmikin nih dei lamdon, Ungta makna rek inni arja lamdon Ungta muplung inni kdeipindih thuh dok lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih muplungin avah Kihin nih perheel chlamdon Ungta Neiyi pdam thuh dok lam nikdi'.’ ” (Is. 6:9-10)
Pdainu naan amik rekin avah msuwkin kqha a mleiya khu mdeh chaak inna. Ungta naan akna rekin avah msuwkin kqha a mleiya khu marjaak chaak inna.

Mleiya Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Tidit tah khulpu rek knempok le' mrinkindit mii rek knempok ki, naan nih adodehn dow rek avah tedeh rah mdongei chaakin pdainu avah dei pchaang chlammeh. Mmaan nih naan nih ado'arjaakin dow rek avah tarjaak rah mdongeiyin pdainu avah arja pchaang chlammeh.
Avaleiyi, naan nih chiimuw kapqau ki pauportol avah arja chaan.

Miikhat tih kruwngpaalna' ki pauna avah tarjaakka arja chda, pdainu avah deipindih mda. Audilli mrilkqha kma' khat ava' thuwkda ungta mma' plung thung ngi mdopqau piik pauna rek avah lowng pthida. Havah 'lamsiir rih chiimuw karlaang kcha' mma' ava'.
Pdainu lungchelre mun rek thung ngi chiimuw karlaang kcha' mma' avah, pauna avah marjaak daat le' m'tunkat daat tih kanpa ngi karlaang kcha' mii ava' hep daat.

Anto'daat yoso, mma' mthina thung ngi murjung knet tih ka'am pseh, mpha rowiksowt tih avah ka'am pemeh. Mleiya pauna ava'leiyi kdung ngi chiitreelna' mditmata tyat chiitreelna' ma'amcheu m'tunkat daat tih khuhsiir mdopirthit chaaklu.

'Tunnu tirling arlak ki chiimuw karlaang kcha' mma' avah, pauna avah tarjaakka arja chda, pdainu hava' dultipaam ki tkilrinna' rekle' sum'alrou ki tkurhuwn chaakna' ava ngi pauna avah kchip krepda ungta mma' avah mchei ktaak kurthuwk chda.

Pdainu duldak 'leenni chiimuw karlaang kcha' mma' avah, pauna ava' arja chda ungta ava' kdeipindih kcha' mma' ava'. Mma ngi dakat tih mchei mdopchei chaak. Aangqhe ngi tum arja khat pthuwkda aangqhe ngi somtruk ungta aangqhe ngi somkdum pthuwk chda.
Mma ngi morson pauportol khat mmaan hinni thepiik nowl lamda. Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah mlou laiyi chiimuw kqha kapqau kcha' miikhat ava' hep daat.
Pdainu mii mi'ii chaak arlaan nih mma' miihal khat thuwkda, ungta chavui rek arlak ki nowmpaar rek varpiik thida sun chda.
Ungta chavui rek ava ngi linda chapaar mpurtunin thungta nowm rek rukka kandang lamda.
Ungta innkpupa ava' suwk rekki mhin nih thlengda ungta mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: ‘Ocha, alou thung vah chiimuw kqha adopqau hepkmah? Mdittu' nowm rekka taluhep pih kthuwk lam o?’
Mma ngi, mmaan hinni theda: ‘Miihal khat tih havah mdotlot.’ Ungta suwk rek ava ngi mhin nih the lamda: ‘Mdittu' nang ngi, neen nih vada mmaan avah kdophui pthi raan angeiya?’
Pdainu mma ngi theda: ‘Immeh! Mleiya naan nih nowm rek aphuiyin thung ngi chavui bul rek rukka mmaan tu' phui kthen naandi'.

Turkunna' mpha, mphaak kpha thung ngi mikniing inni mowngve chdaat lamso. Ungta turkunna' mpha mve thung ngi neiyi kurkun rang rek hinni the nikdi'. ‘Rukri ngi nowm rek avah tapkaak pthi rang ngi mtutmtut tih abowlin rah apurkuwkin. Pdainu chavui avah koktom thuh aptlongin,’ dinikdi'.”
Ungta Mma ngi morson pauportol khat mmaan hinni thepiik nowl lamda. Mma ngi theda: “Parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah miikhat tih anruwng muw khat louda mlou thuh mdopqau chaak ava' hep daat.

Havah dakat tih chiimuw mkheng rek arlak ki kdilsi pdainu mmown dokcheu innbil thung ki anthithowlnu rek arlak ki klinsi kurthuwkda. Ava ngi ding kurthuwkda ungta parvaanlai ki pva rekki mbaak rek 'leenni kthla lamda.”

Ungta Mma ngi morson pauportol khat mmaan hinni thepiik nowl lamda: “Parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah snu khat tih saikan tpertet kdum, thung ngi thowl louda ungta mkheng kheng ngi mkerdelduh kpha ngi mdochoupthi ava' hep daat.”
Jisu ngi hava' dow mkheng avah pauportol lih miipii rek hinni theda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni dow khadaat ruk pauportol lih mdothe kma'don the meh.

Mleiya khulpu ngi mdothe dok ava' kurkhumna' rah Mma ngi havah mdotlot. Khulpu ngi hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi knehr avah pauportol tethena ngi pvang nikdi'. Ungta dultipaam mapqhan daat ki kupqhun nih Kordowl lih mdothiik pthi dow rek avah Neiyi thethuh nikdi'.’ (Luw. 78:2)

Audilli Jisu ngi miipii rek avah psun lam thida inn ava' thung ngi luwtda. Ungta Msikhu rekki Mhin nih thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neen kihin nih loulai ki nowmpaar rekki pauportol avah mheithe pindit piik chaan.”
Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni theda: “Chiimuw kqha kapqau avah Mii Chapa ava'.
Ungta lou avah dultipaam ava', ungta chiimuw kqha rek avah kruwngpaalna' ki mii rek ava'. Pdainu nowmpaar rek avah kqha kma' khat ava' nau le'lam.
Mmaan kapqau miihal ava ngi tarnampii ava'. Turkunpha tidit ava ngi dultipaam qutna' ava' ungta kurkun rang rek ava ngi vaantamsi rek ava'.
Avaleiyi, nowmpaar rek ava' purkuwkda mei thuh mdopkaak pthi heppi dultipaam qutna' avah anto'hep daat rah.

Mii Chapa ava ngi Mma' vaantamsi rek avah pthla lamdon, mmaan nih Mma' kruwngpaalna' thung ki mii rek khuhsiir pirthitna' ktlow mii mkheng rek ungta nowlam tukksut kma' rek mkheng avah kpurkuwk lamrah.
Ungta mmaan nih, mmaan avah kquwngmeek meiqhuwm thung ngi kipthi lamrah. Mmun ava' thuh haa tikriilna' ungta tqatqeina' kthuwk chrah.
Ungta mrinkindit rekka M'paan kruwngpaalna' thung ngi kni heppi kleng chlam rah. Maknapum mma' ava ngi havah arja chdeiso.

Veikhat nowl lih parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah kuwmiikhat tih loulai thah dowlda mdothiik chaak sumbuwr ava' hep daat. Ungta miiktlok khat tih avah mdehkhot thungta mma ngi veikhat dowl ponthot chda. Audilli mma ngi mkanpat chaak ki chetda mdothlowi chaak mkheng jurpthi thida lou avah ren chda.
Veikhat nowl lih parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah mruwngchen kqha dok pearllung rek kthlaam kcha' sumkpervet miikhat ava' hep daat.
Mma ngi kdung ngi mkhon knem langlang pearllung khat ka'am mdeh chaak thungta, mma ngi chetda ungta mdothlowi chaak mkheng jur pthithida ava' mdoren chaaklu.
Veikhat nowl lih parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah truwnpii thuh taptlaak, mdetmdet ki tuwlvah mruk kpurkuwk leenqen ava' hep daat.
Ungta leen avah mdim cheu, tuwlvah kse rekki vaubiing thah mdoqen pthuwn. Audilli mmaan nih ko'ong lamda, kqha rek avah tomkal thuh daal lamda ungta kqha kma' rek avah varpthi lamda.
Hanto' heppi dultipaam qutna' mpha thung ngu kthuwk rah. Vaantamsi rek thuwk lamdon mrilkqha kma' mii rek avah mii kindit rek hinki kpenqhen pthi lamrah.
Ungta mmaan avah kquwngmeek meiqhuwm thung ngi kvarpthi lamrah. Mmun ava' thuh haa tikriilna' ungta tqatqeina' kthuwk chrah.”
Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih hava' dow mkheng rek avah adehpinditthut inna?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Ong ngi Kruwng,” dilamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Avaleiyi, parvaan kruwngpaalna' ava' ki mlei tpurchuh dok nowlam chukpu rek khimkhei avah moktom thung ki doren le' pli kupthuwk innkpupa ava' hep daat lam.”
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Jisu ngi hava' pauportol rek mthe dok dilli, Mma ngi mun ava' thung ki sun chda.

Ungta Mma ngi mkhuwpaam kat thah mtlun dok dilli, Mma ngi mmaan avah mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi purchuk lamda. Mthungta mmaan nah ngakyou chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi hava' luwkinritna' le' ruhtannong rek avah tva ki mdo'arlaan chaakko?
Hava' mii avah ding dimklou ava' chapa kmeh mow? Ungta mnuh a, Mary mdodit ava' pemeh mow? Ungta mnaupa le' avah James, Joses, Simon le' Judah le'lam pemeh mow?
Ungta mcharnu rek mkheng avah neen tu' ka'amsap daat rek avale' lam pemeh mow? Mdittu' hava' mii ava' vah hava' dow mkheng rek avah tva ki mdo'arlaan daat plih?”

Ungta mmaan nih Mma' leiyi, koktollik ki kirbin lamda. Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Khulpu khat avah mma' mdak khuwpaam thuh ungta mma' mdak inn thung kma'don nih takyat chaakmana' ka'am pemeh.”
Ungta mmaan nih lammdorin chaakmaan leiyi, Mma ngi ava' thuh ruhtannong rek avah knempok ki tlowmeh.
Mpha ava' thung ngi Herod tetrach ava ngi Jisu ki mleiyi pauson avah arjada.
Ungta Mma ngi msuwk rek hinni theda: “Havah dii kupluwt Johon ava'. Mma' avah kdiyou thung ki kring kerheel a ungta avaleiyi ruhtannong rek avah mma' thung ngi kthuwk a.”
Mleiya Herod tih mnaupa Philip snu Herodias ki thenni Johon avah kyowngda ungta bowlda rowng'inn thuh mdothiik.
Mleiya Johon nih mhin nih hanto' mdothe: “Nang ngi mma' adoko'onqhi rang avah nowlam dorot liit pemeh.”
Pdainu mma ngi mma' te'eyow rah bin chdaat yoso miipii rek avah mdoqit chaak lam. Mleiya mmaan nih mma' avah khulpu khat tidit tih mdobin chaakin.
Pdainu Herod qouna' nit ava' mporchon chaakin thungta Herodias chanu avah mmaan aang ngi kardaamda ungta Herod plung pngam chda.
Avaleiyi, mma ngi talutalu yoso mma ngi mdoqhil avah pii nikdi', tidit tih paureel khat reeldokda.
Ungta mma ngi mduh thah mnuh ngi mdoperseel dok heppi hanto'theda: “Hava' arkuwsin khat thung ngi dii kupluwt Johon luwchai mheipii,” dida.
Ungta paamkruwng avah kpursul chda. Anto'daat yoso, paureel leiyi, ungta mma' tu' khaan 'leenni ko'ongda kmaal rek leiyi, mma ngi mhin nih Johon luwchai mdopiikna' raan paupiik piida.
Mthungta mma ngi heipthlada Johon nah rowng'inn thung ngi mluw reen lamda.
Ungta mma' luwchai avah arkuwsin khat thung ngi arvansin lamda ungta snunau ava' hinni pii lamda. Ungta mma ngi mnuh hinni arvansinda.
Audilli msikhu rek arva lamda mdaksa avah kdom chlamda ungta alruwl chlamda. Ungta vang lamda Jisu hinni avah vansong lamda.

Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi arkuwngpii khat 'leenni mmun ava' thung ki sunda paamkbiik mun khat thah mthina ngi sun chda. Pdainu mii rekki ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih khuwpii ki thuwk lamda khuh ngi Mma'dil avah qowi chlamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhei thuh thungta miipii knempa rek deida. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah plung pkham chlamda ungta mmaan arlak ki kkowi rek avah pdam chlamda.

Ungta kluhpha mve thungta Msikhu rekki Mhin nih thleng lamda, hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mun avah paamkbiik lai ungta 'tunnu mpha avah kokto kcha' a. Mleiya mmaan nih chet lamso khuw lamknai rek thung ngi mthen inni thendam mdoren chaakna' raanni hava' miipii rek avah apthlapthi doklam.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mmaan nah msun raan pemeh naan nih mmaan hinni mdochaak raan dow mruk apii chaan.”
Mthungta mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih hava' thung ngu, thenpen parnga le' tuwlvah 'knii daat nthlowi inna.”
Mma ngi theda: “Nei kihin nih avale' avah arvansinin.”

Audilli Mma ngi miipii rek avah nowm rek 'leenni kok'ong rah silamda. Ungta Mma ngi thenpen parnga rek avale' tuwlvah 'knii rek avah louda ungta tun thah parvaan hansuw thida suwqhat pii chda. Ungta Mma ngi khuida thenpen rek avah Msikhu rek hinni pii lamda. Ungta sikhu rekki miipii rek hinni pii lamda.
Anto ngi mmaan mkheng inni avah cha lamda ungta mpowiyin paada. Ungta mmaan nih mdochaak don rekin mqhe mdopurtuwlin avah tomkal sowm lei'knii dimda.
'Tunnu ava' kcha mii rek avah snu kmow kthe kmah, pselpalik ki mii pun parnga arveel lam.
Ungta miipii rek mupsun lam chunni m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi Msikhu rek avah arkuwngpii khat thung ngi kkal rah silamda, ungta Mma' duh thah raalpha khat thah kva rah silamda.
Ungta Mma ngi miipii rek mupsun dok lam dilli Mma ngi, Mthina ngi lown khat thah rinkaktham chrah chetda. Ungta kluhpha mve thung vah Mmah ava' thah Mthina ngi ka'am chdaat.
Pdainu 'tunvah arkuwngpii avah truwnpii ningqim mdophaak dok. Ungta tirthli ngi mdusukin ktong thah mdo'arhei raan thang leiyi, diinuk ki arkuwng avah kdung ngi eida.
'Tunnu jaan ki miplitna' qhang ava' thung ngi Jisu ngi truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi chetda mmaan avah heipha lamda.
Ungta sikhu rekki truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi mche mdehn thungta muplungyat inni hanto' the lamda. “Havah tarnam pthla,” dilamda. Ungta mningqit inni kdung ngi owng lamda.
Pdainu m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi mmaan avah bilamda. “Plung apngamin, aningin pqitmaan, Nei ping,” dida.
Ungta Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang akurthuh cheentung ngi neiyi dii 'leenni chetda adokphaakna' rah paupiik mheipii.”
Mthungta Mma ngi theda: “Arvang!” Ungta Pitar rih arkuwng thung ki thuwkda dii 'leenni Jisu kpha rah vada.
Pdainu mma ngi tchangkhu kdung ngi kraang mdeh thungta mningpqitda. Ungta dii thuh kuplup rah mupqhun thungta, kdung ngi owngda, “Kruwng mheisan cha',” dida.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi mkhut arheikhiingda mma' avah kyowng tengda. Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “O mlamrin kdil'suwn nih ka'am nang, taluleiyi aplung adopelqenda?”
Ungta mmaanve ngi arkuwngpii thung ngi mkal dokin thungta tirthli avah dai chda.
Audilli arkuwngpii thung ngi ka'am daat rek ava ngi Mhin nih luwbu chlamda. “Kindit kat tih Nang nga Isowr Chapa ptih,” dilamda.
Ungta mmaan nih maklaan dokin dilli Genesaret paam tlung lamda.
Ungta mmun ava' thung ki mii rekki Mma' avah mdehpinditin thungta mmaan nih paam mkheng ava' kirkhil lih pau pthla lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kkowi rek mkheng avah Mma' hinni qhipsuk lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mbuwdiir mdokmei chaakna' raanni Mhin nih ktham chlamda. Ungta ava' kekmei kcha' rek mkheng avah kqhajik ki dam chlamda.
Audilli Jerusalem ki nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek avah Jisu hinni thleng lamda, ungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda.
“Taluleiyi Nah asikhu rekvah kver rek nowpa avah mdopkui inno? Mleiya mmaan nih then mchaak raan thung ngi mkhutin alqhu lammeh.”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih anowpa rekin ava' adopqowina' raan ki thenni Isowr paupiik avah adopkui inno?
Mleiya Isowr rih paupiik hanto'piida: ‘Anuh apa akyat chaan’ (Mpk. 20:12 Knl. 5:16) ungta ‘Mnuh mditmata mpa pauhor kbuk mma' avah te'eyow rah’, (Mpk. 21:17) mdodit.
