Pdainu naan nih hanto' theen tinu. “Kuwku yoso mnuh mditmata mpa hinni: ‘Naanve ngi nei kihin ki lou chaan tidon dow adopsit chaak raan avah neiyi Isowr hinni chla ngi kparlaan dok a.’

Ungta naan nih hanto' kthe mma' avah, ‘mnuh mditmata mpa takyat chaakmana' thung ki kerthlet kcha' a,’ adoditin. Hanto ngi naan nih Isowr paupiik avah naan ki nowpa pqowina' ava ngi msit ktaak purthuhn tinu.
Kqha kpurhuwi rek naan, Isaiah ngi naan aleiyi mkindit kat avah hanto'theda pau mdopurphuwn dok:
‘Hava' mii rekki mnehrin daat tih Makyat chlamda. Pdainu muplungin avah Kihin ki lamkla kcha'lam.
Ungta msit ktaak ki luwmbuk lamda Ungta dultimii ki pauqum rek avah Tkurchuhna' rekki purchuk lamda,’ (Is. 29:13) mdodit.”
Audilli Mma ngi miipii rek avah own lam thida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Arjaan ungta adeipindihn.
Nehr thung ngi yungkluwt kcha' ava ngi miikhat tborna' tlowmeh, pdainu nehr thung ki arhang kthuwk ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor.”
Audilli Msikhu rek thleng lamda ungta Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Hava' adothe mdo'arjaak inni Pharisy rek, ningkqha kma' avah adeh a?”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Parvaan ki Kpa ngi, mdophunma chiibul khimkhei rek avah kphuipthi rah.
Mmaan nah mthinaan nih am chdaat lamso. Mmaan avah mmikktot rekki luwkthi reklam. Ungta mmikktot tih mmikktot mqhi bih, mikniing inni khor thuh ktlave lamrah.”
Audilli Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih theda: “Hava' pauportol avah neen kihin nih mheithe pindit piikin.”
Ungta Jisu ngi theda: “Naan rukka 'tun kpha ngi kdeipindih mlaiyi ka'amin ptimow?
Naan nih talutalu yoso nehr thung ngi jungkluwt avah powibuwr thung ngi kluwt, ungta mdilthuh ngi kchet kcha', tidit avah 'tun kpha deipindih mlaiyin ptimow?
Pdainu nehr thung ki arhang kthuwk dow rek avah plungril thung ki kthuwk. Ungta ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor.
Mleiya plungril thung ki kthuwk rek avah kqha kma' plung tbinna', mii te'eyowna' rek, lowsangtqhina' rek, jowltpurjutna' rek, mlangkma' sakhi tpiikna' rek ungta pthitda tpauna' rek ava' mdopthuh.
Hava' dow rek ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor pdainu khut kulqhu kmah ngi thendam tchaak ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor pemeh.”
Audilli Jisu ngi ava' thung ki sunda Tair le' Sidon paamkuwl ki rang ngi korlou chda.

Ungta asuwn, Kenaan ki snu khat avah paamkuwl ava' thung ki thuwkda ungta hanto' owngda theda: “Nei k'leen nih plung mheipnee cha' David Chapa, O Kruwng! Mleiya kchanu avah kdung dok ki ram arvei chda.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mpau khadaat ruk arthaang mda. Ungta Msikhu rekki Mhin nih thleng lamda: “Mmah apsun dok, mleiya mma ngi ndilin qowiqowida ko'owng ko'owng a,” dilamda, ktham chlamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya Isreel inn thung ki kenvei kcha' yau rekki then daat kma'don morson rekki thenni mdotsi pemeh.”
Audilli snu ava ngi Mhin nih luwbuk chda ungta hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neiya mheibom cha'.”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nau rek thenpen avah louda uisuwn rek hinni tipthipiik a kqha pemeh.”
Ungta mma ngi the nowlda: “Kruwng avah anto'kat, pdainu uisuwn rek rukku mukpupa rek khaan 'leen ki ktla kcha' thenkri avah mdochaak chaak daat inna,” dida.
Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “O snu, alamrin knetreenna, nang ngi adoqhil avah arlaang cha'.” Ungta mpha ava'kat thung ngi mchanu avah dam chda.
Ungta Jisu ngi ava' thung ki sunda ungta Galily truwnpii hinni thlengda ungta lown khat 'leenni kalda ungta ava' thuh ko'ongda.

Audilli miipii knempok rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda. Mmaan nih, mkhuh kyeng, mmikktot, kyengrii ktong rek, mpau kthuwk kma' rek ungta morson knempok rek avah Mma' hinni arheiqhi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Jisu khuhther rih mmaan avah pthla lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah pdam chlamda.

Ungta miipii rekka ngak chlamda. Mleiya mmaan nih mpau kthuwk kma' rek kpau, kyengrii ktong mii rek kdam, mkhuh kyeng kcha' rek kchet pchaang ungta mmikktot rekki khu mdodeh chaakin, ava' mmikin nih dei lamda. Ungta mmaan nih hava' mdeh chaakin thungta Isreel mii rekki Isowr avah panpaak chlamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi Msikhu rek avah Mhin nih own lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Miipii rek avah plung kapkham chaak lam a, mleiya 'tunnu mmaan nih Nei tu' ma'am tlit daatin avah nii kdum mphaak dok a ungta mdochaak raan dow khatleh thlowi lammeh. Neiyi mmaan avah mpowiyin ktham mih psun pthinuwm lammaang tidit tah mmaan nah 'lam thah powrthlowk kporlow chlam rah.”
Audilli Msikhu rekki Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Hanto'ya knem mii ava' powipatna' rah thenpen avah hava' paamkbiik laivah tva ki tthlaam rangplih?”
Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Thenpen tya athlowi inna?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Thenpen tikhiu le' tuwlvah mnausisi mruk daat ka'am a,” dilamda.
Ungta Mma ngi miipii rek avah dulti mko'onna' raan paupiik pii lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi thenpen tikhiu rekle' tuwlvah avah louda ungta panpaak chda ungta avah khuida, ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni parlaan lamda ungta sikhu rekki miipii rek hinni avah pii lamda.
Ungta mmaan mkheng inni avah chasap lamda, ungta mpowiyin paada. Ungta mmaan nih mdochaakdon rekin thenpen mqhe rek avah tomkal klin tikhiu ngi chom purtuwl lamda.
'Tunnu ava' kcha rek mmaan avah snu kmow kthe kmah ngi mii pun plii lam.
Ungta Mma ngi miipii rek avah psunpthi lamda ungta Mma ngi arkuwng 'leenni kalda Magdala paamkuwl thah arvang chda.
Audilli Phairsy rekle' Saddusy rekki Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta mdoleunaan nih, Mma ngi parvaan ki titinna' khat mdopdeh lamna' rah kheel lamda.
Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih kjiing thah, parvaan thah vausen ktla adehn cheu khu kqha rah diin tinu.

Ungta jiingsun nih vausen tla thida khu mpirniim cheu khu kchiing rah diin tinu. Kqha kpurhuwi rek naan, naan nih parvaan rungchenna deipindihn tinu pdainu naan nih mpha ki titinna' rek avah deipindih maantine?

Kqha kma' ungta lowsangkqhi suruwl ki mii rekki titinna' daat thlaam lamda. Ungta 'tunnu khulpu Jonah ki titinna' kma'don titinna' khatleh ruk pii nimeh.” Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah ma lamda ungta sun chda.
Ungta Msikhu rekki truwnpii raalpha mheitlun dokin thungta thenpen mdohor raan avah perngeel pthi dok lamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Pharisy rekle' Saddusy rek thowl thung ki ikilrindei chaan.”
Ungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda, tidit tah ‘havah neen nih thenpen tohormaan lei,’ dilamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi ava' deithida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mlamrin kdil'suwn rek naan, taluleiyi naan nih asingreelin thung ngi ‘havah neen nih thenpen tohormaan lei,’ adit inna?
Naan nih mii pun parnga ki thenni thenpen parnga daat ungta mqhe rek avah tomkal tya ngi achomin tidit avah 'tun kpha thung ngi deipindih maan timow ungta binphaak maan timow?
Ungta mii pun plii ki thenni thenpen tikhiu ungta tomkal klin tya ngi achom inno?
Mleiya, Neiyi naan ahin nih thenpen ki mleiyi kdothe pemeh? Pdainu Pharisy rekle' Saddusy rek thowl thung ki ikilrindei chaan, kdi ping. Taluhep pih naan nih havah adodeh pinditma daat inno.”
Audilli mmaan nih thenpen thung ngi mdochouin thowl ava' pemeh, pdainu Pharisy rekle' Saddusy rek dopurchuhna' thung ki mkilrin chaak raan ava' mdothena' tidit deipindih chlamda.
'Tunnu Jisu ngi Sijaria Philip pih paamkuwl mphaak thungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda kheel lamda: “Mii rekvah Mii chapa Nei avah kuwpi'ii mtidit lam o?”
Mthungta mmaan nih the lamda: “Mii aangqhe ngi dii kupluwt Johon adi lamda ungta morson aangqhe ngi Elaijah ungta morson aangqhe ngi Jeremaiah mditmata khulpu rek arlak ki khat ptih atidit lam.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mdittu' naanvah Neiya kuwpi'ii atidit inno?”
Ungta Simon Pitar rih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang nga Kring Isowr Chapa Mesaiah ptih.”

Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mma' hinni theda: “Jonah chapa Simon nang nga asuwkqha a. Mleiya daksa le' hii ngi ahin nih havah adotpandan piik pemeh pdainu parvaan thah ka'am Kpa ngi havah adotpandan piik
Ungta Nei rukku kthe a, tidit tah nang nga Pitar ptih ungta hava' lungpii 'leenni Neiyi, Nei ki lamrinlop avah sanikdi'. Ungta Kdikhuw paltong ngi avah khaan pchaang nimeh.

Ungta Neiyi nang ahin nih parvaan kruwngpaalna' ki chungkamke avah apii nikdi'. Ungta talutalu yoso nang ngi dultipaam thuh adobowl avah parvaan thang rukku tbowl lih ka'am rah ungta talutalu yoso nang ngi dultipaam thuh adoperthle avah parvaan thang rukku kerthlet tih ka'am rah.”
Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni, Mma' avah Jisu Mesaiah ava' tidit avah kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan paupiik pii lamda.

Ava'dil ki kupqhun nih Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni tetdet lamrah pqhunda. Mleiya Mma ngi Jerusalem thah mahan rang ungta kver rekle' thimpu kenreel rekki ungta nowlam chukpu rekki dow knempok 'leenni Mma' avah suwk kupthuwk lamrah ungta ke'eyou lamrah ungta mnii kdumna' thung ngi Mma' avah kperdel rah.
Audilli Pitar rih Mmah qhi ptliing thida hanto'theda trai pqhunda: “Havah Nang ahin ki iladokso Kruwng, Nang a'leen nih havah thuwk mso.”

Pdainu Mma ngi kerheelda Pitar hinni theda: “Seitan, Nei kihin ki ikorsown dok! Nang ngi Neiya atapkhaan likka. Mleiya Nang aplungbin avah Isowr dow rek 'leenni ammeh, pdainu dultimii dow rek 'leenni ka'am kcha' a.”
Audilli Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni theda: “Kuwmiikhat Nei kdilkqowi nuwm kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi mma ngi mthina ikarmat chso ungta mdaksa ki khros avah alou chthiso rang ngi, Nei kdil aqowi chso.
Mleiya kuwku yoso mrinkum tsan chaak rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi avah kpenvei pthi rah ungta kuwku yoso Nei kthen nih mrinkum kpenvei kcha' mma' ava ngi avah karlaang chrah.
Mleiya miikhat tih dultipaam mkheng avah arlaang chyoso mma ngi mplungrin mpenvei chaakku talu msit ka'am a? Mditmata miikhat tih mma' plungrin tu' kerthleng ngi talu kpii chrang?
Mleiya Mii Chapa avah Mpa konlorna' thung ngi, Mma' vaantamsi rektu' kurjung rah. Ungta Mma ngi, mma' mma' ki mnong rekin ava' dilkqowiyi mnongqhat'lotin avah kpii lamrah.

Dakat tih Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a. Mleiya Mii Chapa ava ngi Mma' ki kruwngpaalna' tung ngi murjun mmikin nih mdeh chaakduhn kpha thung ngi kdiyou kperteel kma' rang mii aangqhe avah hava' thuh krip daat lam a.”
'Tunnu nit mruk dilli Jisu ngi Pitar, James ungta mnaupa Johon lim qhida mthinaan nih lown thah kal lamda.
Ungta mmaan aang ngi Mruwngchen kerthlengda. Mmai avah kni heppi lengda ungta Mbuwdiir rek avah mar'aang heppi lengda.
Ungta asuwn, Moses le' Elaijah mmaanve hinni kandangda ungta Mma' tu' kirbi lamda.

Audilli Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng neen nthen vah hava' thuh ta'am inni kqha rah. Nang ngi abin cheentung ngi nthen inni buw'inn kdum saanche, Nah athenni khat, Moses thenni khat ungta Elaijah thenni khat.”

Ungta Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih asuwn, armei kepleu vih mmaan avah pkhum dok lamda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih armei thung ki krowl khat thuwkda ungta ava ngi hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kvonsat'low Kchapa, Mma' 'leenni kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha' a. Mma' pau avah arja chaan.”
Ungta sikhu rekki ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih mmaiyin dulti ksuw ngi tluw chlamda ungta kdung ngi mningin qiida.
Pdainu Jisu arvangda mmaan avah kmei lamda ungta mmaan hinni theda: “Kerdelin, aningin pqitmaan.”
Ungta mmaan nih mmikin parkhaap lamda msutin thungta Jisu kma'don morson kuwkhat leh dei lam mda.

'Tunnu mmaan nih lown 'leen ki murjunqumin thung ngi Jisu ngi mmaan hinni paupiik pii lamda. “Naan nih hava' arinmerin avah Mii Chapa ava ngi kdiyou thung ki mkerdel dok duh kpha thung ngi kuwkhat leh hinni themaan,” dida.
Ungta sikhu rekki Mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda: “Mdittu' taluleiyi nowlam chukpu rekki Elaijah choduh kurjung rah,” mdodit inno?
Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Dakkat tih Elaijah ngi rukrirep pih kurjung rah mma ngi dow mkheng avah ren nih kparmang rah.

Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah Elaijah a kurjung dok, ungta mmaan nih mmah deipindih chlam meh ungta mmaan nih mma' 'leenni mdongeiyin khimkhei avah mdotlot dokin. Anto'hep daat tih Mii Chapa ava' rukka mmaan khut thung ngi tyattraanna' kperteel bei rah mthesli a.”
Audilli sikhu rekki Mma ngi Dii kupluwt Johon leiyi, mthe a, tidit deipindih chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih miipii rek hinni marvanin thungta Mma' hinni miikhat thlengda Mhin nih tirdiil chthida hanto'theda:

“Kruwng kchapa avah plung mheipnee piikcha'. Mleiya mma' avah arngol arveida kdung ngi suwk kthuwk kcha' kchoklu. Mleiya mma ngi veityaveitya thung ngi mei thuh tluwda ungta veityaveitya thung ngi dii thuh tlada.
Avaleiyi, neiyi mma' avah Nah asikhu rek paphaak chlam nuh, pdainu mmaan vah pdam pchaang lam mda.”

Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “O, mlamrin ktaak ungta kpenher rih kchet suruwl rek, trek ksowt tih Neiya ahinin nih am rangnu o? Trek ksowt tih Neiyu adiil raannu o? tu'u nei kihin nih mma' avah arheiqhi.”
Ungta Jisu ngi tarnam avah raida ungta mma' thung ki arvang thuwk chda. Ungta pselnau avah mpha ava'kat thung ngi dam chda.
Audilli sikhu rekki Jisu hinni msik inni thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi neen nih avah kdorei pchaanin pemeh o?”

Mthungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih lam'adorin chaak maan lei. Mleiya Neiyi mkindit kat ahinin nih akthepiik inna. Naan nih anruwng muw dipang daat yoso, alamrin chaakin ma'am bih, naan nih hava' lown avah, hava' thung ki wvah thah, ikorsown aditin rukku korsown rah. Ungta naan athen nih kurthuwk kma' dow khatleh am nimeh.
Anto'daat yoso, rintaktham chaak le' then tngowl chaak ava' daat tih hava'lu hep daat avah kthuwk pchaang rah.”
'Tunnu mmaan nih Galily thuh ma'am daatin arlaan nih Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mii Chapa avah mii rek khut thung ngi kyurpthibei rah mthe meeksli a.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah ke'eyou lamrah ungta mnii kdumna' thung ngi Mma' avah kperdel rah. ” Ungta ava ngi mmaan nah kdung ngi muplungin yachda.
Ungta mmaan nih Kapernaum mphaakin thungta Luwbuk'inn sumkqhai rek ava ngi Pitar hinni thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Naan achukpuhn vah Luwbuk'inn sumqhai avah piidok mlai pda?”

Pitar rih theda: “Ou,” dida. Ungta mmaan nih inn thuh mvanluwn thungta Jisu ngi mma' duh thah choduh pauda hanto'theda: “Simon talu abin a? Dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekvah rinnow sumqhai mditmata pselchai sumqhai avah kuw hinni mqhai kchow inno?”
Ungta Pitar rih Mma' hinni theda: “Mal rek hin ki.” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Mdit bih, chapa rek avah ko'ol kcha'lam a.

Anto'daat yoso, neenve ngi mmaan tapkhaanmana' rah truwnpii thah juw ungta baichek aptla rang ngi rukrirep ki adokyown tuwlvah ava' achom rah mnehr alai ungta ava' thuh nang ngi drachma plii ki sum chai khat ka'am deinadi'. Ava' alou rang ngi mmaan hinni Nei kthen le' nang athen nih Luwbuk'inn sumqhai avah apii dok lam.”
Mpha ava' thung ngi sikhu rekki Jisu hinni thleng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Mdittu' parvaan kruwngpaalna' thangngu kuw ngi klinsi rang o?”
Ungta Jisu ngi, Mhin nih kmownau 'suwn khat ownda ungta mmalaiyin kat tih pripda.
Ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, naan nih plung perthlengda hava' kmownau 'suwn hep akurthuh chaak maan bih, naan nih parvaan kruwngpaalna' thuh luwtliit nimaan tih.
Avaleiyi, kuwku yoso hava' nau'suwn heppi kpirdil kcha' mma' ava ngi parvaan kruwngpaalna' thung ngu klinsi rah.
Ungta kuwku yoso, Nei kmiing 'leenni hava' nau'suwn ava' karlaang dei kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei rukka mtarlaan chaak a.

Pdainu kuwku yoso Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' hava' hep daat nau'suwn khat ava' khuhsiir ktipirthih ma'am bih mma' thenvah buhsuklung mlowl thah pirsi thida truwnpii ktlum thung ngi dii dolow chaak ki tvarpthi ngi kqha rah.
Khuhsiir tpirthitna' leiyi, dultipaam 'leenni suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya khuhsiir tpirthitna' avah karvang rah. Pdainu dultimii rek khuhsiir pirthitna' rah ktlow mma' 'leenni suwthitna' set ka'am a!

Ungta nang ngi akhut mditmata akhuh ngi khuhsiir atpirthit cheentung ngi avah areen pthi rah ahin ki avar pthidok. Mleiya ktlangknai kma' mei thung ngi akhut 'knii ungta akhuh 'knii tu' atlaak chaak rang hinvah akhuh kyeng ngi mditmata akhut paang khat ktaak ki rinkum thung ngi aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqhasi rah.

Ungta nang ngi amik ki khuhsiir atpirthit cheentung ngi avah akhorpthi rah ahin ki avarpthi dok. Mleiya nang ngi amik 'knii puwda Simmei thung ngi adotvar pthi rang hinvah amik paang khat daat puwda rinkum thuh aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqhasi.

Naan nih hava' kdilsi rek khatpang daat rukka tukksut kma' adotlotmana' raan ikilrindei chaan. Neiyi mlei avah ayuthepiik inni. Mleiya parvaan thah mmaan ki vaantamsi rek ava ngi parvaan thah ka'am Kpa mai avah mpha ktai mdodeh chaakin.
Mleiya Mii Chapa avah kenvei kcha' dok rek ava' ksan chrang ki thenni kurjung.

Naan nih talu abin inna? Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih yau arja khat athlowi chso ungta marlakin ki khatpang avah 'lamleh thah ichet dokso. Mdittu' mma ngi somtku leitku ava' madaat thidon 'lamleh thah kchet dok khat ava' kthlaam rah lown rek thah chet nimeh mow?

Ungta mma ngi avah mdeh khot chaak bih, Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah mma ngi 'lamleh kqowi kma' yau somtku leitku rek 'leenni mkanpat chaak kkheel lih 'lamleh kqowi dok khat ava' mdeh chaak thung ngi kanpa chrah.
Anto' hepkat tih parvaan thah ka'am A'paan ava' rukku hava' kdil'suwn khat rek ava' kenvei chaak rang avah Mma' plungbin pemeh.

Ava' han'tun nih nang a'uanau khat tih a'leen nih pnu merve chaak cheentung ngi nang ngi apha rah nang le' mma' daat hinni mdoparma avah athepiik. Ungta mma ngi atarjaak chaak bih, a'uanau khat avah aphan chaak a.

Pdainu mma ngi adothe mopqowima cheentung ngi, nang ngi miikhat mow 'knii mow aqhi rah apha. ‘Mleiya 'knii le' kdum nehr thung ki sakhi piik ava ngi pauna khimkhei avah tapqhan pchaan rah.’ (Knl. 19:15)
Ungta mma ngi mmaan avah mopqowima cheentung ngi lamrinlop hinni athe. Ungta mma ngi lamrinlop dothe ruk mrotma cheentung ngi nang ahinnu mma' avah Chaatktlei mditmata sumkqhai rek ikurthuwk chso.

Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna tidit tah naan nih dultipaam thuh adobowlin khimkhei avah parvaan thah korbowl rah. Ungta naan nih dultipaam thuh adoperthleen khimkhei avah parvaan thah kerthlet rah.

Veikhat nowl lih, Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah dultipaam thuh naan arlakin ki 'knii rek ava ngi talutalu yoso mkolrot chaakin bih, mmaan doqhil avah parvaan thah ka'am Kpa ngi mmaan thenni avah ktlotpiik rah.
Mleiya Nei kmiing 'leenni kurtuwl kcha' mmaan 'knii kdum rek amna' mun ava' thung ngi, mmaan arlak ki Neiya ka'am ping.”
Audilli Pitar rih Mhin nih thlengda ungta hanto'theda: “Kruwng, ku'uknau vih k'leen nih pnu merve thung ngi neiyi veitya kornowl lih ptlotpiik nikdi o? Veitikhiu kpha rang?”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih veitikhiu kpha dimaang pdainu veitikhiu khiulu veisomtikhiu kpha.
Avaleiyi, parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah, paamkruwng khat tih msuwk rek hinni tkartaiqhi rah mdongei ava' hep daat.
Ungta mma ngi ktai mupqhun le' mmaan nih mma' hinki talent pun sowm lei kervei miikhat avah mma' hinni arheiqhi lamda.

Pdainu mma ngi mdochowi pchaanmah leiyi, mukpupa ava ngi paupiik khat piida. Mleiya mma' mdak le' mnuwn ungta mnau le' ungta mdothlowi mkheng ruk mlei'arve ava' mdopiik pchaanna' rang ki thenni kyur rah sida.
Avaleiyi, suwk ava ngi tluda mhin nih tirdiil chda. ‘Mukpu mpha mruk mhei'arda chau, neiyi dow mkheng avah apii chdaat nikdi',’ dida.
Audilli suwk ava' kpupa ava ngi, mma' avah plung pkham chda, mma' avah perthlet pthida ungta mlei'arve ava' rukka ptlot piikda.

Pdainu suwk ava ngi mvanthuh thungta mma ngi mmiiqhi khat, mhin nih denarii arja khat lei kervei suwk khat kurdut qhida. Mma ngi kyowngda ungta mlowl thah klelda, ungta mhin nih: ‘Alei'arve avah mheipii dok,’ dida.
Mma'hep suwk ava ngi mkhuhther rih tlu chda mhin nih hanto'theda qhil chda: ‘Mpha mruk mhei'arda chau, neiyi dow mkheng apii chdaat nikdi',’ dida.
Pdainu mma ngi avah rotpiik mda. ungta mma ngi mdo'arve lei ava' mchowi dokduh kpha thung ngi mma' avah rowng'inn thuh daal pthida.
Ungta msuwk kurthuhqhi rekki ava' mdehn thungta kdung ngi muplungin ngam mda. Ungta mmaan nih arva lamda mmaan ki mukpupa ava' hinni kthuwk dow mkheng rek avah song lamda.
Audilli mukpupa ava ngi suwk ava' mo'own dilli mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kqha kma' suwk nang! Neiyi alei'arve mkheng avah nang ngi kihin nih adoqhil chaak leiyi, aptlot piiknu.
Neiyi nang plung adokapkham jik ki nang rukku asuwk kurthuhqhi khat avah plung adopkham chaak rang pemeh mow?’
Ungta mma' kpupa ava ngi m'leen nih muplung pthitda, mlei'arve rek mkheng ava' mchowi dokduh kpha thung ngi chiikepreel rek hinni mma' avah parlaan pthida.
Naan khimkheiyi aplungrilin thung ngi a'uanau doparmah rek avah aptlotpiik maan bih, parvaan ki Kpa rukku naan ahin nih anto'kat tih ktlow rah.”
'Tunnu Jisu ngi hava' mthe dok dilli hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl ki korlouda Jordon kreng raalpha ki Judia paam thah chetda.
Ungta miipii knempok ki Mma'dil qowi chlamda ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh mmaan avah pdam chlamda.
Ungta Pharisy rek rukka Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta Mma' mdoleunaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Miikhat tih talu talulei daat yoso mnuwn tkenqhenqhi rang avah nowlam mih mdorot mow?”
Ungta Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mleiya mupqhun thok thung ngi kpurthuh Mma' ava ngi: ‘Snu le' psel avah mdoseem,’ tidit avah naan nih parcham maan timow. (Rnp.1:27,5:2)
Ungta hanto' mdothe: ‘Tidit tah mlei hava' leiyi pselpa ngi mnuh le' mpa mapthi thidon Mnuwn tu' khadaat tih mkorjom chaak rah. Ungta 'knii rek avah daksa khadaat mkurthuh chaak raan.’ (Rnp. 2:24)
Ava' vah mmaanve avah 'knii kurthuwk porson lam pemeh pdainu daksa khadaat lam. Avaleiyi, Isowr rih khadaat mdopthut dok ksa avah kuwkhat leh ngi qhenpthi mso.”
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni the lamda: “Mdittu' taluleiyi Moses vah, ‘tkenqhenna' paukjit khat apiithiso snu avah akenqhen qhiso’ mdoditto'?”
Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mleiya naan aplungin kapchai ava' deithida Moses vah anuwn rekin avah tkenqhenqhi rah adotrot piikin. Pdainu mupqhun thok thung ngu avah anto' pemeh.

Ungta Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a, kuwku yoso plungbin dakkma' jowltpurjutna' lei daat kma'don mnuwn kenqhenqhi thida snu morson khat kok'onqhi mma' ava ngi lowsangmqhi a. Ungta kuwku yoso tkenqhenqhi dok snu khat kok'onqhi mma' ava' rukku lowsang mqhi a.”
Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Hanto' hepkat tih, mi'innpu le' mnuwn 'leenni mkurthuh rang bih, innknei a qhache mow.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mii mkheng ngi hava' pau avah row pchaang nimeh. Pdainu anto ngi mdopiik dok rek mmaan daat tih havah krow pchaang chlam rah.

Mleiya parvaan kruwngpaalna' ava' ki thenni mnuhpowi thung thung ngi tpirdiin ksajap pih kqou kcha' rek rukka ka'am lam. Ungta dultimii rek dopirdiin nih tpirdiin rek rukka ka'am ungta mdak ki kpirdiin kcha' tpirdiin rek ruk ka'am lam. Ava' pchaangda krownuwm kcha' mma' ava ngi havah arow chso.”
Audilli Mma ngi m'leenin nih mkhut khiingdon rinmdoktham piik lamna' rang ki thenni nausisi rek avah arheiqhi lamda. Pdainu sikhu rekki mmaan avah rai lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Nausisi rek avah Nei kihin nih arva lamso ungta mmaan avah pkhaanmaan. Mleiya parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah mmaan avale' hep daat ki then.”
Ungta Mma ngi m'leenin nih mkhut mkhiin piiklam dilli mmun ava' thung ki Mmah sun chda.
'Tunnu asuwn miikhat tih Mhin nih thlengda hanto'theda: “Kqha Chukpu, ‘Neiyi ktlangknai kma' rinkum kdophan chaakna' rang ki thenni talu kqha tlow chnikli?’ ”

Mthungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya kqha atidit tah? Kqha Khatpang ka'am tidit tah Isowr, ava' kma'don, kqha kuwkhat leh ka'am pemeh. Pdainu nang ngi rinkum thuh tuluw chaak rah angei cheentung ngi paupiik rek avah apqowi cha'.”

Mma ngi Mhin nih theda: ‘Tvah katda?’ Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi, mii ado'eyou rang pemeh, Nang ngi lowsang adoqhi rang pemeh, Nang ngi aprut rang pemeh, Nang ngi pleiknei sakhi adopiik rang pemeh.
Nang ngi anuh le' apa adokyat chaak rah,’ (Mpk. 20:12-16 Knl. 5:16-20) ungta ‘Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah.’ ” (Lev. 19:18)
Ungta kseetnau ava ngi Mma' hinni theda: “Hava' dow mkheng rek avah neiyi kmot ki kupqhun nih kdo'arvandan chaak. Ava' vah 'tunnu talu kdoptham ka'am a?”

Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Nang ngi tkurkhum rah angei cheentung ngi vang rang ngi adothlowi mkheng avah ayurpthi. Ungta srah rek hinni avah apiipthi lam, mdit bih nang asum'alrou rek avah parvaan thah ka'am rah. Ungta nang nga, arva rang ngi Nei kdil aqowi cha'.”
Pdainu kseetnau ava ngi hava' pau ava' marjaak thungta kdung ngi muplung kya ngi sun chda. Mleiya mmah alrou knempok ki mdothlowi.
Audilli Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah svang, miikhat tih parvaan kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw rang avah kparsa dok a.
Ungta veikhat Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe nowl a. Mleiya svang, miikhat tih Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi mluw rang hinvah, uwt khat tih preukna thung ngi mluw chaak pleh ngi ko'olbet rah.”
Msikhu rekki ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nah kdung ngi ngakyou chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda. “Mdittu' kuw rangda o, tkarsan chaak kphang chrang nga?”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan avah suwrim lam thida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Dultimii rek hinvah havah kurthuwk pchaanglu pemeh pdainu Isowr hinvah dow mkheng avah kurthuwk pchaanglu.”
Audilli Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Asuw o, neen nih dow mkheng mapthi dok thiin nuh Nang adokqowi chaakin, avaleiyi 'tunnu neenna talu thlowi nikaandi o?”

Mthungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya Isowr rih dow mkheng ren mpurthuh thung ngi Mii Chapa ava ngi Mma' konlorna' kruwng longkhom 'leenni mko'on thung ngi Nei kdilkqowi kcha' rek naan rukka kruwng longkhom sowm lei 'knii rek 'leenni ko'ongin tidon Isreel phung sowm lei 'knii rek 'leenni pau pindit naandi'.

Ungta Nei kmiing 'leenni mi'inn rek mditmata mu'umnau rek mditmata mcharmyur rek mditmata mnuhmpa mditmata mnuwn mditmata mnaumsuwn mditmata mpaam rek kmapthi kcha' mii khimkheiyi ava' ki 'tum arja khat knem mih karlaang chlam rah ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah alrouchom mih kchom chlam rah.
Pdainu mrukri knempok rek avah dilknau chlam rah ungta mdilknau kcha' rekki mrukri kurthuwk chlam rah.”
“ ‘Mleiya parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah jiingsun kparma ngi innkpupa khat tih mriithlumbil thung ngi nong klou rah mii kirchil rang ngi kchet ava' hep daat.
Ungta mma ngi nong klou rek avah nii khat ki thenni denarii khatkhat tih kirbiikqhi lamda ungta mma ngi mriithlumbil thuh mmaan avah pchet lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mukdumna' qhang arveel lih kyurkren mun thung ngi mnong ktaak ki krip chdaat mii morson rek kurdutqhi nowlda.
Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: ‘Naan rukka nei kriithlumbil thah nong klou rah ichetin low, ungta neiyi tyatya yoso adokpiikin krowpang apiin nikdi'!’ Ungta anto ngi mmaan rukka chet lamda.
Ungta veikhat mma ngi chet nowlda qhang truk le' qhang tku arveel lih anto' heppi tlow nowlda.

Ungta qhang sowm leikhat arveel lih mma ngi chetda mnong ktaak ki krip chdaat mii morson rek kurdutqhida. Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: ‘Taluleiyi naanna anongin ktaak ki niiluwn krip chdaat inpti?’

Mmaan nih mma' hinni the lamda: ‘Mleiya kuwkhat leh ngi neenna mirchilin meh.’ Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: ‘Naan rukka riithlumbil thah ichetin. Ungta naan nih tyatya yoso ado'arlaanin krowpang arlaang chnaandi'.’

Anto ngi kluh ki mpha mphaak thungta riithlumbil kpupa ava ngi suwkkenreel ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nong klou rek avah a'own lam rang ngi mardamanin avah apii lam, ungta mdilknaurel lih kdo'archil rekki apqhun rang ngi mkhatna' rek kpha apii dok lam.’
Ungta msowm leikhatna' qhang thung ngi mdo'archil nong klou rek ava' thleng lamda ungta mmaan nih denarii khat khatsap arlaang chlamda.
Pdainu mrukri rek mthlenin thungta mmaan vah knembet tih karlaang chraan pakin nuh kirdi chlamda. Pdainu mmaan rukku denarii khat khatsap arlaang chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih ava' marlaan chaakin thungta loukpupa ava' 'leenni kerteenna' lamda.
Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: ‘Hava' mqutna' ki mii rekvah qhang khatpang daat nong mdolown. Ungta nang ngi nong meknem klou ungta kni ksa kruwn neen avah mmaan tu' mpinqim intinu,’ dilamda.
Pdainu mma ngi arthaangda ungta marlakin ki khat hinni hanto'theda: ‘Plap, ahin nih neiyi karmak dow khatleh tlowmaang. Nang nga denarii khat ki thenni tkolrot pemeh mow?
Nang ngi adophan rang atum ava' alou rah isun cha', neiyi mqutna' thah kdo'archil mii ava' ruk nang adokpiik heppi tpiik rah kdongei.
Neiyi, nei kdokna rek 'leennu kdongei kdotlot chaak krow pemeh mow? Mditmata nei kuplungqhat leiyi, amik kakraam a?’
Ava' heppi dilknau rek avah rukri lamrah ungta rukri rek ava ngi dilknau chlam rah. Mleiya knempok ki mdo'own, pdainu mruk daat mdokchol.”
Audilli Jisu ngi Jerusalem thah hangda ungta sikhu sowm lei'knii rek avah qhi ptliing lamda 'lampii thung ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda:
“Asuwn, neenna Jerusalem thah kahangin impimin ungta Mii Chapa avah thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek hinni kyurpthi rah ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah kdiyou kpha ngi kupsul lamrah.

Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah Chaatktlei rek hinni tipnichaak rang ngi ungta khuikin kchung ngi tbun rang ngi ungta topthowiyow rang ngi kparlaan pthi lamrah. Ungta mnii kdumna' nit tih Mma' avah veikhat kring kerheel rah.”
Audilli Jebedi chapa rek nuh ava ngi mchapa rektu' Mma' hinni thleng lamda luwbuk chlam thida Mma' hinni dow mruk qhil chlamda.

Ungta Mma ngi snu ava' hinni theda: “Talu adongei ka'am pli?” Snu ava ngi Mma' hinni theda: “Nah akruwngpaalna' thung ngi hava' kchapa 'knii rek avah khat tih achang thah ungta morson khat ava ngi amaleh thah mko'on chaak raan mheirot piikcha'.”

Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi adoqhil chaakin avah talu tidit deipindih maantih. Naanve ngi Neiyi kdoneek bei rang tong avah nee pchaang naandih? Ungta Nei kdiiluwna' rah diiluwna' thung ngu naanve a diiluwt pchaang naandih?” Mmaanve ngi the lamda, “O neenve ngi pchaang nikaan.”

Mthungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni theda: “Dakat tih naanve ngi Nei ktong avah nee naandi' ungta Nei kdiiluwna' thung ngi tuluw ruk akupluwt raan. Pdainu Nei kchang le' kleh thah kok'ong rang avah Neiyi kdopiik rang pemeh pdainu havah Kpa ngi mdoporthlon piik dok rek mmaan ava' then.”
Ungta sikhu sowm rek ava ngi ava' marjaakin thungta ava' unau 'knii rek 'leenni kdung ngi muplungin pthit lamda.

Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan avah Mhin nih own purkuwk lam thida hanto'theda: “Naan nih adehn tidit tah Chaatktlei rekki paamkpu rekki, mmaan ava' 'leenni tpaalna' ruhtan sinton lamda ungta klin rekki mmaan ava' 'leenni ruhtanna' mdosin tonin.
Anto'daat yoso naan arlak innu, havah anto' kurthuwk mso. Pdainu naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih tilin rah kngei kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi mma ngi naan asuwkin ikurthuwk chso.
Ungta arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih mkhatna' mkurthuh nuwm chaak cheentung ngi mma ngi naan asuwk'owrin ikurthuwk chso.
Mleiya Mii Chapa avah soptolow psuk rang mda sopklow chrang ki thenni kurjung. Ungta mii knempok mdoktlanna' rang ki thenni Mrinkum ava' mdopiik chaak ava' heppi atlow chaan.”
'Tunnu mmaan nih Jerikho thung ki msunin thungta miipii knempok rekki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.

Ungta asuwn, mmikktot mii 'knii avah 'lampii beh ngi ko'ong daat lamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi Jisu ava' thuh karva'a tidit marjaakin thungta kdung ngi owng lamda hanto' the lamda. “O Kruwng, David Chapa! Nang ngi neenve a, plung mheipnee chaan.”
Mthungta miipii rekki mmaanve avah rim ma'amna' raan rai lamda. Pdainu mmaanve ngi kerkheel seset tih owng lamda. “O Kruwng, David Chapa! Nang ngi neenve a, plung mheipnee chaan.”
Mthungta Jisu ngi rip chdaat thida mmaanve avah own lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi Neiyi talu adoktlot piik raan adongei inda?”
Mmaanve ngi Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng kmikin avah mheipvaar piik chaannu!”
Mthungta Jisu ngi plung pkham chlamda ungta mmaanve mik avah kmeipiik lamda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaanve ngi mmikin nih khudei chlamda ungta mmaanve ngi Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
'Tunnu mmaan nih Jerusalem khuwpii mhannaiyin thungta ungta Bethphage pha lamda, Kruwn lown mphaakin thungta Jisu ngi sikhu 'knii rek avah heipthla lamda.

Mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi, wvah aheiraalin ki khuw thung ngi vaan, ungta skowlraam khat ava' thuh msuwn tu' kpursuk daat tih ka'am dei naandi'. Naanve ngi avah aperthletin rang ngi kihin nih arvanqhiin.

Ungta kuwmiikhat tih naanve ahinin nih dow mthe cheentung ngi, mhin nih hanto' atheen: ‘Kruwng ngi mmaan avah dow mdopsit rah ka'am a,’ adiin, ungta kbeisek ki mma ngi mmaan avah arheikapthla lamrah.”
Hava' dow mkheng avah khulpu ngi hanto' mdothe dok ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni mdotlot.

Hanto'theda: “Naan nih Jion chanu hinni athepiikin. ‘Asuw, nang ki paamkruwng avah Skowlraam 'suwn pakhat, Skowlraam 'suwn kmow khat, 'leenni ko'ongda Plung kdaiyi, nang ahin nih kthleng a,’ ” dida. (Jkh. 9:9)
Mthungta sikhu rek ava ngi va lamda Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni paupiik mdopiikin jik ki tlow lamda.
Ungta skowlraam avale' msuwn avah arvanqhi lamda ungta mmaanve ngi m'leenin nih mbuwdiirin phat lamda, ungta Mma ngi m'leenin nih ko'ongda.
Ungta miipii knempa rekki 'lampii thung ngi mbuwmdiirin phat lamda. Ungta mii aangqhe rek nowl lih dingbaak thlang lamda ungta avah 'lampii thung ngi phat'arjei lamda.

Ungta mduh thah kchet miipii rekle' mdilkqowi rekki owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “David Chapa ava' hinni Hosanna! ‘Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng Mma' avah msuwkqha a!’ (Luw. 18:26) Kparthaangsi ava' hinni Hosanna!”
Ungta Mma ngi Jerusalem khuwpii marhantlun thungta mkhuwpii mkheng avah kunchuwnda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Kuw daatda havah?”
Mthungta miipii rekki the lamda: “Havah Galily paamkuwl thung ki Najareth khuw ki khulpu Jisu ava',” dilamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi Isowr Luwbuk'inn thung ngi luwtda ungta Luwbuk'inn ava' thung ki kyurkren rek mkheng avah reipthida. Ungta sum kpertlek rek khaan avale' uqhu kyur rek ko'onna' avah purlup pthida.
Ungta mmaan hinni theda: “Hanto' kjitda ka'am: ‘Nei ki'inn avah rinkthamna' inn tidit rah,’ (Is. 56:7) pdainu naan nih avah, ‘Kupru rek khor apthut inna.’” (Jer. 7:11)
Audilli mmikktot rekle' mkhuh kyeng rek avah Luwbuk'inn thung ngi Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah pdam chlamda.

Pdainu thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki Mma ngi tngana' nong rek mdotlot ungta nau rekki, Luwbuk'inn thuh owng lamda: ‘David Chapa hinni Hosanna!’ mdoditin mmikin nih mdehn thungta kdung ngi muplungin thida.

Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi hava' mdotheen dow rek avah arjaakka?” Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Ou, ‘nau rekle' arnu kyown meek nau kdowng rek nehr thung ngi Nang ngi tpanpaak chaakna' avah apurkhum chaak a,’ (Luw. 8:2) dida, mdokjit avah naan nih parcham vot maan timow?”
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan avah mapthi lamda ungta khuwpii thung ki sunda Bethany thah vang chda. Ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh priikda.
'Tunnu, jiingsun nih Mma ngi khuwpii thuh marhan kerheel thungta Mpowi thamda.

Ungta Mma ngi 'lampii beh ngi kduwtbul khat mdeh thungta Mma ngi avah phada pdainu marna kma'don m'leen nih dow khatleh ka'am deimda. Mthungta Mma ngi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “'Tun veikhat a'leen nih mchei khadaat ruk chei mso.” Ungta m'tunkat daat tih kduwtbul avah purvuwi chda.
'Tunnu sikhu rekki ava' mdehn thungta ngak lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Tya koknot tih kduwtbul avah kpurvuwi chdaat toh?”

Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah naan nih plung kpelqen liit kmah ngi lam'arin chaakin bih, naan nih hava' kduwtbul 'leenni kthuwk ava' daat nimeh pdainu naan nih hava' lown avah, ‘ikorlou rah truwnpii thuh ikarvar chah’ aditin rukku avah anto' kurthuwk rah.
Ungta naan nih talutalu yoso rinktham mih adoqhil chaakin avah lam'arin chaakin bih, dow mkheng avah naan nih arlaang chnaandi'.”

Ungta Mma ngi Luwbuk'inn thung ngi luwtda mpurchuh meek lam arlaan nih thimpu kenreel rekle' mii rekki kver rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda. “Talu ruhtanna' ngi, Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah adotlot? Ungta kuw ngi hava' ruhtanna' avah adotpiik?”

Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku ahinin nih dow khat ayukheel inni. Ungta naan nih ava' atarthaanin bih, Nei rukku talu ruhtanna' ngi, hava' dow rek avah kdotlot tidit athepiikin nikdi'.

‘Johon diipluwna' avah tva ki o? Parvaan ki mow, dultimii hinki o?’ Ungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda. “Neen nih avah parvaan ki ndit bih, Mma ngi, ‘avah taluleiyi mma' avah lam'adorinin pemeh?’ kdi rah.
Pdainu neen nih avah dultimii hinki nditin bih, mii rekka tiqit chaak nowlda, mleiya mii mkheng ngi Johon avah khulpu khat tidit tih mdotaiyin.”

Mthungta mmaan nih Jisu hinni arthaang lamda ungta hanto ngi the lamda: “Neenna dei maanring.” Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mdit bih, Nei rukku talu ruhtanna' ngi, hava' dow rek avah kdotlot tidit avah athepiik nimaanring.”

“Pdainu naan nih talu abin inna? Mleiya miipa khat tih chapa 'knii thlowi chda mma ngi mekver ava' hinni vada hanto'theda: ‘Kchapa, tuniyu nang nga nei kriithlumbil thah nong klou rah ichet'low,’ dida.
Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Neiya chet pchaang nimaang,’ dida. Pdainu mdil thah mma ngi plung perthlengda ungta chetda.
Ungta mma ngi miknitna' ava'hin rukku vada anto'jik ki theda: Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda arthaangda: ‘Ocha, chetlai nih,’ dida. Pdainu mmah chetmda.

Mdittu' hava' 'knii rek arlak ki kuw ngi mpa plungbin avah mtlot inna?” Mmaan nih, Mhin nih the lamda: “Mekver ava ngi mtlotta,” dilamda. Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, sumkqhai rekle' dakkurjur snu rekki naan aduh ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi kluwt chlam rah.

Mleiya Johon nih naan ahin nih rinkinditna' 'lam thung ngi thlengda ungta naan nih mma' avah lam'rin chmaan tih. Pdainu sumkqhai rekle' dakkurjur snu rekki mma' avah lam'rin chlamda. Ungta naan nih amikin nih dei dokin tinu, pdainu mdilthangpa daat yoso mma' hinni lam'adorin chaakna' raanni plung perthleng chmaan tih.

Pauportol morson khat arja nowlin. Riithlumbil khat kapqhang kcha' loukpupa khat amda. Mma ngi lungrowng tlowda avah tkhuljikda ungta mma ngi riithlum tsunna' khat khorda ungta arka'inn khat rukka sada. Ungta mma ngi louknum rah mii rek hinni piipthi dok thida paam lamkla khat thah pjiin chda.
'Tunnu mchei mpaar mvehpha mnai thungta mma ngi louknum rek ava' hinni mchei mpaar klou rang ngi msuwk rek avah heipthla lamda.
Ungta louknum rek ava ngi msuwk rek avah qhilam thida, khat avah bun lamda khat ava ngi eyou lamda ungta morson khat avah lung ngi deeng lamda.
Ungta veikhat nowl lih mma ngi msuwk rek avah mkhatna' thung ki hinni knem mih heipthla lamda. Ungta mmaan nih anto'jik ki tlownowl lamda.
Pdainu mqutna'rel thung ngi mma ngi mmaan hinni mchapa ava' heipthlada. Ungta mma ngi hanto' bin chda tidit tah, ‘mmaan nih kchapa kat tah kakyat chdaat lamrah,’ dida.

Pdainu louknum rek ava ngi chapa ava' mdehn thungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: ‘Havah piipa kat ava', arvaan neen nih mma' avah eyou dokin cheh ungta malrou chom rang avah ilowng chaancheh,’ dilamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kyowng lamda ungta riithlumbil duwn thah varpthi lamda ungta ava' thuh eyou lamda.
Avaleiyi, riithlumbil kpupa ava' mthlen thung ngu louknum rek hinni mma ngi talu ktlow rang ngo?”

Mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi mrilkqha kma' mii rek avah mmeel kthi ngi kpenvei pthi lamrah. Ungta mma ngi mriithlumbil avah mkummthla ki mchei mpaar ki mpha thung ngi mhin nih kpii rang morson louknum rek hinni kparlaan pthi rah.”

Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih Kchiir laika rek thung ngi mdokjit rek avah parcham vot maan timow? ‘Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin Lungkat ava ngi innbul lung, Lung kenreel ava' kurthuwk kcha' a.’ (Luw. 118:22-23)
Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin ki kloupthi rah ungta mchei mpaar kpirbiik rang chaat khat hinni kpiipthi rah.
Ungta kuwku yoso, hava' lung ava' 'leenni khuhsiir kpiirthi kcha' avah kkui chrah. Pdainu kuwku yoso ava' tlaakna' mma' avah vaiphul kurthuwk ki kokrowi pthi rah.”
'Tunnu thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rekki Mma' pauportol rek ava' marjaakin thungta Mma ngi neen midotthenaan, tidit tih lou lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih Mma' kokyowng rang ngi mthlaamin thungta, mmaan nih miipii rek avah qi chlamda. Mleiya Mma' avah khulpu khat tidit tih mdobin chaakin.
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni veikhat pauportol lih the nowlda.
“Parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah mchapa thenni kchiir inneena' kporthlong kcha' paamkruwng khat ava' hep daat.
Ungta mma ngi msuwk rek avah inneena' ava' thung ngi mdo'own dok ksa rek avah kchiir innee maalna' thung ngi ko'own rah pthla lamda. Pdainu mmaan nih tethlen rah bin lam mda.

Ungta veikhat mma ngi msuwk morson rek avah hanto'theda pthla nowl lamda: “Naan nih chetin rang ngi to'own dok ksa rek hinni hanto' atheen.’ ‘Asuwn, neiyi vonsum ktlot dok a silpa le' pamarnu kdothiik saa rek avah ke'eyow dok a ungta dow mkheng nga kporthlon dok a, kchiir innee maalna' thung ngi arvaan,’ adiin.”
Pdainu mmaan nih ava' 'leenni plung pluwt lam mda. Ungta mmaan nih mnong mnongin thah, tidit tah khat tih lou thah, morson khat tih sumnong thah chetter chlamda.
Ungta mqhe aangqhe rekki msuwk rek avah kyowng lamda mmeel kthi ngi ningkya pii lamda ungta eyou lamda.
Pdainu paamkruwng ava ngi ava' marjaak thungta kdung ngi plung pthitda. Mma ngi mraalmii rek pthlada miike'eyou rek avah tpenveipthi ter lamda ungta mmaan ki khuwpii avah pquwng pthida.
Audilli mma ngi msuwk rek hinni theda: “Kchiir innee maalna' avah kurchuwl dok a pdainu ava' thuh to'own chaak rek avah mtik kcha kma' thina' daat lam a.
Avaleiyi, naan nih 'lamqhuwm thah ichetin ungta adokurdutqhi pchaaninya knem mih hava' kchiir inneena' thung ki rah mii a'ownin.
Mthungta suwk rek ava ngi 'lampii klin rek thah chet lamda ungta kqha ruk kthi ruk mdokurdutqhi pchaaninya knem mih own chlamda. Ungta kchiir innee maalna' avah mal lih dimda.
Pdainu paamkruwng ava ngi mal rek ksuw rah mthlen thungta mma ngi kphal buwdiir knakma' miikhat deida.
Mthungta mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Plap taluhep pih kchiir inneena' ki buwdiir kna kma'pa ngi hava' thuh kluwt daat pti o?’ Ungta mma' avah kpau kmah am chda.

Audilli paamkruwng ava ngi suwk rek hinni hanto'theda: ‘Mkhut mkhuh abowlin ungta vanqhiin rang ngi kjiing ki kjiingnu thung ngi apthi dokin.’ Mmun ava' thung ngu archam klou le' haa tikriilna' kthuwk chrah.
Mleiya knempok ki mdo'own pdainu mruk daat mdokchol.”
Audilli Pharisy rekka sun lamda ungta taluhep pih Mma' avah mpauna' 'leenni tokyown raan, tidit leiyi, kerseel lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih msikhu rekin avah Herod mii rektu', hanto' kthe rah heisi lamda: “Chukpu, neen nih Nang nga kindit ptih ungta Nang nga Isowr 'lam kindit ava' kpurchuk ptih ungta Nang ngi kuwkhat leh ruk tuk'adosut pemeh mleiya Nang ngi dultimii rek avah mruwngchen thah adosut pemeh, tidit neen nih kdehn.
Avaleiyi, Nang ngi mheithe piik inno, talu abinna? Mleiya, ‘Siijar hinni rinnow sumqhai avah tpiik mow, tpiikmah rang ngoh?’ ”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan ki mrilqhatmaan avah deida, ungta hanto'theda: “Kqha kpurhuwi rek naan, taluleiyi naan nih Neiya atperteel inna?
Nei kihin nih rinnow sumqhai sum avah mheipdehn.” Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih denarii khat pii lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' m'leen ki pthla'arlim ungta jiiktikrii 'leen ki pthla'arlim havah kuwda?”
Mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Havah Siijar pthla'arlim.” Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Siijar dow rek avah Siijar hinni apiin ungta Isowr dow rek avah Isowr hinni apiin.”
Ungta mmaan nih hava' pau rek ava' marjaakin thungta ngak lamda. Ungta Mma' avah mapthi lamda ungta anto ngi sun chlamda.
Mnit ava'kat thung ngi, kring kerheel ka'am pemeh kdi, Saddusy rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta hanto ngi pau kheel lamda.
“Chukpu Moses vah hanto'theda: ‘Pselpa kuwmiikhat tih mnaumsuwn kthlowi kmah ngi mdiyow chaak bih mnaupa khat tih mnuwn avah loudon mu'upa ki thenni rilam mdopqhan piik rah,’ dida.
'Tunnu neen karlak inni mu'umnau tikhiutet ka'am khat am lamda. Ungta mkhatna' ava ngi snu mthedil lih diyou chda ungta mnaumsuwn khatleh ammda. Ungta mnuwn avah mnaupa hinni mapthida.
Anto'hep daat tih miknitna' ava' rukku ungta mukdumna' ava' rukku ungta mtikhiuna' kpha ngi snu avah ko'onqhi lamda.
Ungta mqutna'rel lih snu ava' rukka diyou chda.
Avaleiyi, trin kerheelna' thung ngi mma' avah tikhiu rek arlak ki kuw snu kurthuwk chrang ngo? Mleiya mmaan mkheng inni mma' avah mnuwn mdopthut sapin.”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna aparma chaak dok inna. Naan nih Kchiir laika rek ava' ruk dei maantih ungta Isowr ruhtan ruk dei maantih.
Mleiya trin kerheelna' thung ngu innknei tidit ammeh ungta innknei rang rukku kirpii lam pemeh. Pdainu parvaan thangvah mmaan avah Isowr vaantamsi rek hep daat lamrah.
Pdainu kdiyou rinkerheelna' ki mlei avah naan nih Isowr rih naan ahin nih hanto' mdothe kchiir laika avah parcham liit maan timow?
‘Neiya Abraham ki Isowr ping Ungta Aijek ki Isowr ping Ungta Jakob ki Isowr ping!’ Isowr rah kdiyou ki Isowr pemeh pdainu kring ki Isowr.” (Mpk. 3:6,15)
Ungta miipii rekki ava' marjaakin thungta Mma' dopurchuhna' leiyi, ngakyou chlamda.
Pdainu Pharisy rekki Saddusy rek avah Mma ngi mapdai pthi lam a, tidit marjaakin thungta mmaan nih kor'own kurkuwksap lamda.
Audilli mmaan arlak ki nowlam kdei khat tih Mma' mdoperteelna ngi paukheel khat Mhin nih hanto ngi kheelda.
“Chukpu nowlam thung ngi klinsi paupiik avah tva o?”
Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “‘Nang ngi nang ki Kruwng Isowr avah Aplungchai mkheng ngi Ungta apthlarin mkheng ngi Ungta aplungrin mkheng ngi Vonsat adolow chaak rah.’ (Knl. 6:5)
Havah mkhatna' ungta klinsi paupiik ava'.
Ungta miknitna' ava ngi, ‘Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi Vonsat adolow chaak rah.’ (Lev. 19:18)
Hava' paupiik 'knii ava' 'leenni Nowlam le' Khulpu rek dothe mkheng avah ka'am kcha' a.”
Ungta Pharisy rekki kurkuwk lamda ma'amin arlaan nih Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto' kheel lamda.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih Mesaiah ki mlei avah talu abin inna? Mmah kuw Chapa o?” Mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “David Chapa.”
Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Mdittu' taluhep pih David vah Pthla thung ngi Mma' avah Kruwng mdoditto'?”
Mleiya hanto'theda: “Kruwng ngi nei ki Kruwng hinni: ‘Neiyi, Nang amiihal rek avah Akhuhther rih akthiik piikduh khimheiyi, Nei kchang thah iko'ong daat,’ dida. (Luw. 110:1)
'Tunnu David tih Mma' avah ‘Kruwng,’ mdittu' taluhep pih Mma' avah mma' chapa kurthuwk rang ngoh?”
Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' avah pauna khadaat rukku arthaang pchaang lam mda. Ungta ava' nit ki kupqhun nih kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' hinni paukheel kheel porson pchaang vot lammeh.
Audilli Jisu ngi miipii rek hinni ungta Msikhu rek hinni pauda.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki Moses longkhom 'leenni ko'ong lamda.
Avaleiyi, naan nih talutalu yoso mmaan nih mdotheen avah apqowiyin, adanin ungta atlown. Pdainu mmaan nongtlot heppi tlowmaan mleiya mmaan nih tethe a the lam thida mdotlotin pemeh.
Mleiya mmaan nih tohorna' kparsa bowrkrik pirsim lam thida mii rek luwkou 'leenni mdopdotin. Pdainu mmaan nih ava' avah konok rang ki thenni mkhut chalin khadaat ruk parkhaap lam nimeh.
Pdainu mmaan nih mnongtlotin mkheng avah mii rek dodeh rang ki thenni mdotlotin. Mleiya mmaan nih mmaan ki laikabuwr avah tparja lamda ungta mmaan nih mbuwdiir jaarin avah tupquwm lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kchaknee thung ngi mmun kqhasi ngeen lamda ungta sinegog rek thung ngi longkhom kenreel ngeen lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kyurkren mun rek thung ngi mii rekki mdo'arvuwi chaak raan ungta Rabbi, Rabbi, dida, mdo'own raan ngei lamda.
Pdainu naanvah mii rekki Rabbi, adotitdit raan rowmaan. Tiditta Khat ka'am Mma' avah naan ki Chukpu ava'! Mma' avah Khrista ava' ungta naan akhengin avah unausapin ptih.
Ungta naan nih dultipaam thuh kuwkhat leh ruk a'paan, purthuh maan, tidit tah parvaan thah ka'am Khat, Mma' avah naan Apa.
Ungta chukpu rek, dida mii ngi adoto'own raan pemeh. Mleiya Khat ka'am Mma' avah naan ki Chukpu Khrista ava'.
Pdainu naan arlak inni klinsi mma' ava ngi asuwkin mkurthuh chaak rah.
Ungta kuwku yoso mthina kakparthaang kcha' mma' avah kopchowm pthi rah ungta mthina kpirdil kcha' mma' avah katparthaang piik chrah.

Pdainu kqha kpurhuwi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek, naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih mii rek kepteng ngi parvaan kruwngpaalna' ki 'lam avah ado'arkamin. Tidit tah naan adakin ruk ava' thuh luwt chmaan tih ungta ava' thuh kluwt chrang mii rek rukka pluwt maantih.

Ungta kqha kpurhuwi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek, naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih ksowt ksowt tih rin'aktham chaak leek inni meikhunu rek inn avah pyol dokin tinu. Avaleiyi, naan nih tupsulna' klin avah arlaang chnaandi'.

Kqha kpurhuwi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek, naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih miikhat Jihudi tupthutna' rang ki thenni paam le' diipii kaklaan nih chetin tinu. Ungta naan nih khatpang apthut chaak dokin dilli mma' avah naan adakin heihin nih mthen 'knii knem mih, adakin heppi Simmei thuh ktla chrah mii adopthutin.

Mmikktot luwkqhi rek naan ahin nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih, ‘Luwbuk'inn thamda paukreel kcha' mma' avah takhatleh pemeh pdainu kuwmiikhat tih Luwbuk'inn kchiir ki Jiiring thamda pau mreel bih mpaureel ava ngi mmah korbowl kcha' a, diin tinu.
Kokmok rek ungta mmikktot rek! Mleiya, tva ngi klin betda, jiiring ava' mow, jiiring ava' kpenje luwbuk'inn ava'da?

Ungta kuwku yoso rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thamda pau mreel chaak bih avah takhatleh pemeh. Pdainu kuwku yoso ava' 'leenni ka'am chla rek thamda pau mreel bih, mpaureel ava ngi mmah korbowl kcha' a’ diin tinu.
Ka'aak rek ungta mmikktot rek! Mleiya tva ngi miklin bet toh? Chla ava ngi klin bet mow, chla ava' kipchiir rintparlaanna' ava ngi klin bet toh?
Avaleiyi, rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thamda paukreel kcha' mma' ava ngi ava' 'leenni pau mdoreel ungta ava' 'leenni ka'am dow mkheng rek 'leenni pau mdoreel.
Ungta Luwbuk'inn kchiir ava' thamda paukreel mma' ava ngi ava' 'leenni pau mdoreel ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am Mma' hinni pau mdoreel.
Ungta parvaan thamda paukreel mma' ava ngi Isowr kruwng longkhom ungta ava' 'leenni kok'ong Mma' 'leenni pau mdoreel.

Kqha kpurhuwi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek, naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih, rihiing le' chatra ungta jira mrowi rek khoa sowm ki khat avah adopiikin pdainu nowlam ki mkenreelsi dow rek tidit tah kindit ungta plungnee ungta lamrin hava'le' avah naan nih adomaak pthiin. Hava'le' avah naan nih, morson rek ava' rukka totlotma ngi kmapthi kmah adotlot raankat ava'.
Mmikktot tih miikqhi rek! Naan nih dousmeet tah pdiip intinu pdainu uwt tah pyolin tinu.

Kqha kpurhuwi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek, naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih tong le' arkuw avah mduwn daat chrel alqhuwn tinu pdainu mthung thangvah mii'alrou tepnerna' le' daksa tkorjown mana' ngi kdimin ptih.
Mmikktot Phairsy rek, naan nih tong le' arkuw avah rukrirep pih mthung aktleu dokin, tidit tah ava ngi mduwn rukka kertleu kcha' daat ruk krow.

Kqha kpurhuwi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek, naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naanna mduwn 'leer daat tih kpowl deek ki tportlot mmeel kqha thlaan rek ava' hep daatin ptih. Pdainu mthung thangvah kdiyou ruh rekle' dow mkheng ki totborna ngi kdim daatin ptih.
Anto'hep daat tih naan rukka mii rekki mduwn 'leer rih mrinkindit dok ki adotedehn. Pdainu arilin thung ngi kqha tpurhuwina' le' nowlam tuksutmana' ngi kdim daatin ptih.

Kqha kpurhuwi nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek, naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih khulpu rekki thlaan rek avah adotlotin ungta mrinkindit mii rek thlaanlung avah portlot deekdeek intinu.
Ungta hanto' theen tinu: ‘Neen nih npu'npa rekin amthung ngi na'am chaak daat tlaang bih, khulpu rek ke'eyou thung ngu mmaan tu' khut khatsap pih ta'amma tlaang rangnga,’ diin tinu.
Avaleiyi, naan nih neenna khulpu rek ke'eyou mmaan chapa rek inping tidit ki rinpaumin avah adakin kepteng ngi athinaan nih adopiik chaakin.
Ava' vah naan nih apu'leen 'raal avah apurvuwl piik dokin.
Pruwl rek, kruknei pruwl suruwl thung ki rek naan, taluhep pih naan nih Simmei ki rah tupsulna' avah kerthle daak chnaanno?

Avaleiyi, asuwn, Neiyi naan ahin nih khulpu rekle' mii kinrit rek ungta nowlam chukpu rek avah pthla lam nikdi'. Ungta naan nih mmaan aangqhe rek avah eyounaan ungta aangqhe rek avah pthowiyou naandi'. Ungta aangqhe rekka naan nih naan ki sinegog rek thung ngi khuikin kchung ngi preinaandi'. Ungta khuwpii khat thung ki khuwpii khat kpha thung ngi mmaan avah chiipreel naandi'.

Mleiya dultipaam thuh mrinkindit rek te'eyowna' mkheng ki mraal avah naan a'leen nih ktla rah. Mrinkindit Abel te'eyowna' thung ki ngi mmun kchiir le' rintparlaanna' arlak ki ado'eyown, Berekhaiah chapa Jakhariah te'eyowna' kpha avah naan aleenin nih ktla rah.
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah hava' dow mkheng rek avah hava' suruwl 'leenni ktla rah.

O, Jerusalem, Jerusalem, khulpu rek ke'eyou nang, ungta ahin nih tapthlat rek mmaan avah lung ngi deengyou lam tinu. Neiyi veityaveitya thung ngi anau le' avah harnuh ngi mapthlatii ngi msuwn rek mdopkhum chaak lam heppi tpurkuh rah kdongei chaak pdainu nang ngi avah ngei mtinuh.
Asuw, nang a'inn avah ahin nih ktlong dang ngi mmaak pthi a.
Mleiya Neiyi nang ahin nih kthe a: ‘Nang ngi, Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng Mma' avah msuwkqha a!’ (Luw. 118:26) aditduh khimkheiyi nang ngi Neiya mdei nimtih” dida.
Audilli Jisu ngi korlouda luwbuk'inn thung ki sun chda. Ungta Msikhu rekki luwbuk'inn innsak ava' ktedet rang ngi Mma' hinni thleng lamda.

Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih hava' dow mkheng avah adehnna? Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya hava' thuh lung khadaat rukka morson khat 'leenni tvarpthima ngi tmaak daat tih ka'am daat am nimeh.”

'Tunnu Mma ngi Kruwng 'leenni mko'on daat arlaan nih Msikhu rekki Mhin nih msik inni thleng chlamda hanto' the lamda: “Teden thung ngi hava' dow rek avah kthuwk rangplih? Ungta Nang arjunna' rang ki ungta dultipaam qutna' rang ki titinna' avah talu rang ngoh, mheithe piik chaanno?”
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwkhat leh ngi adotuhuwn chaakmana' raan ki thenni ikilrindei chaan.
Mleiya mii knempok ki Nei kmiing 'leenni, neiya Mesaiah ping dilamdon nih kthleng lamrah ungta mii knempok avah kuhuwng chlam rah.
Ungta naan nih raal kthuwk rek arja naandi' ungta raalkho arjabei naandi', pdainu ava' thuh naan nih aplungin pyamaan. Mleiya hava' dow mkheng avah kthuwk rah pdainu mqutna' avah pha mlai.

Mleiya chaat khat tih chaat khat 'leenni ungta kruwngpaalna' khat tih kruwngpaalna' khat 'leenni krip rah. Ungta ava' thung ngi powitham ka'am rah ungta tidiyowna' omlai kdung ngi ka'am rah. Ungta mmun msikmsik thung ngi ringnaang kthuwk rah.
Hava' mkheng avah tudun tsaanna' rekki mdopqhunna' ngaal.
Audilli mmaan nih naan avah kdung ngi chiitreelna' kpha ngi ayukparlaan pthi raan ungta ake'eyou raan. Ungta Nei kmiing leiyi, chaat mkheng rekki naan avah akahal chraan.
Ungta mii knempok rek avah kapkhaan pthi lamrah, ungta mmaan nih khat le' khat kuryur chlam rah ungta khat le' khat karhal chlam rah.
Ungta mlangkma' khulpu knempok ki kthuwk rah ungta mmaan nih mii knempok kuhuwng chlam rah.
Ungta nowlam tukksut kma' mnemthang leiyi, mii knempok rekki vonsat avah kdaithang chrah.
Pdainu mqutna' kpha thung ngi kdiil pchaang kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah.
Ungta hava' kruwngpaalna' ki kqhapaumin avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi, chaat mkheng rekki rinpaumin kurthuwk ki karjaam rah ungta ava' dilrow ngi mqutna' avah karvang rah.
Avaleiyi, khulpu Daniel lih mdothe: ‘Tepderkuhuwi tkenveina', mma' ava ngi kchiir mun thuh krip, naan nih adehn thung ngi,” ava' kpa kcha' mma' ava ngi havah adeipindih chso. (Dn. 11:31, 12:11)
“Ava' mthuh thung ngu Judia thuh ka'am rek mmaan nih lown rek thah ichen chlamso.
Ungta inntun thah ka'am dok kcha' mma' ava ngi mi'inn thung ki talutalu yoso klou rah veikhat arjungqum mso.
Ungta lou thah paamlaiyi ka'am dok kcha' mma' ava ngi mbuwdiir klou rah arvang kerheel mso.
Pdainu nit rek ava' thung ngi miipum rek mmaan ungta naukkai rek mmaan ki thenvah suwthitna' ka'am a.
Ungta naan nih achenna' raan mpha avah phalbi thuh mditmata tkarngatnit mkurthuh mana' rah rin'iktham dei chaan.
‘Mleiya suwkthuh chiireelna' klin khat ka'am rah. Ungta ava' hep daat avah dultipaam mupqhun daat ki ngi 'tun kpha thung ngi thuwk mlai ungta dilthang rukku thuwkvot nimeh.
Ungta nit rek avah mdoptowi thang kma'don, dultimii kuwkhat leh rukka karsan pchaang chnimeh. Pdainu mdokchol ksadok rekki thenni nit rek avah koptowi piik rah.
Audilli kuwmiikhat tih: ‘Asuw Mesaiah avah hava' thah ka'am a, mditmata wvih thah,’ mditna, naan nih avah lam'rin chmaan.

Mleiya mlangkma' Mesaiah le' mlangkma' khulpu rek kthuwk lamrah. Ungta mkirsit bih mii rekle' mdokchol dok rek kpha rukka mdohuwn chaakna' raan ki thenni titinna' le' tngana' nong klin avah ktedet lamrah.
Asuwn, Neiyi havah mduh thah akthepiik dok inna.
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih, ‘asuwn, paamkbiik laiyi Mma' avah ka'am a,’ mdit inna, naan nih ava' thah chetmaan ungta ‘asuwn, Mma' avah inn thung thah ka'am a,’ mditin rukku naan nih avah lam'rin chmaan
Mleiya kowl keplek ava ngi knithuhna' ki ngi plekda knitlaakna' thah mdotaan chaak. Ava' hep daat tih Mii Chapa arjunna' rang avah kthuwk rah.
Mleiya mrulqaang amna' mun thung ngi laangkya rek avah kurtuwl lamrah.

Kdung ngi chiitreelna' nit rek ava' mqutdil thah, kbeisek ki, Kni avah kjiing chrah. Ungta thla ngi mar'aang piinimeh. Ungta bursi rek avah parvaan ki ktla chlam rah. Ungta parvaan rekki ruhtan avah kakna chrah.’ (Is. 13:10, 34:4)

Audilli parvaan thah Mii Chapa ki titinna' kandang rah. Ungta audillu dultipaam ki phung mkheng rek avah kqapkqei chlam rah. Ungta mmaan nih parvaan ki armei rek thung ngi Mii Chapa ava ngi ruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi kdung ngi konlor rih kurjung kqum kdei lamrah.

Ungta Mma ngi, Mma' vaantamsi rek avah miprin kdungyou kcha' puwtit tu' kilqhi ngi kapthla lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih dultipaam mirkil plii thung ngi ka'am rek avah paang khat ki ngi paang khat ki mdonna' kpha thung ki Mma' dokchol ksa rek avah kpurkuwk lamrah.
'Tunnu hava' kduwtbul 'leen ki pauportol avah adeipindih chaan. Mleiya ava' mbaak rek 'leenni mdown permetda marna muksun cheu, naan nih khulum knai kcha' a tidit adodehn.
Ava' hep daat tih naan nih hava' dow mkheng ava' adehn thung ngi Mma' avah knai kcha' a ungta thurngutbul lih krip daat tah tidit adeiyin.
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya hava' dow mkheng rek ava' mkurkhum duh khimkheiyu hava' suruwl rek avah mthlen dokna' rah amvot meh.
Parvaan le' dulti a kqu chrah pdainu Nei kpauna rek avah teden rukku mkenvei dokna' rah amvot nimeh.
Pdainu mnit le' mqhang avah kuwkhat tih dei meh, parvaan ki vaantamsi rek kpha rukku dei lammeh. Pdainu Kpa daat tih avah mdodeh.
Pdainu Mii Chapa arjunna' rang ava' rukka Noah amthung ki nit rek thung ki hep daat rah.

Mleiya diipa mkenlet duh ki nit rek thung vah mmaan nih cha lamda, nee lamda, inn nei lamda ungta inn kpernee lamda. Ungta mmaan nih ava'lu avah Noah ngi arkuwngpii thung ngi mluwdek dok kpha thung ngi anto ngi mdotlot chaak daatin.
Ungta mmaan nih diipa kenleda ava ngi mlow chaak dokin kpha thung ngi avah mdodehn pemeh. Mii Chapa arjunna' rang rukka ava' hep daat rah.
Audilli mii 'knii rek avah lou thung ngi ka'amve daat lamrah, marlak ki khat tah klou chrah ungta morson khat tah kmapthi rah.
Snu 'knii rekki buh ksuve lamrah, marlak ki khat avah klou rah ungta morson khat avah kmapthi rah.
Avaleiyi, naan nih ikilrindei chaan, mleiya naan nih Kruwng arjunna' rah qhang avah adodeh chaakin pemeh.
Ungta naan nih havah adeiyin, tidit tah innkpupa ava ngi kupru thlenna' rah mpharit ava' mdeh chaak tlaang bih, mma ngi kilrin chdon mi'inn mdopkui rang avah toptlot nimeh.
Avaleiyi, naan rukku ikilrin chaan, tidit tah Mii Chapa avah naan nih adobin phaak manaan mpha thung ngi kurjung rah.
Mdittu' mukpupa ngi mi'innsuwk rek ksutpqowi rah mdosi rah ungta thendam avah mphakatkat thung ngi kpii rang trinchaak krow ungta kinrit suwk'owr avah kuw rangnga?
Mma' kpupa mtlun thung ngi nong kloumeek ki mdophaak khot rang suwk avah msuwkqha
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah mma ngi mma' avah mdomna mkheng ksutpqowi rah ksi chrah.
Pdainu kqha kma' suwk ava ngi muplungril lih kukpupa avah kbeiyok ki tlungkhot nimeh, adiso.
Mma ngi suwk mdokurthuhqhi rek avah te'e pqhunso ungta kipri rektu' icha ineeso ma'am bih.
Ungta suwk ava' kpupa avah mma ngi m'lam msutma nit tih ungta mma ngi mdobin phaakmana' qhang ava' thung ngi ktlung rah.
Ungta mma ngi mthum 'knii kthuwk ki kpunthum pthi rah ungta mma' avah kqha kpurhuwi rek tung ngi mthenin khatsap kpurthuh pthi rah. Ungta ava' thung ngi tqana' le' haa tikriilna' kthuwk chrah.
Audilli parvaan kruwngpaalna' avah, nlakinrim sowm rekki mmeilaan sin lamda kmoukpu kduh chrah kva kcha' rek ava' hep daat rah.
'Tunnu marlak inni parnga rek avah kinrit reklam ungta morson parnga rek avah kokmok reklam.
Mleiya kokmok nlakinrim rek mmaan ava ngi meila a sin lamda pdainu meidii a sinkthen lam mda.
Pdainu kinrit nlakinrim rek ava' vah mmeila sinin tu' meidii khuwng rek rukka sinkthen lamda.
Pdainu kmoukpu arjunna' rang avah moktot set rang thungta mmaan mkhengin avah kurnguwi ter chlamda ungta iipdok chlamda.
Ungta jaan thanqim laiyi kdung ngi ko'owng krowl khat tih hanto'theda: ‘Arjaan, kmoukpu avah kurjung nga, thuwkin rang ngi akurdutqhi chaan.’
Audilli nlakinrim rek avah kerdel lamda mmeila rekin avah pleng chlamda.
Ungta kokmok nlakinrim rekki kinrit nlakinrim rek hinni hanto' the lamda: ‘Neen kmeilasin rekin avah mdii tlang dok chda, avaleiyi ameidiin mruk mheipii chaan low!’
Pdainu kinrit rekki hanto'theda arthaang lamda. ‘Immeh, akpiikin bih neen kthenin ruk ungta naan athenin rukku khom nimeh. Pdainu naan nih ichetin rang ngi kyur rek hinni athen raanna aren chdaatin.’

Ungta mmaan nih kren rah mche chaakin arlaan nih kmoukpu avah arjungda. Ungta korthlong dok kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi mma' tu' kilqhi ngi inneena' ki kmaal ava' thung ngi luwt dok chlamda ungta thurngut avah arkam pthida.
Mdilthang row ngi kinrim morson rek avale' rukka arva lamda ungta ‘Kruwng, Kruwng, inn mheipvan piik chaan,’ dilamda!
Pdainu mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Neiyi naanna adeipindih maanring,’ dida.
Avaleiyi, ikilrindei chaan, tidit tah naan nih Mii Chapa arjunna' rang nit ruk ungta qhang ava' ruk adodeh chaakin pemeh.
Mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah miikhat tih msuwk rek ownda mdomna avah mmaan hinni parlaan pthi lam thida khuwpaam lamkla thah kipjiin kcha' dok ava' hep daat.

Ungta mma ngi khat hinni talent parnga piida ungta morson khat hinni 'knii piida ungta morson khat hinni khat piida. Ungta mma ngi mmaan khatkhat hinni mma' mma' ki mdopchaan chaak dilkqowiyi avah mdopiik chaak lam ungta mpiik dok lam daat le' pjiinteng chda.
Audilli talent parnga karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi chetda mmaan ava'tu' sum lotnada ungta mtun nih talent parnga toppop chda.
Ungta anto' heppi 'knii karlaang kcha' mma' rukku mtun nih morson 'knii toppop chda.
Pdainu talent khat karlaang kcha' mma' ava' vah vangda khor khat khor thida mukpupa sum avah ava' thuh dimda dowl pthida.
'Tunnu mpha rowiksowt dilli suwk rek kpupa avah tlungda ungta mmaan tu' msumin avah taisap lamda.

Mthungta talent parnga karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi morson talent parnga horda thlengda ungta hanto'theda: Kruwng, nang ngi kihin nih talent parnga mpii chtinu ungta asuw o, neiyi avah m'leen nih morson talent parnga toppop chnuh.

Mthungta mma' kpupa ava ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Kqha ungta trinchaak krow suwk, nang ngi kqhajik ki atlotta. Nang nga dow mruk'suwn 'leenni trinchaak krow dok imptih. Ava' vah neiyi dow knempok ksutpqowi rah asi nikdi'. Nang akpupa kanpatna' thung ngi iluwt cha'.’
Ungta talent 'knii karlaang kcha' mma' ava' rukku thlengda hanto'theda: ‘Kruwng, nang ngi neiya talent 'knii mpii chtinu ungta asuw o, neiyi ava' 'leenni morson talent 'knii toppop chnuh.”

Ungta mma' kpupa ava ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Kqha ungta trinchaak krow suwk, nang ngi kqhajik ki atlotta. Nang nga dow mruk'suwn 'leenni trinchaak krow dok imptih. Ava' vah neiyi dow knempok ksutpqowi rah asi nikdi'. Nang akpupa kanpatna' thung ngi iluwt cha'.’

Audilli talent khadaat karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi thlengda hanto'theda: ‘Kruwng neiyi nang nga aplung kapchai tidit adokdeh ungta nang nga adopqau mana' rek thung ki ado'arkun kcho ungta chiimuw adovar mana' rek thung ki adopurku kcho tidit adokdeh.
Ungta neiya kningqida talent khat adotpiik avah dultiril thuh dimnu ka'am daat. Asuw o, havah nah adow, alou cha'.’

Pdainu mma' kpupa ava ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Mrilkqha kma' ungta howngkva suwk nang, nang ngi neiya kdopqau mana' thung ki kdo'arkun tidit dei tih ungta chiimuw kdovar mana' thung ki kdopurku tidit ruk dei tih.
Avaleiyi, neiyi ktlun kerheel thung ngi ksum avah m'leen ki kpop pih kdolow chaak rang ngi, nei ksum avah sum'inn thung ngi adothiik dok rah.
Avaleiyi, mma' hinki talent avah aloupthiin ungta talent sowm kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni apiikpomin.
Mleiya kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni kpiikpom rah ungta mma ngi kepleet tih kthlowi chrah. Pdainu kthlowi kma' mma' hinki avah, mma ngi mdothlowi chaak kpha thung ki rukka kloupthi rah.
Ungta msit ktaak suwk avah aloupthiin rang ngi duwn ki kjiing ki kjiingnu thung ngi avarpthiin. Mun ava' thung ngu tqana' le' haa tikriilna' kthuwk chrah.’
Mii Chapa ava ngi mkonlorna' tu' kilqhi ngi murjun thuh ungta Mma' tu' kchiir vaantamsi mkheng rektu' murjunqum thung ngi Mma ngi mkonlor chaak tu' kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong chrah.
Ungta chaat mkheng rekki Mma' aang ngi krip lamrah. Ungta Mma ngi yaukqhi ngi keel rek hinki yau rek mdopenqhen heppi mmaan avah khat hinki khat avah kpenqhen pthi lamrah.
Ungta Mma ngi yau rek avah machang ktong thah ungta keel rek avah maleh ktong thah kpa'am lamrah.

Audilli Paamkruwng ngi machang ki rek hinni hanto' kthe rah: ‘Kpa ngi suwqhat mdopiik rek naan arvaan. Ungta dultipaam mupqhun daat ki naan athen inni mdoporthlon dok ksa kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih arlaang chaan.

Mleiya Neiyi kpowi mtham thung ngi naan nih Neiyi kdochaak rah thendam mpii chaan tinu. Kning makraal thung ngi naan nih Neiya dii mepneek chaan tinu. Ungta mal kurthuwk nuh ka'am thung ngi naan nih Neiya muptlung chaan tinu.

Neiyi buwdiir ktaak ki ka'am thung ngi naan nih Neiya buw mupkhut chaan tinu. Neiyi kowi nuh ka'am thung ngi naan nih Neiya mvel chaan tinu. Ungta Neiyi rowng'inn thuh ka'am thung ngi naan nih Neiya mvel chaan tinu.’

Audilli mrinkindit mii rekki hanto' arthaang lamdon nih kthe lamrah: ‘Kruwng teden thungda, apowi ktham mih adeiyin nuh neen nih then adokpiik chaak inna? Mditmata teden thungda, aning kakraal adeiyin nuh neen nih dii adokepneek chaak inna?
Teden thungda, neen nih mal khat tih adeiyin nuh neen nih adokuptlun chaak inna? Mditmata teden thungda, neen nih buwdiir ktaak ki a'am adeiyin nuh, buwdiir adokbaan chaak naanna?
Mditmata teden thungda, kowi tinu mditmata rowng'inn thung ngi amtinu neen nih ava' thuh adeiyin nuh, Nang adokvel chaak naanna?’
Ungta Kruwng ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni theda: ‘Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah naan nih Nei ku'uknau rek kdilsi khat hinni adotlotin avah Nei kihin nih adotlot chaakin.’

Audilli Mma ngi mmaleh ktong thah ka'am rek hinni hanto' kthe rah: ‘Pauhor kurbuk kcha' rek naan, Nei kihin ki ikorlou dokin ungta tarnampii avale' mma' vaantamsi rek thenni mdoporthlon dok ksa ktlangknai kma' mei thung ngi isun dokin.
Mleiya Neiyi kpowi mtham thuh naan nih kdochaak rah thendam mpii chmaan tih. Ungta kning makraal thuh naan nih kdoneek rah dii mpii chmaan tih.

Ungta Neiyi mal kurthuwk nuh ka'am thung ngi naan nih Neiya muptlung chmaan tih. Ungta Neiyi buwdiir ktaak ki ka'am thuh buwdiir mvarpiik chmaan tih. Ungta Neiyi kowi nuh ungta rowng'inn thuh amnu pdainu naan nih Neiya mvel chmaan tih.’

Audilli mmaan rukku arthaang lamdon hanto' kthe lamrah: “Kruwng teden thungda, Nang ngi apowi thamda aning kraalda mditmata mal kurthuwk tinu mditmata buwdiir ktaak ki amtinu mditmata kowi tinu mditmata rowng'inn thuh a'am akdehn chunni neen nih Nang sop'adoklow chaakma naanna?’

Audilli Mma ngi hanto' arthaang lamdon nih kthe rah: ‘Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Naan nih talutalu yoso hava'le' arlak ki kdilsi ava' 'leenni adotlotmaan avah Nei kihin rukku adotlotin pemeh.
Ungta hava'le' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' mraal suwkthuhna' thung ngi kchet chrah pdainu mrinkindit kcha' avah ktlangknai kma' rinkum thung ngi kchet chlam rah.”
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Jisu ngi hava' pauna rek mkheng ava' mthe dok dilli, Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda:
“Naan nih nii 'knii dil thah taplaanna' kmaal avah karvang rah tidit tah adodehn. Ungta mmaan nih Mii Chapa avah topthowiyowna' rang ki thenni kyur chlam rah.”
Audilli thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta mii rekki kver rek avah Kaiaphas mdoditin thimpu kenreelsi inn thung ngi kurkuwk lamda.
Ungta Jisu avah mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni taluhep pih tepmenda tokyown rang tidit leiyi, tuprut tih kerseel lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' kmaal ava'kat thung mso, mleiya miipii rek kunpuwr lamrah.”
Ungta 'tunnu Jisu a Bethany khuw thung ki raichi ktong Simon inn thung ngi ma'am daat arlaan nih,

Snu khat tih alabaster lung khuwng khat thung ngi reidii mkhon kdung ngi knem khat sinda Mma' hinni thlengda. Ungta Mma ngi khaan 'leenni mko'on daat arlaan nih phada reidii avah mluw 'leenni perleida,
Pdainu Msikhu rekki ava' mdehn thungta plung pthit lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi msit ktaak ki havah mdopartlai pthi daat toh?
Mleiya hava' mikrimkdi reidii avah mkhon kekre ngi yurthida srah rek hinni tpiik chaak pleh rangnga,” dilamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi ava' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih snu avah muplung apyat inna? Mleiya mma ngi Nei kthen nih nong kqha khat mtlot chaak a.
Mleiya naan nih srah rek avah mpha ktai thung ngi ado'amqhi tlit daatin, pdainu Neiya mpha ktai thung ngi ma'amqhi tlit daat nimaan tih.
Mleiya mma ngi hava' reidii Nei kdaksa 'leenni mdoperlei avah Nei mdotulruwl chaakna' rang ki thenni mdotporthlon chaakna'.

Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Tva'tva' thung yoso hava' kqhapaumin ava' tparjaamna' dultipaam mkheng thung ngi snu ava ngi mdotlot chaak dok avah mma' tbinphaakna' khat tih tethe tlit tih ka'am chrah.”
Audilli sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat Kerioth ki Judas mdoditin ava ngi thimpu kenreel rek hinni vada.
Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih Mma' avah kyur chaakku, naanvah tyakat atpiiknum inna?” Ungta mmaan nih, mhin nih jiipowl sumqiit chai somkdum taipiik lamda.
Mthungta mma ngi ava' dilli, Mma' mdoyur chaakna' rang ki thenni mpha kqha karvang rah sutpqowi chda.

'Tunnu thowl ktaak ki tmaalna' nit ki mkhatna' nit thung ngi sikhu rekki Jisu hinni thleng lamda ungta Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taplaanna' kmaal ava' adochaakna' rang mmun avah tva'thung ngi kdoporthlon raan angeiya?”

Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi khuwpii ava' thung ngi miikhat ka'am ava' hinni vaan rang ngi, mma' hinni hanto ngi atheen, ‘Chukpu ngi, Neiki mpha avah kvei kcha' a, Neiyi a'inn thung ngi ksikhu rektu', Taplaanna' avah idan chnih’ mditta', adiin.”
Mthungta sikhu rekki Jisu ngi mdoperseel lam ava' heppi tlow lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Taplaanna' kmaal avah porthlong chlamda.
'Tunnu kluhpha mve thungta Jisu ngi sowm lei'knii rektu' kmaal rah ko'ongsap lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih then mchaakin chunni Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya naan arlakin ki khat tih Neiya myur chnaandi'.”
Ungta mmaan nah avaleiyi kdung ngi muplungin yada. Ungta mmaan nih khatkhat tih: “Kruwng, avah nei ngaal mowi,” disap lamda?
Audilli Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nei tu' arkuw khat thung ngi khut mukphuwm qhive mma' ava ngi Neiya mukyur chrah.
Mii Chapa avah Mma' leiyi, mdokjit dok ava'jik ki kchet chrah. Pdainu Mii Chapa kyur kcha' mii ava' 'leenni suwthitna' ka'am a! Mii ava' ki thenvah tqouqou vih mqou chaakma daatple bih kqha rangnga.”
Audilli Mma' kyur chrang Judas tih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Rabbi, avah nei ngaal mowi?” Ungta Mma ngi theda: “Nang ngi anto ngi athethut chaak dok a.”
Ungta mmaan nih mmaal meekin arlaan nih Jisu ngi thenpen avah louda ungta panpaak chthida khuida ungta sikhu rek hinni piilam thida hanto'theda: “Arlaangin, a chaan, havah Nei ksadak ava'.”
Audilli Mma ngi tong avah louda ungta panpaak chda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda, pii lamda: “naan akheng inni hava' thungki aneen.
Mleiya havah mii knempok rekki pnu rek toptlot piikna' rang ki thenni kthuwk pauqum renki, Nei kihii ava'.
Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, Neiyi Kpa kruwngpaalna' thung ngi naan tu' ren ava' kdoneekna' nit ava' marvanduh khimkheiyi hava' riithlumdii avah veikhat nee nimaang.
Ungta mmaan nih laa khat mthe dokin dilli, mmaan nih vangthuwk lamda kruwn lown thah hang chlamda.”

Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tuwngkluw kat tih naan akhengin avah Nei kleiyi khuhsiir pirthiter chnaandi'. Mleiya havah mdokjit dok ksa. ‘Neiyi Yaukqhipa avah kvet nikdih Ungta yaulop rek thungki yau rek avah kerjeiter chlam rah.’ (Jkh. 13:7)
Pdainu Nei mteperdel dok dilli, Neiyi naan aduhthaan nih, Galily thah junikdi'.”
Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang aleiyi mii mkheng ngi khuhsiir pirthiter chyoso, neiya teden rukku khuhsiir pirthivot nimaang.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Tuwngkluw kat tih, harkhuwn duh ngi nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi'.”
Ungta Pitar rih Mma' hinni theda: “Neiyi, Nang tu' diyou chdaat rangyow ringngi, Nang nga amatvot nimaang.” Ungta anto' heppi sikhu morson rek mkhengin rukku the lamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi Gethsamany tidit mun thung ngi mmaan tu' hang lamda ungta sikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi wva' thuh rinkaktham chrah kehei arlaan nih, naanna hava' thuh iko'ong daatin.”
Ungta Mma ngi Pitar le' Jebedi chapa 'knii rek qhida vada ungta Mmah kdung ngi yachda ungta muplung kdungreen nih jiing chda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Kapthlarin avah kdung reen nih, kdiyou chrang pang ngi kya kcha' a. Hava' thuh i'am daatin rang ngi Nei tu' iharsap daat inche.”

Ungta Mma ngi mruk vakorsownda ungta Mmai thah tluwda rinktham chda ungta hanto'theda: “O, Apa, mrow rang cheentung ngi hava' tong avah Nei kihin ki ikorsown daatsowi, anto'daat yoso Nei kuplungbin hep daat mso, pdainu Nah aplungbin daatso.”

Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni arvangda ungta mmaan avah ki'iip chdaat tih arvanpha lamda ungta Pitar hinni Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Taluda naan nih qhang khatpang daat rukka Nei tu' harsap pchaang chmaanti a?
Naan nih kepthleem athung inni mluwmana' rah ikilrindei chaan ungta rin'iktham dei chaan. Apthlarin invah dakat tih mbin chaak a pdainu adaksaan nah aruhn kdowng kcha' a.”

Ungta Mma ngi mvei'knitna' vanowlda rinktham chda ungta hanto'theda: “O, Apa, hava' tong avah Neiyi kdoneekma donni korsown pchaang kma' rang mkurthuh cheentung ngi, Nah aplungbin ava' ikurthuwk chdaatso.”
Ungta Mma ngi marvan kerheel thungta veikhat ki'iip dok kcha'lam mih arvanpha nowl lamda. Mleiya mmaan nah mmikkhutin kdimat tih ki'iip kcha' lam.
Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan avah mapthinowl lam thida mveikdumna' rinkaktham chrah chet nowlda ungta mdothe ava'jik ki the nowlda.

Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni arvangda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu i'iipin, ikarnga chaan. Asuwn mpha avah kvei dok kcha' a. Ungta Mii Chapa avah pnu kervei rek khut thung ngi myur dok meeksli a.
Ikerdelin isun dokin cheh, Asuwn Nei mukyur kcha' mma' avah knaitek ki karva'a.”

Ungta Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih, Asuwn, sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Judas ava ngi thimpu kenreel rekle' mii rekki kver rek hinki karva, raal'kaang le' kchung ksin miipiipa rektu' arva lamda.
'Tunnu Mma' kyur kcha' mma' ava ngi titinna' khat mdothe piik doklam. Mleiya ‘Neiyi kdoput avah Mma' rah ungta Mma' avah akyowngin,’ mdodit dok.
Audilli mma ngi m'tunkat daat tih Jisu avah phatengda ungta hanto'theda: “Rabbi,” dida arvuwi leekda ungta Mma' avah putda.
Ungta kornowl kornowl lih Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Plap taluleiyi mmun hava' thung ngi kthleng inpti?” Audilli mmaan nih pha lamda Jisu 'leenni khut ptla lamda, ungta Mma' avah kyowng lamda.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu tu' kilqhi khat tih mbaan thlaanda mraal'kaang turthuhda, thimpu kenreelsi suwk khat avah duda ungta makna sellotda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Araal'kaang avah mkokthuh adaal perheel dok. Mleiya raal'kaang ksin kcha' rek mkheng avah raal'kaang 'leenni kenvei chlam rah.

Mditmata nang ngi, Neiyi Kpa hinni avah kqhil pchaang kma' rah atbin daat mow? Neiyi rinkaktham bih Mma ngi 'tunkat daat tih Nei kthen nih vaantamsi legion sowm lei'knii hinni knem myuk kapthlat piik rah.
Anto' mkurthuh u, taluhep pih Kchiir laika ngi mdothe avah kurtlum pchaang daat rang ngoh?”

Mpha ava' thung ngi Jisu ngi miipii rek hinni theda: “Naan nih Nei moklou rang ngi raanqhul kupru khat kokyowng rang heppi raal'kaang rekle' kchungpa sinin tinu karvaan imptih? Neiyi mniiktaiyi naan tu' ko'ongsap in minnu, Luwbuk'inn thung ngi apurchuk innu ungta ava' thung ngu naan nih mokyowng maan tinu.
Pdainu hava' dow mkheng avah Khulpu rekki Kchiir laika thung ngi mdokjit dokin ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni mdotlot.” Audilli sikhu rek mkheng ngi Mma' avah mapthi ter lam thida chen chlamda.
Ungta Jisu kokyowng rek mmaan ava ngi nowlam chukpu rekle' mii rekki kver rek, kunpunna' thimpu kenreelsi Kaiaphas hinni Mma' avah heiqhi lamda.
Pdainu Pitar vah leer rih thimpu kenreelsi innkhulown kpha qowi chda. Ungta mma ngi vangluwtda mqutna' ksuw rang ngi suwk rektu' ko'owngsap lamda.
'Tunnu thimpu kenreel rekle' kver ungta kunpun mkheng rek ava ngi Mma' mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni Jisu 'leenni mlangkma' rinpaumin tpiikna' rah thlaam lamda.

Pdainu khadaat ruk phang lam mda. Mmaan nih mlangkma' rinpaumin knempok ki piichleek lam yoso mmaan nih khadaat ruk phang chlammeh. Pdainu mqutna' thung ngi mlangkma' rinpaumin kpii mii 'knii thleng lamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi, ‘Neiyi hava' Isowr Luwbuk'inn avah te'ekre kapchaan, ungta nii kdum daat thung ngi sanikdi',’ mdodit,” dilamda.
Ungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi ripda Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga dow khatleh arthaang mtinuh? Hava' mii rekki a'leen nih rinpaumin mdopiik pokin avah taluluda?”

Pdainu Jisu a rimkdi am chda. Mthungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi kring Isowr miing thamnu ahin nih pau akkheel chaak a, mheithe piik chaan. Nang nga Isowr Chapa, Mesaiah ava' pti?”

Mthungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya nang ngi adothe ava' ping. Ungta anto'daat mda Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, 'tun dilli nang ngi Mii Chapa avah Ruhtan ki machang thah ko'ongdon ungta parvaan ki armei 'leenni arjung kqum amik ki deinadi'.”

Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mbuwmdiir jenda kqet thida hanto'theda: “Mma ngi pthitda kpau dok a! Hava' heihin nih talu rinpaumin morson tolowpom raan msit ka'am a? Asuwn, naan nih 'tunkat tih Mma ngi pthitda mpau avah arjaak dok inna!
Naan nih talu abin inna?” Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mmah mdiyow rang kat thah ktla a.”
Audilli mmaan nih Mmai thah ptilkbal lih pthot lamda ungta bun lamda. Ungta aangqhe rekki mkhutpyaan nih tpeeng lamda.
Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mesaiah 'tunnu apurphuwng ngo, kuwda aktpeeng nga?”
'Tunnu Pitar rah duwn thah innkhulown nih kok'ong chdaat. Ungta snunau suwk khat tih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang rukka Galily ki Jisu tu' kilqhi ptih.”
Pdainu mma ngi mmaan mkhengin maiyi avah mat chda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adothe avah neiya deimaang.”
Ungta mma ngi paltong hinni mhei chaak thungta snunau khat nowl lih mma' avah deida ungta ava' thuh ka'am mii rek hinni theda: “Hava' miilai rukka Najareth ki Jisu tu' kilqhi kchok lam.”
Pdainu mma ngi veikhat paureel tu' kilqhi ngi theda: “Neiya hava' mii avah deimaang!”
