Ungta ambong thida, ava' arveel lih krip rek ava ngi mhin nih pha lamda ungta Pitar hinni hanto' the lamda: “Nang rukka mmaan arlak ki khat mun nadi'. Mleiya apau pau vih kuryur kcha' imptih.”
Audilli mma ngi kthi karthamda paureel tu' kilqhi ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mii avah deiliit maang!” Ungta m'tunkat daat tih har khuwngda.

Ungta Pitar rih Jisu pauna avah binphaak chda. Mleiya Mma ngi mhin nih hanto' mdothe: “Harkhuwn duh ngi, nang ngi Neiya veikdumtet thuh mmat chnadi'.” Audilli mma ngi duwn thah vangthuwkda mningksiin dok ki qap chda.
Jiingsun mve thungta thimpu kenreel rekle' mii rekki kver rek mkheng inni Jisu te'eyowna' rang ki thenni lop kerseel lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mbowl dokin dilli heiqhi lamda paamkpu Pontias ki Pilaat hinni Mma' avah parlaan lamda.

Audilli Mma' kyur kcha' Judas tih Mma' avah mupsul inna tidit mmik ki mdeh thungta mthina ngi plung perthleng chda. Ungta mma ngi Jiipowl sumqiit chai somkdum rek avah arheisinda thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rek hinni perheel pthida.

Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dow khatleh kdei kcha' kma' ava' kdoyur chaak leiyi, neiyi pnu kerve chaak a,” dida. Pdainu mmaan nih the lamda: “Neen nih avah talu portlow nikaandi? Nang ngi avah akilrinqhi cha',” dilamda.
Ungta mma ngi jiipowl sumqiit rek avah Luwbuk'inn thung ngi varpthi thida mapthida. Ungta mmah sun chda ungta chetda kurhuwk you chda.

Ungta thimpu kenreel rekki jiipowl sumqiit rek avah lou lam thida hanto' the lamda: “Sumbuwr thung ngi hava' tadaal penlet rang avah nowlam mih mdorot pemeh. Mleiya hava'le' avah hii trenna' mkhon pah.”
Ungta mmaan nih lop kerseel lam thida sum ava ngi beelksapa loupaam khat ren lamda. Mleiya avah mal rek kdiyou tulruwlna' mun purthuh lamda.
Avaleiyi, ava' paam avah tuni kpha thung ngi, ‘Hii loupaam’ tidit tih ka'am kcha'.

Audilli khulpu Jeremaiah ngi mdokjit dok avah anto ngi kurkhumda. Mleiya mma ngi hanto'theda: “Ungta mmaan nih, Mma' khon rah mdopqum dokin Jiipowl sumqiit chai somkdum avah lou lamda. Hava' mkhon avah Isreel nau rekki mdopqum dokin ava'.
‘Ungta Kruwng ngi nei kihin nih mdotsi chaak heppi Mmaan nih beelksa rek loupaam ki thenni avah pii lamda,’ ” mdodit. (Jer. 32:6-9 Jkh. 11:12-13)

'Tunnu Jisu ngi paamkpu aang ngi ripda ungta paamkpu ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda kheelda: “Nang nga Jihudi rekki Kruwng pti?” dida. Mthungta Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Neiya nang ngi hava' adothe ava' ping.”
Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rekki mraal mpiiklam thung vah, Mma ngi dow khatleh mdo'arthaan pemeh.
Audilli Pilaat tih Mhin nih theda: “Nang ngi a'leen nih rinpaumin knempok ki mdopiikin avah arja mtimow?”
Ungta Mma ngi avah pauna khadaat rukku arthaang mda. Mthungta Paamkpu avah kdung ngi ngakyou chda.
'Tunnu kmaal ava' thung ngi miipii rek hinni paamkpu ava ngi mmaan nih mdongeiyin rowngmii khat mdopthlat piik lam rang avah mnowpa khat kurthuwk ki am chda.
Ungta mii mkheng ngi mdodeh mmiing Barabbas tidit rowngmii khat avah mmaan nih thlowi daat lamda.
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih kurtuwl lamda ma'am daatin arlaan nih Pilaat tih mmaan hinni kheel lamda: “Naan nih, athen inni kuw adokapthlat piik raan angei inna? Barabbas mow, Khrista mdodit Jisu ava' rang?”
Mleiya tepnerna' leiyi, mmaan nih Mma' avah mdotparlaan lam tidit avah mma ngi mdodeh.

Mma ngi pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni mko'on daat arlaan nih mnuwn nih hanto'theda pau arheipthlada: “Nang ngi hava' mii kindit ava' 'leenni dow khatleh tlowma', Mleiya tuni kmer rih Mma' leiyi, dow knempok 'leenni suwk kthuwk kcha' ping.”
Pdainu thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rekki miipii rek ava' hinni mmaan nih Barabbas mdoqhilna' raan ungta Jisu avah tpenvei rah adiin rang ngi aqhilin, tidit tih siinchaak dok lamda.
Paamkpu ava ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' 'knii rek arlak ki kuw adokapthlat piik raan angei inna?” dida. Mthungta mmaan nih ‘Barabbas,’ dilamda.
Pilaat tih mmaan hinni theda: “Mdittu' Khrista mdodit Jisu avah talu pirditnikdi?” Mthungta mmaan mkheng inni mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Mma' avah topthowiyow rah.”
Audilli paamkpu ava ngi hanto'theda: “Talulei, talu kthikat mdotlot ma'amna ngi?” Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheel seset tih owng lamda, ‘Mma' avah topthowiyow rah,’ dilamda.

Ungta Pilaat tih mma ngi dow khatleh pqu pchaang rang maang ungta raal kthuwk rah mthe a tidit deida. Audilli mma ngi dii louda ungta miipii rek dodeh ngi mkhut alqhuthida hanto'theda: “Hava' mraal ktaak Mii hava' hii leivah neiya dow khatleh deimaang. Havah naan nih akilrinqhi chaan,” dida.
Ungta mii mkheng ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mma' hii avah neen k'leenin nih ungta knau'leen 'leenni itla chdaatso.”
Audilli mma ngi mmaan thenni Barabbas avah pthlatpiik lamda ungta mma ngi khuikin kchung ngi Jisu a bunthida mdopthowiyow raan ki thenni Mma' avah parlaan pthi lamda.
Audilli paamkpu ava' raalmii rekki Mma' avah Paamkpu inn, tidit tah paamkpu amna'inn ava' thah qhi lamda. Ungta raalmiilop mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah tkhulsap lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mbuwmdiir avah suwtpthi lamda ungta phriktluwn, mipdit kning ngi ksen pnaak lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih tirling penher lam thida avah laar luwkhum mih mluw thah pkhum lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mkhut machang thah piipe kuwng psin lam thida ma'aang ngi pkhup pih tirdiil chleek lamda. Ungta hanto' the lamda pnichaak lamda: “Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng, akurvuwi chaak inna,” dileek lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih ptil pthot lamda ungta piipe kuwng chom lamda mluwchai thah prei lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mipnichaak dokin dilli m'leen ki mbuwmdiir khowk lamda ungta Mma' buwdiir ava' pnaak lamda ungta mdopthowiyow raanni Mma' avah hanqhi lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih marvanthuwn thungta mmiing Simon mdoditin, Sairen khuw ki miikhat kurdutqhi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' khros avah mma' hinni topdom lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Golgotha tidit mun mphaakin thungta tidit tah luwruh mun mdoditnaan.
Mmaan nih saasingkha tu' tporchou thowldii kdor avah mdoneek rah pii lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi ava' mpertem dilli, Mma ngi avah neemda.

Audilli mmaan nih Mma' avah pthowiyou lamda ungta mbuwdiir avah mmaan nih pchalpiik sutna' lam thida penthem chlamda. Mleiya khulpu rek dothe ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni havah anto'kat tih thuwkda. Mleiya hanto'theda: “Mmaan nih Nei kbuwdiir rekka penthem chlamda ungta Nei kiphriktluwn 'leenni pchalpiik sutna' lamda.” (Luw. 22:18)
Ungta mmaan nih ko'ong lamda Mma' avah sutpqowi lamda.
Ungta mluwqhun nih m'raal mdopiiknaan paukjit rek avah hanto' kjit lamda, mdodaarin. ‘HAVAH JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG, JISU’ ava'.
Audilli mmaan nih raanqhul kupru rek 'knii rukka ava' thuh Mma' tu' pthowiyousap lamda. Mleiya khat tih machang thah ungta morson khat tih maleh thah pthowi lamda.
Ungta ava' thuh kthleng mii rekki Mma' 'leenni pthitda pau lamda ungta mluwn ksuk lamda.
Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Luwbuk'inn penvei pthithida niikdum thung ngi ksa rang, Nang nga athina ikarsan cha'low. Nang ngi Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi khros 'leenki arjungqum low,” dilamda.
Anto'hep daat tih, thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rek rukku hanto' the lamda Mmah pnichaak lamda.
“Mma ngi mii morsonna san pchaang thida mdakka karsan pchaang chemow! Mma ngi Isreel rekki Paamkruwng mkurthuh cheentung ngi khros 'leenki arjung qumsolow, neen rukku Mma' lam'trin chaakna' raanni.
Mma ngi Isowr lammdorin chaakpda, 'tunnu Mma ngi Mma' avah changmaptlaak cheentung ngi aktlan chso. Mleiya Mma ngi ‘Neiya Isowr Chapa ping’ mdodit pda.”
Ungta Mma' tu' mdopthowi yowsapin raanqhul kupru rek kpha rukku anto' heppi ar'ow ngi bi chlamda.
'Tunnu mutrukna' qhang thungki kupqhun nih mutkutna' qhang kpha thung ngi paam mkheng avah jiingnu ngi pkhumda.

Ungta mutkutna' qhang arveel lih Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Eli Eli lama Sabakthani?” Mleiya “Neiki Isowr Neiki Isowr, taluleiyi Nang ngi Neiya atmaak pthi a?” mdoditna.' (Luw. 22:1)
Ungta ava' thuh krip mii aangqhe rekki ava' mdothe marjaakin thungta hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi Elaijah mo'own chaak a.”
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaan arlak ki khat tih heichenda, buwphown khat louda thowldii kdor thung ngi phuwmda ungta piipe kuwng 'leenni daar thida Mma' hinni avah mdoneek rah piida.
Mqhe rekki hanto' the lamda: “Anto ngi mthina i'am chdaatso, Elaijah thlengdon ksansik rang mow, isuwn cheh.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mveiknitna' kdung ngi mo'own dilli Mma' pthlarin avah sun chda.
Ungta Asuwn, Luwbuk'inn kenje thungki buwkhaar avah mtun ki ngi mtii kphadek ki laak 'knii kthuwk ki kerjen chda. Ungta dulti kunchuwnda ungta lung rek avah kuida.
Ungta thlaan rek avah parvangda ungta ki'iip dok kcha' miikenje rek daksa knempok rek avah kerdel lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mrinkerheel dok dilli thlaan rek thungki arvang thuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii kchiir thung ngi luwt chlamda ungta mii knempok rek hinni kandang chlamda.

'Tunnu raalmii arja khat kpupa avale' mma' tu' amsapda Jisu ksutpqowi rekki ringnaang kthuwk ungta ava' thuh mdotlot dow rek avah dei lamda ungta kdung ngi mninginkqi ngi hanto' the lamda. “Dakat tih havah Isowr Chapa kat thideh,” dilamda.
Ungta Galily ki kupqhun nih Jisu dil qowida Mma' sopklow kcha' snu rek rukka ava' thuh lamkla ngi leer rih Mma' sutpqowi lamda ka'am daat lam.
Mmaan arlak ki Magdala ki Mary ungta James le' Joses nuh Mary ungta Jebedi chapa rek nuh le' rukka ka'amsap daat lam.
'Tunnu kluhpha mve thungta Arimathia ki mmiing Joseph mdodit svangpa khat thlengda. Ungta mma' mdakkat rukka Jisu sikhu kurthuwk dok kcha'.
Mma ngi Pilaat hinni thlengda ungta Jisu kluwng avah qhil chda. Audilli Pilaat tih mukluwng avah mdopiikna' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda.
Ungta Joseph pih mukluwng ava' mupqum chaak dilli buw kperneem kertleu deek khat tih perjeel deekda.
Ungta mma ngi mma' mdak thlaan rang ngi lung vuwtda mdothiik thlaan ren ava' thung ngi pi'iip chda. Ungta mma ngi lung klinpa khat purlupda, thlaankhor nehr avah arkam thida sun chda.
Ungta ava' thung ngu Magdala ki Mary le' morson Mary le' avah thlaan ava' raalpha thah kok'ong chdaat lam.
'Tunnu mupduknii ngi, tidit tah tporthlonna' nit ava' dilli thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rekki Pilaat hinni kurkuwk lamda.
Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Ocha, neen nih hava' mikuhuwng kcha' mii ava ngi mrindaat thung ngi hanto' mdothe avah kbinphaak inna. Mleiya, ‘Neiyi niikdum dil thah ringkerheel nikdi' mdodit.

Avaleiyi, thlaan avah 'tun ki kupqhun nih niikdum kpha thung ngi kqhajik ki trunna' rah paupiik khat mheiptlaak piik chaan. Mditma bih, Msikhu rekki jaan nih chet lamdon mukluwng avah kupru dok lam ruk krow. Ungta audillu mmaan nih mii rek hinni, ‘Mma' avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok a’ kdi lamrah. Ungta mqutna' ki mihuwn chaakna' ava ngi rukri ki hinni mmeel kthisi rah,” dilamda.
Ungta Pilaat tih mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih arung chaan. Vangin rang ngi naan nih taluhep pih totlot tih kqha rang tidit adodeh chaakinya ngi arung chaan.”
Mthungta mmaan nih hang lamda thlaan avah pnet lamda ungta lung avah kbihjiik lot lamda ungta krung rah mii thi lamda.
'Tunnu tkarngatnit dilki, arveen ki mkhatna' nit ki khu ktlei rah mthe arlaan nih Magdala ki Mary ungta morson Mary le' avah thlaan ksuw rah hang lamda.
Ungta asuwn, ava' thuh ringnaang kdung ngi thuwkda. Mleiya parvaan ki vaantamsi khat arjung qumda ungta thurngut thungki lung avah purlup pthida ungta m'leen nih ko'ongda.
Ungta mmai ruwngchen avah kowl keplek hep daat tih ungta mbuwdiir avah tbur heppi kchiirdang ngi kpowl.
Ungta mukrung rek ava ngi mma' mdoqit chaak inni kunchuwn lamda ungta kdiyou heppi plowm chlamda.
Pdainu vaantamsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta snu rek ava' hinni theda: “Aningin pqitmaan. Mleiya naanve a mdopthowi yown, Jisu kthlaamin ptih tidit akdehn a.
Ungta Mmah hava' thuh ammeh. Mleiya Mma ngi mdothe dok heppi Mmah kring kerheel dok kcha'. Arvang luwtin rang ngi, Kruwng mdo'pi'iinaan mmun avah, arheisuwn.

Ungta naanve ngi kbeisek ki vangin rang ngi Msikhu rek hinni, ‘Mmah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok', adiin rang ngi pau asonpiikin. Ungta dakat tih Mmah aduh thaan nih Galily thah kyudok, ava' thah naanve ngi Mmah kurdutqhi naandi'. Asuwn, neiyi havah akthepiik inna.”
Mthungta snu rek ava ngi kbeiyi thlaan thungki mningqitin le' kdung ngi mkanpat chaak inni yungsun lamda. Ungta Msikhu rek hinni pau ava' kthe rang ngi yungchen lamda.

Ungta mmaanve ngi Msikhu rek hinni pauksong rah mvanmeekin arlaan nih asuwn, Jisu ngi 'lam thuh mmaanve avah kurdutqhi lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Ikanpa chaan!” Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah dei chlamda mkhuh kyowng lamda ungta luwbuk chlamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni theda: “Aningin pqitmaan, ungta naan nih chetin rang ngi ku'uknau rek hinni Galily paamkuwl thah myukna' raan athepiikin. Mleiya mmaan nih ava' thah Neiya mekdei chlam rah.”
Ungta mmaanve mheimeekin arlaan nih thlaankrung mii aangqhe rekki khuwpii thah chet lamda. Ungta mmaan nih thimpu kenreel rek hinni kthuwk dow mkheng avah song lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kver rektu' lop mkerseel dokin dilli raalmii rek hinni sum knempok ki pii lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Naan nih hanto' atheen, tidit tah ‘neen nih ki'ii chaak dokin arlaan nih Msikhu rekki jaan nih thleng lamda neen kihin ki mdoprut dokin,’ adiin.
Ungta hanto' heppi paamkpu kna mtlun dok bih, neen nih mma' avah siinchaak pchaang nikaandi', ungta naan a'leen nih tyatna' takhat am nimeh,”
Ungta thlaankrung rek ava ngi sum avah lou chlamda ungta mmaan nih mdoperseel dokin ava'jik ki tlow lamda. Ungta hava' pau avah tuni kpha rukku Jihudi rek arlak ki tparjaam tlit daat tih ka'am kcha.
Ungta audilli sikhu sowm leikhat rek avah Galily paamkuwl thah chet lamda, Jisu ngi mmaan hinni mdokchol dok lown ava' thah hang lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mdeh chaakin thungta Mma' avah luwbuk chlamda pdainu aangqhe rekvah muplungin porkohei chlamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni thlengda ungta hanto'theda: “Parvaan le' dultipaam ki ruhtanna' mkheng avah Nei kihin nih mtipiik chaak dok a.
Avaleiyi, naan nih ichetin rang ngi chaat mkheng rek thung ngi sikhu apqhangin ungta Pa ungta Chapa ungta Pthla Kchiir ava' miing 'leenni mmaan avah dii apluwtin.

Neiyi naan ahin nih paupiik adokpiik dokin khimkhei rek avah mmaan nih mdodanna' raan ki thenni naan nih mmaan hin rukku apurchukin. Ungta asuwn, dultipaam mqut kpha thung ngi Neiya naan ahin nih mpha ktai thung ngi ka'am imping.” Amen.
Isowr Chapa Jisu Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki mdopqhunna' avah,
Khulpu rek laika thung ngi hanto ngi mdokjit dok heppi: “Asuw, Neiyi Kpausikhu avah, Nang aduh thah, Nang a'lam kporthlong rah, Nang a'aang ngi pthla nikdi'.” (Mal. 3:1)
“Paamkbiik laiyi ko'owng khat krowl ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kruwng thenni 'lam aporthlongin! Mma' 'lam avah kirji deek ki aportlotin.’ ” (Is. 40:3)
Johon thlengda paamkbiik laiyi diipluwtda ungta pnu rek kertleuna' rang ki thenni plung kerthlenna' ki diiluwna' avah parjaamda.

Ungta Judia paam mkheng thungki ungta Jerusalem thungki rek mmaan avah mma' hinni va lamda. Ungta mmaan mkheng inni mupnu arve rekin ava' mthethut chaakin dilli, mma ngi mmaan avah Jordon kreng thung ngi dii pluwt chlamda.
'Tunnu Johon nah uwtmul dona nada ungta morkowl thah saavun arkowlke pkehda ungta khausor rekle' nowm pkhuidii chada.
Ungta mma ngi hanto ngi, parjaam chda: “Nei kdil thah karvang meek Khat avah nei kihin nih mruh ktangset, neiya kuwnda ungta Mma' khuhkokrii kperthlet rah mtik kcha pmaang.
Dakat tih neivah naan avah diisik daat tih dii adokupluw chaakin, pdainu Mma ngi naan avah Pthla Kchiir rih dii akupluwt chraan.”
Mpha ava' thung ngi hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Jisu a Galily paamkuwl ki Najareth khuw thung ngi thlengda ungta Johon nih Jordon kreng thung ngi diipluwt chda.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih, Mma ngi dii thungki murhunkal daat le' Mma ngi parvaan rek kparvang deida ungta Mma' 'leenni Pthla avah uqhu heppi arjung kqum deida.
Audilli parvaan ki krowl khat arjuda: “Nang nga Nei kvonsat low chaak Kchapa ptih, Nang athung ngi Neiya kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha' a,” dida.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Pthla ava ngi Mma' avah paamkbiik lai thah qhidokda.
Ungta Mma' avah paamkbiik laiyi nii somplii thung ngi Seitan dopthleem mih am chda. Ungta Mma' avah nowmsaa rektu' amsap lamda ungta vaantamsi rekki Mma' avah soplow chlamda.
'Tunnu Johon avah rowng thuh mdaal dokin dilli Jisu a Galily paamkuwl thung ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki kqhapaumin kparjaam mih thlengda.
Ungta hanto'theda: “Mpha avah kvei kcha' a. Ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah knaitek kcha' a. Plung aperthleng chaan ungta kqhapaumin avah lam'arin chaan,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi Galily truwnpii biing ngi mehei thung ngi Mma ngi Simon le' mnaupa Andria avah truwnpii thung ngi leen kdeeng meek dei khot lamda mleiya mmaanve a tuwlvah kse mii reklam.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowiyin, ungta Neiyi mii kokyowng rek ayupthuh inni,” dida.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaanve ngi mleen rekin avah mapthi lam thida Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
Mma ngi ava' thung ki mruk klaset tih mehei thungta Jebedi chapa James le' mnaupa Johon avah Mma ngi dei lamda. Mmaanve ava' rukka arkuwng thung ngi mleenin tphut lamda ka'am daat lam.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi mo'own daat lam le' mmaanve ngi m'paan Jebedi avah ardaman suwk rektu' arkuwng thuh mapthi lamda ungta Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
Audilli mmaan nih Kapernaum thah chet lamda ungta m'tunkat daat tih Tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi Sinegog thuh luwtda ungta purchuk lamda.
Ungta mmaan nah Mma' dopurchuhna' 'leenni ngakyou chlamda tidit tah Mma ngi mpurchuh lam thung ngi nowlam chukpu rek hep daat kmah ngi ruhtan kpukat heppi purchuk lamda.
'Tunnu mmaan ki sinegog ava' thung ngi tarnam ktobor khat doqhi miikhat amda ungta mma ngi owngda,

Hanto ngi theda: “Neenna mthong chmaan, Najareth ki Jisu, neen nih Nang tu' talu kdotlot raan ka'am plih? Nang nga neen mke'ekrep raanni kthleng ptimowi? Isowr hinki Kchiir Khat Nang, neiyi Nang nga kuw ptih tidit akdeh.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto'theda, raida: “Rimkdi i'am ungta mma' thungki arvang thuwkdok.”
Ungta tarnam ktobor ava ngi mma' avah arngol tperveda ungta krowl kparthaang ngi owng thida mma' thungki arvang thuwk chda.

Audilli mmaan nah, mkheng inni kdung ngi ngak chlamda, mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda, kerkheel chlamda: “Havah talulu daat toh? Havah taluhep kduh ki tpurchuhna' ren khat daat toh? Tidit tah Mma ngi, ruhtanna' ava ngi tarnam ktobor rek kpha rukka paupiik pii lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' dothe avah pqowi chlamda.”
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma' laarneena' avah Galily kpervel lih ka'am paamklek mkheng thung ngi koryouda.
'Tunnu mmaan nih sinegog thungki marvan thuh daatin le' Simon le' Andria inn thung ngi mmaan nih James le' Johon le' tu' luwtsap lamda.
Ungta Simon ktarnu avah riiphaak kperveda, kkowiyi iip daatda ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni mma' lei avah m'tunkat daat tih song lamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi arvangda mma' avah mkhut thah kyowngda ungta tipripda ungta m'tunkat daat tih riiphaak ava ngi mma' avah mapthida. Ungta mma ngi kerdelda mmaan avah soplow chlamda.
'Tunnu kluh thah kni mtlaak dok thungta mmaan nih kkowi rek mkheng ungta ram kervei rek mkheng avah Mma' paphaak lamda.
Ungta khuwpii thungki mii mkheng avah thurngut bulli kurtuwl lamda.

Audilli Mma ngi mdetmdet ki omlaiyi kkowi rek knempok avah pdam lamda ungta tarnam ruk knempok ki reipthida ungta Mma ngi tarnam rek avah mpau raan rotpiik lam mda mleiya mmaan nih Mma' avah mdodeh dokin.
'Tunnu jiingsun nih khu mvaar duh ngi, kparma ngi Jisu a kerdelda, Mma ngi vangthuwkda mmun kekneeng khat thung ngi chetda ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh rinktham chda.
Ungta Simon le' Mma' tu' kilqhi rek mmaan ava ngi Mma' avah thlaam lamda.
Mmaan nih Mma' mdeh khotin thungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Mii khimkheiyi Nang adokthlaamin,” dilamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen, Neiyi avale' thung rukku kdoparjaamna' rah neheihinin ki khuwklin rek thah neenna ichetin cheh. Mleiya hava' lei kat tih Neiya kthuwk dok ping.”
Ungta Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi kirkhil lih mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi parjaamda ungta tarnam rek avah reipthida.

Audilli Mma' hinni raichi ktong miikhat thlengda ungta Mma' hinni kdung ngi ktham chda, Mma' hinni mupkhup pih tirdiil chda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi abin bih, neiya Nang ngi adotpertleu pchaan,” dida.
Ungta Jisu ngi plung mdopkham chaak ki, Mma ngi mkhut heikhiingda mma' avah kmeida ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Ou Neiyi kbinna, ikertleu cha',” dida.
Mma ngi ava' mthe dok daat le' m'tunkat daat tih raichi ava ngi mma' avah mapthida ungta mmah kertleu chda.
Ungta Mma ngi kdung ngi pilqhit thida mma' avah m'tunkat daat tih psun pthida.

Ungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Asuw, nang ngi kuwkhat leh hinni havah the nimtih, pdainu isun rang ngi thimpu hinni ikterdet cha'. Ungta mmaan hinni rinpaumin khat kurthuwk ki nang ngi akertleu chaak leiyi, Moses tih paupiik mdopiik dok dow rek avah aparlaan cha',” dida.

Pdainu mma ngi vangthuwkda ungta chang karngam mih purphuwngda ungta pau avah parjaam chda. Mthungta ava ngi Jisu a khuwpii ava' thung ngi kurphuwng ngi luwt porson pchaang mda. Pdainu Mma ngi duwn thah, miiphaakma mun rek thung ngi am chda. Anto'daat yoso, mmaan nih Mma' hinni mmun ktai thungki thuwk kurbuk lamda.
Ungta veikhat Mma ngi nit mruk dilli Kapernaum khuwpii thuh luwtda ungta Mma' avah inn ava' thuh ka'am tidit dei lamda.
M'tunkat daat tih mii knempok mkurtuwl inni, inn ava' thung ngi mmaan tupluwna' rah mmun avah thurngutbul kphadek thung ngi ammda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni pau parjaam chda.
Audilli mmaan nih kyengrii ktong miikhat avah miilai plii ngi kdom lamda Mma' hinni paphaak lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih miipii rek leiyi, Mma' hinni naiqhi pchaang lam mda, mthungta mmaan nih Mma' amna' inntun avah khokpthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mupkui dokin dilli, kyengrii ktong iina' kowm avah mdak tu' arjukptla lamda.
Jisu ngi mmaan lamrin ava' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi kyengrii ktong mii ava' hinni, “Kchapa, apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a,” dida.
Pdainu nowlam chukpu rek aangqhe avah ava' thung ngi ko'ong lamda ungta muplungril inni mninglei avah thlaam lamda.
Mleiya,” taluleiyi hava' mii ava' vah hanto ngi pthitda kpau daat toh, pnu koptlot piik pchaang nga Isowr daat pemeh mow?” dilamda.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi, mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi mninglei mthlaam inna tidit deithida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih aplungrilin thung ngi mlei athlaam inna?
Atheen, kyengrii ktong kcha' mii ava' hinni: ‘Apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a, tidit mow, mditmata Ikerdel, a'iina' akdom rang ngi ichet, tidit avah tva ngi ko'ol betta?’
Pdainu naan nih dultipaam thung ngi Mii Chapa ava ngi pnu rek toptlot piikna' ki ruhtan mthlowi tidit adodeh chaakna' raanni,” Mma ngi kyengrii ktong ava' hinni hanto'theda:
“Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, Ikerdel rang ngi a'iina' achom rah ungta a'inn thah ikorlou rah isun cha',” dida.

Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi ripda mi'iina' chomda ungta mmaan mkheng dodeh ngi vangthuwkda. Mthungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngakyou chlamda ungta Isowr ponlor chlamda hanto ngi the lamda: “Neen nih teden rukku hava' hep avah tedeh mlaiyin,” dilamda.
Audilli Mma ngi veikhat truwn biing thah vada ungta miipii rek mkheng avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah purchuk lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi anto ngi mehei thungta Alphius chapa Levi avah sum tqhaina'inn thung ngi kok'ong daat deida ungta Mma ngi mhin nih: “Nei mheiqowi,” dida. Ungta mma ngi ripda Mma'dil qowi chda.

'Tunnu Mma ngi Levi inn thuh mmaal arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek knempok rukka Jisu le' Msikhu rektu' kmaalsap lam, tidit tah Mma' dilkqowi rek avah mii knempok lam.

Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki, Mma ngi sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rektu' mmaalsapin mdehn thungta mmaan nih Msikhu rek hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluhep pih Mma ngi sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rektu' chasap neesapda ka'am mow?” dilamda.

Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mruh ktang ngi ka'am rekki thenvah riipu a msit ka'am pemeh, pdainu kkowi rekki thennu msit ka'am. Neiya mrinkindit ko'own rah kurjung pmaang pdainu plung tperthlenna' thuh pnu kervei rek ko'own chrah kurjung ping,” dida.

Ungta Johon le' Pharisy rekki tamsi rekvah then ngowl kchok lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni thleng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi Johon le' Pharisy rekki tamsi rekvah then ngowl kchok lamda pdainu Nang asikhu rekvah then mdongowlin pemeh o?”

Mthungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kmoukpu ava ngi mmaan tu' ma'am daat arlaan nih, Kmoukpu plap rek avah then mdongowlin krow rang mow? Mmaan hinni kmoukpu ma'am daat khimkhei thung ngu mmaan nih then ngowl pchaang lam nimeh.
Pdainu kmoukpu avah mmaan hinki mdolow pthina' mpha karvang rah ungta ava'dil row ngi, nit rek ava' thung ngi mmaan nih then kngowl row lamrah.
Kuwkhat leh ngi kkerqen mlai buwlaak avah buwpli 'leenni lot kchok meh, mditma bih, buwlaak ren ava ngi buwpli avah kekqetpom rah ungta mkilqit avah mmeel mdopthitset.

Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel pli thung ngi daal kchok meh. Mditma bih thowldii ren ava ngi saavun thowldiibeel avah kepqe rah, mdit bih thowldii avah kyaan chrah ungta saavun thowldiibeel avah kelqet chrah. Pdainu thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel ren thung ngi tadaal rah.”
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi loulai rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda ungta mmaan nih anto ngi meheiyin thungta Msikhu rek ava ngi cha paar avah tyau pqhun lamda.
Ungta Pharisy rekki Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Asuw o, taluleiyi mmaan nih nowlam mih tkarngatnit tih totlot krow kma' avah mdotlot inno?”
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih David tih mikriin thuh ungta mpowi mtham thung ngi, mma' daat kma' mma' tu' kilqhi rektu' talu mtlot, tidit avah parcham vot maan timow?

Mleiya mma ngi taluhep pih thimpu kenreel Abiather amthung ngi Isowr inn thuh luwtda, nowlam mih thimpu rek kma'don nih tchaak krow kma' tetdet thenpen avah mdochaak ko, ungta aangqhe avah mma' tu' kilqhi rek hin rukku mdopiik koh?”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Tkarngatnit avah dultimii ki thenni mdoseem ungta mii avah Tkarngatnit ki thenni mdoseem pemeh.
Ava'leiyi Mii Chapa avah Tkarngatnit ki Kruwng rukka Mma'.”
Ungta Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi luwt nowlda ungta ava' thung ngi mkhut paang khat kqong kcha' miikhat ka'am.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mdotepmenna' raan ki thenni, Mma ngi Tkarngatnit tih mma' avah pdam mow pdam nimeh tidit kmin nih sutpqowi lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mkhut paang khat kqong kcha' mii ava' hinni theda: “Mningqim mih irip,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Tkarngatnit tih nowlam dorot avah, kqha totlot mow, mditmata kthi totlotto', mmow rinkum tsan mow, te'eyow o,” dida? Pdainu mmaan nah rimkdi am chlamda.

Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan avah plungthit tih msutporloi lam dilli, muplung pchaiyin ava'leiyi muplungyat tih mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Akhut arhei arji,” dida. Ungta mma ngi mkhut avah arji chda ungta mkhut avah mpaang khat ki heppi pumqhat tapqhatpiik chda.
Audilli Pharisy rekki Herod mii rektu' Mma' kepteng ngi, Mma' avah taluhep pih tpenvei rang tidit leiyi, mdotepmenna' raan tlow lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi, Msikhu rektu' truwnpii thah kekneeng chlamda. Ungta Galily le' Judia paamkuwl ki miipiipa rekki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
Mleiya Mma ngi dow knempok mdotlot marjaakin thungta, Judia ki Jerusalem ki, Idumia ki ungta Jordon raalpha ki ungta Tair le' Sidon ki miipii knempa rek avah Mma' hinni kthleng lam.
Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni, miipiipa rek leiyi, arkuwng kdil khat avah Mma' thenni mdothiik daatna' raan perseel lamda. Mditma bih miipiipa rekki Mma' avah kperdel lamrah.
Mleiya Mma ngi mii knempok pdamda mthungta kdungksaan knempok rekki Mma' mdokmei chaakna' raan ki thenni mduh thah heikurduwlsom lamda.
Ungta tarnam ktobor rek ava ngi, mmaan nih Mma' mdodehnaan khimkhei thung ngi Mma' aang ngi tluw chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa ptih,” dilamda ko'owng kchok lam.
Pdainu Mma ngi, mmaan nih Mma' avah mdopandan dokmana' raan ki thenni kdung ngi mdopilqhit lam.
Ungta Mma ngi lown thah hangda ungta Mma ngi mdongei reklim avah Mma' hinni own chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni thleng lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi Mma' tu' ka'amsap rah ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah pau kparjaam rang ngi mdopthlat lam rang ki thenni Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah kchol chlamda.
Ungta omlai rek tapdamna' ungta tarnam rek treipthina' ruhtan kthlowi chrang ki thenni, sowm lei'knii rek avah kthlang chlamda.
Mmaan avah, Mma ngi Pitar tidit miing mdopiik Simon,
Ungta Mma ngi Boarnege dida mdophuwk, tidit tah pqeek hep daat mii mdoditna', Jebedi chapa rek James le' mnaupa Johon,
Andria, Philip, Bartholomio, Metthiu, Thomas, Alphius chapa James, Thadias, Jealot mdoditin Simon,
Ungta Mma' ruk Kerioth ki Judas le'lim lam. Ungta mmaan nih inn khat thuh luwt lamda.
Ungta miipiipa rek avah ava' thuh kurtuwl nowl lamda mthungta mmaan nah tmaal kpha ruk maal pchaang lam mda.
Pdainu Mma' mi'innkhor rekkat tih ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih, ‘Mma' avah muplung karmak kcha' a,’ mdoditin leiyi, Mma' kokyowng rah chet lamda
Ungta Jerusalem ki kurju nowlam chukpu rek ava ngi hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi Beeljibub mthlowi a, ungta tarnampii ava' ar'aang ngi tarnam rek avah mdorei pthi,” dilamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan avah Mhin nih own lam thida, mmaan hinni pauportol rekki hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih Seitan nih Seitan avah kreipthi rang?
Kruwngpaalna' khat ava ngi mthina mkurkhui chaak kuh taluhep pih ava' kruwngpaalna' avah krip pchaang rang.
Ungta inn khat ava ngi mthina mkurkhui chaak kuh taluhep pih ava' inn avah krip pchaang rang.
Ungta Seitan nih mthina ngi mkilrisan chaak bih ungta mkurkhui chaak bih, mmah rip pchaang nimeh.

Mleiya mma ngi mruh ktang miikhat avah choduhrep pih mdobowl pthijap kma'don nih, kuwkhat leh ngi mruh ktang miikhat inn thuh luwtda mdomna avah alrowt pchaang nimeh. Ungta ava' dilrow ngi mma ngi mma' inn avah kolrowt chrow rah.
Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah dultimii rekki pnu arve rek mkheng ungta mmaan nih talutalu yoso pthitda mpaunaan mkheng avah koptlotpiik rah.
Pdainu talutalu yoso Pthla Kchiir kepteng ngi pthitda kpau mma' avah toptlot piikna' m'lam amliit meh pdainu avah ktlangknai kma' tupsulna' thung ngi ktla chrang ngi ka'am kcha' a.”
Mleiya havah mmaan nih: “Mma ngi tarnam ktobor mthlowi a,” mdoditin lei.
Audilli Mnaupa rekle' Mnuh avah arva lamda ungta duwn thah ripdaat lam thida Mma' ko'own rah heipthla lamda.
Ungta miipiipa khat avah Mma' ktukhul lih ka'am daat lam ungta mmaan ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Asuw o, anuh le' anaupa rekka Nang akthlaam mih duwn thah krip daat lam a,” dilamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan karthaang ngi hanto ngi theda: “Kuw le'da knuh le' ku'uknau rekka?”
Ungta Mma ngi Mma' kloiyi kok'ong rek avah sutporloijik lam thida hanto'theda: “Knuh le' knaupa rek avah hava'le'!
Mleiya kuwku yoso, Isowr plungbin ktlow kcha' rek mmaan avah Nei ku'uknau ungta kcharkyur ungta knuh,” dida.

Ungta Mma ngi veikhat truwnpii biing ngi tpurchuh pqhun nowlda ungta miipii knempa rek avah Mma' hinni kurtuwl chlamda mthungta Mma ngi arkuwng khat thuh kalda ungta truwnpii thung ngi ko'ongda ungta miipiipa rek mkheng avah truwnpii ktarngatsap pih laan thah rip lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan avah dow knempok 'leenni pauportol lih purchuk lamda ungta Mma ngi mdopurchuh lamna' ava' thung ngi hanto ngi theda:
“Arjaan, ungta asuwn! Chiimuw kapqau miikhat tih chii kapqau chrah chetda.
Ungta hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah anto ngi mma ngi chii mapqau thungta chiimuw aangqhe avah 'lamsiir rih tlada ungta parvaan ki pva rekki thuwk lamda avah chom dok chlamda.
Chiimuw aangqhe rek avah duldak knem mih ka'am kma', dulchelre thung ngi tlada. Ungta avah dul kder pda m'tunkat daat tih arhanmowng tengda.
Pdainu kni tangda msat thungta chiibul rek avah murjungin mtlumma leiyi, qong chlamda.
Ungta chiimuw aangqhe a tirling arlak ki tlada ungta tirling ava ngi linda ungta ava ngi kchipkrepda ungta avah chei pchaang mda.
Pdainu chiimuw morson avah duldak thung ngi tlada ungta avah pqhangda nemthangda mchei mpaar pthuwkda. Aangqhe ngi tum somkdum ungta aangqhe ngi somtruk ungta aangqhe ngi arja khat pthuwk chlamda.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mthina ngi ma'am arlaan nih sowm lei'knii rektu' Mma' hinni ka'am rekki pauportol ava' ki mlei avah kheel chlamda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan ahinnu havah Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki paukordowl ava' tedeh pinditna ngi mdopiik pdainu duwn thah ka'am rek hinvah hava' dow mkheng avah pauportolna' rekki kthuwk kcha'.

Mleiya, ‘Mmaan nih mmikin nih mdeh chunin nih mdodeh dakdakmana' raan, Marjaak chunin nih mdo'arjaak pinditmana' raan, Mditma bih mmaan nih kerheel chlamdon, Ungta mupnu arve rekin avah mmaan hinni toptlot piik thutdok rah.” (Is. 6:9-10)
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' pauportol mkheng rek avah deipindih maan timow?
Chii kapqau ava ngi Pauna ava' mdopqau.
Ungta hava'le' ava ngi 'lamsiir rih tapqau pauna rek ava'. Mleiya mmaan nih muplungril rekin thung ngi tapqau pauna avah marjaak daatin le' m'tunkat daat tih Seitan thuwkda mdolow pthidok.
Hava' hep daat rek avah dulchelre thung ngi tapqau rek ava'. Mmaan avah, pauna avah marjaak daat le' m'tunkat daat tih kanpa ngi karlaang kcha' rek ava'.

Ungta mmaan avah mthung inni murjung knet tih ka'am pemeh ungta ava'leiyi mpha mruk ki then daat tih kchet. Ungta ava' dilli pauna ava'leiyi kdung ngi tyatna' mditmata suwkthuh chiireelna' marvan cheu m'tunkat daat tih mmaan nih khuhsiir mdopirthit chaakin.
'Tunnu hava'le' avah tirling arlak ki tapqau rek ava', mmaan avah kqhapaumin rek ava'.
Pdainu hava' dultipaam ki tkilrin chaakna' dow rek, mlangkma' alrou tngeina' ungta dow morson morson tngeina' ava ngi pauna avah kchoukrepda ungta mchei tepchei mda.

Pdainu 'tunnu hava'le' avah duldak thung ngi tapqau rek ava', tidit tah pauna ava' karja kcha' rek ava ngi avah arlaang chlamda ungta chei chlamda, aangqhe ngi tum somkdum, aangqhe ngi somtruk ungta aangqhe ngi arja khat chei chlamda.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih meila avah tomkal lih tkhumpthi rah mditmata kowm tii ngi tithiikpthi rang ngi ado'arvansinin mow? Meila avah meilakuwng 'leenni teplen rang ki pemeh mow?
Mleiya kandang kmah ngi todowl pthi tlit tih ka'am rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh mditmata todowl pthidok ki ka'am kcha' dow khatleh ka'am pemeh, pdainu mar'aang thung ngi avah kandang rah.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi havah arja chdeiso.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih ado'arjaakin ava' thuh ikilrin chaan. Nang ngi adopertetna' kat ava ngi ahin nih akpertet piik purlup rah ungta karja kcha' mma' hinni morson rukka kpiikpom rah.
‘Mleiya kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni morson rukka kpiikpom rah pdainu kthlowi kma' mma' hinki avah mma ngi mdothlowi chaak ksa kpha ruk kloupthi rah.”
Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah miikhat tih dulti thuh chiimuw mdopqau ava' hep daat.
Ungta mmah jaanvah iip chda, khuvaar rih kerdelda ungta chiimuw ava ngi pkheuda mowngda pdainu mma' mdak vah, taluhep pih kmowng tidit avah mdodeh pemeh.
Mleiya dulti ava ngi chapaar avah mdopermet chaak. Mkhatna' thung ngi chakau audilli chapaar audilli mchakau 'leenni chapaar dakdak avah mdopermet chaak.
Ungta chapaar ava ngi mmincheu, mma ngi m'tunkat daat tih tangkep mdoptlaak mleiya tkunpha avah kvei kcha'.”
Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah talu tu' tportol raan? Mditmata talu tikjitpthla ngi havah tetdet raan?
Mleiya dulti thuh napqau thung ngu dultipaam thungki chiimuw rek mkheng arlak ki kdilsi anruwng muw ava' hep daat.
Pdainu napqau dok cheu mowngda ungta anthithowlnu mkheng rek arlak ki klinsi ungta ava ngi mbaak rek varda ungta parvaanlai ki pva rekki ava' arlim tingi mthlat chaakin krow.”
Ungta Mma ngi hanto' hep daat pauportol knempok avah mmaan nih mdodeh pindit inya ngi mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi pauportol lih mdothe kma'don mmaan hinni dow khatleh the meh. Ungta mmaan nih mthinaan nih ma'amin thung ngi Mma ngi dow mkheng avah Msikhu rek hinni thepindit piik lamda.
Nit ava'kat thung ngi kluhpha mve thungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen, raalpha khat thah heiklaan inche,” dida.

'Tunnu mmaan nih miipiipa rek ava' mmaak pthi dokin thungta mmaan nih anto ngi ma'am daatjapna' arkuwng ava' thung ngi Mma' avah vanqhi lamda. Ungta Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi arkuwng kdil morson rek rukka ka'am daat lam.
Ungta 'tunnu tchangkhu kdungyou kcha' khat raangda ungta diinuk rek ava ngi arkuwng avah deengda mthungta mthung ngi dii kdim mih luwt chda.
Pdainu Mmah arkuwng armei ktong ki mirkilli luwkam detda ki'iip chdaat. Mthungta mmaan nih Mma' avah perdel lamda ungta Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, neen tkenvei raan avah tuksut mtimow?”
Audilli Mma ngi kerdelda ungta tirthli avah raida ungta truwnpii ava' hinni, “Idaidok, rimkdi i'am,” dida. Ungta tirthli avah raang mda ungta ava' thung ngi kdung ngi kdairimsi khat am chda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi aninginkqi a? Taluhepluwda havah, alamrinin ka'am kma' daat mow?”
Ungta mmaan nah kdung ngi mningin qida ungta mmaan nih khat le' khat hinni hanto ngi kerthe lamda: “Hava' tirthli le' truwnpii kpha rukku mpauthe mdopqowi Mma' havah kuw rang ngoh” kirdi lamda?
Audilli mmaan nih truwnpii raalpha khat ki Gadara mii rek khuwpaam thah arvang lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi arkuwng thungki marvan thuh daat le' m'tunkat daat tih tarnam ktobor doqhi miikhat tih Mma' avah kurdut qhida.
Mma' avah thlaan rek thung ngi ka'am kcha' ungta mma' avah kuwkhat tih mdobowl pchaan pemeh, thiirrii rek kpha ngi mdobowl pchaan pemeh.

Mleiya mma' avah mkhuh le' mkhut thah khuhke le' thiirrii ngi mdoporkol tlit kchown pdainu thiirrii rek avah kpotda ungta thiir rek avah mthum thum mih mdokrum pthi kchow, mditmata kuwkhat leh ngi mdopthlai pchaan pemeh.
Ungta mpha ktaiyi suwn le' jaan nih lown rekle' thlaan rek thung ngi am chda, owng pervelda ungta lung ngi mthina kpirlim kcha' kchoklu.
Pdainu mma ngi Jisu avah lamkla ngi mheideh daat le' heichenda ungta Mma' avah luwbu chda.
Ungta mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Kparthaangsi Isowr Chapa, Jisu, Nang tu' neiyi talu kdotlot rah ka'am pli? Neiyi, adoto'owr rah, Isowr miing ngi Ahin nih akupnuwm chaak a.”
Mleiya Mma ngi mma' hinni: “tarnam ktobor nang, mii ava' thung ki arvang thuwk dok,” mdodit.
Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda kheelda: “Amiing nga taluda?” Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda arthaangda: “Nei kmiing nga Legion, mleiya neenna knempok inping,” dida.
Ungta mma ngi Mma' hinni plung kurthlut dok ki, Mma ngi mmaan avah khuwpaam ava' thung ki mdorei pthi mana' raan ktham chlamda.
'Tunnu mmun ava' thung ngi vakluwng rekpa avah lownjaar rih kmaal pok daat lam.
Ungta tarnam rek mkheng ava ngi Mma' hinni: “Neen nih vak rek thung ngi kluw chaakna' raanni, neenna mmaan hinni mheipthla chaan,” dilamda, ktham chlamda.

Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi mmaan avah rotpiik lamda. Audilli tarnam ktobor rek ava ngi arvang thuwk lamda ungta vakluwng, pun 'knii arveel rek thung ngi luwt chlamda. Mthungta vakluwng rek avah ram kerveiter rih truwnpii khamkuwk thah jukchen ter chlamda ungta truwnpii thuh dii porlowter chlamda.
'Tunnu mmaan kapmaal rek avah chen chlamda ungta mmaan nih kthuwk avah khuwpii thuh ungta khuwpaam rek thung ngi vansong lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kthuwk dow ava' ksuw rang ngi chet lamda.

Audilli mmaan nih Jisu hinni thleng lamda ungta mmaan nih choduh ngi ram kervei ungta legion kthlowi mii ava ngi dona nada plung kindit tih mko'on daat ava' dei lamda ungta mmaan nah ava ngi mningin qi chda.
Ungta ava' kdei rek mmaan ava ngi choduh ram kervei mii ava' hinni talu kthuwk ungta vakluwng rek hinni talu kthuwk tidit avah mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih, Mma ngi mmaan paamklek ava' thung ki mkorlow dokna' rah pnuwm chlamda.
Ungta Mma ngi korlouda arkuwng 'leenni mkal thungta choduh ram kervei mma' ava ngi, mma' rukku Mma' tu' mkilqhina' rah Mma' hinni ktham chda.

Anto'daat yoso Jisu ngi avah rotpiik mda pdainu mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Kruwng ngi athenni dow klin adototlot piik ava'leiyi ungta Mma ngi taluhep pih nang a'leen nih plung adotapkham chaak tidit leiyi, a'inn thah aplap rek hinni vang rang ngi avah vanson piiklam,” dida.
Ungta mma ngi anto' korlouda ungta Dekapolis thung ngi Jisu ngi mma' thenni mdotlot piik mkheng avah tparjaam pqhunda ungta ava' karja kcha' mii mkheng avah ngak chlamda.
'Tunnu Jisu ngi arkuwng 'leenni raalpha khat thah mheiklaan nowl thungta miipiipa rek avah Mma' hinni kurtuwl chlamda ungta Mmah truwnpii thung ngi ka'am chdaat.
Ungta asuwn, Jairas tidit sinegog kpupa rek arlak ki khat ava' thlengda ungta mma ngi Mma' mdeh thungta Mma' khuhther rih tluw chda.

Ungta mma ngi Mma' hinni plung kurthlut tih hanto'theda: “Kchanu 'suwn avah kdiyou rah kthe ngi kowida ki'iip chdaat. Arvalap rang ngi akhut avah mdam chaakna' rang ki thenni m'leen nih mheikhiin piikcha',” dida.
Mthungta Jisu ngi mma' tu' vangkilqhi lamda. Ungta miipiipa rekki Mma' avah mdilqowi lamda ungta mii mnemreen inni Mma' avah per'del lamda.
'Tunnu ava' thung ngi kum sowm lei'knii thung ngi hii ngi kyaan kcha' snu khat avah marlak inni amda.
Ungta mma' avah dow knempok 'leenni riipu knempok rek hinni suwk kthuwk kcha'. Mma ngi mdothlowi chaak dow mkheng avah ava'leen nih mdoptlan chaak dok pdainu kqhathang kmah ngi kowithang setsetda.
Mma ngi Jisu ki mlei marjaak thungta miipii arlak ki, mdilpang ktong thah phada mdona avah kmei chda.
Mleiya mma ngi, “Neiyi mdona chreldaat yoso kthown chaak daat bih, dam chnikdi',” mdodit chaak.
Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih mihii kyaan avah kankhaam chda ungta mma ngi mdaksa thung ngi mdun msaanna' thungki mdam chaak avah karja chda.
Ungta Jisu ngi ava'kat thung ngi Mma' thungki ruhtan mche chaak dok avah mdak ki kerdei chthida, miipiipa rek arlak ki kerheelda sutporloijik lam thida hanto'theda: “Kuwda kdokna kekmeiya,” dida?
Pdainu Msikhu rekki Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi miipiipa rekki adotper'del lam avah deidaat tinu ungta Nangvah ‘kuwda mokthong nga,’ adodit tah,” dilamda?
Pdainu Mma ngi ava' ktlow snunau ava' mdosut thlaam mih mmaan avah sutporloi lamda.

Mthungta snu ava ngi, mma' thung ngi talu kthuwk a tidit mdodeh chaak leiyi, mma ngi mningqit le' mkunchuwn tu' korthlop pih thuwkda, Mma' khuhther rih tluw chda ungta Mma' hinni mkindit mkheng avah thethuh chda.
Ungta Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kchanu, alamrin nih atapdam chaak dok a. Nang nga plung kdaiyi isun cha' ungta adun asaanna' thungki idam cha',” dida.

Anto ngi Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih sinegog rek kpupa ava' inn ki karhang mii aangqhe rek thleng khot lamda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Achanu a kdiyou dok kcha' a, taluleiyi Chukpu a pyat porson nadi o” dilamda?
Ungta Jisu ngi mdotheen pau ava' marjaak daat le', Mma ngi sinegog kpupa ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Aning pqitma', lam arincha' hehe daat,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi Pitar, James ungta James tu' unau kthuwk Johon kma'don morson rek ava ngi mdil mdoqowi raan avah rotpiik lam mda.
Audilli Mma ngi sinegog kpupa ava' inn thah mthlen thungta Mma ngi vaangklum you kcha' khat ungta kdung ngi kqap le' archam klou rek mmaan ka'am daat avah kurdutqhi lamda.
Mma ngi marvanluw thung ngi Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi hanto ngi vaangklum dok ki kqap inptih, nau havah kdiyou pemeh ki'iip chngaal,” dida.

Mthungta mmaan nih Mma' avah ningqhuwm mih pni chaak lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin avah duwn thah mupthuh pthidok lam dilli, nau ava' nuh le' mpa ungta Mma' tu' kilqhi rek ava' qhida nau ava' iina' thung ngi vangluwt lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi nau avah mkhut thah kyowng thida hanto'theda: “Talitha kumi,” dida, tidit tah Snunau, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, ikerdel, mdoditna'.
Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih snunau avah kerdelda ungta chetda mleiya snunau avah kum sowm lei'knii mdophaak dok. Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngakyou chlamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi kuwkhat hinni mdopdeh mana' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda ungta snunau ava' hinni mdochaak rah then mruk mdopiikna' raan thepiik lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki sunda ungta Mma' mdak khuwpaam thung ngi arvangda ungta Msikhu rekki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.

Ungta tkarngatnit marvan phaak thungta Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi tpurchuh pqhunda. Ungta Mma' dothe karja kcha' mii knempok rekki mngajow chaak inni hanto' the lamda. “Hava' mii ava ngi hava' dow rek avah toki mdophanno? Ungta Mma' hinni mdopiik luwkinritna' avah talu daat toh. Mleiya hanto'hep daat ruhtannong rek avah Mma' khut thung ngi mdoptlot daat a.

Ungta havah ding dimklou, ungta Mary Chapa ungta James le' Joses le' Judah ungta Simon le' upa ava' pemeh mow? Ungta mcharnu rek, hava' thuh neen tu' ka'amsap rek ava' pemeh mow” dilamda? Ungta mmaan avah Mma' leiyi, muplungin kparkhaan chlamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Khulpu khat avah mma' mdakkat ki khuwpaam thuh, mma' mdakkat ki mri mlam rek ungta mma' mdakkat inn thung kma'don nih takyat chaak mana' ka'am pemeh,” dida.
'Tunnu kkowi mii rek mruk avale' 'leenni Mma ngi mkhut khiingda mdopdam chaak lam kma'don nih, Mma ngi ava' thung ngu ruhtannong rek avah chmeh.
Ungta mmaan lamrinma leiyi, Mmah ngak chda.
Ungta Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah own lamda ungta 'kniinii ngi tapthlat pqhun lamda ungta mmaan hinni tarnam ktobor rek 'leenni ruhtan pii lamda.
Mma ngi mmaan nih mipjiinin thung ngi kchungqhun kma'don dow khatleh mdohor mana' raan paupiik pii lamda. Mleiya thongya, thenpen ungta msumbuwr rekin thung ngi sum mdohor raan pemeh.
Pdainu kholkhaang mdonaak raan ungta phriktluwn 'knii mdonaak raan pemeh.
Mma ngi mmaan hinni hava' rukka theda: “Naan nih talutalu yoso aluwnaan inn khat ava' thung ngi, naan nih mmun ava' thung ki asunduhn khimkheiyi ava' thuh i'am daatin.

Ungta kuwku yoso naan akarlaang kcha' kmaan mditmata akarja kcha' kmaan mmaan avah, naan nih asunin thung ngi, mmaan thenni rinpaumin khat kurthuwk ki akhuhn 'leenki akhuh arbaatin avah akqhipsukin. Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, pau tpinditna' nit tu' khuwpii ava' hinvah Sodom le' Gomorah pleh ngi ko'olbet tih kdiil chlam rah.”
Mthungta mmaan nih chet lamda ungta mii rekki plung mdoperthlen chaak raan, tidit parjaam chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih tarnam knempok reipthi lamda ungta kkowi rek knempok avah reidii pubul chlamda ungta pdam chlamda.

'Tunnu paamkruwng Herod tih Mma' dang avah arjada mleiya Mma' miing avah kdung ngi kontownda. Mthungta Herod tih hanto'theda: “Dii kupluwt Johon avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel a, ava'leiyi hava' ruhtannong rek avah mma' thung ngi kthuwk.”
Pdainu morson rekvah hanto' the lamda: “Havah Elaijah” dilamda. Ungta aangqhe rekvah havah: “Khulpu ava' mditmata khulpu rek arlak ki khat,” dilamda.
Pdainu Herod tih ava' marjaak thungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Havah neiyi mluw kdoreen Johon ava', mma' avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel,” dida.
Mleiya Herod mdakkat tih mma ngi mnaupa Philip snu Herodias ava' mdoko'onqhi leiyi, Johon avah mii pthlada kokyowng rah mdosi ungta bowlda rowng'inn thuh mdothiik.
Mleiya Johon nih Herod hinni hanto' mdothe: “Nang ngi a'uanau khat snu adoko'onqhi avah nowlam mih mdorot pemeh,” mdodit.
Ava'leiyi Herodias tih mma' avah mdohal chaak ungta mma ngi Johon avah te'eyow rah mdongei pdainu mdopchaan pemeh.

Mleiya Herod tih Johon avah mdoqit chaak tidit tah mma' avah mrinkindit ungta mii kchiir khat tidit mdodeh ungta mma ngi Johon avah parkhaalda mdothiik daat. Ungta Herod tih mma' pau marjaak thung ngi dow knempok mdotlot chaak ungta mma' avah kanpa ngi mdo'arjaak chaak kchow.
Audilli chang qhatna' nit khat arvangda tidit tah Herod tih mqouna' nit tih klin ksaang rek, nongmii klin rek ungta Galily paamkuwl thungki miikoprol rek ava' ki thenni tmaalna' khat porthlong chda.

Ungta Herodias chanu mdakkat thlengda ungta kardaamda. Herod le' mma' tu' kok'ong rek plung pngam chda. Mthungta paamkruwng ava ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso adongei avah mheiqhil ungta neiyi avah apii nikdi',” dida.
Ungta mma ngi snunau ava' hinni paureeltham mih hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso, nang ngi adotqhil avah neiyi, neiki kruwngpaalna' mqim kphadaat yoso apii nikdi',” dida.
Mthungta mma ngi vangthuwkda mnuh hinni: “talu qhil nikdih,” dida, kheelda? Ungta mnuh ngi: “Dii kupluwt Johon luw chai aqhil,” dida.
M'tunkat daat tih mma ngi, koknot tih, paamkruwng ava' hinni vangluwtda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi 'tunkat tih dii kupluwt Johon avah arkuwsin thung ngi adotpiik rah kngei a,” dida.
Mthungta paamkruwng avah kdung ngi kpursul chda, anto'daat yoso, mma ngi paureeltham leiyi, ungta mma' tu' kok'ongsap rek leiyi, mma ngi snunau doqhil avah mat pchaang mda.
Mthungta paamkruwng ava ngi m'tunkat daat tih khutksenpa ava' heipthlada mma' luw chai avah mdo'arvansinna' rah paupiik piida. Ungta mma ngi vangda Johon luw chai avah rowng'inn thung ngi reenda.
Ungta mma ngi Johon luw chai avah arkuwsin thung ngi arvansinda ungta snunau ava' hinni piida ungta snunau ava ngi mnuh hinni avah vanpiida.
Ungta Johon sikhu rekki ava' marjaakin thungta mma' kluwng avah lou chlamda ungta thlaan thung ngi pi'iip chlamda.
'Tunnu ava' dilli tamsi rekki Jisu hinni kurkuwk lamda ungta mmaan nih mdotlotin ungta mdopurchuh chaakin mkheng avah Mma' hinni song chlamda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan adak inni paamkbiik lai thah arvaan rang ngi ikarnga chaan,” dida. Mleiya mmun ava' thung ngi arvang kluwt le' vangkthuwk mii knempok ki ma'am leiyi mmaan nah tmaal kpha ruk mmaal chaakna' raan mpha ka'am pemeh.
Mthungta mmaan mthinaan nih, arkuwng 'leenni kal lamda paamkbiik mmun khat thah sun chlamda.

Pdainu miipiipa rekki mmaan msunin avah dei lamda ungta mii knempok ki Mma' avah mdodeh chaak dokin, mthungta mmaan nih khuwpii mkheng thungki thuwk lamda ava' thah mkhuhn nih heichen pqowi lamda. Ungta mmaan pleh ngi mmaan duh thah heitlung lamda ungta Mma' hinni kurbuk chlamda.

Ungta Jisu ngi marvan thuh thungta miipiipa rek ka'am daat avah deida ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah plung pkham chlamda mleiya mmaan avah kqhi chrah ktaak yau rek hep daat lam. Anto ngi Mma ngi mmaan hinni dow knempok tpurchuh pqhunda.
Ungta 'tunnu nit avah meknem mche dok thungta, Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni thleng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mun avah paamkbiik lai ungta mpha avah kokto kcha' a.

Miipiipa rek havah apsunpthi doklam, tidit tah mmaan nih ichet lamso mekpervel khuwpaam rekle' khuw rek thah mthen inni thenpen aren chlamso, tidit tah mmaan nah tchaak rah dow khatleh mdothlowi in pemeh,” dilamda.

Pdainu Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih mmaan hinni mdochaak raan dow mruk apii chaan.” Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih chetda mmaan thenni denarii arja 'knii ki thenpen renda mdochaak raan dow mrukka tpiik rang mow,” dilamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanvah thenpen a tyakat athlowi inna? Vangin rang ngi asuwn,” dida. Ungta mmaan nih msutin dilli: “thenpen parnga le' tuwlvah 'knii ka'am a,” dilamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni, mii rek avah loplop pih nowm 'leenni mkheng inni mdopko'onna' raan paupiik pii lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih kintiingjik ki arja khat ki ungta somparnga ki loplop pih ko'ong lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi thenpen parnga avale' tuwlvah 'knii rek ava' msin dilli Mma ngi parvaan hansuwda panpaak chda ungta thenpen rek avah khuida ungta miipii rek hinni mdodown piikna' raan nih, Msikhu rek hinni avah pii lamda ungta tuwlvah 'knii rek avah Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin hinni thempiik lamda.
Anto ngi mmaan mkheng inni avah chasap lamda ungta mpowiyin paada.
Ungta mmaan nih thenpen kqiik le' tuwlvah rek avah tomkal sowm lei'knii kdim mih chom lamda.
'Tunnu thenpen ava' kcha mii rek avah pun parnga arveel lam.
M'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi miipii rek mupsun lam chunni Mma ngi Msikhu rek avah arkuwng 'leenni pkal lamda ungta raalpha khat thah, tidit tah Bethsaida thah, Mma' duh ngi heipthla lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan mapthlat doklam dilli, Mma ngi rinkaktham chrah lown khat thah kalda.
'Tunnu kluhpha mve thungta arkuwng avah truwnpii ningqim vanpha chda ungta Mmah mthina ngi laan thah am chdaatda.

Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rekki arkuwng avah kparsa dok ki mdothaan avah heideida mleiya tirthli avah mmaan kepteng ngi raangda. Ungta jaan ava' ki qhang plii mtlaak arveel lih Mma ngi truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi chetda mmaan hin thah arvada ungta mmaan avah heikkheelsou lamrah theda.
Pdainu mmaan nih, Mma ngi truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi mche ava' mdehn thungta tarnampakda dilamda ungta owng lamda.

Mleiya mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mdodehn ungta muplungin kya kcha'. Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi mmaan avah bi lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aplungin apngam chaan, Nei ping, Aningin pqitmaan,” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni arkuwng thung ngi kalda ungta tirthli avah dai chda. Ungta mmaan nah msingreelin thung ngi mningin ngak chda ungta ngakyou chlamda.
Mleiya muplungin mdotapchaiyin leiyi, mmaan nih thenpen rekki mlei avah mdodeh pindit chaak dokin pemeh.
Ungta mmaan nih truwn maklaan dokin dilli mmaan nih Genesaret paam heitlung lamda ungta arkuwng khuikin ptla lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih arkuwngpii thungki mqum daatin le' mmaan nih Mma' avah deipindih teng lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih paamkuwl ava' thuh chenkervel teng lamda, mmaan nih Mma' amna' mun mdo'arjaakin ava' thuh kkowi rek avah mkowm rekin tu' kdom lamda tapphaak pqhun lamda.

Ungta tva'tva' thung yoso Mma ngi mluh mluhna' khuw rek mditmata khuwpii rek mditmata loupaam rek thung ngi mmaan nih kkowi rek avah kyurkren mun rek thung ngi pi'iip chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mbuwdiir mowr chreldaat yoso mdokmei chaakna' raan, Mma' hinni ktham chlamda. Ungta kekmei kcha' rek khimkhei avah pumdam dam chlamda.
Audilli Jerusalem ki kurju Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rek aangqhe avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda.
'Tunnu mmaan ava ngi Msikhu rek aangqhe ngi ktobor rih thenpen mdochaakin mdehn thungta, tidit tah khut tulqhutmah ava'leiyi mmaan nih mraalin pii lamda.
Mleiya Pharisy rekle' Jihudi rek mkheng ngi kver rekki mnowpa ava' mdosinton chaak inni, mrit khattih mkhutin tulqhutjap kma'don nih mmaan nah then kcha kchoklu lam pemeh.

Mleiya mmaan nih kyurkren mun thungki marvanin thuh mkhutin kulqhuhjap kma'don then kchalam pemeh. Ungta anto' heppi mmaan nih arlaang chlamda ungta mdosinton chaakin dow morson knempok ki ka'am, tidit tah tong rekle' beel rek ungta jii chai dona rek ungta khaan rek tulqhutna' ki mrit ka'am.
Audilli Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki Mma' hinni hanto ngi kheel lamda: “Taluleiyi Nah asikhu rekvah kver rek nowpa ava' dilkqowiyi kchet kma'pa ngi, mkhutin kulqhuh kmah thenpen mdochaak inno?”

Mma ngi mmaan hinni arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Isaiah ngi, kqha kpurhuwi rek naan aleiyi kqhajik ki mdopurphuwn dok ksa, tidit tah hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Hava' mii rekki, Neiya mnehr inni makyat chlamda. Pdainu muplung chaiyin avah Nei kihin ki lamkla kcha'.
Ungta mmaan nih, Neiya msit ktaak ki luwmbuk Lamda, Ungta mmaan dopurchuhna' Avah, Dultimii rekki paupiik rek ava'.’ (Is. 29:13)

Mleiya naan nih Isowr paupiik rek avah knengpthiin tinu dultimii rekki nowpa rek ava' pqowi intinu. Mleiya naan nih beel rekle' tong rek tulqhutna' ungta morson anto'hep daat dow knempok rek 'leenni avah adopqowiyin.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih naanki anowpa rekin ava' adopqowi chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr paupiik avah teknenpthi ngi kqha ngi binin tinu.
Mleiya Moses tih hanto'theda: ‘Anuh apa akyat chaan,’(Mpk. 20:12 Mnl. 5:16) ungta ‘mnuh mditmata mpa pauhor kbuk mma' avah te'eyow rah,’ dida. (Mpk. 21:17)

Pdainu naanvah hanto' theen tinu: ‘Kuwmiikhat tih mnuh mditmata mpa hinni, Naanve ngi nei kihin ki adolow chaak rang dow avah neiyi kurban kpurthuh pthidok a,’ tidit tah luwbuk'inn thah kparlaan pthidok, mdit cheu,
Naan nih mma' avah mnuh mditmata mpa thenni dow khatleh rukka toptlot porson maantinu.
Ungta naan nih anowpaan adosintonin ava ngi Isowr pauna avah msit ktaak purthuhn tinu. Ungta naan nih ava' hep daat dow knempok adoptlotin,” dida.
Ungta 'tunnu Mma ngi miipii rek mkheng avah Mma' hinni mo'own purkuw lam dilli, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, mii khimkheiyi mhei'arjaan ungta adeipindih chaan.

Mleiya dultimii thung ngi duwn ki jungkluwt ava ngi mii ava' ktopbor pchaang dow khatleh ruk ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mma' thungki arhang kthuwk dow rek tidit tah ava' dow rek ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor pchaan.
Kuwmiikhat maknapum mma' ava ngi havah arja chdeiso,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi miipii rek hinki kneengda inn khat thung ngi mluw chaak dilli Msikhu rekki pauportol ava'leiyi Mma' hinni kmin nih kheel chlamda.

Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan rukka hanto ngi kdeipindih kma'pa ngi ka'am daatin ptimow? Naan nih talutalu yoso duwn ki kluwt dow ava ngi miikhat avah topbor pchaang meh tidit avah deipindih pchaang maan timow?
Mleiya avah muplungchai thuh kluwt pemeh pdainu mpowibuwr thuh kluwt kcha' ungta avah mdaksa thungki kthuwk kcha' ungta anto ngi thendam rek mkheng avah mdopertleu.”
Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Miikhat thungki arhang kthuwk ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor.
Mleiya mthung ki, tidit tah dultimii rek plungchai thungki kthuwk ava ngi mdopthuh avah plungbin kqha kma'. Lowsang tkilqhina', jowltpurjutna', mii te'eyowna',
tuprutna', tpunjuwrna', tqhatmana', tkurhuwnna', tekterdeuna', tepnerna', pthitda tpauna', tpirlinna', tokmowna'.
Hava' kqha kma' dow mkheng avah mthung ki kthuwk ungta ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki korlouda Tair le' Sidon paamklek thah vada ungta Mma ngi inn khat thuh luwtda ungta Mma ngi avah kuwkhat leh ngi mdodeh rah ngei mda pdainu Mma' avah kordowl pchaang mda.
Mleiya tarnam ktobor kthlowi, mchanu kmow khat kthlowi snu khat ava ngi Mma' ma'am avah arjada ungta mma ngi thlengda Mkhuhther rih tlu chda.
Snu avah Grik mii, mqou thung ngi Siria ki Phiniks mii ngi kqou kcha' ungta mma ngi Mma' hinni mchanu 'leenki tarnam avah mdorei pthipiikna' rang ki thenni ktham chda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nau rek powi ipadokso, tidit tah nau rek thenpen ava' louda uisuwn rek hinni tvarpiik avah kqha pemeh.”
Ungta snu ava ngi arthaangda, Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Ong ngi Kruwng, anto'daat yoso, uisuwn rek kpha rukku nau rek thenkqiik khaan 'leenki jungktla avah mdochaak chaak daat inna,” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Hava'kat adothe ava ngi isun chdaat, achanu thungki tarnam avah ksun kcha' a,” dida.
Ungta mma ngi mi'inn thah marvan thungta tarnam ksun kcha' avah deida ungta mchanu avah kowm 'leenni iip daatda.
Ungta Mma ngi Tair le' Sidon paamklek thungki sunda, Mma ngi Dekapolis paamklek ningqim kthleng ngi arvangda Galily truwnpii thah arvangda.
Audilli Mma' hinni makna kbeeng ungta mpau kaklak miikhat avah paphaak lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma ngi mma' 'leenni mkhut mdokhiin piikna' rah Mma' hinni ktham chlamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi mma' avah miipiipa rek hinki ktliing ngi qhithida Mma ngi makna thung ngi mkhut chal lih thunda ungta Mma ngi ptil pthot thida meplei avah kmeipiikda.
Audilli parvaan hansuwda Mma ngi mtadaal krik ki qen thida mma' hinni “Ephatha,” dida, tidit tah “Ikparvang,” mdoditna'.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih makna avah kparvangda ungta mma ngi kindit tih pau chda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan nih kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan paupiik pii lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi paupiik kdungset tih mpiiklam le' koryou thang setset tih avah parjaam chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nah tethena' ktaak ki ngakyou chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi dow mkheng avah kqha dok ki mtlotta. Mma ngi knakbeeng avah khu tparjaakda ungta mpau kthuwk kma' rukka tappauda,” dilamda.
Nit rek ava' thung ngi miipii rek avah mnemreen inni ungta mdochaak raan dow khatleh ma'amma thungta Jisu ngi Msikhu rek avah own lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda:
“Neiyi hava' miipii rek avah plung kapkham chaak lam a. Mleiya mmaan nih hava' thuh Nei tu' niikdum ka'am doklam a ungta mdochaak raan dow khatleh thlowilam meh.
Ungta Neiyi mmaan avah mpowiyin ktham mih mi'inn thaan nih kupsun lambi, 'lam thuh powrthlowk ki klou lamrah, tidit tah mmaan aangqhe rek avah 'lamkla ki kthleng lam.”
Audilli Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni hanto ngi arthaang lamda: “Taluhep pih hava' paamkbiik laiyu kuw ngi hava'ya mii rek avah thenpen nih kapmaal pchaang daat rangplih?”
Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto' kheel lamda: “Naan nih thenpen tyakat athlowi inna?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Tikhiu,” dilamda.

Ungta Mma ngi miipii rek avah dulti thah mko'onna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta Mma ngi thenpen tikhiu rek avah louda ungta panpaak chda ungta avah khuida ungta Mma ngi avah miipii rek hinni mdodown piik lamna' rah Msikhu rek hinni pii lamda ungta sikhu rekki avah miipii rek hinni downpiik lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih tuwlvah mruk rukka thlowi lamda ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli ava' rukka mmaan hinni mdodown piik lamna' rah theda.
Mthungta anto ngi mmaan nih avah cha lamda ungta mpowiyin paada ungta mmaan nih mdochaak donin mikqiik rek avah tomkal klin tikhiu kdim mih chom lamda.
'Tunnu ava' kcha mii rek avah pun plii arveel lamrah. Ungta ava' dilli Mma ngi mmaan avah psunpthi lamda.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi arkuwng thung ngi kalda Msikhu rek tung ngi Dalmanutha paamklek thah arvang chlamda.
Ungta Pharisy rek thuwk lamda ungta mdoperteel naan nih, Mma' hinni parvaan ki titinna' mdothlaam inni Mma' avah kalraiqhi lamda.

Pdainu Mma ngi kdung ngi krik ki tadaal thida hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi hava' suruwl ava' vah titinna' mdothlaam inno? Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, hava' suruwl hinnu titinna' khatleh piinimeh.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah mapthi lam thida veikhat arkuwng 'leenni kalnowlda, mraalpha khat thah sun chda.
'Tunnu sikhu rek ava ngi thenpen mdohor raan avah perngeelpthi lamda mthungta mmaan nih arkuwng 'leen vah thenpen khat kkheel lih thlowilam mda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Pharisy rekle' Herod thowl thungki ikilrindei chaan.”
Mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi mlei avah kerthe lamda: “Havah neen nih thenpen tothlowi maan leiyi, mdothe,” dilamda.

Ungta Jisu ngi ava' mdeh thungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih, havah naan nih thenpen adothlowi maan ava'lei tidit tih atheenna? Naanna kloudei mlai mditmata kdeipindih mlaiyin ptimow?
Amikin ma'am chunni deimaan timow? Ungta aknaan ma'am chunni arja maan timow? Ungta naan nih binphaakliit maan timow?
Neiyi mii pun parnga ki thenni thenpen parnga kukhui thung ngi mikqiik rek avah tomkal tya kdim mih achom inno?” Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni: “Sowm lei'knii,” dilamda.
“Ungta Neiyi mii pun plii ki thenni thenpen tikhiu kukhui thung ngu mikqiik rek avah tomkal klin tya kdim mih achom inno?” Ungta mmaan nih “tikhiu,” dilamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu taluheppa, naan nih taluhep pih deipindih maanti?”
Audilli Mma ngi Bethsaida thah arvangda ungta mmaan nih, Mma' hinni mmikktot miikhat avah paphaak lamda ungta mma' avah mdokmeina' rah Mhin nih ktham chlamda.

Mthungta Mma ngi mmikktot mii avah mkhut thah kyowngda khuwpii thungki duwn thah qhi pthuwkda ungta Mma ngi mmik thuh ptil mopthot dilli ungta Mma ngi mma' 'leenni mkhut mthiikpiik dilli, Mma ngi mma' hinni khu mdeh mow, tidit kheelda.
Ungta mma ngi tun thah hansuwda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi mii rek avah ding kchet heppi kchet kdeh a,” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi mmik 'leenni veikhat mkhut thida tun thah ksuw rah sida. Ungta mma' avah ren nih pqhatda ungta mma ngi mii khimkhei avah kindit chel lih dei chda.
Ungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi khuwpii thung rukku luwtma' ungta khuwpii thungki miikhat leh hin rukku thema',” dida, mi'inn thah psun pthida.
'Tunnu Jisu le' Msikhu rek avah Sijaria Philip pih khuwpii rek thah chet lamda ungta 'lam thung ngi Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda pau kheel lamda: “Mii rekvah Neiya kuwpi'ii mtidit lam mow?”
Ungta mmaan nih hanto ngi arthaang lamda: “Dii kupluwt Johon pi'ii, atidit lam pdainu aangqhe rekvah Elaijah ungta morson rekvah khulpu rek arlak ki khatpi'ii atidit lam.”
Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pdainu naanvah Neiya kuwpi'ii atidit inno?” Ungta Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang nga Mesaiah ptih,” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi, Mma' lei avah kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan ki thenni mmaan avah pilqhit lamda.

Mma ngi mmaan avah hanto ngi tpurchuh pqhun lamda, tidit tah ‘Mii Chapa avah dow mkheng 'leenni suwk kthuwk chrah ungta Mma' avah kver rekle' thimpu kenreel rek ungta nowlam chukpu rekki kikthitna' lamrah ungta Mma' avah ke'eyou lamrah ungta mnii kdumna' dilli kring kerheel rah.’
Mma ngi hava' pau avah kurphuwng ngi theda. Mthungta Pitar rih Mma' avah qhi ptliing thida trai pqhunda.

Pdainu Mma ngi sutporloijik lam thida kerheelda Msikhu rek avah suwrim lamda ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Seitan, nang nga kihin ki ikorsown dok. Mleiya nang nga Isowr then kurthuwk dow rek 'leenni aplungbin ammeh pdainu dultimii rekki then kurthuwk dow rek 'leenni ka'am kcha' a,” dida, Pitar avah rai chda.

Ungta Mma ngi mii rek avah Msikhu rektu' Mma' hinni mo'own purkuw lam dilli, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso, Nei kdil tqowi rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi mdaksa mthina ikarmat chso ungta mma ngi mdaksa ki khros ahor chthiso rang ngi Nei kdil avah aqowi chso.
Mleiya kuwku yoso, mrinkum tsan rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi kpenvei chrah pdainu kuwku yoso, Nei kthen nih ungta kqhapaumin ki thenni mrinkum kpenvei kcha' mma' ava ngi mrinkum avah ksan chrah.
Mleiya miikhat tih dultipaam mkheng tang chyoso, mdaksa ki muplungrin mpenvei chaak kuh mthen nih talu msit amna' ka'am a?
Mleiya miikhat tih muplungrin tu' kerthleng ngi talu kpii rang?

Mleiya kuwku yoso, Nei k'leen nih ungta kpauna leiyi, hava' lowsangkqhi ungta pnu kervei suruwl arlak ki ningmapya chaak bih, Mii Chapa ava' rukku, Mma ngi Mpa konlorna' thung ngi vaantamsi kchiir rektu' murjun thung ngi mma' ava' hinnu ningkapyak rah,” dida.

Ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah mmaan nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah ruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi ma'am mmikin nih mdeh duhn kpha ngi kdiyou kpertem kma' rang mii aangqhe rek avah hava' thuh krip daat lam a.”

'Tunnu niitruk dilli Jisu ngi Pitar, James ungta Johon le' avah qhi lamda mthinaan nih korlou lamda lown kchuwng khat thah, mmaan avah hanqhi lamda ungta mmaan aang ngi Mma' avah mruwngchen kerthlengda.
Mma' buwdiir rek avah pleudangda, kdung ngi tbur heppi powlda tidit tah ava' hep daat tih dultipaam ki buwkursu kuwkhat leh ngi mdoppowl pchaan pemeh.
Ungta mmaan hinni, Elaijah ngi Moses tu' thuwk lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Jisu tu' pau saam lamda.

Audilli Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Rabbi, neen nthennu hava' thuh ta'am chaak inni kqha rah. Ungta neen nih Nah athenni khat, Moses thenni khat ungta Elaijah thenni khat, buw'inn kdum isaan cheh,” dida.
Mleiya mma ngi talu tethe rang tidit mdodeh pemeh tidit tah mmaan nah kdung ngi mningin kqi kcha'.
Ungta armei khat arjuda mmaan avah pkhum lamda ungta armei thungki krowl khat ava ngi hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kvonsat'low Kchapa Mma' pau avah arjaan,” dida.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaan nih porloijik lamda msutin thungta kuwkhat leh ruk deiporson lam mda pdainu mmaan tungngu Jisu daat chrel ka'am dei lamda.

'Tunnu mmaan nih lown 'leenki murjunqumin chunni Mma ngi mmaan hinni paupiik pii lamda tidit tah mmaan nih, ‘Mii Chapa avah kdiyou thungki mperdel dokduh kpha ngi mmaan nih mdodehn dow rek avah kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe raan pemeh,’ dida.
Mthungta mmaan nih hava' kdiyou thungki kring kerheel avah talu tethena tidit mkerkheelin chunni, hava' pau avah mthung inni arkhi chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' kheel lamda: “Taluleiyi nowlam chukpu rekvah Elaijah choduh kurjung rah, mdodit inno?”

Audilli Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Elaijah a choduh kurjung dok ungta dow mkheng avah ren nih mdoparman dok. Ungta Mii Chapa ava'leiyi taluhep pih hanto ngi mdokjitto', tidit tah ‘Mma' avah dow knempok 'leenni suwk kthuwk rah ungta Mma' avah kikthitna' lamrah,’ mdoditto'?
Pdainu Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a, tidit tah Elaijah rukka kurjung dok ungta mma' leiyi, mdokjit dok ava' heppi mmaan nih mma' 'leenni mdobinin khimkhei avah mdotlot dokin.”
Ungta Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni marvan thungta Mma ngi mmaan kutkhul lih miipiipa rek ka'am daat ungta nowlam chukpu rek avah mmaan tu' mkerteen meekin ava' deida.
Mmaan nih Mma' mdeh daatin le' mii mkheng avah ngakyou chlamda ungta Mma' hinni heichen lamda Mma' avah arvuwi chlamda.
Ungta Mma ngi nowlam chukpu rek ava' hinni: “Naanna mmaan tu' hava' thuh akerteen inna, taluda?”
Audilli miipii rek arlak ki miikhat tih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Chukpu, neiyi mpau kthuw kma' pthla ngi mdoqhi knau avah Nang ahin nih kdo'arheiqhi chaak.

Mleiya tva'tva' thung yoso, mma ngi mdokyownna' mun thung ngi mma' avah dulti deenna'da, mnehr thah muhuwn qhutda, mahaa kriilda ungta kkarbor kcha' kchok. Avaleiyi, neiyi Nah asikhu rek hinni, mmaan nih mma' avah mdorei pthina' raan ki thenni kdothe chaak lam pdainu mmaan vah pchaang lam mda.”

Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “O mlamrin ktaak suruwl rek, trek ksowt tih Neiya naan ahin nih am rangnu o? Neiyi naanna trek ksowt tih adiil raannu o? tu'uda, mma' avah Nei kihin nih arheiqhiin.”

Audilli mmaan nih mma' avah Mma' hinni arheiqhi lamda. Ungta mma ngi Jisu mdeh daat le' m'tunkat daat tih tarnam ktobor ava ngi mma' avah knok dik'ardikda ungta mma' avah dulti thah tluwda ungta kurlup pervelda mnehr thah muhuwn qhutda.
Mthungta Mma ngi nau ava' pa ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Hanto ngi mdotlotna' avah trek ksowtta?” Ungta mpa ngi: “Mqou daat ki kupqhun nih mdotlot, dida.

Ungta ava ngi mma' avah ke'eyou rang ngi, veityaveitya thung ngi dii thung ruk ungta mei thung rukku varda. Pdainu Nang ngi talutalu yoso atlot pchaan cheentung ngi plung mheipkham chaan rang ngi neenveya mheibom chaan,” dida.
Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi lam'arin chaak pchaan bih, lamkrin kcha' mma' hinvah dow mkheng avah kkurthuwk pchaang,” dida.
M'tunkat daat tih nau ava' pa ava ngi owngda mqachun nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neiyi lamkrin chaak a ungta klamrinma avah mheibom cha',” dida.

Jisu ngi, mii rekki merheichen sapin mdeh thungta, Mma ngi tarnam ktobor avah hanto'theda, raida: “Makna kbeeng ungta mpau kaklak pthla nang, Neiyi ahin nih paupiik akpiik a, mma' thungki arvang thuwk dok ungta 'tun veikhat mma' thung ngi luwt porsonma',” dida.

Audilli pthla ava ngi owngda mma' avah kdung ngi knok pervelthida mma' thungki arvang thuwk chda. Ungta mma' avah kdiyou kcha' heppi plowm chda, mthungta miipiipa rek ava' vah “mma' avah kdiyou kcha' a,” dilamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' avah mkhut thah kyowng thida pripda ungta mmah kerdelda.
Ungta Mma ngi inn thuh mvanluw thungta Msikhu rekki mthinaan nih, Mma' hinni hanto ngi kheel chlamda: “Neen nih taluleiyi mma' avah kdorei pchaanin pemeh o?”
Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava'lu hep daat avah dow morson khatleh thuh kthuwk pchaang pemeh pdainu rinkthamna' le' then tngowlna' daat thung ngi kthuwklu.”
Audilli mmaan nih mmun ava' thung ki sun lamda ungta Galily paamkuwl kthleng ngi chet lamda ungta Mma ngi avah kuwkhat leh ngi mdodeh rah ngei mda.

Mleiya Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni purchuk lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii Chapa avah dultimii rek khut thung ngi mparlaan meeksli a ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah ke'eyou lamrah. Ungta Mma' me'eyown dilli Mma' avah mnii kdumna' nit tih kperdel rah,” dida.
Pdainu mmaan nih, Mma ngi hava' mdothe avah deipindih lam mda ungta Mma' hinni ava' tkheel rang avah mningin pqit lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih Kapernaum thah arvang lamda ungta Mma ngi inn thuh ma'am thung ngi Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto ngi kheel lamda: “Naan nih 'lampii thuh asingreelin thung ngi akerteenin avah taluda?”
Pdainu mmaan nih rimkdi am chlamda tidit tah mmaan nih 'lampii thung vah msingreelin thung ngi, klinsi a kuw rang tidit leiyi, kkerteen lam.

Ungta Mma ngi ko'ong thida sowm lei'knii rek avah own lamda ungta mmaan ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih mkhatna' tkurthuh rah mngei chaak bih, mma' avah mqutna'rel mkurthuh rah ungta mkheng ki suwk'owr mkurthuh chaak rah,” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi nau 'suwn khat louda mmaan arlakphin nih nau avah pa'amda ungta Mma ngi nau avah morpom dilli, mmaan ahin nih hanto'theda:

“Kuwku yoso, Nei kmiing 'leenni hava' hep nau 'suwn khat ava' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiya mtarlaan chaak a ungta kuwku yoso, Nei mkarlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei mdotarlaan pemeh pdainu Nei myuksi Mma' ava' mdo'arlaan chaak.”

'Tunnu Johon nih arthaangda Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Chukpu, neen nih neen mikepteng kma' kuwmiikhat tih Nang amiing ngi tarnam mdorei pthi dei innu, mthungta neen nih mma' avah kdopkhaanin mleiya mmah neen mikopqowi in pemeh.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mma' avah pkhaan maan, tidit tah Nei kmiing ngi ruhtannong khat ktlow kuwkhat leh ngi mdil thah kbeisek ki Nei kleiyi kthi the nimeh.
Mleiya neen mikepteng kma' mma' avah neen noktong ki.

Mleiya kuwku yoso, naan nih Khrista hinni a'amin leiyi, Nei kmiing ngi tneek rah dii tong khatpang daat yoso, ahinin nih akpiik chaan mma' avah, Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat kthe a, tidit tah mma ngi teden rukku mma' ki mnongqhat'lot avah penveivot chnimeh.
Ungta kuwku yoso, Nei kihinn, hava' hep kdil'suwn rek arlak ki khatpang ava' khuhsiir ktippirthi mma' ava' thenvah buhsuklung khat mlowl thah pirsi thida truwnpii thung ngi tvarpthi ngi kqha rah.

Ungta akhut tih nang nga pnu atperve cheentung ngi avah areen pthi. Mleiya akhut 'knii puda Simmei thuh atlaak rang, kqiim kma' rah mei thuh atlaak rang hinvah, akhut kurhum kmah ngi rinkum thuh aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqha.
Mmun ava' thung vah pden rek avah kdiyou lam pemeh ungta mei avah kqiim vot pemeh.

Pdainu akhuh ngi nang nga pnu atperve cheentung ngi avah areen pthi. Mleiya akhuh 'knii pum mih Simmei thuh atvarpthi rang, kqiim kma' rah mei thuh atvarpthi rang hinvah akhuh kyeng ngi rinkum thuh aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqha.
Mmun ava' thung vah, ‘pden rek avah kdiyou lam pemeh ungta mei avah kqiim vot pemeh.’ (Is. 66:24)

Ungta amik ki nang nga pnu atperve cheentung ngi avah akhorpthi. Mleiya amik 'knii pum mih Simmei thuh atvarpthi rang hinvah amik khadaat tih Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqha.
Mmun ava' thung vah, Pden rek avah kdiyou lam Pemeh. Ungta mei avah kqiim vot pemeh.
Mleiya mii khimkhei avah meiyi kpa'al rah ungta rintparlaan khimkhei avah pti ngi kpa'al rah.
Pti a kqha pdainu pti ava ngi ma'al ava' mkartlai chaakku taluhep pih pa'al naan? Naan adak inni athung inni pti avah apa'alin ungta naan nih khat le' khat hinni plung kdai kthlowi dei ikurthuwkin.”

Audilli Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki korlouda Jordon raalpha khat ki Judia paamklek thah arvangda. Ungta mii rek avah Mma' hinni veikhat kurtuwl nowl lamda ungta Mma ngi, Mma' ki mnowpa dilkqowiyi mmaan avah veikhat purchuk nowl lamda.
Ungta Pharisy rekki thleng lamda ungta Mma' hinni hanto' kheel lamda: “Miikhat tih mnuwn mdokenqhenqhi avah nowlam vah mrot mow?”, dilamda, mdoperteel naan nih kheel lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi arthaang lamda, mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Moses vah naan ahin innu talu paupiik atpiik inno?”
Mmaan nih hanto ngi the lamda: “Moses vah miikhat tih tkenqhenna' ki paukjit mikjit bih snu avah mdomaakpthi krow, mdit,” dilamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaang lamda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mleiya naan aplung pchaiyin deithida mma ngi hava' paupiik avah mdokjit.
Pdainu dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih Isowr rih, ‘snu le' psel avah mdoseemvet.’ (Rnp. 1:27, 5:2)
Hava' leiyi pselpa ngi mnuhmpa avah mdomaak pthi rah ungta mnuwn tu' mkirchin chaak rah.
Ungta 'knii rek avah daksa khadaat mkurthuh rah.(Rnp. 2:24) Anto ngi mmaanve avah 'knii kurthuwk porson lam nimeh pdainu daksa khadaat kurthuwk kcha'.
Avaleiyi, Isowr rih khadaat mdopthut dok ksa avah kuwkhat leh ngi qhenpthi mso.”
Ungta inn thung ngi Msikhu rekki ava' ki mlei avah Mma' hinni veikhat kheel chnowl lamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso mnuwn kenqhenqhi thida snu morson khat kok'onqhi mma' ava ngi lowsang mqhi a.
Ungta snu ngi mi'innpu kenqhenqhi thida innpu morson kok'onqhi mma' ava' rukku lowsang mqhi a.”
Audilli mmaan nih Mma' hinni nausisi rek avah Mma ngi mdokmei lamna' rang ki thenni paphaak lamda pdainu sikhu rekki mmaan arheikqhi rek avah rai chlamda.

Pdainu Jisu ngi ava' mdeh thungta kdung ngi Mmah muplung thida ungta mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Nausisi rek avah Nei kihin nih arva chdaat lamso, mmaan avah pkhaanmaan, tidit tah Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah hava'le' hep daat rekki then.
Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna kuwku yoso, nausisi rek ava' heppi, Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' karlaang kcha' kma' mma' avah teden rukku ava' thuh luwt nimeh.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah morpom lam dilli Mma ngi mmaan 'leenni mkhut khiinpiik lamda ungta mmaan avah suwqhat pii chlamda.

'Tunnu Mma ngi 'lampii thuh mehei meek arlaan nih miikhat arheichenda Mma' aang ngi pkhup pih ktirdiil chthida hanto'theda, kheel chda: “Kqha Chukpu, neiyi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah alrouchom mih kdochom chaakna' rah talu tlow chnikli?” dida.
Mthungta Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi nang ngi, Neiya kqha atidit tah? Kqha Khatpang ka'am, Mma' avah Isowr ava' kma'don kqha kuwkhat leh ka'am pemeh.
Nang ngi paupiik rek avah adeh: ‘Lowsang qhima'. Mii eyouma'. Pruma'. Mlangkma' sakhi piima'. Mii huwng chma'. anuh le' apa akyat cha'.”
Ungta mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Chukpu neiyi hava'le' mkheng avah kmotki kupqhun nih kdo'arvandan chaak,” dida.

Audilli Jisu ngi mma' avah kbihrimda, vonpsatda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi dow khatpang aptat daat tah, vang rang ngi adothlowi dow mkheng avah ayurpthi ungta avah srah rek hinni apiipthi mdit bih, nang ngi parvaan thah alrou purtuwl chna ungta nang nga arva rang ngi akhros ava' achom rah Nei mheiqowi,” dida.
Pdainu hava' pau ava' 'leenni mmah muplung kdung ngi yada ungta muplung kdung ngi sun chda, tidit tah mmah alrou knempok ki mdothlowi.
Audilli Jisu ngi sutporloijik lam thida Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Alrou kthlowi rekki Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw raan avah tya kparsa chdaat a.”

Ungta sikhu rek avah Mma' pauna rek 'leenni mningin ngak chda. Pdainu Jisu ngi veikhat arthaangda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nau rek, alrou lamkrin kcha' rekki Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw raan avah tya thuh kparsa chdaat a.
Svangpa khat tih Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw rang hinvah uwt tih preukna thung ngi mluw chaak pleh ngi ko'olbet rah.”
Ungta mmaan avah kerkheelset tih mningin ngakyou chda, msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “Mdittu' kuw rang ngoh, karsan kcha' rangnga?”
Pdainu mmaan avah suwrim lam thida Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Dultimii hinvah havah kurthuwk pchaang lupemeh pdainu Isowr hin pemeh, tidit tah Isowr hinvah dow mkheng avah kkurthuwk pchaang.”
Audilli Pitar rih Mma' hinni hanto' tethe pqhunda: “Asuw o, neenna dow mkheng mapthi dok thiin nuh Nah adil kdoqowi chaak dokin.”

Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah Nei kthen nih ungta kqhapaumin ki thenni mi'inn rek mditmata mu'umnau rek mditmata mchar myur rek mditmata mpa mditmata mnuh mditmata mnuwn mditmata mnaumsuwn mditmata mpaam rek kmapthi ammlai.

Mmaan avah hava' 'tunki mpha thung vah mtumin arja khat avah arlaang lam nimeh. Mmaan avah mi'inn rekin ungta mu'umnau rekin ungta mchar myur rekin ungta mnuh rekin ungta mnaumsuwn rekin ungta mpaam rekin am nimeh ungta tyat chiireelna' kperteel chlam rah pdainu karvang rang mpha thung vah ktlangknai kma' rinkum karlaang chlam rah.
Pdainu mrukri knempok rek avah dilknau chlam rah ungta mdilknau ava ngi rukri chrah.”

'Tunnu mmaan nah 'lam thuh Jerusalem thah hang meek lamda ungta Jisu a mduh thaan nih chetda ungta mmaan nah ngak chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mdil mqowiyin chunnu mningin qida. Audilli Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah veikhat qhi ptliing lamda ungta Mma' 'leenni kthuwk bei rang dow rek avah mmaan hinni tethe pqhunda.
