“Asuwn, neenna Jerusalem thah kahang meekin impimin ungta Mii Chapa avah thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek hinni kparlaan pthi rah ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah kdiyou kpha ngi kupsul lamrah ungta Mma' avah Chaatktlei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthi lamrah.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah kipni chaak lamrah ungta Mma' avah khuikin kchung ngi kbun lamrah. Ungta mnii kdumna' nit tih Mma' avah kring kerheel rah,” dida.
Audilli Jebedi chapa rek James le' Johon avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, neenve ngi talutalu yoso, adokqhilin avah adottlot piik raan kngei inna,” dilamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naanve athen inni, talu adoktlot piik raan angei inna?”
Mmaanve ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neenve a Nang akonlorna' thung ngi khat tih achang thah ungta ktlok khat ava ngi Amaleh thah mheipkong chaan,” dilamda.

Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi adoqhilin avah talu tidit dei maantih. Naanve ngi Neiyi kdoneek tong avah nee pchaang naandih, ungta Neiyi kluwna' diiluwna' thung ngi luwt pchaang naandi?”

Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Ou pchaang nikaan.” Ungta Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi dakat tih Neiyi kdoneek tong avah nee naandi' ungta Neiyi kluwna' thung ngi luwt naandi'.
Pdainu Nei kmachang thah kok'ong rang ungta Nei kmaleh thah kok'ong rang avah Neiyi kdopiik rang ava' pemeh, pdainu avah mmaan thenni mmun mdoporthlon piikdok ksa mmaan avale' ki then,” dida.
Ungta sowm rek ava ngi ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih James le' Johon 'leenni kdung ngi muplungin thida.

Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan avah Mhin nih own purkuwk lam thida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih adehn tidit tah Chaatktlei rek 'leenni paamkpu kurthuwk rek mmaan ava ngi mmaan 'leenni kruwng kurthuwk lamda ungta mmaan arlak ki klin rek ava ngi mmaan 'leenni ruhtanna' avah mdosintonin.
Anto' pdainu naan arlak innu avah kurthuwk mso, pdainu kuwku yoso a'arlak inni tilin rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi asuwkin mkurthuh rah.
Ungta kuwku yoso mkhatna' tkurthuh rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi mii mkheng ki suwk mkurthuh rah.
Mleiya Mii Chapa ava' kpha rukka soptolowpsuk rang ngi kurjung pemeh pdainu sopklow chrah kurjung ungta mii knempok mdoktlanna' rang ki thenni Mrinkum ava' kpii rah kurjung.”
Audilli mmaanna Jerikho thah arjulamda ungta Mma ngi Msikhurek le' miipiipa rektu' Jerikho duwnthah meheiin thungta Timius chapa Bartimius avah ktlam kqhilli lampii thuh ko'ongdaatda.
Ungta mma ngi Najareth ki Jisu tidit marjaak thungta owngda hantotheda: “David Chapa Jisu, neiya plung mheipneecha',” dida.
Audilli mii knempok ki rimkdi ma'amna' rah pilqhit lamda pdainu mma ngi kerkheel set set tih owngda: “David Chapa Jisu, neiya plung mheipnee cha',” dida.

Mthungta Jisu ngi ripda ungta mma' avah mdo'ownna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Audilli mmaan nih mmikktot mii ava' hinni: “Arda aprokcha'. Hangrip. Mma ngi nang nga ato'own chaak a,” dilamda mma' avah own lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mbuwmdiir varpthi thida ripda ungta Jisu hinni arvada.

Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang athenni talu adoktlot piik rah angei a?” Mmikktot mii ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Rabboni, neiya kmik mheipa'har piikchau,” dida.
Audilli Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Isun cha', alamrin chaak ki nang nga atapdam chaak dok a,” dida. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma' avah mmik har chda ungta 'lam thuh Jisu dil qowi chda.
'Tunnu mmaan nih Jerusalem behki kruwn lown thungki Bethphage le' Bethany khuw rek mphaakin thungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek chai'knii avah hanpthla lamda
Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Wvah aheiraalin ki khuw thah vaan ungta naanve ngi aheiluw daatin le' skowlraam suwn khat tbowldaat deinaandi'. Naanve ngi aperthletin rah avah arvanqhiin.

Ungta kuwmiikhat tih ahinin nih: ‘Naanve ngi taluki havah adotlotin?’ mdit cheentung ngi hanto ngi atheen: ‘Kruwng ava ngi avah dow mdopsit rah ka'am a,’ adiin, mdit bih mma ngi kbeisek ki avah arhei kapthla rah,” dida.
Mthungta mmaanve ngi va lamda ungta skowlraam suwn avah paltong duwn thah 'lambeh ngi kpursuk daat kurdutqhi lamda ungta mmaanve ngi avah perthlet lamda.
Ungta ava' thuh krip daat rek mmaan ava ngi mmaanve hinni: “Taluda adotlot inna, skowlraam suwn aperthle daatin mow?” dilamda.
Mthungta mmaanve ngi Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni paupiik mdopiik lam heppi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan nih mmaanve avah arvanpsun lamda.
Audilli mmaanve ngi skowlraam suwn avah Jisu hinni arvanqhi lamda ungta m'leen nih mbuwdiirin phat lamda audilli Mma ngi ava' 'leenni ko'ongda.
Ungta mii knempok ki 'lampii thuh mbuwdiirin phat lamda ungta morson rekki dingbaak thlang lamda marna avah 'lam thuh phat lamda.
Audilli mduh le' mdil lih kchet rek mmaan ava ngi owng lamda, hanto' the lamda: “Hosanna! Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng, Mma' avah msuwkqha a! (Luw. 118:26)
Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng neenki n'paan, David kruwngpaalna' avah msuwkqha a! Kparthaangsi ngi Hosanna.”

Ungta Jisu ngi Jerusalem thuh hangluwtda ungta luwbuk'inn thuh luwtda. Ungta Mma ngi mthung ki dow mkheng avah sutporloijikda pdainu mpha moktot chaak dok thungta Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rektu' Bethany thah jungkerheel chlamda.
'Tunnu mupduknii ngi mmaan nih Bethany ki marhanin thungta Mmah mpowi tham chda.

Ungta Mma ngi marna kqha dok kduwtbul khat leer thah mheideh thungta Mma ngi m'leen nih mchei mrukmram ka'am daat ngaal mow, dida ksuw rah vada. Ungta Mma ngi mbul merhei phaak thungta Mma ngi marna kma'don nih dow khatleh phangmda, tidit tah mpha avah kduwt cheina' mpha pemeh.
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ava hinni hanto'theda: “'Tun veikhat, kuwkhat leh ngi nang a'leenki achei avah cha mso,” dida. Ungta mdothe pau avah Msikhu rekki arja lamda.

Audilli anto ngi mmaan nih Jerusalem arhantlung lamda. Ungta Jisu ngi Jerusalem thuh luwtda luwbuk'inn thuh kyur le' kren rek avah treipthi pqhunda ungta sum kpertlek rek khaan ungta uqhu kyur rek longkhom avah purlup pthida.
Ungta Mma ngi luwbuk'inn kthleng ngi kuwkhat leh ngi dona rek mdosunqhi rah rotpiik lam mda.

Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda tpurchuh lam pqhunda: “Nei ki'inn avah chaat mkheng rekki thenni, Rinkthamna' inn mkurthuh rah,” (Is. 56:7) dida, kjitmeh mow? Pdainu naanvah, ‘havah raanqhul kupru rek khor apthut inna,’ dida. (Jer. 7:11)

Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' thimpu rekki avah arja lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah taluhep pih tpenveipthi rang tidit ki, mlei thlaam lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih Mma' avah mdoqit chaakin, mleiya mii mkheng ngi Mma' dopurchuhna' thuh mningin ngakyou chda.
Ungta kluhpha mve thungta Mmah khuwpii ava' thung ki sun chda.
'Tunnu jiingsun nih mmaan nih anto ngi marvan chun inni, mmaan nih kduwtbul avah murjung kphadek ki mpurvuwi chaak avah dei lamda.
Ungta Pitar rih mbinphaak thungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Rabbi, asuw o, Nang ngi pauhor adobuk kduwtbul avah kpurvuwi kcha' a.”
Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Isowr hinni lam'arin chaan.

Mleiya mkindit kat tih Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Hava' lown ava' hinni, Ikurphui rah truwnpii thuh ikarvardok,’ dida kthe mma' ava ngi muplung thuh kpelqen ktaak liit tih pdainu ava' dow rek avah anto'kat tih kthuwk rah tidit lamkrin kcha' mma' hinni avah kpurthuh piik rah.
Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, talutalu yoso, rinktham mih adoqhilin dow mkheng rek avah naan nih karlaan chaak inna tidit lam'arin chaan mdit bih naan nih avah thlowi chnaandi'.

Ungta naan nih rinkaktham chrang ngi ariin thung ngi, parvaan ki A'paan nih, naan rukka adoparmana' rekin ava' adotoptlot piikna' raan, naan nih kuwmiikhat tih ahinin nih mdoparmana' ma'am cheentung ngi, mma' avah adoptlot piik raan.
Pdainu naanni aptlotpiik maan bih, parvaan ki A'paan rukku naan nih adoparmana' rekin avah aptlot piikin nimeh.”
Audilli mmaan nih Jerusalem thah arhang nowl lamda ungta Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi mchesli arlaan nih thimpu kenreel rek, nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluhep kduh ki ruhtanna' ngi, Nang ngi havah adotlotto'? Ungta hava' dow rek totlot pchaanna' ki ruhtanna' avah kuw ngi adotpiikko?” dilamda.

Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kqha a, Nei rukku naan ahin nih paukheel khat ayukheel inni, mhei'arthaangin ungta Nei rukku taluhep kduh ki ruhtanna' ava ngi hava' dow rek avah kdotlot tidit ayuthepiikin nih.
Mleiya dii kupluwt Johon diipluwna' avah parvaan kimow, mditmata dultimii hinki o? Mhei'arthaangin.”
Mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi kerthe lamda: “Neen nih parvaan ki nditin bih, Mma ngi ‘mdittu' taluleiyi mma' avah lam'rin chmaan tih’ kdi rah?
Pdainu neen nih ‘dultimii hinki ndit bih,’” tidit tah mmaan nih mii rek avah mdoqit chaakin, mleiya mii mkheng ngi Johon avah khulpu dakdak khat tidit tih mdotai chaakin.

Mthungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta Jisu hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neenna deimaan ring,” dilamda. Mthungta Jisu rukku arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku taluhep kduh ki ruhtanna' ava ngi hava' dow rek avah kdotlot tidit avah ahinin nih the nimaang,” dida.

Ava' dilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni pauportol lih tpau rah pqhunda: “Miikhat tih riithlumbil khat pqhangda ungta ava' kloijik ki rowng tkhulda ungta riithlumdii tsunna' khor khat touda ungta trunna' rah arka khat sada. Audilli mma ngi louknum rek hinni avah turpuwk ki piipthithida ungta mdakka khuwpaam lamkla thah pjiin chda.
'Tunnu turkunpha mve thungta mma ngi msuwk khat tah riithlumbil knum rek hinni heipthlada. Mleiya mma ngi riithlumbil knum rek hinni, riithlumbil thungki mchei mruk klou rah mma' avah mdoheisi.
Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kyowng lamda, bun lamda ungta dow khatleh kipsin kmah ngi arheipthla pthi lamda.
Veikhat mma ngi msuwk morson khat arheipthla nowlda ungta mmaan nih mma' avah lung ngi deeng lamda ungta mluwchai thah tiplim lamda, mmeel kthi ngi ptlot lam thida arheipthla pthi lamda.
Ungta mma ngi veikhat morson khat arheipthla nowlda ungta mmaan nih mma' avah eyou lamda ungta morson knempok rek avah, aangqhe a bun lamda ungta aangqhe a eyou lamda.
Avaleiyi, ava' kpha thung ngi chapa khatpang mdothlowi, mvonsat'lowsi avah mma ngi mmaan hinni mqutna'rel lih hanto' binchda heipthlada: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih kchapa kat tah kakyat chlam rah.’

Pdainu riithlumbil knum rek ava ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: ‘Havah piipa ava'. Arvaan, neen nih mma' avah eyou' incheh ungta malrou chom rang avah neen ndow kurthuwk chrah,’ dilamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kyowng lamda ungta eyou lamda ungta riithlumbil ava' duwn thah varpthi lamda.
Avaleiyi, 'tunnu riithlumbil kpupa ava' vah talu ktlow rang ngoh? Mma ngi arvadon nih riithlumbil knum rek avah kpenvei pthi lamrah ungta riithlumbil avah morson rek hinni kpiipthi rah.
Naan nih, hava' Kchiir laika thung ngi hanto ngi mdokjit avah parcham maan timow: ‘Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi, Innbul lung, lung kenreel ava' kurthuwk kcha' a.
Havah ktlangknai kma' Kruwng ava' nongtlot Ungta neen nmiksutin thung ngi havah tngana'.” (Luw. 118:22-23)

Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mdokyownna' raan tlow lamda pdainu miipiipa rek mdoqit chaakin, tidit tah mmaan nih pauportol avah Mma ngi mmaan kepteng ngi mthe a tidit mdodehn. Mthungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mapthi lam thida sun chlamda.
Audilli mmaan nih, Pharisy rekle' Herod mii aangqhe rek avah Mpauna' thuh, Mma' kokyowng rang ngi Mma' hinni arheipthla lamda.

Ungta mmaan ava ngi merheitlunin thungta Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, Nang nga kindit ptih ungta kuwkhat leh ruk tuk'adosut pemeh pdainu Isowr 'lam ava' daat kindit tih adopurchuh chaak tidit neen nih kdehn. Ava' vah Siijar hinni miichai sumqhai tpiik avah nowlam dorot mow, dorotma pli?

Neen nih kdopiik inni kqha mow, kdopiikmaan nih kqha pli?” dilamda. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan nih kqha mpurhuwi chaakin ava' deithida, mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih taluleiyi Neiya atperteel inna? tu'u Nei kihin nih denarii khat mheipdhen noh, isuw nih,” dida.

Mthungta mmaan nih denarii khat arvansin piik lamda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' m'leenki pthla ungta jiiktikrii avah kuwda?” Ungta mmaan nih, Mma' hinni: “Havah Siijar dow,” dilamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Siijar dow rek avah Siijar hinni apiin ungta Isowr dow rek avah Isowr hinni apiin,” dida. Mthungta mmaan nah Mma' 'leenni ngak chlamda.
Audilli trin kerheelna' ka'am pemeh kdi, Saddusy aangqhe rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda, Mma' hinni kheel chlamda:

“Chukpu, Moses vah neen kihin innu hanto' kjitda: ‘Unau kuwmiikhat tih mnuwn mapthi thida mdiyow chaak bih, ungta mnaumsuwn ma'amma bih, mnaupa ava ngi mnuwn avah ko'onqhidon, mma' thenni mnaumsuwn mdopqhan piik rah,’ dida.
'Tunnu unau chai tikhiu ka'am rek khat am lamda. Mekver ava ngi snu khat theda ungta mdiyow chaak thungta mnaumsuwn khatleh mamda.
Ungta miknitna' ava ngi mnuwn avah ko'onqhi nowlda ungta diyou chda ungta mma' rukku mnaumsuwn khatleh mamda. Ungta mukdumna' ava' rukku anto ngi tlowda.
Anto ngi mtikhiuna' kphadek ki snu avah mnuwn purthuh lamda pdainu mnaumsuwn khatleh thlowi lam mda. Mqutna'rel lih snu ava' rukka diyou chda.
Avaleiyi, trin kerheelna' thuh, mmaan nih mrinkerheel sapin thung vah mmah kuw nuwn kurthuwk rang ngoh? Mleiya mma' avah mtikhiu khiunni mnuwn mdopthut sapin,” dilamda.
Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Kchiir laika rek ungta Isowr ruhtan ava' adodeh maan leiyi, naanna parmak maan timow?
Mleiya mmaan nih kdiyou thungki mrinkerheelin thung vah, mmaan nih innknei ruk am nimeh ungta innkpernee ruk am nimeh pdainu mmaan avah parvaan ki vaantamsi rek hep daat lamrah.

Pdainu kdiyou rinkerheelna' ki mlei avah Moses laika thungki chaan chim kka ki paumin thung ngi taluhep pih, Isowr rih mma' hinni mthe tidit avah naan nih parcham maan timow? Hanto ngi mdothe ‘Neiya Abraham ki Isowr ping, Aijek ki Isowr ping.’ ungta Jakob ki Isowr ping, mdodit. (Mpk. 3:6,15)
Mma' avah kdiyou ki Isowr pemeh pdainu kring ki Isowr. Hava' leiyi naanna kdung ngi aparma chaak inna.”

Audilli nowlam chukpu rek arlak ki khat thlengda ungta mma ngi mmaan kerteenna' avah arjada ungta Mma ngi kqhajik ki marthaan lam a, tidit deithida, Mma' hinni hanto' kheelda: “Hava' mkheng arlak ki paupiik mkhatna' avah tva o?” dida.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto' arthaangda: “Hava' mkheng arlak ki paupiik mkhatna' avah, Arjaan, O Isreel rek, neenki ktlangknai kma' Kruwng Isowr, ktlangknai kma' Kruwng avah khadaat.

Ungta nang ngi nangki Kruwng, nangki Isowr avah aplungchai mkheng ngi, apthlarin mkheng ngi, aplungrin mkheng ngi ungta aruhtan mkheng ngi vonsat adolow chaak rah. (Knl. 6:4-5) Havah mkhatna' paupiik ava'.
Ungta miknitna' ava' hep daat avah hava': ‘Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah.’ (Lev. 19:18) Hava'le' han'tun nih klin paupiik morson ka'am pemeh,” dida.
Mthungta nowlam chukpu ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Chukpu kqhajik ki athe a, Nang ngi mkindit kat athe a, tidit tah Isowr khadaat ka'am ungta morson ka'am pemeh pdainu Mma' daat.

Ungta plungchai mkheng ngi, tedehpindit chaak mkheng ngi, pthlarin mkheng ngi ungta ruhtan mkheng ngi Mma' vonsat tolow chaak ungta mdaksa katheppi mi'innveen vonsat klow kcha' ava ngi, meirinparlaan le' rintparlaanna' mkheng ki mkarthak,” dida.

Jisu ngi mma ngi kindit dok ki mdo'arthaan mdeh thungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr kruwngpaalna' thungki 'lam lapa mtih,” dida. Audilli kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' hinni paukheel morson kheel pchaang lam mda.
Ava' dilli Jisu ngi luwbuk'inn thuh mpurchuh meek lam chunni arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Hava' nowlam chukpu rek ava ngi Mesaiah avah David Chapa, mdoditin avah taluhep pih abin inna?

Mleiya Pthla Kchiir ar'aang ngi, David mdakkat tih hanto'theda: “Kruwng ngi neiki Kruwng hinni: ‘Neiyi Nang amiihal rek avah Akhuhther rih akthiik piikduh khimkheiyi, Nei kma chang thah iko'ong daat’, dida, mdodit. (Luw. 110:1)
Avaleiyi, David mdakkat tih Mma' avah, ‘neiki Kruwng,’ mdodit Mma' avah taluhep pih mma' chapa kurthuwk rang ngoh?” Ungta miithlaang thlaang rekvah Mma' pau avah plung kngam mih arja chlamda.

Audilli Mma ngi mpurchuh lam chunni mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, phriktluwn hilnada tkorlon tkorlon rah kngei kcha' rek ungta kyurkren mun thung ngi mido'arvuwi rah kngei kcha' nowlam chukpu rek hinki ikilrindei chaan.
Mmaan nih sinegog thung ngi longkhom kqha ngeen lamda ungta tchaak tneekna' mun rek thung ngi mmunkqha ngeen chlamda.
Mmaan nih ksowt ksowt tih rinmaktham chaak leekin ava ngi meikhunu rek inn avah mdochaak dokin. Hava'le' ava ngi klin nih tupsulna' avah karlaang chlam rah.”
'Tunnu Jisu a sumbuwr raalpha ngi ko'ongda ungta mii rekki taluhep pih sumbuwr ava' thuh sum mapthlat chaak inna tidit avah deida. Ungta svang knempok rekki musvangthuhn avah knem mih pthla chlamda.
Audilli meikhunu srah khat thlengda jiisen sumqiit 'kniisisi, tidit tah penny plii ki khatpang, ava' pthla chda.

Mthungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek avah Mhin nih own lam thida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, hava' meikhunu srah ava ngi sumbuwr ava' thuh kdaal kcha' rek khimkhei arlak ki knemsi ngi mapthlat chaak a.

Mleiya mmaan mkhengin ava' vah kepleet tih mdothlowi chaakin thungki mdopthlatin pdainu hava' snu ava' vah masraht thuh chaak thungki, mrinkhu mkheng thung ngi mrin chaakna' rang ava' mdopthlat chaak dok.”

Ava' dilli Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thungki mvanthuh thungta Msikhu rek arlak ki khat tih Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Chukpu, asuw o, lung rek havah tya kqha chdaat a ungta hava' innsak avah tya thuh kqha chdaat ane!” dida.
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hava' innsak klinpa avah adeh a? Hava' 'leenki lung khadaat rukka lung morson khat 'leenni tvarpthima ngi amdaat nimeh.”
'Tunnu Mma ngi luwbuk'inn heiraal ki kruwn lown thah mko'on arlaan nih, Pitar, James, Johon ungta Andria leh ngi Mma' hinni tuprut tih pau kheel chlamda.
“Mheithe piik inno, hava'le' avah teden thung ngi kthuwk rang? Ungta hava' mkheng ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni titinna' talu kthuwk rang?” dilamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan karthaang ngi hanto ngi tethe pqhunda: “Naan nih, kuwkhat leh ngi adotuhuwn chaak mana' raan ikilrin chaan.
Mleiya Nei kmiing 'leenni mii knempok thlengdon nih, ‘neiya Mesaiah ping,’ kdi rah ungta mii knempok kuhuwng chrah.
Ungta naan nih raal rek kthuwk arjaakin ungta raalkho arjaakin thuh aplungin pyamaan, tidit tah hava' dow rek avah kthuwk rah pdainu mqutna' avah thuwk mlai.

Mleiya chaat khat tih chaat khat 'leenni krip rah ungta kruwngpaalna' khat tih kruwngpaalna' khat 'leenni krip rah. Ungta mmun knempok thung ngi ringnaang rek kthuwk rah. Hava'le' avah plungyatna' rekki mdopqhunna' ngaal.

Pdainu naan nih athen inni ikilrin dei chaan, tidit tah mmaan nih naan avah kunpun rek hin kpha ngi akparlaan raan ungta sinegog rek thung ngi naanna akbun raan. Ungta naan avah Nei kmiing leiyi, paamkpu rekle' paamkruwng rek hinni, tidit tah mmaan ki rinpaumin ki thenni akqhi raan.
Ungta kqhapaumin avah rukrirep pih chaat mkheng rek hinni tparjaam dok ki ma'am rah.

Pdainu mmaan nih naan atokyownin ungta atyur chaakin thung ngi, taluhep pih arthaang nikaan tidit leiyi mduh thah bin purthunmaan. Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi talutalu yoso adotpiikin ava' atheen, tidit tah kpau avah nang pemeh pdainu Pthla Kchiir ava'.
'Tunnu mu'umnau khat tih mu'umnau khat avah kdiyou kpha ngi kyur chrah ungta mpa ngi mnau ungta nau rekki mnuhmpa rek kepteng ngi krip lam rah.
Ungta Nei kmiing leiyi, naan avah mii mkheng ngi akahal chraan. Pdainu mqutna' kpha ngi kdiil pchaang kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah.

Pdainu naan nih khulpu Daniel lih mdothe: ‘tepder kurhuwiyi tkenveina',’ (Dn. 11:31, 12:11) ava ngi mrimana' rang thung ngi mri adehn thung ngi, hava' kpa kcha' mma' ava ngi havah adeipindih chso. Audilli Judia thung ngi ka'am rek mmaan ava ngi lown rek thah ichen chlamso.
Ungta inntun thah ka'am dok kcha' mma' ava ngi inn thuh kluwt rang ngi junqum mso, mditmata mi'inn thungki doklou rah vangluwt mso.
Ungta loulaiyi ka'am mma' ava ngi mdomna klou rah kerheel mso.
Pdainu nit rek ava' thung ngi mii'pum rek ungta naukkai rek mmaan ki thenni suwthitna'a.
Ungta naan nih achenna' raan mpha avah phalbi thuh mkurthuh mana' rah rin'iktham chaan.

Mleiya Isowr rih dultipaam mpurthuh daat ki kupqhun nih hava' 'tunki mpha arvankpha thung ngi mdopurthuh dok rek ava' thung ngi kthuwk mlailiit mditmata teden rukku kthuwk kma' rang, kdung ngi tyattraanna' avah mpha ava' thung ngi kthuwk rah.

Ungta Kruwng ngi mpha avah mdoptowi kma'don nih, daksa khatleh ruk karsan pchaang nimeh, pdainu taktlan ksadok rekki thenni, tidit tah Mma ngi mdokchol ksadok rekki thenni Mma ngi nit rek avah moptowi pthipiik doklam a.
Audilli naan ahin nih kuwmiikhat tih, ‘Asuwn, Mesaiah avah hava' thuh ka'am a, mditmata Asuwn, wvah thah ka'am a, mditna, naan nih avah lam'rin chmaan.

Mleiya mlangkma' Mesaiah rekle' mlangkma' khulpu rek avah kthuwkpok lamrah ungta tuhuwn chaakna' rang leiyi, titinna' rekle' tngana' rekpa ktlow lamrah, mkirsit bih, mdokthlan ksa rek kpha ruk kuhuwng chlam rah.
Pdainu asuwn, dow mkheng avah mthuhduh ngi akthepiik inna, ikilrin chaan.
Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi, kdung ngi tyattraanna' ava' dilli, Kni a kjiing chrah ungta thla ngi mar'aang piinimeh.
Parvaan ki bursi rek avah kqu chlam rah ungta parvaan ki ruhtan rek avah kakna chrah.
Audilli mmaan nih Mii Chapa avah armei thung ngi ruhtanna' le' tkonlorna' tu' kilqhi ngi arjung kqum kdei lamrah.
Ungta ava' dilli Mma ngi Mma' vaantamsi rek arjupthla donni tirthli mirkil plii thungki ungta dultipaam mqutna' thungki ngi parvaan mqutna' kpha thungki Mma' dokthlan ksa rek avah kpurkuwk lamrah.
'Tunnu hava' kduwtbul 'leenki pau tportolna' avah ikurchuk chaan. Mleiya mbaak rek ava ngi downgda ungta marna rek muksun dokcheu naan nih khulum kpha chrah mthe a tidit adodehn.
Ava' vah naan rukku hava' dow rek ava' kthuwk adehn thung ngi Mma' avah knai kcha' a, thurngutbul lih krip daat a tidit adeiyin.
Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, hava' dow rek ava' mthuthut duh khimkheiyi, hava' suruwl avah teden rukku qudokvot nimeh.
Dulti le' parvaan avah kqu chrah pdainu Nei kpauna rek avah teden rukku kenvei dok vot nimeh.
Pdainu nit avah ungta qhang avah kuwkhat leh ngi deimeh, parvaan ki vaantamsi rek rukku mditmata Chapa ava' rukku deimeh, pdainu Pa ava' daat chrel lih mdodeh.
Naan nih ikilrin chaan, ungta rin'iktham chaan tidit tah naan nih mpha avah teden rang tidit adodehn pemeh.

Havah miikhat tih mi'inn mapthida ungta msuwk khat hinni ruhtanna' parlaan pthithida mnong mnong rah piithida ungta thurngut krung ava' hinni, ihardei, dithida lamkla thah kipjiin kcha' ava' hep daat.

Ava'leiyi ihardei chaan, tidit tah naan nih innkpupa avah teden thung ngi ktlung kerheel rang tidit adodehn pemeh. Mma' avah kjiing mow, thanqim mow, harkhuwn mow, mditmata jiingsun rang mow, tidit adodehn pemeh.
Mditma bih tedeh dokmah ngi mtlunkhot bih, a'iidaatin arlaan nih aktlun phaak raan.
Ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe avah mii mkheng hinni kdothe, ‘ihardei chaan’.”

'Tunnu Taplaanna' ungta Thowldii ktaak thenpen tchaakna' rah nit ava' mdophaakna' rangnga nii'knii daat vaat chda. Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki Mma' avah taluhep pih tepmenda tokyown rang ungta Mma' avah te'eyow rang tidit leiyi, kdung ngi mdosut thlaamin.
Pdainu mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' tmaalna' ki mpha thung mso mditma bih mii vaangklum chuh rah.”

Ungta Bethany thuh raichi ktong Simon inn thuh ma'amin thung ngi, Mma ngi khaan tor'owida mko'on arlaan nih, mkhon knemyou kcha' ki spikenard reidii avah alabaster khuwng khat thung ngi sinda snu khat thlengda. Ungta mma ngi mkhuwng ava' pkuida ungta reidii avah Jisu luwchai thah letda.
Pdainu marlakin ki aangqhe rek ava ngi muplungin kthi ngi msingreelin thung ngi, “taluleiyi hava' mikrimkdi reidii avah mpartlai pthidaat a?
Mleiya havah denarii arja kdum kkheel lih jur chthida srah rek hinpleh ngi npiik chaak daat bih,” dilamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kdung ngi kerteenqhi lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mthina amaapthiin, taluleiyi naan nih mmah apyat inna? Mma ngi kthen nih nong kqha khat mdotlot chaak.

Mleiya naan nih srah rek avah mpha ktai amqhi naandi' ungta naan nih mmaan hinni kqha totlot rah angei chaakin khimkhei thung ngi tlow chdaat naandi', pdainu Neiya mpha ktai thuh mthlowi tlit daat nimaan tih
Mma ngi mdotlot pchaan ava' mdotlot chaak. Mma ngi mduh thah thuwkda Nei kdaksa avah tulruwlna' rang ki thenni reidii mdotupbul chaak.

Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna: ‘Mleiya dultipaam mkheng thung ngi tva'tva' thung yoso, hava' kqhapaumin ava' tparjaamna' mkheng thung ngi, hava' snu ava ngi mdotlot ava' rukka mma' tbinphaakna ngi tethe tlit tih ka'am rah.’ ”
Audilli sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Kerioth ki Judas ava ngi, mmaan hinni Mma' kyur chrang ngi thimpu kenreel rek hinni vada.
Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta muplungin ngamda ungta mma' hinni sum tpiikna' rah paureel reel lamda. Ungta mma ngi taluhep pih Mma' avah tyur chaak rang tidit tih mlam sutthlaamda.

'Tunnu Thowldii ktaak Thenpen tchaakna' ki mkhatna' nit tih mmaan nih Taplaanna' Yausuwn me'eyown thung ngi, Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Mleiya Nang ngi Taplaanna' ava' adochaakna' rang ki thenni, neenve ngi tva'thuh chetda kdoporthlon raan angei a?” dilamda.

Mthungta Mma ngi, Msikhu chai'knii rek avah hanto'theda mmaanve avah heipthla lamda: “Naanve ngi khuwpii thah vaan rang ngi ungta beeldak khat thung ngi dii kokdom pselpa khat kurdutqhi naandi', naanve ngi mma'dil aqowiyin.
Ungta mma ngi mluwna' innkpupa ava' hinni hanto ngi atheen: ‘Neiyi ksikhu rektu' Taplaanna' ava' kdochaakna' rah maltlun'inn avah tva rangda?,’ dida, Chukpu ngi mthe a, adiin.
Audilli mma ngi karthak ki innkhaar klinpa khat aktedet raan, ava' thuh naanve ngi aportlotin rah aporthlongin ungta ava' thuh naanve ngi neen nthen inni aporthlong jikin,” dida.

Ungta Msikhu 'knii rek ava ngi anto ngi chet lamda ungta khuwpii ava' thuh luwt lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Mma ngi mdothe ava'jik ki kurdutqhi lamda ungta mmaanve ngi mmun ava' thuh Taplaanna' avah porthlong chlamda.
Ungta kluhpha mve thungta Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rektu' ava' thuh thleng lamda.

'Tunnu mmaan nih ko'ong lamda ungta mchaakin thungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah naan arlak ki, Nei tu' then kchasap khat tih Neiya mukyur chrah,” dida.
Ungta ava ngi mmaan avah muplungin yatna' pqhunda ungta Mma' hinni khatkhat tih hanto' tethe pqhun lamda: “Avah nei ngaal mowi?” dilamda. Ungta morson khat tih, “avah nei ngaal mowi?” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mma' avah sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Nei tu' arkuw khatsap thung ngi kdophuwm qhive mma' ava' rah.
Mii Chapa avah Mma' leiyi, mdokjit dok ava'jik ki kchet chrah pdainu Mii Chapa kyur kcha' mii avah msuwkthi kcha' a! Mii ava' ki thenvah tqouqou rukku mqou chaakma daatple bih, kqha rangnga!” dida.
Ungta mmaan nih mmaal meekin chunni, Jisu ngi thenpen khat louda, suwqhat piida ungta avah khuida ungta mmaan hinni pii lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kdaksa, Arlaangin, Achaan,” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi tong ava' chomda ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli Mma ngi avah mmaan hinni pii lamda ungta mmaan mkheng inni avah neesap lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Havah mii knempok ki thenni toptlon dok pauqum renki, Nei kihii ava'.
Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi ren ava' kneekduh kpha thung ngi hava' riithlumdii avah neeporson nimaang.”
Ungta mmaan nih tpanpaakna' laa khat the dok lam thida mmaan nih Kruwn lown thah hang lamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan akhengin avah tuwngkluw jaankat tih Nei kleiyi khuhsiir pirthiter chnaandi', tidit tah hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Neiyi Yaukqhi avah sornikdi' Ungta yau rek avah kerjeiter chlam rah,’ (Jkh. 13:7) mdodit.
Pdainu Nei mteperdel dok dilli, Neiya naan duh thah Galily thah yunikdi',” dida.
Pdainu Pitar rih Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Mii mkheng ngi khuhsiir pirthiter chdaat yoso, neiya pirthi nimaang,” dida.
Mthungta Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, tidit tah tuwngkluw jaankat tih, har vei'knii mkhuwn duh ngi nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi',” dida.
Pdainu mma ngi kdungset tih plung kluwt tih, “Neiyi Nang tu' kdiyouve rang kpha thung rukku, neiyi Nang nga amat nimaang,” dida. Ungta mmaan mkhengin rukku anto'sap pih the lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih mmiing Gethsamany mdoditin mmun khat thuh thleng lamda ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni: “Neiyi rinkaktham chaak arlaan nih naanna hava' thuh iko'ong daatin,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi Pitar, James ungta Johon le' avah qhi lamda ungta Mmah kdung ngi muplung dungda ungta muplung yachda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya kapthlarin kdung reen nih, kdiyou rang kpha ngi kya kcha' a. Hava' thuh naanna i'am daatin rah ihardei chaan,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi 'lamkla heiyi heikorsownda ungta dulti thah tluwda ungta mrow rang cheentung ngi, qhang avah Mma' hinki mkorsown dokna' rah rinktham chda.
Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Abba, Apa, Nang athennu dow mkheng avah kurthuwk pchaang! Hava' tong avah Nei kihin ki mheilow pthi piikcha', anto' pdainu Nei kuplungbin mso, Nah aplungbin daatso,” dida.
Audilli arvangda ungta mmaan avah ki'iip kcha'ter rih arvanpha lamda ungta Mma ngi Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Simon nang nga ki'iip kchaampti? Nang ngi qhang khatpang daat ruk har pchaang mtimow?
Ihardei cha' ungta rin'iktham dei cha', mditma bih kepthleem thuh tla chnadi'. Dakat tih apthlarin vah mbin a pdainu adaksa a kdowng kcha' a,” dida.
Veikhat Mma ngi vanowlda rinktham chnowlda ungta mdothe dok ksa pauna rek ava' the nowlda.

Ungta Mma ngi marvan kerheel thungta mmaan avah veikhat ki'iip dok kcha ngi arvanpha nowl lamda, tidit tah mmaan nah kdung ngi mmikin khuh chda ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni talu tarthaan rang tidit dei lam mda.

Audilli Mma ngi mveikdumna' arvang nowlda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna tunkpha thuh iip chdaat intinu karnga kchaan na? 'Tunnu kkhom a! Qhang avah kvei dok kcha' a, asuwn, Mii Chapa avah pnu kervei rek khut thung ngi myur pthi dok a.
Ikerdelin, isunin cheh. Asuwn Nei mukyur kcha' mma' avah karva a,” dida.

Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi mpaumeek arlaan nih sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat Judas avah, raal'kaang le' kchung ksin miipiipa khat tu' thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rek hinki arvada.

'Tunnu Mma' kyur kcha' ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda, mkerdehnaan khat mdopiik doklam: “Mleiya kuwku yoso, neiyi kdoput Mma' avah ava', naan nih Mma' avah akyowngin ungta Mma' avah kqha ngi vanqhi chaan,” mdodit.
Ungta Mma ngi marvan thuh daat le' mma ngi Mma' avah phatengda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Rabbi, Rabbi!” dida ungta Mma' avah putda.
Audilli mmaan nih mkhutin avah Mma' 'leenni ptla lamda ungta Mma' avah kyowng lamda.
Ungta ava' thuh krip daat rek arlak ki khat tih mraal'kaang turthuhda ungta thimpu kenreel suwk khat avah duda ungta makna sellotda.
Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, Nei mikqhi rang ngi raal'kaang rekle' kchung rek sinin tinu raanqhul kupru khat kepteng heppi karvaan imptih?
Neiyi mniiktaiyi naan tu' amnu luwbuk'inn thuh apurchuk innu ungta naanvah mokyowng maantinu. Pdainu Kchiir laika rek avah mkurtluwm rang thah ktla,” dida.
Audilli mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mapthi lamda ungta chen chlamda.
'Tunnu Mma' avah ksetnau kuwvarleh khat tih mdak chaiyi buw kperneem khat kperjeelda mdil qowi chda. Ungta mma' avah ksetnau rekki kyowng lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mbuw kperneem avah mapthi thida mmaan khut thungki mdak chaiyi chen chda.
Ungta mmaan nih Jisu avah thimpu kenreelsi ava' hinni vanqhi lamda ungta mma' hinni thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rek ungta nowlam chukpu rek mkheng avah kurtuwl lamda ka'am daat lam.
Pdainu Pitar rih leer thah thimpu kenreelsi ava' khuwlown kpha ngi Mma'dil avah qowi chda. Ungta mma ngi suwk rektu' mei owsap lamda mdakin kpurlum chlamda.
Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' kunpun mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni Jisu kepteng ngi sakhi thlaam lamda pdainu khadaat ruk phang lam mda.
Mleiya mii knempok ki sakhi avah pii lamda pdainu msakhi piik rekin avah khadaat ruk kilqhi mda.
Ungta aangqhe ngi rip lamda Mma' kepteng ngi hanto' the lamda:
“Maanve ngi, Mma ngi, ‘Neiyi hava' khut tih tsak luwbuk'inn avah ekrep nikdi' ungta niikdum thung ngi khut tih tsakmah morson khat sanikdi',’ mdodit, kdo'arjaakin,” dilamda.
Pdainu msakhipiik rekin avah khadaat ruk kilqhidei mda.

Ungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi marlak inni ripda ungta hanto'theda, Jisu hinni pau kheelda: “Nang nga takhatleh arthaang mtinuh? Hava' mii rekki Nang akepteng ngi sakhi mdopiik rekin avah taluda,” dida?
Pdainu Mmah rimkdi am chda ungta dow khatleh arthaang mda. Veikhat thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda, pau kheel nowlda: “Nang nga suwqhat Chapa Mesaiah ava'pti?” dida.
Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Ou ava' ping. Ungta nang ngi Mii Chapa avah Ruhtan ki machang thah ko'ongdon parvaan ki armei rek 'leenni arjung kqum deinadi',” dida.
Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mbuwdiir jenda ungta hanto'theda: “Neen nih hava' heihin nih talu sakhi morson tpiikpom rah ka'am a?
Naan nih pthitda mpau avah arja thuhn tinu! Talu abin inna?” dida. Ungta mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mdiyow rah tidit tih psulsap lamda.

Ava' dilli morson aangqhe ngi Mma' avah ptil lih pthot lamda ungta Mma' avah mmik klumpthi lamda ungta bun lamda ungta Mma' hinni “Eh Pau kpurphuwng!” dilamda. Ungta nongmii klin rekki mapyaan nih Mma' avah tpeeng lamda.
'Tunnu Pitar rah khuwlown thah ma'am daat arlaan nih thimpu kenreelsi suwk'owr snunau khat arvada.
Ungta mma ngi Pitar avah mei owda ka'am daat mdeh thungta mma ngi suwrim thida hanto'theda: “Nang rukka Najareth ki Jisu tu' kilqhi kchokptida?” dida.
Pdainu mma ngi hanto'theda matda: “Nang ngi adothe avah neiya tedeh ruk deimaang ungta deipindih maang,” dida. Ungta mmah dulbuk thah vangthuwk chda arlaan nih har khuwngda.
Ungta suwk'owr snunau ava ngi mma' avah veikhat dei nowlda ungta mma ngi mbeh ngi krip rek ava' hinni hanto ngi tethe pqhunda: “Havah mmaan arlak ki khat,” dida.

Pdainu mma ngi matnowlda. Ungta ambong thida ava' thuh krip rek mmaan ava ngi veikhat Pitar hinni hanto' the nowl lamda: “Dakat tih nang nga mmaan arlak ki khat mun nadi', nang nga Galily ki mii ptih, apaupau vih kandang kcha' imptih,” dilamda.
Pdainu mma ngi kthi karthamda: “Naan nih adotheen mii avah neiya deimaang,” dida.

Ungta arlaan kat tih mveiknitna' har khuwngda. Mthungta Pitar rih, Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto ngi mdothe pau avah binphaakda: “Har vei'knii mkhuwn duh ngi, nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi',” mdodit ava' binphaakda. Ungta mma ngi ava' mbin thungta mmah qap chda.

M'tunkat daat tih, mjiingsun nih thimpu kenreel rek ava ngi kver rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kunpun mkheng tu' kerseel lam thida Jisu avah bowl lamda, vanqhi lamda ungta Pilaat hinni hanparlaan lamda.
Audilli Pilaat tih Mma' hinni hanto ngi pau kheelda: “Nang nga Jihudi rekki paamkruwng pti?” Ungta Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto ngi theda: “Neiya nang ngi adothe ava' ping,” dida.
Ungta thimpu kenreel rek ava ngi dow knempok 'leenni Mma' avah mraal pii lamda pdainu Mma ngi dow khatleh arthaang mda.
Audilli Pilaat tih Mma' hinni veikhat hanto ngi kheelda: “Nang nga takhatleh arthaang mtinuh? Asuw o, mmaan nih, Nang akepteng ngi tya thuh sakhi mpiik inna?”
Pdainu ava' kpha thung ngi Jisu ngi dow khatleh arthaang mda mthungta Pilaat tah ngak chda.
'Tunnu kmaal ava' thung ngi, kuwku yoso, mmaan nih mdongeiyin, rowngmii khat mmaan thenni tapthlatpiik avah mma' nowpa kurthuwk chda.
Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi sarka 'leenni nih raal mnakin thuh, maplap rektu' miike'eyou mmiing Barabbas, mdoditin sarka 'tunnu raalkna miikhat avah rowng'inn thuh ka'am daat.
Mthungta miipii rekki kdung ngi owng lamda mma ngi mpha ktai thuh mmaan thenni mdotlot kcho ava' mdotlotna' rah mma' hinni tiqhil pqhun lamda.
Pdainu Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda, arthaang lamda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih, Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng ava' adokapthlat piik raan angei inna?” dida.
Mleiya thimpu kenreel rekki mdopner inni Mma' avah mma' hinni mdotparlaan lam tidit avah mdodeh.
Pdainu thimpu kenreel rek ava ngi, mma ngi mmaan hinni Barabbas mdopthlat piik lamna' rah, miipii rek avah siinchaak dok lamda.
Ungta Pilaat tih arthaang nowl lamda ungta veikhat hanto'theda: “Mdittu' naan nih Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng adoditin Mma' avah talu kdoporlow rah angei inna?” dida.
Mthungta mmaan nih veikhat owng lamda: “Mma' avah apthowiyou!” dilamda.
Audilli Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi, Mma ngi talu kqha kma' mdotlot ma'amna ngi?” dida. Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheelset tih, “Mma' avah apthowiyou!” dilamda.
Mthungta Pilaat tih miipii rek plung ngamna' rah Barabbas avah pthlatpiik lamda ungta mma ngi Jisu avah khuikin kchung ngi mbun dilli topthowiyow rang ngi, mmaan hinni parlaan pthi lamda.
Audilli raalmii rekki Mma' avah Pritoriam, mdoditin paamkpu'inn thung ngi luwqhi lamda ungta mmaan nih raalmiilop mkheng avah own purkuwk lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah kning ngi ksen dona pnaak lamda ungta tirling laar luwkhum khat her lamda ungta avah Mma' luwchai 'leenni pkhum lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah luwbu leek lamda: “Akurvuwi chaak inna, Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng,” dilamda.
Audilli mmaan nih mupkhup inni tirdiil leek lamda Mma' avah luwbuk chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mipnichaak dokin dilli kning ngi ksen dona avah khowk pthi lamda ungta Mma' mdak dona rek ava' pnaak lamda ungta mdopthowi yowna' raan ki thenni, Mma' avah qhi lamda.
'Tunnu mmaan nih khros avah Alekjender le' Ruphus pa Sairen ki Simon, mkhuwpaam thungki thuwkda kipjiin kcha' ungta ava' thuh kthleng khot kcha' mma' ava' topdom lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah Golgotha, mdoditin, luwruh mun kdi ngi tperheel, mmun khat thang ngi hanqhi lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih Mma' hinni mdoneek rang ngi myrrh reidii tu' tporchou thowldii pii lamda pdainu Mma ngi avah neemda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mopthowiyown thung ngi, mmaan nih Mma' buwdiir rek 'leenni, mii khatkhat tih talu ktang chrang a tidit leiyi, mthen inni pchalpiik sutna' lamda.
'Tunnu mukdumna' qhang ava' thung ngi mmaan nih Mma' avah pthowiyou lamda.
Ungta Mma' mdopsulnaan jiiktikrii khat avah hanto ngi kjit lamda mkarthak ki daar lamda: “JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG.”
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' tu' raanqhul kupru 'knii rek avah khat tih machang thah ungta morson khat ava ngi Mmaleh thah pthowiyou lamda.
Anto ngi Kchiir laika ngi hanto ngi: “Ungta Mma' avah nowlam tukksut kma' rektu' taipinqimsap lamda” (Is. 53:12) mdodit avah kurtluwmda.
Ungta ava' thuh kthleng rek mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah pthitda paupsukna' lamda, mmaan nih mluwn ksuk lamda hanto' the lamda: “Oho, Luwbuk'inn ekrep thida, niikdum thung ngi ksa rang Nang nga,
Athina ngi ikarsan rah khros 'leenki arjunqum low,” dilamda.

Anto' heppi thimpu kenreel rek rukku, nowlam chukpu rektung ngi pni chaak lamda ungta msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi mii morsonna san chda pdainu Mma' mdakka karsan pchaang chmeh.

Isreel rekki Paamkruwng, hava' Mesaiah avah khros 'leenki arjungqumso, tidit tah neen rukku ava' deithida lam'trin chaakna' rah,” dilamda. Ungta Mma' tu' mdopthowiyow mmaanve rukku Mma' avah rai chlamda.
'Tunnu qhang truk mtlaak thungta paam mkheng thung ngi qhang tku kphadek ki jiingnu tlungda.

Ungta qhang tku thung vah Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Eloi, Eloi lama sabakthani?” dida. Ava' avah, “Neiki Isowr, Neiki Isowr, taluleiyi, Nang ngi Neiya atmaak pthi a?” (Luw. 22:1) mdoditna' kdi ngi perheel lamda.
Ava' thung ngi krip rek aangqhe ngi, ava' marjaakin thungta hanto' the lamda: “Asuwn, Mma ngi Elaijah mo'own nah,” dilamda.

Audilli kuwmiikhat tih heichenda buwphown khat avah thowldii kdor thung ngi plupthida piipe kuwng 'leenni daarda ungta mdoneek rang ngi, Mma' hinni parlaan chda. Ungta mma ngi: “Mma' avah bimaan, Elaijah ngi Mma' kupqum rah kthuwksik rang mow, isuwn cheh,” dida.
Ungta Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda ungta Mma ngi mqutna' mtadaal qen chda.
Audilli luwbuk'inn kenje thungki buwjaar avah mtun ki ngi mtii kphadek ki laak 'knii ngi kerjen chda.
'Tunnu ava' thung ngi krip raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi, Mma ngi hanto ngi owng thida mqutna' mtadaal mdoqen chaak mdeh thungta, mma ngi: “Dakat tih hava' Mii avah Isowr Chapa kat thideh,” dida.
Ungta ava' thung ngi leer rih ksutpqowi snu rek ka'am lam, mmaan ava' arlak ki, Magdala ki Mary, James kdil le' Joses nuh Mary ungta Solomi le' kyaulam.
Hava' snu rek ava ngi, Mma ngi Galily thuh ma'am thung ngi Mma' avah soplow chlamda mdil mdoqowi chaakin. Ungta Mma' tu' Jerusalem ki arhang kilqhisap snu rekpa rukka kyaulam.
'Tunnu kluhpha mphaak thungta, tidit tah nit avah tporthlonna' nit mkurthuh leiyi, tidit tah Tkarngatnit mphaak duh ki nit kurthuwkda.

Mthungta Arimathia ki Joseph, kunpun ava' thung ki, miikenreel khat kurthuwk ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' ningkakraal lih karda kcha' mma' thlengda ungta mningqit ktaak ki Pilaat hinni hangda, Jisu kluwng avah qhil chda.
Mthungta Pilaat tah Mma ngi kbeiyi mdiyow dok ava'leiyi ngak chda ungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpupa ownda, Mma' avah mpha mruk duh thah kdiyou dok kcha' mow, tidit kheelda.
Ungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpupa hinki mkindit mdeh dok dilli, kluwng avah Joseph hinni tpiik rah rotpiikda.

Audilli mma ngi buw kperneem kqha renda, Mma' avah pqumda ungta buw kperneem ava ngi Mma' avah klumda. Ungta mma ngi, Mma' avah lung khorda mdotlot dok ksa thlaan khat thung ngi pi'iip chda ungta mma ngi thlaankhor nehr ava' thung ngi lung khat purlupda, arkam pthida.
Ungta Magdala ki Mary le' Joses nuh Mary ngi Mma' mdopi'iina' mmun avah sutpqowi lamda.
'Tunnu tkarngatnit mthlen dok thungta Magdala ki Mary le' James nuh Mary ungta Solomi leh ngi Mma' mdopubul chaak raan ki thenni reidii renkilring chdok lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kparma dok ki arveen ki mkhatna' nit ava' thung ngi, kni mthuh daat le' thlaan ava' thah hang lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi: “Kuw ngi neen nthen innu thlaan thungki lung avah mikpurlupiik raanno,” kirdi lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih mahansutin thungta lung avah tpurludok ksa ngi handei lamda, tidit tah mlung avah kdung ngi klin.
Ungta thlaan ava' thuh mluwchun inni mmaan nih ksetnau khat phriktluwn kpowldang kna khat avah machang ktong thah kok'ong daat dei lamda ungta ava ngi muplungin pngakyou chlamda.

Pdainu mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aplungin pngakyou chmaan. Naan nih, mdopthowi yown, Najareth ki Jisu athlaam inna, pdainu Mma' avah kkerdel dok! Mmah hava' thuh ammeh. Mmaan nih Mma' mdopi'iinaan mmun avah asuwn.

Pdainu naan nih vangin rah Msikhu rek hinni ungta Pitar hinni vansongin, tidit tah Mmah naan aduhn nih Galily thah kahangdok, Mma ngi naan ahinin nih mdothe dok ava' heppi, naan nih, Mma' avah ava' thah deinaandi',” dida.

Audilli mmaan nih kbeiyi yungsun lamda ungta thlaan ava' thung ki yungchen lamda, tidit tah mmaan nah kunchuwn kcha'lam ungta kngakyou kcha'lam. Ungta mmaan nih kuwkhat hinni, dow khatleh ruk thelam mda mleiya mningin kqi kcha'.
'Tunnu Mma ngi mkerdel thung ngi, kparma ngi arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, Mma ngi rukrirep pih, Mma ngi mthung ki tarnam tikhiutet mdorei pthipiikna', Magdala ki Mary hinni kterdetda.
Mma ngi vangda Mma' tu' kilqhi kcha' rek, 'tun'tun nih kurnung karbaangda ungta kqap kcha' rek avale' hinni vansongda.
Ungta mmaan ava ngi Mma' avah kring kerheel dok kcha' a ungta snu ava ngi Mma' avah mmik ki mdeh tidit marjaakin thungta avah lam'rin chlam mda.
Ava' dilli Mma ngi, khuwpaam thah kchet rek mmaan arlak ki chai'knii rek hinni mruwngchen msik ki kterdetda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi mdosonin ava' rukka lamrin chlam mda.

Ava' dilli Mma ngi mmaan nih khaan thuh mko'onin arlaan nih sowm leikhat rek hinni kterdetda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah mlamrinmaan ungta muplungin kap chai ava'leiyi rai chlamda. Mleiya mmaan nih, Mma ngi mrinkerheel dilli Mma' kdei rek dothe avah lam'mdorin chaakin pemeh.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih dultipaam mkheng thung ngi chetin rah kqhapaumin avah mii mkheng hinni aparjaamin.
Lam'rin chda dii kluwt kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah pdainu lam'krin kma' mma' avah kupsul rah.
Ungta lam'krin kcha' rek avah hava' titinna' rek ava ngi mdilin kqowi rah. Nei kmiing ngi mmaan nih tarnam rek kreipthi lamrah, mmaan nih pauren rekki kpau lamrah.

Mmaan nih mkhut inni pruwl rek avah kchom lamrah ungta mmaan nih tidiyowna' kru needok daat lam yoso, ava ngi mmaan avah taluruk pthe lam nimeh, mmaan nih kkowi rek 'leenni mkhutin khiing chlamdon ungta kkowi rek avah kdam chlam rah,” dida.
Anto ngi Kruwng ngi mmaan hinni mdothe rah mthe dok dilli, Mma' avah Isowr machang thah ko'ong chda.
Ungta mmaan nih chet lamda ungta mmun ktai thung ngi parjaam chlamda ungta Kruwng ngi mmaan tu' nong tlowsapda ungta titinna' rek ar'aang ngi pauna ava' 'leenni ruhtan pii chlamda. Amen.
Neen narlak inni mkinditsi tidit tih knet tih lamtrin chaakin dow rek ava' ki paumin avah mii knempok ki kparnaakjik rang ngi kjit thuh dok lamda.
Avale' avah mupqhun daat ki ngi mmikin nih kdei rek ungta pauna ava' sopklow kcha' rekki mdodehn ava' heppi neen nihin nih avah miparlaan chaanda.

Avaleiyi, nei rukku dow mkheng avah kurkhumjik ki kdeh chaak dok dilli, mkhatna' ki ngi pqhunda karnaakjik ki, kparthaangsi Thiophilas, nang ahin nih tikjit chaak ava ngi kqha rah tidit tih bin chnuh.
Mleiya nang ngi ahin nih adotpurchuh doklam dow rek ava' ki mkindit kat ava' adodeh kcha' rang ki thenni havah kdokjit.
Judia paamkuwl thungki paamkruwng Herod mpaal thung ngi, Abijah lop thungki, mmiing Jakhariah tidit thimpu khat ka'am ungta mnuwn avah Aaron chanu rek thungki ungta mmiing nga Elijabeth tu' mdit.
Ungta mmaanve avah mikniing inni Isowr miing ngi mrinkindit tih am chlamda. Ungta Kruwng paupiik rekle' nowparit mkheng rek thung ngi tupsulna' ktaak ki kchet kcha'lam.
Pdainu Elijabeth vonchowima leiyi, nau thlowi chlam mda ungta mmaanve avah mikniing inni kder dok kcha'lam.
Mleiya mma' lopkarnaak ava' dilkqowiyi mma ngi Isowr aang ngi thimpu khat kurthuwk ki nong mtlot chaak arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda.
Mleiya mma ngi Kruwng luwbuk'inn thuh mvanluw thungta thimpu kurthuwk ki nowpa dilkqowiyi namreng kapka rang ki pchalpiik avah mma' 'leenni tlada.
Ungta namreng tapkaakna' mpha ava' thung ngi miipii rek mkheng avah khulown thah rinktham chlamda.
Audilli Kruwng vaantamsi khat avah namreng tapkaakna' khaan ava' machang thah ripda mhin nih kperdehda.
Ungta Jakhariah ngi mma' mdeh thungta muplung yada ungta m'leen nih ningqitna' thuwkda.

Pdainu vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Jakhariah aningpqitma' mleiya arinktham chaak avah atarjaak piik a, tidit tah anuwn Elijabeth tih chapa khat kuplu rah ungta nang ngi mmiing avah ‘Johon’ dinadi'.
Ungta nang nga kanpa le' plung kngam mih am chnadi' ungta mma' qou thung ngi mii rek kanpa rah.
Mleiya mma' avah Kruwng miksut thung ngi klin rah ungta mmah thowldii ruk pertem nimeh mditmata mjaakpum dii ruk nee nimeh. Mma' rukka mnuhpowi kpha thungki kupqhun nih Pthla Kchiir rih kdim rah.
Ungta mma ngi Isreel nau knempok rek avah mmaan ki Isowr, Kruwng ava' hinni kperheel chlam rah.

Ungta mpa rekki plung rek avah mnau rekin hinni, (Mal. 4:5-6) ungta tethe kopqowi kma’ avah kindit luwkinritna' thung ngi kperheel rang ngi, Kruwng ki thenni mii rek kporthlong chrang ki thenni, Mma' aang ngi pthla thung ngi ungta Elaijah ruhtanna' thung ngi mmah kchet chrah.”
Ungta Jakhariah ngi vaantamsi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih neiyu havah deinikli? Mleiya neiya kder dok kcha' ping ungta knuwn rukka kqhajik ki mkum rek avah kerkheel dok kcha'.”
Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya nang ahin nih hava' plung ngamna' pau ava' ksong rang ngi mdotsi dok Isowr aang ngi krip kcha' Gabriel ping.

Pdainu asuw, nang nga hava' dow rek mthuh dokna' nit ava' kpha ngi apau thuwk nimeh ungta pau pchaang nimtih, mleiya mma' mma' ki mpha thung ngi kthuwk chrang nei kpauna rek avah nang ngi lam'adorin chaak pemeh,” dida.
Ungta mii rekki Jakhariah avah mdo'ardat daatin ungta mma ngi mpha rowiksowt tih luwbuk'inn thuh ma'am dok leiyi, mmaan nah ngak chlamda.

Pdainu mma ngi marvan thuh thungta mmaan hinnu pau the pchaang mda, ungta mmaan nih luwbuk'inn kenje thung ngi mma ngi rinmer khat mdeh a tidit deisap lamda. Mleiya mma ngi tpartam daat tih partam thida kpau pchaang kmah ngi rimkdi am chda.
Ungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah mma ngi msoplow chaakna' mpha ava' mqut daat le' anto ngi mi'inn thah sun chda.
'Tunnu nit rek ava' dilli mnuwn Elijabeth avah kurmuwngda ungta mma ngi thla parnga thung ngu mthina ngi kordowlda am chda, ungta mma ngi hanto'theda:
“Mleiya mii rek arlak ki kningkya mdotodowl piikna' rah, Mma ngi vonsat mdotolow chaakna' mpha thuh Kruwng ngi havah nei kihin nih mdotpurthuh piik,” dida.
'Tunnu mthla trukna' thung ngi Galily paamkuwl ki khuwpii Najareth thung ngi Isowr rih Gabriel tidit vaantamsi avah pthlada.
Mma ngi mmiing Joseph mdodit David innkhor thungki miikhat tih pau mdopthlen dok ksa nlakinrim khat ava' hinni pthlada. Ungta nlakinrim miing avah Mary, mdit.
Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi thleng thida mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng ngi plung mdopo'owi chaak nang, ikanpa cha', Kruwng avah nang tu' ka'am a, nang nga snu rek arlak ki msuwkqhasi kcha' imptih.”
Pdainu Mary ngi mma' mdeh thungta mma ngi mdothe pau rek 'leenni muplung yachda. Ungta mma ngi hava' pau'arvuwi avah talu rangnga tidit binda.
Audilli vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma' Mary, mleiya nang nga Isowr plungnee tu' kilqhi kcha' imptih.
Ungta asuw, nang ngi kurmuwng tidon Chapa khat pluwchnadi', ungta nang ngi mmiing avah ‘JISU’ dinadi'.
Mmah koprol rah ungta Mma' avah Kparthaangsi Chapa kdi lamrah, ungta Kruwng ngi Mhin nih Mpa David kruwng longkhom avah kpii rah.
Ungta Mma ngi Jakob innkhor thung ngi ktlangknai kmah kpaal rah ungta Mma' kruwngpaalna' avah mqutna' am nimeh.”
Audilli Mary ngi vaantamsi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih havah kthuwk daat rangplih, tidit tah neiya pselpa kdodehmapa a?”

Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Pthla Kchiir avah nang a'leen nih kurjung rah ungta Kparthaangsi ruhtan ava ngi arlim akepnee chrah. Avaleiyi, nang ngi adopluk rang Kchiir Khat ava' rukka Isowr Chapa tidit rah.
'Tunnu nang ari'alam kthuwk Elijabeth rukku mder chaak arlaan nih chapa khat kurmuwng slida ka'am. Ungta 'tunnu kokhong kcha' mdoditin ava ngi mkurmuwn avah hava ngi thla truk mphaak a.
Mleiya Isowr hinvah kurthuwk kma' rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.”
Audilli Mary ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw neiya Kruwng suwknu khat ping, nang ngi adothe apau ava' heppi nei kihin nih kthuwk ikurthuwkso,” dida. Ungta anto ngi vaantamsi avah mma' hinki sun chda.
'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi Mary ngi korlouda ungta koknot tih Judah tidit mulpaam ki khuwpii thah chetda.
Ungta mma ngi Jakhariah inn thuh luwtda Elijabeth avah arvuwi chda.
Ungta hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Elijabeth tih Mary hinki pau'arvuwi marjaak daat le' mpowi thungki mnauhor avah konchokda ungta Elijabeth avah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chda.
Audilli mma ngi kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Nang nga snu rek arlak ki asuwkqhasi a ungta adohor rang nau avah msuwkqhasi a.
Pdainu taluleida neiki Kruwng ava' nuh ava ngi kihin nih mthlen rang havah mdotrot piik daat a?
Mleiya dakat tih kakna ngi nang ngi adoturvuwi chaak archaang karjaak chaak daat le' kpowi thungki knauhor avah mkanpat chaak ki konchok kcha' a.
Mleiya Kruwng ngi mhin nih mdothe dow rek avah kpurtluwm rah tidit lamkrin kcha' snu avah msuwkqha a,” dida.
Ungta Mary ngi hanto'theda: “Nei kapthlarin nih Kruwng nga kponlor chaak a.
Ungta kapthla ngi Maksan kcha' Isowr ava' hinni kanpa kcha' a.
Mleiya Mma ngi msuwknu plungdil chaak avah mdeh piik chaak a, Tidit tah asuwn, 'tunki kupqhun nih suruwl mkheng ngi, Neiya msuwkqha mikdi chrah.
Mleiya Mruhktangsi Mma' ava ngi, Nei kthen nih dow klin mtlotpiik chda, Ungta Mma' miing avah kchiir ava'.
Ungta Mma' plungnee avah, Mma' kqi kcha' rek hinni suruwl suruwl thung ngi, m'leenin nih avah ka'am chrah.
Mma ngi, ruhtan nong rekki, Mbaan ruhtan avah pandangda, Ungta Mma ngi, muplungril ki plungbin rek thung ngi, Kpirlin kcha' rek avah arjei pthi lamda.
Mma ngi mruh ktang rek avah mukruwng longkhomin rek thungki loupthi lamda. Ungta kpirdil kcha avah tparthaan chda.
Mma ngi mpowiktham avah dow kqha rekki pdimpiik chda. Ungta svang avah Mma ngi mdakden nih mupsun pthi a.
Mma ngi msuwk Isreel rek avah, Mma' plungqhat mdobinphaak chaak ki bom chlamda.
Mleiya Mma ngi npa'leen, Abraham le' mnaumsuwn rek hinni mdothe dok ava' heppi ktlangknai kmah binphaak chlamda.”
Ungta Mary ngi mma' tu' thla kdum arveel kcheengda ungta mma ngi mi'inn thah sunkerheel chda.
'Tunnu Elijabeth tah mnauplukna' rah mpha avah veidokda ungta mma ngi chapa khat pluw chda.
Ungta mi'innveen rekle' mrilam rekki, Kruwng ngi mhin nih plungqhat klin nih mtedet chaak a, tidit marjaakin thungta mmaan nih mma' tu' kanpasap chlamda.
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah mmaan nih mnii trehtna' nit tih nau avah mvun kreen rang ngi thleng lamda ungta mmaan nih mmiing avah mpa Jakhariah ava' dilkqowiyi mdophuwk raan thah tlada.
Pdainu mnuh ngi hanto ngi arthaangda ungta theda: “Immeh, mmah ‘Johon’ tidit rah.”
Pdainu mmaan nih mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ari'alam thung ngi hava' miing tphuwk kuwkhat leh ruk ka'am pemeh.”
Mthungta mmaan nih mmiing avah talu dida kphuwk rang tidit leiyi, mpa hinni titinna' rekki kheel lamda.
Ungta mma ngi tikjitna' phel khat qhil lamda ungta ava' 'leenni hanto' kjitda: “Mma' mmiing nga Johon,” dida. Ungta mmaan nah mkheng inni ngak chlamda.
Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih mnehr avah kparvangda ungta meplei avah kerthletda ungta mma ngi pauda Isowr panpaak chda.
Audilli mmaan tu' kpervel lih ka'am mkheng rek 'leenni ningqitna' thuwkda. Ungta hava' pau mkheng avah Judia ki mulpaam mkheng kirkhil lih kerseel psuk lamda.
Ungta ava' karja rek mkheng ava ngi: “Hava' nau avah taluhep kdusik rangnga?” dilamda, muplungrilin thung ngi arkhi chlamda. Ungta Kruwng khut avah mma' 'leenni am chda.
'Tunnu mpa Jakhariah avah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chda ungta pau purphuwngda, hanto'theda:
“Isreel rekki Isowr, Kruwng avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso, Mleiya Mma ngi mmii rek avah vel chlamda. Ungta maktlan chaak lam a.
Ungta Mma' suwk David inn thung ngi, Neen nthen inni tkirliinna' arki khat mitapqhan piik inna.
Mma ngi dultipaam mupqhun daat le' ka'am, Mma' khulpu kchiir rek nehr rih mdothe dok ava' heppi,
Mleiya neen avah nmiihal rekin hinki, Ungta neen mikahal kcha' mkheng rek khut thungki midotsan chaakna' raan ki thenni,
Mleiya neen npa'leen hinni pau mdoreel dok lungnee ava' mdopurthuhna' rah. Ungta Mma' pauqum kchiir ava' kbinphaak rang ngi,
Neen npa Abraham hinni mdotham paureeltham ava' kbinphaak rang ngi,
Neen avah nmiihal rekin khut thungki midotaktlan chaakin nih, Ningqit ktaak ki Mma' soptolow chaakna' avah mirotpiikinda.
Mleiya havah neen nih Mma' aang ngi kchiir rih, Ungta rinkindit tih nrimkum mkheng thuh ta'am chaakna' rang kithen.
Ungta nau, nang avah Kparthaangsi ava' khulpu akdi lamrah, Mleiya nang nga Mma' 'lam rek kporthlong rang ngi, Kruwng aang ngi chet chnadi'.
Ungta mmaan pnu arve rek ava' tuknuwl piik ki, Mma' mii rek hinni tkirliinna' ki luwkinritna' avah pii chlamnadi'.
Neenki Isowr plungqhat kperneem ava ngi, Parvaan ki Kni kthuwk ava ngi neenna mitvel chaak inna.
Mleiya ava ngi kjiingnu thuh kok'ong rek, Ungta kdiyou arlim thung ngi kok'ong rek hinni mar'aang kpii rang ngi, Ungta neen kkalin avah plungdaina' 'lam thuh mikqhi chraanpti',” dida.
Anto ngi nau avah linda ungta pthla thung ngi mruh tangda ungta Isreel mii rek hinni mkandanna' nit kpha thung ngi paamkbiik laiyi am chda.
Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi hanto' thuwkda tidit tah dultipaam mkheng thungki mii rek avah mmiingin tikjit rah tidit ki paureen khat avah Agastas Siijar hinki thuwkda.
Hava' miing tikjitna' avah Kurinas tih Siria paamkuwl ki paamkpu mkurthuh arlaan nih rukrithok ki kthuwk.
Mthungta mii khimkhei avah mma' mma' ki mkhuwpii thung ngi mmiingin kikjit chrah chet lamda.

Ungta Joseph rukka Galily paamkuwl ki Najareth khuwpii thungki korlouda Judia paamkuwl ki David khuwpii Bethlehem mdodit ava' thung ngi hangda. Mleiya mma' avah phung ava' thung ki ungta David rilam thungki.
Mma ngi pau mdopthlen dok ksa mnuwn Mary, miipum meek ava' tu' mmiingin kikjit rang ngi chetve lamda.
Mthungta hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah mmaanve ngi ava' thah ma'am daatin arlaan nih mnauplukna' rah mpha avah veidok chda.
Ungta mma ngi mvonchowi mkhatna' Chapa khat avah pluwda ungta buwlaak ki klumda ungta inn ava' thung ngi mmaan thenni mmun ma'amma leiyi, Mma' avah sil'arkuwng thung ngi pi'iip chda.
'Tunnu khuwpaam khatsap thung ngi jaan nih yau luwng khat sutpqowida ka'am yaukqhi rek avah paamlaiyi ka'am lam.
Ungta asuwn, Kruwng vaantamsi khat avah mmaan aang ngi ripda ungta avah Kruwng konlorna' mar'aang ava ngi mmaan 'leenni lengda ungta mmaan avah kdung ngi mningin qida.
Audilli vaantamsi ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aningin pqitmaan, tidit tah asuwn, neiyi dultipaam ki mii mkheng ki thenni kdung ngi kqhapauna rek avah akohorpiik inna.
Mleiya tuni ngi David khuwpii thung ngi naan athen inni Miksan khat kqou a Mma' avah Kruwng Khrista ava'.
Ungta havah naan athen inni bitinna'. Naan nih Nau kdowng khat avah buwlaak ki klumda sil'arkuwng khat thung ngi tpi'iidaat kurdutqhi naandi',” dida.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih vaantamsi ava' tu' kilqhi ngi vaandown rekki hanto' the lamda Isowr ponlor chlamda.
“Kparthaangsi ngi Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso! Ungta dultipaam thung ngi Plung kdai, Ungta mii rek hinni plungbin kqha avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.”

'Tunnu vaantamsi rek ava ngi mmaan hinki korlou lamda parvaan thah muhun chaak dokin thungta yaukqhi rek ava ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “'Leen neen nih Bethlehem thah hangin cheh rang ngi hava' Kruwng ngi neen nihin nih midotparjaakin, kthuwk rang hava' dow rek ava' ksuw rah ichet incheh,” dilamda,
Ungta mmaan nih koknot tih hang lamda Mary le' Joseph ungta sil'arkuwng thung ngi ki'iip daat Nau kdowng avah dei lamda.
'Tunnu mmaan nih Mma' mdeh chaakin thungta, vaantamsi ngi mmaan hinni mdothe Nau ava' ki mlei avah mmaan nih theporyou chlamda.
Ungta yaukqhi rekki mdotheen karja kcha' rek mmaan mkheng avah dow rek ava'leiyi ngak chlamda.
Pdainu Mary ngi hava' dow mkheng rek avah muplungril thung ngi arkhi chda ungta bintuprut tlit chda.

Audilli yaukqhi rek ava ngi Isowr mponlor chaak chunin nih ungta mpanpaak chaak chunin nih jungkerheel chlamda tidit tah mmaan hinni mdothe piik doklam dow mkheng avah ava'jik ki mmaan nih arja chlamda ungta mmikin nih dei chlamda.

Ungta Nau ava' vuntreenna' rah niitreht ava' mphaak dok thungta mmaanve ngi Mma' miing avah ‘JISU’ dilamda phuwk lamda, tidit tah mmiing avah mnuhpowi thung ngi mkurmuwn duduh ngi vaantamsi ngi mdopiik dok ksa.
'Tunnu Moses nowlam ki dilkqowiyi mmaanve kertleuna' nit rek ava' mqut thungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah Kruwng hinni ktedet chrang ngi Jerusalem thah hanqhi lamda.
Kruwng nowlam thung ngi tikjit ksadok ava' heppi, ‘Mreichulna' chapa khimkhei avah Kruwng hinni kchiir tidit rah mdodit.’ (Mpk. 13:2,12,15)

Ungta Kruwng nowlam thung ngi hanto'theda: ‘Uqhu sik khat mditmata khukhu suwn sikkhat rintparlaan rah.’ mdodit.’ Avaleiyi, mmaanve ngi Mma' avah Jerusalem thah hanqhi lamda. Ungta rinparlaan chlamda. (Lev. 12:8)

Ungta asuwn Jerusalem thung ngi mmiing Simeon tidit miikhat ka'am. Ungta hava' mii avah Isreel mii rek plung ngamna' karda kcha' mrinkindit ungta rinko'owi kcha' miikhat ungta Pthla Kchiir avah m'leen nih am chda.
Ungta mma ngi Kruwng ki Mesaiah ava' mmik ki mdehduh khimkheiyi mmah diyou nimeh, tidit avah Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mhin nih mdopandan piikdok.
Mthungta mma ngi Pthla ar'aang ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi thleng chda. Ungta mnuh le' mpa ngi Nau Jisu avah Mma' thenni nowlam nowpa dilkqowiyi ktlotpiik rang ki thenni marhanqhiin thungta,
Mma ngi Nau avah arpom chda ungta Isowr panpaak chda ungta hanto'theda:
“Mukpu Kruwng, 'Tunnu Nah apauna dilkqowiyi asuwk neiya plung kdaiyi mheipsun cha'.
Mleiya kmik ki Nah ahinki, Tkirliinna' avah kdeh chaak dok a.
Nang ngi havah mii mkheng rek maiyi adoporthlon dok ksa.
Ungta havah Chaat ktlei rek kpandang rang mar'aang khat, Ungta Nah amii Isreel rek konlor chaakna',” dida.
Ungta Joseph le' Mnuh avah Nau ava'leiyi mdothe dow rek leiyi, ngak chlamda.

Audilli Simeon nih mmaan avah suwqhat pii lamda ungta Mnuh Mary ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw, hava' Nau avah Isreel thungki miiknem pok rek kerdelna' ungta mtlukna' mdopurthuh dok ksa ungta Mma' avah titinna' khat kurthuwk rah ungta mii rekki Mma' kikthitna ngi kpaulam rah.
Anto ngi plungchai knempok rekki plungbin rek ava' kpandang rang ngi raal'kaang ngi nang apthlarin rukka kthun pthleng rah,” dida.
'Tunnu ava' thung ngi Asher phung thungki Phanuel chanu mmiing Anna mdoditin snu thimpu khat ka'am. Ungta mmah kdung ngi der chda ungta mma' avah innmne dilli mi'innpu tu' kum tikhiu ka'amve doklam.
Ungta hava' snu avah kum somtreht leiplii ki meikhunu. Ungta mma' avah luwbuk'inn thungki ksunliit kmah ngi suwn le' jaan nih then ngowlda ungta rinktham chda ungta Isowr sopklow kcha' snu khat.
Ungta mpha ava'kat thung ngi mma' rukka thlengda Kruwng avah panpaak chda ungta mma ngi, Isowr rih Jerusalem avah kaktlan rah tidit kbin kcha' mkheng rek hinni, Nau ava' ki mlei avah mdothe dok.
Anto ngi mmaan nih Kruwng nowlam dilkqowiyi dow mkheng avah mtlot chaak dokin dilli Galily paamkuwl ki mkhuwpiin Najareth thah jungkerheel chlamda.
Ungta Nau avah linda ungta pthla thung ngi mruh tang chda ungta luwkinritna' ngi dim chda ungta Isowr plungnee avah Mma' thung ngi amda.
Jisu nuh le'pa avah mkumktaiyi Taplaanna' ki Kmaal ava' thung vah Jerusalem thah kahang tlit kchok lam.
Ungta Mma ngi kum sowm lei'knii mphaak dok thungta kmaal ava' ki nowpa dilkqowiyi mmaan nih Jerusalem thah hang lamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi nit rek ava' mqut dilli murjun kerheelin thungta Nau Jisu avah dilnauda Jerusalem thah am chdaatda. Joseph le' Mnuh ava' vah avah dei lam mda.
Pdainu mmaanve vah marlak inni Mmah ampakda dilamda, niikhat 'lamqowi lik thuh kchet doklam ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mrilam rekin le' maplap rekin hinni thlaam lamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mdehmaan thungta Mma' kthlaam mih Jerusalem thah hang kerheel lamda.
'Tunnu anto ngi Mma' avah niikdum dilli luwbuk'inn thuh chukpu rek arlak ki ko'ongda mpautheen arjada ungta paukheel kheel lamda ka'am daat maanve ngi dei lamda.
Ungta Mma' karja rek mkheng inni Mma ngi mdodeh pindit le' mpau'arthaan leiyi, ngakyou chlamda.

Anto ngi mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mdehn thungta ngakyou chlamda. Ungta Mnuh ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kchapa, taluleiyi Nang ngi neen kihinin nih havah adotlotda? Asuw o, Apa le' neiyi plung kparvaiyi adokthlaamin kmah.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naanve vah Neiya adotthlaam inplih? Neiyi Kpa nong thung ngi plung kdopluw chaak rah tidit avah naanve vah deimaan timow?”
Pdainu mmaanve vah Mma ngi mmaanve hinni mdothe paulam avah deipindih chlam mda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaanve tu' arjungda Najareth tlung lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaanve kurduh ngi am chda. Pdainu Mnuh ava' vah hava' dow mkheng rek avah muplungril thung ngi arkhi chda.
Ungta Jisu a luwkinritna' 'leenni ungta mdaksa 'leen linthang setsetda, ungta Isowr le' dultimii plungngam kurthuwkda.

'Tunnu Taiberia ki Siijar mpaalna' kum msowm lei parngatna' mphaak thung ngi Pontias ki Pilaat tih Judia paamkpu kurthuwkda, Herod tih Galily paamkuwl plii ki khat ki paamkpu kurthuwkda, ungta mu'upa Philip pih Ituria paamkuwl plii ki khat ki ungta Trakoniti paamklek rek thung ngi paamkpu kurthuwkda. Ungta Lisanias tih Abilene paamkuwl plii ki khat ki paamkpu kurthuwkda.
Ungta Anna le' Kaiaphas tih thimpu kenreelsi mkurthuhn arlaan nih paamkbiik laiyi Isowr pauna avah Jakhariah chapa Johon hinni arjuda.
Ungta mma ngi Jordon biing ngi ka'am khuwpaam mkheng rek thung ngi chetda pnu toptlot piikna' rang ki thenni plung kerthlenna' ki pau parjaam chda.
Khulpu Isaiah laika thung ngi kjitda ka'am pauna rek ava' hep pih: “Paamkbiik laiyi ko'owng krowl ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kruwng thenni 'lam aporthlongin, Mma' 'lam rek avah kirji deek ki aportlotin.
Kturkuwng rek khimkhei avah kipdim rah, Ungta lown rekle' mul rek khimkhei avah kopchowm rah. Ungta 'lam konkowi rek avah kpirji rah ungta 'lam kotrot rek avah kparnaal rah.
Ungta daksa mkheng ngi Isowr hinki Tkirliinna' avah mmikin nih kdei chlam rah. ’” (Is. 40:3-5)

Audilli mma ngi dii mdopluw chaak lam rang ki thenni kthleng miipii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Kruknei pruwl suruwl thungki rek naan, karvang bei rang plungthit mei kquwng thungki achen chaakna' raan ki thenni kuw ngi atpilqhit inda?

Avaleiyi, naan nih plung kperthleng dok kcha' khat ki mtik kcha ngi achei raan. Ungta naan nih arilin thung ngi: ‘Neenna k'paan Abraham ka'am’ dichmaan, mleiya neiyi kthe a. Isowr rih Abraham thenni nau rek avah hava' lung rek thungki ruk mdopqhan pchaan.
Ungta 'tun 'tun rukku qhii avah ding ava' arjung 'leenni plot pthi dokda ka'am daat ah. Avaleiyi, mchei kqha kchei kma' dingbul khimkhei avah tphurpthilu ungta mei thung ngi tvarpthilu.”
Mthungta mii rekki mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda: “Mdittu' neen nih talu tlow chni kaandi?”
Mthungta mma ngi arthaang lamda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Buwtluwn 'knii kthlowi mma' ava ngi kthlowi liit kma' ava' hinni apii chso ungta thendam kthlowi kcha' mma' rukku anto' heppi atlow chso.”
Audilli sumkqhai rek rukku mhin nih dii kluwt chrah thleng chlamda ungta mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu neenna talu tlow chni kaandi?”
Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih adoqhai raankat ava' kkheel lih qhaimaan.”

Anto' heppi raalmii rek rukku mhin nih hanto ngi kheel chlamda: “Ungta neenna talu tlow chni kaandi?” dilamda. Mthungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwkhat leh ruk pqitmaan mditmata karmak ki miiraal piimaan ungta ardamanin ava ngi ikhomin.”
'Tunnu mii rekki Mesaiah avah ningkakraal lih mdo'ardat chaakin, ungta mii mkheng ngi muplungrilin thung ngi Johon avah Mesaiah ava' mow mditmata ava' pemeh tidit bin lamda.

Mthungta Johon nih mmaan mkhengin hinni hanto'theda arthaang lamda: “Dakat tih neiyu naan avah diisik daat tih dii adokupluwn, pdainu nei kihin nih mruh ktangset Khat avah karvang meeksli a, neiya Mma' khuhkokrii kperthlet ki mtikkcha pmaang. Mma ngi naan avah Pthla Kchiir tu' ungta mei tu' dii'akupluwt chraan.

Mma ngi msikthi avah kchaidang ngi mdoyana' rah maiyaab klin avah mkhut tih sinda ungta Mma ngi chavui avah Moktom thung ngi purkuwk chda pdainu Mma ngi mpirvi rek avah kqiim kma' rah mei thung ngi kapka pthi rah.”
Ungta mma ngi morson tkorsowna' knempok tung ngi mii rek hinni parjaam chda.
Pdainu paamklek plii ki khat ki paamkpu Herod avah Johon nih mnaupa Philip nuwn Herodias mdoko'onqhi leiyi, ungta Herod tih kqha kma' mdotlot mkheng ki thenni Johon nih mma' avah rai chda.
Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava'leiyi mma ngi Johon avah rowng thuh khum pthida.
'Tunnu mii mkheng ngi dii mluw dokin thungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Jisu rukka dii luwt chda. ungta Mma ngi rinmaktham chaak meek arlaan nih parvaan avah kparvangda.

Ungta Pthla Kchiir avah daksa ngi uqhu khat heppi Mma' 'leenni arjung qumda ungta parvaan ki kurju krowl khat ava ngi hanto'theda: “Nang nga, Nei kvonsat'low chaak Kchapa ptih. Neiya, Nang athung ngi kdung ngi kuplung kuplung kngam kcha' a,” dida.
'Tunnu Jisu mdakkat tih Mma' ki nongtlotna' mupqhun thung vah Mdak avah kum somkdum arveel mdophaak dok. Mii rekki Mma' avah Joseph chapa tidit tih mdobinin ungta Joseph avah Heli chapa.
Mleiya Heli a Matthat chapa, Matthat tah Levi chapa, Levi a Melkai chapa, Melkai a Janna chapa, Janna a Joseph chapa,
Joseph a Matathiah chapa, Matathiah a Amos chapa, Amos tah Nahum chapa, Nahum a Eslai chapa, Eslai a Naggai chapa,
Naggai a Maath chapa, Maath tah Matathiah chapa, Matathiah a Semei chapa, Semei a Joseph chapa, Joseph a Judah chapa,
Judah a Johanan chapa, Johanan a Rhesa chapa, Rhesa a Jerubbabel chapa, Jerubbabel lah Shealtiel chapa, Shealtiel lah Neri chapa,
Neri a Melkai chapa, Melkai a Addi chapa, Addi a Kosam chapa, Kosam a Elmodam chapa, Elmodam a Er chapa,
Er a Joshuah chapa, Joshuah tah Eliejer chapa, Eliejer rah Jorim chapa, Jorim a Matthat chapa, Matthat tah Levi chapa,
Levi a Simeon chapa, Simeon nah Judah chapa, Judah a Joseph chapa, Joseph a Jonan chapa, Jonan a Eliakim chapa,
Eliakim a Melea chapa, Melea a Menan chapa, Menan a Mattathah chapa, Mattathah a Nathan chapa, Nathan a David chapa,
David tah Jessi chapa, Jessi a Obed chapa, Obed tah Boaj chapa, Boaj tah Salmon chapa, Salmon a Nahshon chapa,
Nahshon a Aminadab chapa, Aminadab a Aram chapa, Aram a Hejron chapa, Hejron a Perej chapa, Perej tah Judah chapa,
Judah a Jakob chapa, Jakob a Aijek chapa, Aijek ka Abraham chapa, Abraham a Terah chapa, Terah a Nahor chapa,
Nahor rah Saruk chapa, Saruk ka Reu chapa, Reu a Peleg chapa, Peleg ka Heber chapa, Heber rah Shelah chapa,
Shelah a Kainaan chapa, Kainaan nah Arphasad chapa Arphasad tah Shem chapa, Shem a Noah chapa, Noah a Lamek chapa,
Lamek ka Methuselah chapa, Methuselah a Enok chapa, Enok ka Jared chapa, Jared tah Mahalalel chapa, Mahalalel a Kainaan chapa,
Kainaan nah Enos chapa, Enos tah Seth chapa, Seth tah Adam chapa, Adam a Isowr chapa.
Audilli Jisu avah Pthla Kchiir rih kdim mih Jordon kreng ki arhung kerheelda ungta Pthla ngi paamkbiik lai thah qhidokda.
Nii somplii thung ngi tarnampii ngi pthleemda. Ungta nit rek ava' thung ngu Mma ngi dow khatleh chamda ungta ava' dillu, nit rek ava' mqut dilli Mmah mmpowi tham chda.
Ungta tarnampii ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi hava' lung avah thenpen mkurthuhna' rah paupiik apii,” dida.

Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Dultimii a thenpen daat chrel lih mrinrang pemeh, Pdainu Isowr hinki pauna khimkheiyi mrin chaak rah,’ ” dida. (Knl. 8:3)
Audilli tarnampii ngi Mma' avah lown kparthaang khat 'leenni hanqhi thida mpha mruk thung daat tih dultipaam thung ngi ka'am kruwngpaalna' rek mkheng avah tedetda.

Ungta tarnampii ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' ruhtanna' mkheng rekle' mmaan ki konlorna' avah Nang ahin nih apii nikdi', tidit tah havah nei kihin nih mdotpiik dok ungta neiyi avah kuwku yoso kdopiik nuwm hinni pii nikdi',
Avaleiyi, Nang ngi ka'aang ngi luw'atbuk bih, hava' mkheng avah Nang adow kurthuwk chrah,” dida.

Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Seitan kdilpang thah ikorsown dok, Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Nang ngi nangki Kruwng Isowr avah luw'adobuk chaak rah. Ungta nang ngi Mma' daat chrel sop'adolow chaak rah,’ ” mdodit, dida. (Knl. 6:13)
Audilli mma ngi Mma' avah Jerusalem thah hanqhida ungta luwbuk'inn, mdown thah pkalthida Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi hava' 'leenki athina ngi jungkarvar cha',
Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Nang akrung rang ki thenni, Mma ngi Mma', vaantamsi rek avah, Nang aleiyi paupiik kpiilam rah.
Ungta Nang ngi lung 'leenni akhuh ado'etmana' rah, Mmaan nih mkhutin thung ngi akarlaang chlam rah.’” (Luw. 91:11-12)
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Hanto ngi theda ka'am dok: ‘Nang ngi nangki a Isowr, Kruwng avah adoperten rang pemeh,’ ” dida. (Knl. 6:16)
'Tunnu tarnampii ngi tepthleemna' khimkhei avale' ava' mupqut dilli mpha kqha khat ma'am duh kpha ngi Mma' avah mapthida sun chda.
Audilli Jisu a Pthla ruhtan thung ngi Galily paamkuwl thah kerheelda ungta Mma' leiki pauren avah mokloiyi ka'am paamklek rek mkheng thung ngi karjaamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi purchuk lamda ungta mii khimkheiyi Mmah ponlor chlamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi marvanverna' Najareth thah arvangda. Ungta Mma' nowpa dilkqowiyi Tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi luwtda ungta kpa rang ngi ripda.
Ungta Mhin nih khulpu Isaiah laika avah parlaan lamda. Ungta Mma ngi Laika avah mpavan thungta Mma ngi hanto ngi kjitda ka'am ava kurdutqhida.

“Kruwng Pthla avah Nei k'leen nih amda, Mleiya Mma ngi Neiya srah hinni kqhapaumin kparjaam rang ki thenni, Reidii mpubul chda. Mma ngi Neiya muplungbin kertlei kcha' rek kapdam chrah, Ungta paamsuwk ki ka'am rek hinni taktlanpiikna' ki pau kparjaam rah, Ungta mmikktot rek mik kpaharpiik rah, Ungta tyat chiireelna' kphang kcha' rek hinni to'ol chaakna' kpii chrang ki thenni, Neiya msida.
Kruwng ngi mdorot piikna' ki mpha ava' kparjaam chrang ki thenni Neiya msi chda,” dida. (Is. 61:1-2)
Audilli Mma ngi laika avah pkhum pthida ungta ava' sopklow kcha' ava' hinni veikhat pii perheelda ungta ko'ongda. Ungta sinegog thung ngi ka'am mii mkheng rekki mik avah Mma' 'leenni chuda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tuni ngi hava' Kchiir laika avah naan nih ado'arjaakin thung ngi aplungin thuh mpurkhum dok a,” dida.

Mthungta mii mkheng ngi Mhin nih sakhi pii lamda ungta plung knei dok ki pauna rek avah Mma' nehr thungki mthuh leiyi ngak chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Havah Joseph chapa ava' pemeh mow?” dilamda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, ‘Riipu, athina ikpardam cha', talutalu yoso, neen nih Kapernaum thah adotlot kdo'arjaakin avah hava' akhuwpaam thung rukku atlow’, mdodit pauril avah kihin nih themun naandi',” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat kthe a. ‘Khulpu khadaat ruk mdaksa ki mkhuwpaam thung ngi trot chaak a ka'amlu pemeh.’

Pdainu Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Elaijah ki mpha thung ngi, parvaan avah kum kdum thla truk thung ngi karkamda ma'am thung ngi Isreel rek arlak ki meikhunu knempok ki ka'am lam ungta mpha ava' thung ngi paam mkheng thung ngi powitham klin khat thuwkda.
Pdainu Sidon paamklek thung ngi ka'am snu khat, meikhunu Jarephath modit ava'hin kma'don kuw morson khatleh hinni Elaijah avah pthla meh.
Ungta khulpu Elaisah ki mpha thung ngi Isreel rek arlak ki raichi kervei knempok ki ka'am lam pdainu Siria ki Namaan kma'don kuwkhat leh rukka pertleu meh.”
Audilli sinegog thung ngi ka'am mii mkheng rek ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' marjaakin thungta mei kquwng ngi muplungin thida.
Ungta mmaan nih rip lamda Mma' avah khuwpii duwn thah rei lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah qeenlung khuikham thung ngi kvarpthi rang ngi Mma' avah mkhuwpiin ko'onna' lown down thah hanqhi lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan arlak ki mchethlen dok ava ngi Mmah mchena' rang thah anto' chet chda.
Audilli Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl ki khuwpii Kapernaum thah juda ungta Mma ngi tkarngatnit rek thung ngi mmaan avah purchuk chlamda.
Ungta Mma ngi ruhtanna' tu' mpau ava'leiyi mmaan nih Mma' dopurchuhna' 'leenni ngakyou chlamda.
'Tunnu sinegog ava' thung ngi tarnam ktobor pthla khat tih mdoqhi miikhat ka'am. Ungta mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda.

Hanto ngi theda: “Neenna mthowng chmaan! Najareth ki Jisu, neen nih Nang tu' talu kdotlot raan ka'am plih? Nang nga neen mke'ekrep raan ki kthuwk ptimow? Isowr ki Kchiir khat Nang! Neiyi Nang nga kuw ptih tidit adokdeh.”

Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' avah hanto'theda raida: “Rimkdi i'am, ungta mma' thungki arvang thuwk dok!” Ungta tarnam ava ngi mma' avah mmaan arlak ki mvarpthi dilli mma ngi mma' thungki arvang thuwkda ungta mma' avah tiplim meh.

Mthungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngak chlamda ungta msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda: “Hava' pauna avah taluluda? Mleiya Mma ngi ruhtanna' le' ruhtan ava ngi tarnam ktobor rek hinni paupiik pii lamda ungta mmaan avah arvang thuwk lamda,” dilamda.
Ungta Mma' dang avah mekpervel lih ka'am paamklek rek khimkhei thung ngi kervelda.
'Tunnu Mma ngi sinegog thungki korlouda Simon inn thung ngi luwtda. Pdainu Simon ktarnuh avah kdungyou kcha' riiphaak khat tih phada kowida mthungta mmaan nih mma' leiyi, Mhin nih ktham chlamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi mma' 'leenni rikhum thida riiphaak avah raida ungta riiphaak ava ngi mma' avah mapthida. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi kerdelda mmaan avah soplow chlamda.

'Tunnu kni mtlaak thang ngi mdetmdet ki omlai rekki kkowi kthlowi rek mmaan mkheng inni kkowi rek mmaan avah Mma' paphaak lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan khatkhat 'leenni mkhut thiikpiik lamda ungta mmaan avah pdam chlamda.

Ungta mmaan knempok rek thungki tarnam rek ava ngi hanto' the lamda arvang thuwk lamda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa Mesaiah ptih!” Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah rai lamda ungta mpau raan avah rotpiik lam mda, tidit tah mmaan nih Mma' avah Mesaiah tidit mdodehn.

'Tunnu khu mvaar thungta Mma ngi sunda mmun ktliing khat thah chetda. Ungta miiloppii rekki Mma' avah thlaam lamda ungta Mma' avah pha lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma ngi mmaan avah mdomaak mana' raan thlot chlamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah khuwpii morson rek thung rukku kdoparjaam rah mleiya hava' ktlow rang ki thenni Neiya mdotapthlat chaak dok,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl ki sinegog rek thung ngi parjaam chda.
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi Genesaret duwmpii biing ngi mridaat arlaan nih miiloppii rekki Isowr pauna karja chrang ki thenni Mma' avah tkhul lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi duwmpii biing ngi arkuwng 'knii ka'am daat deida, pdainu tuwlvah kse rek avah mthung ki thuwk dok lamda mleenin mdo'alqhut meekin.
Audilli Mma ngi arkuwng rek arlak ki khat, Simon arkuwng thung ngi kalthida laanki ngi mruk kporsown rah sida. Ungta Mma ngi ko'ong thida arkuwng thungki ngi miiloppii rek avah tpurchuh pqhunda.
'Tunnu Mma ngi tpau mdown thungta Simon hinni hanto'theda: “Arkuwng avah lii thuh heithap ungta tuwlvah adokyownna' rah a'leen rek avah avarlam,” dida.
Pdainu Simon nih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mukpu neen nih jaan khat tih arvanvar innu dow khatleh kyowng maanring, anto'daat yoso Nang adothe leiyi, neiyi leen avah var daat nih,” dida.
Ungta mmaan nih hava' mtlotin thungta mmaan nih tuwlvah knempa ngi kyowng lamda ungta mleenin avah kelqet rah theda.

Mthungta mmaan nih arkuwng morson thuh ka'am mmiqhi rek inni arva lamdon nih mdobomna' raan ki thenni karjaab lamda. Ungta mmaan nih arva lamda arkuwng avah mikniing ngi tipdim lamda mthungta mmaan nah kuplup chrah the lamda.
Simon Pitar rih ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi Jisu khuhther rih tluwda hanto'theda: “O Kruwng, nei kihin ki mheikorlow piikcha' mleiya neiya pnu kervei mii ping,” dida.
Mleiya mma' le' mma' tu' kilqhi mkheng rek avah mmaan nih mdopirsim dokin tuwlvah mdokjownin ava'leiyi ngak kchlam.

Ungta anto' heppi Simon miqhi rek, Jebedi chapa rek James le' Johon le' rukka ngak chlamda. Audilli Jisu ngi Simon hinni hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma' tidit tah 'tunki kupqhun nih nang nga mii kokyowng kurthuwk chnadi',” dida.
Anto ngi mmaan nih murkuw ngin avah laan mapphaak dokin dilli, mmaanve ngi dow mkheng avah mapthi lam thida Mma'dil qowi chlamda.

Ungta hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah Mma ngi khuwpii khat thuh ma'am thung ngi, asuwn, raichi ngi kdim kcha' miikhat tih Jisu avah deikhot chda. Ungta mma ngi khupktulup pih tluda ungta Mhin nih hanto ngi theda pnuwm chda: “Kruwng Nang ngi abin bih, Nang ngi neiya mpertleu pchaang nadi',” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi mkhut heikhiingda mdak kmei thida hanto'theda: “Neiyi kngei a, ikertleu cha',” dida, ungta m'tunkat daat tih raichi ava ngi mma' avah mapthida.

Ungta Mma ngi kuwkhat leh hin rukku mdothe mana' rah paupiik piida, hanto'theda: “Pdainu chet rang ngi thimpu hinni adak ikterdet cha' ungta Moses tih paupiik mdopiik heppi mmaan thenni sakhi kurthuwk ki akertleu chaak leiyi, chla khat aparlaan cha',” dida.

Audilli Mma' leiki pauson avah kerkheel setset tih karjaam thangda ungta miiloppii knempa avah Mma' karja chrang ngi ungta mo'omlai rekin thungki Mma ngi mdopdam chaakna' raan ki thenni thlengpok lamda.
Anto ngi Mma ngi korlou tlit kchokda paamkbiik lai thah chetda rinktham kchok tlitda.

'Tunnu niikhat tih hanto ngi thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi mpurchuh lam thung ngi Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rek avah ava' thuh kok'ong daat lam. Ungta mmaan avah Galily, Judia ungta Jerusalem thungki khuwklin rek khimkhei thungki kthleng lam. Ungta mmaan tapdamna' rah Kruwng ruhtan avah Mma' 'leenni amda.
