Audilli asuwn, mii rekki kyengrii ktong kcha' miikhat avah mi'iina' tung ngi klum lamda ava' thuh thuhqhi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih arvanplutda Mma' aang ngi tpi'iina' rah mlaam thlaam lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih miipii rekpa leiyi, mthung thah mupluw pchaan maan thungta mmaan nih inntun thah hangkal lamda ungta mma' avah mekpher tung ngi kowmphel arlak ki mningqim inni Jisu aangkat tih arjuptla lamda.
Anto ngi Mma ngi mmaan lamrin ava' mdeh thungta Mma ngi kkowi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Plap apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a,” dida.
Mthungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki hanto ngi the lamda mlei tathlaam pqhun lamda: “Hava' pthitda kpau a kuwda? Isowr chreldaat kma'don kuwda pnu rek koptlotpiik pchaang nga?”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan nih mninglei mdothlaamin ava' mdeh thungta Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih aplungin thung ngi mninglei rek avah athlaam inna?
Tva ngi tethe ko'olbet tah, ‘Apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a,’ tidit ava' mow, Hangrip ungta ichet tidit ava ngi ko'olbet tah?’

Pdainu naan nih hava' dultipaam thung ngu Mii Chapa ava ngi pnu rek toptlot piikna' ki ruhtan avah mdothlowi tidit adodehna' raan,” Mma ngi kyeng kcha' mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, ikerdel, a'iina' akyul rang ngi, a'inn thah isun cha',” dida.
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi mmaan dodeh ngi kerdelda ungta mma ngi mi'iina' kyulda ungta Isowr kponlor rih mi'inn thah sun chda.
Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngakyou chlamda, ungta Isowr ponlor chlamda ungta mninginqi chda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih tuniyu dow ktlei liklik ndeh chaak inna,” dilamda.
Hava'le' dilli Mma ngi vangthuwkda ungta mmiing Levi mdodit sumkqhai miikhat avah sum tqhaina'inn thung ngi kok'ong daat deida. Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowi,” dida.
Ungta mma ngi dow mkheng mapthida ungta ripda Mma'dil qowi chda.
Audilli Levi ngi mma' mdak inn thung ngi tmaalna' klin khat avah Mma' thenni porthlong chda. Ungta ava' thung ngi sumkqhai rekle' morson rek knempok avah mmaan tu' ko'ongsap lamda.
Pdainu mmaan ki nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki Mma' sikhu rek kepteng ngi nurnur kdi ngi hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi naan nih sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek tung ngi adochaak adoneeksap inno?”
Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaang lamda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kdam mih rekki thenvah riipu a msit ka'am pemeh pdainu kkowi rekki thennu msit ka'am.
Neiya mrinkindit dok rek ko'own rah kurjung pmaang pdainu plung tperthlenna' thung ngi pnu kervei rek ko'own rah kurjung ping,” dida.

Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Johon sikhu rekvah kdet kmah then ngowl lamda ungta rinktham chlamda ungta Pharisy rekki sikhu rek rukku anto' tlow lamda pdainu taluleiyi, Nang asikhu rekka mdochaak mdoneek tlit inno?”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Kmoukpu plap rek avah, mmaan hinni Mma' ma'am daat arlaan nih then pngowl pchaang naandih?
Pdainu Kmoukpu avah mmaan hinki mdolow pthina' nit karvang rah, audilrow ngi mmaan nih nit rek ava' thung ngi then kngowlrow lamrah.”

Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni pauportol khat tih hanto'theda: “Kuwkhat leh ngi buwren thungki mlaak louda buwpli 'leenni lot kchok meh, mditma bih ren ava ngi kekqetkrep rah ungta ren thungki mlaakren tolow ava ngi mlaakplii avah mdokorlot pemeh.

Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel pli thung ngi daal kchok meh mditma bih thowldii ren ava ngi saavun thowldiibeel avah kpelqet rah ungta thowldii avah kyaan chrah ungta saavun thowldiibeel avah kartlai chrah.
Pdainu thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel ren thung ngi tadaal rah, mdit bih, mikniing ngi karkhaal rah.
Ungta thowldii pli knee dok ksa kuwkhat leh ngi m'tunkat daat tih thowldii ren tneek rah ngei nimeh. Mleiya, Pli ava ngi mikdibet, mdodit.”
'Tunnu mkhatna' dilli miknitna' tkarngatnit tih hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi loulai kthleng ngi chetda. Ungta Msikhu rekki chapaar avah yau lamda ungta mapya thuwn nih knuwr lamda cha lamda.
Ungta Pharisy aangqhe rekki mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi naan nih, nowlam mih tkarngatnit tih totlot krow kma' avah adotlot inno?”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan karthaang ngi hanto'theda: “David mdakkat tih ungta mma' tu' kilqhi mmaan rek ava ngi mpowiyin mtham thung ngi talu mtlotin tidit avah naan nih parcham vot maan timow?

Mma ngi taluhep pih Isowr inn thuh luwtda ungta tetdet thenpen ava' louda ungta mchaak ungta mma ngi mma' tu' kilqhi rek mmaan hin rukku avah mpiiklam mow? Thenpen avah thimpu rek kma'don mii morson khatleh ngi mdochaak krow pemeh.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii Chapa avah Tkarngatnit ki Kruwng rukka Mma'.”
'Tunnu Tkarngatnit ktlei khat thung ngi hanto ngi thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi luwtda ungta purchuk lamda. Ungta mmun ava' thung ngi machang ki mkhut kqong kcha' miikhat amda.
Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki Mma' kepteng ngi mraal mdotepmenna' raan ki thenni, tidit tah Mma ngi Tkarngatnit tih pdam mow, pdam nimeh tidit leiyi, kmin nih sutpqowi lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi muplungbin rekin ava' deithida mkhut paang khat kqong kcha' mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Ikerdel rang ngi hava' mningqim inni irip.” Ungta mma ngi kerdelda ungta ripda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih dow khat ayukheel inni: ‘Tkarngatnit tih kqha totlot ava' mow, kthi totlotto', mditmata rinkum tsan mow te'ekreo nowlam dorot tah?’ ”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan mkheng avah sutporloijik lam thida mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Akhut arji,” dida. Ungta mma ngi anto'tlowda, ungta mkhut avah mpaang khat ki heppi pumqhat qha chda.
Pdainu mmaan nah kmok chlamda ungta mmaan nih Jisu 'leenni talu totlot rang tidit leiyi, khat le' khat kerseel lamda.
'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah Mma ngi lown thah rinkaktham chrah chetda ungta Mma ngi jaan khat tih Isowr hinni rinktham chda.
Ungta khu mvaar thungta Mma ngi Mhin nih Msikhu rek avah own chlamda ungta mmaan thungki Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah kchol lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah tamsi rek dilamda.
Mmaan avah Mma ngi Pitar mdodit Simon ungta mnaupa Andria, James le' Johon, Philip le' Bartholomio.
Metthiu le' Thomas, Alphius chapa James le' Jealot mdoditin Simon,
James chapa Judah ungta mikyur kurthuwk kcha' Kerioth ki Judas.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' arjungsap lamda mmun kponjowl khat thung ngi Mma' sikhu rektu' miilop khat le' miiloppii khat tung ngi rip lamda. Ungta mmaan avah Judia paamkuwl mkheng thungki ungta Jerusalem ki ungta duwmpii biingki Tair le' Sidon paam rek thungki ngi Mma' karja chrah ungta mmaan mmaan ki mo'omlai rekin thungki mdopdam chaak lamna' rah kthleng lam.
Ungta tarnam ktobor rekki mdo'owr chaak rek rukka kthleng lam ungta mmaan avah dam chlamda.
Ungta miiloppii mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah kekmei chrang ngi thlaam lamda mleiya Mma' thungki ruhtan avah thuwkda ungta mmaan mkheng avah pdam lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmik phelda Msikhu rek ktong thah suwthida hanto'theda: “Srah rek naanna asuwkin kqha, Tidit tah Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan athen.
'Tun powiktham dolow rek naan avah asuwkin kqha, Tidit tah naanna apowiyin kappaa rah. 'Tun kqap rek naanna asuwkin kqha, Tidit tah naanna pni chnaandi'.
Mleiya Mii Chapa ava'leiyi, Mii rekki atahal chaakin thuh, ateknen pthiin thuh, Ungta ningkya atpiikin thuh ungta amiingin pthitda atvar pthiin thuh, Naanna asuwkin kqha.

Naan nih nit ava' thuh ikanpa chaan ungta akanpat inni ikonchowm chaan. Mleiya dakat tih naan anongqhat'lotin avah parvaan thah klin nih ka'am. Mleiya mmaan nah mpa'leen rukku khulpu rek avah anto'jik ki mdoptlotin.
Pdainu svang rek naan a'leennu suwthitna' ka'am a, Mleiya naan nih naanki plung ngamna' avah ado'arlaan chaak dokin.
Mpowi kpa dok kcha' rek naan a'leen nih, suwthitna' ka'am a, Mleiya naanna apowiyin ktham rah. 'Tun kipni kcha' rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naanna archam louda qap chnaandi'.
Mii mkheng ngi naan adangin mapqhatin thung ngi Naanna asuwkin kthi kcha' a. Mleiya mpa'leen rukku khulpu dakkma' rek hinni anto'jik ki mdangin mdopqhatin.
Pdainu hava' karja kcha' rek naan ahinin nih kthe a. Amiihal rekin avah von'apsatin ungta aksunum kma' mma' ava' hinni kqha atlow cha'.
Pauhor akbuk rek avah suwqhat apii chaan ungta akipthit rekin ki thenni rin'iktham piikin.
Abiing paang khat thah aktpeeng mma' hinni mpaang khat ruk adowipiik. Ungta abuwdiir klou dok kcha' mma' hinni aphrikklum mdolow chaak rang kpha rukka thlotma'.
Akqhil kcha' mii khimkhei rek hinni apii cha' ungta ado'ana rek klou dok kcha' mma' hinki avah veikhat qhil perheelma'.
Ungta mii rekki ahinin nih mdotlot raan adongeiyin heppi naan rukku mmaan hinni atlown.
Pdainu naan nih vonsat aklow kcha' rekin daat alown nuh, ava ngi naan athenni talu tpanpaakna' ka'am a? Mleiya pnu kervei kcha' rek kpha rukku mmaan vonsat klow kcha' rek avah vonsat mdolow chaakin.

Ungta naan nih ahinin nih kqha ktlow kcha' rek mmaan hindaat tih kqha atlot chaak innu ava ngi naan athen inni talu tpanpaakna' ka'am a? Mleiya pnu kervei kcha' rek kpha rukku ava' hepjik ki mdotlotin.

Ungta naan nih arlaang perheel nikaandi' tidit ki plungbinpsuk adothlowi naan rek hindaat tih apthow chaak innu, ava ngi naan athen inni talu tpanpaakna' ka'am a? Mleiya pnu kervei kcha' rek kpha rukku pnu kervei rek hinni mdopiikinya knem mih mdo'arlaan perheelna' raan ki thennu mdopiikin.

Pdainu naan nih amiihal rekin avah vonsat alow chaan, kqha atlow chaan ungta kerheel rah tidit ki plungbinpsuk khat le' ktaak ki apthow chaan, mdit bih naan anongqhat'lotin avah klin rah ungta naanna Kparthaangsi ava' nau rek kurthuwk chnaandi'. Mleiya Mmah kpanpaak dei kma' rekle' kqha kma' avale' hinni muplung knei.
Avaleiyi, A'paan plungnee heppi naan rukka plung knei ikurthuwkin.
Mii 'leenni pau pinditmaan ungta mii rukku a'leenin nih pau pindit nimeh. Mii psulmaan ungta mii rukku apsulin nimeh. Mii aptlotpiikin ungta naan rukka akoptlotpiik raan.

Apiin, ungta naan ahin nih avah akpii raan. Kqha ngi tpertet, tyuknam ungta totnol deek ungta kepleet tih a'aang inni akoptlon piik raan. Mleiya naan nih adopertet naankat ava ngi naan ahinin rukku apertet perheel raan.”
Ungta Mma ngi pauportol khat mmaan hinni theda: “Mmikktot tih mmikktot tah kqhi pchaang rang mow? Mmaanve avah mikniing inni khor thuh tla chlam nimeh mow?
Sikhu khat avah mma' chukpu ava' karthak ki pemeh pdainu kurkhum deek ki kurchuk cha' mii khimkhei avah mma' chukpu ava' hep daat rah.
Ungta taluleiyi amikin thungki siktu ka'am ava' kdei kma'pa ngi a'uanau rek mik thungki ktobor avah adosutto?

Mditmata nang amik thungki siktu ka'am ava' adak ki kdei kma'pa ngi taluhep pih, nang ngi, ‘ku'uknau, amik thungki ktobor avah ayulow piik nih’, dida, a'uanau hinni the pchaang nadio? Kqha kpurhuwi kcha' nang! Rukrirep pih nang adak ki amik thungki siktu avah aloupthi ungta audilrow ngi a'uanau rek mik thungki ktobor tolowpthi rang avah kindit chel lih deirownadi'.
Mleiya dingbul kqha khat ava ngi mchei kqha kma' kcheilu pemeh ungta dingbul kqhakmah ngi mchei kqha ruk kcheilu pemeh.
Mleiya dingbul khimkhei avah mchei ava ngi tedehpinditlu. Mleiya mii rekki liingkhu 'leenki kduwt yau kchok lammeh mditmata turmuw tirling 'leenki riithlum chei yau kchok lammeh.

Kqha miikhat ava ngi muplungril thung ngi kqha mdo'arkhiik thungki kqha ava' mdopthuh ungta kqha kma' mii ava' rukku muplungril thungki kqha kma' mdo'arkhiik thungki kqha kma' ava' mdopthuh. Mleiya muplungril thung ngi kepleet tih ka'am ava' thung ki ngi mnehr rih avah mdothe.
Pdainu naan nih taluleiyi kdothe ava' ktlow liit kma'pa vah ‘Kruwng, Kruwng, adotiditin?
Kuwku yoso, kihin nih thlengda ungta Neiyi kdothe rek ava' karja kcha' mma' avah kuw kduh tidit avah Neiyi ayupdehn nih.

Mma' avah ktlum mih khorda lung 'leenni innmun prip thida inn ksa kcha' mii ava' hep daat. Ungta dii linda ungta dii kluwng ava ngi inn avah kdung ngi deengda pdainu avah tapna pchaang meh. Mleiya inn avah lung 'leenni mdopri chaak dok.

Pdainu tarjaakka arja thida dow khatleh ktlow kma' mma' avah mi'innmun ktaak ki dulti 'leenni inn ksa kcha' ava' hep daat. Dii kluwng ava ngi kdung ngi inn ava' 'leenni deengda ungta avah kbeisek ki tluw chda. Ungta ava' inn ava' kenvei chaak avah kdung ngi mmeel kthi ngi kenvei chda.”
'Tunnu Mma ngi miipiipa rek do'arjaak ki mpauna' mkheng ava' mqut dilli, Mma ngi korlouda Kapernaum thuh luwtda.
Ungta raalmii arja khat kpupa khat suwk, mukpupa nungditsi avah kowida ungta kdiyou chrah theda.
Hanto ngi mma ngi Jisu ki mlei marjaak thungta mma ngi Jisu ngi arvalap donni msuwk avah mdopdam piikna' rang ki thenni Jihudi rekki kver rek avah Mhin nih kupnuwm chrah heipthla lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Jisu hinni merheitlun dokin thungta mmaan nih plung kluwt tih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava' hinni havah adotlotpiik ki mtik kcha.
Mleiya mma ngi neen kchaatin avah vonsat mlow chaanda ungta kthen inni sinegog khat msakpiik inda,” dilamda Mhin nih ktham chlamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan tu' vasap lamda. Ungta Mma ngi inn ava' thung ki klapa kmah ngi mehei meek arlaan nih, raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi Mhin nih maplap rek arheipthlada hanto ngi theda: “Kruwng athina kparja'own chma', tidit tah neiya ki'inn thuh Nang akupluwt chrah mtik kcha pmaang.
Nei kdak ruh Nah ahin nih kthleng rah mtik kcha kmah ngi kkirbin leiyi, karva pmaang. Pdainu pau hehe daat tih mheithe piik chdaat mdit bih ksuwk avah kdam chrah.

Mleiya nei rukka ruhtanna' ksin nih ka'am kcha' miikhat ping ungta nei kkur duh ngi raalmii rek kdothlowi lam. Ungta neiyi khat hinni ‘Vah’ kdit cheu kvah ungta morson khat hinni ‘Arvang’ kdit cheu karvang ungta ksuwk hinni ‘Hava' atlow’ kdit cheu, mma ngi avah mdotlot chaak,” dida.

Jisu ngi hava' dow rek ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi mma' leiyi, ngakda ungta Mma ngi kerheelda ungta Mma' dilkqowi miipiipa rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a hanto'hep daat tih mlamrin klin avah Neiyi Isreel mii rek hin kpha rukku ka'am deimaang!”
Ungta mdoheipthlat rek mmaan ava ngi inn ava' thung ngi mvan kerheelin thungta suwk kkowi avah kdam kcha ngi dei lamda.
'Tunnu hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah mupduknii ngi Mma ngi Nain mdodit khuwpii khat thah chetda ungta Msikhu knempok rekle' miipii knempa rek rukka Mma' tu' chetsap lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi khuwpii ava' paltong mheiphaak thungta asuwn, kdiyou miikhat avah vankdom meeksli lamda. Ungta mma' avah mnuh meikhunu chapa mkhatchlet ava'. Ungta khuwpii ava' thung ki miiloppii khat avah mma' tu' ka'amsap daat lam.
Kruwng ngi mma' mdeh thungta Mma ngi meikhunu avah plung pkham chda ungta mhin nih: “Qapma',” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi arvada ungta kdiyou kluwng avah kmeida ungta mma' kokdom rek avah rip lamda. Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kseetnau, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, ‘Ikerdel.’”
Ungta kdiyou kcha' mma' ava ngi ko'ongda ungta tpau rah pqhunda ungta Jisu ngi mma' avah mnuh hinni parlaan chda.

Audilli mii mkheng rek hinni ningqitna' thuwkda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda Isowr ponlor chlamda. “Neen narlak inni khulpu klin khat mitupthuh piik inna, ungta Isowr rih Mma' mii rek avah mvel chaak lam a,” dilamda.
Ungta hava' Mma' leiki pauson avah Judia paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi ungta ava' kloiyi ka'am paamklek rek mkheng thung ngi koryou chda.
Audilli Johon sikhu rekki hava' dow mkheng reklei avah mhin nih vansong lamda.

Ungta Johon nih mhin nih msikhu 'knii rek avah own lam thida mmaanve avah hanto'theda, Jisu hinni heipthla lamda: “Nang nga kurjung rang Khat ava' ptimow, mditmata neen nih morson khat sutthlaam nikaandi o?” dida.

'Tunnu mmaanve ava ngi Mhin nih valamda ungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Dii kupluwt Johon nih neenna hanto ngi theda, mdotapthlatin. ‘Mleiya Nang nga kurjung rang Khat ava' ptimow, mditmata neen nih morson khat sutthlaam nikaandi o?’ dida. ”

Ungta mpha ava'kat thung ngi Mma ngi mii knempok rek avah mmaan ki mo'omlai rekin thungki, mdun msaannaan thungki ungta tarnam kqha kma' rek thungki pdam chlamda ungta mmikktot knempok rek avah Mma ngi mmikin paharpiik chlamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih vangin rang ngi Johon hinni: ‘Amikin nih adodeh rekin ungta ado'arjaak rekin dow rek avah vansongin. Mleiya mmikktot rekki khudei chlamda, mkhuh kyeng rekki chet chlamda, raichi ktong kcha' rekki kertleu chlamda, knakbeeng rekki khu arja chlamda, kdiyou kcha' ava' kerdelda, ungta srah rek hinni kqhapaumin avah karjaamda.
Ungta Nei kleiyi khuhsiir kpirthi kcha' kma' mma' avah msuwkqha a,’ ” dida.

Ungta Johon pausikhu rek msun dokin thungta Mma ngi miiloppii ava' hinni Johon leiyi, tpau pqhunda: “Naan nih paamkbiik lai thah talulu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Tirthli ngi mdoknow piipe ksuw rah kchet inpti?

Pdainu naan nih talulu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Naan nih buwdiir kperneem mih korthlong miikhat ksuw rah kchet inpti? Dakat tih svangpulraang ngi korthlong ungta kenthle kparnaak ki ka'am kcha' rek avah paamkruwng rek inn thuh ka'am lam.
Pdainu naan nih talulu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Khulpu khat mow? Ou, Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a ungta avah khulpu khat kekheel ava' ksuw rah kchet inptih.
Mleiya havah mma' leiyi, hanto ngi mdokjit dok mma' ava': ‘Asuw, Neiyi Adusuk thah Nei kpausikhu khat avah kapthlat a. Mma ngi Nang a'lam avah akporthlon piik rah,’ mdodit. (Mal. 3:1)

Mleiya Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Snu rekki mdopluk rekin arlak ki dii kupluwt Johon han'tun nih klin khulpu morson ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi kdil mma' avah mma' hinni klin.’ ”
Ungta mii mkheng ngi, sumkqhai rek kpha rukku Mma' pauthe marjaak chaakin thungta, mmaan nih Johon diipluwna' thung ngi dii mluw chaakin leiyi, Isowr rah kindit tidit pandang chlamda.
Pdainu Pharisy rekki, nowlam kdei rekki, Johon diipluwna' thung ngi mluwmaan ava ngi Isowr plungbin avah mthen inni pthlei chlamda.
Ungta Kruwng ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Neiyi hava' 'tunpha ki suruwl avah talu tu' portol lam nikdi' ungta mmaan nah talu mdut inna?

Mmaan avah kyurkren mun thung ngi ko'ongda khat le' khat kor'ownda ka'am nau rek hep daat lam. Mmaan nih hanto ngi the lamda: ‘Neen nih, naan athen inni spirthiil 'dumin nuh, Ungta naanna kardaam maanti'. Neen nih naan ahinin nih archam lou innu, Ungta naanna qap maantih.’
Mleiya dii kupluwt Johon ava ngi thendam ruk kcha kma' ungta thowldii ruk knee kmah ngi thlengda ungta naan nih, ‘Mmah tarnampii mthlowi a,’ diin tinu.

Ungta Mii Chapa ava ngi thlengda tchaak ruk chada ungta tneek ruk needa ungta naan nih hanto' theen tinu: ‘Asuwn, mpowibuwr kparja miikhat ungta thowldiibuwr, sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek plap, diin tinu.’
Pdainu luwkinritna' avah kindit tidit tih mnau le' mkheng ngi mdopandan chaak.”
Audilli Pharisy rek arlak ki khat tih Mma' avah kmaalqhi chrang ngi own chda. Ungta Mma ngi Pharisy ava' inn thung ngi luwtda ungta kmaal rang ngi ko'ongda.

Ungta asuwn, khuwpii ava' thung ki pnu kervei kcha' snu khat ava ngi Jisu a Pharisy ava' inn thung ngi kmaal rang ngi khaan 'leenni ko'ongda ka'am a tidit marjaak thungta mma ngi mikrimkdih reidii, alabaster lung khuwng khat sinda ava' thung ngi thlengda.

Ungta mma ngi Mma' khuhther rih mdilpang thah ripda ungta qapda ungta mma ngi mirthli ngi Mkhuh avah tulqhut pqhunda ungta mluw chai 'leenki msam ava ngi avah knuwlda ungta mma ngi Mma' khuh rek avah put chda ungta mikrimkdih reidii ava ngi Mkhuh avah pubul chda.

'Tunnu Mma' ko'own kcha' Pharisy ava ngi hava' mdeh thungta mma ngi mdak mthina thung ngi hanto ngi theda: “Hava' mii ava ngi khulpu khat mkurthuh bih, Mma' kthowng snu avah taluhep kduh ki mii tidit avah kdei rah, tidit tah mma' avah pnu kervei kcha' khat.”
Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Simon, Neiyi ahin nih kdothe rah dow mruk ka'am a.” Ungta mma ngi, ‘chukpu atheu,’ dida.
“Mpha khat thung ngi mii'knii rek hinni sumkopthow miikhat amda. Miikhat tih denarii arja parnga lei arveida ungta morson khat ava ngi somparnga arveida.

Ungta mmaanve ngi mdopiik perheelna' raan dow khatleh mthlowi maan thungta mma ngi mikniing inni mkhon ktaak ki mleituwlin avah ptlotpiik lamda. Avaleiyi, 'tunnu athe o, mmaanve 'knii thungki kuw ngi mma' avah vonsat klowbet lam rang ngoh?”
Simon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya mma ngi knembet tih mdoptlot piik ava' rah kbinna.” Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi kinditjik ki apindit a,” dida.

Audilli Mma ngi snu ava' hinni kerheel thida Simon hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi snu havah adeh a? Neiyi nang a'inn thung ngi thleng nuh, nang ngi kukhuh kdo'alqhutna' rah dii mpii mtih, pdainu hava' mma' ava ngi mirthli rekki kukhuh avah alqhuhda ungta mluw 'leenki msam mih avah knuwlda.
Nang ngi Neiya mput mtih pdainu snu hava ngi inn thuh karvanluw daat ki kukhuh mdoput avah 'tun kpha thuh down liit meh.
Nang ngi kluw avah reidii mpubulpiik mtih pdainu snu hava ngi kukhuh avah mikrimkdih reidii ngi mtulqhut piik a.
Avaleiyi, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, mma ngi kdung ngi vonsat mdotolow leiyi, mma' pnu knempa rek avah koptlotpiik dok a. Pdainu mruk daat toptlot piik mma' ava ngi mruk daat vonsat mdolow.”
Ungta Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang apnu arve rek avah atoptlot piik dok a.”
Ungta Mma' tu' khaan thung ngi kok'ongsap rek ava ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi tkerthe pqhun lamda: “Hava' pnu rek kpha rukka koptlotpiik pchaang Mma' avah kuw daatda,” dilamda?
Audilli Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto ngi theda: “Alamrin chaak ki nang nga atsan chaak dok a, plung kdaiyi isun cha',” dida.

'Tunnu hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah ava' dilli Jisu ngi khuwpii ungta khuw khimkhei thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda kqhapaumin avah parjaam chda ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki kqhapauna avah horpiik chlamda. Ungta sowm lei'knii rek avah Mma' tu' ka'amsap daat lam.
Ungta snu khat mo'omlai rek ungta tarnam kqha kma' rek thungki mdopdam, mmiing Magdala ki Mary mdodit, mma' thungki tarnam chai tikhiutet rek thuhdokna' avale'.
Herod suwkkenreel Chuja nuwn Joanna ungta Susanna ungta morson snu knempok rekki mmaan mmaan ki mdothlowi chaakin ava ngi Jisu a bom chlamda.
Ungta miiloppii klin khat le' morson rek, khuwpii khimkhei thungki kthleng rek mmaan ava ngi Mhin nih mkurku dok chaakin thungta Mma ngi pauportol khat tih hanto ngi theda:

“Chiimuw kapqau miikhat tih mchiimuw kapqau rah chetda. Ungta mma ngi anto ngi mapqau thungta, aangqhe rek avah 'lamsiir thah tlada, ungta avah tetherkre ngi am chda ungta parvaan laiki pva rekki avah chom chlamda.
Ungta aangqhe rekki lung 'leenni tla chda ungta ava ngi mahanmown daat le' avah purvuwi chda mleiya mdulti avah kchor pemeh.
Ungta aangqhe rekki tirling rek arlak ki tla chda ungta tirling ava ngi chiimuw ava' tu' mowngsap lamda ungta tirling ava ngi avah kchipkrepda.

Pdainu aangqhe rekka duldak thung ngi tlada ungta ava ngi mowngda ungta mpaar avah tum arja khat pthuwkda.” Ungta Mma ngi hava'le' mthe dok thungta Mma ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.”
Audilli Msikhu rekki hanto' the lamda Mhin nih kheel chlamda: “Hava' pauportol avah talu mdothena?” dilamda.

Ungta Mma ngi hanto ngi theda: “Naan ahinnu havah Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki paukordowl ava' tedeh pinditna' rah mdopiik dok pdainu mqhe rek hinvah havah: ‘Mmaan nih mmikin nih deilam yoso mdodeh pchukmana' raan, Ungta arja lam yoso mdodeh pinditmana' raan ki thenni’ pauportol rekki mdopiik. (Is. 6:9)
'Tunnu pauportol avah hava'. Chiimuw avah Isowr pauna ava'.

'Lamsiir ki rek ava ngi, karja kcha' rek mmaan ava' pdainu mmaan nih marjaak chaakin dilli, tarnampii ava ngi arvada muplungril rekin thungki pauna avah mdolow chaak, mditma bih mmaan nih lam'rin chlamdon ungta karsan dok chlam rah.

Pdainu lung 'leenki rek mmaan avah, pauna avah marjaakin thung ngu kanpa ngi karlaang kcha' rek ava' ungta hava'le' avah murjungin ktaak, mpha mruk ki thenni lamkrin kcha' ungta kepthleem marvan ki mpha thung ngi ktluw kcha' rek ava' lam.

Ungta tirling rek arlak ki ktla kcha' rek mmaan avah, pauna ava' marjaak dokin dilli vangkthuwk chda ungta tkilrinna' rek, svang tuthuhna' rek ungta rinkum ki plung ngamna' rekki mdokchikre ungta mchei kaptang pchaang kma' rek mmaan ava'.
Pdainu duldak thung ngi ktla rek mmaan avah, pauna ava plung kluwt tih ungta plung kindit tih karja kcha' ungta kirkhi kcha' ungta tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mchei kepchei kcha' rek mmaan ava'.

Kuwkhat leh ngi meila avah meplen dok dilli arkuw khat tih khum kchok meh mditmata kowm tii thah thipthi meh. Pdainu arvang kluwt rek ava ngi mar'aang ava' mdodehna' rah meilakuwng 'leenni meila avah mdothiiklu.
Mleiya kandang kmah ngi, kordowl tlit tih ka'am chdaat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Mditmata tedeh liitma rah ungta mar'aang thuh kthuwk liit kmah ngi kordowl tlit daat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.

Avaleiyi, naan nih taluhep pih arjaak inna tidit leiyi, ikilrin chaan. Mleiya kuwku yoso kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni kpiikpom rah ungta kuwku yoso kthlowi kma' mma' avah mma ngi kthlowi heppi mkarjaak ava' kpha thungki rukka, mma' hinki kloupthi rah.”
Audilli Mnuh le' mnaupa rek avah Mhin nih thleng lamda, pdainu miipiipa rek leiyi, mmaan nih Mma' avah pha pchaang lam mda.
Ungta hanto ngi kthe mii aangqhe ngi Mhin nih avah song lamda: “Nang anuh le' anaupa rekki Nang nga adeinuwm lamda, duwn thah krip daat lam a.”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Nei knuh le' ungta ku'uknau rek avah, Isowr pauna karja kcha' rek ungta ava' ktlow kcha' rek hava'le' ava'.”

'Tunnu niikhat tih hanto ngi thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi Msikhu rektu' arkuwng khat thung ngi kalda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen neen nih duwmpii raalpha khat thah vaanche,” dida. Ungta mmaan nih anto ngi vangkorlou lamda.
Pdainu anto ngi mheithah meekin arlaan nih Mmah iip chda. Ungta tchangkhu avah duwmpii thung ngi arjukraangda ungta murkuw ngin avah diiluwtda ungta tidina' thung ngi am chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah vanpha lamda ungta perdel lam thida Mhin nih hanto ngi the lamda: “Mukpu, Mukpu, neenna kenvei chrah ktheen a!” dilamda. Audilli Mma ngi kerdelda tirthli avale' diinuk avah raida ungta avale' avah dai chda mthungta ava' thuh kdairimsi khat amda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tva' thungda alamrin inna?” Ungta mmaan nah mningin qida ungta ngak lamda khat le' khat hinni hanto ngi kerthe lamda: “Hava' mii avah kuw rang nga? Mleiya Mma ngi tirthli le' dii kpha rukka paupiik pii lamda ungta mmaan ava' rukku Mma' dothe mdopqowi inna!” dilamda.
Audilli mmaan nih Galily tu' raal kerdeen Gadara mii rek khuwpaam khat thah heithap lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi laan thah mkal mheikhiin daatle' mpha rowiksowt tih tarnam rekki mdoqhiin, khuwpii ava' thung ki miikhat avah Mma ngi kurdutqhida. Ungta mma' avah dona kna pemeh ungta inn thung rukku ka'am pemeh pdainu thlaan rek thung ngi ka'am kcha'.

Mma' ava ngi Jisu mdeh thungta owngda ungta Mma' aang ngi tlu chda ungta krowl kparthaang ngi hanto'theda: “Kparthaangsi Isowr Chapa Jisu, neiyi Nang tu' talu kdotlot rah ka'am plih? Neiyi ahin nih akqhil chaak a, neiya suwk mupthuwk chma'.”

Mleiya Mma ngi tarnam ktobor ava' hinni mii ava' thung ki marvan thuhna' rah paupiik mdopiik dok. Mleiya ava ngi mma' avah kyowng tlit kchokda ungta mma' avah rung lamda ungta thiirrii le' mkhuh 'leenni chungkamke pkeh lamda mdobowlin pdainu mma ngi thiirrii ngi mdobowlin avah kpotda ungta mma' avah ram ava ngi paamkbiik lai thah mdoqhi dok kcho.
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto ngi theda kheelda: “Nang amiing nga talu?” Ungta mma ngi, ‘Legion,’ dida arthaangda, mleiya mma' thung ngi tarnam knempok kluwt dok.
Ungta mmaan ava ngi Mma' hinni, Mma ngi mmaan avah mdonna' ktaak khor thung ngi mchena' raan ki thenni paupiik mdopiik mana' raan ktham chlamda.

'Tunnu lown ava' thung ngi vakluwng knempok khat avah maal daat lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih vak rek thung ngi mluw chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi mdorot piik lamna' rah ktham chlamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah rotpiik lamda.

Audilli tarnam rek ava ngi mii ava' thung ki thuwk lamda ungta vak rek thung ngi luwt chlamda. Mthungta vak rek avah kaptrak lamda, khamkuwk thah chen lamda duwmpii thung ngi tla lamda ungta dii ngi lou chlamda.
Vak kapmaal rek ava ngi kthuwk dow ava' mdehn thungta mmaan nih chen chlam thida khuwpii ava' thuh ungta khuwpaam ava' thuh pau avah song lamda.

Audilli mmaan nih kthuwk dow ava' ksuw rah chet lamda ungta Jisu hinni va lamda. Mthungta mmaan nih, mthung ki tarnam rek sundokna' mii avah Jisu khuhther rih ko'ongda, dona nada ungta plung kindit tih ka'am daat dei lamda, ungta mmaan nah mninginqi chda.
Ungta mmikin nih kdei rek mmaan ava' rukku ram kervei mii ava ngi taluhep kat tih kdam tidit avah mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.

Audilli Gadara kloiyi ka'am paamkuwl thungki miiloppii mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah mmaan hinki msundokna' rah kheel chlamda mleiya mmaan nah ningqitna' klin khat thung ngi kekmen kcha'lam. Ungta Mma ngi arkuwng thung ngi kalda anto ngi vangkerheel chda.
'Tunnu mthung ki tarnam rek sundokna' mii ava ngi mma' rukka Mma' tu' mkilqhi chaakna' rah ktham chda. Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto ngi theda psun pthida.

“Nang nga a'inn thah vangkerheel rang ngi Isowr rih athenni nong klin adottlot piik avah vansong.” Ungta mma ngi anto ngi vangda khuwpii mpumpum thung ngi kirkhil lih, Jisu ngi mma' thenni nong klin mdotlot piik avah purphuwng chda.
'Tunnu Jisu ngi mvan kerheel thungta miipii rekki Mma' avah arlaang chlamda, tidit tah mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mdo'ardat chaakin.
Ungta asuwn mmiing Jairas mdodit miikhat thlengda ungta mma' avah sinegog ava' kpupa. Ungta mma ngi Jisu khuhther rih tlu chda ungta Mma ngi mi'inn thah merheina' rah ktham chda.
Mleiya mma ngi kum sowm lei'knii arveel ki rah mchanu khat mdothlowi ungta mma' avah kdiyou rah theda. Ungta Mma ngi anto ngi mehei thungta miipii rek ava ngi Mma' avah per'del lamda.

'Tunnu kum sowm lei'knii thung ngi hii ngi kyaan kcha' snu khat avah ava' thuh ka'am daat. Ungta mma ngi mdothlowi chaak mkheng avah riipu rek 'leenni ptlang chda pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi mma' avah pdam pchaang mda.
Snu ava ngi mdilpang ktong thah arvangda Mma' buwdiir mowr avah kmei chda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mihii kyaan meek avah kankhaam chda.

Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Kuwda mokthowng nga?” dida. Mii mkheng ngi mmat thungta Pitar rih ungta mma' tu' ka'am rek ava ngi hanto' the lamda: “Mukpu, miipiipa rekki aper'del lamda adotikchi lam ungta Nang ngi, ‘Kuwda mokthowng nga,’ adodit tah?”
Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto ngi theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih Neiya mdotthown mleiya Neiyi Nei kthung ki ruhtan kthuwk dok ava' kdo'arjaak,” dida.

'Tunnu snu ava ngi mmah kordowl pchaang rang maang tidit mkerdeh thungta mma ngi mkunchuwn chunni arvada ungta Mma' aang ngi tlu chda ungta mma ngi mii mkheng avale' maiyi mma ngi Mma' mdothownna' ki mlei, ungta mma ngi m'tunkat daat tih taluhep pih kdam ping tidit avah Mhin nih purphuwng chda.
Ungta Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kchanu aningpqitma' alamrin nih nang nga atapdam chaak a. Plung kdaiyi isun cha'.”
Ungta Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih sinegog kpupa inn ki miikhat thlengda mhin nih hanto ngi theda: “Achanu avah kdiyou dok kcha' a Chukpu a tapya ktlow kma',” dida.
Pdainu Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi mma' avah hanto ngi theda, arthaangda: “Aning pqitma', lam hehe arincha' achanu a kqha chdaat rah.”
Ungta Mma ngi inn ava' thung ngi mthlen thungta Mma ngi Pitar le' James ungta Johon ungta snunau ava' nuh le'pa ava' kma'don kuw morson khatleh rukku mluw raan avah rotpiik lam mda.
'Tunnu mkheng inni qap lamda ungta mma' thenni archam lou lamda, pdainu Mma ngi hanto ngi theda: “Qapmaan mma' avah kdiyou pemeh pdainu ki'iip chngaal,” dida.
Ungta mmaan nih kdiyou dok kcha' tidit mdodehn leiyi, Mma' avah pni chaak lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin avah duwn thah pthuwk pthi lamda ungta Mma ngi snunau avah mkhut thah kyowng thida hanto'theda ownda: “Snunau'suwn, ikerdel,” dida.
Audilli mma' pthlarin avah kerheelda ungta m'tunkat daat tih kerdelda. Ungta Mma ngi snunau ava' hinni mdochaak rah dow mruk mdopiikna' raan paupiik pii lamda.
Ungta mnuh le' mpa avah ngakyou chlamda pdainu Mma ngi mmaanve hinni kthuwk dow ava'leiyi kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan paupiik pii lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu sowm lei'knii rek avah own purkuwk lamda ungta tarnam rek mkheng 'leenni ungta omlai rek tapdamna' ruhtan ungta ruhtanna' mkheng avah pii lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah Isowr kruwngpaalna' kparjaam rah ungta kkowi rek kapdam chrang ngi pthla lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih apjiin 'lamqowiyin ki thenni dow khatleh ruk hormaan, kchung ruk sinmaan, mditmata thowngya hormaan, mditmata thenpen hormaan, mditmata jiipowl ruk hormaan ungta phriktluwn 'knii karsak ki thlowi maan.
Ungta naan nih talutalu yoso aluwnaan inn ava' thung ngi asunduhn khimkheiyi ava' thuh i'am daatin.
Ungta kuwku yoso, naan akarlaang kma' rekin mmaan avah naan nih khuwpii ava' thung ki asunin thung ngi, mmaan 'leenni rinpaumin kurthuwk ki, akhuh arbaatin avah akqhot psukin.”
Mthungta mmaan nih anto ngi korlou lamda khuwklin rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chet lamda kqhapaumin avah parjaam chlamda ungta mmun ktai thung ngi pdam chlamda.

'Tunnu paamkuwl plii ki khat ki paamkpu Herod tih Mma ngi mdotlot dow mkheng avah arjada ungta mii aangqhe ngi Johon avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel nowl a mdoditin leiyi, mmah muplung karmak lik chda.
Ungta aangqhe ngi Elaijah kthuwk a ungta morson aangqhe ngi alraang ki khulpu rek arlak ki khat kthuwk nowl a, dilamda.
Ungta Herod vah hanto ngi theda: “Johon nah neiyi mluw kdoreen pthi dok pdainu neiyi hava' kdo'arjaak mii avah kuw rang ngoh?” dida. Ungta mma ngi Mma' avah mdodehna' rah thlaamda.

Ungta tamsi rek ava ngi mvan kerheel dokin thungta mmaan nih mdotlotin mkheng avah Mhin nih song chlamda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah qhi lamda msik inni ktliing ngi Bethsaida khuwpii thungki paamkbiik mmun khat thah cheqhi lamda.

Pdainu miipii rek ava ngi ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih Mma'dil qowi chlamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah arlaang chlamda ungta mmaan hinni Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mlei thepiik lamda ungta tadam chaakna' kngeen rek mmaan avah pdam chlamda.

'Tunnu kluhpha mve chaak thungta sowm lei'knii rek ava ngi thleng lamda ungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Miipii rek avah apsun dok lam, tidit tah mmaan nih kpervel lih ka'am khuw rekle' khuwpaam rek thung ngi chet lamso mprii chaakna' raan ungta thendam athlaam chlamso, mleiya hava' ta'amnaan mmun havah paamkbiik laiyi ta'amin,” dilamda.

Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih mdochaak raan dow mruk apii chaan,” dida. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih chetda hava' mii mkheng ki thenni thendam trenma donle, neen nih thenpen parnga le' tuwlvah 'knii kma'don morson thlowi maanmin,” dilamda.
Mleiya ava' thuh ka'am mii rek avah pun parnga arveel lam. Pdainu Mma ngi Msikhu rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rek avah mii somparnga nga ki loplop pih apkongin,” dida.
Ungta mmaan nih anto ngi tlow lamda ungta mmaan mkhengin avah topkong lamda.

Audilli Mma ngi thenpen parnga avale' tuwlvah 'knii avah louda ungta parvaan hansuwda ungta Mma ngi avah suwqhat piithida khuida ungta avale' avah miipii rek aang ngi todown piik laam rang ki thenni sikhu rek ava' hinni pii lamda.
Mthungta anto ngi mmaan mkheng inni avah cha lamda ungta mpowiyin paada ungta mmaan nih mdochaakdon rekin avah tomkal sowm lei'knii ngi chompurkuwk lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi mthina ngi rinmaktham chaak arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Mma' avah Msikhu rek ava ngi pha lamda ungta Mma ngi hanto ngi theda, kheel lamda: “Miiloppii rekvah Neiya kuwpi'ii mheitidit lam mow?” dida.

Mthungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Dii kupluwt Johon pi'ii, atidit lam, pdainu morson rekvah Elaijah ungta aangqhe rekki alraang ki khulpu rek arlak ki khat kerdel nowl a, mditin,” dilamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pdainu naanvah Neiya kuwpi'ii atidit inno?” dida. Pitar rih arthaangda ungta hanto ngi theda: “Nang nga Isowr ki Mesaiah ptih,” dida.
Ungta mmaan nih hava' avah kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan, Mma ngi mmaan avah kdung ngi pilqhit lamda ungta paupiik pii lamda.

Ungta hanto ngi theda: “Mii Chapa avah dow knempok 'leenni suwk mthuh chaak rang thah tlada ungta kver rekle' thimpu kenreel rekki ungta nowlam chukpu rekki kikthitna' lamrah ungta ke'eyou lamrah ungta Mma' avah mnii kdumna' nit tih kperdel rah,” dida.

Audilli Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih Neikdil toqowi rah mngei chaak cheentung ngi mma ngi mthina ikarmat chso, ungta mniiktaiyi mdaksa ki khros avah ahor chso ungta Neikdil aqowi chso.
Mleiya kuwku yoso mrinkum tsan chaak rah kngei kcha' khimkhei rekki mrinkumin avah kpenvei chrah pdainu kuwku yoso Nei kthen nih mrinkum kpenvei kcha' mma' ava ngi mrinkum avah ksan chrah.
Mleiya miikhat tih dultipaam avah mpumpum mih tang chyoso, mma' mdak mker'ekre chaakku mditmata mkenvei chaakku talu msit amna' ka'am a?

Mleiya kuwku yoso Nei kleiyi ungta Nei kpauna rek leiyi, ningkya korsowi kcha' mma' ava' hinni Mii Chapa ava ngi Mma' ki mkonlorna' le' Mpa konlorna' ungta kchiir vaantamsi rek konlorna' tu' murjun thung ngi mhin nih ningkya korsowi psuk rah.
Pdainu Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat kthe a. Mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' mmikin nih mdehduwn kpha ngi kdiyou kpertem liit kma' rah mii aangqhe avah hava' thuh krip daat lam a,” dida.
Ungta 'tunnu hava' mdothena' dilki, mnii trehtna' arveel lih hanto' thuwkda: Tidit tah Mma ngi Pitar le' Johon ungta James le'lim qhi lamda lown thah rinkaktham chrah chet lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi rinmaktham chaak thung ngi Mmai ruwngchen avah kerthlengda ungta Mma' buwdiir rek avah kpowldang ngi pleudangda.
Audilli asuwn, mii'knii ngi Mma' avah kirbiikqhi lamda, mmaanve avah Moses le' Elaijah lam.
Mmaanve ngi konlor dok ki kandang lamda ungta Mma ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thung ngi mdopurkhum bei rang, Mma' diyow chaakna' rang ki pau ava' the lamda.
Pdainu Pitar le' mma' tu' kilqhi rek mmaan avah iipdok chlamda ungta mmaan nih mkerdel dokin thungta mmaan nih Mma' konlorna' avale' Mma' tu' mii'knii krip daat rek konlorna' avah dei lamda.

Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' hinki msunin thungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Pitar rih Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Mukpu, neenna hava' thuh ta'am chaak ki kqha rah, ungta neen nih buw'inn kdum isaan cheh, khat tah Nang athen rah, khat tah Moses then rah ungta khat tah Elaijah then rah,” dida. Ungta Pitar rih mdothe avah talu tidit mdodeh pemeh.
Pitar rih hava' mthe meeksli arlaan nih armei khat arjunqumda mmaan avah pkhum dok lamda ungta mmaan nah armei thuh mluw dokin leiyi, mningin qida.
Audilli armei thungki ngi krowl khat arjuda hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kvonsat'low Kchapa, Mma' pauthe arja chaan!”

Ungta krowl ava' mtowdok thungta Jisu a mthina daat tih am chda. Pdainu mmaan nah rimkdi am chlamda ungta mpha mruk thung ngi mmaan nih mmikin nih mdodehn dow rek avah kuwkhat leh hinni thesi lam mda.
'Tunnu mupduknii ngi mmaan nih 'lown 'leenki murjunqumin thungta hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah miiloppii klinpa khat tih Mma' avah kurdutqhi lamda.
Ungta asuwn, miiloppii arlak ki miikhat tih owngda hanto ngi theda: “Chukpu, Ahin nih akaktham chaak a kchapa a mheisut piikcha', mleiya mma' avah kchapa mkhatchlet ava'.

Ungta mheisut piikcha', pthla khat tih mma' avah mdokyown ungta mma ngi tbinphaakmah ngi owngda ungta ava ngi mma' avah arngol tperveda ungta mnehr thah muhuwn tupqhutda ungta mma' avah tiplimda ungta kparsa dok ki mma' thungki kthuwk kchoklu.
Avaleiyi, Nah asikhu rek avah ava' kreipthi rang ki thenni ktham chlam nuh pdainu mmaan vah pchaang lam mda.”

Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto ngi theda: “O mlamrin ktaak ungta kpenher rih kchet suruwl rek naan, trek ksowt tih Neiya naan tu' am rangnu, ungta trek ksowt tih adiil raannu? Achapa avah hava' thuh arheiqhi,” dida.

Ungta mma ngi merhei meeksli arlaan nih tarnam ktobor rih mma' avah dul deenna'da ungta arngol tperveda. Audilli Jisu ngi tarnam ktobor avah raida, nau avah pdamda ungta mpa hinni nau avah pii perheelda.

Ungta mmaan mkheng inni Isowr ki ruhtanna' ava' 'leenni ngakyou chlamda. Pdainu mii mkheng ngi Jisu ngi mdotlot dow mkheng rek ava' thung ngi ngak lamda ma'amin arlaan nih Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda.
“Hava' pauna rek avah naan akna rekin thung ngi idong chso, tidit tah Mii Chapa avah mii rek khut thung ngi kparlaan bei rah mthe a.”

Pdainu mmaan nih hava' paulam avah deipindih lam mda ungta mmaan nih ava' mdodeh mana' raanni ava' avah mmaan hinki mdodowlpthi, ungta mmaan nih hava' paulam avah Mma' hinnu tkheel rah ningpqit lamda.
Audilli mmaan thung ngi, marlak inni kuw ngi miklinsi rang tidit leiyi, mkolrotma naan khat thuwkda.
Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan plungril ki muplungbin rekin avah deithida nau kmow khat louda mma' avah Mhin nih pripda.

Ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso, Nei kmiing ngi hava' nau ava' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiya mtarlaan chaak a ungta kuwku yoso, Nei mkarlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi kcha' Mma' avah marlaan chaak a. Mleiya naan akhengin arlakin ki mikdilsi ava ngi miklin ava' rah,” dida.
Audilli Johon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Mukpu, neen nih miikhat tih Nah amiing ngi tarnam mdorei pthi deiyin nuh, ungta neen nih mma' avah thlot innu mleiya mma' avah neen ndilkqowi pemeh.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Mma' avah thlotmaan tidit tah neen mikepteng kma' mma' avah neen noktong ki.”
'Tunnu Mma' mdo’arjuk loww chaakna' rah mpha marvanve dok thungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Mma ngi knet tih Jerusalem ktong thah kchet rang ngi mmai tarngat chda.
Ungta Mma ngi pausikhu rek avah mduh thah heipthla lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' thenni kporthlong rah meheiyin thung ngi Samaria mii rek khuw khat thung ngi luwt lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih Mma' avah arlaang chlam mda, mleiya Mma ngi mmai avah Jerusalem thah kchet rang ngi mdotarngai dok.

Ungta Mma' sikhu rek James le' Johon nih hava' mdehn thungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng, Elaijah ngi mdotlot heppi, Nang ngi hava'le' 'leenni parvaan ki mei arjudon mdobunpthi lamna' rah paupiik kdopiik raan, angei a?” dilamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi kerheelda mmaanve avah rai lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Naanve a taluhep kduh ki pthla thung ngi ka'am inptih, tidit dei maantih.
‘Mleiya Mii Chapa avah dultimii rek rinkum kpenvei rah kurjung pemeh pdainu mmaan ava' ksan chrah kurjung.” Audilli, mmaan nih khuw morson khat thah chet lamda
'Tunnu mmaan nih 'lampii thung ngi meheiyin thung ngi hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah kuwmiikhat tih, “Kruwng tva'tva' thang yoso Nah achena' thuh Adilqowi chnikdi',” dida.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Tkei rekka mkhor rekin ka'am ungta parvaan laiki pva rek rukka mbuwn ka'am, pdainu Mii Chapa avah mluwchai mdothiikna' rah mmun ka'am pemeh,” dida.
Audilli Mma ngi morson khat hinni theda: “Nei mheiqowi,” dida. Pdainu mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neiyi rukri ngi vang nih rang ngi kpa avah alruwl chdoklap nih,” dida.
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kdiyou ava ngi mikdiyou avah kulruwl chrah, pdainu nang nga chet rang ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah aparjaam cha',” dida.
Ungta morson khat rukku theda: “Kruwng, Nah adilqowi chnikdi', pdainu vang nih rang ngi ki'inn thuh ka'am rek mmaan avah vanthaan chlap lam nih,” dida.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mukdusin kyowng daat thida mdilpang thah kerheel kuwkhat leh rukka Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki thenni mtik kcha pemeh,” dida.
Hava'le' dilli Kruwng ngi morson somtikhiu rek rukka kchol lamda. Mma ngi 'kniinii ngi Mduh thah tidit tah Mma' thlenbeina' rah khuwpii ungta mmun rek khimkhei thung ngi mmaan avah pthla lamda.

Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Dakat tih, turkun rang avah knempok a pdainu nong klou rang mii avah ktlowm 'suwnna. Avaleiyi, turkun rang lou ava' kpupa hinni, Mma ngi turkun rang lou ava' thung ngi nong klou rah mii mdosina' rah rin'iktham chaan.
Naan nih anto ngi ichetin ungta asuwn! Neiyi naan avah yausuwn rek heppi tkeikraang rek arlak ki akapthlat inna.
Naan nih sumbuwr hormaan ungta thowngya hormaan mditmata khuhkok namaan. Ungta naan nih 'lampii thung ngi mii rek arvuwi maan.
Ungta naan nih tva'tva' thung yoso aluwnaan inn ava' thung ngi rukrirep pih ‘Inn hava' thuh plung kdai i'amso’, adiin.
Ungta ava' thuh muplung kdai mii ma'am bih, naan aplungdaiyin avah mhin nih ka'am chrah mditma bih naan ahin nih avah kerheel chrah.

Ungta naanna inn ava' thuh a'am chaak daat raan. Talutalu yoso mmaan nih naan ahin nih adotpiikin ava' achaan ungta ava' aneen. Mleiya nong klou kcha' mii avah mardaman karlaang kcha' ki thenni mtik kcha'. Ungta naan nih inn khat ki ngi inn khat thah konthot maan.
Ungta tva'tva' ki khuwpii thung daat yoso naan nih aluwn thung ngi mmaan nih naan adotarlaan chaak naan khuwpii ava' thung ngi a'aang inni adotodown piikin dow rek avah naan nih achaan.
Ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am kkowi rek avah apdamin ungta mmaan hinni, Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin nih arjung knai kcha' a, adiin rang ngi, athepiikin.
Pdainu tva'tva' ki khuwpii thung daat yoso naan nih aluwn thung ngi mmaan nih atarlaan chaakmaan cheentung ngi hanto' atheen.

‘naan akhuwpiin kat thungki vaiphul kukhuhn 'leenni kpop rek avah titinna' khat tih naan a'leenin nih kokqhot inna. Anto'daat yoso naan nih havah adeiyin, tidit tah Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin nih arjung knai dok kcha' a,’ adiin.
Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Nit ava' thung ngi Sodom mih khuwpii ava' hinni ko'olbet tih kdiil pchaang chrah.

Korasin, nang a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a! Bethsaida nang a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan ahin nih ruhtan nong rek totlot avah Tair le' Sidon hinni totlot mkurthuh tlaang bih mmaan nih choduduh ngi muplungin perthleng chlamdon buwdiir kthi hilna chlamdon nih purvuwt thuh kok'ong chdok lamrah.
Pdainu pau tpinditna' thung vah Tair le' Sidon nih naan ahinvah ko'olbet tih kdiil pchaang chrah.
Ungta parvaan kpha ngi kakparthaang kcha' Kapernaum nang avah Kdikhuw thah ktla daat tih akaptla pthi rah.
naan akarja kcha' rek ava ngi Neiya mtarjaak chaak lam a ungta naan akmat kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiya mtamat chaak a ungta Nei makmat kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi ava' rukka mmat chaak a.”
Audilli somtikhiu rek avah kanpa ngi tlung kerheel lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng neen nih tarnam rek kpha rukka Nah amiing ngi kdosin pchaanin.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Seitan avah kowl keplek heppi parvaan ki arjung ktla deinu.

Asuwn! Neiyi naan ahin nih pruwl rekle' silthum'artham rek tether pchaanna' ki ruhtanna' akpiik inna. Ungta miihal ava' ki ruhtan mkheng tapchaanna' ki ruhtanna' avah naan ahin nih akpiik inna. Ungta taluhep kduh yoso naan avah dow khatleh ngi aplimin nimeh.
Anto'daat yoso naan nih pthla rek adosin pchaanin leiyi, kanpa chmaan pdainu naan amingin avah parvaan thah mdokjit dok leiyi, ikanpa chaan.”

Mpha ava' thung ngi Jisu a Pthla thung ngi kanpa chda ungta hanto'theda: “Dultipaam le' parvaan ki Kruwng Apa! Akpanpaak chaak a mleiya Nang ngi hava'le' avah mii kinrit rekle' kdeipindih rek hinni dowlpthi thi tih nau kdowng rek hinni purphuwn piik lam tinu. Kqha'a Apa Nang amiksut thung ngi aplung kngam mih adobin ava' hep ikurthuwkso!”

Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni kerheelda hanto'theda: “Dow mkheng avah Kpa ngi Nei kihin nih mparlaan dok chda ungta Pa ava' kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Chapa avah kuw tidit deimeh. Ungta Chapa ava' kma'don Pa avah kuw tidit deimeh ungta Chapa ava ngi mdopurphuwn nuwmna' mmaan ava' hinni Mma' avah mdopurphuwn.”
Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni kerheelda ungta msikindaat thung ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih adodehn ava' kdei kcha' rek mik avah msuwkin kqha a.

Mleiya Neiyi kthe a, khulpu rek knempok ki ungta paamkruwng rekki naan nih amik inni adodehn avah mdodeh nuwm chaakin pdainu dei chlammeh. Ungta naan nih ado'arjaakin avah mdo'arjaak nuwm chaakin pdainu mdo'arjaak chaakin pemeh.”
Ungta asuwn, nowlam kdei miikhat tih ripda Mma' mdoperteelna ngi hanto'theda: “Chukpu, neiyi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah alrouchom mih kdo'arlaan chaakna' rah talu tlow nikdi' o?”
Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nowlam thung ngu talu dida mikjitto'? Ungta nangvah avah taluhep pih aparcham lam o?”

Mthungta mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi nangki Kruwng Isowr avah aplungchai mkheng ngi, Apthlarin mkheng ngi, aruhtan mkheng ngi, Ungta aplungbin mkheng ngi vonsat adolow chaak rah. (Knl. 6:5) Ungta, A'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah, mdit.” (Lev. 19:18)
Ungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi kindit deek ki arthaan a, nang ngi hava'le' avah atlow cha' ungta ring chnadi'.”
Pdainu mma ngi mthina tikpindit chaak rah mdongei chaak ki Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwda, nei ki'innveenna?”

Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Miikhat avah Jerusalem ki ngi Jerikho thah arjuda ungta raanqhul kupru rek khut thung ngi tla chda. Ungta mmaan nih mbuwmdiir khowkpet chlamda ungta mma' avah plim lamda ungta kdisum'arsam mih mapthi lam thida sun chlamda.
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah thimpu khat tah 'lampii ava' thuh thleng khotda. mma ngi mma' mdeh thungta loida 'lamsiir khat thah sun chda.
Ungta anto' heppi Levi khat rukka mmun ava' thung ngi thleng nowlda, mma' avah deida. Ungta mma ngi 'lam lepda 'lamsiir khat thah sun chnowlda.
Pdainu 'lam ava' thuh kchet Samaria ki miikhat ava ngi mhin nih thleng khotda ungta mma ngi mii avah mdeh thungta plung pnee chda.

Mma ngi mma' avah heiphada reidii le' thowldii pubulpiik thida mlimna' rek avah klumpiikda. Ungta mma ngi mtuwnna' saa ava' 'leenni pkalda ungta miitlun'inn khat thung ngi ptlung chda ungta soplow chda.

Ungta mupduknii ngi, mma ngi msun rang thang ngi jiipowl sumqiit 'knii turthuhda innkrungpa ava' hinni piida. Ungta mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Mma' avah mheisut pqowi piikcha'. Nang ngi talutalu yoso mma' 'leenni hava' kkheel lih adopche dok avah karvang kerheel thung ngi neiyi avah achowi nikdi', dida.
Hava'le' kdum arlak ki kuw ngi raanqhul kupru rek khut thung ngi ktla kcha' mii ava' ki mi'innveen kurthuwk rah abinna?”
Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mma' hinni plungnee ktedet kcha' khat ava',” dida. Ungta Jisu hanto'theda: “Nang ngi vang rang ngi anto ngi atlow cha',” dida.
'Tunnu mmaan nih anto ngi mcheen thungta khuw khat pha lamda. Ungta Martha tidit snu khat ava ngi mi'inn thuh ptlung chlamda.
Martha a mnaunuh Mary tidit khat ka'am. Mary ngi Jisu khuhther rih ko'ongda Mma' dothe avah arja chda.

Pdainu Martha vah mnongtlot rang mkheng ava ngi muplung tpenqheekda. Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih arvada hanto'theda: “Kruwng, knaunuh ngi nong totlot rang mkheng avah nei kihin daat tih mdotmaak psuk avah dei mtimow? Avaleiyi, mdotbomna' rah mhin nih mheithe piikcha',” dida.
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Martha, Martha, nang nga dow knempok leiyi, tparsat tinu aplung apyat lik.
Pdainu msit ka'am avah dow khatpang daat. Mary ngi makqhabet ungta mma' hinki tolow penletma rang avah mokchol chaak a.”

Mma ngi mmun khat thuh rinmaktham chaak arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya Mma ngi mupqut dok le' Msikhu rek khat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Johon nih msikhu rek hinni rinkthamna' mdopurchuh lam heppi, neen rukka rintakthamna' mheipurchuk chaan.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih rin'aktham chaakin thung ngi hanto ngi atheen: ‘Parvaan thah ka'am Apa, Nah amiing nga kchiir ikurthuwkso! Nah akruwngpaalna' kurjung ikurthuwkso! Parvaan thah Nah aplungbin mdotlotin heppi dultipaam thung rukku ikurthuwkso!
Mni ktai ki kthen chaak raan avah nitnit ki mheipii chaan.

Ungta neen nih kleenleiyin kervei rek khimkhei kdoptlot piikin heppi, Neen kupnu arve rekin avah mheiptlot piik chaan. Ungta neenna kepthleem thuh maptla chmaan, Pdainu kqha kma' khat ava' hinki mheiqenthuh chaan! Adiin,’’ dida.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan arlakin ki plap kthlowi kcha' kuwmiikhat tih maplap khat hinni thanqim laiyi vadon, ‘Plap, thenpen kdum pang arpu chnih.
Mleiya kaplap khat kipjiin nih mphakhotda ungta neiyi mma' aang ngi kdodown chaak rang dow khatleh thlowi chma nuh’, dida, kthe rah kuw ka'am inpti?
Ungta mma ngi mthung thangki ngi arhei'arthaang donni hanto' kthe rah: ‘Kmikkhut kriilma', neiya inn arkam doknu knau le' tu' ki'iip dok kcha' ping, kerdelda apii pchaang nimaang.’’
Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Mma ngi plap khat mkurthuhn lei mda, mma ngi ningkya ktaak ki kornowl kornowl lih mdoqhil chaak leiyi, mma ngi kerdel donni, mma' dokriinya ngi thenpen avah kpii rah.

Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Aqhil chaan, ungta avah naan ahin nih akpii chraan. Athlaam chaan, ungta naan nih avah phang chnaandi'. Inn aqhil chaan, ungta thurngut avah naan athen inni akapvanpiik chraan.
Mleiya kqhil kcha' rek khimkheiyi mdo'arlaan chaakin. Kthlaam kcha' mma' ava ngi kphang chrah. Inn kqhil kcha' mma' hinni thurngut avah kapvan piik rah.
naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih, mchapa ngi thenpen mqhil thung ngi mhin nih lung kpiidaat ka'am rang? Mditmata, mma ngi tuwlvah khat mqhilna ava' kchang ngi mma ngi mhin nih pruwl khat kpii rang?
Mditmata, mma ngi harpirdii khat mqhil chaakna, mhin nih silthum'artham khat kpii rang?

Mdittu' kqha kma' naan maklu ngi anau'leen hinni talu chla kqha rek tpiik chaak rang, tidit adehn nuh, parvaan thah ka'am A'paan ngaalvah kqhil kcha' rek hinni tya knem mih Pthla Kchiir avah kpiilam rang ngoh?”
Ungta mma ngi mpau kthuwk kma' tarnam khat avah reipthida. Ungta tarnam ava ngi msun chaak thungta, mpau kthuwk kma' mii avah pauda. Ungta ava ngi miipii rek avah ngak chlamda.
Pdainu mmaan aangqhe ngi hanto' the lamda: “Beeljibub, tarnampii ava' ar'aang ngi, Mma ngi tarnam rek avah mdorei pchaan.”
Ungta morson aangqhe rekki mdoperteel naan nih Mhin nih, parvaan ki titinna' khat mheitedetin, dilamda, kheel lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi muplungbinin avah deithida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Msingreel lih kurkhui kcha' kruwngpaalna' khimkhei avah kenvei chrah. Ungta msingreel lih kurkhui kcha' inn avah ktlu chrah.
Ungta Seitan rukka mthina mkurkhui chaakku, taluhep pih mma' kruwngpaalna' avah ka'am pchaang rang ngo? Naan nih tarnam rek avah Neiyi Beeljibub ar'aang ngi mreipthi a, mdiin tinu.
Ungta Neiyi Beeljibub ar'aang ngi tarnam rek kreiyu, naan achapa rekin vah kuw ar'aang ngi mmaan avah mrei'inna? Hava' leiyi, mmaan nih naan a'leenin nih pau kpinditpa rek kurthuwk lamrah.
Pdainu Neiyi tarnam rek avah Isowr khutpna ngi kdorei mkurthuh bih, kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin nih knaitek ki kurjung a.
Mruh ktang miikhat tih raaldona ngi korthlong jikda mi'inn mrun chaak thung ngu msum'alrou rek avah kuhuiyi ka'am.
Pdainu mma' hinni mruh ktangbet kuwmiikhat tih mkarnaakqhi cheu, mma' avah pchaang chda ungta mma ngi mma' kilrin chaakna' raaldona avah lou chda. Ungta mma ngi mdolown dona rek avah vanpenqheekda.
Nei tu' kilqhi kma' mma' avah Nei mkepteng ungta Nei tu' kpurkuwkve kma' mma' ava ngi mdo'arjei pthi.

Ungta tarnam ktobor ava ngi miikhat thungki mthuh dokcheu ava ngi paamkbiik laiyi kthleng ngi chetda ungta mkarngatna' rah mun thlaamda. Pdainu mma ngi mun khatleh ruk mphanma thungta, mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi karvanthuhna' ki'inn ava' thung ngi veikhat vangkerheel nikdi',’ dida.
Ungta marvan kerheel thungta avah truw deek ki ungta tportlot deek ki arvanphada.

Audilli mma' ava ngi vangda mma' hinni kqha kma'set morson pthla tikhiu rek qhipom lamda. Ungta mmaan nih ava' thuh luwt lamda ungta ava' thuh am chlamda. Ungta mii ava' ki mqutna' avah choduh ki hinni kdungbet tih qhaset mda.”
Jisu ngi hava' mthesli arlaan nih miipii rek arlak ki snu khat tih owngda, Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang akuplu kcha' ungta murnu adoyown chaak snu avah msuwkqha a.”
Pdainu Mma ngi hanto ngi arthaangda: “Ava' han'tun nih, Isowr pau karja kcha' ungta ava' kopqowi kcha' mmaan rek avah msuwkin kqhaset.”

Ungta miipii rek avah nemthang lamda, ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Havah kqha kma' suruwl ava'. Hava' mii rekki titinna' chreldaat thlaam lamda, pdainu khulpu Jonah ki titinna' kma'don titinna' khatleh piinimeh.
Mleiya Jonah avah Ninevah khuwpii ki mii rek thenni titinna' khat. Ava' heppi Mii Chapa avah hava' suruwl rekki mii rek hinni titinna' khat kurthuwk rah.

Kurduh ki paamkruwngnu ava ngi pau tpinditna' nit tih hava' suruwl ki mii rektu' krip rah ungta mmaan avah kupsul lamrah. Mleiya mmah Solomon luwkinritna' ava' karja chrang ki thenni dultipaam mdonna' ki kthleng. Ungta asuwn, hava' thuh Solomon hinni klin khat avah ka'am daat a.

Ninevah khuwpii ki mii rekki, pau tpinditna' nit tih hava' suruwl thungki mii rektu' krip lamrah. Ungta mmaan avah kupsul lamrah mleiya mmaan nah Jonah pau parjaamna' thung ngi plung mdoperthlen chaakin. Ungta asuwn, hava' thuh Jonah hinni klinbet khat tah ka'am daat a.

Kuwkhat leh ngi meila avah plengthida mmun kordowl thung ngi thikchok meh. Ungta tomkal lih khumpthi kchok meh pdainu arvang kluwt mii rekki mdodehna' rah, mma ngi meila avah meilakuwng 'leenni mdoplen.
Mikka daksa ki meila. Avaleiyi, amik rinchan mqhat bih adaksa mkheng avah mar'aang ngi kdim kcha' a. Pdainu amik rinchan mqhatma bih adaksa mkheng avah kjiingnu ngi kdim kcha' imptih.
Avaleiyi, nang ngi adaksa thung ngi ka'am mar'aang avah mjiinmana' rah ikilrindei cha'.
Audilli naan adakin mkheng thung ngi mar'aang ngi mdim chaak bih, ungta mjiinna' khatleh ma'amma bih, mar'aang ngi a'leenin nih mlen thung ngi dow mkheng avah kleng chrah.”
Jisu ngi mpau mupqut dok dilli, Pharisy miikhat tih kmaalqhi rang ngi Mma' avah own chda. Ungta Mma ngi vangluwtda kmaal rang ngi ko'ongda.
Pharisypa ava ngi, Mma ngi then mchaak rang thang ngi mkhut mdo'alqhutma mdeh thungta ngakda.

Ungta Kruwng ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Pharisy rek naan, naan nih tong le' arkuw avah mduwn daat alqhuhn tinu. Pdainu arilin avah mii'alrou tngeina' le' mrilkqha kmah ngi kdim daat inptih.
Kokmok rek naan, mduwn kseem Mma' ava ngi mthung rukka mdoseem pemeh mow?
Pdainu naan nih arilin nih tkorbom chaakna' avah atlow chaan. Ungta asuwn, dow mkheng avah naan athenni kertleu chrah.

Pharisy rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih rihiing le' jelikhaat ungta innbil thungki mdetmdet ki anbul mkheng rek khoa, sowm ki khat tah piin tinu. Pdainu naan nih kindit le' Isowr vonsat avah tuksut maantih. Naan nih mrukri ki ruk kmapthi kmah ngi mdilknau ki avah adotlot chaak raan.
Pharisy rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih sinegog rek thung ngi longkhom kenreel ngeenin tinu ungta kyurkren mun rek thung ngi mii rekki adoturvuwi chaak raan ngeiyin tinu.
Kqha kpurhuwi, nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naanna, mtun nih kchet mii rekki mdodeh chaak maan, m'leen nih ber tadaarma thlaan rek hep daat inptih.”
Audilli nowlam kdei rek arlak ki khat tih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Chukpu, Nang ngi hava' adothe ava ngi neen rukka kdangin apthitta.”

Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nowlam kdei rek naan a'leenin rukku suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih mii rek 'leenni tohor kparsa bowrkrik adopohorin. Ungta naan adak innu bowrkrik avah akhutchalin khadaat rukku adokmeiyin pemeh.
Naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naanki apu'apa rek inni mdo'eyown khulpu rek thlaan'inn avah naan nih adotlotin.

Ungta mkindit kat daat tih naan nih apu'apa rekin ki nongtlot avah naan nih adopandan chaakin ungta avah adorot chaakin. Mleiya, langlang kat tih mmaan nih khulpu rek avah mdo'eyown ungta naan nih mmaan thlaan'inn rek avah adotlotin.

Avaleiyi, Isowr rih Mma' ki luwkinritna' ava' rukku hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi mmaan hinni khulpu rekle' tamsi rek pthla nikdi' ungta mmaan nih aangqhe rek avah ke'eyou lamrah ungta morson rek avah chiikepreel lamrah.
Mleiya dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih mii rekki mdo'eyow rekin khulpu rek mkheng ki hii buwkna' ki phuw lowna' avah hava' suruwl thungki mii rek 'leenni ktla rah.

Abel hii buwkna' ki kupqhun nih rintparlaanna' khaan le' Mmun Kenjesi arlak ki mdo'eyown Jakhariah hii buwkna' kpha ki avah mmaan nih mdo'arthaan raan. ‘Ou, Neiyi kthe a, hava' suruwl rekki avah mdo'arthaan raan.’

Nowlam kdei rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih luwkinritna' ki chungkamke avah adolowpthi dokin. Naan nih naan adakin ruk luwtmaan tih ungta kluwt nuwm kcha' rek mmaan rukka pkhaanin tinu.”
Mma ngi, mmaan hinni avale' mthe dok dilli, nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki Mma' avah plungkthi ngi kerteenqhi lamda. Ungta dow knempok 'leenni mdotepmenna' raanni pau kheelpok lamda.
Mmaan nih Mma' avah kmin nih sutpqowi lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih Mma' nehr kat thungki pau rekkat tih Mma' avah mdokyownna' raan ki thenni mdosut pqowiyin.

Mpha ava' thung ngi ttai pchaanmah miipii rekpa avah ava' thuh kurkuwk lamda. Ungta mii mnemreenin leiyi, khat le' khat kerther lamda. Ungta rukrirep pih Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto' tethe pqhunda: “Naan nih Pharisy rekki thowl, tidit tah kqha tpurhuwina' thungki ikilrin chaan.
Mleiya kurphuwng kmah ngi kurkhum tlit daat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Ungta kandang kmah ngi kordowl tlit daat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
Avaleiyi, talutalu yoso, naan nih kjiingnu thung ngi adotheen avah mar'aang thung ngi tarjaak rah. Ungta naan nih mthung ki innkhaar rek thung ngi kna thuh adotheen avah inntun thah kurphuwng rah.
Kaplap rek, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a: Naan nih daksa ke'eyou rek mmaan avah qi chmaan, tidit tah mmaan nih ava' mtlot dokin dilli morson mdotlot pchaan raan ka'am pemeh.

Pdainu, Neiyi adoqit chaak raan avah kuw tidit tah ayupdehn nih. Naan nih daksa ava' me'eyow dilli Simmei thung ngi tvarpthina' ki ruhtanna' kthlowi, Mma' avah aqi chaan. Ou, Neiyi kthe a, Mma' avah aqichaan.
Mii rekki chaichvi chai parnga 'leenni jiisen sumqiit 'knii ngi mdoyur chaak inpda? Ungta mmaan khadaat rukka Isowr aang ngi tperngeel pthi dok ka'am pemeh.
Anto'kat tih Isowr rih aluw chaiyin 'leenki asam rekin avah khatkhat tih mdotai dok. Avaleiyi, ningpqit maan, naanna chaichvi knempok rek hinni akhonin knem.
Ungta Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: Kuwmiikhat tih mii rek aang ngi, Nei mek kthe thuh kcha' mma' avah, Mii Chapa ava ngi Isowr vaantamsi rek aang ngi kthe thuh chrah.
Pdainu mii rek aang ngi Nei makmat kcha' mma' avah Isowr vaantamsi rek aang ngi kmat chrah.
Ungta kuwku yoso, Mii Chapa ava' kepteng ngi kpau kcha' mma' avah Isowr rih koptlot piik rah. Pdainu Pthla Kchiir 'leenni pthitda kpau mma' avah ptlotpiik nimeh.

Mii rekki naan avah sinegog rek thuh, paamkpu rek hinni ungta ruhtanna' ksin rek hinni akqhi raan. Pdainu naan nih taluhep pih kerthlet nikdi' mditmata taluhep pih arthaang nikdi', tidit leiyi, aplungin pyamaan.
Mleiya mpha ava' thung ngi naan nih talu thenaan tidit avah Pthla Kchiir ava ngi akpurchuk raan.”
Miipii rek arlak ki kuwmiikhat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Chukpu, ku'upa hinni, alrou kdochom raan avah nei tu' kdopenthem sapna' raan mheithe piikcha'.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: Plap “naanve ki thenni paukpinditpa mditmata alrou kukhuipa khat kurthuwk ki, kuw ngi Neiya mdotokcholda?”

Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih tpunjuwrna' thungki ikilrindei chaan ungta khu asuwdei chaan. Mleiya hava' miikhat tih kokhop kerdeiyi sum'alrou mdothlowi chaak ava' thung ngi mrinkum avah ka'am pemeh.”
Audilli Mma ngi hava' pauportolna' avah mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Svangpa khat lou thung ngi chasowm avah kepleet tih thuwkda.
Mma ngi mthina plung parngam chda ungta mthina ngi hanto' kirbin chda: ‘Neiyi kchasowm rek kdothiikna' rah inn ammeh, talu tlow nikdi' o?”
Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu hanto' tlow nih. Ktompli rek avah qhit dok thini rang ngi klinbet tih isa lam nih. Ungta ava' thung ngi neiyi kchasowm mkheng rekle' kdokna rek avah ithi nih.
Ungta neiyi kapthlarin hinni hanto' the nikdi': ‘Kapthlarin nang ngi kum tyatya ki thenni alrou knempok ki apurtuwl chaak dok a. Nang nga ikarnga cha', acha'anee rang ngi ikanpa cha'.”

Pdainu Isowr rih mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Nang nga kokmok kcha imptih. Tuni ki jaankat tih, Neiyi apthlarin avah loupthi nikdi'. Ungta nang ngi athen rang ngi adopurtuwl chaak dow rek avah kuw dow kurthuwk chrang ngo?’
Avaleiyi, Isowr hinni svang tuthuhna' kmah ngi mthina ki thenni alrou kpurtuwl kcha' mma' avah hava' hep daat rah.”

Audilli Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Naan nih arinkumin ki thenni, ‘talu chani kaan,’ mditmata adaksaan ki thenni ‘talu hilna nikaan,’ dida aplungin pyamaan.
Rinkum avah thendam han'tun ki ungta daksa avah buwdiir han'tun ki.

Naan nih pa'aa rek rinkum avah abinphaakin. Mmaan nih chiimuw ruk pqau lammeh mditmata chasowm ruk arkun lammeh. Ungta tpurtuwlna' inn ruk thlowi lammeh mditmata ktom ruk thlowi lammeh. Anto'daat yoso, Isowr rih mmaan avah mdopmaal lam. Ava' vah naanna pva rek han'tun nih tya knem mih asit'in ka'am o?
Ungta naan arlakin ki kuwda, muplungyat chaak ki mdung khutup khatpang daat yoso kapsaang pchaang nga?
Naan nih mikdil'suwn ava'maklu tlow pchaang maantih, mdittu' taluleiyi naan nih morson rekki thenni plung apyat inna.

Naan nih duwmrei rek avah taluhep pih kmowng lam tidit abinphaakin. Mmaan nih nong ruk lou lammeh ungta plaa ruk qen lammeh. Anto'daat yoso, Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a. Solomon kpha rukku mma' ki mkonlorna' mkheng rek thung ngi hava'le' khatpang hep daat tih mkorthlon chaakna' ka'am pemeh.

O, mlamrin kdil'suwn rek naan, 'tun 'tunnu paamlaiyi mowngda ka'am a ungta pdukniu meiqhuwm thuh tvarpthi rang nowm rek maklu a, Isowr rih dona mapnaak chaak lam u, naan ngaalla tya knem mih akapnaak chdaat raanno?
Ungta naan nih talu tchaak rang mditmata ‘talu tneek rang’ tidit leiyi, thlaammaan? Ungta ava'leiyi plung ruk pyamaan.
Mleiya dultipaam ki chaat rekki hava' dow mkheng rek avah mdothlaamin. Ungta naan A'paan nih hava' dow rek ava' akriin inna tidit avah mdodeh.
Pdainu naan nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' athlaam chaan, ungta hava' dow mkheng rek avah naan ahin nih akthlolpiik chraan.
Lopkdil rek naan, aningin pqitmaan, tidit tah naan ahin nih kruwngpaalna' adotpiik raan avah A'paan plungngam ava'.

Naan nih adothlowi chaakin avah ayurin rang ngi srah rek hinni abom chaaknaan. Ungta naan nih asumbuwrin avah kqi kma' rang thung ngi arkhi chaan. Parvaan ki sum'inn avah kenvei tidit am nimeh ungta kupru rukku pha pchaang nimeh mditmata mnu dosuk ki kenvei kcha' tidit ruk am nimeh.
Mleiya asum'alrouin amna' thung ngi nang aplungrin rukka ka'am rah.
Naan nih, dona nada korthlongda ungta arkowlin ajeelin rang ngi, nong klou rah ikorthlong chaan. Ungta ameila rekin avah apquwng tlitin.

Naan nih kchiir innee maalna' thah kchet mukpupa arvang kerheel rah karda kcha' mii rek ava' hep ikurthuwkin. Mmaan nah, mma ngi arvang kerheel donni inn mqhil ki mpha thung ngi kbeisek ki thurngut mdopvan piikna' raan ki thenni kilring kcha'lam.

Mma ngi marvan kerheel thung ngi, kilrinda kahar daat tih mdophaak suwk rek avah msuwkqha a. Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, mma ngi dona nadon, morkowljeel pnet thidon nih, suwk rek avah khaan 'leenni topkong lamdon ungta mma ngi mmaan avah sopklow chlam rah.
Mma ngi qhang miknitna' thung ngi arjung yoso mditmata qhang mukdumna' thung ngi arjung yoso kilrinda kahar tlit tih mdophaak suwk rek avah msuwkqha kcha' a.

Pdainu naan nih havah adeiyin. Mleiya innkpupa ava ngi kupru thlenna' rang mpha avah mma ngi mdeh chaak daat tlaang bih, mma ngi har kilring chdon nih mma ngi mi'inn mdopkui rang avah ptlot lam nimeh.
Avaleiyi, naan rukku ikilrin chaan rang ngi i'amin. Mleiya Mii Chapa avah naan nih adobin psukmanaan mpha thung ngi kurjung rah.”
Audilli Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi hava' pauportolna' avah neen kihin daat chrel lih adothe mow mditmata mii mkheng rek hinni adothe plih?”

Ungta Kruwng ngi hanto'theda: “Mdittu' mukpupa ngi mi'innsuwk mkheng rek ksutpqowi rah mdosi rah ungta mphakatkat thung ngi thendam kpii rang, trinchaak krow ungta kinrit suwkkenreel kurthuwk rang avah kuw rang a?
Mukpupa mtlun thung ngi, anto ngi ktlow meek ki mdotlun phaak suwk avah msuwkqha a.
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah mma ngi mma' avah mdomna mkheng ksutpqowi rah ksi chrah.

Pdainu suwk ava ngi muplungril lih hanto ngi: ‘Kukpupa avah kbeiyok ki tlungkhot nimeh’ adiso ungta mma ngi pselsuwk rekle' snusuwk rek avah te'e mupqhun chaak bih, ungta chaso neeso ungta miprit chaak bih,

Suwk ava' kpupa avah mma ngi m'lam mdosut mana' nit ungta mma ngi mdorin qhang thung ngi ktlung rah. Ungta mma ngi mma' avah thum 'knii ngi kpunthum rah ungta mma' avah lamkrin kma' rek tung ngi mthen kpurtum pthirah.
Ungta mukpupa plungbin deithida totlot rah kbin kma' ungta mma' plungbin dilkqowiyi ktlow kma' suwk avah kchung knempok ki keprei rah.

Pdainu ava' kdei kcha' kma' mma' ava ngi kchung tohorna' ki mtik kcha ngi parmak chdaat yoso mma' avah ktlowm 'suwn nih kchung kohor rah. Mleiya kuwku yoso mukpupa ngi mhin nih knempok ki mdopiikna' mma' hinki knem mih karngai chrah. Ungta mii rekki knempa ksutpqowi rah mdosiin mma' hinki knem mih kqhil lamrah.
Neiya dultipaam thung ngi mei kopchok rah kurjung ping ungta Neiyi kdongei chaak avah mei topchow dok rang ava'.
Pdainu Neiyi diiluwna' khat thuh dii kluw rah ka'am daat ungta ava' mkurthuh dok duh kpha thung ngu Neiya tya thuh kuplung nga kya kcha' daat a!
Naan nih, Neiya dultipaam thung ngi plung kdai kpii rang ngi kurjung rah atbin inna? Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a anto'liit pemeh, pdainu ava' mda tkenqheena' kpii rah kurjung ping.
Mleiya 'tunki kupqhun nih inn khat thuh miilai parnga ka'am avah kenqheek rah. Mleiya kdum rekki 'knii rek 'leen ungta 'knii rekki kdum rek 'leenni kperteng ngi krip lamrah.
Mpa ngi mchapa 'leen ungta mchapa ngi mpa 'leen, mnuh ngi mchanu 'leen ungta mchanu ngi mnuh 'leen ungta maktarnuh ngi mokmounu 'leen ungta mokmounu ngi maktarnuh 'leen kenqheek ki krip lamrah.”
Audilli Mma ngi miipii rek hin rukku hanto'theda: “Naan nih knitlaak ki armei karhang adehncheu, naan nih kbeisek ki hanto' theen tinu, ‘Khu kra rah mthe a,’ ungta avah anto'kat tih rahda.
Ungta naan nih kurduh ki tirthli mraancheu kni kdung ngi ksa rangnga, diin tinu ungta anto ngi sada.
Kqha kpurhuwi rek naan, naan nih dulti le' parvaan ki ruwngchen avah dei pchaang thiin tinu taluhep pih hava' 'tunpha ki mpha ruwngchen avah adodeh pchaan maanno?
Ungta taluleiyi naan nih kindit avah talu tidit ava ngi adakin avah kpindit chmaanti?

Nang ngi, adokarnaakqhi mii ava' tung ngi paukpinditpa hinki rah 'lam thuh aheimeek sliin arlaan nih mma' tu' akalqhat dokna' raan kdung ngi atlow cha'. Mditma bih, mma ngi nang avah paukpinditpa hinni aqendon ungta paukpinditpa ava ngi nang nga nongmii klin hinni aparlaandon ungta nongmii klin ava ngi nang nga rowng'inn thuh akdaalpthi rah.
Neiyi nang ahin nih kthe a. Nang ngi mqutna'dek ki jiisen sumqiit ava' apiik dok duh khimkheiyi nang ngi ava' thung ki arvanthuhna' rah m'lam amvot meh.”

Audilli mpha ava'kat thung ngi ava' thuh ka'am mii rekki Galily ki mii rek leiyi, Mhin nih pau song lamda. Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih rinmparlaan chaakin arlaan nih, Pilaat tih mmaan avah eyou lamda.’

Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan akheng inni hava' Galily ki mii mkheng rek avah mmaan nih hava' suwkthuhna' mdoperteelin leiyi, mmaan avah Galily ki mii morson rek hinni mmeel kthi ngi pnu kervei kcha' heppi abin inna?
Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Naan nih plung aperthlen chaak maanbi, naan rukka mmaan heppi kenveiter chnaandi'.
Mditmata Siloam thung ngi arka'inn tluda mdonenyow mii sowm leitreht rek mmaan avah, naanvah Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mii mkheng rek hinni pnu kerveisi rah abin inna?’
Neiyi kthe a anto'liit pemeh. Pdainu naan nih plung aperthlen chaak maanbi, anto' heppi naan akhengin avah kenvei chnaandi'.”
Audilli Mma ngi hava' pauportol ava' rukka theda: “Miikhat tih mrithlumbil thung ngi kduwtbul khat phunda ungta mma ngi ava'leen ki mchei ksuw rah arvada pdainu khadaat ruk phangmda.

Audilli mma ngi mrithlumbil krungpa ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Asuw o, kum kdum thung ngi neiyi arvanu hava' kduwtbul 'leenki mchei avah kdosut thlaam pdainu khadaat ruk phangmaang. Avah aphuwr pthi, taluleida dulti mdopartlaiya?’
Pdainu mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu tunkum pang ngu i'am daatso, neiyi mbul iploi nih rang ngi ikhorni ungta dulqhatna' ibuk nih.
Ava ngi kchei chdaat ruk krow. Pdainu mcheima cheentung ngi nang ngi avah phuwr pthi teng daatlai.’ ”
'Tunnu Mma ngi tkarngatnit khat thung ngi sinegog rek thung ngi purchuk lamda.
Ungta asuwn ava' thung ngi kum sowm leitreht thung ngi choitroina' pthla ngi kkowi kcha' snu khat ka'am. Ungta snu avah ktorkon khak kcha' ungta mthina ngi kinding pchaang vot pemeh.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi, Mhin nih ownda ungta snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Snu, achoitroi chaakna' thungki nang nga kerthlet dok kcha' imptih.”
Ungta Mma ngi mma' 'leenni mkhut khiinpiik chda ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma' avah pdamda ungta Isowr ponlor chda.

Pdainu sinegog kpupa ava ngi plungkthi ngi arthaangda, mleiya Jisu ngi tkarngatnit tih mdopdam ungta mma ngi miipii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Dultimii rekki nong mdolow chaakna' raan niitruk ka'am, avaleiyi naan nih nit rek ava' thung ngi ithlengin rang ngi idam chaan pdainu tkarngatnit rang pemeh.”

Audilli Kruwng ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Kqha kpurhuwi rek! Naan khimkheiyi, tkarngatnit tih mma' mma' ki, sil mditmata skowlraam rek avah mi'innin thungki perthletin tinu dii adopneekin kmeh mow?
Ava' vah, abinno, Abraham chanu khat avah Seitan nih kum sowm leitreht thung ngi bowlpthida ka'am snu avah tkarngatnit tih tperthlepiik rang pemeh mow?”
Mma ngi hava' mdothe ava ngi, Mma' krow kma' rek mkheng avah ningkya pii lamda. Ungta miipii rek mkheng ngi Mma ngi tkonlorna' nong rek mdotlot mkheng ava' 'leenni kanpa chlamda.
Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah talu tu' tpinqim rang? Ungta Neiyi avah talu tu' portol nikdi?
Havah miikhat tih louda mi'innbil thung ngi mdopqau anruwng muw khat ava' hep daat. Ungta ava ngi mowngda linda ding klin khat kurthuwkda ungta parvaanlai ki pva rekki mbaak rek 'leenni kthla lamda.”
Ungta veikhat Mma ngi theda: “Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah talu tu' portol nikdi o?
Mleiya havah snu khat tih saikan tomkal kdum thung ngi pertetda mkerdel duh kpha ngi mdochou thowl ava' hep daat.”
Ungta Mma ngi Jerusalem thah mahanthang chunni khuwpii rekle' khuw rek thah kthleng ngi chetda purchuk lamda.
Audilli miikhat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng mii mruk'suwn daat rang mow mdosan chaak rang nga?” Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda:
“Paltong ktirbik thung ngi aluw chaakna' raan atlow chaan. Mleiya Neiyi kthe a, mii knempok ki tuluw chaakna' rah ktlow rah pdainu luwt pchaang lam nimeh.

Innkpupa ava ngi ripdon ungta thurngut markam dok dilthang vah naan nih duwn thah ripda inn tiqhil pqhunin tidon: ‘Kruwng, Kruwng, neen kthenin nih mheipvan piik chaan,’ dinaandi'. Ungta Mma ngi, ‘Neiyi naan avah adei maan ring, naanna tva'kiin ptih,’ adiindon nih akarthaang raan.
Audilli naan nih hanto' tethe pqhunnaandi': ‘Neen nih, Nang tu' chasap innu ungta Nang ngi neenki khuwpii 'lam rek thung ngi mpurchuk intinu.’
Pdainu Mma ngi hanto' kther rah: ‘Neiyi kthe a, neiyi naanna tva'kiin ptih tidit adei maanring, nowlam tukksut kma' nong ktlow rek naan akheng inni, Nei kihin ki isun dokin.’

Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi naan nih Abraham le' Aijek le' Jakob le' ungta khulpu rek mkheng adehn thung ngi, naan avah athinaan nih akarvar chaakin leiyi, ava' thuh kqapkqei le' haa tikriilna' kthuwk chrah.
Mmaan nih knithuh ki ungta knitlaak ki ungta karthak ki ungta kurduh ki kthleng lamrah ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi kok'ong lamrah.
Ungta dakat tih ava' thung ngi rukri chrah dilknau ka'am rah ungta dilknau chrah rukri ka'am rah.”
Nit ava' thung ngi Pharisy rek aangqhe avah Mhin nih thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Ikorlou rang ngi mmun hava' thungki isun dok, mleiya Herod tih Nang nga te'eyow rah atbinna.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Vangin rang ngi tkei ava' hinni hanto' vantheen: ‘Asuwn, tuni le' pduknii vah Neiyi tarnam reipthida ungta tapdamna' nong tlow nikdi' ungta mnii kdumna' nit tu', Neiya mukpurkhum chrah’, mdit', aditpiikin.
Anto'daat yoso, Neiyi tuni le' pduknii ungta adainii lim thung vah k'lamqowi rang ava' qowida chet chnikdi'. Mleiya khulpu khat tah Jerusalem duwn thang ngi mkenvei chaak daatna' kqha pemeh.

O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, khulpu rek ke'eyou nang ungta ahin nih tapthlat rek mmaan avah lung ngi deeng lam tinu. Neiyi veityaveitya thung ngi nang anau le' avah harnuh ngi mapthlatii ngi msuwn rek mdopurku chaak lam heppi tpurkuh rah kdongei chaak pdainu nangvah avah ngei mtinu'.

Asuw! nang a'inn avah ahin nih ktlong dang ngi mmaak pthi a. Neiyi mkindit kat kthe a nang ngi: ‘Kruwng miing 'leenni karva Mma' avah msuw kqha a,’ (Luw. 118:26) adoditna' mpha marvan duh khimkheiyi, nang ngi Neiya mdeiliit nimtih.”
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi Pharisy rekki, paamkpu khat inn thuh kmaal rah mhei thung ngi mmaan nih Mma' avah kmin nih sutpqowi lamda.
Ungta asuwn, ava' thung ngi ktirthlingrii ktong miikhat avah Mma' aang ngi amdaatda.
Ungta Jisu ngi nowlam kdei rek ungta Pharisy rek karthaang ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tkarngatnit tih tapdam avah nowlam vah mrot mow, rowmeh o?”
Pdainu mmaan nih rimkdi am chlamda. Ungta Mma ngi mma' avah kmeida ungta pdamda ungta mma' avah anto ngi psun chda.

Audilli Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat mma ngi mdothlowi skowlraam khat mditmata silpa khat avah tkarngatnit tih khor thuh mtlaak dokku kbeisek ki ava' thung ki kturthuh kma' rah kuw ka'am rang ngo?”
Ungta mmaan nih hava' dow rek leivah Mhin nih dow khatleh arthaang pchaang lam mda.
Mma ngi mmaan nih taluhep pih mmun kqhasi avah makthlanin tidit mdeh dilli, kowllat kphang kcha' rek hinni Mma ngi pauportolna' khat thepiik lamda.

Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih kuwmiikhat tih kchiir innnee maalna' thung ngi atalat chaakin cheentung ngi, naan nih mmun kqhasi thung ngi ko'ongmaan. Mleiya mma ngi naan ahin nih takyat chaakbet krow mii morson mdolat chaak ruk ka'am krow.
Ungta nang akla kcha' ava ngi mma' tu' kilqhi ngi arvangso ahin nih ‘hava' mii ava' hinni mmun apii cha', kdi rah.’ Ava' dilli nang ngi ningkya tu' kilqhi ngi mmun kchowmsi thah tko'on pqhunnadi'.

Pdainu mii ngi atalat chaakin thung ngi naan nih mmun kchowm thuh vaan rang ngi iko'ongin. Mdit bih, nang akla kcha' mma' arvangdon nih ahin nih hanto' kthe krow, ‘Plap, mmun kparthaang thah vang.’ Audilli nang nga, nang ngi khaan 'leenni adoko'onqhi rek aang ngi tkonlor chaakna' phang chnadi'.
Mleiya kuwku yoso mdak ki katparthaan kcha' khimkhei rek avah kopchowm pthirah. Ungta mdak ki kporchowm kcha' mii khimkhei rek avah katparthaan piik lamrah.”

Audilli Mma ngi Mma' kla kcha' ava'hin rukku hanto'theda: “Nang ngi kluh ki von yoso mditmata jiingsun ki von yoso aporthlon chaak thung ngi aplap rek, mditmata a'uanau rek, mditmata ari'alam rek mditmata a'innveen svang rek lalamma'. Mleiya mmaan nih aklapurthuwl lamrah ungta nang nga akchowi dok lamrah.
Pdainu nang ngi tmaalna' khat aporthlon thung vah srah ungta arda korsowi ungta mkhuh kyeng ungta mmikktot mii rek alahcha'.
Ungta ava ngi nang nga suwqhat phang chnadi', mleiya mmaan vah achowi pchaang lam nimeh. Mleiya mrinkindit rek rinkerheelna' thung ngi nang nga akpurthuwl piik chrah.”
'Tunnu mmaan arlak ki kok'ong khat tih hava' dow rek ava' marjaak thungta mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi thenpen ava' kcha chrang mma' avah msuwkqha a.”
Audilli Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih tmaalna' klin khat porthlong chda ungta mma ngi mii knempok ki lah chda.
Ungta kmaal rang ki mpha thung ngi mma ngi msuwk rek avah mkowllat chaak rek hinni, ‘Arvaan, dow mkheng avah 'tunnu kurchuwl dok a,’ dida kther rah pthla lamda.

Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni kinqimsap pih hanto ngi mthlenmana' raan ki mlei tethe pqhun lamda. Mrukri ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi loupaam khat ren chnuh ungta neiya ava' ksuw rah chetnikdi' Neiyi adotoptlot piikna' rah akaktham chaak a.’
Ungta morson khat ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi silpa sikparnga ren chnuh ungta neiyi mmaan avah perteel lam nikdi'. Neiyi adotoptlot piikna' rah akaktham chaak a.’
Ungta morson khat nowl rukku hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi snu khat the chnuh ungta avaleiyi neiya arva pchaang nimaang.’

Mthungta suwk ava ngi arvang kerheelda ungta innkpupa hinni hava' pauna rek avah song chda.
