Audilli innkpupa ava ngi muplungthit tih suwk ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi kbeisek ki khuwpii 'lam rek thuh ungta 'lamqhuwm rek thuh va rang ngi, srah rek, kyeng kkhowi rek, mmikktot rek ungta mkhuh kyeng rek avah hava' thuh arvanqhi lam.’
Ungta suwk ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu, nang ngi paupiik adotpiik heppi ktlot chaak dok a ungta arlaan kpha rukku mmunna ka'am daat a.’
Audilli mukpupa ava ngi suwk ava' hinni theda: ‘Nang ngi 'lampii rekle' 'lamqhuwm rek thung ngi va rang ngi ka'am rek mmaan avah ki'inn mdimna' khimkhei arvanqhi lam.
Mleiya neiyi nang ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah kowllat mii kuwkhat leh ngi nei kvonsum ki mdit avah pertem lam nimeh.’ ” dida.
Ungta miipiipa rek avah Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi chetsap lamda. Ungta Mma ngi mdilkerheel thida hanto'theda:
“Kuwmiikhat tih Nei kihin nih arvathida, mnuh le' mpa, mnuwn le' mnau, mu'umnau le' mcharmyur, Ou ungta mdaksa ki mrinkum ruk kahal kcha' kma' mma' ava ngi Nei ksikhu kurthuwk pchaang nimeh.
Ungta mdaksa ki khros kohor kcha' kmah ngi kdilkqowi kcha' mma' avah Nei ksikhu kurthuwk pchaang nimeh.
Mleiya naan arlakin ki kuwn pti, arka'inn khat tsak rah kbin kcha' khat tih choduh ngi ko'ongda mma ngi ava' tupqutna' krow kimkhon rah thlowi mow thlowi maang tidit ktaijap kma' rangnga?
Mditma bih, mma ngi innmun mphun dok dilli ungta ava' mupqut pchaanmah bih, kdei mii khimkheiyi mma' avah tipni chaak kupqhun lamrah.
Mmaan nih, ‘hava' mii ava ngi tsakka pqhun pthida, tupqut tah pqu pchaang meh,’ kdi lamrah.

Mditmata talu paamkruwng khatda, morson paamkruwng khat tu' raal karna rang ngi, choduh ko'ongda kbinjap kma' rang nga? Mleiya mma ngi mma' mii pun sowm ava ngi mma' kepteng ngi karva rang pun som'knii avah tkurdukqhi kapchaang rang mow, tidit kbinjap kma' rang nga?
Mditma rang bih, morson khat ava ngi 'lamkla ngi ma'am arlaan nih, mma ngi pausikhu pthladon nih tkalqhatna' ki mrit rek mdoqhil chaak rah.
Anto' heppi, naan arlakin ki kuwku yoso, mma ngi mdothlowi dow mkheng kmapthi kma' mma' ava ngi Nei ksikhu kurthuwk pchaang nimeh.
Pti a kqha pdainu pti ava ngi ma'al mse chaakku taluhep pih avah veikhat tpa'al daat rang ngo?
Havah dulti ki then rukku mqhatna' ammeh ungta dulqhatna' ngi tpurtuwl ki then rukku msit ammeh, pdainu mii rekki avah mdovar pthi. Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.”
Audilli sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek avah Mma' karja chrang ngi Mhin nih nai chlamda.
Ungta Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rek mkheng ngi nurnur kdi ngi, ‘hava' mii ava ngi pnu kervei rek arlaang chlamda ungta mmaan tu' chasap lamda,’ dilamda.
Mthungta Mma ngi hanto'theda mmaan hinni hava' pauportol ava' theda:

“naan arlak inni yau arja khat kthlowi khat ka'am a, ungta marlakin ki khat tah kmaang kcha' a. Mdittu' mma ngi paamkbiik laiyi morson somtku leitku mapthidon ungta kmaang kcha' khat ava' mphanduh khimkheiyi chetda thlaam nimeh mow?
Ungta mma ngi ava' mphan chaak thung ngi, mkanpat chaak ki yau avah mluwkou 'leenni pko'ongda.
Ungta mma ngi inn mtlun thungta maplap rekle' mi'innveen rek avah own purkuwk lamda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Ikanpasap inche, mleiya neiyi kmaang kcha' kyau avah kphan chaak a.’

Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, anto' heppi, plung kperthleng dok kcha' mii kindit somtku leitku rek leiyi, tkanpat ava' han'tun nuh, plung kperthleng kcha' khatpang ava'leiyi parvaan thah kerkheelset tih tkanpatna' ka'am rah.
Mditmata snu khat tih jiipowl sumqiit sowm thlowi chda ungta sumqiit khat tah pmaang pthida. Mdittu' mma ngi meila plengdon khat ava' mphanduh khimkheiyi ktipnek ki thlaam nimeh mow?
Ungta mma ngi ava' mphan chaak thung ngi maplap rekle' mi'innveen rek owndon hanto' kther rah, ‘Ikanpasap inche, mleiya neiyi kdopmaan sumqiit avah kphan chaak a.’
Anto' heppi Neiyi kthe a, Isowr vaantamsi rek aang ngi plung kperthleng kcha' khat ava'leiyi tkanpatna' ka'am rah.”
Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Miikhat tih chapa 'knii thlowi chda.
Ungta mokmow ava ngi mpa hinni hanto'theda: ‘Apa nei kthen rah alrou avah mheipii dok.’ Mthungta mma ngi mmaanve hinni sum'alrou avah penthem piik lamda.
Ungta mnit trek kma' daat thung ngi mchapa kmow ava ngi mkheng ngi purkuwkda. Ungta mma ngi horda khuwpaam 'lamkla khat thah pjiinda ungta mma ngi msum'alrou rek avah ktirki kmah ptlang pthida.
Pdainu mma ngi mdothlowi mkheng ava' maptlan dok le' mpaam ava' thung ngi powitham kdungyou kchang ngi thuwkda. Ungta mma ngi dow tikriin rah pqhunda.
Audilli mma ngi chetda khuwpaam ava' thung ki svangpu khat hinni thamlow chda. Ungta mma ngi vakluwng rek kapmaal rah mlou thah mma' avah sida.
Mma ngi vakluwng rek dochaak vakthen ava ngi kpowi tappaa chrang paknu dida, pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi dow khatleh ruk pii chlam mda.

Pdainu mma ngi mkirbin pthuhhowl thungta, mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kpa hinni thamklow kcha' suwk rekka thenpen kkhop kkhop pih thlowi lamda ungta karsak ki thlowi lamda, ungta neiya hava' thuh powitham mih kdi rah kthe a.
Neiyi korlou nih kpa ngeng ngeng, pha chdaat nih ungta mhin nih hanto' the chnih: ‘Apa, neiyi parvaan kepteng ngi ungta nang a'aang ngi pnu kerve chaak a.
Ungta neiya nang achapa kurthuwk ki mtik chaporson maang. Neiya tham klow kcha', asuwk rek khat mheipthut cha',’ dinikdi'.”
Audilli mma ngi ripda mpa hinni kerheel chda. Pdainu mma ngi 'lamkla dok ki murhun arlaan nih, mpa ngi avah deida ungta plung pkham chda. Ungta mma ngi juchenda mlowl thah arpomda ungta put chda.
Ungta mchapa ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Apa! Neiyi parvaan kepteng ngi ungta nang amiksut thung ngi pnu kerve chaak a. Ungta neiya achapa kurthuwk ki mtik chaporson chmaang,’ dida.
Pdainu mpa ngi msuwk rek hinni hanto'theda: ‘Buwdiir makqhasi arvansinin rang ngi apnaakin ungta mkhut 'leenni khutpaar apnaakin ungta mkhuh 'leenni khuhkok apnaakin.
Ungta tapmar silsuwn avah arvanqhiin ungta a'eyou'in ungta neen nih ava' ichaan cheh rah ikporchong inche.
Mleiya hava' kchapa avah kmaang kcha' thungki tphan chaakin.’ Ungta anto ngi mmaan nih kporchong chlamda.
'Tunnu mma' upa avah lou thah ka'am chdaat. Ungta mma ngi arhungda inn murhunnai thungta mma ngi laakrowl le' kardaam archaang arjada.
Mthungta mma ngi msuwk rek khat ownda ungta hava'le' avah talu tidit kheelda.
Ungta mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Anaupa tlung kerheelda ungta apa ngi anaupa avah kchun kahaam mih mdo'arlaan chaak leiyi, tapmar silsuwn avah mdo’eyow piik.’
Pdainu mmah muplung thida ungta tvanluw rah row mda. Avaleiyi, mpa ngi arvang thuwkda mma' avah pnuwm chda.

Mthungta mma ngi mpa pau avah arthaangda hanto'theda: ‘Asuw o, hava' kum tya thung ngi neiyi nang nga sop'alow chnuh, neiyi teden rukku apaupiik rek avah tukksut kma' tlowmaang. Pdainu nang ngi, neiyi kaplap rektu' kporchon chaakna' raan ki thenni keelsuwn khadaat ruk mpii mtih.
Ungta hava' achapa, asum'alrou dakkurjur snu rektu, kcha dok ava' mtlun daat le' nang ngi tapmar silsuwn avah eyowpiik tinu,’ dida.
Ungta mpa ngi mchapa hinni hanto'theda: ‘Kchapa, nang nga mpha ktai thung ngi nei tu' amve minnu ungta neiyi kdothlowi mkheng avah nang adoyesang.
Havah hanto'kat rah, tidit tah neen nih porchongda tkanpat chaak rah. Mleiya anaupa avah kdiyou dok kcha' thungki kring kerheel ungta mmah kmaang kcha' thungki tphan chaakin,” dida.

Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Svangpa khat amda ungta mma ngi suwkkenreel khat thlowida. Ungta suwkkenreel ava ngi mma' sum'alrou rek avah mpartlai a tidit ki mraal avah mhin nih song lamda.

Mthungta mma ngi suwkkenreel avah ownda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi hava' kdo'arjaak avah taluda? Kihin nih anongtlotna' rekki mleikindit avah mheipii dok, mleiya 'tunnu nang nga suwkkenreel kurthuwk porson nimtih.’

Audilli suwkkenreel ava ngi mdak mthina ngi, neiya talu tlow nikdi'? Mleiya kukpupa ngi neiki suwkkenreel kkurthuhna' avah kihin ki kloupthi rangnga. Neiya khor ktoulow pchaang maang ungta kthamda tiqhil chaak rang ruk kning kakyak a.

Kqha a kukpupa ngi suwkkenreel tkurthuhna' thungki nei avah mtolowpthi thung ngu talu tlow nikdi', tidit neiyi kdeh a. Mmaan nih neiya mi'innin thung ngi mdotarlaan chaak lamna' rah neiyi havah tlow nikdi'.
Mthungta mma ngi mma' kpupa ava' hinni leenlei kervei rek khimkhei avah mhin nih own purkuwk lamda ungta mkhatna' ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang nga nei kukpupa hinni leenlei tya arve o?’

Ungta mma ngi, ‘kruwn reidii til arja khat kdo' arve daat,’ dida. Mthungta mma ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Nang ngi nangki aleenlei tikjitna' chena hava' alou rang ngi kbeisek ki iko'ong rah somparnga akjit.’

Audilli mma ngi morson khat ava' hinni theda: ‘Ungta nangvah tya ado'arve o?’ Mthungta mma ngi: ‘Chavui til arja khat kdo'arve daat,’ dida. Ungta mma ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Nang ngi nangki aleenlei tikjitna' che hava' alou rang ngi somtreht akjit,’ dida.

Mthungta mukpu ava ngi mrinkindit kma' suwkkenreel avah mma ngi kinrit dok ki nong mdotlot leiyi, panpaak chda. Mleiya hava' dultipaam ki mii rekka mmaan ki mdomna rekin tsintonna' 'leen vah mar'aang ki nau rek hinni kinrit lam.

Ungta Neiyi kthe a, naan nih mrinkindit kma' sum'alrou rek avah naan adaksaan ki thenni plap apthut chaan. Mleiya naan nih athlowi maan thung ngi mmaan nih naan avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ta'amna' thuh akarlaang chraan.
Mnau'suwn thung ngi trinchaak krow mma' avah knempa thung rukku trinchaak krow. Ungta mnau'suwn thung ngi ktobor mma' avah knempa thung rukku ktobor.
Avaleiyi, naan nih mrinkindit kma' sum'alrou 'leenni trinchaak krow kma' akurthuhn nuh, kindit svangthuhna' thung ngi kuw ngi naanna lam'akrin chdaat raanno?
Ungta naan nih mii morson dona rek 'leenni trinchaak krow kma' akurthuhn nuh kuw ngi naan adow rekin avah akpii raanno?

Suwk kuwkhat leh ngi mukpu 'knii soplow pchaang meh mleiya mma ngi khat haldon ungta ktlok khat avah vonsat klow chrah. Mditma bih mma ngi khat 'leenni popdon ktlok khat avah tuksut nimeh. Naan nih Isowr le' sum'alrou avah soplowve pchaang nimaan tih.”
'Tunnu sum kngei Pharisy rek rukku hava'le' mkheng avah arja lamda, ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah pni chaak lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna mii rek maiyi mdak kpindit kcha' mii rek inptih. Pdainu Isowr rih aplung rekin avah mdeh. Mleiya dultimii rek arlak ki kparthaang dok ki tbinpsuk avah Isowr miksut thung ngi tepder chaak kurhuwi.

Johon mthlen duh kpha thung ngi mii rekki Nowlam le' Khulpu rek dothe ava' mdoparjaamin. Mpha ava' ki kupqhun nih mii rekki Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah parjaam lamda ungta mii khimkheiyi ava' thung daat tih kluwt rah korlown lamda.
Ungta parvaan le' dultipaam mqut chaak rang ava' hinvah nowlam thungki kbih'suwn khat mkertlei rang ava ngi kparsabet.
Kuwku yoso mnuwn kenqhenqhi thida snu morson khat kok'onqhi mma' ava ngi lowsang mqhi a ungta kuwku yoso tkenqhenqhi snu ava' kok'onqhi mma' rukku lowsang mqhi a.
Svangpa khat amda ungta mma ngi kning ngi ksen buwdiir le' buw kperneem kqha hilnada mniiktaiyi kporchong dok ki am kchokda.
Pdainu kthamkqhil kcha' ungta mdak mkheng kheng ngi paanda ka'am kcha' mmiing Lajaras tidit khat ruk amda ungta mii rekki mma' avah svangpa ava' thurngut bulli pko'ong lamda.
Mma ngi svangpa maalna' khaan 'leenki ktla thenkri ava' chomda mpowi tappat chaak rah bin chda, ava' daat kma' ui rekki m'leen ki kpaan rek avah pha lamda pliik kchok lamda.
Mthungta anto ngi kthamkqhil kcha' mii avah diyou chda ungta mma' avah vaantamsi rekki Abraham aang thah hunqhi chlamda. Ungta svangpa ava' rukka diyouda ungta alruwl lamda.
Ungta mmah Kdikhuw thah chiikreel lih am chda ungta mma ngi knaanda khu mahansut thungta 'lamkla ngi Abraham handeida ungta Lajaras avah mma' aang ngi ka'am daat handeida.

Audilli mma ngi owngda hanto' hantheda: ‘Apa Abraham, plung mheipnee cha', ungta Lajaras arjupthla rang ngi dii thuh mkhutchal mowr aphuwm thiso rang ngi keplei avah mheipdai piik chso. Mleiya neiya hava' mei thung ngi suwk kthuwk kchaam ping.

Pdainu Abraham mih theda: ‘Kchapa, nang ngi dultipaam ki arinkhu avah abinphaak, nang nga dow kqha rek avah kurkhum mih arlaang dok chtinu, ungta Lajaras tah dow kqha kma' mdo'arlaan chaak. Pdainu 'tunvah mmah plung ngamna' phang chda ungta nang nga chiitreelna' adophan chaak.

Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava' han'tun nih, neen kihin ki ngi naan ahin nih kyunuwm rekki myukmana' ungta naan ahinki ngi neen kihin nih marhan mana' rang ki thenni nang le' neen narlak ki laikarkhaan klin khat mdothiik dok.’
Mma ngi hanto'theda qhil chda, ‘Mdit cheentung ngi, Apa nang ngi mma' avah kpa inn thah mheipthlat piikcha'.
Mleiya neiya ku'uknau parnga ka'am lam, tidit tah mmaan rukka hava' chiitreelna' mun thung ngi merheimana' raan ki thenni mma ngi mmaan avah apilqhit chlamso.’
Abraham mih mhin nih theda: ‘Mmaan nih Moses le' Khulpu rekki laika rek ava' mdothlowi chaakin, mmaan nih mmaan pauthe ava' karja chdaat lamrah.’
Ungta mma ngi theda: ‘Immeh apa Abraham, mmaan nih kdiyou dok ksa thungki miikhat mvan bih, plung kperthleng chlam rah.’
Pdainu mma ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Mmaan nih Moses le' Khulpu rek dothe marjaak chaak maanbi, kdiyou thungki khat kerdelda vangkerheel yoso mmaan pau avah lam'rinlam nimeh,’ dida.”
Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Khuhsiir tpirthitna' avah marvanmana' qhaliit nimeh. Pdainu mmaan ava' kthuhqhi mma' 'leenni suwthitna' ka'am a.
Mleiya hava' kdil'suwn rek khuhsiir ktipirthih mma' avah mlowl 'leenni buhsuk lung khat pirsi thida truwnpii thuh taptlaak pthipleh ngi mma' thenvah kqha rah.
Naan nih ikilrindei chaan’. A'uanau vih a'leen nih pnu merve chaak dok cheentung ngi mma' avah arai ungta plung mperthlen chaak cheentung ngi mma' avah aptlot piikcha'.

Ungta mma ngi niikhat thuh a'leen nih veitikhiu pnu aterve psuk dok a ungta mma ngi niikhat thuh veitikhiu kenleso ahin nih plung kperthlen chaak a mdit chaak cheentung ngi mma' avah nang ngi adoptlot piik rah.”
Ungta tamsi rekki Kruwng hinni: “Neen klamrinin mheipkheel piik chaan,” dilamda.

Mthungta Kruwng ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih anruwng muwpang daat yoso alamrinin ma'am bih, naan nih hava' beempqhi dingbul ava' hinni, ‘Arjung jung ngi ikurphui rang ngi truwnpii thuh imowng cha'’ dipchaang naandi' ungta ava ngi naan apautheen avah kopqowi rah.
Ungta naan arlakin ki suwk kthlowi khat tih, msuwk khat tih lou kikriit mditmata yaukqhi ava ngi louki mtlun le' ardada, ‘arvang rang ngi iko'ong rah imaal dok’ kdi rah kuw am naandi?

Pdainu ava' kchang ngi mma ngi msuwk ava' hinni, ‘Nei kthen nih kluh ki von avaidok ungta arkowl ajeel rang ngi then kchaak kneek dokduh khimkheiyi sopmheilow ungta kmaal dok dilli nang nga charow neerownadi',’ dinimeh mow?
Ungta mma' paupiik khimkhei rek ava' mdotlot leiyi, mma ngi suwk avah kpanpaak rang? Neiya kpanpaak rah binmaang.

Anto' heppi naan rukku, naan ahin nih adotlot raan ki thenni paupiik adotpiikin dow rek mkheng ava' atlot dokin dilli hanto' atheen, ‘neenna trinchaak krow kma' suwk inping, neen nih kdotlot raan knongin avah ktlot dok inna.’ ”
'Tunnu Mma ngi Jerusalem ki rah mahan thung ngi Mma ngi Samaria le' Galily paamkuwl rek kthleng ngi chetda.
Audilli Mma ngi khuw khat thuh luwtda ungta ava' thuh 'lamkla ngi krip raichi ktong miilai sowm rek ava ngi Mma' avah kurdutqhi chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Jisu, Mukpu, neenna plung mheipnee chaan.”

Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan mheideh thungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Vaan rang ngi adakin avah thimpu rek hinni ikterdet chaan,” dida. Ungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah mmaan nih anto' mvan inni mraichiitonin thungki mmaan avah kertleu chlamda.
'Tunnu mmaan arlak ki khat tih mma ngi kdam kchaam ping tidit mdeh thungta kerheelda krowl kparthaang ngi owngda Isowr panpaak chda.
Ungta mma ngi Mma' khuhther rih tluw chda ungta Mma' avah panpaak chda. Ungta mma' avah Samaria ki mii.
Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Kertleu kcha' rekka chaisowm lam pemeh mow? Tu'uwng lamda tku rekka?
Hava' khuwveen ki mal ava' kma'don kerheelda Isowr kpanpaak chrah kuwkhat leh ammeh mow?”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ikerdel rang ngi a'lamqowi thah isun cha', alamrin chaak ki nang nga atapdam chaak a.”
'Tunnu Pharisy rekki Mhin nih, Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah teden kurjung rang, tidit kheel lamda? Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda arthaangda: “Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah mik ki tedeh daat tih arjung nuwm meh.
Mditmata, hithah asuwn mditmata wvih thah asuwn aditpiikin nimeh. Mleiya asuwn dakkat tih Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah naan arlak inni ka'am daat a.”
Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni theda: “Naan nih Mii Chapa amna' nit rek amikin nih tedeh chaak rah adongeinaan mpha avah karvang rah pdainu naan nih avah dei chnih maantih.
Ungta mmaan nih naan ahin nih, ‘asuwn hithah ka'am a, ungta asuwn wvih thah ka'am a,’ kdi lamrah. Ava' thuh naanna chetmaan ungta mmaandil qowimaan.
Mleiya kowl keplek ki paang khat ki mepleh ava ngi parvaan kurduh ki morson paang khat ki kpha ngi mlen ava' heppi Mii Chapa ava' rukka Mma' nit ava' thung vah anto'hep daat rah.
Pdainu rukrirep pih Mma ngi tyattraanna' avah kperteel rah ungta hava' suruwl ki mii rekki Mma' avah kepthlei lamrah.
Ungta Noah amthung ki mpha heppi Mii Chapa amthung ki mpha ava' rukka kthuwk rah.
Noah ngi arkuwngpii thung ngi mluwnit kpha ngi mmaan nih chanee lamda snu the lamda inn'kperne lamda ka'am lam. Ungta diipa kenleda ungta mmaan mkheng avah tpenveipet pthi lamda.
Anto'hep daat tih Lot ki mpha thung rukvah mmaan nih chanee lamda, ren lamda yur lamda, pqau lamda ungta inn sa lamda ka'am lam.
Pdainu Lot tih Sodom khuwpii thungki mvanthuh nit tih parvaan ki mei le' kantuk khu ngi rahda ungta ava ngi mmaan mkheng avah tpenveipet pthi lamda.
Anto' heppi Mii Chapa ava' mpurphuwn thung rukku kthuwk rah.

Nit ava' thung ngi inntun thah ka'am dok kcha' mma' ava ngi inn thung thah mdomna ka'am daat klou rah arjungqum mso. Ungta anto' heppi loulaiyi ka'am mma' ava ngi mdil thah ka'am kcha' rek klou rah arvang kerheel mso.
Lot snu avah abinphaakin.
Kuwku yoso mdaksa ki mrinkum tsanna' rah kthlaam kcha' mma' ava ngi avah kpenvei chrah ungta kuwku yoso mdaksa ki mrinkum kpenvei kcha' mma' ava ngi avah kparkhaal chrah.
Neiyi akthepiik inna, jaan nih kowm khat 'leenni mii'knii ki'iipve rah, khat tah klou chrah ungta morson khat tah kmapthi rah.
Snu 'knii ngi buhsuk lung thuh buh ksuwve lamrah, khat tah klou chrah ungta morson khat tah kmapthi rah.
Pselpa 'knii avah louthuh ka'amve lamrah khat tah klou rah ungta morson khat tah kmapthi rah.”

Ungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng tva'thung rangda adohunqhi lamna' rang nga?” Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Daksa amna' thung ngi laangkya rek avah kurkuwk lamrah.”
Audilli Mma ngi, mpha ktai thung ngi rinmaktham chaakna' raan ungta muplungin mkenlet votmana' rah mii rek hinni hava' pau tportolna' khat tih hanto'theda:
“Khuwpii khat thung ngi Isowr ruk kqi kma' ungta dultimii ruk kakyat kma' paukpinditpa khat amda.
Ungta meikhunu khat ruk khuwpii ava' thung ngi ka'am. Ungta mma ngi paukpinditpa ava' hinni thlengda, mma' kepteng mii ava' 'leenni pau mheipindit piikcha' dida ktham chda.
Ungta mma ngi mpha mruk thung ngu avah tlow nimeh pdainu mdil thah mma ngi mthina hanto' kerthe rah, ‘Neiyi Isowr qimyow rih ungta dultimii ruk kyatmyow ringngi,
Neiyi pau a pinditpiik dok daatnih mleiya mma ngi mtapyat likka, mditma bih kornowl reen nih mthlen ava ngi mkapya ktlok rah,’ dida.”
Audilli Kruwng ngi theda: “Mlangkma' paukpinditpa ava ngi pau mdothe avah arjaan.

Mleiya mmaan nih suwn le' jaan nih mo'own chaakin leiyi, ungta Isowr rih mmaan avah tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mdo'arjaak chaak lam leiyi, Isowr rih, Mma ngi mdokchol chaak rek ava' 'leenni kindit pau tpinditna' avah tpurthuh piik nimeh mow?
Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Mma ngi kbeisek ki mmaan thenni kindit tih paukpindit piik rah. Anto'daat yoso, Mii Chapa murjun thung ngu, dultipaam thuh dakat tih lamkrin kcha' mii kphang rang mow?”
Ungta Mma ngi, mdak mthinaan nih mrinkindit rekin ping kdi kcha' ungta lamkilrin kcha' ungta mii morson tukksut kma' mii aangqhe rek hinni hava' pauportol ava' theda:
“Luwbuk'inn thah rinkaktham chrang ngi mii'knii hang lamda. Khat avah Pharisy ungta ktlok khat avah sumkqhaipa khat.

Pharisypa ava ngi mthina ripda hanto ngi rinktham chda. ‘Isowr neiya mii morson rek hepkma' kkurthuh chaak leiyi, akpanpaak chaak a. Mleiya mmaan nah miidona 'leen changtlaak kthlowi lam, kindit lam pemeh, ungta lowsang kqhi lam. Ungta neiya hava' sumkqhaipa ava' hep daat pmaang.
Neiyi arveen khat thung ngi vei'knii then ngowl chnuh ungta neiyi kdophan chaak rek mkheng ki sowm ki khat tah kdopiik chaak,’ dida.
Pdainu sumkqhaipa avah 'lamkla ngi rip chda ungta mma ngi parvaan ruk hansuw meh. Mma ngi muplung tpeengda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Isowr pnu kervei kcha' neiya plung mheipnee cha',’ dida.

Neiyi, naan ahin nih kthe a: Isowr rih hava' mii avah ktlok khat ava' hinni mpindit chaak dilli anto ngi mmah mi'inn thah ksun kcha'. Mleiya mthina kpirlin kcha' mma' avah kipdil pthirah, ungta mthina kpirdil kcha' mma' avah kiplin chrah.’ ”
Audilli mmaan nih Jisu hinni nausisi rek avah Mma ngi mdokmei chaak lam rang ki thenni arvanqhi lamda. Pdainu Msikhu rekki ava' mdehn thungta mmaan avah rai lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan avah Mhin nih own lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Nausisi rek avah Nei kihin nih arva lamso, mmaan avah pkhaanmaan. Mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah hava' hep daat mii rekki then.”
Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna: “Kuwku yoso hava' nau khat heppi Isowr Kruwngpaalna' ava' karlaang kma' avah talu hepkduh yoso ava' thuh luwtvot nimeh.”
'Tunnu svangpa paamkpu khat ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda, kheel chda: “Kqha Chukpu ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah alrouchom mih kdochom chaakna' rah neiyi talu tlow nikdi' o?”
Mthungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya kqha atidit tah? Kqha Khat ka'am Isowr ava' kma'don kqha kuwkhat leh ka'am pemeh.
‘Nang ngi lowsang qhima, Mii eyouma', Miidona pruma', Mlangkma' sakhi piima', Anuh le' apa akyatcha', Tidit paupiik rek avah nang ngi deitinu,’ ” dida. (Mpk. 20:12-16 Knl. 5:16-20)
Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Hava' mkheng avah neiyi kmotki kupqhun nih kdopqowi chaak.”

Mthungta Jisu ngi hava'le' marjaak thungta. Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “'Tun rukku nang ngi dow khat aptat daat a. Nang ngi adothlowi mkheng avah ayurpthi rang ngi srah rek hinni athem piiklam. Ungta ava ngi nang nga parvaan thah asum'alrou ka'am chrah. Ava' dilli arva rang ngi Neikdil aqowi cha',” dida.
Pdainu mma ngi hava' marjaak thungta muplung kdung ngi kya pqhunda mleiya mmah kdung ngi svang.
Ungta Jisu ngi mma' plungyat ava' mdeh thungta hanto'theda: “Sum'alrou knem mih kthlowi kcha' rekki Isowr Kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw raan avah tya thung ngi kparsa chdaat a!
Mleiya svangpa khat tih Isowr Kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw rang hinvah uwt khat tih preukna thung ngi mluw chaak pleh ngi ko'olbet rah.”
Ungta ava' karja rekki. “Mdittu' kuwda karsan chrang a,” dilamda?
Pdainu Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dultimii hinni kurthuwk kma' dow rek avah Isowr hinvah kurthuwk pchaang.”
Audilli Pitar rih theda: “Asuw o, neen nih dow mkheng mapthi dok thiin nuh Nang adokqowi chaakin.”

Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna: ‘Kuwkhat leh rukku, Isowr Kruwngpaalna' ki thenni mi'inn mlou, mditmata mnuhmpa mditmata mu'umnau, mditmata mnuwn, mditmata mnaumsuwn kmapthi ka'am pemeh.
Ma'am bih, mma ngi hava' 'tunki mpha thung ngi mtum kerkheelset tih karlaang chrah ungta karvang meek mpha ava' thung ngi mma ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah karlaang chrah.”

Audilli Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah qhi ptliing lam thida hanto'theda: “Asuwn! neenna Jerusalem thah kahang thangin pimin. Ungta Mii Chapa ava'leiyi Khulpu rekki mdokjit dokin dow mkheng avah mkurtluwm rah.
Mleiya Mma' avah Chaatktlei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthi rah ungta kipni chaak lamrah ungta ningkya kpiilam rah ungta M'leen nih ptil kopthotpsuk lamrah.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah rii kchung ngi kbun lamrah ungta ke'eyou lamrah. Pdainu mnii kdumna' thung ngi Mmah veikhat kerdel nowl rah.”
Pdainu mmaan nih hava'le' avah khadaat ruk deipindih lam mda. Mleiya hava' paulam rek avah mmaan hinvah kordowl kcha' ungta Mma ngi mdothe pauna rek avah mdodeh chaakin pemeh.
Audilli hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya Mma ngi Jerikho beh ngi merhei meek arlaan nih mmikktot miikhat avah 'lambeh ngi ko'ongda qhiltham chda.
Ungta mma ngi miipii rekpa kchet marjaak thungta talulu ka'am plih tidit kheel chlamda.
Mthungta mmaan nih: “Najareth ki Jisu kthleng nga,” ditpiik lamda.
Ungta mma ngi owngda hanto'theda: “David Chapa Jisu neiya plung mheipnee cha'.”,
Mthungta mduh thah kchet rek ava ngi rim ma'amna' rah rai lamda. Pdainu mma ngi kerkheel set tih owngda, “David Chapa neiya plung mheipnee cha',” dida.
Mthungta Jisu ngi ripda ungta mma' avah Mhin nih mdo'arvan qhina' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda. Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih merheinai thungta Mma ngi kheelda.
Hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang athenni talu adoktlot piik rah angeiya?” Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng! kmik ki khu dei chni'ii!”
Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Amik ki kvaar adeicha', alamrin chaak ki nang nga atapdam chaak a.”
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi khu dei chda ungta Mma'dil qowida Isowr ponlor chda. Ungta mii mkheng ngi ava' mdehn thungta Isowr panpaak chlamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi Jerikho khuwpii thuh luwtda ungta kthleng ngi chetda.
'Tunnu asuwn, ava' thuh mmiing Jakhayas tidit sumkqhai rekki kruwng khat ka'am ungta mmah svang.
Ungta mma ngi Jisu avah kuw tidit ksuw chrang ngi thlaam chda. Pdainu mdung mtowi chaak vah miipii rek leiyi, dei pchaang mda.
Mthungta mma ngi mduh thah heichenda Mma' ksuw rang ngi bungkba ding khat 'leenni kalda. Mleiya Mma' avah ava' 'lam qowidon nih karva beirah.
Ungta Jisu ngi ava' mun mphaak thungta knaanda hansuwda ungta mma' avah handeida, ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Jakhayas, kbeisek ki arjungqum, mleiya tuniyu nang a'inn thuh tlung nikdi'.”
Mthungta mma ngi kbeisek ki arjung qumda ungta Mma' avah kanpa ngi arlaang chda.
Pdainu mmaan nih ava' mdehn thungta mkheng inni nurnur kdi ngi hanto' the lamda: “Mmah pnu kervei mii ava' hinni, mi'innmal khat tih ktlung daat a,” dilamda.

Audilli Jakhayas tih ripda Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Asuw o, Kruwng neiyi kdothlowi chaak kdokna mqim avah srah rek hinni kdopiik chaak lam. Ungta neiyi karmak dok ki kuwmiikhat hinki mlangkmah ngi mraal piida kuwku hinki yoso klow dokcheu, neiyi avah tum plii thlolnu kdopenlet chaak.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Tuniyu tkirliinna' avah hava' inn thung ngi ktlung a, mleiya mma' rukka Abraham chapa.
Mleiya Mii Chapa avah kmaang kcha' ava' kthlaam rang ki ungta ksan rang ki thenni kurjung.” sowm ki mleiyi pauportol

'Tunnu mmaan nih ava' marjaakin arlaan nih Mma ngi pauportol morson khat ruk theda. Mleiya mmaan nah Jerusalem ktlung chrah mdotheen ungta mmaan nih Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah kbeisek ki tlung rang pakda tidit tih mdobinin.
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Takyat kurhuwi miikhat ava ngi mthen nih kruwngpaalna' khat karlaang chrang ki thenni khuwpaam 'lamkla khat thah veikhat ktlung kerheel rang ki ngi pjiin chda.
Mthungta mma ngi msuwk sowm rek avah own lamda ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni mina sowm avah thempiik lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: ‘Naan nih nei ktlun duh khimkheiyi hava ngi sumnong atlotnaan.’

Pdainu mma' avah mpaam ki mii rekki mdohal chaakin ungta mmaan nih mdilpqowi lamda pau kthe rah mii pthlatpsuk lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: ‘Neen nih hava' mii ava ngi k'leenin nih mukpu tupthuh rah ngeimaan ring,’ dilamda.

Ungta 'tunnu mma ngi kruwngpaalna' ava' arlaangda marvan kerheel mpha thung ngi mma ngi miikhat khat tih sum tyaya mlot naanna tidit mdodehna' rang ki thenni, mma ngi mhin nih sum mdopiik suwk rek avah mthlenna' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda.
Audilli mkhatna' ava ngi thlengda hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu, neiyi nang amina ava ngi mina sowm klot chaak a.’

Ungta mma ngi suwk ava' hinni theda: ‘Suwk kqha, nang nga nong kqha ngi atlotta. Nang ngi mnau'suwn thung ngi trin chaak krow nong adotlot leiyi, nang nga khuwpii sowm tsutpqowina' ki ruhtanna' akpiik a.’
Ungta miknitna' thleng nowlda hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu nang amina ava ngi mina parnga klot chaak a.’
Anto' heppi mma ngi suwk ava' hinni theda: ‘Nang rukka khuwpii parnga 'leenni mukpu ikurthuwk.’
Ungta morson khat thlengda hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu amina a, hithah ka'am daat a, neiyi buwlaak 'suwn khat thung ngi klumnu kdothiik daat.
Mleiya nang nga raanqhul mii akurthuh leiyi, adokqit chaak. Nang nga ado'purtuwlma ava' kqhai ptih ungta adopqauma ava' kurkun ptih.’

Ungta mma ngi suwk ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Suwk kqha kma', nang anehr kat thungki apau ava ngi neiyi a'leen nih pau'apindit nikdi'. Nang ngi neiya raanqhul mii ping ungta kdopurtuwl mana' thungki klou ungta kdopqau mana' thungki kurkun ping tidit deitinu.
Mdittu' neiyi ktlun kerheel thung ngi m'leenki kpop tu' kilqhi ngi kdolow chaakna' rah taluleiyi nang ngi nei ksum avah sum'inn thung ngi adothikma?’
Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh krip rek hinni hanto'theda: ‘Mma' hinki mina avah alouin rang ngi mina sowm kthlowi hinni apiin.’
Pdainu mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: ‘Mukpu, mmah mina sowm mdothlowi daat,’ dilamda.
Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. ‘Mleiya kthlowi kcha' khimkhei rek hinni kpiikpom rah ungta kthlowi kma' mma' hinki avah mma ngi mdothlowi chaak kpha thungki rukka kloupthi rah.
'Tunnu nei kmiihal rek, tidit tah neiyi mmaan 'tun nih mukpu kkurthuh rah kngei kma' mii rek avah arvanqhiin. Ungta mmaan avah nei kmaiyi a'eyou'in,” dida.
Mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli Mma ngi Jerusalem ktong thah hang thangda.
Audilli 'tunnu Mmah Bethphage le' Bethany khuw tidit tah Kruwn lown hankpha rah theda. Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu 'knii rek avah heipthla lamda.

Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi wva' raal kerdeen khuw ava' thung ngi vaan ungta naanve ngi avanluwnaan thung ngi kuwkhat leh doko'onna' mlai skowlraam suwn khat kpursuk daat deinaandi'. Naanve ngi avah apethletin rang ngi arvanqhiin.
Ungta kuwmiikhat tih taluleiyi avah aperthleen a, atiditin cheentung ngi? Naanve ngi, ‘Mleiya Kruwng ngi mdopsit rah amda.’ adiin.”
Mthungta teheisi dok rek avah valamda ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni mdothe ava'jik ki ka'am dei lamda.
Pdainu mmaanve ngi skowlraam suwn ava' mperthlemeekin arlaan nih ava' kpupa ava ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naanve ngi skowlraam suwn avah aperthleen a?”
Mthungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng ngi dow mdopsit rah amda,” dilamda.
Audilli mmaanve ngi avah Jisu hinni arvanqhi lamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi mmaan ki mdomna rekin avah skowlraam suwn ava' 'leenni var lamda ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih Jisu avah pko'ong lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi anto ngi mahan thungta mmaan nih mdomnaan avah 'lampii thung ngi phat lamda.

Audilli Mma ngi Kruwn lown, jowl mahan phaak sousou thung ngi sikhu kurthuwk miipii rek mkheng inni kanpa lamda ungta Isowr ponlor chlamda. Mleiya mmaan nih ruhtan nong rek kthuwk avah mmikin nih mdodeh chaak dokin.
Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng paamkruwng avah msuwkqha a! (Luw. 118:26) Parvaan thah plung kdai ikurthuwkso ungta kparthaangsi ngi Konlor kcha' ikurthuwkso!”
Ungta miipii rek arlak ki Pharisy rek aangqhe ngi, “Chukpu Asikhu rek avah arailam,” dilamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, hava'le' ava ngi rimkdi ma'am daatin bih lung rek ko'owng lamrah.”
'Tunnu Mma ngi mhannai thungta Mma ngi khuwpii avah handeida ungta ava' 'leenni qap chda.

Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi tuni ngi, tidit tah nang athenni plungdaina' aktlotpiik dow rek avah nang adak kat tih adeh chaak daat bih. Pdainu 'tunnu mmaan avah nang amiksut thungki kordowl kcha' a.
Mleiya nang amiihal rekki akloijik ki dulti bang adotutkhul psuk lamna' rah ungta mmaan nih nang avah mmun mkheng thung ngi aloijik lamdon nih adotkhum lamna' rah nit rek avah karvang rah.

Ungta mmaan nih nang le' anau le' avah nang arowng thung ngi dulti tu' kinqim mih akporlow pthi lamrah. Mmaan nih nang athungki lung khadaat ruk kurtuwn daat tih mapthi daat lam nimeh. Mleiya nang ngi Isowr rih adotvel chaakna' mpha avah adodeh pindit chaak pemeh.”
Audilli Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thuh luwtda ungta ava' thung ngi kyur le' kren rek avah treipthi pqhunda.
Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “‘Nei ki'inn avah rinkthamna' inn,’ dida mdokjit dok. (Is. 56:7) Pdainu naan nih avah, ‘Raanqhul kupru rek khor’ apthut inna.” (Jer. 7:11)
Ungta Mma ngi mniiktai luwbuk'inn thung ngi purchuk tlit lamda. Pdainu thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta mii rekki luwkqhi rekki Mma' avah te'eyow rang ngi thlaam lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih Mma' 'leenni dow khatleh tlow pchaang lam mda, mleiya mii mkheng avah Mma' dothe karja chrang ngi muplungin kluwtsap kcha'.

'Tunnu Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi mii rek purchukda ungta kqhapaumin parjaamda ma'amna' nit rek thung ngi niikhat tih hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rekki Mma' avah pha lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah talu ruhtanna' ngi adotlot tidit mheithe piikin? Mditmata hava' ruhtanna' avah kuw ngi Nang ahin nuh adotpiikko?”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku naan ahin nih paukhat ayukheel inni, mhei'arthaangin.
Johon diipluwna' avah parvaan ki mow mditmata dultimii hinki o?”
Mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “Neen nih parvaan ki nditin bih, Mma ngi, ‘Mdittu' taluleiyi naan nih mmah lam'rin chmaantio?’ mikdi raan.
Pdainu neen nih dultimii hinki, ndit bih, mii mkheng ngi lung ngi mikdeeng raan. Mleiya mmaan nih Johon avah khulpu khat tidit tih mdobin chaak dokin.”
Mthungta mmaan nih, neenna tva'ki tidit deimaan ring’ dilamda, arthaang lamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku talu ruhtanna' ngi kdotlot tidit avah athepiik nimaanring.”

Audilli Mma ngi hava' pauportolna' avah mii rek hinni tethe pqhunda: ‘Miikhat tih riithlumbil khat thlowi chda. Ungta mma ngi avah riithlumbil knum mii rek hinni mandown nih piilam thida mpha rowiksowt ki thenni khuwpaam 'lamkla thah pjiin chda.

'Tunnu riithlum minna' mpha thung ngi mma ngi msuwk'owr khat avah riithlum knum rek hinni riithlumbil ava' thung ki mchei mruk klou rah heipthlada. Pdainu riithlum knum rek ava ngi mma' avah bun lam thida mdakden nih heipthla pthi lamda.
Veikhat mma ngi suwk'owr morson khat arheipthla nowlda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' rukka bun lamda ungta ningkya pii lamda ungta mdakden nih heisi pthi nowl lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mukdumna' arhei pthlada. Ungta mmaan nih mma' rukka plim lamda ungta rowng duwn thah varpthi lamda.’
Audilli riithlumbil kpupa ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘'Tunnu neiyi talu tlow nikdi' o? Neiyi kvonsat'low kchapa ava' ipthla nih. Mmaan nih mma'kat tah mdehn bih kakyat kcha'lam krow,’ dida.

Pdainu riithlumbil knum rek ava ngi mma' mdehn thungta, mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: ‘Havah piipa kat ava'. Arvaan, neen nih alrouchom avah neen nthen mkurthuhna' rah neen nih mma' avah eyoudok incheh.’
Mthungta mmaan nih riithlumbil duwn thah mmah varpthi lamda ungta mma' avah eyou lamda. 'Tunnu avaleiyi riithlumbil kpupa ava ngi mmaan hinni talu ktlow rang ngo?

Mma ngi arvang donni ava' riithlumbil knum rek avah ke'eyou lamrah ungta mma ngi riithlumbil avah ktlok rek hinni kpiipthi rah.” Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta hanto' the lamda: “Avah hanto' kurthuwk liit mso.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah suwrim lam thida hanto'theda: “Mdittu' ‘Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi innbul lung, Lung kenreel ava' kurthuwk kcha' a.’ (Luw. 118:22) dida, mdokjit avah talu mdothena o?
Kuwku yoso lung ava' 'leenni ktla kcha' mma' avah kkui chrah pdainu kuwku yoso m'leen nih lung ava' tlaakna' mma' avah, ava ngi purvuwt heppi kokrowi pthirah.”

Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki ava' mphakat thung ngi Mma' avah kokyowng rang ngi mdotlotin. Mleiya mmaan nih pauportol avah mmaan kepteng ngi mdothe tidit mdodehn. Pdainu mmaan nih mii rek avah qi chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah sutpqowi lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mpau 'leenni mdokyownna' raan ki thenni mrinkindit kpurhuwi kcha' rekki tuprut pausikhu rek avah pthla lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih paamkpu ava' ki ruhtan le' ruhtanna' ava' thung ngi Mma' avah mdoparlaanna' raan ki thenni havah mdotlotin.

Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda: “Chukpu neen nih Nang nga kindit ava' adothe ungta kindit ava' adopurchuh, tidit kdehn. Ungta Nang ngi kuwkhat leh mikmai suw mtih, pdainu Nang ngi kindit ava' tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr 'lam ava' adopurchuh lam.
Ava' vah, neen kthen vah Siijar hinni paammii sumqhai kdopiikin avah nowlam mih rowmow rowmeh?”
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan plungril qhatma avah deithida, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih taluleiyi Neiya atperteel inna?
tu'u denarii khat Mheitedet inno! Hava' m'leen ki pthla'arlim ungta jiiktikrii avah kuwda?” Ungta mmaan nih, ‘havah Siijar pthla'arlim ungta mma' jiiktikrii’ dilamda, arthaang lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mdit bih, Siijar dow rek avah Siijar hinni apiin ungta Isowr dow rek avah Isowr hinni apiin.”
Ungta mmaan nih Mma ngi mii rek maiyi mdothe pau ava' 'leenni Mma' avah tepmen pchaang lam mda. Ungta mmaan nah Mma ngi hanto' mdo'arthaan 'leenni ngak chlamda ungta rimkdi am chlamda.
Audilli trin kerheelna' krow kma' Saddusy rek arlak ki mii aangqhe rekki Mhin nih thleng lamda ungta Mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda.

“Chukpu, Moses vah neen kihin nih hanto' kjitda, ‘tidit tah kuwmiikhat mu'upa khat ava ngi snu thedok thida mnau kthlowi mlaiyi mdiyow chaak bih mnaupa ngi mnuwn avah ko'onqhi donni mu'upa ki thenni nau mdotupluk piik rah,’ dida.
'Tunnu mu'umnau tikhiutet rek khat am lamda, ungta mkhatna' ava ngi snu the chda pdainu nau kthlowi kmah ngi diyou chda.
Ungta miknitna' ava ngi snu avah ko'onqhi nowlda ungta mma' rukka nau ktaak ki diyou chda.
Audilli mukdumna' ava ngi mmah ko'onqhida ungta anto' heppi mitkhiutna' kpha rukku ko'onqhida pdainu mmaan nih nau khatleh kthlowi lam kmah diyouter chlamda.
Mqutna'rel lih snu ava' rukka diyou chda.
Avaleiyi, trin kerheelna' nit tu' snu avah kuw nuwn kurthuwk chrang ngo? Mleiya mmah tikhiu rek mkheng kheng inni mnuwn mdopthut sapin.”
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' tunpha ki mii rekki inn nei lamda ungta innkpernee lamda.
Pdainu karvang rang mpha ava' thung vah ungta kdiyou rinkerheelna' thung ngi kyau chrang ki thenni mtik kcha ngi mdotai rek avale' avah inn neilam nimeh ungta inn ruk kpernee lam nimeh.
Mditmata, mmaan nah tidiyow ruk diyou pchaang lam nimeh. Mleiya mmaan nah vaantamsi rek hep daat lam. Ungta kring kerheel mii rek mkurthuhn leiyi, mmaan nah Isowr nau reklam.

'Tunnu Moses hin kpha rukku ding'arbuw kaakna' ava' thung ngi kdiyou rek kerdel avah tedet chda. Ungta mma ngi Kruwng avah, ‘Abraham ki Isowr, Aijek ki Isowr ungta Jakob ki Isowr,’ dida. (Mpk. 3:6,15)
Mleiya Mma' avah kdiyou rekki Isowr pemeh pdainu kring rekki Isowr ungta mkheng avah Mma' amleiyi kring.”
Ungta nowlam chukpu aangqhe rekki arthaang lamda Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, Nang nga kqha dok ki kpau imptih.”
Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih dow khatleh leiyi, paukheel morson kheel porson pchaang lam mda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Taluhep pih mii rekki Mesaiah avah David chapa mdodit pchaan inno?
Mleiya David mdakkat tih Luwbuklaa laika thung ngi: ‘Kruwng ngi neiki Kruwng hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nei kmachang thah iko'ong daat.
Neiyi Nang amiihal rek avah, Akhuhther rih akthiikpiik duh kpha thung ngi iko'ong daat,’ dida. (Luw. 110:1)
Avaleiyi, David tih Mma' avah ‘Kruwng’ mdodit, mdittu' taluhep pih Mma' avah David Chapa rang ngoh?”
Audilli Mma ngi mii mkheng ngi mdo'arjaak ki Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda.

“Naan nih phriktluwn hilnada tche rah kngei, kyurkren mun rek thung ngi mii rekki mdo'arvuwi chaak rah kngei, ungta sinegog thung ngi longkhom kenreel rek kngei ungta kchaknee thung ngi mmun kqhasi kngei nowlam chukpu rek hinki ikilrin deichaan.
Mmaan nih ksowt ksowt tih rinmaktham chaak leek inni meikhunu inn rek avah pyol dok lamda. Hava'le' ava ngi tupsulna' klin avah karlaang chlam rah.”
Audilli Mma ngi svang rekki sumbuwr thung ngi mmaan ki chla rek mdodaal chaakin avah deida.
Ungta Mma ngi meikhunu srah khat tih jiisen sumqiit 'kniipang mdodaal chaak ava' rukka deida.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah hava' meikhunu srah ava ngi mkheng arlak ki knemsi ngi mpiik chaak a.

Mleiya hava' mkheng rek ava' vah mmaan nih kepleet tih mdothlowi chaakin ava' thung ki ngi Isowr hinni tparlaan chaakna' avah mdodaal chaakin. Pdainu meikhunu ava' vah masraht thuh thungki mma ngi mdothlowi mrin chaakna' rang mkheng avah sumbuwr ava' thuh mdodaal chaak dok.”
Ungta mii aangqhe rekki luwbuk'inn ava' ki mleiyi pau the lamda. ‘Hava' lungrek ruwngchen ungta m'leenki chla rek tportlot avah tya thung ngi kqha chdaat a,’ dilamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi theda: “Naan nih adosut meekin dow rek avah lung khat 'leenni lung khat kurtuwn daat tih tvarpthima ngi, ma'ammana' mpha karvang chrah.”
Mthungta mmaan nih, Mhin nih kheel lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, hava'le' avah teden thung ngi kthuwk rangda? Ungta avale' kthuwk rah mthe thung vah talu titinna' kthuwk rang ngoh?”

Ungta Mma ngi theda: “Naan nih kuwkhat leh ngi naan avah adotuhuwn chaakmana' raan ki thenni ikilrin chaan. Mleiya mii knempok ki Nei kmiing 'leenni, ‘Neiya Mesaiah ping,’ didon nih kthleng rah, ungta mmaan nih, ‘mpha avah knai kcha' a,’ kdi lamrah. Ava' thung ngi naan nih mmaandil qowida chetmaan.

Ungta naan nih raal kthuwk rek archaang ungta raal kkarna rek arjaakin thung ngi aningin pqitmaan. Mleiya hava' dow rek avah rukri ngi mthuh rang thah ktla. Pdainu mqutna' avah kbeisek ki arvang teng nimeh.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto ngi the nowlda. “Chaat khat tih chaat khat 'leenni krip rah ungta kruwngpaalna' khat tih kruwngpaalna' khat 'leenni krip rah.

Ungta mmun knempok thung ngi ringnaang kdungyou kcha' kthuwk rah, ungta powitham le' omlai kdungyou kcha' avah mmun knempok thung ngi kthuwk rah. Ungta tsut thuh tiqit kervei rek ungta titinna' klinklin rek avah parvaan ki kthuwk rah.

Pdainu hava' dow mkheng rek mthuhduh ngi mmaan nih naan avah akokyowng raan ungta naan avah chii'akpreel raan. Ungta naan avah sinegog rek thung ngi ungta rowng'inn rek thung kpha ngi akparlaan pthi raan. Ungta naan avah paamkruwng rekle' paamkpu rek hinni Nei kmiing leiyi, akqhipsuk raan.
Pdainu avah naan athenni rinpaumin adopiik chaak naan kurthuwk rah.
Avaleiyi, naan nih mpha marvanduh ngi naan nih athinaan nih akparkhaan chaakmana' raan, aplungin avah aporthlong chaan.
Mleiya Neiyi naan ahin nih kqha ngi tpaudehna' ungta luwkinritna' avah apii nikaandi'. Ungta naan akepteng rek mkheng inni avah klek pchaang nimeh ungta mat pchaang lam nimeh.
Naan avah anuh le' apa rek inni, a'uanau rek inni ungta ari'alam rek inni ungta aplap rek inni akyur chraan, ungta naan arlak ki aangqhe rekka mmaan nih ke'eyou lamrah.
Ungta Nei kmiing leiyi, naan avah mii mkheng ngi akahal chraan.
Pdainu aluwchaiyin 'leenki asamin khadaat ruk kenvei nimeh.
Naan nih knet tih ari chaakin ava ngi naan nih arinkumin avah phang chnaandi'.
Pdainu naan nih raalmii rekki Jerusalem mdotkhul dokin amikin nih adeh chaakin thung ngi naan nih mma' kenvei chaakna' rah avah knai kcha' a tidit adeiyin.

Audilli Judia paamkuwl thung ngi ka'am mma' ava ngi lown rek thah ichen chso. Ungta khuwpii ava' thung ngi ka'am kcha' rekki avah mdomaak pthi raan. Ungta khuwpaam thah ka'am rek mmaan ava ngi khuwpii ava' thuh mluw raan pemeh.
Mleiya hava'le' avah phuwlow nit. Mleiya tikjit dok dow mkheng avah mkurtluwm dokrah.
Mpha ava' thung ngi miipum snu rekle' naukkai rekki thenni suwthitna' ka'am a! Mleiya paam ava' thung ngi kdung ngi plungyatna' ungta Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah hava' mii rek 'leenni ktla rah.

Ungta mmaan nah raal'kaanghaa 'leenni ktla chlam rah ungta mmaan nih chaat mkheng rek avah paamsuwk ki kqhi chlam rah. Ungta Jerusalem avah Chaatktlei rekki mpha ava' mtlan dokduh kpha ngi, Chaatktlei rekki khuhther kupthut lamrah.

Ungta kni 'leenni, thla 'leenni ungta bursi rek 'leenni titinna' rek kthuwk rah. Ungta dultipaam thung ngi chaat rek avah kdung ngi muplungin kya ngi krip chlam rah. Ungta truwnpii archaang kdung le' diinuk ava ngi mii rek plung rek avah ktaparvai rah.
Ungta ningqit le' dultipaam thung ngi karvang rang dow rek tbinpsukna' ava ngi dultimii rek plung avah kirpil chrah. Mleiya parvaan ki ruhtan rek avah kakna chrah.
Audilli mmaan nih Mii Chapa ava ngi ruhtan tu' ungta tkonlorna' klin ava' tung ngi armei thung ngi arjung kqum kdei lamrah.
'Tunnu hava' dow rek ava ngi tuthuh mupqhun thung ngi naan nih aluwn akhiingin rang ngi hansuwn, mleiya naan akartlanna' raan mpha avah knai kcha' a.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni pauportol khat tih hanto'theda: “Naan nih kduwtbul ava' asuwn, ungta dingbul mkheng avah asuwn.
Naan nih mmaan ava ngi muksun dokin adehn thung ngi naan nih khulum avah knai kcha' a tidit adodeh chaakin.
Anto' heppi naan nih hava' kthuwk meek meek dow rek adehn thung ngi, naan nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah knai kcha' a tidit adei chaan.
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna hava' dow rek mkheng ava' mkurtluwm dokduh kpha ngi hava' suruwl ki mii rek avah talu hepkduh yoso thleng dokvot lam nimeh.
Dulti le' parvaan avah kthleng dok chrah pdainu Nei kpauna rek avah talu hepkduh yoso ngi thleng dokvot nimeh.

Pdainu naan nih ikilrindei chaan! Mditma bih, thowldii knee ungta thowldii needa kipri ungta hava' dultipaam rinkum ki tkilrinna' rek ava' thung ngi aplung rekin avah kluwt chrah. Ungta naan nih adobin phaakmanaan mpha thung ngi Nit avah kurjung khot rah.
Mleiya dultipaam thuh ka'am mkheng rek 'leenni Nit avah ktaang khat heppi kurjung rah.

Avaleiyi, naan nih mpha ktai ikilrin chaan. Mleiya, naan avah hava' kthuwk beirang dow mkheng thungki kloi pchaang ki mtik kcha ngi adottai chaakna' raan ungta Mii Chapa ava' aang ngi arichaak pchaanna' raan rin'ktham chaan.”
Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi Mma ngi kunthun nih luwbuk'inn thuh mii rek avah purchuk kchok lamda ungta jaanvah Kruwn lown mdoditin ava' thah hangda kipriik kchoklu.
Audilli jiingsun kparma ngi mii mkheng ngi Mma' pau karja chrang ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi thleng lamda.
'Tunnu Taplaanna' mdoditin, Thowl ktaak Thenpen tchaakna' ki kmaal avah nai chda.
Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki taluhep pih Mma' avah te'eyow rang tidit ki m'lam thlaam lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih mii rek avah mdoqit chaakin.
Audilli sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat mmiing Kerioth ki mii mdoditin Judas ava' plung thung ngi Seitan luwt chda.
Mthungta mma ngi anto'chetda thimpu kenreel rekle' luwbuk'inn krung rekki koprol rek tung ngi mma ngi Mma' avah taluhep pih yur chnikdi, tidit leiyi, kurdutqhi lamda.
Ungta mmaan nah kanpa chlamda ungta mhin nih sum tpiik rang avah row chlamda.
Audilli mma ngi miipii rek armadil lih Mma' mdoyur chaakna' rah mpha kqha sutpqowi chda.
Audilli Taplaanna' Yausuwn te'eyowna' rah Thowl ktaak thenpen tchaakna' Nit avah arvanpha chda.
Ungta Pitar le' Johon avah hanto'theda, heipthla lamda: “Naanve ngi vaan rang ngi, neen nih tchaak raan ki thenni Taplaanna' ki vonsum avah aporthlongin.”
Mthungta mmaanve ngi Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi tva thung ngi kdoporthlon raan angeiya?”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Asuwn, naanve ngi khuwpii aheiluwn le' diibeel kokdom pselpa khat kurdutqhi naandi', naanve ngi mma' luwna' inn ava' thung ngi aluw pqowiyin.
Audilli naanve ngi innkpupa ava' hinni hanto' the naandi': ‘Neiyi Ksikhu rek tung ngi Taplaanna' ki tmaalna' kdochaakna' raan maltlun innkhaar avah tva'rangda? dida, Chukpu ngi ahin nih theda’ adiin.
Audilli mma ngi karthak ki innkhaar klinpa khat, kqhajik ki tportlot ksa avah akepdeh raan naanve ngi ava' thung ngi aporthlongin.”
Ungta mmaanve ngi anto ngi chet lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni mdothejik ki ka'am dei lamda ungta Taplaanna' ki tmaalna' avah ava' thung ngi porthlong chlamda.
Ungta mpha avah mvedok thungta, Mma ngi tamsi sowm lei 'knii rektu' ko'ongsap lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi tyattraan kperteel duh ngi naan tu' Taplaanna' vonsum havah tchaak rah kdung ngi kdongei chaak.
Mleiya Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a: ‘Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi mkurtluwm dokduh khimkheiyu Neiyi hava' Taplaanna' avah chaporson vot nimaang.’ ”
Audilli Mma ngi tong avah chomda ungta panpaak chthida hanto'theda: “Havah arlaangin rang ngi naan arlak inni athemin.
Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' murjun duh khimkheiyi riithlumdii avah nee nimaang.”

Ungta Mma ngi thenpen avah chomda ungta avah panpaak chda ungta avah khuida ungta mmaan hinni avah pii lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Havah naan athenni mdopiik dok ksa Nei ksadak ava', naan nih havah Nei adotbin phaakna' raan ki thenni atlown.”
Anto' heppi, Mma ngi kluh ki buh mchaak dokin dilli tong ava' rukka chomda ungta hanto'theda: “Havah naan athen inni kthuwk dok Nei kihii thungki ngi tapqhan pauqum ren ki tong ava'.
Pdainu asuwn, Nei mukyur chrang khut avah Nei tu' khaan 'leenni ka'amve daat a.
Ungta dakat tih Mii Chapa avah mdopurtum dok ksa heppi kchet kcha' a. Pdainu Mma' kyur chrang mii ava' 'leennu suwthitna' ka'am a.”
Audilli mmaan nih marlakin ki kuw ngi havah ktlow teng rang, tidit leiyi, msingreelin thung ngi kerkheel chlamda.
Ungta mmaan arlak ki kuw ngi klinsi tkurthuh raan tidit lei rukku tkerteenna' khat thuwkda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Chaatktlei rekki paamkruwng rek ava ngi mmaan 'tun nih kruwng kurthuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih ruhtanna' sinda m'leenin nih mukpu kurthuwkda raanqhul nong ktlow rek avah msit karlaang kcha' mii rek kirdi lamda.

Pdainu naan arlak innu avah kurthuwk mso. Ava' kchang ngi naan arlakin ki klinsi ava ngi naan arlakin ki mokmowsi hep daat ikurthuwkso. Ungta mkenreelsi mma' ava ngi sopklow kcha' khat hep daat ikurthuwkso.

Mleiya miklinbet avah kuw o? Khaan 'leenni kok'ong mma' ava' mow, sopklow kcha' ava o? Khaan 'leenni kok'ong mma' ava' pemeh mow? Anto'daat yoso Neiyi naan arlak inni sopklow kcha' Khat ava' hep daat tih ka'am ping.
Pdainu naanna Neiki tperteelna' rek ava' thung ngi ka'am kcha' tlit rekin ptih.
Ungta Kpa ngi Nei kihin nih kruwngpaalna' khat mdotpiik heppi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kruwngpaalna' avah akpiik inna.

Mleiya naan nih Neiki kruwngpaalna' thung ngi adochaak adoneek chaakna' raan ungta kruwng longkhom 'leenni ko'ongin tidon Isreel rekki phung sowm lei'knii rek 'leenni pau adopinditna' raan ki thenni havah adokpiikin.”
Ungta Kruwng ava ngi hanto'theda: “Simon, Simon dakat tih chavui svai tupkhui heppi adotupkhuina' raan ki thenni, Seitan nih nang nga angeenda.
Pdainu Neiyi alamrin mkertleimana' rang ki thenni nang athenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Ungta nang ngi Nei kihin nih akerheel thung ngi a'uanau rek avah ruhtan apii lam.”
Pdainu mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, rowng'inn thuh ungta kdiyou rang ki then rukku, neiya Nang tu' kilqhi rang ngi korthlong dok kcha' ping.”
Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Pitar, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, tuwngkluw kat tih nang ngi Nei adotedeh avah veikdum atmatduh kpha thung ngi, har khuwng nimeh.”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan avah sumbuwr ktaak ki, thowngya ktaak ki ungta khuhkok ktaak ki akapthlatin thung ngi adoptatin dow ka'am mow?” Mthungta mmaan nih, ‘immeh dow khatleh ptamaanring,’ dilamda.

Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pdainu 'tunnu sumbuwr khat kthlowi kcha' mma' ava ngi avah ahor chso ungta anto' heppi thowngya kthlowi kcha' mma' rukku ahor chso ungta raal'kaang kthlowi kma' mma' ava ngi mbuwdiir ayurso rang ngi khat aren chso.

Mleiya Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a, tidit tah, ‘Mma' avah nowlam ko'owi kma' rektu' taipinqimsap lamda,’ dida tikjit dok avah kurkhum rang thah tlada. Mleiya Nei kleiyi mdokjit dok rekki mqutna' avah mphaak dok a.” (Is. 53:12)
Audilli mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng asuw o hava' thuh raal'kaang 'knii ka'am daat tah.” Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni, “'Tunnu kokhom kcha' a,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi ava' thung ki arvang thuwkda ungta mahan tlit kcho heppi Mma ngi Kruwn lown thah hangda. Ungta Msikhu rek rukku Mma'dil hanqowi lamda.
Mma ngi mmun ava' mphaak thungta, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih kepthleem thuh atlaak mana' raan ki thenni rin'iktham chaan.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinki lungdeen klapang 'lamkla ngi heikorsown thida, Mma ngi tirdiilda rinktham chda.

Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Apa, havah Nah aplungbin mkurthuh cheentung ngi hava' tong avah Nei kihin ki mheilow pthi piikcha'. Anto'daat yoso, Nei kuplungbin rang pemeh pdainu Nah aplungbin ikurthuwkso.”
Audilli parvaan ki vaantamsi khat avah Mhin nih kandangda, Mma' avah mruh taptanpiik chda.
Ungta kdungreen nih muplung myat chaak ki, Mma ngi kdungset tih rinktham chda. Ungta Mparthlan avah hii ngi marchai knempok ki dulti thah chaida.
Mma ngi rinmaktham chaak thungki ripda marvan kerheel thungta Msikhu rek avah muplungyat chaak inni ki'iip dok kcha'lam mih arvanpha lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi ki'iip inna? Naan nih kepthleem thuh atlaak mana' raan ki thenni, Ikerdelin ungta rin'iktham chaan.”

Ungta Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih, asuwn, miiloppii khat arhei tlungda. Ungta sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Judas mdoditin ava ngi mmaan duh thah chetda ungta mma ngi Jisu kput rang ngi Mhin nih arheinaida.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Judas, nang ngi Mii Chapa avah putda yur chna mow?”
Mma' kpervel lih ka'am rek ava ngi talu kthuwk rang nga tidit mmikin nih mdehn thungta, mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng, neen nih raal'kaang ngi duwn nikmow?”
Ungta marlakin ki khat tih thimpu kenreelsi suwk'owr avah duda ungta machang ki makna avah sellotda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Havalu tlowma'.” Ungta Mma ngi makna avah kmeida ungta pdam piikda.

Audilli Jisu ngi Mma' kepteng ngi karva, thimpu kenreel rekle' luwbuk'inn krung rekki koprol rekle' ungta kver rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih raanqhul kupru khat kokyowng heppi raal'kaang rekle' kchung rek sinin tinu karvaan ptine?
Neiyi luwbuk'inn thuh mniiktaiyi ka'am thung ngu naan nih Nei k'leen nih khut khiing maantih. Pdainu 'tunnu havah naanki mpha ungta kjiingnu ki ruhtanna' ava'.”
Audilli mmaan nih Jisu a kyowng lamda ungta Mma' avah thimpu kenreelsi inn thah vanqhi lamda. Ungta Pitar rih 'lam karlat heiyi mdilin qowi lamda.
'Tunnu mmaan nih inn ava' khulown nih mei pchok lamda ungta mko'onsapin thungta Pitar rukka mmaan arlak ki ko'ongda.
Ungta snu suwk khat tih mei ar'aang ngi mma' mdeh thungta kmin nih suwrim thida hanto'theda: “Hava' mii ava' rukka Mma' tu' kilqhi.”
Pdainu mma ngi hanto'theda Mma' avah matda: “Snu neiyi Mma' avah deimaang.”
Ungta mpha mruk dilli morson khat tih mma' avah dei nowlda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang rukka mmaan arlak ki khat ptih.” Pdainu Pitar rih hanto'theda: “Miilai, neiya ava' pmaang.”
Audilli qhang khat arveel dilli morson khat tih kdung ngi hanto'theda: “Dakat tih hava' miilai rukka Mma' tu' kilqhi, mleiya mmah Galily ki mii.”
Pdainu Pitar rih theda: “Miilai, nang ngi adothe avah neiya deimaang.” Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih har khuwngda.

Ungta Kruwng ava ngi kerheelda Pitar avah arheisuw rimda. Ungta Pitar rih Kruwng pauna ungta Mma ngi mhin nih taluhep pih mthe, tidit tah, “Har mkhuwnduh ngi nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi',” mdodit avah binphaakda.
Audilli Pitar rih duwn thah vangthuwkda mning ksiin dok ki qap chda.
'Tunnu Jisu kokyowng mii rek ava ngi Mma' avah pni chaak lamda ungta rii kchung ngi bun lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mmik mbowl dokin dilli tpeeng lamda ungta ‘kuwda aktpeeng nga? Athethuh o,’ dilamda.
Ungta dow morson morson knempok 'leenni mmaan nih Mma' avah pauthit tih bi chlamda.
Ungta khu mvaardaat le' kver rekle' thimpu kenreelsi le' nowlam chukpu rek avah kurbuk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah luwsang thung ngi heiqhi lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga Mesaiah akurthuh cheentung ngi mheithe piikin.” Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi akthepiikin rukku, naan nih Neiya lam'mrin nimaan tih.
Ungta Neiyi paukheel khat akkheelin rukku naan nih avah adotarthaan pchaanna' raan ammeh mditmata Neiya tapthlat ruk mapthla nimaan tih.
Ungta 'tundil ki kupqhun nih Mii Chapa avah Isowr ruhtan ki machang thah kok'ong chrah.”
Audilli mmaan mkheng inni, “Nang nga Isowr Chapa pti,” dilamda? Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya naan nih kindit kat tih adotheen ava' ping.”
Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih hava' heihin nih talu sakhi tarjaakpom raan morson ka'am a? Mleiya neen ndakkat inni Mma' nehr kat thungki narjaak dok inna.”
Audilli miipii rek mkheng inni rip lamda ungta Mma' avah Pilaat hinni vanqhi lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah hanto' the lamda, mraal tpiik pqhun lamda: “Neen nih hava' miilai ava ngi mii rek avah 'lamleh thang ngi mdoqhi meeksli deiyin nuh ungta Siijar hinni paammii sumqhai tpiik rang avah pkhaanda. Ungta Mma ngi mthina ngi Neiya Mesaiah ping ungta paamkruwng khat ping kirdi chda.”
Mthungta Pilaat tih Mma' hinni hanto'theda, pau kheelda: “Talu, Nang nga Jihudi rekki paamkruwng pti?” Ungta Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya nang ngi adothe ava' ping.”
Audilli Pilaat tih thimpu kenreel rekle' miipii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi hava' Mii 'leenni mraal ka'am deimaang.”
Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheelset tih kdung ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi Galily ki kupqhun nih hava' kpha thung ngi Judia paam mkheng thuh chetda purchuk lamda ava ngi mii rek avah mdokchou terlam.”
Pilaat tih Galily tidit marjaak thungta, mma ngi Miilai avah Galily ki mii mow tidit kheel lamda.
Ungta mma ngi Mma' avah Herod paampuwk thungki tidit marjaak daat le' mma ngi Herod hinni Mma' avah heipthlada. Mleiya mpha ava' thung ngi mma' rukka Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am.

'Tunnu Herod tih Jisu mdeh thungta kdung ngi mmah kanpa chda. Mleiya mma ngi Jisu tedeh rah mdongeina' avah rowiksowt. Mleiya mma ngi Jisu ki mlei avah knempok ki mdo'arjaak dok ungta mma ngi Jisu dotlot ruhtan nong rek avah tsut rah mdobin.
Audilli mma ngi Jisu hinni pau knempok kheelda pdainu Mma ngi khatleh ruk arthaang mda.
Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki rip lamda kdung ngi Mma' 'leenni mraal pii lamda.
Audilli Herod tih mma' mii, raalmii rek tung ngi mmeel kthidok ki bi chlamda ungta pni chaak lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kenthle kparnaak ki dona pnaak lam thida Pilaat hinni veikhat heipthla nowl lamda.
Nit ava'kat thung ngi Pilaat le' Herod avah khat le' khat plap kurthuwk chlamda. Mleiya ava'duh vah mmaanve avah khat le' khat karhal kcha'lam.
Ungta Pilaat rih thimpu kenreel rekle' paamkpu rek ungta miipii rek avah own purkuwksap lamda.

Audilli mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' mii avah 'lamleh thah mii kqhi diin tinu, nei kihin nih arheiqhi inna. Asuwn, Neiyi naan amai inni Mma' avah kperteel dok a. Ungta neiyi hava' Mii ava' 'leenni naan nih mraal adopiik rekin 'leenni mraal khatleh ruk ka'am deimaang.
Herod rukku mraal phang meh tidit tah neiyi naan avah mma' hin rukku adoheiksi dokin. Ungta asuwn, Herod rukku Mma' avah tidiyow ki mtik kcha mraal khatleh ruk Mma' 'leenni phang meh.
Avaleiyi, neiyi Mma' avah mraal suwkthuhna' kpiik dilli pthlapthi nikdi'.”
Mleiya Pilaat tih kmaal ava' thung ngi mmaan thenni miikhat mdopthlat piiklam rang thah tlada.
Pdainu miipii rek mkheng inni veikhadaat tih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Mii avah a'eyou, ungta neen kthenin nih Barabbas mheipthlat piikin.”
Barabbas tidit mii avah khuwpii ava' thung ngi sarka 'leenni raal ktlow arlak ki yauda mii ke'eyou leiyi, mmaan nih mma' avah rowng'inn thuh mdodaalin.
Audilli Pilaat tih Jisu tapthlat rah mdobin leiyi, mmaan avah veikhat own nowl lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih owng owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Mma' avah apthowiyou'in, Mma' avah apthowiyou'in,” dilamda.

Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni mveikdumna' hanto ngi theda: “Talulei, Mma ngi talu kthikat mtlotplih? Neiyi Mma' thung ngi tidiyowna' krow mraal khatleh phangmaang. Avaleiyi, neiyi Mma' avah bunthida pthlapthi nikdi'.”
Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheelset tih krowl kdung ngi owng lamda hanto' the lamda: ‘Mma' avah topthowiyow rah.’ Ungta mmaan krowl le' thimpu kenreel rek krowl ava ngi mma' pau avah pchaang chda.
Mthungta Pilaat tih mmaan doqhil heppi pauqut avah pqu pthida.

Ungta mma ngi mmaan nih mdoqhilin khat avah pthlatpiik lamda. Mma' avah sarka kepteng ngi raal ktlow ungta mii ke'eyou leiyi, rowng'inn thung ngi mdothiikin ava'. Ungta Pilaat tih mmaan nih mdobin inni, mdoporlow chaakna' raan ki thenni Jisu avah mmaan hinni parlaan pthi lamda.

'Tunnu mmaan nih anto ngi Mma' avah mvanqhiin thungta Sairen ki Simon mdoditin khuwpaam khat ki kthleng kcha' miikhat kyowng lamda ungta Jisu khros avah mma' topdom lamda ungta Jisu dil topqowi lamda.
Ungta miipii knempa ngi Mma'dil qowi chlamda. Ungta marlak inni Mma' thenni plungkya ngi archam louda kqap kcha' snu rek rukka kyaulam.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mdil kerheelda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Jion chanu rek naan nih Nei kleiyi qapmaan pdainu naan, athen inni ungta anau'leen ki thenni iqap chaan.
Asuwn, naan nih: ‘Von kchowi kma' rekka msuwkin kqha a, mlung'om kerthlet kma' rek ungta nau kkai kma' arnu rek avah msuwkin kqha a, adoditna' raan nit rek avah karvang meeksli a.’
Mpha ava' thung ngi mii rekki, lown rek hinni hanto ngi tethe kupqhun lamrah: ‘Neen k'leen nih mheichim piik chaan.’ Ungta mul rek hinni, ‘neenna mheipkhum chaan,’ kdi lamrah. (Hos. 10:8)
Mleiya, mmaan nih avale' avah ding kring khat 'leenni mtlot innu kqong 'leen ngaallu talu ktlow lam rang ngoh?”
Audilli ava' thung ngi kqha kma' ktlow mii 'knii rukka ka'am lam ungta mmaan nih mdo'eyow raan ki thenni mmaanve avah Mma' tu' hanqhi lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih luwruh mun mphaakin thungta Mma' avah mmaan nih pthowiyou lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kqha kma' ktlow mii rek avah khat tih machang thah ungta morson khat ava ngi Mmaleh thah pthowiyou lamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Apa, mmaan avah aptlotpiik chlam, mleiya mmaan nih mdotlotin avah talu tidit deipindih chlammeh.” Ungta mmaan nih Mma' buwdiir rek avah penthem chlamda ungta pchalpiik sutna' lamda.

Ungta mii rekki Mma' avah sutpqowi lamda. Pdainu paamkpu rek kpha rukku mmaan tung ngi mmeel kthi ngi hanto' the lamda Mma' avah kdung ngi ningqhuwm mih pni chaak lamda: “Mma ngi mii morsonna san chlamda. Mma ngi, Isowr rih mdokchol dok Mesaiah mkurthuh cheentung ngi Mthina ngi ikarsan chso,” dilamda.
Ungta raalmii rek rukku Mma' avah pni chaak lamda ungta Mhin nih arva lamda ungta thowldii kdor parlaan chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi Jihudi rekki paamkruwng akurthuh cheentung ngi, athina ngi ikarsan cha' low,” dilamda.
Ungta HAVAH JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG, tidit ki kbih tikjit khat avah Grik pau vih, Latin pau vih ungta Hibriu pau vih kjit lamda Mma' karthak ki daar lamda.
Audilli kqha kma' ktlow rek thungki khat ava ngi Mma' kipthit tih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Mesaiah akurthuh cheentung ngi athina ngi ikarsan chthi rang ngi neenve rukka mheisanin low,” dida.
Pdainu ktlok khat tih arthaangda mma' avah raithida hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hanto'hep daat tupsulna' thung ngi a'am arlaan rukku Isowr rah qicha' mtimow?
Ungta kindit kat tih neenve a nnongtlot chaak rek ava' ki mtik cha ava'kat tarlaan chaak. Pdainu hava' Mii avah karmak mdotlot khatleh ka'am pemeh.”
Audilli mma ngi Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi Nangki akruwngpaalna' atlun chaak thung vah, neiya mheibin phaak cha'.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Tuni kat tih nang nga Nei tu' Kanpamun thah tlung chnadi.”
Ungta 'tunnu mutrukna' qhang arveel ki kupqhun nih mutkutna' qhang kpha ngi dultipaam mkheng avah jiingnu ngi pkhumda.
Audilli kni avah pjiing pthida luwbuk'inn kenje thungki buwyaar avah mmalaiyi 'knii kthuwk ki kerjen chda.

Ungta Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi mo'own dilli, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Apa, Nah akhut thung ngi Nei kapthla avah akparlaan chaak a.” (Luw. 31:5) Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok le' Mma ngi mqutna' mtadaal qen chda.
'Tunnu raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi kthuwk dow rek ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi Isowr ponlor chda ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dakat tih hava' Mii, avah mrinkindit miikhat thideh,” dida.
Ungta ava' thuh thlengda mmik ki kthuwk dow ava' kdei miipii rek mkheng ava ngi, muplungin tpeeng lamda ungta mmun ava' thung ki sunkerheel chlamda.
Pdainu Mma' dokilqhiqhi mkheng rekle' Galily ki kupqhun nih Mma'dil kqowi kcha' rekvah leer rih rip lamda kthuwk dow mkheng rek avah sutpqowi chlamda.
Ungta asuwn, kunpun ava' ki miichai khat kurthuwk ungta mii kqha ungta mii kindit khat mmiing Joseph mdoditin khat ka'am.
Mma ngi mmiqhi rek dokerseel le' mnongtlotin avah pqowimda. Ungta mma' avah Jihudi rek khuwpii Arimathia ki ungta mma' mdak avah Isowr kruwngpaalna' karda kcha' miikhat.
Hava' mii ava ngi, Pilaat hinni hangda Jisu kluwng avah qhil chda.
Audilli mma ngi kluwng avah pqumda ungta buw kperneem mih k'lum deekda ungta kuwkhat leh tpi'iina' mlai, lungkhor thlaan ava' thung ngi Mma' avah pi'iip chda.
Ava' nit avah tkorthlonna' nit ungta tkarngatnit avah knai kcha'.
Ungta Jisu tu' kilqhi ngi Galily ki karhangsap snu rekki mdilin qowi chlamda ungta mmaan nih thlaan avah dei lamda ungta taluhep pih Mma' avah mirkhiik a tidit suwjik lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih sunkerheel lamda namreng le' reidii mikrimkdi rek avah porthlong chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih paupiik ki dilkqowiyi tkarngatnit avah dan chlamda.
'Tunnu arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, jiingsun kparma ngi mmaan le' snu morson rek aangqhe tu' kilqhi ngi mdoporthlon dok ksaan namreng rek ava' sin lamda thlaan thah arhang lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih thlaan nehr 'leenki lung kurlup dok kcha' avah dei lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih mthung ngi vangluwt lamda pdainu Kruwng Jisu kluwng avah deilam mda.
Ungta mmaan nih kdung ngi muplungin kelqen nih ma'amin arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda: Mleiya asuwn, mmaanve hinni dona kepleu dang kihilkna mii'knii ripdaat lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih mningqit inni mmaiyin dulti suw lamda ma'amin arlaan nih, mmaanve ngi mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi naan nih kring avah kdiyou arlak ki athlaam inna?
Mma' avah hava' thuh ammeh kerdel dok. Mma ngi Galily thung ngi ma'am daat thung ngi naan ahin nih mdothe avah abinphaakin.
Mma ngi hanto' mdothe: ‘Mii Chapa avah pnu kervei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthi rah ungta kopthowiyou lamrah ungta mnii kdumna' nit tih veikhat kerdel rah,’ mdodit.”
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' pauthe rek avah binphaak lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih thlaan ava' thung ki jungkerheel lamda ungta kthuwk dow mkheng rek avah sowm leikhat rek hinni ungta morson mkheng rek hinni avah song chlamda.
Avale' avah Magdala ki Mary le' Joanna ungta James nuh Mary le' mmaan tu' kilqhi snu rek ava ngi tamsi rek hinni avah song chlamda.
Ungta tamsi rekki mmaan dothe pau avah kthesusu kcha'lam heppi bin lamda ungta mmaan nih avah lam'rin chlam mda.

Pdainu Pitar rah ripda thlaan thah hangchenda ungta tpeda heisuwda. Ungta mma ngi buw kperneem rek ava' daat chrel ka'am deida. Ungta mma ngi kthuwk ava' 'leenni mthina ngak chda ungta anto ngi jungkerheel chda.
'Tunnu asuwn, ava' nit kat tih mii'knii rek avah Jerusalem thungki kilomitar sowm leikhat arveel kla, Immaus tidit khuw thah pjiin lamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi kthuwk dow mkheng rek leiyi, pau avah saam lamda.
Anto ngi mmaanve ngi ava' ki mlei rek ava' the lamda meheiyin arlaan nih, Jisu mdakkat tih mmaanve avah heipha lamda anto ngi mmaan tu' kilqhi ngi chetsap lamda.
Pdainu mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mdodeh pinditmana' raan ki thenni Isowr rih mmikin avah purlup pthida.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Talulu pau plih naanve ngi achechun inni adosaam inna, ungta aplungin myat tah?”
Audilli mmiing Kleopas mdodit ava ngi arthaangda, Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Jerusalem thung ngi mal khat tih amda, harvai ki kthuwk rek kdei kma' avah nang daat heppa?”

Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Talulu kat kthuwk plih?” Ungta mmaanve ngi Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Najareth ki Jisu ki mlei. Mma' avah Isowr aang ngi ungta mii mkheng rek aang ngi mruh ktang ngi nong ktlow kcha' ungta kpau kcha' khulpu khat.
Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' neenki paamkpu rekki Mma' avah Pilaat hinni parlaan lamda ungta mma ngi Mma' avah te'eyowna' rah pauqut theda ungta raalmii rekki Mma' avah mdopthowi yown.
Pdainu neenvah Mma' avah Isreel rek kaktlanbei rang ava' tidit tih kdobinin. Ungta hava' han'tun nih dakat tih ava' khimkhei mthuhna' avah tuni ngi niikdum mphaak dok a.
Ungta neen karlakin ki jiingsun nih thlaan thah kahang snu rek aangqhe ngi neenna mapngakyou chaanda.
Mleiya mmaan nih Mma' kluwng avah mdehmaan thungta arjung kerheel lamda hanto ngi the lamda: “Mmaan nih mrinmer inni, ‘Mma' avah kring kerheel dok,’” dida kthe vaantamsi rek dei lamda.
Ungta neen karlakin ki aangqhe rekki thlaan thah hang lamda snu rek dothejik nowl lih handei lamda. Pdainu mmaanve ngi Mma' avah deilam meh.”
Audilli Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “O kokmok rek ungta Khulpu rekki mdothe rek mkheng 'leenni lamtrin chaak rang 'leenni muplung ktomowl rek.
Mesaiah ava ngi hava' tyatna' rek avah perteel donni ungta Mma' ki mkonlorna' ava' thuh mluw chaak rangkat pemeh mow?”
Ungta Mma ngi Mma' ki mlei avah, Moses ki kupqhun nih khulpu rek laika mkheng rekle' Kchiir laika rek mkheng ava ngi mdothe rekki mlei avah mmaanve hinni thepindit piik lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih mmaanve ngi mdophaak raan khuw avah heipha lamda. Ungta Mma ngi khuw ava' hinni kla ngi heppi tlowda.

Pdainu mmaanve ngi hanto ngi the lamda, Mma' avah thlot lamda: “Neen tu' amdaat inche, mleiya kluhpha kvei kcha' a, ungta khu kjiing chrah mthe a,” dilamda. Ungta Mma ngi ka'am daat rang ngi mmaanve hinni tlung chda.
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi mmaanve tu' kmaal rang ngi khaan 'leen mko'onin thung ngi Mma ngi thenpen avah chomda ungta panpaak chda ungta khuida mmaanve hinni pii lamda.
Audilli mmaanve mik avah kparvangda ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah deipindih chlamda pdainu Mma ngi mmaanve mikdeh thungki korlou chdokda.

Ungta mmaanve ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “Mma ngi 'lam thuh nihin nih pau msaam thuh ungta Mma ngi nihin nih Kchiir laika rek, mitthepindit piik thung ngi neenve nuplungril avah kkapda?”

Mthungta mmaanve ngi mpha ava'kat thung ngi korlou lamda Jerusalem thah veikhat dil hang kerheel lamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi sowm leikhat rekle' mmaan tu' ka'am rek avah kurtuwl sap lamda ma'am daatin arlaan nih hanpha khot lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih, ‘Kruwng avah dakat tih kring kerheel dok a ungta Simon hinni kperdehda,’ tidit song chlamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi, 'lam thung ngi kthuwk dow rek avah song chlamda ungta taluhep pih Mma ngi mmaanve hinni thenpen tkhuina' thung ngi kandang, tidit song chlamda.
'Tunnu mmaanve ngi hava' the lamda ma'amin arlaan nih Jisu mdakkat tih mmalai inkat tih ripda ungta “naan aplungin avah kdai ikurthuwkso,” dida, mmaan hinni theda.
Pdainu mmaan vah pthla kdeihep pih kirbin lamda piir lamda ungta mningin kdung ngi qi chda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naanna aplunginkya a? Ungta taluleiyi aplungin thung ngi plung kelqenna' apthuhnna?
Naan nih kukhuh le' kukhut asuwn, Nei ping, Nei kat ping! Mheikmeiyin ungta adeiyin tidit tah pthla vah, Neiyi kdothlowi adodehn ava' heppi sadak le' ruh mdothlowi pemeh.”
Mma ngi hava' mthe thung ngi, Mma ngi mkhut le' mkhuh avah mmaan hinni tepdeh lamda.

Pdainu ava' kpha thung ngi mmaan nih mkanpatin le' mnga chaakin ava ngi lam'krin kmah ngi ma'amin arlaan nih, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' thuh thendam athlowi ngaalin mowi?” dida.
Mthungta mmaan nih Mhin nih klum daat tuwlvah klek khat le' pkhuithlaar mruk pii lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi avah arlaangda ungta mmaan dodeh ngi avah chadokda.

Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Hava'le' avah Neiyi naan tu' na'amsapin thung ngi kdothe pauna rek ava'. Mleiya Moses ki Nowlam thung ngi ungta Khulpu rek laika thung ngi ungta Luwbuklaa thung ngi Nei kleiyi tikjit dok mkheng avah mkurkhum rah,” kdodit.
Ungta mmaan nih, Kchiir laika rek ava' mdodeh pindit chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi muplungrilin rek avah pvanpiik lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tikjit dok ava' heppi Mesaiah ki thennu tyattraanna' mdoperteel rang ungta mnii kdumna' thung ngi mdiyow thungki mrinkerheel rang avah msit amda.
Mleiya Jerusalem thungki pqhunda Mma' miing 'leenni chaat mkheng rek hinni pnu rek tuknuwl piikna' rang ki thenni plung kerthlenna' pau avah tparjaam rah.
Ungta hava' dow rek 'leenni naanna Neiki ksakhi rekin ptih.
Asuwn, Neiyi, Kpa paureel avah naan ahin nih, kapthlat a. Pdainu naan ahin nih kparthaang hinki ruhtan ava ngi atipdimduhn kpha thung ngi naan nih Jerusalem khuwpii thung ngi i'am daatin.”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah Bethany kpha klangi qhilam thida Mma ngi m'leenin nih Mkhut khiingda mmaan avah suwqhat pii chlamda.
'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi mmaan suwqhat mpiikmeek arlaan nih Mma ngi mmaan hinki sun chda ungta Mma' avah parvaan thah arjuklou chda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah luwbu chlamda ungta kdung ngi kanpa ngi Jerusalem thah arjung kerheel chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kdet liit kmah ngi luwbuk'inn thuh Isowr panpaak chlamda ungta suwqhat piichtlit kchok lamda. Amen.
Mupqhun thok thuh Pauna ava' amda ungta Pauna avah Isowr tu' amda ungta Pauna avah Isowr kurthuwkda.
Mupqhun thok thuh Mma' avah Isowr tu' amda.
Mma' arlim mih dow mkheng avah seemda ungta mdopurthuh dow mkheng avah Mma' ktaak ki dow khatleh seem meh.
Mma' hinni rinkum avah ka'am ungta rinkum ava ngi dultimii ki mar'aang kurthuwkda.
Mar'aang ava ngi kjiingnu thung ngi lengda ungta kjiingnu vah mar'aang avah deipindih pchaang meh.
Isowr dopthlat mmiing Johon tidit miikhat ka'am.
Mii avah rinpaumin kpii rang ki thenni kurjung, tidit tah mma' arlim mih mii mkheng ngi lammdorin chaakna' rah mma ngi Mar'aang ava' ki rinpaumin avah mdopiik.
Mma' avah Mar'aang ava' pemeh pdainu Mar'aang ava' ki rinpaumin kpii rah kurjung.
Dultipaam thuh kurjung khimkhei rek hinni mar'aang kpii kindit Mar'aang avah Mma'kat hava'.
Dultipaam thuh Mmah ka'am doksa ungta dultipaam avah Mma' arlim mih mdopurthuh pdainu dultimii ngi Mma' avah deipindih pchaang meh.
Mma ngi Mma' dow rek hinni arjungda ungta Mma' mii rekki Mma' avah arlaang chlammeh.
Pdainu Mma' arlaang chda Mma, miing 'leenni lam'krin kcha' khimkhei rek hinni, Isowr nau tkurthuhna' ruhtan avah mdopiik lam.
Mmaan avah hii thungki kqou mditmata daksa ki dilkqowiyi kqou mditmata dultimii plungbin dilkqowiyi kqoulam pemeh pdainu Isowr hinki kqou kcha'lam.

Ungta Pauna ava ngi daksa kurthuwkda neen narlak inni amda. Ungta neen nih Mma' konlorna' tidit tah Pa ava' hinki Chapa khatpak ki konlor chaakna' avah nmikkat inni ndeh chaak dok inna. Ungta Mma' avah plungnee le' kindit tih kdim.
Johon nih Mma' ki rinpaumin avah hanto ngi owngda, mdopiik: “Neiyi, ‘Nei kdil thah karvang rang Mma' avah nei kduh ki rah, mleiya Mmah nei kduh thah ka'am dok ksa,’ kdodit Mma' avah hava'.
Ungta neen nkheng inni Mma' pleetna' ki plungnee 'leenni plungnee avah narlaan chaak dok inna.
Mleiya Isowr rih Moses arlim mih nowlam avah piida pdainu plungnee le' kindit avah Jisu Khrista arlim thung ngi karvang.
Kuwkhat leh ngi Isowr avah teden rukku mmik ki deimeh. Pa ava' thungthiik Chapa khatpak ava ngi Mma' avah mpurphuwn a”.
'Tunnu Jihudi rekki, ‘nang nga kuw ptih’ tidit kekheel rang ngi, Jerusalem ki thimpu rekle' Levi rek merheisi thuwnki Johon rinpaumin avah hava'.
Mma ngi thethuh chda ungta kmat kmah, “Neiya Mesaiah ava' pmaang,” tidit kerthethuh chda.
Ungta mmaan nih kheel lamda: “Mdittu' talu pti, Nang nga Elaijah pti?” Ungta mma ngi, “neiya ava' pmaang,” dida. “Nang nga khulpu khat pti?” di lamda. Ungta mma ngi, “Immeh,” dida.
Audilli mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga kuw ptih? Mleiya neen nih mheiksi rekin hinni kdovanson chaakna' raanni, nang nga kuw ping ngi kirdi kcha' ptil lih?”
Mma ngi hanto'theda: Khulpu Isaiah ngi, “ ‘Kruwng 'lam avah arjiin,’dida mdothehep pih, ‘Neiya paamkbiik laiyi ko'owng krowl ava' ngaal ping.’ ” (Is. 40:3)
Ungta mdo'arheisi rekin avah Pharisy rek thungki lam.
Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda: “Nang nga Mesaiah akurthuhma mditmata Elaijah ruk akurthuhma mditmata khulpu ruk akurthuhma u, taluleiyi dii adopluw o?”
Johon nih hanto'theda arthaang lamda: “Nei vah diisi ki daat tih dii kdopluw lam. Pdainu naan nih adodeh maan Khat avah naan arlak ki krip daat a.
Hava' Mma' avah nei kdil thah karvang meek ava'. Mmah nei kduh ki rah ungta neiya Mma' khuhkok rii kperthlet ki mtik kcha pmaang.”
Ungta hava' dow mkheng rek avah Johon nih dii mdopluw lamna' Jordon kreng raalpha ki Bethabera tidit mun thung ngi kthuwk.
Mupduknii ngi Johon nih Jisu avah mma' ktong thah karva mdeh thungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dultipaam pnu kloupthi Isowr Yausuwn avah, asuwn.
Neiyi, ‘kdil thah karva Miikhat avah kduh ki rah,’ kdodit Mma' avah hava'. Mleiya Mmah nei kduh thah ka'am dok ksa.
Neiyi Mma' avah deidok chmaang. Pdainu Mma ngi Isreel mii rek hinni mkurphuwnna' rang leiyi, neiya diisik ki dii kupluwt rang ngi kthleng ping.”
Ungta Johon nih hanto' rinpaumin avah mdopiik theda “Neiyi Pthla avah uqhu heppi parvaan ki arjungda ungta Mma' 'leenni kchuw deinu.

Neiyi Mma' avah deidok chmaang. Pdainu neiyi diisik ki dii kupluwt rang ki thenni myuksi Mma' ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi m'leen nih Pthla arjungda ungta m'leen nih kchuw adodehna' Mma' avah Pthla Kchiir rih dii kupluwt rang ava'.’
Ungta neiyi kmikkat tih kdeh chaak a tidit tah havah Isowr Chapa kat ava' tidit kpandan chaak a.”
Veikhat mupduknii ngi Johon nah msikhu 'knii rek tung ngi ripda lamda.
Ungta mma ngi Jisu kchet meek heidei thida hanto'theda: “Isowr Yausuwn avah asuwn!”
Ungta sikhu 'knii rek ava ngi mma' dothe marjaakin thungta mmaanve ngi Jisu dil qowi chlamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi mdil mkerheel thungta mmaanve ngi mdil mdoqowi meek lam ava' mdeh thungta suwrim lam thida, mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Taluda naanve ngi adothlaam inna?” Mmaanve ngi Mhin nih the lamda: “Rabbi, tidit tah chukpu mdoditna'. Nang nga tva thah ka'am ptil lih?”

Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Arvaan rang ngi arheisuwn.” Ungta mmaanve ngi va lamda Mma' amna' avah heidei chlamda ungta mmaanve ngi mnit avah ava' thah Mma' hinni kcheeng chlamda. Mleiya mpha avah qhang sowm arveel ktla kcha'.
Johon pauthe arjada Jisu dil kqowi kcha' 'knii rek arlak ki khat tah Simon Pitar tu' unau kthuwk Andria.
Mma ngi rukrirep pih mma' tu' unau kthuwk Simon kurdutqhida ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neenve ngi Mesaiah, tidit tah Khrista avah kdeh chaak dok inna.”

Ungta Andria ngi Simon avah Jisu hinni arheiqhida. Jisu ngi mma' avah suwrim thida hanto'theda: “Nang nga Jonah chapa Simon ptih, nang amiing nga Siphas tidit rah,” tidit tah npurlu bih lung mdoditna'.
Mupduknii ngi Jisu ngi Galily paam thah tyuk rah binda ungta Mma ngi Philip kurdutqhida ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowi.”
'Tunnu Philip avah Andria le' Pitar amna' khuwpii, Bethsaida ki.
Philip pih Nathanel kurdutqhida ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neen nih Moses nowlam thuh ungta khulpu rekki mdokjit psukin, Najareth khuw ki Joseph chapa Jisu avah kdeh chaak dok inna.”
Nathanel lih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Najareth khuw thung vah dow kqha kthuwk pchaang lumow?” Philip pih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Arva rang ngi asuw.”
Jisu ngi Nathanel avah Mma' ktong thah karva deida ungta mma' leiyi, hanto'theda: “Mthung ngi tkurhuwnna' ktaak, Isreel miidakdak avah, asuwn!”
Nathanel lih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Teden thung ngi adotedehda?” Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Philip pih ato'own duduh ngi kduwtbul lih a'amdaat arlaan nih adokdeh dok.”
Nathanel lih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Rabbi, Nang nga Isowr Chapa kat ptih, Nang nga Isreel rekki paamkruwng ptih.”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mleiya Neiyi ahin nih, kduwtbul lih adokdeh dok kdodit leiyi, nang ngi lam'atrin chaak a ne? Nang ngi hava' han'tun nih klinklin dow rek dei chnadi'.”

Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih the nowlda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. 'tundil thah nang ngi parvaan kparvangdon, Isowr vaantamsi rek avah Mii Chapa ava' 'leenni arjung kqum ungta hangkkal amikkat tih deinadi'.”
Ungta mnii kdumna' nit thung ngi Galily paam ki kana tidit khuw thung ngi kchiir inneena' khat amda. Jisu nuh rukka ava' thuh jauda.
Ungta kchiir inneena' ava' thung ngi Jisu le' Msikhu rek rukka own chlamda.
