Ungta thowldii mtlan dok thungta Jisu nuh ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mmaan nah thowldii morson thlowi lammeh.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Snu, nang ngi Nei k'leennu talu adotlot rah ka'am plih? Neiki mpha avah arvang mlaiya.”
Mnuh ngi suwk rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso Mma ngi atlown mdodit avah atlown.”
Jihudi rekki tekpertleuna' nowpa dilkqowiyi ava' thung ngi lung ksowr truk, khat thung ngi khoubum somtreht thungki ngi arja khat arveel kluwt rang rek avah pkong daat lamda.
Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Ksowr rek thung ngi dii apdimin.” Ungta mmaan nih ksowr rek avah dii kirkhi tih pdim lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu asunin rang ngi vansinin, ungta sikhupa ava' hinni vanpiin,” ungta mmaan nih avah vansin lamda.
Sikhupa ava ngi diisik thowldii tpurthuh dok avah pertemda, pdainu mma ngi tva'ki tidit tah deimeh. Pdainu mdii ksuwk kcha' suwk rek daat tih avah mdehn. Ungta sikhupa ava ngi kmoukpu avah ownda.

Ungta mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mii khimkheiyi mthowldiimai avah rukrirep pih mdopthuh ungta mal rekki mningin kchim mih mneek chaakin dilli meksep avah mdpthuh rotlu. Pdainu nangvah athowldiimai avah 'tun kpha thung ngi athiik tlit daat ane.”
Jisu ngi hava' titinna' rekki tupqhunna' avah Galily paam ki kana tidit khuw thung ngi tlowda mkonlorna' avah pandangda ungta Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda.
Hava' dilli Mma ngi mnuh, mnaupa rek ungta Msikhu rek tung ngi Kapernaum khuwpii thah julamda. Pdainu mmaan nih ava' thah nit knempa ngi kcheeng lammeh.
'Tunnu Jihudi rekki Taplaanna' nit avah arvangnai chda, mthungta Jisu a Jerusalem khuwpii thah hangda.
Ungta Mma ngi Luwbuk'inn thung ngi sil le' yau le' uqhu kyur rek ungta sum kpertlek rekki ko'ong lamda sum mdolotin avah deida.
Ungta Mma ngi rii kchung sinda yau rekle' silpa kyur rek mkheng avah luwbuk'inn thungki reipthi lamda. Ungta sum kpertlek rek sum avah leipthida ungta khaan rek avah purlup pthida.
Ungta Mma ngi uqhu kyur rek hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' dow rek avah aloupthi dokin. Naan nih Kpa Inn avah sum tolotna'inn purthuhmaan.!”
Audilli Msikhu rekki: “Nang a'inn leiyi, kdung ngi kdongeen chaak ava ngi neiya mtapkaak a,” dida, mdokjit avah binphaak lamda. (Luw. 69:9)
Ungta Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi hava' dow rek adotlot pchaanna' ki, neen kihinin nih adotetdet raan talulu titinna' athlowi?”
Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' Isowr Inn kenje avah a'ekrep dokin. Ava' dilli mnii kdumna' thung ngi Neiyi avah perdel nikdi'.”
Mthungta Jihudi rekki the lamda: “Hava' Isowr Inn kenje avah kum somplii leitruk kluwt tih tsak ungta Nang ngi niikdum daat thung ngi adoperdel rah?”
Pdainu Mma ngi hava' Isowr Inn kenje avah mdaksa mkerthena'.
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki mkerdel thung ngi mmaan hinni hava' mdothe avah Msikhu rekki binphaak lamda ungta mmaan nih Kchiir laika le' Jisu ngi mdothe pauna rek avah lam'rin chlamda.
'Tunnu Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' thung ngi Mma ngi Jerusalem thuh ma'am daat thung ngi, Mma ngi mdotlot titinna' rek ava' mdehn thungta mii knempok ki Mma' miing 'leenni lam'rin chlamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mii mkheng avah mdodeh doklam leiyi, mdaksa avah mmaan hinni kparlaan chmeh.
Ungta Mma ngi kuwmiikhat tih miikhat leiyi, mdothe pindit piik rah ngei meh. Mleiya Mma ngi mii thung ngi talu ka'am tidit avah mdodeh dok ksa.
Pharisy rek arlak ki Jihudi rekki kver, mmiing Nikodimas tidit khat ka'am.

Hava' mii ava ngi jaan nih Jisu hinni thlengda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Rabbi, Nang nga Isowr hinki kurjung Chukpu ptih tidit neen nih kdehn. Mleiya Isowr doqhi kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi hava' titinna', Nang ngi adotlot avah tlow pchaang nimeh.”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, miikhat tih ren nih mqou chaak kma'don, mma ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah mmik ki dei pchaang nimeh.”
Nikodimas tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih kver dok kcha' miikhat ava ngi ren nih kqou pchaang rang plih? Mma ngi mvei'knitna' mnuhpowi thung ngi luwt thidon kqou kerheel pchaang rang mow?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, kuwmiikhat tih dii ngi ungta Pthla ngi mqou chaakma bih mma ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi luwt pchaang nimeh.
Talutalu yoso daksa ngi kqou kcha' mma' avah daksa ungta Pthla ngi kqou kcha' mma' avah pthla.
Neiyi ahin nih, ‘Nang ngi ren nih aqou chaak rah kdodit leiyi, ngakma'.

Tirthli ngi mraanna' thah raang chda ungta naanvah marchaang daat ado'arjaakin. Pdainu naan nih tva'ki thuwkda tva'lam mqowi a tidit tah the pchaang maantih. Ava' vah Pthla ngi kqou kcha' rek khimkhei avah ava' hep daat lam.”
Nikodimas tih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih hava'le' avah kurthuwk pchaang rang plih?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isreel rekki chukpu khat kurthuwk daat thi tih, taluhep pih hava'le' avah adodehma daat toh?
Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, Neenna kdodehn ava' kdotheen ungta kmikdeh katin ava' kdopandanin. Pdainu neen nih kdopiikin rinpaumin avah naan nih lam'rin chmaan tih.
Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi kthuwk dow rek leiyi, adokthepiikin lam'arin chaak maannu parvaan thah kthuwk dow rek leiyi, adokthepiikin avah taluhep pih lam'rin pchaang raan tinu o?
Parvaan ki arjung kqum, tidit tah parvaan thah ka'am Mii Chapa ava' kma'don, kuwkhat leh rukka parvaan hangkkal dok ammlai.
Moses tih paamkbiik laiyi pruwl mdokhiin heppi Mii Chapa avah tikhiin chaak rang thah ktla.
Mleiya kuwku yoso Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek avah kenvei lam nimeh pdainu ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kthlowi chlam rah.

Mleiya Isowr rih dultimii avah hanto'ya vonsat low chda, tidit tah Mma ngi Mchapa mkhat chlet daat ava' piida. Tiditta kuwku yoso Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek avah kenvei lam nimeh pdainu ktlangknai kma' rinkum kthlowi chlam rah.
Isowr rih Mchapa avah dultimii kupsul rah mdo'arjuksi pemeh pdainu dultimii ngi Mma' arlim mih mkarsan chaakna' raan ki thenni mdo'arjuksi.
Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' Mma' avah psul meh pdainu lamkrin kma' mma' avah choduduh ngi mdopsul dok. Mleiya mma ngi Isowr Chapa mkhat chlet ava' miing 'leenni lam'mdorin chaak pemeh.
Ungta havah tupsulna' ava' tidit tah mar'aang avah dultipaam thung ngi arjung dokda, pdainu dultimii rekki mar'aang hinvah kjiingnu avah kdung ngi ngei chlamda. Mleiya mnongtlotin avah kqha pemeh.
Mleiya mnowpa ngi kqha kma' nong ktlow khimkhei rekki mar'aang avah mdohal chaakin ungta mar'aang thung ngi kthlenglu lam pemeh, mleiya kqha kma' mdotlotin ava' kandang rah.
Pdainu kinditnong ktlow kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr rih mdongei heppi nong kqha mdotlot avah kindit tih mkandanna' rah, mar'aang thung ngi kthleng kcha'lu.”
Hava'le' dilli Jisu ngi Msikhu rek tung ngi Judia paam thung ngi chet lamda. Mma ngi ava' thuh mmaan tu' amsap lamda ungta ava' thuh diipluwt pluwt chlamda.
Ungta 'tunnu Johon rukvah Salim khuw behki Aenon thung ngi, dii mtlum bet leiyi, ava' thuh diipluwt chlamda. Ungta mii rekki ava' thah va lamda ungta dii luwt chlamda.
Mleiya mpha ava' thung vah Johon nah rowng thuh khum mlailam.
Audilli Johon sikhu rek aangqhe le' Jihudi rek arlak ki, tekpertleuna' leiyi, kdung ngi kerteenna' lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih Johon hinni arva lamda hanto' the lamda: “Rabbi, asuw o, Jordon kreng raalpha thah ahin nih kthleng, Mrinpaumin adopiik Mma' ava ngi diipluwt meekda. Ungta mii mkheng nga Mma' hinni kvachlam a,” dilamda.
Johon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Parvaan nih mhin nih mdopiik dok kma'don nih kuwkhat leh ngi dow khatleh ruk arlaang pchaang nimeh.
naan adak kat inni neiyi rinpaumin kdopiik avah arjaan tinu, tidit tah, ‘neiya Mesaiah ava' pmaang, pdainu neiya Mma' duh thah mdotsi ngaal.

Kmou kthlowi mma' avah kmoukpu, pdainu Mhin nih krip kcha' kmoukpu plap mma' ava ngi kmoukpu krowl mdo'arjaak chaak leiyi, kdung ngi kanpa kcha' a. Avaleiyi, nei kkanpat avah hava ngi kurkhum kcha' a.
Mmah mkoryou thang chaakkat rah. Pdainu neiya ksiinthang chrang ping.
Tunki kurjung Mma' avah mkheng ki mkarthak pdainu dulti ki kthleng mma' avah dulti ki ungta dulti ki heppi kpau. Parvaan ki kurjung Mma' avah mkheng ki mkarthak.
Ungta Mma ngi mmikdeh kat le' makna arjaak kat rek ava' ki rinpaumin mdopiik. Pdainu Mma' rinpauminpiik avah kuwkhat leh ngi arlaang chmeh.
Mma' rinpaumin karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr avah kindit kat tidit ki kbihjiik mlot chaak a.
Mleiya Isowr rih mdopthlat Mma' ava ngi Isowr pauna rek ava' mdothe ungta Isowr rih Mma' hinvah Pthla avah pertetetda piimeh.
Pa ava ngi Chapa avah vonsat lowda ungta dow mkheng avah Mma' khut thung ngi mdopiik.

Chapa ava' hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a. Ungta Chapa ava' hinni lamkrin kma' mma' ava ngi rinkum avah mmik ki dei nimeh. Pdainu Isowr plungthit avah mma' 'leenni ka'am kcha' a.”
Ungta Jisu ngi Johon hinvah kerkheelsi ngi sikhu pqhangda ungta dii mupluw lam a tidit tih Pharisy rekki marjaak inna tidit avah Kruwng ava ngi deida.
Anto'daat yoso Jisu mdakkat tih diipluwt lammeh pdainu Msikhu rekki mdopluwn.
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi Judia paam mada veikhat Galily paam thah chet nowlda.
Ungta Mma ngi Samaria paam heikheel donle mche rang thah tlada.
Ungta Mma ngi Samaria paam ki khuwpii, Jakob pih mchapa Joseph hinni mdopiik mmun ava' behki Saikhar tidit khuw thung ngi thlengda.
'Tunnu Jakob diirum avah ava' thuh ka'am. Ungta Jisu a m'lamqowina ngi kham chda, avaleiyi diirum ava'beh ngi ko'ong chda. Mpha avah qhang truk arveel rah.
Ava' thung ngi Samaria ki snu khat dii ksuwk rah arvada. Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Dii mheipneek cha'low.!”
Mleiya Msikhu rekka thendam kren rah khuwpii thah kchet doklam.
Audilli Samaria ki snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih Jihudi nangvah Samaria ki snu nei kihin nih, adoneek rah dii atqhil a?” Mleiya Jihudi rekle' Samaria rekka khut karcha lam pemeh.

Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Isowr chla avah adeh chaak daat bih ungta ahin nih dii mheipneek cha' kdiya, kuw tidit adeh chaak daat bih, nang ngi Mhin nih qhil chtidon ungta Mma ngi kringdii adotpiik chaak rangnga!”
Snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, Nang nga adiisuwna' rah dow khatleh ksin kma'pa vah, ungta hava' diirum avah ktlumpa kmah, mdittu' toki adosuw chaak plih kringdiiya?

Hava' diirum avah k'paan Jakob pih mdotpiik chaakin. Ungta mma' mdak rukku, mnaumsuwn rek rukku ungta mdownkhaal rek rukku hava' thungki dii mdoneekin. Mdittu' nang nga k'paan Jakob hin rukku klinbet daat ptimow?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso hava' dii knee kcha' rekka mningin kakraal chdaat nowl rah.

Pdainu Neiyi mhin nih kdopiik rang dii knee kcha' rek khimkheiya teden rukku mningin kraal nimeh, Pdainu Neiyi mhin nih kdopiik rang dii ava ngi mma' thung ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii diitlaang ki diirum kurthuwkdon kphul rah.”
Snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, neiyi kning makraal mana' rah ungta hava' thuh dii ksuwk rah kerhei mana' rah ava'dii avah mheipiicha' low!”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Vang rang ngi a'innpu aqhi rah arva.”
Snu ava ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya ki'innpu ka'am pemeh.” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi ki'innpu ka'am ‘pemeh, adodit avah mkindit kat athethut a.
Mleiya nang nga a'innpu parnga ka'am dok ksa ungta 'tun 'tun nih ado'amqhi meek pselpa avah a'innpu pemeh. Avaleiyi, nang ngi mkindit kat athethut a.”
Ungta snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, Nang nga khulpu khat ptimow tidit tih akbin chaak a.
Neen kpa'leen vah hava' lown 'leenni luwbu kchok lamda pdainu Jihudi rek naanvah, mii rekki luw mdobukna' raan mun avah Jerusalem thung rah diin tinu.”

Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Snu, Nei kpauthe lam'arin cha'. Mleiya hava' lown'leen daat kma' ungta Jerusalem thung daat kma' Pa avah naan nih luw adobuk chaakmana' raan mpha avah karvang meeksli a.
Naanvah adodeh mapaan ava' luwbuk intinu pdainu neenna kdodehn ava' luw kdobukin, tidit tah tkirliinna' avah Jihudi rek hinki.

Pdainu kindit tih rekki pthla ngi ungta kindit tih Pa ava' hinni luwmdobuk chaakna' raan ki mpha avah karvang meeksli a ungta 'tun hava' thuh ka'am daat a. Mleiya Pa ava ngi anto' heppi luwkbuk cha' rek avah mdongei.
Isowr rah Pthla ungta Mma' hinni luwkbu chrangvah pthla ngi ungta kindit tih luwmdobuk chaak rah.”
Ungta snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mesaiah kurjung rah tidit tah kdeh Mma' avah Khrista mdoditin, Mma' murjun thung ngi, Mma ngi dow mkheng avah mekthepiik raan.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang akbimeek sli, Nei avah Mma' ping.”

Ungta Msikhu rek avah arlaan kat tih arvang tlung lamda. Mma ngi snu khat tu' mkirbiikin leiyi, mmaan nah ngak lamda. Pdainu mmaan kuwkhat leh ngi, ‘talu adongeida,’ mditmata ‘taluleiyi hava' snu tung ngi pau adosaamin,’ tidit tah kheel lammeh.
Audillu snu ava ngi mbeelsin mapthi thida, khuwpii thah vangchenda mii rek hinni hanto'theda:
“Arvaan, neiyi kdotlot dow mkheng kthe thuh dok pchaang miikhat avah arheisuwn. Mmah Mesaiah ava' ngaalmow?”
Audilli mmaan nih khuwpii thungki thuwk lamda, Mma' hinni va lamda.
Marlak ava' thung ngi Msikhu rekki: “Rabbi, imaal dok,” dilamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan nih mlei adodeh pinditmaan tchaak rah thendam kthlowi a.”
Avaleiyi, Msikhu rekki, ‘kuwmiikhat tih mdochaak rah thendam kdakpiik ka'am ngaal mow?’ Tidit khat le' khat hinni kerkheel lamda.
Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei kthendam rang avah Nei myuksi Mma' plungbin totlot chaak ungta Mma' nong tupqut rang ava'.
Naan nih buh turkunpha mdophaakna' rah thla plii ka'am daat a adit kchown pda? Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a ikindingin rang ngi lou rek avah heisuwn, minda turkunpha veidokda ka'am a.

Ungta kurkun kcha' mma' ava ngi mardaman kphang chrah ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii mchei mpaar avah kurkun chrah. Mleiya havah kapqau kcha' ungta kurkun kcha' mmaanve ngi kinqimsap pih mkanpatveh chaakna' raan ki then.
Mleiya paulam mih, ‘khat tih pqauda ungta ktlok khat tih arkunda’, mdodit avah anto'kat.
Neiyi naan avah anonglow manaan thung ngi kurkun chrah aksi inna. Ungta naanna mii nonglow chaakksa thung ngi ktang chrah heikluwt dokin imptih.”
Ungta snu ava ngi: “Neiyi kdotlot dow mkheng Mma ngi kihin nih mthethuht tah,” dida, rinpaumin mdopiik leiyi, khuwpii ava' thungki Samaria mii knempok ki Mhin nih lam'rin chlamda.
Ungta Samaria ki mii rekki Mma' merhei phaak chaakin dilli Mhin nih mmaan tu' ma'am sapna' raan ktham chlamda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' ava' thuh nii'knii kcheenqhisap lamda.
Ungta morson mii knempok ki Mma' pauna mdo'arjaak chaakin leiyi, lam'rin chlamda.

Audilli snu ava' hinni hanto' the lamda: “'Tunnu neen nih nang adothe leiyi, lam kdorin chaakin pemeh, pdainu kdak inni kdo'arjaak chaakin ungta neen nih Mesaiah ava'kat ungta dultipaam ksan kcha' ava' tidit kdeh chaak inna.”
'Tunnu nii'knii dil thah, Mma ngi ava' thung ki sunda, Galily paam thah chetda.
Jisu ngi mdakkat tih thepinditda, tidit tah ‘khulpu khat avah mpaamkat thung ngu mii ngi kyat chmeh’.

Audilli Mma ngi Galily mphaak thungta Galily mii rekvah Mmah arlaang chlamda mleiya mmaan rukka kmaal ava' thung ngi kahang lam. Ungta mmaan nih Jerusalem thah kmaal ava' thuh mahan thuwn nih, Mma ngi mdotlot dow mkheng avah mdodeh chaakin.

Ungta Jisu ngi veikhat, Mma ngi diisik thowldii mdopurthuhna', Galily ki Kana tidit khuw thung ngi thleng nowlda. Ungta Kapernaum thah mchapa kowida ka'am chdaat miikanthang khat avah ava' thuh amdaatda.

Mma ngi Jisu a Judia paam ki galily thah karvang a tidit marjaak thungta, Mhin nih vada ungta mma ngi mchapa avah kdikat rah kthe ngi mkowi leiyi, julapdon mchapa avah mdopdam piikna' rang ki thenni Jisu hinni ktham chda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Naan nih titinna' rekle' tngana' rek adehmaan bih, teden rukku lam'rin chni maantih.”
Miikanthang ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, knau mdiyow duh ngi arjulap daat tu'!”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Isun chdaat, achapa a kring dok kcha' a.” Ungta mii ava ngi, Jisu ngi mhin nih mdothe pau avah lam'rin chda ungta mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki korlouda sun chda.
Ungta mma ngi sunda, myunmeek arlaan nih, 'lam thung ngi msuwk rek karhang ngi kurdutqhi lamda ungta mhin nih: ‘Achapa a kring dok a’, dilamda.
Avaleiyi, mma ngi mdambetna' mphakat avah kheel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih, ‘jani ki mtikhiuna' qhangkat thung ngi rii doknow avah mdodown dok’, dilamda.
Mthungta mpa ngi qhang avah, Jisu ngi, mhin nih: ‘Achapa avah kring dok a’, mdoditna' mphakat ava' a tidit deida. Ungta mma' mdakkat le' mi'inn thungki mii mkheng ngi lam'rin chlamda.
Havah Jisu ngi Judia paam ki galily paamkuwl thah marvan thuh le' mdotlot titinna' rekki miknitna' nowl.
Hava' dilli Jihudi rekki kmaal khat amda ungta ava' thuh Jisu rukka Jerusalem thah hangda.
'Tunnu Jerusalem thung ngi yaupaltong hinni diirum khat ka'am. Ungta mdulbuk parnga ma'am leiyi, Hibriu pauvi avah ‘Bethesda’ mdoditin.
Hava' thung ngi kkowi rek, mmikktot rek ungta mkhuh kyeng rekle' mdakkyeng rek, mii knempok avah ava' thuh dii kakna rah karda ngi iippok daat lamda.

Mleiya diirum ava' thung ngi vaantamsi khat arjungqum kchokda, dii avah mdotapnatna' mpha ka'am kchoklu. Vaantamsi ava ngi dii mtapnat daat le' rukrirep pih jungkqum teng kcha' mma' avah taluhep kduh ki omlai tong chyoso kdam kcha'lu.
'Tunnu ava' thung ngi kum somkdum leitreht thung ngi kyeng kcha' miikhat ka'am.
Jisu ngi mma' ki'iip daat avah deida ungta mpha rowiksowt tih anto ngi ava' thuh mmah ka'am chdaat tidit mdeh thungta, Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga tdam chaak rah angeiya?”

Kkowi ava ngi arthaangda: “Ocha, neiya vaantamsi ngi dii mtapnat daat le' diirum thung ngi myukkqhi teng chrah mii ammda. Ungta neiyi, kyuk chaak meeksli arlaan nih morson khat tih myukkheel dok kchokda.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ikerdel, a'iina' asin rang ngi isun cha'.”
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mii avah dam chda. Mma ngi mi'iina' sinda ungta sun chda. Ungta mnit avah tkarngatnit kurthuwkda.
Avaleiyi, kdam dok kcha' mma' hinni Jihudi rekki hanto' the lamda: “Tuni vah tkarngatnit, a'iina' kdom tih ache avah’ nowlam mih mdorot pemeh.”
Mma ngi arthaang lamda: “Nei mkapdam Mma' ava ngi kihin nih: ‘A'iina' asin rah isun,’ mdida, dida.”
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih, nang ahin nih: ‘A'iina' asin rah isun,’ akdi mii avah kuwkatda, tidit kheel lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mdopdam mii ava ngi Mmah kuw tidit deimda. Mleiya Jisu a ava' thuh ka'am miipii rek arlak ki luwt dok chda.

Mdilthang row ngi Jisu ngi mma' avah luwbuk'inn thung ngi kurdutqhi nowlda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Asuw o, nang nga kdam dok kchaam ptih. Pnu veikhat arvei kchokma' mditma bih a'leen nih kqhaset kma' dow kthuwk rah.”
Mii ava ngi sunda ungta Jihudi rek hinni, mma' kapdam mii avah Jisu tidit thepiik lamda.
Ungta hava' leiyi Jihudi rekki Jisu a chiipreel lamda ungta ke'eyou rang ngi thlaam lamda. Mleiya Mma ngi hava' dow rek avah tkarngatnit tih mdotlot.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni, arthaang lamda: “Kpa ngi 'tun kpha nong avah tlow tlit daatda ungta Nei rukku nong avah kdotlot.”
Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki kerkheelset set tih Mma' mdo'eyowna' raan thlaam lamda. Mleiya Mma ngi tkarngatnit mdopkui daat kma' Isowr avah Mpa tpurthuhda, Mdak ruk Isowr tu' kpinqim leekda, dilamda.

Audilli Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Pa ava ngi mdotlot mdodeh ava' kma'don nih, Chapa ava ngi mthina thungki daat tih mdotlot pchaan dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Mma ngi mdotlot dow khimkhei avah Chapa ava' rukku ava' heppi mdotlot.

Mleiya Pa ava ngi Chapa avah vonsat mdolow chaak ungta Mma ngi mdotlot dow mkheng avah Mhin nih mdotedet ungta naan anga chaakna' raan ki thenni, Mma ngi Mma' hinni hava' heihin nih nong klin avah ktedet rah.
Mleiya Pa ava ngi kdiyou perdelda ungta rinkum mdopiik lam heppi Chapa ava ngi mdopiik nuwm chaak hinni rinkum avah mdopiik.
Mleiya Pa ava ngi miikhat leh hinni pau pindit meh, pdainu Chapa ava' hinni pau tpinditna' mkheng avah mdoparlaan dok.
Mleiya havah mii mkheng ngi Pa ava' mdokyat chaakin heppi Chapa avah mdokyat chaakna' raan ki then. Ungta Chapa ava' kakyat kcha' kma' mma' ava ngi Mma' arjuksi Pa ava' rukka kyat chmeh.

Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah Nei kpauna karja kcha' ungta Nei myuksi Mma' hinni lam'krin kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a. Ungta mma’avah pau tpinditna' thung ngi arva nimeh. Pdainu mmah tidiyowna' thungki ngi rinkum thah maklaan chaak dok a.
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, kdiyou rekki Isowr Chapa krowl arja lamdon ungta karja kcha' rek mmaan khimkheiyi mrin chaakna' raan mpha avah karvang meeksli a ungta 'tunkat ki qhang hava'.
Mleiya Pa ava ngi mdak thuh rinkum mdothlowi heppi Chapa ava'hin rukku mdak thung ngi rinkum tothlowina' avah piida.
Ungta Mma ngi Mhin nih pau tpindit pchaanna' rang ki ruhtanna' ava' rukka piida. Mleiya Mmah Mii Chapa ava'.
Naanna hava ngi ngakmaan. Mleiya diyouda thlaan thung ngi ka'am mkheng rekki Mma' krowl mdo'arjaak chaakna' raan mpha qhang avah karvang meeksli a.
Ungta kqhanong ktlow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi kring kerheel rinkum thung ngi karva lamrah. Ungta mrilqhatma ngi nong ktlow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi tupsulna' thung ngi kring kerheel lamrah.

Neiyi dow khatleh ruk kthina daat tih kdotlot pchaan ka'am pemeh. Neiyi kdo'arjaak heppi pau kdopindit ungta Nei kpaupindit avah mrinkindit mleiya Nei kuplungbin daat tih kdotlot pemeh. Pdainu Nei myuksi Pa ava' plungbin nih kdotlot.
Neiyi krinpaumin avah kthina ngi kthe chaak bih Nei krinpaumin avah kindit ava' pemeh.
Nei kthen nih rinpaumin kpii kcha' miiktlok khat ka'am. Ungta Mma ngi Neiki krinpaumin leiyi, rinpaumin mdopiik avah kindit, tidit Neiyi kdeh.
Naan nih Johon hinni kkheel rah mii pthlaan tinu ungta ava'leiyi mma ngi kindit deek ki rinpaumin avah piida.
Mleiya Neiyi dultimii hinki rinpaumin arlaang chmaang. Pdainu hava' dow rek avah Isowr rih naan adotsan chaakna' raan ki thenni kdothe.
Mmah kquwngmeek ungta kleng meeksli mar'aang ava' ungta naan nih mpha mruk ki thenni mma' ar'aang thung ngi tkanpat rah ngeiyin tinu.

Pdainu Neiyi Johon rinpaumin hinni klin rinpaumin avah kthlowi. Mleiya Pa ava ngi mdotpiik dok nong rek ava' kupqu rah Neiya myuksida. Ava' nongkat rek avah Neiyi kdotlot meek, tidit tah havah ngi Pa ava ngi Neiya mdoyuktsi tidit ki rinpaumin avah mdopandan.
Ungta Nei myuksi Pa ava' kat tih Nei kleiyi rinpaumin avah piida. Naan nih Mma' krowl avah teden rukku arja chmaan tih ungta mruwngchen ruk dei chmaan tih.
Ungta naan athung inni Mma' pauna avah amdei meh. Mleiya Mma ngi mdo'arjuksi Mma' avah naan nih lam'adorin chaakin pemeh.
Naan nih mmaan thung ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah ka'am tidit adobin chaakin leiyi, Kchiir laika rek ava' thlaamin tinu. Ungta avaleh ngi Neiki krinpaumin avah mdopiikin.
Pdainu naan nih rinkum adothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni Nei kihin vah arvanuwm maantih.
Neiyi tkaryat chaakna' avah dultimii hinki arlaang chmaang.
Pdainu Neiyi akdehn a tidit tah naan athung ngi Isowr vonsat avah ammeh.
Neiya Kpa miing ngi kurjung ping pdainu naan nih Neiya marlaang chmaan tih. Ungta ktlok khat tih mdaksa miing ngi mthlen bih, naan nih mmah arlaang chnaandi'.
Isowr kat hinki kurjung tkaryat chaakna' kthlaam kmah, khat le' khat hinki tkaryat chaakna' karlaang kcha' naanvah taluhep pih lam'rin pchaang naanno?
Neiyi naan avah Pa ava' hinni akupsul raan mbinmaan. Pdainu akupsul raan khat ka'am, naan nih adorin chaakin Moses tih naan avah akupsul raan.
Naan nih Moses lamkrin kcha' akurthuh tlaangin bih, Nei rukka lam'mrin naandi'. Mleiya mma ngi Nei kleiyi mdokjit dok.
Pdainu naan nih mma' dokjit rek lam'arin chaakmaan bih taluhep pih Nei kpauna rek avah lam'rin chnaanno?”
Hava'le' dilli Jisu ngi Galily truwnpii, Taiberia truwn mdoditin klaanda vada.
Ungta omlai ktong rek 'leenni titinna' nong tyatya mdotlot kdei rek mii knempok ki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi lown khat 'leenni kalda ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh Msikhu rek tung ngi ko'ong lamda.
'Tunnu Jihudi rek maalna', Taplaanna' avah naitek chda.
Jisu ngi mluw parkhaapda khu msut thungta, Mhin nih miilop knempok karva deida. Mthungta Mma ngi Philip hinni hanto'theda: “Neen nih hava' miipii rek dochaak kho rah thenpen avah tva'ki tren raanno?”
Mma ngi havah Philip mdoleuna' ngaal lih mdothe mleiya talu totlot rang tidit avah Mma ngi mdodeh dok ksa.
Philip pih arthaangda: “Hava' mmaan ava ngi mruksisi ngi achasap lamso ndit bih denarii arja 'knii khoki rukvah khom nimeh,” dida.
Msikhu rek arlak ki khat Simon Pitar tu' unau kthuwk Andria ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda:
“Rukowl thenpen parnga le' tuwlvah kdil 'knii kthlowi kmow khat hava' thuh ka'am daat a. Pdainu avale' vah hanto'ya knem mii rekki thenvah talu ksirang ngo?”
Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek avah kok'ongsap rah asiin.” 'Tunnu mmun ava' thung ngi nowm mowngpokda. Mthungta mii rekka ko'ong lamda ungta miichai avah pun parnga arveel rah.

Jisu ngi thenpen rek avah louda ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli Msikhu rek hinni the mda. Ungta sikhu rekki kok'ong mii rek hinni them lamda. Ungta ava' heppi tuwlvah ava' rukka mningchimin ya ngi thempiik lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kokhop pih mchaakin dilli, Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Khadaat ruk mkartlaimana' rah mikri ka'am daat rek avah apurbukin.”
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mikri rek avah purbuk lamda ungta rukowl thenpen parnga daat thungki mikri tidit tah kcha rekki mdochaak donin avah tomkal sowm lei'knii dimda.
Audilli mii rek ava ngi Jisu ngi tngana' mdotlot mdehn thungta hanto' the lamda: “Kindit kat tih havah dultipaam thung ngi kurjung rang khulpu ava' a.”
Audilli Jisu ngi mii rekki arva lamdon nih paamkruwng mdopurthuh raan ki thenni raanni mvankqhi lamrah tidit mdeh thungta, veikhat sunda Mthina ngi lown thah hangkal chda.
Ungta kluwki mpha mveh thungta, Msikhu rekka truwnpii thah yu lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih arkuwng thung ngi luwt lamda ungta truwnpii 'leenni Kapernaum ktong thah va lamda. Ungta 'tunnu khu jiing chda, ava' kpha thung ngi mmaan hinni Jisu a yumlaida.
Ungta tchangkhu kdung ngi kraang ava ngi truwnpii avah purlupda.
Mmaan nih kilomitar parnga mditmata truk arveel mvanthaan dilli, mmaan nih arkuwng ktong thah Jisu ngi truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi chetda karvang mdehn thungta mningin pqit lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mhinin nih hanto'theda: “Nei ping ngi, aningin pqitmaan.”
Audilli mmaan nih plung korkhol lih Mma' avah arkuwng thung ngi arlaang chlamda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih arkuwng avah mheitlunna' raan laan ava' heitlungda.

Mupduknii ngi truwnpii ava' raalpha khat thah krip miipii rekki Msikhu rek kalna' arkuwngte ava' kma'don morson ammeh ungta Jisu a Msikhu rektu' kalsap lammeh. Pdainu Msikhu rek daat chrel kal lamda kvanglam tidit dei lamda.
Anto'daat yoso, Kruwng ava ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli thenpen mdochaak naan mun ava' beh ngi Taiberia ki arkuwngte morson rek avah arva lamda.
Ungta miipii rek ava ngi mmun ava' thuh Jisu daat kma' Msikhu rek rukka ma'ammaan dei lam thida mmaan rukka arkuwngte thung ngi kal lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Jisu kthlaam mih Kapernaum thah arva lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih truwnpii raalpha khat thah Mma' mkurdutqhiin thungta mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Rabbi, teden thung ngi hava' thangvah karva dok ptil lih?”

Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya naan nih titinna' adodehn leiyi adotthlaamin pemeh, pdainu naan nih apowiyin kpa ngi thenpen ava' adochaakin leiyi, adotthlaamin.

Naan nih kenvei chrah thendam ava' ki then daat tih nong loumaan. Pdainu Mii Chapa ava ngi naan ahin nih adotpiik raan ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki thenni ka'am rang thendam leiyi, nong alouchaan. Mleiya Pa Isowr ava ngi Mma' 'leenni kbihjiik mdolot chaak dok.”
Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih Isowr nong kdotlot chaakna' raan, talu tlow nikaanli?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Havah Isowr nong ava' tidit tah naan nih Mma ngi mdo'arjuksi Mma' hinni lam'arin chaan.”

Avaleiyi, mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Mdittu' neen nih kmikin nih deida lam'adokrin chaakna' raan ki thenni adotetdet raan titinna' talu adotlot pchaan ka'am a? Ungta talu nongda, Nang ngi adotlot rangnga?
Neen kpa leenni paamkbiik laiyi manna cha lamda. Tikjit dok ava' heppi, ‘Mma ngi parvaan ki tchaak rah thenpen mmaan hinni pii lamda.’ ” (Mpk. 16:4 Neh. 9:15 Luw. 78:24)

Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Moses tih thenpen avah parvaan ki adotpiikin pemeh. Pdainu Kpa ngi naan ahin nih parvaan ki kindit thenpen ava' adotpiikin.
Isowr thenpen avah parvaan ki kurjung Mma' ava'. Ungta Mma ngi dultipaam thung ngi rinkum avah mdopiik.”
Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Kruwng mpha ktai thung ngi hava' thenpen avah mheipii chaan.”

Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya rinkum ki thenpen ava' ping. Nei kihin nih kthleng kcha' mma' avah teden rukku mpowi tham nimeh. Ungta Nei lam'mikrin kcha' mma' ava ngi teden rukku mningkraal nimeh.
Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah naan nih Neiya mdei dokin tinu pdainu lam'mrin chmaan tih.
Pa ava ngi Kihin nih mdotpiik dok rek mkheng avah Kihin nih kthleng chlam rah. Ungta Nei Kihin nih kthleng kcha' mma' avah teden thung rukku Neiyi kneng pthivot nimaang.
Mleiya Neiya kthina ki kuplungbin ktlow rah kurjung pmaang. Nei myuksi Mma' plungbin ava' ktlow rah parvaan ki kurjung ping.

Ungta havah Nei myuksi Pa ava' plungbin ava'. Mleiya Mma ngi mdotpiik dok rek mkheng avah Neiyi khadaat preu kdopenvei lamna' rang ki then pemeh, pdainu mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi veikhat kdoperdel lamna' rang ki then.

Ungta havah Nei myuksi Mma' plungbin ava'. Mleiya Chapa ava' mmik ki dei chda ungta lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rekki ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kphang chrah. Ungta Neiyi mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi mmah perdel nikdi'.”
‘Neiya parvaan ki kurjung thenpen ava' ping’, mdodit leiyi, Jihudi rekki Mma' leiyi, nurnur kdi ngi kerteenna' lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih the lamda: “Havah neen nih mnuh le' mpa tedehksaan Joseph chapa Jisu ava' pemeh mow? Mdittu' taluhep pih Mma ngi, ‘Neiya parvaan ki kurjung ping’, mdoditto'?”
Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi arthaangda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih asingreelin thung ngi nurnur kdi ngi kerteen maan.
Nei myuksi Pa ava ngi mdoqen thuh kma'don leh kuwkhat leh ruk Nei kihin nih thleng pchaang nimeh. Ungta Neiyi mma' avah mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi perdel nikdi'.

Havah Khulpu rek laika thung ngi tikjit ksa dok: ‘Ungta mmaan mkheng avah Isowr rih kpurchuk dok rah.’ (Is. 54:13) Avaleiyi, ava' karja dok kcha' ungta Pa ava' hinki kurchuk dok kcha' mii khimkheiyi Nei kihin nih karva kcha'lam.
Isowr tu' ka'am Mma' daat kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Pa avah mmik ki deidok mlai. Mma' daat chrel lih Pa avah mmik ki mdodeh chaak.
Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a.
Neiya rinkum ki thenpen ava' ping.
Naan apa'leen nih paamkbiik laiyi manna cha lamda ungta diyou chlamda.
Havah parvaan ki kurjung thenpen ava'. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih ava' thungki kcha chrah, ungta diyou nimeh.

Neiya parvaan ki kurjung kring thenpen ava' ping. Kuwmiikhat tih hava' thungki thenpen mchaak chaak bih, mmah ktlangknai kmah ngi kring chrah. Ungta Neiyi kdopiik rang thenpen avah dultipaam rinkum ki thenni kdopiik rang Neiki kdaksa ava'.”
Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki msingreelin thung ngi kalraina' lamda. “Mleiya taluhep pih hava' mii ava ngi mdaksa avah neen nthenni tchaak raanni mikpiidaat raanno,” dilamda?
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Naan nih Mii Chapa daksa chada ungta Mma' hii ava' aneek chaakmaan bih naan athung inni kring ka'am pemeh.
Nei kdaksa kcha kcha' ungta Nei kihii knee kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a. Ungta Neiyi mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi mmah perdel nikdi'.
Mleiya Nei kdaksa avah tchaak rangkat thendam ungta kihii avah teneek rangkat ava'.
Nei kdaksa kcha kcha' ungta Nei kihii knee kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei kthung ngi ka'am a ungta mma' thung ngi Neiya ka'am ping.
Kring Pa ava ngi, Neiya myuksida ungta Neiyi Pa ava' amleiyi ring nuh. Ava' heppi Nei makcha kcha' mma' ava ngi trin rukka Nei ka'am leiyi, kring chrah.
Havah parvaan ki kurjung thenpen ava'. Naan apa 'leenni paamkbiik laiyi manna chalam thida mdiyow chaakin ava'lu pemeh. Hava' thenpen kcha kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kmah kring chrah.”
Hava' dow khimkhei rek avah Mma ngi Kapernaum ki Jihudi rek sinegog thuh mpurchuh lam thung ngi mdothe.
Msikhu knempok rekki hava' marjaakin thungta, ‘havah tarjaak pchaanmah pau a, kuw ngi kdeipindih pchaang daat rang’? dilamda.
Jisu ngi Msikhu rekki ava'leiyi mkerteenna' nurnur inna tidit muplungril lih mdeh thungta, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava ngi atulut inna?
Mdittu' naan nih Mii Chapa avah choduh ki ma'amna' mun thah muhungkal amikin nih adeh thung innu talu dinaandi o?
Pthla ava ngi rinkum avah mdopiik pdainu daksa ngi dow khatleh mdotan chaak rah ka'am pemeh. Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe pauna rek avah pthla ungta mmaan avah rinkum.
Pdainu arlak inni lamkrin kma' aangqhe ka'am a.” Mleiya mupqhun daat ki Jisu ngi lamkrin kma' rek mmaan avah kuwle ungta kuw ngi Mmah kyur chrang tidit avah mdodeh dok ksa.
Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Kpa ngi mma' hinni mdopiik dok kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Nei kihin nih thleng pchaang nimeh.”
Mpha ava' ki kupqhun nih Msikhu rek knempok ki dil mkerheel chlamda ungta Mma' tu' veikhat chetsap lammeh.
Audilli Jisu ngi sowm lei'knii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naan rukka tsun chaak rah abin inna?”
Audilli Simon Pitar rih arthaangda: “Kruwng, neenna kuw hinni sundaat nikaanli? Nang ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki pauna rek adothlowi a.
Ungta neen nih, Nang nga Kindit Isowr Chapa, Mesaiah ava' ptih, tidit lamkrin chaak inna ungta kdeh chaak inna.”
Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Sowm lei'knii rek naan avah Neiyi adokokcholin ungta arlakin ki khat tah tarnampii khat kurthuwk kcha' a.”
Mma ngi havah Kerioth ki Simon chapa Judas leiyi, mdothe. Mleiya mmah sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat kurthuwk thida mma ngi Mma' avah kyur chbei rah.
Hava'le' dilli Jisu a Galily thah vada. Mleiya Jihudi rekki ke'eyou rang ngi mdothlaamin leiyi, Mma ngi Judia paam thung ngu korlon nuwm pemeh.
'Tunnu Jihudi rekki buw'inn ki tmaalna' avah naitek chda.
Avaleiyi, mnaupa leh ngi Mhin nih the lamda: “Mmun hava' ama rang ngi Judia paam thah vangsun dok. Mleiya asikhu rek rukku Nang ngi adotlot nong rek avah mmikin nih adei chlamso.

Mleiya mdak mthina ngi mii rek hinni tkurphuwn rah kngei kcha' kuwkhat leh ngi tuprut tih dow khatleh mdotlotlu pemeh. Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah atlot cheentung ngi, dultipaam thuh adak athina ikpandang cha'.”
Mleiya mnaupa le' kpha rukku Mhin nih lam'mdorin chaakin pemeh.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiki mpha arvang mlai. Pdainu naanki mpha avah mpha ktai thung ngi ka'am tlit daat.
Dultimii ngi naanna ahal pchaang inmeh, pdainu Neiyi dultipaam thungki nong rek avah kqha pemeh tidit ki rinpaumin kdopiik leiyi, ava ngi Neiya mdotahal chaak lam.
Naanna hava' kmaal ava' thung ngi hangin, Neiya hava' kmaal ava' thung ngu hangkhot nimaang. Mleiya Neiki mpha avah kurkhum mlai.”
Mma ngi hava' pauna avah mmaan hinni mthe dok dilli, mdakka Galily paam thung ngi ka'am chdaat.
Pdainu mnaupa leh’ mahan dokin dilli, Mma' rukka kmaal ava' thung ngi hangda. Pdainu Mma ngi kurphuwng vah hang meh, tuprut heiyi hangda.
Audilli Jihudi rekki kmaal ava' thung ngi, ‘Mmah tu'uwng thangda,’ dilamda, thlaam lamda.
Ungta miipii rekki Mma' leiyi, kdung ngi kerteenna' nurnur lamda. Mleiya aangqhe ngi, ‘Mmah miikqha’, dilamda ungta morson rekki, ‘Immeh, anto' mda Mma ngi mii rek mdohuwn chaakbeh’, dilamda.
Anto'daat yoso Jihudi rek mdoqit chaakin leiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' leiyi, kandang ngi dow khatleh the pchaang lammeh.
'Tunnu kmaal avah mqimmlai mphaak arlaan nih, Jisu ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi hangda purchuk lamda.
Ungta Jihudi rekka ngak chlamda. “Taluhep pih kurchuk liit kma'pa mii hava ngi jiik rek avah mdodeh pindit pchaanno,” dilamda?
Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Nei kihin ki tkurchuhna' avah Nei kdow pemeh pdainu Nei myuksi Mma'dow.
Kuwmiikhat tih Mma' plungbin ktlow nuwm ma'am bih, mma ngi tkurchuhna' avah kdei chrah. Mma ngi tkurchuhna' avah Isowr hinki mow, mditmata Nei kdobin nih kdothe mow tidit avah kdei chrah.
Mdak thungki ngi kpau mma' ava ngi mthina ki mkonlorna' mdothlaam chaak. Pdainu Mma' arjuksi khat ava' konlorna' kthlaam kcha' Mma' avah kindit ungta Mma' thung ngi rinkinditmana' ammeh.
Moses tih naan ahin nih nowlam avah adotpiikin kmah? Ungta naan khadaat rukku nowlam avah pqowi maantih kmah? Taluleiyi naan nih Neiya mke'eyou rang ngi atthlaam inna?”
Mii rekki arthaang lamda ungta the lamda: “Nang nga tarnam khat athlowi chaak a. Kuw ngi Nang nga ake'eyou rah atthlaam a?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda:” Neiyi nong khat ktlotcheu, naan akheng inna ngakin tinu.
Avaleiyi, Moses tih naan ahin nih vuntreenna' avah adotpiikin. Havah Moses hinki pemeh pdainu apa'leen hinki. Ungta naan nih tkarngatnit tih miikhat avah mvun reenin tinu.

Moses nowlam ava' adopkui mana' raan ki thenni tkarngatnit tih miikhat tih vuntreenna' avah arlaang chda. Mdittu', Neiyi tkarngatnit tih miikhat changkarngam mih kdopdam deek leivah, taluleiyi naan nih Nei k'leen nih aplungin kthi a?
Naan nih mikmai suwda pau pindit maan. Pdainu rinkindit ki paupinditna' ava ngi pau apinditin.”
Audilli Jerusalem ki mii aangqhe rekki the lamda: “Havah mmaan nih mdo'eyow raanni mdothlaamin Mma' ava' pemeh mow?
Pdainu asuwn, Mma ngi kurphuwng ngi pauda ungta mmaan nih dow khatleh ruk Mhin nih the pchaang lam mda. Paamkpu rekki havah Mesaiah ava'kat tidit mdeh daatin mow?
Neen nih hava' mii avah tva'ki tidit tah ndehn. Pdainu Mesaiah ava' murjun thung ngu kuwkhat leh ngi Mmah tva'ki kthuwk tidit dei nimeh.”

Audilli luwbuk'inn thuh Jisu ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Naan nih Neiya mdeiyin tih ungta tva'ki kthuwk ping tidit ruk adotedehn, anto'daat yoso Neiya kdobin nih kurjung pmaang. Pdainu Naan nih adodeh maan, Nei myuksi Mma' avah kindit.
Ungta Neiyi Mma' avah kdeh, tidit tah Neiya Mma' hinki ping ungta Mma ngi Neiya mdoyuktsi.”
Audilli mmaan nih Mma' kokyowng rang ngi owng lamda pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'leenni khut khiing pchaang lammeh. Mleiya Mma' ki mpha avah veimlai.
Ungta mii meknem mih Mhin nih lam'rin chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mesaiah murjun thung vah hava' mii ava ngi mdotlot kkheel lih titinna' rek avah ktlow rang mow?”
Audilli miipii rekki Mma' leiyi, mkerteenna' inna tidit avah Pharisy rekki arja lamda. Mthungta Pharisy rekle' thimpu kenreel rekki Mma' kokyowng rah koprol rek heipthla lamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya mpha mruk ki thenni a'amqhi thiin nikdon, Nei myuksi Mma' hinni hung chnikdi'.’
Naan nih Neiya mthlaam naandi' pdainu naan nih Neiya mdei nimaan tih ungta Nei ka'amna' mun ava' thung ngu naanna arhung pchaang nimaan tih.”

Audilli Jihudi rekki msingreelin thung ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi tva thah mche rangna, neen nih tedeh pchaanmah rangplih? Mma ngi kerjeida ka'am ter kcha' Grik mii rek arlak ki chetda Grik mii rek mpurchuh chaak rangna ava'mow?
Taluhep pih, ‘Naan nih Neiya mthlaam naandi' pdainu naan nih Neiya mdei nimaan tih ungta Nei ka'amna' mun ava' thung ngu naanna arhung pchaang nimaan tih,’ dida, mdothe avah talu mdothena o?”
Kmaal ava' ki mqutna' nit klinsi ava' nit tih Jisu ngi ripda ungta owngda hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat mning kakraal ma'am cheentung ngi, Nei kihin nih arvaso rang ngi anee chso.
Kchiir laika ngi mdothe heppi, Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' avah muplungril thungki kringdii kreng ngi kluwng rah,” dida.
Pdainu Mma ngi havah Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rekki mdo’arlaan bei chaak raan Pthla ava'leiyi mdothe. Mleiya Pthla Kchiir avah piidok mlai, mleiya Jisu avah ponlor dok mlai.
Avaleiyi, miipii rek meknem mih hava' mdothe marjaakin thungta, ‘kindit kat tih havah khulpu ava' amda’, dilamda.
Morson rekki the lamda: “Havah Mesaiah ava',” pdainu aangqhe rekki, ‘Khrista avah Galily ki kthuwk rangmuh’? dilamda.
Kchiir laika ngi mdothe, ‘Mesaiah avah David amna' Bethlehem khuwpii thung ngi David suruwl thungki kthuwk rah mdodit pda’, dilamda?
Mthungta Mma' leiyi, mii rek arlak ki lopkenqhenna' khat thuwkda.
Ungta mii aangqhe rekki Mmah kyowng nuwm lamda, pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'leenni khut khiing lammeh.
Audilli koprol rek avah thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rek hinni vangkerheel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih, ‘taluleiyi naan nih Mmah arvanqhi maantih,’ dilamda?
Koprol rek ava ngi arthaang lamda: “Teden rukku kuwkhat leh ngi hava' mii ava' pau heppi kpau ammeh.”
Avaleiyi, Pharisy rekki arthaang lamda: “Naan rukka Mma ngi atuhuwn chaakin neh?
Naan nih paamkpu rek mditmata Pharisy rekki Mma' hinni lammdorin chaakin adeh kchown mow?
Pdainu nowlam kdei kma' hava' miipii rek avah kuhu kurbuk kcha'lam a.”
Jaan nih Jisu hinni kthleng Nikodimas, mmaan arlak ki khat ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda:
“Neenki nowlam ava ngi miikhat avah rukri ngi mhin ki karjajap mlaiyi ungta talu mtlot tidit kdei kmah ngi paukpindit khot rang mow?”
Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang rukka Galily paam ki ptimow? Athlaam rang ngi asuw tidit tah Galily paam ki khulpu kthuwk ka'am pemeh.”
Ungta mii khimkheiya, mi'inn mi'inn thah sunter chlamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi kruwn lown thah hangda.
Ungta Mma ngi jiingsun kparma ngi luwbuk'inn thah veikhat thleng nowlda. Ungta mii mkheng ngah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta mma ngi ko'ong thida mii rek avah purchuk lamda.
Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki lowsangkqhi 'leenni mdokyownin snu khat avah Mma' hinni arheiqhi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih snu avah mmalai inni pkong lamda.
Mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu hava' snu avah lowsang mqhimeek kat arlaan nih, mdokyownin.
'Tunnu nowlam dilkqowiyi, Moses vah havalu hep daat avah lung ngi tedeenyow rah tidit ki paupiik mdotpiikin. Pdainu Nangvah talu aditta,” dilamda?
Havah mmaan nih Mma' mdopsulna' raan ki thenni mdotheen. Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan dothe karja kma' heppi kuwnda dulti leenni mkhutchal lih kjitda.
Mmaan nih kornowl lih Mhin nih mkheel mkheelin thungta, Mma ngi mthina kindingda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan arlakin ki pnu kervei liit kma' mma' ava ngi snu avah rukrirep pih adeengso.”
Ungta Mma ngi veikhat kuwn nowlda dulti 'leenni kjitda.

Audilli ava' karja rek mmaan ava ngi mma' mma' ki muplungril inni mkerdeh chaakin dilkqowiyi, kversi ki kupqhun nih mqutna'dek kpha ngi khatkhat tih vanthuwk chlamda. Ungta mmalai inni krip snu avale' Jisu mthina daat chrel mapthi lamda.

Ungta Jisu ngi mkarkha thungta snu ava' kma'don mii morson khatleh ka'am kma' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Snu tu'uwng lamda nang akokyowng rekka? Kuwkhat leh ngi nang nga apsul lam meh mow?”
Ungta snu ava ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, kuwkhat leh am lammeh,” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei rukku apsul maang. Isun cha' ungta pnu lamchi' veikhat arveima'.”

Audilli Jisu ngi veikhat mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya dultipaam ki mar'aang ava' ping. Nei kdil kqowi kcha' mma' ava ngi kjiingnu thung ngi chet nimeh, pdainu rinkum ki mar'aang avah mma ngi kthlowi chrah,” dida.
Avaleiyi, Pharisy rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga athina ngi adaksa ki rinpaumin apiik chaak a. Avaleiyi, Nang arinpaumin avah kindit ava' pemeh.”

Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi kthina ki rinpaumin pii chdaat yow ringngi Neiki krinpaumin avah kindit. Mleiya Neiyi, Neiya tva'ki kthuwk ping ungta tva thah qowi nikdi tidit avah kdeh. Pdainu naan nih Neiya tva'ki kthuwk ping ungta tva thah qowi nikdi tidit avah dei maantih.
Naanna daksa ‘lam thah pau pinditin tinu pdainu Neiya kuwkhat ruk pau pindit maang.
Ungta Neiyi paukpindit bih, Nei kpaupindit avah kindit. Mleiya Neiya kthina daat pmaang pdainu Nei myuksi Kpa ava' tung ping.
Ungta naan anowlamin thung rukku ‘Mii 'knii dopiik rinpaumin avah kindit, dida mdokjit dok.
Neiya kthina ki rinpaumin kpii kcha' khat ping. Ungta Nei myuksi Pa ava ngi Neiki krinpaumin avah mdopiik.”

Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Apa a tva thah ka'am?” Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Naan nih Nei ruk, Kpa ruk mdei maantih. Naan nih Nei atedeh chaak tlaangin bih, Kpa rukka adodeh chaak tlaang raanna.”
Jisu ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi mpurchuh meek lam chunni, hava' pau rek avah sumbuwrinn aang ngi mdothe. Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'leenni khut khiing lammeh. Mleiya Mma' ki mpha avah veimlai.

Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni veikhat the nowlda: “Neiya sun chnikdi' ungta naan nih Neiya mthlaamnaan. Ungta naanna apnuwn thung ngi diyou chnaandi' ungta Nei kchena' ava' thung ngu naanna thleng pchaang nimaan tih.”
Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki the lamda: “Hava' mdothe avah mthina mker'eyow chaak rangna ava' mow? ‘Nei kchena' thung ngu naanna thleng pchaang nimaan tih,’ midotidit inna?”
Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna kurduh kiin ptih. Neiya karthak ki ping. Naanna hava' dultipaam thung kiin ptih. Neiya hava' dultipaam ki pmaang.
Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih, ‘Naanna apnuwn thung ngi diyou chnaandi', kdodit. Mleiya naan nih Nei avah Mma' tidit lam'arin chaak maanbi, naanna apnuwn thung ngi diyou chnaandi',” dida.
Audilli mmaan nih Mma' hinni the lamda: “Nang nga kuw ptih?” Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih ahinin nih kdothe tlit ava' ping.
Neiyi naan aleiyi dow knempok kdothe rah ka'am ungta pau kdopindit rah ka'am, pdainu Nei myuksi Mma' avah kindit. Ungta Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi Mma' hinki kdo'arjaak dow rek ava' kdothe.”
Mma ngi Pa ava' ki mlei mmaan hinni mdothe avah mmaan vah deipindih lam mda.

Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Mii Chapa avah akhiin chaakin thungrow ngi naan nih Nei avah Mma' tidit deirow naandi'. Ungta Neiyi kthina thungki ngi dow khatleh tlowmaang pdainu Kpa ngi mdotpurchuh heppi, Neiyi hava'le' avah kdothe.
Ungta Nei myuksi Mma' avah Nei kihin nih ka'am. Kpa ngi Neiya kthina ngi mmameh. Mleiya Neiyi mpha ktai thung ngi Mma' plung ngamna' chrel daat kdotlot chaak.”
Mma ngi hava' pauna rek mthe thungta mii knempok ki Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih lamkrin kcha' Jihudi rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Nei kpauthe thuh a'am chaak tlitin bih, dakkat tih naanna Nei ksikhu rekin ptih.
Ungta naan nih kindit avah dei chnaandi' ungta kindit ava ngi naanna ayukpo'ol chraan.”
Mmaan nih Mhin nih arthaang lamda: “Neenna Abraham suruwl thungki inping ungta neenna kuwkhat leh hinni suwk ki arvang amvot maanring. Taluhep pih Nang ngi, ‘Naanna ol chnaandi' atidit inna?”
Jisu ngi mmaan nah arthaang lamda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya kuwku yoso pnu kervei kcha' mma' ava ngi pnu suwk'owr kurthuwk kcha' a.
Ungta suwk'owr ava ngi inn ava' thah ktlangknai kmah ka'amlu pemeh. Pdainu Chapa avah ktlangknai kmah inn ava' thung ngi ka'amlu.
Avaleiyi, Chapa ava ngi naanna atpo'ol chaakin bih, naanna dodak kat tih ol chnaandi'.
Neiyi naan avah Abraham suruwl thungki inptih tidit kdeh. Pdainu naan athung inni Nei kpauna amna' rah mun ma'amma leiyi, naan nih Neiya mke'eyou rang ngi adotthlaamin.
Neiya Kpa hinki kmik ki kdodeh ava ngi kpau ping ungta naan rukka a'paan hinki amikin nih adodehn ava ngi adotlotin.”

Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta Mhin nih the lamda: “Abraham avah neen kpa.” Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Abraham nau rek akurthuh innu, naan nih Abraham nongtlot rek ava' tlow raan imptih.
Pdainu Isowr hinki, kdo'arjaak kindit ava' ahinin nih akthepiikin Nei avah naan nih mke'eyou rang ngi mthlaamin tinu. Ava'lu avah Abraham vah mdotlot pemeh.
Naanna a'paan dotlot ava' adotlotin.” Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Neenna chlamin pmaan ring, K'paan khat ka'am, avah Isowr.”

Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Isowr avah A'paan mkurthuh tlaang bih, naan nih Neiya vonsat mlow raan imptih. Mleiya Neiya Isowr hinki thuwknu dultipaam thung ngi kurjung ping. Neiya Nei kuplungbin nih kurjung pmaang pdainu Mma ngi mdoyuktsi.
Taluleiyi naan nih Nei kpauthe avah deipindih maanti o? Mleiya naan nih Nei kpauna avah ado'arjaak pchaanin pemeh.

Naanna a'paan tarnampii ava' hinkiin ptih. Ungta naan nih a'paan nih kdung ngi mdongei ava' totlot rah adobinin. Mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih mmah miike'eyou ungta kindit thung ngi mmah ka'am pemeh. Mleiya mma' thung ngi kindit avah ka'am pemeh. Ungta pleimnee thung ngi mma ngi mdaksa thungki ngi kpau kcha'lu. Mleiya mmah pleiknei ungta pleiknei ki mpa.
Ungta Neiyi ahinin nih kindit ava' kdothe leiyi, naan nih Neiya lam'mrin chmaan tih.
Arlakin ki kuwn pti, Nei pnu kervei mukpurthuh a? Ungta Neiyi kindit ava' ktheu, taluleiyi naan nih Neiya lam'mrin chmaan tih?
Isowr hinki Mma' ava ngi Isowr pauna rek avah mdo'arjaak. Naanna ava' arja maantih, mleiya naanna Isowr hinkiin ptipmeh.”
Audilli Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda ungta Mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih, ‘Nang nga Samaria ki mii ptih ungta ram arve a,’ kdoditin avah anto'kat tah?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiya ram arvei maang. Pdainu Neiyi Kpa avah kdokyat chaak ungta naannu Neiya makyat chmaan tih.
Ungta Neiya kthina ki kkonlor chaakna' rah thlaammaang. Kthlaam kcha' ungta kpindit kcha' khat ka'am.
Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Kuwmiikhat tih, Nei kpauna mopqowi chaak bih, mma ngi teden rukku kdiyou tidit avah mmik ki deiliit nimeh.”

Audilli Jihudi rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “'Tunnu neen nih, Nang nga tarnam athlowi a tidit kdehn a. Mleiya Abraham ruk ungta khulpu rek rukka kdiyou kcha'lam. Pdainu nangvah, ‘kuwmiikhat tih Nei kpauna mopqowi chaak bih, mma ngi teden rukku kdiyou tidit avah pertem liit nimeh’ aditta.
Nang nga neen k'paan Abraham kdiyou kcha' ava' hinni klinbet ptimow? Ungta khulpu rek rukka kdiyou lam. Nang nga athina vah kuw ping ngi kirdi kcha' ptil lih?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi kthina ngi kokponlor chaak bih, Nei kokponlor chaakna' avah doksi pemeh. Pdainu Nei mokponlor kcha' khat avah naan nih naanki Isowr pii'i adoditin avah, Kpa ava'.

Naan nih Mmah deipindih mlai inptih pdainu Neivah kdehpindit chaak. Ungta Neiyi Mma' avah deipindih maang kdit bih, Nei rukka naan ahep inni pleiknei chrang ping. Pdainu Neiyi Mmah kdeh ungta Mma' pauna avah Neiyi kdopqowi.
Naan a'paan Abraham mih Neiki knit avah tedeh rah mdobin chaak ki kanpa chda ungta mma ngi mmik ki tedeh ruk mdeh chaak dok ungta kanpa dok kcha'.”
Audilli Jihudi rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga kum somparnga kpha mlai ptih ungta ava ngi Abraham avah amik ki adodeh?”
Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Abraham amduduh ngi Neiya ka'am dok ping.”
Audilli mmaan nih Mma' mdodeenna' raan ki lung chomsap lamda, pdainu Jisu a kordowl chda. Ungta luwbuk'inn thungki thuwkda mmaan arlak ki luwt dok thida anto' sun chda.
Ungta Jisu ngi anto' mvan chaakna ngi, mqou daat ki mmikktot kcha' miikhat deida.
Ungta Msikhu rekki Mhin nih kheel chlamda: “Rabbi hava' mmikktot tih kqou mii avah mmii ava' pnu arvemow, mnuhmpa pnu arve leiki o?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Hava' mii ava ngi pnu mdo'arvelei pemeh ungta mnuhmpa pnu arvelei ruk pemeh. Pdainu Isowr nong rek avah mma' hinni mkandanna' ranglei.
Khu mvaardaat arlaan nih Nei myuksi Mma' nong rek avah Neiyi kdotlot rah. Mleiya kuwkhat leh ngi nong mdosuk pchaanmana' jaan avah karvang chrah.
Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi ka'am khimkhei thung ngi, Neiya dultipaam ki mar'aang ava' ping.”
Mma ngi hava' dow khimkhei mthe dok le' dulti thah ptil pthotda, ptil lih bul klomda. Ungta Mma ngi bul ava ngi mii ava' mik 'leenni pubul piikda.
Ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Vang rang ngi Siloam, ‘tidit tah tapthlat dok' mdoditna', diirum ava' thung ngi alqhucha'. Mthungta mma ngi vangda ungta alqhu chda ungta mma ngi khu dei chda.”
Avaleiyi, mi'innveen rek ungta mmikktot tidit kdeiksa rekki the lamda: “Hava' mii avah ko'ong kchokda mii rek hinni kthamkqhil kcha' kchok ava' pemeh mow?”
Mii aangqhe ngi hanto'theda: “Havah mma'kat', ungta morson rekki, ‘havah mma'hep daat a’, dilamda.” Mthungta mma ngi, ‘neiya mma'kat ava' ping’, dida.
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Taluhep pih amikka kahar kchada?”

Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Jisu mdoditin miikhat ava ngi bul klomthida kmik mpubul piikda ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Vang rang ngi Siloam diirum thung ngi alqhucha'’, mdida. Ungta neiyi vanu kulqhut chaak thungta khu kdodeh chaak.”
Audilli mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Mmah tva thah kqowi?” Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiya dei maang.”
Mmaan nih Pharisy rek hinni, mduh ngi mmikktot mii avah arheiqhi lamda.
Jisu ngi bul klomda, mmikktot mdopahar piikna'nit avah tkarngatnit kurthuwkda.

Audilli Pharisy rekki taluhep pih mma ngi khu mdodeh tidit avah veikhat kheel nowl lamda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mma ngi kmik thung ngi bul pubulda ungta neiyi alqhunu, ungta neiyi khu kdodeh chaak.”

Avaleiyi, Pharisy aangqhe rekki the lamda: “Hava' mii avah Isowr hinki pemeh, mleiya Mma ngi tkarngatnit avah danmeh. Pdainu aangqhe rekki taluhep pih pnu kervei miikhat tih havalu tngana' nong avah ktlow pchaang rangplih?” dilamda. Ungta ava ngi marlak inni lop kenqhenna' khat thuwkda.
Mmaan nih mmikktot ava' hinni veikhat the nowl lamda: “Nang ngi amik akpaharpiik Mma' avah kuw pii aditto?” Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mmah khulpu khat.”
Pdainu Jihudi rekki mma' avah mmikktot thungki ngi khu mdodeh chaak tidit ki mlei avah, khu kdei kcha' mii ava' nuh le' mpa own lamda mkheelduhn kpha thung ngi lam'rin lammeh.
Ungta mmaan nih mmaanve hinni kheel lamda: “Havah mmikktot tih kdoplukin adoditin acha'paan avah hava' mow? Mdittu' taluhep pih khu mdodeh chaak koh?”
Mnuh le' mpa ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni the lamda: “Neenve vah havah, neen kchapa tidit tah kdehn a ungta mmah mmikktot tih kqou.

Pdainu taluhep pih khu mdeh chaak tidit tah naanve vah deimaan ring, mditmata kuw ngi mmikka mpaharpiik tidit deimaan ring. Mmah kokhop pih verimdau. Mdak akheelin mdaksa 'leenki a karthaang chdaat rah,” mmaanve ngi dida.

Mnuh le' mpa leh ngi hava' pau rek avah, Jihudi rek mdoqit chaakin leiyi, mdotheen. Mleiya Jihudi rekki mduh thah hanto' mdokolrotna' dokin: ‘Kuwmiikhat tih Mma' ava Mesaiah ava' tidit kthe thuh kcha' ma'am bih, mmah sinegog thungki teknen pthirah.’
Avaleiyi, mnuh le' mpa ngi, “Mmah kokhop pih ver'imda mdak akheelin,” mdoditin.
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mmikktot mii avah mveiknitna' own nowl lamda ungta kheelnowl lamda: “Isowr apanpaak cha', tidit tah hava' mii avah pnu kervei khat tidit tah neen nih kdehn a.”
Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya Mma ngi pnu mdo'arve mditmata mdo'arvema avah deimaang. Pdainu neiyi kdodeh chaak khat tah, neiya kmikktot ungta 'tunnu khu kdeh chaak a.”
Audilli mmaan nih mhin nih veikhat the nowl lamda: “Mma ngi ahin nih talukat atotlot piik ungta taluhep pih amikka atpahar piikko?”
Mma ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiya adokthepiik dokin, naan nih arja chmaan tinu ava'. Taluleiyi naan nih veikhat tarjaak rah abin inna? Naan rukka Mma' sikhu rek tkurthuh chaak rah abin inna?”
Audilli mmaan nih mmah kdung ngi rai lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Nang kho a Mma' sikhu ptih, pdainu neenna Moses sikhu rekin ping.
Neen nih Moses hinni Isowr rih pau mdothe tidit tah kdehn. Pdainu hava' mii avah tva'ki kthuwk tidit neen nih dei maanring.”
Mii ava ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Havah tngana' khat tah, tidit tah naan nih Mmah tva'ki kthuwk tidit dei maantih ungta Mma' vah nei kmikka mpahar piikda.

'Tunnu neen nih Isowr rih pnu kervei kcha' rekka arjaak piik meh tidit tah ndehn. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih Isowr luwkbuk cha' mkurthuh bih ungta Mma' plungbin mtlot chaak bih, Mma ngi avah mdo'arjaak piik.
Dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kuwkhat tih mmikktot tih kqou kcha' mii avah pahar piikda tidit tah tarjaak mlai.
Hava' mii ava ngi Isowr hinki mkurthuhma bih, Mma ngi dow khatleh tlow pchaang nimeh.”
Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga aqou thung thung ngi pnu thung ngi kqou kcha' ava ngi neen mukpurchuk raan athe a?” Ungta mma' avah duwn thah knengpthi lamda.
Jisu ngi mmaan nih mma' avah duwn thah mdoknen pthi dokin avah arjada. Ungta Mma ngi mma' mkurdutqhi thungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa hinni lam'arin chaak a?”
Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Mma' avah kuw plih, neiyi Mma' hinni lam'kdorin chaakna' rah mheithe piikcha'.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Mma' avah amik ki adodeh chaak dok ksa ungta 'tun'tun nih nang ahin nih kpau meeksli Mma' ava'.”
Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neiyi lamkrin chaak a.” Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih luwbu chda.

Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Neiya paukpindit rang ki thenni hava' dultipaam thung ngi kurjung ping. Mleiya khu kdei kma' rekki khu mdodeh chaakna' rah ungta khu kdei kcha' rek mik koptot rang ngi, Neiya kurjung ping.”
Ungta mma' tu' kilqhi Pharisy aangqhe rekki hava' mdothe pauna rek avah arja lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni, ‘neen rukka kmikin ktotmow’ dilamda?

Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih amikin ktot akurthuh chaak tlaangin bih, pnu ado'arve chaakma tlaang raanna. Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih, ‘neenna kmikin kahar’ adit inna. Avaleiyi, naan apnu arve rekin avah ka'am tlit chdaat a.”
Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Yau'inn thurngut thung ngi kluwt kma' 'lam morson thlaamda hangkkal mma' avah kupru ungta raanqhul kupru kat ava'.
Pdainu thurngut thung ngi kluwt mma' avah yaukqhi ava'.

Mma' hinni thurngut krungpa ava ngi thurngut pvan piikda ungta yau rek ava ngi mma' krowl avah arjapindit chlamda. Ungta mma ngi myau rek avah mmiing mmiing inni own lamda ungta duwn thah qhi pthuwk lamda.
Ungta mma ngi myau rek avah duwn mupthuh doklam dilli, mma ngi mmaanduh qowida ungta yau rek ava ngi mma'dil ava' mdoqowiyin. Mleiya mmaan nih mma' krowl avah mdo'arjaak pinditin.
Ungta miiktlok khat tah qowilam nimeh ungta mma' hinkiya kchen chlam rah. Mleiya mmaan nih mal ktlei krowl avah mdodehpinditin pemeh.”
Jisu ngi havah pau tportolna' khat tih theda. Pdainu mmaan nih talu mdoditna' tidit deipindih pchaang lam mda.
Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi mmaan hinni veikhat the nowlda: “Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Neiya yau thurngut ava' ping.
Nei kduh thah kthleng rek mkheng avah kupru rek ungta raanqhul kupru reklam. Pdainu yau rek ava ngi mmaan dothe avah arjaakpiik lammeh.
Neiya thurngut ava' ping, kuwmiikhat tih Nei ka'am leiyi, mluw chaak bih, mmah kirling chrah. Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh luwtdon ungta thuwkdon leh mmaalna' kqha mun avah kphang chrah.

Kupru rekvah mdoprutna' raan le' mdo'eyowna' raan le' mdopenvei pthina' raan ki then kma'don nih kthlenglu lam pemeh. Pdainu Neiya mmaan nih rinkum mdothlowi chaakna' raan ungta kepleet tih mdothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni kurjung ping.
Neiya kqha yaukqhi ava' ping. Kqha yaukqhi ava ngi mrinkum avah yau rekki thenni parlaanda.

Pdainu ardaman suwk avah yaukqhi ava' pemeh ungta mma' avah yaukpupa ava' ruk pemeh. Mma ngi tkeikraang karva mdehcheu, yau rek avah mapthida kchen kcha'lu. Ungta tkeikraang ava ngi yau rek avah kyowng chlamda ungta mdorei penqhen pthipet lu.
Ardaman suwk avah kchen kcha', mleiya mmah mardaman klow kcha' ungta mma ngi yau rekki thenni tukmdosut piik pemeh.
Neiya kqha yaukqhi ava' ping. Ungta Neiyi kyau rek avah kdodeh pindit chaak lam ungta Nei kdow rek ava ngi Neiya mdotedeh pindit chaak lam.
Pa ava ngi Nei mdotedeh chaak heppi, Neiyi Pa avah kdodeh chaak, Ungta Neiyi krinkum avah kyau rekki thenni kdoparlaan chaak.
Ungta hava' yau'inn thungki kma' yau morson Neiyi kdothlowi rekki Nei kokrowl avah karja chlam rah. Ungta mmaan avah yaulop khatsap kurthuwk lamrah ungta yaukqhi khat kurthuwk lamrah.
Avaleiyi, Kpa ngi Nei vonsat mdotolow, mleiya Neiyi veikhat kdolow penlet chaakna' rah krinkum avah kdoparlaan chaak.

Kuwkhat leh ngi kihin ki mdolow pemeh pdainu Neiyi, kuplungbin nih kdoparlaan chaak. Neiyi tpiikna' ki ruhtan avah kthlowi ungta veikhat tolow penletna' ki ruhtan ruk kthlowi. Hava' paupiik avah Neiyi Kpa hinki kdo'arlaan chaak.”
Hava' pau rek avaleiyi Jihudi rek arlak ki veikhat lopkenqhenna' khat thuwk nowlda.
Ungta mmaan knempok ki the lamda: “Mmah tarnam mthlowi a ungta ka'aak kcha' a taluleiyi Mma' pauthe avah arjaak inna?”
Morson rekki the lamda: “Hava' pauna rek avah tarnam kthlowi mii ngi mdothelu pemeh. tarnam vah mmikktot mik mpahar pchaan mow?”
'Tunnu Jerusalem thung ngi tparlaan chaakna' ki kmaal ava' amda ungta mpha avah phalbi kurthuwkda.
Ungta Jisu a luwbuk'inn thungki Solomon inndulbuk, mdoditin thung ngi tlowngda.

Audilli Jihudi rekki tkhul lam thida Mhin nih the lamda: “Trek ksowt tih Nang ngi neenna plung kpelqen tlit tih mthi naandi? Nang nga Mesaiah akurthuh dakat cheentung ngi kindit tih mheithe piik dokin.”
Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiyi adokthe piik dokin, pdainu naan nih lam'rin chmaan tih. Neiyi Kpa miing ngi nong rek kdotlot ava ngi Neiki krinpaumin rek avah pandang chlamda.
Pdainu naan nih avah lam'rin chmaan tih, mleiya Neiyi ahinin nih kdothe dok heppi, naanna Nei kyau rek inptipmeh.
Nei kyau rekki Nei kokrowl avah mdo'arjaakin ungta Neiyi mmaan avah kdehpindit lam ungta mmaan nih kdil mdoqowi chaakin.
Ungta Neiyi mmaan hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum kdopiik chaak lam. Ungta mmaan nah teden rukku kenvei lam nimeh ungta kuwkhat leh ngi Nei kukhut thungki mlowng lam nimeh.
Nei kihin nih mmaan mikpii kcha' Kpa avah mkheng rek hinni klinsi. Ungta kuwkhat leh rukku mmaan avah Kpa khut thungki lowng pchaang meh.
Nei le' Kpa avah khadaat inping.”
Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki Mma' kdeeng rang ngi veikhat lung chomsap nowl lamda.
Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiyi Kpa hinki nong kqha knempok ki naan ahin nih atedet innu. Naan nih tva' nongkat, leiyi, lung ngi mdeeng naandi?”
Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda: “Neen nih nong kqha adotlot leiyi, adeeng inni dimaan ring, pdainu Nang ngi pthitda apau lei. Mleiya dultimii khat nang ava ngi Isowr ping akirdit lei.”
Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiyi kthe a: ‘Naanna isowr rekin ptih,’ dida, (Luw. 82:6) naanki anowlamin thung ngi mdokjit pda?
Mma ngi Isowr pauna arjukna' rek avah isowr rek, mdit bih. Ungta Laikajiik avah kertlei pchaang nimeh.
Neiyi, ‘Neiya Isowr Chapa ping kdodit leiyi, naan nih, Pa ava ngi penjeda dultipaam thung ngi mdo'arjuk pthlat dok Mma' avah pthitda kpau, adit inna?
Neiyi Kpa nong rek ava' ktlotma cheentung ngi lam'mrin maan.

Pdainu Neiyi ktlot cheentung ngi, Nei lam'mrin cha' myown tih nong rek avah lam'arin chaan. Mleiya Pa avah Nei kihin nih ka'am ungta Neiya Mma' hinni ka'am ping tidit adodehna' raan ungta lam adorin chaakna' raan,” dida.
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mdokyownna' raan ki thenni veikhat thlaam nowl lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan khut thungki kerthlet chda.
Ungta Mma ngi veikhat, choduh Johon nih dii mdopluwna' Jordon kreng raalpha ki mmun thah chetda ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh amda.
Ungta mii knempok Mhin nih thlengda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Johon nih tngana' khatleh tlowmeh pdainu hava' mii ava'leiyi Johon nih mdothe dow mkheng avah mkindit kat ava',” dilamda.
Ungta mii knempok ki ava' thuh Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda.
'Tunnu Mary le' mu'unuh Martha amna' khuwpii Bethany thungki mmiing Lajaras, tidit miikhat avah kowida.
Hava' Mary avah Kruwng ava' hinni mikrimkdi reidii pubul thida msam mih mkhuh kuknuwl piik ava'. Ungta kkowi avah mma' naupa Lajaras.
Avaleiyi, mu'unuh le' knii ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, asuw o! Nang ngi von'adopsat chaak mma' avah kowi chda,” dida, kthe rah mii heipthlada.
Ungta Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Hava' kkowi avah mdiyowna' rang ki pemeh, pdainu Isowr konlorna' rang ki then. Mleiya Isowr Chapa avah ava' thung ngi konlor kcha' krow.”
'Tunnu Jisu ngi Martha le' mnaunuh Mary ungta Lajaras avah vonsat mdolow chaak lam.
Jisu ngi mmah kkowi kcha' a tidit marjaak dilli, Mma ngi ma'amna' mmun ava' thung ngi nii'knii nii tuwngda.
Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neen nih veikhat Judia paam thah junowl inche.”
Sikhu rek ava ngi Mhin nih the lamda: “Rabbi, 'tunkat tih Jihudi rekki lung ngi akdeeng rang ngi adotthlaam lam. Avah Nangvah veikhat ava' thah kju rah athe nowl a?”

Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Kunthun niikhat thung vah qhang sowm lei'knii ka'am pemeh mow? Kuwmiikhat tih kunthun nih mche bih, mma ngi khuhsiir pirthi nimeh. Mleiya mma ngi hava' dultipaam ki mar'aang avah mdodeh.
Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih jaan nih mche bih, mma ngi khuhsiir kpirthi rah. Mleiya mma' thung ngi mar'aang ka'am pemeh,” dida.
Hava'le', ava' mthe dok dilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naplapin Lajaras avah ki'iip dok kcha' a. Pdainu Neiyi mma' kperdel rah vanikdi'.”
Audilli Msikhu rekki the lamda: “Kruwng, mma ngi ki'iip kcha' mkurthuh bih, dam chrang imda.”
Pdainu Jisu vah mdiyow chaak dok ava' mdothena'. Ungta mmaan dobin vah iipda karnga mdothena' pakda, mdoditin.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni kurphuwng ngi: “Lajaras tah kdiyou kcha’ a.
Ungta naan athenni, Neiyi ava' thuh ka'amma leiyi, kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya havah naan nih lam'adotrin chaakna', raan ki then. Anto'daat yoso 'leen neen nih mma' phaanche,” dida.
Audilli kinphiir mdoditin Thomas tih mmiqhi, sikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen, neen rukka mma' tu' tidiyow sapna' raan, vaanche'” dida.
Ungta Jisu meheitlun thungta, mma' avah thlaan thuh mdo'alruwlnaan nii plii mphaak dok a tidit avah Mna ngi deida,
'Tunnu Bethany avah Jerusalem tungngu karnai tek lam, marlakin avah kilomitar kdum arveel daat rah.
Ungta Jihudi mii knempok ki Martha le' Mary hinni, mnau'paan leiyi, plungngam kpii chrah thlengpok lamda.
Audilli Martha ngi Jisu karva a tidit marjaak daat le' Mma' kduh rah heithuwkda. Pdainu Mary a inn thung ngi kok'ong chdaat.
Audilli Martha ngi Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi hava' thuh a'am daat tlaang bih, knaupa avah mdiyowma rangnga!
Pdainu 'tun kpha rukku, talutalu yoso, Nang ngi adoqhil avah Isowr rih akpii rah tidit neiyi kdeh.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Anaupa avah kerdel chdaat rah.”
Martha ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi mma' avah mqutna' nit ki trin kerheelna' nit ava' thung ngi kerdel rah, tidit tah kdeh.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya kring kerheel ungta rinkum ava' ping. Nei lam'mikrin kcha' mma' ava ngi diyou dok chdaat yoso kring chdaat rah.
Ungta kuwku yoso kring kcha' ungta kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' avah teden rukku diyou nimeh. Nang ngi havah lam'arin chaak a?”
Mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ou Kruwng, neiyi lamkrin chaak a tidit tah Nang nga dultipaam thung ngi kurjung rang Isowr Chapa, Mesaiah ptih.”
Ungta mma ngi anto ngi ava' mthe dok le' vangluwtda mnaunuh Mary avah tuprut tih ownda, ‘Chukpu a arva dokda, nang nga ato'own a, dida.
Ungta mma ngi ava' marjaak daat le' rip tengda Mma' avah heiphada.
'Tunnu Jisu a khu thung ngi arvang luwt mlai. Mleiya Martha ngi mdoheidutna' mmun ava' thung ngi ka'am chdaat.
Inn thung ngi Mary plungngam piida ka'am daat Jihudi rekki Mary ngi koknot tih ripda mvanthuh mdehn thungta mdil qowi lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Thlaan thah kqap rah kvanowl a.”

Audilli Mary ngi Jisu amna' merhei phaak thungta mma ngi Jisu ka'am daat ava' deida. Mma ngi Mkhuh ther rih tluw chda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi hava' thuh a'amdaat tlaang bih, knaupa avah mdiyowma rangnga!
Jisu ngi mma' kqap ungta Jihudi rek kqap mdeh thungta, Mma ngi kdung ngi muplung pkhamda ungta yada.
Ungta Mma ngi tva'thungda ado'alruwl naanna?” dida. Mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Kruwng arva rah arheisuw!”
Jisu qapda.
Audilli Jihudi rekki the lamda: “Asuwn, Mma ngi tya thuh vonmapsat chaak daat a.”
Ungta mmaan aangqhe ngi the lamda: “Hava' mmikktot mikkpahar pchaang ava' vah hava' mii ava' rukka mdiyow mana’ tlow pchaang meh mow?”
Jisu ngi mdaksa thung ngi kdung ngi muplung mapkham chunni thlaan thah vada. Ungta thlaan avah lungkhor ungta m'leen nih lung khat tih mdo'artlunin.
Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih lung avah aloupthi dokin.” Pdainu kdiyou unuh Martha ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, 'tunvah kqop thuh dokrah, mleiya mdina' nii plii mdophaak dok.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih kthe dok kmah, ‘tidit tah nang ngi lam'arin chaak bih, nang ngi Isowr konlorna' avah amik ki deinadi'’, Kdodit beh?”

Audilli mmaan nih kdiyou mdothiiknaan mmun ava' thung ki lung avah loupthi lamda. Ungta Jisu ngi knaanda karthak thah hansuwda ungta hanto'theda: “Apa, Nang ngi adotarjaak chaak leiyi, akpanpaak chaak a.

Ungta Neiyi kdeh tidit tah Nang ngi mpha ktai thung ngi adotarjaak chaak. Pdainu mmaan nih Neiya Nang ngi adoyuktsi tidit lam'mdorin chaakna' raan Neiyi havah hava' krip daat miipii rekki thenni kdothe,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli, Mma ngi kdung ngi owngda, “Lajaras arvang thuwk,” dida.
Ungta kdiyou dok kcha' mma' avah mkhutmkhuh kluwngjeel buw ngi tuklum ungta mmai avah parthlandau vih tuklum daat tih arvang thuwkda. Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aperthletin, vangsunso!”
Audilli Mary hinni kthleng Jihudi rek knempok ki Jisu ngi mdotlot dow rek avah dei lamda ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih lam'rin chlamda.
Pdainu mmaan arlak ki aangqhe rek avah Pharisy rek hinni vangsun lamda ungta Jisu ngi mdotlot rek avah mmaan hinni vansong lamda.
Audilli thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rekki kunpun lusang khat purkuwk lamda. Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neenna talu tlow chenaan? Hava' mii ava ngi tngana' knempok ki mtlotta.
Neen nih hanto' noptlot tlit daatin bih, mii mkheng ngi Mma' hinni lamkrinter chrang a. Ungta Rome mii arjudon, neenki nmunin ruk ungta nchaatin ruk kloupthi rangnga,” dilamda.
Ungta mmaan arlak ki khat, mmiing Kaiaphas mdoditin mkum ava' ki thenni thimpu kenreelsi kurthuwk ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna dow khatleh ruk deipindih maantih.
Ungta hava ngi neen nthen inni kqha rah tidit ruk binmaan tih. Mleiya chaat mkheng kenvei mana' rang ki thenni miikhat tih mii mkheng ki thenni mdiyow ngi kqha,” dida.
Ungta mma ngi hava' mdothe avah mthina ki ngi mdothe pemeh. Pdainu mkum ava' ki thenni thimpu kenreelsi mkurthuh leiyi, mma ngi Jisu ngi chaat ava' ki thenni mdiyow rah tidit mdopurphuwn.
Ungta chaat ava' ki then daat kma' mlown mlown thah kerjeida ka'am kcha' Isowr mii rek avah Mma ngi mmun khadaat thung ngi mdopurku lamna' rang ki then rukku mdiyow rah.
Audilli mmaan nih ava' nit ki kupqhun nih, Mma' mdo'eyowna' raanni khadaat tih kerseel dok lamda.
Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi Jihudi rek arlak ki kurphuwng ngi chetporson meh pdainu Mma ngi paamkbiik behki khuwpaam Ephrim tidit khuwpii thah yu chda. Ungta ava' thuh Mma ngi Msikhu rektu' am lamda.

Ungta 'tunnu Jihudi rekki Taplaanna' avah arvangnai chda. Ungta mii knempok ki mkhuwpaam mkhuwpaam thungki korlouda Jerusalem thah mkertleu chaakna' raan ki thenni Taplaanna' nit mphaakduh ngi hang lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih Jisu a thlaam lamda ungta luwbuk'inn thung ngi krip daat tih msingreel inni hanto' the lamda: “Talu abin inna, Mmah kmaal hava' thung vah thlengmow thleng nime?”
'Tunnu thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rekki pauqum khat mdothiikin. Mleiya mmaan nih mdokyown chaakna' raan ki thenni, ‘Kuwmiikhat tih Mma' amna' mdeh cheentung ngi, midotthe piik rah,’ mdoditin.
Audilli Jisu ngi Bethany thah Taplaanna' nit mdophaakna' rah niitruk mvadaat arlaan nih thlengda. Mmun avah Mma ngi kdiyou kcha' Lajaras, kdiyou thungki mdoperdelna' ava'.
Ava' thung ngi mmaan nih kluwki buh pchaak lamda ungta Martha ngi soplow chlamda. Pdainu Lajaras rukka, Mma' tu' khaan 'leenni kmaal rah kok'ong rek mmaan arlak ki ko'ongda.

Audilli Mary ngi mkhon knem langlang nard kenje reidii khuwng khat louda, Jisu khuh avah pubulda. Ungta mma ngi mkhuh avah msam mih knuwl piikda. Ungta inn avah reidii krimkdi ava ngi pum kervel kervelda.
Avaleiyi, Msikhu rek arlak ki Simon chapa khat Kerioth ki Judas, Mma' kyur chbei rang khat ava ngi hanto'theda:
“Taluleiyi hava' reidii avah denarii arja kdum mih yur chthida, srah rek hinni mdopiik chaakma daat toh?”
Mma ngi hava' mdothe avah srah rekki thenni mbinpiik rekrekna', mdothe pemeh. Pdainu mmah kupru tidit tah mma ngi sumbuwr avah mdosin. Ungta ava' thung ngi kluwt sum khimkhei avah mdolow chaak kchow.
Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mdobin atlow chdaatso. Mma ngi havah Nei mdotulruwlna' nit ki thenni mdo'arkhiik chaak ava'.
Srah rekka naan nih mpha ktai ado'amqhi tlitin, pdainu Neiya mpha ktai thung ngi ma'amqhi nimaan tih.”

Avaleiyi, Jihudi mii rek knempok ki Mma' avah ava' thuh ka'am tidit dei lamda. Ungta mmaan nah Jisu lei daat tih kthleng lam pemeh, pdainu Mma ngi kdiyou kcha' thungki mdoperdel Lajaras ksuw rang ki rukku kthleng lam.
Pdainu thimpu kenreel rekki Lajaras rukka te'eyow rah kdi ngi kerseel lamda.
Mleiya mma' leiyi, Jihudi mii knempok rek avah mmaan hinki sun chlamda, Jisu hinni lam'mdorin chaakin.
Mupduknii ngi Jisu rukka Jerusalem thah karhang rah tidit mmaan nih marjaakin thungta, mii knempok ki kmaal ava' thung ngi thleng lamda.

Mmaan nih spra arna sin lamda, Mma' kurdutqhi chrah hang lamda. Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda, “Hosanna! Isreel rekki Paamkruwng! ‘Kruwng miing 'leenni karhang Mma' avah msuwkqha a!’ ” dilamda. (Luw. 118:26)
Audilli tikjit dok ava' heppi, Jisu ngi skowlraam suwn khat mphan thungta Mma ngi ava' 'leenni ko'ongda.
“Jion, chanu rek, ningpqit maan. Asuwn, naanki Paamkruwng avah skowlraam suwn khat 'leenni ko'ongda karhang nga.” (Jkh. 9:9)

Hava' dow rek avah Msikhu rekki rukri vah deipindih lam mda. Pdainu Isowr rih Jisu avah mponlor chaak dilli, mmaan nih hava'le' avah Mma' leiyi, tikjit dok ungta hava'le' avah mmaan nih Mma' hinni mdotlotin tidit binphaak lamda.
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi thlaan thungki Lajaras own pthuwkda, kdiyou thungki mperdel thung ngi Mma' tu' ka'amsap miipii rekki rinpaumin avah pii chlamda.
Hava' leiyi miipii rek rukku Mma' avah kurdutqhi chlamda.
Avaleiyi, Pharisy rekki msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda. “Asuwn o, anong tlotin dow khatleh ksi kma' avah adehnna? Asuwn, dultipaam mkheng ngi Mma'dil mqowi chaak inna.”
Ungta kmaal ava' thung ngi luwkbu chrah karhang rek arlak ki Grikmii aangqhe yau lamda.
Mmaan ava'kat tih Galily paamkuwl thungki Bethsaida khuw ki Philip hinni arva lamda ungta mdongeen chaakin avah the lamda: “Ocha, neenna Jisu tkurdutqhi rah kbin chaak inna.”
Philip pih vangda Andria hinni theda ungta Andria le' Philip pih Jisu hinni the lamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Mii Chapa konlor chaakna' rah mpha avah kvei dok a.
Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Chavui chiimuw ava ngi dulti thuh tlada mdiyowma bih avah mthina daat rah, koryou nimeh. Pdainu mdiyow chaak bih, ava ngi mchei knempok ki kchei rah.
Mrinkum vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi kpenvei pthirah. Ungta hava' dultipaam thung ngi mrinkum kahal kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpha ngi kirkhi chrah.

Kuwmiikhat tih Nei sopmtolow chaak cheentung ngi, Nei kdil aqowi chso. Ungta Nei ka'amna' ava' thung ngi Nei ksuwk ava' rukka ma'am rah ungta kuwmiikhat tih Nei sopmtolow chaak bih, Kpa ngi mma' avah kakyat chrah.
'Tunnu Neiya kapthlarin kparvai kcha' a. Ungta Neiya talu the nikdi'? Apa mpha hava' thungki mheisan cha', pdainu hava' leiyi, Neiya hava' mpha kpha thung ngi karvang ping.’
Apa, Amiing aponlor cha',” dida. Audilli parvaan ki krowl khat arjuda hanto'theda: “Neiyi, kponlor chaak dok a, ungta ponlornowl nikdi'.”
Avaleiyi, ava' thuh ripda ka'am miipii rekki krowl avah arja lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Khu kipri a, ungta morson rekki vaantamsi ngi mkirbiikqhi a” dilamda
Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Hava' krowl avah Nei kthen nih kurju pemeh, pdainu naan athenni kurju.
'Tunnu hava' dultipaam ki pau tpinditna' mpha. 'Tunnu hava' dultipaam ki paamkpu avah kreipthirah.
Ungta Neiya hava' dulti thungki mtikhiin chaak bih, Neiyi mii mkheng avah kihin kat tih qen lam nikdi',” dida.
Havah Mma ngi taluhep kduh ngi diyou nikdi', tidit mdopandanna' ngi mdothe.

Mii rekki Mhin nih hanto' arthaang lamda: “Neen nih nowlam thungki kdo'arjaakin avah, ‘Mesaiah avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am rah,’ dida. Ungta taluhep pih Nang ngi, ‘Mii Chapa avah tikhiin chaak rah,’ adoditto? Hava' Mii Chapa avah kuwda?”

Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mpha mruk'suwn daat ki, thenni mar'aang avah naan tu' ka'am a. Naan nih mar'aang athlowi chaaklimin thung ngi ichet chaan, mditma bih kjiingnu ngi akphakhot raan. Mleiya kjingnu thung ngi kchet mma' ava ngi tva'lam kqowi a tidit mdodeh pemeh.

Naan nih mar'aang athlowi chaakin thung ngi Mar'aang mii rek akurthuh chaakna' raanni mar'aang avah lam'arin chaan.” Jisu ngi hava'le' mthe dok dilli sun chda ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinki kordowl chdokda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mmaiqhuwm inni tngana' knempok ki mtlot arlaan kpha rukku mmaan nih Mhin nih lam'rin chlam mda.
Havah khulpu Isaiah pauthe ava' mkurkhumna'. Mleiya mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, kuw ngi neen kpausonin avah lam'mrin chaak inna? Ungta kuw hinni Kruwng baanruhtan avah mpandan a?” dida. (Is. 53:1)
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih lam'mdorin chaak pchaanin pemeh. Mleiya Isaiah ngi veikhat hanto'theda:

“Mma ngi mmaan avah mmik inni khu mdodeh mana' raan ki thenni mmikin toptotdah. Ungta muplungril inni mdodeh pinditmana' raan ki thenni muplungrilin avah tapchaida. Mditma bih,mmaan nih plungren hor chlamdon, Neiyi pdam chdok thuh lam nikdi'.” (Is. 6:10)
Hava' dow khimkhei avah Isaiah ngi Jisu konlorna' ava' mdeh thungta mdothe ungta Mma' leiyi, mdothe.

Anto'jik ki kenreel paamkpu rek arlak rukku knempok ki Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda. Pdainu Pharisy rek leiyi, mmaan nih Mhin nih kerthethuh kcha'lam pemeh. Mditma bih mmaan nih sinegog thungki mmaan avah kreipthi lamrah.
Mleiya mmaan nih dultimii dopanpaak avah Isowr dopanpaak hinni mdongei chaakin.
Jisu ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei lammdotrin chaak pemeh, pdainu Nei myuksi Mma' hinni lammdorin chaak.
Ungta mmik ki Nei mekdei kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi Mma' avah mmik ki mdeh chaak a.
Neiya dultipaam thung ngi mar'aang ngi kurjung ping. Mleiya kuwku yoso Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' rek avah kjiingnu thung ngi am lam nimeh.

Ungta kuwmiikhat tih Nei kpauna rek arja thida lamkrin kcha' kma' mma' avah Neiyi m'leen nih pau pindit maang. Mleiya Neiya dultipaam thung ngi paukpindit rah kurjung pmaang, pdainu dultipaam ksan chrah kurjung ping.
Nei mepthleida Kpauthe karlaang kma' rek hinni paukpindit rah khat ka'am. Mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi Neiyi kdothe dok pau ava'kat tih mma' 'leenni paukpindit rah.
Neiyi pau avah kthina ki kruhtanna' ava ngi kdothe pemeh, pdainu Nei mkapthla Pa ava ngi Neiyi talu the nikdi', ungta talu saamnikdi', tidit ki pauqum mdotpiik.
Ungta Mma' paupiik avah ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava' tidit Neiyi kdeh. Avaleiyi, Neiyi kdothe khimkhei avah Pa ava ngi kihin nih mdothe ava'jik ki kdothe.”

'Tunnu Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' mphaakduh ngi, Jisu ngi hava' dultipaam thungki korlouda Mma ngi Pa ava' hinni muhun chaakna' rah, Mma' ki mpha avah kvei dok a tidit deida. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi dultipaam ki mvonsat'low, Mma' mii rek avah mqutna' kpha ngi vonsat low chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kluwki buh chadok lamda. Ungta 'tunnu Simon chapa Kerioth ki Judas plung thung ngi Mma' mdoyur chaakna' rah tarnampii avah luwt chda.
Pa ava ngi dow mkheng nga Mma' khut thung ngi mpiik dok a ungta Mma' avah Isowr hinki kurjung ungta Isowr hinni kuhung rang ping tidit avah Jisu ngi deida.
Mma ngi kmaal ava' thung ki ripda, mtun ki mdona avah khowkda ungta Mma ngi tkurnuwlna' buwkhat louda kperjeelda.
Audilli Mma ngi kulqhut arkuw khat louda ungta sikhu rek khuh tulqhut pqhunda. Ungta tkurnuwlna' buw mekperjeel ava ngi knuwlpiik lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi Simon Pitar arvanphada. Ungta Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi nei kukhuh mulqhut piiknadih?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi kdotlot avah 'tunnu nang ngi deipindih nimtih, pdainu dil thah deipindihrow nadi'.”
Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Nei kukhuh ado'alqhut roliit nimeh.” Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi nang akhuh kulqhutma bih, nang nga Nei tu' khadaat tkurthuhna' ammeh.”
Mthungta Simon Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng mdit cheentung ngi kukhuh daatmda, kukhut le' kluw ruk mhei'alqhut piikcha'.”
Jisu ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kulqhu dok kcha' mii avah mkhuh daat tulqhut rah, mleiya mdak mkheng avah kertleu dok ksa. Naanna kertleu dok kcha'in ptih pdainu naan akheng khengin pemeh.”
Mleiya Mma ngi kuw ngi mukyur chrang tidit mdodeh dok. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi, ‘naan akheng khengin pemeh’, mdodit.
