Ungta Mma ngi mkhuhn mulqhut piiklam dilli, dona nadok thida veikhat mko'on dilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan athenni hava' kdotlot avah adehpindit inna?
Naan nih Neiya chukpu ungta Kruwng, adotiditin avah mkindit kat, tidit tah Neiya ava'kat ping.
Mdit bih, naanki Chukpu ungta Kruwng Neiyi naan akhuhn avah kulqhut a. Ava' vah naan rukku khat le' khat khuh akulqhutpiik kcho raan thah ktla a.
Mleiya Neiyi mirmik khat adokpiikin ava' heppi, tidit tah Neiyi ahinin nih kdotlot ava' heppi naan rukku adotlot raan.
Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya suwk avah mukpupa ava' hinni klin pemeh, Ungta mdo'arjuksi Mma' avah arjuksi ava' hinni klin pemeh,
Naan nih hava' dow khimkhei avah adeh chaakin bih, ungta avale' ava' atlot chaakin bih, suwqhat aphan chaak inna.

Neiyi naan akhengngin athemaan ring. Neiyi kdokchol chaak mma' avah kdeh chaak. Pdainu Kchiir laika ava' kurkhumna ngi, ‘Nei tu' thenpen kchaveh mma' ava ngi, Mkhuhpkhong mikkhiin Psuk rah.’ (Luw. 41:9)
'Tunnu Neiyi hava' avah marvan thuh duh ngi, tidit tah naan nih ava' marvan thuh thung ngi Neiya Mma'kat tidit lam'adotrin chaakna' raan ki thenni akthepiik inna.

Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Kuwku yoso Neiyi kdosi ava' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei mtarlaan chaak a ungta Nei mkarlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi Mma' avah marlaan chaak a.”

Jisu ngi ava' mthe thung ngi Mmah mapthla parvai chda, ungta Mma ngi rinpaumin piida ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah naan arlak ki khat tih Neiya myur chnaandi'.”
Audilli sikhu rekki khat le' khat kursuw lamda ungta Mma ngi kuw mdothena tidit leiyi, plung tpelqen lamda.
'Tunnu Jisu vonsat'low Msikhu rek arlak ki khat tah Jisu plung 'leenni kikbiu daat.
Avaleiyi, Simon Pitar rih mma' hinni, mdothe avah kuw mdothena tidit mdokheelna' rah kchapda.
Audilli mma ngi Jisu plung 'leenni mikbiu daat chunni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, avah kuw plih?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Mma' avah Neiyi thenpenlek mdii thuh phuwm thida kdopiik rang ava' rah.” Ungta Mma ngi thenpen avah phuwm thida Simon chapa Kerioth ki Judas hinni piida.
Ungta thenpenlek ava' mchaak dilli mma' thung ngi Seitan luwt chda. Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adotlot rang avah kbeisek ki atlow.”
'Tunnu khaan ava' thung ngi kok'ong kuwmiikhat leh ngi Mma ngi talu binda mhin nih havah mdothe tidit tah deilam meh.

Mleiya marlakin ki aangqhe rekvah ‘Judas tih sumbuwr mdosin leiyi, Jisu ngi mhin nih kmaal ava' thung ki rah dow tikriin rekin ava' aren dok, mditmata mma ngi srah rek hinni dow mruk mdopiikna' rah thepakda,’ dilamda.
Audilli mma ngi thenpenlek ava' marlaan dok le', m'tunkat daat tih vanthuwk chda ungta mpha avah jaan.
Avaleiyi, mma' mvanthuh dok dilli Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Mii Chapa avah mponlor chaak a ungta Isowr rah Mma' thung ngi konlor kcha' a.
Isowr avah Mma' thung ngi mkonlor chaak bih, Isowr rukku Mma' avah mdak thung ngi kponlor chrah ungta Mmah kbeisek ki kponlor chrah.

Nausisi rek naan, Neiyi mpha mruk'suwn daat ki thenni naan tu' amnikdi'. Naan nih, Neiya mthlaam naandi', ungta Neiyi Jihudi rek hinni kdothe heppi, Nei kchena' thung ngu naanna arhang pchaang nimaan tih, avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih tun kdothe.
Neiyi naan ahin nih paupiik ren khat akpiik inna. Mleiya naan nih khat le' khat vonsat akorlow chaak raan. Neiyi naan vonsat adoklow chaakin heppi naan nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan.
Naan nih khat le', khat vonsat akorlow chaakin bih, ava ngi mii mkheng ngi naan avah Nei ksikhu reklam tidit akdei raan.”

Simon Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng tva'lam, qowi chnali?” Jisu ngi mhin nih arthaangda: “Neiyi kchena' rang thung vah nang ngi 'tunnu mqowi pchaang nimtih. Pdainu dil thah nang ngi Nei kdil lah mqowirow nadi'.”
Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng taluleida 'tun neiyi Nang adil kdoqowi pchaanmana' rangnga? Neiyi Nang athenni krinkum avah pii nikdi'.”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Nang ngi Nei kthen nih arinkum kpha rukka piinadi? Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Nang ngi veikdum atmatduh kpha ngi har khuwng nimeh.”
“Naan aplungin avah dow khatleh ngi pya mso. Isowr hinni lam'arin chaan ungta Nei kihin rukku lam'mheirin chaan.
Mleiya Kpa inn thung ngi ta'amna' rah mun knempok ki ka'am. Ava' mkurthuhma bih, Neiyi naan ahin nih athepiik dok nikaandi'. Neiya naan athenni mmun khat kporthlong rah kuhung imping.
Neiyi naan athen inni mmun khat ava' kporthlon dok bih, arjung kenle nowl nikdi'. Ungta naan avah Nei kihin nih ahunqhi nikaandi'. Mleiya Nei ka'amna' ava' thung ngi naan rukka am naandi'.
Ungta Nei kchena' avah naan nih adehn ungta lam avah adodehn.”
Thomas tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neen nih Nang achena' avah deimaan ring ungta taluhep pih lam avah dei nikaandi'?”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya 'lam ava' ping, kindit ava' ping ungta rinkum ava' ping. Kuwkhat leh ruk Nei kar'aang kma'don Pa ava' hinni thleng pchaang nimeh.
Naan nih Nei atedeh chaak tlaangin bih, Kpa rukka adodeh chaak tlaang raanna. Ungta 'tunnu naan nih Mma' avah adeh chaak dok inna ungta amikin nih Mma' avah adeh chaak dok inna.”
Philip pih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng Pa avah neen kihin nih mheitedet chaan, ava ngi neen kthen nih kuplungin kngamrah”

Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mpha ksowt tih amnu, ava' kpha thung ngi Neiya mdeimlaitine, Philip? Nei mekdei dok kcha' mma' ava ngi Pa avah mmik ki mdeh chaak dok a. Taluhep pih nang ngi Pa avah mheitedetin, aditta?

Nang ngi Neiya Pa ava' hinni ka'am ping ungta Pa ava ngi Nei kihin nih ka'am tidit avah lam'mrin mtine? Neiyi nang ahin nih kdothe pau avah Nei kthung ki pemeh. Pdainu Nei kthung ngi ka'am Pa ava ngi nong rek avah mdotlot.
Neiya Pa ava' hinni ka'am ping ungta Pa ava ngi Nei kihin nih ka'am tidit avah lam'arin cha'. Mditma cheentung ngi nong rek ava'kat ki thenni lam'mheirin cha'.

Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Nei lam'mikrin kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiyi kdotlot nong rek avah ktlow rah. Ungta hava' heihin nih klinklin nong rek avah mma ngi ktlow rah. Mleiya Neiya Pa ava' hinni kuhung imping.
Ungta talutalu yoso naan nih Nei kmiing 'leenni adoqhilin avah Neiyi tlow nikdi'? Mleiya Pa ava ngi Chapa thung ngi kponlor chrah.
Naan nih Nei kmiing 'leenni talutalu yoso aqhil chaakin bih, Neiyi avah tlow nikdi'?
Naan nih Nei von'atapsat chaakin cheentung ngi Nei kpaupiik rek avah apqowiyin.
Ungta Neiyi Pa ava' hinni qhil nikdon ungta Mma ngi morson Kbom kcha' khat akpii chraan. Ungta Mmah naan ahin nih ktlangknai kmah ka'am rah.

Kindit ki Pthla avah dultipaam mih mdo'arlaan pchaan pemeh. Mleiya dultipaam mih Mma' avah mmik rukku deimeh ungta tedeh rukku deipindih meh. Pdainu Mmah naan nih adodeh chaakin, mleiya Mma ngi naan tu' amsapda ungta Mmah naan athung ngi ka'am rah.
Neiyi naan avah nuhmataak pamataak ki ama nimaanring. Neiya naan ahin nih arjung nikdi.
Mpha mruk dil thah, dultipaam mih Neiya mmikin nih mdeiporson nimeh. Pdainu naanvah amikin nih mdeinaandi', mleiya Nei krin leiyi, naan rukka ring naandi'.
Nit ava' thung ngi, Neiyi Kpa hinni ungta naan nih Nei kihin nih ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am ping tidit naan nih deinaandi'.

Nei kpaupiik rek avale' kirkhi kcha' ungta ava' kopqowi kcha' mma' avah Nei vonsat moklow kcha'. Ungta Nei vonsat moklow kcha' avah Kpa vonsat'low kurthuwk rah. Ungta Neiyi vonsat low nikdi' ungta Neiyi mma' hinni kandanpiik nikdi,” dida.
Kerioth ki Judah kma', ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, taluhep luplih, Nang ngi neen kihin nih adaksa akandan rangnga ungta dultipaam hin kma' rangnga?”

Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih Nei vonsat mtolow chaak bih, mma ngi Nei Kpauna rek avah kopqowi chrah. Ungta Kpa ngi mmah vonsat klow chrah ungta Neenve ngi mma' hinni tlungda ki'innin pthutda mma' tu' amsap nikaandi'.
Ungta Nei vonsat moklow kma' mma' ava ngi Nei kpauna rek avah pqowi meh. Ungta naan nih ado'arjaakin pauna havah Nei kihin ki pemeh pdainu Nei myuksi Kpa ava' hinki.
Neiyi hava' dow rek avah naan ahin nih ka'am lim thung ngi kdothe dok.

Pdainu Pa ava ngi Nei kmiing 'leenni mdopthlat rang Kbom kcha' Pthla Kchiir ava ngi naan ahin nih dow mkheng avah akpurchuk raan. Ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe dow mkheng avah ayuktipbin phaak raan.

Plung kdai avah Neiyi naan ahinin nih akmaakpiik inna. Ungta Nei kuplung kdai avah naan ahin nih akpiik inna. Dultimii ngi mdopiik heppi Neivah adokpiikin pemeh. naan aplungin avah dow khatleh ngi pya mso ungta aningin ruk qi mso.

Naan ahin nih Neiyi, ‘Neiya sun chnikdi, ungta veikhat arjung nowl nikdi' kdodit avah naan nih ado'arjaak dokin. Naan nih Nei vonsat atolow chaakin bih, akanpat chaak tlaang raanna. Mleiya Neiyi Kpa hinni kuhung imping, kdodit. Mleiya Kpa a Nei kihin nih klin.
Ungta 'tunnu ava' marvan thuh thung ngi naan nih Nei lam'adotrin chaakna' raan, Neiyi ava' avah marvan thuh duh ngi adokthepiik dokin.
'Tun dilli Neiyi naan ahin nih knempok ki pau porson nimaang tidit tah hava' dultipaam ki paamkpu avah karvang a. Ungta mma ngi Nei k'leen nih mdotlot rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
Pdainu dultimii ngi Pa avah Neiyi vonsat kdolow chaak tidit mdodehna' rah, Neiyi, Pa ava ngi mdotpiik paupiik avah Neiyi anto'jik ki kdotlot. 'Leen, iripin hava' thungki isun dokin cheh.
Neiya riithlumnu kat ava' ping ungta Kpa ngi riithlumbil knumpa ava'.
Pa ava ngi Nei k'leenki mchei ktaak mbaak rek khimkhei avah kloupthi irah. Ungta Mma ngi mcheipum mbaak khimkhei avah knem betbet tih mcheina' rah ardi deekda.
Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe dok pauna ava ngi naanna kertleu dok inptih.
Nei kihin nih mpha ktai i'amin ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih i'am nih. Mbaak ava ngi riithlumnu ktaak ki mthina ngi mchei pchaanmah heppi, naan nih Nei kihin nih a'amin kma'don chei pchaang nimaan tih.

Neiya riithlumnu ava' ping ungta naanna mbaak rekin ptih. Nei kihin nih ka'am kcha' ungta Neiyi mhin nih ka'amna' mma' ava ngi knempok ki kchei chrah. Mleiya Nei ktaak ki naan nih dow khatleh tlow pchaang nimaan tih.

Kuwmiikhat, Nei kihin nih ka'am kma' mma' avah mbaak heppi kvarpthi rah ungta kqong chrah. Ungta mii rekki purkuwk lamda ungta mmaan avah mei thung ngi varpthi lamda ungta mmaan avah kukbung kcha'lam.
Naan nih Nei kihin nih a'amin bih ungta Nei kpauna rek avah naan athung inni ma'am chaak bih, naan nih adobinin adoqhil chaakin avah naan ahin nih aktlot piik raan.
Naan nih knem mih achei chaakin bih, Kpa avah aponlor chaak inna ungta naanna Nei ksikhu rek kurthuwk chnaandi'.
Pa ava ngi vonsat mdotolow chaak heppi, Neiyi naan avah vonsat adoklow chaakin. Naan nih Nei kvonsat thung ngi mpha ktai i'amin.
Neiyi Kpa paupiik rek ava' pqowi nuh, Mma' vonsat thung ngi ka'am heppi, naan nih Nei kpaupiik rek avah apqowi chaakin bih, Nei kvonsat thung ngi am chnaandi'.
Neiyi hava' pauna rek avah naan athung inni Nei kkanpatna' ava' ma'amna' rah ungta naan akanpatin mkurkhumna' rah Neiyi hava'le' avah ahinin nih kdothe dok.
Havah Nei kpaupiik, tidit tah Neiyi naan vonsat adoklow chaakin heppi naan nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan.
Miikhat tih maplap rekki thenni mrinkum kpii pchaang tidit heihin nih klin vonsat avah dultimii kuwkhat tih thlowi meh.
Naan nih talutalu yoso Nei kpaupiik ava' atlot chaakin bih, naanna Nei kaplap rekin ptih.

'Tunnu Neiyi naan avah suwk rek adiporson maan ring tidit tah suwk ava ngi mukpupa nongtlot avah mdodeh pemeh. Pdainu Neiyi naan avah plap rek, akdit inna. Mleiya Neiyi Kpa hinki kdo'arjaak dow mkheng avah naan ahin nih adokepdeh chaak dokin.

Naan nih Nei adotokcholin pemeh pdainu Neiyi naan avah adokokchol chaak dokin ungta adokakthlan dokin. Mleiya naan nih chetda knem mih achei chaakna' raan ungta acheiyin avah ma'am tlitna' rah adokakthlan chaak dokin. Ungta naan nih talutalu yoso, Nei kmiing 'leenni adoqhil chaakin avah Pa ava ngi adotpiikna' raanni, adokakthlan dokin.
Neiyi hava'le' avah paupiik ki akpiik inna, tidit tah naan nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan.
Dultimii ngi naan avah atahal chaakin bih, naan atahalin duduhn nih, Nei mtahal chaak lam a tidit naan nih adeiyin.

Naan avah dultipaam ki akurthuh tlaangin bih, dultipaam mih mdakdow avah vonsat klow chrah. Pdainu Neiyi naan avah dultipaam thungki adokokchol dokin leiyi, naanna dultipaam kiin ptipmeh. Avaleiyi, dultipaam mih naan avah adotahal chaakin.

Neiyi ‘suwk avah mukpupa hinni klin pemeh’, dinuh kdothe pauna avah abinphaakin. Mmaan nih Nei tyat chiireelna' mtipiik dok lam bih, naan rukka chii akepreel raan. Ungta mmaan nih Nei kpauthe mopqowi chaakin bih, naan ruk akopqowi raan.
Pdainu hava' dow khimkhei avah mmaan nih naan ahin nih, Nei kmiing 'leen ktlow lamrah, mleiya mmaan nih Nei myuksi Mma' avah mdodeh pindit in pemeh.
Neiyi kurjunma ungta mmaan hinni pau kthe dok kma' kkurthuh tlaang bih, mmaan nih pnu mdo'arvema raanna. Pdainu 'tunvah mmaan nih pnu arvei maan ring tidit ki mlei pii pchaang lam nimeh.
Nei mkahal kcha' mma' ava ngi Kpa rukka mahal chaak a'.

Neiyi mii morson nih mdotlot liitma nong rek avah mmaan hinni ktlotma tlaang bih, mmaan nih pnu mdo'arve chaakma raanna. Pdainu 'tunnu mmaan nih tedeh ruk dei lamda ungta Nei ruk ungta Kpa ruk mtahal chaak inna.
Pdainu havah mmaan ki nowlam thung ngi mdokjit dok: ‘Mmaan nih Neiya mlei ktaak ki mdotahal chaak lam', mdodit ava' kurkhumna' rang kithen. (Luw. 69:4)
Pdainu Neiyi Pa ava' hinki naan athenni kdopthlat rang Kbom kcha', Pa ava' hinki kthuwk kindit pthla ava' murjun thung ngi Mma ngi Nei kleiyi rinpaumin avah kpii chdaat rah.
Ungta naan rukku rinpaumin avah piinaandi'. Mleiya naanna mupqhun daat ki Nei tu' ta'amsapin.
Hava'le' khimkhei rek avah, naan nih khuhsiir adopirthiht mana' raan ki thenni Neiyi naan ahinin nih kdothe.
Mmaan nih sinegog thungki naan avah akekneng pthi raan. Ungta kuwku yoso, naan ake'eyou rek inni Isowr nong ktlow kcha' heppi mkirbin chaakna' raan ki mpha avah karvang nga.
Mmaan nih hava' dow rek avah naan ahinin nih ktlow lamrah. Mleiya mmaan nih Pa ava' ruk ungta Nei ruk mdotedeh chaakin pemeh.

Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih hava' dow rek avah adokthepiik dokin. Mleiya mpha marvan thung ngi, Neiyi adokthe piik dok rekin avah naan nih binphaak naandi'. Ungta mupqhun thok thung ngu hava' dow rek avah ahinin nih kdothe pemeh. Mleiya Neiya naan ahin nih ka'am daat ping.
Pdainu 'tunnu Neiya, Nei myuksi ava' hinni kuhung kcha' rang imping ungta naan kuwkhat leh rukku, ‘tva'lam qowinadi,’ tidit mkheelsi maantih?
Pdainu Neiyi hava' pauna rek avah naan ahin nih kdothe dok leiyi, naan aplungin avah tyatna ngi kdim kcha' a.

Anto'daat yoso Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya Nei kuhunma bih, naan ahin nih Kbom kcha' avah arjung nimeh. Nei kuhun rang avah naan athenni suwqhatna' mleiya Neiyi Mma' avah arjupthla nikdi'.
Ungta Mma' murjun thung ngi, dultipaam avah Mma ngi pnu leiyi, ungta rinkinditna' leiyi, ungta pau tpinditna' leiyi, kupsul rah.
Ungta pnu ki mleiya mmaan nih Nei kihin nih lammdotrin chaak lam pemeh.
Rinkinditna' ki mleiya Neiyi Kpa hinni hung nikdi' ungta naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdeiporson nimaan tih.
Pau tpinditna' ki mleiya hava' dultipaam ki paamkpu ava' 'leenni pau mpindit dok a.
Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe rah dow knempok ki ka'am daat pdainu naan nih avah diil pchaang nimaan tih.

Pdainu kindit ki Pthla ava' murjun thung ngi, Mma ngi kindit mkheng thung ngi akqhi chraan. Mleiya Mma ngi mthina thungki daat tih pau nimeh. Pdainu Mma ngi mdo'arjaak chaak khimkhei rek ava' kthe rah ungta Mma ngi karvang kthuwk rang dow rek avah naan ahin nih akparjaak raan.
Mma ngi Neiya mokponlor chrah. Mleiya Mma ngi Nei kihin ki karlaang chrah. Ungta Mma ngi naan ahin nih avah akparjaak chraan.
Pa ava ngi mdothlowi dow mkheng avah Nei kdow. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi Nei kihin ki loudon, naan ahin nih akparjaak raan dinuh, kdothe.
Mpha mruk thung ngi naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdei nimaan tih ungta mpha mruk dilli naan nih veikhat Neiya amikin nih mdeinowl naandi’. Mleiya Neiya Pa ava' hinni kuhung imping.”

Audilli Msikhu rek aangqhe ngi msingreelin thung ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi, ‘mpham ruk thung ngi naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdei nimaan tih ungta mpha mruk dilli naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdeinowl naandi’, mleiya Neiya Pa ava' hinni kuhung imping’, mdodit avah talu mdothena,” tidit kerkheel lamda?
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih the lamda: “Mma ngi ‘mpha mruk dil thah mdodit avah talu mdothena, tidit neen nih tedehpindit inmeh.”

'Tunnu Jisu ngi mmaan nih pau kihin nih tkheel rah mtibin lam a, tidit deithida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan asingreel inni, ‘Neiyi mpha mruk thung ngi naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdei nimaan tih ungta mpha mruk dilli, Neiya amikin nih mdeinowl naandi' kdodit leiyi, kerkheelin imptih?

Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya naanna qapnaan ungta kurnung karbaang naandi' pdainu dultipaam a kanpa chrah. Ungta tyattraanna' perteel naandi'. pdainu ayat'araanin avah tkanpatna' akpurthuh piik raan.

Snu ngi von mchowi rang thung vah, mma' ki mpha marvanve leiyi, myatna' kurthuwkda. Pdainu mma ngi von mchowi dok dilvah, dultipaam thung ngi miikhat kqouki tkanpatna' ava ngi mirthli buwkna' avah veikhat binphaak meh.

Ungta avaleiyi 'tunnu naanna aplungin kya a. Pdainu Neiyi veikhat akurdutqhi nikaandi'. Ungta naan aplungin avah kanpa chrah ungta naan akanpatin avah kuwkhat leh ngi naan ahinki alowng pchaangin nimeh.

Ungta nit ava' thung ngi naan nih Nei kihin nih dow khatleh ruk mkheel nimaan tih. Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Naan nih talutalu yoso Nei kmiing 'leenni Pa ava' hinni adoqhil chaakin avah Mma ngi akpii raan.
'Tun kpha thung vah naan nih Nei kmiing ngi dow khatleh qhil maantih. naan akanpatin avah mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni naan nih aqhil chaan, phang chnaandi'.
Hava'le' avah Neiyi naan ahin nih pauril lih kthe a. Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih pauril lih kdothe mana' mpha avah karvang kcha' a. Ungta Pa ava' ki mlei avah, Neiyi kindit tih aparjaak nikaandi'.
Nit ava' thung ngi naan nih Nei kmiing 'leenni qhil chnaandi' ungta Pa ava' hinni Neiyi naan athenni aqhilpiik nikaandi', dimaang.
Mleiya Pa, mdakkat tih naan avah von'adotapsat chaak dokin. Mleiya naan nih Nei vonsat adotolow chaakin. Ungta naan nih Neiya Isowr hinki kurjung ping tidit lam'adotrin chaakin.
Neiyi Pa ava' hinki dultipaam thung ngi arjungnu ungta veikhat dultipaam manikdon Pa ava' hinni hung nikdi'.”
Msikhu rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “Asuw o, 'tunvah pauril lih them tih ungta ko'oltek ki athe a.

'Tunnu neen nih Nang nga dow mkheng adeh a tidit kdeh chaak inna ungta kuwkhat leh ngi ahin nih dow khatleh ruk adotkheel rah ammeh. Havah ngi neen nih Nang nga Isowr hinki ptih tidit lam'krin chaak inna.”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “'Tun row ngi naan nih lam'atrin chaak inna?

Asuwn, mpha avah karvang meeksli a, ungta mpha avah kvei dok a. Mleiya naanna kerjeiter chnaandi' ungta mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mmun thah sunter chdon, Neiya kthina daat tih makmapthi lamrah. Anto'daat yoso Neiya kthina daat pmaang mleiya Pa ava ngi mdota'amqhi.

Naan nih Nei kihin nih plung kdai adothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni, Neiyi hava' dow rek avah ahinin nih kdothe dok. Naan nih dultipaam thung ngu suwkthuh chiireelna' perteel naandi'. Pdainu aningin pqitmaan mleiya Neiyi dultipaam avah kapchaan dok a.”
Jisu ngi hava' pauna rek ava' thethida parvaan hansuwda ungta hanto'theda: “Apa mpha avah kvei dok a, Achapa rukku adotponlor chaakna' rah, Achapa avah aponlor cha'.
Nang ngi Mma' hinni daksa mkheng rek 'leenni ruhtan adopiik heppi, Mma' hinni Nang ngi adopiik dok khimkhei rek hinni Mma ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum mdopiikna' rah, Mmah ruhtan apii cha'.
Ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah hava' tidit tah mmaan nih, Nang nga mkindit kat Isowr ptih ungta Nang ngi adoyukpthlat Jisu Khrista avah adeipindih chlamso.
Neiyi Nang nga dultipaam thung ngu akponlor chaak dok. Nang ngi kdotlot rah adotpiik nong avah kupqut chaak dok a.
'Tunnu O Apa, dultipaam ma'am duduh ngi Nang tu' konlor dok ki ka'am chaakna' ava ngi, Neiya Nang adak ki mheiponlor cha'.

Neiyi, Amiing avah, Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok dultipaam ki mii rek hinni kpandan chaak a. Ungta mmaan avah kihin nih adotpiik dok, Nang amii reklam. Ungta mmaan nih Nang apauna rek avah mdopqowi chaakin.
'Tunnu mmaan nih mdeh chaak dokin tidit tah talutalu yoso, Nei kihin nih adotpiik chaak dow mkheng avah Nang ahinki.

Mleiya Nang ngi adotpiik chaak pauna rek avah mmaan hinni Neiyi kdopiik chaak doklam. Ungta mmaan nih avah arlaang chlamda ungta Neiya Nang ahinki kurjung tidit mmaan nih dakat tih mdeh chaak dokin. Ungta mmaan nih Neiya Nang ngi adotyuksi tidit avah lam'mdorin chaak dokin.
Neiyi mmaan thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Neiyi dultipaam ki thenni rinktham chmaang pdainu Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok rekki thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Mleiya mmaan nah Nang adow reklam.
Ungta Nei kdow rek mkheng avah Nang adow. Ungta Nang adow rek avah Nei kdo. Mleiya Neiya avale' thung ngi konlor kcha' dok ping.

'Tunnu Apa, Neiya dultipaam thung ngi amporson rang maang, Nang ahin nih kurhung kcha' imping. Pdainu hava'le' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am daat lam a. Apa Kchiir, Nang ngi adotpiik chaak dok rek mmaan avah Neenve heppi khadaat tih ma'amdehna' raan, Amiingkat 'leenni mmaan avah mheithiik piikcha' lam.

Neiyi dultipaam thuh, mmaan tung ngi ka'am thung ngi mmaan avah Nang amiing 'leenni kdothiik chaak lam. Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok rek mmaan avah Neiyi kdorun chaak lam. Pdainu Kchiir laika thung ngi mdokjit dok ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni mmaan arlak ki kenvei kcha' rang chapa ava' kma'don, mmaan kuwkhat leh ruk kenvei kcha' ammeh.
'Tunnu Neiya Nang ahin nih kurhung kcha' imping. Ungta Nei kkanpatna' avah mmaan thung ngi mkurkhumna' rah Neiyi hava' dow rek avah dultipaam thung ngi kdothe.
Neiyi Nang apauna avah mmaan hinni kpiik doklam ungta dultipaam mih mmaan avah mdohal chaakin. Mleiya Neiyi dultipaam ki kkurthuhma heppi mmaan avah dultipaam ki lam pemeh.
Neiyi mmaan avah dultipaam thungki alou doklam, dida rinktham chmaang. Pdainu Nang ngi mmaan avah kqha kma' thungki mheirun piik chlam.
Neiyi dultipaam ki kkurthuhma heppi mmaan avah dultipaam ki lam pemeh.
Nang apauna avah kindit. Nang ki akinditna' ava ngi mmaan avah apenje chlam.
Nang ngi Nei avah dultipaam thung ngi adoyuktsi heppi Nei rukku mmaan avah dultipaam thung ngi ksi chaak lam a.
Nang ngi mmaan avah kindit ava ngi adopenje chaak lamna' rah, mmaan thenni, Neiyi kdaksa avah kpenje kcha' ping.
Neiyi hava'le' ki then daat chrel lih rinktham chmaang, pdainu hava'le' pauna thungki ngi lammikrin kcha' rang rekki then rukku rinkaktham kcha' ping.

Apa, Nang ngi Nei kthung ngi amtinu, ungta Neiyi Nang athung ngi ka'am chaak ava' heppi, mmaan mkheng rukka khadaat mkurthuhna' raan ki thenni, mmaan thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Ungta mmaan nih neenve nthung ngi khadaat mkurthuhna' raan ki thenni, rinkaktham kcha' ping. Mleiya dultipaam mih Neiya Nang ngi adoyuktsi, tidit lam'mdorin chaakna' raan, mmaan nih khadaat mkurthuh raan.
Ungta mmaan rukka Neenve ngi khadaat tkurthuh heppi khadaat mkurthuhna' raan, Nang ngi adotpiik tkonlorna' avah Neiyi mmaan hinni kdopiik chaak doklam.

Neiyi mmaan avah khadaat tih kdopurkhum deek pchaan lamna' rah, Neiyi mmaan thung ngi amnu ungta Nang ngi Nei kthung ngi amtinu. Ungta dultipaam mih Nei avah Nang ngi adoyuktsi ungta Nang ngi mmaan avah, Nei von'adotapsat heppi vonsat adolow chaak lam, tidit mdodehna' raanni Neiyi mmaan thung ngi amnu ungta Nang ngi Nei kthung ngi amtinu.

Apa, Neiyi Nang ngi adotpiik dok rek mmaan avah, Nei ka'amna' mun thung ngi ma'am raan kngei a. Mleiya mmaan nih Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik chaak kkonlorna' avah mmikin nih adei chlamso. Mleiya dultipaam mapqhanduh duh ngi, Nang ngi Neiya vonsat adotolow chaak dok.
Mrinkindit Apa, dultipaam mih Nang nga adeipindih meh. Pdainu Neivah adokdeh chaak ungta hava' mii rekki Neiya Nang ngi adoyuktsi tidit avah mdeh chaakin.

Ungta Neiyi Nang amiing avah mmaan hinni kdopdeh chaak doklam. Ungta Nang ngi Nei kihin nih vonsat adotolow chaakna' vonsat avah mmaan hinni ma'amna' rah ungta Neiyi mmaan thung ngi ka'amna' rah, Neiyi kdopdeh chaak lam.”
Jisu ngi hava'le' khimkhei mthe dok dilli Msikhu rektu' Kedron prah raalpha thah vah lamda. Ungta mmun ava' thung ngi bil khat ka'am ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek tung ngi mthung ngi luwt lamda.
Ungta Jisu kyur chrang Judas rukku mmun avah mdodeh. Mleiya Jisu ngi mmun ava' thuh Msikhu rek tung ngi kurduh tlit kchok lam.
Audilli Judas tih thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rek hinki miilop khat le' koprol rek qhida bil ava' thung ngi klachowi ksin le' meila ksin ungta raaldona ksin rek tya tu' thleng lamda.
Jisu ngi Mma' 'leenni kthuwk rang dow mkheng mdodeh dok leiyi, heipha lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwda naan nih adothlaam inna?”
Mmaan nih arthaang lamda: “Najareth ki Jisu.” Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya Mma' ping.” Ungta Mma' kyur kcha' Judas avah mmaan arlak ki krip daat.
Mma ngi ‘Neiya Mma' ping’, mdit daat le' mmaan nih kunqhunsowk lamda ungta dulti thah tlu lamda.
Audilli Mma ngi veikhat kheelnowl lamda: “Kuw plih, naan nih adothlaam inna?” Ungta mmaan nih the lamda: “Najareth ki Jisu.”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi, ‘Neiya Mma' ping' dinuh akthepiik dokin kmah? Naan nih Nei atthlaamin cheentung ngi hava'le' avah apsunpthi dokin.”
Mleiya Mma ngi, ‘Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok rek avah khadaat ruk penvei maang’, dida mdothe ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni Mma ngi havah mdothe.
Audilli Simon Pitar rih raal'kaang mdosin daat ava' turthuhda ungta thimpu kenreelsi suwk khat avah duwda, mchang ktong ki makna sellotda. Ungta suwk miing avah Melkas, mdit.
Audilli Jisu ngi Simon Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Raal'kaang avah mkokthuh adaal dok. Kpa ngi mdotpiik dok tong avah Neiyi nee nimaang mow?”
Audilli, koprol khat doqhi raalmii loppii rekle' Jihudi rekki luwbuk'inn krung rekki, Jisu avah raanqhul lih kyowng lamda ungta bowl lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mkum ava' ki thimpu kenreelsi kkurthuwk Kaiaphas ktarpa Anna hinni rukri reppi Mma' avah vanqhi lamda.
'Tunnu Kaiaphas avah Jihudi rek hinni paukperseel kchok ungta ‘mii mkheng ki thenni miikhat mdiyow ngi kqha', tidit kthe ava'.

Ungta Simon Pitar le' sikhu morson khat tih Jisu dil avah qowi chlamda. Mleiya sikhu avah thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mdodeh pindit ungta mma ngi Jisu tu' thimpu kenreelsi inndulbuk kpha thung ngi vangluwtve lamda.

Pdainu Pitar rah thurngut duwn thah krip chdaat. Avaleiyi, thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mdodeh pindit sikhu morson khat ava ngi vangthuwkda thurngut krung ava' hinni theda, Pitar avah thung thah pluwt chda.
Audilli thurngut krung snusuwk ava ngi Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Nang rukka hava' mii ava' ki sikhu rek arlak ki khat ptipmeh?” Mma ngi, “Neiya ava' pmaang,” dida.
Ungta ava' thuh krip suwk rekle' koprol rek ava ngi, mdai leiyi, prel bung lamda mei mdo'otin. Ungta Pitar rukka mmaan tu' ripda mei mdo'ot chaak.
Thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi Msikhu rekle' Mma ngi mdopurchuhna' leiyi, pau kheelda.

Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi kurphuwng ngi kpau ping. Neiyi Sinegog rek thung ngi ungta luwbuk'inn thung ngi purchuk nuh, ava' thung ngi Jihudi rekki mpha ktai thleng kchok lamda ungta Neiyi tuprut tih kdothe dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
Taluleiyi nang ngi Nei kihin nih atkheel a? Neiyi kdothe karja rek hinni, Neiyi talu kthe tidit avah akheel chaan. Ungta asuw! mmaan nih Neiyi kdothe avah mdehn,” dida.
Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe thungta, mbeh ngi krip daat koprol rek khat ava ngi Jisu a mapya ngi tpeengda. Ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi thimpu kenreelsi khat pau avah anto ngi ado'arthaan rang mow?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi kqha kma' kthe cheentung ngi kqha kma' ki sakhi apii, pdainu kqha mkurthuh u, taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya atetpeenna?”
'Tunnu Anna ngi Jisu avah tbowldaat tih thimpu kenreelsi Kaiaphas hinni heipthlada.
Ungta Simon Pitar rah ripda mei mdo'ot chaak. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Nang rukka sikhu rek arlak ki khat ptipmeh?” Mma ngi matda ungta “Neiya ava' kmaang,” dida.
Thimpu kenreelsi suwk rek arlak ki khat, Pitar rih makna mdosellot rilam kthuwk khat tih hanto'theda: “Bil thung ngi Mma' tu' kilqhi kmik ki adokdehya, nang kmeh mow?”
Pitar rih veikhat matnowlda, ungta m'tunkat daat tih har khuwngda.

Audilli mmaan nih jiingsun kpanma ngi Jisu avah Kaiaphas hinki ngi Paamkpu'inn thah vanqhi lamda. Pdainu mmaan mdakin avah Paamkpu'inn thung ngi vangkluwt lam pemeh. Mleiya ava' thuh mluwn bih, kbur chlam rah. Pdainu Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' thung ngi mmaal chaakna' raan ki thenni vangkluwt lam pemeh.
Audilli Pilaat tih vangthuwk thida, mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' mii ava' kepteng ngi mraal talu apiik inna?”
Audilli mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi kthi ktlow kma' mkurthuh bih neen nih Mma' avah nang ahin nih aparlaan nimaanring.”

Audilli Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mma' avah naan nih vanqhi chaan ungta naanki anowlamin dilkqowiyi pau'apindit chaan.” Pdainu Jihudi rekki mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih miikhat kdo'eyow raan avah nowlam mih mdorot pemeh.”
Jisu ngi talu diyow ngi diyoubei nikdi' tidit mdothe dok ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni mmaan nih havah mdotheen.
Audilli Pilaat tih Paamkpu'inn thung ngi veikhat vangluwt nowlda. Ungta mma ngi Jisu ownda Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng pti?”
Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Nang ngi havah athina ki aplungbin nih adothemo, mii morson nih Nei kleiyi adotthepiik pli?”
Pilaat tih arthaangda: “Neiya Jihudi kmaang, Nang achaat kat rekle' thimpu kenreel rekki, Nang nga Nei kihin nih mdotparlaan lam. Nang ngi talu adotlot ma'amna ngi?”

Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiki kruwngpaalna' avah hava' dultipaam ki pemeh. Neiki kruwngpaalna' ava ngi hava' dultipaam ki mkurthuh daat tlaang bih, Nei mokbom rekki Jihudi rek khut thuh mdotparlaan mana'rah ker'eqhi lamrah. Pdainu 'tunnu Neiki kruwngpaalna' avah hava' dultipaam ki pemeh.”

Avaleiyi, Pilaat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mdittu' Nang nga Paamkruwng khat pti?” Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Nang ngi Neiya ‘paamkruwng khat pti' adotidit avah mkindit kat athe a. Neiya hava'rang ki thenni kqou ping ungta hava' leiyi dultipaam thung ngi Neiya kurjung ping. Mleiya Neiyi kindit ava' kpha ngi sakhi avah kdopiik rah. Ungta kindit thung ngi ka'am kcha' rek khimkheiyi Nei kokrowl avah mdo'arjaak chaakin.”

Pilaat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kindit avah taluda?” Ungta mma ngi hava' mthe dok le' veikhat Jihudi rek hinni vangthuwk nowlda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mma' thung ngi mraal dow khatleh phangmaang.

Pdainu naanki anowpaan khat ka'am, tidit tah Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' thung ngi neiyi naan ahin nih miikhat adokapthlat piik raan. Avaleiyi, neiyi Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng ava' adokapthlat piik raan angei inna?”
Audilli mmaan mkheng inni owng lamda: “Hava' mii ava'rang pemeh, pdainu Barabbas rah,” dilamda! 'Tunnu Barabbas avah raanqhul kupru miikhat.
Audilli Pilaat tih Jisu qhida ungta Mmah tpubun lamda.
Ungta raalmii rekki luwkhum rah tirling purkul lamda ungta mluw thah pkhum lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kning ngi ksen phriktluwn pnaak lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih: ‘Akurvuwi chaak inna Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng’, dilamda, ning'er rih bi chlamda ungta mkhutin nih tpeeng lamda.
Avaleiyi, Pilaat tih vangthuwk nowlda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Asuwn, neiyi Mma' thung ngi mraal khadaat ruk phangmaang tidit adodehna' raan ki thenni Mma' avah naan ahin nih akupthuh piik inna.”
Audilli Jisu a tirling luwkhum khumda ungta kning ngi ksen phriktluwn nada arvang thuwkda. Ungta Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii avah asuw chaan.”

Avaleiyi, thimpu kenreel rekle' koprol rekki Mma' mdehn thungta, owng lamda: “Mmah khros 'leenni apthowiyou in, Mmah khros 'leenni apthowiyou in,” dilamda.’ Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih vanqhiin rang ngi apthowiyou chaan mleiya Neiya Mma' thung ngi mraal khadaat ruk phangmaang.”
Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda: “Neen nih nowlam khat kthlowi'in, ungta neenki nowlam ki dilkqowiyi Mmah mdiyow rang thah ktla. Mleiya Mma ngi Isowr Chapa kpurthuh chda.”
Ungta Pilaat tih ava' mdotheen marjaak nowl thungta kdung ngi mningpqitda.
Ungta veikhat mma ngi Paamkpu'inn thung ngi vangluwt thida Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Nang nga tva'paam ki pti?” Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangsi mda.

Audilli Pilaat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga kihin nih pau thesi nimtih? Neiyi Nang nga khros 'leen adokopthowi yowna'rang ruk ungta adokapthlat pthina' rang ki ruhtan ruk kdothlowi avah dei mtimow?”

Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Karthak ki ngi nang ahin nih adotpiik kma'don nih, nang ngi k'leen nih dow khatleh ruk adotlot pchaanna' ruhtan thlowi nimtih. Avaleiyi, nang ahin nih Nei makparlaan kcha' mma' ava ngi pnu klin merve chaak a.”

Ungta audilli Pilaat tih Mma' avah mdopthlat pthina' rah tlowda, pdainu Jihudi rekki owng lamda: “Nang ngi hava' mii ava' apthlatpthi bih, nang nga Siijar plap ptipmeh, ungta kuwku yoso mdak ki paamkruwng kpurthuh kcha' mii ava ngi Siijar kepthleiyi kpau a.”
Avaleiyi, Pilaat tih hava' pau marjaak thungta mma ngi Jisu avah arvan pthuwkda. Ungta mma ngi Lungquwnglai, Hibriu pau vih ‘Gabatha’ mdodit, pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni ko'ongda.
Ungta nit avah Taplaanna' nit ki thenni tkorthlon chaakna' nit kurthuwkda. Ungta qhang truk arveel mtlaak thungta, Mma ngi Jihudi rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naanki Paamkruwng avah, Asuwn!”

Pdainu mmaan nih owng lamda: “Mma' avah aqhi dokin, Mma' avah aqhi dokin ungta khros 'leenni apthowiyou in,” dilamda. Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanki Paamkruwng avah neiyi khros 'leenni pthowiyou nikmow?” Thimpu kenreel rekki arthaang lamda: “Neenna Siijar kma'don paamkruwng morson thlowi maanring.”
Mthungta mma ngi Mma' avah khros 'leenni mdopthowiyow chaakna' raan ki thenni parlaan pthi lamda. Mthungta mmaan nih Jisu avah qhi lamda ungta sunqhi lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mdaksa ki khros avah kdomda, luwruh mun mdoditin mun thah hangda. Ungta mmun avah Hibriu pau vih ‘Golgotha’ mdit.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mdopthowi yow naan ava' thung ngi morson 'knii rek rukka pthowiyou lamda. Ungta mmaan nih paang khat terthah khatkhat ungta mmalai inni Jisu avah pthowiyou lamda.
Ungta Pilaat tih miingkbih khat kjitda ungta avah khros 'leenni daarda. Ungta jiiktikjit avah: ‘NAJARETH KI JISU, JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG’ dida.
Ungta Jisu mdopthowi yownaan mun avah khuwpii hintek mkurthuh leiyi, Jihudi mii knempok ki miing kbih avah parchamda lamda. Ungta jiiktikjit avah Hibriu ungta Grik ungta Latin pau vih tikjit.
Audilli Jihudi rekki thimpu kenreel rekki Pilaat hinni the lamda: “ ‘Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng’, dida kjitma', pdainu, ‘Neiya, Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng ping’, mdodit, adira, akjit.”
Pdainu Pilaat tih arthaangda: “Neiyi kdokjit dok avah tikjit dok.”

Audilli raalmii rekki Jisu mopthowiyown thung ngi, mbuwmdiir rek avah loupthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih tum plii kthuwk ki penqheek lamda ungta raalmii ktai ki tum khatkhat kpurtum lamda. Pdainu Mphriktluwn avah ka'am chdaat. 'Tunnu mphriktluwn avah tititna' ktaak ki mutluwnni torkhown.

Avaleiyi, mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi the lamda: “Neen nih havah kqet maan cheh pdainu kuw dow kurthuwk chrang a tidit ki thenni pchalpiik sutnaan cheh,” dilamda. Mleiya Kchiir laika thung ngi hanto'theda: “Mmaan nih kbuwdiir rek avah marlak inni penthem chlamda. Ungta kiphriktluwn ava' 'leenni pchalpiik sutna' lamda,” (Luw. 22:18) mdodit ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni, raalmii rekki hava'le' avah mdotlotin.
'Tunnu Jisu khros beh ngi Mnuh a rip daatda ungta Mnuh naunuh, Kleopas nuwn Mary le' Magdala ki Mary le' rukka kripsap daat lam.
Jisu ngi Mnuh le' Mvonsatlow chaak sikhu ava' krip daat mdeh thungta, Mma ngi Mnuh hinni hanto'theda: “Snu, achapa asuw cha'!”
Audilli Mma ngi sikhu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Anuh asuw cha'!” Ungta qhang ava' thung ki kupqhun nih sikhu ava ngi snu avah mi'inn thah junqhi chda.
Hava' dilli, Jisu ngi dow mkheng avah 'tunnu kqudok a tidit deida. Ungta Kchiir laika kurkhumna' rang leiyi, ‘Kningkakraal a,’ dida.

'Tunnu ava' thung ngi thowldii kdor kcha' beel kdimteer khat kok'ong daat. Ungta mmaan nih buwphown avah thowldii kdor thung ngi phuwm lam thida hyssop kuwng 'leenni daar lamda ungta Mnehr thung ngi handen lamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi thowldii kdor mpertem dilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu kqu kcha' a,” dida. Ungta Mma ngi tunguwi chda ungta Mapthlarin avah pthla pthida.

Mleiya mnit avah tporthlonna’ nit mkurthuh leiyi, mmaan daksa rek avah tkarngatnit tih khros 'leenni mokthowi daat raan avah ngei lam mda. Mleiya tkarngatnit avah nit klinsi. Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki Pilaat hinni mmaan avah mkhuhn punthum thida tupqumpthi lamna' rah ktham chlamda.
Audilli raalmii rekki Mma' tu' mdopthowiyow rekin arlak ki mkhatna' ungta morson khat tah mkhuhn punthum lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih Jisu marvan phaakin thungta Mmah choduh duh ngi mdiyow chaak dok avah dei lamda. Avaleiyi, Mmah mkhuh punthum lammeh.
Pdainu raalmii rek arlak ki khat tih Mjii thah kcheiyi hanthunda. Ungta ava' thung ki hii le' dii thuwkda.
Ungta kdei kcha' mma' ava ngi ava' ki rinpaumin avah piida ungta mma' rinpauminpiik avah mkindit kat ava'. Mleiya naan nih lam'adorin chaakna' raan ki thenni mma ngi kindit kthe a tidit deida.
Kchiir laika ngi: ‘Mma' ruh rek avah khadaat ruk beng nimeh’, (Mpk. 12:46 Cha. 9:12 Luw. 34:20) mdodit. Ungta hava' dow rek khimkhei avah tikjit dok ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni thuwkda.
Ungta veikhat Kchiir laika morson thung ngi the nowlda: “Mmaan nih kcheiyi mdothunin Mma' avah ksuw lamrah.” (Jkh. 12:10)

Ungta hava' dilli Jihudi rek kqikcha ngi kandang pchaang kma' tuprut tih Jisu sikhu kurthuwk kcha', Arimathia ki Joseph tidit miikhat ka'am. Ungta mma ngi Pilaat hinni Jisu kluwng avah mdolow chaakna' rah ktham chda. Ungta Pilaat tih mmah rotpiikda. Avaleiyi, mma ngi arhangda Jisu kluwng avah lou chda.
Ungta choduh ngi Jisu hinni jaan nih kthleng kcha', Nikodimas rukka Mhin nih thlengda. Mma ngi myrrh le' aloe tporchou reidii kilo somkdum leiparnga arveel krik rah arhansinda.
Audilli mmaanve ngi Jisu kluwng avah lou lamda, Jihudi rek kulruwlna' nowpa dilkqowiyi buw kperneem mih reidii rektu' klumdeek lamda.
'Tunnu Mma' mdopthowinaan mun ava' thung ngi bil khat ka'am. Ungta bil ava' thung ngi kuwkhat leh tithiikna' mlai thlaankhor ren khat ka'am.
Mleiya nit avah Jihudi rek karngatnit ki thenni tkorthlonna' nit mkurthuh leiyi, ungta thlaan avah mnai leiyi, Jisu avah ava' thung ngi alruwl chlamda.
Arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, kparma ngi, mjiindaat arlaan nih Magdala ki Mary ngi thlaan thah hangda. Ungta mma ngi thlaankhor 'leenki lung korlou chdok avah deida.
Audilli mma ngi arjung chenda, Simon Pitar le' Jisu vonsat'low sikhu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Mmaan nih Kruwng avah thlaan thungki mlowpthi dok inna ungta tva'thah mthiik dokin tidit deimaan ring.”
Avaleiyi, Simon Pitar le' sikhu morson khat avah thlaan thah hang lamda.
Mthungta mikniing inni hangchen lamda ungta sikhu morson khat ava ngi Pitar chenkheelda choduh thlaan avah hanphada.
Ungta mma ngi tpeda mheisut thungta buw kperneem rek avah ka'am daat deida, pdainu thlaan thung vah vangluwt meh.
Audilli mma' dilkqowiyi Simon Pitar arhan tlungda. Ungta mma ngi thlaan thung ngi vangluwtda, buw kperneem rek ka'am daat avah deida.
Ungta Mluw 'leenki parthlandau avah ava' thuh ka'am buw kperneem rektu' amsap mda. Pdainu msik ki kerthlep deek ki mmun msik khat thung ngi amdaatda.
Audilli thlaan thuh rukri hangktlung dok sikhu morson ava' rukka vangluwtda, deida ungta mma ngi lam'rin chda.
Mleiya mmaan nih ava' kpha thung rukku, Kchiir laika thung ngi tikjit: ‘Mma ngi kdiyou thungki kring kerheel rah’, mdodit avah mdodeh pindit chaakin pemeh.
Audilli sikhu rek avah mi'inn thaan nih veikhat jungsun kerheel lamda.
Pdainu Mary a qapda thlaan beh ngi krip chdaat ungta mqa chunni mma ngi tpeda thlaan thung ngi heisuwda.
Ungta mma ngi kpowldang dang ngi korthlong vaantamsi 'knii avah Jisu kluwng mdothiiknaan thung ngi, khat tih mluwqhun thah ungta morson khat tih mkhuhther thah kok'ong daat lam deida.

Ungta mmaanve ngi mhin nih the lamda: “Snu, taluleiyi nang nga kqap ptil lih?” Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Mleiya mmaan nih Neiki Kruwng avah loupthi dok lamda ungta neiyi tva'thah mthiik dokin tidit deimaang.”
Ungta mma ngi antomthe dok daat le' mma ngi mdil mkerheel thungta Jisu ava' thung ngi krip daat deida, pdainu mma ngi avah Jisu tidit tah deimda.

Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Snu taluleiyi, nang nga kqap ptil lih, ungta kuw kthlaam ptil lih?” Mma' vah bilkrung miipakda, dida Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, nang ngi Mma' avah aneenpthi dok cheentung ngi, adothiikna' mun avah mheithe piikcha' low, ungta neiyi Mma' avah ava' thung ki lou chnih.”
Jisu ngi mhin nih, “Mary,” dida ownda. Ungta mma ngi kerheelda Mhin nih, “Rabboni,” dida, tidit tah Chukpu, mdoditna'.

Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mokyowngma', mleiya Neiya Kpa hinni hungkal mlairing. Pdainu vang rang ngi ku'uknau rek hinni, Neiyi Nei Kpa ungta naan A'paan ungta Neiki Isowr ungta naanki Isowr ava' hinni hung nikdi', mdit, adi rang ngi athepiik lam,” dida.
Magdala ki Mary ngi arvangda, mma ngi Kruwng avah kmik ki kdeh chaak ungta Mma ngi hava' dow rek avah theda, tidit avah sikhu rek hinni song chda.

Audilli arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, kluw thang ngi sikhu rekka kurtuwl chlamda. Pdainu mmaan nih Jihudi rek mdoqit chaak inni thurngut arkammer lamda. Anto'daat yoso, Jisu ngi marlak inni thuwkda, mningqimin kat tih ripda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Plung kdai ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.”
Ungta Mma ngi hanto' mthe dok dilli, mmaan hinni mkhut rekle' mjii avah tedet lamda. Audilli, mmaan nih Kruwng mdodeh chaakin leiyi, sikhu rekka kanpa chlamda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni veikhat the nowlda: “Plung kdai ahinin nih i'amso, Kpa ngi Nei mdotsi heppi, Nei rukku naan avah aksi inna.”
Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok le' Mma ngi m'leenin nih Mtadaal muwpiik lamda ungta mhinin nih hanto'theda: “Naan nih Pthla Kchiir avah karlaang kcha' ikurthuwkin.
Kuwku yoso, naan nih mupnu arve adoptlot piik dokin avah toptlot piik dok ungta kuwku yoso naan nih mupnu arve adoptlot piikmaan avah toptlot piik meh.”
Pdainu kinphiir mdoditin Thomas, sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat avah, Jisu merhei thung vah ka'am pemeh.

Avaleiyi, sikhu morson rekki mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih Kruwng avah kmikin nih kdeh chaakin.” Pdainu mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mkhut 'leenki jowtpii kbih deida, mthung ngi kukhutchal thunda ungta Mjii thung ngi kukhut tih thunda kdehduh khimkheiyi, lam'rin nimaang.”

Ungta niitreht dilli sikhu rek avah inn thung ngi kurtuwl nowl lamda. Ungta Thomas rukka marlak inni yauda, ungta thurngut arkammer chleeklam yoso Jisu ngi marlak inni thuwk khotda mningqimin kat tih ripda. Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Plung kdai ahinin nih i'amso.”
Audilli Mma ngi Thomas hinni hanto'theda: “Akhut arheikhiing ungta akhutchal lih athun rang ngi kukhut avah asuw, lamkrin kma' tlowma', lam'arin cha'.”
Ungta Thomas tih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiki Kruwng ungta Neiki Isowr!”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Thomas, nang ngi amik ki adotedeh dok leiyi, lam'atrin chaak a, pdainu mmik ki mdeh chaakduduh ngi lam'krin kcha' mmaan avah msuwkin kqha.”
Ungta hava' laika thung ngi tikjit dokmah, titinna' knempok ki, rek maiyi Jisu ngi mdotlot ka'am.

Pdainu Jisu a Mesaiah ava' ungta Isowr Chapa ava' tidit lam'adorin chaakna' raan ungta alamrin chaak inni, naan nih Mma' miing 'leenni rinkum adothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni, hava' dow rek khimkhei avah tikjit.
Hava'le' khimkhei dilli, Jisu ngi Taiberia truwnpii thung ngi sikhu rek hinni mdak ki veikhat kterdet nowl lamda. Ungta Mma ngi hanto' heppi kperdeh chlamda.
Ava' thung ngi Simon Pitar le' kinphiir mdoditin Thomas ungta Galily paam ki kana khuw thungki Nathanel ungta Jebedi chapa rek ungta sikhu morson rek 'knii rukka ka'amsap daat lam.

Simon Pitar rih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya tuwlvah kse rah chet chnih.” Ungta mmaan nih mma' hinni the lamda: “Neen rukka nang aqowi nikaan.” Ungta mmaan nih chet lamda arkuwng khat thung ngi luwtteng lamda pdainu ava' nit ki jaanvah dow khadaat ruk kyowng lam mda.
'Tunnu, jiingsun mphaak thungta, diibiing ngi Jisu a rip daatda, pdainu sikhu rekki Mmah Jisu tidit tah dei chlam mda.
Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nausisi rek, thendamlu athlowi ngaalin mowi?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Immeh,” dilamda arthaang lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Arkuwng machang ktong thah aleensinin avah adeengin ungta naan nih mruk kyowng naandi'.” Avaleiyi, mmaan nih leen avah ava' thuh deeng lamda ungta tuwlvah knemreen nih mdokhum dokin leiyi, leen avah qen turthuh pchaang lam mda.

Avaleiyi, Jisu vonsat low sikhu ava ngi, Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Havah Kruwng ava'.” 'Tunnu Simon Pitar rih, “havah Kruwng ava',” tidit marjaak thungta, dona kna kmah ngi ma'am leiyi, mma ngi miphriktluwn ava' nateng thida, truwnpii thung ngi jungluwt dokda.

Ungta arkuwng kdil khat thung ngi sikhu morson rek avah arva lamda. Mleiya mmaan amna' avah laan thungki lamklapa pemeh, mitar somtku arveel daat rah ungta mmaan nih tuwlvah pum leen avah laan thah qenthuh lamda.
Mmaan nih laan mphaak daatin le' prel lih tbun mei 'leenni tuwlvah trow meek ungta ava' thuh thenpen ka'am daat dei lamda.
Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih 'tunkat adokyownin tuwlvah avah mruk arvansin inno.”

Simon Pitar rih vada tuwlvah kdimteer rih ka'am leen avah laan thah qen pthuwkda. Ungta mdokyownin tuwlvah rek avah klinlik ki arja khat somparnga leikdumtet pdainu antoya nem chdaat yoso leen avah takhatleh kelqet meh.
Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Arvangin, imaal dokin.” Ungta sikhu rek, kuwkhat leh ngi, “Nang nga kuw ptil lih,” tidit kheel pchaang lammeh? Mleiya Mma' avah Kruwng ava' tidit mdodeh dokin.
Audilli Jisu ngi thenpen avah vanlouda thempiik lamda ungta tuwlvah ava' rukka ava' heppi thempiik lamda.
'Tunnu Jisu ngi kdiyou thungki mkerdel dilli Msikhu rek hinni, mekperdehna' avah hava ngi mukdumna'.

Ungta mmaal dokin dilli Jisu ngi Simon Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Jonah chapa Simon, nang ngi, Neiya dakat tih hava'le' heihin nih vonsat atolow a?” Mma ngi arthaangda: “Ong ngi Kruwng, Neiyi vonsat adoklow chaak avah Nang ngi adeh.” Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kyausuwn rek avah apmaal deilam.”

Jisu ngi mhin nih mvei'knitna' the nowlda: “Jonah chapa Simon, nang ngi, Neiya dakat tih vonsat atolow a?” Mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ong ngi Kruwng, Neiyi vonsat adoklow chaak avah Nang ngi adeh.” Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kyau rek avah aqhidei lam.”

Mma ngi mhin nih mveikdumna' the nowlda: “Jonah chapa Simon, nang ngi Neiya vonsat atolow a?” ‘Nang ngi Neiya vonsat atolow a’? dida mveikdumna' kpha mdothe leiyi, Pitar rah muplung yada. Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi dow mkheng adeh, Neiyi Nang vonsat adoklow chaak avah, Nang ngi adeh.” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kyau rek avah apmaal deilam.

Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Amotvah nang ngi adongei chaak dilkqowiyi ado'ana hilna tinu kirsim kcha' ptih. Ungta adongei chaak ‘lam thah kchet kcha' ptih. Pdainu aver dok dilthang vah, abaan arji tidon morson khat tih nang nga dona akapnaak rah ungta adongeima ‘lam thah akqhirah.”
Havah mma ngi talu diyow ngi diyoudon nih mma ngi Isowr avah kponlor chrang tidit mdotedetna ngi mdothe. Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowi.”

Audilli Pitar rih kerheelda msut thungta, Mma ngi vonsat mdolow chaak ungta kluwki kmaal ava' thung ngi, Mma' plung 'leenni kbiuda ungta Mhin nih, ‘Kruwng, kuw rang plih akyur chrang nga’, dida kkheel sikhu ava ngi mdilin mdoqowi lam avah deida.
Pitar rih mma' mdeh thungta Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng mdittu' hava' miikhat avah taluhep rang o?”
Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi mmah kurjun kerheel kpha ngi i'am daatso, kdit tu' ava ngi nang ahin nih talu kthuwk a? Nang nga Nei mheiqowi.”

Audilli unau rek arlak ki hava' pauthe avah koryouda, tidit tah mmaan nih, “hava' sikhu avah diyou nimeh,” dilamda. Anto' pdainu Jisu ngi mhin nih mma' avah diyou nimeh mdodit pemeh pdainu ‘Neyi kurjun kerheel kpha ngi i'am daatso kdit tu' ava ngi nang ahin nih talu kthuwka’, mdodit?
Hava' sikhu ava ngi hava'le' khimkhei rek 'leenni rinpaumin avah piida ungta hava'le' avah mma ngi mdokjit chaak. Ungta neen nih mma' rinpaumin piik avah kindit tidit avah ndeh chaak inna.

Ungta hava'le' kma' Jisu ngi dow knempok ki mdotlot ka'am. Ungta avale' avah khatkhat tih nikjit bih, dultipaam mpumpum thung ngi ava' tikjit rang laika rek avah kiksim thuh pchaang nimeh tidit tih kbin chaak a. Amen.
O, Thiophilas, Neiyi Jisu ngi mnongtlot mdopqhunna' le' mdopurchuhna' mkheng rekki paumin avah mikniing ngi choduh ngi kdokjit chaak dok.
Parvaan thah Mma' murjuklow chaak dokduh kpha thung ngi, Mma ngi Pthla Kchiir ar'aang ngi, Mma ngi mdokchol dok ksa tamsi rek hinni paupiik rek avah pii lamda.

Msuwk thuhna' dilli Mma ngi kring imping tidit ki mkinditna' avah bitinna' rekki, Mma' mdakkat tih mmaan hinni kperdeh chlamda. Mmaan nih, Mma ngi nii somplii ma'am thung ngi mmikin nih dei lamda ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mlei avah mmaan hinni theda.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' kmaal rang ngi ma'amsapin thung ngi, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto' paupiik pii lamda: “Naan nih Jerusalem mada sunmaan, pdainu, naan nih Pa ava' paureel avah arda chaan, kdodit avah ado'arjaak chaak dokin.
Mleiya mkindit kat tih Johon vah diisik daat tih dii mdopluw pdainu nit mruk dil thah naan avah Pthla Kchiir thung ngi dii akupluwt raan.”
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mkurtuwlsapin thung ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda, kheel chlamda: “Kruwng, 'tunvah Nang ngi kruwngpaalna' avah Isreel rek hinni penletpiik lamnadi?”
Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pa ava ngi Mma' ruhtan thung ngi mdo'arkhiik dok mpha mditmata mnit avah naan nih adodehnaan kqha pemeh.

Pdainu a'leenin nih Pthla Kchiir ava' murjun thung ngi naan nih ruhtan avah arlaang chnaandi'. Ungta naan nih Jerusalem thung ruk ungta Judia paam mkheng thung ruk ungta Samaria thung ruk ungta dultipaam mdonna' kpha thung ngi naan nih Neiki ksakhi kurthuwk naandi'.”
Mma ngi hava' dow rek mthe dok dilli, msutdaatin arlaan nih Mma' avah parvaan thah arjuklou chda ungta mmiksutin thungki armeiyi Mma' avah arju'arlaang chda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hangkal chaakna' parvaan avah kmin nih msut chaakin arlaan nih, asuwn dona kpowl kihilkna mii 'knii rek avah mhin inni ripdaat lamda.

Ungta mmaanve ava ngi hanto' the lamda: “Galily ki mii rek, taluleiyi naan nih parvaan suwn tinu krip daat inpti? Hava' naan ahinki parvaan thah mdo’arjuk loww chaak Jisu kat avah naan nih parvaan thah mahankal adodehn heppi veikhat kurjung kerheel rah.”
Audilli mmaan nih kruwn lown ki ngi Jerusalem thah arjung kerheel lamda. Mleiya lown avah Jerusalem behki ungta mkarlatin avah tkarngatnit 'lamqowi pangdaat.

Ungta mmaan nih ma'amnaan thuh marvanluw dokin dilli, Pitar, Johon, James le' Andria, Philip le' Thomas, Bartholomio le' Metthiu, Alphius chapa James ungta Jealot mdoditin Simon ungta James chapa Judah le'lim avah karthak ki innkhaar ava' thah hangkal lamda.
Hava'le' mkheng ava ngi snu rekle' Jisu nuh Mary ungta Mma' naupa rektu' plung khadaat tih rinkthamna' le' tiqhil chaakna' 'leenni plung pluwt chlamda.
Mpha ava' thung ngi Pitar rih sikhu rek arlakphin nih rip thida hanto'theda: Miichai rek avah mkheng inni arja khat som'knii arveel lam.
Mii rekle' ku'uknau rek, Jisu kokyowng rek ava' 'lam kqhipsuk Judah hava' leiyi alraang ngi Pthla Kchiir rih David nehr thung ngi mdothe Kchiir laika avah mkurtluwm rang thah tlada.
Mleiya mma' avah neen tu' mitaisapinda ungta hava' nongtlotna' ava' thung ngi mqhe mruk avah mma' rukku tang chda.
'Tunnu mma ngi nowlam tuksutmana' ki mardaman ava ngi loupaam khat renda ungta khupktulup pih tla chda ungta mdak avah mmalaiyi qe chda ungta mikril mkheng avah thuwkter chda.
Ungta Jerusalem thuh ka'am mii mkheng ngi avah arjada. Mthungta mmaan nih loupaam avah mpau inni, Akaldema dilamda, tidit tah Hii loupaam mdoditnaan.

Mleiya luwbuklaa thung ngi hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma' mun avah kram kcha' ikurthuwkso. Mun ava' thuh miikhat leh ktla kma' ikurthuwkso.” (Luw. 69:25) Ungta “Mii ktlok khat tih mma' longkhom avah athlengso,” mdodit. (Luw. 109:8)
Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi neen nihin nih luwtda thuwkda ma'amna' mpha mkheng thung ngi, neen tu' mpha mkheng thung ngi amsapda kdei miikhat tokchol raan thah tlada.
Johon nih dii mupluw ki kupqhun nih neen nihinki Jisu mdo'arjuk low chaakna' mpha kpha kdei, tidit tah mma' avah neen tu' Mma' rinkerheelna' ki sakhi kpii khat mkurthuh rah.
Mthungta mmaan nih mii 'knii kchol lamda. Barsabas mdoditin Joseph ungta mma' avah Jastas ruk mdoditin ungta Metthias avah kchol purphuwng lamda.
Audilli mmaan nih hanto ngi rinktham chlamda, “O Kruwng, Nang ngi miiplungril mkheng avah adodeh, hava' 'knii rek arlak ki kuw akchol a mheipdeh chaan,” dilamda.
Mleiya havah Judas tih mche chaakna' thah mchena' rang ki thenni nowlam pkuida mdomaak pthidok nongtlotna' le' tamsinong rekki mqhe ava' ktlow rang ki then.
Audilli mmaan nih pchalpiik ava maanve thenni chom lamda ungta pchalpiik avah Metthias 'leenni tlada ungta mma' avah sowm leikhat rek 'leenni tpom lamda.
'Tunnu Pentikost nit marvan phaak thungta mmaan mkhengin avah munkhat thuh amsap lamda.
Ungta tbinphaak liitma ngi tchangkhu kdungyou kchang ngi kraang hep daat tih parvaan ki archaang khat arjuwda mmaan ko'onna' inn avah marchaang pumdim dim chda.
Ungta mmaan nih mei hep daat tih kurkhui plei rek arjungda mmaan khimkhei ‘leenni khatkhat tih kchuw dei lamda.
Ungta mmaan avah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chlamda ungta Pthla ava ngi mmaan hinni tpauna' mdopiik lam ava' dilkqowiyi mmaan nih pau ktleiyi tpau pqhun lamda.
Ungta 'tunnu ava' thung ngi rinko'owi kcha' Jihudi rekle' parvaan kurduh ngi ka'am chaat rek khimkhei avah Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am lam.
'Tunnu ava' archaang marjaakin thungta miipii rekpa avah mningin ngakda mmun ava' thuh thleng lamda, mleiya mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mpau inni kpau vih mdo'arjaakin.
Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngak chlamda ungta ngakyou chlamda ungta khat le' khat hinni hanto' kerthe lamda: “Asuwnno, hava' kpau rek mkheng avah Galily mii lam pemeh mowi?
Mdittu' taluhep pih neen khimkheiyi neen neenki qounaan npaunpau inni tarjaak inno?
Parthia pau vih Media pau vih, Elimia pau vih ungta Mesopotamia thuh ka'am rek pau vih, Judia pau vih, Kappadosia pau vih ungta Pontas pau vih ungta Asia thuh ka'am rek pau vih, tarjaakin.

Ungta Phrigia pau vih, Pamphylia pau vih, ungta Egypt thuh ka'am rek pau vih Sairen beh ngi ka'am Libya pau vih ungta Rome thuh ka'am mal rek pau vih ungta Jihudi rekle' Jihudi rin'owi ko'owi kcha' rek pau vih, tarjaakin.
Kritii le' Arabia pau vih kpau vih tarjaakin. Neen nih neen neen ki npau inni mpauin tarjaakin avah Isowr dotlot tngana' nong rek ava'.”
Ungta mmaan mkheng avah ngakyou chlamda ungta plung kelqen nih hanto ngi khat le' khat hinni kerthe lamda: “Havah talu ningleiyo?” dilamda.
Aangqhe rekki hanto ngi kchim mih mmaan avah: “Mmaan nih thowldii knemreen nih mneek chaak inna,” dilamda.

Pdainu Pitar rih tamsi sowm lei khat rek tung ngi rip thida krowl kparthaang ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Jihudi rek ungta Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mkheng rek naan, havah naan nih adeiyin ungta nei kpauna rek avah naan nih kmin nih arja chaan.
Mleiya hava' mii rek avah naan nih adobin purthunin heppi kipri lam pemeh, mleiya 'tunnu jiingsun ki mukdumna' qhang row'a.
Pdainu havah khulpu Joel lih hanto ngi mdothethut dok ava'.”

‘Ungta mqutna' nit rek thung vah hanto' kthuwk rah, dida, Isowr rih hanto'theda: “Neiyi, Kapthla avah mii khimkhei 'leenni ptlong nikdi'. Ungta achanu le' achapa rek inni pau kpurphuwng lamrah. Ungta akseet rek inni rinmer kmer lamrah. Ungta akder rek inni mer kmer lamrah.
Ungta nit rek ava' thung ngi, Neiyi ksuwk rekle' ksuwknu rek hinni, Nei Kapthla avah ptlonpiik lam nikdi'. Ungta mmaan nih pau kpurphuwng chlam rah.
Ungta Neiyi karthak thah parvaan 'leenni tngana' pandang nikdi'. Ungta kurduh thah dultipaam thung ngi, Hii le' mei ungta meikhut hang rekki titinna' rek pandang nikdi'.
Kruwng Nit klin ungta nit kenreel ava' marvan phaakduh ngi, Kni a kjiingnu ungta thla a hii kurthuwk chrah.
Ungta hanto' kthuwk rah. Tidit tah Kruwng miing ko'own kcha' rek khimkhei avah ksan chrah.’ ” (Joe. 2:28-32)

Isreel mii rek naan nih havah arja chaan. Najareth ki Jisu avah naan ahin nih Isowr rih ruhtannong rekle' tngana' nong ungta titinna' rekki mdopandan miikhat ungta Isowr rih Mma' ar'aang ngi mdotlot avah naan adakin rukku adodehn.

Mma' avah Isowr rih muplung reel dok le' mduh kthuwk rah tedehna' luwkinritna' ava ngi naan ahin nih aparlaaninda. Ungta naan nih nowlam tukksut kma' mii rek khut tih Mma' avah khros 'leenni pthowiyin tih ado'eyown.
Mma' avah Isowr rih kdiyou ki tuduntsaanna' thungki perthletda, perdelda. Mleiya kdiyou vih Mma' avah mdokyown pchaan pemeh.
David tih Mma' leiyi, hanto'theda: “Neiyi mpha ktai thung ngi Kruwng nga kduh thah deinu. Mma ngi nei kmachang thah ma'am leiyi kuwkhat tih neiya moknok pchaang nimeh.
Avaleiyi, kuplung ngam chda ungta kepleiya kanpa chda. Ungta kdaksa rukka plungbinpsuk thung ngi kring chrah.
Mleiya, Nang ngi nei kapthlarin avah kdikhuw thah mapthi nimtih, Ungta Nang ngi Nangki Kchiir Khat avah pqop pthi nimtih.
Nang ngi nei kihin nih rinkum ki 'lam rek avah mepdeh chtinu. Ungta Nang a'aang ngi neiya kanpa ngi mipdim chnadi'.” (Luw. 16:8-11)
Ku'uknau rek, neiyi ahinin nih neen n'paan David leiyi, changkarngam mih ithe nih, tidit tah mma' avah diyouda ungta alruwl lamda ungta mma' thlaan avah tuni, neen nihin nih ka'am daat a.

Mma ngi khulpu khat mkurthuh ava ngi, mma' suruwl rek thung ngi daksa ki dilkqowiyi mma' kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong rang ki thenni Mma ngi Mesaiah avah perdel nikdi' dida, Isowr rih mma' hinni paureel lih pau mdoreel ava ngi mma ngi avah deida.
Mma ngi mduh thah hava' mdodeh leiyi, mma ngi Mesaiah rinkerheelna' avah deida. Mleiya Mma' pthlarin avah Kdikhuw thah tmaak ruk mameh mditmata Mma' daksa avah topqoh ruk pqopmeh.
Hava' Jisu avah Isowr rih perdelda ungta neen nkhengin avah ava' ki sakhi rek inpimin.

Ungta Isowr machang thah mdohankdom dok leiyi ungta Pa ava' paureel Pthla Kchiir ava' mdo'arlaan chaak leiyi, Mma ngi avah mdo'arjukptlon. 'Tun naan nih amikin nih adodehn ungta ado'arjaakin avah ava'.
Mleiya David tah parvaan thah hangkal dok meh pdainu mma' mdakkat tih hanto'theda: “Kruwng ngi neiki Kruwng hinni theda. ‘Nei Kmachang thah iko'ong daat.
Neiyi nang amiihal rek avah akhuhther kpurthuhduh kpha ngi iko'ong daat,’” dida. (Luw. 110:1)
Avaleiyi, Isreel mii mkheng rek naan nih, havah kindit kat tih adodeh raan, tidit tah naan nih adopthowiyown Jisu kat avah Isowr rih Kruwng ava'ruk ungta Mesaiah ruk mdopurthuh.
'Tunnu mmaan nih ava' marjaak daatin le' muplungin avah kdung ngi yada ungta mmaan nih Pitar le' tamsi morson rek hinni hanto' the lamda: “Unau rek neen nih talu tlow chenaandi?”

Audilli Pitar rih mmaan hinni theda: “Isowr rih apnu arveen adotoptlot piikna' raan ki thenni naan khimkheiyi aplungin aperthleng chaan ungta Jisu Mesaiah miing 'leenni dii iluwt chaan mdit bih Pthla Kchiir ki chla avah naan nih arlaang chnaandi'.
Paureel avah naan athen, anau asuwnin rekin ki then ungta lamkla ngi ka'am mmaan mkheng rekki then. Ungta Kruwng, neenki Isowr ava' ko'own kcha' mii mkheng rekki then.”
Ungta mma ngi morson pauna knempok ki mmaan hinni thepindit piik lamda ungta ksop lamda, hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' kqha kma' suruwl ava' thungki ikarsan chaan.”
Audilli plung kngam mih mma' pauna karlaang kcha' rek mmaan avah dii luwt chlamda. Ungta mnit kat ava' thung ngi mii pun kdum mih mmaan avah tpom chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek dopurchuhna' ungta lopkhat tkurthuhna' thung ngi ungta thenpen tkhuina' thung ngi ungta rinkthamna' rek thung ngi knet tih amtlit chlamda.
Ungta mii khimkheiya ningqit tih dim chlamda ungta tamsi rekki tngana' nong rekle' titinna' rek knempok ki tlow lamda.
Ungta lamkrin kcha' rek mkheng avah khadaat tih amsap lamda ungta dow mkheng avah tkurdutsap pih thi chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih msum'alrou rekin ungta mdomna rekin avah jur lam thida mii mkheng hinni mma' mma' ki mdokriinin dilkqowiyi penthem chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mniiktaiyi luwbuk'inn thuh plung khadaat tih am lamda ungta inn inn thah chet lamda thenpen khui lamda ungta plung kngam mih ungta plung kperneem mih chasap lamda.
Mmaan nih Isowr panpaak chlamda ungta mii mkheng tu' plung kor'onsap pih am lamda. Ungta Kruwng ngi mniiktaiyi karsan kcha' rang rek avah lamrinlop ava'leen nih thlolpiik lamda.
'Tunnu Pitar le' Johon avah mutkutna' qhang mphaak thungta rinkthamna' ki mpha thung ngi luwbuk'inn thah hang lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih mqou daat ki mkhuh kyeng ngi kqou kcha' miikhat avah kdom lamda luwbuk'inn ava' thuh kthleng mii rek hinni kthamkqhil chrang ki thenni Ruwngchen kqha mdoditin luwbuk'inn paltong ava' thung ngi topkong lamda.
Mma ngi Pitar le' Johon avah luwbuk'inn thuh kluwt rah kthe mdeh lam thungta thamqhil chlamda.
Ungta Pitar rih mma' avah suwrimda ungta Johon rukku anto' heppi suwda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neenve mheisuwn.”
Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinki dow mruk tarlaan chaak rah mdobin chaak ki mmaanve pauthe avah pqowi chda.
Audilli Pitar rih theda: “Neiya jiipowl le' jiiring khadaat ruk thlowi maang pdainu neiyi kdothlowi avah ahin nih apii nikdi'. Najareth ki Jisu Khrista miing 'leenni irip rang ngi ichet cha'.”
Ungta mma ngi mchang ki mkhut tih mma' avah kyowngda qenpripda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mkhuh le' mkhuh'armik ruh 'leenni ruhtan phang chda.
Ungta mma ngi konchowmda, ripda ungta chetda. Ungta mma ngi, Isowr panpaak chda ungta mmaanve tu' luwbuk'inn thuh luwtsap chda.
Ungta mii mkheng ngi mma ngi chet pchaangda Isowr mdopanpaak chaak avah dei lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah Ruwngchen kqha mdoditin luwbuk'inn paltong ava' thung ngi ko'ongda kthamkqhil kcha' ava' tidit dei lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' 'leenni kthuwk ava'leiyi kdung ngi ngakyou chlamda ungta mningin ngak chda.

Ungta mdopdam chaakin khuhkyeng ava ngi Pitar le' Johon avah kyowngda ma'am arlaan nih, mngajow chaakin leiyi, Solomon inn khulown mdoditin ava' thung ngi mmaanve hinni mii mkheng avah arheichen lamda.

Ungta Pitar rih ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi mii rek hinni hanto' arthaangda: “Isreel mii rek naan nih taluleiyi hava' 'leenni kngak inpti? Mditmata neenve ngi neen kruhtan inni mditmata neenki krin'owi chaak inni hava' mii avah kdopche chaakin heppi neenve avah kmin nih atsut inna?

Ungta naan nih adoparlaan pthi dokin ungta Pilaat tih tapthlatpthi rang ngi plung mdoreel dok Mma' avah naan nih mma' aang ngi adomat chaakin Mma' avah neenki npa'leen ki Isowr, Abraham ki, Aijek ki ungta Jakob ki Isowr ava ngi Mma' Suwk Jisu avah ponlor chda.
Pdainu naan nih Kchiir ungta Kindit khat avah matin tinu ungta miike'eyou khat avah naan athen inni adotperthle piik raan ngei intinu.
Ungta Rinkum ki Mukpu avah eyou intinu pdainu Mma' kat avah Isowr rih perdelda, neenna ava' ki sakhi rek inping.

Ungta Mma' miing ngi ungta Mma' miing 'leenni lamtrin chaak ki naan nih amikin nih adodehn ungta adodeh pinditin mii ava ngi ruhtan havah mdo'arlaan chaak. Ungta Mma' miing 'leenni lamtrin chaak ki naan akhengin a'aang inni mma' hinni chang kanngam mih tadamna' avah mdopiik.
'Tunnu ku'uknau rek naan nih adodeh pindit dokmaan nih havah adotlotin, tidit neiyi kdeh. Anto' heppi naanki luwkqhi rek rukku anto ngi mdotlot dokin.
Pdainu Mma' khulpu mkheng rek nehr thung ngi, Mesaiah avah tyattraanna' kperteel rah, dida mduh thah mdothe dok rek avah Isowr rih hanto ngi mpurtluwm a.
Avaleiyi, naan nih apnu arve rekin adotuknuwl piik dokna' raan ki thenni plung aperthleng chaan ungta Isowr hinni ikerheel chaan. Ava' thung ngi kya karngatna' rah mpha avah Kruwng hinki kurjung rah.
Ungta Mma ngi naan ahin nih mduh thah tparjaam dok Jisu Mesaiah avah arjuk kapthla rah.
Mma ngi alraang ngi Mma' khulpu kenje rek nehr thung ngi mdothe dok heppi, Isowr rih dow mkheng ren nih mdopenletna' mpha ava' mphaakduh khimkheiyi Mmah parvaan thah ka'am chdaat rah.
Mleiya Moses tih npa'leen hinni hanto'theda: ‘Naanki Kruwng Isowr ava ngi naan a'uanau rekin arlak ki nei kehep daat, Khulpu khat kapqhang rah. Naan nih Mma' dothe dow mkheng avah ado'arjaak raan.
Ungta Khulpu ava' dothe karja kma' mii khimkhei avah mii rek hinki kpenvei pthirah.’ (Knl. 18:15,18,19)
Anto'kat tih Samuel ki kupqhun nih mma' dilki khulpu rek mkheng inni hava' nit rek avah mduh thah mdothethut dokin.

Ungta naanna khulpu rekki piipa rekin ptih ungta Isowr rih neen npa'leen hinni pau mdoreel pauqum ava' ki piipa rekin ptih. Mma ngi Abraham hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang arilam rek thung ngi dultipaam thungki mii mkheng avah suwqhat karlaang chrah.’ (Rnp. 22:18, 26:4, 28:14)

Isowr rih Mma' suwk ava' mperdel dok dil lih, naan nih arilin qhatmana' thungki akerheel chaakna' raan ungta suwqhat adotpiik chaakna' raan ki thenni, Isowr rih Mma' avah naan ahin nih rukrirep pih adotapthlat piikin.
Ungta mmaanve ngi mii rek hinni mpau meek sliin arlaan nih thimpu rekle' luwbuk'inn krung raalmii kpupa le' Saddusy rek avah Pitar le' Johon hinni arva lamda.
Tamsi rekki mii rek hinni kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah Jisu ar'aang ngi mdoparjaamin leiyi, kdung ngi muplungin pthit lamda.
Mmaan nih mmaanve avah kyowng lamda pdainu kluh thah mkurthuh leiyi, mmaanve avah rowng'inn thuh mupduknii kpha ki thenni khum pthi lamda.
Pdainu ava' pauna karja kcha' rek meknem mih lam'rin chlamda ungta mmaan avah miichai pun parnga arveel lam.
Ungta mupduknii ngi mmaan ki paamkpu rek, ungta kver rekle' nowlam chukpu rek avah Jerusalem thung ngi kurkuwk lamda.
Ungta thimpu kenreelsi Anna le' Kaiaphas ungta Johon le' Alekjender ungta thimpu kenreel innkhor rek thungki knempok rek avah Jerusalem thung ngi kurbuk lamda.
Mmaan nih mmalai inni mmaanve avah pthuwk lam thida hanto' paukheel kheel lamda: “Naanve ngi talu ruhtan nih mditmata kuw miing ngi havah adotlot inno?”
Audilli Pitar rah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rekki paamkpu rek ungta Isreel rekki kver rek naan nih havah arjaan.
Tuni ngi neen avah, neen nih kyeng kkhowi kcha' miikhat hinni kqhanong tetdet chaak ki mlei kther rah, ungta taluhep pih mma' avah kdam tidit ki mlei kpiik rangin cheentung ngi,

Naan nih ungta Isreel mii mkheng ngi havah adeiyin: Mleiya naan nih adopthowiyown ungta Isowr rih kdiyou thungki mdoperdel Najareth ki Jisu Khrista miing ngi ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi hava' miilai avah naan akhengin a'aang ngi krip daat a.
Mma' avah, ‘Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi innbul lung, Lung kenreel ava' kurthuwk kcha' a.’ (Luw. 118:22)
Tkirliinna' avah morson khatleh thung ngi ka'am pemeh. Mleiya neen tkarsanna' rang ki thenni parvaan kurduh ngi ka'am mii rek arlak ki miing morson khatleh ka'am pemeh.”

'Tunnu mmaan nih Pitar le' Johon plung kngar dei lamda ungta mmaanve avah kurchuk lam pemeh ungta tpurchuh lam pemeh tidit mdehn thungta ngak lamda ungta mmaan nih hava' mii rek avah Jisu tu' arvang ka'am lam tidit dei lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih marlak inni kdam kcha' miikhat ava' krip daat mdodehn leiyi, ava' kepteng ngi dow khatleh the pchaang lam mda.
Pdainu mmaan nih mmaanve avah Senhedrin thungki mthuh dokna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta msingreelin thung ngi hanto' karjaakna' lamda.

Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih hava' mii rek avah talu pirdit chenaan? Mleiya Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mii khimkheiyi mmaan nih ruhtannong klin nih mtlot inna tidit avah mdodeh dokin ungta neen nih avah tmat pchaanin nimeh.
Pdainu mii rek hinni hava' mkoryou porsonmana' rah ungta mmaanve ngi 'tunki kupqhun nih hava' miing 'leenni mpaumana' raan, mmaanve avah ipqitin cheh.”
Audilli mmaan nih mmaanve avah ownpluwt lamda ungta mmaanve avah Jisu miing 'leenni mpau liitmana' raan ungta mdopurchuh mana' raan paupiik pii lamda.
Pdainu Pitar le' Johon nih arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Isowr miksut thung ngu, Isowr pauthe topqowi mow, naan apautheen topqowiyi kqha tidit avah naan adak inni apindit chaan?
Mleiya neen nih kmikin nih kdodehn ungta kdo'arjaakin avah kthe kma' ngi ta'am a pchaang maanring.”

Mmaan nih taluhep pih mmaanve avah mraal suwkthuhna' tpiik rang tidit kthe pchaang kmah ngi kdungset tih ptitlam thida psunpthi lamda. Mleiya mii mkheng ngi kthuwk dok ava'leiyi Isowr avah mdopanpaak chaakin.
Mleiya m'leen nih titinna' thuwkda kdam kcha' miilai avah kum somplii karthak ki mii.
Mapthlat pthiin thungta Pitar le' Johon nih mmii rekin hinni vangkerheel lamda ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rekki mmaanve hinni mdotheen avah vansong lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih plung khadaat tih Isowr hinni krowl kparthaang ngi owng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mukpu, nang nga parvaan le' dultipaam ungta truwnpii ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am mkheng rekki Isowr ptih.
Nang ngi neen K'paan, Asuwk David nehr thung ngi Pthla Kchiir rih hanto' the tinu: ‘Taluleiyi chaat rekki plungthit tih krip lam a, Ungta msit ktaak thung ngi mbinpsuk inna?
Dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekle' paamkpu rekki, Kruwng kepteng ngi ungta Mma' Mesaiah ava' kepteng ngi ripsap lamda?’ (Luw. 2:1-2)
Mleiya mkindit kat tih Nang ngi reidii adopubul dok Asuwk kchiir Jisu kepteng ngi Herod le' Pontas Pilaat tih Chaatktlei rekle' Isreel mii rek tung ngi kurduhsap lamda.
Nang ngi aruhtan nih ungta Aplungbin nih talu ttlot rang tidit mduduh thah adoreel dok heppi ava' ktlow rah mmaan nah kurduh lamda.
Kruwng 'tunnu mmaan dopqit avah asuw ungta Asuwk rekki Apauna avah ningkqiliit kmah ngi atappau chlam.
Mleiya tapdamna' ungta titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek avah Asuwk kchiir Jisu miing ngi ttlot pchaanna' rang ki thenni akhut mhei arjit piik chaan.”
Ungta mmaan nih rinmaktham chaak dokin le' ma'am sapnaan mun avah kunchuwnda. Ungta mmaan avah Pthla Kchiir rih pdim chlamda, ungta mmaan nih ningqit ktaak ki Isowr pauna avah parjaam chlamda.

Ungta lamkrin kcha' rek mmaan mkheng inni plung khat ungta plungrin khadaat tih amsap lamda. Mmaan kuwkhat leh ngi mma ngi mdothlowi dow khatleh rukka mma' mthina ki mdow ngi tai lammeh pdainu dow mkheng avah tkurdutsap pih thlowi lamda.
Ungta tamsi rekki ruhtan klin tu' kilqhi ngi Kruwng Jisu rinkerheelna' ki rinpaumin tpiikna' 'leenni am chlamda ungta mmaan mkhengin 'leenni plungnee avah klin nih amda.

Avaleiyi, mmaan arlak ki kuwkhat leh ruk kikriing ammeh. Mleiya marlak marlak ki lou'inn kthlowi rekki mmaan ki loupaam mditmata innmun rek avah jur chlamda ungta mdojurna' mkhon rek avah arvansin lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek khuhther rih down chlamda. Ungta kikriing kcha' dokriin chaak dilkqowiyi themsap lamda.
Ungta Saipras ki Levi phung thungki Joseph, tamsi rekki Barnabas mdoditin. Npurlu bih mikoksopdei mdoditna'.
Mma ngi loupaam khat thlowida ungta jurda ungta msum avah mma ngi tamsi rek khuhther rih pthla chda.
Pdainu mmiing Anania tidit miikhat tih mnuwn Saphira tung ngi mloupaamin mruk jur chlamda.
Mma ngi mkhon avah mnuwn tu' mdodehsap inni aangqhe qheek chlam thida aangqhe rek avah tamsi rek khuhther rih arheisin chlamda.
Pdainu Pitar rih hanto'theda: “Anania, taluleiyi Pthla Kchiir hinni plei tneena' rah aplung thung ngi Seitan kdim kcha'da, ungta paam adojurnaan mkhon avah athen raanni aangqhe apenqhe pthi a?

Ajurdokduh vah avah nang adow pemeh mow? Ungta ava' ajurdokdil rukku mkhon avah nang akhut thuh ka'am pemeh mow? Taluleiyi nang ngi aplung thung ngi havalu a adobinno? Nang ngi dultimii hinni plei adonee pemeh pdainu Isowr hinni plei anee a.”
Ungta Anania ngi hava' pauna rek avah arja thida tluwda ungta mqutna' mtadaal avah qen chda. Mthungta ava' karja kcha' mii mkheng rek avah kdung ngi mningin qi chda.
Ungta kseetnau rekki rip lamda mma' daksa avah buw ngi klum lam thida vanpthuwk lamda ungta alruwl pthi lamda.
'Tunnu qhang kdum arveel mphaak dilli mnuwn avah arvang luwtda ungta mma' vah talu kthuwk tidit tah deimda.
Ungta Pitar rih arthaangda mhin nih hanto' kheelda: “Athe o, paam avah hanto'daat tih adujurin mow?” Ungta mma ngi: “Ou, anto'daat tih kdojurrin,” dida.

Audilli Pitar rih mhin nih theda: “Taluhep pih naanve ngi Kruwng Pthla Kchiir avah kperteel rang ngi kolrow kchaan ptih o? Asuw, a'innpu kulruwl rek avah karvang kluwt rang ngi thurngutbul lih ka'am daat lam a, mmaan nih nang rukka avankokdom pthuwk lamrah.”

Ungta m'tunkat tih mma ngi mma' khuhther rih tluda ungta mqutna' mtadaal qen chda. Ungta kseetnau rekki marvanluwn thungta mma' avah kdiyou vih dei lamda, ungta vankdom pthuwk lamda mi'innpu beh thah alruwl lamda.
Mthungta lamrinlop avale' ava' karja kcha' mii khimkhei rekki kdung ngi mningin pqit lamda.
Ungta tamsi rek khut thung ngi titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek avah mii rek hinni thuwkda. Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah Solomon innkhulown thung ngi plung khadaat tih amsap lamda.
Mii rekki mmaan avah kparthaang dok ki bin chdaat lam yoso kuwkhat leh ngi mmaan arlak ki tyau chaak rang avah pchaang lam mda.
Ungta lamkrin kcha' rek avah snu ruk psel ruk Kruwng hinni nemthang sesetda.

Avaleiyi, mmaan nih Pitar mthlen thung ngi aangqhe rek 'leenni mirlim daat yoso mtlaakna' rah kkowi rek avah 'lam rek thung ngi pthuwk lamda, ungta mkowm rekin 'leenni ungta kpher rek 'leenni pi'iip lamda.

Ungta Jerusalem kpervel lih ka'am khuw rek thungki mii knempok rekki kurkuwk lamda ungta mmaan nih kkowi rekle' tarnam ktobor rih chii mdopreel rek avah qhi pthuwk lamda ungta mmaan mkheng avah dam chlamda.
Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi ungta mma' tu' ka'am rek mkheng ngi rip lamda. Mmaan avah Saddusy lop rek thungki mii rek lam. Ungta mmaan nah plungthit tih dim chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek 'leenni khut ptla lamda ungta tkurdutsap rowng'inn thung ngi daalpthi lamda.
Pdainu jaan nih Kruwng vaantamsi khat tih rowng'inn thurngut avah pvangda ungta mmaan avah pthuwk pthi lamda.
Ungta hanto'theda: “Vangin ungta luwbuk'inn thung ngi ripin rang ngi mii rek hinni hava' rinkum renki pauna rek avah atheen.”

Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta jiingsun kpanma ngi mmaan nih luwbuk'inn thuh luwt lamda ungta tpurchuh pqhun lamda. Pdainu thimpu kenreelsi le' mma' tu' ka'am mkheng rekki Senhedrin le' Isreel nau rekki kver rek mkheng tung ngi kurtuwlsap lamda ungta rowng'inn ki mmaanve avah klou rah heisi lamda.
Pdainu luwbuk'inn krung ki koprol rek mheitlunin thungta mmaanve avah rowng'inn thuh ka'am dei lam mda, mthungta mmaan nih vangkerheel lamda avah vansong lamda.

Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Dakat tih neen nih rowng'inn avah knet tih tarkammer daat ungta mukrung rek rukka duwn thah thurngutbul lih krip daat lam dei innu. Pdainu neen nih avale' avah kapvanin thungta mthung ngi kuwkhat leh ka'am deimaan nuh.”
'Tunnu thimpu kenreelsi le' luwbuk'inn krung raalmii kpupa le' thimpu kenreel rekki hava'le' avah arja lamda, ungta talu arvang kthuwk rang tidit leiyi, mmaan nah mningin mulda.
Audilli miikhat thlengda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Asuwn! naan nih rowng'inn thuh adokhumin mii rek avah luwbuk'inn thuh rip lamda mii rek mpurchuh meeksli inna.”
Audilli luwkqhi ava ngi luwbuk'inn krung rektu' hang lamda mmaan avah raanqhul lih kthe kmah ngi arjunqhi lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih mii rekki lung ngi mdodeen raan avah mdoqit chaakin.
Ungta mmaan nih murjunqhi dokin dilli Senhedrin, ava' ningqim mih topkong lamda ungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mmaanve hinni paukheel kheel lamda.

Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Hava' miing 'leenni mii rek adopurchuh mana' raan ahinin nih kdung ngi paupiik apii maan ringmow? Ungta asuwn, naan nih tpurchuhna' ava ngi Jerusalem avah pdimin tinu ungta hava' Miilai hava' ki hii buwkna' mraal avah neen k'leenin nih taptlaak rah binin tinu.”
Audilli Pitar le' morson tamsi rekki arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih dultimii dothe topqowi rang hinvah Isowr dothe ava' kdopqowi raan thah tlada.
Neenki npa'leen ki Isowr ava ngi naan nih ding khat 'leenni pthowiyin tih ado'eyown Jisu avah perdelda.

Isowr rih Mma' avah mkenreelsi ungta Miksan khat tih tparthaang chda, Mma' machang thah topkong chda. Mleiya havah Mma ngi Isreel nau rekki plung kerthleng mdohor chaakna' raan ungta Mma ngi mmaan pnu arve rek ava' mdopertleu piik lamna' rang kithen.
Ungta neenna hava' dow rek ava' 'leenni Mma' sakhi rek inping Mma' pauthe kopqowi kcha' rek hinni mdopiik Pthla Kchiir ava' rukku ava' ki sakhi.”
Mmaan nih hava' marjaakin thungta kdung ngi muplungin thida ungta mmaan mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni kerseel lamda.

Audilli Senhedrin ava' thungki Pharisy miikhat mmiing Gamaliel mdodit, mii mkheng ngi mdokyat chaak nowlam chukpu khat tih ripda tamsi rek avah duwn thah mpha mruk ki thenni mdopthuh bongna' raan paupiik khat pii lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Isreel mii rek, naan nih hava' mii rek 'leenni talu ttlot rah abin inna tidit leiyi, aplung aplungin apindit chaan.

Mleiya mpha mruk duh thah Theudas thuwkda, neiya kapchaang khat ping kirdi chda. Mii knempok ki, mii arja plii arveel lih mma' avah qowi chlamda. Mma' avah eyou lamda ungta mma' kopqowi kcha' rek mkheng avah kerjeiter chlamda ungta dow khatleh sichlam meh.

Hava' mii ava' dilli Galily ki Judah avah miichai tikjitna' mpha thung ngi thuwk nowlda ungta mii knempok ki mma'dil kqowiyi qen pthida. Mma' rukka kenvei chda ungta mma'dil kqowi kcha' rek rukka kerjeiter chlamda.

Ungta 'tunnu naan ahin nih kthe a: ‘Hava' mii rek hinki ikekneeng chaan, ungta mthinaan nih amapthiin. Mleiya hava' nongrit ungta nong avah dultimii hinki mkurthuh bih, dow khatleh ksi kma' kurthuwk chrah.
Pdainu hava ngi Isowr hinki mkurthuh bih, naan nih avah penvei pchaang nimaan tih. Ungta naan rukka Isowr ptengda karnaakqhi kurthuwk kcha'ruk krown ptih.”
Ungta mmaan nih mma' dothe avah row chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek avah own lamda ungta bun lam thida mmaan nih Jisu miing 'leenni mpaumana' raan paupiik piilam thida mmaanve avah psunpthi lamda.
Mthungta mmaanve ngi Senhedrin ava' aangki sun chlamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' miing 'leenni ningkya kperteel kcha'ki mtik kcha khat tih mdotai chaak lam leiyi, kanpa chlamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi mniiktaiyi luwbuk'inn thuh ungta inn khimkhei rek thung ngi chet lamda, ungta kmapthi kmah ngi Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit tih purchuk lamda ungta parjaam chlamda.

'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi sikhu rek mkerkheel sesetin thungta marlak inni Grik pau vih kpau Jihudi rekki, Hibriu pau vih kpau Jihudi rek 'leenni kho tkerthena' khat thuwkda. Mleiya nit nit ki thendam mdothemin thung ngi mmaan ki meikhunu rek, avah olson lamda.
Mthungta sowm lei'knii rekki sikhu rek mkheng avah own purkuwk lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih tchaak le' tneek tethemna' leiyi, Isowr pauna avah tmaakpthi row nimeh.

Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rekin, naan nih, naan arlakin ki mdang kqha ungta Pthla Kchiir le' luwkinrit tih kdim miilai tikhiu athlaamin, ungta neen nih mmaan avah hava' nong rek ava' tukksut chrang ngi kchol inni.
Ungta neenna rinkthamna' le' pauna ava' ki nongtlotna' 'leenni kuplungin avah parlaan tlit chnikaandi'.”

Ungta hava' mdotheen ava ngi mii mkheng plung ngam chda. Ungta mmaan nih lamkrin kcha' ungta Pthla Kchiir rih kdim miikhat Stiphen avah kchol lamda ungta Philip, Prokoras, Mikennor, Taimon, Parmenas ungta Antiok ki Jihudi rinko'owi kcha' Nikolas le' rukka kchol lamda.
Mmaan nih mdokchol rekin, mmaan avah tamsi rek aang ngi pthuwk lamda ungta tamsi rekki mmaan 'leenni mkhutin khiing lamda rinktham piik chlamda.
Ungta anto ngi Isowr pauna avah karjaamda ungta Jerusalem thung ngi sikhu rek avah kdung ngi kerkheel setset tih pqhangda. Ungta thimpu rek knempok ki lamrin avah pqowi chlamda.
Ungta lamrin le' ruhtan nih kdim Stiphen nih tngana' nong klinklin rekle' titinna' rek avah mii rek arlak ki tlowda.
Audilli tkolrotmana' khat avah Mii'ol rek Sinegog thungki mii rek hinki thuwkda. Mmaan avah Sairen ki, Alekjendria ki ungta Silisia le' Asia ki Jihudi mii reklam. Mmaan nih Stiphen tu' kerteen lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih Stiphen pauna' luwkinritna' le' Pthlarin ava' kepteng ngi rip pchaang lam mda.
Audilli mmaan nih, “Stiphen nih, Moses le' Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda mpauna' neen nih karjaakin,” dida kthe rah mii aangqhe rek avah siinchaak lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mii rekle' kver rekle' ungta nowlam chukpu rek avah kchap perseeljik lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah pha lamda ungta kyowng lamda mma' avah Senhedrin thung ngi pthuwk lamda.
