Ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih mlangkma' sakhi rek rukka pii lamda, hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi mmun kchiir le' nowlam ava' kepteng ngi pthitda mpau avah down liit meh.’
Mleiya mma ngi, ‘Hava' Najareth ki Jisu ngi hava' mun avah kupkui pthi rah ungta Moses tih neen nihin nih midotparlaan dokin nowpa rek avah kperthleng pthirah,’ mdodit neen nih karjaakin.”
Ungta Senhedrin ava' thung ngi kok'ong mii mkheng ngi mma' avah kmin nih suwsap lamda ungta mmai avah vaantamsi mai hep daat tih dei lamda.
Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi: “Hava' dow rek avah anto' mow,” dida kheelda?

Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek ungta apa'leen, naan nih havah arjaan, n'paan Abraham mih Haran, tidit khuw thuh ma'amduh ngi Mesopotamia paam thuh ma'am thung ngi Konlor ki Isowr ava ngi mma' hinni kperdehda.
Ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi akhuwpaam thungki ungta ari'alam rek hinki ikorlou rang ngi, Neiyi ahin nih adoktedet rang paam ava' thah arva,’ dida. (Rnp. 12:1)

Audilli mma ngi Kaldia mii rek paam ava' thung ki arvangda ungta Haran tidit khuw thung ngi arvan amda. Ungta paam ava' thung ki ngi mpa mdiyow dok dilli, 'tun naan nih a'amna' meekin paam ava' thung ngi Isowr rih mma' avah arvanqhi chda.

Ungta Isowr rih ava' thuh mhin nih alrouchom khatleh piimeh, mkhuh mdothiikna' rang mmun kpha ruk piimeh. Pdainu Abraham mih nau mthlowima arlaan kpha thung ngi Isowr rih mma' hinni ungta mma' dilki mnau msuwn rek hinni paam avah apii nikdi', dida, mhin nih pau reelda.
Isowr rih mma' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang anau asuwn rek avah miipaam thung ngi mal lih ka'am lamrah. Mmaan avah mii rekki suwk'owr rih kthi lam rah ungta kum arja plii thung ngi ko'owr chlam rah.

‘Pdainu mmaan nih suwk mkurthuh chaak naan chaat ava' 'leenni, Neiyi pau pindit nikdi.' (Rnp. 15:14) Ungta ava' dilli, ‘Mmaan nih arvang thuwk lamdon nih Nei avah mmun hava' thung ngi sopmoklow chlam rah,’ (Mpk. 3:12) dida.

Audilli Mma ngi vuntreenna' ki pauqum avah mma' hinni piida. Ungta hanto ngi Abraham mih Aijek pluwda ungta mnii trehtna' nit tih mvun reenda. Ungta Aijek ki Jakob pluwda ungta Jakob pih npu'npa rekin sowm lei'knii rek ava' pluw lamda.
Ungta npu'npa rek inni mdopnerin leiyi, Joseph avah Egypt paam thah jurpthi lamda, pdainu mma' avah Isowr rih korthlowqhi chda.

Ungta msuwkthuhna' mkheng thungki san chda ungta Egypt paamkruwng Pharoah aang ngi plungqhat le' luwkinritna' avah mma' hinni piida. Ungta mma ngi Joseph avah Egypt paam mkheng le' mma' inn rek mkheng ki paamkpu tpurthuhda.
'Tunnu Egypt paam le' Kenaan paam mkheng thung ngi powitham le' suwkthuhna' avah klin nih thuwkda. Ungta mpha ava' thuh npu'npa rekin avah then mdochaak raan thlowi lam mda.
Pdainu mkhatna' thung ngi Jakob pih Egypt paam thah chasowm ka'am tidit marjaak thungta npu'npa rekin avah mma ngi yuksi lamda.
Ungta mveiknitna' thung ngi Joseph pih mu'umnau rek hinni kterdetda ungta Joseph innkhor rek avah Pharoah hinni tkerdehna' arvang thuwkda.
Audilli Joseph pih mpa, Jakob le' mma' rilam rek tidit tah mii somtikhiu leiparnga rek mkheng ava' ko'own rang ngi mmaan avah pthla lamda.
Anto ngi Jakob pih Egypt paam thah yung konthotda ungta ava'thah diyou chda. Ungta mma' tung ngi npu'npa rekin rukka diyou chlamda.
Ungta mmaan avah Sikhem khuw thah puperheel lamda Abraham mih Hamor chapa rek tidit tah Sekhim pa hinni sum mruk piida mdoren chaak paam ava' thung ki thlaan thung ngi pi'iip chlamda.
Pdainu Isowr rih Abraham hinni paureel lih mdothe paureel ki mpha marvannai thungta mii rek avah Egypt paam thung ngi pungpok lamda.
Audilli Joseph kdeipindih kma' paamkruwng khat avah Egypt paam thung ngi pqhangda.
Hava' mii ava ngi neen nchaat rekin avah mmeel kthi ngi yowmpsit chlamda ungta npa'leen avah mmeel kthi ngi owr chlamda. Mmaan nih mnau kdowng rekin avah mdiyow chaakna' rah kvarpthi rah si lamda.
Mpha ava' thung ngi Moses avah qouda, ungta mma' avah kdung ngi Isowr miksut thung ngi qha chdokda. Ungta mma' avah mpa inn thung ngi thla kdum thung ngi yuwk chlamda.
Pdainu mma' avah duwn mupthuh pthiin dilli Pharoah chanu ngi mchapa purthuhda yuwk chda.
Ungta Moses avah Egypt mii rek luwkinritna' thung ngi kurchuk chda ungta mma' avah mpauna' rekle' mnongtlotna' rek thung ngi ruhtan thlowi chda.
Pdainu mma ngi kum somplii mphaak thungta muplung thung ngi mu'umnau rek tidit tah Isreel mii rek kvel rah tche rah bin chda.
Ungta mma ngi marlakin ki khat avah karmak daat tih suwk kthuwk meek mdeh thungta mma ngi suwkkthuwk meek avah pkhaanda ungta phuw lowpiikda ungta Egypt mii avah eyouda.
Mleiya Isowr rih mma' ar'aang ngi mu'umnau rek avah mma' khut tih kaktlan chlam rah tidit avah kdei chlam rah tidit tih mdobin chaak pdainu mmaan nih avah dei lam mda.

Ungta mupduknii ngi miilai 'knii mker'e meekin arlaan nih mma ngi thuwkda, kpalqhat lam rang ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: ‘Mii rekku, naanna unau inptih, taluleiyi khat le' khat kpursulin ptil lih?’ dida.
Pdainu mi'innveen kupsul mma' ava ngi Moses avah kneng pthithida hanto'theda: ‘Kuw ngi nang nga neenve kthenin nih paukpindit rah adotokcholda?
Nang ngi, nei rukka jani ki Egypt mii ado'eyow heppi te'eyow rah atbinna?’ dida. (Mpk. 2:14)
Audilli hava' pau ava ngi Moses avah Media mii rek paam thah malpa ngi mchapa 'knii ma'am kpha thung ngi pa'amda.
Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh ma'amna' kum somplii maklaan dilli Kruwng vaantamsi khat ar'aang ngi Sainai lown behki paamkbiik laiyi ding'arbuw mei kquwng ngi mhin nih kterdetda.
Moses tih ava' mdeh thungta ngakda ungta mma ngi ksuwpindit rang ngi mheinai thungta mma' hinni Kruwng krowl khat arjuda.
Hanto ngi theda: ‘Neiya apa le' ki Isowr ping, Abraham ki Isowr ping, Aijek ki Isowr ping ungta Jakob ki Isowr ping!’ (Mpk. 3:6,15) Mthungta Moses tah kunchuwn chda ungta, suw pchaang mda.
Audilli Kruwng ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Akhuhkok avah akhuh 'leenki aloupthi, Mleiya mmun kchiir thuh krip imptih.

Neiyi Egypt thung ngi Nei kmii rek suwkthuh avah kindit tih kdeh. Neiyi mmaan hesat avah karjaak ungta mmaan ksan chrah, Neiya kurjung ping. 'Tunnu arva, Neiyi nang nga Egypt thah ayusi nih.’ (Mpk. 3:5,7,8,10)

Mmaan nih: ‘Nang nga kuw ngi neen k'leen nih paamkpu ungta paukpindit kurthuwk rah adotsida?’ dilamda. (Mpk. 2:14) Ungta mmaan nih anto ngi the lamda mdoknenin Moses kat avah mma' hinni ding'arbuw thung ngi kekterdet kcha' vaantamsi ar'aang ngi paamkpu ungta kaktlanpiik khat kurthuwk rang ngi Isowr rih Egypt thah yusida.
Mma ngi mmaan avah Egypt paam thung ngi ungta truwnpii ksen thung ngi ungta paamkbiik laiyi kum somplii thung ngi tngana' nong rekle' titinna' nong rek mdotlot tya ava ngi arvanqhi pthuwk lamda.
Mleiya, Isreel nau rek hinni: ‘Kruwng naanki Isowr ava ngi naan a'uanau rekin hinki nei kehep daat, Khulpu khat kperdel rah. Naan nih Mma' pau arja chnaandi',’ dida, kthe Moses ava'.(Knl. 18:15)

Ungta mma' avah paamkbiik laiyi kurtuwl miipii rek arlak ki kyau ungta npa'leen tu' ma'amin thung ngi Sainai lown 'leenni vaantamsi ngi mdokirbiikqhi mma' avah hava'. Ungta mma ngi neen nihin nih midotparlaan chaak raan ki thenni kring pauna avah arlaang chda.
Mma' avah npa'leen nih mma' pau pqowi lam mthida mma' avah kthitna' lamda. Ungta mmaan nih muplungin thung ngu Egypt paam thah kerheel chdok lamda.

Mmaan nih Aaron hinni hanto' the lamda: ‘Neen kthen inni kduh thaan nih kchet rah isowr rek mheiseem piikin. Mleiya Egypt paam thungki Mikqhiin, Moses avah m'leen nih talu kthuwk kcha' a tidit tedeh meh.’ (Mpk. 32:1,23)
Ungta mpha ava' thuh mmaan nih silsuwn khat seem lamda ungta pthla ava' hinni rinparlaan chlamda ungta mmaan nih mkhutin nongtlot rek ava' 'leenni kanpa chlamda.

Audilli Isowr rih mmaan avah kerheel daak lamda ungta mmaan avah kni le' thla ungta bursi rek luwkbu chrang ki thenni mapthi lamda. Hava ngi khulpu rek laika thung ngi mdokjit avah tpurkhumda. Hanto ngi avah mdokjit: ‘Isreel innbung rek! Naan nih kum somplii thung ngi paamkbiik laiyi kihin nih, Downkhaal rek rintparlaanna' le' rintparlaanna' avah kihin nih atpiikin mow?

Naan nih Molek buw'inn chom intinu ungta naanki isowr Remphan ki bursi chom intinu, Ungta adak inni adoseemin dow pthla rek luwbuk intinu. Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan avah Babylon raalpha thah paamsuwk ki asipthi nikaandi',’ dida. (Ams. 5:25-27)
Neen npa'leen nih rinpaumin ki buw'inn avah paamkbiik laiyi mdothlowiyin. Buw'inn avah Mma' dobin heppi Moses hinni mma ngi mmik ki mdodeh chaak dok ava' heppi mdosakna' rah Isowr rih purchukda.

Neen npa'leen nih buw'inn avah suruwl tyatya thung ngi arvansin lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Joshuah tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr rih mmai inni mdorei pthi Chaatktlei rek paam mmaan nih mlow chaakin thung rukku buw'inn avah arvansin lamda. Ungta paam ava' thung ngi David ki mpha kpha thung ngi buw'inn avah arvansin lamda.
Hava' David avah Isowr plungngam karlaang kcha' miikhat ungta mma ngi Jakob ki Isowr ava' amna' rah inn ksa rang ngi qhil chda.
Pdainu Solomon nih Mma' thenni inn avah mdosak.
Anto'daat yoso Kparthaangsi Mma' avah khulpu rek dothe heppi khut tih tsak Mmun Kenjesi thung ngi ka'amlu pemeh.

Khulpu rekki hanto' the lamda: ‘Parvaan avah Neiki kruwng longkhom, Ungta dultipaam avah Nei kukhuhther. Nei kthen nih talu innlu sanadi? dida, Kruwng ngi theda, Mditmata Nei kkarngatna' rah munna tvah rang?
Nei kukhut tih hava' dow mkheng rek avah mdoseem pemeh mow? (Is. 66:1-2)
Mlowl khiingda ka'am ungta muplung le' makna thung ngi vunkreen kma' rek, naan nih mpha ktai thung ngi naanki apa'leen dotlotjik ki tlown tinu Pthla Kchiir avah kthitnaan tinu.

Khulpu rek khadaat rukka apa'leen nih chii mdopreel maan ka'am mow? Mmaan nih Mrinkindit khat ava' arjun rang ava' mduh thah kthe thuh kcha' rek avah eyou lamda. Ungta 'tun naan nih Mma' avah yur chaan tinu ungta a'eyown nah.
Naan avah, vaantamsi rek ar'aang ngi nowlam karlaang kcha' rekin ptih pdainu avah ado'arkhiik chaakin pemeh.”
Mmaan nih hava' dow rekpa ava' marjaakin thungta muplungin thiyou chda ungta mma' 'leenni mahan kriilpsuk lamda.
Pdainu mma' avah Pthla Kchiir rih mdim chaak leiyi, Parvaan thah kmin nih hansuw chda ungta mma ngi Isowr konlorna' ungta Isowr machang ngi Jisu krip daat handeida.
Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Asuwn! Neiyi parvaan kparvangda ungta Mii Chapa avah Isowr machang thah krip daat kahandeh a.”
Audilli mmaan nih krowl kparthaang ngi owng lamda ungta maknaan kvumpthi lam thida mkheng inni plung khadaat tih mma' avah heichenmar lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii duwn thah varpthi lam thida lung ngi deeng lamda. Arlaan nih mmik ki ava' kdei rekki mbuwmdiir avah khowk lam thida kseetnau khat mmiing Saul mdoditin ava' khuhther rih pthla lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Stiphen avah mma ngi Isowr miing own chda, “Kruwng Jisu Nei kapthlarin avah murjuk'arlaan piikcha'” mdit arlaan nih lung ngi deeng lamda.
Audilli mma ngi tirdiil chthida krowl kparthaang ngi owngda, “Kruwng hava' pnu avah mmaan hinni psulna' lamma',” ungta mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli mmah kdiyou vih iip chda.
'Tunnu mma' diyowna' avah Saul rukku mdorot chaak.
Ungta rinko'owi kcha' mii rekki Stiphen avah kdom lamda alruwl chlamda ungta kdung ngi mma' leiyi, archam lou chlamda.
Pdainu Saul vah lamrinlop avah kdung ngi owr chlamda, mma ngi inn khimkhei thung ngi luwtda pselpa rek ungta snu rek rukka qen pthuwk lamda rowng'inn thung ngi mmaan avah daal lamda.
Ungta kerjei kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi mche mchenaan thung ngi kqhapaumin avah parjaam chlamda.
Audilli Philip pih yuda Samaria khuwpii thung ngi mmaan hinni Mesaiah avah parjaam chda.
Ungta miipii rekki mma' dothe arja lamda ungta mma ngi titinna' nong rek mdotlot mdehn thungta mmaan nih Philip pauthe avah plung khadaat tih arja chlamda.
Mleiya tarnam ktobor rek ava ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owng lam thida ava' kthlowi mii knempok rek thungki thuwk chlamda ungta kyengrii ktong rekle' mkhuh kyeng knempok rek avah dam chlamda.
Ungta anto ngi khuwpii ava' thung ngi kdung ngi tkanpatna' khat thuwkda.
Pdainu khuwpii ava' thung ngi mphakhat thung ngi k'dim kurthuwk mmiing Simon tidit miikhat amda. Ungta mma ngi Samaria ki mii rek avah tapngakyou chlamda ungta neiya klin khat ping kdi ngi am chda.
Mma' avah kdilklin mii mkheng ngi, ‘hava' mii ava ngi Isowr ruhtan klin nih mthlowi a,’ dilamda.
Ungta mma ngi k'dim mkurthuhna' ava ngi mpha ksowt thung ngi mdopngajow chaak lam leiyi, mmaan nih mma' avah plung kluwt tih arja chlamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih Philip pih Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mleiyi ungta Jisu Khrista ki miing mdoparjaam ava' lammrin chaakin thungta snu rek rukku ungta psel rek rukku diiluwt chlamda.

Audilli Simon mdakkat rukku lam'rin chda. Ungta mma ngi dii mluw chaak dok thungta mma ngi Philip tu' kilqhi tlit chda. Ungta tngajow chaakna' nong klin rekle' titinna' rek mdotlot mdeh thungta mmah ngak chda.
Ungta Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am tamsi rekki Samaria ki mii rekki, Isowr pau avah marlaan chaak inna, tidit marjaakin thungta Pitar le' Johon avah mmaan hinni yupthla lamda.
Mmaanve ngi myuphaakin thungta mmaan nih Pthla Kchiir mdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni rinktham piik chlamda.
Mleiya mmaan kuwkhat leh 'leenni Pthla Kchiir avah arjunqum mlai. Mmaan nih Kruwng Jisu miing 'leenni diluwna' chreldaat mdo'arlaan chaakin.
Audilli mmaan nih m'leenin nih mkhutin khiinpiik lamda ungta mmaan nih Pthla Kchiir avah arlaang chlamda.
'Tunnu Simon nih tamsi rekki m'leen mkhut mdokhiin inni Pthla Kchiir avah kurjung tidit mdeh thungta mma ngi mmaan hinni sum'alrou kparlaan chrah theda.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi kuwku yoso m'leen nih kukhut kkhiin chaak thung ngi Pthla Kchiir mdo'arlaan chaakna' rah hava' ruhtan avah nei kihin nih mheipii cha.
Pdainu Pitar rih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang asum avah nang adak tu' kenvei chso! Mleiya nang ngi Isowr chla avah sum'alrou vih tren pchaan rah tidit tih abin a.
Hava' nong thung ngi nang athen rah mditmata atum rah ammeh. Mleiya nang aplung avah Isowr miksut thung ngi kindit tih ammeh.
Avaleiyi, nang ngi plung aperthleng cha' mleiya Isowr rih aplungbin avah akoptlot piik daat ruk krow.
Mleiya nang nga kkha barrih kdim kcha' imptih ungta nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi akorbowl chaak avah kdeh a.”
Audilli Simon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adothe dow rek avah k'leen nih khadaat ruk mthuhmana' rah, nei kthen nih Kruwng hinni rinmheiktham piikcha',” dida.

Anto ngi mmaan nih kqha deek ki rinpaumin pii lamda ungta Isowr pauna avah mparjaam dokin thungta kanpa ngi Jerusalem thah arhung kerheel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Samaria ki khuw knempok rek thung ngi kqhapaumin avah parjaam chlamda.
'Tunnu Kruwng vaantamsi khat tih Philip hinni hanto'theda: “Jerusalem ki ngi Gaja tphaakna' paamkbiik laiki 'lampii, kurduh ktong ki 'lampii thah irip rang ngi yu.”

Mthungta mma ngi ripda ava'thah yuda. Ungta asuwn, Ethiopia ki mii, dakkpirdiin dok kcha' miikhat Ethiopia ki paamkruwngnu kurduh ngi ruhtanna' klin nih ksin miikenreel ungta msum'inn mkheng ngi mdopsin miikhat avah Jerusalem thah luwkbu chrah arhangda.
Ungta 'tunnu mma' avah tolai 'leenni ko'ongda jungkerheel meekda ungta mma ngi khulpu Isaiah laika avah parchamda chda.
Audilli Pthla ava ngi Philip hinni hanto'theda: “Wva' tolai beh thah varah heipha.”
Mthungta Philip pih mma' hinni heichenda ungta mma ngi khulpu Isaiah laika mdoparcham meek avah arjada ungta mma ngi mhin nih, ‘nang ngi adoparcham avah adehpindit a,’ dida, kheelda?
Ungta mma ngi, ‘kuwmiikhat tih mtethepiikma bih, taluhep pih deipindih nikli,’ dida? Ungta mma ngi Philip avah mma' tu' kok'ongve rang ngi kheel chda.

Mma ngi mdoparcham chaak Kchiir laika avah hava': “Mma' avah yau khat heppi te'eyowna' mun thah qhi lamda. Ungta yausuwn nih mmul kikchippa aang ngi rimkdi ma'am chaak heppi, Mma' ngi Mnehr avah pvang meh.
Mma' mdoyowm mdopsit chaak naan ava' thung ngi, Mma' kinditna' avah loupthida. Ungta Mma' rilam avah kuw ngi kpandang rang. Mleiya Mma' rinkum avah dultipaam thungki mdolow pthi dokin.” (Is. 53:7-8)

Mthungta dakkpirdiin dok kcha' ava ngi Philip hinni arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi akkheel chaak a, khulpu ava ngi havah kuw leiyi, mdothe o, mdakkat leiyi, mdothe chaak mow, mditmata ktlok morson khat leiyi, mdothe o?”
Audilli Philip pih tpau pqhunda, hava' Kchiir laika ava' thung ngi pqhunda mma' hinni Jisu ki kqhapaumin avah parjaam chda.

'Tunnu mmaanve ngi anto ngi 'lampii qowi lamda myukin thungta dii mruk amna' munkhat pha lamda. Ungta dakkpirdiin kcha' dok mii ava ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw o, hava' thung ngi dii ka'am a, dii kluw chaak daat a talu karmak rangplih?”
Audilli Philip pih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi aplungril mkheng ngi lam'arin chaak bih, adotlot krow.” Ungta mma ngi arthaangda hanto'theda: “Neiyi Jisu Khrista avah Isowr Chapa tidit lamkrin chaak a.”
Mthungta mma ngi tolai avah mdoprina' rah paupiik piida ungta Philip le' dakkpirdiin kcha' dok mma' avah dii thung ngi yunqumve lamda ungta Philip pih mma' avah diipluwt chda.

'Tunnu mmaanve ngi dii thungki murhunkalin thungta Kruwng Pthla ava ngi Philip pah arjuklou chda. Mthungta dakkpirdiin kcha' dok mma' ava ngi mmah deiporson mda, ungta mmah anto ngi kanpa ngi yungsun chda.
Pdainu Philip avah Ayotas paam thah thuwkda, ungta mma ngi Sijaria mphaakduh kpha ngi mche mchena' khuwpii rek mkheng thung ngi kqhapaumin avah parjaam chda.
Audilli Saul lih Kruwng sikhu rek ava' kepteng ngi tipqit rah ungta te'eyow rah kbinsli daat tih thimpu kenreelsi ava' hinni hangda.

Ungta mma' hinni Damaskas thungki Sinegog hinni tikjit paukjit rek, tidit tah mma ngi kuwku yoso 'Lam ava' kqowi kcha' mkurdutqhi thung ngi snu rek yoso mditmata pselpa rek yoso, mma ngi bowl lamdon nih Jerusalem thah mdo'arhunqhi lamna' rah qhil chda.
Ungta mma ngi anto ngi myuk thungta Damaskas beh yukphada. Ungta mdobin phaak liitma ngi parvaan ki mar'aang khat tih mma' 'leenni lengda.
Mthungta mmah dulti thah tlu chda. Ungta mma ngi mma' hinni krowl khat tih hanto ngi mdothe arjada: “Saul, Saul, taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya chii atepreel a?”
Ungta mma ngi, “Nang nga kuw ptih, Kruwng?” dida. Ungta Kruwng ngi, “Neiya nang ngi chii adopreel meek Jisu ping. Thiirsi kchung rek ptengda tpirthit tah nang athennu kparsa rah,” dida.

Mthungta mma ngi, kunchuwn chda ungta mning mnga chaak chunni hanto'theda: “Kruwng neiyi talu kdotlot rah adongei pli?” Mthungta Kruwng ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Ikerdel, ungta khuwpii thah vah, ungta nang ngi talu tlowna' tidit avah akthepiik rah.”
Ungta mma' tu' kchetsap mii rek avah, mmaan nih krowl khat tah arja lamda pdainu kuwkhat leh mdodehmaan leiyi, kpau kmah ngi rip chlamda.
Audilli Saul lih dulti ki hangripda pdainu mma ngi mmik mpahar thungta dow khatleh deimda. Mthungta mmaan nih mkhut thah kyowng lamda, vanqhi lamda ungta ungta Damaskas paphaak lamda.
Ungta mma ngi niikdum thung ngi khudei meh ungta tchaak ruk chameh ungta teneek ruk nee meh.
'Tunnu Damaskas thung ngi mmiing Anania tidit sikhu khat ka'am, Mma' hinni Kruwng ngi rinmer khat tih hanto'theda: “Anania,” dida, ownda, ungta mma ngi, ‘ka'am daat imping Kruwng,’ dida.

Mthungta Kruwng ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Irip rang ngi 'lam kirji tidit ava'thah vah, ungta Judah inn thung ngi mmiing Tarsas ki Saul tidit miikhat avah athlaam, mleiya asuw, mmah rinktham chda ka'am daat a.”
Ungta mma ngi mrinmer rih mmiing Anania tidit miikhat tih mhin nih thlengdon ungta mma ngi khu mdodeh chaakna' rah m'leen nih mkhut mdothiik piik mdeh a.
Audilli Anania ngi hanto' arthaangda: “Kruwng hava' miilai ava ngi Jerusalem thung ngi, Nang amii kenje rek 'leenni kqha kma' tya knem mih mtlot tidit avah neiyi mii knempok hinki kdo'arjaak dok.
Ungta hava' thung rukku mma ngi, Nang amiing ko'own kcha' rek mkheng ava' tbowlna' rang ki thenni ruhtanna' avah thimpu kenreel rek hinki sinda kurju,” dida.
Pdainu Kruwng ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Vah, mleiya mma' avah Chaatktlei rek, paamkruwng rek ungta Isreel nau rek aang ngi, Nei kmiing kpandang rang ki thenni kdokchol dok miikhat.
Mleiya Neiyi, Nei kmiing leiyi, mma ngi tyatna' dow rek avah tya knem mih kperteel rang tidit avah pdeh nikdi'.”

Audilli Anania ngi anto' vada inn ava' thuh luwtda m'leen nih mkhut thiikpiik thida hanto'theda: “Ku'uknau Saul nang ngi arhei thung ngi 'lam thuh ahin nih akperdeh, Kruwng Jisu ngi, nang ngi khu adodeh chaakna' rah ungta Pthla Kchiir rih adim chaakna' rah ahin nih neiya mdoheitsi.”
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmik 'leenki tuwlvah klip rek hep daat tih tlada ungta mma ngi khu deiteng chda. Ungta mma ngi kerdelda dii luwt chda.
Ungta mma ngi then mchaak chaak dilli mruh tang chda.
Kbeisek ki mma ngi Sinegog rek thung ngi Mesaiah avah Isowr Chapa ava' tidit parjaam chda.

Mthungta ava' karja mii mkheng rekki mningin ngakda mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii avah Jerusalem thung ngi hava' miing ktham kcha' mii rek kpenvei ungta hava' Damaskas thung rukku ava' ktlow rang ngi tidit tah mma ngi mii rek avah bowl lamdon nih thimpu kenreel rek hinni kqhi rang ki thenni kurju ava' pemeh mow?”
Pdainu Saul avah nitnit ki mruh tang setsetda. Ungta mma ngi Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit mdopandan leiyi, Damaskas thuh ka'am Jihudi rekka mningin tupmulda.
'Tunnu mpha mvansopok dilli Jihudi rekki mma' avah ke'eyou rang ngi kerseel lamda.
Pdainu mmaan kerseel avah Saul hinni kandang chda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' ke'eyou rang ngi suwng rek avah suwn le' jaan nih sutpqowi lamda.
Audilli sikhu rekki mma' avah lou lamda bowr klinpa khat thung ngi daal lam thida rowngbang duwn thah yukptla lamda.

Ungta Saul lih Jerusalem thah murhun dok dilli mma ngi sikhu rek arlak ki myau chaakna' rah tlowda. Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni mma' avah qi chlamda mleiya mma' avah sikhu khat tidit tih lammdorin chaakin pemeh.

Pdainu Barnabas tih mma' avah qhida tamsi rek paphaakda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni taluhep pih Saul lih lam thung ngi Kruwng avah mkurdutqhi chaak ungta Kruwng ngi Mma' hinni taluhep pih kpau ungta mma ngi ningqit ktaak ki Damaskas thung ngi Jisu miing avah mparjaam chaak tidit rek avah purphuwng chda.
Audilli mma ngi mmaan tu' amsap lamda Jerusalem thung ngi mmaan arlak ki chettlowng chda.
Ungta mma ngi mningqit ktaak ki Kruwng Jisu miing 'leenni pau chda ungta Grik pau vih kpau Jihudi rek tung ngi kirbi lamda ungta kerteenna' lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah ke'eyou rah the lamda.
Pdainu unau rek, ava' mdehn thungta mmaan nih Sijaria thah yukqhi dok lamda ungta Tarsas thah psunpthi dok lamda.

Hanto ngi, Judia le' Galily ungta Samaria paam mkheng thungki lamrinlop rek mkheng thung ngi plung kdai amda ungta pqhang chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Kruwng kqi ngi mche chaak inni ungta Pthla Kchiir ava ngi plungngam mdopiik chaak inni mmaan avah nemthang seset chlamda.
'Tunnu Pitar rih khuwpaam mkheng thung ngi mche chaak thungta mma ngi Lydda thuh ka'am kcha' miikenje rek amna' avah phakhotda.
Mun ava' thung ngi Anias tidit miikhat avah kurdut qhida, mma' avah kum treht thung ngi kowm nangda kowida ungta kyengrii tongda ka'am kcha'.
Ungta Pitar rih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Anias Khrista Jisu ngi nang nga atapdam a, Ikerdel ungta akowm apenseen dok.” Audilli m'tunkat daat tih mmah kerdelda.
Mthungta Lydda le' Sharon thung ngi ka'am rek mkheng ava ngi mma' avah mmikin nih dei lamda ungta Kruwng hinni kerheel chlamda.
Ungta Joppa thung ngi mmiing Tabitha tidit, npurlu thung ngi Dorkas mdodit sikhu khat ka'am. Hava' snu ava ngi kqhanong ungta tpiik chaakna' nong rek knempok ki tlow chda.
Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi mma' avah kowida ungta diyou chda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah alqhuh dok lam thida karthak ki innkhaar ava'thang ngi pi'iip lamda.

Ungta Lydda avah Joppa thungki vah mnaitek leiyi, sikhu rekki Pitar ava' thuh ka'am avah arja lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mii 'knii heipthla lamda, Pitar avah kbeisek ki mmaan mdo'arhei phaak lamna' rah ko'own rah heisi lamda.

Audilli Pitar rih ripda mmaan tu' arvangsap lamda. Ungta mma' merheitlun dok thungta mmaan nih mma' avah karthak ki innkhaar thah hanqhi lamda. Ungta meikhunu rekki Dorkas tih mmaan tu' mrin thung ngi mdo'arkhown buwtluwn rekle' dona rek avah mma' hinni tedet lamda.

Pdainu Pitar rih mmaan mkheng avah duwn thah pthuwk pthi lamda ungta mma ngi tirdiilda rinktham chda. Ungta mma ngi kluwng ava' ktong thah kerheel thida hanto'theda: “Tabitha ikerdel,” dida. Ungta mma ngi mmik pahar chda ungta Pitar mdeh thungta kerdelda ko'ongda.
Audilli mma ngi mkhut piida ungta mma' avah qenpripda. Ungta mma ngi miikenje rekle' meikhunu rek avah mo'own purkuw lam dilli mmaan hinni Dorkas avah kring ngi parlaan chlamda.
Ungta avah Joppa kirkhildek ki karjaamda ungta mii knempok ki Kruwng hinni lam'rin chlamda.
Mthungta mma ngi nit knempok ki Joppa thung ngi saavun kparnaal Simon tu' amve lamda.
Sijaria khuwpii thung ngi Italy raalmiilop mdoditin ava' thung ngi mmiing Kornelias mdoditin, raalmii arja khat kpupa khat ka'am.

Mma' mdak le' mi'innmii rek mkheng avah rinko'owi kcha' ungta Isowr kqi kcha' mii reklam. Mma ngi plung kertleu deek ki tpiik chaakna' nong avah tlow chda. Ungta mpha ktai thung ngi Isowr hinni rinkaktham kcha'lu.
Niikhat tih, mutkutna' qhang, tidit tah kluh ki qhang kdum arveel lih mma ngi rinmer khat kindit tih deida, Mleiya Isowr vaantamsi khat tih mma' hinni thlengda, “Kornelias,” dida, ownda.

Ungta mma ngi mma' avah kmin nih msutrim thungta mningqida ungta mma ngi, ‘taluda Kruwng?’ dida. Mthungta mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang arinktham chaak rekle' tpiik chaakna' nong rek adotlot avah Isowr aang ngi tbinphaakna' khat tih arhang ktlung a.
'Tunnu nang ngi Joppa thah Pitar mdodit Simon ava' ko'own rah mii heipthla.
Mma' avah truwnpii biing ngi mi'inn ka'am saavun kparnaal Simon hinni kcheengda ka'am daat. Mma ngi nang ngi talu tlownadi', tidit avah akthepiik rah.”
Ungta mma' hinni kpau vaantamsi ava' msun dok dilli Kornelias tih mi'inn thungki suwk 'knii rekle' mpha ktai thung ngi mma' karda tlit kchok rek arlak ki rinko'owi kcha' raalmii khat avah ownda.
Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek mkheng avah mmaan hinni mthepindit piik doklam dilli Joppa thah heisi lamda.
Mupduknii ngi mmaan ava ngi anto' valamda khuwpii mheiphaak tiing tiingin arlaan nih Pitar rih mutrukna' qhang tidit tah qhang sowm lei'knii arveel lih inntun thah rinkaktham chrah hangkalda.
Audilli mmah kdung ngi mpowi thamda then tchaak rah binda. Pdainu mmaan nih von mtlot meek sliin arlaan nih mmah mrinnow kerthlengda?
Ungta mma ngi, dowphel klinpa hep daat khat, mirkil plii thung ngi tbowl khat avah mma' hinni parvaan ki ngi arjuda dulti thah arjuptlada.
Ungta ava' thung ngi dultipaam thungki mdetmdet ki mkhuh pliipum downkhaal rek nowmsaa rek, mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek ungta parvaan laiyi kyuwng pva rek mkheng avah kurkhumjik ki ka'am.
Ungta mma' hinni krowl khat kurju ava ngi hanto'theda: “Pitar, ikerdel, a'eyou rang ngi havah acha.”
Pdainu, Pitar rih theda: “Kruwng anto' pemeh! Neiya kchiir kma' ungta kertleu kma' dow khatleh kcha pmaang.”
Ungta krowl ava ngi mhin nih mveiknitna' theda: “Isowr rih mdopertleu dok avah nang ngi kchiir kma' dida, louma'.”
Ungta hava' avah veikdum thung ngi tlowda ungta dow avah veikhat parvaan thah arjuklou chda.
'Tunnu Pitar rih mrinmer thung ngi mdodeh avah talu ninglei rang tidit leiyi, ngakda ma'am arlaan nih asuwn, Kornelias tih mdosi mii rek ava ngi Simon inn kthlaam mih paltong thung ngi ripdaat lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih arhei'owng lamda Pitar mdodit Simon avah hava' thuh kekcheeng mowi, tidit kheel chlamda.
Pitar rih rinmer ava'leiyi binda ma'am arlaan nih Pthla ava ngi mhin nih theda: “Asuw, miilai kdum rekki atthlaam lam a.
Avaleiyi, rip rang ngi junqum ungta mmaan aqowi lam, dow khatleh kelqen nih binma' mleiya mmaan avah neiyi kdopthlat lam.
Audilli Pitar rih junqumda Kornelias hinki ngi mma' hinni mdo'arjuk pthlat mii rek avah junpha lamda ungta naan nih adothlaamin avah, nei ping, talu rang ki thenni naanna karvaanpti,” dida?

Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Raalmii arja khat kpupa Kornelias hinki karvaan ping. Mma' avah mrinkindit ungta Isowr kqi kcha' ungta Jihudi chaat mkheng rek arlak ki mdang kqha miikhat. Mleiya mma ngi nang ahinki pauna rek mdo'arjaak chaakna' rah kchiir vaantamsi khat tih, mi'inn thah nang adoto'own chaakna' rah mhin nih thepiikda.”
Audilli mma ngi mmaan avah arlaang chlamda ungta ptlung chlamda.
Ungta mupduknii ngi mmaan nih Sijaria khuw avah pha lamda. 'Tunnu Kornelias tih mu'umnau rekle' maplap kurthuhqhi kat rek avah own purkuwk lamda ungta mmaan avah arda chlamda.
Ungta Pitar marvanluw thungta Kornelias tih mma' avah kurdutqhi chda ungta mkhuhther rih tluwda luwbuk chda.
Pdainu Pitar rih mma' avah phong thida hanto'theda: “Irip dok, nei rukka nang ahep daat miilai ping.”
Ungta mma ngi mma' tu' pau msaamin chunni marvanluwn thungta mma ngi mii knempok ki kurtuwlda ka'am ava' deida.

Audilli mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Jihudi miikhat tih chaat morson khat tu' kilqhi mditmata mi'inn thuh kluwt avah mnowpa pemeh tidit adodehn. Pdainu Isowr rih, neiyi kuwkhat leh hinni kchiir kma' mditmata kertleu kma' kdodit mana' rah kihin nih mepdeh chda.
Avaleiyi, neiyi mko'own rah merhei daatin le' kmat kmah kdoqowi chaak daat lam. 'Tunnu akkheel chaak a, taluleiyi nang ngi neiya adoto'own chaak plih?”

Ungta Kornelias tih hanto'theda: “Nii plii a kthleng dok a, neiyi hava' 'tunki mpha kpha thung ngi then ngowl nuh ungta mutkutna' qhang, tidit tah kluh ki qhang kdum, ava' thung ngi neiyi ki'inn thung ngi rinktham chnuh. Ungta ava' thung ngi asuw, buwdiir kepleu dang kihilkna miikhat avah kmaisuk ki ripda.
Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Kornelias, nang arinkthamna' rek avah atarjaak piik dok a. Ungta nang ngi tpiik chaakna' nong adotlot rek avah Isowr rih atbinphaak piik a.

Avaleiyi, nang ngi Pitar mdodit Simon ava' ko'own rah Joppa thah mii apthlalam, mma' avah truwnpii hinni ka'am, saavun kparnaal Simon inn thung ngi ka'am daat. Ungta mma ngi thleng donni ahin nih paukthe rah.’ dida.

Avaleiyi, neiyi kbeisek ki mmaan avah nang ahin nih kdopthlat chaak lam, ungta nang athlen khot avah kqha a. Avaleiyi, 'tunnu neen kekheng inni Isowr rih nang ahin nih paupiik adotpiik chaak mkheng ava' karja chrang ngi Isowr aang ngi kurtuwl kchaan ping.”
Audilli Pitar rih mnehr pvangda tpau pqhunda hanto'theda: “Isowr rah mikmai suw meh tidit avah mkindit kat tidit neiyi kdeh chaak a.
Pdainu chaat khimkhei thung ngi Mma' kqi kcha' ungta mrinkindit tih nong ktlow kcha' rek avah Mma ngi mrotpiik lam a.
Isreel nau rek hinni Isowr rih mdopthlat pauna avah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi plung kdai tparjaam ava'. Mma' avah mkheng ki Kruwng.
Hava' pauna avah naan nih adodeh dokin. Pauna havah Judia paamkuwl mkheng thuh ungta Galily ki kupqhun nih, diiluwna' ava' dilli Johon nih mdoparjaam avah hava'.

Mleiya taluhep pih Isowr rih Najareth ki Jisu avah Pthla Kchiir rih ungta ruhtanna' ava ngi reidii avah pubulda. Ungta taluhep pih, Mma ngi chetda kqhanong tlowda ungta tarnampii ngi suwk mdopthuh mkheng rek avah mdopdam mow? Mleiya havah, Isowr rah Mma' tu' mkilqhi lei.
Ungta neenna, mmaan nih ding 'leenni pthowi lamda mdo'eyown Mma' ava ngi Jihudi rek paam thuh ungta Jerusalem thung ngi mdotlot dow mkheng rek ava' ki sakhi rek inping.
Mma' avah Isowr rih mnii kdumna' thung ngi perdelda ungta mdotedetna' rang ki thenni Mma' avah pandangda.

Ungta mii mkheng rek hin pemeh pdainu Isowr rih mduh thah mdokchol dok ksa sakhi rek neen kihinin daat. Ungta dakat tih Mma ngi kdiyou thungki mrinkerheel dilli neen kihin nih kandangda Mma' tu' chasap, neesap innu.

Ungta Mma ngi neen kihin nih, mii rek hinni tparjaamna' rah ungta Mma' avah Isowr rih kring le' kdiyou rekki paukpinditpa rang ngi mdokchol chaak dok ava' tidit ki rinpaumin tpiikna' rah paupiik mpiinda.
Khulpu rek mkheng ngi Mma' leiyi, sakhi mpiikin, tidit tah Mma' miing 'leenni Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek khimkheiyi pnu rek toptlot piikna' karlaang chlam rah.”
Pitar rih hava' pauna rek ava' msaam meeksli arlaan nih Pthla Kchiir avah pauna ava' karja kcha' rek mkheng 'leenni arjungda.
Ungta Pitar tu' kilqhi lamkrin kcha' vunkreen rek ava ngi Chaatktlei rek 'leen rukku Pthla Kchiir mdo'arjukptlon leiyi, mningin ngakyou chda.
Mleiya mmaan nih pau ktleiyi pau lamda ungta Isowr avah ponlor chlamda. Audilli Pitar rih arthaang lamda.
“Kuwmiikhat tih, neen nih tarlaan chaakin heppi Pthla Kchiir karlaang kcha' hava' mii rekki dii mluw raan krow kma' ka'am ngaalin mow?”
Ungta mma ngi mmaan avah Kruwng miing 'leenni dii mdopluwna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Pitar hinni mmaan nih nit mruk mmaan tu' ma'amna' raan kheel chlamda.
'Tunnu Judia thuh ka'am tamsi rekle' unau rekki Chaatktlei rek rukku Isowr pauna avah marlaan chaak inna tidit avah arja lamda.
Ungta Pitar rih Jerusalem thah murhun thungta lamkrin kcha' vunkreen rekki mma' avah kerteenqhi lamda.
Mmaan nih mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga vunkreen kma' rek hinni chet tinu ungta mmaan tu' then chasap intinu!”
Pdainu Pitar rih mmaan hinni mbul ki kupqhun nih hanto'theda, thepindit piik lamda:

“Neiyi Joppa khuw thung ngi amnu ungta rinktham chnuh. Ungta neiyi krinnow mkerthlen thung ngi rinmer khat deinu. Dowphel klinpa hep daat khat avah mirkil plii thang ngi kyowngda turjukptlaak heppi parvaan ki ngi arjung tlada ungta avah nei kihin nih arjuda.

Ungta neiyi kmin nih avah suwnu ksutpindit thungta neiyi dultipaam thungki mdetmdet ki mkhuh pliipum downkhaal rek ungta nowmsaa rek, mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek ungta parvaanlai ki pva rek mkheng avah deinu.
Ungta neiyi krowl khat tih, ‘Pitar ikerdel rang ngi hava'le' avah a'eyou rang ngi acha,’ mdodit arjanu.
Pdainu neiyi: ‘Anto' pemeh Kruwng! Mleiya neiya teden rukku kchiir kma' ungta kertleu kma' dow khatleh knehr thuh luwtmlai,’ dinuh.
Pdainu krowl ava ngi parvaan ki ngi veikhat marthaang nowlda hanto'theda: ‘Isowr rih mdopertleu dok avah nang ngi kchiir kma' dida louma'.’
Ungta anto ngi avah veikdumtet thung ngi tlow thida, ava' mkheng rek avah parvaan thah veikhat arjukqen dok chda.
Mpha ava'kat thung ngi Sijaria ki mdo'arhei pthlatin miilai kdum rek avah nei ka'amna' inn maiyi ripdaat lamda.
Audilli Pthla ava ngi mmaan tu' plungkelqen ktaak ki mdilin aqowi lam mdida. Ava' han'tun nih unau rek miilai truk ki neiya mqowi chlamda ungta neen nih mii ava' inn thung ngi luwt innu.
Ungta mma ngi, mi'inn thuh vaantamsi mdodehna' avah kihin nih songda tidit tah vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih, ‘Joppa thah mii heipthla rang ngi mmiing Pitar tidit Simon avah hei'own.
Ungta mma ngi nang ruk ungta a'inn thuh ka'am rek rukka akarsan chaakna' raan pau akthepiik raan,’ ditpiikda.
Ungta neiyi mmaan hinni tpau kupqhun thungta mupqhunthok thung ngi neen n'leenin ki heppi Pthla Kchiir avah mmaan 'leenni arjuda.
Audilli neiyi, Kruwng ngi, ‘Dakat tih Johon vah diisik ki dii mdopluw pdainu naanna Pthla Kchiir rih dii akupluwt raan,’ dida, mdothe pauna avah binphaak nuh.
Avaleiyi, neen nih Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni lamnrin chaakin thung ngi midotpiikin chla avah Isowr rih mmaan hinni mpiik arlaan nih Isowr krisan pchaang rang neiya kuw ping lih?”

Mmaan nih hava' dow rek ava' marjaakin thungta kdairim mih am chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Mdit bih, Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek hin rukku rinkum tarlaanna' rah plung tperthlen chaakna' avah mpiik chaak lam a,” dilamda. Isowr avah ponlor chlamda.

'Tunnu Stiphen chiireelna' dilli kerjei dok kcha' rek ava ngi Phininsia paamkuwl Saipras diiloipaam ungta Antiok khuwpii kpha thung ngi chet lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kqhapaumin avah kuw morson khatleh hin kma' Jihudi rek hindaat tih parjaam chlamda.
Anto'daat yoso Saipras diiloipaam le' Sairen paamkuwl ki mii aangqhe rekki mmaan nih Antiok mphaakin thung ngi Grik pau vih kpau Jihudi rek hin rukku Kruwng Jisu avah parjaam chlamda.
Ungta Kruwng ruhtan avah mmaan hinni amda ungta miichai knempok ki lam'rin chlamda ungta Kruwng hinni kerheel chlamda.
Audilli hava' dow rekki pau rek avah Jerusalem thungki lamrinlop kna tlungda. Mthungta mmaan nih Barnabas avah Antiok kpha kchet rang ngi pthla lamda.

Ungta mma ngi tlungda ungta Isowr plungnee ava' mdeh chaak thungta kanpa chda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan avah muplungbinrit intu' kilqhi ngi Kruwng hinni ma'am tlit chaakna' raanni mmaan mkhengin avah ksop chlamda.
Mleiya mma' avah Pthla Kchiir rih ungta lamrin nih kdim miikqha khat. Ungta ava' thung ngi miipii rek knempok avah Kruwng hinni thlolpom chlamda.
Audilli Barnabas avah Saul kthlaam rang ngi Tarsas thah sun chda.

Ungta mma ngi mkurdutqhi chaak dilli mma' avah Antiok thah arvan qhida. Mthungta anto ngi mmaan nih lamrinlop ava' tu' kum khat thung ngi am lamda kurtuwlsap kchok lamda. Ungta mmaan nih miipii knempok rek avah purchuk chlamda. Ungta rukrirep pih Antiok thung ngi sikhu rek avah Khristen tidit miing phuwk chlamda.
Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi khulpu rek aangqhe avah Jerusalem ki ngi Antiok thah arjung lamda.

Audilli marlakin ki mmiing Agabas mdoditin ava ngi ripda Pthla ar'aang ngi, ‘dultipaam mkheng thung ngi powitham kthuwk bei rah,’ dida, purphuwng chda. Ungta avah Klaudias Siijar ki mpha thung ngi thuwkda.
Audilli sikhu rek ava ngi mma' mma' ki mdopchaan chaak dilkqowiyi Judia paam thuh ka'am unau rek hinni tbom chaakna' tapthlat rah kdi ngi rip lamda.
Mmaan nih havah tlow lamda ungta Barnabas le' Saul khut thung ngi pii lamda, kver rek hinni hanpthla lamda.
'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi paamkruwng Herod tih lamrinlop thungki mii aangqhe rek ko'owr chrang ngi mkhut khiingda.
Ungta mma ngi Johon naupa James avah raal'kaang ngi eyouda.
Ungta mma ngi, ava ngi Jihudi rek plung kngam mdodeh leiyi, mma ngi Pitar rukka mdokyownna' rah m'lam thlaamda. 'Tunnu mpha avah Thowl ktaak Thenpen ki Nit rek thung ngi kthuwk.

Mthungta mma ngi Pitar avah kyowngda. Ungta mma ngi Taplaanna' ava' maklaan dilli mii rek hinni mdopthuh nuwm leiyi, rowng'inn thuh Pitar avah daalthida, raalmii chai plii rekki lop chai plii rek hinni mma' avah krung rah si lamda.
Anto ngi Pitar avah rowng'inn thung ngi am chda. Pdainu lamrinlop rekki mma' thenni Isowr hinni kdet liit kmah rinktham piik chlamda.

Ungta Herod tih mma' mdopthuhna' rang nit ava' ki mjaan nih Pitar avah thiirrii 'knii ngi tbowldaat tih raalmii 'knii arlak ki'iip daatda. Ungta mma' krung raalmii morson rek rukka rowng'inn thurngutbul lih ripdaat lamda.

'Tunnu asuwn, Kruwng vaantamsi khat thuwkda mhin nih ripda, rowng'inn ava' thung ngi mar'aang piida. Ungta mma ngi Pitar avah msiirthah tpeengda perdelda ungta hanto'theda: “Kbeisek ki hangrip,” ungta ava' thung ngi mkhut 'leenki thiirrii avah tla chda.
Audilli vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ado'ana anadok ungta akhuhkok apirsi dok,” ungta mma ngi anto' tlowda. Ungta mma ngi the nowlda: “Abuwhil ahil rang ngi nei mheiqowi.”
Mthungta mma ngi anto' vangthuwkda mma'dil avah qowida. Ungta mma ngi vaantamsi ava ngi mdotlot avah mlangkat tidit deimda pdainu mma ngi rinmer khat kdeh a tidit tih binda.

Ungta mmaan nih mkhatna' ungta miknitna' rowng'inn krung rek amna' mkheel dokin dilli khuwpii tphaakna' thiir paltong pha lamda. Ungta thiir paltong avah mthina ngi kparvang chda. Ungta mmaanve ngi vangthuwk dok lamda, khuwpii'lam khat qowi lamda myunin arlaan nih m'tunkat daat tih vaantamsi avah mma' hinki sun chda.

Ungta 'tunnu Pitar rih mkerdeh chaak thungta hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Kruwng ngi Mma' vaantamsi avah nei kihin nih mtapthlat piik a, tidit avah neiyi kindit chelli kdeh chaak a. Mleiya havah Mma ngi Herod khut thungki ungta Jihudi rek plungbin chaak rek thungki mdotsan chaakna' rang kithen.”
Mma ngi ava' mdeh chaak dok dilli, mmiingdak Mark mdodit Johon nuh Mary ava' inn thung ngi arvangda. Ungta ava' thung ngi mmaan nih knempok ki kurtuwl lamda rinktham meeksli lamda.
Ungta Pitar rih duwn ki thurngut mqhil thungta Rhoda mdoditin snunau suwk khat ava ngi thurngut kapvang rah arvada.
Ungta mma ngi Pitar krowl tidit marjaak pindit thungta mkanpat chaak reen nih thurngut kapvang kmah ngi vangchenda, ‘Pitar rah thurngutbul lih krip daat a,’ tidit vantheda.
Pdainu mmaan nih mhin nih, ‘nang nga ka'aak kchaampti,’ dilamda. Anto'daat yoso mma ngi: ‘Anto'kat pi'ii,’ tidit avah thetheda. Mthungta mmaan nih, ‘mdit bih havah mma' vaantamsi thideh,’ dilamda.
Pdainu Pitar rih thurngut avah qhilqhil daatda. Ungta mmaan nih thurngut pvang lamda ungta mma' mdehn thungta mningin ngakyou chda.

Pdainu mma ngi rimkdi ma'amna' raan mmaan avah kchap lamda. Ungta mma ngi taluhep pih Kruwng ngi rowng'inn ava'thung ki mma' avah mupthuh tidit avah mmaan hinni purphuwngda. Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih chetin rang ngi James le' unau rek hinni hava' dow rek avah vansongin,” dida. Ungta mma ngi ava' thung ki sunda mmun morson thah chetda.
Ungta mupduknii ki jiingsun mphaak thungta Pitar hinni kthuwk ava'leiyi raalmii rek arlak ki klinyou kchang ngi vaangklum khat thuwkda.
Pdainu Herod tih mma' avah thlaamda ungta mdehma thungta mma ngi rowng'inn krung rek avah kmin nih pau kheel lamda ungta mma ngi mmaan avah te'eyow rah tidit ki paupiik pii lamda.

'Tunnu Herod tah Tair le' Sidon khuwpii ki mii rektu' mkalraiyin leiyi, kdung ngi m'leenin nih plung pthitpsuk lamda. Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni plung khadaat tih mhin nih hang lamda. Paamkruwng ava ngi mi'inn thung ksutpqowi rah mdosi msuwk Blastas plap mdokurthuhqhi chaak inni mmaan nih Herod hinni mkalqhat chaakna' raan qhil chlamda. Mleiya mmaan khuwpaam avah paamkruwng ava' paamkuwl thungki ngi thendam avah mdopiik chaak kchown.
Ungta nit tpelreen khat thung ngi Herod tih paamkruwng dona rek hilnada ungta mma ngi pau mdopinditna', mma' Kruwng longkhom 'leenni ko'ong thida mii rek hinni pau theda.
Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Havah Isowr krowl, dultimii krowl pemeh.”
Audilli m'tunkat daat tih Kruwng vaantamsi ava ngi mma' avah heem ptluda. Mleiya mma ngi Isowr avah mdoponlor chaak pemeh. Ungta mma' avah pden nih sowda ungta diyou chda.
Pdainu Isowr pauna avah linthangda ungta koryouda.
Ungta Barnabas le' Saul lih mnongtlotin mupqut chaak dokin dilli Jerusalem ki arjung kerheel lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Mark mdoditin Johon rukka arjunqhi lamda.

'Tunnu Antiok lamrinlop ava' thung ngi khulpu rekle' chukpu rek ka'am lam. Mmaan avah Barnabas, kvom mdoditin Simeon, Sairen ki Lusias ungta paamkuwl plii rekki khat ki paamkpu, Herod tung ngi klinkheng Menan ungta Saul le' lim lam.

Mmaan nih Kruwng hinni soplow chlamda ungta then mngowl chaakin thung ngi Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Barnabas le' Saul avah Neiyi kdo'own lamna' nong ava' ktlow rang ki thenni Nei kthen nih, apantaan pthiin.”
Audilli mmaan nih then ngowl lamda ungta rinktham chlam thida mmaanve 'leenni mkhutin khiinpiik lamda ungta mmaanve avah pthla chlamda.
Anto ngi Pthla Kchiir rih mdopthlat chaak lam leiyi, mmaanve ngi Selusia thah yu lamda ungta ava' thung ki ngi Saipras thah heithap lamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi Salamis mphaakin thungta Jihudi rekki sinegog rek thung ngi Isowr pauna avah parjaam chlamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi Johon avah mmaan kbom rang ngi mdoqhi chaakin.
'Tunnu mmaan nih diiloipaam kthleng ngi chet lamda, Paphos khuwpii mphaakin thungta mmaan nih mmiing Bar Jisu mdodit, Jihudi mii, mlangkma' khulpu, k'dim khat avah kurdutqhi lamda.
Mma' avah paamkpu Sargias Paulas tidit luwkinrit miikhat tu' kilqhi lamda. Hava' mii ava ngi Barnabas le' Saul avah own lamda ungta Isowr pauna avah mmaanve hinki tarjaak rah bin chda.

Pdainu k'dim Elimas, tih mmaanve avah pkhaan lamda. Mleiya mmaan pau vih Elimas mdoditin, Elimas tidit tah mii kinrit mdoditna'. Mleiya mma ngi lamrin ava' thung ki paamkpu avah mdoperheelna' rah mdotlot.
Audilli Paul ruk mdoditin Saul ava ngi Pthla Kchiir rih dim chthida, mma' avah suwrimda.
Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “O, miiqhatmana' le' tuhuwn chaakna ngi kdim, tarnampii chapa nang ungta rinkinditna' mkheng ki miihal nang, nang ngi Kruwng 'Lam kirji adopenher avah down liit nim timow?

Ungta 'tunnu, dakat tih Kruwng ruhtan avah nang atun nih ka'am kcha' a, nang nga amik kjiing chrah ungta mphakhat ki thenni kni avah dei nimtih,” dida. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma' 'leenni armei le' kjiingnu arjuda ungta mma ngi mkhut thah kyowng donni kqhi chrah kuwmiikhat kukchul lih korloiyi chet chda.
Audilli paamkpu ava ngi kthuwk dow ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi lam'rin chda. Mleiya mma ngi Kruwng leiyi, mdopurchuh ava' thung ngi mmah mning kngakyou kcha'.

'Tunnu Paul le' mmiiqhi rek ava ngi Paphos khuwpii ki thap lamda mcheen thungta mmaan nih Pamphylia paamkuwl ki Perga khuwpii pha lamda. Ungta ava' thung ki ngi Johon nah mmaanve hinki korlouda Jerusalem thah hung kerheel chda.
Pdainu mmaanve a Perga thungki msunin thungta Pisidia paamkuwl ki Antiok khuwpii pha lamda ungta mmaanve ngi tkarngatnit tih sinegog thung ngi luwt lamda ungta ko'ong lamda.

Ungta sinegog kpupa rek ava ngi, Nowlam rekle' Khulpu rek laika mparcham dokin dilli mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda pau heipthlada: “Mii rek ungta unau rek, naanve ngi mii rek toksowna' pau ahorin cheentung ngi avah atheen.”
Audilli Paul lih hanripda ungta mkhut tih partamda hanto'theda: “Isreel mii rek ungta Isowr kqi kcha' rek naan nih, havah arjaan.

Hava' Isreel mii rekki Isowr ava ngi neen npa'leen avah kchol chlamda ungta Egypt paam thung ngi mal lih ma'amin thung ngi mmaan avah kparthaang ngi thi chlamda. Ungta mruhtan klin ava ngi, Mma ngi mmaan avah paam ava' thungki qhi pthuwk lamda.
'Tunnu kum somplii arveel thung ngi paamkbiik laiyi Mma ngi mmaan rinchan avah arvandiil chlamda.
Ungta Mma ngi Kenaan paam thung ngi chaat tikhiu rek mpenvei lam dilli Mma ngi mmaan paam avah npa'leen hinni alrouchom mih penthem piik lamda.
Ava' dilli Mma ngi khulpu Samuel arvankpha ngi kum arja plii somparnga thung ngi paukpindit rek avah mmaan hinni arvanpii lamda.

Ava' dilli mmaan nih paamkruwng ki thenni qhil chlamda. Mthungta Isowr rih Benjamin phung thungki miikhat. Kish chapa Saul avah paamkruwng ngi pii lamda, ungta mma ngi kum somplii thung ngi paamkruwng kurthuwkda.

Ungta Mma ngi Saul mlowpthi dilli Mma ngi mmaan thenni David avah paamkruwng khat tih pii lamda. Ungta mma' leiyi, Mma ngi hanto'theda rinpaumin mdopiik: ‘Neiyi Jessi chapa David kphan chaak a,’ (Luw. 89:20) ‘Nei kuplungbin hep daat mii, kdobin mkheng mma ngi ktlow rah.’ dida. (1 Sam. 13:14)
Hava' mii ava' suruwl thungki ngi, paureel dilkqowiyi Isowr rih Isreel nau rek thenni Miksan Jisu avah pqhangda.
Jisu mthlenduh ngi Johon nih Isreel mii rek mkheng hinni plung tperthlenna' le' dii tuluwna' avah parjaam dokda.

Ungta Johon nih mnongtlot ava' mqutna' thang ngi hanto'theda: ‘Naan nih, neiya kuwpi'ii atidit inna? Neiya Mma' ava' pmaang. Pdainu asuwn, hava' thuh nei kdil thah khat karvang nga. Neiya Mma' khuhkok rii kperthlet ki mtik kcha pmaang,’ dida.
Mii rek ungta unau rek, Abraham suruwl thungki nau rek ungta naan arlakin ki Isowr kqi kcha' rek, hava' tkirliinna' pauna avah naan ahin nih mdopthlat.

Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mii rekle' paamkpu rekki Mma' avah deipindih chlammeh. Mmaan nih tkarngatnit ktaiyi mdoparchamin khulpu rek krowl avah mmaan nih Mma' mdopsulnaan ava' thung ngi purtluwm lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' thung ngi tidiyowna' krow ki mlei khatleh mdehmaan arlaan nih Pilaat hinni Mma' te'eyowna' rah qhil chlamda.
'Tunnu mmaan nih Mma' leiyi, mdokjit ava' mkheng ava' mpurtluwm dokin dilli Mma' avah ding 'leenki pqum lamda ungta thlaan khat thung ngi pi'iip chlamda.
Pdainu Isowr rih Mma' avah kdiyou thungki perdelda.
Mma' tu' Galily ki ngi Jerusalem thah karhang rek mmaan ava ngi Mma' avah nit knempok thung ngi dei lamda. Mmaan havah, mii rek hinni Mma' sakhi reklam.
Ungta neen nih naan ahinin nih, npa'leen hinni pau mdoreel dok ava' ki kqhapaumin avah kpurphuwn chaak inna.

Isowr rih, mmaan nau neen nihinin nih hava'kat avah mpurtluwm a, tidit tah Mma ngi Jisu avah mdoperdel dok. Miknitna' Luwbuklaa thung ngi mdokjit heppi: ‘Nang nga Nei Kchapa ptih, Tuni ngi Nang nga Neiyi akuppluk chaak a.’ (Luw. 2:7)

Ungta mma ngi Mma' daksa avah veikhat kqop kma' rang ngi mdoperdel chaak dok. Isowr rih hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi David hinni kdopiik trinchaak krow kchiir paureel rek avah ahin nih apii nikdi',’ dida. (Is. 55:3)
Avaleiyi, Luwbuklaa morson khat thung ngi hanto' the nowlda: ‘Nang ngi Nang ki Kchiir Khat avah pqop nimtih.’ (Luw. 16:10)
Ungta David tih mma' suruwl rek thung ngi Isowr plungbin avah sopmlow chaak dilli kdiyou vih iip chda, ungta mma' avah mpa le' tu' alruwl chlamda ungta mdaksa a qop chda.
Pdainu Isowr rih mdoperdel chaak Mma' avah qopmeh.
Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek naan nih havah adeiyin, tidit tah hava' Mii ava' ar'aang ngi naan ahin nih pnu rek toptlot piikna' avah kdoparjaam chaakin.
Ungta Moses nowlam mih dow mkheng thungki adotpindit pchaanmah naan ava' thung ki naan avah hava' Mma' ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rek avah mpindit piik chaak dok lam a.
Avaleiyi, naan nih Khulpu rekki mdotheen dow rek avah a'leenin nih mthuhmana' rah ikilrin deichaan.

Khulpu rekki hanto' the lamda: ‘Asuwn, tukksut kma' rek, naan ingakin ungta ikenvei chaan. Mleiya Neiyi naanki mpha thung ngi nong tlow nikdi'. Ungta naan nih nong avah kuwmiikhat tih athepiik daatin yoso teden rukku lam'rin nimaan tih,’ mdodit.” (Hab. 1:5)
Ungta Jihudi rekki sinegog thungki mvanthuh dokin thungta Chaatktlei rekki hava' pauna avah karvang rang, tkarngatnit tih mmaan hinni mdoparjaam piik lamna' rah Paul le' Barnabas hinni ktham chlamda.

'Tunnu mii rekki kui lamda mvanthuhn thungta Paul le' Barnabas avah Jihudi rekle' Jihudi rin'owi ko'owi kcha' knempok rekki mdilin qowi chlamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi mmaan nih Isowr plungnee thung ngi ma'am tlit chaakna' raan mmaan avah pnuwm chlamda.
Ungta mkorjown tkarngatnit ava' thung vah khuwpii mkheng thungki mii avah mkheng souvih Isowr pauna karja chrah kurtuwl chlamda.
Pdainu Jihudi rekki miipiipa rek mdehn thungta muplungin avah tukyuwnna ngi dim chda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul lih mdothe dow rek ava' kepteng ngi ungta kipthit tih pau lamda.

Audilli Paul le' Barnabas tih mningqitin ktaak ki hanto' the lamda: “naan ahin nih Isowr pauna avah rukrirep pih tethe rang avah msit am rekrekda, pdainu naan nih avah kthitnaan tinu ungta naan adak kat inni ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha kma' rang ngi pau akpindit chaak dokin leiyi, asuwn, 'tunnu neen nih Chaatktlei rek ktong thah ktarngat chaak inna.

Mleiya Kruwng ngi neenve kihinin nih hanto ngi paupiik mpiinda: ‘Neiyi nang nga Chaatktlei rek hinni mar'aang khat tih akthiik a. Tidit tah dultipaam mdonna' kpha thuh nang ngi tkirliinna' avah adohor rah.’ ” (Is. 49:6)
Ungta 'tunnu Chaatktlei rekki ava' marjaakin thungta kanpa chlamda ungta Isowr rah panpaak chlamda. Ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki thenni mdokchol chaak dok mkheng rek ava ngi lam'rin chlamda.
Ungta Kruwng pauna avah paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi karjaam chda.

Pdainu Jihudi rekki, rinko'owi kcha' snu rekle' takyat kurhuwi snu rek ungta khuwpii ava' thung ki miikenreel rek avah kchoukrep lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul le' Barnabas 'leenni tyatchiireelna' pthuwk lamda ungta mmaanve avah mpaamkuwlin thungki knengpthi lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih mkhuhn 'leenki vaiphul avah mmaan 'leenni kqhik psuk lam thida Ikoniam thah arvang chlamda.
Ungta sikhu rek avah kanpa le' Pthla Kchiir rih pdim chlamda.
'Tunnu Ikoniam thung ngi Paul le' Barnabas tih Jihudi rek Sinegog thung ngi luwtve lamda ungta anto ngi mpauin thungta Jihudi rekle' Grik rek knempok ki lam'rin chlamda.
Pdainu lamkrin kma' Jihudi rekki, Chaatktlei rek avah kchoukrep lamda ungta unau rek ava' 'leenni, muplungin thung ngi kru thlaak pthi lamda.

Audilli Paul le' Barnabas tih mpha ksowt tih ava' thuh am lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Kruwng pauna leiyi, mningqitin ktaak ki pau chlamda. Ungta Kruwng ngi Paul le' Barnabas khut thung ngi titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek mdoptlot pchaan lam ava ngi Mma' plungnee ki rinpaumin avah piida.
Pdainu khuwpii ava' thung ki mii rek avah aangqhe ngi Jihudi rek hinni ungta aangqhe ngi tamsi rek hinni kenqhen chlamda.
Ungta Jihudi rekle' Chaatktlei rekki mmaan ki paamkpu rektu' eenghal lih mmaanve avah ningkya kpii rah ungta lung ngi kdeeng rah the lamda.
Pdainu mmaanve ngi avah dei lamda ungta avaleiyi Likonia paamkuwl ki khuwpii rek Listra le' Darbi thah chen chlamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi kqhapaumin avah ava' thung ngi parjaam chlamda.
Ungta Listra thung ngi mnuh ngi mupluk daat ki kyeng kcha', mkhuh thung ngi ruhtan ka'am kma' teden rukku kchet kcha' kma' miikhat avah ko'ong daatda.
Hava' mii ava ngi Paul kpau avah arja chda ungta Paul lih mma' avah kmin nih msutrim thungta mma ngi tapdam chaakna' rah lamrin mdothlowi chaak avah deida.
Ungta Paul lih krowl kparthaang ngi owngda, ‘Hangrip ungta kinding ngi irip,’ dida. Ungta mma ngi konchowmda ungta tche pqhun chda.
'Tunnu mii rek ava ngi Paul lih mdotlot avah mmikin nih mdehn thungta mmaan nih owng lamda, Likonia pau vih, ‘isowr rek avah neen nihin nih miilai heppi arjunkqum a,’ dilamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Barnabas avah ‘Jeus,’ dilamda ungta Paul ava ngi, kpaupa mkenreelsi mkurthuh leiyi, mma' avah ‘Harmis,’ dilamda.
Ungta khuwpii aang ngi ka'am Jeus luwbuk'inn ki thimpu ava ngi silpa rekle' reirii rek avah khuwpii suwng ava' thung ngi arjuksinda mmaanve hinni miipii rekpa tung ngi rinkparlaan chrah the lamda.
Pdainu tamsi rek, Barnabas le' Paul lih ava' marjaakin thungta mmaanve ngi mdomnaan kqet lamda ungta miipii rek arlak ki heichen lamda.

Ungta owng lamda hanto' the lamda: Mii rek naan nih taluleiyi hava'le' avah atlot inna? Neenve rukka naan ahep daat, miilai inping ungta neenve ngi naan ahin nih hava'lu hep daat msit ktaak dow rek hinki ngi kring Isowr hinni akerheel chaakna' raan kqhapaumin avah naan ahin nih kdoparjaam chaakin, Mma' ava ngi parvaan le' dultipaam ungta truwnpii ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am dow mkheng rek avah mdoseem.
Alraangvah mma ngi chaat mkheng rek avah mmaan mmaan ki plungbin nih mdopche chaak lam.

Anto'daat yoso Mma ngi Mma' mdak avah mrinpaumin ktaak ki karmapthi meh. Mleiya Mma ngi kqha mitlotpiik inda, parvaan ki khu mipratpiik inda ungta chapaar ki mpha mipiinda. Ungta neen nuplungin avah thendam le' tkanpatna' ngi mipdimpiik inda.
Ungta hava' mdotheen ava' rukku mmaan nih neenve hinni rin'mdoparlaan raan thungki avah tapkhaanna' parsada.

Audilli Antiok le' Ikoniam ki Jihudi rek avah ava' thuh thleng lamda. Ungta mmaan nih miipii rek avah siinchaak lamda ungta mmaan nih Paul avah lung ngi deeng lamda ungta khuwpii duwn thah kdiyou kcha' a, dilamda, varpthi lamda.
Anto'daat yoso sikhu rekki mma' tkhul lamda mkurtuwl chaakin thung ngi mma ngi kerdelda ungta khuwpii ava' thung ngi vangluwtda. Ungta mupduknii ngi mma ngi Barnabas tu' Darbi khuwpii thah sun chda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi khuwpii ava' thuh kqhapumin parjaam lamda sikhu knempok mapqhanin dilli mmaanve ngi Listra thah, Ikoniam thah ungta Antiok thah hung kerheel lamda.

Ungta mmaanve ngi mcheen thung ngi sikhu rek plungrin ava' 'leenni ruhtan pii chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih lamrin ava' thuh ma'am tlit chaakna' raanni hanto ngi the lamda: “Neen nih kdung ngi tyat tperteelna' knempok rekki Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh tuluw chaak raan,” dilamda ksop chlamda.

Ungta mmaanve ngi, mmaan thenni lamrinlop rek khimkhei thung ngi kver rek makthlan dokin dilli ungta then ngowl lamda rinmaktham chaakin dilli, lammdorin chaakin Kruwng hinni mmaan avah parlaan chlamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi Pisidia paamkuwl kthleng ngi mche chaakin dilli Pamphylia paamkuwl avah pha lamda.
'Tunnu mmaanve ngi Perga khuwpii thung ngi pau mparjaam dokin dilli Atalia arkuwngkal thah julamda.

Ava' thung ki ngi mmaanve ngi, Antiok khuwpii thah arkuwng 'leenni hang lamda. Ava' thung ngi lamrinlop ava ngi mmaanve avah, mmaanve ngi mdopqut dokin, nong ava' thung ngi mmaanve avah Isowr plungnee thung ngi parlaan chlamda.

Ungta mmaanve ngi mtlun dokin thungta lamrinlop avah purkuwksap chlamda ungta Isowr rih mmaanve hinni mdotlot rek mkheng avah mmaan hinni song chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih lammdorin chaakna' raan ki thenni Chaatktlei rek hinni Isowr rih 'lam pvanpiik lamda tidit avah song chlamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi mpha ksowt tih ava' thuh sikhu rek tung ngi amsap lamda.

Ungta Judia paamkuwl ki mii aangqhe rekki Antiok thah yu lamda unau rek avah hanto ngi purchuk lamda: ‘Mleiya naan nih Moses tih paupiik mdotpiikin heppi, vun'areen chaak maan bih naan nih tkirliinna' avah arlaang pchaang nimaan tih,’ dilamda.

Ungta ava' thung ngi Paul le' Barnabas tih mmaan tu' kdung ngi kolrow lam mda ungta kerteenna' lamda. Audilli mmaan nih, tamsi rekle' kver rek hinni hava' pau ava' kkheel rang ki thenni Paul le' Barnabas ungta morson aangqhe rek avah Jerusalem thah kahang rang ngi kchol lamda.

Ungta lamrinlop rekki mdohanpthlat chaakin leiyi, mmaan nih Phininsia le' Samaria paamkuwl rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chet lamda. Ungta mmaan nih taluhep pih Chaatktlei rekki Isowr hinni kerheel kcha'lam tidit avah song chlamda, ungta pau ava ngi unau rek mkheng avah kdung ngi kanpa chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Jerusalem mtlunin thungta lamrinlop le' tamsi rekki ungta kver rekki mmaan avah arlaang chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr rih mmaan hinni nong mdotlot mkheng avah song chlamda.

Pdainu Pharisy lop rek thungki lamkrin kcha' aangqhe rekki rip lamda hanto' the lamda. “Neen nih mmaan avah vuntepreen raan thah ktla ungta Moses nowlam ava' mdopqowina' raan ki thenni paupiik tpiik raan thah ktla.”
Mthungta tamsi rekle' kver rek avah hava' kerseel rang ki thenni kurtuwl lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih mpha ksowt tih mkerseelin dilli Pitar rih ripda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek, naan nih mpha mruk duh thah Isowr rih neen narlak inni tokcholna' khat mdotlot avah adehn. Chaatktlei rekki nei knehr thungki kqhapaumin ava' arjada lammdorin chaakna' raan ki thenni mikchol inda.
Anto ngi plungril kdei Isowr rih neen nihin nih midotpiikin heppi mmaan hinni Pthla Kchiir avah pii lamda mmaan avah mdorot chaak doklam.
Mma ngi mmaan plung rek avah lamrin nih mdopertleu piiklam leiyi, Mma ngi mmaan le' neenki tkertleinaan mdopa'am pemeh.
Avaleiyi, 'tunnu, taluleiyi naan nih sikhu rek lowl 'leenni, npa'leen ruk mditmata neen rukku tohor pchaanmah raan reengkol aplot inna?
Pdainu 'tunnu neen nih Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ava ngi lamnrin chaakin thung ngi misan chaanda. Anto' heppi Isowr rih mmaan rukka mdosan chaak lam.”

Audilli miipii rek ava ngi kdairim mih am lamda, ungta Barnabas le' Paul dothe pau avah arja chlamda. Mmaanve ngi Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek arlak ki mmaanve hinni titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek mdotlot tya avah mmaan hinni pandang chlamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi rimkdi ma'amin arlaan nih James tih arthaangda hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek naan nih mhei'arjaak piik chaan.
Simeon nih, Isowr rih choduhrep pih Chaatktlei rek mdovelna' avah mithepindit piikdok inda. Isowr rih Mma' miing kpandang chrang ki miichaat khat mdokchol chaakna' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.
Ungta hava' pauna ava' tu' Khulpu rek dothe avah kilqhi, tidit tah hanto' kjitda ka'am:
‘Hava' dilli Neiyi kerheel nikdon, ktlu dok kcha' David buw'inn avah saperheel nikdi'. Neiyi mker'ekrena' avah saperheel nikdon ren nih mmun thuh thipenle nikdi'.

Mleiya havah dultimii chaat mqhe rekki, Ungta Nei kmiing ko'own kcha', Chaatktlei mkheng rek kpha rukku, Kruwng mdothlaam chaakna' rang ki then, dida, hava' dow mkheng rek ava' kpurthuh Kruwng ava ngi theda.
Isowr rih Mma' nong rek mkheng avah ktlangknai kma' ki ngi mdodeh dok ksa.’ (Ams. 9:11-12)
Avaleiyi, nei kpaupindit avah neen nih Isowr hinni kerheel kcha' Chaatktlei rek 'leenni tparsatna' morson topqou piik raan pemeh.

Pdainu neen nih mmaan nih pthla rek hinni tparlaan dok dow rek hinki ungta lowsang tkilqhina' thungki, ungta teklelyow saa rek hinki ungta hii tchaakna' thungki mkenser chaakna' raan paukjit kjitpiik inche.
Mleiya alraang ki kupqhun nih khuwpii khimkhei thuh Sinegog rek thung ngi tkarngatnit ktaiyi mii rekki Moses laika avah mdoparjaam kchown.”

Audilli tamsi rekle' kver rekki Antiok khuwpii thah tapthlat rah mii kchol lamda ungta lamrinlop thung ngi ka'am rek mkheng rukku avah row chlamda. Mmaan nih Paul le' Barnabas tu' kchet rang ki thenni unau rek arlak ki luwkqhi rek, Barnabas mdoditin Judah ungta Sailas avah kchol lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih mmaanve khut thung ngi hanto ngi tikjit paukjit khat avah pthla lamda: “Tamsi rekle' kver rek ungta unau rek, neen nih Antiok khuwpii thuh ka'am rek, ungta Siria le' Silisia paamkuwl thung ngi ka'am lamkrin kcha' Chaatktlei rek naan ahin nih hava' paukjit avah kjit innu, Akurvuwi chaak inna.

Mleiya neen kihin ki kyu mii aangqhe rekki naan ahin nih, ‘naan nih vun adoreen raan ungta Moses nowlam avah adopqowi raan,’ dilamda. Mmaan pauthe rek ava ngi naan aplungrin rekin avah tparmak likda atapyat inna tidit arjaan nuh pdainu neen nih mmaan hinni ava' kthe rah paupiik piimaan ring.

Ungta neen nih plung khadaat tih kurtuwl innu kkolrot chaakin dilkqowiyi neen nih mii mruk tokchol lih kqha rah binin nuh. Avaleiyi, mmaanve avah neen nih kvonsat'low chaakin Barnabas le' Paul tung ngi naan ahin nih kapthlat chaak inna.
Barnabas le' Paul avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing leiyi, mrinkum kparlaan dok kcha' mii reklam.
Avaleiyi, neen nih Judah le' Sailas avah kapthlat chaak inna. Ungta mmaanve ngi neen nih kdokjit chaakin ava' heppi aksonpiik chraan.
Mleiya Pthla Kchiir hinruk ungta neen kihinin rukku, hava'le' daat kma'don morson bowr krik a'leen innu tithiikmah ngi kqha ngi bin innu.

Hava'le' avah naan nih adorin raan ava': ‘Naan nih dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dow rek hinki ikenser chaan. Naan nih hii thungki ungta teklelyow saa rek tchaakna' thungki ungta lowsang tkilqhina' thungki ikekneeng chaan. Naan nih hava'le' avah apqowi chaakin bih, kqha atlot chaak inna. Hanto ngi kupqut chaak inna.’”
Mthungta anto ngi mdopthlat inni mii rekki chet lamda ungta Antiok khuwpii tlung lamda. Ungta mmaan nih miipii rek mpurku chaakin dilli paukjit avah mmaan hinni parlaan chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih ava' mparcham chaakin thungta tkorsowna' pauna rek avaleiyi kanpa chlamda.
'Tunnu Judah le' Sailas avah khulpu ruk kurthuwk lam. Ungta mmaanve ngi unau rek avah paumin ksaangpa ngi ksop chlamda ungta ruhtan pii chlamda.
Ungta mmaanve ngi mpha mruk thuh ma'amin dilli mmaanve avah unau rekki plungdai tu' kilqhi ngi tamsi rek hinni hunpsun chlamda.
Anto'daat yoso Sailas vah ma'am daat tih kqha rah tidit tih bin chda.
Ungta Paul le' Barnabas rukka Antiok thung ngi am chdaat lamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi ava' thung ngi purchuk lamda ungta mii morson knempok rek tung ngi Kruwng ki kqhapaumin ki mlei avah parjaam chlamda.

Ungta mpha mruk dilli Paul lih Barnabas hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu ikerheel cheh rang ngi neenve ngi Kruwng pauna tparjaamna' khuwpii khimkhei rek thung ngi ka'am unau rek avah ivel lamche' ungta mmaan nah taluhep pih ka'am lam a tidit isuw che',” dida.
Ungta Barnabas tih mmaanve tu' Mark mdoditin Johon ava' rukka tkilqhiqhi rah ngeida.

Pdainu Paul vah avah kqha rang ngi bin mda mleiya Mark vah mmaanve avah Pamphylia paamkuwl thungki ngi mdomaak pthidok lam. Ungta mma ngi nong ava' thung ngi mmaanve tu' mkilqhimaan ava'leiyi Paul vah mma' tqhi rangnga ngei mda.
Anto ngi mmaanve ngi kdung ngi mkolrotmaan ma'am leiyi, mmaanve avah khat le' khat hinki kenqhen chlamda. Barnabas tih Mark qhida Saipras diiloipaam thah arkuwng 'leenni chet chda.
Pdainu Paul vah Sailas kchol chda. Ungta unau rek ava ngi Isowr plungnee thung ngi mparlaan chaak lam dilli mma ngi anto' sunchda.
Ungta mma ngi Siria le' Silisia paamkuwl rek thung ngi chetda lamrinlop rek avah ruhtan pii chlamda.
Audilli mma ngi Darbi le' Listra khuwpii tlungda. Ungta asuwn mmiing Timothy mdoditin sikhu khat avah ava' thung ngi ka'am ungta mma' avah lamkrin kcha' Jihudi snu khat chapa pdainu mpa a Grik mii.
Mma' avah Listra le' Ikoniam khuwpii thuh ka'am unau rekki mdang mdopqhat dok chaakin miikhat.

Paul lih mma' avah qhida tcheqhi rah ngeida. Paul lih mma' avah qhida ungta mpaamkuwl ava' thuh ka'am Jihudi rek leiyi, mma' avah mvun reen piikda. Mleiya mmaan mkheng inni mpa avah Grik mii tidit mdodeh.
Ungta Mmaanve ngi khuwpii rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chet lamda. Ungta Jerusalem thung ngi tamsi rekle' kver rekki mdopqumin pauqum rek ava' mdopqowina' raan ki thenni mmaan hinni kparlaan chlamda.
Anto ngi lamrinlop rek avah lamrin 'leenni ruhtan pii lamda ungta mniit ktai ki mmiichai rekin avah nemthang setset lamda.
'Tunnu mmaanve ngi Phrigia khuwpii le' Galatia paamkuwl thuh kthleng ngi mche dokin thungta mmaanve hinni Pthla Kchiir ava ngi Asia thung ngi pauna mdoparjaam raan avah pkhaan lamda.
Mmaanve ngi Maisia paamklek mtlun dokin dilli mmaanve vah Bithynia paamkuwl thah kchet rah korthlong lamda. Pdainu Pthla ava ngi mche raan avah rotpiik lam mda.
Ungta Maisia kthleng ngi mcheen inni mmaanve ngi Troas khuwpii thah arju lamda.
Ungta jaan nih Paul hinni rinmer khat pdeh chda. Mesedonia ki miikhat tih mma' aang ngi ripda Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Mesedonia thah arju rang ngi, neenna mheibom chaan,” dida, pnuwm chlamda.”

'Tunnu mma ngi rinmer ava' mdeh dilli neen nih kbeisek ki Mesedonia thah kyukna' raan tlown nuh. Ungta neen nih kqhapauna avah mmaan hinni kdoparjaam chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih neenna mto'own chaak inna tidit dei innu.
Avaleiyi, neen nih Troas khuwpii ki ngi kthleng rik ki arkuwng 'leenni kal innu Samothras diiloipaam thah heichen innu. Ungta mupduknii ngi Niapolis khuwpii thah arvang innu.
Ava' thung ki neen nih Rome mii rek amna'mun Mesedonia ki klorsi khuwpii Philippia thah vaan nuh. Ungta ava' khuwpii thung ngi neen nih kdokmah am innu.

Ungta neen nih tkarngatnit tih khuwpii duwn thah chet innu. Ungta neen nih kreng biing thah mii rekki mnowpaan nih rinmaktham chaakna' kchown mmun ava'thah juwn nuh. Ungta neen nih kok'on chaakin dilli, ava' thuh kurkuwk snu rek hinni tpau pqhun innu.

'Tunnu Lydia mdoditin snu khat ava ngi kpautheen avah arja chda. Mma' avah buw kning ngi ksen kjur kcha' Thyatira khuwpii ki ungta Isowr luwkbuk cha' miikhat. Ungta Kruwng ngi Paul lih mdothe dow rek ava' kmin nih karja chrang ki thenni muplung pvan piikda.

Ungta neen nih mma' mdak le' mi'inn thungki mii rek dii kupluwn thungta mma ngi mi'inn thah mo'own chaanda. Ungta hanto'theda: “Naan nih neiya Kruwng hinni lamkrin kcha' khat tidit tih atbin chaakin cheentung ngi arvaan rang ngi ki'inn thuh mhei'am piik chaan,” dida, neen avah mupnuwm chaanda.

'Tunnu neen nih rinkaktham chrang ngi keheiyin thungta snunau suwk khat tih mkurdut qhiinda. Mma' avah ruwlpiidowi pthla ksin ungta mii rek hinni mdusukin mdothethut piiklam ava ngi mma ngi mukpupa rek thenni sum knempok ki lotpiik kchok lamda.

Hava' snunau ava ngi Paul le' neen avah mqowi'inda. Ungta mma ngi owngda: “Hava' mii rek avah kparthaangsi Isowr ava' suwk reklam. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr rih neen midotsan chaakna' raan ki m'lam avah midotpur phuwn piikin,” dida.

Ungta havah mma ngi nit knempok thung ngi tlowda. Pdainu Paul lih avah mdiil pchaanmah reen thungta, pthla ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Jisu Khrista miing ngi paupiik akpiik a! Mma' thungki arvang thuwk dok!” Ungta mpha ava'kat thung ngi pthla avah arvang thuwk chda.

Pdainu mukpupa rekki muplungbinin msit ka'am kma' rang ava' mdehn thungta mmaan nih Paul le' Sailas avah kyowng lamda. Ungta mmaan nih paukpindit rek hinni mdoparlaan raan ki thenni kyurkren mun thung ngi qenthuh lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih paukpindit kenreel rek hinni hanto' the lamda mmaanve avah pthuwk lamda. “Hava' mii rek avah Jihudi mii lam ungta mmaan nih nkhuwpiin thung ngi kdung ngi vaanglumna' mtlot inna.
Mmaan nih Rome mii neen nih tarlaanna' mditmata topqowina' kqha kma' kindit kma'pa nowpa rek avah parjaam lamda,” dilamda.
Audilli miipii rekki Paul le' Sailas krow kmah ngi rip lamda. Mthungta paukpindit rek ava ngi mmaanve dona avah kqepiik lamda. Ungta kchung ngi mmaanve avah mdobunna' raan paupiik pii lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kchung kbi knem mih mbun chaak dokin dilli mmaanve avah rowng'inn thuh daal lamda. Ungta mmaan nih rowng'inn kpu ava' hinni mmaanve avah knet tih mdorunna' raan ki paupiik pii lamda.
Mma ngi hava' hep paupiik ava' marjaak thungta mmaanve avah rowng'inn mril thah daalpthi lamda ungta mkhuhn avah dingkol pkehda bowlpthi lamda.
Pdainu jaan nih thanqim laiyi Paul le' Sailas tih Isowr hinni rinktham chlamda ungta tpanpaaklaa the lamda. Ungta rowng'inn mii rekki mmaanve dothe avah arja lamda.

Ungta tedeh dokmah ngi ringnaang klin khat thuwkda mthungta rowng'inn innmun avah knokda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih rowng'inn thurngut mkheng avah kparvang chda ungta rowng'inn mii rek tbowlna' thiirrii avah kerthletpet chda.

Ungta rowng'inn kpu ava ngi ki'iip mkerdel thungta rowng'inn thurngut kparvang mdeh thungta rowng'inn mii rek avah kchen chdok terlam a, tidit tih binda. Audilli mma ngi mraal'kaang turthuhda ungta mthina ker'eyou chrah theda.
Pdainu Paul lih kdung ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Neen kekheng inni, ka'am daat inping, athina sulkurnul chma'!”
Audilli rowng'inn kpu ava ngi meila thlaamda ungta vangchenda, luwtda ungta kunchuwnda Paul le' Sailas khuhther rih tlu chda.
Audilli mma ngi duwn thah vanqhi pthuwk lam thida hanto'theda: “Ocha! Isowr rih mdotsan chaakna' rah neiyi talu tlow chnikli?”
Ungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni lam'arin cha' ungta Isowr rih nang ruk, ungta a'innmii rek rukka aksan chraan.”
Audilli mmaanve ngi Kruwng pauna avah mhin nih ungta mma' inn thungki morson mkheng rek hinni the lamda.

Mma ngi Paul le' Sailas avah jaan koktopa ava' thung ngi qhi lamda ungta mlimnaan mkheng avah alqhutpiik chlamda. Ungta m'tunkat tih mmaanve ngi mma' le' ungta mi'innmii rek mkheng avah dii pluwt chlamda.
'Tunnu mma ngi mmaanve avah mi'inn thuh vanluwqhi chlamda ungta mmaanve hinni then downpiik lamda. Mma' ungta mi'innmii rek mkheng ngi Isowr hinni lammdorin chaakin leiyi, kanpa chlamda.
Ungta khu mvaar thungta paukpindit kenreel rekki, “miilai 'knii rek avah apthlapthi doklam,” dida kthe rah mmaan ki nongmii klin rek avah rowng'inn kpu ava' hinni arheisi lamda.

Mthungta rowng'inn kpu ava ngi pau rek avah Paul hinni hanto' parjaakda. “Paukpindit kenreel rek ava ngi nei kihin nih naan adokapthlat dokna' raan pau mheitpiik a. 'Tunnu naanve a isunin ungta plung kdaiyi vangin,” dida.

Pdainu Paul lih nongmii klin rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Neenve a Rome mii kurthuwk chyown rih mmaan nih pau mpindit duhn nih mii rek maiyi me'ei inda. Ungta rowng'inn thung ngi mdaalinda. 'Tunnu mmaan nih tuprut tih neenve a mkapthla raan mow? Anto' nimeh mmaan nih arva lamdon duwn thah neenve a mdotqhi pthuh raan,” dida.
Ungta nongmii klin rek ava ngi vang lamda hava' pau rek avah paukpindit kenreel rek hinni vansong lamda. Mmaan nih mmaanve avah Rome mii lam tidit marjaakin thungta, mningin pqit lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih arva lamda mmaanve avah duwn thah qhi pthuwk lamda ungta khuwpii ava' thung ki msun dokna' raan ktham chlamda.
Anto ngi Paul le' Sailas tih rowng'inn thungki mthuh dokin dilli mmaan nih Lydia inn thah luwt lamda. Ava' thuh mmaanve ngi unau rek kurdutqhi chlamda. Ungta mmaan avah ksop chlam thida sun chlamda.
'Tunnu mmaanve ngi Amphipolis khuwpii ungta Apollonia khuw klin kirkhil lih mche dokin dilli Jihudi rek Sinegog amna' Thessalonika khuwpii pha lamda. Ungta ava' thung ngi Sinegog khat ka'am.
Audilli Paul lih mma' ki mnowpa dilkqowiyi mmaan hinni vangluwtda. Ungta tkarngatnit veikdumtet thung ngi Kchiir laika rek thung ngi mdothe rekki mlei rek avah mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.

Mleiya Mesaiah ngi suwk thuwk don nih kdiyou rek arlak ki mrinkerheel rang thah tlada, tidit avah mmaan hinni, tikjit rek thungki ngi tedet lamda thepindit piik lamda. Ungta mma ngi, ‘hava' Jisu, neiyi naan ahin nih kdoparjaam avah Mesaiah ava',’ dida.
Ungta mii aangqhe rekki avah pqowi chlamda. Ungta rinko'owi kcha' Grik mii knempok rekle' snu kenreel rek ktlowm kma' ngi Paul le' Sailas avah jong chlamda.

Pdainu ava' kopqowi kma' Jihudi rekvah avah pner lamda. Mmaan nih kyurkren rek arlak ki kqha kma' mii rek archil lamda miilop khat pqhang lamda. Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii ava' thung ngi kdung ngi vaanglumna' khat pthuwk lamda. Ungta Paul le' Sailas avah miipii hinni tupthuh rah mdongei inni, mmaan nih Jason inn avah pha lamda.

Pdainu mmaan nih, mmaanve mdehmaan thungta Jason le' unau morson rek aangqhe avah khuwpii ava' ki paukpindit rek hinthah vanqen lamda. Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda: “Dultipaam kpurlup kperthel lik mii rek avah hava' thung rukku karvalam a.
Ungta Jason nih mmaanve avah mi'inn thuh mdoptlun lam. Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava ngi, Jisu tidit paamkruwng morson khat ka'am, dilamda, Siijar pauqum rek kepteng ngi nong mdotlotin.” dilamda.
Ungta miipii rekle' kenreel paukpindit rekki hava' dow rek marjaakin thungta pau rek ava ngi mmaan nah kdung ngi muplungin yada.
Mthungta mmaan nih Jason le' morson rek avah tapthlat pthina' sum loulam thida mmaan avah pthlapthi lamda.
Audilli unau rek ava ngi Paul le' Sailas avah kbeisek ki Beria khuwpii thah psun dok lamda. Ungta mtlun dokin thungta, mmaanve ngi Jihudi rek sinegog thah va lamda.

Hava' Beria ki mii rek avah Thessalonika ki mii rek hinni muplungin kqha. Mleiya mmaan nih pauna avah kngei kcha'jap pih mdo'arlaan chaakin. Ungta mmaan nih mniiktaiyi hava' dow rek avah anto' mow anto' pemeh tidit leiyi, Kchiir laika avah mdothlaam chaak kchown.
Avaleiyi, Grik rek mruk'suwn daat kma' kenreel snu rekle' psel rek mii knempok ki lam'rin chlamda.
Pdainu Thessalonika ki Jihudi rekki Paul lih Beria thah Isowr pauna mparjaam a tidit avah arja lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Beria khuwpii thang rukku arva lamda ungta miipii rek avah kchoukrep lamda.
Audilli unau rek ava ngi kbeisek ki Paul avah truwnpii thah msunna' rah yukda lamda. Pdainu Sailas le' Timothy avah mikniing inni ava' thuh ka'am chdaat lam.

Anto ngi mii aangqhe rekki Paul avah Athen khuwpii kpha ngi da chlamda. Ungta Sailas le' Timothy ngi mma' avah mrot khimkhei thuh kbeiyi mdophaak raan, tidit ki paupiik marlaan chaakin dilli, mmaan nah kerheel row lam.
'Tunnu Paul lih Athen khuwpii thung ngi mmaanve karda ngi ma'am thung ngi mma ngi khuwpii avah pthla rek hinni kakparlaan kcha'lam a tidit mdeh thungta kdung ngi mapthla parvai chda.

Avaleiyi, mma ngi mniiktaiyi sinegog thung ngi Jihudi rekle' rinko'owi kcha' Chaatktlei rek tung ngi mlei avah thepindit chda kyurkren mun thung ngi, ava' thuh kthleng mii rek tung ngi mlei avah thepindit chda.

Audilli Epikurias le' Stoik dilkqowi luwkinrit kngei kcha' rekki mma' avah karnaakqhi lamda. Mmaan aangqhe rek ava ngi hanto' thepsuk lamda: “Hava' paunempa ava' vah taluphu plih mdothe chaak a?”dilamda. Ungta morson aangqhe rek nowl lih: “Mma' avah paamktlei ki isowr rek kparjaam kcha' rek hep daat a.” Mleiya mma ngi Jisu le' kring kerheel mdoparjaam a,’ dilamda.

Audilli mmaan nih Aresmul tidit kunpun ava' hinni mma' avah qhi lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Hava' tpurchuhna' ren khat nang ngi adopurchuh lam avah talulu plih, neen rukku tedeh chaak krow rang mow?
Nang ngi kakna arjaakin thung ngi doren liklik sinthuh tinu. Avaleiyi, neen nih hava' dow rek avah talu tidit kdehnum inna,” dilamda.
Mleiya Athen mii rekle' ava' thuh ka'am miimal rek mkheng ava ngi dow morson ktlow kmah ngi mmaan ki mpha ktlong rek ava' thung vah doren tethe mditmata tarjaak liklik tlow lamda ka'am kcha'lu lam.
Audilli Paul lih Aresmul tidit kunpun ava' ningqim mih rip thida hanto'theda: “Athen khuwpii thungki mii rek naan avah dow mkheng 'leenni rinko'owi kcha' dokin ptih.

Neiyi kkorlon thuh ungta naan nih luw adobukin dow rek ksut thung ngi, neiyi rintparlaanna' khaan khat 'leenni, ‘Kuwkhat tih mdodehma Isowr hinni,’ diin tinu tikri ngi tikjit deinu. Avaleiyi, naan nih kuw tidit adodeh maan nih luw adobukin Khat avah neiyi, naan ahin nih kdoparjaam Mma' ava'.
Dultipaam ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am dow mkheng kpurthuh Isowr avah khut tih tsak Mmun Kenjesi thung ngi ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Mmah dulti le' parvaan ki Kruwng ava'.
Ungta Mma ngi dow kikriing leek heppi dultimii khut tih Mma' hinni soptolowpiik, msit ammeh. Mleiya, Mma ngi mkheng hinni rinkum, tdaal ungta dow mkheng avah mdopiik.
Ungta Mma ngi miikhat thungki ngi dultipaam mkheng thuh ka'am chaat mkheng ki mii rek avah pqouda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan ki mpha le' ma'amna' raan paamrit rek avah mduh thah mdopelreen piik doklam.

Mleiya mii rekki Mma' kekmei chrang ki thenni mkhut inni kchul lamdon ungta mdophaak chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni Kruwng avah kthlaam chlam rah. Pdainu Isowr avah neen khimkhei hinki lamkla ngi ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya Mma' hinni neen ringinmin ungta knaan minnu ungta nrinnown avah tphan chaakin. Dakat tih naan arlakin ki laika kikjit rekki hanto' the lamda: ‘Neenna Mma' nausuwn rek inpimin,’ mdoditin.

Avaleiyi, neenna Isowr nausuwn rek tkurthuhn leiyi, Isowr rinnow Kchiir avah dow pthla hep daat tidit tih tbin raan pemeh. Isowr a, dultimii ngi mmaan ki mdimdehn nih ungta mdimjiik inni ungta jiiring ngi mditmata jiipowl lih mditmata lung ngi dow pthla rek mdoseemin ava' hep daat pemeh.
Alraangvah Isowr rih hava'lu hep daat mdodeh pinditmaan avah sutpthipiik lamda. Pdainu 'tunvah Mma ngi mmun ktai ki mii mkheng hinni plung tperthlenna' raan ki thenni paupiik mdopiik lam.

Mleiya Mma ngi dultipaam 'leenni pau mdopinditna' rah nit avah mdopelreen dok ksa. Mleiya Mma ngi mdokthlan dok Mma' rinkinditna' ava ngi paukpindit rah. Mma ngi kdiyou thungki Mma' mperdel thung ngi mii mkheng hinni hava' ki mkindit avah mdopandan dok.”

Ungta mmaan nih kdiyou rinkerheelna' ava' marjaakin thungta aangqhe rekki pni chaak lamda pdainu morson rekki hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih hava' paulam avah veikhat tarjaak rah kbinnowl inna,” dilamda.
Anto ngi Paul lih mmaan avah ma lamda sun chda.

Anto'daat yoso, mii aangqhe rekki Paul avah mdilqowi chlamda. Ungta mmaan arlak ki Aresmul ki kunpun ava' thung ki Dionysias mdoditin le' mmiing Damarias mdoditin snu khat le' mmaan tu' kilqhi morson rek rukka kyausap lam.
'Tunnu hava'le' dilli Paul lih Athen khuwpii avah mathida Korinthia khuwpii thah sun chda.

Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh Pontas paamkuwl ki mmiing Akyul a mdoditin Jihudi miikhat kurdutqhida. Ungta mma' avah mnuwn Prisila tung ngi Italy khuwpii ki mthlennaan sowtmlai. Mleiya Klaudias tih Jihudi mkheng rek avah Rome paam thungki msunna' raan paupiik khat mdopiik lam. Ungta Paul lih mmaanve avah pha chlamda.
Mthungta mma ngi mmaanve tu' mdimlown khatsap daat mkurthuh leiyi, mmaanve tu' amsap lamda. Mleiya mmaan nongtlot avah buw'inn ksalam.
Ungta mma ngi tkarngatnit ktaiyi sinegog thung ngi Jihudi rekle' Grik mii rek hinni mlei thepindit piik kchok lamda ungta pnuwm chlamda.
Ungta Sailas le' Timothy ngi Mesedonia paamkuwl ki mtlunin thung ngu Paul avah pthla 'lam thung ngi am chda. Ungta Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit ki sakhi avah Jihudi rek hinni pii chda.

Pdainu mmaan nih mma' mrotmaan ungta pthit lamda mpauin thungta, mma ngi mdomna rek kqhik thida hanto'theda: “naan ahiin avah naan aluwchaiyin 'leenni i'am chso. Ungta neiya naan ahinki kertleu kcha' dok ping. 'Tundil ki kupqhun nih neiya Chaatktlei rek hinni chet chnikdi'.”
Ungta Paul lih ava' thung ki korlouda mmiing Jastas tidit miikhat ava' inn thung ngi luwtda. Ungta mma' avah rinko'owi kcha' miikhat ungta mi'inn avah Sinegog behkat tih ka'am.

Audilli sinegog ava' kpupa mmiing, Krispas tidit ava ngi mi'innmii rek mkheng tung ngi Kruwng hinni lam'rin chda. Ungta Korinthia ki mii knempok rekki ava' mdo'arjaak chaak inni lam'rin chlamda ungta dii luwt chlamda.
'Tunnu jaan nih Kruwng ava ngi rinmer rih Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma', ipau tlit daat ungta rimkdi amma'.
Mleiya Neiyi nang nga akqhi a ungta kuwkhat leh ngi akarnaak qhida aplim nimeh. Mleiya hava' khuwpii thung ngi Nei kmii knempok ki ka'am.”
Ungta mma ngi ava' thung ngi kum khat thla truk amda, mmaan arlak ki Isowr pauna rek avah purchuk chlamda.
'Tunnu Gallaio ngi Akhaia ki paamkpu mkurthuh arlaan nih Jihudi rekki plung khadaat tih korlow lamda, Paul kepteng ngi rip lamda ungta mma' avah luwsang thung ngi pthuwk lamda.
Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi mii rek avah nowlam ki mlehmluk thah Isowr avah luwkbuh rah pnuwm chlamda.”

Ungta Paul lih kpau rah mthe le' Gallaio ngi Jihudi rek hinni hanto'theda: “Jihudi rek naan, naan nih dow karmak mditmata tidina' krow ngi yaikla ava'leen nih adotrotmaan ma'amta neiyi adokarjaak piikna' raanni tethe krow ngi athen.

Pdainu pauna rek ungta mmiing leiyi, mkurthuh bih ungta naan athinaan ki now reklei mkurthuh bih, hava'lu avah naan athung inni apquchaan. Neiya ava' hep daat nongki thenni pau tpindit rah ngei maang,” dida.
Audilli mma ngi luwsang thungki mmaan avah reipthi lamda.
Audilli sinegog kpupa Sosthenas avah Grik rek mkheng inni kbob lamda ungta mmaan nih luwsang aang ngi mmah bun lamda. Pdainu hava' khimkhei avah Gallaio vah dow khatleh kmah ngi binda.
