Paul lih Korinthia khuwpii thuh mpha mrukka am daatda. Audilli mma ngi unau rek thaan lam thida Siria paamkuwl kpha rang ngi thapda. Ungta Prisila le' Akyul a ngi mmah qowi lamda. Pdainu mma ngi mvanthah dokduh ngi, mma ngi paureeltham khat mdotham dok leiyi, Senkria thung ngi mluw pkol chda.
Ungta mmaan nih Ephisia khuwpii thuh arvang lamda ungta mmaanve avah ava' thuh ma lamda. Paul mdak ki sinegog thuh luwtda ungta mma ngi Jihudi rektu' mlei thepindit lamda.
Mmaan nih mhin nih mmaan tu' mpha knembet tih ma'amna' rah maktham chaakin thungta mma ngi avah mat chda.

Pdainu mma ngi mthaan 'lam thuh hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso karvang rang kmaal ava' kdan rah neiyi Jerusalem thah hangnikdi'. Pdainu Isowr plungbin mkurthuh bih, naan ahin nih veikhat kerheel nowl nikdi',” dida. Ungta mma ngi Ephisia ki ngi vanthap chda.
Ungta mma ngi Sijaria khuwpii mtlun le' Jerusalem thah hangda Lamrinlop arvuwi chlamda. Audilli mmah Antiok khuwpii thah yu chda.
Mpha mruk Antiok khuwpii thuh ma'am dilli sun chda. Ungta mma ngi Galatia ungta Phrigia paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi chetda ungta sikhu rek mkheng avah ruhtan pii lamda.

'Tunnu mmiing Apollos tidit Alekjendria khuwpii thung ngi kqou Jihudi miikhat Ephisia thung ngi thlengda. Ungta mma' avah kpaudei langlang miikhat. Ungta mma ngi Kchiir laika rek avah kdung ngi mdodeh chaak.

Hava' mii avah Kruwng 'lam thung ngi kuwmiikhat tih kqhajik ki mdothe piik dok. Mma ngi Johon diipluwna' daat chrel dei chyoso mma ngi pthla thung ngi plung mdopluw chaak ki Kruwng ki mlei avah mthungjik ki theda ungta mdopurchuh chaak kchow.

Ungta mma ngi sinegog thuh chang karngam mih tpau chaak pqhunda. Pdainu Akyul a le' Prisila ngi marjaak dokin le' mma' avah own ptliing lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Isowr 'lam avah kerkheel set tih mthungjik ki thepindit piik lamda.

Ungta Apollos tih diipii klaanda Akhaia thah tche rah mngei thungta unau rekki sikhu rek hinthah paukjit khat kjit lamda, mmaan nih Apollos avah mdo'arlaan chaak lamna' rah paukjit thung ngi ksop chlamda. Ungta mma ngi mheitlun thungta plungnee ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' rek avah Apollos tih kdung ngi bom chlamda.
Mleiya mma ngi Jihudi rek pauna avah miipii maiyi ko'oltek ki reen pthida. Ungta mma ngi Kchiir laika rekki, Jisu avah Mesaiah ava' tidit avah kindit tih tedet chlamda.

'Tunnu Apollos tih Korinthia khuwpii thuh ma'am daat arlaan nih Paul lih karthak ktong ki paamkuwl rek thah kthleng ngi chetda. Ungta Ephisia khuwpii thah arvangda ava' thuh mma ngi sikhu aangqhe rek avah kurdut qhi lamda.

Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih alamrin chaakin thung ngi Pthla Kchiir avah arlaan chaak dokin mowi?” Ungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih Pthla Kchiir ka'am tidit avah tarjaak ruk arja mlai inring.”
Ungta Paul lih mmaan hinni theda: “Taluhep kdu ki diiluwna' ado'arlaan chaak inno?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Neen nih Johon diipluwna' ava' kdo'arlaan chaakin,” dilamda.

Ungta Paul lih dakat tih hanto'theda: “Johon vah plung tperthlenna' ki diiluwna' ava ngi dii mdopluw. Mleiya mma ngi mii rek hinni hanto'theda: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih mma' dilthah karvang rang Mma' tidit tah Khrista Jisu ava' hinni lammdorin chaak raan,’ mdodit.”
Ungta mmaan nih hava' mdo'arjaakin ava ngi Paul lih mmaan avah Kruwng Jisu miing 'leenni diipluwt chlamda.
Ungta mmaan 'leenni Paul lih mkhut mthiik piiklam thungta Pthla Kchiir avah mmaan 'leenni arjungda. Ungta mmaan nih pau ktleiyi pau chlamda ungta pau purphuwng chlamda.
'Tunnu hava' mii rek mkheng avah sowm lei 'knii arveel lam.
Ungta Paul lih sinegog thung ngi luwtda, mma ngi ningqit ktaak ki thla kdum thung ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' ki mlei avah thepindit piik lamda ungta mmaan avah pnuwm chlamda.

Pdainu marlakin ki aangqhe rekka muplungin pchaida ungta tethepqowi lam mda ungta 'Lam ava' kepteng ngi kqha kma' avah miipii rek aang ngi the lamda. Audilli Paul lih mmaan avah mapthi lamda. mma ngi sikhu rekka qhi lamda ungta mniiktaiyi Tairenas ki kurchuk'inn thuh mlei avah thepindit piik lamda.
Ungta hanto ngi hava ngi kum 'knii thuh tlow tlit chda. Ava ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am mii mkheng tidit tah Jihudi rek rukku ungta Grik rek rukku Kruwng Jisu pauna avah arja chlamda.
Ungta ruhtan nong kenreel totlot pchaanna' ruhtanna' avah Isowr rih Paul hinni piida.

Mleiya mmaan nih buwlaak mditmata mbuw perjeel daat yoso mdaksa tu' korthowng khimkhei lou lamda, ungta kkowi mii rek hinni marvansinin cheu ava ngi dam chlamda, ungta mthungin ki tarnam kqha kma' rek avah thuwk chda.

Audilli Jihudi rek arlak ki tlowng kervelda pthla kqha kma' krei pchaang k'dim aangqhe ka'am lam. Mmaan nih tarnam kqha kma' kthlowi rek 'leenni Kruwng Jisu miing ktham rah korthlong lamda. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' thelamda: “Neen nih Paul lih mdoparjaam Jisu miing ngi paupiik akpiik inna,” dilamda.
Ungta Jihudi mii, mmiing Skevia tidit thimpu kenreel khat ava' chapa tikhiu rek avaleh ngi hava'lu nong avah mdotlotin.
Ungta tarnam kqha kma' ava ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neiyi Jisu a kdeh ungta Paul rukka kdeh pdainu naanna kuwleen pti?”

Audilli tarnam kqha kma' kthlowi mii ava ngi m'leenin nih yuwngda ungta mkheng inni ko'oltek ki arbun lamda, ungta mmaan avah pchaang chlamda. Ungta mma ngi mbuwdiirin kpha ruk khowpiik lamda ungta plim lamda. Ava' dilli mmaan nih inn ava' thung ki klim mih ungta dona ktaak ki chen chlamda.

Ungta Ephisia thung ngi ka'am Jihudi rek ungta Grik mii rek mkheng inni hava' pau avah arja lamda. Audilli mmaan 'leenni ningqitna' thuwkda ungta mmaan nih Kruwng Jisu miing avah kdung ngi panpaak chlamda.
Ungta 'tunnu lamkrin dok kcha' rek knempok ki thleng lamda ungta mdotlotin kqha kma' mkheng avah thethuh chlamda.

Ungta 'kdim rek ava' rukku mmaan ki laika rek avah arheisin pok lamda, mmaan mkheng inni miipii rek maiyi avale' avah purtuwl lamda ungta bung pthi lamda. Ungta mdobun pthiin laika rek ava' khon avah mtaiyin thungta sumpowl qiit pun somparnga tet tih tai lamda.
Anto ngi Kruwng pauna avah kparja ngi karjaamda ungta ruh ktang ngi amda.

Mma ngi hava' dow khimkhei ava' mupqut dilli, Paul lih muplungril lih, Mesedonia le' Akhaia paamkuwl rek kthleng ngi mche dilli Jerusalem phanikdi' ungta neiyi ava' thah ktlun dilli Rome rukka kdovellap rah tidit bin chda.
Audilli mma ngi Mesedonia paamkuwl thah mma' kbom mii 'knii rek Timothy le' Erastas avah heisida. Mma ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh ksowt bong ngi, mpha mruk thuh amda.
Mpha ava' arveel lih 'Lam ava' ki mleiyi klin nih mii rek thung ngi raal kthuwk rah theda.

Mleiya mmiing Demetrias mdoditin jiipowl ksa miikhat ava ngi Artemis luwbuk'inn pthla avah jiipowl lih sada. Mma ngi jiipowl lih ava' ksa rah dimkdei mii knempok ki thida. Ungta dimkdei mii rek avah sum knem mih mdoplot chaak lam.
Mma ngi ava'lu dimklou nongmii rekle' mma' dimklou nongmii rek avah own purkuwk lamda. Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek, asuwn! neen nih hava' nong totlotin ava ngi sum knempok ki tarlaan chaakin.

Ungta naan nih Ephisia thung daat kma' Asia paamkuwl mkhengsou thung ngi talu kthuwk tidit avah amikin nih adeh dokin ungta arjaakin. Hava' Paul ava ngi mii rek knempok ki pnuwm chda ungta hava' thungki perheelda. mma ngi, ‘khut tih tsak isowr avah Isowr pemeh.’ dida.

Ava' vah hava ngi neen nnongtlotin qhatmana' daat kma' mma ngi klin nu'isowr Artemis luwbuk'inn ava'ruk tukmdosut pemeh. Ungta mma ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am mii mkheng ngi ungta dultipaam mih luw mdobuk nu'isowr ava' konlorna' ava' rukka ke'ekrep rah mthe a,” dida.
Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta plungthit perleer lamda ungta mmaan nih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Ephisia mii rekki Artemis ava ngi klinsi!” dilamda.

Ungta khuwpii mkheng thung ngi plung karmana ngi dim chda. Ungta mmaan nih Mesedonia ki Gaius le' Aristarkas Paul tu' kilqhi rek avah kyowng lamda ungta tuwl'inn thung ngi plung khatsap pih heiqhi lamda.
Ungta Paul lih miipii rek hinni tehei rah ngeida pdainu sikhu rekki mhei rang avah thlot lamda.
Ungta mma' plap rek nongmii kurthuwk rek Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am rekki pau arheipthla lamda ungta ktham chlamda tidit tah mma ngi, ‘Tuwl'inn thung ngi mluw rang pemeh,’ dilamda.
Ungta kunpun avah muplungin karmak ter chda. Mmaan nih owng lamda aangqhe ngi dow morson khat the lamda. Mii meknem mih talu rang ngi kurtuwlsap inping ngow, tidit avah dei lam mda.

Jihudi rekki, miipii rek arlak ki Alekjender avah qen pthuwk lamda ungta mdothe rang avah arheithe piik lamda. Alekjender rih rim ma'amna' raanni mkhut tih partamda. Audilli mma ngi mthina miipii rek thungki makparkhaan chaakna' rah bin chda.
Mmaan nih mma' avah Jihudi mii tidit mdehn thungta mkheng inni krowl khadaat tih owng lamda: “Ephisia mii rekki Artemis ava ngi klinsi,’ dilamda mpharit 'knii arveel owng lamda.”

Ungta khuwpiinong kikjit mii ava ngi miipii rek avah mapdai dok lam dilli hanto'theda: “Ephisia khuwpii ki mii rek talulu mii rangda hava' kdei kma' rang a. Ephisia khuwpii avah nu'isowr Artemis luwbuk'inn ungta Jeus hinki arjunktla dow pthla ava' ksutpqowi tidit tah mdodehn.
Avaleiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi mdomat pchaanmah leiyi, naan nih rim a'am raan. Naan nih dow khatleh ruk plungthit kpornowr rih adotlot raan pemeh.
Naan nih luwbuk'inn thungki dow kupru kma'pa ungta naanki nu'isowr hin rukku pthitda kpau kma'pa mii rek avah naan nih hava' thuh arheiqhiin a.

Avaleiyi, Demetrias ungta mma' dimklou rekki kuwmiikhat 'leenni mdorotmaan ma'am cheentung ngi mmaan nih tikjit tih apluwt lamso, luwsang rukka kirtilda ka'am daat ungta nongmii rek rukka ka'am lam a. Ungta mmaan nih ava' thung ngi khat le' khat hinni mraalin ikirpii chlamso.
Pdainu naan nih talutalu yoso kukthuwk ki tathlaam rah abinin bih mnowpa ngi kunpun ava ngi avale' avah mdoparman rah.
Mleiya tuni ki kthuwk nong rek ava ngi neenna raal kupthuwk lik ki tidina' mraal mikpii raan. Ungta neen nih hava' mnowpa kma'pa ngi tkurkunaan ki mlei kindit tpiikna' raan m'lam am nimeh.”
Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe dilli, kunpun avah pqiin pthida.
'Tunnu vaangklum ava' mqut dok dilli, Paul lih sikhu rek ko'own rah heisi lamda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan avah moksow chaak lam dilli thaan lam thida Mesedonia paamkuwl thah kchet rah pqhun chda.
Mma ngi paamklek rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda ungta mmaan avah kdung ngi ksop chlamda ungta mqutna' thah mma ngi Gris paamkuwl tlung chda.

Ungta ava' thuh mma ngi thla kdum amda. Ungta mma ngi Siria paamkuwl thah arkuwng 'leenni kchet rah mthe arlaan nih Jihudi rekki ke'eyou rang ngi ptuwn lamda. Mthungta mma ngi Mesedonia paamkuwl kthleng ngi kchet rang ngi plung reel chda.

Hava' avah mma' kkorthlowqhi kcha' rek miing, mmaan avah Beria khuwpii ki Sopeter, Thessalonika khuwpii ki Aristarkas ungta Sekandas. Darbi khuwpii ki Gaius ungta Timothy. Ungta Asia paamkuwl ki mii rek Tikaikas ungta Trophimas le'lam.
Ungta hava' mii rek ava ngi kduh thaan nih vang lamda, ungta Troas khuwpii thuh neenve a, marda chaanda.
Thowl ktaak thenpen tchaakna' nit ava' dilli neenve ngi Philippia khuwpii ki ngi thap innu nii parnga dilli neenve ngi Troas phaan nuh. Ungta ava' thuh morson rektu' neenve a niitikhiu amsap innu.

Arveen ki mkhatna' nit ava' thung ngi sikhu rekki thenpen kcha rah thleng kurduhsap lamda. Paul lih mii rek hinni pauda. Mleiya mma ngi mkorjown nit tih tsun rah mdobin leiyi, mma ngi thanqim kpha ngi pau chda.
Neen kkurdutnaan karthak ki innkhaar ava' thung ngi meila knempok ki lengda.

Ungta kseetnau mmiing Eutaikas tidit khat ava' thuh ka'am. Ungta mmah khirkiik baan 'leenni ko'ongda. Paul lih ksowt tih mpau thungta mmik khuda ungta kdung dok ki iipdok chda. Ungta inn kurtuwn kdum thungki yuntlada, mmaan nih mchomin thungta diyou chda.
Audilli Paul lih yungqumda, kseetnau ava' 'leenni popda ungta arpomda. Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: “Vaang lummaan! Mtadaal ka'am daat a, ungta mrinkum mhin nih ka'am daat a.”
Audilli karthak ki innkhaar thang ngi hangkalda ungta thenpen avah khuida ungta chada. Ungta mma ngi mpha ksowt tih pau nowlda. Ungta khu mvaar kpha thung ngi pau thida anto' sun chda.
Ungta mmaan nih kseetnau avah kring ngi arvanqhi lamda. Ungta hava ngi kdung ngi muplungin ngam chaakna' khat kurthuwkda.

Audilli neen nih arkuwng 'leenni kal innu. Asos khuwpii thah vanthap innu. Ungta ava' thuh neen nih Paul avah arkuwng thuh kdokalqhina' raan tlown nuh mleiya Paul lah mkhuh ngi laan thah kchet rang ngi korthlong chdokda.
Ungta mma ngi Asos khuwpii thah mtlun qhiinda mthungta neen nih arkuwng 'leenni kalqhisap innu, Mitilen khuwpii thah yuwn nuh.

Ava' thung ki korlou innu kdovanthaan ava ngi mupduknii ngi Keos raal khat heiphaan nuh. Mupduknii vah neen nih Samos diiloipaam phaan nuh. Ungta neen nih Trojiliam khuw klin thung ngi mjaanvah am innu ungta mupduknii ngi Melitas khuwpii tlung innu.
Asia paamkuwl thuh mpha tpenveimana' rang ngi Paul lih Ephisia khuwpii klaanda tvanthah rah binda. Mleiya mkirsit tah Pentikost ki kmaal avah mma ngi Jerusalem thuh mdodan nuwm leiyi, koknot kcha'.
Melitas khuwpii thungki ngi Ephisia khuwpii thah mii heipthlada lamrinlop thungki kver rek avah hei'own lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih merheitlunin thungta mmaan hinni mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi Asia thung ngi rukrirep pih kukhuh ktherthok ki kupqhun nih neiyi taluhep pih naan tu' mpha mkheng thung ngi ka'am ping tidit tah naan nih adehn.
Neiyi Kruwng nong avah kpirdil dok kcha ngi ungta arthli kbuh ngi kdotlot chaak. Jihudi rekki muptuwn lamda chii mtepreel lam kpha thuh mnong avah kdotlot chaak.
Neiyi naan athenni kqha rang dow khadaat ruk ktlow kmah ngi kdomaak daat ka'am pemeh, pdainu adokparjaak dokin. Ungta neiyi miipii rek maiyi ungta a'inn a'inn thaan nih adokpurchuh dokin.
Neiyi Jihudi rek hin ruk ungta Grik mii rek hin rukku, Kruwng hinni plung tperthlen chaak ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ava' lamtrin chaakna' rang ki thenni kqhajik ki sakhi kdopiik chaak.
Ungta 'tunnu asuwn neiya Pthla Kchiir ava ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thah kahang rah mtisi a. Neiyi ava' thah k'leen nih talulu kthuwk rang tidit tah dei maang.
Neiyi kdodeh chaak rang avah kche kchena' khuwpii ktai thung ngi, ‘thiirrii rowngmii tkurthuhna' le' tyat tperteelna' thina' daat tih atardat a,’ dida, Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mpandan piik chda.

Pdainu neiyi, kchena' lam avah kanpa ngi kdopqut chaakna' rah ungta Kruwng Jisu hinki kdo'arlaan chaak nongtlotna' tidit tah Isowr plungnee ki kqhapaumin ava' ki sakhi kdopiik chaakna' rah neiya hava' dow rek 'leenni kuplungyatna' ammeh ungta krinkum avah nei kthen nih msit ka'am tidit tih tai maang.
Ungta dakat tih neiyi arlak inni Kruwngpaalna' ava' ki mlei ava' kparjaam rah kchet kcha' dok ping. Ungta 'tunnu asuwn! arlakin ki kuwkhat leh rukku kmai avah veikhat dei nimaan tih, tidit kdeh a.
Avaleiyi, tuni vah, neiyi naan ahin nih sakhi kpandan chaak a tidit tah hava' mii mkheng ava' ki hii buwkna' ava' thung ki neiya kertleu kcha' dok ping.
Mleiya naan ahin nih neiyi akparjaakin thuh Isowr ki plungbinpsuk mkheng avah kdoptham dok ka'am pemeh.

Avaleiyi, naan nih adaksaan ungta Pthla Kchiir rih ksutpqowi rah adotsi dokin miilop rek mkheng avah arindei chaan. Naanna Mma' mdakkat tih Mihii ngi mdotren dok Isowr lamrinlop ava' ki yaukqhi akurthuh raan.
Neiyi akmaakin dilthah saa kring kcha tkeikraang arlak inni karvang rah. Ungta mmaan nih miilop khadaat rukka qheek lam nimeh, tidit neiyi kdeh a.
Ungta naan arlakin ki mii rek kpha rukka thuwkdon kurlup pih pau lamdon nih mmaan ki sikhu rek mdopthutna' raan kqhi chlam rah.

Avaleiyi, naan nih akilrin chaak raan! Naan nih abinphaakin tidit tah neiyi kum kdum thung ngi akhengin ahinin nih kdown liit kmah ngi khatkhat tih adokpilqhitin. Neiyi kunthun ruk jaan ruk arthli kbuh ngi havah kdotlot chaak.

Ungta 'tunnu ku'uknau rek neiyi Isowr hinni ungta Mma' pauna ki plungnee thung ngi akparlaan chaak inna. Ungta hava ngi aplin pchaangin don, Isowr rih mdopenje ksa rek mkheng arlak ki alroukchom akpurthuh chraan.
Neiyi kuwkhat leh sumpowl ruk, mditmata jiiring ruk mditmata dona kqha ruk pnermaang.
Naan nih adehn tidit tah hava' kukhut ava ngi neiki kikriin rek ungta kdo'amqhi rekki kriin rek mkheng avah pordon chda.

Neiyi hava' dow mkheng avah adokepdeh dokin, naan nih hava' heppi kdung ngi nong tlown tidon, kapchaang kma' rek avah adobom chaak raan. ‘Mleiya kpii kcha' ava ngi karlaang kcha' mii ava' hinnu msuwkqha,’ dida, Kruwng Jisu mdakkat tih mdothe pauna rek avah abinphaak chaan.”
Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek mthe dok le' ungta mmaan mkheng tung ngi tirdiil lamda rinkthamsap chlamda.
Ungta mmaan mkheng inni Paul avah mlowl thah arpom lamda put lamda ungta kdung ngi qap lamda.
Mma ngi mhin inni, ‘kmai veikhat dei nimaan tih,’ mdodit ava ngi kdung ngi muplungin kham chda, audilli mmaan nih arkuwng kphadek ki da chlamda.

'Tunnu neen nih mmaan hinki ksunin dilli arkuwng 'leenni vang innu kthlengjik ki kvanin ava ngi Kos diiloipaam phaan nuh. Mupduknii ngi Thodes diiloipaam vanphaan nuh ungta ava' thung ki ngi Patara khuwpii thuh vang innu.
Ava' thung ngi neen nih Phininsia paamkuwl thuh kvang rah arkuwng khat phakhot innu ungta mthung ngi kal innu, arkuwng 'leenni vang innu.

Ava' dilli neen nih Saipras diiloipaam avah heidei innu ungta maleh ktong thah vankheel innu, Siria paamkuwl thah arvanthap innu ungta Tair khuwpii tlung innu. Mleiya arkuwng ava' dohor dona rek avah ava' thuh mdopqhum rah.
Ungta ava' thuh neen nih sikhu rek kdehn thungta ava' thuh nii tikhiu am innu. Pthla ar'aang ngi mmaan nih Paul hinni Jerusalem khuwpii thah mahanmana' rah thepiik lamda.

Ungta neenki knitkhuwn mtlan dok thungta k'lamqowi raan thah veikhat sun innu. Ungta mmaan mkheng inni mnuwn ungta mnau rekin tu' khuwpii duwn kphaakin kpha thung ngi mda chaanda. Ungta neen nih truwnpii biing ngi tirdiil innu ungta rinkthamsap innu.
Neen nih khatleh khat kkarthaan dokin dilli arkuwng thuh kal innu ungta mmaan rukka mi'inn thaan nih vangkerheel chlamda.
Ungta neen nih Tair khuwpii ki ngi truwnpii 'lam kdoqowiyin mqut dilli Ptolemais khuwpii phaan nuh, ungta neen nih unau rek avah arvuwi chaannu ungta niikhat mmaan tu' amsap innu.

Mupduknii ngi Paul miqhi rek neenna sun chaan nuh ungta Sijaria khuwpii phaan nuh. Ungta neen nih pauminksi Philip tidit tah tikhiu rek arlak ki khat ava' inn thung ngi luwt innu ungta mma' hinni am innu.
'Tunnu hava' mii ava ngi pau kpurphuwng mchanu kinrim chai plii mdothlowi.
Ungta neen nih mpha mruk ka'amin thung ngi mmiing Agabus tidit khulpu khat avah Judia paamkuwl ki arjungda.

Ungta mma ngi neen kihinin nih mthlen thung ngi mma ngi Paul arkowlke avah louda ungta mdak ki mkhuh korbowl chthida hanto'theda: “Pthla Kchiir ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Hanto' heppi hava' arkowlke kthlowi mii avah Jerusalem khuwpii thuh ka'am Jihudi rekki kbowl lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah Chaatktlei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan lamrah,’ ” dida.
Ungta neen nih hava' dow rek ava' karjaakin thungta, neen le' mmun ava' thuh ka'am mii rekki Jerusalem thah mahanmana' rah Paul hinni pnuwm chaannu.

Audilli Paul lih arthaangda: “Naan nih hanto ngi qapda ungta kuplung adopkuiyin avah talu adobin naanplih? Neiya tbowl daat mda, Kruwng Jisu miing ki thenni Jerusalem thuh kdiyou rang kpha ngi korthlong dok kcha' ping.”
Ungta neen nih kupnuwm pchaanmaan thungta, ‘Isowr plungbin chdaatso,’ diin nuh, rimkdi amchaan nuh.
Ungta nit rek ava' dilli neen nih kdonaan porthlong innu Jerusalem khuwpii thah hang innu.

Ungta Sijaria khuwpii ki sikhu aangqhe rek rukka neen tu' hangsap innu. Mmaan nih neen mukuptlung chraan Saipras ki Mnason tidit tah choduh ki sikhu rek arlak ki khat ava' inn thung ngi neenna mqhi chaanda.
Ungta neen nih Jerusalem khuwpii kphaakin thungta unau rekki kanpa ngi marlaang chaanda.
Mupduknii vah Paul lih morson rek neen tu' James hinni luwtsap innu ungta kver rek mkheng rukka amsap daat lamda.
Ungta mma ngi murvuwi chaak lam dilli, Isowr rih mma' nongtlotna' thung ngi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki mdotlot dow mkheng rek avah mmaan hinni karnaakjik ki song chda.

Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta Isowr ponlor chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul hinni hanto' the lamda: “Ku'uknau'in, asuwn o, Jihudi rek pun tyatya ngi lammrin chaak daat inna ungta mmaan mkhengin avah nowlam 'leenni plung kupluwt kcha' mii reklam.

Pdainu Chaatktlei rek arlak ki ka'am kcha' Jihudi rek hinni, mnaumsuwn rekin vun mdoreen mana' raan mditmata mnowlamin dilkqowiyi mchemana' raan ungta Moses tmaak pthina' rah purchuk lam tinu tidit tih mmaan hinnu nangki alei avah mdoparjaak dokin.
Ava' vah 'tunnu talu totlot raan? Kunpun avah trin kmah kurduh lamrah mleiya nang atlun dok avah karjamun lamrah.
Avaleiyi, neen nih adoktheen heppi mheitlot piik chaan. Neen karlak inni paureeltham ktham dok miichai plii ka'am lam.

Hava' mii rek avah aqhilam rah mmaan tu' adakin ikpirchiir sapin, ungta mmaan nih msamin mdokchi chaakna' raan ki thenni sum avah nang ngi apii chlam. Ungta mii mkheng ngi mmaan nih mdo'arjaak dokin nang aleiki pauson avah anto' kma'pa a, tidit tah nang adak kat tih karnaakjik ki apqowi a ungta nowlam, dilkqowiyi kchet a, tidit adei lamso.

Pdainu lamkrin kcha' Chaatktlei rek leivah neen nih hanto ngi kupqum dokin. Mleiya mmaan nih dow pthla rek hinni rintparlaan dok dow rek thungki ungta hii thungki ungta teklelyow thungki ungta plungbindak kmah ngi lowsang kilqhi thungki ikekneeng chlamso.”

Ungta mupduknii ngi Paul lih mii rek avah qhi lamda ungta mma ngi mdaksa avah mmaan tu' kpirchiir chlamda. Ava' dilli mma ngi tikpirchiirna' ki mpha avah teden ktlang rang ungta mmaan ktai ki thenni teden thung ngi rintparlaan chaak rang tidit ava' kparjaak lam rang ki thenni, luwbuk'inn thuh luwt chlamda.

'Tunnu nii tikhiu kpha chrah mthe arlaan nih, Asia paamkuwl ki Jihudi rekki Paul lih luwbuk'inn thuh ma'am avah dei lamda. Mthungta mmaan nih miipii rek mkheng avah siinchaak lam thida Paul avah kyowng lamda.

Mmaan nih hanto' owng lamda: “Isreel chaat thungki mii rek, mheibom chaan! Hava' mii avah mii rek hinni ungta nowlam 'leenni ungta hava' mun ava' kepteng ngi, mmun ktai thung ngi mii rek kpurchuk mii ava'. Ungta mma ngi hava' han'tun nih, Grik mii rek avah hava' luwbuk'inn thung ngi luwqhi lamda hava' mmun kchiir avah mtopbor rah.” dilamda.
Mleiya mmaan nih khuwpii ava' thung ngi Paul lih Ephisia khuwpii ki mii, Trophimas tu' mduh thah mkilqhiin avah mdodehn. Avaleiyi, Paul lih mma' avah luwbuk'inn ava' thung ngi luwqhipakda mdoditin.

Ungta hava ngi khuwpii mkheng avah vaanglum chda ungta mii rekki arheichen lamda Paul avah kyowng lamda. Ungta Luwbuk'inn thungki rowng duwn thah qhi pthuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih m'tunkat daat tih paltong rek avah arkam lamda.
Mmaan nih mma' ke'eyou rah mthemeekin arlaan nih Rome raalmiilop ki raalmii luwkqhi hinni Jerusalem khuwpii mkheng thung ngi raal kthuwk a tidit ki pau avah tlungda.

Ungta mma ngi kbeisek ki raalmii rek aangqhe le' raalmii arja khat kpupa rekle' qhida mmaan hinni yuchen lamda. Ungta mmaan nih raalmii luwkqhi avale' raalmii rek mdehn thungta Paul mdobunin avah down lamda.
Audilli raalmii luwkqhi ava ngi heinaida Paul avah kyowngda. Ungta mma ngi thiirrii 'knii ngi mdobowlna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Audilli mma ngi mma' avah kuw, ungta talu mtlot tidit, kheelda.

Ungta miipii rek arlak ki aangqhe rekki owng lamda msik khat the lamda ungta morson aangqhe rekki msik khat nowl the lamda. Mthungta mma ngi vaangmlum inni mkindit kat avah dei pchaang mda. Avaleiyi, mma ngi Paul avah raalmii inn thah tuhunqhina' rah paupiik pii lamda.
Ungta Paul lih arkal rek mphaak thungta mma' avah miipii rekki eenghal mdotlotin leiyi, raalmii rekki mdopuwk raan thah tlada.
Mleiya miipii rekki hanto' owng lamda, “Mma' avah aqhi dokin,” dilamda, mdil mdqowi daatin.

Ungta Paul avah raalmii inn thuh kluwqhi rah mtheen arlaan nih mma ngi raalmii luwkqhi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Ahin nih kpau chaak krow rang mowi,” dida? Ungta mma ngi: “Grik pau adeh mow,” dida arthaangda?
“Nang nga mphakhat thung ngi raal kupqhun, mii pun plii qhidokda paamkbiik laiyi kchen dok miike'eyou lop thungki Egypt mii ava' ptipmeh mow,” dida?

Pdainu Paul lih hanto'theda: “Neiya Silisia paamkuwl ki Tarsas khuwpii ki ping, Jihudi mii ping. Ungta neiya ava' mkenreelsii khuwpii ki miikhat ping. Neiyi mii rek hinni pau kdothe chaakna' rah mheirot piikcha', dinuh akaktham chaak a.”
Anto ngi mma ngi mrotpiik dok thungta Paul lih arkal 'leenni rip thida mii rek hinni mkhut tih partamda. Ungta mii rekki kdairim mih ma'amin le' mma ngi Hibriu pau vih hanto'theda, arvuwi chlamda.
“Mii rek, unau rek ungta apa'leen 'tun naan a'aang inni neiyi kparkhaan chaakna' pau kdothe havah mhei'arjaak piik chaan.
Ungta mmaan nih Hibriu pau vih mpau marjaakin thungta kdungbet tih kdaiyi am lamda. Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda!

Neiya dakat tih Silisia paamkuwl ki Tarsas khuwpii thuh kqou kcha' Jihudi khat ping. Pdainu hava' khuwpii thung ngi linnu Gamaliel hinni kurchuk kcha' ping. Mma ngi npu'leen nowlam dilkqowiyi kqhajik ki mdotpurchuh chaak ungta tuni naan akhengin ahehep inni nei ruk Isowr plung kupluwt kcha' khat ping.
Ungta neiyi hava' 'Lam ava' kqowi rek avah kdiyou kpha ngi tyattraanna' tperteel lam nuh. Neiyi snu ruk psel ruk bowl lam nuh rowng'inn thuh kdoparlaan lam.

Hava' 'leennu thimpu kenreel le' kunpun mkheng ki kver rek rukku nei ksakhi avah pii lamda. Ungta Damaskas thungki unau rek hinki rah paukjit kpha rukka neiyi mmaan hinki lounu. Mleiya neiyi ava'thah ka'am mii rek avah bowl lam thida mraal suwkthuhna' tpiik lamna' rah Jerusalem thah arhunkqhi rang ngi ava'thah yunu.
Pdainu 'tunnu kunthunqim arveel lih hanto' thuwkda. Neiyi Damaskas khuwpii kphaak tiingtiing arlaan nih kdodeh dokmah ngi, parvaan ki ar'aang klin khat arjuda mokloijik ki mtaanda.
Mthungta neiya dulti thah tlu chnuh ungta krowl khat tih kihin nih hanto' mdothe arjanu: ‘Saul, Saul, taluleiyi nang ngi, neiya tyat chiireelna' atpiik a?’ dida.
Mthungta neiyi hanto ngi arthaang chnuh: ‘Kruwng nang nga kuw ptil lih?’ Ungta Mma ngi kihin nih hanto ngi theda: ‘Neiya nang ngi tyat chiireelna' adotpiik meek, Najareth ki Jisu ping.’ dida.
Ungta kmiiqhi rek rukku mar'aang avah mmikkat inni dei chlamda ungta mningin pqit lamda. Pdainu mmaan vah nei kihin nih kpau Mma' krowl avah arja lammeh.

Mthungta neiyi hanto' thenu: ‘Kruwng neiya talu tlow chnikli?’ dinuh. Kruwng ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Ikerdel rang ngi Damaskas khuwpii thah vang. Ava' thuh nang ngi adotlot rang ngi mdoporthlon dok dow mkheng rek avah talu rang tidit ahin nih akthepiik rah.’ Dida.
Ungta mar'aang klengreen dotlot tih neiya khudei pchaang manu. Avaleiyi, nei kmiiqhi rekki kukhut thah mokyowng lamda, Damaskas khuwpii thah mvanqhi chlamda.
Audilli nowlam ki dilkqowiyi rinko'owi kcha' ungta ava' thuh ka'am Jihudi rek mkheng ngi mrinpaumin mdopqhat sapin Anania mdoditin miikhat ka'am.
Mma ngi kihin nih thlengda ungta kihin nih rip thida hanto'theda: ‘Ku'uknau Saul, mik kahar arlaang cha',’ dida kihin nih theda. Ungta qhang ava'kat thung ngi neiyi mma' avah kmik ki dei chnuh.

Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi Isowr plungbin Kindit Khat avah amik ki adodeh chaakna' rah ungta Mma' nehr kat thungki krowl ado'arjaak chaakna' rah neenki npa'leen ki Isowr rih nang nga atokchol chaak dok a.
Mleiya havah nang ngi mii mkheng hinni amik ki adodeh ungta ado'arjaak rek 'leenni Mma' sakhi kurthuwk chnadi'.
Ungta 'tunnu taluda nang ngi ado'ardat tah? Irip rang ngi dii iluwt cha'. Ungta Kruwng miing adotham chaak ki apnu arve mkheng avah alqhucha',’ dida.
Audilli neiyi Jerusalem khuwpii thah kuhun kerheel thung ngi hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya neiyi luwbuk'inn thuh rinkaktham chaak meek arlaan nih rinmer khat deinu.

Mleiya Jisu ngi kihin nih hanto' mdothe deinu: ‘Iknot ungta kbeisek ki ikorlou rang ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thungki ithuwk dok mleiya Nei kleiyi adopiik nangki arinpaumin avah mmaan nih arlaang lam nimeh,’ dida.
Ungta neiyi, ‘Kruwng, Sinegog ktai thung ngi Nang ahin nih lamkrin kcha' rek avah rowng'inn thuh khum lam nuh ungta kdobun lam avah mmaan nih mdodehn.
Ungta Nang asakhi Stiphen hii mupthuhn thung rukku neiya mhin nih krip daat ping,’ dinuh.
Audilli Jisu ngi kihin nih theda: ‘Ikorlou rang ngi ichet, mleiya Neiyi mmun hava' thungki lamkla ngi Chaatktlei rek hinni apthla nikdi',’ dida.”

Ungta mmaan nih mpauthe avah hava' mdothe kpha vah arjaakpiik lamda. Pdainu ava'dil vah mmaan nih owng lamda: “Hava' hep daat mii avah dultipaam thuh ma'am rang pemeh mleiya mma' avah mrin ki mtikkcha pemeh,” dilamda.
Audilli mmaan nih mo'ownchun inni mbuwmdiirin jen lamda ungta vaiphul parvaan thah ponthowm lamda.

Ungta raalmii luwkqhi ava ngi Paul avah raalmii'inn rek thuh mdoluwqhi dokna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta mma ngi taluleiyi m'leen nih ko'owng lam a, tidit mdodehna' rah mma' avah riikchung ngi bunda pau tkheel rah, dida.

Ungta mmaan nih mdobunna' raan ki thenni saavunrii ngi mbowl arjitin thung ngi ava' thuh krip daat raalmii arja khat kpupa ava' hinni Paul lih hanto'theda: “Naan nih Rome miikhat avah nperteel duh ngi tbun rang avah nowlam vah mrot mow,” dida.

Raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi hava' marjaak thungta, raalmii lopkqhi ava' hinni vada vansongda, ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adotlot avah ikilrin deicha', mleiya hava' mii avah Rome miikhat,” dida.
Audilli raalmii lopkqhi ava ngi vada Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Athe o, nang nga Rome mii pti?” Ungta Paul lih, “Ou, Rome mii ping,” dida.

Ungta raalmii lopkqhi ava ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi sum knempok kdopiik ki hava' paammii tkurthuhna' avah kdophan chaak,” dida. Ungta Paul lih hanto'theda: “Pdainu neiya paammii khat tih kqou kcha' ping,” dida.
Audilli mma' hinni pau kekheel rah kthe rek avah mma' hinki kbeisek ki korsown dok chlamda. Ungta raalmii lopkqhi ava' rukka mma ngi Rome miikhat ava' mdobowl leiyi, mningpqitda.

Mupduknii vah mma ngi taluleiyi Jihudi mii rekki mma' avah mraal mdopiikin tidit mdodeh nuwm leiyi, mma ngi thimpukenreel rekle' kunpun mkheng rek hinni paupiik pii lamda purbuk lamda. Audilli mma ngi Paul avah perthletda ungta arjukqhida mmaan aang ngi topko'ongda.

Audilli Paul lih Senhedrin avah suwrim lam thida hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek, neiyi krinkum mkheng avah Isowr aang ngi plung kindit tih knong purkhum nuh, tuni kpha thung ngi arvang ka'am ping,” dida.
Ava'kat thung ngi thimpu kenreel Anania ngi mhin nih krip daat rek hinni Paul avah mnehr thah mdotpeen lamna' rah paupiik pii lamda.

Audilli Paul lih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Bang toppowl dang hep daat nang avah Isowr rih aktpeeng rah. Mleiya nang ngi ko'ong tinu nowlam dilkqowiyi nei k'leen nih pau apindit tah? Pdainu nang ngi taluleiyi neiya nowlam klaan tinu mektpeeng rah paupiik apiik lam a?”
Ungta mhin nih krip rekki Paul hinni hanto' the lamda: “Nang rang mow Isowr thimpu kenreelsi krai rangnga?”

Audilli Paul lih hanto'theda: “Unau rek, neiyi mma' avah thimpu kenreelsi ava' tidit deimaang. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: ‘Nang ngi nang amii rekki paamkpu ava' 'leenni kthi adothe rang pemeh,’ ” mdodit. (Mpk. 22:28)

Pdainu Paul lih mmaan avah lopkhat tih Saddusy rek thungki lam ungta morson rek ava ngi Pharisy thungki reklam tidit mdodeh leiyi, Senhedrin ava' thung ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Mii rek, ungta unau rek, neiya Pharisy khat ping ungta Pharisy khat chapa ping. Pdainu plungbipsukn le' kdiyou rinkerheelna' ki mleiyi neiya mitpindit meeksli a.”
Ungta mma ngi hava' mthe thungta Pharisy rekle' Saddusy rek arlak ki tkolrotmana' khat pthuwkda, ungta hava ngi Senhedrin avah penqhen pthida.
Mleiya Saddusy rekvah trin kerheelna' ungta vaantamsi mditmata pthla tidit ka'am pemeh mdoditin. Pdainu Pharisy rekvah mikniing ngi mdorot chaakin.

Audilli mmaan arlak ki kdung ngi vaanglumna' khat thuwkda. Ungta Pharisy rek thungki nowlam chukpu rekki rip lamda mdokthitnaan nih hanto' thelamda. “Neen nih hava' mii 'leenni mthitna' khadaat ruk phang maanring. Pdainu pthla ngi mditmata vaantamsi ngi mhin nih mpauna' ma'am cheentung ngi neen nih Isowr kepteng ngi karnaakqhi karnaakqhi maancheh.”

Ungta kdungreen nih vaanglumna' mthuh thungta mii rekki Paul avah mikqiik mikqiik ki kqetkrep lam rang pakda, mdoditin leiyi, raalmii luwkqhi avah mningqi chda. Avaleiyi, mma ngi raalmii rek hinni, Paul avah mii rek arlak ki raanni qenthuhda raalmii'inn thang ngi mdo’arhun qhina’raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda.

Pdainu mupduknii jaan nih Kruwng ngi Paul hinni ripda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Paul arda aprok, nang ngi kindit deek ki Jerusalem khuwpii thuh, Nei kthen nih sakhi adopiik heppi Rome khuwpii thung rukku adopiik rah.”

Ungta khu mvaar thungta Jihudi mii aangqhe rekki khadaat tih kthikerseel lamda ungta kthikartham na' khat tih korbowl lamda, hanto' the lamda: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih Paul me'eyow duhn khimkheiyi tchaak ruk tchaakin nimeh ungta tneek ruk tneekin nimeh’ kirdi lamda.
'Tunnu hava' kthi kkerseel mii rek avah somplii kerdei lam.

Mmaan nih thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rek hinni thleng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih khadaat tih kthiktham paureel klin khat 'leenni korbowl dok kcha' inping. Mleiya neen nih Paul ke'eyow duhn khimkhei inni dow khatleh cha nimaanring.

'Tunnu naan le' Senhedrin ava ngi raalmii luwksu hinni, naan nih mma' lei avah kukthuk bet tih kthlaam nuwm inna, adiin rang ngi mma' avah naan ahin nih mdo’arjuk qhina’ raan iktham chaan. Ungta neenna mma ngi hava' mphaakduh ngi ke'eyou rang ngi korthlong dok kcha' inping,” dilamda.
Pdainu Paul charnu chapa ava ngi mdoptuwnin avah arjada, mma ngi vada raalmii'inn rek thung ngi luwtthida Paul hinni avah sonpiikda.
Audilli Paul lih raalmii arja khat kpu rek arlak ki khat ownda ungta hanto'theda: “Hava' kseetnau avah raalmii luwksu hinni vaanqhicha' mma ngi mhin nih dow mruk mdothe rah ka'am a,” dida.

Audilli mma ngi kseetnau avah, raalmii luwksu ava' hinni vaanqhida. Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Rowngmii Paul ava ngi mo'ownda ungta hava' kseetnau ava ngi: ‘Ahin nih dow mruk mdothe rah ka'am’ dida, mma' avah ahin nih kdo'arhanqhina' rang ki thenni ktham chda,” dida.
Mthungta raalmii luwksu ava ngi mma' avah mkhut thah kyowngda msiirthah heiqhi ptliing thida hanto' kheelda: “Taluda nang ngi kihin nih tson rah adobin nah?”

Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Jihudi rekki nang ngi Paul avah pduknii ki kunpun ava' thung ngi adopthuhna' rah ahin nih iqhil inche kdi ngi kerseel doklam. Mleiya mmaan nih mma' lei avah kukthuk bet tih kthlaam num dotlot ktlow lamrah.

Pdainu nang ngi mmaan dothe avah pqowima' mleiya mii somplii kerdeiyi mma' avah ptuwn lamda ka'am daat lam a. Mleiya mmaan nih Paul me'eyow duhn khimkheiyi tchaak ruk kcha kma' ungta tneek ruk knee kma' rang ngi kthiktham paureel pau mdoreel dokin. 'Tunnu mmaan nah korthlongjik lamda ka'am lam a. Ungta mmaan nih nang apauqum rang hehe daat mdo'ardat daatin,” dida.
Audilli raalmii luwksu ava ngi, “nang ngi nei kihin nih hava' dow rek adoson avah kuwkhat leh hinni thema', dida kseetnau avah psun pthida.”

Ungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpu rek 'knii own lam thida mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih raalmii arja 'knii, skowl raalmii somtikhiu ungta kchei ksin raalmii arja 'knii avah Sijaria khuwpii thah kchet rah aporthlong tengin. Ungta naan nih jaanki mutkutna' qhang thung ngi ikorlouin rah ichetin.
Ungta naan nih Paul 'tuwnna' rah saa khat aporthlongin rah, kqhajik ki Paul avah paamkpusi Pheliks hinni aqhi dokin,” dida.
Ungta mma ngi hava' mkurduh ki heppi paukjit khat avah kjitda.
“Klaudias Lysias neiyi, Kparthaangsi paamkpu Pheliks, nah ahin nih akurvuwi chaak a.
Jihudi mii rekki hava' mii avah kyowng lamda ungta eyousou lamda. Pdainu neiyi raalmii rektu' chetnu mma' avah Rome mii tidit kdo'arjaak leiyi, kdosan.
Ungta neiyi taluleiyi mmaan nih mdopsulin tidit kdodeh nuwm leiyi, mmaan ki kunpun thung ngi mma' avah pthuwk nuh.
Pdainu mmaan nih mdopsulnaan ki mlei avah mmaan ki nowlam 'leenni paukheel reklei chrel daatda. Ungta mma ngi mdiyowna' krow mditmata rowngmii mkurthuhna' krow ki mtik kcha mraal mdopiik inna ammda.

Ungta neiyi Jihudi rekki, mii havah ke'eyou rang ngi mdoptuwnin karjaak thungta nang ahin nih mma' avah keheipthlat chaak a. Ungta neiyi mma' 'leenni mraal kpii rek hin rukku mdokthitnaan ki mlei avah ahin nih adotpiik lamna' rah paupiik kdopiik doklam. Hanto' arveel lih idown chni.”
Avaleiyi, raalmii rek ava ngi mpaupiik avah pqowi lamda. Ungta jaan nih Paul avah qhi lamda, Antipatris khuwpii phaakqhi lamda.
Ungta mupduknii ngi skowl raalmii rek avah Paul tu' kchet rah silam thida, raalmii morson rek avah raalmii'inn rek thah arvang kerheel chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih Sijaria khuwpii pha lamda paukjit mparlaanin thung ngi mmaan nih Paul rukka paamkpu ava' hinni parlaan chlamda.
Ungta paamkpu ava ngi paukjit ava' mparcham dok dilli mma' avah talu paamkuwl thungki tidit mhin nih kheelda. Ungta mma ngi Silisia paamkuwl ki tidit avah arjada.

Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang araal akpii rek mtlunin dilli, nangki alei avah arjarow laini',” dida. Ungta mma ngi Paul avah Herod kruwng'inn thung ngi thithida mdorunna' raan ki paupiik pii lamda.

'Tunnu niiparnga dilli thimpu kenreelsi Anania ngi kver rekle' Tertullas mdoditin nowlam 'leenni kpaudei khat le' qhi lamda Sijaria khuwpii thah arju lamda. Ungta mma ngi paamkpusi ava' hinni Paul kepteng ngi mraal rek avah piida.

Ungta mmaan nih Paul mo'ownplu dokin dilli Tertullas tih Pheliks aang ngi mma' raal rek avah hanto'theda parlaanda: “Neen nih nang a'am leiyi mpha ksowt tih kdaiyi, kanpa ngi arvan'am chaannu. Ungta mduh adosutdehna' ava ngi chaat hava' thung ngi taqhatna' tya arvan amda.
Kparthaangsi Pheliks mpha ktaiyi ungta mmun ktai thung ngi neen nih adokpanpaak chaakin tu' korthlop pih adokrot chaakin.
Pdainu adokapyat porsonmana' rah akaktham chaak a, tidit tah avonsat tih kpauthe raan ava' ki mlei rek avah mruk mhei'arjaak piik chaan!

Neen nih hava' mii avah omlai khat lik ki ungta dultipaam mkheng thung ngi Jihudi mii rek arlak ki raalthuhna' thina' ktlow ngi deiyin nuh. Ungta mma' avah Najareth tidit lop thungki mluwksuber khat ava'.
Ungta mma ngi luwbuk'inn kpha rukka ktopbor rang ngi tlowda. Ungta neen nih mma' avah kyowng innu ungta neenki knowlamin dilkqowiyi m'leen nih pau tpindit rah ngeiyin nu.
Pdainu raalmii luwksu Lysias arvada ungta raanqhul dok ki neen kukhutin thungki mma' avah mlownginda.

Ungta Paul 'leenni mraal kpii mii rek avah nang ahin nih mthlenna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Nang ngi mma' aperteel thung ngi neen nih mraal mdopiik rekin mkheng ki mkindit kat rek avah dei chdaatnadi'.”
Ungta Jihudi rek rukvah avah bom lamda ungta hava'le' avah anto'kat tidit thepom lamda.

Ungta paamkpu ava ngi mhin nih mpauna' rah makcha thungta Paul lih arthaangda: “Neiyi nang nga kum tya thung ngi hava' chaat 'leenni paukpindit miikhat akurthuh avah kdodeh. Avaleiyi, neiyi kanpa ngi kparkhaan chaakna' pau avah a'aang ngi ithe chnih.
Mleiya havah nang ngi kdei krow ptih, tidit tah neiyi Jerusalem khuwpii thah luwkbu rah kahanna' avah nii sowm lei'knii kheel mlaiya.
Ungta mmaan nih luwbuk'inn thuh neiyi kuwmiikhat tu' kerteen meek ki, mditmata sinegog thuh mditmata khuwpii thung ngi miipii rek kokchou meek arlaan nih mdotedeh lamna' ruk ka'am pemeh.
Ungta mmaan nih 'tun nei k'leen nih mraal mdotpiik lamna' ki mkindit dow khatleh ruk pii pchaang lam nimeh.

Pdainu neiyi ahin nih havah kthethut chaak a, tidit tah mmaan nih mdotheen lop ava' ki 'Lam ava' dilkqowiyi neiyi Kpa le' ki Isowr avah luwkdobuk chaak. Ungta nowlam thung ngi mdokjit dow mkheng rekle' thimpu dokjit mkheng avah neiyi lam kdorin chaak.
Neiyi mmaan mdak inni mdorot chaakin heppi nei rukka Isowr hinni kuplungbin avah ka'am. Mleiya mrinkindit mii rekki then rukku kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah ka'am bei rah.
Hava' mkurthuh leiyi, mpha ktai thung ngi Isowr hinruk dultimii rek hin rukku kdopkhaan mana' rah plungrildeh kdothlowi chaakna' rah kdotlot chaak.
'Tunnu mpha ksowt dil thang ngi neiya kchaat rek thungki srah rek kbom chrah ungta chla kpii chrang ngi kthleng kcha' ping.

Pdainu marlak ava' thung ngi neiyi luwbuk'inn thuh daksa tikpirchiirna' ktlot meek arlaan nih Asia ki kurju Jihudi rekki mphakhot lamda. Neiya miipii rek tung rukku ka'am pmaang ungta vaangkdoplumna' ruk ka'am pemeh.
Mmaan nih nei k'leen nih mraal mdotpiik lamrah ma'am tlaang bih 'tun hava' thuh am lamdon nang a'aang ngi neiya kraal mikpii lamrah.
Mditmata 'tun hava' ka'am rek ava' rukku neiyi rinkdo'owimana' ma'am cheentung ngi neiyi kunpun hava' aang ngi kri daat arlaan nih mmaan nih avah athe lamso.

Mleiya hava' hava' paulam khat ava'leiyi mmaan arlak ki rip nuh ko'owng ping. Mleiya kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' ava'lei tidit tah ava'leiyi tuni rukku nang ngi nei k'leen nih pau apindit meeksli a.”

Pdainu Pheliks ki hava' khimkhei arjada, ungta 'Lam tidit ava'leiyi kukthuwkset tih mkindit mdodeh leiyi, ‘mma ngi, neiyi raalmii luwksu Lysias murjukdil row ngi nang apau avah apinditpiik laini',’ dida pau tpindit rang avah tpunqhun pthida.

Mthungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpu ava' hinni Paul avah mdothiik penletna' rah ungta ko'olbet tih mdothiikna' rah paupiik piida. Ungta maplap rekki dow mdopiik chaak raan ungta mdovel chaak raan ava' rukka mdopkhaan mana' raan paupiik pii lamda.
Ungta nit mruk dilli, Pheliks ki mnuwn Drusilla Jihudi mii ava' tu' mthlenin thung ngi, mma ngi Paul ko'own rah si lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Khrista hinki lamrin ki mleiyi Paul dothe avah arja chlamda.

'Tunnu Paul lih rinkinditna' leiyi, ungta daksa tkilrinna' leiyi, ungta karvang rang pau tpinditna' leiyi, pintiingda pau avah saam chda. Audilli Pheliks ka mningpqitda ungta hanto'theda: 'Tunki thenvah isun dok, dilthah mpha kqha kthlowi thung ngi veikhat a'own daat laini',’ dida.
Ungta ava' tu' kilqhi ngi mma ngi Paul lih kdopthlatna' rah sum mikpii daat rang mow, tidit ruk mdobin chaak. Avaleiyi, mma ngi kornowl kornowl lih mma' avah pau mdosaamqhi kcho.
Pdainu kum 'knii dilthang ngi Persias Phestas tidit ava ngi Pheliks avah thleng chda. Pheliks ki Jihudi rek mdobom nuwm leiyi, Paul avah kapthla kmah madaatda.
'Tunnu Phestas tih paamkuwl ava' thuh mthuhna' niikdum mphaak dilli, mma ngi Sijaria khuwpii ki ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thah hangda.
Audilli thimpu kenreelsi avale' Jihudi rekki miikenreel rekki Paul kepteng ngi m'leen nih pau thepsuk lamda ungta mmaan nih Phestas hinni hanto ngi ktham chlamda.
Mmaan nih Paul avah Jerusalem khuwpii thah mdo'ownna' rah ktham chlamda. Mleiya havah mmaan nih Paul mahan thung ngi 'lam thah ptuwn lamdon nih mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni ktaang mdotlotin.
Pdainu Phestas tih hanto ngi arthaangda: “Mleiya Paul avah Sijaria khuwpii thuh tithiik daat rah, mleiya mma' mdak avah kbeiyi ava'thah kjung kerheel rah.
Avaleiyi, naan arlak inni nei tu' kyu pchaang rah a'amin cheentung ngi arju lamso. Ungta mmaan nih mii ava ngi karmak mdotlot ma'am cheentung ngi mma' avah mraal apii lamso,” dida.

Ungta mma ngi mmaan arlak ki niisowm kerdeiyi ma'am dilli Sijaria khuwpii thah yuda. Ungta mupduknii ngi mma ngi pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni mko'on dilli, Paul avah mdo'arvan qhina' raan ki paupiik pii lamda.

Ungta Paul mthuh dilli, Jerusalem khuwpii ki kurju Jihudi rekki rip lamda mma' avah tkhul lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul kepteng ngi m'leen nih mraal klin nih pii lamda, pdainu mmaan nih mraal mdopiikin ki mkindit avah the pchaang lam mda.
Audilli Paul lih makparkhaanna' pau avah hanto'theda: “Neiyi Jihudi mii rekki nowlam dorotma mditmata luwbuk'inn 'leen nih mditmata Siijar kapkhaan rah karmak dow khatleh tlowmaang “

Pdainu Phestas tih Jihudi rek plungngam mdotlot nuwm leiyi, mma ngi Paul pauthe avah arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hava' dow rek leiyi, nei ka'aang ngi pau tpinditna' rang ki thenni Jerusalem khuwpii thah tahan rah abinna?” dida.

Audilli Paul lih hanto'theda: “Neiya k'leen nih paukpindit rah Siijar paupinditna' longkhom aang ngi krip kcha' dok ping. Nang ngi kqhajik ki adeh tidit tah neiyi Jihudi rek 'leenni karmak dow khatleh tlowmaang.

Anto'daat yoso neiyi mmaan kdopkhaan lamna' ma'am, mditmata tidina' krow ngi kdoparmana' ka'am mkurthuh bih, tidiyow rang avah neiya matmaang. Pdainu hava' mii rekki kraal mdotpiik lamna' dow rek ava' thung ngi mkindit ma'amma bih kuwkhat leh ngi neiya mmaan hinni mparlaan pchaang nimeh. Neiyi Siijar hinni pau knaak chaak a.”
Audilli Phestas tih kunpun rektu' mkerseel dokin dilli hanto' arthaangda: “Nang ngi Siijar hinni pau anaak dok a ava' vah nang nga Siijar hinni chetnadi'!” dida.
Ungta nit mruk dilthah paamkruwng Agrippa le' Bernis tih Phestas kurvuwi chrah Sijaria thuh thleng lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih nit knempok ki ava' thuh ma'amin dilli Phestas tih Paul 'leenki pau avah paamkruwng ava' hinni hanto'theda parjaakda. “Pheliks ki rowngmii khat tih thida mdomaak daat miikhat ka'am.
Neiyi Jerusalem thah kahan thuh thimpu kenreel rekle' Jihudi rekki kver rekki mma' lei avah mparjaak lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kihin nih mma' 'leenni pau mheipindit piikin, mdi lamda.

Pdainu neiyi hanto' thenu arthaang lam nuh. Mleiya tupsulmii ava ngi mkupsul rektu' maiqhuwm mih tpurduhda ungta mma' 'leenni tupsulna' ki mlei rek ava' 'leenni mdak ki makparkhaan chaakna' npiikduh khimkheiyi miikhat avah tpenveipthi rang ngi tpiik dok tidit avah Rome mii nowpa pemeh dinuh.
Avaleiyi, hava' thuh mmaan nih mthlen kurdut dok daatin le' koktoliit kmah ngi neiyi mupduknii ngi pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni ko'ong nuh Paul mdo'arvan qhina' raan ki thenni paupiik piilam nuh.
Pdainu mma' 'leenni mraal kpii rekki mriin thung ngi neiyi kdobin dow rek ava' heppi mma' kepteng ngi mraal avah pii pchaang lam mda.
Pdainu mrin'owi chaakin leiyi, mma' kepteng ngi paukheel mruk rekle' Paul lih kring daat, dida mdopandan kdiyou dok kcha' khat Jisu tidit ava' ki mlei daatda.
Ungta neiyi paukheel rek ava'leiyi mkindit avah dei pchaang manu. Avaleiyi, neiyi hava' dow rek khimkhei tpinditna' rang ki thenni mhin nih, ‘Jerusalem khuwpii thah tahan rah abinna,’ tidit kheelnu.
Pdainu Paul lih, ‘Agastas dopindit rang ki thenni mheipardat chaan,’ dida, pau mdonaak dok leiyi, neiyi Siijar hinni kapthlat pchaanduh kpha ngi athi daatin, tidit ki paupiik piilam nuh,” dida.
Audilli Agrippa ngi Phestas hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku hava' mii avah kdak ki tarjaak rah kbinna,” dida. “Mditta pduknii row arjalai,” dida

Mupduknii ngi Agrippa le' Bernis tih kenthle kparnaak dok ki thleng lamda ungta mii kurtuwlna' inn ava' thung ngi raalmii luwksu rekle' khuwpii ava' thung ki miikenreel rek tung ngi luwt lamda. Audilli Phestas paupiik ki Paul avah arvanqhi pthuwk lamda.

Ungta Phestas tih hanto'theda: “Paamkruwng Agrippa ungta neen tung ngi hava' thuh ka'am mii mkheng rek naan nih hava' mii havah amikin nih adehn a. Hava' mii ava' 'leenni Jerusalem khuwpii ki ungta hava' thuh ka'am Jihudi rekki kihin nih pau naa lamda. Mmaan nih owng lamda hava' mii avah mrinporson rang pemeh, mdoditin.
Pdainu neiyi mma ngi tidina' ki mtik kcha ngi mdoparma mraal m'leen nih phangmanu. Ungta mma' mdak rukku Agastas hinni pau nadokda, avaleiyi neiyi mma' avah Agastas hinni pthla nih dinuh.

Pdainu neiyi neiki kruwng ava' hinni mma' leiyi, mkindit kat kdokjit rah ammeh. Avaleiyi, naan ahin nih mma' avah kdopthuh ungta kdungsi ngi paamkruwng Agrippa havah nang ahin. Mleiya maanve ngi tperteel ava' thung ngi neiyi kdokjit chaak rah, dow mruk kphang kcha' daat krow ping.
Mleiya rowngmii khat avah mraal mkindit kthe kmah ngi tsi daat avah mlei ktaakpa rang heppi binnu,” dida.
Aludilli Agrippa ngi Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang ngi athenni apau chaakna' rah mpha akpiik a.” Audilli Paul lih mkhut arji thida makparkhaan chaakna' pau avah tethe pqhunda.

Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Paamkruwng Agrippa tuni vah Jihudi rekki mdotupsul lamna' dow mkheng 'leenni kakparkhaan chaakna' avah nang a'aang ngi ripda kpau chaak rang avah kuplung kngam kcha' rekrek ki kirbin kcha' imping.
Mleiya nang nga Jihudi rekki nowpa mkheng le' paukheel rek mkheng avah adodeh leiyi, kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha'. Avaleiyi, nang ngi kpau avah kqhajik ki mhei'arjaak piikcha'.
Neiyi mbul ki kupqhun nih taluhep pih arvang ka'am ping ungta kseetnau khat kurthuwk ki Jerusalem thuh kchaat rek arlak ki taluhep pih arvang ka'am ping tidit mkheng avah hava' Jihudi rekki mdehn.
Mmaan nih sakhi mpiiknuwm inbih, choduhrep ki kupqhun nih neiya mmaan nih mdotedeh doklam. Mleiya neiyi neenki krin'owiyin kpinditsi lop ava' dilkqowiyi neiya Pharisy miikhat kurthuwk nuh.
Pdainu 'tunvah neiya neen npa'leen hinni Isowr rih paumdoreel ava' ki plungbinpsuk ava'leiyi hava' pau tpinditna' thuh neiya krip kcha' ping.

Hava' paureel ava' thung ngi neenki nphungin sowm lei'knii rek ava ngi plungbinpsuk ava' mdophan chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr avah suwn le' jaan nih luwbuk chlamda. ‘O, paamkruwng Agrippa, hava' plungbinpsuk ava'leiyi Jihudi rekki neiya kraal mdotpiik lam.
Isowr rih kdiyou mperdel tidit avah taluleiyi naan nih kurthuwk kma' rah tidit tih adobininda?
Dakat tih nei rukka, Najareth ki Jisu miing ava' kepteng ngi dow knempok ki itlow nih, dinuh kdo'arvanbin.

Neiyi hava'kat avah Jerusalem khuwpii thung ngi tlownu. Ungta thimpu kenreel rek hinni ruhtanna' paukjit lounu, miikenje tyatya rek avah neiyi rowng'inn thuh kdodaal lam. Ungta mmaan me'eyown thung rukku neiyi mmaan kepteng ngi kpau ping.

Ungta neiyi marlak ktaak ki sinegog khimkhei rek thung ngi chetnu mraalin suwkthuhna' piilam nuh ungta raanni pthitda kpau rah silam nuh. Neiyi kdung ngi mmaan 'leenni plungthit lowlam nuh ungta paamktlei ki khuwpii rek kpha thung rukku chetnu mmaan avah suwk kdopthuh lam.
Neiyi hanto ngi kchena' khat ava' thung ngi thimpu kenreel rek hinki ruhtanna' le' paupiik sin nuh Damaskas khuwpii thah chetnu.

Ungta niikhat tih kunthunqim arveel lih, ‘Oh paamkruwng neiyi 'lam thuh kehei meek arlaan nih parvaan ki kni ar'aang hin rukku kleng mar'aang khat deinu. Ungta mar'aang ava ngi nei k'leen ruk ungta kmiiqhi rek 'leen ruk mokloijik inni mtaaninda.

Ungta neen nih dulti thah ktluk haakter dokin le', Hibriu pau vih krowl khat tih nei mdotbiik arjanu. Krowl ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Saul, Saul, taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya tyat chiireelna' atpiik a? Thiirsi kchung rek ptengda adopirthit tah nang athennu kparsa rah,’ dida.
Mthungta neiyi hanto'thenu, ‘Kruwng, Nang nga kuw ptil lih?’ dinuh. Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Neiya nang ngi tyat chiireelna' adopiik meeksli Jisu ava' ping.

Pdainu ikerdel rang ngi akhuh ngi irip, mlei hava' leiyi Neiya ahin nih kkandang ping. Mleiya nang nga sopklow kcha' khat apurthuh nikdi'. Ungta nang nga 'tun amik ki adodeh dow rek 'leenni ungta 'tun dilli Neiyi adokepdeh rang dow rek 'leenni sakhi khat apurthuh nikdi'.
Neiyi nang nga Jihudi rek hinki ungta Chaatktlei rek hinki asan nikdi'.’ Ungta 'tun Neiyi nang nga mmaan hinni aksi a.

Ungta mmaan mik rek parvanna' rah ungta mmaan nih kjiingnu thungki ngi kvaar thah mkerheelna' raan ungta Seitan ruhtanna' thungki ngi Isowr hinni mkerheelna' raan ki thenni, nang nga adoksi. Mleiya havah mmaan nih mupnu arve rekin thungki toptlot piikna' mdophan chaakna' raan ungta lamtrin chaak ki kenje dok kcha' rek mmaan tung ngi alroukchom kcha'sap mkurthuh chaakna' raan ki then.
Avaleiyi, paamkruwng Agrippa, neiyi parvaan ki kurju rinmer ava' dothe kdopqowima pemeh.

Pdainu mmaan nih plung mdoperthlen chaakna' raan ungta Isowr hinni mkerheel chaakna' raan ungta plung kperthleng kcha' ki mtikkcha nong rek ava' mdotlot chaakna' raanni, Neiyi choduhrep pih Damaskas khuwpii thuh ungta Jerusalem khuwpii thuh ungta Judia paamkuwl mkheng thuh ungta audilli Chaatktlei rek hinni kdopurphuwn chaak.
Mlei ava'leiyi Jihudi rekki luwbuk'inn thuh neiya mokyowng lamda ungta mke'eyou rah mdotheen.

Pdainu Isowr rih mbom chda, avaleiyi tuni kpha ngi neiyi kdilklin kthe kmah mii mkheng hinni rip nuh sakhi kdopiik chaak pchaan. Neiyi Moses le' khulpu rek dothe avah kthuwk bei rah tidit hehe daat kdothe chaak kma'don dow morson the chmaang.
Mleiya Khrista ngi tyatna' avah kperteel rah ungta Mma ngi kdiyou rek thungki kring kerheel mkhatna' kurthuwkdon nih mar'aang avah Jihudi rek hinruk ungta Chaatktlei rek hin rukku kparjaam bei rah.”
'Tunnu mma ngi hava' theda mparkhaan chaak arlaan nih Phestas tih kdung ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Paul nang nga aplung karmak kcha' a! Knemreen nih akurchuh chaak ava ngi aplung mparma chaak a,” dida.
Pdainu Paul lih hanto'theda: “Kparthaangsi Phestas neiya kuplung karmak meh pdainu neiyi kindit kat rekle' mleipum pauna rek ava' kdothe.

Mleiya neiyi ningqit ktaak ki kpau chaakna' paamkruwng ava ngi hava' dow rek avah mdodeh. Mleiya hava' dow rek avah mirkil khat thung ngi totlot pseh, hava' dow rek avah mma' plungluwna' thungki khadaat ruk kerthlet meh tidit tih kbin chaak a.
Paamkruwng Agrippa, nang ngi khulpu rek avah lam'arin chaakpda? Neiyi nang ngi lam'arin chaak a tidit tah kdeh.”
Audilli Agrippa ngi Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi mpha mruk'suwn daat thung ngi neiya Khristen kurthuwk souvih atupnuwm chaak a,” dida.

Ungta Paul lih hanto'theda: “Neiyi mpha mruk'suwn thung yoso, ksowtpa thung yoso, Isowr hinni, nang daat kma' tuni ki kpauthe karja kcha' rek mkheng rukka, hava' thiirrii rek kma'don, nei kehep daat mkurthuh raan kdongei chaak,” dida.
Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe dok thungta, paamkruwng ava ngi paamkpusi le' Bernis ungta mmaan tu' kok'ong mkheng rektu' ripsap chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih mvanthuh dokin thung ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda. “Hava' mii avah mdiyowna’ ki mtik kcha ngi ungta rowngmii khat tih ma'amna' krow ngi mdotlot dow khatleh ruk ammeh,” dilamda.
Audilli Agrippa ngi Phestas hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' mii avah mma' mdak ki Siijar hinni paumnaak dokmah tlaang bih, maanve ngi tapthlat pthidok daat rang a,” dida.

Ungta mmaan nih Italy paam thah neen nih kthap daat rang ngi mkerseel dokin thungta, Paul le' rowngmii morson rek avah mmiing Julias mdoditin Agastas raalmii loppii thungki raalmii arja khat kpupa ava' hinni parlaan lamda.

Mthungta neen nih Adramittiam khuwpii ki arkuwng khat 'leenni kal innu. Ungta arkuwng avah Asia paamkuwl rekki diibiing ktong thah thapda kchet rang ki ngi truwnpii thuh tlaan nuh. Ungta Thessalonika khuwpii ki Mesedonia ki mii, Aristarkas rukka kilqhiqhisap innu.

Ungta mupduknii ngi neen nih Sidon khuwpii thuh qum innu ungta Julias tih Paul avah kqhadeek ki sutpqowi chda. Ungta mma ngi maplap rek hinni chetda ungta maplap rekki sopmdolow chaak raan ava' rukka rotpiikda.
Ungta neen nih ava' thung ki ngi veikhat truwnpii thuh ktlaak nowlin thung ngi tirthli ngi kmaisuk thaan nih mdotraanin leiyi, neen nih Saipras diiloipaam kperthenin chunni vanthap innu.
Ungta neen nih Silisia le' Pamphylia paamkuwl behki truwnpii thuh kvanthaan dilli Laisia paamklek thungki Maira khuwpii phaan nuh.
Ava' thung ngi raalmii arja khat kpu ava ngi Alekjendria khuwpii ki arkuwng khat Italy paam thah kvang rah deikhotda ungta mma ngi ava' thung ngi neen avah mapkalinda.

Ungta neen nih nit knempok ki naamnaam mih kvanthaan dilli kparsa dok ki Snaidas khuwpii beh phaan nuh ungta tirthli ngi kdothah pthlen naan mqhatma leiyi, neen nih Salmoni kirtin nih Kritii diiloipaam kperthen nih vanthap innu.
Kdung ngi kparsa ngi kvantha dokin dilli neen nih kqha arkuwngkal mdoditin, Lasia khuwpii arveel ki munkhat thung ngi tlung innu.
'Tunnu mpha knempok thleng dokda ungta 'Then tngowlna' mpha mkerkheel dok leiyi, dii 'leenni thapda tvan rang avah 'tunnu tidina' mkurthuh thungta, Paul lih mmaan avah pauperseel lamda.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek, ndiilam qowi raan avah tidina' rangnga, ungta arkuwng le' mbowrhor kenvei chrang daat kma' neen nrinkumin ki then rukku kdung ngi tkenveina' rang ngi kdeh a,” dida.
Anto'daat yoso, raalmii arja khat kpu avah Paul lih mdothe ava' hinvah arkuwngpii kqhipa le' arkuwngpii kpupa dothe ava ngi pchaang chda.

Ungta ava' arkuwngkal avah phalbi ki thenni mqhatma leiyi, mii meknem bet tih ava' thungki tvanthah daat rah, dilamda. Mmaan nih Phininsia khuwpii avah taluhep kduyoso phada phalbi avah ava' thuh ta'am rah bin lamda. Ungta hava' Kritii diiloipaam ki arkuwngkal avah kurduh knitlaak ruk ungta karthak knitlaak ruk mdotarngat.

Ungta kurduh ktong ki tirthli mraan hiirhiir thungta, mmaan nih muplungbinritin avah ktlung pchaang daat rah kdi ngi truwnpii thung ngi tla lamda ungta Kritii diiloipaam ki laan ktenel lih vanthap lamda.
Pdainu mpha ksowtliit kmah ngi Euroklaidon mdoditin tchangkhu avah diiloipaam ktong ki arjukraang thangda.

Mthungta tchangkhu ava ngi arkuwng mokyown chaak thungta ungta tirthli thung ngi tvanthah daat kdopchaanmaan leiyi, neen nih kthap kmah ngi arkuwng avah tirthli praan pthiin nuh ungta tirhli palraan innu.
Ungta neen nih Klauda mdoditin diiloipaam 'suwn kperthen chaak inni kvanchen meekin chunni kparsa kokki neen nih rinkum tsanna' arkuwngte avah kyowng chaannu.

Ungta mmaan nih arkuwngte rek mapkal dokin dilli arkuwng avah mkuimana' rah rii ngi mtii le' mtun nih pervel lamda bowl lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih Syrtis sitphui kthong rah mdobinin leiyi, arkuwng buwjaar rek mkheng avah pqumpthi lamda ungta parkai pthi lamda.
Tchangkhu ngi kdungreen nih mdotpeherin leiyi, mupduknii ngi mmaan nih arkuwng bowrhor rek avah tvarpthi pqhun lamda.
Ungta mnii kdumna' thung ngi neen nih arkuwng dona rek ava' rukka kukhut kat inni varthiin nuh.

Nit tyatya thung ngi kni rukku ungta bursi rek rukku mkandanma ungta tchangkhu avah mraan tlit thungta mqutna' thangngu, neen nih kdakin tkarsan chaak pchaan rah tidit ki plungbinpsuk mkheng rukka mapthi dok innu.

Pdainu mii rekki mpha rowiksowt tih then kcha kmah ngi ma'amin dilli, Paul lih mmaan arlak ki hanrip thida hanto'theda: “Mii rek, naan nih nei kdothe apqowi daat tlaangin bih, ungta Kritii diiloipaam ki narvanthama daat tlaangin bih, hava' hep tidina' ungta tkenveina' avah thuwk nimeh.
Anto'daat yoso, 'tunnu neiyi akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah naan nih plung kngam mih a'am raan. Mleiya arkuwng tpenvei daatin kma'don neen kuwkhat leh ki rinkum avah kenvei nimeh.
Mleiya nei ka'am chaakna' ungta sopkdolow chaak Isowr ava' ki vaantamsi khat tih jaangklu kbeh ngi ripda.
Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Paul aningpqitma'! Nang nga Siijar aang ngi rip nadi' ungta asuw, nang tu' kthapsap mii mkheng rekki rinkum avah Isowr rih nang ahin nih atpiik dok a,’ dida.
Avaleiyi, mii rek aplungin apngamin! Mleiya nei kihin nih mdothe ava' hephep pih kthuwk rah tidit tih neiyi lamkrin chaak a.
Anto'daat yoso neen nih diiloipaam khat thung ngi dulti tothown raan,” dida.

Ungta mjaan sowm leiplitna' jaan nih Adria truwnpii mdoditin ava' thung ngi phei le' dung ngi tirthli ngi mraaninda. Ungta thanqim mih arkuwng kthap rek ava ngi laan khat kpha rah ntheenna tidit avah dei lamda.
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih dii tlum avah suw lamda ungta mtlum avah lam som'knii tlumda. Ava' dilli mruk kla heiyi msutin thungta lam sowm lei parnga tlumda.
Audilli mmaan nih lung rek kthown khot daatin bih, mdodit inni, mningin mqit leiyi, arkuwng khuikin plii tet avah arkuwng armei ktong thah ptla lamda ungta khu kvaar rang daat arda chlamda.

Ungta arkuwng kthap rek ava ngi arkuwng thungki mchen dokna' raan korthlong lamda. Mmaan nih arkuwng khuikin mduh thah kaptla dotlot ktlow ngi rinkum tsanna' arkuwngte avah truwnpii thung ngi ptla lamda.
Paul lih raalmii arja khat kpu le' raalmii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' mii rek ava ngi arkuwng thuh ma'am daat maan bih naan kuwkhat leh ruk karsan pchaang nimaan tih,” dida.
Audilli raalmii rekki rinkum tsanna' arkuwngte rii rek avah kvetpthi lamda, ungta ptlapthi lamda.

Ungta khuvaar tiingtiing ngi Paul lih mmaan mkhengin hinni then mruk ruk mdochaakna' raanni hanto'theda, ktham chlamda: “Naan nih thendam kcha kmah ngi, powitham mih arvan am'in avah tuni ngi nii sowm leiplii mphaak dok a ungta naan nih dow khadaat ruk pkeivot maantih.

Avaleiyi, neiyi then mruk ruk adochaakna' raan akaktham chaak inna. Naan nih tan mruk adolow chaakna' raanni then mruk rukka adochaak raan, Neiyi kthe a naan kuwkhat leh ki aluwchaiyin 'leenki asamin avah khadaat ruk kenvei nimeh.”
Mma ngi hava' dow rek mthe dok dilli, mmaan mkhengin dodeh ngi mma ngi thenpen ava' louda, Isowr hinni panpaak chthida khuida tchaak pqhunda.
Audilli mii mkheng arda rokda ungta mmaan rukku then avah cha lamda.
Ungta arkuwng 'leenni ka'am neen avah kekheng inni mii arja 'knii somtikhiu leitruk inping.
Ungta mmaan nih kkhom mih mchaak dokin dilli arkuwng mthowm betbetna' rang leiyi chavui rek avah truwnpii thung ngi varpthi lamda.

'Tunnu khu mvaar thungta mmaan nih paam avah deipindih lam mda. Pdainu mmaan nih truwnpii biing ngi sitphuidaam khat avah heidei lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mrot khimkhei thung ngi arkuwng avah ava' paphaakda laan thah tkal rah bin chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih arkuwng khuikin rii rek avah reen pthi lamda ungta truwnpii thung ngi mapthi lamda. Ungta marlak ava' thung ngi mmaan nih arkuwng tkeheelna' rii rek avah perthlet pthi lamda ungta mduh ki buwjaar avah tirthli thuh jaarteng lamda. Ungta arkuwng avah truwnpii biing daam ktong thah vanthap thang lamda.

Pdainu truwnpii knii kurdutna' kat thung ngi mmaan nih arkuwng avah mdovantha dok inni dulti nowr lamda. Ungta dii thung ngi ktuwr rih ka'am sitphui 'leenni mduh ki mpowiyi nowrda ava' thuh kakna pchaang kmah ngi kmen chda. Pdainu mdilpang ki avah diinuk ki kdungreen nih mdoknow leiyi, kui chda.
'Tunnu raalmii rek ava ngi rowngmii rekki dii thaplam donni mchen chaakmana' raan ki thenni rowngmii rek avah te'eyow dok rah kdi ngi kerseel lamda.

Pdainu raalmii arja khat kpu ava ngi Paul tsan rah mdobin leiyi, mmaan dobin avah ptlot lam mda. Ungta mma ngi, dii kthap pchaang khimkheiyi rukri truwnpii thuh tlada laan mdophaak chaakna' rah dii kthap krow rah tidit ki paupiik pii lamda.
Ungta morson rek arkuwng 'leenni ka'am daat rekki aangqhe ngi kowmphel 'leen, ungta aangqhe ngi arkuwng kqiik 'leenni vanthap lamda. Ungta hanto' heppi mmaan mkheng inni kuhuwiyi laan phasap lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kerthlet lamda laan mtlunsap dokin dilli diiloipaam avah Malta, mdit, tidit avah deirow lamda.
Ungta mpaam ava' thung ki mii rekki kdung ngi plungnee mtedet chaanda. Mmaan nih neen khimkhei avah kqha ngi marlaang chaanda ungta khu mrat le' mdaipa ava' leiyi mmaan nih mei mtlotpiik inda.
Ungta Paul lih krom'kram pahampokda mei thuh bungda. Ungta mei dosat tih mukrupum pruwl khat thuwkda Paul avah mkhut thah pkeida m'leen nih popmerda.

Ungta mpaam ava' thung ki mii rekki mkhut 'leenni pruwl kokthowi daat mdehn thungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii avah mii ke'eyou mun rah, mma ngi truwnpii thungki chen chleek yoso mrinmana' rah kindit ava ngi mrin rang avah rotpiik meh,” dilamda.
Pdainu mma ngi pruwl avah mei thuh kqhik pthida ungta mdakka dow khatleh the mda.

Anto'daat yoso mmaan nih mma' avah tirthling luwidon, mditmata m'tunkat daat tih tluw donni kdiyou chrah tidit tih mdobinin. Pdainu mmaan nih mpha rowiksowt tih msutpqowiyin dilli ungta mma' 'leenni mkarmana' dow khatleh mdehmaan thungta muplungbinin avah perthleng lamda ungta ‘mma' avah Isowr khat tah,’ dilamda.
'Tunnu paamklek ava' thung ngi khu kruwng, mmiing Publias mdoditin, ava' loupaam khat avah mmun ava'arveel lih ka'am. Neenna mma ngi muptlung chaanda ungta niikdum thung ngi mhin nih mpa'am chaanda.

Mthungta hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Publias pa avah riiphaak le' powisen nih kowida iip chdaatda. Paul lih mma' avah ksuw rah vangluwtda ungta mma ngi rinmaktham chaak dilli, m'leen nih mkhut mikniing ngi pnenda ungta mma' avah pdamda.
Ungta mma ngi hava' mtlot thungta diiloipaam ava' thuh omlai tongda kkowi mii morson rek rukka Paul hinni thleng lamda ungta mma ngi mmaan avah pdam chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih m'lam knempok 'leenni neen avah kdung ngi makyat chaanda, Ungta neen nih veikhat kthap rah kkorthlonin thungta mmaan nih neenki kikriin rekin mkheng avah mpii chaanda.

Thla kdum dilthah neen nih ava' diiloipaam thung ngi phalbi danda ka'am daat Alekjendria ki arkuwngpii, mluwchai 'knii kpu unau kinphiir Kastar le' Pollaks mdoditin 'leenni kal innu truwnpii thuh tlanowl innu.
Ungta neen nih Sairakas tidit diiloipaam thuh laan kal innu, ava' thuh niikdum kcheeng innu.

Ava' thung ki ngi neen nih purkul innu kvanin ava ngi Rhegiam khuwpii tlung innu. Ungta mupduknii vah kurduh ki tirthli raangda ungta ava ngi neen nih mkorjownnit ava' thung ngi Puteoli khuwpii tlung innu.
Ungta ava' thung ngi neen nih unau rek kurdutqhiin nuh, ungta mmaan nih neen avah nii tikhiu ka'amna' raanni mo'own chaanda. Ungta audilli neen nih Rome khuwpii ktong thah chet innu.

Ungta ava' thung ki unau rekki neen ktlunin marjaakin thungta, mmaan nih Appii mdoditin kyurkren mun le' Miitlun'inn kdum ava' kpha kla ngi neen mukduh raan arju lamda. Paul lih mmaan mdeh thungta Isowr panpaak chda ungta arda prow chda.

'Tunnu neen nih Rome khuwpii ktlunin thungta, raalmii arja khat kpu ava ngi rowngmii rek avah raalmii luwksu ava' hinni parlaan pthi lamda. Pdainu mma ngi Paul avah mthina ngi ma'am rah rotpiikda ungta mmah raalmii khat tih rungda.

Ungta 'tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah niikdum dilthah Paul lih Jihudi rekki luwksu rek avah own purkuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mkurku dokin thungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rek, ungta ku'uknau rek, neiyi neenki nmii rek kepteng ngi mditmata npu'leen ki nowpa kepteng ngi karmak dow khatleh ruk tlowmaang. Pdainu Jihudi rekki Jerusalem khuwpii ki rowngmii khat tih Rome mii rek hinni neiya mparlaan lamda.
Pdainu mmaan nih metperteel lam thungta tidina' krow ngi kdoparma kraal mdophan maan leiyi, tapthlat rah mbin lamda.
Pdainu Jihudi rekki motrotma lam thungta, ava ngi neiya Siijar hinni pau mapnaakda. Pdainu neiyi havah kmii rek 'leenni mraalin kdopiik lamna' pemeh.

Mlei hava' leiyi neiyi naan avah adoko'own chaakin. Mleiya neiyi naan avah adokdeh nuwm chaakin ungta naan ahin nih pau kdosaam nuwm. Mleiya Isreel mii rekki plungbinpsuk ava'leiyi neiya hava' thiirrii ngi mdotbowl.”

Ungta mmaan nih mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih nang aleiyi, Judia paamkuwl ki paukjit khadaat ruk phang maanring. Ungta ava' ki karhang unau rek kuwkhat leh rukku dow khatleh thelam meh, mditmata nang aqhatmana' mdosonin ruk ka'am pemeh.
Pdainu neen nih nang ngi talu abinna tidit avah nang adak kat hinki tarjaak rah kbin inna. Mleiya neen nih hava'lop ava'leiyi mmun ktai thung ngi mii rekki ava' kepteng ngi mdotheen karjaakin.”

Ungta mmaan nih mma' thenni nit khat mdopelreen dokin nit ava' thung ngi mmaan nih mii knempok ki mma' tlunna' mun ava' thung ngi thleng lamda. Ungta mma ngi jiingsun ki ngi kluw kphadek ki Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' ki mlei avah kinditjik ki pandang chda. Ungta mma ngi mii rek hinni Jisu ki mlei avah Moses nowlam le' khulpu rek dokjit thungki ngi mii rek tupnuwm chaakna ngi pau chda.
Ungta mma ngi mdothe dow rek ava ngi mii aangqhe rek avah pnuwm chlamda pdainu morson aangqhe rekvah lam'rin chlam mda.

Ungta mmaan nih, msingreelin thung ngi mkolrotmaan thungta sun chlamda. Pdainu msun dok duhn nih Paul lih mmaan hinni mqutna' Paulam khat avah hanto'theda: “Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mkindit avah npu'leen hinni khulpu Isaiah nehr thung ngi hanto' thepiik lamda.
Nang ngi ichet rang ngi, hava' mii rek hinni hanto' athe: ‘ ‘Naan nih tarjaakka arja naandi' pdainu deipindih nimaan tih ungta amik innu tedeh a deinaandi' pdainu deipchuk nimaan tih.

Mleiya hava' mii rekki plungchai avah kepneel kcha' a. Makna rekin avah kthaluwi kcha' a. Ungta mmik rekin avah mipjiin pthidok inna. Mditma tlaang bih, mmaan nih mmikin nih dei lamdon, Ungta makna rek inni arja chlamdon ungta muplungchai rek inni kdeipindih thuh chdok lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih kihin nih kerheel chlamdon, Neiyi mmaan avah pdam thuh doklam nikdi',’ dida. (Is. 6:9-10)
Avaleiyi, neiyi Isowr rih tkirliinna' avah Chaatktlei rek hinni mapthlat dok a ungta mmaan nih avah karja lamrah, tidit avah naan nih adodeh chaakin ikurthuwkso.”
Ungta mma ngi hava' pau mthe dok dilli Jihudi rekka sun chlamda. Ungta marlak inni klin nih tkerteenna' khat thuwk chda.
Audilli Paul lih mi'inn, mkhonpum ava' thung ngi kum 'knii amda ungta mma ngi mhin nih kthleng kcha' mkheng rek avah arlaang chlamda.
Ungta mma ngi kumtluwn nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mlei ava' parjaamda ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki mlei avah changkarngam mih purchuk chlamda ungta kuwkhat leh ngi mma' avah pkhaan meh.
Jisu Khrista ki suwk Paul neiya Isowr ki kqhapaumin thung ngi mpenje dok chda tamsi khat kurthuwk rang ngi mo'own dok chda.
Mma ngi havah Mma' khulpu ar'aang ngi mduduh ngi ngi Kchiir laika rek thung ngi pau mdoreel dok ksa.
Mleiya dultimii nowpa ngi, David rilam thungki kqou Mma' Chapa, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ava'leiyi paureel avah mdoreel dok.
Ungta tchiirna' ki Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' ava ngi Mma' avah ruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr Chapa tidit tih mdopurphuwn dok ksa.
Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' miing ki thenni lamrin thung ngi tethe kopqowi tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni chaat rek arlak ki plungnee le' tamsi tkurthuhna' avah neen nih tarlaan chaak dokin.
Mmaan arlak ki naan rukka Jisu Khrista do'own dok rekin ptih.
Rome thung ngi ka'am miikenje rek rang ngi mdo'own dok, Isowr vonsat low rek mkheng hinni: N'paan Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan akhengin 'leenni i'amso!
Rukrirep pih naan akhengin ki thenni, Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neiki Isowr avah kpanpaak chaak a. Mleiya naanki alamrinin avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi mii rekki mthe inna.

Mleiya neiyi kuplung kluwt tih Mchapa ki kqhapaumin thung ngi sopkdolow chaak Isowr ava ngi neiki ksakhi. Mleiya kdet liit kmah mpha ktaiyi neiyi krinkthamna' rek thung ngi naan avah adokbin phaak tlit chaakin.
Mleiya, 'tunnu talutalu yoso, Isowr plungbin nih naan ahin nih kthlen pchaanna' rah krinktham chaakna' thung ngi kaktham kcha' ping.
Mleiya naan apqhan chaakna' raan ki thenni neiyi naan ahin nih pthla 'lam ki chla mruk adokpiik chaakna' raanni, neiyi naan avah adokdeh nuwm chaakin.
Mleiya havah neen nih khat le' khat ki nlamrin chaak sapin ava ngi nei rukka naan tu' mdotoksow chaakna' rang ki then.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, naan nih hava' adodehma raan avah ngei maang. Mleiya neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinki kdo'arkun heppi naan ahinki mchei mruk turkun chaak rah kdongei. Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih kthlenna' rang thina' kdotlot, pdainu tunkpha ngi mtapkhaan tlit daat a.
Neiya Grik rek hinni ungta Grik kma' rek hin rukku ungta kinrit mii rek hin rukku ungta kinrit kma' rek hin rukku lei kervei kcha' khat ping.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, Rome khuwpii thung ngi ka'am naan ahinin rukku kqhapaumin avah tparjaam rah kdobin chaak.

Mleiya neiya Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki thennu kningkyak meh. Mleiya havah lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rekki thenni, rukrirep pih Jihudi mii rek thenni ungta Grik rekki then rukku tkirliinna' kpii Isowr ruhtan ava'.
Mleiya kqhapaumin thung ngi Isowr ki rinkinditna' avah lamrin ki ngi lamrin thuh kurphuwng dok. Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mii kindit avah mlamrin nih kring chrah.” (Hab. 2:4)
'Tunnu rinkinditmana' ava ngi kindit knamdowl, rinko'owi kma' ungta mrinkindit kma' mii mkheng rek 'leenni Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah parvaan ki ngi mdo'arjuk purphuwn dok.
Mleiya mmaan hinni Isowr ki mlei tedehna' rek avah tpandan dok ksa, tidit tah Isowr rih mmaan hinni avah mdotedet doklam.

Mleiya mik ki tedehma Mma' laarruhtanna' avah dultipaam mpurthuh daat ki kupqhun nih kindit chelli nmik inni tedeh dokin. Mma ngi mdopurthuh dow rek ava ngi ungta Mma' ki ktlangknai kma' ruhtan le' Isowr mkurthuhna' ava ngi tedehpindit chaak dokin. Avaleiyi, mmaan nah mkerthlenna' raan m'lam ammeh.

Mleiya mmaan nih Isowr tidit deilam yoso, mmaan nih Mma' avah Isowr heppi ponlor chlammeh mditmata tpanpaak ruk panpaak chlammeh. Pdainu mmaan nih muplungbin rekin thung ngi msit ktaak kurthuwk chlamda ungta mmaan ki kokmok kcha' muplung rekin avah kjiing kcha'.
Mmaan nih kinrit dotlot mdotlotin ava ngi kokmok kcha'lam.
Ungta kqop kma' rang Isowr konlorna' avah kqop chrang dultimii ungta pva rek ungta mkhuh pliipum saa rek ungta mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek pthla khat tung ngi perthleng lamda.
Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mdaksaan avah msingreelin thung ngi mkaryat chaakmana' raan Isowr rih totborna', daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei rek avah mdopiik lam.
Mmaan ava ngi Isowr ki kindit avah pleinee tu' perthleng lamda. Ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi tpanpaak ki ka'am Mikpurthuh kcha' ava' kchang ngi khut purthuh ava' luwbuk lamda ungta soplow chlamda.
Mleiya hava' leiyi Isowr rih mmaan hinni daksa ngi kdung ngi tngeina' avah mdopiik lam. Mleiya mmaan ki snu rek kpha rukku mnowpa ki rilam avah nowpa kma' rilam tu' mdoperthlen in.

Anto'hep daat nowl lih pselpa rek rukku mnowpa dilkqowiyi snu tu' rilam ma'amin mapthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih pselpa le' pselpa msingreelin thung ngi daksa dongeiyi ningkyana'si ava ngi kparka kcha'lam. Ungta mmaan nih mdoparmaan ki mraalin suwkthuhna' ka'am daat avah mdak inni mdo'arlaan chaakin.
Ungta mmaan nih Isowr avah mmaan ki tedeh pinditna' thung ngi mdothiik nuwmmaan leiyi, Mma ngi mmaan hinni totlotma rang nong rek ava' totlotna' rang ki thenni plungbin dak kma' mdotipbin lam.

Mmaan nih mdakin avah rinkinditmana' mkheng 'leen, jowltpurjutna', tkerteenna', tpunjuwrna', mii te'eyowna', ker'ei kalrai, mrilpum mih tkurhuwnna', miiqhatmana' plungbin hava'le' ava ngi kdim kcha'lam.
Ungta mmaan nah miikhow kthe kcha' rek, Isowr kikthitna' rek, plung kthidei, kpirlin kcha' mii, kpirlinda kpaumii, kqha kma' kupthuwk mii, ungta mnuhmpa kopqowi kma' mii reklam.
Mmaan nah kokmok rek ungta lam trinphuma mii reklam. Mmaan nah vonsat kthlowi kma', koptlot piikdei kma' ungta muplungnee ktaak reklam.

Mmaan nih Isowr ki mrinkindit paureen, tidit tah hava'hep dow rek ava' ktlow mmaan avah mdiyow ki mtik kcha, tidit mdodehn. Pdainu mmaan nih mdotlot daatin ungta ava' daat kmah ngi avale' ktlow mii rek avah mmaan nih mdorot piikin.
Avaleiyi, miikhat 'leenni paukpindit, O dultimii, kuwku yow tih, nang nga akerthlena' rah m'lam amvot meh. Mleiya mii morson khat 'leenni paukpindit nang ngi athina kpursul kcha' imptih.
Pdainu neen nih ava' hep daat nong ktlow rek 'leenni, Isowr rih kindit ava' dilkqowiyi pau tpinditna' avah mdotlot tidit avah ndehn.
Ungta nang adak kuh adotlot tlit daat nong ava' hep daat nong ktlow rek mmaan 'leenni paukpindit, O dultimii nang, Isowr rih pau mpindit thung vah nang nga kerthlet chrah kirbin imptih?

Mditmata nang ngi Mma' plungqhat knemsi avah tuk'asutma mow? Mditmata nang ngi Mma ngi mduh thah mdo'arvandiilna' ungta ksowt tih mdodiildehna' avah tuk'asutma mow? Mditmata nang ngi Isowr plungqhatna' ava ngi plung tperthlenna' thah nang nga adotqhi tidit avah adehma mow?

Pdainu nang aplung kapchai ungta plung adoperthlen mana' ava ngi nang ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng nit ava' ki thenni, athina 'leenni plungthit mei kquwng avah apurtuwl chaak a. Nit ava' thung ngi Isowr rih Mma' ki mrinkindit pau tpinditna' avah kpurphuwng rah.
Isowr rih: “Mii khimkhei hinni mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi kpii lamrah.” (Luw. 62:12 Prl. 24:12)
Tidiil chaak tlittu' kilqhi ngi kqha ktlow kcha' rek ungta tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ungta kqop kma' rang kthlaam kcha' rek mmaan ava' hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kpii chlam rah.
Pdainu mthennemna' kthlaam kcha' rek ungta kindit kopqowi kmah ngi rinkinditmana' kopqowi kcha' rek hinni plungthit le' plungthit mei kquwng avah kpiilam rah.

Tyattraanna' ungta arthli buwkna' avah kqha kma' ktlow tlit daat mii rekki pthlarin khimkhei rek hinni ka'am rah. Hava'le' avah Jihudi rek hinni rukri ngi ka'am rah ungta audilli Grik rek hin rukku ka'am rah.
Pdainu tkonlorna', takyat chaakna' ungta plungdaina' avah kqha ktlow mii khimkhei rek hinni ka'am rah. Hava'le' avah Jihudi rek hinni rukri ngi ka'am rah ungta audilli Grik rek hin rukku ka'am rah.
Mleiya Isowr rih mii avah mmikmai mdosut pemeh.

Mleiya nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi pnu kervei kcha' rek avah nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi kkenvei chlam rah. Ungta nowlam thung ngi pnu kervei kcha' rek avah nowlam ava ngi m'leenin nih paukpindit rah.
Mleiya Isowr miksut thung vah, nowlam avah tarjaak hehe ngi karja kcha' rek mmaan avah mrinkindit pemeh pdainu nowlam avah mnong ngi ktlow kcha' rek mmaan avah kpindit chlam rah.
Mleiya nowlam kthlowi kma' Chaatktlei rekki mnowpaan nih nowlam thung ngi ka'am rek ava' mtlotin thung ngi, mmaan nih nowlam thlowilam myoso, ava ngi mmaan thung ngi nowlam khat kurthuwk chda.

Ava' hep mii rek ava ngi Isowr rih nowlam ki nong avah mmaan plungchai rek thung ngi mikjitta tidit mdopdeh lam. Ungta muplungrildehn rukku avah sakhi mdopiik. Ungta muplungbin rekin ava ngi mmaan avah marlakniu kpursul lamda ungta marlakniu kperthlet chlamda.
Mleiya Pau tpinditna' nit khat ka'am rah, Isowr rih dultimii rekki tuprut nong rek avah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi pau mpindit rang thung vah, neiyi kdoparjaam kqhapaumin ki dilkqowiyi paukpindit rah.
Asuwn, nang nga Jihudi khat kirdi kcha' ptih ungta nowlam 'leenni kikbiu kcha' ptih. Ungta Isowr hinni kpirlin kcha' ptih.
Ungta nang ngi Mma' plungbin avah adodeh ungta nowlam thungki akurchuh chaak leiyi, nang ngi makqhasi dow rek avah adorot chaak dok.
Ungta nang adak kat avah mmikktot kqhi kcha' khat ptih ungta kjiingnu thung ngi ka'am kcha' rek thenni mar'aang khat ptih tidit avah adak ki kindit tih adodeh.
Nang nga kokmok rekki kpurchuk kcha' khat ptih. Nang ngi nowlam thungki tedeh pinditna' mrit ungta kindit ki mrit avah adodeh.
Avaleiyi, mii morson kpurchuk nang ngi taluleiyi adak athina kpurchuk mti? Kuprunong totlot rang pemeh, dida kparjaam nang nga kuprungaal ptimow?
Lowsang qhimaan, dida kthe nang nga lowsang kqhingaal ptimow? Dow pthla rek kahal kcha' nang nga dow pthla luwbuk'inn kukruwl ngaal ptimow?
Nowlam leiyi, kpirlin kcha' nang nga nowlam adopkuiyi Isowr akyatma ngaal mow?
Mleiya, hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Naan aleiyi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki, Isowr miing 'leenni pthitda kpau dok ka'am lam.” (Is. 52:5 Ejk. 36:22)
Mleiya nang ngi nowlam apqowibi, vuntreenna' avah msit ka'am a, pdainu nang ngi nowlam kupkui khat akurthuh bih, nang ngi vun'adoreen avah vuntreenma kurthuwk kcha' a.
Avaleiyi, vunkreen kma' kuwmiikhat tih nowlam ki mrinkinditsi ava' mopqowi chaakku, mma' ki vuntreenmana' avah vuntreen nih tai nimeh mow?

Ungta mnowpa ngi vunkreen kma' miikhat tih nowlam avah mpurkhum chaakku, nowlam ki mqutna' pauna kpha kthlowi kcha' ungta vunkreen kcha' naan avah, nowlam kupkui inptih, tidit tih a'leenin nih pau tpindit nimeh mow?
Mleiya mduwn thang daat tih Jihudi kurthuwk mma' avah Jihudi dakdak pemeh. Mditmata mduwn thang daat ki, daksa 'leenni vunkreen mma' avah vunkreen dakdak pemeh.

Pdainu mthung thang ngi Jihudi kurthuwk mma' avah Jihudi dakdak. Ungta vunkreen avah muplung thung ngi mdoreen ungta mapthla thung ngi mdoreen, nowlam ki pauna ngi mdoreen pemeh. Jihudi dakdak avah mii rekki mdopanpaak ava' pemeh pdainu Isowr rih mdopanpaak ava'.
Mdittu' Jihudi rekki talu changqhatna' mthlowi inna? Mditmata vunkreen nih talu msit amna' ka'am a?
Dow khimkhei 'leenni klinsi ngi, mkhatna' thung ngi Isowr rih Mma' ki pauna rek avah mmaan dokilrinqhi chaak rang ngi mdopiik lam.
Mdittu' aangqhe ngi lammrinma'u talu? Mmaan lamrinma ava ngi Isowr ki trin chaakna' avah msit ktaak kpurthuh rang?

Anto'liit rang pemeh! Dakat tih, Isowr rah kindit ungta mii khimkhei avah pleiknei. Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mleiya nang nga apauthe rek ava ngi kindit chrang ptih. Ungta a'leen nih mii rekki pau mpindit dilli, nang ngi kapchaang kcha' krow ptih.” (Luw. 51:4)

Pdainu neenki nrinkindit mana' ava ngi Isowr rinkinditna' mtedet tu', talu tethe raan? Isowr rih n'leenin nih muplungthit mei kquwng mitpiikin thung ngi neen nih Mma' avah mrinkindit meh, tidit raan ? Neiyi havah dultimii khat tih kthe'a.
Immeh, Anto'liit rang pemeh! Mleiya anto' mkurthuh u, taluhep pih Isowr vah, dultipaam 'leenni paukpindit rang ngoh?
Mleiya nei kepleinee ava ngi Isowr ki kindit avah Mma' konlorna' mkerkheel thang setset tu', taluleiyi neiya tunkpha thung ngi pnu kervei khat tidit tih mdotupsul o?

Ungta taluleiyi “kqha mthuhna' rang ki thenni kqha kma' itlown cheh,” tiditma raanno? Mleiya mii aangqhe ngi titii mnee psukinda ungta ‘Anto' adotheen,’ midiinda. Ungta Isowr rih mmaan mdopsul lam avah mkindit kat.

Mdittu' talu? Neenna mmaan hinni kqhabet inpmin mow? Immeh, anto'liit pemeh! Mleiya neen nih choduduh ngi Jihudi rek ruk ungta Grik rek ruk, mkheng kheng inni pnu kurduh ngi ka'am kcha'lam, tidit dokin.
Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mrinkindit khatleh ammeh, khadaat ruk ammeh.
Kdeipindih kcha' khatleh ruk ammeh. Isowr kthlaam kcha' khadaat ruk ammeh.
