Mii mkheng ngi 'lamleh mqowi chaakter'a, Mii mkheng ngi msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a. Kqha ktlow khatleh ammeh, khadaat ruk ammeh. (Luw. 14:1-3, 53:1-3 Pkj. 7:20)
Mmaan to'or rek avah kpurhuk kcha' thlaan rek hep daat kurthuwk kcha'lam a, Meplei rek inni mii huwng chlamda. (Luw. 5:9) Mnehrkowngin 'leenni, Pruwldowi ka'am kcha' a. (Luw. 140:3)
Mnehrin thung ngi pauhor le' paukkha tethena ngi kdim kcha' a. (Luw. 10:7)
Hii tupbuwkna' rang ki thenni mkhuhn nah kyaang.
Te'ekrena' le' ningqitna ngi m'lam inna kdim kcha'.
Ungta plung kdai 'lam avah mdodeh pindit in pemeh. (Is. 59:7-8)
Mmaan miksut thung ngu Isowr tqit chaakna' ka'am pemeh.” (Luw. 36:1)

'Tunnu nehr khimkhei mkarngat chaakna' ungta dultipaam mkheng ngi Isowr aang ngi kparmak mkurthuh chaakna' rah nowlam mih mdothe khimkhei avah nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am mii rek hinni mdothe tidit avah neen nih ndehn a.
Avaleiyi, Mma' miksut thung ngi dultimii kuwkhat leh rukka nowlam dotlot thung ngi tpindit nimeh. Mleiya nowlam avah pnu tidit tedeh pinditna' ngaal.
Pdainu 'tunnu Nowlam thungki kma' Isowr hinki rinkinditna' avah kandangda ungta avaleiyi Nowlam mih ungta Khulpu rek rukku sakhi mdopiikin.
Mleiya Isowr hinki rinkinditna' avah mii mkheng hinni ungta lamkrin kcha' mii mkheng rek 'leenni Jisu Khrista hinni lamkrin kcha' ar'aang ngi kurjung. Mleiya mkertleina' ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya mii mkheng ngi pnu arvei chda ungta Isowr ki konlorna' avah mdoptham chaak.
Isowr rih Mma' plungnee ngi Khrista Jisu doktlanna' ar'aang ngi mmaan nah pindit chlamda.

Isowr rih Mma' hii thung ngi lamrin ki ar'aang ngi, Mma' avah Isowr plung kapngam rintparlaan khat kurthuwk ki parlaan chda. Mleiya Mma ngi hava' mdotlot ava ngi Mma' rinkinditna' avah pandangda. Mleiya Isowr rih choduh ki terveen pnu avah, Mma' ki mduh tidiildehna' ava ngi arvan taplaan piikda.
Mma ngi hava' mdotlot ava ngi 'tun kpha thung rukku Mma' ki rinkinditna' avah kandang a. Mleiya Isowr rah kindit ungta kpindit kcha' khat ava ngi Jisu hinki lamrin ar'aang ngi mdopindit.

Mdittu', tpirlin chaakna' rang talu thuh ka'am a? Tpirlin chaakna' rah ka'am liit pemeh. Talu nowlam mih havah markam a? Mmow, miikhat nongtlot ava ngi markam a? Immeh, pdainu havah lamrin ki nowlam mih havah mdo'arkam.
Avaleiyi, neen nih hanto ngi tupqutin, tidit tah Isowr rih miikhat avah nowlam dotlot thungki kma' lamrin nih mdopindit.
Mditmata Mma' avah Jihudi rek chrelki Isowr daat mow? Mma' avah Chaatktlei rekki Isowr ruk pemeh mow? Ou, Mma' avah Chaatktlei rekki ruk Isowr.
Mleiya Isowr khadaat ma'am leiyi, vunkreen rek avah lamrin nih ungta vunkreen kma' rek ava'ruk lamrin ava' ar'aang ngi kpindit rah.
Mdittu' neen nih nowlam avah lamrin leiyi, msit ktaak tpurthuh raan? Immeh, anto'liit rang pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih nowlam avah mruhtaptan qhak thangin.
Mdittu' dultimii nowpa ki n'paan Abraham ava' vah daksa lam ki dilkqowi vah talu mphaan chaak a, tidit raanno?
Mleiya Abraham avah nongtlot tih mpindit chaak bih, mma ngi mpirlin chaakna' rah mruk ka'am a, pdainu Isowr aang pemeh.
Pdainu Kchiir laika ngi talu mthe? “Abraham mih Isowr lamrin chda, Ungta mma' hinni avah rinkinditna' ngi taipiikda,” mdit. (Rnp. 15:6)
'Tunnu miikhat nongtlotna' arda avah plungnee khat tih mii ngi taimeh pdainu avah leenleiyi mdotai.
Pdainu rinko'owi kma' rek kpindit piik kcha' Mma' ava ngi, nong nga ktlow kma' pdainu Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' lamrin avah rinkinditna' thung ngi taipiikda.
David rukku anto'hep daat tih hanto ngi theda: Isowr rih nongtlotna' kma' rinkinditna' ava ngi mdotai piik chaak mma' avah msuwkqha'a, dida.
David tih hanto ngi theda: “Nowlam tukksut kma' rek mdoptlot piik, Ungta mupnu arve rek mdopkhum piik mii rek avah msuwkin kqha'a.
Kruwng ngi m'leen nih pnu mdotai piikmah rang, Mii avah msuwk kqha'a,” dida. (Luw. 32:1-2)
Mdittu' suwqhatna' avah vunkreen kcha' rek then daat mow? Mditmata vunkreen kma' rek then rukko? Mleiya neen nih, Abraham thenni lamrin avah rinkinditna' ngi taipiikda, tiditin.
Mdittu' avah taluhep pih mdotai piikko? Mleiya mma ngi vunmreen arlaan mow, mditmata vunmreenma arlaanno? Avah mma ngi vunmreendil pemeh pdainu mma ngi vunmreenduh ngi mdotai piikdok.

Mma ngi vuntreenna' avah titinna' khat tih mdo'arlaan chaak. Mma ngi lamrin nih vuntreenna' avah rinkinditna' ki kbihjiik khat tih mdo'arlaan. Mleiya mma ngi vuntreenna' ava' marlaanduh ngi lamrin avah mdothlowi chaak dok. Mleiya mmaan nih vuntreenna' arlaang mlam yoso mmah lamkrin kcha' rek mkheng ki mpa. Ungta mmaan nih lammrin chaakin thungta Isowr rih rinkinditna' thung ngi mmaan nah mdotai chaak lam.

Abraham a vunkreen kcha' rek daat ki mpa pemeh. Pdainu neenki n'paan Abraham lamrinna' khuhther thung ngi kchet kcha' rek mmaan then rukku mma' avah mpa kurthuwk. Mleiya vuntreenna' marlaan duduh ngi hava' lamrin avah mma ngi mdothlowi chaak dok.
Mleiya Abraham le' mnaumsuwn rekki dultipaam ki alroukchom mii mkurthuhna' raan ki paureel mdo'arlaanin avah nowlam ar'aang pemeh pdainu lamrin ki rinkinditna' ar'aang ngi mdo'arlaan chaakin.
Mleiya nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am kcha' rekki alroukchom rek mkurthuhn bih, lamrinna' avah msit ammeh ungta paureel ava' rukka msit ktaakpa kurthuwk kcha' a.
Mleiya nowlam mih plungthit mdopthuh, tidit tah nowlam ammana' thung ngi nowlam kupkui ruk ka'am pemeh.

Avaleiyi, plungnee dilkqowiyi mkurthuhna' rah lamrin ar'aang ngi paureel avah kurjung. Mleiya havah nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am rek daat kma' Abraham lamrinna' thung ngi ka'am kcha' rek mmaan hin rukku paureel ava ngi nausuwn mkheng rek 'leenni kertlei ktaak ki mkurthuhna' rang ki then. Mleiya Abraham avah neen nkhengin ki n'paan.

Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi nang nga chaat knempok rekki mpa adokpurthuh dok.” (Rnp. 17:5) Mleiya mma' lamrin chaak Isowr miksut thung ngi mma' avah neen npa kurthuwk dok. Isowr rah kdiyou rek hinni rinkum kpii ungta ka'am kma' dow rek avah ka'am ksadok rek heppi kthe pchaang.

Abraham mih plungbinpsuk ktaak thung ngi plungbinpsuk tu' lamrin chda. Mthungta ava ngi, mma ngi chaat knempa rekki mpa kurthuwk chda. Mleiya mma' hinni: “Nang asuruwl rekka anto'hepdat rah,” (Rnp. 15:5) dida mdothe heppi thuwkda.

Ungta mma ngi lamrin 'leenni mdown chaakma ava ngi, mma ngi mdaksa avah kdiyou dok kcha' kluwng khat heppi kerdeida. Mleiya mmah kum arja khat arveel mdophaak chaak dok ungta Sarah vonchowi rang rukka kdiyou kcha' tu' kanpang ngi bin chda.
Anto'daat yoso mma ngi Isowr paureel avah lamrinma ngi plung kpenqheek tlowmeh. Pdainu mma ngi mlamrin pnetsetda Isowr hinni ponlor chda.
Ungta mma ngi Isowr rih pau mdoreel dok avah Mma ngi mdotlot pchaan tidit tih knet tih lamrin chda.
Ungta avaleiyi, ‘mma' hinni havah rinkinditna' thung ngi taipiikda.’ (Rnp. 15:6)
'Tunnu rinkinditna' thung ngi taipiikda, tidit avah mma' then daat chrel lih mdokjit pemeh.
Pdainu neen nthenin rukku mdothe. Havah neenki Kruwng Jisu kdiyou thungki kperdel Mma' ava' hinni lamkrin kcha' neen nihin rukku, rinkinditna' ngi miktaipiik raan.
Isowr rih Jisu avah neen nih tparmaan leiyi, parlaan pthida ungta neen midotpinditna' raan ki thenni kdiyou thungki perdel nowlda.
Avaleiyi, lamrin nih midotpindit chaak dokin leiyi, neen nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr tu' plung kdai avah nthlowi chaak inna.

Ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi neen nih 'tun trin chaakna' meekin plungnee ava' thung ngi lamrin ar'aang ngi tuluw chaakna' lam avah nphan chaak inna. Ungta neen nih Isowr ki konlorna' ava' tbinpsuk chaak inni kanpa kcha' inpimin.
Ungta ava' daat kma' neen nih tyattraanna' nperteelin thung ngi ava ngi tidiildehna' mdopthuh tidit avah neen nih ndehn a.
Ungta tidiildehna' ava ngi rinchan kenreel pthuwkda ungta kenreel rinchan nih plungbinpsuk avah mdopthuh.
'Tunnu plungbinpsuk ava ngi ningkya mipiimeh. Mleiya neen nihin nih midotpiikin Pthla Kchiir ava ngi Isowr vonsat avah neen nuplung rekin thung ngi midotperlei piik dokin.
Mleiya neen nih nruh kdowng ngi na'am daatin arlaan nih, mphakat thung ngi Khrista ngi rinko'owi kma' mii rekki thenni diyow piikda.
Mrinkindit kcha' miikhat kchang ngi, kuwmiikhat tih kdiyowpiik daat tidit tah amchuchu meh. Miikqha khat ki thennu kuwmiikhat tih kdiyowpiik daat ruk krow.
Pdainu Isowr rih neen nihin nih vonsat avah hanto ngi mitedet inda. Mleiya neen nih pnu nerve chaak meekin arlaan nih Khrista ngi neen nakchang inni diyouda.
Ava' han'tun nih Isowr rih neen avah Khrista ki hii ava' ar'aang ngi midotpindit chaak dokin leiyi, Mma' ar'aang ngi plungthit mei kquwng thungki neenna miksan chraan.
Mleiya neenna miihal kurthuwk chdaat yomin, Mma' Chapa diyow ava' ar'aang ngi Isowr tu' mipalqhat inda. Ava' han'tun nih midotpalqhat dokin ava ngi, Mchapa rinkum mih neenna miksan chraan.
Ungta anto'daat mda, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neenna Isowr hinni tpirlin chaak raan. Mma' ar'aang ngi 'tunnu neenna tkalqhatna' avah tarlaan chaak dokin.
Avaleiyi, miikhat leiyi, dultipaam thung ngi pnu mluw chaakku ungta pnu leiyi, kdiyou ma'am chaak heppi, mii mkheng 'leenni kdiyou avah arvang chda. Mleiya mii mkheng ngi pnu mdo'arve chaak.
Mleiya nowlam mpiikduduh ngi pnu avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am dok kcha'. Pdainu nowlam ma'amma thung ngu pnu avah taipiik meh.

Pdainu Adam ki kupqhun nih Moses arvankpha thung ngi kdiyou ava ngi arvankpaal kcha'. Ungta kdiyou ava ngi Adam nowlam pkui heppi, pnu kervei kma' kpha rek 'leen rukku arvanpaal chda. Adam avah karvang rang Mma' ava' hep daat khat tih ka'am kcha'.

Pdainu mkhon ktaak chla avah tparmana' ava'lu pemeh. Mleiya miikhat doparmah ava ngi mii knempok eyouda. Pdainu ava' han'tun nih Isowr ki plungnee ungta Miikhat, tidit tah Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ki chla ava ngi mii knempok 'leenni ptlon piikda.

Ungta chla avah pnu kervei miikhat leiyi, karvang ava'lu pemeh. Mleiya miikhat ki nowlam pkuina' thungki karvang dok pau tpinditna' ava ngi tupsulna' pthuwkda. Pdainu nowlam knempok taklaanna' thungki karvang mkhon ktaak chla ava ngi tpindit pikkna’ pthuwkda.

Mleiya miikhat doparmah ava ngi miikhat ava'leiyi kdiyou ava ngi paal chda. Pdainu ava' han'tun nih Khat ki, tidit tah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi plungnee kepleet tih karlaang kcha' ungta rinkinditna' ki chla karlaang kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi tya knem mih rinkum thuh kpaal chdaat lam rang ngoh.

Avaleiyi, miikhat doparmana' ava' ar'aang ngi mii mkheng 'leenni tupsulna' ki pau tpinditna' avah arvangda. Anto' heppi Miikhat ki rinkinditna' nongtlot ava' ar'aang ngi mii mkheng 'leenni tpindit piikda kring rinkum avah karvang.
Mleiya miikhat pau pqowimana' ava ngi mii knempok avah pnu tperveda, anto' heppi Miikhat pau pqowina' ava ngi mii knempok avah mrinkindit kpurthuh rah.
Ava' han'tun nih dow kparmak mnemna' rah nowlam avah arvang amda. Pdainu pnu nemna' thung ngi plungnee avah kerkheel setset tih knemthang.
Mleiya pnu ngi kdiyou thuh mpaal chaak heppi plungnee ava ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii rinkinditna' ava ngi kpaal rah.
Mdittu' talu tethe raan? Plungnee mnemsetna' rah neen nih pnu thuh ta'am tlit daat raan?
Immeh, anto'liit rang pemeh! Taluhep pih pnu thuh kdiyou dok neen ava ngi pnu thuh ta'am tlit daat rang?
Mditmata Khrista hinni dii kluwt dok kcha' neen nkhengin avah Khrista diyowna' thung ngi dii kluwt dok inpimin tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow?

Avaleiyi, diiluwna' ava ngi neenna Khrista tu' kdiyou thuh mi'alruwl dok inda. Mleiya Pa ava' konlorna' ava ngi kdiyou thungki Khrista mdoperdel heppi, neen rukka rinkum ki ren tkurthuhna' thung ngi tche chaak raan.
Mleiya neen nih Mma' diyowna' thuh ava' heppi neen rukka Mma' tu' kirchinsap kcha' nkurthuh chaakin bih, kertlei liit kmah ngi neen rukka Mma' rinkerheelna' ava' thung ngi tkirchinsap raan.
Neen nih havah ndehn tidit tah neen nih pnu suwk'owr tkurthuh porsonmana' raan ki thenni, tidit tah pnu daksa avah msit ktaak tuppthutna' rah neenki miipli avah Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi mdopthowi yowdok.
Mleiya kdiyou dok kcha' mma' avah pnu thungki ko'ol dok kcha' a.
'Tunnu neen nih Khrista tu' ndiyow chaak dokin bih, neen rukka Mma' tu' trinsap chaak raan tidit tih lamtrin chaakin.
Khrista ngi kdiyou thungki mrinkerheel dok leiyi, veikhat ren nih diyou nowl meh tidit avah ndehn. Kdiyou vih Mma' 'leenni tpaalna' ruhtan sin pchaang meh.
Mleiya Mma ngi mdiyow thung ngi pnu thuh veikhadaat tih kdiyou. Pdainu Mma ngi mrinkerheel thung ngu Isowr hinni kring kerheel kcha'.
Anto' heppi, naan rukka dakat tih pnu thuh kdiyou dok kchaan ping, pdainu neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni Isowr hinthah kring dok kchaan ping tidit ikerdei chaan.
Avaleiyi, pnu ngi kdung ngi mdongei kqha kma' ava' adopqowi mana' raan, kdiyou kcha' rang adaksaan thung ngi pnu avah tappaalmaan.

Naan nih apna rekin avah pnu thuh rinkinditmana' ki khutsinton kurthuwk ki parlaan chmaan. Ava' kchang ngi kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok kcha' mii rek heppi adak inni apna rekin avah Isowr ki rinkinditna' nongki thenni khutsinton khat kurthuwk ki aparlaan chaan.
Mleiya naanna nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am inptipmeh pdainu plungqhat kurduh ngi a'amin leiyi, pnu ngi a'leenin nih tpaalna' ruhtan mdosin mdosin rang pemeh.
Mdittu' talu? Neen nih nowlam kurduh ngi ta'ammaan pdainu plungqhat kurduh ngi ta'amin leiyi, pnu terve tlit raan? Immeh. Anto'liit rang pemeh!
Naan nih tidina' thah kqhi pnu hin yoso, mditmata rinkinditna' thah kqhi tethe topqowina' hin yoso, akparlaan chaak naan ava' hinni, naanna suwk'owr rekin ptih, tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow?

Choduh vah naanna pnu suwk'owr rek kurthuwk kcha' inptih. Pdainu Isowr rih tpurchuhna' mdet khat aparlaan inda ungta naan nih ava' tpurchuhna' avah aplungchaiyin mkheng tu' pqowi chaan tinu. Avaleiyi, Isowr rah kdopanpaak chaak.
Ungta Isowr rih pnu thungki adotperthle chaakin leiyi, naanna rinkinditna' ki suwk'owr rek kurthuwkin imptih.

Naanki dultimii daksa ruhdown leiyi, neiyi dultimii heppi kpau ping. Mleiya choduh vah naan nih adaksaan ki apna rekin avah totborna' le' nowlam tuksutmana' hinni nowlam tukksut kma'set akurthuhna' raan ki thenni suwk'owr rih kparlaan kchaan ptih. Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih akenjet chaakna' raan ki thenni apna rekin avah rinkinditna' thung ngi suwk'owr rekki ikparlaan chaan.
Mleiya naan nih pnu thuh suwk'owr rek akurthuh thung innu, rinkinditna' thangvah naanna ko'ol dok kcha' inptih.
Mdittu' 'tun naan nih ningkya adophaannaan dow rek ava' thung ngi talu mchei adophanin ka'am a? Mleiya ava' dow rekki mqutna' avah tidiyowna'.
Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih pnu thungki adotperthle chaak dok inni ungta Isowr suwk'owr akurthuh chaak inni tkenjetna' ki mchei avah athlowi chaak inna. Ungta ava' thuh ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah ka'am.
Mleiya pnu ardaman nah kdiyou pdainu Isowr chla avah neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava'.
Mditmata, ku'uknau rek naan nih miikhat avah mrin khimkhei thung ngi nowlam mih m'leen nih tpaalna' ruhtan mdosin tlit tidit avah deimaan timow? Neiyi havah nowlam kdei rek 'leenni kpau ping.

Mleiya mi'innpu ka'am snu khat avah mi'innpu ma'am khimkhei thung ngi nowlam ava ngi mi'innpu 'leenni mdobowl. Pdainu mi'innpu mdiyow dok bih, mma' avah mi'innpu hinki nowlam dobowl thungki kerthlet kcha' a.

Anto' mkurthuh bih, snu ava ngi mi'innpu mrin daat arlaan nih pselpa ktlok khat hinni inn'mne bih, mma' avah lowsang kqhinu tidit rah. Pdainu mi'innpu mdiyow chaak bih, nowlam ava' thung ki mmah kerthlet dok kcha' a. Mdit bih, mma ngi pselpa ktlok khat hinni inn nei chyoso, mmah lowsang kqhinu kurthuwk nimeh.

Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih ktlok khat tidit tah, kdiyou thungki mdoperdel dok Mma' ava' hinni inn anee chaakna' raan, Khrista daksa ar'aang ngi naan rukka nowlam thung ngi kdiyou dok kcha' inptih. Mleiya havah Isowr hinni anai chaakna' raan ki then.

Neen nih daksa nowpa dilkqowiyi na'amin thung vah, daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei pnu rek ava ngi tidiyowna' ki mchei kepchei rang ngi napna rekin thung ngi nong tlowda. Mleiya daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei avah nowlam mih mdopandan.

Pdainu 'tunnu neen mikbowlin ava' thung ngi tidiyow chaakin ava ngi neenna nowlam thungki miktlan dok inda. Mleiya havah neen nih nowlam thungki paukjit rekki nowpa pli ava' kma' Pthla hinni nowpa ren thung ngi soptolow chaakna' raan ki then.

Mdittu' talu tethe raan? Neen nih nowlam avah pnu pi'ii tidit raan? Anto'liit rang pemeh! Ava' kchang ngi, Neiyi nowlam ma'amma bih pnu avah deipindih nimaang. Mleiya nowlam mih: “Naan nih kraam nimaan tih,” (Mpk. 20:17 Knl. 5:21) mditma bih, neiyi kakraam avah pnu tidit, dei nimaang.
Pdainu pnu ngi paupiik ava' 'leenni changqhatna' louthida k'leen nih mdetmdet ki kqha kma' tngeina' pthuwkda. Mleiya nowlam ma'amma thung ngu pnu avah kdiyou kcha'.
Neiya mpha khat thung ngi nowlam ktaak ki arvang kring ping pdainu paupiik ava' marvan thungta pnu avah ring nowlda ungta neiya diyou nuh.
Ungta rinkum kpii rang paupiik ava ngi tidiyowna' kihin nih mpiida.
Mleiya pnu ngi paupiik ava' 'leenni changqhatna' louda neiya muhuwng chda ungta ava ngi neiya me'eyouda.
Avaleiyi, nowlam avah kchiir ungta paupiik avah kchiir ungta mrinkindit ungta kqha.

Mdittu' kqha tidit ava ngi nei kthen nuh kdiyowna' mupthuh a? Anto'liit pemeh! Pdainu pnu avah pnu tidit kdodehna' rah kqha ava' ar'aang ngi pnu ngi nei kihin nih tidiyowna' avah mdopthuh. Mleiya havah pnu ava ngi paupiik ava' ar'aang ngi kerkheel set tih pnu tervena' mkurthuhna' rang ki then.
Mleiya neen nih nowlam avah pthla 'lam kqowi, pdainu neiya pnu kervei nowpa thuh ka'am ping ungta ava ngi neiya pnu thuh suwk'owr rih mdotyur chaak tidit ndehn a.
Mleiya neiyi kdotlot meek avah talu tidit deipindih maang. Mleiya neiyi totlot rah kdongeima ava' kdotlot ungta neiyi kdohal chaakkat ava' kdotlot.
Pdainu neiyi kdotlot nuwmma ava' ktlot bih, neiyi nowlam avah kqha a tidit kdorot chaak.
Pdainu 'tunnu ava' ktlow avah nei pemeh, nei kthung ngi ka'am pnu ava ngi mdotlot chaak.
Mleiya nei kthung ngi 'tidit tah, nei kdaksa thung ngi' kqha khatleh ka'am pemeh. Mleiya kqha totlotna' plungbin avah kihin nih ka'am pdainu ava' totlotna' rang ki lam avah kdophan pchaan pemeh.
Mleiya kqha totlot rah kdongei avah kdotlot pchaan pemeh pdainu totlot rah kdongeima kqha kma' ava' kdotlot.
'Tunnu neiyi kdongeima ava' ktlot bih, ava' ktlow tlit avah nei pemeh pdainu nei kthung ngi ka'am pnu ava ngi mdotlot.
Avaleiyi, neiyi hava' kdeh a, tidit tah neiyi kqha ktlot rang thung ngi kqha kma' nowpa ava ngi kthung ngi nong mdotlot tlit.
Mleiya nei kthungmii ava' dilkqowiyi neiya Isowr nowlam thung ngi kuplung kngam kcha'.
Pdainu neiyi kapna rek thung ngi nei kuplungril ptengda karnaakqhi nowlam msik khat kdeh a. Ungta ava' pnu nowlam ava ngi nei kapna rek thung ngi amda neiya rowngmii mupthutda.
O tya thuh msuwkthi kcha' mii ping neiya! Kuw ngi hava' tidiyowna' daksa thungki mekqen thuh chrangda?
Neiyi Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr rah kpanpaak chaak a! Avaleiyi, nei kdaksa ki, kuplungril vah Isowr nowlam soplow chnuh pdainu daksa nowpa vah pnu nowlam avah sopkdolow chaak.
Avaleiyi, 'tunnu Khrista hinni ka'am rek, daksa 'lam thah kchet kma' rek pdainu Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kchet rek mmaan 'leenni tupsulna' avah am nimeh.
Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinni rinkum kpii nowlam ki Pthla ava ngi pnu ki ungta tidiyowna' ki nowlam ava' thung ki neiya mpo'ol chda.

Mleiya daksa am leiyi nowlam ava ngi dow khatleh tlow pchaang mda, mruhtanna' ammda. Avaleiyi, Isowr rih Mma' Chapa avah pnu kervei arlim mih pnu leiyi, arjuk pthlada. Anto ngi Mma ngi daksa thung ngi pnu avah psulda.
Mleiya daksa 'lam thah kchet kma' pdainu Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kchet kcha' neen nthung inni nowlam ki mrinkindit dokriin rek ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni Mchapa avah arjuk pthlada.
Mleiya daksa 'lam thah kring kcha' rekvah daksa lamki dow rek 'leenni muplungrilin avah mdothiikin. Pdainu Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kring kcha' rekvah Pthla ava' ki dow rek 'leenni mdothiik chaakin.
Mleiya daksa 'lam thah kbin kcha' avah tidiyowna' pdainu pthla 'lam thah kbin kcha' avah rinkum ungta plungdaina'.
Mleiya daksa 'lamki plungril avah Isowr kepteng miihal, tidit tah daksa 'lamki plungril lih Isowr nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am pemeh, mditmata ka'am pchaang pemeh.
Ava'leiyi, daksa lam thah ka'am rek ava ngi Isowr plung pngam pchaang meh.

Pdainu naanna pnu nowpa thung ngi ka'amin ptipmeh. Pdainu Isowr Pthla ava ngi naan athung inni dakat tih ma'am leiyi naanna Pthla thuh ka'am kchaan ptih. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih Khrista Pthla ava' mthlowi chaakma bih, mmah Khrista hinki pemeh.
Ungta Khrista ngi naan athung inni ma'am bih, daksa avah pnu leiyi, kdiyou kcha' a pdainu pthla avah rinkinditna' leiyi, kring kcha' a.

Isowr rih Jisu a kdiyou thungki perdelda. naan athung inni Isowr Pthla ava' ka'am mkurthuh bih, kdiyou thungki Khrista kperdel Mma' ava ngi, kdiyou chrah adaksa rekin avah mma ngi akipring chraan. Mma ngi havah naan athung inni ka'am, Mma' Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi akipring chraan.
Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek neenna lei kervei kcha' rek inpimin. Pdainu pnu kervei nowpa thung pemeh mditmata neen nih ava' dilkqowiyi trin chaakna' raan ki then pemeh.
Mleiya naan nih pnu kervei nowpa dilkqowiyi arinin bih, diyou chkat naandi' pdainu naan nih Pthla ava ngi daksa nongtlot avah apdiyow chaakin bih, naanna ring chnaandi’.
Mleiya Isowr ki Pthla ngi mdoqhi rek mkheng avah Isowr chapa reklam.

Mleiya naan nih ningqitna' thuh suwk'owr rih ta'amna' rah pthla ado'arlaanin pemeh. Pdainu naan nih chapa ngi adotuhum chaak naanki Pthla avah ado'arlaan chaakin. Pthla ava ngi: “Abba, Apa,” tidit chaak in.
Pthla Mma'kat ava ngi neenki napthlaan tung ngi, neenna Isowr nau rek inpimin tidit ki sakhi avah mdopiik.

'Tunnu neen nih nau rek nkurthuh chaakin bih, alroukchom rek ava' inpimin. Neenna Isowr alrou kchom kcha' rek inpimin. Neen nih Mma' konlorna' ava' ttan chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma' suwkthuhna' thuh dakat tih ntan chaakin bih, neenna Khrista tu' alrou kchomve kcha' rekin pmin.
Mleiya 'tunpha ki neen nih tyattraanna' tperteel lih avah neen nihin nih midotpandan piik raan dilki tkonlorna' tungngu tportolphu liit tih binmaang.
Mleiya mdopurthuh dok ava ngi, Isowr chapa rek kandan rang avah ningkakraal lih mdo'ardat chaak.
Mleiya mdopurthuh dok ava ngi dow khatleh mkurthuh pchaanmana' rah Mma ngi tii pnun pthida. Hava' avah mdopurthuh dok dongei pemeh pdainu Isowr rih havah plungbinpsuk leiyi, tii mdopnun.
Mleiya mdopurthuh dok ava' rukku kqop chrang ava' thung ngi suwk'owr tkurthuhna' thungki ngi Isowr nau rekki konlor dok to'ol chaakna' thah mdoktlan chaak rang ava' mdo'ardat chaak.
Mleiya 'tunpha thung ngi mdopurthuh dok mkheng ava ngi vonkchowi rang snu powidun heppi kya dok ki heksa ngi ma'am avah neen nih ndehn a.

Ungta mmaan daat chrel kma' Pthla ava' ki mkhatna' mchei rek neen rukka, ungta neen kpha rukka nrillin thung ngi kya dok ki hetsat chaakin. Neen nih chapa ngi midotuhum chaak raan, tidit tah neen ndaksaan midotaktlan chaak raan avah ningkakraal lihtardat chaak inni tyattperteel chaakin.

Mleiya neenna hava' plungbinpsuk ava' thung ngi midotsan chaakin, pdainu mik ki tedeh dok plungbinpsuk avah plungbinpsuk pemeh. Mleiya taluleiyi miikhat tih mmik ki mdodeh dok avah kbinpsuk tlit daat rang ngoh?
Pdainu neen nih nmik inni tedehma ava nbinpsukin bih, neen nih avah ningkakraal lih, tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi nardat chaak inna.

Anto' heppi Pthla ava' rukku neen nruhdownnaan thung ngi midotbom chaakin. Mleiya neen nih talukat leiyi, rintaktham chaak raan, tidit avah tedehn pemeh. Pdainu Pthla Mma' ava ngi nehr rih tethe pchaanmah ngi neen nthenni kya le' heksa tu' kilqhi ngi midotaktham piikin.
'Tunnu plungchai rek kthlaam Mma' ava ngi Pthla ava' ki plungril avah talu tidit mdodeh. Mleiya Pthla ava ngi Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi miikenje rekki thenni mdoktham piiklam.
Ungta Isowr vonsat klow kcha' rek hinni dow mkheng avah mqhatna' rang ki thenni mdotlot tidit avah neen nih ndehn. Mleiya mmaan avah Mma' plungbinrit dilkqowiyi mdo'own chaak lam.

Mleiya Mma ngi mduh ngi mdodeh dok rek mmaan avah Mchapa arlim thung ngi mdoperthlen lamna' rah mduduh ngi mdoreel dok ksa. Mleiya Chapa ava ngi unau rek arlak ki mkhatna' mchei mkurthuhna' rah havah mdotlot.

Ava' han'tun nih Mma ngi mduduh ngi mdoreel dok rek avah Mma ngi to'own ruk mdo'own. Ungta Mma ngi mdo'own dok rek avah tpindit ruk mdopindit piik. Ungta Mma ngi mdopindit dok rek avah tponlor ruk mdoponlor chaak.
Mdittu' neen nih hava' dow rek 'leennu talu tethe raan? Isowr rah neen nthen mkurthuh u, kuw ngi neenna mikepteng raan?
Isowr rih Mchapa kat avah kparkhaal kmah ngi neen nthen inni parlaan pthida. Mdittu' taluhep pih Mma ngi Mma' tu' neen nihin nih dow mkheng avah mkhon ktaak ki mikpiikma' raan mow?
Kuw ngi Isowr dokchol dok ksa ava' 'leenni mraal kpii pchaang rang? Kpindit kcha' avah Isowr.
Kuwda kupsul lah? Kdiyou dok avah Khrista ungta ava' han'tun nih kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok. Ungta 'tunnu Mmah Isowr machang thah ko'ongda ungta neen nthen inni mikthampiik meek sliinda.

Kuw ngi neenna Khrista vonsat thungki mikpenqhen pchaang raan? Tyattraanna' ngi mditmata plungbin kerthlet tih, mditmata tyatchiireelna ngi mditmata powitham mih mditmata tihiltnaak rah ktaak ki mditmata suwthitna ngi mditmata raal lih mikpenqhen pchaang raanmow?
Tikjit ava ngi hanto'theda: “Nang athenni niiluwn nih neenna me'eyou inda. Neenna te'eyow rah yau tu' mtaisap inda.” (Luw. 44:22)
Pdainu hava' dow mkheng rek 'leen rukku neen vonsat moklow kchaan Mma' ar'aang ngi neenna kapchaang rek han'tun ki kapchaang rek inpmin.

Mleiya neiyi kindit tih kdeh tidit tah kdiyou vih mditmata kring rinkum mih, vaantamsi rekki mditmata paamkpu rekki mditmata ruhtan rekki mditmata 'tun ka'am dok dow rekki mditmata karvang rang dow rekki,
mditmata kparthaang tya ngi ungta ktlum tya ngi mditmata mdopurthuh dok dow morson rekki neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am Isowr vonsat thungki neenna mipenqhen pchaang liit nimeh.
Neiyi Mesaiah hinni kindit ava' kdothe, plei neimaang. Ungta nei kuplungril deh rukku Pthla Kchiir hinni nei ksakhi avah mpiik a.
Mleiya neiyi kuplung thuh kdung ngi tyattraan na' kdoperteel ungta plungkya tlit tih ka'am kcha' ping.
Mleiya dultimii nowpa ki dilkqowiyi ku'uknau rek, krik lam rek kchang ngi, Mesaiah hinki neiya pauhor mbukda mdotreen pthi dok rang kpha ruk kdak ki kdorot chaak.
Mmaan avah Isreel nau reklam. Mmaan hinni chapa ngi tuhum chaakna', tkonlorna', pauqum rek, nowlam tpiikna', Isowr soptolowna' ungta paureel rek mkheng avah mdopiik lam.

Npu'npa rekin avah mmaan thungki karvang lam. Ungta Mesaiah avah dultimii ki rilam dilkqowiyi mmaan thung ngi karvang. Mma' avah dow mkheng ki mkarthak ungta ktlangknai kma' tpanpaak chaakin Isowr ava'. Amen.
Pdainu hava ngi Isowr pauna avah msit ammeh mleiya Isreel mii rek mkheng avah Isreel miidakdak thina' lam pemeh.
Anto' heppi, Abraham suruwl thungki mkurthuhn leiyi, mmaan mkheng avah Abraham nau rek thina' lam pemeh. Pdainu: “Aijek thungki ngi nang asuruwl rek avah ttai rah,” mdodit. (Rnp. 21:12)
Mleiya dultimii nowpa ki dilkqowiyi kqou kcha' nau rek mmaan avah Isowr nau reklam pemeh. Pdainu paureel ki nau rek mmaan avah suruwl avale' tidit tih mdotai lam.
Mleiya paureel ki pauna rek avah hava': “Tpelreen dok mpha ava' thung ngi Neiya arjung nikdi' Ungta Sarah ngi chapa khat kupluw chrah,” mdodit. (Rnp. 18:10,14)
Ungta hava' daat pemeh, pdainu Rebecca rukku miikhat, tidit tah npu'n'paan Aijek leiyi, kurmuwngda.
Mleiya chapa 'knii rek ava ngi mqou duduhn nih ungta mmaanve ngi kqha mditmata kthi khatleh mtlot duduhn nih, nong rek lei kma' mko'own kcha' do'own chaakna' ki plungbinrit ava' mkurthuhna' rah,
Rebecca hinni hanto'theda: “Kver ava ngi mokmow sopklow chrah.” (Mpk. 33:19)
Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi Jakob vonsat kdolow, pdainu Esau a kdopder chaak,” dida. (Mal. 1:2-3)
Mdittu' talu tethe raan? Isowr hinni rinkinditmana' ka'am a, tidit raan? Immeh, anto'liit rang pemeh.

Mleiya Isowr rih Moses hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi plung kdopkham chaak khimkhei rek hinni plung pkham chnikdi' Ungta plungkham kdotedet nuwm khimkhei rek hinni plung pkham chnikdi',” dida. (Mpk. 33:19)
Mdit bih, kbin kcha' mma' ava' pemeh, mditmata kchen kcha' mma' ava' pemeh pdainu plungqhat ktedet kcha' Isowr ava' plungbin.

Mleiya Kchiir laika ngi, Pharoah hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' plungbinrit kat leiyi, tidit tah Neiyi, Nei kruhtan avah nang ahin nih adokepdehna' rah Ungta Nei kmiing avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi tethethutna' rang ki thenni, Neiyi nang nga singsa adokupthuh.” (Mpk. 9:16)
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi plung mdopqhat nuwmna' hinni Mma ngi plungqhat horda ungta plung mdotapchai nuwmna' hinni mma ngi tapchaida.
Mdit bih, naan nih kihin nih hanto' the naandi': “Taluleiyi Mma ngi 'tun kpha thuh neenna midotupsulin? Mleiya Mma' plungbin avah kuw ngi mapkhaan a?”
Pdainu dakat tih O dultimii, Isowr kepteng ngi karthaang nang avah kuw ptih? Mdopurthuh dok ava ngi mukpurthuh kcha' ava' hinni: Taluleiyi Nang ngi neiya hanto'hep adotpurthuhda, kdi rang?
Beelksa mii ava ngi kanka ngi tsin rang beelruk ungta chowmkponbor rih tsin rang beel rukka mtenekklom khatsap ava' thung ki ngi tsakvena' rah ruhtan mdothlowi chaak pemeh mow?

Isowr rih muplungthit mei kquwng avah tpandan rah mdongei ungta Mma' ruhtan avah mii rekki mdodeh raan mdongei. Anto'daat yoso, Mma ngi plungthit mei kquwng karlaang chrang rek mmaan hinni kdung ngi mdodiil piik chaak lam ungta tkenveina' ki thenni mmaan avah mdoporthlon chaak doklam.
Ungta Mma ngi konlor ki thenni choduduh ngi mdoporthlon dok mmaan, tidit tah plungqhat ki beel rek hinni Mma' konlorsina' ava' mdopandanna' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.
Anto' heppi Mma ngi Jihudi rek arlak ki daat kma' Chaatktlei rek arlak ki neen rukka midoto'own chaak dokin pemeh mow?
Mma ngi Hosia laika thung ngi: “Neiyi, Nei kmii kma' mii rek avah Nei kmii rek dilam nikdi', ungta Neiyi vonsat kdolowma snu ava' hinni, nang nga Nei kvonsat'low pti', dinikdi',” mdodit. (Hos. 2:23)
“Ungta havah hanto' kurthuwk rah, tidit tah, ‘naanna Nei kmii rekin ptipmeh, kdoditna' ava'kat thung ngi, ‘Neiyi naanna Kring Isowr chapa rekin ptih,’ dilam nikdi',’ ” dida. (Hos. 1:10)
Ungta Isaiah rukku Isreel rek leiyi, owngda, hanto'theda: “Isreel nau rek chai avah truwnpii biing ki sitphuiya ngi nem chleek yoso, mqhe rek daat ksan chlam rah.
Mleiya Mma ngi nong avah kupqu rah, Ungta rinkinditna' thung ngi avah kreenptowi pthi rah, Mleiya Kruwng ngi dultipaam thuh nong avah ktowitek ki ktlow rah.” (Is. 10:22-23)

Ungta choduh ngi Isaiah ngi hanto ngi mdothe heppi: “Sabaoth Kruwng ngi neen nihin nih charuwl khat mdomaakma don nih, Neenna Sodom hep daat tkurthuh chaak raan Ungta neenna Gomorah hep daat mikpurthuh pthidok thuh raan.” (Is. 1:9)
Avaleiyi, neen nih talu tethe raan? Mleiya rinkinditna' kopqowi kma' Chaatktlei rekki rinkinditna', tidit tah lamtrin chaak ki rinkinditna' avah marlaan chaak inna.
Pdainu rinkinditna' ki nowlam kopqowi kcha' Isreel mii rekki rinkinditna' ki nowlam avah arlaang pchaang chlammeh.

Havah taluleiyo? Mleiya mmaan nih lamrin nih avah mdothlaam chaakin pemeh, pdainu mmaan nih nowlam ki nong rekki mdopqowi chaakin. Mleiya mmaan nih khuhsiir tpirthitna' Lung ava' 'leenni khuhsiir mdopirthit chaakin.

Hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Asuwn, Neiyi Jion thung ngi khuhsiir tpirthitna' Lung khat ungta tparkhaanna' Lungpii khat kthiika. Ungta kuwku yoso, Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek khimkheiya ningkya duhlam nimeh.” (Is. 8:14, 28:16)
Ku'uknau rek, neiyi kdung ngi kuplung ngamna' rang ungta Isowr hinni krinkthamna' avah Isowr rih Isreel mii rek mdosan chaak rang ava'.
Mleiya neiyi mmaan 'leenni sakhi kpiik chaak a, tidit tah mmaan nih Isowr hinni kdung ngi plung mdopluw chaakin pdainu mmaan dongei avah tedeh pinditna' dilkqowi pemeh.
Mleiya mmaan nih Isowr ki rinkinditna' mdodeh pinditma inni ungta mmaan nih mmaan ki rinkinditna' mdopqhan chaak inni Isowr ki rinkinditna' thung ngu kakparlaan chlam pemeh.
Mleiya lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rek hinni rinkinditna' ki thenni Khrista a nowlam ki mqutna'.
Mleiya Moses tih nowlam ki rinkinditna' ki mleiyi hanto' kjitda: “Hava' dow rek ava' ktlow kcha' mii ava ngi, mmaan ar'aang ngi kring chlam rah,” dida. (Lev. 18:5)
Pdainu lamrin ki rinkinditna' ava ngi hanto'theda: “Aplung thung ngi, parvaan thah kuw kuhung rang, dichma'?” (Knl. 30:12) Mleiya karthak ki Khrista arjunkqhi rang ki
Mditmata “Kdiyou thungki Khrista arhunkqhi rang ngi kukthuwk ava' thuh kuw kyungkqum rang?” Mleiya kurduh ki Khrista arhunkqhi rang ki (Knl. 30:13)
Pdainu havah talu mdothena? “Pauna rek avah ahin nih knaitek ki ka'am a, anehr kpha thung ngi ka'am a, Ungta aplung thung ngi ka'am a.” (Knl. 30:14) Mleiya neen nih kdoparjaamin lamrin ki pauna ava'.

Mleiya nang ngi anehr rih Jisu avah Kruwng ava' tidit athethut chaak bih, ungta Isowr rih Mma' avah kdiyou thungki mdoperdel tidit aplung thung ngi lam'arin chaak bih, nang nga tkarsan chaak phang chnadi'.
Mleiya nang ngi aplung ngi lam'adorin chaak ungta ava ngi arinkindit kcha'. Ungta anehr rih adothethut chaak ava ngi tkirliinna' avah ka'am.
Mleiya Kchiir laika thuh hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek khimkheiya ningkya duhlam nimeh.” (Is. 28:16)
Mleiya Jihudi rekle' Grik rekki mkertleina' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya mmaan mkheng 'leenni Kruwng kurthuwksap Mma' ava ngi Mma' ko'own kcha' mkheng rek 'leenni svang ngi ka'am.
Mleiya: “Kuwku yoso, Kruwng miing ko'own kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah.” (Joe. 2:32)

Mmaan nih Mma' hinni lammrin chaakma innu, taluhep pih mmaan nih Mma' avah ko'own kcha' lam rang ngo? Ungta mmaan nih mdo'arjaak liitmaan Mma' avah taluhep pih lamkrin chlam rang ngo? Ungta kparjaam piik ktaak ki taluhep pih mmaan nih karja lam rang ngo?

Ungta kparjaam lam rang ngo? Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Plung kdai ki kqhapaumin kparjaam rek, dow kqha rekki plung ngamna' pau kparjaam kcha' rek khuh avah tya thuh kqha chdaat a.” (Is. 52:7 Hah. 1:15)
Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni kqhapaumin avah mdopqowi chaakin pemeh. Mleiya Isaiah ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng neen nih kdotheen pau avah kuw ngi lamrin chaak a?” (Is. 53:1)
Avaleiyi, lamrinna' avah tarjaak thungki karvang ungta tarjaakna' avah Isowr pauna thungki karvang.
Pdainu neiyi kthe a, Mmaan nuh arja lammeh mow? O, mdo'arjaak in. “Mmaan krowl avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi kchet dok a. Ungta mmaan pauna rek avah dultipaam mqutna' mphaak dok a.” (Luw. 19:4)

Pdainu neiyi kthe a, Isreel mii rekvah avah deilam meh mow? Mkhatna' thung ngi Moses tih theda: “Neiyi naan avah chaat khat kma' 'leenni kukyuwn kcha ngi apa'am nikaandi'. Neiyi naan avah mongkokto chaat khat 'leenni aplungin pthit nikdi',” dida. (Knl. 32:21)
Pdainu Isaiah ngi changkarngam mih hanto'theda: “Nei makthlaam kma' rekki Neiya mdei chlamda. Nei mikqhil kma' rek hinni Neiya kkandang kcha' ping.” (Is. 65:1)
Pdainu mma ngi Isreel rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi tethe kopqowi kma' ungta mlehkunluk mii rek hinni niiluwn nih kbaan kdothlaan chaak.” (Is. 65:2)

Mdittu' neiyi kthe a, tidit tah Isowr rih Mmii rek avah mrotma lam mow? Immeh, anto'liit pemeh. Mleiya nei rukka Isreel miikhat ping. Abraham charuwl thungki ungta Benjamin phung thungki miikhat ping.

Isowr rih choduh mdodeh dok ksa Mmii rek avah mdorotmalu ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Elaijah paumin thung ngi, Kchiir laika ngi mdothe avah naanna deimaan timow? Mleiya mma ngi Isreel rek ptengda Isowr hinni mdopnuwm chaak.
“Kruwng mmaan nih Nah akhulpu rek avah eyou lamda. Ungta Nang arinparlaanna' khaan rek avah pkuipthi lamda. Ungta neiya kthina daat imping ungta mke'eyou rang ngi mtathlaam lam a.” (1 Pkg. 19:10,14)
Pdainu Isowr rih taluhep pih marthaanno? Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi nei kthen nih, Baal hinni mupkhup pih tirdiilda luwkbu kma' mii pun tikhiu parkhaalnu kthiik dok a,” dida. (1 Pkg. 19:18)
Anto' mkurthuh u, 'tunki mpha thung ngi plungnee dilkqowiyi tokchol dok aangqhe rek ka'am daat lam a.

Ungta plungnee leiki mkurthuh bih, nong rekki mlei avah amporson meh, mditmata plungnee avah plungnee kurthuwk porsonmeh. Pdainu ava ngi nong leiki mkurthuh bih, avah plungnee leiki kurthuwk porsonmeh, mditmata nong avah nong kurthuwk porsonmeh.
Mdittu' talu? Isreel rekki mdothlaamin avah phang chlam mda pdainu mdokchol dok rek mmaan ava ngi avah mphan chaak inna ungta mqhe rek hinnu avah plung mdotapchai pthi.

Tikjit dok ksa ava' heppi: “Isowr rih mmaan hinni pthla ki'iing pii lamda, Ungta khu kdei pchaang kma' mik rek pii lamda. Ungta khu karja pchaang kma' rah kna pii lamda. Tuni kpha ngi havah mdopiik tlit daat lam.” (Knl. 29:4 Is.29:10)
David rukku hanto' kjitda: “Mmaan maalna' khaan avah ktaang le' tepmenna' ikurthuwkso ungta ava ngi khuhsiir tpirthitna' dow rek ikurthuwkso. Ungta ava ngi mmaan hinni tpiikpenletna' ikurthuwkso.”
Mleiya mmaan nih khu mdodeh mana' raanni mmik rekin avah ijiing chso. Ungta mpha ktai thung ngi mtukhumin avah itorkon chso,” dida. (1 Pkg. 69:22-23)

Audilli neiyi kthe a: Mmaan nah mtlukna' raan ki thenni khuhsiir mpirthitin mow? Immeh, anto'liit pemeh. Pdainu mmaan nowlam tuksutmana' ava' ar'aang ngi mmaan thung ngi tepnerna' mthuhna' rah tkirliinna' avah Chaatktlei rek hinni ktlung kcha'.
'Tunnu mmaan nowlam tuksutmana' ava ngi dultipaam ki svangthuhna' ungta mmaan dopchaanma ava ngi Chaatktlei rek svangthuhna' mkurthuh u, mmaan kurkhumna' ngaalvah tya kepnem thang rang ngoh?
Mleiya neiyi Chaatktlei rek naan ahin nih kthe a. Mleiya neiyi Chaatktlei rek naan ahin nih tamsi khat kkurthuh chaakya ngi neiyi nei ksoplow chaakna' avah kdoponlor chaak.
Mleiya havah krik lam thungki kmii rek thung ngi tepnerna' pqouda ungta neiyi taluhep kduyoso ngi mmaan avah mruk daat yoso kdonsan chaak lamna' rang ki then.
Mleiya mmaan mdovar pthi lam ava ngi dultipaam tpalqhatna' mkurthuh u, mmaan marlaan chaak lam u, taluhep rang ngoh? Pdainu avah kdiyou thungki rinkum ava'rang pemeh mowi?
Mleiya mrukri ki mchei avah mchiir bih, ava' thung ki ngi tponlom thenpen ava' rukka kchiir rah. Ungta murjung avah mchiir bih, mbaak rek rukka kchiir rah.
Ungta mbaak aangqhe rek avah reenso, nowmkruwn nang avah mmaan arlak ki atoppow chaak bih, nang nga kruwn dakdak arjung thungki then kqha ksim kcha' kurthuwk kcha' imptih.
Avaleiyi, nang ngi mbaak rek ptengda pirlin chma'. Pdainu nang ngi apirlin chaak cheentung ngi, nang ngi murjung ava' adobom pemeh pdainu murjung ngi nang avah adotbom chaak tidit perngeelma'.
Mdit bih, nang ngi: “Ava' thuh nei mdotoppow chaakna' rang ki thenni mbaak rek avah mdoreen pthi,” dida the chnadi'.
Kqha a, mleiya mlamrinmaan leiyi, mmaan nah mreen pthi doklam a ungta nang nga lamrin nih krip kcha' imptih, pdainu naarlinna ngi binma' pdainu aning apqitcha'.
Mleiya Isowr rih mnowpa dakdak ki mbaak rek maklu mparkhaalma'u, nang rukka aparkhaal nimeh.

Avaleiyi, Isowr ki mqhatna' le' mthitna' avah adeipindih cha'. Nang ngi Mma' qhatna' thung ngi a'am chaak tlit bih, ktlu kcha' rek hinni mthitna' pdainu nang athenni avah mqhatna'. Mditma bih, nang rukka akreen pthi rah.
Ungta mmaan rukka mlamrin mana' thuwn nih ma'am chaak tlit maanbi, ava' thuh koppop chlam rah. Mleiya Isowr rih mmaan avah veikhat ava' thuh toppow ruk mapchaan.

Mleiya mnowpa ngi nowmkruwn kurthuwk kcha' thungki nang avah areenda nowpa kepteng ngi kruwn dakdak 'leenni adotoppow chaak. Mdit bih, mnowpa ngi kruwn dakdak baak rek mmaan avah kruwn dakdak 'leenni toppow rang avah tya thuh ko'olrang ngow?

Mleiya ku'uknau rek naan nih hava' paukordowl ava' kdei kmah ngi a'am raan avah neiya ngei maang. Mditma bih naanna athinaan ki aplungbin chaakin thung ngi kinrit kcha ngi kirbin naandi'. Mleiya Chaatktlei rekki mkurkhum chaakna' mphaakduh kpha thung ngi hava' mruk thuh plung pchaina' avah Isreel rek hinni kthuwk dok.
Ungta hanto ngi Isreel rek mkheng avah ksan chrah, tidit tah hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mikaktlanpiik avah Jion ki kthuwk rah ungta Mma ngi Jakob mii rek avah rin'owimana' thungki kperheel chlam rah.
Mleiya, Neiyi mmaan pnu arve rek klow pthipiik lam thung ngi, Neiyi kpaupqum avah mmaan tu pqum nikdi'” (Is. 59:20-21)
Ungta kqhapaumin leivah mmaan nah naan aleiyi ava' ki miihal reklam pdainu mduh thah tokchol dok leivah mpa'leen leiyi, mmaan nah vonsat'low reklam.
Mleiya Isowr ki chla rekle' to'ownna' thung vah tpursulna' ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya mphakhat thuh naanna tethe kopqowi kma' rekin ptih pdainu mmaan nih tethe mdopqowi maan ava ngi naan nih plungqhat avah adophan chaakin.
Anto' heppi hava'le' rukka 'tunnu tethe mdopqowi in pemeh tidit tah havah naan ahin nih plungqhat adotetdetin ava' ar'aang ngi mmaan rukku plungqhat mdophan chaakna' raan ki then.
Mleiya Mma ngi mii mkheng hinni plungqhat mdopiik pchaanna' rah Isowr rih mmaan avah tethe topqowi mana' thung ngi mdokhum pthi lam .

O, Isowr ki luwkinritna' le' tedeh pinditna' avah tyatya thung ngi kukthuwk dok chdaat a! Kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' paupinditna' avah thlaam pthuwk pchaang meh, Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'lam rek avah mdilji pchaang meh.
“Mleiya kuwda Kruwng plungril kdei dok a? Mditmata kuwda Mma' kperseel pchaang nga? (Is. 40:13 Jer. 23:18)
Mditmata leiyi, mdochowi rang ngi Mma' hinni rukri ngi kpiik kcha' kuw ka'amda?” (Job. 41:11)
Dow mkheng avah Mma' hinki ungta Mma' ar'aang thungki, Ungta Mma' thungki kthuwk. Mma' hinni ktlangknai kmah tponlor chaak kurthuwkso. Amen.

Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, akaktham chaak inna, naan nih Isowr plungkham ava ngi adak inni adaksa rekin avah akring inni rintparlaan chaak ki, kchiir rih, Isowr plung ngam mih ikparlaan chaan. Mleiya havah naanki pthla lamki anongtlot raankat ava'.

Ungta naan nih hava' dultipaam ki nowpa thung ngi korthlong chmaan pdainu aplungrilin adoperthlen chaak inni ikorthlong chaan. Mleiya ava ngi naan nih kqha avah talu ungta trotpiik krow avah talu ungta Isowr plungbin kurkhum avah talu tidit avah perteelda deinaandi'.

Mleiya nei kihin nih plungnee mdotpiik chaak ava' ar'aang ngi neiyi naan arlak inni ka'am mii khimkhei rek hinni kthe chaak a. Mleiya miikhat tih mdobin rangkat ava' han'tun nih mthina ngi kparthaang ngi mkirbin rang pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rih mii khimkhei hinni mdothem lamrin ki tpertetna' ava' dilkqowiyi mkilrin chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mdobin chaak rah.
Mleiya neen nih ndaksaan 'leenni napna rekin knempok ki ka'am pdainu napna rekin mkheng avah mnongtlot khatsap daat pemeh.
Anto' heppi knempok neen avah Khrista hinni daksa khadaat inpimin ungta neen khatkhat avah khat le' khat ki pna rek inpimin.

Neen nihin nih plungnee midotpiik chaakin ava' dilkqowiyi mdetmdet ki chla rek avah neen nih tothlowi chaakin. Neen nih chla rek avah pau tphuwnna' ki mkurthuh cheentung ngi nlamrin tu' kinqimchap pih avah ipurphuwng chaan cheh.
Mditmata soptolowna' ki nkurthuh cheentung ngi nsoplow chaak naan thuh, kpurchuk kcha' mkurthuh cheentung ngi tpurchuhna' thuh isinton chaan cheh.

Mikoksopdei mma' ava ngi tkorsowna' ava' 'leenni, kpiidei kcha' mma' ava ngi kertleu vih tpiikna' 'leenni chla avah asinton chso. Kqhi kcha' mma' ava ngi plung kluwt tih, plungqhat ktedet kcha' mma' ava ngi kanpa dok ki mdopiik chaak rah.
Vonsat avah kqha tpurhuwina' purthuh maan. Kqha kma' avah apder chaan. Kqha avah knet tih akyowng chaan.
Naan nih unaukat vonsat korlow heppi khat le' khat avah plungqhat tih ikarman chaan. Adakin akarjat chaakin han'tun nih khat le' khat ikarjat chaan.
Naan nih ardathit thlowi maan, pdainu apthlaan tu' plung kluwt tih Kruwng nga sop'alow chaan.
Plungbinpsuk thuh ikanpa chaan, kdung ngi tyattraanna' thung ngi adiildei chaan. Ungta naan nih kdet liit kmah rinkthamna' thung ngi i'am tlit chaan.
Miikenje rek dokriin rek avah athempiik deiyin ungta mal rek tuptlun chaak kdung ngi angei chaan.
naan ahin nih tyat chiireelna' akpii rekin avah suwqhat apii chaan, suwqhat apiin pauhor bukmaan.
Kanpa kcha' rektu' ikanpasap chaan ungta kqap kcha' rektu' iqapsap chaan.

Naan nih khat le' khat hinni plungril khatsap ahordei in. Naan nih aplungrilin avah kparthaang dow rek 'leenni thimaan pdainu kpirdil kcha' rektu' ikilqhisapin. Athina daatin ki plungbin thung ngi kinrit chmaan.
Kqha kma' thenni kqha kma' pii perheel maan. Mii mkheng dodeh ngi takyat kurhuwi rek ava' atlow chaan.
Naan nih mrot khimkhei thung ngi mkirsit cheentung ngi mii mkheng tu' plung kdai deek ki i'amin.

Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih adak inni phuw louvotmaan pdainu plungthit mei kquwng ki thenni mmun apii chaan. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Phuw klou avah Nei kthen, Neiyi pii perheel nikdi,” dida (Knl. 32:35) Kruwng ngi mdothe.

Avaleiyi, “Nang ngi amiihal avah mpowi mtham cheentung ngi apmaalcha'. Mning makraal cheentung ngi dii apneek cha', Tidit tah nang ngi hanto' adotlot chaak ava ngi mma' luwchai 'leenni mei'ai kpurtuwl kcha' kurthuwk nadi'.” (Prl. 25:21-22)
Naanna kqhakmah ngi mdopchaan kurthuwkmaan pdainu kqha ava ngi kqha kma' avah atappchaanin.
Mii khimkheiyi ruhtanna' ksin sarka hinni makparlaan chaak rah. Mleiya Isowr hinki kma' ruhtanna' ka'am pemeh ungta hava' ka'am ruhtanna' khimkhei rek avah Isowr rih mdokthlan ksadok.
Avaleiyi, hava' ruhtanna' ava' kikthitna' rek khimkheiyi Isowr ki ruhtan pauqum avah mikthitna'a, ungta ava' kikthitna' rek mmaan ava ngi pau tpinditna' avah mtun inni mthuhqhi chaak inna.

Mleiya paamkpu rek avah kqhanong rek 'leenni tqit chaakna' ka'am pemeh pdainu kqha kma' nong rek 'leen. Nang ngi ruhtanna' ksin rek 'leenni ning tipqitma rah angeiya? Mditta nang ngi kqha ava' atlow cha' ungta nang nga ava'kat tih akpanpaak chrah.

Mleiya mma' avah kqha ki thenni Isowr suwk khat. Pdainu nang ngi kthi atlot cheentung ngi ning'apqitcha', mleiya mma ngi mraal'kaang avah msit ktaak ki mdohor pemeh. Mleiya mma' avah kthi ktlow mma' hinni plungthit mei kquwng ksin thuh rang ngi, phuw klou rang Isowr ki suwk khat.
Avaleiyi, plungthit mei kquwng ava'lei daat kma' nang aplungrildeh kindit chaakna' rang leiyi, mhin nih akparlaan chaak rah.
Mleiya mlei hava' leiyi nang ngi paammii sumqhai rek ava' rukka adopiik rah, tidit tah mmaan nah hava' nong ava' thung ngi kdet liit kmah kthleng kcha' Isowr sopklow kcha' reklam.

Avaleiyi, nang ngi adopiik rang ma'am dilkqowiyi mii khimkhei hinni apii. Paammii sumqhai adotuwlna' hinni paammii sumqhai avah apii, sumqhai adotuwlna' hinni sumqhai avah apii. Ungta ningqit adotedetna' rang hinni ningqit atedet, takyat chaakna' adotedetna' rang hinni takyat chaakna' atedet cha'.
Naan nih khat le' khat vonsat akorlow chaakin kma'don kuwkhat leh hinni lei tuwlmaan. Mleiya ktlok khat vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi nowlam avah mpurtluwm chaak a.

Mleiya nowlam mih hanto' mdothe: “Nang ngi lowsang thi nimtih. Nang ngi mii eyou nimtih. Nang ngi pru nimtih. Nang ngi mlangkma' sakhi pii nimtih. Nang ngi, pner nimtih.” (Mpk. 20:13-15,17 Knl. 5:17-19,21) Ungta hava' thung ngi pauqum ktlei morson am chyoso ava' mkheng avah hava ngi khadaat mdopthut pthi dok, tidit tah, “Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah.” (Lev. 19:18)
Vonsat tih mi'innveen hinni mthitna' tlowmeh, avaleiyi vonsat avah nowlam ki mkurtluwmna'.

Ungta 'tunki mpha avah ki'iip thungki tkerdelna' mpha tidit adodeh pindit chaak inni, naan nih havah atlown. Mleiya 'tunnu tkirliinna' avah neen nih lamnrin chaak thokin thungki hinni lamknai kcha' a.
Jaan avah meknem kvei dok kcha' a ungta khuvaar avah knaitek kcha' a. Avaleiyi, neen nih kjiingnu thungki nong rek avah ivarpthiin cheh ungta mar'aang ki raaldona avah ina chdok incheh.

Neen nih khuvaar ki heppi takyat kurhuwiyi ichet chaan cheh. Ungta lop pih thowldii tneekna' thuh, ungta tipritna' thuh ungta jowltpurjutna' thuh ungta tekterdeuna' thuh ungta tker'e tkalraina' thuh ungta tukyuwnna' thuh ta'am raan pemeh.
Pdainu Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah buwdiir rih hilna chda ungta daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei daksa ki avah mning tuptlunpiik raan pemeh.
Naan nih mlamrin kdowng khat avah arlaang deichaan pdainu plung thuh kinqim kma' leennu kerteenna' maan.
Mleiya miikhat tu' dow mkheng kdochaak krow tidit tih lammrin chaak a pdainu mlamrin knet kma' khatvah anthithowlnu chrel daat mdochaak chaak.
Ava' vah kcha kcha' mma' ava ngi kcha kma' mma' avah tukksut kma' tlow mso. Ungta kcha kma' mma' ava ngi kcha kcha' mma' 'leenni pau pindit mso. Mleiya Isowr rih mma' avah mdorot piik dok.

Miiktlok khat suwk 'leenni paukpindit nang nga kuw ptih? Mleiya mma ngi mma' kpupa ava' hin daat tih krip kcha' mditmata ktlu kcha'. Dakat tih mmah krip chrah mleiya Isowr rih mma' avah mdopri pchaan.
Miikhat tih nit khat avah nit morson rek hinni klin nih kbincha' ruk krow. Anto ngi mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki muplungril thung ngi krip pih mdobin chaak rah.

Nit ava' kdan kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni avah mdodan chaak. Ungta nit ava' kdancha' kma' mma' ava' rukku Kruwng hinni avah mdodan chaak pemeh. Kcha kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni mdochaak chaak tidit tah mma ngi Isowr mdopanpaak chaak. Ungta kcha kma' mma' ava' rukku Kruwng hinni mma ngi mdochaak chaak pemeh ungta Isowr rah mdopanpaak chaak.
Mleiya neen kuwkhat leh rukka mthina daat thung ngi kring kcha' ka'am pemeh ungta mthina daat thung ngi kdiyou ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya neen nih nrin bih, Kruwng hinni trin chaakin ungta ndiyow chaakin bih, Kruwng hinni tidiyow chaakin. Avaleiyi, neen nih nrin rukku mditmata ndiyow rukku neenna Kruwng dow rekin pimin.
Mleiya Mma' avah kdiyou le' kring, mikniing ki Kruwng mkurthuhna' rah Khrista ngi hava' rang ki thenni diyouda ungta kerdelda ungta veikhat kring nowl.
Pdainu taluleiyi a'uanau hinni pau apindit tah? Mditmata taluleiyi nang ngi a'uanau avah ayowm chaak a? Mleiya neen nkheng inni Khrista ki paupinditna' longkhom aang ngi trisap chaak raan.
Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Kruwng ngi, Neiyi ring nuh ka'am leiyi, pkhup khimkheiyi Nei kihin nih luwmdotbuk chaak rah ungta plei khimkheiyi Isowr hinni mkerthethut chaak rah,” dida. (Is. 45:23)
Ava' vah neen nkheng inni ndak ndakin ki nlei rekin avah Isowr hinni tethe chaak raan.

Avaleiyi, neen nih khat le' khat 'leenni pau tpindit porson raan pemeh pdainu ava' kchang ngi neen nih nu'unnau rek 'lamqowi thung ngi khuhsiir pirthitna' rah mditmata moplowmna' rah, totlotmana' raan ki thenni nuplungin ikperseeldei incheh.
Neiyi kdeh ungta Kruwng Jisu ar'aang ngi kindit tidit kdeh tidit tah mthina ngi ktobor dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Pdainu ktobor tidit tih kbin kcha' mma' hinni avah ktobor.
Anto'daat yoso nang athen chaak leiyi, a'uanau plungyatna' mkurthuh bih, nang nga vonsat thung ngi chet porson mtih a. Nang athen chaak ava ngi Khrista ngi mdodiyow piik dok khat avah tpenveima'.
Avaleiyi, nang aqhatna' avah mii ngi kthi ngi tepthema'.
Mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah tchaak le' tneekna' pemeh. Pdainu Pthla Kchiir thung ngi mrinkindit plungdaina' ungta tkanpatna'.
Mleiya hava' dow rek thung ngi Khrista sopklow kcha' mma' avah Isowr hinni trot chaak krow ungta dulti mii rek rukku mdorot chaakin.
Avaleiyi, neen nih plung kdai kupthuwk ungta khat le' khat qhatna' kupthuwk dow rek 'leenni plung ipluwt incheh.
Nang ngi thendam leiyi, Isowr nong avah tpenveima'. Dow mkheng avah dakat tih kchiir pdainu mparkhaan chunni kcha kcha' mma' ki thenvah avah kqha pemeh.

A'uanau khuhsiir pirthitna' rah mditmata mparkhaanna' kurthuwk rah mditmata mruh kopdowng rah mkurthuh bih, saa tchaakmah ngi mditmata thowldii tneekmah ngi mditmata dow khatleh ruk totlotma ngi kqha.
Nang nga lamrin athlowi ngaal mow? Nang ngi avah Isowr aang ngi avah athlowi cha'. Mma ngi perteelda mdorot chaak ava' 'leenni mthina kpursul kcha' kma' mma' avah msuwkqha.
Pdainu plung kpelqen mma' ava ngi mchaak bih kpursul kcha' a. Mleiya mma ngi lamrin nih avah mdochaak pemeh. Mleiya talutalu yoso lamrin thungki kma' avah pnu.
Mruh ktang neen ava ngi mruhkdong tlukna' thung ngi tvondeh chaak raan thah ktla ungta neen nih nthinaan plung ngamna' totlot chaak raan pemeh.
Neen khimkheiyi ni'innveenin avah mlin msaanna' rang ngi, mma' qhatna' rang ki thenni muplung ngamna' totlot chaak rah.
Mleiya Khrista kpha rukku mthina plungngam kirpii chmeh, pdainu hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Ningkya akpii rekki ningkyana' rek avah Nei ktun nih ktla a,” dida. (Luw. 69:9)

Mleiya Kchiir laika rekki tidiildehna' le' plung ngamna' ava' ar'aang ngi neen nih plungbinpsuk ava' tothlowi chaakna' rah mdokjit. Tidit tah choduh ngi talutalu yoso mdokjit dok rek avah neen tkurchuhna' raan ki thenni mdokjit dok.
'Tunnu tidiil chaakna' le' plung ngamna' ki Isowr ava ngi Jisu Khrista dilkqowiyi khat le' khat hinni plungbin khatsap tohorna' avah ayupii chaanso.
Mleiya havah naan nih plungbin khat tih ungta nehr khat tih Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ava' adopanpaak chaakna' raan ki then.
Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi neen avah Isowr konlorna' thung ngi midotarlaan chaak dokin heppi naan nih khat le' khat ikarlaang deichaan.
'Tunnu neiyi kthe a, tidit tah Isowr ki kindit ava' ki thenni, npa'leen hinni mpaureel rek ava' kepnetset rang ki thenni Jisu Khrista avah vunkreen rek hinni suwk khat arvang kurthuwkda.

Ungta havah Chaatktlei rekki Mma' plungqhat leiyi, Isowr mdoponlor chaakna' raan ki then, tidit tah hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mleiya hava' leiyi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki, Neiyi, Nang ahin nih thethuh chnikdih ungta Nang amiing ngi laa ngi the hnikdi',” mdodit. (2 Sam. 22:50 Luw. 18:49)
Ungta veikhat mma ngi hanto'theda: “O Chaatktlei rek, naan nih Mma' mii rektu' ikanpa chaan!” dida. (Knl. 32:43)
Ungta veikhat nowl lih: “Chaatktlei rek naan akheng inni Kruwng avah apanpaak chaan! Miilop mkheng rek naan nih Mma' hinni laa ngi apanpaak chaan,” dida. (Luw. 117:1)

Ungta Isaiah ngi veikhat the nowlda: “Jessi arjung khat kthuwk rah, Ungta Mma ngi Chaatktlei rek 'leenni kpaal rang ngi kerdel rah. Mma' thung ngi Chaatktlei rekki plungbinpsuk avah kthlowi chlam rah.” (Is. 11:10)

'Tunnu Pthla Kchiir ki ruhtan nih plungbinpsuk thung ngi apleet chaakna' raan ki thenni plungbinpsuk ki Isowr ava ngi naan avah lamrin thung ngi tkanpatna' le' plungdaina' mkheng ava ngi ayupdim chaanso.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek nei kdakkat rukku naan aleiyi kuplung nga krip kcha' tidit tah naan rukka tedeh pinditna' mkheng tu' adotipdim chaak dok inni, taqhatna ngi kdim kcha'in imptih. Ungta khat le' khat kerthepiik pchaang dokin ptih.
Anto'daat yoso ku'uknau rek Isowr rih kihin nih mdotpiik chaak plungnee ava'leiyi naan adoktinbin phaak chaakna' raan ki thenni dow mruk rek 'leenni kerkheelset tih changkarngam mih kdokjit chaak.

Mleiya havah neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinni Khrista Jisu ki sopklow kcha' khat kkurthuh chaakna' rah, ungta Isowr ki kqhapaumin ava' sopkdolow chaakna' rah plungnee avah mdotpiik chaak. Tidit tah Chaatktlei rek doparlaan chaak avah trotpiik chaak mkurthuhna' rah, ungta Pthla Kchiir rih mdopenje chaakna' rang ki thenni plungnee avah mdotpiik chaak.
Avaleiyi, neiyi Isowr hinni sopkdolow chaakna' dow rek thung ngi Khrista Jisu hinni kpirlin chaakna' rah mlei kthlowi chaak a.

Tidit tah neiyi, Khrista ngi nei kar'aang ngi mdotpurkhum piik dokmah dow rek ava' 'leennu neiya dow khadaat ruk the pchaang nimaang. Mleiya neiyi kdothe ungta kdotlot nong ava' ar'aang ngi Chaatktlei rekki tethe mdopqowi chaakin.

Mleiya Isowr ki Pthla ava' ruhtan nih ruhtan ki titinna' rekle' tngana' rek avah pthuwkda. Mleiya ava ngi Jerusalem thungki ngi Illirikam kpervel rek mun thung ngi neiyi Khrista ki kqhapaumin avah parjaam chnuh.
Ungta neiyi miiktlok khat innmun 'leenni innksa kkurthuh mana' rah Khrista miing kandan mana' mun thung ngi kqhapaumin tparjaam rang avah mpha ktai thung ngi neiki kuplungbin chaak.
Ungta hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mhin inni tparjaammah mii rekki Mma' avah mmikin nih kdei lamrah. Ungta karja kcha' kma' rekki kdeipindih chlam rah.” (Is. 52:15)
Mleiya hava' leiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen chaak rang ava' rukka mapkhaan tlit kchokda.
Pdainu neiyi hava' kum tyatya thung ngi naan ahin nih tethlen chaak rah kdung ngi kdongei chaak ava ngi 'tunnu hava' paamkuwl thung ngu nei ka'amna' rah mmun amporson meh.

Neiyi Spain ki rang ngi kthlen thung ngi naan ahin nih thleng nikdi'. Mleiya neiyi kipjiin thung ngi naan avah ayudei chaan nih tidit tih plung kbinpsuk chaak a ungta neiyi naan tu' mpha mruk kanpasap pih ka'am chaak bih, naan nih neiya k'lamqowina' thung ngi mbom chnaan tidit tih kbin chaak a.
Pdainu 'tunnu neiya miikenje rek sopklow chrang ki thenni Jerusalem thah kahang imping.
Mleiya Mesedonia le' Akhaia paamkuwl ki mii rekki, Jerusalem thah ka'am miikenje rek arlak ki srah rek hinni chla tqhaipiik avah mmaan plung ngamna' kurthuwkda.

Dakat tih hava ngi mmaan nah muplungin kngam kcha' ungta mmaan avah miikenje rekki lei ktuwl reklam. Mleiya Chaatktlei rek ava ngi pthla lamki tikriinna' rek thung ngi Chaatktlei rek thenni Jihudi rektu' korchomsap mkurthuhn bih, Jihudi rek nongtlot rang avah mmaan hinni dona rekki mmaan avah sopmdolow chaak raan thah tlada.
Avaleiyi, neiyi hava' kupqut dok dilli ungta hava' mchei ava ngi mmaan avah kbih klot chaak doklam dilli neiyi naan aphathangin nikdon, Spain thah chetnikdi'.
Pdainu neiyi kdeh a tidit tah neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen thung vah Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki suwqhatna' avah kurkhum mih horda thleng nikdi'.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi ungta Pthla ava' ki vonsat ava' ar'aang ngi neiyi aktham chaak inna. Tidit tah naan nih nei kthen nih Isowr hinni rinkthamna' 'leenni nei tu' kdung ngi nong itlowsap chaan cheh.
Mleiya Judia paam thungki lamkrin kma' rek hinki nei mdotaktlan chaakna' rah ungta Jerusalem thung ngi nei ksoplow chaak avah miikenje rek hinni trot chaak mkurthuhna' rah rinmheiktham piik chaan.
Mleiya Isowr plungbin nih neiyi naan ahin nih kanpa tu' kilqhi ngi kthlen chaakna' rah ungta neiyi naan tu' ardaren tarlaansap chaakna' raan ki thenni rinmheiktham piik chaan.
'Tunnu plung kdai ki Isowr avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Neiyi Senkria thungki lamrinlop ki suwk khat ncharin Phibi avah naan ahinin nih akparlaan chaak inna.

Mleiya naan nih mma' avah miikenje rek heppi Kruwng hinni arlaang chaan ungta talutalu yoso mma ngi mdokriin chaakna' rek thung ngi abom chaan. Mleiya mma ngi mii knempok bom chda ungta nei rukka mdotbom chaak.
Khrista hinni knonglowqhi chaak rek Prisila le' Akyul a hinni mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Mleiya mmaanve ngi nei kdiyowna' rang thung ngi mlowlin avah mirjitpiik chlamda. Mmaan hinni nei kthina daatmda Chaatktlei rekki lamrinlop mkheng rek rukku kpanpaak chaak inna.

Anto' heppi mmaanve inn thung ngi ka'am ptha'ownlop hin rukku mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Ungta Khrista hinni mkhatna' mchei kurthuwk Akhaia paamkuwl ki nei kvonsat'low chaak Ephenitas avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Neen nthen inni kdung ngi nong klou kcha' Mary avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.

Ungta nei ki'innkhor rek ungta rowngmii kdokurthuh qhisap rek, Andronikas le' Junias avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Mmaanve a tamsi rek arlak ki mdang kqha mii reklam ungta mmaanve a nei kduh thah Khrista hinni ka'am dok kcha' reklam.
Kruwng hinni nei kvonsat'low chaak Amplias avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Khrista hinni nnonglowqhi chaak sapin, Urbanas hinni ungta nei kvonsat'low chaak Staikis hinni mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Khrista hinni perteelda mdorot chaak dok ksa Apellas avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Aristobulas innmii rek mmaan avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Nei ki'innkhor Herodion avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Kruwng hinni ka'am Narkissas inn thungki mii rek avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Kruwng hinni kdung ngi nong klou kcha' Tryphena le' Tryphosa avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Kruwng hinni kdung ngi nong klou kcha' vonsat'low Persis avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Kruwng hinni tokchol dok ksa Ruphus ungta mma' nuh ungta nei knuh avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Asynkritas, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Harmis ungta mmaan tu' ka'am unau rek avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Philologas ungta Julia, Nerreus le' mcharnu ungta Olympas ungta mmaan tu' ka'amsap miikenje rek mkheng avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
Naan nih khat le' khat avah kchiir kurputna ngi ikurput chaan. Khrista ki lamrinlop rekki aturvuwi chaak inna.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, naan nih adokpurchuh chaak dokin ava' kma' thung ngi, arlak inni tkenqhenna' rekle' tparkhaanna' rek kupthuwk mmaan avah bih atinin. Ungta mmaan hinki ikekneeng chaan, dinuh akaktham chaak inna.

Mleiya ava'lu hep daat mmaan ava ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah sopmdolow chaakin pemeh pdainu mmaan nah mpowibuwr indaat sopklow kcha' reklam. Ungta mmaan nih mpauqhatin le' mnerhqhat inni dow kdei kma' plung rek avah mdohuwn chaakin.

Mleiya naan nih tethe adopqowi chaakin avah mii mkheng hinni kandang dok kcha' a. Avaleiyi, naan akchang inni neiya kanpa kcha' ping, pdainu anto'daat yoso naan nih kqha ava'leiyi akinrit chaak raan ungta kthi leiyu dow khatleh kdei kmah ngi a'am raan kdongei chaak.
Ungta plung kdai ki Isowr ava ngi Seitan avah naan akhuhpya tiin nih kuknuwr bei rah. Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Nei knonglowqhi Timothy ngi ungta ki'innkhor rek Lusias le' Jason ungta Sosipater leh ngi aturvuwi chaak inna.
Hava' paukjit kikjit kcha' Tertulias neiyi Kruwng hinni akurvuwi chaak inna.
Nei ki'innkpupa ungta lamrinlop mkheng rekki innkpupa Gaius tih aturvuwi chaak inna. Khuwpii ava' ki sumksinpa Erastas rukku, nu'unnau'in Kvartas rukku aturvuwi chaak inna.
Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.

'Tunnu, dultipaam mupqhun daat ki tuprut tih mdothiik pthi paukordowl avah tpurphuwngda. Ungta Jisu Khrista ki mleiyi tparjaamna', neiki kqhapaumin ava' dilkqowiyi, Mma ngi naan avah adotapqhan pchaanin.

Pdainu 'tunnu avah mpandan dok a ungta ktlangknai kma' Isowr pauqum ava' dilkqowiyi, lamrin thuh tethe topqowina' rang ki thenni, Khulpu rek dokjit Kchiir laika rekki chaat mkheng rek hinni avah mtepdeh doklam a.
Kinrit Mma' daat chrel Isowr avah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi ktlangknai kmah ngi tponlor chaak ki i'amso. Amen.
Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi tkurthuh chaakna' rah Paul neiya Isowr rih mo'own chda. Ungta nu'unnau'in Sosthenas rukka ka'amqhi a.

Neenve ngi Korinthia khuwpii ki Isowr lamrinlop naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak inna. Mleiya naanna Isowr rih Khrista Jisu hinni apchiirinda mdotpenje chaak dok miikenje rekin ptih. Ungta naanna mmun ktai thung ngi neenki ungta mmaan ki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ko'own kcha' miikenje rektu' miikenje rek akurthuh chaakna' raan adoto'own chaak dokin.
Ungta neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Neiyi Khrista Jisu ar'aang ngi, naan ahin nih Isowr Plungnee adotpiik chaakin leiyi, mpha ktaiyi Isowr avah naan athen inni kdopanpaak chaak.
Mleiya Mma' ar'aang ngi naan nih dow khimkhei thuh, tpauna mkheng 'leen ungta tedeh pinditna' mkheng 'leenni kepleet tih ka'amin ptih.
Anto' heppi Khrista ki rinpaumin avah naan athung inni mdopnee chaak dok.
Avaleiyi, naan nih ningkakraal lih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista kurphuwn rang ardat chaakin thung ngi chla khadaat ruk adoptatnaan ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya Kruwng Jisu Khrista Nit ava' thung ngi dow khatleh ngi adotupsul mana' raan ki thenni Mma ngi naan avah mqutna' kpha thuh tepnee ruk akepnet chraan.
Isowr rah trinchaak krow, Mma ngi naanna Mchapa Jisu Khrista tu' lopkhat tkurthuh chaakna' thung ngi adoto'own chaak dokin.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek neiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing 'leenni akoksow chaak inna. Mleiya naan akheng inni kinqimsap pih ipauin ungta naan athung inni tkenqhenna' am mso. Ava' kchang ngi naan nih plungril khadaat ungta pau tpinditna' khadaat thung ngi kurkhum deek ki i'amin.
Mleiya Klois inn thungki mii aangqhe ngi kihin nih naan aleiyin avah mparjaak chlamda tidit tah naan arlak inni kalrai kerthe ka'am a, mditin.
Pdainu, neiyi hava' kdothena' mleiya naan nih, “Neiya Paul mii ping,” mditmata “Neiya Apollos mii ping,” mditmata “Neiya Siphas mii ping,” mditmata “Neiya Khrista mii ping,” diin tinu.
Mdittu' Khrista a mkurkhuina' ka'am mow? Ungta Paul lah naan athenni kokthowi mow? Mditmata Paul miing 'leenni diiluwna' arlaan chaakin mow?
Neiyi Krispas le' Gaius kma'don naan kuwkhat leh ruk dii adokupluw chaak maan leiyi, Isowr rah kpanpaak chaak a.
Mleiya havah kuwkhat leh ngi diiluwna' avah neiyi, nei kmiing ngi kdoptlot lam, tidit mdothe mana' rang ki then.
Ong ngi, neiyi Stephanas le' innmii rek kho a diiluw kdoptlot chaak lam pdainu mii morson diiluwna' kdoptlot lam rang a deimaang.

Mleiya Khrista ngi neiya diiluwna' koptlot rang ngi mapthla meh, pdainu kqhapaumin kparjaam rang ki then. Kpaudei rek rekki neiya dultimii ki luwkinritna' pauna rekki kdoparjaam pemeh mditma bih, Khrista ki khros avah msit ktaak kurthuwk chrah.
Mleiya khros ki paumin avah kenvei chrang rekki thenvah tokmowna' pdainu mdosan chaak dok rek neen nthen vah Mesaiah ruhtanna' ava'.
Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi kinrit rekki, luwkinritna' avah penvei pthi nikdi' Ungta kdeipindih rek dopinditna' avah dow khat psit nimaang,” mdodit. (Is. 29:14)
Kinrit mii a tvada? Tva'thungda kdeipindih mii a? Ungta Tva'thungda 'tunpha ki kerteendei mii a? Isowr rih hava' dultipaam ki luwkinritna' avah kokmok mdopurthuh dokin pemeh mow?

Mleiya Isowr luwkinritna' thung vah dultipaam mih luwkinritna' ar'aang ngi Isowr rah deimeh. Mleiya tokmowna' ki paumin tparjaam ava' ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' rek tsan chaak rang avah Isowr plungngam.
Mleiya Jihudi rekvah titinna' qhil lamda, ungta Grik rekki luwkinritna' thlaam chlamda.
Pdainu neenvah, Jihudi rek thenvah khuhsiir tpirthitna' lung ungta Grik rekki thenvah tokmowna' Mesaiah ava' kdoparjaam chaakin.
Pdainu mdo'own dok mii rek hinvah, tidit tah Jihudi rek yoso Grik rek yoso Mesaiah avah Isowr ruhtanna' ungta Isowr luwkinritna'.
Mleiya Isowr kmowna' avah dultimii luwkinritna' hinni kinrit ungta Isowr ruhdownna' avah dultimii ruhtan hinni mruh ktang.

Mleiya ku'uknau rek naan nih, naan adoto'own chaak naan avah adeiyin. Mleiya dultimii rek dopertetna' dilkqowi vah mdo'own rek naan meknem avah kinritin ptipmeh, naan meknem avah mruh ktang ruk am maantih ungta takyat kurhuwiyi kqou ruk am maantih.

Pdainu mii kinrit rek ningkya mdopiikna' rah Isowr rih hava' dultipaam ki kokmoksi dow rek ava' mdokchol. Mruh ktang mii rek ningkya mdopiikna' rah Isowr rih hava' dultipaam ki mruh kdowngsi dow rek ava' mdokchol.
Ungta Isowr rih ka'am dok ksa dow rek ava' msit ktaak mdopurthuhna' rah hava' dultipaam ki kyuwmsi dow rek ungta tuktsutma rek ungta dowksi kma' dow rek ava' mdokchol.
Mleiya dultimii kuwkhat leh ruk Mma' aang ngi mpirlin rang pemeh.
Pdainu Mma' leiyi, naanna Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am kchaan ptih. Mma' avah Isowr hinki neen nthenni luwkinritna', rinkinditna' ungta neen mikpenje kchaan ungta mikaktlan kchaan ava'.
Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Kpirlin kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni ipirlin chso,” mdodit. (Jer. 9:24)
Nei ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen chaak thung vah Isowr ki rinpaumin avah kpaudei dok ki mditmata luwkinritna' dok ki kparjaam rah kthleng pmaang.
Mleiya neiya, naan arlak inni, mdopthowi yown Mma' tidit tah Jisu Khrista ava' kma'don morson adodehmana' raan kuplung kdopri chaak.
Neiyi naan tu' ruhdownna' thuh, ningqitna' thuh ungta kunchuwn kunchuwn nih arvang ka'am kcha' ping.
Ungta nei kpauthe rekle' kpau parjaam rek avah dultimii luwkinritna' ki tupnuwm chaakna' pauna rek pemeh. Pdainu avah Pthla ki ungta ruhtanna' ki mkandanna'.
Mleiya havah naan alamrinin avah dultimii luwkinritna' thungki mda, Isowr ruhtanna' thungki mkurthuh rah.

Anto'daat yoso, neen nih luwkinritna' ki paumin avah ktangksa mii rek hinni kdosaamin. Pdainu havah, hava' tunpha ki luwkinritna' ava' pemeh mditmata 'tunpha ki msit ktaak paamkpu rek luwkinritna' ava' pemeh.
Pdainu neen nih Isowr luwkinritna' avah paukordowl lih kdotheen. Ungta hava' kordowl luwkinritna' avah mpha mapqhan duduh ngi Isowr rih neen tkonlor chaakna' rang ki thenni mdoporthlon dok ksa.
Havah, hava' 'tunpha ki paamkpu rek khat leh ngi mdodeh pindit chaakin pemeh. Mleiya mmaan nih ava' mdehpindit chaak tlaangin bih, konlor ki Kruwng avah mmaan nih pthowi lam nimeh.

Pdainu hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Isowr rih Mma' vonsat klow rek thenni mdoporthlon dow rek avah, mik khadaat rukku deimeh, kna khadaat rukku arja meh. Kuwkhat plung thung rukku avale'lei avah binmeh,” mdodit. (Is. 64:4)
Pdainu Isowr rih Mma' Pthla amleiyi neen nihin nih mipurphuwn piikinda. Mleiya Pthla ava ngi dow mkheng avah mdothlaam. Ou Mma ngi kukthuwk dok Kruwng dow rek rukka mdothlaam pthuh.
Mleiya mdak thung ngi ka'am, mii ava' ki pthla kma'don miiktlok khat ki plungbin kdei a taluhep kdu ki mii rangda? Anto' heppi Isowr Pthla kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Isowr plungbin avah deimeh.

'Tunnu neenna dultipaam ki pthla ava' tarlaan chaakin pemeh, pdainu Isowr hinki Pthla ava' tarlaan chaakin. Mleiya havah Isowr rih neen nihin nih mkhon ktaak ki midotpiik chaakin dow rek ava' tedeh chaakna'.

Hava' dow rek avah neen nih dultimii rekki luwkinritna' dopurchuh heppi kdotheen pemeh. Pdainu Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mdotpurchuh chaakin heppi kdotheen. Neen nih pthla lamki rek avah Pthla hinki pauna rekki kdothe chaakin.

Pdainu daksa lam ki mii ava ngi Isowr Pthla hinki dow rek avah mdo'arlaan pemeh. Mleiya avale' avah mma' hinvah tokmowna' mditmata mma ngi avah mdodeh pindit pchaan pemeh. Mleiya mmaan avah Pthla 'lam thah tedehpindit rah.
Pdainu pthla lamki mii ava ngi dow mkheng 'leen pau mdopindit, pdainu kuwkhat tih mma' 'leenni pau pindit meh.
Mleiya, “Kuw ngi Kruwng plungril mdeh? Kuw ngi Mmah kpurchuk rang?” (Is. 40:13) Pdainu neen nthung inni Khrista ki plungril avah ka'am.
Ungta ku'knau rek, neiyi naan ahin nih pthla 'lam ki mii rek heppi adoktheen pemeh. Pdainu daksa lam thuh ka'am mii rek tidit tah Khrista hinni ka'am nau kdowng rek heppi adoktheen.
Neiyi naanna arnu adokepneek chaakin ungta thenktang adokpiikin pemeh. Mleiya naanna thenktang ado'arlaan pchaanin pemeh ungta 'tun kpha thung rukku thenktang adochaak pchaanin pemeh.

Mleiya naanna 'tun kpha thung ngi daksa 'lam thuh ka'amin ptih. Mleiya naan athung inni tepnerna' le' tker'ena' ungta loptkenqhenna' ka'am tlit daat a. Ava' vah naanna daksa 'lam thah ungta dultimii thlaang thlaang ngi am chmaan timow?
Mleiya naan arlakin ki khatvah, “neiya Paul hinki ping,” ungta morson khatvah, “neiya Apollos hinki ping,” aditin thung ngi, naanna dultimii thlaang thlaang ngi am chmaan timow?

Mdittu' Paul lah kuwda ungta Apollos tah kuw o? Mmaan avah, mmaan ar'aang ngi naan nih lam'adorin chaakin, Mma' suwk rek ngaal lam. Mmaan nah Kruwng ngi mma' mma' hinni mdopiik mnong ava' ki suwk reklam.
Neiyi phunnu ungta Apollos tih dii mdolet pdainu Isowr rih chiibul rek avah mdopmown lam.
Mdit bih kphun kcha' mii ava'ruk ungta dii klet kcha' mii ava'ruk mkenreellam pemeh pdainu kiplin kapsaang Isowr avah mkenreelsi.
'Tunnu kphun kcha' mii avale' dii klet kcha' mii ava ngi khadaat tih mnongin ava' mdotlot chaakin. Ungta mmaanve ngi mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi mnongqhat'lot rekin avah kphang chlam rah.
Mleiya neenna Isowr tu' nong ktlow kcha'sap rekin ping, naanna Isowr lou inptih ungta naanna Isowr innsakin ptih.

Nei kihin nih mdotpiik Isowr plungnee dilkqowiyi, kinrit innksapa heppi neiyi innmun avah kdopqhan ungta morson khat tih ava' 'leenni mdosak. Pdainu mii khimkheiyi taluhep pih ksak chaak a tidit 'leenni ikilrindei chso.
Mleiya neiyi kdopqhan dok innmun ava' kma'don kuwkhat tih ktlei khat pqhang pchaang nimeh. Ava' innmun avah Jisu Khrista ava'.
'Tunnu kuwmiikhat tih hava' innmun 'leenni jiiring ngi, jiipowl lih, lung kenreel lih, ding ngi nowm mih, buhkuwng ngi ksa ruk krow.

Mii khimkhei ki nongtlot rek avah kpandang rah, tidit tah mnit ava ngi kpurphuwng chrah. Mleiya meiyi avah kpurphuwng rah ungta taluhep kdu nong tidit mdodehna' rah meiyi mii khimkhei ki nongtlot rek avah kperteel rah.
Kuwmiikhat nongtlot tidit tah mma' dosak avah ma'am tlit daat bih mma ngi mnongqhat'lot avah kphang chrah.
Kuwmiikhat nongtlot avah meiyi mkaak chaak bih avah mma' kenvei chaakna' kurthuwk chrah. Pdainu mmah mei thungki tkhai heppi ksan chrah.
Naanna Isowr luwbuk'inn kenje avaan ptih tidit kerdei maan timow? Mleiya Isowr Pthla avah naan athung ngi ka'am.
Kuwmiikhat tih Isowr luwbuk'inn kenje ava' mtopbor chaak bih, Isowr rih mma' rukka ktopbor pthi rah. Mleiya Isowr luwbuk'inn kchiir avah kenje ungta naanna luwbuk'inn kenje avaan ptih.
Kuwkhat leh ngi mdak mthina kurhuwn chaak mso. Ungta arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih 'tunki mpha thung ngi kinrit kcha' rek rek heppi mkarjaak cheentung ngi mma ngi mkinrit chaakna' rah ikmok chso.
Mleiya hava' dultipaam ki luwkinritna' avah Isowr hinvah tokmowna'. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma ngi kinrit avah mrilqhatmana' thung ngi mdotepmen.” (Job 5:13)
Ungta veikhat hanto ngi theda: “Kruwng ngi kinrit plungbin avah msit ktaak tidit mdeh.” (Luw. 94:11)
Avaleiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi dultimii ki mleiyi mpirlin chaak row nimeh. Mleiya dow mkheng avah naan adow.

Paul ruk Apollos ruk ungta Siphas rukka naan adoyesang. Hava' dultipaam ki dow rek ruk mditmata rinkum ki ruk mditmata kdiyou ruk mditmata 'tun ka'am dow ruk mditmata karvang bei rang dow rek ava' rukka naan adowyesang daat.
Ungta naanna Khrista down ptih ungta Khrista a Isowr dow.
Avaleiyi, mii rekki neen avah Khrista sopklow kcha' rekkat tih ungta Isowr ki paukordowl ava' ki suwkkenreel khat tih miheitai chaanso.
Hava' han'tun nih suwkkenreel rek tkurthuhna' thung ngu trinchaak krow tkurthuh rang avah msit ka'am.
Pdainu naan nih mditmata dultimii luwsang ngi pau mpindit inbih, nei kthen vah avah taluruk pemeh pdainu dakat tih neiyi kdak kthina kpindit chmaang.
Mleiya neiya k'leen nih dow khatleh mkepteng ka'am mih deimaang. Ungta dow rek ava ngi neiya mdotpindit chaak pemeh pdainu Kruwng ngi neiya pau mdotpindit chaak.

Avaleiyi, mpha mveduh ungta Kruwng murjun duh ngi naan nih dow khatleh 'leenni pau pinditmaan. Mma ngi mii rekki kjiingnu thuh mdodowlin dow rek avah mar'aang thuh kupthuwk rah. Ungta Mma ngi dultimii rek plungril rekki plungbin rek avah kpurphuwng rah. Audilli miikhat khat ki tpanpaakna' avah Isowr hinki karlaang chrah.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek neiyi hava' dow rek avah naan athenni bitinna' kurthuwk ki nei kdak le' Apollos 'leenni kponthow chaak a. Mleiya havah naan nih tikjit dok ava' heihin nih adobinmana' raan ki then. Mleiya havah naan nih, miikhat avah morson khat heihin nih plinda a'ammana' raan ki then.
Mleiya naanna kuw ngi khat le' khat avah adotpinqim maanno? Nang ngi ado'arlaanma talu ka'am a? 'Tunnu naan nih ava' arlaan chaak innu, taluleiyi naan nih karlaang kma' heppi kpirlin inpti o?

Naanna kokhop dokin ptih! Naanna svang kthuwk dok kchaan ptih! Naan nih neen ktaak ki paamkruwng rek heppi ka'am kchaan ptih. Ungta dakat tih neen rukku naan tu' paamkruwng heppi ka'amsap chaakna' raanni naan nih anto ngi paamkruwng heppi a'am raan avah kdongei chaak.

Mleiya tamsi rek neen avah Isowr rih, mii rekki tidiyowna' kpha ngi mdopsul chaak rang ngi mqutna' thuh mdotupthuhn. Mleiya dultimii rek hinruk ungta vaantamsi rek hin rukku dultipaam thung ngi neen avah mii rek dosut rang ngi mdotthiikin.

Neenna Khrista ki thenni kokmok rekin ping pdainu naanna Khrista hinni kinrit kcha' rekin ptih. Neenna kruhn kdowng pdainu naanna aruhn ktang. Naanna miidokyat rekin ptih pdainu neenna midokyatma rekin ping.
Hava' 'tunki mpha thung vah npwoi'in thamda ungta nningin kraalda ungta nbuw'ndiirin ammda. Mii rekki miei'inda ungta ni'innin ammda.

Neen nih nkhut inni nong lou'in minnu nong tolow chaakin. Mmaan nih mitrai chaakin thung ngu neenvah panpaak chaan minnu. Ungta mmaan nih tyat chiireelna' mitpiikin thung ngi neenvah diil chdaatin minnu.
Mmaan nih neen nleiyi kthi mtheien thung ngu neenvah pnuwm chaan minnu. Neenna dultipaam ki ktoborsi mipthutinda. 'Tun kpha rukku neenna dow mkheng ki junthildau mipthutinda.
Neiyi hava' dow rek avah naan ningkya adokpiik naan nih kdokjit pemeh pdainu vonsat kdolow chaak knau le' heppi adokpilqhit chaakin.
Mleiya naan nih Khrista hinni kthepiik rek pun sowm thlowi yown tih, Pa knempok adothlowi in pemeh. Mleiya naanna Khrista hinni kqhapaumin amleiyi neiyi adokupluk chaakin.
Avaleiyi, akoksow chaak inna naan nih neiyi kdotlot heppi atlown.

Mleiya hava' leiyi neiyi kvonsat'low kchapa, Kruwng hinni trinchaak krow Timothy avah naan ahin nih kdopthlat chaak. Mma ngi neiyi Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am chaakna' rinchan tidit tah mmun ktai thuh lamrinlop khimkhei rek kdopurchuh chaak lam avah ayuktipbin phaak chraan.
'Tunnu neiya kthleng liit kma' rang heppi, arlakin ki mii aangqhe rek avah kpirlin dok kcha' ki kpaulam a.
Pdainu Kruwng plungbin mkurthuh bih kbeisek ki ahinin nih thleng nikdi'. Audilli neiyi kpirlin kcha' rek avah mmaan pauna rek kma' mmaan ruhtanna' avah talu tidit deinikdi'.
Mleiya Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah pauna daatlu pemeh pdainu ruhtanna'.
Naan nih talu angei' inna? Neiyi kchung sinda kthlen rah adongeiyin mow, mditmata vonsat le' pthlakdowng ngi thleng nikdi'?

Mii rekki dodak kat tih kihin nih hanto ngi msonpiik lamda, tidit tah naan arlak inni jowlkpurju ka'am lam a mdit inna. Hava' hep jowlkpurju avah Chaatktlei rek hin kpha rukku tapdaulu pemeh. Mleiya miikhat tih mpa snu mko'onqhi a.
Ungta naan nih hava' ktlow mii avah naan arlakin ki adoknen pthi raan. Pdainu naanna kpirlin dok ki pau intinu anto' mda, naanna aqa'aqei chaak raan.
Mleiya daksa ngi neiya naan ahininvah ammaang pdainu kapthla a naan ahinin nih ka'am tlit daat. Neiyi arlak inni ka'am daat heppi hava' ktlow mii ava' 'leenni paukpindit chaak dok a.
Naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi akurku chaakin thung ngi neiya kapthla ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ruhtan nih ahinin nih ka'am imping.
Mleiya Kruwng Jisu nit tih mapthla avah mdosan chaakna' rah tidit tah mdaksa ava' mdo'ekre dokna' rah ava' hep mii avah Seitan hinni aparlaan pthiin.
Naan nih apirlin chaakin avah kqha pemeh, tidit tah thowl mnau'suwn daat ava ngi saikan mkheng avah mdokmet doklu tidit deimaan timow?

Avaleiyi, naan nih thowl tathlaakma saikanren akurthuhna' raanni thowl pli avah avarpthi dokin. Tidit tah naanna dakat tih thowl ktaak avaan ptih. Mleiya neenki Taplaanna', Khrista avah neen nthen inni rintparlaan dok.

Avaleiyi, neen nih thowl pli ktaak ki tmaalna' ava' idan chaan cheh. Mditmata miiqhatmana' kbin ungta kthi ktlow thowl pli avah thlowi maan cheh. Pdainu plung kertleuna' le' kindit ki thowldii ktaak thenpen ava' ithlowi chaan cheh.
Nei kpaukjit thung ngi neiyi naan ahin nih kthe chaak a tidit tah jowlkpurju mii rektu' naanna akilqhi raan pemeh.

Anto' pdainu neiyi hava' dultipaam ki jowlkpurju mii rek ava' kdothena' pemeh. Mditmata kpunjuwr rek mditmata miikolrowt rek mditmata pthla luwkbuk rek kdothena' pemeh. Anto' mkurthuh bih naanna hava' dultipaam mada ksun chraan ptih.

Pdainu 'tunnu havah naan nih unau adoditin mii ava' adokorthlow qhimana' raan ki thenni havah kdokjit. Mma' avah lowsangkqhi mditmata kpunjuwr mditmata pthla luwkbuk mditmata kthi kthe mditmata thowldii kipri mditmata miikolrowt mkurthuh cheentung ngi naan nih mma' avah korthlowqhi maan. Ungta then kpha ruk chaakqhisap maan.
Mleiya neiyi duwn ki rek avah taluleiyi m'leenin nih pau pindit lam nikdi? Naan nih mthung ki rek 'leenni pau pindit maan timow?
Pdainu Isowr rih duwn ki rek mmaan ava' 'leennu paukpindit chrah. Avaleiyi, “Arlakin ki kqha kma' mii avah aloupthi dokin.” (Knl. 17:7, 19:19, 22:21,24, 24:7)
Taluhep pih naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih morson khat tu' mkirthitna' ma'amcheu, mma ngi miikenje rek hin kma' mrinkindit kma' rek hinni pau ktipindit rang ngi mdoqhi pchaanno?
Naan nih miikenje rekki dultipaam avah paukpindit rah tidit avah deimaan timow? Ungta dultipaam avah naan nih kpindit rah akurthuh innu, naan nih ava'sisi rek avah pchaang maan timow?
Neen nih vaantamsi rek 'leenni pau tpindit raan tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow? Ava' mkurthuh u, hava' rinkum ki dow rek ngaalla tya knem mih pau tpindit pchaan chaak raanno?
Naan nih hava' rinkum ki dow rek 'leenni pau tpinditna' rah ma'am thung ngu lamrinlop pih msit ktaaksi ngi mdobin miikhat avah paukpinditpa rang ngi akcholin mow?

Neiyi havah naan ningkya adokpiikna' inni kdothe. Mleiya naan arlak inni kindit khatpang daat ruk ka'am kma' mow, tidit tah unau khat le' unau khat arlak ki paukpindit pchaang miikhat leh ruk ammeh mow?
Pdainu anto' kmah ngi unau khat tih unau khat kepteng ngi nowlam thung ngi chetda ungta ava' rukka lamkrin kma' rek hinni kchet!

'tunnu avaleiyi naan nih knempok ki adoparmaan avah kandang kcha' a tidit tah naan nih khat le' khat tpertenna ngi nowlam thah kchet inptih. Ava' vah taluleiyi mii rek rukku ahinin nih mdoparma raan avah adorot chaakin pemeh? Ungta taluleiyi mii rekki adotolrowt raan avah adorot in pemeh?
Anto' rang pemeh, naan adak kat inni karmak avah tlown tinu ungta miihuwng chaan tinu ungta naan nih hava' dow rek avah a'uanau rekin hinni adotlotin!
