Naan nih mrinkindit kma' rekki Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom chlam nimeh tidit avah deimaan timow? Kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso. Mleiya jowlkpurju rek mditmata pthla luwkbu rek mditmata lowsangkqhi rek mditmata psel mdak kurjur rek mditmata psel le' psel lowsang kilqhi rek,
kupru rek mditmata kpunjuwr rek mditmata thowldii kipri rek mditmata kthi rek mditmata miikolrowt mkheng hava ngi rek Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom chlam nimeh.

Ungta naan aangqhe rek rukka ava' hep daat inptih. Pdainu Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi ungta neenki Isowr Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi naanna adotulqhut chaak dokin ungta adotpenje chaak dokin ungta adotpindit chaak dokin.
Nei kthen vah dow mkheng avah kdotlot krow pdainu dow mkheng rek ava ngi neiya mdotbom pemeh. Nei kthen vah dow mkheng kdotlot krow pdainu neiya dow khatleh ngi ruhtanna' kurduh ngi mqhi nimeh.

Thendam rek avah powipii ki then ungta powipii avah thendam ki then. Pdainu Isowr rih mikniing ngi msit ktaak kpurthuh pthi lamrah. 'Tunnu daksa avah jowltpurjutna' ki then pemeh pdainu daksa avah Kruwng then ungta Kruwng avah daksa ki then.
Ungta Isowr rih Kruwng avah kdiyou thungki perdelda. Ungta Mma ngi neen rukka Mma' ruhtanna' ava ngi mikperdel raan.
Naan nih naan adaksaan avah Khrista pna rek tidit deimaan timow? Mdittu' neiyi Khrista pna avah louda dakkurjur snu ava pna rektu' porjom nikmow? Immeh! Anto'liit rang pemeh.
Mditmata naan nih dak kurjur snu tu' korjom mma' avah snu ava'tu' daksa khadaat lam tidit deimaan timow? Tidit tah Mma ngi hanto' mdothe: “Mii 'knii rek avah daksa khadaat mkurthuh rah.” (Rnp. 2:24)
Anto' heppi Kruwng tu' korjom kcha' mma' avah Mma' tu' pthla khadaat lam.

Naan nih jowltpurjutna' thungki ichen dok chaan. Dultimii ngi mdo'arve pnu khimkhei avah daksa duwn ki yesang. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih jowlmpurjut bih mma ngi mdaksa kepteng ngi mthina 'leenni pnu kperve kcha' a.

Mditmata naan nih adaksaan avah naan athung inni ka'am Pthla Kchiir ki luwbuk'inn kenje ava' tidit deimaan timow? Naan nih Mma' avah Isowr hinki adothlowi chaakin ungta naanna athina inni korthlowi kcha' inptipmeh.
Mleiya naanna mkhon nih adotren chaak dokin. Avaleiyi, naan nih Isowr hinki adaksaan ava ngi ungta apthlaan nih Isowr avah aponlorchaan.
'Tunnu naan nih nei kihin nih adokjitin dow rek ava'leiyi ikjit chnih. Mleiya pselpa vah snu avah mdothown liitma ngi kqha.
Anto' pdainu jowltpurjutna' leiyi, psel ktaiyi mnuwn khat khat mdothlowi chaak rah ungta anto' heppi snu ngi mi'innpu khat khat mdo'arve chaak rah.
Mi'innpu ava ngi mnuwn ava' hinni mdopiik rang mdongei avah mdopiik rah ungta anto' heppi mnuwn ava' rukku avah mdopiik rah.
Mnuwn ava ngi mdaksa 'leenni ruhtanna' mdothlowi pemeh pdainu mi'innpu ava ngi mdothlowi. Ungta anto' heppi mi'innpu ava ngi mdaksa 'leenni ruhtanna' mdothlowi pemeh pdainu mnuwn ava ngi mdothlowi.

Naanve ngi mpha mruk ki then kma'don khat le' khat hinki kparkhaan chmaan. Mleiya naanve ngi adakin avah then tngowlna' ungta rinkthamna' ki thenni ikparlaan chaan pdainu Seitan nih naan avah daksa tkorjownmana' thuh adotepthleem mana' raan ki thenni veikhat ikurduh tengin.
Pdainu neiyi havah tporkol heina' ngi kdothe pdainu paureen nih kdothe pemeh.

Mleiya neivah mii mkheng ngi nei kehep pih ma'am rah kdongei chaak. Pdainu mii khimkheiyi Isowr rih mma' mma' hinni mdopiik chla khatkhat mdothlowisap chaak tidit tah miikhat tih hava' hep ungta morson khat tih ava' hep ava' mdothlowi chaak.
Pdainu neiyi innknei kma' rek ungta meikhu ngi ka'am rek hinni kthe a: Mleiya mmaan nih nei kehep pih ma'am chaakin bih avah mmaan thenni kqha.
Pdainu mmaan mthina inni mkorjown pchaan chaakmaan bih mmaan rukka inn inei chdaat lamso. Mleiya daksa dongei thung ngi kparkada ta'am rang hinvah inn nee chaak ki kqha.
'Tunnu neiyi innknei ksa rek hinni hava' pauqum ava' kpiik a, anto' pdainu kpii avah nei pemeh Kruwng ngi mdopiik lam. Mleiya nuwn khat avah mi'innpu hinki msunliit rang pemeh.
Pdainu mnuwn ava ngi msun rang cheentung ngi mma ngi innknei kmah i'am chdaatso mditmata mi'innpu tu' veikhat ikalqhat chlamso. Ungta innpu khat ava' vah mnuwn avah mdokenqhenqhi rang pemeh.

Pdainu morson rek hinvah neiyi hava' kthe a, havah neiyi kdothe Kruwng hinki pemeh. Mleiya nu'nnau kuwmiikhat tih lamkrin kma' snu khat mko'onqhi dok cheentung ngi ungta snu ava' rukku mi'innpu tu' ta'am rang avah mningtlunna' mkurthuh cheentung ngi am chdaatso mma ngi snu avah kenqhenqhi mso.

Ungta ava' heppi snu khat tih lamkrin kma' innpu khat mko'onqhi dok cheentung ngi ungta mma ngi mnuwn tu' ta'am rang avah mningtlunna' mkurthuh cheentung ngi am chdaatso, mma ngi mi'innpu avah kenqhenqhi mso.

Mleiya lamkrin kma', innpu avah mnuwn ava'leiyi mdopchiir dok ungta lamkrin kma' mnuwn avah mi'innpu leiyi, mdopchiir dok. Mditma bih naan anaupluk rekin avah chlam kurthuwk chlam rah pdainu 'tunnu mmaan avah kchiir kcha'lam.

Pdainu mmaan thungki lamkrin kma' ava ngi msun chaak cheentung ngi mma' avah sun chdaatso, ava' thung ngi nu'unnau mditmata nchar'nyur khat avah ava' hep thung ngi mkorbowl tlit daatna' rah mlei ammeh. Mleiya Isowr rih neen avah plung kdai thung ngi midoto'own chaakin.

Mleiya, O nuwn nang, nang ngi a'innpu avah san chna mow san chnim tih tidit avah taluhep pih adodeh? Mditmata O innpu nang, nang ngi asnu avah san chna mow san chnim tih tidit avah taluhep pih adodeh?

Pdainu Isowr rih miiktai hinni mdothem dok ava' heppi ungta Kruwng ngi miiktai mdo'own chaak dok ava' heppi mma ngi ichet chso. Ungta neiyi anto' heppi lamrinlop rek mkheng hinni hava' pauqum avah kpiik a.

Mleiya vunmreen meek arlaan nih mdo'own chaak dok kuwmiikhat ka'am ngaal mow? Mma' ava ngi vunkreen kma' kurthuwk mso. Ungta vunmreenma arlaan nih mdo'own dok chaak kuwmiikhat ka'am ngaalmow? Mma' ava ngi vunkreen kurthuwk mso.
Vuntreen nih msit amna' ka'am pemeh ungta vuntreenma ava ngi msit amna' ka'am pemeh, pdainu msit ka'am avah Isowr paupiik rek topqowi chaak ava'.
Avaleiyi, mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mdo'own chaakna' kat thung ngi ma'am chaak rah.
Nang avah suwk'owr khat akurthuh arlaan nih adoto'own chaak ngaalmow? Mdit cheen tung ngi, nang ngi avah binbinma' pdainu mii'ol adotpurthuhna' mqhat cheentung ngi nang ngi avah asinton cha'.

Mleiya suwk'owr rih ma'am chaak arlaan nih Kruwng hinni mdo'own chaak dok mma' avah Kruwng mii'ol kurthuwk kcha' a. Ava' heppi mii'ol mkurthuh arlaan nih mdo'own chaak mma' ava ngi Khrista ki suwk'owr kurthuwk kcha' a.
naan avah mkhon nih adotren chaak dokin, avaleiyi dultimii rek suwk'owr kurthuwkmaan.
Ku'uknau rek naan nih khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mdo'own chaak dokna' ava'kat thung ngi mma ngi Isowr tu' ma'am chaak rah.

'Tunnu kinrim mih ka'am kcha' rekki mleivah neiyi Kruwng hinki paureen kdophan ammeh. Anto'daat yoso Kruwng ngi Mma' plungnee thung ngi trinchaak krow mdopthut chaak khat kurthuwk ki paukpindit chaak a.
Mleiya hava' tunpha ki tparsatna' ava'leiyi hava ngi kqha rah kbin chaak a. Mleiya pselpa khat tih mjikjik ki ma'am chaak daat ava ngi kqha.
Nang nga asnu hinni korbowl kcha' ngaal ptimo? Mdit cheen tung ngi akerthlena' rah thlaamma'. Nang nga asnu hinki kerthlet kcha' ngaal ptimow? Mdit cheen tung ngi asnu ktlok khat thlaamma'.

Pdainu nang ngi innknei chdaat akurthuh rukku nang ngi pnu arvei mtih. Ungta kinrim ava ngi inn nei chyoso mma ngi pnu arvei meh. Anto' pdainu ava' hep rek ava ngi mdaksa thuh tparsatna' kduh chrah pdainu neiyi akperthle pthi daat inna.
Pdainu ku'uknau rek neiyi havah kthe chaak a tidit tah mpha avah arvang ktowi kcha' a. Mleiya 'tundil ki kupqhun nih mnuwn rek ka'am mmaan avale' rukka khadaat ruk ka'am kma' hep daat lamrah.
Ungta kqap kcha' rek mmaan avah kqapliit kma' hep daat lamrah, kanpa kcha' rek mmaan avah kanpa kcha'liit kma' hep daat lamrah ungta kren kcha' rek mmaan avah kthlowi kcha'liit kma' hep daat lamrah.
Ungta hava' dultipaam ki dow rek ava' kriin kipsit kcha' rekki ava' avah karmak ki ksinton kma'hep pih ka'am lamrah. Mleiya hava' dultipaam ki ruwngchen avah kthleng chrah.
Pdainu naan nih ava'leiyi plungkya kmah ngi a'am raan kngei a. Pdainu innknei kma' mma' ava ngi taluhep pih mma ngi Kruwng plungngam tlow chnikdi tidit tih Kruwng dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak.
Pdainu snu kthe dok mma' ava ngi mnuwn plungngam taluhep pih tlotpiik nikdi, mdodit leiyi, mma ngi dultipaam ki dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak.

Inn knei dok snu khat le' kinrim khat avah mkerthlenna' ka'am. Mleiya inn knei mlai snu ava ngi mdak avah daksa lam thang ruk ungta pthla 'lam thang rukku mkenje chaakna' rang ki thenni Kruwng dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak. Pdainu inn knei dok kcha' snu ava ngi taluhep pih mi'innpu plungngam taluhep pih tlow chnikdi mdodit leiyi, dultipaam ki dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak.

Ungta neiyi havah naan athen inni mqhatna' rang ki thenni kdothe, a'leenin nih ktaang kdopansamna' pemeh. Pdainu naan nih, Kruwng avah dakat tih ungta plung kenqhena' ktaak ki sop'adolow chaakna' raan ki thenni havah kdothe.

Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mma ngi mma' ki kinrim khat ava' hinni karmak heppi korthlong ngi mkarjaak cheentung ngi ungta mma ngi kseet mkurthuhna' ki reipaar kdei dok kcha' mkurthuh ungta avah totlot daat rang mkurthuh cheentung ngi mma ngi mdobin rek avah atlow chdaatso, mma ngi pnu arvei meh, mmaan nah inn'inei chdaat lamso.

Anto'daat yoso muplung thung ngi knet tih krip kcha' ungta ava' kikriing kma' pdainu mthina ki muplungbin thung ngi mruh ktang ungta mma' ki kinrim khat avah anto'kat tih innpne nimaang tidit tih plung kiprip kcha' mma' ava' rukku kqha mtlotta.
Ungta inn kepnee kcha' ava' rukku kqha mtlot chaak a pdainu inn kepnee kma' mma' ava ngi makqhabet mtlot chaak a.

Mleiya mnuwn avah mi'innpu mrindaat khimkhei thuh nowlam mih mdobowl tlit daat. Pdainu mi'innpu mdiyow chaak bih mma' avah Kruwng hinni lamkrin kcha' mii hindaat tih innknei kcha' krow ki ning'olna' mthlowi chaak a.
Pdainu nei kpaupindit chaak dilkqowi vah mma ngi anto ngi ma'am chaak daat tih msuwkqhabet rah ungta neiyi Isowr Pthla ava' rukka kthlowi chaak immow, tidit tih kbin chaak a.

'Tunnu neiyi mii rekki dow pthla rek hinni rinmdoparlaan dokin dow rek leiyi, kjit chnih. Neen nih ndehn tidit tah nkheng inni tedeh pinditna' avah nthlowisap in. Tedehpiditna' ava ngi kpirlin kcha' pdainu vonsat ava ngi mdopqhan.
Ungta kuwmiikhat tih mma ngi hava' dow rek avah kdei kcha' heppi mkirbin chaak bih, mma ngi mdodeh rangkat avah dow khatleh deimeh.
Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih Isowr vonsat mlow chaak bih hava' khat avah Mma ngi mdehpindit chaak a.

Avaleiyi, dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dok dow rek ava' tchaak ki mlei avah, neen nih ndehn tidit tah dultipaam thung ngi dow pthla rek avah taluruk pemeh tidit ndehn ungta khat ava' kma'donle Isowr morson ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya parvaan thah mditmata dultipaam thung ngi isowr rek mdoditin knempok ki am chyoso, tidit tah isowr rekle' Kruwng rek knempok ki ka'am lam.

Pdainu neen nthen invah dow mkheng thuhna' ungta Mma' then tkurthuh chaak naan Pa Isowr khadaat chrel ka'am. Ungta dow mkheng Mma' ar'aang ngi kkurthuwk ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi trin chaak naan Kruwng Jisu Khrista khadaat ka'am.

Anto'daat yoso mii khimkheiyi hava' tedeh pinditna' avah mdothlowisap pemeh. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tah dow pthla rek 'leenni mnowpa ma'am chaak leiyi, mmaan nih ava' hep daat then mchaakin thung ngi thendam avah dow pthla khat hinni rintparlaan dok ksa heppi bin lamda. Ungta mmaan ki muplungrildeh chaakin ava' mdown leiyi, mthen chaakin ava ngi topbor lamda.
Pdainu thendam ava ngi neen avah Isowr hinni midotapnai in pemeh ungta nchaak rukku taqhatna' set pemeh ungta nchaakma rukku tithitna' pemeh.
Pdainu naan nih hava' to'ol chaakna' adothlowiyin ava ngi mruh kdowng rek khuhsiir pirthitna' akurthuh mana' raan ki thenni ikilrindei chaan.

Mleiya tedeh pinditna' kthlowi kcha' nang ngi pthla luwbuk'inn thung ngi kcha rang ngi ako'on avah mruh kdowng miikhat tih mdeh a ungta nang akdei mii ava ngi dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dow rek avah tchaak krowpakda kdi ngi changkarngam mih mbin chaak a.
Mdit bih Khrista ngi mthen inni mdodiyow piik dok mruh kdowng unau rek avah nang adodeh pinditna' leiyi, kenvei chlam rang?
Pdainu naan nih anto ngi a'uanau rekin kepteng ngi pnu arvei intinu mmaan ki plungril kdowng adoplim piikin ava ngi naan nih Khrista kepteng ngi pnu avah ado'arve chaakin.
Avaleiyi, neiyi thendam kdochaak ava ngi ku'uknau pnu arvena' rah mkurthuh bih, neiyi saa avah veikhat chaliit nimaang. Mditma bih neiyi ku'uknau avah khuhsiir ktipirthit a.
Neiya tamsi khat kma' ping mow? Neiya mii'ol kma' ping mow? Neiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista kmik ki kdei kma' ping mow? Naanna Kruwng hinni nei knongtlot rek kma' inptih mow?
Neiya mii morson hinni tamsi khat kkurthuhma rukku naan ahinnu neiya tamsi khat kat ping. Mleiya naan avah Kruwng hinni neiki tamsi khat kkurthuhna' ki kbihjiik inptih.
Nei mheikperteel mii rek hinni nei kpau arthaan chaak avah hava:
Neenve ngi tchaak le' tneekna' ki nthlowi maan mow?
Neenve rukka tamsi morson rek, tidit tah Kruwng naupa le' Siphas dotlot heppi lamkrin kcha' nuwn khat tiqhi tlitna' ruhtan kthlowi maan mow?
Mditmata Barnabas le' nei daat rang mow, nong tolowna' thungki tkankaina' ruhtan kthlowi kma' rangnga?
Mthina ki mardaman kirpii chthida raalmun thah kchet raalmii kuw ka'am? Riithlumbil thlowi chthida mchei kcha kma' kuw ka'am? Mditmata yau qhi chthida yaulop ava' arnu knee kma' kuw ka'am?
Neiyi havah dultimii thlaang thlaang khat kurthuwk ki kdothe mow? Mditmata nowlam ava' rukku anto' heppi the mehmow?
Mleiya Moses nowlam thung ngi hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Naan nih silpa khat avah chapaar apchown meek sliin arlaan nih mnehr bowlmaan,” mdodit. (Knl. 25:4) Isowr rih mdokilrinqhi avah silpa ava' mow?

Mditmata Mma ngi neen nkhengki qhatna' rah mdothe o? Mleiya havah neen nthenin qhatna' rang ngi mdokjit. Mleiya louknumpa ava ngi plungbinpsuk thuh mdonum rah, plungbinpsuk thuh ke'ei kcha' mma' ava ngi muplungbinpsuk ava' tu' karlaang sap kcha' mkurthuh rah.
Neenve ngi naan athen inni pthla 'lam ki dow rek ava' kapqau chaak innu neenve ngi naan ahinki daksa ki dow rek ava'tkurkun rang avah klin reen mow?

Ungta morson rek ava ngi naan a'leenin nih tarlaansap chaakna' ki ruhtan ava' mthlowi chaak innu neenve ngaalvah kerkheelset tih thlowi nimaan ringmow? Pdainu neenve ngi hava' ruhtanna' avah kdosinton votin pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi Khrista ki kqhapaumin ava' kdopkhaan mana' raan ki thenni dow mkheng avah kdodiil chaakin.

Sopklow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi dow kchiir rek tidit tah luwbuk'inn thungki dow rek avah mdochaak chaak daatin, ungta rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh sopklow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thung ngi rintparlaan dow rek avah mdo'arlaan chaak sapin tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow?
Anto' heppi Kruwng ngi kqhapaumin ksi kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi kqhpaumin thungki ngi mrin chaak raan, tidit ki paupiik avah mdopiik.

Pdainu hava'le' avah neiyi khadaat ruk kdosinton vot pemeh. Mditmata hava' dow rek avah nei kihin nih adotlot raan tidit rukku kdokjit vot pemeh. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih nei kpirlin chaakna' avah msit ktaak mpurthuh pthi bih, nei kthen nuh kdiyow chaak ki kqha.

Mleiya neiyi kqhapaumin kdoparjaam chaak leiyi, kpirlin chaakna' rah ka'am pemeh mleiya ava' tparjaamna' ki nong avah nei mdotopdot chaak dok. Ong ngi neiyi kqhapaumin kparjaam chaakma cheentung ngi k'leen nih suwthitna' itla chso.
Mleiya neiyi arda krok ki ktlot chaak bih, avah nei knongqhalot, pdainu neiyi kardarow kepteng ngi ktlot chaak bih, suwkkenreel khat mdotpurthuh leiyi, ktlow kcha' thlaang thlaang ngaal imping.
Mdit bih, nei knongqhat'lot rang avah taluda? Mleiya neiyi kqhapaumin ki ruhtanna' ava' kdopthit mana' rah neiyi Khrista ki kqhapaumin avah mmaan ktaak ki kdoparjaam chaak.
Mleiya neiyi mii mkheng hinki mii'ol khat kurthuwk chdaat yowring ngi mii knempa kdoqenthuh chaakna' rang ki thenni kthina ngi mii mkheng ki suwk kurthuwk kcha' ping.
Mleiya neiyi Jihudi rek kdoqenthuh lamna' rang ki thenni Jihudi rek hinni Jihudi mii kurthuwk nuh. Ungta nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am mii rek kdoqenthuh lamna' rang ki thenni neiyi nowlam kurduh ngi amnu.

Mleiya nowlam tukksut kmah ngi ka'am kcha' rek kdoqenthuh chaak lamna' rah nowlam tukksut kmah ngi ka'am rek hinni neiyi nowlam tukksut kma' heppi amnu. Anto'daat yoso Isowr ktong thah neiyi nowlam tukksut kmah ngi ka'am pmaang pdainu Khrista ktong thah nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am ping.
Neiyi mruh kdowng rek kdoqenthuh chaak lamna' rah mruh kdowng rek hinni mruh kdowng ngi amnu. Neiyi mruk daat yoso kdosan chaakna' rah mii mkheng hinni dow mkheng arvang kurthuwk kcha' ping.
'Tunnu neiyi naan tu' kilqhi ngi kqhapaumin avah karlaang kcha'sap kkurthuh chaakna' rah kqhapaumin ki thenni havah kdotlot chaak.

Naan nih kchen kperteek rek mmaan ava ngi mkheng kheng inni mchenin avah deimaan timo, pdainu nongqhat'lot avah khadaat tih mdo'arlaan? Avaleiyi, naan nih ava' ado'arlaan chaakna' raanni icheidei chaan.

Ungta mnongqhat'lot ki thenni kekperteek mii rek khimkheiyi mdaksa avah dow mkheng thung ngi kkilrin kcha' tliitlu. 'Tunnu mmaan nih kqop kcha' rang laar luwkhum ava' mdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni havah mdotlot in. Pdainu neen nih totlotin havah kqop kma' rang laar luwkhum ki then.
Ava'leiyi neiya mtlunna' kindit kmah ngi kchen pmaang pdainu anto'kat tih kchen ping. Ungta tker'e ruk anto'kat rukka, tirthli kker'eqhi rek hep kmah ngi anto'kat tih kdo'arvan ker'eqhi chaak dok.
Pdainu neiyi kdaksa avah archak nuh kkurduh ngi kdo'arvanqhi chaak. Mditma bih, neiyi morson hinni pauparjaam chthida nei kdak avah mrit kaptham kcha' kurthuwk chnikdi.

Ava' han'tun nih naan nih hava' kdei kmah ngi a'am raan avah neiya ngei maang. Mleiya neen npu'npa rekin mkheng inni armei kurduh ngi arvan ka'am dok kcha'lam ungta mmaan mkheng inni duwmpii kepthleng ngi karvang dok kcha'lam.
Mmaan mkhengin avah Moses thung ngi armei thung ngi ungta duwmpii thung ngi diiluwna' avah mdo'arvantlot chaak dokin.
Mmaan mkheng inni pthla lamki thendam avah mdo'arvan chaak dokin.

Ungta mmaan mkheng inni pthla lamki dii ava'kat avah mdo'arvanneek chaak dokin. Mleiya mmaan nih mdilin arvankqowi pthla lamki Lung ava'kat thungki dii avah mdo'arvan neek dokin ungta ava' Lungpii avah Mesaiah ava'.
Pdainu mmaan meknem rek 'leenni Isowr rah muplung ngammda. Avaleiyi, mmaan kluwng rek avah paamkbiik laiyi kerjeiter chlamda.

'Tunnu neen nih, mmaan nih daksa thuh mdo'arvan ngeiyin kqha kma' dow rek avah tngeimana' thung ngi nuplungin tipri chaakna' raan ki thenni mmaan avah neen nthen inni bitinna' rek kurthuwk ki ka'am kcha' a.
Ungta mmaan aangqhe rek heppi naan rukka pthla luwkbu akurthuh raan pemeh. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mii rekki kchaknee rang ngi ko'ong lamda ungta klee rang ngi rip lamda,” mdodit. (Mpk. 32:6)
Mditmata mmaan aangqhe rekki anto ngi mdotlot inni niikhat thung ngi mii pun som'knii leikdum mtluk chaakin ava' heppi neen nih jowltpurjut raan pemeh.
Mditmata neen nih, mmaan aangqhe rekki anto ngi mdotlot inni pruwl rekki mdopenvei pthiin ava' heppi Khrista avah tperteel raan pemeh.
Mditmata neen nih, mmaan aangqhe rekki anto ngi mdotlot inni kpenvei rekki mdopenvei pthiin ava' heppi neen nih nunur tidit raan pemeh.
'Tunnu hava' dow mkheng avah titinna' rekki mmaan hinni kthuwk ungta mmaan avah m'leenin nih mqutna' mpha karvang kcha' neen nthen inni tpilqhitna' khat kurthuwk ki mmaan avah mdokjit.
Avaleiyi, neiya krip imping kdikcha' mma' ava ngi mtlukmana' rah ikilrindei chso.

Dultimii khat 'leenni kthuwk nowpa kma'don kerkheel lih a'leenin nih kepthleem kthuwk pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rah trinchaak krow tidit tah naan nih adodiil pchaanmah raan kepthleem avah a'leenin nih pthuwk nimeh. Pdainu naan nih adodiil chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni, kepthleem ava' adoloi chaakna' raan ki m'lam rukka aktlot piik raan.
Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat'low rek naan nih pthla luwtbukna' thungki ichen chaan.
Neiyi mii kinrit rek hinni kthe heppi kthe a, neiyi kdothe avah athi naan nih pau'apindit chaan.
Neen nih tpanpaak chaakin suwqhat tong avah Khrista hii thung ngi tarlaan chaak sapin pemeh mow? Neen nih tupkuiyin thenpen avah Khrista daksa thung ngi tarlaan chaak sapin thenpen pemeh mow?
Mleiya knempok rek neen avah thenpen pum khat ungta daksa pum khat daatin pimin, tidit tah neen nkheng inni ava' thenpen khat ava' tarlaan chaak sapin.
Dultimii nowpa ktong thah Isreel rek avah mheisut piik chaan. Mleiya rintparlaanna' ava' kcha kcha' rek mmaan avah rintparlaanna' khaan ava' tu' karlaang kcha'sap lam pemeh mow?
Mdittu' neiyi kthe a talu? Neiyi dow pthla rek avah dodak lam kdit mow? Mditmata dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dow rek avah dodak lam kdit mow?

Pdainu neiyi hanto' kdothe, tidit tah Chaatktlei rekki rin mdoparlaanin avah tarnam rek hinni mdoparlaanin ungta avah Isowr hin pemeh ungta neiyi naan avah tarnam rektu' lopkhat akurthuh raan avah kdongei pemeh.
Naan nih Kruwng hin tong avale' tarnam rek tong avah neeve pchaang nimaan tih. Ungta naan nih Kruwng khaan le' tarnam rek khaan avah arlaangve pchaang nimaan tih.
Mditmata neen nih Kruwng avah tepner pchaang chenaandi? Ungta neenna Mma' hinni nruwn ktangset mow?
Nei kthen vah dow mkheng avah kdotlot krow pdainu dow mkheng rek ava ngi neiya mbom meh. Nei kthen nuh dow mkheng avah kdotlot krow pdainu dow mkheng ava ngi neiya mapqhang meh.
Kuwkhat leh ngi mthina ki daat sutthlaam mso pdainu mii khimkheiyi morson rek qhatna' asutthlaam chso.
Naan nih aplungrildehn ava' ki thenni, paukheel kkheel kmah ngi kyurkren mun thungki dow rek avah talutalu yoso achaan.
Mleiya, “Dultipaam ungta mthung ngi kdim mih ka'am mkheng rek avah Kruwng ava' dow.” (Luw. 24:1)

Ungta lamkrin kma' kuwmiikhat tih naan avah kmaal rah ato'own chaakin cheentung ngi ungta naan nih tche rah angeiyin cheentung ngi, aplungrildehn ki thenni paukheel kkheel liit kmah ngi, talutalu yoso a'aang inni mdodownin avah achaan.

Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih ahin nih: “Havah dow pthla rek hinni mdoparlaan dok ksa” mdit cheentung ngi nang ngi, ahin nih ava' kthe mii ava' ki thenni ungta plungrildeh ki thenni saa avah chama'. Mleiya “Dultipaam ungta mthung ngi kdim mih ka'am mkheng rek avah Kruwng ava' dow.” (Luw. 24:1)
Neiyi plungrildeh kdodit avah naan adow rekin ava' pemeh pdainu ktlok morson rek dow ava' kdothena'. Mleiya taluleiyi mii morson rek plungrildeh ava ngi nei kning'olna' 'leenni paukpindit rang?
Pdainu neiyi tpanpaak chaak tu' kilqhi ngi karlaan chaakku taluleiyi neiyi panpaak chnuh kdochaak chaak thendam ava'leiyi neiya kthi makpauna' rangda?
Avaleiyi, naan nih chayown tih mditmata nee chyown tih mditmata talutalu yoso adotlotin mkheng avah Isowr tponlor chaakna ngi atlow chaan.
Naan nih kuwkhat leh hinni, tidit tah Jihudi rek hin yoso mditmata Grik rek hin yoso mditmata Isowr lamrinlop hin yoso tparkhaanna' piimaan.

Mleiya nei rukku mii mkheng avah dow mkheng 'leenni muplung ngamin kdotlot chaak heppi atlown. Mleiya neiyi kthen nemna' thlaam chmaang pdainu mmaan karsan chaakna' rah, mii knempok thennemna' ava' kdothlaam chaak.
Neiyi Khrista nowpa kdopqowi chaak heppi naan rukku nei knowpa ava' apqowi chaan.
'Tunnu ku'uknau rek naan nih dow mkheng 'leenni adotbin phaakin ungta naan nih, neiyi naan ahin nih adokparlaan chaakin nowparit rek ava' ado'arkhiik chaakin leiyi, akpanpaak chaak inna.
Pdainu neiyi naan nih hava' adodeh raan avah kdongei chaak. Mleiya pselpa khimkhei ki luwchai avah Khrista ungta snu luwchai avah pselpa ungta Khrista luwchai avah Isowr.
Pselpa khimkheiyi buwluw khumda rinkaktham kcha' mditmata pau kparjaam kcha' mma' ava ngi mthina ki mluwchai avah kyat chmeh.

Pdainu snu khimkheiyi mluw kukhum kmah ngi rinmaktham chaak mditmata pau mparjaam chaak bih, mma ngi mthina ki mluwchai avah kyat chmeh. Mleiya mma'kat avah mluw topkolpthi khat ava' tu' kinqim kcha' a.
Mleiya snu khat tih mluw mkhumma cheentung ngi msam akchip chso mditmata mluw apkol pthiso. Pdainu snu ki thenni mluw topkol avah mningkyana' mkurthuh cheentung ngi mma ngi mluw akhum chso.
Mleiya pselpa vah mluw avah dakat tih mdokhum rang pemeh mleiya mmah Isowr arlim ungta mkonlorna' pdainu snu avah pselpa konlorna'.
Mleiya pselpa avah snu thungki pemeh pdainu snu avah pselpa thungki.
Mditmata pselpa avah snu ki thenni mdopurthuh pemeh pdainu snu avah pselpa ki thenni mdopurthuh.
Hava' lei kat tih, vaantamsi rek leiyi, snu ava ngi mluwchai 'leenni ruhtanna' kurduh ngi ma'amna' ki titinna' khat avah mdothlowi chaak rah.
Anto'daat yoso, Kruwng hinvah snu ngi pselpa hinki mning'olna' ka'am pemeh mditmata pselpa ngi snu hinki mning'olna' ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya snu ava ngi pselpa thungki mkurthuh ava' heppi pselpa ava' rukka snu ar'aang thungki pdainu dow mkheng avah Isowr hinki.
Mleiya snu khat tih mluw kukhum kmah ngi Isowr hinni rinmaktham chaak avah qha mow, qhame, tidit avah naan adak inni apinditin rang ngi asuwn?
Ungta pselpa khat tih msam kapsaang avah mthina ngi karjat chmeh, tidit avah rinnow ava'kat tih apurchuk chaan meh mow?
Pdainu snu a msam msaan cheu avah mkonlor chaakna' tidit tah msam avah mma' hinni mukpurkhumna' rang ngi mdopiik.
Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih hava' 'leenni tkerteenna' mupthuh nuwm bih ava' hep nowpa avah neenna thlowi maan ring mditmata Isowr lamrinlop rek rukku thlowi lammeh.
'Tunnu naan nih athlen kurdutsapin avah mqhatna' lei mda mthitna' mkurthuh leiyi, hava' tpurchuhna' rek adokpiikin ava' thung ngu neiyi naan avah apanpaak chmaan ring.
Mleiya mkhatna' thung ngi naan nih lamrinlop khat tih athlen kurdutsapin thung ngi naan arlak inni tkenqhenna' kthuwk a tidit arjanu ungta neiyi avah mruksuwn lam kdorin.
Mleiya Isowr rih mdoperteel dok ksa mii rek avah naan arlak ki mkandanna' rang ki thenni naan arlak ki mlangkma' mrukka ma'am rah.
Avaleiyi, naan nih mmun khat thung ngi athlen kurdutin avah Kruwng Maalna' ava' kcha rang ki then pemeh.
Mleiya kchaknee thung vah mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mthen avah morson rek duh ngi mdochaak dok ungta khat tah mpowi mtham arlaan nih ktlok khat avah kipri kcha'.

Mdittu' talu! Naan nih adochaak adoneekna' raan ki thennu a'innin ammeh mow? Mditmata naan nih Isowr lamrinlop tuk'adosutmaan ungta dow khatleh kthlowi kma' rek ningkya adopiiknaan pemeh mow? Hava' thung ngu neiyi talu the nikdi' o? Neiyi apanpaak nikaandi? Neiya apanpaak maanring.
Mleiya neiyi Kruwng hinki kdo'arlaan chaak avah nei rukku naan ahin nih adokparlaan chaakin. Mleiya Kruwng Jisu ngi, Mma' mdoyur chaakna' jaankat ava' thung ngi thenpen avah louda.

Ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli, Mma ngi thenpen avah khuida ungta hanto'theda: “Arlaangin, achaan, havah naan athen inni mdopkui dok Nei ksadak ava'. Naan nih havah Nei adotbin phaakna' raan ki thenni atlown.”

Ungta anto' heppi Mma ngi kluhvon mchaak dokin dilli, Mma ngi tong avah louda hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kihii thung ngi mdopqhan dok pauqum ren ki tong ava'. Naan nih hava' aneekin khimkhei thung ngi Nei adotbin phaakna' raan ki thenni havah atlow tlitin.”
Mleiya naan nih hava' thenpen achaak tlitin ungta hava' tong aneek tlitin khimkhei thung ngi naan nih Mma ngi murjun kerheel duh khimkheiyi Kruwng diyowna' avah apurphuwn chaak inna.
Avaleiyi, kuwmiikhat tih karlaangphu kma' rang ngi hava' thenpen ava' mchaak bih ungta hava' tong ava' mneek bih, mma' avah Kruwng daksa le' Mihii ava' 'leenni mraal ka'am kcha' a.
Pdainu mii ava ngi mdak mthina ngi ikperteel chso ungta anto ngi mma ngi thenpen avah achaso ungta tong avah anee chso.
Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih Kruwng daksa avah mqhatmthit kdei kmah, karlaangphu kmah ngi mchaak ungta mneek chaak bih mma' mthina ngi pau tpinditna' avah m'leen nih mchaak mneek chaak a.
Mleiya hava' leiyi naan arlakin ki mii knempok rek avah mruh downg chda ungta kowi lamda ungta knempok ki ki'iip kcha'lam.
Mleiya neen nih nthi naan nih nikpindit chaakin bih n'leenin nih pau pindit nimeh.
Pdainu neen avah hava' dultipaam tu' mido'tupsul mana' raan ki thenni, n'leenin nih pau mpindit thung ngi Kruwng ngi neen avah midotarchak chaak dokin.
Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek naan nih kchaknee rah athlen kurdutsapin thung ngi naan nih khat le' khat ikardasap kchokin.

Pdainu kuwmiikhat mpowiktham ma'am cheentung ngi mma ngi inn thah imaal chso. Mditma bih athlen kurdutsapin avah pau tpindit ki then kurthuwk chrah. Ungta morson avah neiyi kthlen thung ngi parnaak laini'.
'Tunnu ku'uknau rek naan nih pthla lamki chla rekki mlei ava' kdei kmah ngi a'am raan avah neiya ngei maang:
Mleiya naan avah hava' mpau kthuwk kma' dow pthla ava' hinni mdoqhi dok lamleh thah tiqhi dok Chaatktlei rek inping tidit avah adodeh chaakin.

Avaleiyi, neiyi, Isowr Pthla ar'aang ngi kpau kcha' kuwkhat leh ngi Jisu pauhor tupbuk meh ungta Pthla Kchiir ar'aang kma'donle kuwkhat leh ngi Jisu avah Kruwng mdodit pemeh tidit avah adokepdeh chaak dokin.
'Tunnu mdetmdet ki chla rekpa ka'am pdainu Pthla khatsap hinki.
Soptolowna' msikmsik ka'am pdainu Kruwng khatsap hinki.
Ungta nongtlotna' mdetmdet ka'am pdainu dow mkheng ki mkheng kheng thung ngi nong ktlow avah Isowr khadaat.
Pdainu mkheng ki thenni msit amna' rang ki thenni mii khimkhei hinni Pthla dopandan piikna' avah mdopiik.
Mleiya Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi khat hinni luwkinrit pauna piida. Ungta Pthla khatsap ava' ar'aang ngi morson khat hinni tedeh pinditna' pauna piida.
Pthla khatsap ava ngi khat hinni lamrin piida ungta Pthla khatsap ava ngi morson khat ava' hinni tapdamna' chla rek piida.

Morson khat hinni ruhtannong totlotna', morson khat hinni pau tpurphuwnna', morson khat hinni kqha le' kthi pthla rek tedeh pinditna' piida, morson khat hinni mdetmdet ki pau rekki tpauna' ungta morson khat hinni mdetmdet ki pau rek ava' tperheelna' piida.
Pdainu hava' dow mkheng avah Pthla khadaat thungki ungta khatsap ava' nongtlot yesang tidit tah Mma' plungbin dilkqowiyi mii khimkhei hinni, mma' mma' ki thenni mdothem piik.

Mleiya daksa avah khadaat kurhuwk yoso mapna rek knempok ki ka'am, pdainu nempok chleek yoso daksa khadaat thungki lam ungta mkheng inni daksa khat ava' pna reklam. Ungta anto' heppi Khrista rukka anto'hep daat.

Mleiya neen nkhengin avah Pthla khadaat ar'aang ngi neen nih daksa khadaat thung ngi diiluwna' avah tarlaan chaakin. Jihudi mditmata Grik yoso, ungta suwk'owr mditmata mii'ol yoso neen nkhengin avah Pthla khadaat thung ngi midotepneek chaak dokin.
Mleiya daksa ngi mapna khadaat thlowi meh pdainu knempok, mdothowi.
Ungta khuh ngi, “neiya khut kkurthuhma leiyi, daksa ki pmaang,” mdittu' mma ngi daksa thungki kma' kurthuwk rang mow?
Ungta kna ngi, “neiya mik kkurthuhma leiyi, daksa pmaang,” mdittu' mma ngi daksa ki kma' kurthuwk rang mow?
'Tunnu daksa mpumpum mih mik mkurthuh chaakku talu ngi khu karja rang ngo? Ungta daksa mpumpum mih kna mkurthuh chaakku talu ngi mikrim kipniim rang ngo?
Pdainu 'tunnu Isowr rih daksa pna rek khimkhei avah Mma' plungngam dilkqowiyi anto ngi mdopa'am lam.
Ungta pna rek mkheng avah pna khadaat mkurthuh u, daksa a tva'thuh ka'am rang ngo?
Pdainu 'tunnu dakat tih pna rek avah knempok anto'daat yoso daksa khadaat.
Ungta mik ki khut hinni, “nang nga akriin maang,” dipchaang nimeh. Luwchaiyi khut hinni, “nang nga akriin maang,” dipchaang nimeh.
Anto' mda 'tunnu daksa ki mapna kdilsi rek mmaan ava ngi klinsi ngi msit ka'am.

Ungta neen nih takyat chaakna' ktaak liit heppi tbinin daksa pna rek ava ngi kdungset tih takyat chaakin. Ungta ningkyana' khat tih tbin chaakin pna aangqhe rek ava ngi tsutpqowi chaakinsi kurthuwkda.
Pdainu tpandan krow napna rekin avah msit ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rih ava' kapta kcha' pna rek hinni klin nih takyat chaakna' piida daksa avah pum khat tih mdoporjom.
Mleiya daksa thung ngi mkenqhena' ma'am rang pemeh pdainu pna rek mkheng ava ngi kinqim sappi, khat le' khat mkursutdeh chaak raan.
Ungta khat myat bih ava' tu' pna rek mkheng avah kyasap mditmata pna khat 'leenni takyat chaakna' ma'am bih ava' tu' pna rek mkheng avah kkanpa kcha' saplam.
'Tunnu naanna Khrista ki daksa rekin ptih ungta khat le' khat ki pna reksap inptih.

Ungta hava'le' avah Isowr rih lamrinlop thung ngi mdokchol dok ksa: Mkhatna' thung ngi tamsi rek, miknitna' thung ngi khulpu rek, mukdumna' thung ngi chukpu rek, ava' dilli ruhtannong rek, audilli tapdamna' chla rek, tkorbomna' rek, sarka nong rek, mdetmdet tih tpauna' rek ava'.
Mii mkheng avah tamsi reksap lam mow? Mii mkheng avah khulpu reksap lam mow? Mii mkheng avah chukpu reksap lam mow? Mii mkheng avah ruhtannong ktlow reksap lam mow?
Mii mkheng ngi tapdamna' chla mthlowisapin mow? Mii mkheng avah pau ktleiyi kpausap lam mow? Mii mkheng ngi pau mperheel sapin mow?
Pdainu naan nih makqhasi chla rek avah plung kluwt tih athlaam chaan.
Mleiya neiyi dultimii rek pau vih pau chyow rih ungta vaantamsi rek pau vih pau chyow rih, vonsat kthlowima bih, neiya sumpi le' tliingdiing kipring kcha' hep daat nikdi'.

Ungta neiyi pau tpurphuwnna' ki chla thlowi chyow rih ungta paukordowl mkheng deipindih chyow rih ungta luwkinritna' mkheng thlowi chyow rih ungta lown rek tponthowna' kpha ki lamrin mkheng thlowi chyow rih, neiyi vonsat kthlowi chaakma bih neiya dow khatleh parcham maang.
Ungta neiyi kdothlowi mkheng avah srah rek tapmaalna ngi pii chyow rih ungta kdaksa avah tapkaak rang ngi kparlaan chyo ringngi, vonsat kthlowima bih ava ngi kthen nih mqhatna' ka'am pemeh.
Vonsat tih ksowt tih tyatna' kdiil pchaang ungta muplung knei, vonsat tih pner meh, vonsat tih kpirlin meh ungta kpirlin nih kpau pemeh.
Vonsat tih eenghal lih korthlong meh, mthennemna' kthlaam pemeh, plungthitna' ktlow pemeh ungta kqha kma' kbin pemeh.
Vonsat tih nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi kanpa pemeh pdainu kindit thung ngi kkanpa kcha'.
Vonsat tih dow mkheng mdokhaan chaak, dow mkheng lammdorin chaak, dow mkheng 'leenni plungbin mdothiik chaak ungta dow mkheng mdodiil chaak.
Vonsat tah teden rukku kertlei pemeh. Pdainu pau tpurphuwnna' avah am chyoso mmaan avah kertlei chrah, mdetmdet tih kpau am yoso avah kqu chrah, tedeh pinditna' am yoso avah kqu chrah.
Mleiya neen nih mruk'suwn daat tedeh chaakin ungta neen nih mruk'suwn daat tpurphuwn chaak ngaalin.
Pdainu kurkhum ava' marvan thung ngi, ava' dilli mruk'suwn daat avah kupqupthi rah.
Mleiya neiyi nau kkurthuh thung ngu naupau heppi pau nuh, nau dodeh pindit heppi deipindihnu, nau dobin heppi bin chnuh, pdainu neiyi kver dok dilvah nau nowpa mkheng avah kdomaak pthi.

Mleiya 'tunnu neen nih pthlasut thung ngi marvaam ava' nmik inni tedeh ngaalin pdainu ava' dilli mai le' maiqhuwm mih tedeh raan. 'Tunnu neiyi mruk'suwn daat kdodeh pdainu ava' dilli neiyi mdotedeh dok ava' heppi deinikdi'.
Ungta 'tunnu lamrin., plungbinpsuk ungta vonsat, hava' kdum 'leenni i'amin pdainu hava'le' thungki miklinsi avah vonsat.
Naan nih vonsat athlowi tlit chaan ungta pthla 'lam ki chla rek avah kdung ngi angeichaan pdainu kerkheelsi ngi pau tphuwnna' ava' angeichaan.

Mleiya mdetmdet tih kpau mma' ava ngi dultimii rek hinni kpau pemeh pdainu Isowr hinni kpau kcha'. Mleiya mma ngi mdothe avah kuwkhat tih mdodeh pindit pemeh anto'daat yoso mma ngi, pthla thung ngi paukordowl ava' mdothe chaak.
Pdainu pau kpurphuwng mma' ava ngi dultimii rek pqhanna', tkorsowna' ungta plungngam tkirpiikna' mdothe rah.
Ungta pau ktleiyi kpau kcha' mma' avah mdak mthina kpalqhang kcha' pdainu pau kpurphuwng kcha' mma' ava' vah lamrinlop ava' mdopqhan chaak.

Neiyi naan akheng inni pau ktleiyi apau raan kdongei chaak pdainu kerkheelset tih pau adopurphuwn raan kdongei. Mleiya mma ngi lamrinlop pqhanna' kurthuwk ki dakat tih pau avah mperheelma' bih, pau kpurphuwng mma' ava ngi pau ktleiyi kpau mma' hinvah klin.

Pdainu 'tunnu ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahin nih pau ktleiyi pauda kthlen nuh ungta pauphuwn nih, luwkinritna ngi, pau tpurphuwnna ngi mditmata tpurchuhna ngi kpauma u, naan ahin nih talu msit amna' ka'am a?
Mleiya mrinkum ktaak dow rek, spirthiil mditmata dumreng mdumin thung ngi marchaang tpenqhenna' ma'amma u, taluhep pih spirthiil mow, mditmata dumreng ngoh tidit tah tedeh rang ngo?
Mleiya puwtit avah marchaang kindit kmah ngi ndum u, kuw ngi raalmun ki thenni korthlong chdaat rang ngo chdaat rang ngo?

Ava' vah hanto' heppi, naan nih mdetmdet ki pauktlei avah tedehpindit pchaan nih aptha maannu adothe dokin pau avah taluhep pih tedeh rang ngo? Mditma bih, naanna tirthli thung ngi kpau kcha' kurthuwk chnaan.
Dultipaam thung ngi mdetmdet ki pau knempok ki ka'am pdainu mninglei ktaak pau khadaat ruk ka'am pemeh.

Avaleiyi, neiyi pau ava' ki mninglei kdehma bih pau ava ngi kpau mma' hinnu neiya paamktlei ki miikhat kurthuwk kcha' imping ungta ava' pau vih kpau mma' avah nei kihin nuh paamktlei ki miikhat kurthuwk kcha' a.
Avaleiyi, naan nih pthla 'lam ki chla rek thuh plung adopluw chaakin leiyi, lamrinlop pqhan chaakna' rang ava' kthlaam kcha' ikurthuwkin.
Avaleiyi, pau ktleiyi kpau kcha' mma' ava ngi mdoperheel pchaan chaakna' rah rin'iktham chso.
Mleiya neiyi pau ktleiyi rinkaktham chaak bih, kapthlarin vah rinkaktham kcha' a pdainu kdodeh pinditna' thung vah mchei ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a.

Mdittu' ava' ki mqhatna' talu ka'am a? Mdit bih neiyi kapthlarin nih rinktham chnikdi' ungta neiyi kdodeh pindit chaak tu' rinktham chnikdi'. Ungta neiyi kapthlarin nih laa the chnikdi' ungta neiyi kdodeh pindit chaak tu' laa the chnikdi'.

Mditma bih, naan nih pthla ngi suwqhat apiik chaak innu, tparjaakmah mmun thung ngi ka'am kcha' tidit tah nang ngi adothe avah talu tidit mdodehpse taluhep pih nang ngi adopanpaak chaakna' rek thungng vah “Amen” kpii chrang ngo?
Mleiya naan nih dakat tih kqhadeek ki kpanpaak kcha' krow inptih pdainu morson rek pqhan chaakna' kurthuwk meh.
Neiyi naan akhengin han'tun nih pau ktleiyi kpau chaak leiyi, Isowr rah kpanpaak chaak a.
Anto'daat yoso lamrinlop thung ngu neiyi pau ktleiyi pauna pun sowm kdothe rang hinvah kdodeh pindit chaak tu' kilqhi ngi pauna parnga pang daat yoso kdothe chaak ki kqha.
Ku'uknau rek tedeh pinditna' 'leennu nau kurthuwkmaan, anto'daat yoso, mii 'leenni kthi tbinna' thung vah nau ikurthuwkin, ungta naan nih tedeh pinditna' 'leenni ikindit chaan.

Mleiya nowlam thung ngi hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi hava' mii rek tungngu pauktlei kna mii rek pau vih ungta paamktlei mii rek nehr rih bilam nikdi'. Ungta tlow daatyorih hava' mkheng thung ngi mmaan nih Neiya marja lam nimeh.” (Is. 28:11-12) Kruwng ngi mdodit.

Ava'leiyi pauktlei rek avah titinna' rang ki thenngaal ungta avah lamkrin kcha' rekki then pemeh pdainu lamkrin kma' rek then ungta pau tpurphuwn avah lamkrin kma' rek then pemeh pdainu lamkrin kcha' rek then.

Avaleiyi, lamrinlop rek mkheng ava ngi mmun khat thuh kurkuwk lamso ungta mkheng inni pau ktleiyi mpausap innu ungta mmaan arlak ki tparjaakmah mditmata lamkrin kma' rek rukka myau innu, mmaan ava ngi naan avah aplungin karmak kcha' a, adiin nimeh mow?

Pdainu mii mkheng ngi pau mpurphuwnsap daat tu' ungta ava' thuh lamkrin kma' mditmata tethe piikma khat arlak inni kthleng a ungta mma' avah mmaan mkheng inni kindit mthepiik pchaanin ungta mperteel pchaan innu,

Ungta anto ngi Isowr rih mma' plungril avah mapvan piik chaak bih mma ngi khupktulup pih tlow chdon nih Isowr hinni luwkbu chrah ungta Isowr avah dakat tih naan athung ngi ka'am a, tidit kpandang chrah.

Mdittu' ku'uknau rek taluhep rang? Mleiya naan nih akurtuwl chaakin thung ngi, arlakin ki khatvah luwbuklaa khat mthenuwm a, khatvah tpurchuh rah mngei a, khatvah pau ktleiyi mpau rah ka'am a, khatvah pau mdopurphuwn rah ka'am a, khatvah pau mdoperheel rah ka'am a, mdit bih naan nih hava' mkheng avah tapqhanna' ki thenni atlown.
Naan nih arlak inni pau ktleiyi kpau rah ma'am cheentung ngi, mmaan avah 'knii mditmata knemsi ngi kdum kpha ngi khatkhat tih athe lamso ungta miikhat tih avah aperheelso.
Pdainu kperheel rah ma'amma cheentung ngi lamrinlop ava' thung ngu mma ngi rimkdi i'am chdaatso ungta mma ngi mma' mdak le' Isowr hin daat tih avah athe chso.
Mleiya khulpu 'knii mditmata kdum daat tih ipau chlamso ungta morson ava ngi kmin nih m'leenin nih pau apindit chlamso.
Pdainu mbeh ngi kok'ong ktlok khat ava' hinni Isowr rih mpurphuwn piik cheentung ngi mrukri ki mma' avah rimkdi i'am chdaatso.
Mleiya naan nih mii mkheng kurchuk chaakna' rah ungta mii mkheng toksow chaakna' rah khatkhat tih pau avah adopurphuwn chaakin krow.
Ungta khulpu rekki pthlarin rek avah khulpu rek daat tih mdosin chaakin.
Mleiya miikenje rekki lamrinlop rek mkheng thungki heppi, Isowr rah plung karmana' ki mukpu pemeh pdainu plung kdai ki mukpu.
naan arlakin ki snu rek ava' vah lamrinlop rek thung vah rimkdi i'am chlamso tidit tah mmaan nih mpau raan avah mdorot piiklam pemeh pdainu nowlam rukku mdothe heppi mmaan nih makparlaan chaak raan.
Ungta mmaan nih tedeh rah mbin chaakin cheentung ngi inn thuh mi'innpu rekin hinni akheel chlamso, tidit tah snu ngi lamrinlop thung ngi mpau rang avah ningkyana'.
Mditmata mbulthok ki Isowr pauna avah nang athungki kthuwk mow? Mditmata avah nang ahin daat tih kurju mow?
Kuwmiikhat tih mdak avah khulpu khat heppi mditmata pthla 'lam ki khat heppi mkarjaak chaak cheentung ngi, mma ngi, neiyi naan ahin nih kdokjit dow rek avah Kruwng hinki paupiik rek tidit adei chso.
Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mdehma cheentung ngi, kdei kmah ngi i'am chdaatso.
Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih pauphuwn avah kdung ngi angei chaan ungta pau ktleiyi kpau ava'ruk pkhaanmaan.
Naan nih dow mkheng avah kqhadeek ki ungta karnaak deek ki atlow chaan.
Ava' han'tun nih ku'uknau rek, naan nih ado'arlaan chaak dokin ungta mthung ngi arichaak naan, naan ahinin nih kdoparjaam chaak kqhapaumin avah neiyi naan ahin nih aktipbin phaak chaak nuwm inna.
Mleiya naan nih msit ktaak ki lamkrin kma' akurthuwn bih neiyi ahinin nih kdoparjaam chaak pauna ava'kat ava ngi karsan dok kcha' inptih.

Mleiya nei rukku kdo'arlaan chaak dok ava'kat avah neiyi naan ahinin nih rukrirep pih adokparlaan chaakin. Mleiya Kchiir laika rek ava' dilkqowiyi Khrista ngi neen nupnu rekin ki thenni midiyowpiik inda.
Ungta Kchiir laika ava' dilkqowiyi Mma' avah alruwl lamda ungta Mma ngi mnii kdumna' nit tih kerdelda.
Ava' dilli Mma' avah Siphas tih deida ungta ava' dilli sowm lei'knii rek rukku dei lamda.
Audilli unau rek pun parnga ava ngi Mma' avah veikhadaat thuh dei lamda, avale' meknem bet avah 'tun rukku ka'am daat lam a pdainu aangqhe rekka ki'iip dok kcha'lam a.
Ava' dilli Mma' avah James tih deida ungta audilli tamsi rek mkheng inni dei chlamda.
Audilli mqutna'rel thung ngi thla kaptham mih kqou kcha' nei rukku dei chnuh.
Mleiya neiya tamsi rek arlak ki mikdilsi kcha', tamsi khat tih ttaiphuma khat ping. Mleiya neiyi Isowr lamrinlop rek avah chii kdopreel chaak lam.

Pdainu Isowr plungnee ngi neiya kkurthuh rang ava' kkurthuwk kcha' ping ungta nei kihin ki Mma' plungnee avah msit ammana' ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mmaan mkhengin han'tun nih, neiyi kerkheel set tih nong avah kdolow chaak, anto'daat yoso nong klou kcha' avah nei pemeh pdainu nei mkorthlowqhi kcha' Isowr plungnee ava' dotlot.
Avaleiyi, nei yoso mmaan yoso ngi anto ngi kparjaam chaak inna ungta naan nih anto ngi arin chaak dok inna.
'Tunnu Khrista avah kdiyou thungki perdelda tidit avah tparjaam dok ki ma'am arlaan nih, taluhep pih naan arlakin ki aangqhe rekku kdiyou rinkerheelna' tidit ka'am pemeh mdodit inno?
Kdiyou thungki kring kerheel tidit ma'amma bih, Khrista a ringkerheel meh a.
Ungta Khrista avah kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, neen kpau parjaam chaakin avah msit ammeh a ungta naan alamrinin rukka msit ammeh a.

Ava' han'tun nih, neen nih Isowr rih Khrista avah kdiyou thungki mdoperdel diin nuh mkindit kat ava' kdopandan chaakin. Pdainu kdiyou kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, Mma ngi Khrista avah perdel meh a ungta ava ngi mkindit kat mkurthuh bih, neenna Isowr ki mlangkma' sakhi rek kurthuwk kcha'in imping.
Mleiya kdiyou kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, Khrista avah perdel meh a.
Ungta Khrista mperdelma bih naan alamrinin avah msit ammeh ungta naanna apnu rekin thung ngi ka'am tlit chdaat inna.
Mdit bih Khrista hinni ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaan ava' rukka kenvei kcha'lam a.
Neen nih hava' rinkum ava' daat ki thenni Khrista hinni plungbinpsuk kthlowi kcha' nkurthuhn bih, neenna mii mkheng arlak ki plungdun vonsat'lowsi tkurthuh chaak raan.
Pdainu 'tunnu Khrista avah kdiyou thungki perdelda ungta ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaan ava' ki mkhatna' mchei kurthuwkda ka'am a.
Mleiya miikhat ava' thung ki ngi tidoyowna' avah arvangda ava' vah Miikhat ava' hinki rukku kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah karvang.
Mleiya Adam thung ngi mii mkheng mdiyow chaak ava' heppi, Khrista thung ngi mii mkheng avah kipring perheel rah.
Pdainu mii khimkhei avah mma' mma' ki mkarnaakjiik ava' dilkqowi rah. Mleiya mkhatna' mchei Khrista ava'don, ava' dilli Mma' murjun thung ngi Khrista mii rek ava' rah.

Audilrow ngi mqutna' avah karvang rah, tidit tah Mma ngi tpaalna' ruhtan ksin rek ungta ruhtanna' ksin rek ungta ruhtan kthlowi rek mkheng ava' mupqutpthi dilli Mma ngi Kruwngpaalna' avah Pa Isowr ava' hinni kparlaan pthi rah.
Mleiya Mma ngi Mma' miihal rek mkheng avah mthiikpthi dokduh kpha ngi kpaal rah.
Tpenvei pthi rang mqutna' miihal, avah kdiyou, ava'.
Mleiya, “Mma ngi dow mkheng avah Mma' khuhther rih mdothiik pthi dok.” (Luw. 8:6) Pdainu Mma ngi “Dow mkheng avah Mma kurduh ngi,” mdit thuh, dow mkheng Mma' kurduh ngi kthi Mma' avah kparkhaal chda.

'Tunnu Mma' kurduh ngi dow mkheng mdothiik ava' thung ngi, Chapa mdakkat ava' rukka, dow mkheng Mma' kurduh ngi kthiikpiik, Mma' ava' kurduh ngi ka'am kcha' a, tidit tah Isowr rah dow mkheng ki mkheng kheng ava'.
Mditma bih, kdiyou kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, kdiyou ki thenni dii kluwt dok kcha' rek mmaan ava' vah talu ktlow lam rang ngo? Mdittu', talulteiyi mmaan nah kdiyou ki thenni dii kluwt chlam o?
Ungta taluleiyi neenna mqhang ktaiyi tidina' thuh tri chaak inno?
Neiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni kdothlowi chaak, naan aleiyi kpirlin chaakna' ava ngi kthepindit chaak a, tidit tah neiya mpha ktai thuh kdiyou ping.

Neiyi Ephisia thung ngi nowmsaa tu' kkurbun avah dultimii rinchan ki mkurthuh u, nei kthen nih talu msit amna' ka'am a? Kdiyou mkerdelmata, “Neen nih, ichaan cheh ineen cheh mleiya pduknii u tidiyow chaak raan.” (Is. 22:13)
Naanna kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso, kqha kma' tu' kilqhi ava ngi rinnow kqha avah mdo'ekre.
Naan nih rinkinditna' thuh ikerdel chaan ungta pnu arvei maan, tidit tah mii aangqhe vah Isowr ki tedeh pinditna' avah mdothlowi chaak pemeh. Neiyi havah naan aningkyana' raan ki thenni kdothe.
Pdainu mii aangqhe ngi hanto' kthe rah: “Taluhep pih kdiyou avah kerdel? Ungta taluhep kduh ki daksa ngi kerdel rang?”
Kokmok rek, naan nih adopqauin chiimuw avah kdiyou kmah ngi ring nimeh.
Ungta naan nih adopqauin avah mbul kurthuwk rang ava' pemeh pdainu chaapaar thlaang thlaang ngaal, tidit tah chavui kurthuwk krow mditmata ktlok chaapaar kurthuwk krow.
Pdainu Isowr rih Mma' plung ngamna' dilkqowiyi chiimuw ava' hinni chiibul avah mdopiik ungta mchiimuw mchiimuw ki dilkqowiyi mchiibul avah mdopiik.
Sadak mkheng avah kinqimsap sadak pemeh pdainu dultimii sadak ki khat, morson nowmsaa rekki sadak rek, morson nih tuwlvah rekki sadak rek ungta morson nih pva rekki sadak rek ka'am lam.
Ungta parvaan daksa rek rukka amda ungta dultipaam ki daksa rek rukka ka'am lam Pdainu parvaan konlorna' ava ngi khat ungta dultipaam konlorna' ava ngi msik khat nowl.
Kni konlorna' msik khat amda ungta thla konlorna' msik khat am chda. Ungta bursi rek konlorna' msik khat am chda. Mleiya bursi khat le' bursi morson khat avah mkonlorna' msikmsik ka'am kcha'.
Ava' heppi kdiyou rinkerheelna' avah ka'am. Kqop chrang daksa thung ngi tapqau avah kqop kma' rang daksa thung ngi kerdelda.
Takyatna' ktaak ki tapqau ava ngi tkonlorna' thung ngi kerdelda. Ruhdownna' thung ngi tapqau ava ngi ruhtanna' thung ngi kerdelda.
Nowpa ki daksa thung ngi tapqau ava ngi pthla 'lam ki daksa thung ngi kerdelda. Mleiya nowpa ki daksa msik khat ungta pthla 'lam ki daksa msik khat ka'am.
Ungta hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mkhatna' mii Adam avah kring pthlarin kurthuwkda. Mqutna' Mii ava ngi kring kpii pthla tpurthuhda.” (Rnp. 2:7)
Anto'daat yoso, pthla 'lam ki ava ngi mrukri pemeh pdainu nowpa ki ava' ungta ava' dilrow ngi pthla 'lam ki ava' karvang.
Mkhatna' mii avah dultipaam thungki ungta dulti thungki, pdainu miknitna' Mii avah Kruwng ava' ungta parvaan ki.
Dulti thungki mii ava' heppi, dulti thungki mdoseem rek ava' rukka anto'lam. Ungta parvaan ki Mii ava' heppi, parvaan ki rek avale' avah anto'lam.
Ungta neen nih dulti ki mii tomkal lih tohor chaakin heppi, parvaan ki Mii ava' arlim rukka tohor chaak raan.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neiyi hava' kthe a: Mleiya sadak le' hii ngi Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom pchaang chnimeh. Anto' heppi kqop chrang ava ngi kqop kma' rang avah alrouchom mih chom pchaang chlam nimeh.
Asuwn neiyi naan ahinin nih paukordowl akthepiik inna. Mleiya neen nkhengin avah ti'ii chaakterin nimeh pdainu neen nkhengin avah tkerthlen chaak raan.

Mpha mdet’suwn thung ngi, mik takchalap pang thung ngi, mqutna' puwtit prin thung ngi tkerthlen chaak raan. Mleiya puwtit kdum rah ungta kdiyou avah kqop pchaang kma' thung ngi kperdel rah ungta neen nkhengin avah tkerthlen chaak raan.
Mleiya hava' kqop pchaang ava ngi kqop pchaang kma' ava' mdonaak chaak rah ungta hava' kdiyou pchaang ava ngi kdiyou pchaang kma' ava' mdonaak chaak rah.

Mleiya hava' kqop pchaang ava ngi kqop pchaang kma' ava' mnaak chaak ungta kdiyou pchaang ava ngi kdiyou pchaang kma' mnaak chaak dilli, hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Kdiyou avah tapchaanna' thung ngi mopyol dok a” (Is. 25:8) mdodit avah arvankqhi rah.
“O Kdiyou tva'thungda akru a? O Kdikhuw tva'thungda adopchaanna'a?” (Hos. 13:14)
Kdiyou kru a pnu ungta pnu ruhtanna' avah nowlam.
Pdainu neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi tapchaanna' mikpii Isowr avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso!

Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek, knet tih irip chaan, kakna kmah ngi tidit tah Kruwng hinni naan anonglow chaakin avah mkenveina' ammeh tidit adodeh chaak inni mpha ktaiyi Kruwng nong totlotna' thung ngi kurkhum mih ikparlaan chaan.
'Tunnu miikenje rek thenni adoqhai rekin ava'lei vah naan nih neiyi Galatia ki lamrinlop rek hinni mkarnaakrit kdopiik rek ava' heppi, naan rukku adotlot raan.
Mleiya nei kthlen thung ngi naan nih sum adoqhaimana' raan ki thenni Isowr rih miiktai hinni mdorot piik dok ava' dilkqowiyi, arveen ki mkhatna' nit ktaiyi sum avah pankaidon mdoporkhowl chaak rah.
Ungta nei kthlen thuh kuwku yoso naan nih paukjit tih adorotsapin mii rek ava' hinni naan achla rekin avah paukjit tu' kilqhi ngi Jerusalem thah kda rah silam nikdi'.
Ungta nei rukka kche ngi mqhat rang bih, nei rukka mmaan tu' chetsap nikdi'.
'Tunnu neiyi Mesedonia paamkuwl thuh kthleng ngi kchedok dilli naan ahin nih thleng nikdi'. Mleiya neiya Mesedonia paamkuwl kthleng ngi kchet rang imping.

Pdainu neiya naan ahin nih ka'am bong krow ping mditma bih phalbi avah ava'thah naan tu' ta'amsap daatin ruk krow. Mleiya tva'tva' thang yoso, neiyi kchena' rang ava' thung ngi naan nih adotadak chaakna' raanni, naan ahin nih ambong nikdi'.
Mleiya 'tun'tun nih 'lam thung daat tih akvellap ngaal raan daat tih thleng nuwm maang. Pdainu Kruwng ngi mtrotpiik bih, naan tu' mpha mruk ta'amsap raan.
Pdainu Pentikost ki tmaalna' kpha vah neiya Ephisia khuwpii thung ngi amnikdi'.
Mleiya nei kthen nih thurngut klin nih ungta ruhtanna' ki thurngut ungta changqhatna' thurngut kthen nih kparvangda pdainu mkikthitna' knempok ki ka'am lam a.
'Tunnu Timothy avah naan ahinin nih mthlen cheentung ngi mningkqi kmah ngi naan tu' ma'amsapna' rah asuwdei chaan. Mleiya neiyi Kruwng nong kdotlot chaak heppi, mma' rukku anto'jik ki mdotlot chaak.

Avaleiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi mma' avah tukksut kma' tlow mso. Ungta nei kihin ki rah m'lamqowina' thuh plung kdai deek ki arheida chaan. Mleiya neiyi morson unau rektu mthlen raan avah 'lamksut daat lam a.

'Tunnu nu'unnau'in Apollo leiyi, kikjit chaak a. Mleiya unau rektu' naan ahinin nih mthlenna' rah neiyi kdung ngi kdoksow chaak, pdainu mmah 'tun'tun vah tethlen rah binliit mda Anto'daat yoso, mma ngi mpha kqha mthlowi thuh kthleng chdaat rah.
Naan nih ihardei chaan, lamrin thuh knet tih irip chaan, pselpa dotlot heppi ikorthlongin ungta aruhn ktang ngi i'amin.
Naan nih dow mkheng avah vonsat tih atlown.

Ku'uknau rek akoksow chaak inna, tidit tah naan nih Stephenas innkhor avah adodehn, mmaan nah Akhaia paamkuwl ki mkhatna' mchei reklam ungta miikenje rek soptolowna' thung ngi kakparlaan dok kcha' reklam.
Mleiya naan nih mmaan hep daat mii rek hinni ungta neen tu' nong klousap kcha' mii rek khimkhei hinni akparlaan chaakna' raan akokso chaak inna.
Stephenas le' Phortunatas le' Akhaiakas le' mthlenin avah kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya naan ahinki kdoptat chaak rek avah mmaan nih mpordonpiik chlamda.
Mleiya mmaan nih nei kapthla ruk ungta naan apthlaan rukka ren mipthut piik chaanda, avaleiyi ava' hep mii rek avah naan nih adeipindih chaan.
Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am lamrinlop rekki aturvuwi chaak inna. Akyul a le' Prisila ngi mi'nnin thungki lamrinlop rektu' plung kluwt dok ki Kruwng hinni aturvuwi chaak inna.
Unau rek mkheng inni aturvuwi chaak inna ungta naan nih khat le' khat avah kchiir kurput tih ikurputin rah, ikurvuwi chaan.
Paul neiyi hava' tkurvuwina' avah kukhut kat tih kdokjit chaak.
Kuwmiikhat tih Kruwng Jisu Khrista vonsat mlow chaakma bih, mma' 'leenni pauhor ka'am kcha' a. ‘O, Kruwng, arjungqum.
Kruwng Jisu ki plungnee avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Khrista Jisu hinni nei kvonsat avah naan akhengin a'leenin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.

Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi nu'unnau'in Timothy tu' Korinthia khuwpii thuh ka'am Isowr lamrinlop naan ahinin nih ungta Akhaia paamkuwl thuh ka'am miikenje rek hinni kikjit chaak a.
Neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa, ungta plungqhat rekki Mpa ungta dow mkheng 'leenni plungngam mikpii kchaan Isowr avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso.

Mleiya neen nih tyattraan kperteel rek mmaan ava' hinni plungngam tpiik pchaanna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi tyattraanna' mkheng thung ngi plung ngamna' mipiinda. Mleiya Isowr rih neen nihin nih plungngam midotpiikin heppi neen nih mmaan avah plungngam tpiik raan.
Mleiya Khrista suwkthuhna' ava ngi neen nthung ngi kepleet tih mluwn chaak heppi Khrista amleiyi Isowr rih plung ngamna' avah kepleet tih mitpiik chaak inna.

Ungta neenve ngi tyattraanna' kdut chaakin bih, avah naan athen inni plung ngamna' ungta akarsan chaakna' raan ki then. Mleiya hava' thuh naan rukku, neenve ngi kdodiilin tyattraanna' rek ava'jik ki tidiil chaakna' ki ruhtanna' ka'am. Mditmata neenve ngi plung ngamna' kdut chaakin rukku avah naan athen inni plung ngamna' ungta akarsan chaakna' raan ki then.

Ungta neenve ngi naan athen inni plungbinpsuk avah knet tih kthlowi chaakin. Mleiya neenve ngi kyat chaakin thung ngi naan rukka kya kcha' inptih ungta plung ngamna' kdut chaakin thung rukku naan ruk plung ngamna' phang chnaandi'.

Mleiya ku'uknau rekin, neenve ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh kthleenin nih tyatna' kthuwk rek avah naan nih adodehma raan avah ngei maanring. Mleiya neenve a tperteel pchaanmah ngi bowrkrik mopdotinda, ava' thung ngi neenve ngi kring kma' rang kpha rukku kirbinin nuh.
Ou, mkindit kat tih neenve, kdak inni lamkilrin kmah ngi kdiyou kperdel Isowr hin daat tih lamrinin nuh, kuplung inni kdakin avah tidina' pauqum kpha rukka kirpii dok kchaan ping.
Hanto'ya klin tidina' thungki Isowr rih neenve a maktlan inda ungta mtaktlan meek sliinna ungta neenve ngi lamkrin chaak inna tidit tah 'tundil rukku Mma ngi mkaktlan chraan.

Naan rukku khadaat tih neenve kthen inni rin'aktham chaakin ava ngi mbom chaan tinu. Mleiya mii knempok ar'aang ngi neenve kihin inni chla mdotparlaan chaakin ki thenni, mii knempok ki neenve kakchang inni Isowr rah kpanpaak chlam rah.

'Tunnu neenve kpirlin chaaknaan avah hava: Neenve ngi dultipaam thung ngi ka'amin ki krinchanin ungta kerkheelsi ngi naan a'aang inni ka'amin ki krinchanin avah neenki kuplungril dehn ava ngi mdopandan. Mleiya neenve a Isowr hinki kurjung plungbin khadaat le' plung kertleu vih ka'am kchaan ping. Neenve ngi dultimii ki luwkinritna' dilkqowiyi ka'am pmaan ring pdainu Isowr hinki kurjung plungnee ava' dilkqowiyi ka'am kchaan ping.
Mleiya naan nih adoparchamin ungta adodehn ava' heihin nih neenve ngi dow morson kjit maanring. 'Tunnu naan nih mqutna' kpha thung ngi avah deipindih chnaandih, tidit kbin chaak a.
Dakat tih naan nih neenve a mruk daat adotedeh pinditin, tidit tah Kruwng Jisu nit ava' thung ngi neenve kleiyi pirlin chnaandi' ungta naan aleiyi neen ruk pirlin chnikaandi'.
Mleiya naan nih miknitna' athenin nem chaakna' adophaak chaakna' raan ki thenni ungta hava' thung ngi neiyi plungkrip kdothlowi chaak leiyi, choduduh ngi naan ahin nih tethlen rah kdobin chaak.

Mleiya naan nih Judia paamkuwl thah adotapthlat chaak raan kdongei chaak leiyi, neiyi Mesedonia paamkuwl thah kche rang thung ngi naan ahin nih luwtda ungta karvang kerheel thang rukku ahinin nih luwtda ta'am rah kdongei chaak.

Avaleiyi, neiyi ava' knongbin avah, ko'oltek ki ktlow ngi atbinin mow? Mditmata neiyi dultimii rek dobin heppi knongbin avah ktlow rah atbinin mow? Mleiya nei kihin nuh, ong nga, ong ungta immeh, immeh.
Pdainu Isowr rah trinchaak krow, naan ahinin nih kdotheen pau avah ong le' maang tethena'lu pemeh.
Mleiya Isowr Chapa Jisu Khrista leiyi, neen nih ungta Silvenas le' Timothy ungta neiyi kdoparjaamin avah ong le' maang tethena' pemeh pdainu Mma' hinni avah ong ava'.
Mleiya Isowr paureel mkheng avah Mma' hinni ong ava'. Ungta mii rekki neenve ar'aang ngi Isowr mdoponlor chaakna' rah Mma' avah ‘Amen’ ava'.
'Tunnu Khrista hinni naan ruk ungta neen ruk mikapqhangin ungta reidii mikpubullin Mma' avah Isowr.
Mma ngi neen avah kbihjiik milot chaanda ungta tarpaalna' khat tih Pthla avah nuplungchai rekin thung ngi mipiinda.
Neiyi naan adokparkhaal chaakna' raan ki thenni Korinthia khuwpii thah veikhat kthleng nowl pmaang. Neiyi havah Isowr rih kapthlarin mdodeh daat tih mkindit kat ava' kdothe.

Neen nih naan alamrinin 'leenni tpaalna' ruhtan kdosintonna' raan ki then pemeh pdainu neenna akanpat chaakin thung ngi akkanpat qhi kcha' aplapin ping. Mleiya naanna lamtrin chaakna' thung ngi knet tih krip kchaan ptih.
Pdainu nei kthung ngi hanto' binnu krip imping tidit tah veikhat plungkya ngi ahinin nih thleng nimaang.
Mleiya neiyi naan akapyatin bih, kuw rangda nei kkanpatna' moktlotpiik rang nga, neiyi kdopyat chaak rek naan daat pemeh mow?

Ungta neiyi hava' dow rekkat avah kdokjit dok, mditma bih, kthlen chaak thung ngi nei kkanpatna' rang rek ava ngi neiya mkapya kcha' lamrah. naan akhengin a'leenin nih adokrin chaakin leiyi, nei kkanpat avah naan akhengin kanpa kcha' inptih.

Mleiya neiyi kya dok ki ungta plungkqap pih kirthli kbupok ki naan ahinin nih kdokjit chaak. Pdainu havah naan aplungin yatna' rang mda, neiyi naanna kepleet tih vonsat adoklow chaakin ava' adodehna' raan ki then.
Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih tyatna' mupthuh bih, mma ngi nei mdotapyat pemeh pdainu naan akhengin avah mruk thung ngi adotapyat chaakin. Neiyi mruk kdodit avah naan ahin nih mapchai reenmana' rah kdothe.
Mii knempok ki mraal suwkthuhna' mdopiikin ava ngi ava' hep mii ava' ki thenvah kokhop a.
Pdainu ava' kchang ngi naan nih mma' avah ptlotpiik thida adoksow chaak raan. Mditma bih ava'hep mii avah kdung ngi tyatna' ava ngi mma' avah kopyol kcha'krow.
Avaleiyi, neiyi akaktham chaak inna tidit tah mma' hinni avonsat'lown avah ren nih atedetin.
Mleiya naan nih dow mkheng 'leenni tethe apqowiyin immow, tidit kdoperteel chaakna' rang ki thenni naan ahin nih havah kdokjit chaak.

'Tunnu naan nih kuwmiikhat hinni talutalu yoso adoptlot piikin mma' avah nei rukku koptlotpiik a. Mleiya naan athenni talutalu yoso kdoptlot piik dok mma' avah Neiyi Khrista dodeh ngi kdoptlot piik dok.
Mditma bih, Seitan nih neenna mikepkheel raan mleiya neen nih mma' ki tekmena' mihuwn avah tedeh mlaiyin pemeh.
Ava' han'tun nih Khrista ki kqhapaumin leiyi, neiyi Troas khuwpii thah chetnu. Neiyi ava'thah kche thuh Kruwng ngi kthen nih thurngut mdotapvan piik deinu.
Pdainu kuplung karngat chaakna' ammda mleiya ava' thuh knaupa Taitas tah kdodeh pemeh. Mthungta neiyi thaan lam thinu Mesedonia thah kchet kcha' ping.

'Tunnu mpha ktai Khrista hinni miktapchaanin, Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso. Ungta Mma ngi Mma' tedehpindit chaakna' mikrimkdih langlang avah neen nlei inni mmun ktai thungki mii rek hinni tedetda.
Mleiya neenna mdosansli dok rek hin ruk ungta kenvei kcha'sli rek hin rukku Isowr thenni Khrista hinki mikrimkdih reidii rek inpimin.

Ungta khat hinvah neenna tidina' thungki tidina' ki thenni mikrimkdih reidiin pimin. Ungta morson khat hinvah rinkum ki rinkum thenni mikrimkdih reidii rek inpimin. Ungta hava' dow rekki thenni kuw ngi kopkhop pchaang chrang nga?

Mleiya neenna, Isowr pauna avah mthen nemna' ki thenni kporchoukrep mii rek ava' hep pmaanring. Pdainu plung kertleu vih ungta Isowr dow kurthuwk ki ungta Isowr miksut thung ngi, neen nih Khrista hinni avah kdothe thut chaakin.

Neen nih veikhat, kpalqhat chaak naan ahinin nih ktlotin mow? Mditmata mii aangqhe rekki naan ahinki rah trotpiikna' paukjit mdongeenin ungta naan ahinki trotpiikna' paukjit mdongeenin ava' heppi neenna kngeenin mow?
Naanna mii mkheng ngi mdodeh ungta mdoparcham kuplungin thung ngi tikjit dok neenki kpaukjit inptih.

Ava' han'tun nih naanna kandang daat tih tedeh, neen nih sopkdolow chaakin Khrista ki paukjit avaan ptih. Khut tih tikjitma pdainu kring Isowr Pthla ngi tikjit dok, lungphel 'leenni tikjitma pdainu sadak ki aplungchaiyin 'leenni tikjit dok rekin ptih.
Ungta hava' hep plungbin knet avah neen nih Isowr ktong thah Khrista Jisu amleiyi kthlowi chaakin.
Neen nih kthina daatin thungki ngi talutalu yoso tbinna' avah kokhop pih kdothlowi chaakin pemeh pdainu kokho chaaknaan avah Isowr hinki.

Ungta Isowr rih neenna pauqum ren ava' sopklow ki mtikkcha pchaang mupthutinda. Neen nih tikjit dok ava' pemeh pdainu neen nih Pthla nong ava' kdotlot chaakin. Mleiya tikjit dok rek ava ngi mdo'eyow pdainu Pthla ava' vah rinkum mdopiik.

Pdainu kdiyou nongtlotna', tikjit dok ungta lung rek 'leenni tikri ava ngi mkonlor chaakku, tidit tah kenvei kcha' rang tkonlorna' dotlot tih, Isreel nau rekki mmai konlorna' leiyi, Moses avah kmin nih msut pchaanmah innu,
Taluhep pih Pthla nongtlotna' ava ngi kerkheelsi ngi konlorset kma' rangda?
Mleiya tupsulna' kpii nongtlot avah konlor mkurthuh bih rinkinditna' nongtlot ngaalla kerkheelsi ngi konlor chrah.
Mleiya hava' thung vah choduh ki tkonlorna' dok avah 'tunnu mkonlorna' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya npinqim bih 'tunnu ava' kepkheelsi tkonlorna' ka'am kcha'.
Mleiya kenvei meeksli ava ngi mkonlor chaak bih, hava' ka'am daat ava ngi kdungset tih konlor chrah.
Hava' hep plungbinpsuk kdothlowi chaakin leiyi, neen nih changkarngam mih neenna kpau kchaan ping.
Mleiya havah Isreel nau rekki msit ktaak mqutna' ava' mdosut tlit mana' raan ki thenni maikhum mih mmai kupkhum Moses dotlotlulu pemeh.

Pdainu mmaan plung rek avah tapchai pthida. Mleiya tuni kpha ngi mmaan nih pauqum pli mparchamin thung ngi ava' maikhum avah kliik kmah ngi ka'am daat. Hava' maikhum avah Khrista hinni mdolow pthi dok.
Pdainu tuni kpha ngi mmaan nih Moses laika rek mparchamin cheu muplung rekin thung ngi maikhum ava ngi mdopkhum tlit daat lam.
Anto'daat yoso kuwmiikhat tih Kruwng hinni plung mtarngat chaak thung ngi Kruwng ngi ava' maikhum avah mdolow pthipiik.
'Tunnu Kruwng nga Pthla ava' ungta Kruwng Pthla amna'mun ava' thuh ning'olna' avah ka'am.

Pdainu neen nkheng inni pthlasut thuh 'tun tkerdehn heppi Kruwng konlorna' avah maikhum liik pthida mai le' maiyi dei chenaandi'. Mma ngi neenna Pthla ngi ka'am Kruwng ava' ar'aang ngi tkonlorna' thungki ngi tkonlorna' thah mikperthleng chraan.
Avaleiyi, neen nih hava' nongtlotna' avah plungnee kdo'arlaan chaakin heppi kdo'arlaan chaakin, ava' vah neenna kuplungin pneelvot meh.

Pdainu neen nih kordowl lih ka'am ningkyana' dow rek avah kdopthlat pthi chaak dokin. Ungta neenna mii ktepmen rang ngi kchet pmaan ring ungta Isowr Pauna ngi mii huwnna' maan ring. Pdainu hanto' heppi neen nih kdaksaan avah Isowr aang ngi mii khimkhei ki plungril thung ngi kindit avah kertleu deek ki kdoparlaan chaakin.
Pdainu neenki kqhapaumin avah mkandanma bih, avah kenvei chrang rek hinni kandang chmeh a.
Isowr arlim Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki mar'aang ava ngi mmaan 'leenni mlenmana' rang ki thenni tunpha ki isowr rek ava ngi lamkrin kma' rekki plungbin rek mik avah toptot pthida.
Mleiya neen nih neen kdaksaan kparjaam kcha'in pmaan ring pdainu Kruwng Khrista Jisu ava' kdoparjaam chaakin. Ungta neenna Jisu thenni naan asuwk inping.

Mleiya kjiingnu thungki ngi mar'aang teplenna' rang ki thenni paupiik kpii Isowr ava ngi neen kuplungin thung ngi mar'aang meplenpiik inda. Jisu Khrista mai thung ngi Isowr konlorna' tedeh pinditna' mar'aang ava' mdotpiikna' raan ki thenni mar'aang avah mdoplen dok.
Pdainu hava' klinsi ruhtanna' avah Isowr hinki ungta neen kihinin ki pemeh, tidit tpandanna' rang ki thenni neen nih hava' alrou avah duldak beel rek thung ngi kdothlowi chaakin.
Neenna mirkil ktai ki tyattraanna' rekki mper'delinda pdainu ava ngi mper'delkrep inmeh. Kuplungin tpenqheekda pdainu neen nih kuplungbin psukin avah pqhun chmaan ring.
Neen nih tyat chiireelna' perteel innu pdainu Isowr rih neenna mmapthiin meh, neenna muptluwnda pdainu mpenvei inmeh.
Mpha ktaiyi Jisu rinkum avah neen kdaksaan thung ngi ka'am tidit mkandanna' rah neen nih kdaksaan thung ngi Kruwng Jisu diyowna' avah kdohor chaakin.
Mleiya kdiyou kcha' rang neen ndaksa thung ngi Jisu rinkum ava' mkandanna' rang ki thenni, ringda ka'am daat neen avah mpha ktaiyi Jisu thenni kdiyou hinni mparlaaninda.
Hanto ngi kdiyou ava ngi neen kthung inni nong tlowda pdainu naan athung innu rinkum avah ka'am.

Pdainu hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi lamkrin chaak ungta avaleiyi neiyi kdothe,” (Luw. 116:10) mdoditna' lamrin ki pthla avah neen kihinin nih ma'am leiyi neen nih lam kdorin chaakin ungta avaleiyi neen nih kdotheen.
Mleiya Kruwng Jisu kperdel Mma' ava ngi neen rukka Jisu ar'aang ngi mekperdel chraan tidit kdeh chaakin.
Hava' dow mkheng avah naan athen, tidit tah mii knempok hinni kerjei dok plungnee ava ngi mii knempok ki Isowr konlorna' thung ngi tpanpaak chaakna' avah kepleet chrah.
Avaleiyi, neenna kuplungin kepneel amvot meh. Neenki mduwn 'leer ki daksa avah kenvei sli chyoso krilin ki kdaksaan avah nitnit ki ren mtupthuh thang setset inna.
Mleiya hava' neenki tyatraanna' avah ko'oltek ungta havah mpha rowisowt nimeh. Ungta hava ngi ktlangknai kma' tkonlorna' avah kerkheel setset tih midotepnem piikthangin.

Avaleiyi, neen nih mik ki tedeh pchaan dow rek tsutthlaamin pemeh pdainu mik ki tedeh pchaanmah dow rek ava' tsutthlaam chaakin. Mleiya mik ki tedeh dow rek avah mpha mruk ki then daat ungta mik ki tedehma dow rek avah ktlangknai kma' ki then.

Mleiya dultipaam ki ni'innin, hava' buw'inn ava' mkenvei chaak bih, neen nih Isowr hinki inndak nthlowi chaakin tidit neen nih ndehn. Mleiya khut tih tsakmah ktlangknai kma' inn avah parvaan rek thah ka'am.
Mleiya parvaan ki ta'amna' raan inn avah dona heppi midotapnaak chaak rang ava' karda ngi neenna hava' thung ngi archam lou'in minnu ta'am chaak ngaalin.
Mma ngi dona ava' mitapnaak dokin dilvah neenna buwdiir ktaak ki ta'amin nimeh.

Mleiya neen nih hava' buw'inn thuh na'amin thung ngu dakat tih archam lou'in minnu ungta nbowrin rikda. Mleiya Isowr rih nbuw ndiirin mdosu pthi rah tngeina' pemeh pdainu kdiyou avah rinkum mih mdopyol dokna' rang ki thenni hava' kdiyou chrang daksa ava' pyoldon rinkum ki buwdiir mdotapnaak chaak raan ava' tngei chaakin.
'Tunnu nthen inni hava'kat mikporthlon piikin avah Isowr. Ungta Mma ngi Pthla avah midotarpaal chaak naan nih, nihin nih midotpiik chaakin.
Avaleiyi, mpha ktai thuh neenna plungkrip pih ndehn tidit tah neen nih daksa ki inn thuh na'amin thung ngu Kruwng hinki inn ava' thung ki 'lam talat chaakin.
Mleiya neenna lamrin nih tcheen, mikdeh ngi tcheen pemeh.
Ou, neenna nuplungin krip tidit tah daksa inn thuh ka'am kmah ngi Kruwng tu' inn thuh ta'am chaak ava ngi nuplungin kngam kcha'.
Avaleiyi, neen nih nuplungin tupluw chaakin avah, inn thuh am yomin mditmata am myomin nih Mma' plungngam totlot chaak ava' daat.

Mleiya neen nkhengin avah Khrista paupinditna' longkhom aang ngi krip rang yesang inpimin. Mleiya mii ktaiyi daksa ki mnongtlotna' avah mma' mma' ki nongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi kqha yoso kthi yoso mdo'arlaan chaak rah.

Mleiya neen nih Kruwng ki tiqit chaakna' avah talu tidit kdodeh chaakin leiyi, mii rekka kdopnuwm chaakin. Ungta neenna Isowr rih kqhajik ki mtedeh chaakin. Ungta naan rukku aplungrildeh inni neenna atedehpindit chaak inna tidit tih kbin chaak a.

Mleiya naan nih muplung ril lih kpirlin kma', mii dodeh ngi kpirlin kcha' rek hinni ado'arthaan chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni, neen nih kdaksaan avah naan ahin nih veikhat palqhat chmaan ring. Pdainu neen kakchang inni akpirlin chaakna' raan ki thenni changqhatna' akpii kcha' inping.
Mleiya neen nih ka'aa chaakin bih, avah Isowr thenso mditmata neen nih kuplungin kindit mkurthuh cheentung ngi avah naan athen.
Mleiya Khrista vonsat tih neenna mdotoptlot chaakin mleiya havah mkindit kat ava'. Mleiya Miikhat tih mii mkheng ki thenni diyouda ava'leiyi mii mkheng avah kdiyou.
Mleiya 'tun kring rek ava ngi mmaan mdaksa ki thenni mrinporson raan pemeh mmaan thenni diyouda ungta kring kerheel dok Mma' thenni mrin chaakna' raanni Mma ngi mii mkheng ki thenni diyouda.
Avaleiyi, 'tunki kupqhun nih neen nih kuwkhat leh ruk daksa dilkqowiyi suw chmaanmin. Neen nih Khrista avah daksa dilkqowiyi dei chdaat yomin, neen nih anto' heppi tedeh porsonin pemeh.
Avaleiyi, kuwmiikhat tih Khrista hinni ma'am chaak bih, mma' avah ren tpurthuh kurthuwk kcha' a. Mleiya dowpli mkheng avah kthleng dok kcha' a, asuwn, dow mkheng avah ren kurthuwk kcha' a.
'Tunnu dow mkheng avah Isowr hinki. Mma ngi Jisu Khrista amleiyi neen avah mdakkat thung ngi mikpalqhat chaanda. Ungta Mma ngi tkalqhatna' ki nongtlotna' avah neen nihinin nih mitpiik chaak inna.

Isowr rih dultimii rekki doparmana' rek avah ktaipiik kmah ngi, Mma ngi Khrista thung ngi amda dultipaam avah Mma' hinni tpalqhatda. Ungta Mma ngi neen nihin nih tkalqhatna' pauna avah neen nihin nih mitpiik inna.

Avaleiyi, neenna Khrista kchangkdon mii ava' inpimin. Havah Isowr rih naan avah neen ka'amin leiyi, adokoksow chaakin. Ungta neen nih Khrista kchang ngi akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah naan nih Isowr tu' ikalqhat chaan.
Mleiya havah neen nih Mma' hinni Isowr ki rinkinditna' ava' tphan chaakna' raan, tidit tah Mma ngi pnu kdeiliit kma' Khrista avah neen nthen inni pnu tpurthuhda.
Ava' vah neenna Mma' tu' nong ktlow kcha'sap rekin pimin. Avaleiyi, Isowr plungnee avah msit ktaak ki karlaang akurthuh mana' raan ki thenni akokso chaak inna.

Mleiya Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi adokrot piikna' mpha thung ngi nang nga adokarjaak, Neiyi tkirliinna' nit ava' thung ngi adokbom, ” dida. (Is. 49:8) Asuwn, 'tunkat ki mpha havah trotpiikna' ki mpha. Asuwn, 'tunkat ki mpha havah tkirliinna' ki mpha avah.
Mleiya neen nih ksoplow chaakin ava' 'leenni kraallin khatleh ruk ma'ammana' rah dow khatleh 'leenni mii rek khuhsiir pirthitna' rah kdotlot chaakin pemeh.

Pdainu dow mkheng 'leenni neen nih Isowr sopklow kcha' rek kurthuwk ki, kdung ngi tidiildeh chaak ki, tyat tperteel chaak ki, kikriing rek rekki ungta arda khatna' tya arlak ki havah kdopandan chaakin.
Mdote'epok inni, rowng'inn thuh mdotkhum pok inni, eenghal tyatya tidiil chaak ki, arda tyatya tupluw chaak ki, ti'iimana' tyatya ngi, then tngowlna' tya tu' kdopandan chaakin.
Neen nih kchiir rih, tedeh pinditna' chaak ki, ksowt tih tidiildeh ngi, plungdown nih, Pthla Kchiir rih, kqha kpurhuwi kma' vonsat tih kdopandan chaakin.
Ungta kindit pauna ava ngi, Isowr ruhtan ava ngi ungta rinkinditna' ki raaldona avah maleh machang ngi sin innu ava ngi kdopandan chaakin.

Ungta aangqhe ngi makyat chaanda ungta aangqhe ngi mdotakyat chaak maan tya ngi, aangqhe ngi mipthitinda ungta aangqhe ngi maqhatinda ungta aangqhe ngi mikuhuwn chaak mupthutinda. Anto'daat yoso neen nih kindit ava' kdopandan chaakin.
Ungta anngqhe ngi kqhajik ki mtedehn chunni mdotedeh maan tya ngi ungta kdilelep pih, asuwn, neenna kring daat inping. Mmaan nih kraallin suwkthuhna' mpiinda pdainu me'eyou kat inmeh.

Tyattraan kdut chaakin pdainu mpha ktai thuh kanpa chdaat inping. Neenna srahn ping pdainu mii knempok svang kupthut chaakin. Neen nih dow khatleh thlowi chmaan ring pdainu anto' chdaat yoso, neen nih dow mkheng kdothlowi chaakin. Hava' dow mkheng rek 'leenni neen nih Isowr suwk inping tidit ava' kdopandan chaakin.
Oh, Korinthia rek neen nih naan ahin nih kertleu vih kpau kchaan ping ungta kuplungin kparja ngi kparvang.
Neen nih naan athen inni kuplungin arkam vot chmaan ring pdainu naanvah aplungrilin avah arkam pthiin tinu.
'Tunnu ava' adopenletna' inni naan rukku aplungin avah kihin inni atoprolin. 'Tunnu nau rek hinni tethe heppi akthe inna.
Mleiya lamkrin kma' rektu' reengkol porlotsapmaan. Mleiya mrinkindit rekle' nowlam tukksut kma' rek avah lopkhat kurthuwkdei rang mow? Ungta mar'aang le' kjiingnu avah taluhep pih ka'amve rangda?
Ungta Khrista le' Beliel avah mkolrotna' ka'am? Mditmata taluhep pih lamkrin kcha' khat ava ngi lamkrin kma' khat tu' kunpun dei rangda?

Taluhep pih Isowr Luwbuk inn kenje avale' dow pthla rekka talu mkolrotna' ka'am rangda? Mleiya naanna kring Isowr luwbuk'inn kenje avaan ptih. Isowr rih hanto ngi mdothe heppi: “Neiyi mmaan thung ngi amnikdi', Ungta mmaan arlak ki chetnikdi'. Neiya mmaan Isowr kurthuwk nikdi', Ungta mmaan nah nei kmii rek kurthuwk lamrah,” mdodit. (Lev. 26:12 Jer. 32:33 Ejk. 37:27)
Avaleiyi, Isowr rih: “Mmaan hinki arvang thuwkin rang ngi ikekneeng chaan. Naan nih ktobor avah thowngmaan, ungta Neiyi naan avah arlaang chnikaandi',” dida, mdothe. (Is. 52:11 Ejk. 20:34,41)
“Neiya naan Apa kurthuwk nikdi'. Ungta naanna Nei kchapa rekle' kchanu rek kurthuwk naandi,” dida (2 Sam. 7:14) Kpaalkpusi Kruwng ngi mdothe.

Avaleiyi, kvonsat'low rek, neen nih hava' paureel rek ava' tothlowi chaak inni, neen nih daksa le' pthla ktopbor rang dow mkheng rek thungki ndak inni ikertleu chaan cheh. Neen nih Isowr tiqit chaak inni tchiirna' thuh ikurkhum chaan cheh.
Aplungril inni neenna mhei'arlaang chaan, neen nih kuwkhat leh hinni karmak arvantlow chmaan ring. Neen nih kuwkhat leh hinni kthi arvantlow chmaan ring. Neen nih kuwkhat leh ruk huwng chmaan ring.

Neiyi havah naan adokupsul chaak naan nih kdothe pemeh. Mleiya neiyi mduduh thah kdothe chaak dok tidit tah naanna neen kuplungril rekin thung ngi ka'am tlitin ptih. Naanna neen tu' kdiyou kheng rang ki ungta krip kheng rang ki inptih.

Neiyi naan ahinin nih kningqit ktaak liit tih kpau kcha' ping ungta naan alei inni kpirlin dok ki kpau kcha' ping. Neiya plung ngamna' ngi kdim imping ungta neiya neenki kyatkraan chaakin mkheng thung ngi kdung ngi kkanpa kcha' ping.

Mleiya neen nih Mesedonia thah kthlenin thung vah daksa ngi kkarngat chaaknaan ka'am pemeh pdainu mirkilktai thung ngi tyattraanna' kdoperteelin. Mleiya duwn thang ngi eenghal duhn nuh ungta thung thang ngi ningqitna' amda.
Anto'daat yoso misutma hinni plungngam kpii Isowr rih, Taitas mthlen leiyi, neenna plungngam mpii chaanda.

Ungta Taitas thlenlei daat tih plungngam kdophanin daat pemeh pdainu naan nih plungngam mma' hinni adopiik chaakin. Mleiya naan nih kdung ngi atedeh nuwm inna tidit avah Taitas tih kihinin nih songda. Ungta naan nih kdung ngi neen kthen inni plung adopdun chaakin le' kdung ngi vonsat adotolow chaakin ava' rukka songda ungta avaleiyi neiya kdung ngi kanpa kcha' setset ping.

Mleiya nei kpaukjit ava ngi naan aplungyat naan kurthuwk chdaat yoso, neiya kpursul maang. Neiyi mduduh thah kpursul yowring ngi 'tunnu kpursul maang. Nei kpaukjit ava ngi naan aplungin mapyat tah tidit tah kdeh pdainu avah mpha mruk ki then daat rah.

'Tunnu nei kkanpat avah naan ayatin lei pemeh pdainu naan nih ayat chaakin thung ngi plung adoperthlen chaakin leiyi, kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya naanna Isowr dongei dilkqowiyi kya kchaan ptih. Mleiya neen nih, naan nih dow khatleh 'leenni akenveina' raan kdotlotin ka'am pemeh.

Mleiya Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi tyatna' kphang kcha' ava ngi tkarsan chaakna' ki thenni plung tperthlenna' mdopthuh, ava' vah tpursulna' ka'am pemeh. Pdainu dultipaam ki tyatna' ava' vah tidiyowna' mdopthuh.

Naan nih hava'kat avah asuwn, tidit tah naan nih rinko'owi kcha' rek rekki tyattraanna' avah perteel chaan tinu ungta ava ngi naan athung inni talu mupthuh a: Ava ngi adaksaan avah kpertleu chaan tinu, plungthit le' ningqit thlowi'in tinu, kdung ngi tngeina' plung le' plung kluwt avah thlowi chaan tinu ungta a'raalin ka'am kmah ngi tipchiir rah ngei intinu. Hava' dow rek mkheng ava' 'leenni naan nih adaksaan avah kertleu inping tidit apandan chaak dok inna.

Avaleiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih kjityow ring karmak ktlow mii ava' qhatna' rah mditmata miikhat tih m'leen nih karmak mdotlot mii ava' qhatna' rah kdokjit pemeh. Pdainu naan nih Isowr miksut thung ngi adotrin chaakin ava' mkandanna' rang ki thenni kdokjit chaak.

Avaleiyi, neenna naan aplung ngamin thung ngi kuplungin kngam kcha' a. Mleiya naan akheng inni, Taitas pthla adoparngat chaakin ungta mma' kanpat chaak ava ngi neenna kerkheelsi ngi kanpa kchaan ping.

Mleiya neiyi Taitas hinni naan aleiyi talutalu 'leen yoso kpirlin chaak leiyi, neiya kningkyak meh. Pdainu neen nih naan ahinin nih dow mkheng avah kindit tih kdothe chaakin leiyi, Taitas hinni neen kpirlin chaakin ava' rukka mkindit kat ava'.

Ungta naan akheng inni tethe adopqowiyin ava' mbinphaak chaak thung ngi Taitas tih naan avah kerkheelsi ngi von'adotapsat chaakin. Mleiya naan nih mma' avah ningqit tih kunchuwn kchang ngi ado'arlaan chaakin avah mdobinphaak chaak.
Neiya dow mkheng thuh naan a'leen nih kuplungkrip kdothlowi chaak leiyi, kanpa kcha' ping.
Hava' han'tun nih ku'uknau rek Isowr rih Mesedonia ki lamrinlop rek hinni plungnee mdopiik chaak lam avah naan nih adodeh raan kdongei chaakin.
Mmaan nah tyatraanna' tya ngi perteel lamda pdainu mmaan nah kdung ngi kanpa kcha'lam. Ungta kdung ngi srah kurthuwk chlamda pdainu mmaan nih kdung ngi knem mih mdopiikdeh chaakin.
Mleiya mmaan nih mdopchaan inya knem mih mpiik inna tidit avah neiyi sakhi kpiik chaak a. Mmaan nih muplungbin chaakin dilkqowiyi mdopiik pchaanin thungki kerkheel lih mdopiik chaakin.
Mleiya neen nih plungnee kdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ungta miikenje rek thenni lopkhat kurthuwna' ava' thung ngi mmaan then ruk ma'amna' rah kihinin nih kdung ngi ktham chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih havah neen nih tbinpsukin hep daat chrel lih mdotlotin pemeh pdainu mmaan nih rukrirep pih mdakin avah Isowr hinni kakparlaan chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi mdakin avah neen kihinin rukku kakparlaan kcha'lam.
Avaleiyi, neen nih Taitas rukku mma ngi mdopqhun dok avah anto'hepjik ki naan athung ngi plungnee ki chla thung ngi mdopqutna' rang ki thenni kdoksow chaakin.

Avaleiyi, naan nih dow mkheng 'leenni apleet chaakin heppi, tidit tah lamrin 'leenni, tpauna' 'leenni, tedeh pinditna' 'leenni, ungta ardarowna' mkheng 'leenni ungta neen vonsat adotolow chaakin 'leenni ungta naan nih hava' plungneena' 'leen rukku kepleet kchaan ping mow, tidit ruk asuwn.
Neiyi paureen heppi ahinin nih kdothe pemeh pdainu mii morson rek ardarow tu' kpinqim chaak thung ngi naan avonsatin avah trinchaak krow a tidit tih kdoperteel chaakna'.

Mleiya naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista plungnee avah adodeh pindit chaak dokin. Mleiya Mma ngi svang kurthuwk chleek yoso naan athen inni srah kurthuwk chda. Mleiya Mma' sraht thuh ar'aang ngi naan nih svang athuh chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma' avah srah thuwk chda.

Ungta 'tunnu naan ahinin nih nei kpauthe chaak avah hava', tidit tah havah naan athen inni mqhatna'. Mleiya jaankum muh naan nih tpiik chaakna' 'leenni mkhatnaan ptih. Naanna ktlow daat mda tpiik chaakna' kngei rekin ptih.
'Tunnu avaleiyi naan adotlotin avah apurtluwm dokin. Mleiya naanna ktlow rang ngi ka'am dok ungta kbin dok kcha' rekin ptih. Ava' heppi naan nih adothlowi chaakin ava' thung ngi apurtluwm chaan.
Mleiya mkhatna' thung ngi kpiinuwm kcha'ki plungbin ma'am bih, mdothlowima thungki kma' mdothlowi chaakya thungki ngi tpiik chaak avah trotpiik krow.
Mleiya havah neiyi morson rekka po'ol thida naan daat abowrin kdopri nuwm lei pemeh.
