Pdainu mkinqimsapna' rang ki then, tidit tah mkinqimsapna' raan ki thenni naanki apleetna' rekin thungki ngi mmaan doptat ava' pordonda ungta mmaan pleetna' thungki ngi naan aptatnaan kpordon rah.
Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mleiya knempok ki kpurkuwk kcha' mma' ava ngi kepte ngi thlowi meh. Ungta mnau'suwn daat kpurkuwk kcha' mma' ava' rukku pta meh.” (Mpk. 16:18)
Pdainu Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso. Mleiya ava' hep ardarow avah Mma ngi Taitas plung thung ngi naan athenni thiik piikda.
Mleiya mma ngi neen kdoksown avah mdorot chaak ungta mma ngi kerkheel set tih totlot rah mdongei chaak. Ungta mma ngi muplungbin chaak dilkqowiyi naan ahin nih kthleng kcha'.
Ungta neen nih mma' tu' lamrinlop mkheng ngi kqhapaumin thung ngi mdopanpaak sapin, nu'unnau'in avah kapthlatsap chaak inna.

Ungta ava' daat kmah ngi, naan nih adopiik dokin plungnee ki chla ava' tu' neen karlak inni kchetsap rang ngi lamrinlop rekki mma' avah mdokcholin. Mleiya naan nih Kruwng mdakkat adokyat chaak inni tbom chaakna' 'leenni ardarown adotedet chaak naan chla avah neen nih kqha ngi them chnikaandi'.
Neen nih kuwmiikhat tih hava' chla knempa ava' sopkdolot chaakin 'leenni mdotupsul raan ava' toloi chaak rah kdongeiyin.
Ava' tu' korthlop pih neen nih kindit deek ki Kruwng aang daat kma' mii rek aang rukku totlot rah kdongei chaakin.

Ungta neen nih dow knempok 'leenni naan athenni muplung mupluw tlit tah tidit tih kdoperteel tlit chaakin, ku'uknau'in avah mmaanve tu' kapthlat chaak inna. Ungta 'tunnu neen nih, naan a'leen nih kdung ngi plungkrip kdothlowi chaakin leiyi, kerkheelset tih mmah muplung kluwt kcha' a.

'Tunnu Taitas leiyi, kjit chnih. Mma' avah nei kmiiqhi ungta naan arlak inni nei knonglowqhi khat. Ungta 'tunnu nu'unnau rekin leiyi, kjit chnowl nih. Mmaanve a lamrinlop rek kchangkdon lam ungta mmaanve a Khrista konlor chaakna' lam.
Avaleiyi, hava' mii rek ava' hinni naan avonsatin avah atedetin. Ungta neen nih naan aleiyi kpirlin chaak naan mlei avah atedetin ungta lamrinlop rek hin rukku havah atedetin.
'Tunnu naan ahin nih miikenje rek hinni soptolow chaakna' leiyu kdokjit rang avah msit ammeh.

Mleiya neiyi naan ardarown avah kdodeh chaak dok ungta avaleiyi Mesedonia ki mii rek hinni kpirlin kchaam ping. Neiyi hanto' kdothe: ‘Mleiya Akhaia paamkuwl ki mii rekka jaankum kum mih kkorthlowng kcha' doklam’, kdodit. Ungta naan nih kdung ngi arda krok ki adotlotin ava ngi mii knempok plung avah mdopunchul.

Anto'daat yoso, naan aleiyi neen kpirlin chaakin avah msit ktaak mkurthuh mana' rang ki thenni neiyi unau rek avah kdopthlat chaak lam. Hava' leiyi, tidit tah neiyi kdothe chaak ava' heppi naan nih akorthlonna' raan ki thenni mmaan avah kdopthlat chaak lam.

Mditma bih, Mesedonia ki mii rektu' naan ahin nih kthlen bih, ungta mmaan nih naan avah korthlong kmah ngi ka'am atedeh khotin bih, neen nih naan ahin nih dokhatleh ki mlei kthe kma'pa ngi kpirlin chaakin leiyi, ningkya duh nikaandi'.

Avaleiyi, neiyi unau rek toksow rang avah msit ka'am rek rekki bin chnuh, avaleiyi mmaan avah mduh thah naan ahin nih kdosi lam. Mleiya naan nih pau'adoreel dokin kurkhum chla avah adopqut dokna' raan ungta naan akorthlonin avah mkurkhumna' rah kdosi lam. Naan nih havah kepner rih adopiik raan pemeh pdainu plung kertleu vih suwqhat tu' adopiik chaak raan.
Pdainu neiyi hava' kthe a. Mleiya arsitda kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi kirsit tih kurkun chrah. Ungta kepleet tih kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi kepleet tih kurkun chrah.

Ava' vah mii khimkheiyi muplungril lih tpiik chaak rah mdobin chaak dilkqowiyi mdopiik chaak rah. Ungta mma ngi mpiiknuwmma arlaan nih, mditmata tpiikmah krow kmah ngi mdopiik rang pemeh. Mleiya Isowr rih kanpa kanpa ngi kpii kcha' rek avah vonsat mdolow chaak.

Ungta Isowr rih naan athenni plungnee mkheng avah kepleet tih adotpiik pchaanin. Mleiya naan nih adoptatin ktaak ki mpha ktai thung ngi dow mkheng adothlowina' raan mdotlot pchaan. Mdit bih naan nih kqhanong totlot chaak avah pchaang pok chnaandi'.
Tikjit ava ngi hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma ngi arjeipok chda ungta srah rek hinni pii chda. Ungta Mma' rinkinditna' avah ktlangknai kma' ki thenni ka'am.” (Luw. 112:9)

'Tunnu chii kapqaupa ava' hinni chiimuw kpii Mma' ava ngi thenpen rukka naan athendam raan ki thenni akpii chraan. Ungta Mma ngi achiipqau'in avah kepnem rah ungta arinkindit naanki mchei rek avah akperkheel setset piik chraan.

Mleiya naan nih knem knem mih adopiik pchaanna' raan ki thenni dow khimkhei thuh Mma ngi naan avah tepleetna' mkheng thuh svang akupthuh raan. Ungta ava ngi neen nih Isowr hinni tpanpaakna midotpiik chaakin.
Mleiya naan nih hava' soplowna' adotlot chaakin ava ngi miikenje rek dokriin rek mdopordon chaak rang daat mda mii knempok ki kdung ngi Isowr avah kpanpaak chlam rah.

Mleiya hava' soplowna' adotlotin ava ngi mdopandan nih mii rekki Isowr avah kpanpaak chlam rah. Ungta tethe kopqowi deek ki Khrista ki kqhapaumin thung ngi akerthethut chaak inni ungta naanki aplungtlai inni mmaan tu' ungta mii khimkhei tu' athenin adoporlon chaakin leiyi, mii rekki Isowr avah kpanpaak chlam rah.
Ungta Isowr ki kerkheelset plungnee avah naan athung inni ma'am leiyi naan plung akopdon kcha' rek inni plung kluwt tih naan athen inni rinktham chlamda.
'Tunnu Mma' ki tethe pchaanmah chla ava' ki thenni Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso.

'Tunnu Paul neiyi Khrista ki plungdown le' plungperneem ava ngi akoksow chaak inna. Ungta neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thung ngu neiya kuplung kdil pdainu ahinin nih ka'amma thung ngu naan aktong thah kuplung kraang.

Pdainu akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thung ngi mii angqhe rek trisan rah kdobin nih plung kraang ngi ta'amna' rah plung kdopri chaak. Mleiya mmaan nih mii rek amnow ngi neen rukka ka'am mih mbininda. Neiyi hava' heppi plung kraang ngi ka'am mana' rah akaktham chaak inna.
Mleiya neenna daksa ngi kringin pimin pdainu dultimii nowpa dilkqowiyi raal avah tnaakin pemeh.
Mleiya neenki nraaldona avah dultimii ki pemeh pdainu raalrowng tekqhe pchaanna' rang ki Isowr hinki ruhtanna' ava'.

Mleiya Isowr luwkinritna' ptengda mthina kakparthaan kcha' dultimii ki plungbin rek khimkhei avah avarpthiin. Ungta plungbin rek khimkhei avah Khrista ki tethe topqowina' kurduh ngi rowngmii ngi athipthiin.
Ungta naan nih, naanki tethe topqowina' thung ngi akurkhum dokin bih, neen nih tethe topqowimana' ki nong mkheng rek avah mraal suwkthuhna' tpiikna' raan tkorthlon chaak raan.

Naan nih dow rek avah mduwn ki mruwngchen chrel daat adosutin mow? Kuwmiikhat tih mdak avah Khrista hinni ka'am ping tidit mkilrin chaak bih, mma ngi avah kornowl lih abin chso. Mleiya mma ngi Khrista hinni ma'am chaak heppi neen rukka Khrista hinni ka'am imping tidit abin chso.
Mleiya neiyi hava' ruhtanna' leiyi, mruk kpirlin chyo ringngi kningkyakmeh. Mleiya hava' ruhtanna' avah naan akenvei chaakna' raan ki mda naan apqhanna' raan ki thenni Kruwng ngi midotpiik chaakin.
Mleiya mii rekki neiyi naan avah, nei kpaukjit rek ava ngi akipqit inna tidit tih mdobin raan avah kdongei pemeh.
Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih, ‘Paul paukjit rekka krik reen nah mditmata kapchai reen nah, pdainu mdakka taluruk pemeh ungta mpauthe avah msit ka'am pemeh,’ kdikrow.
Ava' hep mii ava' vah hava' abin chso, tidit tah neen nih ndak na'amma thung ngu neen nih pauna rek avah paukjit tih tikjitlu. Ungta ndak na'am thung vah ava' heppi mnong ngi totlot'lu.

Mleiya neen nih mthinaan nih kpalqhat kcha' rek mmaan tung ngi kdakin avah khatsap pih tpinqim mditmata tportol chaakna' ruhtan thlowi maan ring. Pdainu mdakin msingreel inni kpertet kcha' ungta mdakin msingreel inni kportol kcha' mmaan avah kinrit lam pemeh.

Pdainu neenna Isowr rih mdopelreen dok ava' han'tun nih pirlin chnimaan ring. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih Isowr rih mdotthem piikin knongrit inki dilkqowiyi kpirlin kcha' inping. Ungta hava' tpertetna' ava ngi naan rukka adotphaak chaakin.
Mleiya neen nih naan adokphaakna' raan ki thenni kerkheel reen nih kirjida nong kdotlotin pemeh. Mleiya dakat tih neen nih naan akpha ngi Khrista ki kqhapaumin ava' tu' ahinin nih kthleng inping.

Neen nih kthen raan kerkheel lih dow rek 'leenni kpirlinin pmaanring. Mleiya neen nih mii morson nongtlot chaak leiyi, pirlin chmaan ring. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih hava' plungbinpsuk kdothlowi chaakin. Mleiya naan alamrinin kerkheel setset ava ngi naan arlak inni neen knongtlot chaak raan avah Isowr rih kperkheel seset rah.
Mleiya havah neen nih kqhapaumin avah naan aheihin inni kdoparjaam chaakna' raan ki then. Ungta neen nih mii morson nih mdopqut chaak dok nong 'leenni kpirlin chaakmana' raan ki then.
Pdainu “kpirlin kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni ikpirlin chso.” (Jer. 9:24)
Mleiya Kruwng ngi mthina kakpanpaak kcha' mii avah mdorot piik pemeh. Pdainu Kruwng ngi mdopanpaak mii avah trot ruk mdorot chaak.
O, neiyi kokmow chaak thung rukku naan nih mnau'suwn a adotidiil chaak raan avah ngei chnuh ungta dakat tih tidiil ruk mdiil chaan tinu.

Mleiya neiyi naan avah Isowr hinki tepnerna' ava ngi adokepner chaakin. Mleiya neiyi naan avah kchiir nlakinrim khat tih adokparlaanna' raanni, innpu khat tidit tah Khrista hinni pau kdopthlen chaak dok.
Pdainu Pruwl ava ngi Eve avah mma' ki tepmenna' ava ngi mdohuwn chaak heppi naan rukka Khrista hinni plungkrip adohor chaakin thungki akuhuwng chraan binnu. neiya kningkqi a.

Mleiya miikhat ithlengso neen nih kdoparjaamin ava' kma' Jisu msik khat kparjaam krow. Mditmata naan nih ado'arlaan dokin ava' kma' pthla msik khat karlaang krown ptih. Mditmata naan nih adorot chaak dokin ava' kma' kthapaumin msik khat arot chaak dokin bih, naan nih ava' tu' ko'oltek ki kilqhi kcha'in imptih.
Mleiya neiya tamsi klin rek arlak ki mikdilsi khat ping kirdi chmaang.
Neiyi tpauna' 'leenni kurchuk myow rih, tedeh pinditna' 'leenni ptamaang. Ungta neen nih dow mkheng thung ngi ahinin nih kqhajik ki kdopandan chaakin.
Neiyi naan ahin nih, Isowr ki kqhapaumin mkhon ktaak ki kdoparjaamna' thung ngi naan aparthaanna' raan ki thenni kpirdil kcha' ping, ava'leiyi neiya pnu kerve mow?
Neiyi naan sop'adoklow chaakna' raan ki thenni kardaman mdotpiik chaak lam ava ngi lamrinlop morson rek avah kdo'alrowt chaak lam.

Neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thung ngi kikriinna' ka'am pdainu kuwkhat leh bowr prik chmaang. Mleiya Mesedonia ki kthleng ku'uknau rekki kikriin rek avah kurkhumjik ki mdotpordon piiklam. Neiyi naan kuwkhat leh bowr kdopri mana' rah, dow mkheng 'leenni neiya kkilrin kcha' ping ungta neiya hanto' heppi kilrin tlit chnikdi'.
Khrista ki kindit ava' nei kthung ngi ma'am leiyi Akhaia paamkuwl rek thung ngi kpirlin chaakna' 'leenni kuwkhat leh ngi mapkhaan nimeh.
Havah talulei? Neiyi naan vonsat adoklowmaan lei mow? Avah Isowr rih mdeh!

Mleiya neiyi neen kehep inni mii rekki mdobin raan kngei kcha' mmaan ava ngi mpirlin chaak naan dow rek 'leenni mpirlin chaakna' raan ki m'lam ava' kdoreen pthina' rah neiyi kdotlot avah tlow tlit chdaat nikdi'.
Mleiya avale' avah mdak inni Khrista tamsi rek hepleek ki mmeel kperthleng mlangkma' tamsi rekle' tuhuwn chaakna' nong ktlow reklam.
Ungta havah tngana'lu pemeh, tidit tah Seitan mdakkat tih mar'aang ki vaantamsi heppi mmeel perthlengda.

Avaleiyi, mma' sopklow kcha' rek ava ngi, rinkinditna' ki sopklow kcha' rek heppi, mkerthlen chaakin avah tngana' rah ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mmaan rinkum qutna' avah mnongtlot rekin ava' dilkqowijik daat rah.

Neiyi veikhat kthe chaak nowl a tidit tah kuwkhat leh ngi neiya kokmok ki mbin mso. Pdainu mma ngi anto' heppi mtibin chaak rukku, neiyi mnau'suwn kpirlin chaakna' rah kokmok khat mdo'arlaan chaak heppi mhei'arlaan chso.
Neiyi havah tpirlin chaakna' ki hava' plungkrip kthlowi kcha' dothe ngi kdothe Kruwng dothe dilkqowiyi kdothe pemeh pdainu kokmok khat pau vih, kdothe chaak.
Mii knempok ki daksa lam thah mpirlin chaakin kdodeh ngi nei rukka ava' heppi kpirlin kcha' ping.
Mleiya naan nih akindit reen inni kokmok rek tung ngi kanpa ngi adodiil chaak sapin.
Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih suwk'owr apthutin yoso, akcha dokin yoso, ahinin ki lou chdok yoso, mthina kpirlin chyoso ungta amai thaan nih atpeengin yoso, naan nih hava'le' mkheng avah adodiil chaakin.

Mleiya neenna ava' ki thenvah kdungreen nih kruhn kdowng, neiya havah kningkya chaak ki kdothe. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih ava' ki thenni plung kraang mkurthuh bih, nei rukka kuplung kraang. Neiyi havah kokmok ki kdothe.
Mmaan nah Hibriu lam mow? Mdit bih nei ruk Hibriu ping. Mmaan nah Isreel lam mow? Mdit bih nei ruk Isreel ping. Mmaan nah Abraham rilam thungki lam mow? Mdit bih nei ruk Abraham rilam thungki ping.

Mmaan nah Khrista sopklow kcha' rek lam mow? Mdit bih nei rukka Khrista sopklow kcha' khat ping. Neiyi havah kokmok khat dothe ngi kthe'a. Mleiya neiyi mmaan dolow han'tun nih knem mih nong kdolow chaak. Neiya ttai pchaanmah ngi mdote'e chaak lam, rowng'inn thung rukku neiya knemsi ngi mdotkhum chaak lam ungta veityaveitya thung ngi neiya kdiyousou kdiyousou ping.
Jihudi rekki neiya mden parngatet thung ngi veisomplii thungki veikhat ktla ngi mdotarvai lam.

Veikdumtet thung ngi neiya thiir kchung ngi mbun lamda. Veikhat lung ngi mdeeng lamda. Veikdumtet thung ngi ktuwnna' arkuwngpii avah dii thung ngi plupda. Neiyi jaan khat le' kunthun niikhat thung ngi dii'leen daat tih am chnuh.

Neiya kdet liit kmah ngi pjiinptlowng nuh ka'am ping. Dii 'leenni suwk thuwknu, raanqhul kupru rekki molrowt chlamda. Ungta kpaamki kmii rekki suwk mupthuwk chlamda ungta Chaatktlei rek rukku suwk mupthuwk chlamda. Ungta khuwpii thung ngi suwk thuwk chnuh ungta paamkbiik laiyi rukku suwk thuwk chnuh. Ungta mlangkma' unau rekki suwk mupthuwk chlamda.

Neiyi thamlownu kdung ngi nong lou chnuh ungta jaan tyatya thung ngi ki'iip kmah ngi jaan ranu. Powitham mih mlouda, diikang ngi mlouda ungta kthen chaak rah ktaak ki then ngowl nuh. Siktbub pih mlouda ungta kbuwdiir naak rah ammda.
Hava'le' han'tun nih mniiktaiyi neiya lamrinlop rekki thenni kuplung yachda. Ungta hava' kdobin ava ngi neiya mporkol tlit chda.
Kuwda mruh kdowng nga ungta ava' thuh nei rukka kruh kdowng pemeh mow? Ungta khuhsiir mdotpirthitin mmaan avah kuw le'da ungta ava' thuh neiya kril lih kuplungkthi kma' mow?
Neiyi kpirlin chaak rang bih, nei kruhdown kandanna' dow rek 'leen daat tih pirlin chnikdi'.
Neiyi plei kdoneema avah Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ava ngi mdeh. Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah tponlor chaak ki i'amso.
Damaskas thung ngi paamkruwng Arestas kurduh ngi ka'am paamkpu ava ngi Damaskas khuwpii ki mii rek avah rung lamda. Mma ngi neiya tokyown rah mbinda.
Pdainu neiya rii bowr thuh mdaal lamda ungta khirkiik thung ngi khuwpii bang duwn thah maptla lamda ava ngi neiya mma' khut thungki kerthlet chngaal ping.
Tpirlin chaak ki kthen nih msit amna' ka'am pemeh pdainu pirlin chdaat nikdi'. Mleiya Kruwng ngi rinmer rek mepdehda ungta kihin nih dow rek avah mtupurphuwn piik a.

Neiyi kum sowm leiplii duh thah Khrista hinni miikhat deinu. Mii avah daksa ki mii mow mditmata daksa ki mii kma' mow tidit ruk deimaang. Isowr rih avah mdeh. Ava' hep mii avah mukdumna' parvaan thah arjuklou chda.
Ungta ava' mii avah neiyi kdeh, mma' avah daksa ki mii mow, mditmata daksa ki mii kma' mow tidit tah deimaang. Isowr rih avah mdeh.
Mma' avah kanpamun thah mdo’arjuk loww dokda. Ungta mma ngi nerh rih tethethut pchaanmah pauna rek avah arja chda.
Neiya hava' hep ki mleiyi pirlin chnikdi' pdainu nei kdak leivah kruhdownna' reklei kma'don pirlin chnimaang.

Pdainu neiyi tpirlin chaak rah ngei chyo ringngi kokmok a kurthuwk nimaang, mleiya neiyi kindit ava' kdothe. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mmik ki mdotedeh dok mditmata mdotarjaak dok ava' heihin nih mdotbin mana' rah, neiyi korjowng kcha' ping

Isowr rih nei kihin nih kepleet tih mdotpurphuwn piik leiyi, nei kdaksa thung ngi tirling khat mpiida. Neiyi kpirlin chaakmana' rah tirling havah mpiida ungta tirling havah nei mokoknok rah Seitan ava' ki pausikhu.
Mleiya hava' leiyi ava' msun chaakna' rah neiyi Kruwng hinni veikdumtet kdopnuwm chaak.

Pdainu Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kuplungnee avah nang athennu kkhop kerdei a, tidit tah Nei kruhtan avah ruhdownna' thung ngi mdopurkhum,” dida. Avaleiyi, neiyi Khrista ruhtan avah nei k'leen nih ma'amna' rang ki thenni neiyi kruhdownna' rek thung ngi kanpadok ki pirlin chnikdi'.

Avaleiyi, Khrista ki thenni neiya kruhdownna' rek thung ngi, ningkya kdut chaak thung ngi, kikriin chaak thung ngi, kyar chiireelna' thung ngi ungta tparsatna' rekki mtikchi lam thung ngi kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya neiya kruh mdown cheu ava' dilli kruh ktang kcha'lu.

Tpirlin chaakna' 'leennu neiya kokmok kcha' ping, avah naan nih adotoptlotin. Mleiya naanvah neiya adotapqhat chaakkat raan, tidit tah neiyi taluruk kma' khat kurthuwk chyo ringngi, neiya tamsi mkenreelsi rek arlak ki msit ktaak laang pmaang.
Mkindit kat tih neiyi naan arlak inni tidiil chaakna' mkheng tu' korthlop pih, titinna' rek, tngana' nong rek ungta ruhtannong rek tlownu tamsi khat ki mikbih avah kdopandan chaak.
Talulu'leen katda, naan nih lamrinlop morson rek arlak ki ajuwm chaak naanna? Nei kdak ki naan abowrin riina' kdotlotma lei mow? Hava' kdoparma leivah mheiptlot piik chaan.

Asuwn, neiya naan akveel raanni mveikdumna' kthleng rang ngi ka'am imping. Pdainu neiyi naan abowrin prik chnimaang tidit tah neiya naan nih adothlowiyin ava' ngei maang, pdainu naan adakin. Mleiya mnau le' ava ngi mnuhmpa ki thenni mdopurtuwl rang pemeh pdainu mnuhmpa ngi mnau le' thenni mdopurtuwl rah.

Ungta neiyi kdothlowi chaak mkheng avah naan apthlarin rekin ki thenni kanpa ngi pchet chnikdi' ungta kdak kpha rukka pchet chnikdi'. Pdainu neiyi kdung ngi vonsat alow chyown rih naanvah mnau'suwn daat vonsat mlow chaan tinu.
Ungta ava ngi mkindit kurthuwk daat yoso neiyi abowr inna prik chmaang. Anto' pdainu pnerthitna' ava ngi adoktepmen dokin.
Neiyi naan ahin nih kdopthlat rek mmaan ava'leiyi naan a'leen nih changqhatna' klow ngaal mow?

Neiyi Taitas avah pnuwm chnuh mma' tu' nu'unnau'in avah kdoheipthlat. Taitas tih a'leenin nih changqhatna' mlow ngaal mow? Neen nih pthla khadaat thung ngi chet chmaan ring mow? Neen nih kal khatsap khiingmaan ring mow?

Ungta veikhat nowl lih naan nih hava' mpha mkheng thuh neenna, naan ahin nih kparkhaan kcha' tlit tih atbinin mow? Neen nih Isowr aang ngi Khrista hinni kthe chaak inna, tidit tah neen nih vonsat adoklow chaakin. Pdainu neen nih hava' dow mkheng avah naan apqhan chaakna' raan ki thenni kdotheen.

Mleiya neiyi ahinin nih kthlen thung ngi, kuplungbin heppi adei mnikaan mow mditmata nei rukka aplungbinin heppi mdei mnaan mow, kdi ngi kningkqi'a. Mditma bih, kalraikerthe, kperner, plungthit, mthen daat kbin, khowdan kerthe, titii knei, kpirlin kcha' vaangklum hava'lu rekpa ka'am krow.

Mditma bih, neiyi veikhat ahinin nih kthlen nowl thung ngi naan a'aang inni, neiki Isowr rih neiya maijuwm mikpii chrah binnu kningkqi'a. Mleiya choduh ngi mii knempok ki pnu arvei chlamda. Mleiya mmaan nih, tkertleumana', jowltpurjutna', tekterdeuna' rek thungki plung perthleng chlam mda ungta avale' leiyi neiya qap chmun nikdi'.
naan ahin nih kthlen rang avah hava ngi mveikdumna' rah. “Mii 'knii mditmata kdum nerh rih mdothethut sakhi rek ava ngi pauna avah tapqhan rah.” (Knl. 19:15)

Neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thuh adokpilqhit dokin, 'tunnu neiya ahinin nih mveiknitna' ka'am hephep pih 'tun mduh thah kthe a. 'Tunnu ka'am pingpse, neiyi pnu kervei kcha' mmaan ava' hinni ungta morson mkheng rek hinni kikjit chaak a. Mleiya neiyi veikhat kthlen thung vah mmaan avah parkhaal daat lam nimaang ungta neiyi morson rek rukka parkhaal lam nimaang.
Ungta naan nih nei kthung ngi Khrista kpau tidit ki mkandanna' mlei adothlaamin leiyi, hava' kthe a. Khrista avah naan athen inni mruh kdowng pemeh pdainu naan athung ngi mruh ktang.

Mleiya Mma' avah ruhdownna' thung ngi pthowi chleek lam yoso, Isowr ruhtan nih Mmah ring chda. Mleiya neen rukka Mma' hinni kruhn kdowng pdainu naan athenin qhatna' rang ngi Isowr ruhtan nih Mma' tu' ring chnikaandi'.

Naan nih, lamrin thuh ka'am kchaan ptimow, tidit avah athinaan nih ikperteel chaan ungta ikterdet chaan. Mleiya naan avah dakat tih adoteknen pthi dokin kma'don Jisu Khrista avah naan athung inni ka'am tidit avah adak inni kqhajik ki dei chmaan timow?
Pdainu neenna midoteknen chaakin pemeh tidit avah naan nih deinaandi', kdi ngi neiya lamkrin chaak a.

'Tunnu naan nih kthi adotlotmana' raan ki thenni, Isowr hinni rinkaktham kchaam ping. Mleiya, neen avah taknenpthi dok heppi kandang chyomin, neen nih trotpiik dok heppi tkandanna' rang mda mkindit ava' adotlot chaakna' raan ki thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping.
Mleiya neen nih kindit ava' kepteng ngi dow khatleh totlot pchaanin nimeh pdainu kindit ava' ki thenni totlot chaak rah.
Mleiya neen kruhdownin thung ngi naan aruhn ktang, hava' leiyi neenna kanpa kchaan ping. Ungta naan avah adotpurkhum chaakna' raan ki then rukku rinkaktham kchaan ping.

Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen thung ngi, Kruwng ngi nei kihin nih mdotpiik ruhtanna', tidit tah naan adokupkuina' raan ki then mda naan adokapqhanna' raan ki thenni mdotpiik ruhtanna' avah neiyi plungthit tih kdosinton mana' rang leiyi, neiyi ahinin nih ka'amma thung ngi hava' dow rek avah kdokjit chaak.

Mqutna' thung ngi ku'uknau rek akkurvuwi chaak inna. Naanna ikurkhum dei chaan ungta plungngam kqha ngi ikirpiideiyin. Plungbin khatsap pih i'amin ungta plung kdaiyi ipaalin. Ungta vonsat le' plung kdai ki Isowr ava ngi naanna ayu'amqhi chaanso.
Naan nih khat le' khat avah kchiir kurputna' ava ngi ikurput chaan.
Miikenje mkheng rekki aturvuwi chaak inna.
Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ungta Isowr vonsat ungta Pthla Kchiir do'amqhi avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso, Amen.
Paul neiya dultimii rek hinki mditmata miikhat dosi tamsi pmaang, pdainu Jisu Khrista ungta kdiyou thungki Mma' kperdel, Pa Isowr ava' ar'aang ngi tamsi khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
Ungta neiyi kdo'amqhi unau rek mkheng tu' kilqhi ngi, Galatia thuh ka'am lamrinlop rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
Pa Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso!
Mleiya neenki Isowr ungta Npa ava' plungbin dilkqowiyi neen avah 'tunpha ki kqha kma' mpha ava' thung ki midotsanna' raan ki thenni, Jisu Khrista mdakkat tih neen nupnu rekin leiyi, kparlaan chda.
Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ngi tponlor chaak ki ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
Naan nih, Khrista hinki plungnee thung ngi ayuko'own kchaan Mma' hinki kbeisek ki kqhapaumin ktlei khat thah akerheel teng chaakin avah neiya kningkngak kcha' a.
Havah kqhapaumin morson khatvot pemeh, pdainu havah naan aplungin kparmak ungta Khrista ki kqhapaumin ava' lehkpunluk nuwm mii aangqhe ka'am lam a.

Pdainu neen nih parjaam jown rih mditmata parvaan ki vaantamsi khat tih ahinin nih kqhapaumin ktlei khat parjaam yoso, neen nih naan ahin nih kdoparjaam dokin ava' kma' kthe avah Isowr rih pauhor kbuk rah.

Choduh ngi ahinin nih kdothe dokin heppi 'tun veikhat neiyi kthe chaak nowl a. Kuwmiikhat, neen nih kdo'arlaan chaakin ava' tu' lehkunluk ki kqhapaumin ktlei khat, naan ahinin nih kparjaam kcha' mma' avah Isowr rih pauhor kbuk rah.

Mleiya 'tunnu neiya dultimii dongeina' rah tlow nikmow, mditmata Isowr dongeina' rah tlow nikdi' o? Mmow, neiyi dultimii rek plung ngamna' thlaam nikdi o? Mleiya neiyi 'tun kpha thung ngi dultimii rek plung ngamna' ktlot chaak tlit daat bih, neiya Khrista ki suwk'owr khat kurthuwk rang pmaang.
Pdainu, ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahinin nih adokparjaak dokin, tidit tah neiyi naan ahin nih kdoparjaam chaak kqhapaumin avah dultimii plungbin dilkqowiyi kdoparjaam pemeh.
Mleiya neiyi avah dultimii hinki kdo'arlaan pemeh mditmata mukpurchuk ruk ka'am pemeh pdainu Jisu Khrista ngi mdotpurphuwn piik.

Mleiya Jihudi rin'owi thung ngi ka'am thungki choduh ki nei krinchan, avah naan nih ado'arjaak dokin. Mleiya tethena' ktaak ki neiyi taluhep pih Isowr lamrinlop tyat chiireelna' piilam nuh ungta mmaan avah kpenvei rah kthelam, tidit avah ado'arjaak dokin.
Ungta neiya, kmii rek arlak ki, kepkep knempok rek heihin nih Jihudi rin'owina' thung ngi kdung ngi ru'arvanrih nuh ungta neiya kpa le' nowpa thung ngi kdung ngi kepner rih arvan amnu karvang ping.
Pdainu Isowr plungngam mkurthuh thungta, knuh powithuh ka'am daat arlaan nih neiya mpenje chda ungta Mma' plungnee ar'aang ngi neiya mo'own chda.
Neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinni Mma' leiki kqhapaumin ava' kdoparjaam chaakna' rang ki thenni Mchapa avah kihin nih mkurphuwn piik chda. Pdainu neiyi kbeisek ki dultimii kuwkhat leh tu' kerseel chmaang.
Mditmata neiyi kduh thah tamsi kurthuwk ksadok rek kpha rah Jerusalem khuwpii thang ruk hang maang. Pdainu neiyi Arabia paam thah chetnu ungta veikhat Damaskas khuwpii thah kenle nowl nuh.
Audilli kum kdum dilthah neiyi Pitar tu' kkerdehna' rah Jerusalem khuwpii thah hang nuh ungta mma' tu' nii sowm leiparnga thuh amveen nuh.
Pdainu neiyi Kruwng naupa James kma'don morson khatleh deilam maang.
'Tunnu naan ahinin nih neiyi kdokjit dow rek avah kindit tih asuwn, Isowr maiyi neiya pleinei chmaang.
Ava' dilli neiyi Siria le' Silisia paamkuwl rek thah chetnu.
Pdainu Khrista hinni ka'am Judia paamkuwl ki lamrinlop rekvah neiya mdeipindih lam mda.

Pdainu mmaan nih: ‘Choduh neen nihin nih tyat chiireelna' mikpiin mma' ava ngi, mma ngi mpha khat thuh mdopenveina' rah mdotlot psuk lamrin avah 'tunnu mparjaam a,’ tidit ki mlei hehe daat mdo'arjaakin.
Ungta hanto ngi mmaan nih nei kthung ngi Isowr avah ponlor chlamda.
Audilli kum sowm leiplii dilthah neiyi Barnabas tu' Jerusalem khuwpii thah veikhat hangnowl nuh ungta Taitas rukka kdoqhiin.

Neiyi Isowr rih kihin nih mdotpurphuwn piik ava' kdo'arthaanna ngi kahang ping. Ungta neiyi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki chetnu kdoparjaam kqhapaumin ava' ki mlei avah mmaan hinni kdothe pindit chaak. Pdainu neiyi havah msit ktaak ki kchemana' rah mditmata arvang kchen dok kkurthuh mana' rah, mmaan arlak ki miikenreel betbet tih kdodeh rek hinni msik ki kdothe pindit chaak.
Anto'daat yoso, nei tu' kkilqhi Grik mii Taitas kpha rukka, mmaan nih trin kmah vunkreen tidit tah ptlot lam nimeh.

Pdainu narlak inni mlangkma' unau rek tuprut tih kluwqhi dok ma'amin leiyi, havah kthuwk. Mleiya mmaan nih neen avah rowngmii midotupthuhna' raan ki thenni neen nih Khrista Jisu hinni nning'olna' tothlowi chaakin ava' ki mlei avah tuprut tih mdosut thlaamin.
Pdainu kqhapaumin ki kindit ava ngi neen nthung inni ma'am tlitna' rang ki thenni, mmaan hinni mpha mruk'suwn thung daat yoso takparlaan chaakin pemeh.

Pdainu kenreel mii rek heppi kandang, mmaan avah taluhep kduh kurthuwk lam yoso, nei kihin nuh mkertleina' ammeh. Mleiya Isowr rih kuwkhat leh rukka msik ki mdokarmanna' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya miikenreel heppi ka'am kcha' mmaan ava ngi, nei kihin nih mdotoppom piik lamna' ka'am pemeh.
Pdainu ava' kchang ngi vunkreen kma' rek thenni kqhapaumin avah nei kihin nih mitpiik chaak a ungta anto' heppi vunkreen kcha' rekki thenni, Pitar hinni mpiik chaak a tidit dei lamda.

Mleiya Pitar hinni vunkreen kcha' rek thenni tamsi tkurthuhna' 'leenni mruh ktang ngi nong tlotpiikda Ava' ktlot piik Mma' ava ngi, Chaatktlei rek ktong thah nei kthen nih mruh ktang ngi nong avah mdotlot piik.

Ungta kchow rek kurthuwkda takyat kurhuwiyi ka'am James le' Siphas ungta Johon leh ngi Isowr rih plungnee avah nei kihin nih mtipiik a tidit mdehn thungta Barnabas le' neiya lopkhat tkurthuhna' ki changqhat mpii chaanda. Mleiya havah neenve ngi Chaatktlei rek hinni ungta mmaan nih vunkreen rek hinni kche chaakna' raan ki then.
Mmaan nih neenve ngi srah rek kdobin phaak raan avah mdongeiyin ungta nei rukku ava'kat avah totlot rah kdongei chaak.
Pdainu Pitar rih Antiok khuwpii thah mthlen thung vah neiyi mmaiyi mma' pteng nuh krip ping, mleiya mma' avah mraal tpiik rang thah tlada.

Mleiya James hinki mii aangqhe rek mthlenduh vah mma ngi Chaatktlei rektu' chasap neesap lamda. Pdainu mma ngi mmaan mthlenin thungta, vunkreen rek mmaan ava' mdoqit chaak leiyi, kekneengda mthina kankai chda.
Ungta Jihudi mii aangqhe rek rukku mma' tu' kqha kpurhuwi kcha'sap lam. Kqha mukpurhuwi inni Barnabas kpha rukka mmaan nih qhidok lamda.

Pdainu mmaan nih kqhapaumin ki mkindit ava' dilkqowiyi kirji ngi mche naan ava' kdeh thungta, mmaan mkhengin maiyi Pitar hinni hanto' thenu: “Nang nga Jihudi khat ptih pdainu Chaatktlei rek khat heppi ka'am kcha' imptih ungta Jihudi khat heppi am mtih. Mdittu' taluhep pih nang ngi Chaatktlei rek avah Jihudi nowpa rek thung ngi raanni kpa'am rah athe a?
Neenna nrinnow inni Jihudi ngi tqou chaakin ungta pnu kervei Chaatktlei rekin pminmeh.

Neen nih ndehn tidit tah miikhat avah nowlam ki nong rek ava ngi mdopindit pemeh pdainu Jisu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ki mdopindit chaak. Avaleiyi, neen rukka nowlam ki nong rek ava' kma' Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ki midotpindit chaakna' raan ki thenni Jisu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaakin. Mleiya nowlam ki nong rek ava ngi kuwkhat leh rukka pindit nimeh.

Pdainu neen nih Khrista hinni midotpindit chaakna' raan nthlaamin arlaan nih neen ndaksaain avah pnu kervei kcha ngi kerdeiyin minnu. Mdittu' Khrista a pnu sopklow kcha' khat tidit raan? Havah anto'liit rang pemeh!
Mleiya neiyi kdo'ekre dok ksa avah veikhat ksak nowl bih, neiya kthina ngi nowlam kupkui khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
Mleiya neiyi Isowr hinni krin chaakna' rang ki thenni nowlam ar'aang ki mii, nei avah nowlam thung ngi kdiyou dok kcha' ping.

Neiya Khrista tu' kokthowive dok kcha' ping. 'Tun nei krin avah nei pmaang pdainu Khrista ngi nei kthung ngi kring. Pdainu 'tun neiyi daksa 'lam thah krinna' rinkum avah nei vonsat moklow kcha' ungta nei kthen nih Mdak mthina ngi kakparlaan kcha' Isowr Chapa Mma' ava' hinni klamrin chaak ava ngi neiya kring kcha' ping.
Neiyi Isowr plungnee avah msit ktaak ki pthitmaang. Mleiya rinkinditna' avah nowlam ar'aang ngi karvang mkurthuh bih, Khrista a msit ktaak ki kdiyou kcha' a.”

O kokmok kcha' Galatia rek! Neen nih naan ahin nih, mii rekki mdopthowi yown Jisu Khrista ki mlei avah kindit deek ki athepiik dok innu. 'Tunnu naan nih kindit ava' adopqowi mana' raan ki thenni kuw ngi naanna adotekser inno?

Neiyi naan ahinki hava' daat chrel tarjaak rah kbinna: Mleiya naan nih Pthla avah nowlam ki nong rek dilkqowiyi ado'arlaan chaakin mow, mditmata lamrin ava' ado'arjaak chaak inni ado'arlaan chaak inno?
Naanna hanto'ya ngi kokmok inptih mow? Naanna Pthla ngi pqhun chdaat thiin tinu, 'tunnu dultimii nowpa thah kurchuwl chrang ngi atlot inna?
Naanna msit ktaakpa rang ngi dow knempok 'leenni suwk arvang kthuwk kcha' daat inptih mow? Anto'kat mkurthuh bih avah msit amna' ammeh.

Mleiya Isowr rih naan ahin nih Pthla avah ayupiinda ungta naan arlak ki ruhtannong rek avah tlowda. Ava' mkurthuh u, Mma ngi avah nowlam ki nong rek ar'aang ngi avah mdotlot mow, mditmata lamrin ki tarjaak chaakna' ava' ar'aang ngi avah mdotlotto'?
Anto' heppi Abraham 'leenki avah abinphaakin. “Abraham mih Isowr lamrin chda ungta mma' hinni avah rinkinditna' ngi taipiikda.” (Rnp.15:6)
Avaleiyi, naan nih adeiyin, tidit tah lamrin thungki rek mmaan avah Abraham chapa reklam.

Ungta Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek avah lamrin nih kpindit lamrah, dida, Kchiir laika ngi mduduh thah mdodeh dok leiyi, kqhapaumin avah mduduh ngi Abraham hinni hanto'theda mdoparjaam dok: “Nang athung ngi chaat mkheng rek avah suwqhat kphang chlam rah,” mdodit. (Rnp.12:3,18:18,22:18, 26:4, 28:14)
Avaleiyi, lamrin kthlowi kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi lamkrin kcha' Abraham tu' suwqhat avah mdophan sapin.

Mleiya nowlam ki nong rek thung ngi ka'am rek mmaan avah pauhor kurduh ngi ka'am kcha'lam. Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Nowlam ki laika thung ngi totlot rang ki thenni tikjit dok dow mkheng rek ava' ktlow tlit kma' rek mmaan khimkhei rek 'leenni pauhor avah ka'am kcha' a,” mdodit. (Knl. 27:26)
Pdainu havah mkindit kat ava', Isowr aang ngi kuwkhat leh rukka nowlam ar'aang ngi pindit nimeh, tidit tah: “Mii kindit avah mlamrin nih kring chrah.” (Hab. 2:4)
Anto'daat yoso, nowlam avah lamrin thungki pemeh pdainu “Hava' mmaan ava' ktlow kcha' mii ava ngi mmaan ar'aang ngi kring chrah.” (Lev. 18:)

Khrista ngi neen nthenni pauhor kduh kcha' kurthuwkda neen avah nowlam ki pauhor ava' thung ki neenna miktlan chaanda. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Ding 'leenni kokthowi kcha' rek khimkhei rek avah pauhor kduh kcha' reklam.” (Knl. 21:23)

Mleiya Isowr rih Abraham hinni mdopiik suwqhat avah Khrista hinni, Chaatktlei rek hinni marvanna' rah, Khrista ngi neenna miktlaninda. Mleiya havah neen nih lamrin ar'aang ngi Mpaureel dok Pthla ava' tarlaan chaakna' raan ki then.

Ku'uknau rek, neiyi havah dultimii rek nowpa ngi kpau kcha' ping. Havah dultimii rekki pauqum kurthuwk chdaat yoso, kapqhang dok mkurthuh bih, kuwkhat leh ngi msit ktaak tupthut pchaang meh ungta kuwkhat leh ngi totpom ruk pchaang meh.

'Tunnu Abraham le' mma' chiimuw ava' hinni paureel rek avah mdopiik. Mma ngi chiimuw rek hinni, dimeh pdainu khadaat hinni hanto ngi mdothe: “Ungta nang achiimuw hinni,” (Rnp. 13:15, 24:7) mdodit tidit tah Mesaiah ava'.

Ungta neiyi hava' kthe'a, tidit tah Isowr rih mduduh thah Mesaiah hinni pauqum avah mdopqhan dok. Mleiya kum arja plii somkdum dil thah nowlam avah karvang pdainu nowlam ava ngi pauqum avah kneng pthimeh ungta paureel ava'ruk msit ktaak tpurthuh meh.
Mleiya alrouchomna' avah nowlam thungki mkurthuh bih, ava' avah paureel thungki kurthuwk porsonmeh. Pdainu Isowr rih Abraham hinni avah paureel ava' ar'aang ngi mdopiik.

Mdit bih, nowlam ava' vah talu plungbinrit mthlowi'a? Mleiya mpaureelna' chiimuw ava ngi murjun duh kpha ki thenni nowlam avah nowlam tupkuina' rek leiyi, mdotpom. Ungta vaantamsi rek ar'aang ngi avah mikpalqhat khat ava' khut thung ngi mdopqhan dok.
'Tunnu mikpalqhat ava ngi khadaat ki thenni mdopalqhat pemeh pdainu Isowr rah khadaat.

Mdittu' nowlam avah Isowr paureel ava' kepteng mow? Avah anto'liit pemeh! Mleiya kring kpii pchaang nowlam khat kpii dok mkurthuh bih, mkindit kat tih rinkinditna' avah nowlam ar'aang ngi kurthuwk dok thuh rah.
Pdainu Kchiir laika ngi mii mkheng avah pnu kurduh ngi daal pthida. Mleiya havah Jisu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' rek hinni paureel ava' mdopiikna' rang ki then.
Pdainu lamrin marvan duhvah neenna nowlam dorun kurduh ngi tarvan'amin. Mleiya lamrin avah talu tidit mpurphuwn duh kpha ngi neen avah nowlam kurduh ngi midotpa'amin.
Avaleiyi, lamrin nih neen avah midotpindit chaakna' raan ki thenni, nowlam avah Khrista hin thah neen mikqhiin, miksutpqowi kcha' khat ava'.
Pdainu lamrin ma'am dok dilvah, neenna miksutpqowi kcha' khat ava' kurduh ngi ta'am porsonin pemeh.
Mleiya naan akhengin avah Khrista Jisu hinni lamrinna' ava' ar'aang ngi Isowr chapa rekin ptih.
Mleiya Khrista thung ngi dii kluwt kcha' naan khimkhei ava' vah Khrista avah dona heppi anaak chaak dok inna.
Mleiya Jihudi mditmata Grik tidit ka'am pemeh, suwk'owr mditmata mii'ol tidit ka'am pemeh, snu mditmata psel tidit ka'am pemeh. Mleiya naan akhengin avah Khrista Jisu hinni khadaat inptih.
Ungta naanna Khrista dow akurthuh chaakin bih, audillu naanna Abraham suruwl rekin ptih ungta paureel dilkqowiyi piipa rekin ptih.
'Tunnu neiyi hava' kthe a: ‘Piipa ava ngi nau kdowng mkurthuh khimkhei thung ngu mma ngi mkheng kheng ki mukpu kurthuwk chdaat yoso suwk'owr khat hinki mkertleina' ka'am pemeh.
Pdainu mpa ngi, mdopelreen dok mpha ava' mphaakduh khimkhei vah mma' avah suwkkenreel rek kurduh ngi ungta inn ksutpqowi sikhu rek kurduh ngi ka'am kcha'.
Anto' heppi neen nih nau rek nkurthuhn thung ngi neenna hava' dultipaam ki tkurchuhna' rit rek thung ngi suwk'owr rih tarvan amin.
Pdainu mpha kurkhumna' kat mphaak thungta Isowr rih Mchapa avah snu khat thung ngi kqouvih ungta nowlam kurduh ngi kqouvih arjuk pthlada.
Mleiya neen avah chapa rekki midotuhum chaakna' raan ki thenni nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am rek mmaan ava' mdoktlanna' rah, Mma ngi havah mdotlot.
Ungta naan avah chapa rek akurthuhn leiyi, Isowr rih Mchapa Pthla avah naan aplungril rekin thung ngi mdo'arjuk pthlat. Pthla ava ngi, “Abba,” “Apa,” dida, owngda mdo'own chaak.

Avaleiyi, nang nga suwk'owr kurthuwk porson mtih pdainu chapa khat kurthuwk kchaam ptih. Ungta nang ngi piipa akurthuh leiyi, Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr hinki alrou kchom kcha' khat ruk kurthuwk kchaam ptih.
Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi naanna Isowr dei chmaan tinu, ungta mrinnown thung ngi isowr kma' rek mmaan ava' sop'adolow chaakin.

Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih Isowr avah adeh dok inna mditmata Isowr rih naan avah atedeh chaak dok inna. Mdittu' taluhep pih naan nih mruh kdowng rek ungta msit ktaak tkurchuhna' ava' thung ngi kerheel kcha' nowl inptih o? Taluhep pih naan nih mmaan thung ngi suwk'owr tkurthuh rah adongei nowlin?
Naan nih nit rekle' thla rek ungta kum armik rekle' kum rek avah danin tinu.
'Tunnu neiyi naan athenni knonglow chaak avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha ngi binnu, naan athenni neiya kningkqia.
Ku'uknau rek naan nih nei kehep daat akurthuhna' raan akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah nei rukka naan ahep daat khat ping. Naan nih nei k'leen nih karmak dow khatleh tlow maantih.
Naan nih adehn, tidit tah nei kdaksa 'leenki kdunksaanna' leiyi, rukrirep pih kqhapaumin avah naan ahin nih parjaam chnuh.

Nei kdunksaanna' ava ngi naan ahin nih tperteelna' khat liklik kurthuwk chyoso, naan nih neiya tukmuksut kma' mditmata mokrow kma'lu tlowvot maantih. Pdainu naan nih neiya Isowr vaantamsi khat heppi, tidit tah Khrista Jisu kat heppi marlaang chaan tinu.
Ava' naanki aplung ngamin avah 'tunnu talu kthuwk a? Mleiya neiyi sakhi kpiik chaak a, naan nih apchaanin bih, mpha ava' thung vah naan nih amikin kpha rukka khorpthida nei kihin nih mpiinaan kmah!
'Tunnu neiyi naan ahin nih kindit ava' adokthe piikin leiyi, neiya naanki amiihalin kurthuwk imping mow?

Morson rekki naan athenni kdung ngi plung mdopluw chaakin avah mqhatna' rang ki thenvot pemeh. Pdainu naan nih mmaan thenni plung kluwt tih adobinna' raan ki thenni naan avah neen kihin ki adotpenqhen raan mdongeiyin.
Pdainu neiyi naan tu' ka'am thung daat kma', mpha ktai thung ngi dow kqha 'leenni plung tupluw chaak ki kqha.
Nei knausisi rek naan, naan athung ngi Khrista avah mpermetduh khimkheiyi, neiya naan athenni veikhat nowl lih vonkchowi katrang heppi kdung kchaam ping.
Naan nih kuplung adopenqheen leiyi, 'tunnu neiya naan tu' ta'amsap rah kngei a ungta kokrowl tperthlen rah kngei a.
'Tunnu nowlam kurduh ngi ta'am rah kngei rek naan nih, nowlam mih mdothe avah deimow deimaan tio? Atheenno.
Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am. Mleiya Abraham mih chapa 'knii thlowida, chapa khat avah snu suwk'owr ava' hinki ungta ktlok khat ava ngi snu mii'ol ava' hinki.
Pdainu snu suwk'owr ava' hinki avah dultimii nowpa dilkqowiyi qou chda ungta snu mii'ol ava' hinki ava ngi paureel ava' ar'aang ngi kqou.

'Tunnu hava'le' avah tportolna' rekki ka'am. Hava' snu 'knii rek ava ngi pauqum 'knii rek avah mdopandan. Snu khat avah Sainai lown ki ungta ava ngi suwk'owr kurthuwk nau rek ava' pluwda. Hava' snu avah Hagar.
'Tunnu Hagar rih hava' Arabia paam ki sainai lown ava' ungta 'tunki Jerusalem ava' mdotedet. Ungta ava ngi mnau le' tu' suwk'owr rih ka'am lam.
Pdainu karthak ki Jerusalem avah ko'ol kcha' ungta mma' avah neen nkhengin ki nnuhn ava'.

Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “O mlung'om kerthlet kma', nau kuplu kma' snu nang, ikanpa cha'! O vonchowi powidun Kdei kma'Snu nang, kpuwk daat tih i'owng cha'. Mleiya mi'innpu ngi Mdomaak pthi snu ava ngi, mi'innpu pum snu ava' hinni nausuwn knembet tih mthlowi chaak a.” (Rnp. 13:15, 24:7)
'Tunnu, ku'uknau rek, Aijek heppi, neenna paureel ki nau rekin pimin.
Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi daksa ngi mdopluk mma' ava ngi, Pthla 'lam mih mdopluk mma' avah tyat chiireelna' piida. Ava' hep daat tih tuni rukku kurthuwk kcha' a.
Pdainu Kchiir laika ngi taluhep pih mthe o? “Snu suwk'owr avale' mchapa avah areipthi, Mleiya snu suwk'owr chapa avah snu mii'ol chapa tu' piipa mkurthuhvena' amvot nimeh.” (Rnp. 21:10)
Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, neenna snu suwk'owr ava' nau rekin pimin meh, pdainu neenna snu mii'ol ava' nau rekin pimin.
Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi midotpo'ol chaak naan to'ol chaakna' ava' thung ngi knet tih irip chaan. Ungta adak inni suwk'owr tkurthuhna' reengkol thung ngi veikhat luwt chnowl maan.
Paul nei kpauthe avah bih atin chaan, tidit tah naan nih vuntreenna' arlaan chaakin bih, naan ahin nih Khrista avah msit amna' ammeh.
Ungta neiyi vunkreen kcha' mii khimkhei rek hinni veikhat kthepindit chaak a. Mleiya mma ngi nowlam dothe mkheng avah mdotlotna' rang ki thenni, mmah lei kervei miikhat kurthuwk kcha' a.
Mleiya nowlam mih tikpindit chaakna' rah kthlaam kcha' rek naan athen vah Khrista avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta naan a plungnee thungki k'qu dok kchaan ptih.
Mleiya lamrin nih neen nih rinkinditna' ki plungbinpsuk avah Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi ningkakraal lih tardat chaakin.
Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinnu, vunkreen ruk vunkreen kma' ruk msit amna' ka'am pemeh. Pdainu vonsat tih nong ktlow kcha' lamrin ava' daat tih msit ka'am.
Naanna kqha dok ki arvang kchen inptih. 'Tunnu kindit ava' 'leenni tethe kopqowi kma' akurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni, kuw ngi atapkhaan inda?
Hava' tupnuwm chaakna' avah naan ako'own kchaan, Mma' ava' hinki kurju pemeh.
Thowl mnau'suwn daat ava ngi saikan avah mpumpum mih mdotepmet pchaan.

Mleiya naan nih plung ktlok reel maantih, tidit leiyi, Kruwng hinni neiya naan aleenin nih kuplungkrip kcha' a. Pdainu naan a'leen nih tyatna' kupthuwk mma' avah kuwku daat yoso, mma ngi pau tpinditna' avah kdiil chrah.

Ku'uknau rek, 'tun kpha thung ngi neiyi vuntreenna' ava' kparjaam kcha' kkurthuh u, taluleiyi neiyi tyat chiireelna' avah kdoperteel tlit daat toh? Mdit bih, khros ki khuhsiir tpirthitna' avah kqu kcha' a.
Nei kdobin chaakvah, naan aplungin kpenqheek rek mmaan ava ngi mthinaan nih msadakin mkelreen chaak raan ungta mkekneen chaak raan.

Nei ku'knau rek, naan avah Isowr rih to'ol chaakna' thuh adoto'own chaak dokin. Pdainu naan nih, naanki a'ol chaaknaan avah pnu nowpa ki thenni changqhatna' ngi sintonmaan. Ava' kchang ngi naan nih khat le' khat vonsat tih sop'ikorlow chaan.
Mleiya nowlam mkheng avah pauna khadaat thung ngi kurtluwm. Mleiya hanto ngi theda: “Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah.” (Lev. 19:18)
Pdainu naan nih perkeida akarchaakin bih, naan nih khat le' khat akpartlan dokmana' raan ki thenni ikilrin chaan.
Pdainu neiyi hanto' kthe a. Mleiya naan nih Pthla thuh i'am tlit chaan, mdit bih, naan nih pnu nowpa dongei avah ningptlun piik nimaan tih.

Mleiya pnu nowpa dongei ava ngi Pthla avah mdopten ungta Pthla ava ngi pnu nowpa avah mdopten. Ungta hava'le' 'knii avah khat tih khat kekperteng lam, avaleiyi naan nih totlot rah adobinin dow rek avah adotlot pchaanin pemeh.
Pdainu Pthla ava ngi naanna atiqhi chaakin bih, naanna nowlam kurduh ngi am chmaan tih.
'Tunnu pnu nowpa ki nongtlot rek avah kindit tih tedeh daat. Avale' avah: Lowsangkqhi, jowlkpurju, totborna', tekterdeuna',
dow pthla luwkbuk, kserkpu, karhal kcha', ker'ei kalrai, changtlaakna', plungthit ksinton, mthen daat kbin, plung kinqim kma', lopkurkhuina',

tepnerna', miike'eyou rek, tipritna', lopthowldii neekna', ungta hava' hep daat dow rek, ava'. Anto' heppi neiyi choduh rukku adokthe piik dokin ungta 'tun rukku mduh thah akthe piik inna, tidit tah hava' hep daat ktlow rek mmaan ava ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom chlam nimeh.
Pdainu Pthla ki mchei avah, vonsat, plungngam, plung kdai, ksowt tih tidiildehna', plungdownna', taqhatna', trinchaak krow,
plung kperneem, kilrindei kcha', ava'. Hava' kepteng nowlam morson ka'am pemeh.
Ungta Khrista hinki rek mmaan ava ngi pnu nowpa ngi kdung ngi mdongei ungta mdongei rek avah Mma' tu' mopthowiyow chaak dok inna.
Neen nih Phla ngi nrin chaakin cheentung ngi, neen nih Pthla ngi tche ruk ichetin cheh.
Neen nih msit ktaak ki plungreelda khat le' khat avah kardaida ungta pernerda ammaan che.

Ku'uknau rek, kuwmiikhat avah pnu thung ngi mekmen chaak cheentung ngi, pthla 'lam thuh ka'am rek naan ava ngi plung kperneem mih mma' avah aqhipenle chaan. Pdainu ikilrindei chaan mditma bih, naan rukka kepthleem thuh ktla kcha' krown ptih.
Naan nih khat le' khat bowrrihna' rek avah ikorchom deiyin. Ungta naan nih hanto ngi atlot chaakin bih, Khrista nowlam kpurkhum kcha' kurthuwk naandi'.
Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih dow khatleh msitma arlaan nih, doksi kcha' heppi mkarjaak bih, mmah mthina kurhuwng kcha' a.
Pdainu mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mnongtlot rek avah aperteel chso. Ungta ava' dilli mma ngi mii morson tu' kokportol kmah ngi mthina thung ngi mkanpat chaak rah.
Mleiya mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mbowr avah mdohor chaak rah.
Pauna ava' thung ngi tkurchuhna' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi dow kqha rek mkheng avah mma' kpurchuk kcha' khat ava' tu' mdopenthem chaak rah.
Kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso, Isowr rah tipni chaak pchaanlu pemeh. Miikhat tih talutalu yoso, mdopqau chaak avah mma ngi kurkun chrah.

Mleiya pnu nowpa thung ngi kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi, pnu nowpa thungki kqop kcha' rang dow rek ava' kurkun chrah. Pdainu Pthla thung ngi kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi, Pthla hinki ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava' kurkun chrah.
Ungta neen nih ardathit nthlowima bih, mphakat marvan thung ngi mchei avah turkun chaak raan.
Avaleiyi, neen nih changqhatna' nthlowi chaakin thung ngi mii mkheng hinni kqha avah totlot chaak raan. Mahan'tunsi ngi neen nih lamrin ki innmii rek hinni kqha avah totlot chaak raan.
Asuwn, jiik klin rekki neiyi, naan ahin nih kukhut kat tih havah kdokjit chaak!

Mleiya naan nih vuntreenna' thuh raanni adotsidulna' raan ki thenni daksa 'lam thah kqha heppi kterdet kcha' mii ka'am pok lam a. Mmaan nih hava' mdotlotnaan mlei avah mmaan nih Khrista ki khros ava' ki thenni tyat chiireelna' mdophan mana' raan ki then daat.

Mleiya vunkreen kcha' mmaan mdakin kpha rukku nowlam avah mdopqowi in pemeh. Pdainu daksa 'lam thah mmaan nih naan adaksa rekin 'leenni mpirlin chaakna' raan ki thenni naan nih vun adoreen raan avah mdongeiyin.

Pdainu khros ava ngi dultipaam avah nei kihin nih pthowiyouda ungta khros ava ngi dultipaam hinni neiya mopthowiyou chda. Ava' vah nei kthen nuh neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki khros lei kma'don kpirlin chaak rang avah Isowr rih mdorot pemeh.
Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinnu, vunkreen rukku mditmata vunkreen kma' rukku msik ki msit ma'amna' ka'am pemeh, pdainu msit ka'am avah ren tpurthuhna' ava' hehe daat.
Ungta hava' nowrit ava' kopqowi kcha' rek khimkhei rek 'leenni plung kdai le' plungqhat avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Ungta Isowr ki Isreel rek hin rukku plung kdai le' plungqhat avah ka'am ikurthuwkso!
'Tunki kupqhun nih kuwkhat leh ngi neiya mapya cha'mso, mleiya neiyi Kruwng Jisu ki kbih rek avah kdaksa 'leenni kdopuwk chaak dok.
Ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan apthlaan tu' ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
Isowr plungbin nih Kruwng Jisu Khrista tamsi Paul neiyi, Ephisia thung ngi ka'am miikenje rek naan ahinin nih ungta Khrista Jisu hinni trinchaak krow rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
Mleiya Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso!
Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa, Isowr avah apanpaak chaan. Mma ngi neenna Khrista hinni parvaan thah pthla lamki suwqhat mkheng ava' midotpiik chaak inni neenna suwqhat mipii chaanda.

Anto' heppi Isowr rih neen avah dultipaam mdopurthuhna' mmun mporthlon duduh ngi, Mma' hinni neenna midotokchol chaak dokin. Mleiya neen nih, Mma' aang ngi mraal ktaak ki ungta vonsat thung ngi tkenje chaakna' raan ki thenni havah mdotlot.
Mma' plungbin ki muplung ngamna' dilkqowiyi neen nih Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Mma' chapa rek rang ngi midotuhum chaak raan avah mduduh thah mdoporthlon dok ksa.
Mleiya mii rekki Mma' plungnee ki tkonlorna' ava' mdoponlor chaakna' rang leiyi, mvonsat'low chaak Khat ava' ar'aang ngi, mkhon ktaak ki plungnee avah midotpiik chaakin.
Mma' hinni ungta Mma' hii ar'aang ngi neen nih tkartlanna' avah tothlowi chaakin. Mleiya Mma ngi Mma' plungnee kepleet ava' dilkqowiyi neen nih nowlam tuktsutmana' rekin avah miptlotpiik inda.
Mma ngi, Mma' plungnee kepleet avah luwkinritna' le' tedeh pinditna' mkheng tu' neen nthenni mipluwn piik inda.
Mma ngi Mma' plungbin ki paukordowl avah neen nihin nih mipdeh dok chaanda. Havah Mma ngi kdung ngi muplung ngamna' Khrista hinki Mma' plungbinrit ava' dilkqowiyi mdotlot.
Mleiya mpha armik kurkhumna' ki soplowna' ava' thung ngi Mma ngi parvaan ki dow mkheng ruk ungta dultipaam ki dow mkheng rek avah Khrista hinni, Mma'kat hinni khadaat tih kpurkuwk rah.

Mleiya neen rukku Khrista hinni alrou kchom kcha' khat tkurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi mduduh thah muplungbinrit thung ngi mdoporthlon dok. Ungta Mma ngi dow mkheng avah muplungbin ki muplungreel ava' dilkqowiyi mdotlot.
Mleiya havah mduduh ngi Khrista hinni muplungbin ka'am dok kcha' rek neen nih Mma' konlorna' avah mii rekki kpanpaak kcha' tpurthuhna' raan ki then.

Naan rukku kindit pauna rek ava' arjaak chaakin dilli Khrista hinni lam'rin chaan tinu. Ungta kindit pauna avah naan akirliin chaakna' kqhapaumin ava'. Ungta naan nih lam'arin chaak dokin dilli Isowr rih mpaureel dok ksa, Pthla Kchiir ava ngi naan avah Khrista hinni kbihjiik adotepbel chaak dokin.

Isowr rih, Mma ngi mdoren dok ksa rek avah maktlan dok duh ngi neenki alrouchom ava' ki tarpaalna'sum kurthuwk ki Pthla Kchiir avah mdopiik. Mleiya hava ngi mii rekki Mma' konlorna' avah kpanpaak chlam rah.
Avaleiyi, nei rukku naan nih Kruwng Jisu hinki alamrinin kdo'arjaak chaak leiyi, ungta miikenje rek mkheng vonsat adolow chaakin kdo'arjaak chaak leiyi, naan athen inni kpanpaak chaak a.
Neiyi ava' karjaak daat ki kupqhun nih, naan athen inni kdopanpaak chaak avah down chmaang ungta rinkakthamna' rek thung ngi naan amiing rekin avah kdopyau chaak.
Mleiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki Isowr, konlor ki Pa ava ngi naan nih Mma' avah kindit tih adodeh pinditna' raan ki thenni luwkinritna' le' pau tpurphuwnna' ki pthla avah ayupii chaanso!

Ungta tedeh pinditna' ki amik rekin adotapvan piik inni, Mma' do'ownna' ki plungbinpsuk ava' adodeh pinditna' raan, rinkaktham kcha' ping. Ungta miikenje rek thung ngi Mma' alrouchom, konlor ava' ki mepleetna' avah talu tidit adodehna' raan, rinkaktham kcha' ping.
Ungta havah naan nih, lamkrin kcha' neen nihin nih Mma' ruhtan avah kdung ngi klin ungta Mma' ruhtan avah Mma' laarruhtanna' ruhtan ava' tidit adodehna' raan ki then.
Ava' ruhtan ava ngi, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki Khrista avah perdelda. Ungta ava' ruhtan ava ngi Mma ngi parvaan thah Mma' machang thah Mma' avah topkongda.

Mma ngi, Mma' avah paamkpu ungta ruhtanna' ungta ruhtan ungta tpaalna' ruhtan rek mkheng ki mkarthak ki pko'ong dokda. Ungta 'tun tphuwk dok ungta dilki karvang bei rang mpha thung ngi tphuwk rang miing khimkhei rek han'tun nih kparthaang ngi Mma' avah pko'ong dokda.
Ungta Isowr rih dow mkheng avah Khrista khuhther thah thipthida. Ungta dow mkheng ki mluwchai mkurthuhna' rah Mma' avah lamrinlop hinni parlaan pthida.
Lamrinlop avah Mma' daksa. Ungta havah Mma' kurkhum riimna' ava' ungta Mma ngi mii mkheng hinni dow mkheng avah mdopdim.
'Tunnu mpha khat thung ngi adoparmana' rekin ungta apnu arve rekin thung ngi kdiyou dok kcha' naan avah Mma ngi apringinda.

Mleiya mpha ava' thung ngi naanna hava' dultipaam ki nowpa dilkqowiyi kchet inptih. Ungta naan nih tirthli kpupa ava' ruhtan thung ngi kchetin ptih. Mma' avah tethe kopqowi kma’ mii rek thung ngi 'tun nong tlowda ka'am meek pthla ava'.

Mmaan arlak ki neen nkhengin rukka mpha khat thung vah pnu nowpa ngi kdung ngi mdongei rek ava' tarvan tlotin. Neen nih pnu nowpa le' plungril lih mdongei rek ava' ptlotin minnu. Ungta morson rek heppi nnowpaan thung ngi plungthit mei kquwng kduh chrah nau rek kurthuwk ki tarvanin.
Pdainu plungqhat 'leenni kepleet, Isowr ava ngi vonsat klin nih mdothlowi leiyi, neen avah vonsat milow chaanda.
Mma ngi vonsat midotolow chaakin leiyi, neen nih tparmaan leiyi, ndiyow chaakin thung ngi Mma ngi Khrista tu' mipringinda. Isowr rih naan avah plungnee ngi adotsan chaakin.
Ungta Isowr rih neen avah Mma' tu' midotperdel chaak dokin. Mma ngi neen avah Mma' tu' parvaan thah Khrista Jisu tu' midotopkon chaak dokin.
Mleiya havah karvang rang mpha rek thung ngi Mma' plungnee kepleet ava' midotetdetna' raan ki then. Mma ngi neen n'leen nih Mma' plungnee avah Khrista hinni mitedet inda.
Mleiya lamrinna' ava ngi naan avah plungnee ngi adotsan chaakin. Ungta havah naan adakin hinki pemeh, havah Isowr hinki chla.
Kuwkhat tih mpirlin chaakmana' rah, havah nong rek lei pemeh.

Mleiya neenna Mma' dim rekin pimin. Neen nih kqhanong totlotna' raan ki thenni neen avah Khrista Jisu hinni midotpurthuh chaak dokin. Neen nih kqhanong ava' thuh tche chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih avah mduduh thah mdoporthlon dok ksa.

Avaleiyi, abinphaakin, tidit tah mphakhat thung ngi naanna Chaatktlei rekki kqou inptih. Ungta naan avah vunkreen rekki, vunkreen kma' rek, adotidit chaakin. Vunkreen, tidit tah daksa 'leenni khut tih treen.

Ungta naan nih abinphaakin, tidit tah mpha ava' thung vah naanna Khrista hinki msik ki ka'am kchaan ptih. Naanna Isreel mii rek tung ngi paammii khatsap tkurthuhna' thungki teknenpthi dok ki ka'am dok kcha' inptih ungta paureel ki pauqum rek thung ngi mal lih ka'am dok kcha' inptih. Ungta naanna plungbinpsuk ktaak ki ungta Isowr ktaak ki dultipaam thung ngi ka'am dok kcha' inptih.
Pdainu mphakhat thung ngi lamkla ngi ka'am kcha' naan avah 'tunnu Khrista Jisu hinni, Khrista ki hii ava ngi adotapnai chaak dokin.
Mleiya Mma' avah neenki nuplungdaina' ava' ungta Mma ngi 'knii rek neen avah khadaat mipthutinda. Ungta Mma ngi neen mikpenqhenin narlakin ki bang avah pkui pthida.

Mma ngi neen mikparhalin nowlam ki paupiik rekle' paureen rek avah Mma' daksa thung ngi penvei pthida. Mleiya Mma ngi 'knii rek neen avah Mma' daksa thung ngi miiren khat purthuhda ungta plung kdai avah midotpa'am piikin.
Ungta Mma ngi khros ava' ar'aang ngi 'knii rek neen avah daksa khadaat tih Isowr tu' mipalqhat inda. Mma ngi neenki tkarhalna' rekin avah khros ava ngi pdiyouda.
Mma ngi arjungda lamknaiyi ka'am naan ahin nih ungta lamkla ngi ka'am mmaan hinni plung kdai avah parjaamda.
Mleiya Mma' ar'aang ngi 'knii rek neen ava ngi Pa ava' hinni Pthla khat thung ngi tuluw chaakna' lam avah tphan chaakin.
Avaleiyi, 'tunnu mal rek ungta mpha mruk ki then daat ki mii rekin ptipmeh. Naanna miikenje rekle' Isowr innmii rek tung ngi paammii khatsap dok inptih.
Isowr rih naan avah tamsi rekle' khulpu rekki innmun ava' thung ngi adotapqhan chaak dokin. Jisu Khrista mdakkat avah innbul lung kenreel ava'.
Isowr rih inn avah mpumpum mih Mma' hinni parkaida ungta inn avah Kruwng hinni klinthang kchiir luwbuk'inn khat tih, adotapqhan chaak dokin.
Mleiya naan nih Isowr rih Pthla ngi ma'amna' mun akurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni naan avah Kruwng hinni adotsakve dokin.
Mleiya hava' leiyi, Paul neiya, Chaatktlei rek naan athenni Jisu Khrista ki rowngmii khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
Isowr rih Mma' plungnee avah naan ahin nih neiyi sopkdolow chaakna' rah mdotpiik chaak dok avah arjamun naandi'.
Taluhep pih Isowr rih nei kihin nih mdotpurphuwn piik ava ngi paukordowl avah mtepdeh chaak tidit avah, choduh ngi naan ahin nih ktowitek ki pau mruk avah kdokjit chaak dok.
Naan nih ava' aparcham chaakin thung ngi, neiyi Khrista ki paukordowl ava' kdodeh pindit chaakna' avah kdeipindih chdaat krown ptih.

Mleiya suruwl morson thungki dultimii rek hinvah hanto' heppi paukordowl avah mdopdeh lam pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rih 'tunnu Mma' tamsi kenje rek hinni ungta kenje khulpu rek hinni Mma' Pthla ava ngi mdopurphuwn piik doklam.

Paukordowl avah hava': Mleiya Chaatktlei rekki kqhapaumin ki mar'aang ngi Isreel mii rek tung ngi piipa mkurthuhsapna' raan ungta mmaan tu' daksa khat mkurthuh chaakna' raan ungta Khrista hinni Mma' paureel ava' karlaang kcha'sap mkurthuh chaak raan ava'.
Mma' nongtlotna' mruhtan ava ngi Isowr rih nei kihin nih Mma' plungnee ki chla avah mpii chda. Ungta chla ava' dilkqowiyi neiya kqhapumin ki suwk khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.

Neiyi miikenje mkheng rek arlak ki, mikdil rek arlak ki kdilsi kurthuwk chyo ringngi neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinni kqhapaumin tparjaam chaakna' rah plungnee avah nei kihin nih mpii chda. Ava' kqhapaumin avah Khrista ki tapphaak pchaanmah sum'alrou ava'.

Mii mkheng hinni paukordowl ava' ki lopkhat tkurthuhna' ava' kthepindit rang ki thenni plungnee avah nei kihin nih mpii chda. Jisu Khrista hinni dow mkheng kpurthuh Isowr ava ngi hava' paukordowl avah mpha tyatya thung ngi Mma' mdak thung ngi mdo'arvandowl pthi.

Mleiya Isowr luwkinritna' avah mdetmdet ki mrit knempok mleiya hava' Mma' luwkinritna' avah lamrinlop ava ngi, paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' rek hinni parvaan ki mun rek thuh mdopdeh lamna' rah hava' plungnee avah nei kihin nih mdotpiik chaak.
Mmaan nih Mma' luwkinritna' avah neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni mdotlot Mma' ki ktlangknai kma' plungbinrit ava ngi kdei lamrah.
Neen nih Mma' hinni lamtrin chaakin ava ngi Mma' thung ngi neen nih ningqit ktaak ki ungta plungkrip pih tuluw chaakna' 'lam avah tphan chaakin.
Avaleiyi, naan aleiyi kdung ngi chiitreelna' kdoperteel chaak leiyi, naan nih plung karmak adohormana' raan akaktham chaak inna. Mleiya hava'le' avah naan akonlor chaak naan ava'.
Hava' leiyi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ava' hinni kupkhup pih tirdiil nuh luwkdobuk chaak.
Mma' hinki ngi parvaan ki ungta dultipaam thungki innbung mkheng ngi mmiingin avah mdo'arlaan chaakin.
Naan nih Mma' hinki tkonlorna' kepleet ava' dilkqowiyi, Isowr rih Mma' Pthla ava ngi arilin ki mii ava' 'leenni ruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi aruhn mtanna' raan ki thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping.
Mleiya havah lamtrin chaak ar'aang ngi Khrista ngi naan aplungchaiyin thung ngi ma'amna' rah ungta Mma ngi vonsat thung ngi arjungin mdovar tlitna' rah ungta adotapqhanna' raan ki then.
Mleiya havah naan nih miikenje rek mkheng tung ngi Khrista ki vonsat avah tya kquwm ungta ksaang ungta kchuwng ungta ktlum tidit tedeh pinditna' ruhtan adothlowi chaakna' raan ki then.
Ungta kuwkhat tih mdodeh pchaanmah Khrista ki vonsat avah naan nih deinaandi'. Mleiya Isowr kurkhumna' mkheng ava ngi naanna akipdim chraan.
'Tunnu Isowr rah neen nih, paukheel mditmata tbin pchaanmah mkheng ava' han'tun nih knem mih ktlow pchaang. Mma ngi neen nthung inni nong ktlow meek mruhtanna' ava' dilkqowiyi havah mdotlot pchaan.
Avaleiyi, mpha ktai thung ngi ktlangknai kmah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi lamrinlop thung ngi Mma' avah aponlor chaan. Amen.
Avaleiyi, Kruwng rowngmii neiyi Isowr rih naan adoto'own chaak naan nowpa ava' thung ngi naan nih trinchaak krow ngi achena' raan ki thenni akoksow chaak inna.
Naan nih tpirdil chaakna' mkheng tu' ungta plung kperneem mih ksowt tih tidiildehna' tu' kilqhi ngi khat le' khat avah vonsat tih akursutdeh chaak raan.
Naan nih plung kdai thung ngi akorbowlnaan plung kinqimna' Pthla avah adopa'amdehna' raan atlown.
Isowr rih naan ato'ownin thung ngi daksa khat ungta Pthla khat ma'am heppi plungbinpsuk khatsap thung ngi adoto'own chaakin.
Ungta Kruwng khatsap, lamrin khatsap ungta diiluwna' khatsap.
Ungta mkheng ki Mpa ungta Isowr khat ka'am. Mma' avah mkheng ki mkarthak ungta mkheng 'leenni kirkhil lih ka'am ungta naan akhengin athung inni ka'am.
Pdainu Khrista chla dopertetna' dilkqowiyi plungnee avah neen khimkhei hinni midotpiikin.

Avaleiyi, tikjit ava ngi hanto'theda: “Mma ngi kparthaang ngi mahankal thung ngi, Mma ngi paamsuwk ki mdothiik rowngmii rek avah qhida. Ungta mii rek hinni Mma ngi chla rek avah piida,” mdodit. (Luw. 68:18)
Tikjit ava ngi: “Mma ngi mahankal thung ngi,” mdodit avah talu mdothena? Hava ngi mdothe avah, Mma' rukka chodurep pih dultipaam ki tii knungsi mun thung ngi jungkqum dok, mdoditna'.
Jungkqum khat Mma' avah, dow mkheng mdopdimna' rang ki thenni parvaan mkheng rekki mkarthak kpha ngi hangkkal Mma' ava'.

Mma'kat ava ngi aangqhe rek hinni tamsi tkurthuhna' ungta morson rek hinni khulpu tkurthuhna' ungta aangqhe rek hinni paukparjaam tkurthuhna' ungta morson rek hinni lamrinlop kqhi rekle' chukpu rek tkurthuhna' avah mdopiik.
Mma ngi havah, soptolowna' nong rek thung ngi miikenje rek mdopurkhumna' rah ungta Khrista ki daksa ava' mdopqhanna' rang ki thenni mdopiik lam.
Neen nkheng inni lamrinna' 'leenni ungta Isowr Chapa ki tedeh pinditna' 'leenni plung tpinqimda Khrista kurkhumna' ki tpertetna'ya ngi nver dok chaak duhn kpha ngi, Mma ngi chla rek avah midotpiikin.

Mleiya neenna tkurchuhna' ki tirthli khimkheiyi mduhmdil lih mdoknow pchaan ungta raanda mdoqhi chaak nau rek tkurthuh porson raan pemeh. Mleiya mii rekki nau rek avah tuhuwnna' pau vih ungta mmaan ki mrilqhatmaan ki plungbinpsuk rek thung ngi tepmenda 'lamleleh thah mdoqhi chaakin.
Pdainu havah neen nih vonsat tih kindit ava' theda, dow mkheng 'leenni neen nih Mma' hinni tilin chaakna' raan ki then. Mma' avah mluwchai ava', tidit tah Mmah Khrista ava'.
Mma' hinni daksa mpum avah daksa rek mkheng ngi mkorjomna' rang thung ngi korjomda ardapii ngi daksa avah khadaat tih mdoparkai. Ava ngi vonsat thung ngi linda mthina kapqhang kcha'
Avaleiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih hava' thenu, Kruwng hinni sakhi kpiik chaak a: Mleiya morson Chaatktlei rekki msit ktaakpa muplungbinin thung ngi mche chaakin heppi naanna ache porson raan pemeh.
Mleiya mmaan nah mdodeh pinditin pemeh ungta muplungin mapchai leiyi, mmaan dodeh pinditna' avah kjiingnu thung ngi ka'am kcha'. Isowr rih mdopiik rinkum ki thennu mmaan nah duwn ki mii reklam.

Mleiya mmaan nah plung ngi tbin pchaanna' heihin nih ka'am kcha'lam. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mdakin avah tekterdeuna' thung ngi kirpii chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih mdetmdet ki ktobor mkheng thung ngi kerkheel setset tih kpunjuwr dok ki totlot rah mdongei chaakin.
Pdainu naanna Khrista avah ava'lu, tidit tih kurchuk chmaan tih.
Dakat tih naan nih Mma' avah ado'arjaak dokin ungta Jisu hinni ka'am kindit ava' dilkqowiyi naanna adotpurchuh chaak dokin.
Naan nih choduh ki arinnown, tidit tah daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei, tkurhuwnna' thung ngi kqopthang kcha' miipli avah asuwtpthi dokin.
Isowr rih, naan avah aplungbinin ki pthla thung ngi ren akurthuh chaakna' raan avah aptlotin.
Naan nih Isowr rih Mma'kat heppi kindit ki rinkinditna' le' tchiir chaakna' thung ngi mdopurthuh dok miiren avah dona heppi ana chaan.
Avaleiyi, pleitneena' avah asuwtpthi dokin. Ungta mii khimkheiyi mi'innveen tung ngi pau kindit tih mkirbiik chaak rah. Mleiya neenna khat le' khat ki miichai rek inpmin.
Naan nih, “aplungin mthit thung ngi pnu arvei maan.” (Luw. 4:4) Ungta plungthit kohor tlit daat tih kni ptlamaan.
Ungta tarnampii hin rukku mmun piimaan.
Kupru kchok mma' ava ngi pruporson mso. Pdainu nong alou chso ungta mma ngi kikriing kcha' rek hinni dow mruk mdopiik pchaan chaakna' rah mkhut tih kqhanong atlow chso.
Naan anehrin thung ngi kqha kma' pauna rek khadaat ruk thuwk mso. Pdainu karja kcha' rek hinni plungnee mkurthuhna' rah tapqhanna' ki thenni msit ka'am kqhapauna rek ava' ithuwkso.
Ungta taktlanna' nit ki thenni naan a'leen nih kbihjiik akbelin Isowr Pthla Kchiir plung avah tapyamaan.
Ungta kkha mkheng ungta plungthit mei kquwng ungta plungthit ungta plungthit tih ko'owng ungta miiqhatmana' paukthe ungta plungbin kqha kma' mkheng avah naan ahinki aloupthi dokin.
Naan nih khat le' khat avah plungnee le' plung kdowng tu' kilqhi ngi ikursudei chaan. Ungta Isowr rih Khrista hinni adotoptlot piik dokin heppi, naan nih khat le' khat ikportlot piikin.
Avaleiyi, Isowr rih vonsat mdolow chaak nau rek heppi naan nih Isowr dotlot ktlow kcha' ikurthuwkin.

Ungta Khrista rukku vonsat milow chaanda neen nthen inni Mdak avah tparlaan rah dow khat tih ungta rintparlaan khat tih Isowr hinni mikrimkdi namreng heppi makparlaan chaak heppi, vonsat thuh ichetin.
Pdainu jowltpurjutna' ungta totborna' mkheng mditmata tpunjuwrna' avah, naan ahinvah kuwkhat tih tapdaudau rukku pdau mso. Mleiya avale' avah miikenje rek then pemeh.
Ungta naan nih totlotma rah ktobor rih mditmata kokmok pau vih mditmata paukkaam theda arle chimmaan. Ava' hinvah apanpaak chaan.

Naan nih jowlkpurju mii rek mditmata ktobor mditmata kpunjuwr, tidit tah dow pthla luwkbu kcha' khimkhei rekki Khrista ki ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi dow khatleh ruk alrouchom mih mdocham chaak raan ka'am pemeh, tidit avah adodeh dokin.
Kuwkhat leh ngi naan avah msit ktaak pau vih ahuwng chmaanso. Mleiya hava' dow rek leiyi, tethe kopqowi kma' mii rek 'leenni, Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah ktlung dok ksa.
Avaleiyi, mmaan tu' mthenin karlaangsap kurthuwk maan.
Mleiya mphakhat thung ngi naanna kjiingnuwn ptih pdainu 'tunnu naanna Kruwng hinni mar'aangin ptih. Avaleiyi, mar'aang ki mii rek heppi ichetin.
Mleiya Pthla ava' ki mchei avah tqhatna' mkheng thung ngi ungta rinkinditna' ungta kindit thung ngi ka'am.
Naan nih anto ngi ache chaakin ava ngi Kruwng plung ngamna'si avah aperteelin rang ngi adeiyin.
Ungta naan nih mchei ktaak kjiingnu nong rek thung ngi lopkhat kurthuwk chmaan, pdainu mmaan hinni mdoparma rekin avah athepiikin.
Mleiya mmaan nih tuprut tih mdotlotin dow rek avah tethe rang kpha rukka ningkyana'.
Pdainu mar'aang ava ngi dow mkheng avah taanda mdopandan. Mleiya dow khimkhei kpandang avah mar'aang.
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kie'iip daat rek naan ikerdelin. Kdiyou rek hinki ikerdelin. Ungta Khrista ngi mar'aang ngi a'leenin nih kleng rah.”
Avaleiyi, kinditjik ki achena' raan ikilrin chaan. Naan nih kokmok mii rek heppi chetmaan pdainu mii kinrit rek heppi ichetin.
Mleiya nit rek avah kqha pemeh, mpha avah aktlan chaan.
Avaleiyi, naan nih kinrit kmah ngi ammaan pdainu Kruwng plungbin avah talu tidit naan nih adeipindih chaan.
Ungta naan nih thowldii needa primaan, mleiya ava' thung ngi tkorjown pchaanmana' ka'am pdainu Pthla ngi naanna ayupdim chaanso.
Naan nih khat le' khat hinni luwbuklaa ngi ungta tpanpaakna' laa ngi ungta pthla lamki laa rekki ikirbi chaan. Ungta laa theda ungta aplungin thung ngi krowl kinqim mih Kruwng apanpaak chaan.
Ungta mpha ktai thung ngi dow mkheng 'leenni neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi Pa Isowr avah apanpaak chaan.
Ungta naan nih Isowr adoqit chaak inni khat le' khat hinni ikparlaan chaan.
Nuwn rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni akparlaan chaakin heppi naanki a'innpu rekin hinni ikparlaan chaan.
Mleiya Khrista ngi lamrinlop ki mluwchai mkurthuh heppi mnuwn luwchai avah m'innpu.
Avaleiyi, lamrinlop pih Khrista hinni makparlaan chaak heppi mnuwn rekki dow khimkhei 'leenni mma' mma' ki mi'innpu rekin hinni makparlaan chaak rah.
Innpu rek, Khrista ngi lamrinlop vonsat low chda, ava' ki thenni Mdaksa makparlaan chaak heppi naan nih anuwn rekin avah vonsat adolow chaak raan.
Mleiya Mma ngi lamrinlop ava' mdopchiirna' rang ki thenni mdak kirpii chda. Mma ngi dii le' pauna ava ngi mdo'alqhut chaak ki mma' avah pchiir chda.

Mleiya Mma ngi, Mdak hinni kchiir rih ungta tupsulna' ktaak konlor lamrinlop khat tih makparlaan chaakna' rah, mma' avah alqhuchda. Ungta m'leen nih, kbihkchu mditmata ktivi mditmata ava' hep daat khatleh ma'ammana' rah Mdiyow ngi mma' avah mdo'alqhut chaak.
Hanto' heppi, innpu rekki mnuwn rekin avah mmaan nih mdakin vonsat chaakin heppi vonsat mdolow chaak raan. Mnuwn vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi mdak vonsat korlow kcha' a.
Mleiya kuwkhat leh ngi teden rukku mdak ki mdaksa avah hal chmeh. Pdainu Kruwng ngi lamrinlop hinni mdotlot heppi thendam tnot chda ungta mdokilrin qhi chaak.
Mleiya neenna Mma' daksa ki, sadak ki ungta Mma' ruh rekki mapna rek inpmin.
“Hava' leiyi pselpa khat tih mnuhmpa mapthidon mnuwn hinni mkorjom chaak rah. Ungta 'knii rek avah daksa khadaat mkurthuh chaak raan.” (Rnp. 2:24)
Havah kparsa dok paukordowl khat. Pdainu neiyi havah Khrista le' lamrinlop leiyi, kdothe.
Anto'daat yoso, naan khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mnuwn avah mdak vonsat mkorlow chaak heppi vonsat adolow chaak raan. Ungta mnuwn ava ngi mi'innpu avah mdokyat chaak rah.
Nau rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni anuh a'paan dothe apqowiyin, mleiya havah mkindit ava'.
Havah paureel tu' kilqhi, mkhatna' pauqum ava'. “Anuh le' Apa akyatcha.” (Knl. 5:16)
Paureel avah hava': “Mleiya havah nang athenni mqhatna' rah ungta dultipaam thuh ksowt tih arin chaakna' rang ki then.” (Knl. 5:16)
Ungta mpa rek, naan nih anau'leen avah plungthitna ngi raimaan. Ava' hinvah Kruwng dopurchuhna' thung ngi mmaan avah asutpqowi deiyin.
Suwk rek, naan nih Khrista hinki heppi dultipaam ki akpu rekin avah tiqit le' tkunchuwn ungta plungbinrit khadaat tu' kilqhi ngi mpauin apqowi chaan.

Naan nih akpu rekin avah mii plung ngamna' ktlow rek dotlot heppi miksut thung daat tih tlowmaan. Pdainu Khrista suwk rekki muplungchai intu' Isowr plungbin mdotlot chaakin heppi mmaan hinni tethe apqowi chaan.
Mleiya naan nih dultimii sop'adolow chaakin pemeh pdainu Isowr sop'adolow chaakin. Avaleiyi, kqha plungbin nih akpu rekin avah sop'adolow chaak raan.
Mleiya suwk khat yoso mditmata mii'ol khat yoso, kqha ktlow kcha' kuwmiikhat ava ngi mdotlot ava'kat avah Kruwng hinki karlaang chrah, tidit avah naan nih adodeh dokin.
Mukpu rek, naan nih anto'hepkat tih asuwk rekin hinni adotlot raan. Mleiya naan nih parvaan thah mikmai ksuw kma' naanki Mukpu ka'am tidit avah adodeh dokin. Avaleiyi, mmaan avah pqitmaan.
Mqutna' thung ngi ku'knau rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni ungta Mma' Ruhtanna'si ava' thung ngi aruhn aptang chaan.
Mleiya naan nih tarnampii dohuwnna' nongrit rek kepteng ngi ari pchaanna' raan ki thenni Isowr dopiik kurkhum raaldona avah ana chaan.

Mleiya neenna sadak le' hii kepteng ngi tkarnaakqhiin pemeh. Pdainu paamkpu rek kepteng ngi, ruhtanna' rek kepteng ngi, ungta hava' 'tunpha ki kjiingnu dultipaam ki paamkpu rek kepteng ngi ungta parvaan ki mun rek thung ngi mrilkqha kma' pthla lamki raalmii rek tung ngi tkarnaakin.
Avaleiyi, naan nih mkheng ngi pquda krip daat akurthuhna' raan ungta kqha kma' mpha marvan thung ngi krip daat tih a'am chaakna' raan, Isowr dopiik kurkhum raaldona ava' ana chaan.
Avaleiyi, naan nih kindit ava ngi arkowlkeen pthutda knet tih jeelda ungta rinkinditna' ki plungkeh pkehda arichaak raan.
Ungta naan nih akhuhn 'leenni khuhkok adonaakin heppi plung kdai ki kqhapaumin avah adonaak chaak raan.
Ava' mkheng ava' han'tun nih naan nih lamrin ki phow ava' sinda arichaak raan. Ungta ava ngi naan nih kqha kma' khat ava' ki, meiyi kquwng jel rek mei avah eyou pchaang naandi'.
Ungta tkirliinna' ki thiir luwkhum le' Pthla raal'kaang, Isowr pauna avah achom chaan.

Ungta naan nih mpha ktaiyi mdetmdet ki rinkthamna' ungta rintaktham piikna' mkheng thung ngi Pthla ngi rin'iktham chaan. Naan nih aplung inni hava' abinin chunni tidiildehna' mkheng tu' kdung ngi ikilrindei chaan. Ungta miikenje mkheng rekki thenni rin'iktham chaan.

Ungta neiyi knehr kapvan chaak ktai thung ngi pauna rek mdotpiik chaakna' rah ungta ava ngi neiyi ningqit ktaak ki kqhapaumin ki paukordowl avah kdopandan pchaanna' rah, nei kthen rukku rinmheiktham piik chaan.
Mleiya neiya thiirrii doporkol pausikhu khat ping. Neiyi kpau chaakna' kat rang ava' heppi, ningqit ktaak ki kpau pchaan chaakna' rah nei kthen nih rinmheiktham piik chaan.

'Tunnu naan rukku neiya taluhep pih ka'am ping ungta talu ktlot tah, tidit ki mlei mkheng avah Tikaikas tih ahinin nih akepdeh chdaat raan. Mma' avah Kruwng hinni trinchaak krow sopklow kcha' ungta vonsat tolow chaakin nu'unnau'in khat.

Mma' avah hava' plungbinpsuk, tidit tah naan nih taluhep pih neenna ka'am inping tidit adodeh chaakna' raan ki thenni naan ahin nih kdopthlat chaak. Ungta mma ngi naan aplungin avah plungngam akpii chdaat raan.
Unau rek hinni plung kdai i'amso ungta Pa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki lamrin chaak tu' kilqhi vonsat avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni ktluwk ki vonsat klow kcha' mkheng rek hinni plungnee avah ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
Jisu Khrista suwk rek Paul le' Timothy neenve ngi, Philippia khuwpii thuh ka'am, Khrista Jisu hinni miikenje rek mkheng le' ksutpqowi kcha' rekle' sopklow kcha' rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
Mleiya neen Npa Isowr hinki ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki Plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso,
Neiyi naan adokbin phaak chaak naan khimkhei thung ngi neiki Isowr avah kdopanpaak chaak tlit kcho.
Neiyi krinktham chaakna' khimkhei thung ngi, mpha ktaiyi naan akhengin athen inni kanpa ngi kdopnuwm chaaklu.
Mleiya mkhatna' nit ki kupqhun nih 'tun kpha thung ngi kqhapaumin thung ngi lopkhat tkurthuh sapin leiyi, kdopanpaak chaak.
Naan athung ngi kqhanong kupqhun Mma' ava ngi, Jisu Khrista murjun duh kpha ngi ava' nong avah kpurkhum chdaat rah, tidit tah hava'kat thung ngi neiya kuplungkrip kcha'.

Neiyi havah naan akhengin leiyi, anto' heppi kdobin avah mkindit kat, mleiya naanna kuplung thuh adokthiik tlit chaakin. Mleiya naan akhengin avah neiyi thiirrii rowngmii kkurthuh thung ruk ungta kqhapaumin ki thenni kparkhaan chaakna' le' mkindit tethepindit chaakna' mkheng thung ngi naan akhengin avah nei tu' plungnee karlaang kcha'sap tkurthutin.
Mleiya neiyi naan akhengin avah taluhepya ngi, Jisu Khrista vonsat'low heppi plung akopdon chaakin tidit leiyi, Isowr rah neiki ksakhi.
Ungta naan avonsatin avah luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi ungta penqhenda tedeh pinditna' mkheng thung ngi mkerkheel setsetna' rang ki thenni rinkatham kcha' ping.

Mleiya havah naan nih dow mkheng avah perteelda ungta kqhasi dow rek avah adorot chaakna' raan ungta neen nih Jisu Khrista murjun kpha thung ngi plung kchiir rih ungta tupsulna' ktaak ki a'amna' raan ki then.
Mleiya Isowr tpanpaakna' le' tponlorna' rah Jisu Khrista ki ar'aang ngi rinkinditna' ki mchei rek ava ngi idim chaan.
Pdainu ku'uknau rek neiyi, naan nih hava' adodeh raan kngeiya, tidit tah nei k'leen nih kthuwk dok dow rek ava ngi kqhapaumin ki mmadown ksom kurthuwkda.
Mleiya hava ngi paamkruwng inn krung mkheng ngi ungta morson mkheng rek hinni nei kthiirrii korbowlna' rek avah Khrista hin, tidit kindit chel lih mdopandan.
Ungta Kruwng hinni nu'unnau rekin meknem mih nei kthiirrii rek 'leenni plungkrip mdothlowi chaak inni, pauna avah kerkheelset tih, mningqitin ktaak ki mdothe chaak pchaanin.
Dakat tih aangqhe rekki tepner rih ungta tekpertena ngi Khrista avah parjaam lamda ungta aangqhe rukku kqha plungbin nih parjaam chlamda.
Mrukri rek ava ngi nei kthiirrii rek ava' totpom rah mdobin inni Khrista avah mthennemna' plungbin nih, plung kchiir kmah ngi parjaam lamda.
Pdainu mdilknau rek ava ngi, kqhapaumin kapkhaan chrang ngi nei avah mdotokchol tidit mdodehn nih vonsat tih avah mdoparjaam chaakin.

Mdittu' talu? Mleiya dow khimkhei thuh ktlow leek ki mditmata kindit kat tih tlow yoso, Khrista avah kurphuwng kcha' daat a, ungta neiya hava' thung ngi kanpa kcha' ping. Ungta ong ngi neiya kanpa chtlit nikdi'.
Mleiya naan arinkthamin ungta Jisu Khrista ki Pthla dobom chaak ki nei kthen nih tkirliinna' kthuwk rah tidit neiyi kdeh.

Plung korkhol lih kdobin chaak ungta kuplungbin psuk chaak thung ngi neiya dow khatleh 'leenni ningkya duh nimaang. Pdainu ningqit ktaak ki, ardarowna' mkheng ngi mpha ktai ki heppi, 'tun rukku nei kdaksa thung ngi kdiyou vih mditmata kring ngi Khrista avah konlor dok chrah.
Mleiya nei kthen nuh krin avah Khrista then ungta kdiyow chaak bih, avah kthen nem chaakna'.
Pdainu neiyi daksa thuh krin tlit daat bih, avah nei knonglow chaak ki mchei ava'. Anto'daat yoso neiyi tvah kcholnikdi', tidit tah the pchaang maang.
Mleiya neiya hava' 'knii rek doper'del lih ka'am imping, neiya sun chda ungta Khrista tu' ta'am rah kngei chaak a ungta ava ngi makqhasi.
Anto'daat yoso daksa thung ngi ka'am daat rang ava ngi naan athenni msit ka'amset tah.

Ungta hava' plungkrip kdothlowi chaak ava ngi, naan nih alamrinin thuh akorsom chaakna' raan ungta akanpat chaakna' raan ki thenni neiyi am daatda naan akhengin tu' ka'am bong rang imping tidit kdeh a.
Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih veikhat kthlen nowl ava ngi Jisu Khrista hinni nei kleiyi akpirlin chaakin avah kerkheel setset rah.

Talutalu yoso naan nih arinchanin avah Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki thenni mtik kcha apurthutin. Mdit bih, neiyi thlengda asuw yown rih mditmata thleng myow rih naan nih pthla khadaat tih knet tih krip inptih ungta kqhapaumin ki lamrin ki thenni khatsap, plungbin khadaat tih adonaaksapin tidit ki adangin avah arja nikdi'.

Ungta naan nih, naan akepteng rekin avah talutalu yoso qi chmaan. Mleiya havah mmaan hinni titinna' khat tidit tah mmaan nah kenvei chlam rah pdainu naan ahinnu havah tkirliinna' ungta havah Isowr hinki.
Mleiya naan nih Mma' hinni lam'adorin daatin kma' Mma' thenni suwk rukka athuhna' raanni, Khrista kchang ngi naan ahin nih havah adotpiik dokin.
Mleiya naan nih, neiyi tyat kdoperteel avah amikkat inni deiyin tinu ungta tunkpha thuh kdoperteel meeksli daat avah ado'arjaakin ungta ava' heppi naan rukku adoperteel meek sliin.

Avaleiyi, Khrista hinni ardarowna' ma'am cheentung ngi, vonsat ki plung ngamna' ma'am cheentung ngi, Pthla tu' lopkhat kurthuwk kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi, plungdun vonsat le' plung knei vonsat kthlowi kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi,
Plungreel khadaat ki plungbin khat tih, vonsat khatsap ava' adothlowi chaak inni plungbin kinqimsap pih, nei kkanpat avah mheipurkhum piik chaan.

Naan nih mthennemna' plungbin nih mditmata msit ktaak ki tpirlin chaak ki dow khatleh adotlot raan pemeh. Pdainu kpirdil kcha' plungbin nih mii khimkheiyi morson khat avah mmaan mdakin hinni kqhabet tih mdobin chaak rah.
Naan khimkheiyi mthina ki ardarowna' dow rek daat suwmaan pdainu morson rekki ardarowna' dow rek rukka asuwn.
Khrista Jisu hin rukku ka'am hava' plungbin avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Mma' avah Isowr rinchan nih am chdaat yoso. Mma ngi Isowr tu' mkinqimna' avah tokyownmer rah tidit tih binmeh.
Pdainu ava' kchang ngi Mdak ki mdangqhat ktaak liit khat kpurthuhda suwk'owr khat ruwngchen louda, Ungta dultimii khat heppi arjungda.
Ungta dultimii khat heppi mkandan ava ngi, Mma ngi mthina kpirdil chda. Ungta kdiyou kpha ngi, tidit tah khros 'leenni kdiyou kpha ngi tethe pqowi chda.
Ava'leiyi Isowr rukku Mma' avah kparthaang ngi tparthaan chda. Ungta miing khimkhei rek han'tun ki miing ava' piida.
Mleiya parvaan thah ka'am mmaan rukku ungta dultipaam thuh ka'am mmaan rukku ungta dultiril thah ka'am mmaan rukku Jisu miing 'leenni pkhup khimkheiyi tirdiildon luwmdobuk chaak rah.
Ungta plei khimkheiyi Pa Isowr tponlor chaakna ngi Jisu Khrista avah Kruwng tidit mdothethut chaak rah.

Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat low rek, naan nih nei ka'am thung daat kma' mpha ktaiyi tethe adopqowiyin heppi, 'tun nih nei ka'amma thung rukku kerkheel set tih tethe adopqowiyin heppi ningqit le' tkunchuwn tu' kilqhi ngi adakin ki akarsan chaak naan nong ava' atlow chaan.
Mleiya naan athung inni Mma' plung ngamna' dilkqowiyi tbinna' le' Mma plungbinrit kqha ava' totlotna' 'leenni nong ktlow avah Isowr.
Naan nih dow mkheng avah tkirthitna' le' tkerteenna' ktaak ki atlown.

Mleiya naan nih tupsulna' ktaak ungta kertleu deek ki ungta mdoparma ktaak, Isowr nau rek akurthuhna' raan, hava' lamdak kma' kqowi ungta kpurlup kperthel suruwl ava' arlak ki mar'aang rek heppi dultipaam thuh ilengin.
Mleiya naan nih rinkum ki pauna avah knet tih akyowng chaan, mdit bih, neiyi msit ktaak ki kchen dok kcha' mditmata msit ktaak ki nong klou dok kcha' kkurthuhma leiyi, kpirlin chnikdi'.
Ou, neiya, naan alamrinin ki rintparlaanna' le' soptolowna' 'leenni moptlong chdaat kpha yoso, neiya kanpa kcha' ping ungta naan akhengin tu' kanpa chdaat nikdi'.
Hava' lei kat thung ngi naan rukka nei tu' aplungin mngam rah ungta akanpatsap chaak raan.
Pdainu neiyi naan a'amin rinchan kdeh chaak thung ngi kardamrow chaakna' rah naan ahin nih kbeisek ki Timothy kdopthlat chaakna' rah neiyi Kruwng Jisu avah lamkrin chaak a.
Mleiya Timothy kma'don naan arinchanin qhatna' thuh plung kluwt tih ksuw rah kuplungbin kinqimqhi kuwkhat leh thlowi maang.
Mleiya mii mkheng ngi Khrista Jisu ki dow rek kma' mma' mma' ki daat mthlaamsap chaak inna.
Pdainu naan nih mma' ki tperteel dok rinchan avah adodeh dokin, tidit tah mchapa khat tih mpa tu' nong mdotlot heppi mma ngi nei tu' kqhapaumin thung ngi sopmdotolowqhi chaak.
Ava'leiyi neiyi taluhep rang imping tidit kdeh daat le' Timothy avah naan ahin nih kbeisek ki tapthlat rah tidit ki plungbinpsuk kthlowi chaak a.
Pdainu nei kdak rukka kbeisek ki naan ahin nih thleng nikmow, kdi ngi Kruwng hinni lamkrin chaak a.

Anto'daat yoso, nei knaupa, knonglowqhi ungta kraalnaakqhi pdainu naan apau sikhuwn ungta nei kikriin 'leenni sopmoklow kcha' Epaphroditas avah naan ahin nih tapthlat rang avah msit ka'am mih bin chnuh.
