Mleiya mma ngi naan akhengin avah plung apdon inda ungta naan nih mmah kkowi a tidit ado'arjaakin leiyi muplung kya tlit tih amda.
Mleiya mma' avah dakat tih kdiyousou vih kowi chda pdainu Isowr rih plungqhat tedet chda. Ungta mma' hin daat kma' nei ruk mditmata neiyi plungyatna' 'leenni plungyat duh chnikdi'.
Ava'leiyi neiyi mma' avah plung korkhol lih tidit tah naan nih mma' adeh chaak nowlin thung ngi akanpat chaakna' raan ungta nei kuplungyat rukka mtlowmbetna' rah kdopthlat chaak.
Ava'leiyi mma' avah Kruwng hinni plungngam mkheng tu' arlaang chaan ungta mma'hep mii rek avah naan nih akyat chaan.
Mleiya mma ngi mrinkum ki thenni kbin kmah Khrista ki nong ki thenni kdiyousou kpha ngi, naan nih nei kihin nih adoptat dokin soptolowna' avah mdopqut chaak.
Mqutna' thung ngi ku'uknau rek, Kruwng hinni ikanpa chaan. Nei kthen nuh naan ahin nih dow rek ava'kat ki thenni tikjit nowl rang avah karda thimeh ungta avah naan athen innu mqhatna' set.
Naan nih uwi rek hinki ikilrindei chaan, kthi ktlow rek hinki ikilrin chaan ungta daksa 'leenni vunkreen rek hinki ikilrindei chaan.
Mleiya neenna pthla ngi Isowr hinni luwkbu kcha' kindit thuh vunkreen kcha' rek inpimin. Khrista Jisu hinni ikpirlin chaan ungta dultimii nongtlot 'leenni plungkrip thlowi chmaan.

Nei kdak rukka dultimii nongtlot 'leenni plungkrip kthlowi kcha' khat kurthuwk chdaat ruk krow ping. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih daksa 'leenni plung tiprina' ki mlei kthe ma'am bih, nei rukku kerkheelset tih kdothe rah ka'am.
Neiya knitrehtna' nit tih kvunkreen ping, Isreel chaat thungki ping, Benjamin phung thungki ping. Hibriu mii rekki Hibriu miikhat ping ungta nowlam 'leennu neiya Pharisy miikhat ping.
Plung kluwt ki mlei thung ngi, neiyi lamrinlop avah chiipreel lam nuh, nowlam thuh ka'am rinkinditna' ki mlei thung ngi neiya tupsulna' ktaak ki karvang ka'am ping.
Pdainu nei kthen nih ktuwn chaakna' dow rek avah neiyi Khrista ki thenni msit ktaak tidit tih kdotai chaak dok.

Pdainu neiyi dakat tih Kruwng Khrista Jisu tedeh chaak ki, mkenreelsi ava' ki thenni dow mkheng avah msit ktaak tidit tih nei rukku kdotai chaak dok. Mleiya Mma' thenni dow mkheng avah msit ktaak kdopthut ungta Khrista kdophan chaakna' rah mmaan avah kqopktobor rek tidit kdotai pthi.

Ungta havah neiyi Mma' hinni nowlam thungki kthina ki rinkinditna' kthlowi kcha' kkurthuh mana' rah pdainu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ar'aang thungki lamrin ava ngi Isowr hinki rinkinditna' ava' kdothlowi chaakna' rang ki then.
Mleiya neiyi Mma' ungta Mma' rinkerheelna' ruhtan ava' kdodeh chaakna' rah ungta Mma' suwkthuhna' thuh lopkhat kdokurthut qhih chaakna' rah neiya Mma' diyowna' thuh kiksim kcha' ping.
Ungta talutalu yoso neiyi kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah tphaak chaak rah kdongei.
Neiyi kphan chaak doknah ava' pemeh mditmata kkurkhum chaak doknah ava' pemeh pdainu Khrista Jisu rukku nei mdotokyowna' ava' avah nei rukku kdokyown chaakna' rah kdorei chaak.
Ku'uknau rek, neiyi avah kokyowng dok kcha' ngi kirbin chmaang. Pdainu neiyi kdotlot chaak khat tah, kdil thah ka'am dow rek avah perngeel chnuh ungta kduh thah ka'am dow rek ava' kdorei chaak.
Neiyi Khrista Jisu hinni karthak ki do'own, Isowr ki nongqhat'lot ki thenni plungreelpsuk ava' ktong thah kdochenrei chaak.
Ava'leiyi plung kenreel dok kcha' rek khimkheiyi hava' plungril avah ithlowi incheh. Ungta talutalu yoso naan nih ktleiyi abinin bih, Isowr rih ava' kpha rukka ahinin nih akpurphuwn piik chraan.
Ktlowm liit kmah ngi neen nih tkolrotna' dokin pauqum ava' thung ngi nowrit khadaat tih chetin cheh ungta plungril khadaat ihorin cheh.
Ku'uknau rek, neiyi adoktedetin heppi, morson rektu' mheipqowiyin ungta neenve ngi adokpiikin titinna' ava' thung ngi kchet rek mmaan avah bih atinin.
Mleiya mii knempok ki Khrista ki khros kepteng ngi miihal kurthuwk chda ka'am a, neiyi havah naan ahinin nih mpha ktai kdothe ungta 'tunnu kqap pih ahinin nih kthe a.
Mmaan ava' ki mdonna' avah tkenveina', mpowiyin avah mmaan ki isowr. Ungta mningkyaian avah mmaan konlorna' ungta mmaan nah dultipaam ki dow rek 'leenni muplungril lihn avah mdothiik chaakin.
Mleiya neen nih paammii tkurthuhna' avah parvaan, neen nih mmun ava' ki Miksan Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah neen rukku ningkakraal lih tardat chaakin.
Mma ngi dow mkheng nampdowngda Mma' hinni teqen pchaanna' ruhtan nongtlotna' ava' dilkqowiyi, neenki dow khatleh kma' ndaksa rekin avah Mma' konlorna' daksa thung ngi mikperthlenpiik chraan.
Ava'leiyi nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek, ungta plung kdopdon chaak, kkanpatna' le' kuKruwng luwkhum ku'uknau rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni knet tih irip chaan.
Neiyi Kruwng hinni plungril khadaat adohorna' raan ki thenni Eurodia nang ahin nih akoksow chaak a ungta Syntaiki ahinin nih akoksow chaak a.

Ungta neiyi kmiiqhi kat nang ahin nih akaktham chaak a, hava' snu rek avah abomcha'. Mleiya mmaanve a kqhapaumin thung ngi Klement le' tu' ungta Rinkum ki laika thung ngi mmiing rekin tikjit dok rek nei ksoplowqhi morson rektu' nong klou kcha'sap reklam.
Mpha ktaiyi Kruwng hinni ikanpa chaan. Ungta neiyi veikhat kthe nowl a ikanpa chaan.
Naanki aplung downin avah mii mkheng hinni apdehn. Kruwng arjunna' rang avah knaitek kcha' a.
Naan nih dow khatleh ki thenni plung pyamaan, pdainu dow khimkhei 'leenni rinkthamna' le' tiqhil chaakna' ngi tpanpaak chaak tu' kilqhi ngi aktham chaakna' rekin avah Isowr hinni apdeh chaan.
Ungta tedeh pinditna' mkheng rek han'tun ki Isowr ki plung kdai ava ngi naan aplung rekin le' aplungril rekin avah Khrista Jisu ar'aang ngi akrunpiik chraan.

Mqutna' thung ngi ku'uknau rek, naan nih talutalu yoso, kindit dow rek, talutalu yoso takyat kurhuwi dow rek, talutalu yoso kindit dow rek, talutalu yoso kchiir dow rek, talutalu yoso vonsat kurhuwi dow rek, talutalu yoso mdang kqha dow rek, rinchan qhatna' ungta tpanpaak chaak kurhuwi ma'am cheentung ngi naan nih hava'le' 'leenni plung kluwt tih abin chaan.

Ungta naan nih nei kihin ki akurchuh chaakin ungta ado'arlaan chaakin ungta ado'arjaakin ungta amikin nih adodeh chaakin dow rek avah naan nih atlown ungta plung kdai ki Isowr ava ngi naanna akqhi chraan.

Pdainu neiya Kruwng hinni kdung ngi kanpa kcha' ping tidit tah naan nih nei kthen nih adokilrinqhiin avah mqutna' thah 'tunnu veikhat apandan inna. Dakat tih naan nih adotkilrinqhi chaak tlitin, pdainu adopandanna' raan ki mpha adophanin pemeh.
Neiyi havah kikriin leiyi, kdothe pemeh, tidit tah neiyi talutalu daat yoso, kokhom tlit tih ka'amna' rah kurchuk dok kcha' ping.

Neiyi taluhep pih kikriing ngi ungta taluhep pih kokhom mih ta'am rang tidit kdeh chaak dok. Mmun mkheng thuh ungta dow khimkhei thung ngi taluhep pih powikpaa ngi ungta pwoiktham mih ta'am rang ungta taluhep pih kokhom mih kikriing kperteel lih ta'am rang tidit avah kurchuk dok kcha' ping.
Neiyi kru mkaptanpiik Khrista ava' ar'aang ngi dow mkheng avah kdotlot pchaan chaak.
Anto'daat yoso, naan nih nei kyatna' thung ngi adottanqhi chaak sapin avah, naan nih kqha atlot chaak inna.

'Tun nah Philippia rek naan nih hava' rukka adeiyin, tidit tah kqhapaumin mupqhun thok thuh neiyi Mesedonia ki ksun thung ngi naan kma'don lamrinlop kuwkhat leh ngi tpiikna' le' tarlaanna' 'leenni nei tu' ktangsap kcha' ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya naan nih Thessalonika khuwpii thah ka'am thung ruk ungta kikriing ngi ka'am rukku adotbom chaak naan avah veikhat vei'knii mapthlat piik intinu.
Neiyi chla ava' kdothlaam pemeh pdainu naan aleitai rekin thung ngi mchei mkerkheel setsetna' rang ava' kthlaam kcha' ping.

Dakat tih dow mkheng kthlowi ungta kepleet tih kthlowi. Mleiya Epaphroditas hinni adotpohor chaakin dow rek mkheng ava' kdo'arlaan chaak ki, neiya kdimteer rih kthlowi a. Naan nih adotpohor chaakin chla rek avah Isowr plung ngamna' trotpiik krow rintparlaan, mikrimkdi namreng kurthuwk kcha' a.
Ungta neiki Isowr rih Mma' ki konlor svangthuhna' rek ava ngi Khrista Jisu ar'aang ngi naan akriinin mkheng avah akpii chraan.
'Tunnu neenki Isowr ungta Pa ava' hinni ktlangknai kmah ngi tponlor chaak ki i'amso. Amen.
Khrista Jisu hinni miikenje khimkhei rek avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Nei tu' ka'am unau rekki aturvuwi chaak inna.
Miikenje rek mkheng inni aturvuwi chaak inna, pdainu mkenreelsi ngi Siijar innmii rek mmaan nih aturvuwi chaak inna.
Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
Isowr plungbin nih, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi ungta nu'unnau'in Timothy ngi,

Kolossia khuwpii thuh ka'am, Khrista hinni trinchaak krow unau rekle' miikenje rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak inna. N'paan Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Neenve ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ungta Isowr ava' hinni mpha ktai naan athenni rinkaktham chaak inni kpanpaak chaak inna.
Mleiya naan nih Khrista Jisu hinni alamrin chaakin ungta miikenje mkheng rek vonsat adolow chaakin avah neenve ngi kdo'arjaak chaakin.
Mleiya hava' plungbinpsuk avah naan athenni parvaan thah purtuwlda ka'am daat. Naan nih havah kqhapaumin ki kindit pauna thung ngi mduduh ngi ado'arjaak chaak dokin.

Kqhapaumin avah naan ahin nih tlung dokda ungta anto' heppi dultipaam mkheng thung ngi karjaamda ungta avah 'tunnu mchei kchei a. Anto' heppi naan ahinin rukku naan nih ava' arjaan tinu ungta kindit tih Isowr ki plungnee ava' adodeh chaak naan nit ki kupqhun nih kchei kcha' inptih.
Ungta naan nih neenve ngi vonsat kdolow in, suwk'owr kdokurthuh qhiin Epaphras hinki arjaak chaak inna. Mma' avah naan akchang inni Khrista ki trinchaak krow sopklow kcha' miikhat.
Mma ngi neenve kihin inni avonsatin avah Pthla ar'aang ngi purphuwng chda.

Hava'le' rukku neenve ava' kdo'arjaak naan nit ki kupqhun nih naan athen inni krinktham chaakin avah tunkpha down chvot maanring. Ungta naan nih pthla lamki tedeh pinditna' ungta luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi Mma' plungbin tedeh pinditna' thung ngi adotipdim chaakna' raan ki thenni rinkaktham kchaan ping.

Mleiya havah naan nih kqhanong khimkhei thung ngi kchei kcha' ungta Isowr ki tedeh pinditna' thung ngi kerkheelset set tih klinthang kcha' kurthuwkda kurkhum mih Mma' plung ngamna' mkheng ava' tlowda Kruwng hinni mtikkcha khat tih ache chaakna' raan ki then.
Ungta Mma' ruhtan konlor ava' dilkqowiyi kanpa tu' kilqhi ngi tidiildehna' mkheng le' ksowt tih tidiildehna' thuh ruhtan mkheng tu' adotaptan chaakin ikurthuwkso.
Mar'aang thung ngi miikenje rektu' alrou kchom mikupthutsap kchaan Pa ava' hinni kpanpaak chaak inna.
Mma ngi neen avah kjiingnu ruhtan dokhum thungki miktlan inda ungta Mma' vonsat'low Chapa ava' kruwngpaalna' thungki rah neen avah miperheel chaanda.
Mma' thung ngi neen nih tkartlanna' avah Mma' hii ar'aang ngi pnu rek toptlot piikna' avah tothlowi chaakin.
Mma' avah nmik ki tedehma Isowr arlim ava' ungta mdorpurthuh khimkhei rekki mkhatna' kqou ava'.

Mleiya parvaan ki ungta dultipaam ki nmik ki tedeh ungta nmik ki tedehma, kruwng longkhom rek yoso mditmata tpaalna' ruhtan ksin rek yoso, mditmata paamkpu rek yoso mditmata ruhtanna' rek yoso, dow mkheng avah Mma' ar'aang ngi mdopurthuh. dow mkheng avah Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' thenni mdopurthuh.
Ungta Mma' avah dow mkheng duh ki ungta Mma' thung ngi dow mkheng avah ka'am.
Mma' avah daksa ki mluwchai, lamrinlop ava'. Tidit tah dow mkheng thung ngi Mma ngi mrukrisi mkurthuhna' rah Mma' avah mkheng ki tupqhunna' ungta kdiyou arlak ki mkhatna' kqou ava'.
Mleiya Mma' thung ngi dow mkheng kurkhum mih ma'am avah Pa ava' plung ngamna' kurthuwkda.
Ungta Mma ngi dultipaam ki dow rek yoso, parvaan ki dow rek yoso, dow mkheng avah Mma ngi Mma' mdak thung ngi mdopalqhat lamna' rah, Mma' khros ki hii ava' ar'aang ngi plung kdai avah tpa'amda.
Ungta mphakhat thung ngi mrilkqha kma' nong rekki aplungrilin thung ngi miihal rek kurthuwkda ungta Mma' hinki teknenpthi dok naan avah 'tunnu Mma ngi naan avah apalqhat chaanda.
Naan avah Mma' miksut thung ngi kchiir rih ungta mraal ktaak ki ungta tupsulna' ktaak ki adotparlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni tidiyow ngi Mma' sadak ki daksa thung ngi adotpalqhat chaak dokin.

Hava' mkurthuhna' rah naan nih lamrin thung ngi i'am tlitin ungta knet tih abullin apnetin rah knet tih irip chaan. Ungta parvaan kurduh ngi ka'am downkhaal khimkhei rek hinni mdoparjaam dok ungta naan rukku ado'arjaak dokin kqhapaumin ava' ki plungbinpsuk ava' thung ki konthot chmaan. Paul neiya ava' ki sopklow kcha' khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.

'Tunnu neiya naan athenni tyartraan kdoperteelna' rek thung ngi kanpa kcha' ping. Ungta Mma' daksa tidit tah lamrinlop ava' ki thenni Khrista ngi mdoptat dok tyattraanna' rek avah nei kdaksa thung ngi mipdimpiik chda.
Isowr soplowna' ava' kdopurkhum chaakna' rah, naan athenni nei kihin nih mdotpiik Isowr hinki suwkkenreel tkurthuhna' ava' dilkqowiyi neiya ava' ki sopklow kcha' khat ping.
Mpha tyatya thung ngi ungta suruwl rek tya thung ngi kordowl lih ka'am kcha' paukordowl avah 'tunnu Mma' miikenje rek hinni mpandan piiklam a.
Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek arlak ki miikenje rek mmaan hinni hava' paukordowl ki mkonlor chaakna'si avah tepdeh rah bin chda. Mleiya konlor plungbinpsuk ki naan athung inni ka'am Khrista ava'.

Mma' avah neenve ngi kdopurphuwn chaakin. Mleiya naan nih mii khimkhei avah Khrista Jisu hinni kurkhum deek ki kdoparlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni mii khimkhei hinni pilqhit chaannu ungta luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi mii khimkheiya kdopurchuh chaakin.
Hava' rang ki thenni, nei kthung ngi mruh ktang dok ki nong ktlow Mma' ruhtan nih nei rukku nong avah pelren nuh kdolow chaak.
Mleiya neiya naan athenni ungta Laodisia thuh ka'am rekki thenni ungta daksa 'lam thah nei kmai kdei kcha' mlai rek mkheng ki thenni tya klin nih kkarnaakqhi a tidit adodeh raan kdongei chaak.

Mleiya mmaan nih muplungchai rekin avah arda krok ki ungta vonsat tih makparkai chaakna' raan tidit tah mmaan nih Pa Isowr ki ungta Khrista ki, Isowr ki paukordowl ava' kindit chel lih tedeh pinditna' ki luwkinritna' mkheng ava' mdothlowi chaak raan kdongei chaak.
Mma' hinni luwkinritna' le' tedeh pinditna' ki arkhiik mkheng rek avah kordowlda ka'am.
'Tunnu kuwkhat leh ngi naan avah tupnuwm chaakna' pau rekki adotuhuwn chaakmana' raan ki thenni havah kdothe.

Mleiya neiyi daksa ngi ahinin nih ammyo ringngi pthla ngi neiya naan tu' ka'am daat ping. naan a'amqhatin ungta Khrista hinni alamrinin thung ngi knet tih ari chaakin ava' kdodeh ngi kanpa kcha' ping.
Naan nih Kruwng Khrista Jisu ado'arlaan chaak dokin heppi, naan nih Mma' thung ngi ichetin.
Naan ahinin nih adotpurchuh dokin heppi Mma' hinni arjungin apnet chaan, ipqhang chaan ungta lamrin thung ngi adopanpaak chaakin avah aperkheel setset chaan.

Naan nih ikilrindei chaan, mditma bih, kuwmiikhat tih Khrista nowpa dilkqowi kma'pa, dultipaam ki nowpa dilkqowi ki luwkinritna' ava' ar'aang ngi ungta msit ktaak tkurhuwnna' ava ngi ungta dultipaam ki nowritbul rek dilkqowiyi akuhuwng chraan.
Mleiya Khrista thung ngi Isowr kurthuwk ki mkurkhumna' mkheng avah Mma' daksa thung ngi ka'am kcha'.
Ungta naan avah paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' rek mkheng ki mluwchai Mma' ava' hinni naanna kurkhum dok kcha' inptih.
Naan nih pnu nowpa rek ava' adosupthi chaak inni, Khrista ki vunreenna' ava ngi naan rukka khut rekki treenma vuntreenna' thung ngi Mma' hinni vunkreen dok kcha' rekin ptih.

Naanna diiluwna' thung ngi Mma' tu' kulruwlve kcha'sap dokin ptih. Ava' thung ngi naan nih kdiyou thungki Mma' kperdel Isowr nongtlot ava' lam'adorin chaakin ar'aang ngi naan rukka Mma' tu' adotperdel chaak sap dokin.
Ungta naanna adoparmaan nih ungta adaksaan thuh vunkreen kma' akurthuhn nih kdiyou dok kchaan ptih. Pdainu Mma ngi adoparmanaan mkheng ava' adotoptlot piik inni Khrista tu' apring chaanda.
Neen mikepteng ngi ungta mikrisanin tikjit paureen rek avah miknuwlpthi piikinda. Ungta Mma ngi khros 'leenni avah heem pthowida midotlow pthipiik dokin.
Mma ngi paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' rek mkheng ki raaldona mdolow pthi ava ngi mmaan avah mii rek hinni tupsutda ungta khros ava ngi mmaan avah pchaangda.
Ava'leiyi naan avah thendam mditmata tneek, mditmata tporchonna' mlei rek, mditmata thla ren khat ki mditmata tkarngatnit rek 'leenni kuwkhat leh ngi a'leenin nih ayupindit maanso.
Mleiya avale' avah karvang bei rang dow rek ava' ki mapthla rek ngaal pdainu mlang avah Khrista hinni ka'am.

Naan avah mlangkmah ngi kpirdil kcha' ungta vaantamsi rek luwkbuk kcha' rek kuwkhat leh ngi naan nih ado'arlaan chaak raan anongqhat'lotin thungki ahuwng chmaanso. Ava' hep mii ava ngi mmik ki mdodehma dow rek thuh kukthuwk ki kluwt kcha' ungta mma' ki dultimii ki plungril ava ngi msit ktaak ki kpirlin kcha'.
Ungta mma' avah daksa mkheng pringda ungta ruhjom rekle' ardajom rekki parkaida kiplin thang Luwchai ava' 'leenni knet tih karkaikcha' pemeh ungta hava'le' kiplin avah Isowr.

Ava'leiyi naan nih Khrista tu' hava' dultipaam ki nowritbul rek thungki kdiyou dok kcha' akurthuhn nuh, taluleiyi naan nih dultipaam thungki tlit tih ka'am inna? Naan nih adakin avah ava' ki paureen thung ngi kakparlaan kcha' daat inptih mow?
“Naan nih avah thowngmaan, pertem maan ungta kmeimaan.”
Hava' dow rek avah tsintonna' thung ngi kqop kcha' rang ki thenni mdopurtum dok mleiya mmaan avah dultimii paupiik rekle' tpurchuhna' rek 'leenni kikbiu kcha'lam.

Hava' dow mkheng rek avah mthina ki rin'owina', mlangkma' tpirdilna' ungta daksa tuktsutmana' 'leenni luwkinritna' kthlowi kcha' rekrek heppi kandang lam. Pdainu pnu nowpa ningtlunna' kepteng ngu mruhtanin ka'am pemeh.
Naan nih Khrista tu' kerdel dok kcha' akurthuhn cheentung ngi Isowr machang thah kok'ong Khrista amna', karthaak ki dow rek ava' athlaam chaan.
Naan nih aplungrilin avah dultipaam ki dow rek 'leen kma' karthak ki dow rek 'leenni athi chaan.
Mleiya naanna kdiyou dok kcha' inptih ungta naan arinkumin avah Khrista tu' Isowr hinni kordowl lih ka'am kcha'.
Neenki nrinkumin, Khrista mkandan thung ngi, naan rukka Mma' tu' konlor rih kandang chnaandi'.

Ava'leiyi naan nih dultipaam nowparit thung ngi ka'am apna rekin avah, jowltpurjutna', totborna', sadak dongei, kthi tngeina' mkheng thungki ungta tpunjuwrna' tidit tah dow pthla luwtbukna' thungki apdiyou dokin.
Hava' dow rek leiyi, Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah tethe kopqowi kma' mii rek 'leenni kurjung rah.
Mphakhat thuh, naan nih mmaan thung ngi a'amin thuh naan rukka ava' thuh kchet inptih.
Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih hava'le' rukka adomaak pthiraan. Mleiya, plungthit, plungthit mei kquwng, miiqhatmana' ktlow, pthitda kpau, mnehr thung ngi paukkaam kna mkheng avah amapthi dokin.
Naan nih khat le' khat hinni plei kernee psuk maan, mleiya naan nih miipli avah mnongtlot rektu' adosuwpthi dokin.
Ungta naanna mukpurthuh kcha' Mma' arlim ava' dilkqowiyi tedeh pinditna' thung ngi ren kurthuwk dok kcha' miiren avah buwdiir rih adonaak chaak dokin.

Ava' thung ngu Grikmii mditmata Jihudimii tidit ka'am pemeh ungta vunkreen mditmata vunkreen kma' tidit ka'am pemeh. Ungta paam lamkla ki mii mditmata Saithia mii tidit ka'am pemeh ungta suwk'owr mditmata mii'ol tidit ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Khrista ngi dow mkheng ungta dow mkheng thung ngi ka'am.
Avaleiyi, Isowr dokchol dok kchiir ungta vonsat'low heppi, naan nih plungkham, plung kdowng plungril lih kpirdil kcha', plung kperneem, ksowt tih kdiildei kcha' avah dona ngi ana chaan.

Naan nih khat le' khat kirdiildei kcha' ungta khat le' khat kokportlot piikdei, ikurthuwkin kuwmiikhat tih khat kepteng ngi paukna am yoso, Khrista ngi adotoptlot piikin heppi naan rukku avah adotlot raan.
Pdainu hava' dow mkheng rek ava' karthak ki, kurkhum deek ki akbowlin, vonsat avah buwdiir rih ana chaan.
Ungta avah daksa khadaat thung ngi adoto'own doknaan, Isowr ki plungdaina' ava ngi aplungril rekin ki mukpu apthutin ungta kpanpaak dei kcha' ikurthuwkin.

Khrista ki pauna ava ngi luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi naan athung ngi kepleet tih ka'am ikurthuwkso! Naan nih plungnee tu' aplung inni Kruwng hinni laa athe chaakin thuh, khat le' khat avah luwbuklaa ngi ungta tpanpaakna' laa ngi ungta pthla lamki laa ngi ikpurchuk chaan ungta ikorsop chaan.
Ungta naan nih talutalu yoso pauna ngi mditmata nongtlot tih adotlotnaan mkheng thung ngi Kruwng Jisu miing ngi dow mkheng avah atlown, ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi Pa Isowr hinni apanpaak chaan.
Nuwn rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni kurthutjik ava' heppi naan naanki a'innpu rekin hinni ikparlaan chaan.
Innpu rek, naan nih naan naanki anuwn rekin avah vonsat alown ungta mmaan hinni kkha ngi korthlong maan.
Nau rek, naan nih dow mkheng thung ngi anuh le' apa dothe apqowiyin. Mleiya havah Kruwng hinni kdung ngi plung ngamna'
Mpa rek, anau rekin avah mdokthitna' raanni raimaan mditma bih, mardaan kthi rah.

Suwk'owr rek, naan nih dow mkheng thung ngi naanki, dultipaam ki akpu rekin hinni tethe apqowi chaan ungta mii rek hinni miiplung ngamna' ktlow rek dotlot heppi miksut nongtlot tih tlowmaan. Pdainu naan nih plung kluwt tih Isowr kqikcha ngi atlown.
Ungta talutalu yoso atlotin thuh, dultimii hin kma' Kruwng hinni totlot heppi, aplungrinin tu' korthlop pih atlown.
Mleiya Kruwng hinki alrouchomna' avah nongqhat'lot tih arlaang chnikaan tidit adodehn. Mleiya naan nih Kruwng Khrista sop'adolow chaakin.
Pdainu karmak ktlow kcha' mma' hinni mma ngi karmak mdotlot avah kpii perheel rah ungta ava' thuh tbom le' tsuwpsitna' ka'am pemeh.
Mukpu rek, naan nih parvaan thah naanki Mukpu khat ka'am tidit adodeh inni, asuwk'owr rekin avah kurthutjik ki ungta kqha ngi apii chaan.
Naan nih kilrin kcha' ngi ungta tpanpaak chaak ki adakin avah kdet'liit kmah rintakthamna' 'leenni plung apluwt chaan.

Ava'arlak ki nei rukku thiirrii ngi kkorbowlna' Khrista ki paukordowl avah neenve ngi kdoparjaam chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih thurngut mdotapvan piikna' raan neen kthen inni rinmheiktham piik chaan.
Mleiya neiyi kdothe rang heppi, neiyi kdopandan pchaan chaakna' rah rinmheiktham piik chaan.
Duwn ki rek hinni ache'atlownin 'leenni luwkinrit tih i'amin ungta mpha avah aktlan chaan.
Mleiya naan nih mii khimkhei rek hinni ado'arthaan raan heppi ado'arthaan pchaanna' raan ki thenni mpha ktaiyi apauin avah plungnee tu' ungta ptika'al deek apthutin.
Vonsat'low nu'unnau'in, trinchaak krow sopklow kcha' mii, Kruwng Jisu hinni suwk'owr khatsap kdokurthuhqhi, Tikaikas tih nei klei ki pauren mkheng avah akthepiik chraan.
Neiyi mma' avah naan ahin nih, hava' nongrit kat ki thenni, tidit tah mma ngi naanki a'amrinchanin mdodehna' rah ungta aplungin adotoksow chaakna' raan ki thenni mma' avah ahinin nih kdopthlat chaak.
Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi trinchaak krow ungta vonsat'low nu'unnau in, naan arlakin ki khat, Onesimas tu' kapthlat chaak lam a. Mmaanve ngi hava' thah kthuwk dow mkheng avah akepdeh chraan.

Neiyi rowngmii kdokurthuhqhi Aristarkas tih Barnabas tu' unau kthuwk Mark tu' aturvuwi chaak inna. Mma' leiyi, naan nih tkerthe piikna' rek avah ado'arlaan chaak dokin, mma ngi ahinin nih mthlen cheentung ngi arlaangdei chaan.

Ungta Jastas mdoditin, Jisu rukku aturvuwi chaak inna. Hava'le' ava' daat chrel avah Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki thenni nei ksoplowqhi reklam, mmaan avah vunkreen kcha' rek thungki lam ungta mmaan nah nei kuplungchai rekkat lam.

naan arlakin ki khat, Epaphras, Khrista ki suwk'owr khat ava ngi aturvuwi chaak inna. Mma ngi mpha ktaiyi, naan nih Isowr plungbin mkheng thung ngi knet tih ari pchaanna' raan ungta akurkhum chaakna' raan ki thenni rinkthamna' thung ngi kdet'liit kmah kdung ngi nong mdolow chaak.
Mma ngi naan athenni ungta Laodisia thung le' Hieropolis khuwpii thung ngi ka'am rek mmaan ki thenni kepner dok ki nong mtlot chaak a tidit ki sakhi avah neiyi kpiik chaak a.
Vonsat'low riipu, Luke le' Demas tih aturvuwi chaak inna.
Laodisia thung ngi ka'am unau rek hinni ungta Nimphia le' mi'inn thuh ka'am lamrinlop ava' hinni mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.

'Tunnu naan nih hava' paukjit avah naan arlak inni aparcham dokin dilli, Laodisia rekki lamrinlop ava'hin rukku tpat tih ka'am immow, tidit asuwn. Ungta naan nih anto' heppi Laodisia thungki paukjit ava' rukka naan rukku aparchamin.
Ungta Arkippas hinni, “Nang ngi avah adopurkhumna' rang ki thenni Kruwng hinni nang ngi ado'arlaan dok soptolowna' avah akilrinqhi' cha, adiin rah, mheithe piik chaan.
Hava' tkurvuwina' avah Paul nei kukhut kat tih kdokjit chaak. Nei kthiirrii rek avah abinphaakin. naan ahin nih plungnee avah ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.

Paul le' Silvenas ungta Timothy neen nih Pa Isowr hinni ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni ka'am Thessalonika ki lamrinlop ahinin nih kikjit chaak inna. Neen ki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Neen nih krinktham chaak rekin thung ngi naan amiingin the innu mpha ktaiyi naan akhengin ki thenni Isowr rah kdopanpaak chaakin.

Neen nih Isowr ungta N'paan ava' ar'aang ngi naanki alamrinin ki anong rekin, vonsat ki anong rekin ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni plungbinpsuk ki adodiildeh chaak naan avah kdet'liit kmah kdobinphaak chaakin.
Vonsat'low ku'uknau rek, naanna Isowr dokchol ksa rekin ptih tidit neen nih kdehn.

Mleiya naan ahin nih, neenki kqhapaumin avah pauna rek daat tih kthleng pemeh. Pdainu ruhtan nih ungta Pthla Kchiir thung ngi ungta mkindit kukthuwk dok ki kthleng. Anto' heppi neen nih naan athenni a'arlak innu taluhep pih arvang ka'am inping tidit avah adodeh dokin.

Ungta naan nih Pthla Kchiir rih adotpiik chaakin tkanpatna' tu' kilqhi ngi kdung ngi tyattraanna' phang chdaat yown tih pauna avah ado'arlaan chaakin. Ava' avangi neen kdilin kqowi kcha' ungta Kruwng dilkqowi kcha' rek kurthuwk chaan tinu.
Ungta ava ngi naanna Mesedonia le' Akhaia thungki lamkrin kcha' mkheng rek hinni titinna' rekin ptih.

Mleiya Mesedonia le' Akhaia thung daat kma' mmun khimkhei thung ngi, Kruwng pauna avah naan athungki ngi marchaang kthuwk dok kcha' a. Mleiya Isowr ktong thah naanki alamrin chaakin avah kchet dok kcha' a, ava' vah neen nih naan ahin nih dow khatleh kdothena' raan ki msit ammeh.

Mleiya taluhep kduh ki tarlaan chaakna ngi neenna atarlaan chaakin tidit avah mmaan mthinaan nih mdopandan chaakin. Ungta mmaan nih taluhep pih naan nih kring ungta kindit Isowr ava' sopklow chrang ngi dow pthla rek hinki ngi Isowr hinni kerheel dok kcha' inptih, tidit avah mtheen.
Ungta karvang rang plungthit mei kquwng ava' thung ki mikaktlanin Jisu, kdiyou thungki Mma ngi mdoperdel Mma' Chapa, parvaan ki kurjung rang ava' ado'ardat chaakin avah kihinin nih msonin.
Mleiya ku'uknau rek, neen nih naan ahinin nih kthlenin avah msit ammana' ammeh tidit avah naan nih adehn.

Neen nih mduh ngi Philippia khuwpii thung ngi tyattraan perteel innu ungta ningkya mdotpiik chaakin avah naan nih adehn. Pdainu neenki Isowr rih mdotbom chaak inni neen nih kdung ngi mkeptengin am chyoso naan ahin nih Isowr ki kqhapaumin avah changkarngam mih kdosit chaak pchaanin.
Mleiya neenki tkorsowna' pau avah tkurhuwnna' mditmata totborna' thungki kthuwk pemeh, mditmata tekpermenna' thungkilu pemeh.

Pdainu neen nih Isowr rih kqhapaumin ksin rang ngi mdoperteel dok ksa mii rek heppi kpau kchaan ping. Neenna dultimii plung ngamna' ktlown pmaanring pdainu kuplung rekin kperteel Isowr plungngam ktlow kcha' rek inping.
Mleiya naan nih adodehn, neen nih teden rukku paukdau kdonaaknaan ka'am pemeh mditmata kpunjuwrrin kordowlna ngi maikok kdoptlotnaan ka'am pemeh, havah Isowr rih mdeh.

Neenna dultimii rek dopanpaak rah tidit tah naan dopanpaak rah mditmata morson kuwmiikhat dopanpaak rah kthlaamin pmaanring. Khrista ki tamsi rek kurthuwk ki neenna naan abowrrin riina' kurthuwk krown ping.
Pdainu mnuh ngi mnau mdokilrinqhi chaak heppi, neenna naan arlak innu plung kperneem mih ka'am kchaan ping.

Neen nih naan avah kdung ngi vonsat adoklow chaakin, Neen nih naan ahin nih Isowr ki kqhapaumin daat kma' neenki krinchan rekin kpha ruk plung kngam mih adokparlaan chaakin, mleiya naan avah neen kvonsat'low rekin ptih.

Mleiya ku’uknau rek, neen nih Isowr ki kqhapumin ahinin nih kparjaam chaakin thung ngi, naan kuwkhat leh hinni mbowrriina' kkurthuh mana' raan ki thenni neen nih suwn le' jaan nih nong kdolow chaakin. Ungta suwkkthuwk ki knonglow chaakin avah binphaak mun naandi'.

Lamkrin kcha' rek naan a'arlak inni ka'amin thuh kchiir rih, rinkindit tih ungta tupsulna' ktaak ki neen nih kdakin avah taluhep pih arvang ka'am inping tidit ki sakhi avah naan le' Isowr ka'am daat a.
Mleiya neen nih naan khimkhei avah mpa ngi mnaukat rek hinni mdotlot heppi taluhep pih akoksow chaakin, plungngam akpiikin tidit avah naan nih adehn.
Ungta Mma' mdak ki kruwngpaalna' ungta tkonlorna' thungki rang ngi ayuko'own kchaan Isowr ava' aang ngi trinchaak krow ngi ache chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni aksiduwl chaak inna.

Hava' leiyi, neen rukku Isowr rah kdet'liit kmah kdopanpaak chaakin. Mleiya naan nih neen kihin ki ado'arjaakin Isowr pauna avah dultimii rek pauna hep kmah ngi, pdainu kindit tih Isowr pauna tidit tih ado'arlaan chaak dokin. Ava'kat ava ngi 'tun rukku lamkrin kcha' rek naan ahin nih knet tih nong mtlotmeek sli a.

Mleiya, unau rek, naan nih Jisu Khrista hinni ka'am Judia paamkuwl thungki Isowr lamrinlop rek dotlot ava' kopqowi kcha' ikurthuwk in. Mleiya lamrinlop rekki Jihudi rek hinki tyattraan mdoperteel chaakin hephep pih naan rukku akhuwpaamin thungki mii rek hinki tyattraan adoperteel chaakin.

Mmaan ava ngi, Kruwng Jisu ruk ungta mmaan ki khulpu rek rukka eyou lamda ungta neen rukka tyat chiireelna' mipiinda. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr plungngam tlow chlammeh ungta mii mkheng ruk kepteng ngi ka'am lam.

Neen nih, mmaan nih karsan kcha' mdophan chaakna' raan ki thenni Chaatktlei rek hinni kpau chaak raan avah mmaan nih mapkhaan inda. Ungta hanto ngi mpha ktaiyi mdotlotin ava ngi mupnu rekin avah mqutna'dek kpha ngi purtuwl chlamda. Pdainu Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah mmaan 'leenni mqutna'dek ki kurjung a.

Pdainu ku'uknau rek, mpha mruk ki thenni neen avah naan ahinki mpenqhen pthiinda kerdei myownmin, naanna kuplungrilin thung ngi ka'am tlit daat inptih. Neen nih kdung ngi adokdeh nuwm chaak inni, amaiyin tedehna' rah ktlot chaak meeksli inna.
Ava'leiyi, neen nih naan ahin nih tethlen rah ngei innu. Paul nei rukka vei'knii kpha thung ngi kthlenna' rah tlow chnuh pdainu Seitan nih mapkhaan tlit chda.
Mleiya neenki kuplung binpsukin laar kkanpatnaan, kikpirchiirnaan, luwkhum avah taluda? Mleiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista murjun thuh Mma' aang ngi kkonlor chaakna' raan avah naan pemeh mow?
Mleiya naan avah neenki kkonlornaan ungta kkanpatnaan ptih.
Ava'leiyi, neen ngi ava' avah kdiil pchaanmah reenin thungta neen ngi Athen khuwpii thung ngi ka'am chaak daat inni kqha rah tidit tih bin innu.

Ungta neenve ngi Khrista ki kqhapaumin thung ngi knong lowqhiin ungta Isowr ki sopklow kcha' mii, nu'unnau'in Timothy avah naan ahinin nih kapthlat chaak inna. Mma ngi naanki alamrinin leiyi, ayukapqhang chraan ungta akoksop chraan.
Mleiya hava' tyattraanna' ava ngi kuwkhat leh rukka knok mso, mleiya neenna hava' ki thenni midotokchol chaak dokin, tidit avah naan nih kindit tih adodeh chaak dokin.

Tidit tah neen nih naan ahin nih ka'amin thung ngi, neen nih tyattraanna' kdung avah kperteel rah nthe inna, diin nuh mduh thah kdothe dokin. Ungta avah anto'kat tih kthuwk ungta avah naan nih adodeh dokin.

Hava'lei kat tih neiyi ava' avah kdiil porson pchaanmah thungta naan alamrinin tedehna' rang ki thenni mii kdopthlat. Mditma bih, kepthleempa ava ngi apthleem indon, neenki knonglow chaakin avah msit ktaak kurthuwk chrah.

Pdainu 'tunnu Timothy a naan ahinki ngi neenve kihin nih ktlung dok kcha' a ungta mma ngi naan alamrinin le' avonsatin ki mleiyi pauren kqha avah neene kihin nih mtlunqhi a. Ungta naan nih neenve mpha ktai thuh kqhajik ki atbinphaak chaak inna ungta kdung ngi neenve avah tedeh rah atbin chaak inna tidit karjaak chaak inna ungta neenve rukku naan avah tedeh rah akbin chaak inna.
Ava'leiyi ku'uknau rekin, neenve ki kyatkraan naan le' kdokriinin mkheng avah naan alamrinin leiyi, neenve a mtoksow chaak inna.
Mleiya 'tunnu naan nih Kruwng hinni knet tih ari chaakin bih, neenna kring kcha' dakdak inpimin.
Mleiya Isowr aang ngi naan alei inni kkanpat chaakin ki tkanpatna' mkheng ki thenni naan athenni taluhep pih Isowr rah panpaak chnikaandi o?
Neenve ngi naan amaiyin deida ungta alamrin chaakin thung ngi kapta dok ava' kdopurkhum chaakna' raan ki thenni suwn le' jaan nih kdungsi ngi rinkdoktham chaakin.
'Tunnu neenki Npa ungta Isowr mdakkat tih ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ngi naan ahin nih neenve ki k'lamin avah mheiqhi chaanso.
Ungta neenve ngi naan ahin nih kdotlotin heppi, Kruwng ngi naan avah apnem thang setset inso ungta naan nih khat le' khat hinni ungta mii mkheng hinni vonsat tih kdim ayupurthuh chaanso.

Ava ngi naan avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ngi Mma' miikenje mkheng rektu' murjunqum thung ngi, neenki N'paan ungta Isowr ava' aang ngi tchiirna' thung ngi tupsulna' ktaak ki naan aplungchai rekin avah akapqhanpiik chraan.

Mqutna' thung ngi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih neenve kihin ki ado'arlaan chaak dokin heppi, taluhep pih chetda Isowr plung ngamna' tkurthuh rang tidit leiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu hinni, tidit tah naan nih akurkhum setsetna' raan ki thenni akaktham chaak inna ungta akoksow chaak inna.
Mleiya Kruwng Jisu ar'aang ngi neenve ngi talu paupiik akpiikin, tidit avah naan nih adehn.
Mleiya havah Isowr plungbin ava', tidit tah naan nih akenjet chaakna' raan ki thenni jowltpurjutna' thungki ikekneeng chaan.
Tidit tah naan khimkheiyi taluhep pih apna apna rekin avah kenje ngi ungta takyat chaak ki tirkhiik rang tidit avah adodeh chaak raan.
Isowr kdei kma' Chaatktlei rek heppi daksa dongei thung ngi a'am raan pemeh.

Tidit tah kuwkhat leh ngi mu'umnau khat avah hava' leenni changqhatna' louda tuprutna' rang ki thenni mdohuwn chaak rang pemeh. Mleiya Kruwng nga ava'lu hep daat mkheng 'leenni phuw klou rang ava' ungta neenve rukku mduh thah adokpilqhit chaakin ungta kdothe pindit chaak dokin.
Mleiya Isowr rih neen avah totborna' thung ngi midoto'own in pemeh pdainu kenjetna' thung ngi midoto'own chaakin.
Ava'leiyi hava' kikthitna' kuwmiikhat ava ngi dultimii kthitna' meh pdainu neen nihin nih, Mma' ki Pthla Kchiir mikpiin Isowr ava' mdokthitna'.

Pdainu unau heppi vonsat tkorlowna' ki thenvah neiyi naan ahin nih kdokjitna' rang ki msit ammeh. Mleiya khat le' khat vonsat tkorlowna' avah naan adak katin ahinin nih Isowr rih adotpurchuh chaak dokin.
Ungta anto'kat tih naan nih Mesedonia thung ngi ka'am unau rek mkheng hinni avah adotlot chaakin. Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naan nih avah adotlot setsetna' raan ki thenni akoksow chaak inna.
Tidit tah neenve ngi naan ahinin nih paupiik adokpiik dokin heppi, kdaideek ki anongin thung ngi plung adopluw chaakna' raan, akhutkat inni nong adotlotna' raan kdung ngi plung aprip chaan.
Mleiya havah naan nih duwn thah ka'am rek aang ngi kurkhum deek ki ache chaakna' raan ungta dow khatleh adoptat mana' raan ki then.
Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naan nih muplungbinpsukin ktaak mmaan ava' heppi aplungin myatmana' rah, naan nih ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaan ki mlei ava' kdei kmah a'am raan avah ngei maang.
Mleiya neenni Jisu a diyouda ungta kring kerheel tidit lam'nrin chaakin bih, anto' heppi, Jisu hinni ki'iip kcha' dow rek mmaan avah Isowr rih Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' tu' kqhi perheel sap lamrah.

Mleiya Kruwng pauna ngi neenve ngi havah naan ahinin nih kthe inna. Tidit tah Kruwng arjun kpha thung ngi kring daat ungta ka'am daat neen ava ngi talutalu yoso ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaanduh tqowi votin nimeh.

Mleiya Kruwng mdakkat ava ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngdon, vaantamsi kenreel khat ava' krowl tu' ungta Isowr puwtit tu' kilqhi ngi parvaan ki arjung kqum rah. Ungta Khrista hinni kdiyou dok kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi rukrirep pih kerdel chlam rah.

Audilrow ngi kring daat ungta ka'am daat neen avah mmaan tu' kilqhi ngi tirthli thuh Kruwng kurdutqhi rang ngi armei rek thung ngi mi'arjuk kchom chraan. Ungta anto ngi neenna mpha ktai thuh Kruwng tu' ta'am chaak raan.
Ava'leiyi, naan nih hava' pauna rek ava ngi khat le' khat avah plungngam ikirpii chaan.
Pdainu ku'uknau rek, mpha rekle' mkum'armik rekki thenvah neiyi naan ahin nih kdokjitna' rang ki msit ammeh.
Mleiya Kruwng nit avah kupru khat tih jaan nih mthlen heppi kthleng rah tidit avah naan adak inni kindit tih adodeh chaak dokin.

Mleiya mmaan nih: “Plung kdai ungta ningqitna' ammeh!” mditin cheu vonkchowi rang snu powidun heppi m'tunkat daat tih m'leenin nih tkenveina' thuwkda. Ungta mmaan nah ava' thung ki kerthlet pchaang liit lam nimeh.
Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naanna kjiingnu thuh ka'am inptipmeh, ava'leiyi hava' nit ava ngi kupru thlen heppi adotphaak raan pemeh.
Naan akhengin avah mar'aang mii rekin ptih ungta khuvaar ki mii rekin ptih. Neenna jaanki mditmata kjiingnu thungki inpmin meh.
Ava'leiyi, neen nih morson rek dotlot heppi iipmaan cheh pdainu ihardei incheh ungta kilrindei ikurthuwk incheh.
Mleiya ki'iip rek, mmaan avah jaan nih ki'iiplam ungta kipri rek mmaan ava ngi jaan nih kipri lam.
Pdainu khuvaar ki neen ava ngi lamrin le' vonsat ki plungkeh ipkeenche rah ungta tkirliinna' ki plungbinpsuk avah luwkhum heppi ikhum incheh rah ikilrin chaan cheh.
Mleiya Isowr rih neen avah plungthit mei kquwng ki thenni midotokcholin pemeh pdainu neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi tkirliinna' kthlowi chrah midoto'own chaakin.
Mma ngi neen nthen inni midipiik inda, tidit tah neen nih hardaat yowmin mditmata iipdok chyownmin neen nih Mma' tu' mpha ktai ta'am chaak raan.
Ava'leiyi, naan rukku adotlot meekin heppi khat le' khat ikorsop dei chaan ungta ikparqhang dei chaan.
Ku'uknau rek, naan nih a'arlak inni nong ktlow kcha' rek ungta Kruwng hinni atun inni amda akpindit kcha' rekin mmaan avah adodeh pinditna' raan ki thenni akoksow chaak inna.
Ungta naan nih mmaan avah mnong rekin leiyi, vonsat tih kdung ngi kparthaang ngi abin chaan. Naan nih khat le' khat arlak ki plung kdaiyi i'amin.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neenve ngi akoksow chaak inna tidit tah naan nih tethelal rek avah apilqhitin ungta plung kdil rek avah plungngam apiin, mruh kdowng rek abomin ungta mii mkheng tu' ikirdiildei chaan.
Ungta naan kuwkhat leh ngi kthi ktlow ki thenni kthi tpenletmana' rah asuw deiyin pdainu naan adakin ki then ruk ungta mii mkheng ki then rukku mpha ktai kqha avah areidei chaan.
Mpha ktai ikanpadei chaan.
Kdet'liit kmah rin'ikthamdei chaan.
Dow mkheng 'leenni apanpaak chaan, mleiya naan athenni Khrista Jisu hinni havah Isowr ki plungbin.
Naan nih Pthla avah archuw pthimaan.
Naan nih pau tpurphuwn avah tukksut kma' tlowmaan.
Dow mkheng avah aperteelin ungta kindit avah knet tih akyowng chaan.
Kthi khimkhei rek thungki ikekneeng chaan.

'Tunnu plung kdai ki Isowr mdakkat tih naan avah ayupchiirdang chaanso. Ungta naanki apthlaan mkheng, apthlarinin mkheng ungta adaksaan avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista murjun thung ngi tupsulna' ktaak ki adotirkhiik piikin ikurthuwkso.
Mleiya naan ako'own kchaan Mma' avah trinchaak krow ungta Mma ngi ava' rukka ktlow rah.
Ku'uknau rek, neen kthen inni rinmheiktham piik chaan.
Unau rek mkheng avah kchiir kurputna ngi ikurvuwi chaan.
Neiyi hava' laika avah kchiir unau mkheng rek hinni adoparchamna' raan ki thenni Kruwng miing ngi aksi chaak inna.
Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Paul neiyi Silvenas le' Timothy le' tu', neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni Thessalonika thungki lamrinlop hinni kikjit chaak a.
Naan ahin nih neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh plung kdai avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.

Neenna mpha ktaiyi naan athenni Isowr avah kdopanpaak chaak raan thah tlada ungta avah mkindit kat. Mleiyi naan alamrinin avah kdung ngi kerkheel setsetda ungta naan khimkheiyi khat le' khat ki thenni vonsat akorlow chaakin avah nemthang setsetda.

Tidit tah naan nih adodiil chaak pchaanin ungta tyat chiireelna' adoperteel chaakin mkheng thungki alamrinin ungta suwkthuh chiireelna' adoperteel chaakin ava ngi neen nih Isowr ki lamrinlop rek hinni kdak inni naan athung ngi kponlor kchaan ping.

Hava' mkheng ava ngi Isowr paupinditna' avah kindit tidit mpandan a, mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki thenni naanna mtik kcha tidit tih aktai chdaatin krow. Tidit tah naan rukku ava' ki thenni tyattraanna' adoperteel chaakin.
Isowr rah mrinkindit, tidit tah naan akapya rekin 'leenni Isowr rih suwkthuh chiireelna' kpenlet piik chdaat lamrah.
Ungta Kruwng Jisu ngi Mma' vaantamsi laarruhtan kthlowi rektu' parvaan ki ngi mkurphuwnin thung ngi plungyatna' kperteel kcha' rek naan avah neen tu' karngasap chnaandi'.
Ungta Isowr kdei kma' ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki kqhapaumin kopqowi kma' rek mmaan ava' 'leenni kquwng meek meiyi phuw klou rah.
Mmaan avah Kruwng aangki ungta Mma' ruhtan ki tkonlorna' thungki ngi ktlangknai kma' tkenveina' thuh phuw klou rah.

Mleiya Mma' miikenje rek thung ngi konlor chrang ngi ungta lamkrin kcha' mkheng rek thung ngi mikchukna' rang ngi, Mma ngi murjunna' nit ava' thung ngi naan rukka yau chnaandi'. Tidit tah, neen nih kdopiikin rinpaumin avah naan nih lam'adorin chaakin.

Neen nih hava' kdobin chaak inni, tidit tah neenki Isowr rih naan avah hava' to'ownna' ava' thuh ttai ki mtik kcha adotpurthuhna' raan, ungta Mma' hinki taqhatna' ava ngi naanki kqha plungbin mkheng, ungta ruhtan tu' alamrinin ki nong avah adotuptlun piikna' raan ki thenni, neen rukku mpha ktaiyi naan athen inni rinkdoktham chaakin.

Mleiya havah neenki Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ava' dilkqowiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing avah naan athung inni ungta naan avah Mma' thung ngi konlor kcha' mkurthuhna' rang ki then.
'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah kurjung rah ungta neen nih Mma' hinni tkurkusap chaak raan. Mlei hava' leiyi neen nih naan ahin nih hanto ngi akaktham chaak inna.

Tidit tah naan aplungrilin avah kbeisek ki maknat rang pemeh mditmata Khrista ki nit avah ktlung dok a, dida, neen kihinin ki heppi, pthla ngi mditmata pauna ngi mditmata paukjit tih mthena, ava' thung ngi plungyat adothlowi raan pemeh.

Naan avah kuwkhat tih talutalu 'leen yoso ahuwng chmaanso. Mleiya lamrin tepthleina' choduh kthuwk rah ungta kenvei chrang chapa, tidit tah pnu kervei mii ava' mpurphuwn duh khimkheiyi, nit avah thuwk khot nimeh.

Mma' ava ngi dow mkheng ki mkarthak tidit tah Isowr mditmata luwtbuk chaak ava' kikthitna' rah ungta mthina ngi ktaparthaang chrah ungta ava ngi, mma ngi Isowr luwbuk'inn thuh kok'ong rah ungta mdak ki, Isowr ping kirdi chrah.
Neiyi naan tu' ka'amsap thung ngi hava' dow rek avah ahinin nih kdothe dok, avah binphaak maan timow?
Ungta 'tunnu, mma ngi mma' ki mphakat thung ngi mkurphuwnna' rang ki thenni talu ngi mma' avah mokyown a tidit avah naan vah adehn a.
Mleiya nowlam tukksut kma' ki paukordowl ki mnong avah kandang dok kcha' a. Pdainu ava' kokyowng ava ngi mma' avah 'lam thungki mlowpthi duh kpha ngi kokyowng tlit daat rah.
Ungta ava'dil lih Kruwng ngi mtadaal lih mdopquwn pthi rang ungta Mma' arjun thungki kepleu ava ngi mdopenvei pthi rang, nowlam ktaak khat avah kpandang rah.
Mma' mdakkat thuh rang avah Seitan nongtlot rek, tidit tah ruhtanna' ungta titinna' mkheng rektu' ungta mlangkma' pleiknei rektu' kilqhi ngi kthuwk rah.
Ungta rinkinditmana' thuh kenvei chrang rek mmaan ava' tuhuwn chaakna' rek mkheng tu' kilqhi ngi kthuwk rah. Mleiya mmaan nih mkarsan chaakna' raan kindit ki vonsat avah mdo'arlaan chaakin pemeh.
Ungta hava' leiyi Isowr rih mmaan nih kuhuwng kcha' khat ava' lammdorin chaakna' raan mlangkma' lamrin klin avah mmaan hinni mdopiik lam.
Mleiya ava ngi kindit ava' lamkrin kma' ungta rinkinditmana' kngei kcha' mmaan mkheng rek ava' tupsulna' thuh ktla chlam rah.

Pdainu Kruwng vonsat'low ku'uknau rek, naan athen inni neenna mpha ktaiyi Isowr avah kdopanpaak chaak raan thah tlada. Mleiya Pthla ava ngi adotpenje chaak inni ungta kindit ava' lam'adorin chaak inni mbulbul lih Isowr rih naan avah tkirliinna' thuh adotokchol chaak dokin.
Mleiya naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki konlorna' ava' adophan chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi naan avah neenki kqhapaumin thung ngi adoto'own chaak dokin.
Avaleiyi ku'uknau rek, naan nih pauna ngi mditmata paukjit daat yoso ngi naan ahin nih tukpurchuh dokin nowpa rek ava' thung ngi knet tih irip chaan.
'Tunnu plungnee ngi vonsat miklow kchaan ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi ardarow le' plungbinpsuk kqha mikpii kchaan, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista mdakkat le' neenki Npa ungta Isowr ava ngi,
aplungchaiyin thung ngi avah plungngam ayupii chaanso. Ungta pauna le' kqhanong khimkhei rek ava ngi naan avah ayupqhang chaanso.

Mqutna' rel lih, ku'uknau rek, naan nih naan a'leenin ki heppi, Kruwng pauna avah kapkhaan ktaak liit tih mkoryou thang setsetna' rah ungta mkonlor chaakna' rah neen kthen nih rin'mheiktham piik chaan.
Ungta neen avah mrilkqha kma' ungta kqha kma' mii rek hinki mdotaktlan chaakna' raan rin'mheiktham piik chaan. Tidit tah mii mkheng ngi lamrin avah mdothlowi chaak sap pemeh.
Pdainu Kruwng avah trinchaak krow, Mma ngi naan avah akapqhang chraan ungta kqha kma' thungki akirkhi chraan.
Ungta neen nih, naan ahin nih paupiik adokpiikin dow rek avah naan nih totlot ruk tlown tinu ungta 'tun ruk tlow tlit naandi' tidit tih naan aleiyi Kruwng hinni plungkrip kthlowi chaak inna.
Ungta 'tunnu Kruwng ngi, Isowr vonsat tolowna' thuh ungta Khrista ki tidiildehna' thung ngi aplungchai rekin avah ayu'arkhiik piik chaanso.

'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neen nih Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi paupiik akpiik chaak inna. Mleiya naan nih, karnaak deek ki kchet kma' ungta mma ngi neen kihin ki mdo'arlaan chaak nowpa thung ngi kchet kma' unau khimkhei rek hinki adak inni ikekneeng chaan.
Mleiya naan adak kat inni taluhep kduh ava' kdopqowi raan tidit avah adodehn. Mleiya neen nih naan arlak ki karnaak kmah ngi ka'amin pmaanring.

Mditmata neen nih kuwkhat leh hinki kartlaiyi thenpen chamaan ring. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih, naan kuwkhat leh ki bowrriina' kkurthuh mana' raan ki thenni suwn le' jaan nih nonglou innu ungta kya dok ki nonglou innu arvang ka'am inping.
Mleiya avah neen nih miidobomna' rang ki ruhtan kthlowima naan nih ava' pemeh pdainu neen nih, naan athenni bitinna' khat tkurthuh rah kdongei chaakin lei.
Mleiya neen nih naan ahinin nih ka'amin thung rukku, neen nih hava' paupiik avah adopiikin. Tidit tah kuwmiikhat tih nong klou nuwm kma' ma'am bih tchaak rukku cha mso.
Mleiya neen nih naan a'arlak inni howngkva rek ka'am lam a ungta mmaan nah nonglou lammeh pdainu miinong mnong kupthut, karnaak ki kchet kma' mii ka'am lam a tidit karjaak inna.

'Tunnu ava' hep mii rek hinni, neen nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing 'leenni paupiik kpiik chaak inna ungta toksow ruk koksow chaak inna. Tidit tah mmaan nih kdairim mih nong alou chlamso ungta mdochaak raan mthendamin avah alow chlamso.
Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naan nih kqha totlot chaak 'leenni ning kepneel thlowi maan.
Ungta naan nih hava' paukjit thung ngi kdokjitin kpauna rekin ava' kopqowi kma' kuwmiikhat ma'am cheentung ngi mma' avah bih atinin. Ungta mningkyana' rah, naan nih mma' avah korthlow qhimaan.
Anto'daat yoso, naan nih mma' avah miihal khat heppi tlowmaan pdainu unau khat heppi archakin.
'Tunnu plung kdai ki Kruwng mdakkat ava ngi naan ahin nih, mpha ktai thuh ungta milamktai thuh plung kdai avah ayupii chaanso. Kruwng avah naan akhengin ahin inni ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Paul neiyi hava' pau'arvuwi avah neiki kpaukjit khimkhei thung ngi mkinditna' khat tih hanto ngi kikjit chaak a.
Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin a'leenin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Neenki nuplung binpsukin Kruwng Jisu Khrista le' Miksan Isowr ki paureen ava' ar'aang ngi Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi, ahin nih kikjit chaak a.
Timothy nang nga Lamrin thung ngi kchapa kat ptih.Neenki Npa Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki Plungnee, plungqhat ungta plung kdai avah nang ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.

Neiyi ahin nih adokaktham chaak heppi tidit tah neiyi Mesedonia thah kche thung vah nang nga Ephisia thuh a'amdaat rah. Tidit tah mii rek hinni mlangkma' tpurchuhna' ava' mdopurchuh lammana' raan mmaan aangqhe rek avah adosutpqowi lamrah.
Ungta lamrin thuh rin'owina' ktong thah tapqhanna' kurthuwk kma' paumin rekle' mqutmqiin ktaak rilam rek ava' rukka mdo'arjaak raan pemeh.
'Tunnu hava' paupiik ava' ki plungbinrit avah plung kchiir thungki vonsat, plungrildeh kqha ungta plung kluwt lamrin ava'.
Mii aangqhe rekka ava' thung ki lamleh thah chet chlamda msit ktaak ki pauriim mnaak chaak inna.
Mmaan ava ngi talu kthe inna ungta talulu kpindit inna tidit kdeipindih kmah ngi nowlam ki chukpu rek tkurthuh rah ngei lamda.
Pdainu nowlam avah ksinton khat tih nowlam heppi msinton cheu avah kqha tidit tedehn.

Ungta hava' rukka ndehn, tidit tah nowlam avah mrinkindit mii ki thenni mdopa'am pemeh. Pdainu nowlam ktaak ki kchet rek ungta nowlam ko'owi kma' rek, rinko'owi kma' rek ungta pnu kervei rek, miikenje kma' rekle' kenje tukksut kma' rek, mnuh ke'eyou le' mpa ke'eyou, mii ke'eyou rek thenni mdopa'am.
Ungta jowlkpurju rek, kterdeu rek, mii kokyowng rek, pleiknei rek, pleiknei sakhi kpii rekki thenni ungta tpurchuhna' kqha ava' kepteng dow morson morson rekki thenni mdopa'am.
Mleiya havah neiyi kdokilrinqhi chaak rang thung ngi mdotpiik dok, konlor dok Isowr ki kqhapaumin ava' dilkqowi.
Ungta neiyi ruhtan mikpii kcha' neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu avah kpanpaak chaak a. Mleiya Mma ngi neiya trinchaak krow khat tih mtai chda ungta Mma' sopklow chrang ngi neiya mokchol chda.

Tidit tah choduh vah neiya pthitda kpau ungta tyatchiikepreel ungta ningkyakpii khat kurthuwk chyo ringngi neiyi lamrinna' ava' thung ngi kdodeh pindit chaakma ngi kdotlot dok mkurthuh leiyi, plungqhat avah mtedet chda.
Ungta Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am lamrin le' vonsat ava ngi neenki Kruwng plungnee avah kerkheelsi ngi nei kthen nih mtepleet piik chda.
Havah, dow mkheng thuh trinchaak krow ungta trot chaak ki mtik kcha. Tidit tah Khrista Jisu avah pnu kervei rek ksan chrang ngi dultipaam thuh arjungda ungta neiya mmaan arlak ki pnu kerveisi ping.
Anto' chdaat yoso, ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki thenni Mma' hinni lamkrin chbei rang rekki thenni ksowt tih tidiildehna' mkheng ava' mdotetdetna' rah plungqhat avah nei kihin nih mtedet chda.
'Tunnu ktlangknai kma' Paamkruwng, kdiyou kma' rang, mik ki tedehma Isowr ava' daat chrel avah kinrit, Mma hinni takyat chaakna' le' tkonlorna' avah ktluwk ktluwk ki ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Kchapa Timothy, nang ngi kqha dok ki raal adodukna' rah, nang aleiyi mduduh ngi tpurphuwn dok ava' dilkqowiyi jik ki adotlotna' rah neiyi ahin nih paupiik akpiik chaak a.
Tidit tah nang ngi lamrin le' plungrildeh kqha avah adothlowi chaak rah. Mleiya mii aangqhe rekki avah kthitna' dok lamda, ungta lamrin leiyi, mmaan avah arkuwng kuiyi kkui kcha' lam.
Mmaan arlak ki Haimenas le' Alekjender ruk ava' thuh kyaulam. Mmaanve ngi pthitda mpaumana' raanni neiyi mmaan avah Seitan hinni kdoparlaan pthidok lam.
Avaleiyi, neiyi rukrirep pih akoksow chaak inna, tidit tah kirpii kcha' rinkthamna' rek, rinkthamna' rek, tupnuwm chaak rinkthamna' rek ungta tpanpaakna' rek avah mii mkheng ki thenni atlown.
Mleiya neen nih rin'owina' le' tkenje chaakna' mkheng thung ngi kdaideek ki ungta plung kdaiyi trin chaakna' raan ki thenni, paamkruwng rekle' ruhtanna' ksin rek mkheng ki thenni havah atlown.
Mleiya havah neen Miksan Isowr miksut thung ngi kqha ungta mdorot piik krow.
Mma ngi mii mkheng avah mkarsan rah mdongei ungta kindit ava' tedeh pinditna' thung ngi merhei raan mdongei.
Mleiya Isowr le' dultimii arlak ki Isowr khat ungta Mikpalqhat khat ka'am, Mii avah Khrista Jisu ava.
Mma ngi mii mkheng ki kartlanman mthina ngi Mdak kparlaan chda, hava' rinpaumin avah mphakatkat thung ngi tson rah.

Hava' leiyi Isowr rih neiya paukparjaam kcha' khat tih ungta tamsi khat tih mdotokchol chaak. Neiyi pleinei chmaang, Khrista hinni kindit ava' kdothe chaak. Neiya lamrin le' kindit thung ngi Chaatktlei rekki chukpu khat ping.
Avaleiyi, neiyi pselpa rekki plungthit le' plung kpelqen ktaak ki mkhutin kchiir khiing lamdon nih mmun khimkhei thuh rinmaktham chaak raan kdongei.

Anto'hep nowl lih snu rekki plungdak horda plungbin kqha tu' korthlop pih mdomnaan avah karmang deek ki mdonaak chaak raan. Mmaan nih tportlotna ngi msamin herda mditmata jiiring ngi mditmata pearl lung ngi mditmata mkhon knem buwdiir rih mkorthlon raan pemeh.
Pdainu snu korlot tih mnongqhat tih rinko'owi kcha' khat mkurthuh chaak raan.
Snu khatvah makparlaan chaakna' mkheng tu' korthlop pih kdaideek ki mkurchuh chaak rah.
Ungta neiyi snu khat tih mdopurchuh rah mditmata pselpa khat 'tun nih ruhtanna' ksin nih ma'am rang avah rotpiik maang pdainu kdaideek ki ma'am rah.
Mleiya Adam rukri purthuh thida Eve avah mdopurthuhrot.
Ungta Adam avah huwng chmeh pdainu snu avah mdohuwn chaak leiyi, nowlam tupkuina' thuh tla chda.
Anto' chdaat yoso, mmaan nih lamrin le' vonsat thuh ungta daksa tkorjown chaakna' tu' korthlop pih tkenjetna' thuh ma'am chaakin bih, mma' avah nau mupluk thung ngu ksan chrah.
Havah trinchaak krow: Tidit tah kuwmiikhat tih lamrinlop ki kver tkurthuh chaak rah mngei chaak bih, mma ngi nong kqha khat mngei chaak a.
Lamrinlop ki kver khat avah dow khatleh 'leenni tupsulna' ktaak, nuwn khadaat ki innpu, mdaksa kilrindei kcha', muplung kenreel, mrinchan kqha, mal kuptlungdei, kpurchuk pchaang khat mkurthuh rah.
Thowldii thuh kirpii kma', raanqhul ksinton kma', sum 'leenni kpunjuwr kma', pdainu plung kperneem, tkalrai kngei kma' ungta mepner kthi kma' mkurthuh rah.
Mma' avah mi'inn kqhajik ki ksutpqowi pchaang khat mkurthuh rah, mnau le' avah takparlaan chaakna' mkheng thung ngi kirpii kcha' mdopurthuh rah.
Mleiya miikhat tih mdaksa inn avah taluhep pih tsutpqowi rang tidit mdehmau, taluhep pih mma ngi Isowr ki lamrinlop avah kilrinqhi pchaang rang ngoh?
Mma' avah kurchukrow mkurthuh rang pemeh, mditma bih mma ngi pirlin chdon nih, tarnampii tupsulna' ava'kat thung ngi ktla chrah.
Ava' han'tun nih mma ngi duwn ki ka'am kcha' rek arlak ki mrinchan kqha khat mkurthuh rah, mditma bih mma ngi trai chaakna' thuh ktla chrah ungta tarnampii ktaang thuh kekmen chrah.
Anto' heppi, nongsuwk rek avah takyat kurhuwi, pau kpenqheek kma', thowldii kdung ngi knee kma', sum 'leenni kakraam kma', mkurthuh raan.
Plungril kchiir rih lamrin ki paukordowl ava' kokyowng dei kcha' mkurthuh raan.
Pdainu hava'le' rukka rukrirep pih tperteel dok rah, audilli mmaan nih nongsuwk rek khat tih sopmdolow chaak raan, mleiya mmaan avah tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuh raan.
Anto' heppi, mnuwn rekin avah takyat kurhuwi mkurthuh raan, titii knei kma', mdaksa kilrindei kcha', dow mkheng thuh trinchaak krow mkurthuh raan.
Nongsuwk rek avah nuwn khadaat ki innpu mkurthuh raan, mnaule' le' mi'inn kqha ngi ksutpqowi dei mkurthuh raan.

Mleiya nongsuwk khat kurthuwkda kqha ngi sopklow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi Khrista Jisu hinni, mdaksaan ki thenni mrina' raan mmun kqha khat ungta kdung ngi ruhtanna' avah lamrinin thung ngi marlaan chaak inna.
Neiyi kbeisek ki ahin nih tethlen rah bin chdaat yow rih hava'le' avah ahin nih kikjit chaak a.

Pdainu laanglam mih koktot daat bih kdi ngi, kikjit chaak a. Tidit tah nang ngi kindit ki kchow ungta innmun, kring Isowr ki lamrinlop, Isowr inn ava' thung ngi taluhep pih taknat rang tidit adodehna' rah, havah kikjit chaak a.

Ungta tepthleina' ktaak liit tih, rinko'owi kcha' ki paukordowl avah mkenreel Mleiya Isowr avah daksa ngi kandangda. Pthla ngi pinditda, vaantamsi rekki dei lamda. Chaatktlei rek arlak ki karjaamda. Dultipaam thung ngi lamtrin chaak tlit tih amda ungta konlor rih arju'arlaang chda.

'Tunnu Pthla ava ngi kindit chel lih hanto'theda. Tidit tah mphaqutna' rang thung ngu mii aangqhe rekki lamrin ava'thung ki sun chlamdon nih miikuhuwng kcha' pthla rekle' tarnam rek dopurchuhna' rek thung ngi plung kupluwt chlam rah.
Tidit tah mmaan nih kqha tpurhuwina' thuh pleiknei lamrah ungta muplungrildehn avah thiir tpa'ai ava ngi kikriit chlam rah.

Mmaan nih inntepne lam nimeh ungta kindit kdei rek ungta lamkrin kcha' rekki panpaak chdon nih mdo'arlaan chaak rang, Isowr rih mdopurthuh dok thendam rek ava' thung ki mkankai chaakna' raan mii rek hinni paupiik kpii lamrah.
Mleiya Isowr hinki downkhaal khimkhei avah kqha ungta tpanpaak chaak tu' kilqhi ngi narlaan chaak bih, teppthlei rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya havah Isowr pauna ava ngi ungta tupnuwm chaak rinkthamna' ava ngi avah mdopchiir dok.

Nang ngi unau rek avah hava' dow rek 'leenni athepiik chaak lam bih, nang nga Jisu Khrista sopklow kcha' kqha khat kurthuwk kcha' imptih. Mleiya nang nga lamrin ki pauna rek ungta tkurchuhna' kqha ava' thung ngi kpurchuk kcha' ptih ungta nang ngi avah knet tih adopqowi chaak.
Pdainu nang ngi rinko'owi kma' paumin rek ungta kderpii rek paumin rek avah akthitna'. Ungta ava' kchang ngi rinto'owina' thung ngi athina ikurchuk cha'.

Mleiya daksa 'lam thah tkurchuhna' totlot ava ngi msit amna' mruk daat ka'am, pdainu rinko'owi kcha' ava ngi dow mkheng thung ngi msit ka'am. Ava' thung ngi 'tunki rinkum ungta karvang bei rang rinkum ki paureel avah ka'am kcha' a.
Hava' mkheng avah trinchaak krow ungta trot chaak ki mtik kcha'.

Mleiya hava'lei kat tih neen nih nong lou innu ungta ningkya ruk kdoperteel chaakin. mleiya dultimii mkheng ungta mhan'tun set tih lamkrin kcha' rek Ksan kcha' kring Isowr avah neen nih lam kdorin chaakin.
Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah paupiik ki apii lam ungta apurchuk lam.

Kuwkhat leh ngi akseetthuh avah ayowm chaakna' mso. Pdainu apauna 'leen, arinchan 'leen, avonsat 'leen, aplung thuh 'leen, alamrin 'leen, ungta achiirna' 'leenni, lamkrin kcha' rekki thenni bitinna' khat ikurthuwk.
Nei kthlen duh kpha ngi, tparchamna' 'leen, tkorsowna' 'leen ungta tpurchuhna' 'leenni plung apluwt cha'.
Kverlop khat tih khut tkhiin tu' korthlop pih pau tpurphuwn nih, ahin nih adotpiik dok chla avah nang ngi tukksut kma' tlowma'.
Hava' dow rek ava' thung ngi kmin nih abincha', tidit tah nang anongma korsom avah mmaan mkhengin hinni mkandanna' rah, adaksa avah mmaan thung ngi ikparlaan cha'.

Nang ngi adaksa 'leen ungta tpurchuhna' ava' 'leenni ikilrindei cha'. Mmaan thung ngi i'am tlit, nang ngi hava' atlot chaak bih, nang ngi adaksa ruk ungta nang akarja kcha' rek mmaan ava'ruk san chnadi'.
Nang ngi kver khat avah raima', pdainu plung kchiir rih apa heppi, kmowhei ava ngi a'upa rek heppi, aksop chlam.
Snu kder rek avah anuh le' heppi, kmowhei rek ava ngi achar rek heppi, tchiirna' mkheng tu' aksop chlam.
Meikhu dakdak rek avah akyat chlam.

Pdainu meikhunu kuwmiikhat tih mnaule' mditmata murdule' kthlowi ma'am cheentung ngi, mmaan nih choduhrep pih mi'innin thuh kdung ngi rinko'owi kcha' ikurthuwk chlamso. Ungta mnuhmpa hinni leikchowi ikurthuwk chlamso. Tidit tah havah kqha ungta Isowr aang ngi trotpiik krow nong.
'Tunnu meikhu dakdak, mthina daat tih ka'am kcha' ava' vah Isowr hinni lamrin chda, kirpii kcha' rinkthamna' 'leenni am tlit chda ungta suwn le' jaan nih rinkaktham kcha'lu.
Pdainu daksa 'lam thah nungaiyi ka'am kcha' mma' avah mrindaat arlaan nih kdiyou dok kcha'.
Ungta mmaan nih tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuhna' raan, hava'le' avah mii rek hinni apurchuk lam.

Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mdaksa inn thung ngi, ungta mhan'tun set tih mma' innkat thungki mii rek hinni mpordon pchaanmah bih, mma' ava ngi lamrin avah mmat chaak a. Ungta lamkrin kma' khat han'tun rukku mmah mmeel kthi a.
Nang ngi kum somtruk kurduh ki meikhunu ungta innpu khadaat kervei mkurthuhma bih, mma' avah meikhunu ngi taima'.

Mma' avah, mma ngi nausuwn marvan'opdeh mow, mal muptlun dehmow, miikenje rek khuh mulqhut dehmow, mma ngi kdungksaan mchom chaak dehmow, ungta kqhanong khimkhei rek avah mtlot chaak mow, tidit leiyi, mii rekki mnongqhat rek mdodeh mkurthuh rah.
Pdainu kmow daat meikhunu rek avah amatlam. Mleiya mmaan ki sadak dongei ava ngi Khrista mepten dok cheu, mmaan nih inntne rah mdongei chaakin.
Anto ngi mmaan nih rukri ki mlamrinin avah mdomaak pthiin leiyi, mtun inni tupsulna' avah mdak inni mdothuhqhi chaakin.

Ungta ava' han'tun nih mmaan nih howngkva kurchuk lamda, inn khat ki ngi khat thah tlowng lamda. Ungta mhowngvatin daat kma' titii nei lamda, miinong rah mnongin pthut lamda, mmaan dothema rah dow rek ava' kthelam.

Avaleiyi, neiyi meikhunu kmow rek avah inneida, nausuwn thlowida, mi'innin mdosut pqowi chaak raan. Ungta kepteng khat ava' hinni ningkyana' pau mdothena' rah changqhatna' mdopiikma raan ava' kdongei.
Mleiya aangqhe rekki kenle lamda Seitan dil mdoqowi chaak dokin.
Ungta lamkrin kcha' snu mditmata psel kuwmiikhat tih meikhunu mthlowi chaak cheentung ngi, tidit tah lamrinlop ava ngi meikhunu dakdak rek ava' mdobom chaakna' rah mma ngi meikhunu avah abom chso.
Kqhajik ki lop kqhi kcha' ungta ava' han'tun nih pauna ava' 'leenni ungta tpurchuhna' 'leenni nong klou kcha' kver rek avah tum' knii knem mih takyat chaak mtik kcha.

Mleiya Kchiir laika ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih chapaar adoptherin silpa avah mnehr thah arkamke pkehmaan.” (Knl. 25:4) Ungta “Louknum rek avah mardamanin karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha,” mdodit. (Lk. 10:7)
Nang ngi kver khat 'leenki mraal avah miilai 'knii mditmata kdum mih sakhi mdopiikma don nih arlaangma'.
Pnu kervei sli rek avah mqhe morson rekki mdoqit chaakna' raanni, mii mkheng aang ngi arailam.

Neiyi Isowr aang ngi ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ungta taktlanksa vaantamsi rek aang ngi, nang ngi tapqhat bet le' tipthitbetna' ktaak ki ungta dow khatleh ruk tbom le' teknenna' ktaak ki adotlot chaakna' rah hava' dow rek avah adancha'.
Kuwkhat leh 'leenni koknot teng ngi khut khiingma' ungta mii morson pnu arve thung rukku arveqhi sapma'. Adaksa ngi kchiir rih i'am cha'.
'Tunnu diisik chrel daat a neeporsonma' pdainu akowi tlitna' a'omlai le' apowibuwr leiyi, thowldii mnausisi aneekchok.
Mii aangqhe rek pnu arve avah kandangchel lih, pau tpinditna' thah, mduh thahan nih chetda pdainu mii aangqhe rekka mupnu arveen ava ngi mdilin qowida.
Anto'hep daat tih mii aangqhe rekki, mnongqhatin avah kindit chelda ungta ava' kma' rek avah kordowl pchaang nimeh.

Tidit tah Isowr miing ungta Mma' hinki tkurchuhna' ava' 'leenni pthitda tpaumana' rah reengkol khatsap kurduh ngi ka'am suwk rek mkheng ngi mma' mma' ki mukpu rek avah takyat chaak ki mtik kcha, tidit tih mdotai chaak raan.

Ungta lamkrin kcha' mukpu rek kthlowi kcha' mmaan ava ngi, mmaan avah unau khat mkurthuhn leiyi, tukksut kma' tlow lam mso. Pdainu mmaan nih, mnongtlotin karlaang kcha' avah trinchaak krow rek ungta mvonsat'lown mkurthuh leiyi, kerkheelset tih sopmdolow chaak raan. Hava' dow rek 'leenni apurchuk lam ungta toksow ruk aksoplam.
Kuwmiikhat tih tkurchuhna' ktlei khat mpurchu bih, ungta paukindit tidit tah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki pauna rek kpha rukka ungta rinko'owi kcha' ki tkurchuhna' ava' tukksut kma' ka'am krow.

Mma' avah kpirlin kcha', dow khatleh kdei kma' pdainu mma' pauna rek 'leenni tkalraina' le' tkerteenna' ngi kdim kcha' mii. Mma' thungki ngi changtlaakna', tker'ena', pauhor tbukna', kqha kma' tbinpsukna' avah karvang.
Ungta muplung kqop kcha' ki mqutmqiin ktaak ki tkerteenna', kindit varpthida rinko'owi kcha' avah mthennemna' khat tih kbin reklam. Hava' hep daat rek thungki nang ngi ikankai cha'.
Pdainu plung kngam mih rinko'owi kcha' avah kdung ngi mthennemna'.
Mleiya neen nih hava' dultipaam thung ngi dow khatleh ruk horda tethlenin pemeh ungta neen nih hava' thung ki dow khatleh ruk tohor pchaanin nimeh tidit avah mkindit kat.
Ungta thendam le' buwdiir nthlowi chaakin bih, hava'le' ava ngi plung tapngam chaak raan.

Pdainu svang tkurthuh rah kngei kcha' rekka, tkenvei chaakna' le' tker'ekrena' thah kqhi, kepthleem ungta ktaang ungta tokmowna' tyatya thung ngi ungta tkenveina' sadak dongei rek thung ngi ktla chlam.

Mleiya sum vonsat klow kcha' ava ngi kthi mkheng ki murjung. Tidit tah aangqhe rekki makraam inni lamrin thungki 'lamleh thah mche chaakin ava ngi tyatna' tyatya thung ngi mdakin avah ktorkhot kcha'lam.
Pdainu, O Isowr mii nang, nang ngi hava' dow rek thungki ichen cha'. Ungta rinkinditna', rin'owina', lamrinna', vonsatna', tidiildehna', plungperneemna' rek ava'dil ajiidei cha'.

Nang ngi lamrin ki raalnaak kqha avah anacha'. Ktluwk rinkum avah knet tih akyowng cha'. Ava'kat ava' thung ngi sakhi mii knempok aang ngi kqha kerthethutna' ava ngi akerthethut chaak ki, nang rukka adoto'own chaak dok.
Neiyi, dow mkheng thung ngi rinkum kpii Isowr ungta Pontias ki Pilaat aang ngi kqha kerthethutna' ngi sakhi kpii kcha' Khrista Jisu aang ngi, ahin nih akaktham chaak a.
Mleiya nang ngi Khrista mkandan rang ava' kpha ngi hava' paupiik avah kbihkchu liit kmah, tupsulna' ktaak ki arkhi cha'.
Avah, Mma ngi Mma' mdak ki mpha thung ngi kpandang rah. Suwqhat kthlowi a Mma' ungta Ruhtan kpu a Mma' daat. Paam kruwng rekki Paamkruwng, kruwng rekki Kruwng.

Kdiyou liit kmah Mma' daat, tnai pchaanmah mar'aang ngi ka'am, kuwkhat tih mmik ki mdodehma mditmata mdodeh pchaanma, Mma' hinni takyat chaakna' le' ktlangknai kma' ruhtan avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.

Hava' 'tunki mpha thung ngi svang kthuwk rek hinni mpirlin chaakmana' raan, mditmata mkinditna' ktaak svangthuhna' 'leenni mdorin chaakmana' raan. Pdainu svang dok ki dow mkheng mikpii kring Isowr ava' hinni lammdorin chaakna' raan paupiik apii lam.
Mleiya mmaan nih kqhanong thuh svang mthuhna' raan, tpiik chaakna' 'leen mkorthlon chaakna' raan ungta tpenthemsap mdongeina' raan, mmaan nih kqha atlow chlamso.
Mleiya mmaan nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum mdophan chaakna' raan, mmaan nih karvang rang mpha ava' ki thenni mdaksaan ki thenni innmun kqha aportlot chlamso.
O Timothy, nang ahin nih adotpiik dok avah arungdei cha', ungta mlangkmah ngi luwkinritna' mdoditin ava' thung ki kthuwk rinko'owi kma' ungta msit ktaak ki tkerteenna' rek avah akdaan.
Ava' ktlow kcha', aangqhe rek ava ngi lamrin ki mlei avah mdopqhil chaak dokin. Plungnee avah nang ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Isowr plungbin nih ungta Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am rinkum ki paureel ava' dilkqowiyi, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi, ahin nih kikjit chaak a.
Kvonsat'low kchapa, Timothy nang ahin nih Npa Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinki: Plungnee, plungqhat ungta plung kdai avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.

Neiyi suwn le' jaan nih krinkthamna' rek thung ngi, kdet liit kmah nang adokbin phaak chaak leiyi, kpiikpu rek dotlot heppi plungrildeh kchiir tu' korthlop pih neiyi sopkdolow chaak Isowr avah kpanpaak chaak a.
Tidit tah kkanpat mkurkhum chaakna' rah, neiyi a'arthli buwkna' rek kbin phaak cheu kdung ngi nang nga tedeh rah ayubin chnuh.

Neiyi nang athung ngi ka'am, dakat lamrin ava' kbin phaak thung ngi ava' lamrin avah apii Lois hinni choduhrep pih amda. Audilli anuh Eunis hinni amda ungta 'tunnu avah nang ahin rukku ka'am a tidit tih kbin chaak a.
Avaleiyi, neiyi a'leen nih kukhut rek kdokhiin chaak ki nang athung ngi ka'am Isowr ki chla avah adopchow thang chaakna' rah ayuktipbin phaak chaak a.
Mleiya Isowr rih pthla mningkqi midotpiikin pemeh pdainu ruhtanna' le', vonsatna' ki ungta plung kindit ki pthla midotpiik chaakin.
Avaleiyi, neenki Kruwng ki rinpaumin tpandanna' 'leenni ungta Mma' rowngmii nei kleiyi aning pyakma'. Pdainu Isowr ruhtanna' dilkqowi, kqhapaumin ava' thenni tyatna' ava' thuh nei tu' iyakheng cheh.

Mleiya Mma ngi neen avah mpha mupqhunduduh ngi, neen nnongtlotin lei kma' Khrista Jisu hinni midotpiik dokin plungnee, ungta Mma' mdak ki plungbinrit dilkqowiyi, kchiir mi'own nih neen avah mi'own inda midotsan chaak dokin.
Pdainu kqhapaumin ar'aang ngi, kdiyou penvei pthida mar'aang thuh rinkum le' kdiyou kma' kthuhqhi, neen Miksan Jisu Khrista kandan ava ngi 'tunnu mitpandan piik inna.
Ava'kat thung ngi neiya Chaatktlei rekki pauksaam kcha' khat tih, tamsi khat tih ungta chukpu khat tih mdotakthlan chaak dok.

Hava'kat ki thenni nei rukka hava' dow rek 'leenni kya kcha' ping. Anto'daat yoso, neiya kningkyak meh. Mleiya neiyi lam kdorin chaak Mma' avah kdeh ungta nit ava' kpha thung ngi neiyi Mma' hinni kakparlaan chaakna' ava' thuh Mma ngi neiya mkirkhi pchaang rah tidit neiyi kindit tih kdeh.
Nang ngi nei kihin ki ado'arjaak paudak rekki mril, tidit tah Khrista Jisu hinki lamrin thuh ungta vonsat thuh knet tih akyowng cha'.
Nang ngi, athung ngi ka'am Pthla Kchiir ava' ar'aang ngi ahin nih adokparlaan dok dow kqha rek avah arkhidei cha'.
Nang ngi Asia paamkuwl ki mmaan mkheng inni, kihin ki mkenlet chaakin avah adodeh. Mmaan arlak ki Phygellas le' Hermogenes le' kyaulam.
Kruwng ngi Onesiphoras innmii rek avah plungqhat apii chlamso. Mleiya mma ngi kdet liit kmah neiya sopmlow chda ungta mmah nei kthiirrii leiyi, ningkya korsowi meh.
Ungta mma ngi Rome khuwpii mtlun thung ngi mma ngi neiya kdung ngi mthlaam chda ungta mkurdutqhi chda.

Nit ava' thung ngi mma ngi Kruwng hinki plungqhat mdo'arlaan chaak rang avah Kruwng ngi arotpiik chso. Ungta mma ngi Ephisia thah neiya taluhepya ngi sopmtolow chaak tidit avah nang ngi kqhajik ki adodeh.
Avaleiyi, kchapa, nang nga Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am plungnee ava' thung ngi aruh aptang cha'.
Ungta nang ngi sakhi knempok rek arlak ki, nei kihin ki ado'arjaak dow rek avah morson rek rukka kpurchuk pchaang rang, trinchaak krow mii rek hinni havah aparlaan lam.
Avaleiyi, nang ngi Jisu Khrista ki kqha raalmii khat heppi tparsatna' tya rek avah adodiildeh chaak rah.
Mleiya raalkna rang raalmii khat tih mma' kakthlang kcha' ava' plungngam ktlow chrang kuwkhat leh ngi hava' rinkum ki dow rek thung ngi kekmen kcha'lu pemeh.
Ungta teletna' rek thung ngi klee rang mma' ava ngi, nowrit rek ava' dilkqowiyi mpertenma donni laar luwkhum avah pkhum nimeh.
Kqang dok ki louknum kcha' mma' ava ngi mkhatna' thok ki mcha'arkun rek avah kcha chrah.
Neiyi kdothe avah abindei ungta Kruwng ngi dow mkheng thung ngi tedeh pinditna' avah akpii chrah.
Nang ngi David chiimuw thungki Jisu Khrista avah neiki kqhapaumin ava' dilkqowiyi kdiyou thungki mdoperdel dok tidit abin phaak.
Mleiya ava' ki thenni, kthi ktlow khat heppi neiya thiirrii rekki tporkol kpha ngi tyattraan nah' avah perteel chnuh, pdainu Isowr ki pauna avah thiirrii ngi porkol meh.
Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinni, ktluwk ki tkonlorna' tu' kilqhi ngi tkirliinna' avah mmaan rukku mdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni dow mkheng avah kdodiil chaak.
Havah trinchaak krow paulam: Mleiya neen nih Mma' tu' ndiyow chaakin bih, Neen nih trin ruk Mma' tu' ring chenaandi'.
Neen nih ndiildeh chaakin bih, neen nih tpaal ruk Mma' tu' tpaal chaak raan. Neen nih Mma' avah nmat chaakin bih, Mma' rukku neen avah mikmat chraan.
Neen nih lamrin ktaak kurthuwk chyomin, Mmah trinchaak krow. Mma ngi Mdak avah karmat pchaang nimeh.
Nang ngi mmaan avah hava'le' 'leenni atipbin phaaklam. Ungta mmaan nih msit ktaak ki, karja rek ker'ekrena' pauna rek leiyi, mkalrai raan pemeh tidit leiyi, Kruwng aang ngi mmaan avah aparlaan chlam.
Nang ngi Isowr hinni kqhajik ki adaksa avah akparlaan chaakna' rah atlow cha'. Kqhajik ki kindit ki pauna ava' ksinton kcha' nongmii khat ava ngi ningkya mkorsowina' ki msit ammeh.
Pdainu nang ngi rin'owina' le' msit ktaak ki tpauna' rek hinki ikekneeng cha', tidit tah avale' ava ngi rinto'owimana' avah mdopnem thang.
Ungta mmaan pausaam rek avah cancer omlai heppi koryou thang setset rah. Haimenas le' Philetas le' avah ava'lu lam.
Mmaanve ngi trin kerheelna' avah kthleng dok kcha', mdodit inni kindit ava' thung ki 'lamleh thah kchet dok kcha'lam ungta mmaanve ngi mii aangqhe rekki lamrin avah mdopurluw pthi dokin.

Anto' chdaat yoso, Isowr innmun mlang avah hava' kbihjiik tu' krip chdaat. “Kruwng ngi Mma' dow rek rang avah mdodeh chaak.” Ungta “Khrista miing ktham kcha' rek khimkheiyi nowlam tuksutmana' thungki isun chlamso.”

Pdainu inn klinpa thung vah jiiring le' jiipowl ki arkuw thleengkam chreldaat ka'am pemeh. Pdainu aangqhe ngi takyat kurhuwi kma' thuh tsinton rang ngi ding le' duldak ki arkuw thleengkam rek rukka ka'am.

Avaleiyi, kuwmiikhat tih mdak avah mdilknau ki thuh mekpertleu chaak bih, mma' avah nong kqha khimkhei ki thenni mdoporthlon dok, Mukpupa ki thenni tpenje dok ungta msitpum, takyat kurhuwi arkuw thleengkam kurthuwk chrah.

Nang ngi kseet tkurthuh ki sadak dongei ava' thung ki rukka ichen cha'. Pdainu plung kchiir rih Kruwng miing ktham kcha' mmaan rektu' rin'owina', vonsatna' ungta plungdaina' thuh kdung ngi plung apluwt cha'.
Ungta nang ngi kokmok le' mdodeh ktaak ki ksowt tih tkerteenna' ava ngi tker'ena' mdopthuh tidit adodeh chaak ki avale' avah amapthi.
Ungta Kruwng suwk vah kalrai kerthe mdotlot rang pemeh. Pdainu mii mkheng hinni plung kperneem mdohor chaak rah, mdopurchuh chaak rah ungta mdodiildeh chaak rah.
Kpirdil kcha' rekrek ki, mmaan kepteng mii rek avah mdopindit raan. Mleiya mmaan nih kindit ava' mdodeh chaakna' raan, Isowr rih mmaan hinni plung tperthlenna' avah tohorna' kpii chdaat lam krow.
Ungta tarnampii ava ngi mma' plungbin mdoptlot lam rang ngi mdokhum dokna' ktaang ava' thung ki mchen chaakna' raan ki thenni muplung rekin avah kindit chdaat ruk krow.
Pdainu havah adei, tidit tah mqutna' mpha thung vah tidina' mpha karvang rah.
Mleiya dultimii rek avah, mdak vonkparsat, sumkngei, pirlinda kpau, kpirlin, pthitda kpau, mnuhmpa dothe kopqowi kma', kpanpaak dei kma', kchiir kma',
Vonsat kthlowi kma', koptlot dei kma', titii knei, korjowng dei kma', kthikkhak, kqha kekneeng,
Mii kyur kcha', merngem kthlep kma', korjowm kcha', Isowr vonsat tolow hinni sadak nungaina' vonsat klow kcha',
Rinko'owi kcha' armeel horthida ava' ki mruhtanna' ava' kmat kcha' kurthuwk chrah. Ungta nang ngi ava' hep daat mii rek avah akerheel daaklam.

Hava' hep rek ava ngi inn rek thung ngi spirjiik ki luwt lamda. Ungta muplung krip kma', pnu rekki mbowrin krik kcha' snu rek avah kyowng chlamda. Ungta mmaan avah sadak dongei mdetmdet ki kthi rek thung ngi qhi lamda.
Mmaan ava ngi mpha ktai thuh kurchuk lamda pdainu kindit ava' ki tedeh pinditna' ava' thung ngu teden rukku kurchuk pchaang lam pemeh.
'Tunnu Jannes le' Jambres tih Moses mdokthitnaan heppi, hava' mii rek ava ngi kindit avah mdokthitnaan. Mmaan havah muplungril kqop kcha' ungta lamrin ki mlei ava' krow kma' reklam.
Pdainu mmaan havah choduh ki rek mmaan ava' heppi mdusukin avah korsomdei nimeh, mii mkheng hinni mokmow chaak naan avah kandang chrah.
Pdainu nangvah kqhajik ki. Tidit tah neiyi kdopurchuhna' krinchan nowpa, kuplungbinrit, klamrin, ksowt tih kdodiildehna', kvonsatna', kdodiil chaakna', avah adodeh.

Ungta kyat chiireelna' rek, ksuwk thuhna', nei k'leen nih Antiok khuwpii thuh, Ikoniam thuh, Listra thuh taluhep kduh ki tyatchiireelna' rek kthuwk avah kdiil chaak daat toh. Ungta ava' mkheng thungki Kruwng ngi neiya maktlan chda.
Khrista Jisu hinni rinko'owi kcha ngi ta'am chaak rah kngei kcha' mkheng ava ngi dakat tih avah suwk mdothuhqhi rah.
Pdainu kthi ktlow mii rek ungta mmeel kpurhuwi mii rek avah knemthang setset rah. Miikuhuwng chlam rah ungta mdakin ruk kurhuwng chlam rah.

Pdainu nang athen vah, nang ngi akurchuh chaak dokna' ungta kindit tidit adodeh chaak dok avah nang ngi, mmaan avah, kuw hinki ngi kurchuk kcha' ptih, tidit adodeh chaak ki, dow rek ava' thuh i'am tlit cha'.
Ungta amot ki kupqhun nih Kchiir laika rek avah adodeh chaak dok. Avale' ava ngi Khrista jisu hinni lamtrin chaak ar'aang ngi tkirliinna' ki thenni nang nga akpinrit pchaang rah.
Kchiir laika mkheng avah Isowr tadaal do'arjukmu ungta avah tkurchuhna' ki thenni, tkerthe pinditna' ki thenni, tikpindit piikna' ki thenni msit ka'am.
Mleiya havah Isowr mii ava' kurkhumna' rah ungta kqhanong mkheng thuh kqhajik ki mkorthlon chaakna' rang kithen.
Ava'leiyi, neiyi Mma ngi Mma' ki Kruwngpaalna' tu' mkandan thung ngi kdi le' kring 'tun nih paukpindit rang Isowr le' Kruwng Jisu Khrista aang ngi akparlaan chaak a.
Pauna avah aparjaam! Mpha thung ruk mpha kma' thung rukku ikorthlong tlit cha'. Tidiildeh chaakna' le' tpurchuhna' mkheng ava ngi archildei lam, araidei lam ungta aksopdei lam.

Mleiya mmaan nih mma' mma' ki mdongeiyin, mdotlot nuwm chaak inni tkurchuhna' kqha ava' thuh merheimanaan mpha karvang chrah. Mmaan nih mdo'arjaak nuwm inni maknaan mapda leiyi, mthen inni chukpu rek kpurtuwl chlam rah.
Ungta mmaan nih makna rekin avah kindit ava' thung ki koploipthi lamrah ungta paumin thlaang thlaang rek hinni kerheel chlam rah.
Pdainu nang nga dow mkheng thung ngi ikilrin deicha', tparsatna' tya avah adilldei cha', paumin kparjaam ki nong avah atlow cha', asoplowna' avah apurtluwm cha'.
Mleiya tneek rah tparlaan dok khat tih neiya mteperlei chaak dok a ungta nei ksun chaakna' rah mpha avah knai kcha' a.
Neiyi raal avah kqhajik ki knaak chaak dok a. Neiyi tchenpertena' avah kupqut chaak dok a. Neiyi lamrin avah kirkhiik chaak dok a.

Ungta 'tunnu, rinkinditna' ki laar luwkhum avah nei kthen nih mtithiik piik dok a. Ava' vah mrinkindit Paukpindit Kruwng ava ngi nit ava' thung ngi kihin nih mikpii chrah. Ungta nei kihin chrel daat kma', Mma' arjun rang lamksu kcha' mkheng rek hin rukku avah kpii chrah.
Kbeisek ki kihin nih athlenna' rah kdung ngi atlow.
Mleiya Demas tih hava' dultipaam ava' mdongei chaak ki neiya mtamaak pthidok a, ungta Thessalonika khuwpii thah ksun kcha' a, Kresens nih Galatia thah ungta Taitas tih Dalmatia thah kchet dok lam a.
Ava' vah Luke daat chrel kihin nih ka'am a. Nang ngi Mark aqhi rang ngi kihin nih ithleng. Mleiya mma' avah soplowna' thung ngi kthen nih msit ka'am a.
Ungta Tikaikas avah neiyi Ephisia thah kapthlat dok a.
Nang ngi athlen thung ngi, Troas ki Karpas hinni kdomaak kiphriktluwn, kokrol avah mheihor piik ungta laikakuwl rek, mkenreelsi ngi saavun laikakuwl rek avah mheihor piikcha'.
Jiichai dimklou Alekjender ava ngi k'leen nih kthi knempok ki mdotlot. Kruwng ngi mma' avah mnongtlot rek dilkqowiyi apurthuwl chdaatso.
Nang rukka mma' hinki ikilrin deicha'. Mleiya mma ngi neen kpauna rekin avah kdung ngi mdorisan.
Neiyi mkhatna' kakparkhaan chaakna' thok thung vah kuwkhat leh ngi mriqhimeh, mii mkheng ngi mchendaak chda. Pdainu avah mmaan 'leenni mraalin piikna' lam mso, dinuh rinkaktham chaak a.

Anto'daat yoso, nei kleiyi paumin avah kurkhum mih mkarjaamna' rah ungta Chaatktlei rek mkheng ngi avah mdo'arjaak chaakna' rah Kruwng ngi nei koktong thah mriipiikda. Ungta kruh maptanpiik chda ungta neiya humpu nehr thungki maktlan chda.

Ungta Kruwng ngi neiya kqha kma' nong khimkhei rek thungki mkaktlan chrah. Ungta Mma' parvaan ki Kruwngpaalna' kpha ngi mkirkhi chrah. Mma' hinni ktlangknai kma' tkonlorna' avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Prisila le' Akyul a avah mhei'arvuwi piikcha' ungta Onesiphoras innmii rek avah mhei'arvuwi piikcha'.
Erastas tah Korinthia thah ka'am daat pdainu Trophimas tah kkowiyi Melitas thuh kdomaak daat.
Phalbi mphaakduh ngi hava' thuh atlunna' rah kdung ngi atlow. Eubulas tih aturvuwi chaak a ungta anto' heppi Pudens le' Linas le' Klaudia le' ungta unau rek mkheng inni aturvuwi chaak lam a.
Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah apthlarin tu' ka'am ikurthuwkso. Plungnee avah a'leen nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Paul neiya Isowr rih mduduh thah mdokchol dok rek lamrin ava' ki ungta kindit tedeh pinditna' tidit tah rin'owina' ava' dilkqowiyi kurthuwk kcha' Isowr suwk'owr ungta Jisu Khrista ki tamsi khat ping.
Hava' lamrin le' luwkinritna' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki plungbinpsuk ava' 'leenni krip kcha'. Mpha ngi ta'am mupqhunduduh ngi, pleiknei pchaang kma' Isowr rih avah pau mdoreel dok.

Pdainu Isowr rih mdokthlan mphakat thung ngi, Mma' pauna avah pau tparjaamna' ar'aang ngi mar'aang thuh pthuwkda. Hava' pau tparjaamna' avah neen Miksan Isowr paureen ava ngi, Mma ngi nei kihin nih mparlaan chda.

Neen nkhengin ki nlamrin chaak sapin ava' dilkqowiyi nang nga kchapa kat ptih, neiyi Taitas nang ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Tidit tah Pa Isowr ungta neenki Miksan Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plungqhat ungta plung kdai avah nang ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.

Neiyi Kritii diiloipaam thuh adokmaakna' mleiya hava: Mleiya nang ngi tparnaak dokmah dow rek avah aparnaakjik ungta neiyi adokperseel dok ava' hep pih, khuwpii klin rek khimkhei thung ngi lopkver rek akchol lam.

Lopkver khat kurthuwk rang mma' avah, tupsulna' ktaak ungta snu khadaat ki innpu mkurthuh rah. Ungta mnau le' avah lamkrin kcha', kartlai kcha ngi ka'am mditmata tethe kopqowi kma' 'leenni tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuh raan.

Mleiya lopkver khat avah Isowr hinki ksutpqowi kcha' khat kpurhuwiyi tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuh rah. Mma' avah mthina ki muplungbin kngei kcha', kbeisek ki muplung kthidei, thowldii knee ker'ei kalraidei, sum 'leenni kpunjuwr mkurthuh rang pemeh.
Pdainu mma' avah mikuptlungdei, kqha kngei, mdak kilrindei, mrinkindit, kchiir, muplung kenreel, mkurthuh rah.
