Mma ngi mkurchuh chaakna' dilkqowiyi trinchaak krow pauna rek avah knet tih mdokyown chaak rah. Tiditta mma ngi tkurchuhna' kindit ava ngi mii rek avah mdoksow chaak rah, ungta mma ngi ava' kikthitna' mii rek ava' hinni, anto' pemeh tidit kepdeh pchaang mkurthuh rah.
Mleiya arlak inni msitktaak ki kpau ungta mrilqhatma ngi mii kuhuwng kcha', tethe kopqowi kma' mii rek ka'am pok lam a. Mmaan avah vunkreen rek arlaksi ngi ka'am lam a.
Nang ngi mmaan nehr rek avah ado'artlun rah. Mleiya mmaan nih mdopurchuh maraan, sum 'leenni tpunjuwrna' mdopurchuh kreen ava ngi innmii rek mkheng avah ekrep lamda.
Mmaan arlak ki mmaan ki khulpu ava ngi hanto'theda: “Kritii mii rekka mpha ktai thuh pleiknei lam. Mmaan nah kqha kma' nowmsaa rek ungta howngkva, mpowibuwr kparja reklam.”
Hava' mmaan leiki rinpaumin avah mkindit. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih lamrin thuh knet tih ma'am chaakna' raan ki thenni mmaan avah arai lamrah apindit lam.
Tidit tah kindit ava' thung ki kerheel kcha' Jihudi rekki pauminsit rek ungta dultimii paupiik rek thung ngi plung mdopluw mana' raan ki thenni arailam.

Mleiya kertleu kcha' mii rek hinvah dow mkheng kheng a kertleu pdainu ktobor rek ungta lamkrin kma' rek hinvah kertleu khatleh ka'am pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi mmaan plungril rekle' muplungrildeh rekin ava' rukka ktobor kcha'.

Mmaan nih Isowr kdei rekrek ki kkorthlong lam pdainu mnongtlot inni Isowr rah mdomat chaakin. Mmaan nah tepder chaak kurhuwilam, tethe kopqowi lam pemeh ungta mmaan nah kqha dow khimkhei avah ktlowphu lam pemeh.
Pdainu nang athennu tkurchuhna' kindit ava' tu' kurthut tih tethekrow dow rek ava' athe.
Tidit tah kder klaam rek hinni, thowldii knee mii mkurthuh mana' raan apurchuk lam. Mmaan nah takyat kurhuwi, muplung kurkhum, mlamrin knet, vonsat kthlowi ungta tidiildehna' 'leenni mkurkhum raan.

Anto' heppi snu kder rek rukka, rinko'owi kcha' rek kpurhuwiyi, mrinchan inni ma'amna' raan apurchuk lam. Mleiya mmaan nih titii knei kma' ungta knem mih thowldii tneekna' thung ngi makparlaan chaak raan pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi mmaan nah dow kqha rekki chukpu rek mkurthuh raan.
Mleiya mmaan nih, innknei row snu rekki plung kindit tih mi'innpu rekin le' mnau le' vonsat mdolowna' raanni mdoksow deh raan.

Mleiya innknei row snu rekki, mmaan nih Isowr pauna avah mdopthit mana' raan ki thenni mi'innpu rekin hinni makparlaan chaak raan ungta plung kindit mdohor raan ungta mchiir chaak raan ungta inn thah amda inn nong ktlow kcha' rek mkurthuh raan.
Anto' heppi, kseetnau rek rukka plung kindit mdohorna' raan aksoplam.
Dow mkheng 'leenni nang nga mmaan hinni kqhanong totlotna' ki titinna' khat tih a'am rah. Adopurchuhna' 'leenni topborma', takyat kurhuwiyi ungta plung kluwt tih atlow cha'.
Mleiya nang akikthitna' rekki a'leen nih kthi dow khatleh mdothe raan ma'amma ngi ningkya mdophan chaakna' raanni nang ngi kuwkhat leh ngi mdopsul pchaanna' ktaak paukindit adothe chaak rah.
Nang ngi suwk'owr rekki, dow mkheng 'leenni mmaan plung ngamna' rah, mma' mma' ki mukpu rekin hinni makparlaan chaakna' raan aksoplam. Mmaan nih, mpauin mdo'arthaan purlu raan pemeh.

Mleiya dow mkheng 'leenni mmaan nih neenki Miksan Isowr ki tkurchuhna' ava' ruwngchen mdopqhatna' raan ki thenni muprut raan pemeh. Pdainu dow khimkhei 'leenni trinchaak krow ngi mekterdet chaak raan.
Mleiya mii mkheng hinni tkirliinna' kpii Isowr plungnee avah kkandang dok a.

Ungta ava ngi neen avah rinko'owi kma' ungta dultipaam ki tngeina' rek tmat chaakna' rah mipurchukinda. Ungta neen nih plungkurkhum mih, rinkindit tih ungta rinko'owiyi hava' 'tunpha ki mpha thung ngi ta'amna' raan mipurchukinda.
Mleiya neen nih hava' suwqhat plungbinpsuk ki thenni ungta konlor dok ki kandang rang neenki klin Isowr ungta neen Miksan Jisu Khrista nardat chaakin chunni anto' heppi neen nih ta'am chaak raan.

Tidit tah Mma ngi neen avah nowlam tuksutmana' mkheng thungki midotaktlan chaakna' raan ki thenni Mdak ki kakparlaan chda. Ungta Mma' mdak chrel ki then daat tih Mma' mii tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni mipertleuinda. Avaleiyi, kqhanong rekki thenni neen nih arda toprow chaak raan.
Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah adopurchuh kat lam rang ava'. Nang ngi ruhtan mkheng tu' korthlop pih adoksow lamrah ungta adorai lamrah. Kuwkhat leh ngi nang nga tuk'aksut kma' tlow mso!

Paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' ksin rek hinni mii rekki makparlaan chaak raan avah nang ngi adotipbin phaak chaak lamrah. Mleiya mmaan nih, kqhanong khimkhei thuh mmaan hinni tethe kopqowiyi ungta ktlow rangjap pih ma'am raan.
Tidit tah mmaan nih khat le' khat qhatmana' mdothe mana' raan, ker'ei kalrai kngei kma', plung kdowng ngi ungta mii mkheng hinni plung kperneem mdotedet pchaanna' raan, aksoplam.

Mleiya neen ndakkatin rukka mphakhat thung vah, kokmok ki, tethe kopqowi kmah ngi tarvan amin. Ungta mii rekki neenna mihuwnginda mdetmdet ki daksa dongei ningtlunna' rek thung ngi suwk'owr rih tarvan'amin. Ungta miiqhatmana' ktlow ngi ungta kepner rih, ungta mii rekki miihalinda ungta khat le' khat karhalin minnu tarvan'amin.
Pdainu dultimii ktong thah neen Miksan Isowr plungqhat le' vonsat avah kandangda.

Ungta ava ngi neenna misaninda, tidit tah neenna, neen nih rinkindit nong rek totlot chaakin leiyi, midotsan chaakin pemeh pdainu Mma' plungqhat ava ngi neenna midotsan chaakin. Mleiya ren nih tqou chaakna' ar'aang ngi mi'alqhuh chaanda ungta Pthla Kchiir ar'aang ngi ren mipthutinda, neen avah midotsan chaakin.
Mma ngi neen Miksan Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neen n'leen nih Pthla Kchiir avah kepleet tih miptlonpiik inda.
Mleiya Mma ngi neen avah Mma' plungnee ngi mitpindit chaak dokin dilli ktlangknai kma', rinkum ki plungbinpsuk ava' dilkqowiyi, piipa rek tkurthuh chaakna' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.

Hava' pauna rek avah trinchaak krow. Tidit tah Isowr hinni lamkrin kcha' rek mmaan nih kqhanong rek totlot chaakna' 'leenni plung mdopluw chaakna' raan ki thenni naan nih mmaan hinni knet tih adothepindit piik raan kngei a. Mleiya hava' dow rek avah mkenreelsi ungta mii khimkhei hinni mthennemna' ka'am.
Pdainu nang ngi kokmok kerteenna' rekle' rilam ki mlei rekle', nowlam ki mleiyi tker'e ungta tkalraina' rek mkheng thungki ikekneeng cha'. Mleiya avale' avah msit amna' ka'am pemeh ungta mdak kden.
Lop kenqhenna' rah ktlow mii avah mveikhatna' le' mveiknitna' kpha thung ngi apilqhit pdainu ava'dil vah mma' avah apthlapthi.
Ava'lu hep daat mii avah 'lam ava' thung ki kenle dok kcha' ungta pnu mdo'arve chaak ungta mthina kukpursul kcha' tidit avah kindit tih adodeh chaak rah.

Neiyi nang ahin nih Artemas mditmata Tikaikas akapthlat psuk lam thung ngi nang ngi trin kmah Nikopolis thah nei kihin nih athlenna' rah atlow. Mleiya neiya phalbilim thung ngi ava' thah ka'am rang ngi plungkreel dok a.
Nang ngi nowlam kdei Jenas le' Apollos leh ngi dow khatleh mdoptatin ktaak ki mipjiin 'lamin mdopthlen pchaanna' raan asutpiik lam.

Ungta neen nmii rekin rukku kqhanong rek mdotlot chaakna' raan ikurchuk chlamso. Mleiya mmaan nih 'tun'tun ki mdokriin rekin mdopordon chaakna' raan ungta mchei mpaar ktaak mkurthuh mana' raan ki thenni havah atlow chlamso.
Nei tu' ka'am rek mkheng ngi, ahin nih akurvuwi chaak inna. Ungta lamrin thuh vonsat miklow kcha' rek mmaan avah mhei'arvuwi piik chlam. Naan akhengngin 'leenni plungnee avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen
Khrista Jisu ki rowngmii Paul nei le' neen nu'unnau'in Timothy ngi, neenki kvonsat'lown ungta knong lowqhi chaakin Phaileman nang ahin nih kikjit chaak inna.
Ungta kvonsat'lown Apphia le' raalmii kdokurthuh qhiin Arkippas le' nang a'inn thungki lamrinlop hin rukku kikjit chaak inna.
Naan ahinin nih neenki N'paan Isowr hinki ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Neiyi neiki Isowr avah kpanpaak chaak a. Neiyi krinktham chaakna' rek thung ngi, mpha ktai thung ngi nang amiing nga kdopyau chaak tlit kchow.
Tidit tah nang ngi Kruwng Jisu hinni ungta miikenje rek mkheng hinni vonsat le' lamrin adothlowi chaak avah neiyi kdo'arjaak chaak dok.
Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinni nang athung ngi ka'am dow kqha khimkhei tedeh pinditna' ava ngi nang ngi mii morson hinni adopenthem alamrin avah mruhtan ma'amna' rah rinkaktham kcha' ping.

Tidit tah nang avonsat thlowi leiyi, neenve ngi kdung ngi, Isowr kpanpaak chaak inna ungta ava ngi mtoksow chaak inna. Mleiya knaupa, nang ngi miikenje rek plungchai rek avah ren tpurthuh piik lam tinu.
Avaleiyi, nang ngi kqha adotlot rangkat ava' adotlotna' rang ki thenni neiyi Khrista hinni changkarngam mih paupiik adokpiik krow.
Pdainu ava' kchang ngi vonsat leiyi, akaktham chaak a. Tidit tah neiya kder dok kcha' Paul ping ungta 'tun rukku Jisu Khrista ki rowngmii khat tih ka'am kcha' ping.
Neiyi thiirrii dobowl daat tih ka'am chaak arlaan nih kdopluk chaak, Onesimas ki thenni nang ahin nih akaktham chaak a.
Mphakhat thung vah mma' avah nang ahinnu msit amna' ka'am pemeh, pdainu 'tunnu mma' avah nang ahinruk ungta nei kihin rukku msit ka'am kcha' a.
Neiyi mma' avah nang ahin nih keheisi perheel chaak a. Nang ngi mma' avah nei kuplungchai kat heppi abin rang ngi arlaang cha'.
Mleiya mma ngi nang akchang kdon nih, kqhapaumin ki rowngmii, nei sopmdotolow chaakna' rang ki thenni, mma' avah kihin nih kdothlot nuwm chaak.
Pdainu neiyi nang adorotma ngi dow khatleh tlownuwm maang. Mleiya neiyi ahin nih kqha adokoptlot mda, nang adak ki totlot chaak rah adongeiyi kqha avah adotlot chaak rah.
Mleiya mpha mruk thuh nang ahinki msun chaakna' ki mlei avah, nang ngi mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ado'arlaan chaakna' rang ki then kurthuwk daat ruk krow.

Nang ngi mma' avah suwk'owr khat heppi thlowima', pdainu suwk'owr khat kkheel lih avonsat'low a'uanau khat heppi athlowi cha'. Neiyi mma' avah kdung ngi vonsat kdolow chaak pdainu nang ngi kerkheelsi ngi daksa 'lam thang ruk ungta Kruwng hin rukku vonsat adolow chaak rah.
Avaleiyi, nang ngi neiya amiqhi khat heppi atbin chaak cheentung ngi, nei adotarlaan chaak rang heppi mma' avah arlaang cha'.
Pdainu mma ngi ahin nih karmak mtlot cheentung ngi mditmata ahin nih lei merve cheentung ngi, nang ngi avah nei k'leen nih atai.
Paul neiyi havah kukhut kat tih kikjit chaak a, neiyi avah achowi nikdi'. Anto' mda, neiyi havah nang adak kat tih nei kihin nih lei ado'arve kdoditna' pemeh.
Kqha a, knaupa nang ngi, Kruwng hinni neiyi nang ahinki plungngam kdophan chaakna' rah atlow cha'. Kruwng hinni nei kuplungchai avah ren mheipthuh piikcha'.
Neiyi, nang ngi tethe adopqowi chaakna' 'leenni plungkrip kdothlowi chaak leiyi, havah ahin nih kdokjit. Mleiya nang ngi neiyi kdothe ava' han'tun nih tlownadi' tidit kdeh.
Ava'arlak ki, nang ngi maltlun'inn khat rukka nei kthen nih mheiporthlon piikcha'. Mleiya nang arinktham chaak rek ar'aang ngi ahin nih neiya akpii chdaat ruk krow.
Khrista Jisu hinni rowngmii kdokurthuhqhi Epaphras rukku ahin nih aturvuwi chaak a.
Ungta anto' heppi nei knonglowqhi rek Mark, Aristarkas, Demas ungta Luke le' rukku aturvuwi chaak lam a.
Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah nang apthlarin tu' ka'am ikurthuwkso, Amen.
Alraangvah Isowr rih npu'npa rekin avah mpha msikmsik ungta mnow msikmsik ki, khulpu rek ar'aang ngi bi chlamda.

Pdainu 'tunki mqutna' mpha thung vah Mchapa ar'aang ngi neenna mibi chaanda. Mma ngi dow mkheng ki piipa mkurthuhna' rah Mma' avah kchol dokda. Ungta Mma ngi dultipaam rek avah Mma' ar'aang ngi mdopurthuh.

Chapa avah Mma' konlorna' Mar'aang ava' ungta Mma' rin chan ava' ki pthla kat ava'. Mma ngi mruhtan ki pauna ava ngi dow mkheng avah kdomda. Mma ngi neen pnu tulqhutna' rek ava' mtlot dok dilli, Mma ngi kparthaangsi mun thung ngi Mlaarkneisi ava' machang thah ko'ong chda.
Mleiya Mma ngi alrouchom mih mdo'arlaan miing avah vaantamsi rek hin rukku kqhasi. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi mmaan hinki kdung ngi kqha ava' kurthuwk chda.

Mleiya Isowr rih vaantamsi kuwkhat leh hinni teden rukku hanto ngi mdothena' ka'am pemeh: “Mleiya Nang nga Nei Kchapa ptih, Tuni ngi Nang nga akupluk chaak a,” mditmow? (Luw. 2:7) Ungta Mma ngi veikhat hanto ngi the nowlda: “Neiyi Mma' Pa kurthuwk nikdi' ungta Mma' avah Nei Kchapa, kurthuwk rah,” mdit mow? (2 Sam. 7:14)
Ungta Mma ngi Mchapa mkhatna' kqou ava' dultipaam thung ngi muryunqhi thung ngi, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr ki vaantamsi rek mkheng ngi Mma' avah luwmdobuk chaak rah,” mdodit. (Knl. 32:43, Ll. 97:7)
Ungta Mma ngi vaantamsi rek leiyi, hanto ngi theda: “Mma ngi Mma' vaantamsi rek avah tirthli rek purthuh lamda. Ungta Mma' sopklow kcha' rek mmaan avah mei kquwng purthuh lamda,” mdodit. (Luw. 104:4)
Pdainu Chapa ava'leiyi Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Oh Isowr, Nah akruwng longkhom avah tlangnai liit nimeh. Ungta Nah akruwngpaalna' ki kchung avah rinkinditna' ki kchung.

Nang ngi rinkinditna' avah vonsat low tinu Ungta Nang ngi nowlam tukksut kma' rek avah adopder chaak lam. Avaleiyi, Isowr, Nang ki Isowr rih Nang avah tkanpatna' reidii adotpubul chaak ava ngi amiqhi rek han'tun nih adotparthaan chaak dok.” (Luw. 45:6-7)
Ungta Mma ngi theda: “O Kruwng, mupqhunthok thung ngi, Nang ngi dultipaam ki innmun avah porthlong tinu. Ungta parvaan rek avah Nang adimlow akhut nong rek.
Mmaan mkheng avah kenvei chrah. Pdainu Nang nga amtlit daatnadi'. Ungta mmaan mkheng avah dona heppi kchuwlter chrah.

Nang ngi mmaan rek avah buwphat tukyul heppi kyul tidon perthleng lamnadi'. Pdainu Nang nga mehehep pih amtlit chdaatnadi' Ungta Nang akum rek avah teden rukku tlangliit nimeh,” mdodit. (Luw. 102:25,27)
Pdainu vaantamsi rek khadaat hin rukku Mma ngi: “Neiyi Amiihal rek avah Akhuhther rih akthiik piikduh khimkheiyi, Nei kmachang thah iko'ong daat,” mditmow? (Luw. 110:1)
Mdittu' talu, mmaan mkheng avah, alrouchom mih tkirliinna' ava' kchom kcha' rang rek mmaan ava' sopklow chrang ki thenni mdopthlat, sopklow kcha' pthla rek lam pemeh mow?
Mlei hava' leiyi neen nih midotphui pthidok mana' raan ki thenni tarjaak chaak dokin ava' thung ngi knet tih plung treel chaak raan.
Mleiya vaantamsi rek ar'aang ngi mdothe pauna rek avah kindit. Tidit tah nowlam kupkui rekle' tethe kopqowi kma' rek khimkheiyi mmaan ki mraal suwkthuhna' rek avah karlaang chlam rah.

Mdittu' neen nih kdung ngi klin tkirliinna' ava' tukksut kma' nkurthuh innu, neenna taluhep pih tkerthle raanno? Mleiya tkirliinna' avah choduduh ngi Kruwng ngi mdoparjaam dok ungta Mma' dothe karja rekki avah kindit tidit avah neen nihinin nih mdopandan chaak dokin.

Ungta Isowr mdakkat rukku titinna' le' tngana' rekki tidit tah mdetmdet ki ruhtan nong rekki ungta Mma' mdak plungbin dilkqowiyi Pthla Kchiir ki chla rekki avah kindit tidit ki sakhi avah mdopiik dok.
Mleiya neen nih mlei tethe kchown, karvang bei rang ta'amna' dultipaam avah Mma ngi vaantamsi rek kurduh ngi mdothiik pemeh.
Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih sakhi mdopiikna' mmun khat ka'am. Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adobinphaak mii avah taluda? Mditmata Nang ngi adokilrin qhichaak Mii Chapa avah kuwda?

Nang ngi Mma' avah mpha mruk thuh vaantamsi rek hinni pchowm bet tih. Nang ngi Mma' avah tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ki laar luwkhum pkhum chtinu. Ungta Nang akhut nongtlot khimkhei rek 'leenni tpa'am tinu.

Ungta Nang ngi dow mkheng avah Mma' khuhther rih thipthi tinu,” dida. (Luw. 8:4-7) Mleiya hava' thung ngi Mma ngi dow mkheng avah Mma' tii thah, Mma' kurduh ngi mdothiik pthidok. Mma ngi Mma' kurduh ngi mdothiikma dow khatleh ruk ka'am pemeh. Pdainu 'tunnu neen nih dow mkheng avah Mma' kurduh ngi ka'am mih deimlai inpimin.

Pdainu neen nih Jisu avah ndehn a, tidit tah mpha mruk thung ngi Mma' avah vaantamsi rek hinni kchowm set purthuhda. Mleiya Mma ngi Isowr hinki plungnee avaleiyi mii khimkhei ki thenni kdiyou avah mdopertem dok. Avaleiyi, 'tunnu Mma ngi tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ki laar luwkhum avah mdokhum chaak.

Mleiya dow mkheng avah Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' thenni ka'am ungta Mma ngi chapa rek knempok avah tkonlorna' thung ngi mdothuhqhi. Ungta Mma' avah mmaan ki tkirliinna' ki mbul mkurthuh leiyi, Isowr rih, Jisu avah tyattraanna' tperteel lih mdopurkhum rang thah tlada.
Mleiya kipchiir kcha' Mma' ava'ruk ungta mdopchiir chaak rek mmaan ava'ruk, mkheng kheng inni khadaat hinki lam. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi mmaan avah ku'uknau rek, mditlam thung ngi mningkakyak pemeh.
Mleiya hanto ngi theda: “Neiyi, Nang amiing avah ku'uknau rek hinni purphuwng nikdi'. Lamrinlop thung ngi neiyi adokpanpaakna' laa the nikdi',” mdodit. (Luw. 22:22)
Ungta veikhat nowl lih: “Neiyi klamrin avah Mma' hinni thinikdi',” dida. (2 Sam. 22:3 Is. 8:17) Ungta veikhat nowl lih: “Nei le' Isowr rih mdotpiik nau rek avah hava' thang inping,” dida. (Is. 8:8)

Mleiya nau rek ava ngi sadak le' hii mdothlowiyin leiyi, Mma' rukku anto' heppi mmaan ki sadak le' hii ava'kat louda. Mleiya Mma ngi mdiyow avah kdiyou ki tpaalna' ruhtan, kthlowi tarnampii ava ngi ruhtan mdothlowi porsonmana' rang ki then.
Ungta Mma' diyow ava ngi, kdiyou mdoqit chaak inni mrinkumpung inni ava' thuh suwk'owr rih ka'am kcha' rek mmaan avah perthlet chlamda.
Mleiya dakat tih Mma ngi vaantamsi rek avah bom chlammeh, pdainu Mma ngi Abraham nau rek ava' mdobom chaak lam.

Avaleiyi, dow mkheng 'leenni Mma' avah mu'umnau rek hep daat mdopurthuh rang thah tlada. Mleiya havah Mma ngi Isowr sopmdolow chaakna' thung ngi plungqhat kohordei ungta trinchaak krow thimpu kenreel khat mkurthuhna' rang ki then. Ungta mii rek pnu leiyi, Mma' avah Isowr plung ngamna' rintparlaan khat mkurthuh chaakna' rang ki then.
Mleiya Mma' mdakkat tih avah tarnampii ngi mepthleem thung ngi tyat perteelda. Ungta ava' tyatna' mdoperteel ava ngi Mma ngi kepthleem thung ngi ktla rek avah mdobom chaak pchaan.

Avaleiyi, parvaan do'own chaak kphang dok kcha', kchiir dok kcha' ku'uknau rek, naan nih aplungbin rekin avah Khrista Jisu hinni apnet chaan. Mleiya Mma' avah neen nih kdopandan chaak dokin, tamsi ava' ungta thimpu kenreel ava'.
Mma' avah Moses tih Isowr inn mkheng thung ngi trinchaak krow mkurthuh heppi, Mma' kokchol kcha' Khat ava' hinni Mmah trinchaak krow ngi ka'am.
Mleiya inn ksa kcha' mma' ava ngi mi'innsak ava' hinni takyat chaakna' kerkheel set tih ma'am heppi, hava' Khat ava ngi Moses hin rukku kerkheel set tih konlor kcha'ki mtik kcha.
Mleiya inn khimkhei avah ksa khat tih mdosak, pdainu dow mkheng ksa avah Isowr.
Ungta dil thah talu tpauna' rang tidit ki rinpaumin tpiikna' rang 'leenni Moses avah Isowr inn mkheng thung ngi trinchaak krow suwk khat.

Pdainu Khrista avah Isowr inn thung ngi Chapa khat tih trinchaak krow. Ungta neen nih neenki nardarow naan le' neenki tpirlin chaak naan plungbinpsuk 'leenni knet tih nokyown chaakin bih, neenna Mma' inn rek inpimin.
Avaleiyi, Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mdothe heppi: “Tuni naan nih Mma' krowl arjaak chaakin cheentung ngi.
Naan nih paamkbiik laiyi, naan atperteelin thung ngi, Naan nih ava' ptengda raalkna ngi a'amin thungki heppi aplung rekin tapchai maan.
Ava' thung ngi apu'apa rek inni kum somplii thung ngi mleuna' lamda ungta mperteel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Nei knongtlot rek avah mmikin nih mdodeh dokin.
Ava'leiyi, suruwl ava' 'leenni kuplung thida hanto' kdothe: 'Mmaan plung rek avah mpha ktaiyi 'lamleh thah chetda ungta mmaan nih, Nei k'lam rek avah deilam meh.
Ava'leiyi, Neiyi kuplungthit mei kquwng ava ngi, ‘Mmaan nah Nei kkarngatna' thung ngi luwtlam nimeh’ dinuh, pau kdoreel dok,” mdodit. (Luw. 95:7-11)
Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan kuwkhat leh ruk lamrinma ki plung kqha kma' ava ngi naan nih kring Isowr hinki asunmana' raan ki thenni ikilrindei chaan.
Pdainu naan nih, tuni tidit ma'am daat arlaan nih, khat le' khat avah mniktai ikorsopdei chaan. Mditma bih naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tah pnu ki tkurhuwnna' ava ngi muplung ktapchai krep rah.
Mleiya neen nih mqutna' kpha thung ngi choduh ki nuplungin rina' ava' knet tih nokyown chaakin bih, neenna Khrista hinki karlaang kcha'sap tkurthuh chaak raan.
Tikjit ava ngi mdokjit dok heppi: “Tuni, naan nih Mma' krowl arjaak chaakin cheentung ngi, Ptengda raalkna rek heppi aplung rekin tapchaimaan,” dida. (Luw. 95:7-8)
Mleiya kuw le'da arjadaat thida ptengda raalkna rekka? Mmaan mkheng avah Moses tih Egypt paam thungki mdoqhi pthuh rek avale' lam pemeh mow?
'Tunnu Mma ngi kum somplii thung ngi plungthit mdolow rek avah kuw le' lamda? Mmaan avah pnu arvei lamda paamkbiik laiyi mokluwngin kplowm pok kcha' rek avale' lam pemeh mo?
Ungta kuw le' hinda Mma ngi, ‘Mma' karngatna' thuh luwtlam nimeh,' dida, pau mdoreel psuk rekka, tethe kopqowi kma' rek mmaan ava le' pemeh mow?
Avaleiyi, neen nih ndehn a tidit tah mmaan nih mlamrinmaan leiyi, ava' thuh kluwt pchaang lam. Pemeh
Avaleiyi, Mma' karngatna' thuh tuluw chaakna' ki paureel avah ma'am tlit daat leiyi, neen nih ikilrindei chaan cheh. Mditma bih naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tah kaptham dok kcha' ka'am krow.

Mleiya dakat tih kqhapaumin avah mmaan hinni mdoparjaamin heppi, neen nihinin rukku mdoparjaam. Pdainu paumin avah mmaan nih lamrin tu' mdoporthlow chaakmaan leiyi, mmaan hinni msit ka'am kurthuwk mda.

'tunnu lamkrin kcha' neenna Mma' karngatna' thung ngi tuluw chaakin. Mleiya Isowr rih hanto'theda: “Neiyi kuplungthit mei kquwng ava ngi pau reel nuh kthe a, Tidit tah mmaan nah Nei kkarngatna' thung ngi luwtlam nimeh,” dida. (Luw. 95:11) Mleiya dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih Mma' nong avah qu chdaat yoso, mmaan nah luwtlam nimeh.
Mleiya Mma ngi mmun khat thung ngi hava' pauna rekki mtikhiuna' nit ava'leiyi hanto'theda: “Ungta mtikhiuna' nit tih, Isowr rih mnong rek mkheng thungki karnga chda.” (Rnp. 2:2)
Ungta veikhat hava' thung ngi Mma ngi the nowlda: “Mmaan nah Nei kkarngatna' thung ngi luwtlam nimeh,” dida. (Luw. 95:11)

Mleiya tunkpha thung ngi tkarngatna' mmun ava' thung ngi kuwmiikhat tih mluw chaak rang avah ka'am tlit daat a. Ungta choduh ngi mhin inni kqhapaumin tparjaamna' rekki tethe mdopqowi maanni ava' thung ngu luwt chlam mda.

Avaleiyi, Isowr rih mpha rowiksowt tih ma'am dil lih David ar'aang ngi choduh mdothe dok ava' hep pih: “Tuni, naan nih Mma' krowl avah arjaak chaakin cheentung ngi, aplung rekin avah tapchaimaan,” dida. (Luw. 95:7-8) Tuni' tidit nit avah veikhat tpa'am nowlda.
Mleiya Joshuah ngi mmaan hinni tkarngatna' kpiidok lam mkurthuh bih, Mma ngi mdilthang vah morson nit khat tidit avah the nimeh.
Ava'kat ava' thung ngi Isowr mii rekki thenni tkarngatna' nit avah ka'am kcha' a.
Mleiya Mma' karngatna' ava' thung ngi kluwt kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr rukku mkarngat chaak ava' heppi mnong rek thungki karnga kcha' a.
Avaleiyi, neen nih ava' tkarngatna' ava' thung ngi tuluw chaakna' raan ki thenni kdung ngi itlow chaancheh. Mditma bih kuwmiikhat tah mmaan ki tethe topqowimana' ava' thung ngi ktla kcha' ka'am rah.

Mleiya Isowr pauna avah kring ungta mruh ktang ungta mahaa 'knii kpu raal'kaang hin rukku kraang. Ava ngi plungrin le' pthla kurkhuina' kpha ungta ruhjom rekle' artlin rek kpha kepthleng pchaang. Ungta plungbin rekle' plungrildeh rek kpha rukka kdeipindih pchaang.

Ungta neen nih neenki nleiyin tpiikna' raan Mma' ava' miksut thungki kordowl pchaang rah mdopurthuh dok dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Mma' mikchai rek thung ngi dow mkheng avah mdak kchai ungta kparvang kcha'.
Avaleiyi, neen nih parvaan kepthleng ngi hungkkal dok kcha' thimpu kenreelsi Isowr Chapa Jisu tothlowi chaakin leiyi, neen nih tethethut chaakin lamrin ava' thung ngi knet tih ikyowngdei chaancheh.

Mleiya neen nih neenki nruhdownna' rek mikdehpiikin thimpu kenreelsi khat nthlowi chaak inna. Mleiya Mmah neen nehep daat tidit tah dow mkheng 'leenni neen nih tperteelin kepthleem avah Mma' rukku mdoperteel chaak pdainu Mmah pnu kervei pemeh.
Avaleiyi, neen nih nikriin chaakin ki mpha thung ngi plungqhat le' plungnee tarlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni, plungnee ki Kruwng longkhom avah changkarngam mih ijong chaan cheh.

Tidit tah thimpu kenreelsi khimkhei avah mii rek arlak ki tokchol lam ungta mii rekki thenni Isowr hinni sopklow chrang ki ngi takthlan dok. Mleiya mma ngi chla rek ruk ungta pnu ki thenni rintparlaan ava'ruk mikniing ngi mdotlot rah.
Mma ngi kdeipindih kma' rekle' 'lamleh kqowi kcha' rek 'leenni plung mdopdown pchaan, mleiya mma' rukka ruhdownna' rekki mdotkhul.
Mlei hava' leiyi mii rekki then mdotlot heppi mma ngi mma' mdaksa ki then rukku pnu leiyi, rintparlaanna' ava ngi makparlaan chaak rah.
Ungta dultimii kuwkhat leh ngi Aaron heppi Isowr rih mma' avah mdo'own chaak kma'don nih mdak ki mkaryat chaakna' klou pchaang kcha' ka'am pemeh.

Anto' heppi, Khrista rukku Thimpu Kenreelsi tkurthuhna' thung ngi Mdak ki kokponlor kcha' pemeh. Pdainu Mma' hinni: “Nang nga Kchapa ptih. Tuni Nang nga, Neiyi adokupluk,” (Luw. 2:7) dida kthe Mma' ava' dopurthuh.
Anto' heppi Mma ngi mmun morson khat thung ngi hanto'theda: “Nang nga Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi ktlangknai kma' thimpu khat ptih,” mdodit. (Luw. 110:4)

Dultipaam thung ngi Jisu ngi ma'ambong mpha thung ngi, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki Mma' ksan pchaang rang ava' hinni kdung ngi owngda tqa tu' kilqhi ngi rinktham chda. Ungta Mma ngi rinko'owi dok ki makparlaan chaak ava ngi mrinktham chaak avah arjaak piikda.
Mma ngi Chapa khat kurthuwk chleek yoso, Mma ngi tyat mdoperteel chaakna' 'leenni tethe topqowina' avah kurchuk chda.
Ungta mdopurkhum piik chaak leiyi, Mma ngi tethe kopqowi kcha' mkheng rek hinni ktlangknai kma' tkirliinna' ki mukpu avah kurthuwk chda.
Ungta Mma' avah Isowr rih Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi thimpu kenreelsi purthuhda.
Neen nih hava' ki mlei thung ngi tethe raan knempok ki ka'am pdainu naan nih ado'arjaak dehmaan leiyi, tethena' kparsa a.

Dakat tih 'tunnu naanna chukpu kurthuwk dok chraan ptih. Pdainu Isowr pauna kindit rek ava' ki mbul ava' ki mlei avah kuwmiikhat tih veikhat adotpurchuh raan thah ktla a. Mleiya naanna then kapchai kcha pchaang kma' ungta arnu kyown meek kurthuwk kcha'in imptih.
Arnu kyown meeksli kuwkhat leh ngi, tidit tah nau kdowng mkurthuhn leiyi, rinkinditna' ki mleiyi tpurchuhna' avah mdodeh pindit khot pemeh.
Pdainu thendak avah kver dok kcha' mmaan ava' ki then. Mleiya mmaan nih muplungrilin avah kqha le' kthi tedeh pinditna' thung ngi kdet kmah mdopurchuh chaak dokin.

Avaleiyi, neen nih Khrista ki tkurchuhna' mbul rek avah imapthiin cheh rang ngi, kurkhum ava' thuh ichetin cheh. Mleiya neen nih veikhat nowl lih kdiyou kcha' nong rek thungki plung tperthlenna' le' Isowr hinni lamtrin chaakna' ki innmun phunnowl maancheh.
Tidit tah diiluwna' rek leiyi, tkurchuhna', baan tathlaanna' reklu, kdiyou rinkerheelna' ungta ktlangknai kma' pau tpinditna'lu avah themaan cheh.
Ungta hava'le' avah Isowr rih mitrotpiikin bih, neen nih totlot chaak daat raan.
Mleiya mpha khat thung ngi mar'aang mdopiik dok rek ungta parvaan ki chla kpertem dok kcha' rek ungta Pthla Kchiir karlaang dok kcha' rek aangqhe ka'am dok lam.
Ungta mmaan nih Isowr pauna avah mdopertem chaak dokin ungta karvang bei rang dultipaam ava' ki ruhtan rek avah mdopertem chaak dokin.

Ungta mmaan ava ngi mdil mkerheel chaakin bih, mmaan nih muplungin mdoperthlenna' raan ki thenni mveiknitna' tarvanqhi lamna' rah m'lam am nimeh. Mleiya mmaan nih Isowr Chapa avah mkhutkat inni mveiknitna' mopthowi inna ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah ningkya mpiik inna.

Tidit tah dulti ava ngi m'leen nih krah khu avah prowpda ungta ava ngi msitpum dow rek pthuwkda ungta dulti knum kcha' rekki mchei avah mdo'arkun chaakin. Mleiya dulti ava ngi Isowr hinki suwqhat avah mdo'arlaan chaak.
Pdainu tirling le' lingkhu kupthuwk dulti avah msit amna' ka'am pemeh ungta avah pauhor tbuk ki ka'am kcha' a. Ungta mqutna' thung ngu avah tapkaak pthi ngi ka'am kcha' a.
Pdainu kvonsat'lown rekin, neen nih hanto ngi the chdaat yown ringngi, naan nih dow kqhabet tidit tah tkirliinna' tu' kilqhi dow rek pthuwknaan tidit tih a'leenin nih kuplungin avah krip kcha' a.

Mleiya Isowr rah mrinkindit kma'lu pemeh. Mma ngi naan anongtlotin ungta Mma' miing leiyi, kdung ngi vonsat tih sop'adolow chaakin. Tidit tah naan nih Mma' miikenje rek hinni sop'adolow chaakin ungta 'tun rukku mmaan avah sop'alow chaak tlit daat inna. Naan nih vonsat adotedet chaaknaan nong rek avah Mma ngi perngeel nimeh.
Ungta neen nih naan akheng inni plungbinpsuk ki plungrina' ava' thung ngi mqutna' kpha thung ngi hava' heppi plung adopluw chaak raan kdongei chaakin.

Tidit tah naan nih howngkva ngi a'am raan avah ngeimaan ring. Mleiya naan nih lamrinna' le' ksowt tih tidiildehna' ar'aang ngi Isowr rih pau mdoreel dok rek ava' alrouchom mih kchom kcha' rek mmaan ava' dotlot heppi adotlot chaak raan.
Mleiya Mma ngi Abraham hinni pau mreel thung ngi, Mma' han'tun nih klin mdotham rah ma'amma leiyi, Mma ngi mdak karthamda pau mdoreel.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang nga suwqhat apii langlang nikdi', Ungta Neiyi nang avah atuppung nikdi,” dida. (Rnp. 22:17)
Ungta Abraham mih ningkakraal lih mdiil chaak dilli mma ngi paureel avah arlaang chda.
Mleiya dultimii ngi mmaan hinni klin ava' thamda pau mdoreel ungta paureel ava ngi mdothe pau avah mdotepne bet ungta ava ngi tkerteenna' rang mkheng avah mdopa'am pemeh.
Anto' heppi Isowr rih Mma' plungbinrit avah kertlei liit nimeh tidit avah Paureel ava' ki piipa rek hinni mdopandan nuwm leiyi Mma ngi avah paureel lih mdopindit.

Tidit tah kertlei pchaang kma' rang dow 'knii rek leiyi, Isowr a pleinei pchaang meh. Mleiya havah neen nih kdung ngi arda toprow chaakna' raan ungta karsan kcha' rang ki thenni, Mma' hinni heikchen kcha' neenki nduhsuk thaan nih midotithiik piikin plungbinpsuk ava' tokyown chaakna' raan ki then.
Neen nih hava' plungbinpsuk avah nuplungrinin ki thenni thiirkuwikin nih tothlowi chaakin ungta havah kindit ungta knet. Ungta hava ngi buw'inn thungki buwyaar rilki Mmun Kenjesi avah mdopthlen.
Mmun ava'kat thung ngi neen nduhn nih kchet, Jisu ngi neen nakchang inni ava' thuh luwtda. Ungta Mma ngi Melkaijadek hep daat tih, ktlangknai kma' thimpu kenreelsi avah kurthuwk dok kcha'.

Mleiya hava' Melkaijadek avah Salem ki paamkruwng ungta mma' avah Kparthaangsi Isowr ava' ki thimpu khat. Abraham mih paamkruwng rek eyou lam thida marvan kerheel thung ngi, Melkaijadek ki mma' avah kurdut qhida ungta mma ngi Abraham avah suwqhat pii chda.

Ungta Abraham mih pchaangda raan nih mdolow dow mkheng ki sowm ki khat avah Melkaijadek hinni piida. Mma' avah mmiing ki dilkqowiyi, mkhatna' thung ngi rinkindit ki paamkruwng ungta audilli Salem ki paamkruwng pi'ii mdit. Mningleiya nperheel bih, ‘plung kdai ki paamkruwng’ mdoditna'.

Mma' avah mnuh mditmata mpa ka'am pemeh, mqou mqauna' ruk ka'am pemeh ungta mdopqhunna' ruk ka'am pemeh mditmata mrinkum qutna' ruk ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mma' avah Isowr Chapa hep daat pthutda ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi thimpu khat tih ka'am kcha'.
'Tunnu abinin, hava' mii havah tya thung ngi klin chdaat a, tidit tah neenki tqou naan Abraham kpha ngi pchaangda raan nih mdolown dow rek ava' ki sowm ki khat mdopiik kah!

Ungta Levi chapa rekki thimpu rek arvang kurthuwk lamda ungta mii rek hinki tidit tah mu'umnau rekin hinki sowm ki khat avah qhai lamda. Hava' avah nowlam ki paupiik ka'am ksa ava'. Mleiya mmaan nih Abraham suruwl thungki kurthuwk chleeklam yoso, mmaan nih havah mdotlotin.
Pdainu Levi phung thung ngi mri mlam karvang kma'pa hava' mma' ava ngi Abraham hinki sowm ki khat arlaangda ungta paureel rek kthlowi kcha' mma' ava' hinni suwqhat piida.
'Tunnu kdilset ava ngi miklin ava' hinni suwqhat mpii ka, tidit avah tethe perkheelna' amvot nimeh.

Lam. khat thah havah, kdiyou kcha' mii ava ngi sowm ki khat avah mdo'arlaan, pdainu m'lam morson khatthang nowllu, mma' avah kring daat ungta sowm ki khat avah marlaan tlit daat tidit tih sakhi pii lamda.
Ungta hanto' rukku tethe krow tidit tah sowm ki khat karlaang kcha' rang, Levi phung kpha rukku Abraham ar'aang ngi sowm ki khat avah mpii ka.
Mleiya Melkaijadek ki Abraham mkurdutqhi thung vah Levi avah mpa daksa thung ngi ka'am chdaat.

Tidit tah Avaleiyi, kurkhum avah Levi phung rek, thimpu kurthuh ar'aang ngi mpurthuh pchaan rang ngu, Tidit tah ava' 'leenni nowlam avah mii rek hinni mdopiik. Taluleiyi, Aaron kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi ko'own kmah Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi thimpu morson khat mthuh rang avah msit ka'am tlit daat toh?
Mleiya thimpu tkurthuhna' mkerthlen, leiyi nowlam ava' rukka mkerthlen rang thah ktla.
Tidit tah hava' dow rek ava' tethena' Mma' avah phungktlei morson khat thung ki ungta phung ava' thung ki kuwkhat leh ngi rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh soplow cha' mlai.
Mleiya neenki Kruwng avah Judah phung thungki tidit avah mkindit kat. Ungta phung ava'lei vah Moses tih thimpu ki mleiyi dow khatleh the meh.
Ungta Melkaijadek heppi thimpu ktlei khat mthuh bih, neen nih tetheen avah mpinditset thangnga.
Thimpu ktlei khat avah daksa lam ktong thah mdopiik paupiik ava' ki nowlam ki dilkqowiyi karvang pemeh. Pdainu k'qu tidit ktaak rinkum ki ruhtan dilkqowiyi karvang.
Mleiya Mma ngi hanto'theda, sakhi mdopiik: “Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi Nang nga ktlangknai kma' thimpu khat ptih,” mdodit. (Luw. 110:4)
Mleiya 'lam khat thah, choduh ki paupiik avah mdown leiyi, ungta msit ma'amma leiyi, Isowr rih avah mdoknen pthi.

Mleiya nowlam ava ngi dow khatleh ruk kurkhum mdopthut pchaan pemeh. 'Lam khat thah Isowr rih kqhaset plungbinpsuk khat mipthuhpiikinda ungta neen nih ava' plungbinpsuk ava' ar'aang ngi Isowr hinni knai kcha' inpimin.
Ungta Mma' avah paureel ktaak ki thimpu mdopurthuh thlaang thlaang pemeh.

Mleiya mmaan nah paureel ktaak ki thimpu arvang kurthuwk lam, pdainu Mmah paureel khat thung ngi thimpu avah kkurthuwk. Mleiya Isowr rih paureel thamda Mma' hinni hanto ngi mdothe: “Kruwng ava ngi paureel thamda ungta Mma ngi muplungreel perthleng nimeh. ‘Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi, Nang nga, ktlangknai kma.’ thimpu khat ptih,” mdodit. (Luw. 110:4)
Hava' paureeltham ava ngi Jisu ngi kqhaset pauqum ava' ki thenni kripiik ava' mdit mow? mdit mow?” ' kurthuwkda.
Ungta kdiyou ava ngi mdopkhaan lam leiyi, mmaan avah amtlit lam mda avaleiyi thimpu knempok rek arvan ka'am lam.
Pdainu Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ma'am tlit leiyi, Mmah kerthleng krow kma' thimpu kurthuwk chda.
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi, Mma' ar'aang ngi Isowr hinni karva kcha' rek mmaan avah pumsan nih mdosan chaak pchaan lam. Mleiya mmaan thenni rinkaktham piik chrang ngi Mmah ktlangknai kmah ngi kring.

Tidit tah Isowr rih neen nthen inni kurthutjik ki thimpu kenreelsi avah mitpiik chaak dok inna. Mleiya Mmah kchiir, mikiplim pemeh, ktobor pemeh, pnu kervei rek thungki kenje kcha', ungta parvaan hankkheel dek ki kparthaang.

Mma' avah thimpu kenreel morson reklu pemeh. Mma ngi rukri ngi Mma' mdak ki pnu rek thenni ungta mii rekki pnu rekki thenni, mnitmnit ki rinmdoparlaan chaakna' rang ki msit ammeh, Mleiya Mma ngi Mdakkat makparlaan chaak ava ngi mmaan pnu rekki thenni veikhadaat tih rinkakparlaan dok kcha'.
Mleiya nowlam ava ngi mruh kdowng dultimii rek avah thimpu kenreelsi rek kurthuwk rang ngi kcholda. Pdainu nowlam dil thah karvang paureeltham ava ngi ktlangknai kmah ngi kpurkhum Chapa ava' kcholda.
'Tunnu neen nih kdothenaan ki mlei klinsi avah hava': Tidit tah neen nih parvaan thah, Mlaarkneisi ava' kruwng longkhom machang ngi kok'ong Thimpu Kenreelsi ava' tothlowi chaakin.
Ungta dultimii ngi mdophunma Kruwng ava ngi mdophun kindit buw'inn dakdak ki Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi Mma ngi sopmdolow chaak.

Mleiya thimpu kenreelsi rek khimkhei avah, chla rekle' rintparlaanna' rek ava' kparlaan rang ki thenni mmaan avah tokchol. Avaleiyi, hava' Khat ava' rukku talu varpleh khat mdoparlaan rang thah tlada.
Mleiya Mma' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am mkurthuh bih, Mmah thimpu kurthuwk nimeh. Mleiya nowlam dilkqowiyi chla rek ava' kparlaan kcha' thimpu rek ka'am lam.

Tidit tah mmaan ava ngi parvaan ki dow rek ava' kopqowiyi ungta tomkal lih thung ngi sopmdolow chaakin. Mleiya Moses tih buw'inn ksa rah mthe thung ngi mmah parvaan ki ngi mdopilqhit. Tidit tah Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi lown thah, Neiyi adokepdeh ruwngchen ava' dilkqowiyi dow mkheng avah atlot chaak mow, tidit asuw cha',” mdodit. (Mpk. 25:40)
Pdainu 'tunnu Mma ngi kenreelsi soplowna' avah mdo'arlaan chaak. Mleiya Mmah Isowr rih makqhaset paureel rek ava' thung ngi mdotham, pauqum kqhaset ava' ki Mikpalqhat kcha' khat ava'.
Mleiya mkhatna' pauqum ava ngi mkarmana' ma'amma bih, miknitna' ki thenni mmun avah thlaam nimeh.

Isowr rih mmaan doparmana' mdothlaam leiyi, hanto'theda: “Asuwn, ‘Neiyi Isreel innkhor thung ngi ungta Judah innkhor thung ngi, pauqum ren khat kdopqhanna' rah mpha avah arvang knai kcha' a,’ dida, Kruwng ngi mthe a.

Ungta hava' pauqum ren avah, ‘Neiyi mmaan avah Egypt paam thungki mkhut thaan nih kyowng lam nuh kqhi pthuhlam thung ngi, Mpu'mpa rekin hinni kdopiik pauqum ava' hep daat tlit nimeh.’ Mleiya mmaan nih ‘Nei kpauqum ava' thung ngi tethe kopqowiyi ma'ammaan leiyi, Neiyi mmaan avah tukkdosut lam pemeh,’ dida, Kruwng ngi mthe a.

Tidit tah ava' nit rek ava' mqut dilli, Neiyi Isreel innkhor thung ngi kdopqhan rang pauqum avah hava': ‘Mleiya Neiyi Nei ki knowlam rek avah mmaan plungril thung ngi pchip nikdi', ungta muplungchai in 'leenni mmaan avah kjit nikdi'. Ungta Neiya mmaan Isowr kurthuwk nikdi' ungta mmaan avah Nei kmii rek kurthuwk lamrah.’
Kuwkhat leh ngi mi'innveen mditmata mu'umnau khat hinni: ‘Kruwng avah adeipindih cha',’ mdoditna' ki msit am nimeh. Mleiya mikdilsi rukku ungta miklinsi rukku Neiya mekdei chlam rah.
Tidit tah Neiyi mmaan ki rinkinditna' 'leenni plungqhat hor nikdi' Ungta mmaan pnu arve rekle' nowlam tuksutmana' rek avah binphaak porsonpiik lam nimaang,” dida. (Jer. 31:31-34)
Ava' thung ngi Mma ngi: ‘Pauqum ren khat,’ dida, mdothe ava ngi mdopandan avah, Mma ngi choduh ki pauqum avah pli mdopthut pthi. 'Tunnu avah kdung ngi pli kurthuwk chda ungta kbeiyi kenvei chrah.
'Tunnu dultipaam ki mkhatna' buw'inn ava' thung ngi luwtbukna' ki nowparit rek avah ka'am.
Buw'inn avah hanto', mkhatna' innkhaar avah Mmun Kenjesi mdoditin ava'. Ava' thung ngi meilakuwng ava' amda, rintparlaanna' khaan ava' amda ungta tetdet thenpen avale' avah ka'am lam.
Ungta buw'inn ava' ki miknitna', buwjaar ava' thung ngi, innkhaar khat ka'am avah mmaan nih, Mmun Kenjesi, mdoditin.

Mmun ava' thung ngi namreng tapkaakna' jiiring ngi tsak rintparlaanna' khaan ungta jiiring ngi kloijik ki tupluwn pauqum buwr avah ka'am. Ungta mthung ngi maana tadaal jiiring bel le' mdei kuksun Aaron kchung ungta pauqum ki lungphel 'knii avah ava' thung ngi ka'am.
Ungta ava' 'tun nih cherubim konlorna' ava ngi plungqhat longkhom avah mtun nih pkhum lamda. Hava' dow rekki mlei avah 'tun neen nih mkindit avah the pchaang maanring.
'Tunnu hava'le' ava' mporthlon dok dilli, mniiktaiyi thimpu rekki buw'inn ki mkhatna' ava' thung ngi sopklow ngi kluwt kcha' kchok lam.

Pdainu miknitna' innkhaar ava' thung ngu thimpu kenreelsi ava' daat chrel lih, kum khat thung ngi veikhat daat chrel kluwt kcha'lu. Ungta mma ngi ava' thung ngi mma' mdak ki thenni ungta mii rekki mdodeh pindit maanni pnu mdo'arve dokin ki thenni rinkparlaan rah mvanluw chaak thung ngi, mma ngi hii ktaak ki kluwt lupemeh.
Tidit tah mkhatna' buw'inn ava' ma'am khimkhei thung ngu Mmun Kenjesi 'lam avah mdopandan pemeh tidit avah Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mdotedet dok.
Mleiya hava ngi tunpha ki thenni tedeh pinditna' khat kurthuwkda. Mleiya chla rekle' rintparlaanna' rek tparlaan ava ngi luwkbu kcha' rekki plungrildeh avah purtluwm pchaang meh.

Mleiya hava' nowren ava' marvan thuh kpha ki thenni ka'am chngaal. Tidit tah mmaan avah daksa 'lam ki nowparit rek tidit tah tchaak le' tneekna' ki mlei ungta mrit khat thung ngi mdetmdet ki tulqhutna' nowpa rek daat ngaal.

Pdainu Khrista ngi karvang bei rang dow kqha ava' ki Thimpu Kenreelsi kurthuwk ki arvangda. Tidit tah Mma ngi klinsi ngi ungta kurkhum set tih khut rekki tsakmah Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi luwtda. Mleiya avah Isowr rih mdopurthuh hava' dultipaam thungki pemeh.

Mma ngi Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi mluw thung ngi keel rekle' silsuwn rek hii sinda kluwt pemeh. Pdainu Mdakkat ki hii tu' kilqhi ngi veikhadaat tih kluwt kcha'. Ungta ava ngi Mma ngi ktlangknai kma' tkartlanna' avah mdo'arlaan chaak.
Mleiya silpa rekle' keel rek ungta sil'arla rek tapkaakna' purvuwt avah kertleu kma' rek 'leenni mikqhiincheu mmaan avah daksa 'lam thah kertleu chlamda.

Khrista ngi, ktlangknai kma' Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi tupsulna' ktaak liit tih, Isowr hinni Mdakkat avah kparlaan chda. Ava' vah Mma' hii ava' ngaalvah, naan nih kring Isowr sop'adolow chaakna' raan ki thenni tya kerkheel lih kdiyou nong rek thungki naan aplungrildeh rekin avah akipchiir piik pchaang chraanno?

Ungta hava' leiyi mdiyow chaak ava' ar'aang ngi Mma' avah pauqum ren ki Mikpalqhat kcha' ava' kurthuwkda. Ungta havah Mma ngi rukri ki pauqum ava' kurduh ngi nowlam kupkui rek mmaan ava' mdoktlan lamna' rang ki then. Mleiya havah Isowr rih pau mdoreel dok heppi Mma ngi mdo'own chaak dok rekki ktlangknai kmah alroukchom ava' mkurthuh chaakna' raan ki then.
Mleiya pauqum khat mapqhan daat le' kapqhang kcha' mma' avah mdiyow rang thah tlada.
Mleiya mii rek mdiyown dilli, pauqum avah topqowi rotlu ungta ava' kapqhang mii ava' ma'am daat arlaan nuh pauqum avah mruhtan ka'amvot lupemeh.
Avaleiyi, Isowr rih rukri ki pauqum avah hii ktaak ki mdopqhan pemeh.

Moses tih nowlam ava' ki paupiik rek khimkhei avah mii mkheng rek hinni mthethut dok dilli, mma ngi silsuwn rekle' keel rek hii ava' louda ungta saamul ksen ungta hyssop kuwng louda laika ava' 'leenni ungta mii mkheng rek 'leenni avah mdokqhi.
Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Havah naan ahin nih Isowr rih paupiik ki adotpiikin hii ki pauqum ava,” dida. (Mpk. 24:8)
Audilli ava' heppi mma ngi anto' heppi buw'inn le' soptolowna' beel'uwm rek mkheng avale' 'leenni hii avah kqhikda.
Ungta dakkat tih nowlam dilkqowiyi dow mkheng kheng souvih, hii ava ngi mdoktleu'in. Ungta hii kbuw kma' donle pnu toptlot piikna' ka'am pemeh.
Avaleiyi, parvaan ki dow rek ava' ki mirlim rek avah hava' rintparlaanna' ava ngi tipchiir rang thah tlada. Pdainu parvaan ki dow rek mmaan kat avah, hava'le' hinni kqhaset tih rintparlaan dok.

Mleiya Khrista ngi dultimii ngi mdoseem kindit kat ava' ki mirlim rek tidit tah Mmun Kenje rek ava' thung ngi kluwt pemeh. Pdainu 'tun neen nthen inni Isowr hinni midotkandan piikna' raan ki thenni parvaan kat ava' thung ngi luwtda.

Mleiya thimpu kenreel rekki ktlok morson rek hii sin lamda kum ktaiyi Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi kluwt kchok lam. Ava' hep pih, Mma ngi kornowl kornowl lih Mdak makparlaan chaak thliinthliin mana' rah kluwt dok kcha'.

Mditma bih, dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun vah Khrista avah veitya veitya thung ngi suwkkthuwk chrah. Pdainu 'tunnu Mma ngi pnu tuknuwl pthina' rang ki thenni mphaqutna' thung ngi Mma ngi mdakkat makparlaan chaak ava ngi kandangda.
Dultimii ngi veikhatpang mdiyow rang avah Isowr rih mdopelreen dok. Ava'dil lih pau tpinditna' karvang chrah.

Ava' heppi pnu knempok rekki thenni Khrista avah veikhadaat mdoparlaan. Ningkakraal lih karda kcha' rek hinni Mma ngi, pnu thungki kekneeng ngi pdainu tkirliinna' ki thenni mveiknitna' Mmah kandang rah.

Nowlam tidit avah karvang bei rang dow kqha rekki mirlim rek ngaal, mlanglang pemeh. Mleiya mmaan nih kum ktaiyi rintparlaanna' ava'kat tih mdoparlaanin, mleiya ava ngi luwkbu kcha' rek mmaan avah teden rukku purkhum pchaang lam nimeh.

Ungta ava ngi mkindit mkurthuh bih, mmaan nih rintparlaan rek avah mdomaak raan thah ktla. Anto' rang pda? Mmaan nih veikhatpang rintparlaan ava ngi luwkbu kcha' rek avah mpertleu pchaan bih, mmaan nih mupnu arve chaakin leiyi, mraalin ka'am mih kirbin lam nimeh.
Pdainu kum kum thah ava' rintparlaanna' ava ngi mupnu arve rekin avah tipbin phaak tlit chlamda.
Mleiya silpa rekle' keel rek hii ava ngi pnu klou pthi rang tidit avah kurthuwk liit rang pemeh.

Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi dultipaam thuh murjun thung ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi rintparlaan rekle' tparlaan chaak dow rek ava' ngeen mtih, pdainu nang ngi nei kthen nih adoporthlon chaak daksa ava,” mdodit.
“Nang ngi pnu rek leiyi, meirinparlaan le' rintparlaanna' rek thung ngi aplungngam ka'am pemeh.”
Avaleiyi, Neiyi thenu: “Asuw, Neiya kurjung imping! Mmaan nih Nei kleiyi laikakuwl thung ngi kjitda ka'am. O Isowr! Neiya nang aplungbin ktlow rah kurjung ping,’ kdodit,” mdoditin. (Luw. 40:6-8)

Rukrirep pih Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi rintparlaanna' rekle' tparlaan dow rek ava' ngeen mtih. Nang ngi pnu leiyi, meirinparlaan le' rintparlaan dow rek ava' thung ngi aplung ngamna' ka'am pemeh,” dida. 'Tunnu nowlam dilkqowiyi dultimii rekki hava'le' avah mdoparlaanin.
Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw, o Isowr! Neiya nang aplungbin ktlow rah kurjung kcha' imping,” dida. Mma ngi miknitna' ava' mdopqhanna' rang ki thenni mkhatna' avah loupthida.
Isowr plungbin mdotlot chaak ava ngi Jisu Khrista ngi neenna Kenje kcha' mipthutinda. Mma ngi mdaksa avah veikhadaat tih mqutna' ngi makparlaan chaak ava ngi havah mdotlot.
Ungta thimpu khimkheiyi mniiktaiyi rip lamda ungta teden rukku pnu rek ava' kloupthi pchaang kma' rang rintparlaanna' khadaat ava' thina'daat parlaan chlamda.
Pdainu hava' mii ava ngi mpha mkheng ki thenni pnu leiyi, rintparlaanna' khat ava' mparlaan chaak dilli Mma ngi Isowr machang thah ko'ong chda.
Mpha ava' thung ki kupqhun nih Mma ngi mmiihal rek avah Mma' khuhther rih mdothiik piik rah mdo’ardat daat.
Mleiya veikhadaat chrel lih rinmdoparlaan chaak ava ngi Mma ngi mdopchiir chaak dok rek mmaan avah ktlangknai kma' ki thenni purkhum chlamda.
Ungta Pthla Kchiir ava' rukku, neen nihinin nih sakhi midotpiik chaak dokin.

Mleiya Mma ngi choduhrep pih hanto'theda: “Kruwng Neiyi kthe a, havah Neiyi mmaan tu' kdopqhan rang pauqum ava'. Nit rek ava' dilli Neiyi knowlam rek avah mmaan plung rek thung ngi pchip nikdi'. Ungta Neiyi avah mmaan plungchai rek thung ngi kjit nikdi,” mdodit, dida. (Jer. 31:33)
Ungta ava' dilli, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi mmaan pnu arve rekle' nowlam tuksutmana' rek avah binphaak piiklam nimaang,” mdodit. (Jer. 31:34)
'Tunnu pnu toptlot piikna' ma'am khimkhei thung ngi, pnu leiyi, rintparlaan ki msit amporson nimeh.
Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rekin, Jisu ki hii ava'leiyi neen nih Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi tuluw chaakna' ki plungkrip avah tothlowi chaak dokin.
Mleiya Mma ngi Mmun Kenjesi kepthleng, ren ungta kring 'lam avah neen nthen inni mitlotpiik inda, tidit tah 'lam avah Mma' daksa ava'.
Ungta neen nih Isowr inn ava' thung ngi ka'am Thimpu Kenreelsi avah nthlowi chaak dok inna.

Ava'leiyi neen nih lamrin ki plungkrip kurkhumna' thung ngi plung kindit tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr hinni inai chaan cheh. Mleiya Mma ngi neen avah kqha kma' plungrildeh thungki nuplung rekin avah m'leen nih Mihii kqhikda midotulqhut piik dokin. Ungta Mma ngi neen ndaksa rekin avah dii kchiir rih midotulqhut chaak dokin.
Neen nih, tethethut dokin plungbinpsuk avah knetmer rih ikyowng chaan cheh, tidit tah paukreel Mma' avah trinchaak krow.
Ungta neen nih khat le' khat hinni taluhep pih vonsat le' kqhanong rekki tkorsow chaak rang tidit ibinin cheh.

Ungta neen nih mii aangqhe rekki mnowpaan mdopthutin heppi munkhat thuh tkurtuwl chaakna' avah mapthi maan cheh. Ungta neen nih khat le' khat ikorsop deiyin cheh ungta neen nih Nit ava' avah marvannai chaak tedehn ava ngi kerkheel setset tih ikorsop chaan cheh.
Mleiya neen nih kindit ki tedeh pinditna' ava' narlaan chaakin dilli, ndeh daat chunin nih pnu nerve chaak tlit daatin bih, pnu ki thenni rintparlaanna' morson ka'am pemeh.
Pdainu tiqit kervei pau tpinditna' tbinphaak raan avale' Mma' kikthitna' rek kbun chaak beina' rah plungthit mei kquwng ava' daat ka'am.
Kuwmiikhat tih Moses nowlam kikthitna' ma'am bih, mii 'knii mditmata kdum ki sakhipiik ava ngi mma' avah plungqhat ktaak ki kdiyou chdaat.

Mdittu' Isowr Chapa Mma' avah mkhuh ngi ktherthen ungta mma' mdak kipchiir kcha' pauqum ki hii avah ktobor rih kbin, ungta plungnee ki Pthla ava' ningkyakpii, mii ava' ki mraal suwkthuhna' avah tya kdung ngi karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha rang ngo?

Mleiya hava' kthe Mma' avah neen nih ndehn, Kruwng ngi hanto'theda: “Phuw klou rang avah Nei, Neiyi purthuwl nikdi,” dida. (Knl. 32:35) Ungta veikhat, “Kruwng ngi Mma' mii rek 'leenni paukpindit rah,” mdodit. (Knl. 32:36)
Kring Isowr ava' khut thung ngi tatlaak rang avah ningqitna'.
Pdainu naan nih, mar'aang ava' arlaan chaakin dilli tyat tperteelna' klin thung ngi kepteng ngi arichaak naan choduh ki nit rek avah abinphaakin.
Mpha khat thuh naanna miipiipa maiyi mii rekki ningkya apiinda ungta tyattraanna' rek duh chaan tinu ungta mpha morson khat thung ngi, naan nih ava' hep kduh kcha' rektu' avah riqhisap chaan tinu.

Mleiya naan athenni ktluwk alrou kqhaset ka'am tidit adodeh chaak lei inni, naan nih, neiya rowng'inn thuh ka'am thung ngi plung mapkham chaan tinu ungta mii rekki ado'ana rekin adotolown chaakin avah kanpa ngi adorot chaakin.
Avaleiyi, naan nih mnongqhat'lot klin nih ka'am naanki plungkrip adothlowi chaakin avah mapthimaan.
Mleiya naan nih Isowr plungbin ava' atlot chaakin dilli, paureel ava' ado'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni, tidiildeh chaakna' avah adothlowi chaak raan thah ktla.
“Mleiya, mpha mruk dilli kurjung rang Mma' avah kurjung rah ungta Mmah ktow nimeh.
'Tunnu mii kindit avah mlamrin nih kring chrah. Pdainu kuwmiikhat plung kperheel kcha' ma'am bih, mma' thung ngi tkanpatna' ammeh.” (Hab. 2:3-4)
Pdainu neenna kenvei kcha' thung ngi plung kperheel kcha' mmaan thungki inpimin pemeh. Pdainu plungrin kparkhaal kcha' rek mmaan thungki inpimin.
'Tunnu lamrin avah neen nih plung tbinpsukin dow rek ava' ki mkindit kat tedehna' ungta nmikin nih tedehmaan dow rek ava' ki mkandanna' ava'.
Mleiya lamrin ava ngi neen nduhn ki kver rek leiyi, Isowr rih sakhi kqha mdopiik lam.
Lamrin nih neen nih ndehn tidit tah dultipaam rek avah Isowr pauna ava ngi kurkhum deek ki mdopurthuh. Mleiya mik ki tedeh dow rek avah mik ki tedeh pchaan dow rek ava' thung ki ngi mdopurthuh pemeh.

Lamrin nih Abel lih Kein nih mdoparlaan hinni kqhabet avah Isowr hinni parlaan chda. Rintparlaan chaak ava ngi Isowr rih mrinkindit tidit ki mlei avah pandan piik chda. Isowr rih mma' chla rek leiyi, mdopandan piik ava ngi diyou chyoso 'tun kpha ngi mmah kpau chtlit daat.

Lamrin nih Isowr rih Enok avah 'tun thah mdo’arjuk loww chaak, tidit tah havah Enok ki kdiyou tidit mdodeh mana' rah mdotlot. “Ungta Isowr rih mdo’arjuk loww dok leiyi, mma' avah tathlaam mdophanin pemeh.” (Rnp. 5:24) Mleiya Isowr rih mma' murjuklow chaakduh ngi, mma ngi Isowr plungngam tlow chda, tidit ki mrinpaumin ka'am.

Pdainu lamrin ktaak ki Isowr plungngam totlot tidit tah kurthuwk pchaang vot pemeh. Mleiya Mma' hinni kthleng kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr ka'am tidit lammdorin chaak rah. Ungta Mma ngi Mma' kthlaam kcha' khimkhei rek hinni nongqhat'lot avah mdopiik tidit ruk lammdorin chaak rah.

Lamrin nih Noah ngi arkuwng klinpa avah mdosak. Isowr rih mdodeh liitma dow rek 'leenni mpilqhit thung ngi, mma ngi kenje ningqit tih avah mdoporthlon chaak. Hanto' mdotlot chaak ava ngi mma ngi mi'innmii rek avah san chda ungta dultipaam avah psulda. Ungta mma ngi lamrin thungki karvang rinkinditna' ki piipa kurthuwk chda.

Lamrin nih Abraham mih Isowr do'own avah pqowi chda. Isowr rih dil thah mma ngi alrouchom mih mdochom chaak bei rang mmun khat ava' thuh kchet rah own chda. Mma ngi tva thah qowi nikdi tidit deiliit myoso thuwkda kchet chdaat.

Lamrin nih Isowr rih mhin nih pau mdoreel dok paam ava' thung ngi mma ngi mal kurthuwkda arvan'amda. Mma ngi Aijek le' Jakob tung ngi buw'inn rek thung ngi arvan am lamda. Mmaan nih mma' tu' paureel ava' ki piipa ava' arvan kurthuwk sap lamda.
Mleiya mma ngi Isowr rih mbul pqhangda mdosak ungta mdopurthuh khuwpii ava' deinikdi', dida, mma ngi ava' arda chda.

Lamrin nih Sarah ngi vontchowina' ki ruhtan avah mdophan chaak. Mleiya mma ngi mvonchowina' ki mpha kerkheel chdaat yoso kurmuwngda nau khat mdopluk chaak. Mleiya mma ngi paukreel Mma' avah trinchaak krow tidit tih lammdorin chaak.

Avaleiyi, mma ngi mdiyowpha kpha kcha' ava' thung ngi, hava' miikhat hinki suruwl rek avah mma' thungki kqou. Mma' suruwl rek avah parvaan ki bursiya knem mih ungta truwnpii biingki sitphui chai ttai pchaanmah ya ngi knem.

Hava' mii rek mkheng avah, paureel rek ava' karlaang kcha' kmah ngi lamrin thung ngi diyou chlamda. Pdainu mmaan hinni mdothe pindit piikdok lam avah mmaan nih 'leer khat tih mdodeh chaak dokin ungta mdo'arlaan chaak dokin ungta ava' thuh plungkrip mdothlowi chaakin ungta mdo'arpom chaakin. Ungta mmaan nih hava' dultipaam thung ngu mal rek heppi ka'am inping tidit avah mdothethut chaakin.
Mleiya hanto' heppi kindit tih kthe rek mmaan ava ngi, mmaan nih mpaamin khat kthlaam inping tidit avah mpandan inna.
Ungta dakat tih mmaan ava ngi marvan thuhnaan mkhuwpaamin avah mbinphaakin bih, mmaan nih ava' thuh mvan kerheelna' raan changqhatna' kthlowi chdok lamrah.

Pdainu mmaan ava ngi makqhaset ava' mdosut thlaam chaakin, tidit tah avah parvaan ki khuwpaam ava'. Avaleiyi, Isowr mdak ki Mma' avah mmaan ki Isowr ping mdodit ava' thung ngi ningkya mdothlowi pemeh, mleiya Mma ngi khuwpii khat avah mmaan thenni mdoporthlon piiklam.
Lamrin nih Abraham mih, mma' mdoperteelna' khat thung ngi mma ngi Aijek avah mdoparlaan chaak. Ungta paureel rek karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi mchapa khatpak daat avah parlaan chda.
Mma' kat ava' hinni: “Neiyi achapa Aijek thungki ngi nang asuruwl avah own chnikdi',” mdodit. (Rnp. 21:12)
Mleiya Abraham mih Isowr rih Aijek avah kdiyou thungki kpha ruk mdoperdel pchaan tidit mdodeh chaak. Mleiya dakat tih nthe bih, mma ngi Aijek avah kdiyou kcha' thungki mdophan perheel chaak.
Lamrin nih Aijek ki Jakob le' Esau avah karvang bei rang dow rek ava'leiyi suwqhat pii chlamda.
Lamrin nih Jakob pih Joseph chapa rek avah khatkhat tih suwqhat pii chlamda ungta mma ngi kchungdo 'leenni kbaangda Isowr hinni luwbu chda.
Lamrin nih Joseph pih, Isreel nau sun chaakna' rang avah purphuwngda ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni mma' ruh rek leiyi, perseel lamda.
Lamrin nih Moses tah mnuhmpa ngi thla kdum thung ngi dowl chlamda. Mleiya mmaanve ngi mma' avah mruwngchen kqha nau tidit mdodehn leiyi, paamkruwng paureen avah mdoqit chaakin pemeh.
Lamrin nih Moses tih mver dilli, mii rekki mma' avah Pharoah chanu, chapa mdodit raan avah mdak ki mat chda.
Ungta mma ngi pnu thung ngi plupda kanpa ngi ta'am chaak rang ava' hinvah Isowr mii rek tung ngi tyattraan tperteel chaak rang ava' kchol chda.

Mleiya mma ngi Khrista thenni ningkya tperteel chaak ki Egypt thungki sum'alrou rek hinni svang tuthuhna' ka'am tidit dei chda. Mleiya mma ngi karvang rang nongqhat'lot ava' 'leenni mmik avah mdopchuk mer chaak.
Lamrin nih mma ngi paamkruwng plungthit mei kquwng ava' kqi kcha' kmah ngi Egypt paam avah mdomaak pthi. Mleiya mma ngi mik ki tedehma Mma' avah kdei kcha' heppi mdo'arvandiil chaak.
Lamrin nih mma ngi Taplaanna' avah dan chda ungta hii tikqhiina' avah mdodan chaak mditma bih, vonchowi mkhatna' kpenvei mma' ava ngi mmaan rukka kthong rah.
Lamrin nih mmaan nih truwnpii ksen avah mdoklaan chaakin ungta ava' heppi ktlow kcha' Egypt rek avah dii ngi mlow chaakterin.
Lamrin nih mmaan nih nii tikhiu thung ngi mloi dokin dilli Jerikho rowngbang avah tluw chda.
Lamrin nih dakkurjur Rahab pih tuprut sikhu rek avah plung kdaiyi mdo'arlaan chaak lam leiyi, lamkrin kma' rektu' kenvei kcha' lam pemeh.
Ungta talu morson the nikdih? Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih, Gideon le' Barak le' Samson le' Jephtha ungta David le' Samuel ungta khulpu rekki rukka kdothena' rah mpha ammeh.
Mleiya mmaan ava ngi lamrin nih Kruwngpaalna' rek avah nampdowng lamda, mrininkindit tih chet chlamda, paureel rek avah arlaang chlamda, humpu nehr artlun pchaang chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih mei ruhtan pdai pchaang lamda, raal'kaang haa thungki kerthlet chlamda, mruhdown naan thungki ruhtan phang chlamda, raal thung ngi pauqha kurthuwk chlamda, paamktlei rekki raalmii rek avah karnaakqhi pchaang lamda.

Snu rekki mmaan ki kdiyou dok kcha' rek avah veikhat rinkum thah tperdel piikna phang chlamda. Ungta morson aangqhe rek avah, mmaan nih makqhaset rinkerheelna' mdophan chaakna' raan ki thenni mii ngi mdoktlan raan mat chlamda tyat chiireelna' avah mdoperteel chaakin.
Mmaan aangqhe rek avah mii rekki pnichaak lamda ungta rii kchung ngi prei lamda ungta morson aangqhe rek nowl avah thiirrii ngi bowl lamda ungta rowng'inn thuh daalpthi lamda.

Mleiya mmaan avah lung ngi deeng lamda ungta horaiyi thum 'knii ngi punthum lamda, kdung ngi pthleem lamda, raal'kaang ngi reen lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mi'inn mlou ktaak ki, tyat chiireelna' kperteel lih, ungta to'owr chaak ki arvang ka'am kcha'lam.
Mmaan ki thenvah dultipaam avah trinchaak krow pemeh. Mleiya mmaan nih paamkbiik laiyi konthot konthot lamda lown rek thung ngi ungta lungkhor le' dultikhor rek thung ngi arvang ka'am kcha'lam.
Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava ngi lamrin nih mrinpauminin kqha kqha arlaang chlamda pdainu paureel avah arlaang chlammeh.
Mleiya Isowr rih neen nthen inni makqhaset dow rek avah midotreel piik inni, mmaan avah msik ki neen ktaak ki mdopurkhum lam pemeh.

Avaleiyi, neen rukka, armei knemya knem mih miksutpqowi daat rek inni midotutkhul daatin leiyi, nbowr riinaan khimkhei ungta ko'oltek ki miktepmen raan pnu avah ipthlapthi dokin cheh. Ungta neen nduhsuk inni midotithiik piik dok tchenpertena' ava' thung ngi tidiildeh chaak tu' kilqhi ngi ichen chaan cheh.

Mleiya neen nih neenki nlamrinin ki mukpu ungta mikpurkhum piik kchaan Jisu hinni nmikin avah ipchuk chaan cheh. Mleiya Mma ngi mduhsuk thah mthen nih kanpa plung ngamna' ava'leiyi khros 'leenki tyattraan avah diil chda ungta Mma ngi ningkyana' tukmdosutma ava ngi Isowr ki Kruwng longkhom ava' ki machang thah kok'ong kcha'.

Mleiya naan nih, pnu kervei rekki pteng lamda Mma' mrotmaan thung ngi Mma ngi, taluhep pih avah mdiil chaak tidit avah abinphaakin, mditma bih aplungrinin thung ngi plungyatna' le' ardathitna' kthuwk rah.
Ungta naan nih pnu kepteng ngi araalnaakin ava' thung ngi ahiin kbuwkpha ngi karnaakqhi mlai inptih.

Ungta naan nih chapa rek heppi ahinin nih tkorsowna' pau tethe avah aperngeel pthi dok inna. Mleiya hanto'theda: “Kchapa rek naan nih, Kruwng ngi archak inda adotpurchuwn avah tukksut kma' tlowmaan. Mditmata Mma ngi atraiyin thung ngi arda kthi tlowmaan.
Mleiya Kruwng ngi vonsat mdolow mma' avah Mma ngi archakda mdopurchuh. Ungta Mma ngi mdo'arlaan chaak chapa rek khimkhei avah rii kchung ngi mdopreilu.” (Luw. 3:11-12)
Naan nih archakda tpurchuhna' ava' adiildeh chaakin bih, Isowr rih chapa rek heppi aksutpqowi chraan. Mleiya taluhep kduh chapada mpa ngi archakda mdopurchuh liitma a?
Pdainu nang ngi archakda tpurchuhma ngi a'am chaak bih, nang nga chapa dakdak ptipmeh ungta chlam ptih, tidit tah mii mkheng avah ava' hepthina ngi karvang.

Ava' han'tun nih neen mikpindit kchaan, dultipaam ki npa rekin ka'am lam ungta mmaan avah neen nih takyat chaakin. Ava' vah neen nih pthla rekle' rinkum ki Pa ava' hin ngaal vah, korthlongjap kcha ngi takparlaan chaak raan pemeh mow?
Mleiya dakat tih mmaan ava' vah nit mruk ki then daat tih, karlaangsap kcha' rek tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni rinchan now avah midopturchuh chaakin.

'Tunnu te'etrai tidit avah 'tun'tun ki thenvah tkanpatna' ammeh, plungyatna'. Pdainu ava'kat thung ngi kurchuk kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi dil thah plung kdai kpii rinkinditna' ki mchei mdo'arkun chaakin.
Avaleiyi, naan nih kthowi chda ka'am kcha' khut rek ungta kunchuwn kcha' pkhup rek avah ruhtan apii chaan.
Ungta naan nih, akhuhn ki thenni 'lam avah apirji chaan, mdit bih, mkhuh kyeng ava' rukka kirtlingyok nimeh ungta tadam ruk kdam chrah.
Mii mkheng tung ngi plung kdaiyi ikirbi chaan ungta kenje avah athlaam chaan, ava' kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Kruwng avah dei nimeh.

Mleiya neen kuwkhat leh rukka Isowr plungnee ava' thung ki taptat chaakmana' raan ki thenni kdung ngi isuwdei chaan cheh. Mditma bih kkha ava ngi murjung vardon tyatna' kupthuwk krow, ungta hava' ava ngi mii knempok ki ktopbor rah.
Mditma bih jowlkpurju mditmata baarkhat daat tih chapa kver tkurthuhna' ki mqouna' ruhtan kyurpthi Esau hep daat mii ka'am rah.

Mleiya mdil thah Esau ngi suwqhat avah alrouchom mih tarlaan chaak rah mbin thung ngi mma' avah mmdoken pthi tidit avah naan nih adehn. Mleiya mma ngi kdung ngi plung kluwt tih, mirthlikbu ngi thlaam chdaat yoso, mma ngi plung mdoperthlen chaakna' rang ki mmun mdophan chaak pemeh.
Naan nih adokmei pchaanin ungta meiyi kka kcha' ungta kvom kcha' ungta kjiing kcha' ungta tchangkhu doraan lown khat ava' thuh karvaan ptihmeh.
Ungta puwtit khat mditmata karja rek ava ngi pauna morson arja chnum maanring, dida maktham chaak naan kpau archaang ava' thung thah karvaan ptipmeh.

Mleiya mmaan nih paupiik mdopiik avah mdodiil chaak pchaanin pemeh. “Ungta saa rek kpha rukku lown ava' mthownin bih, ava' saa avah lung ngi tedeenyow rah mditmata jel lih tkayow rah.” (Mpk. 19:12-13)
Ungta Moses tih mdothe avah tsut thuh kdung ngi ningqitna': “Neiya kdung ngi kningkqi a ungta kunchuwn imping.” (Knl. 9:19)
Pdainu naanna kring Isowr khuwpii, parvaan ki Jerusalem, mchai ttai pchaanmah vaantamsi rek amna' Jion lown thah karvaan ptih.

Ungta naanna parvaan thah mmiing mdokjit dok rukri kqou dok kcha' rekki lamrinlop ungta miiloppii ava' thung ngi karva dok kchaan ptih. Ungta naanna mkheng ki paukpindit Isowr ungta mii kindit rek pthla ava' kpurkhum kcha' ava' hinni karva dok kchaan ptih.
Ungta naanna, pauqum ren thung ngi Mikpalqhat, Jisu hinni ungta hii tikqhiina' thung ngi, Abel hinni mdang kqha ava' thung ngi karva kcha' inptih.

Naan nih kpau slimeek Mma' avah adomat chaakmana' raan ki thenni ikilrindei chaan. Mleiya hava' dultipaam thung ngi kpau meeksli ava' kmat kcha' rekki Mma' hinki kerthlet pchaang chlam pemeh. Mdit bih, neen nih parvaan ki ngi kpau Mma' ava' hinki nkerheel daakin bih, Mma' hinki tkerthleena' avah kdung ngi kparsa rah.
Mleiya Mma' avah mokrowl daat rukku dultipaam avah mdopun chuwn. Ungta 'tunnu Mma ngi paureel khat tih hanto'theda: “Neiyi veikhat dultipaam daat kma' parvaan rukka knok nimaang,” (Hgg. 2:6)

'Tunnu hava' “Veikhat nowl lih,” mdodit avah, kakna dow rek khimkhei mdolow pthina' rah tidit mkandanna' tidit tah mdopurthuh dok dow rek ava'arlak ki kakna kma' rek avah ka'am chdaat rah tidit ki mkandanna'.

Avaleiyi, neen nih kakna pchaang kma' rah Kruwngpaalna' khat ava' tutlun chaak raan leiyi, neen nih takparlaan chaakin tu' ungta Isowr kqi kcha' tu' kilqhi ngi trotpiik krow ngi Isowr hinni soptolow chaakna' raanni plungnee avah ithlowi chaan cheh.
Mleiya neenki Isowr avah kyon nih kka mei ava'.
Naan nih khat le' khat avah unaukat heppi vonsat korlow tlit tih i'amin.
Naan nih mal rek aptlungdei chaan. Mleiya mmaan nih havalu mdotlot chaakin thung ngi kdei dok kmah ngi vaantamsi rek avah mal heppi kuptlung kcha' mii aangqhe rek ka'am lam.

Naan nih rowng'inn thuh ka'am rek avah rowng'inn thuh adakin ka'am kcha' heppi abinphaak chaan. Ungta mii ngi mmeel kthi ngi mdo'owr chaak rek avah naan adaksaan kat 'leenki heppi abinin rah abinphaak chaan.
Dow mkheng thung ngi kchiir inneena' avah takyat chaak rah ungta kowm avah ktobor pemeh pdainu jowlkpurju rekle' lowsangkqhi rek avah Isowr rih paukpindit chrah.

Naan nih arinchanin avah tpunjuwrna' ktaak apthutin ungta 'tun adothlowi chaakin ava' thung ngi ikhopdei chaan. Mleiya Mma' mdakkat tih hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan avah asun daak nimaan ring ungta amapthi nimaanring.” (Knl. 31:6,8 Js. 1:5)
Avaleiyi, neen nih nningkqi kmah: “Kruwng nga nei mokbom kcha', Neiyi ningpqit nimaang. Dultimii ngi nei ktun nih talu ktlow pchaang rang, tidit chaak krow.” (Luw. 118:6)
Naan nih naan a'leenin nih luwkqhi kurthuwkda Isowr pauna ahinin nih kthe rek mmaan avah abinphaakin. Ungta naan nih mmaan lamrin avah apqowiyin ungta mrinchanin avah kmin nih asutpqowi chaan.
Jisu Khrista avah janiruk, tuni ruk ungta ktlangknai kmah kerthleng tidit ka'am pemeh.

Ungta naan avah mdetmdet ki ungta ktlei liklik ki tkurchuhna' rek ava ngi naanna ayuqhi chdok maanso. Mleiya neen nih nuplungin avah plungnee ar'aang ngi knet tih tapqhan chaak inni kqha mleiya ava' thuh karsang kcha' rekki msit amna' ktaak thendam 'leenni tapqhan chaak raan pemeh.
Neen nih buw'inn thung ngi sopklow kcha' mmaan kuwkhat leh ngi ava' thung ki tchaakna' ruhtan mdothlowi pchaanmah rintparlaanna' khaan khat nthlowi chaak inna.
Mleiya thimpu kenreel lih pnu leiyi, mihii louda Mmun Kenjesi thung ngi mdo'arvanluwna' saa rek daksa avah mii'amna' buw'inn ava' duwn thah mdopkaak pthi luwn.
Avaleiyi, Jisu rukku mii rek avah Mdakkat hii ngi mdopenje chaak lamna' rah paltong duwn thah Mma ngi tyattraanna' perteel chda.
Avaleiyi, neen nih Mma' ningkyana' ava' ihorin cheh rang ngi mii'amna' buw'inn duwn thah Mma' hinni vaan cheh.
Mleiya hava' thuh ktluwk ki ka'am rah khuwpii ka'am pemeh pdainu neen nih karvang bei rang khat ava' tathlaam chaakin.
Avaleiyi, neen nih Mma' ar'aang ngi Mma' miing tpanpaak chaak ki tkerthethut chaak naan nnehrin ki mchei tidit tah Isowr tponlor chaakna' ki rintparlaanna' avah iparlaan tlit chaan cheh.
Pdainu naan nih kqha totlot chaak ungta tkirpiikdehna' avah perngeelmaan tidit tah hava' hep rintparlaanna' rek ava ngi Isowr plung mdopngam chaak.

Naan nih atun inni ka'am paamkpu ava' dothe apqowi chaan ungta adakin avah ikparlaan chaan. Mleiya mmaan avah anongtlot rekin ktai rangkat heppi mmaan nih naanki aplungrin rekin avah mdosut pqowiyin. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih plungkya kmah ngi kanpa ngi atlow lamso mditma bih avah naan athen inni msit amna' am nimeh.
Neen kthen inni rinmheiktham piik chaan, tidit tah neenna dow mkheng 'leenni pirdil chda ta'am tngei chaakna' thung ngi kuplungrildeh rekin kqha avah knet tih krip kcha'.
Pdainu neiyi mkenreelsi ngi naan ahin nih adokaktham chaakin avah kbeisek ki naan ahin nih neiya mdotpenletna' rah atlown.
'Tunnu ktlangknai kma' pauqum ava' hii ar'aang ngi tidit tah yau rekki Yaukqhi klin, neenki Kruwng Jisu kdiyou thungki kqhi perheel Isowr ava' hinki plung kdai,

ava ngi Mma' plungbin totlotna' nong kqha khimkhei thung ngi naan avah ayupurkhum chaanso. Mma ngi Mma' plung ngamna' miksut thung ngi Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi naan athung inni nong ayutlot piik chaanso. Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah konlor ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Ku'uknau rek neiyi naan ahin nih kaktham kcha' imping, tidit tah naan nih neiyi naan ahin nih pauna mruk kdokjit chaak ava' thung ngi tkorsow chaakna' 'leenni ikirdiildei chaan.
Naan nih havah adeiyin tidit tah neenve ngi nu'unnau'in Timothy avah ko'ol kcha' dok a, kbeiyi mma' mthlen bih neiyi mma' tu' naan avah adei chnikaandi'.
Naan akqhi kcha' rekin ungta miikenje rek mkheng avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Italy ki mmaan rek ava ngi aturvuwi chaak inna.
Plungnee avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Isowr le' Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki suwk'owr, James neiyi Isreel phung sowm lei'knii rek, chaat morson rek arlak ki kerjeida ka'am kcha' rek naan ahinin nih akurvuwi chaak inna.
Nei ku'uknau rek, naan nih mdetmdet ki tperteelna' rek thuh atlaak chaakin thung ngi mkheng avah tkanpatna' ngi atai chaan.
Mleiya alamrinin mdoperteelna' ava' thung ngi tidiildehna' avah mdopthuh tidit adeiyin.
Tidit tah naan nih dow khatleh kapta kma', kikriing kma' ungta kurkhum akurthuhna' raan ki thenni tidiildehna' ava ngi mnong avah kurkhum jik ki ayupqut piik chaanso.
Naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat luwkinritna' kapta a'amin cheentung ngi, mii mkheng hinni krai kmah ngi, plung knei dok ki kpii kcha' Isowr ava' hinni aqhil chso, ungta mma' hinni avah kpii chrah.
Pdainu mma ngi plung kpelqen liit kmah ngi lamrin nih mdoqhil chaak rah. Mleiya plung kpelqen kcha' mma' avah truwnpii thungki tirthli ngi raanda mdoponthoh pthi diinuk hep daat.
Mleiya ava' hep mii ava' vah mma ngi talutalu yoso Kruwng hinni arlaang chnikdi', tidit bincha' mso.
Mma' avah plung kpenqheek miilai, ungta mma ngi mdotlot mkheng avah knet pemeh.
Kyuwm kcha' nu'unnau'in ava ngi mma' mdotparthaan piikna' thung ngi mkanpatna' i'amso.
Pdainu svang kthuwk kcha' mma' avah mdopchomna' thuh mkanpatna' i'amso. Mleiya paamlai ki rei heppi mmah kqu chrah.

Mleiya kni ngi kepqek ki msat tu' kilqhi ngi thuwkda ungta chiibul avah satpurvuwida, mpaar rek avah qu chda. Ungta mruwngchen qhatin mkheng avah kenvei chda. Anto' heppi, svangpa ava' rukka mnongtlot chaak rek ava' thung ngi kchuwl chrah.

Kepthleem kdiil kcha' mma' avah msuwkqha. Mleiya mma ngi tperteelna' thuh mrichaak dilli, Kruwng ngi Mma' vonsat klow kcha' mii rek hinni pau mdoreel dok, rinkum ki laa luwkhum? avah mma ngi karlaang chrah.

Kuwkhat leh ngi kepthleem thuh mtlaak chaak thung ngi mma ngi: ‘Neiya Isowr rih mtepthleem a,’ di mso. Mleiya Isowr rah kqha kma' ava ngi mdopthleem pchaan pemeh mditmata Mma' mdakkat tih kuwkhat leh ruk pthleem meh.
Pdainu mii khimkhei avah mdakmdak dongei chaak kqha kma' ava ngi mma' avah porjowkda ungta tepngeida ava ngi kepthleem thuh ktla kcha'.
Audilli kqha kma' tngeina' ava ngi mkurmuwn cheu, pnu pluwda. Ungta pnu ava ngi mtan dok cheu, tidiyowna' pthuwkda.
Nei kvonsat ku'uknau rek, kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso.
Dow kqha tpiikna' khimkhei ungta kurkhum chla khimkhei avah tunki, tidit tah Mar'aang rek Pa, ava' hinki kurjung. Mma' avah mkerthlenna' ka'amvot pemeh mditmata arlim kerthlen nih kerthleng pemeh.
Mleiya neen nih Mma' dim rek arlak ki mkhatna' kchei ki, mdet khat ava' tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni Mma' plungbin dilkqowiyi, Mma ngi neen avah kindit pauna ngi midotupluk chaakin.
Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek, mii khimkheiyi kbeisek ki karjadei kcha', pdainu naamnaam mih kpau ungta naamnaam mih plungthit kohor ikurthuwkin.
Mleiya dultimii plungthit ava ngi Isowr ki rinkinditna' avah mdopthuh pemeh.

Avaleiyi, ktobor mkheng rekle' plungrilqhat mana' knempok rek mkheng avah amapthi dokin. Ungta naan nih apthlarin rekin ksan pchaang aplungrilin thung ngi adotapqau piik dokin pauna avah plung kdowng tu' kilqhi ngi arlaang chaan.
Mleiya naan nih tarjaak hehe daat tih arjada mthinaan nih kurhuwng kcha' kurthuwkmaan pdainu pauna ava' ki mnong ktlow kcha' ikurthuwkin.
Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih pauna avah tarjaak hehe daat tih arja thida mnong ktlow kma' mkurthuh bih mma' avah pthlasut thung ngi mdaksa mai ksuw kcha' miikhat ava' hep daat.
Mleiya mthina kursuw kcha' mma' ava ngi pthlasut aangki mkorlow dokcheu m'tunkat daat tih mma' avah taluhep kduh miilai ping tidit mdoperngeel pthiteng.

Pdainu to'ol chaakna' kpii nowlam kurkhum ksut thlaam kcha' mii avah ungta ava' ktlow tlit kcha' mma' avah kperngeel kmah ngi mdo'arjaak avah mnong ngi ktlow kcha' ava'. Mma ngi mnongtlot chaak ava' thung ngi suwqhat mphan chaak a.
Naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat avah rinko'owi kcha' dok ki kandang a. Pdainu mnehr rah kqen kma' ungta mthina ngi muplungchai kuhuwng kcha' mii ma'am bih ava' ki rin'owi avah msit amna' ammeh.

Isowr le' Pa ava' aang ngi kchiir ungta ktobor kma' rin'owi avah hava': Mnuhmpa ktaak rek ungta meikhu rekki suwk mthuh chaakin thung ngi kveldei kcha' ungta dultipaam ki kbih khadaat ruk m'leen nih kchuw kmah ngi ka'am ava'.
Nei ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista, konlor ki Kruwng ava' ki lamrin avah naan nih mikmai tsutna' thung ngi sinton maan.
Mleiya naanki kunpun ava' thung ngi kuwmiikhat tah jiiring khutpaar nada buwdiir kqha hilnada kthleng ka'am rah. Ungta buwdiir kthi kihilkna kcha' srah kuwmiikhat ruk kthleng rah.

Ungta naan nih buwdiir kqha kihilkna kcha' rek hinni plung pluwt betin tinu ungta naan nih mma' hinni hanto' adotheen. “Nang nga hava' mmun kqha thung ngi mheiko'on piikcha',” diin tinu ungta srah ava' hinvah: “Nang nga hava' thuh iripdaat,” mditmata, “kukhuhther rih iko'ong daat,” diin tinu.
Mdittu' naan nih asingreelin thung ngi khat le' khat kinqim mana' nong kterdet chmaan timow? Ungta kqha kma' plungbin rekki paukpindit rek kurthuwk chmaan timow?

Nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek naan nih havah arjaan, Mma ngi Mma' vonsat klow kcha' rek hinni pau mdoreel dok. Tidit tah lamrinna' 'leenni svang kthuwk ungta kruwngpaalna' ki piipa rek tkurthuhna' rang ki thenni Isowr vah hava' dultipaam ki srah avah mdokchol lam pemeh mow?
Pdainu naan nih srah avah kyat chmaan tinu. Svang ava ngi naanna a'owrinda ungta luwsang rek thung ngi aqenthuhn meh mow?
Ungta naan ako'own kchaan miing kenreel ava' 'leenni mmaan nih pthitda kpaulam pemeh mow?

Kchiir laika ava' dilkqowiyi kenreel nowlam thung ngi: “Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah,” mdodit avah naan nih dakat tih atlot chaakin bih, naanna kqha atlot chaak inna. (Lev. 19:18)
Pdainu naan nih mikmai asutin bih, naan nih pnu arve chaak inna. Ungta avale' avah nowlam mih nowlam kupkui rek tidit tih mdopsul lam.
Mleiya kuwku yoso nowlam mkheng kheng a kopqowi kcha' pdainu kbih khat'suwn 'leenni khuhsiir kpirthi kcha' mma' ava ngi mkheng kheng 'leenni mraal ka'am kcha'.

Mleiya, “Lowsang qhima,” (Mpk. 20:4 Mnl. 5:18) dida, kthe Mma' ava ngi, “Mii eyouma',” tidit ruk mdothe. (Mpk. 20:13 Mnl. 5:17) 'Tunnu nang ngi lowsang nga qhi mtih, pdainu mii a a'eyow a, mdit bih, nang nga nowlam kupkui kurthuwk kchaam ptih.
Avaleiyi, to'ol chaakna' ki nowlam ava ngi m'leenin nih pau mdopindit bei rangkat ava' heppi ipauin ungta ava' heppi atlown.
Mleiya pau tpinditna' avah plungqhat kthlowi kma' ava' hinvah plungqhat ktaak ki pau mdopindit. Mleiya pau tpinditna' avah plungqhat tih mdopchaan.
Mdittu', ku'uknau rek, kuwmiikhat tih mlamrin ka'am a adiso, pdainu mnong ma'amma'u, talu msit ka'am a? Lamrin nih mmah ksan pchaang rang?
Tidit tah kuwmiikhat ki, mqampa mditmata mcharmyur avah mbuwdiir ktaak ki ungta mnitmnit ki mthen chaak rah ktaak ki ka'am a, idiin cheh.

Ungta naan kuwmiikhat tih: “Plung kdaiyi isun chdaat tu', klum kcha' ikurthuwkku ungta apowi kpa kcha' ikurthuwk sowi,” mditta, pdainu naan nih daksa ki thenni mdokriin dow rek avah apiikmaan nuh, talu msit ka'am a?
Anto' heppi, lamrin chrel daat, tidit tah mnong ktaak lamrin avah kdiyou.
Pdainu miikhat tih kthe rah: “Nang nga alamrin ka'am a, ungta neiya knong rek ka'am. Nang ngi anong ktaak ki alamrin mheitedet ungta nei rukku knong rekki klamrin ayutedet nih.”
Nang ngi Isowr khat ka'am tidit lam'adorin chaak avah kqha atlot chaak a. Tarnam rek kpha rukku avah lammdorin chaakin ungta kunchuwn kcha'lam.
Pdainu nang ngi tedeh rah angei a? O, kokmok kcha' dultimii, tidit tah mnong rek ktaak lamrin avah kidyou kmah!
Tidit tah neenki n'paan Abraham mih rintparlaanna' khaan 'leenni mchapa Aijek mparlaan thung ngi mma' avah nong rekki mdopindit chaak?
'Tunnu asuw o, tidit tah lamrin ava ngi mnong rek tung ngi kilqhisap pih nong mdolowsap, ungta nong rek ava ngi lamrin avah mdopurkhum?

Ungta Kchiir laika ava ngi hanto' mdothe: “Abraham mih Isowr lamrin chda, ungta ava ngi mma' hinni rinkinditna ngi taipiik chda,” mdodit avah purkhumda. (Rnp. 15:6) Ungta mma' avah Isowr plap, kurthuwk chda.
Ava ngi naan nih, miikhat avah nong rekki mdopindit ungta lamrin daat chrel pemeh tidit adehn a.
Ungta anto'hep daat tih, mma ngi pausikhu rek avah arlaang chda ungta 'lam msik khat thah mdopsun chaak lam ava' ki nong rek ava ngi, Rahab avah mdopindit chaak pemeh mow?
Mleiya pthla ktaak daksa avah kdiyou, anto' heppi, mnong ktaak lamrin avah kdiyou.
Nei ku'uknau rek, naan knempok ki chukpu rek kurthuwkmaan. Mleiya chukpu kurthuwk rek neen nih kdungset tih pau tpinditna' avah tarlaan chaak raan.

Tidit tah neen nkhengin avah dow knempok 'leenni khuhsiir tpirthit chaakin. Kuwmiikhat tih tpauna' 'leenni khuhsiir mpirthit chaakma bih, mma' avah kurkhum miikhat ungta mma' avah mdaksa mpumpum mih haake kperke pchaang kcha' a.
Dakat tih neen nih skowl rekki mmaan nih tethe mdopqowina' raan ki thenni mnehrin thung ngi haake tepkeen ungta ava ngi neen nih mdaksaan mpumpum mih tkeheel pchaanin.

Naan nih arkuwngpii rukka asuwn. Mmaan avah kdung ngi lin chyoso ungta tchangkhu rekki tya raan chdaat yoso, mmaan avah tkeheelna' kdil'suwn ava ngi kpeher rek ava ngi mdongeiyin ki dilkqowiyi mdokeheelin.
Anto' heppi plei avah pna kdil'suwn khat ungta dow klinklin rek 'leenni kpirlin kcha'. Asuwn, meiqai 'suwn khat tih tya klin paam khat avah mapkaak ko!

Ungta plei avah mei khat ungta nowlam mrinkindit kma' dultipaam khat., Plei avah neen napna rekin arlak ki mdopa'am tidit tah hava ngi daksa mkheng avah chukda topborda. Ungta rinchan nowpa avah mei mdopchuk pthi ungta Simmei ava ngi havah mei mdopchuk.
Mleiya mdetmdet ki saa ungta pva le' mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek ungta truwnpii thungki downkhaal khimkhei avah tepmeengda ungta dultimii ngi avah mdotepmeen dok.
Pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi plei avah tepmeeng pchaang meh. Havah tokyown pchaanmah kthi khat ungta mthung ngi tidiyowna' kru kdim mih ka'am.
Neen nih plei ava ngi neenki Isowr ungta N'paan avah ponlor chmin nuh ungta neen nih plei ava ngi Isowr arlim mih mdopurthuh dok dultimii avah pauhor buknaan minnu.
Nehr khadaat thungki ngi neen nih suwqhat le' pauhor avah theen minnu. Nei ku'uknau rek, hava'le' avah anto' rang pemeh.
Mleiya diitlaang khor khadaat thungki dii kthlum le' dii kkha kphulve kchok mow?
Ku'uknau rek, kduwtbul lih kruwn rek kchei pchaang rang mow, mditmata riithlumnu ngi kduwt rek kchei pchaang rang mow?
Naan arlakin ki kuwda mluwkinrit ungta kdeipindih a kuwda? Mma ngi mnong rek avah luwkinritna' ki plung kperneem thung ngi mdotlot chaak tidit avah mrinchanqhat tih apandang chso.
Pdainu naan nih aplung rekin thung ngi kdung ngi tepnerna' le' mthennemna' kthlaam athlowiyin cheentung ngi, naan nih pirlin chmaan ungta kindit kepteng ngi plei neimaan.
Hava' luwkinritna' avah karthak ki kurjung pemeh pdainu dultipaam ki, dultimii nowpa thungki ungta tarnam nowpa thungki.
Mleiya kepner le' mthennemna' kthlaam amna' thung ngi plung karmana' rekle' kqha kma' khimkhei ava' ka'am.

Pdainu karthak ki luwkinritna' avah mkhatna' thung ngi kchiir, audilli plung kdai kngei, plung kdowng, kakparlaandei, plungqhat tih kdim ungta mchei kqha, mikmai ksuw kma' ungta kqha tpurhuwina' ka'am pemeh.
'Tunnu plung kdai kpa'am rek mmaan ava ngi rinkinditna' ki mchei avah plung kdai thung ngi mdopqau chaakin.
Naan arlak inni raal rekle' tker'ena' rek avah tva'ki kthuwk o? Tidit tah naan apna rekin thung ngi raal kthuwk avah daksa ngi tkanpatna' mdongei ava' thung ki kthuwk lam pemeh mow?

Naan nih kdung ngi tothlowi chaak rah ngeiyin tinu pdainu avah thlowi pchaang chmaan tih. Naan nih mii'eyou intinu ungta miidona changptlaak intinu pdainu avah thlowi pchaang chmaan tih. Naan nih ker'eiyin tinu ungta raal karnaan tinu, pdainu naan nih avah thlowi pchaang chmaan tih. Mleiya naan nih Isowr hinni adoqhil chaakin pemeh.
Naan nih daksa ki tkanpatna' thung ngi adosintonna' raan ki thenni karmak ki adoqhil chaakin leiyi, tiqhil lah adoqhil chaakin pdainu dow khatleh ruk ado'arlaan chaakin pemeh.

Lowsang kqhipa rekle' lowsang kqhinu rek naan, naan nih dultipaam tu' plap tkurthuh avah Isowr tu' tkarhalna' tidit dei maan timow? Avaleiyi, kuwku yoso dultipaam tu' plap tkurthuh rah kngei mma' ava ngi mdak ki Isowr miihal khat kurthuwk kcha' a.
Mditmata, naan nih: “Neen nthung inni ka'am Pthla ava ngi kdung ngi mdopner,” dida, Kchiir laika ngi mdothe avah msit ktaak ki mdothe tidit tih abinin mow?
Pdainu Mma ngi plungnee avah kdungset tih midotpiikin. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi hanto' mdothe: “Isowr rih kpirlin kcha' rekka mdokthitna'. Pdainu kpirdil kcha' hinni plungnee mdopiik chaak.” (Prl. 3:34)
Avaleiyi, Isowr hinni adak inni ikparlaan chaan. Ungta tarnampii avah aptengin ungta mmah naan ahinki kchen chrah.
Isowr hinni inai chaan ungta Mma ngi ahinin nih knai rah. Pnu kervei rek naan, akhutin apertleu chaan. Ungta plung kenqheek rek naan, aplungin apchiir chaan.
Ningsiin ikorlow chaan, aqatin ungta iqap chaan’. Tidit tah naan apni naan avah tqana' apurthuhn ungta akanpatin avah plungjiinna' apthutin.
Kruwng miksut thung ngi adak inni ikpirdil chaan ungta Mma ngi naan avah aktparthaang chraan.

Ku'uknau rek, naan nih khat le' khat hinni kthi kerthe maan. Mleiya mu'umnau khat 'leenni kthi kthe ungta mu'umnau 'leenni paukpindit mma' ava ngi nowlam 'leenni kthi mdothe ungta nowlam ava' 'leenni pau mpindit a. Pdainu nang ngi nowlam 'leenni pau'apindit bih, nang nga nowlam kopqowi ava' ptipmeh pdainu nowlam 'leenni paukpindit ptih.
Nowlam kpii Khat ka'am Mma' ava ngi tsan ruk ungta te'ekre ruk mapchaan. Mdittu' ktlok khat 'leenni paukpindit nang nga kuw pti?

'Tunnu hanto' kthe rek naan nih havah arjaan: “Naan nih tuni mditmata pduknii ngi neen nih khuwpii khat thah tchen raan ungta neen nih ava' thuh kum khat ta'am raan. Ungta neen nih tren le' tyur le' tlowda sum tolot raan,” diin tinu.
Tidit tah naan nih pduknii vah talu kthuwk rang tidit adodehn pemeh. Mleiya naan arinkumin avah talu? Naan arinkumin avah mpha mruk thung ngi ambong thida kmaang kcha' sumtuk khat hep daat.
