Anto' mda, naan nih: “Kruwng plungbin mkurthuh bih, neen nih ringin mindon nih ungta neen nih hava' mditmata ava' totlot chaak raan,” adodit raan.
Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih kpirlin chaakin ava' thung ngi kpirlin chaan tinu. Hava' hep tpirlinna' mkheng avah kqha pemeh.
Avaleiyi, kqha totlot rah deithida ktlow kma' mma' ava' hinni avah pnu kurthuwk kcha' a.
'Tunnu svang mii rek naan nih havah arjaan: Tidit tah naan a'leen nih tyattraanna' karvang rang leiyi, iqap chaan ungta owngin rah iqap chaan.
Naan asvang thuhn avah kqop kcha' a ungta ado'ana rekin avah mnu ngi msuk chaak a.

Naan ajiiringin le' ajiipowl rekin avah kparba kcha' a ungta mparbat ava ngi naan akepteng inni sakhi mpiik inna. Ungta ava ngi asadakin avah mei thungki heppi kka chrah. Naan nih mqutna' nit rekki thenni sum'alrou purtuwlin tinu.

'Tunnu asuwn, alrou rekin kponkom, nong klou kcha' rek avah naan nih huwng chaan tinu, mmaan ardaman avah pii maantinu. Mmaan ardaman rek ava ngi naan akepteng inni owngda ka'am a. Ungta kponkom rek own ava ngi ‘Sabaoth’ Kruwng kna ktlung dok kcha' a.
Naan nih dultipaam thung ngi kartlai dok ki ungta adongeiyin ningtlunna' thuh amin tinu. Naan nih aplungchai rekin avah te'eyowna' nit thungki heppi tapmarin tinu.
Naan nih mii kindit avah psulin tinu ungta eyou'in tinu. Mma ngi naan avah apkhaan siinmeh.

Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih Kruwng murjun duh kpha ngi adiildei chaan! Asuwn, louknum rekki dulti ngi mchei kenreel rek mdopiik rang avah taluhep pih mardatin. Ungta mmaan nih kunyou khubu le' qhaalkhu kra rang avah tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mdo'ardat chaakin.
Naan rukka adiildei chaan. Aplungchai rekin avah apqhang chaan, mleiya Kruwng arjunna' rang nga knai kcha' a.
Ku'uknau rek, naan nih khat le' khat kperteng ngi kerteen maan, mditma bih, naanna akupsul raan. Asuwn, Paukpinditpa avah thurngut bulli krip daat a!
Nei ku'uknau rek, naan nih Kruwng miing 'leenni kpau khulpu rek avah tyattraanna' le' tidiildehna' ki bitinna' khat tih alou chaan.

'Tunnu asuwn, kdiildei kcha' rek avah msuwkin kqha tiditin. Naan nih Job dodiildehna' avah arjaakin ungta Kruwng ngi Job thenni mqutna' thuh talu mtlotpiik tidit adehn. Mleiya Kruwng nga plungkham mih kdim ungta plungqhat kthlowi.

Pdainu dow mkheng ki mahan'tun nih, ku'uknau rek naan nih parvaan mditmata dulti mditmata morson paureeltham rek thamda kthampaureel reelmaan. Pdainu naanki ‘ong’ avah ‘ong rah’ ungta ‘mmeh’ avah ‘mmeh’ rah, mditma bih, naanna kqha tpurhuwina' thuh tla chnaandi'.
Naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat tyattraanna' kphang kcha' ka'am ngaal mow? Mma ngi rin'iktham chso. Kuwmiikhat kanpa kcha' ka'am ngaal mow? Mma ngi luwbuklaa athe chso.
Naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat kkowi ka'am ngaal mow? Mma ngi lamrinlop ki kver rek a'own chlamso. Ungta mmaan nih Kruwng miing 'leenni reidii apubul chlamso rang ngi mma' 'leenni rin'ikthampiik chlamso.
Ungta lamrin ki rinktham chaak ava ngi kkowi avah ksan chrah ungta Kruwng ngi mma' avah kperdel chrah. Ungta mma ngi pnu merve chaak rukku, mma' hinni avale' avah koptlotpiik chrah.

Avaleiyi, naan nih khat le' khat hinni adoparmanaan avah ikerthe thuwn ungta adam chaakna' raan ki thenni khat le' khat ki thenni rin'ikthamsap chaan. Mrinkindit miikhat ki rinkthamna' avah kdet liit kmah msit ka'am.
Elaijah avah daksa 'lam thah neen nehep daatin. Ungta mma ngi khurat mana' rah kdung ngi rinktham chda. Mthungta dultipaam thung ngi kum kdum thla truk thung ngi khu rah mda.
Ungta mma ngi veikhat rinktham chnowlda ungta parvaan nih khu prada ungta dulti ngi mchei arkun chda.
Ku'knau rek, naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat kindit ava' thungki 'lamleh kqowi dok kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi, ungta kuwmiikhat tih mma' avah marvanqhi penlet cheentung ngi, mma ngi havah adei chso.
Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih pnu kervei kcha' khat avah m'lamleh qowina' thungki marvanqhi perheel chaak bih, mma ngi kdiyou thungki pthlarin khat msan chaak a. Ungta pnu knempa rek avah mupkhum chaak a.

Jisu Khrista tamsi Pitar neiyi, mal kurthuwk chda Pontas thuh, Galatia thuh, Kappadosia thuh, Asia thuh ungta Bithynia paamkuwl rek thung ngi kerjeida ka'amter kcha' rek, naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.

Mleiya Pthla ava' dopenjetna' thung ngi tethe topqowina' le' Jisu Khrista ki hii tikqhiina' rang ki thenni, Pa Isowr ki, mduh tedeh pinditna' ava' dilkqowiyi naanna adotokchol dokin. Naan ahin nih plungnee le' plung kdai avah kepleet thang setset ikurthuwkso.

Neenki Isowr ungta Jisu Khrista Pa avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso. Mleiya kdiyou thungki Jisu Khrista rinkerheelna' ava' ar'aang ngi neen avah Mma' plungqhat kepleet ava' dilkqowiyi kring plungbinpsuk thung ngi mihum chaanda.
Mleiya kqop kma' rang alrouchom avah neen nthen inni parvaan thah mdo'arkhiik daat.
Mleiya naanna lamrin ar'aang ngi Isowr ruhtanna' ava ngi mqutna' mpha thung ngi mdopandan rang tkirliinna' ava' ki thenni mdo'arkhiik dok rekin ptih.
Hava' leiyi naan nih, msit ma'am bih mdetmdet ki tperteelna' thuh tlada 'tunki mpha mruk thung ngi aplungrinin avah pya chdaat yoso ikanpa chdaatin.

Mleiya Jisu Khrista mkurphuwn thung ngi, mei thuh tperteel dok daat yoso, kkenvei chdaat jiiring kkheel lih kkenreel naanki alamrinin mlang avah tpanpaak ki, takyat kurhuwiyi ungta konlor rih ka'am rah.

Naan nih Mma' avah amikin nih dei myown tih vonpsat intinu. 'Tun'tun nih naan nih amikin nih deimdaat yown tih lam'rin chaan tinu tethe pchaanmah plung ngamna' ungta kdung ngi tkonlorna' tu' kanpa chaan tinu.
Tidit tah naan nih alamrinin ki mqutna' apthlarin rekin ki thenni tkirliinna' avah arlaang chnaandi'.
Naan ahinin nih, hava' tkirliinna' avah, naan ahin nih kthleng rang plungnee ava' ki mlei kpurphuwng khulpu rek ava ngi sutthlaam lamda kdung ngi mdothlaam chaakin.

Mmaan thung ngi ka'am Mesaiah Pthla ava ngi, mmaan nih mdothlaamin mditmata taluhep kduh ki mpha thung ngi Mesaiah ngi tyattraanna' mdoperteel rang ungta ava' dilli mkonlorna' kthuwk rang avah mthuhduh ngi mmaan hinni pandanpiik lamda.

Hava' mmaan hinni mdopurphuwn avah mmaan nih sopmkorlow chaakna' raan ki then pemeh. Pdainu pauna rek ava' thuh naan avah sopadotolow chaakin. Mleiya parvaan ki mdo'arjuk pthlat Pthla Kchiir ava' ar'aang ngi 'tun naan ahin nih tparjaam dok kqhapaumin avah mdoparjaam chaakin.

Avaleiyi, aplungril rekin ki arkowl rekin avah knet tih arkowljeel ajeel chaan, ikorjowng dei chaan. Ungta aplungbin psukin avah Jisu Khrista kurphuwn thung ngi mdo'arjunhor rang plungnee ava' 'leenni apa'am chaan.
Tethe kopqowi nau rek heppi, adehpinditmaan thungki heppi, choduh ki daksa dongeina' rek thung ngi adak inni plup chmaan.
Pdainu naan ayuko'own kchaan Mma' ava ngi mchiir ava' heppi naan rukka arinchanin mkheng thung ngi ichiir chaan.
Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Ichiir chaan tidit tah Neiya Kchiir ping.” (Lev. 11:44-45, 19:2, 20:7)
Ungta naan nih, mikmai ksuw kmah ngi mnong mnong rek dilkqowiyi, Pa ava' miing a'own chaakin cheentung ngi, hava' mal khat heppi a'amnaan mkheng ava' thung ngi ningkqi dok ki i'am chaan.
Naan nih havah adeiyin, tidit tah naan nih apa'leen hinki nowpa thung ngi ado'arlaan dokin kqop kcha' rang jiipowl le' jiiring ngi adotaktlanin pemeh.
Pdainu kakmang kma' ungta kbih kchuw kma' yausuwn khat heppi Khrista hii ngi adotaktlanin.
Mma' avah dakat tih hava' dultipaam ava' mapqhan duduh ngi mdoktlan dok pdainu naan athen inni hava' mqutna' mpha rek thung ngi mdopandan rot.
Tiditta naan alamrinin le' aplungbin psukin avah, kdiyou thungki Mma' kperdel ungta tkonlorna' Mma' hinni kpii, Isowr ava' hinni Mma' ar'aang ngi lam'arin chaan.

Naan nih Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi kindit ava' hinni tethe kopqowi akurthuh chaak inni apthlarin rekin avah apertleu chaak dok inna. Avaleiyi, naan nih a'uanau rekin hinni kqha tpurhuwina' ktaak vonsat avah adothlowi chaak dokin. Ava' vah naan nih khat le' khat avah plung kertleu deek ki vonsat ikorlowdak dak chaan.
Naanna ktlangknai kmah ngi kring tlit ungta ka'am tlit Isowr ki pauna ava' ar'aang ngi kqop chrang chiimuw kma' kqop kma' rang thung ngi kqou dok kchaan ptih.
Mleiya, “Daksa mkheng avah nowm rek hep daat, Ungta dultimii konlorna' avah nowmpaar hep daat. Nowm a kpurvuwi kcha'lu ungta mpaar rek avah kqu kcha'lu.
Pdainu Kruwng pauna avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am tlit.” (Is. 40:6-7) 'Tunnu havah naan ahin nih kqhapaumin nih tparjaam pauna ava'.
Avaleiyi, miiqhatmana' plungbin, tekpermen', kqha tpurhuwina', tepnerna' ungta kthi tethena' mkheng thungki ikekneeng chaan.
Naan nih, alin asaanna' raan ki thenni nau kdowng rek heppi pauna ava' ki arnu kchiir ava' angeen chaan.
Mleiya dakat tih naan nih, Kruwng nga plung knei dok tidit avah adopertem chaak dokin.
Dultimii rekvah mdoknen pthi dokin pdainu Isowr rih mdokchol dok ungta Kring Lung kenreel, Mma' hinni ithleng chaan. Ungta

naan rukku, Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi pthla 'lam ki inn khat tih tsak, kchiir thimpu tkurthuhna' khat tih Isowr rih mdorot piik pthla 'lam ki rintparlaanna' rekki tparlaan chaak, kring lung rek ikurthuwkin.

Avaleiyi, Kchiir laika thung rukku havah kiksim dok: “Asuwn, Neiyi Jion thung ngi takthlan dok, kenreel lung, Innbul lung avah kphun a. Ungta Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' avah ningkya duh nimeh.” (Is. 28:16)
Pdainu lamkrin kcha' naan ahinnu Mma' avah kenreel. Ungta tethe kopqowi kma' mmaan hinnu: “Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi innbul lung, lung kenreel kurthuwk kcha' a.” (Luw. 118:22)

Ungta “Khuhsiir tpirthitna' lung khat, Ungta kapkhaan lungpii khat kurthuwk kcha' a.” Mmaan nih tethe mdopqowi maanni, mmaan ruk ko'own kcha' lung ava'kat 'leenni khuhsiir mpirthit chaak inna. (Is.8:14)

Mleiya naanna kjiingnu thungki ngi Mma' ki tngana' mar'aang thung ngi ako'own kchaan ava' kparjaam chrah ungta kponlor chrang ki thenni tokchol dok suruwl rekin ptih. Ungta paamkruwng innmii thungki thimpu rekin ptih, kenje dok chaat khat inptih, ungta mdoren dok Mma' mii, rekin ptih.
Naanna mpha khat thung vah mii kurthuwkin ptipmeh pdainu 'tunnu Isowr mii rekin ptih. Ungta plungqhat karlaang kma' rekin ptih pdainu 'tunnu plungqhat avah arlaan chaak inna.

Vonsat'low rek, dultipaam thung ngi paamktlei ki mii rek heppi ungta mal rek heppi ahinin nih akoksow chaak inna. Tidit tah naan nih apthlarinin tu' kperteng pnu nowpa dongei rek thungki ikekneeng chaan.

Mleiya mmaan nih naan avah kthi ktlow rek kdi ngi, naan akepteng inni kpau lam. Pdainu Mma ngi mitvel chaak nit tih naan anongqhat rekin, mmaan nih mdodehn ava ngi Isowr mdoponlor chaakna' raanni, Chaatktlei rek arlak ki arinchanin avah takyat chaak kurhuwiyi ichetin.
Avaleiyi, naan nih Kruwng thenni dultimii rekki ruhtanna' ksin khimkhei rek hinni, mkenreelsi hinki heppi ikparlaan chaan.
Mditmata paamkpu rek hinni, tidit tah kthi ktlow rek hinni, mraal suwkthuhna' kpii rah ungta kqha ktlow rek hinni, tponlorna' kpii rah mma ngi mdopthlat rek hinni, ikparlaan chaan.
Mleiya naan nih kqha ava' adotlot chaak inni kokmok rekki kdeipindih kmah ngi mpau raan ava' adopdaipthi raan avah Isowr plungbin ava'.
Naan nih mii'ol heppi i'amin. Anto'daat yoso, mii'ol akurthutin ava ngi kthi todowlna' pthutmaan pdainu Isowr suwk rek heppi i'amin.
Mii mkheng akyat chaan. Unau tkurthuhna' avah vonsat alown ungta Isowr aqi chaan. Paamkruwng avah akyat chaan.
Suwk'owr rek, ningqit mkheng tu' korthlop pih, naan naanki akpu rekin ava' hinni ikparlaan chaan. Ungta kqha rek hin hehe daat kma' kqha kma' rek hin rukku ikparlaan chaan.
Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih Isowr mdodeh pindit chaak leiyi, karmak daat tih tyattraanna' mperteel chaak bih, avah tpanpaak chaak krow.

Mleiya nang ngi adoparma leiyi, kchung ahor chaakku ungta ava' adiil chaakku, talu akonlorna' ka'am a? Pdainu nang ngi kqha adotlot leiyi, ava' ki thenni tyattraanna' aperteel chaak bih ungta ava' adiil chaak bih, Isowr aang ngi avah trotpiik chaakna' ka'am a.

Tidit tah hava' lei kat tih naanna adoto'ownin mleiya Khrista rukku neen nthenni tyattraanna' perteel chda. Tidit tah naan nih Mma' khuhne rek ava' adopqowina' raan ki thenni, neen nthenni bitinna' khat midotmaak piikin.
“Mma' avah mupnu arve ka'am pemeh mditmata Mma' nehr thung ngi tkurhuwnna' ka'am pemeh.” (Is. 53:9)

Mma ngi, mmaan nih mraal mpiikin thuh Mma ngi mraalin pii perheel lammeh. Mma ngi tyattraan mperteel thuh, Mma ngi tipqit ruk pqit lammeh. Pdainu ava' kchang ngi Mma' mdak ki mrinkindit tih paukpindit Mma' hinni kparlaan chda.

Mleiya pnu thuh kdiyou kcha' neen ava ngi rinkinditna' thuh trin chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi neen nupnu arve rekin avah Mma' daksa thung ngi mihor piikinda. Mma limna' ava ngi naanna adotapdam chaakin.
Mleiya naan avah lamleh kqowi yau rek hep kchaan ptih pdainu 'tunnu Yaukqhi ava' hinni ungta apthlarin rekin Ksutpqowi kcha' ava' hinni kerheel dok kchaan ptih.

Anto' heppi, nuwn rek naan nih a'innpu a'innpu rekin hinni akparlaan chaak raan. Mleiya aangqhe rekki pauna ava' kopqowi kma' kurthuwk chlam yoso, kpau kmah ngi mnuwn rekin ki rinchan ava ngi mmaan avah mdopchaan lamna' rah mmaan hinni akparlaan chaak raan.
Mmaan nih naanki akertleuin le' takyat kurhuwi arinchanin msut chaakin thung ngi mmaan avah pchaang naandi'.
Naan nih aruwngchen qhatin avah mduwn 'leerki asam sowiyin, ajiiring naakin, mditmata buwdiir kqha adohiil adonaakin hep daat mso.
Pdainu Isowr miksut thung ngi mkenreelsi, aplungrilin ki mii, plung kperneem le' pthlakdai tu' kilqhi kqop kma' rang dona ngi ikirsim chaan.
Mleiya alraang ki snu kchiir rek, Isowr hinni plungbinpsuk kthi kcha' rek rukku mdak inni hava' hep nowpa ngi korthlong chlamda, mi'innpu mi'innpu rekin hinni akparlaan kcha'lam.

Sarah ngi Abraham hinni tethe kopqowiyi am chda, mma' avah kruwng, mdodit chaak. Naan rukku kqha atlot chaakin bih ungta tiqit chaakna' lei kmah ngi akyat chaakin bih, naanna mma' chanu rek kurthuwk chnaandi'.

Anto' heppi innpu rek, naan nih naanki arinktham chaak rekin ava' mdopkhaan mana' rah, anuwn rekin avah snu mkurthuhn leiyi, mruh kdowngset beel'uwm khat heppi, a'amqhi chaan. Ungta rinkum ki plungnee ava' ki piipa akurthuhve chaak inni, takyat chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mmaan avah adodeh pindit chaakin tu' a'amqhi chaan.
Mqutna' thung ngi, naan akheng inni plungril khadaat tih a'am raan. Khat le' khat plung ikparkham chaan, unaukat heppi von'ikparsatin, plung kdowng ahordeiyin ungta thung'ikor'on chaan.

Kqha kma' ki thenni kqha kma' penlemaan mditmata ningkya leiyi, ningkya kirpiimaan. Pdainu ava' kchang ngi, naanna hava' leiyi, adoto'own dokin tidit adodeh chaak inni, tidit tah naan nih suwqhat avah alrouchom mih adochom chaakna' raanni, suwqhat apiin.
Mleiya “Rinkum kngei kcha' ungta kqha nit rek kdei chrang mma' ava ngi, Kqha kma' thungki meplei ungta tkurhuwn chaakna' thungki mnehr avah aqenpenle chso.
Mma ngi kqha kma' akenlet daakso ungta kqha atlow chso, Ungta avah arei chdeiso.

Mleiya Kruwng mik rek avah mrinkindit rek 'leenni ka'am, Ungta Mma' kna rek avah mmaan rinkthamna' rek hinni kparvang. Pdainu Kruwngmai avah kqha kma' ktlow rek mmaan ava' kepteng ngi ka'am.” (Luw. 34:12-16)
Ungta naan nih kqha ava' ki mdilkqowi kcha' akurthuh chaak innu, kuwda naan ake'ekrep raanna?
Pdainu naan nih rinkinditna' leiyi, tyattraanna' kperteel chrang kurthuwk kpha chyown tih naanna asuwkin kqha. “Ungta mmaan dopqit avah qi chmaan. Ungta aplungin ruk pyamaan.” (Is. 8:12)

Pdainu aplungchai rekin thung ngi Isowr rah Kruwng tidit tih apenje chaan. Ungta naan athung inni ka'am plungbinpsuk ava' ki thenni akkheel kchaan khimkhei rek hinni ado'arthaan pchaanna' raan ki thenni mpha ktai thuh ikorthlong chaan. Pdainu plung kperneem mih ungta ningkqi ngi arthaangin.

Mleiya mmaan nih naan avah kthi ktlow rek, tidit tih adangin mipthitin thung ngi, Khrista hinni naanki arinchan qhatin 'leenni akrai kcha' rekin mmaan ava ngi ningkya mdophanna' raanni, naan nih plungrildeh kqha ava ngi arthaangin.
Mleiya Isowr plungbin mkurthuh bih kqha totlot leiyi, tyattraanna' tperteel lih kqha kma' totlot leiyi, tyattraanna' tperteel hinvah kqhabet.

Mleiya Khrista rukku pnu rek leiyi, veikhadaat thuh tyattraanna' perteelda. Mrin kindit kma' rekki thenni Mrinkindit Khat ava' diyouda, Isowr hinni neen midotqhina' raan ki thenni Mma' avah daksa 'lam thah tipdiyouda pdainu Pthla ava ngi Mma' avah pring perheelda.
Pthla ava ngi Mma ngi chetda rowng'inn thung ngi ka'am pthla rek hinni parjaamda.

Alraang, mpha khat thuh Noah ki mpha thung ngi Isowr rih ksowt tih tidiil chaak tu' mardat chaak 'lam thuh, tidit tah arkuwngpii msakbing arlaan nih pthla rek avah tethe kopqowi kmah ngi ka'am kcha'lam. Ava' thung ngi mruk'suwn daat tidit tah, pthlarin chaitreht daat chrel rek avah dii ar'aang ngi mdosan chaak lam.

Mleiya dii avah 'tun neen miksanin diiluwna' ava' ki titinna' khat: Diiluwna' ava ngi daksa 'leenki ktobor avah pertleu meh pdainu Isowr ktong thah tarthaan chaakna' ki plungrildeh kqha ava' mdopiik. Mleiya diiluwna' ava ngi Jisu Khrista ki rinkerheelna' ava' ar'aang ngi neenna midotsan chaak dokin.
Mma' avah parvaan thah hungkal chda Isowr machang thah am chda. Vaantamsi rekle' ruhtanna' rek ungta ruhtan rek mkheng avah Mma' kurduh ngi pa'am pthi dokda.

Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi neen nthen inni daksa 'lam thah tyattraanna' mdoperteel dok heppi, naan rukku ava' hep plungbin thung ngi ikorthlong chaan. Mleiya daksa 'lam thuh tyattraanna' kperteel dok mma' ava ngi pnu avah mdopqut pthi dok.
Mleiya mma ngi mma' ki mpha ka'am daat rek avah daksa 'lam thah, daksa 'leenni takraamna' ki thenni mrinporson rang pemeh. Pdainu Isowr plungbin ki thenni mrin chaak rah.

Mleiya neen nih Chaatktlei rek plungbin totlotna' thung ngi tarvan amin. Tidit tah, tekterdeuna' rek, daksa 'leenni takraamna' rek, tipritna' rek, lop pih thowldii tneekna' rek lopthowldii neekna' paarklau ungta tepder kuhuwi dow pthla rek luwtbukna' rek thung ngi kthleng dok ksa nrinkum rekin avah arvanpchet pokin minnu.
Hava'le' thung ngi naan nih mmaan tu' kilqhisap pih kerkheelsi ngi ker'ei kalrai nemna' thuh achensap maan leiyi, mmaan nih msik ki abininda a'leenin nih kqha kma' mdotheen.
Mmaan nih kring le' kdiyou hinni paukpindit rang ngi korthlongda ka'am Mma' hinni mlei avah kpii chdaat lamrah.

Tidit tah hava' leiyi kqhapaumin avah 'tun kdiyou dok kcha' rek mmaan hin rukku tparjaam dok. Mleiya dultimii rinnow dilkqowiyi daksa 'lam thah pau mdopindit lamna' rah pdainu Isowr rinnow dilkqowiyi pthla ngi mrin chaakna' raan ki thenni avah mdoparjaam.
Pdainu dow mkheng ki mqutna' avah knaitek kcha' a. Avaleiyi, arinktham chaak rekin thung ngi plung kindit tih ungta kilrin kcha ngi i'amin.
Ungta dow mkheng rekki mahan'tun nih kdet liit kmah khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan. “Mleiya vonsat tih pnu knempa rek avah kupkhum pthi rah.” (Prl. 10:12)
Naan nih pau kepnem pok kmah ngi khat le' khat avah ikpurtlung dei chaan.
Tidit tah mii khimkheiyi chla khatkhat mdo'arlaan chaak sap ava' hep pih, naan nih khat le' khat hinni mdetmdet ki Isowr plungnee ki kqha suwkkenreel rek heppi sop'ikorlow chaan.

Kuwmiikhat tih mpau chaak rang cheentung ngi mma ngi Isowr hinki kpaudei rek heppi ipau chso. Kuwmiikhat tih sopmlow chaak cheentung ngi Isowr rih mma' hinni mdopiik, tapchaanna' tu' kilqhi ngi atlow chso. Tidit tah dow mkheng 'leenni Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr konlor chaakna ngi atlow chaan. Mleiya Mma' hinni tkonlorna' le' tpaalna' ruhtan avah ktlang knailiit kmah ngi ka'am kcha'. Amen.
Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih, naan adotperteelna' raan ki thenni naan a'arlak inni kthuwk, mei kquwng ngi tyatna' leiyi, naan nih dow ktlei liklik khat kthuwk heppi binmaan.
Pdainu naan nih Khrista ki tyattraanna' rek ava' karlaan chaak inna, tidit kpha ngi ikanpa chaan. Mleiya Mma' konlorna' ava' mpurphuwn thung ngi naan rukka kerkheelsi ngi aplungin kngam kcha' krow.

Naan nih Khrista miing ki thenni ningkya adut chaakin bih, naanna asuwkin kqha kcha' a. Mleiya tkonlorna' le' Isowr Pthla avah naan a'leenin nih kchuw kcha' a. Tidit tah mmaan hinnu Mma' avah mipthit inna pdainu naan ahinnu Mma' avah konlor kcha' a.
Pdainu naan kuwkhat leh rukka miike'eyou heppi, kupru khat heppi, kthi ktlow khat heppi, mditmata mii morson rek nong thung ngi mnong kupthut khat heppi tyattraanna' perteelmaan.
Anto'daat yoso kuwmiikhat tih Khristen khat kurthuwk ki tyattraanna' mperteel chaak cheentung ngi, mma ngi hava' nong leiyi, Isowr avah aponlor chso.

Mleiya Isowr innmii ava' 'leenni pau tpindit mdopqhunna' rah mpha avah kvei dok kcha' a. Ungta ava ngi neen nihin nih rukri ngi mupqhun nuh, Isowr ki kqhapaumin kopqowi kma' rekki mqutna' avah talu rang nga?
Ungta “Mrinkindit khat avah kparsa dok ki msan chaakku, Rinko'owi kma' le' pnu kervei avah tva'thuh kandang lam rang nga?” (Prl. 11:31)
Avaleiyi, Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi tyattraanna' kperteel kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi trinchaak krow Mikpurthuh kcha' ava' hep pih, kqha ktlow tlit kcha ngi mapthlarinin avah Mma' hinni aparlaan chlamso.

Naan a'arlakin ki lopkver rek hinni, lopkver khat kurthuwksap pih mmaan hinni koksow chaak lam a. Mleiya neiya Khrista ki tyattraanna' tperteelna' ki sakhi khat ping ungta mdopurphuwn rang tkonlorna' ava' karlaang chrang khat ping.
Naan nih a'arlakin ki Isowr yauluwng ksutpqowi kcha' khat kurthuwk ki, totlotma krow kma' lei mda totlot nuwm chaak ki ungta ningkyana ngi sumtngei lei mda arda krok ki aqhidei chaan.
Naan ahinin nih adotparlaan dok rekin ava' 'leenni kruwng rek kurthuwk maan, pdainu yauluwng ava' hinni bihtinna' rek ikurthuwkin.
Ungta Kenreel Yaukqhi ava' mkurphuwn thung ngi naan nih kchuwl kma' rah tkonlorna' luwkhum avah arlaang chnaandi'.

Anto' heppi, kseetnau rek, naan nih naanki akver rekin hinni ikparlaan chaan. Ungta naan akheng inni khat le' khat hinni akparlaan chaak raan ungta tpirdil chaakna' avah buwdiir heppi adonaak chaak raan. Mleiya, “Isowr rih kpirlin kcha' rekka mdokthitna' Pdainu kpirdil kcha' hinni, plungnee mdopiik chaak.” (Prl. 3:34)
Avaleiyi, Mma ngi naan avah karvang rang mpha thuh adotparthaan chaakna' raan ki thenni mruh ktang Isowr baan ava' kurduh ngi adak inni ikparlaan chaan.
Naan nih Mma' hinni aplungyatnaan mkheng avah avardeen chaan. Mleiya Mma ngi naan athenin adotbin piikin.
Adak inni ikorjowng dei chaan ungta ikilrindei chaan. Mleiya naan amiihal, tarnampii ava ngi kukruwn meek humpu heppi aloiyinda, mdochaak chaak rah mthlaam a.
Naan nih alamrinin apnetin rang ngi mma' avah arisanin. Mleiya a'uanau rek inni ava' hep daat tyattraanna' avah dultipaam thung ngi mdo'arvan perteel chaak dokin tidit avah adeiyin.

Pdainu naan nih mpha mruk thuh tyattraanna' aperteel chaakin dilli Khrista Jisu hinni, Mma' ki ktlangknai kma' tkonlorna' thung ngi neen miko'own kchaan, plungnee mkheng ki Isowr Mma'kat ava ngi naan avah ayupurkhum chaanso. Ungta ayupqhang chaanso, ruhtan ayupiinso ungta ayupnet chaanso.
Mma' hinni tkonlorna' le' tpaalna' ruhtan avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.

Neiyi trinchaak krow nu'unnau khat tih kdobin chaak Silvenas ar'aang ngi naan ahinin nih pauna mruk havah kikjit chaak a. Ungta neiyi akoksow chaak inna ungta sakhi kpiik chaak a, tidit tah naan ari chaaknaan havah Isowr plungnee kindit kat ava'.
Babylon khuwpii thung ngi ka'am naan tu' tokcholsap lamrinlop ava ngi aturvuwi chaak inna. Ungta kchapa Mark rukku aturvuwi chaak inna.
Naan nih khat le' khat hinni vonsat kurput tih ikurvuwi chaan. Jisu Khrista hinni ka'am rek naan akhengin ahinin nih plung kdai ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
Jisu Khrista tamsi ungta msuwk, Simon Pitar neiyi, neenki Isowr ungta Miksan Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neen kehep inni kenreelsi lamrin karlaang kcha' rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
Naan ahinin nih, Isowr le' neenki Kruwng Jisu ki tedeh pinditna' thung ngi plungnee le' plung kdai avah koryou thang setset ikurthuwkso.

Mleiya Mma' konlorna' le' muplungqhat ava ngi neen miko'own kchaan Mma' ava' tedehpindit chaakin ar'aang ngi, Mma' ki Isowr kurthuwk ki ruhtanna' ava ngi rinkum ki ungta rin'owina' ki dow mkheng rek avah midotpiik chaakin.

Hava' ar'aang ngi Mma ngi, Mma' ki kerkheelsi ngi klin ungta kenreelsi paureel rek avah neen kihinin nih mpiinda. Mleiya havah naan nih, dultipaam thung ngi ka'am daksa dongei ava' ar'aang ngi kqop chrang ava' thung ki chen chda Isowr kurthuhna' rinchan ava' ktang kcha'sap rek akurthuhna' raan ki then.
Pdainu hava' leiyi alamrinin 'leenni rinchan kqha ungta rinchan kqha 'leenni tedeh pinditna' ava' adothlolna' raan plung apluwt chaan.
Tedeh pinditna', 'leenni ndak tkorjownna', ndak tkorjownna' 'leenni tidiildehna' tidiildehna' 'leenni rin'owina' athlolin.
Rin'owina' 'leenni unau kurthuwk ki plungqhatna' ungta unau kurthuwk ki plungqhatna', 'leenni vonsat athlolin.
Mleiya hava' dow rek ava ngi naan athung inni kepleet tih amso mkerkheel setset bih naan avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista tedeh pinditna' thung ngi msit ktaak mditmata mchei ktaak kurthuwk nimaan tih.
Mleiya hava' dow rek ava' kapta kcha' mma' avah 'lamkla ngi kdei pchaang kma' ungta mmikktot kcha'lulu. Ungta mma ngi mupnuton pli rek thungki mdopertleu tidit avah mperngeel pthi a.

Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih adoto'own chaakin ungta adotakthlan chaakin avah kindit mkurthuhna' rah kdungset tih plung apluwt chaan. Mleiya naan nih hava' dow rek ava' atlot chaakin bih, naan nih teden rukku khuhsiir pirthivot nimaan tih.
Mdit bih, neenki Kruwng ungta Miksan kcha' Jisu Khrista ki ktlangknai kma' kruwngpaalna' thung ngi tuluw chaakna' ki trotpiikna' avah naan ahinin nih kepleet tih akpii chraan.

Avaleiyi, 'tun adothlowiyin kindit ava' kdei dok ungta kapqhang dok kcha' kurthuwk yown tih neiya naan nih hava' dow rek leiyi, mpha ktai thuh ren nih tikpirbin phaakna' raan 'leennu tukksut kma' tlow nimaang.
Ou, neiyi havah kindit kat tih kdobin chaak. Neiyi hava' buw'inn thuh ka'am daat khimkhei thung ngi naan ahinin nih adoktipbin phaak inni naan avah aperdel chnikaandi'.
Mleiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ngi mdotetdet chaak heppi neiyi hava' buw'inn avah kbeiyi purthlut pthi nikdi', tidit avah kdeh a.
Ava' han'tun nih nei kdiyow chaak dil kpha rukku, mpha ktaiyi hava' dow rek avah naan nih adobinphaakna' raan ki thenni neiyi kdung ngi plung pluwt chnikdi'.

Mleiya neenvah naan ahinin nih, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki ruhtan ungta murjun rang ava' ktheen thung ngu kdei langlang ngi, tpurthun paumin rekki kdotheen pemeh. Pdainu neenna Mma' laarneena'si, ava' mmik ki kdei kcha', sakhi rek ngaalin ping.

Mleiya: “Havah Nei kvonsat'low Kchapa ava'. Mma' thung ngi Neiya kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha' a,” dida. Hava' hep krowl avah, kerkheelsi ngi konlor ava' hinki ngi Mma' hinni murjuk thung ngi, Mma ngi Pa Isowr hinki takyat chaakna' le' tkonlorna' avah mdo'arlaan chaak.
Ungta neen nih Mma' tu' kchiir lown 'leenni ka'amin thung ngi, hava' parvaan ki kurju krowl avah kdo'arjaakin.

Ungta kinditset kpurthuh khulpu rek pauna avah neen rukku kthlowiyin. Naan nih ava' adopqowi chaakin avah kqha a ungta mar'aang khat tih kjiingmun khat thuh mlen heppi naan nih aplungril rekin thung ngi khu vaarso, ungta khuhvaar vaarpa mthuhduh khimkheiyi avah atlow tlit chdaatin.
Ava' han'tun nih naan nih hava' choduh adeiyin. Tidit tah, Kchiir laika thungki pauphuwn khadaat rukka miikhat plungbin thungki ngi kthuwk ka'am pemeh.
Mleiya pauphuwn avah teden rukku dultimii plungbin thungki ngi kthuwk pemeh. Pdainu Isowr miikenje rekki Pthla Kchiir rih qhida mmaan hinni mdopthe.

Pdainu mii rek arlak rukku mlangkma' khulpu rek avah arvan'am lamda. Ava' heppi tuprut tih mlehkunluk ki tkenveina' kpurchuk mlangkma' chukpu rek avah naan arlakin rukku ka'am lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih mmaan kren kcha' Kruwng ava' kpha rukka kmat chlam rah ungta mdak inni, m'leenin nih tkenveina' avah kbeisek ki ksin thuh chlam rah.
Ungta mii knempok ki tkenveina', mmaan 'lamqowi rek avah kqowi chlam rah. Mleiya mma' leiyi, kindit 'lam avah pthitda kpau lamrah.
Mmaan nih mpunjuwr inni naan avah mdopurthun chaakin paumin rekki ake'ekrep raan. Mleiya mmaan 'leenni pau tpinditna' avah ksowt tih pardat daat nimeh ungta mkenvei chaakna' raan avah iip daat nimeh.

Mleiya Isowr rih pnu kervei vaantamsi rek avah parkhaal lammeh. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan avah simkhor thah ptlapthi lamda ungta pau tpinditna' ki thenni pardatda kjiingnu thiirrii rek thung ngi mmaan avah mdoparlaan pthi lam.

Ungta Mma ngi alraang ki dultipaam ava' rukka parkhaal meh, pdainu miichai treht arlak ki khat, rinkinditna' ki paukparjaam mii, Noah avah san chda. Mma ngi rinko'owi kma' dultipaam ava' 'leen nih diipa tpenleda.
Ungta Mma ngi dil thah rinko'owi kmah ngi ka'am rang rek hinni titinna' khat mkurthuhna' rah Sodom le' Gomorah avah purvuwt tpurthuh pthida, tkenvei chaakna ngi psul lamda.
Ungta nowlam tukksut kma' mii ava' ki tekterdeuna' nowpa ngi mdo'owr chaak mrinkindit Lot avah qen turthuh chda.
Mleiya mrinkindit mii avah mmaan arlak ki amda mii rekki nowlam ktaak ki mdotlot rekin avah mmik ki deida ungta ava' mdo'arjaak ki muplungrin avah nitnit ki yachda.

Audilli rinko'owi kcha' mii avah taluhep pih kepthleem hinkiya teqen turthut rang, ungta mrinkindit kma' avah pau tpinditna' nit tih mraal suwkthuhna' tpiik rang ngi pardatda tithiik rang tidit avah Kruwng ngi mdeh chaak.

Ungta mkenreelsi ngi daksa dongei, totborna' ava' dilkqowiyi kchet rek ungta ruhtanna' tukksut kma' rek mmaan ava' hinni avah kthuwk rah. Mmaan avah muplungin kraang ungta mthina' ki muplungbin daat ktlow reklam ungta mmaan nah, laarknei rek 'leenni pthitda tpauna' thuh mningin kqi pemeh.
Anto'daat yoso, ruhtan le' totlot pchaanna' 'leenni klinset vaantamsi rek kpha rukku Kruwng aang ngi mmaan kepteng ngi pthitda pau pchaang lammeh.

Pdainu hava' mmaan avah dow khatleh kbin pchaang kma' saa rek, kyowngda tpenveipthi rang ngi, mnowpa ngi kqou kcha' ava' hep pih, mdodeh pinditmaan dow rek ava' 'leen nih pthitda kpaulam. Ungta mmaan nah mdakin ki mqow chaaknaan thung ngi kenvei chlam rah.

Ungta kunthun nih tchaak le' tneekna' thung ngi plung ngamna ngi ktai kcha' rek heppi, mmaan nih rinkinditmana' ki ardaman avah karlaang chlam rah. Mmaan avah, mmaan nih naan tu' mchaak mneeksapin arlaan nih mdak inni kurhuwng kcha', kbihkchu rek ungta mraalpum mii reklam.

Mmaan nih lowsang tkilqhina' ki miksut thlowi lamda ungta pnu tervena' thungki kkarnga pchaang lam pemeh. Mmaan nih muplungrin knet kma' rek avah porjowk lamda ungta tpunjuwrna' 'leennu muplungin kindit you kcha'lam ungta pauhor tbuk dok nau reklam.
Mmaan nah rinkinditmana' ki ardaman vonsat klow kcha' Beor chapa Balaam 'lamqowi kqowi rang ngi 'lamkirji mapthida 'lamleh thah chetda kepveet kcha' reklam.
Pdainu Balaam avah skowlraam ava ngi nowlam mdopkui leiyi, raida ungta mpau kthuwk kma' saa ava ngi dultimii krowl lih mpau ava ngi khulpu avah ma'aana' thungki pkhaan chda.
Hava' mii rek avah dii kirding kma' diirum reklam ungta tchangkhu ngi mdoraan pthi armei reklam. Mmaan thenni kjiingnu ki kjiingsi mmun avah ktlangknai kma' ki thenni mdopurtum dok.

Mmaan nih msit ktaak ki tpirlin chaakna' pauna rek mtheen thung ngi, karmak ki ka'am rek hinki kchen sli mii rek avah pnu nowpa ngi kdung ngi mdongei tkorjown pchaanma, tekterdeuna' ava ngi mdoporjowkin.

Mmaan mdakin avah kqop kcha' rang kurduh ngi suwk'owr rih ma'am daatin arlaan nuh mmaan hinni to'olna' kpii rang ngi paureel reel lamda. Mleiya miikhat avah, mma' kapchaang dow khat ava' kurduh ngi mma' avah tporkolpthi ngi ka'am kcha'.

Mleiya mmaan nih Kruwng ungta Miksan Jisu Khrista mdodeh pindit chaak inni dultipaam ki totborna' tirthli thungki mchen chaak dokin dilli veikhat ava' thuh mkorbolin ungta ava ngi mapchaan chaak dokin bih, mdilknau ki mqutna' avah mrukri ki hinni, mmaan thenni kdung ngi mmeel kthi rah.
Mleiya mmaan hinni kchiir paupiik tparlaan ava' dei thida ava' thung ki mdokenlet daak raan hinvah mmaan ki thenvah rinkinditna' 'lam avah tedehdeh ngi mdodehma tlaang raanna.

Pdainu, “Uiyi mkonsow avah mdochaak kchow.” (Prl. 26:11) Ungta “Vaknu tulqhut chaak avah mukbulna' bulpornok thung ngi kluwt chdaat,” dida, pauril kindit khat tih mdothe heppi avah mmaan hinni kthuwk.
Nei kvonsat'low rek, 'tunnu hava' miknitna' paukjit avah naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a. Paukjit mikniing thung ngi, neiyi adoktipbin phaak chaak inni aplungril rekin kchiir avah kdoperdel chaak.
Mleiya kchiir khulpu rekki choduduh ngi mdothe dokin pauna rek ungta Kruwng ungta Miksan ki paupiik avah tamsi rek neen nih adokpiikin ava' adobinphaak chaak raan kdongei chaak.
Naan nih rukrirep pih hava' avah adodeh chaak raan. Tidit tah mqutna' nit rek thung ngi mikipnichaak rek avah kthuwk rah ungta mmaan nah, mmaan ki daksa dongeina' thuh kchet chlam rah.

Ungta mmaan nih hanto' kthe lamrah: “Tva'thung ngi Mma' arjunna' rang ki paureel avah ka'am? Mleiya npa'leen mi'ii chaak dokin ki kupqhun nih dow mkheng avah mdopurthuh thokna' thungki hephep daat tih karvang.”

Mleiya mmaan nih mbindaat chunin nih havah mdoperngeelin. Tidit tah Isowr pauna ava ngi choduh ngi parvaan rek avah anto ngi tpurthuhda ungta dultipaam avah dii thungki ngi ungta dii thung ngi mdopa'am.
Ava'dii ava ngi ka'am dok dultipaam avah alraang ngi diipa kenleda ungta ava ngi tpenvei pthida.

Pdainu 'tun ka'am daat parvaan rekle' dultipaam avah pau tpinditna' nit ungta rinko'owi kma' mii rek kenveina' nit ava' mphaakduh kpha ngi, mei ki thenni Mma' pauna ava'kat tih parkhaalda mdothiik daat.
Pdainu kvonsat'low rek, naan nih hava' dow khat avah kdei kmah ngi ammaan. Mleiya Kruwng hinvah niikhat avah kum pun khat hep daat ungta kum pun khat avah niikhat hep daat.

Mleiya mii aangqhe ngi kokto ngi mdotaiyin heppi Kruwng nga mpaureel 'leenni kokto pemeh. Pdainu neen nthen inni ksowt tih mdodiildeh chaak mleiya kuwkhat leh ruk mkenvei rah mdongei pemeh. Pdainu mii mkheng ngi plung mdoperthlen chaak rah mdongei.

Pdainu Kruwng nit avah jaan nih kupru thlenhep pih kthleng rah. Ava' thung vah parvaan rek avah mokrowl klin khat kthuwk tu' kilqhi ngi kqu chrah ungta dow rek avah meidosat tih kyon chrah ungta dultipaam le' mthung ngi ka'am nong rek avah kukbung chrah.
Avaleiyi, hava' dow mkheng rek avah myon chaak rangvah, naanna taluhep kduh ki mii rek kurthuwk naandio? Kchiir rinchan nih ungta rinko'owiyi a'am raan.
Mleiya Isowr arjun rang nit ava' arngai chda ungta avah adotepbei chaak raan. Mleiya ava'leiyi parvaan rek avah mei 'leenni kyon chrang nga ungta dow rek avah msatreen nih kluwng chrah.
Pdainu neenna Mma' paureel dilkqowiyi rinkindit amna' parvaan ren rekle' dultipaam ren rek ava' tsutthlaam chaakin.
Avaleiyi, kvonsat'low rek, naan nih hava' dow rek ava' adosutthlaam chaakin leiyi, Mma' hinni plung kdaiyi, kbihkchu kma' ungta mraal ktaak ki akandan chaakna' raanni ikilring chaan.

Ungta neenki Kruwng ki ksowt tih tidiildehna' avah tkirliinna' tidit tih atai chaan. Hava'kat avah neenki nvonsat'lown nu'unnau'in Paul lih mma' hinni luwkinritna' mdopiik chaak ava' dilkqowiyi naan ahinin nih mdokjit dok.

Ungta mma' paukjit rek mkheng thung rukku hava' dow rek avah mmaan hinni mdothe dok. Ava' mdothe rek ava' thung ngi aangqhe rek avah tedeh pinditna' kparsa dok ka'am. Ava' thung ngi tpurchuhma ungta knet kma' rekki paukjit avah Kchiir laika morson rek thung ngi mdotlotin heppi tkenveina' thah mdopeher kreen.

Avaleiyi, kvonsat'low rek, naan nih, hava' dow rek avah mthuhduh ngi adodeh chaak dokin leiyi, ikilring chaan. Mditma bih, naan rukka nowlam tukksut kma' doparmana' thah mdothiik dok, mdaksa ki knet tih mrina' thungki ktluw kcha' kurthuwk chnaandi'.

Pdainu naan nih neenki Kruwng ungta Miksan Jisu Khrista plungnee le' Mma' tedeh pinditna' thung ngi ipqhang chaan. Mma' hinni 'tun rukku ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi tkonlorna' avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
Rinkum ki pauna ava'leiyi, tidit tah mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih neen nih avah karjaakin ungta kmikin nih kdehn. Ungta kmin nih kdosut pinditin ava' avah naan ahinin nih adokparjaakin.

Isowr rih rinkum avah mipandan piikinda. Ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah neen nih kmikin nih deiyin nuh ungta naan ahin nih ava' ki rinpaumin avah pandang innu kthethut chaak inna. Mleiya ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah Pa ava' tu' ka'am ungta avah neen kihin nih mpandan piikinda.

Mleiya neen nih, naan rukku neen tu' lopkhat akurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni kmikin nih kdodehn ungta kdo'arjaakin avah naan ahinin nih kthethut chaak inna. Ungta kindit kat tih neenna Pa ungta Chapa Jisu Khrista le' tu' lopkhat inpimin.
Ungta naan akanpatin ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni, neen nih hava'le' avah naan ahin nih kikjit chaak inna.
Havah neen nih Mma' hinni kdo'arjaakin ungta kdothe thutin paumin avah hava': Tidit tah Isowr rah mar'aang ungta Mma' thung ngi kjiingnu ka'am liit pemeh.
Neen nih Mma' tu' lopkhat inping dithida kjiingnu thuh nche tlitin bih neen nih plei nnee chaak inna. Ungta neen nih kindit avah tlow maanmin.

Pdainu Mma ngi mar'aang thuh ma'am heppi neen nih mar'aang thung ngi ncheien bih, neen nih khat le' khat tu' lopkhat tkurthuh chaakin. Ungta Mchapa Jisu Khrista ki hii ava ngi neenna pnu mkheng thungki mitpertleu chaak inna.
Neen nih kupnu arve ka'am pemeh nditin bih, neen nih nthina tkurhuwn chaakin. Ungta kindit avah neen nthung inni ammeh.

Neen nih nupnu arve rekin avah nthethut chaakin bih, neenki nupnu arve rekin thungki mikoptlotpiik rang ki thenni ungta nrinkindit mana' mkheng thungki mikpertleu rang ki thenni Mmah trinchaak krow ungta kindit.
Neen nih pnu arvan'arvei maanring nditin bih, neen nih Mma' avah plei nepne inna ungta Mma' pauna avah neen nthung inni ammeh.

Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan nih pnu ado'arvemana' raan ki thenni neiyi hava'le' avah naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a. Ungta kuwmiikhat tih pnu merve chaak dok rukku, neen nthen nih kpau rah khat avah Pa ava' hinni ka'am daat. Mma' avah mrinkindit Jisu Khrista ava'.

Mma' avah neen nupnu arveen ki thenni mrinkparlaan, Isowr plungngam ktlow Mma'kat ava'. Ungta Mma' avah neen nupnu arve rekin ki then daat kma' dultipaam mkheng ki pnu arve ki then rukku mrinkparlaan dok kcha' ava'.
'Tunnu hava ngi ndehn a tidit tah neen nih Mma' paupiik rek ava' nopqowi chaakin bih, neen nih Mma' avah ndeh chaak dok ina.
“Neiyi Mmah kdeh,” dithida, Mma' paupiik rekka kopqowi kma' mma' avah pleimne a. Ungta mma' thung ngi kindit ka'am pemeh.
Pdainu Mma' Pauna kirkhi kcha' mma' hinni dakat tih Isowr vonsat avah mma' thung ngi kpurkhum piik chrah. Hava ngi neen nih ndehn, tidit tah neenna Mma' hinni ka'am inpimin.
Mma' hinni ka'am ping kdi, mma' ava ngi Mma' chehep pih mma' rukka mche chaak rah.

Ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahinin nih paupiik ren kjitmaang pdainu mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih naan nih adothlowi dokin paupiik pli ava' kdokjit. Paupiik pli avah mupqhun daat ki naan nih ado'arjaak dokin pauna ava'.

Veikhat nowl lih neiyi naan ahin nih paupiik ren khat kurthuwk ki kikjit chaak a. Tidit tah hava' dow rek avah Mma' hin ruk ungta naan ahinin rukku kindit ava'. Mleiya kjiingnu avah kthleng dok kcha' a ungta kindit mar'aang avah kleng dok a.
Mar'aang thung ngi ka'am ping dithida mu'umnau ksunum kma' mma' avah 'tun kpha thung ngi kjiingnu thuh ka'am chdaat a.
Mu'umnau vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi mar'aang thung ngi ka'am a. Ungta mma' thung ngi khuhsiir tpirthitna' rah ammeh.
Pdainu mu'umnau ksunum kma' mma' avah kjiingnu thuh ka'am ungta kjiingnu thung ngi kchet kcha' a. Mma ngi tva'lam kqowiya tidit deimeh, mleiya kjiingnu ava ngi mmik avah mdopjiin pthi.
Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Naan apnu arve rekin avah Mma' miing leiyi, atoptlotpiik dokin a.

Mpa rek, naan ahin nih neiyi kikjit chaak a. Mleiya mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih ka'am. Mma' avah naan nih adodeh dokin. Kseet nau rek, naan ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Mleiya naan nih kqha kma' khat avah adopchaan dokin. Nei kvonsat'low nausisi rek, Naan ahin nih neiyi kikjit chaak a. Mleiya naan nih Pa avah adodeh chaak dokin.

Mpa rek, naan ahin nih neiyi kdokjit chaak dok. Mleiya mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih ka'am, Mma' avah naan nih adodeh chaak dokin. Kseet nau rek, naan ahin nih kdokjit chaak dok. Mleiya naanna aruhn ktang ungta Isowr pauna avah naan ahinin nih ka'am. Ungta naan nih kqha kma' khat avah adopchaan dokin.
Naan nih dultipaam avah vonsat lowmaan mditmata dultipaam ki dow rek avah vonsat lowmaan. Kuwmiikhat tih dultipaam vonsat mlow chaak bih Pa, ava' vonsat avah mma' thung ngi ammeh.

Mleiya hava'le' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am rek ava': Mmaan avah pnu nowpa ki daksa dongei miksut 'leenni daksa dongei ungta rinkum ki tpirlin chaakna' rek mkheng avah Pa ava' hinki pemeh pdainu avah dultipaam thungki.
Ungta dultipaam avah kqu chrah mthe a ungta ava' ki kqha kma' tngeina' ruk kqu chrah. Pdainu Isowr plungbin ktlow mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ka'am tlit rah.

Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, havah mqutna' qhang ava'. Ungta naan nih ado'arjaakin heppi mlangkma' khrista avah karvang meeksli a. Ungta 'tun rukku mlangkma' khrista rek avah karvang dok a'. Hava ngi neen nih mqutna' qhang ava'a tidit avah ndehna.

Mmaan avah neen nihin ki vangkthuwk lam, pdainu mmaan avah neen nthungin ki lam pemeh. Mleiya mmaan avah neen nthung ki mkurthuh tlaangin bih mmaan nih neen nthung ngi ka'am tlit lamrah. Pdainu mmaan mkheng avah, khadaat rukka neen nthungin ki lam pemeh tidit mkandan chaakna' raan ki thenni vangkthuwk kcha'lam.
Pdainu naanna Kenje khat ava ngi reidii adotupbul chaak dokin, ungta naan nih dow mkheng avah adodehn.
Naan nih kindit ava' adodeh maan lei pemeh. Pdainu naan nih kindit avah adodeh dokin leiyi, ungta pleiknei avah kindit ava' thung ki kthuwklu pemeh tidit adodeh chaakin leiyi, kdokjit chaak.
Pleiknei khat avah kuw? Mma' avah Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit krow kma' ava'. Pa ungta Chapa krow kma' avah mlangkma' khrista ava'.
Mchapa krow kma' mii mkheng ava ngi Pa ava' rukka thlowi chmeh. Pdainu Chapa ava' kdeipindih kcha' mma' ava ngi Pa ava' rukka mthlowi chaak a.
Avaleiyi, naan nih mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaakin avah naan athung ngi i'amso. Mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaakin ava ngi naan athung ngi ma'am bih, naan rukka Chapa le' Pa ava' hinni am chnaandi'.
Ungta havah neen nihin nih mdoreel, Mma' paureel ava' ungta avah ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava'.
Naan akuhuwng chraan rek leiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih hava'le' avah kdokjit chaak dok.

Pdainu naan nih Mma' hinki reidii tupbulna' ado'arlaan chaakin ava ngi naan athung inni ma'am leiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi adotpurchuh raan ammeh. Pdainu reidii tupbulna' ava'kat ava ngi dow mkheng leiyi, atpurchuh chaak dok inna. Ungta havah kindit ungta havah plei tneena' pemeh. Ungta naan nih Mma' hinni akurchuh dokin ava'jik ki naan nih Mma' hinni am chnaandi'.

Ungta 'tunnu, nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan nih Mma' hinni i'amin. Mleiya Mma' mkurphuwn thung ngi neen nih plungkrip tothlowi chaakna' rah ungta Mma' murjun thung ngi Mma' aang ngi, neen nih ningkya tudutmana' rah Mma' hinni i'amin.
Naan nih Mma' avah mrinkindit tidit adodehn leiyi, mrinkindit tih nong ktlow kcha' rek khimkhei avah Mma' hinki kqou tidit adeiyin.

Asuwn! Pa ava ngi neen daat, nihin nih tya klin vonsat mitpiik daat inna. Neen avah Isowr nau rek midotiditna' raan ki thenni vonsat avah neen nihin nih mipiinda. Avaleiyi, dultipaam mih neen avah mideipindihn meh. Mleiya dultipaam mih Mma' avah mdodeh pindit pemeh.

Nei kvonsat'low rek, 'tunnu neenna Isowr nau rekin pimin. Ungta neenna taluhep daat raan pimin tidit avah 'tunnu mipandanpiik mlaiyin. Pdainu neen nih ndehn tidit tah Mma' mkurphuwn thung ngi neenna Mma' hep daat chenaandi'. Mleiya neen nih Mma' avah Mma' hephep daat tih dei chenaandi'.
Ungta Mma' hinni hava' plungbinpsuk kthlowi kcha' khimkheiyi, Mma' chiir heppi mma' rukka kpirchiir kcha' a.
Kuwku yoso pnu kervei kcha' mma' ava ngi nowlam mupkui a ungta pnu avah nowlam kupkui ava'.
Ungta naan nih adehn tidit tah neen nupnu arve miklow pthipiik rang ki thenni, Mma' avah mipurphuwn piik inda. Ungta Mma' thung ngi pnu ka'am pemeh.
Kuwku yoso Mma' hinni ka'am kcha' mma' ava ngi pnu armei chmeh. Kuwku yoso pnu kervei kcha' mma' ava ngi, Mma' avah mmik rukku deimeh ungta tedeh rukku Mma' avah deimeh.
Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan avah kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso. Mma' rinkinditna' heppi, rinkinditna' nong ktlow kcha' mma' avah mrinkindit.

Pnu kervei kcha' mma' avah tarnampii hinki. Mleiya tarnampii avah mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih pnu mdo'arve chaak. Hava' leiyi, Mma ngi tarnampii ki nongtlot rek ava' mdopenveina' rang ki thenni Isowr Chapa avah mdopurphuwn.
Kuwku yoso Isowr hinki kqou mma' avah pnu arvei meh! Mleiya Mma' chiimuw avah mma' thung ngi ka'am ungta pnu mdo'arve pchaan pemeh. Mleiya mmah Isowr hinki kqou kcha'.
Hanto ngi Isowr nau rekle' tarnampii nau rek avah mdopandan. Kuwku yoso rinkinditna' thuh nong ktlow kma' ungta mu'umnau vonsat klow kma' mma' avah Isowr hinki pemeh.
Mleiya havah naan nih mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaakin paumin ava': Tidit tah neenni khat le' khat vonsat tkorlow chaak raan.

Kqha kma' khat ava' hinki Kein nih mnaupa mdo'eyowluhep kmah ngi vonsat tkorlow chaak raan. Ungta taluleiyi mma ngi mnaupa avah mdo'eyow o? Mleiya mma' nongtlot rek avah kqha pemeh ungta mnaupa nongtlot avah mrinkindit.
Nei ku'uknau rek, dulti mii ngi naan atahal chaakin thung ngi naan nih kngak ki kirbinmaan.

Neen nih, neenna kdiyou thungki rinkum thah konthot dok kchaan pimin, tidit avah ndehn. Mleiya neen nih nu'unnau rek vonsat tolow chaakin. Mu'umnau vonsat klow kma' mma' avah kdiyou thung ngi ka'am chdaat a.
Kuwku yoso mu'umnau ksunum kma' mma' avah mii ke'eyou. Ungta mii ke'eyou kuwkhat leh hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah ka'am pemeh tidit avah naan nih adehn.
Hava ngi neen nih vonsat avah tedehn mleiya Mma ngi neen nthenni mrinkum avah mdoparlaan pthidok. Avaleiyi, neen rukku nrinkum rekin avah nu'unnau rekki thenni tparlaan chaak raan.

Kuwmiikhat tih dultipaam ki dow rek avah mthlowi chaak dok a idiin cheh, ungta mu'umnau dokriin rukka mdeh a. Pdainu mu'umnau ki thenni plung knei kma' mkurthuh u, taluhep pih mma' thung ngi Isowr vonsat avah ka'am rang ngo?
Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, neen nih pauna daat tih mditmata nehr daat tih vonsat lowmaan cheh. Pdainu nong ngi ungta kindit tih vonsat ilown cheh.
Hava ngi ndehn a tidit tah neenna kindit thungki inpimin ungta ava ngi nuplungin avah Mma' aang ngi krip kcha' a.
Mleiya nuplung inni neen avah mitupsulin bih, Isowr avah nuplungin hinni klin a ungta Mma ngi dow mkheng avah mdodeh.
Nei kvonsat'low rek, nuplung inni neen avah mitupsulmaan bih neen nih Isowr ktong thah plungkrip nthlowi chaak inna.
Ungta talutalu yoso neen nih tiqhil chaakin avah Mma' hinki tarlaan chaakin. Mleiya neen nih Mma' paupiik rek avah pqowi inmin ungta Mma' miksut thung ngi muplung ngamna' avah totlot chaakin.

Ungta havah Mma' paupiik ava': Tidit tah neen nih Mma' Chapa Jisu Khrista ava' miing 'leen lamtrin chaak raan. Ungta Mma ngi neen nihin nih paupiik midotpiikin heppi neen nih khat le' khat vonsat tkorlow chaak raan.

'Tunnu Isowr paupiik rek ava' kopqowi kcha' mma' ava ngi, Mma' hinni ka'am a ungta Isowr rih mma' hinni ka'am a. Ungta Mma ngi midotpiikin Pthla ava ngi neen nih neen nthung ngi Mma' ka'am tidit avah ndeh chaak inna.

Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih pthla khimkhei lam'rin chmaan pdainu naan nih mmaan avah Isowr hinki mow tidit leiyi, pthla rek avah aperteelin. Mleiya mlangkma'. khulpu knempok rek avah dultipaam thung ngi kchet doklam.
Hanto ngi naan nih Isowr Pthla avah adeiyin. Mleiya Jisu Khrista avah daksa ngi kurjung dok tidit kthe thuh kcha' pthla khimkhei rek avah Isowr hinki.

Ungta Jisu Khrista avah daksa ngi kurjung dok tidit kthe thuh kma' pthla rek khimkhei avah Isowr hinki pemeh. Ungta avah mlangkma' khrista ki pthla ava'. Ungta naan nih mma' avah kurjung rah tidit ado'arjaakin, ungta mma' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am dok ksa.
Nei kvonsat'low rek, naanna Isowr hinki inptih. Mleiya naan athung inni ka'am Mma' ava ngi dultipaam thung ngi ka'am mma' ava' hinni klin ungta naan nih mmaan avah adopchaan dokin
Mmaan nah dultimii reklam. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih dultipaam ki ngi kpaulam ungta dultipaam ki mii ngi mmaan dothe avah mdo'arjaakin.

Neenna Isowr hinkiin pimin. Isowr kdeipindih kcha' mma' ava ngi neen avah midotarjaak chaakin, ungta Isowr hinki kma' mma' ava ngi neenna midotarjaakin pemeh. Hava ngi neen nih kindit ki pthla le' kuhuwng kcha' pthla avah tedehpindit chaakin.

Nei kvonsat'low rek, neen nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaancheh. Mleiya vonsat avah Isowr hinki. Ungta vonsat kthlowi kcha' khimkhei rek avah Isowr hinki kqou kcha'lam ungta Isowr avah mmaan nih mdodeh chaakin.
Vonsat kthlowi kma' mma' ava ngi Isowr avah deipindih chmeh. Mleiya Isowr rah vonsat.

Hanto ngi Isowr rih vonsat midotolow chaakin avah neen nihin nih mipandanpiik inda. Mleiya neen nih Mma' amleiyi trin chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih Mchapa khatpak daat avah dultipaam thung ngi arjupthlada.

Vonsat tah talu tidit avah hava': Tidit tah neen nih Isowr vonsat tolown ava' pemeh pdainu Mma ngi neen avah vonsat milow chaanda. Tidit tah Mchapa avah neen nupnu arve rekin leiyi, Isowr plung kapngam mih mrinkparlaan rah arjupthlada.
Nei kvonsat'low rek, Isowr rih neen avah hanto ngi vonsat milownda. Avaleiyi, neen rukku khat le' khat vonsat tkorlow chaak raan.
Kuwkhat leh ngi Isowr avah teden rukku mmik ki deimeh. Neen nih khat le' khat vonsat nkorlow chaakin bih, Isowr avah neen nihin nih ka'am a. Ungta Mma' vonsat avah neen nthung ngi mpurkhum a.
Hava ngi neen nih ndehn a tidit tah neen nih Mma' thung ngi aminmin ungta neen nthung inni Mma' amda. Mleiya Isowr rih Mma' Pthla avah neen nihin nih midotpiik dokin.
Neen nih kmikin nih kdeh chaakin ungta kthepindit chaak inna, tidit tah Pa ngi Chapa avah dultipaam thung ngi Miksan kcha' khat tih arjuk pthlada.
Kuwku yoso Jisu avah Isowr Chapa tidit kthe thuh kcha' mma' hinni Isowr avah ka'am a ungta mma' avah Isowr hinni ka'am a.

Ungta neen nih Isowr rih neen nthenni mdothlowi vonsat avah tedeh chaak dokin ungta lam'trin chaak dokin. Isowr rah vonsat ungta kuwmiikhat vonsat thung ngi ka'am kcha' mma' avah Isowr hinni ka'am kcha' a ungta Isowr avah mma' hinni ka'am a.

Isowr rih vonsat avah neen narlak ki hanto ngi mpurkhum a. Ungta havah Isowr rih pau mpindit nit tih, neen nih plungkrip tothlowi chaakna' raan ki then. Mleiya dultipaam thung ngi neenna Mma' hep daatin pimin.

Vonsat thung ngi ningkqi ka'am pemeh ungta kurkhum vonsat tih ningqit avah mdorei pthi. Mleiya ningqit thung ngi suwktuthuhna' ki plungyatna' ka'am. Ungta ningkipqit mma' ava' hinni vonsat avah tpurkhum meh.
Mma ngi rukri ngi vonsat midotolow chaakin leiyi, neen nih Mma' avah vonsat tolow chaakin.

Kuwmiikhat tih: “Neiyi Isowr rah vonsat klow chaak”, adithiso mu'umnau mahal chaak bih mmah pleiknei. Mleiya, mma ngi mmik ki mdodeh mu'umnau vonsat mlow chaakma u, taluhep pih mmik ki mdodehma Isowr ngaalla vonsat klow rang ngo?
Havah neen nih Mma' hinki tothlowi chaakin paupiik hava': Tidit tah Isowr vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi mu'umnau rukka vonsat mdolow chaak rah.
Kuwku yoso, Jisu avah Mesaiah ava' tidit lamkrin kcha' rek avah Isowr hinki kqoulam. Ungta Mpa kurthuwk Mma' ava' vonsat klow kcha' khimkheiyi mdopluk chaak Mma' avah vonsat mlow chaak a.
Hava ngi neen nih ndehn a, tidit tah neen nih Isowr vonsat'low chda ungta Mma' paupiik rek ava' nopqowi chaakin thung ngi neen nih Isowr nau rek avah vonsat tolow chaakin.
Mleiya havah Isowr vonsat ava': Tidit tah neen nih Mma' paupiik rek avah topqowi chaak raan. Ungta Mma' paupiik rek avah bowr rihna' pemeh.
Mleiya talutalu yoso Isowr hinki kqou kcha' dok rek mkheng ava ngi dultipaam avah mapchaan dok a. Ungta dultipaam kapchaang dok neenki tapchaan chaak naan avah neenki nlamrinin ava'.
Dultipaam kapchaang avah kuwda? Dultipaam kapchaang avah, Jisu avah Isowr Chapa tidit lamkrin kcha' ava' pemeh mow?
Havah dii le' hii ngi karvang dok Jisu tidit tah Mesaiah ava'. Dii daat kma' dii le' hii ngi Mmah karvang. Ungta Pthla ava ngi Mma' rinpaumin avah mdopiik mleiya Pthla avah kindit.
Mleiya parvaan thah kdum rekki rinpaumin avah mdopiikin. Mmaan avah: Pa, Pauna ungta Pthla Kchiir ungta hava' kdum rek avah khadaat lam.
Ungta dultipaam thung ngi kdumtet tih rinpaumin avah mdopiikin. Mmaan avah: Pthla, dii ungta hii, ungta hava' kdum rek avah khadaat tih kolrowlam.
Neen nih dultimii hinki rinpaumin ava' narlaanin bih, Isowr rinpaumin ava ngi ava' hinni klinbet. Mleiya havah Mchapa leiyi, mdopiik Isowr hinki rinpaumin ava'.

Isowr Chapa hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' avah mdak thung ngi rinpaumin avah ka'am kcha' a. Isowr pauna lamkrin kma' mma' ava ngi Mma' avah plei mtepnee a. Mleiya Isowr rih Mchapa? ki rinpaumin mdopiik avah mma ngi lammdorin chaak pemeh.
Havah rinpaumin ava': Tidit tah Isowr rih neen nihin nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mipiida. Ungta hava' rinkum avah Mma' Chapa hinni ka'am.
Chapa ava' kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni rinkum avah ka'am. Ungta Isowr Chapa ava' kthlowi kma' mma' hinni rinkum avah ka'am pemeh.

Isowr Chapa miing 'leenni lamkrin kcha' rek naan ahin nih hava' dow rek avah neiyi kikjit chaak a. Mleiya naan nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kthlowi chaak inna tidit adodehna' raan ungta naan nih Isowr Chapa miing 'leenni lamkrin tlit tih a'am chaakna' raan ki thenni kikjit chaak a.
'Tunnu havah neen nih Mma' hinni plungkrip tothlowi chaakin ava': Tidit tah neen nih Mma' plungbin tu' kilqhi ngi talutalu yoso nqhil chaakin bih, Mma ngi avah mitarjaak piik inna.
Ungta neen nih talutalu yoso tiqhilin avah Mma ngi mitarjaak piik inna tidit ndehn bih, neen nih Mma' hinni tiqhil chaakin, rintaktham chaak avah narlaan chaak dok inna tidit ndeh chaak inna.

Kuwmiikhat tih mu'umnau khat avah tidiyowna' thah kqhikma' pnu kervei mdeh bih, mma ngi rinmdoktham piik rah. Mdit bih, Isowr rih tidiyowna' thah kqhikma' pnu kervei rek ava' hinni rinkum avah kpii rah. Tidiyowna' thah kqhi pnu ka'am. Pdainu neiyi ava' ki thenni mma ngi rinmdoktham piik rah dimaang.
Rinkinditmana' mkheng avah pnu ungta tidiyowna' thah kqhi kma' pnu ka'am.
Neen nih ndehn tidit tah kuwku yoso, Isowr hinki kqou kcha' rekka pnu arvei meh. Pdainu Isowr dopluk chaak mma' ava ngi mdak ki kirkhi kcha' ungta kqha kma' khat ava ngi mma' avah kmei pchaang meh.
Neenna Isowr hinkiin pimin tidit neen nih ndehn a. Ungta dultipaam mkheng avah kqha kma' khat ava' khut thuh ka'am kcha' a, tidit avah neen nih ndehn.

Ungta Isowr Chapa ava' arjungda neen nih kindit ava' tedehna' raan ki thenni tedeh pinditna' mitpiik inna tidit avah neen nih ndeh chaak inna. Ungta kindit khat Mma' tidit tah Mma' Chapa Jisu Khrista hinni neenna ka'am inpimin. Mma' avah kindit Isowr ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava'.
Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih adakin avah dow pthla rek hinki ikilrin chaan. Amen.

Kver nang, ungta mdokchol dok takyat kurhuwi snu avale' mma' nau rek hinni kikjit chaak a. Neiyi kindit ava' thung ngi vonsat aklow chaakin, nei daat pemeh, pdainu kindit ava' kdei kcha' rek mkheng ngi vonsat adotolow chaakin.
Mleiya neen nthung ngi ka'am ungta neen nthung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am rang kindit ava ngi vonsat adoklow chaakin.
Kindit le' vonsat tih Pa Isowr ava' hinki ungta Pa ava' Chapa Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungqhat le' plung knei nong ungta plung kdai avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
Nang anau le' aangqhe rekki neen nih Pa, ava' hinki tarlaan chaakin paupiik ava' heppi kindit thung ngi mche chaakin kdodeh chaak leiyi, kdung ngi kanpa kcha' imping.

Ungta 'tunnu takyat chaak kurhuwi snu nang ahin nih neiyi paupiik ren khat kdokjit pemeh. Pdainu havah neen nih mupqhun daat ki tothlowi dokin ava': Tidit tah neen nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaancheh, kdi kcha' ping.
Vonsat hava', neenni Mma' paupiik rek heppi tche chaak raan. Paupiik avah hava', naan nih mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaak chaakin ava' heppi ava' thuh ache chaak raan.

Tidit tah 'lamleh thah mikqhikrep rek tidit tah Jisu Khrista avah daksa ngi kurjung tidit kthe thuh kma' rek knempok avah, dultipaam thuh kchet dok lam a. Hava' mii avah 'lamleh thah mikqhi ungta mlangkma' khrista ava'.
Mleiya neen nih nong tolow chaakna' rekin dow rek avah neen nih kpenvei kmah ngi, pdainu neen nih nnongqhat'lotin, kurkhum ava' tarlaan chaakna' raanni, adak inni asuwdei chaan.

Kuwku yoso, nowlam kupkui ungta Khrista dopurchuhna' thung ngi ka'am kma' mma' ava ngi Isowr avah thlowi chmeh. Ungta Khrista dopurchuhna' thung ngi ka'am kcha' mma' ava ngi Pa ava' ruk ungta Chapa rukka mthlowi chaak a.
Ungta kuwmiikhat, hava' tpurchuhna' kohor kmah ngi ahin nih mthlen cheentung ngi mma' avah a'inn thung ngi ptlungma' ungta turvuwi ruk arvuwima'.
Mleiya mma' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi mma' ki kqha kma' nongtlot ava' thuh lopkhat mkurthuhqhi a.
Neiyi ahin nih dow knempok kdokjit rah ka'am, Neiyi che le' muk tsin rah binmaang. Pdainu neenki tkanpat chaak mkurkhumna' rah, neiyi ahin nih thlengda maiqhuwm mih pau tsaam rah kdobin.
Isowr rih mdokchol dok ksa a'unu nau le' rukku aturvuwi chaak lam a. Amen.
Kver nang, ungta neiyi vonkdopsat chaak Gaius nang ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Neiyi kindit tih vonsat aklow chaak a.
Nei kvonsat'low chaak nang, nang ngi apthlarin mqhatjik ava' heppi dow mkheng thung ngi kqhajik ki a'am rah ungta kdam mih a'am rah kngei chaak a.
Unau rek aangqhe thleng lamda ungta nangki akinditna' le' nang ngi kindit thung ngi ache chaakna' ki rinpaumin avah pii lamda. Avaleiyi, neiya kdung ngi kanpa kcha' ping.
Knau leh ngi kindit thung ngi kchet lam tidit karjaak chaak thung ngi kkanpat chaak ava' han'tun nih kkanpatna' morson ammeh.
Nei kvonsat'low chaak nang, nang ngi unau rek hinni ungta mal rek hinni adotlot avah trinchaak krow ngi atlot chaak a.
Mmaan nih lamrinlop hinni nang avonsat leiyi, thepindit chlamda. Nang ngi mmaan avah m'lamqowi thaan nih Isowr dorot tih apsun chaak lambi, nang nga kqha atlot chaak a.
Mleiya mmaan nah Mma' miing leiyi, kchet chlam. Ungta Chaatktlei rek hinni takhatleh ruk mdolow chaakin ka'am pemeh.
Neen nih kindit ava' ki thenni nong ktlow kcha'sap tkurthuhna' rang ki thenni, neen nih ava' hep mii rek avah kqha ngi tarlaan chaak rah.
Neiyi, lamrinlop hinni kdokjit chaak dok. Pdainu mrukrisi tkurthuh rah kngei, Diotrephes tih neen avah marlaang chmaanda.

Avaleiyi, kthlen bih, neiyi mhin nih mnongtlot rek avah tipbinphaak nikdi'. Mma ngi neen k'leen nih pauthit tih titii mthepsuk inda. Ungta ava' pau rek daat ava ngi muplung ngammda ungta unau rek rukka arlaang chlam mda. Ungta mmaan kuptlung nuwm kcha' mii rek avah mma ngi thlot lamda ungta lamrinlop thungki knengpthi lamda.
Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih kqha kma' avah pqowimaan pdainu kqha avah apqowi chaan. Kqha ktlow kcha' mma' avah Isowr hinki ungta kqha kma' ktlow mma' ava ngi Isowr avah mmik ki dei chdokmeh.

Demetrias rinpaumin avah mii mkheng ngi kqhajik ki mpiik ka. Ungta kindit ava' hinki rukku ungta neen rukku kthepindit chaak inna. Ungta neen nih kdothe pindit chaakin avah kindit tidit tah naan nih adehn.
Neiyi dow knempok kdokjit rah ka'am, pdainu neiyi pen le' muk ki ahin nih tikjit rah binmaang.
Neiyi nang nga kbeisek ki tkurdutqhi rah adokbin. Ava' thung ngi maiqhuwm mih saamlaiche'.
Plung kdai ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Hava' ki plap rekki aturvuwi chaak lam a. Ava' ki aplap rek avah mmiing inni kurvuwi chaak lam a. Amen.
Jisu Khrista suwk ungta James naupa Jude neiyi, Pa Isowr rih adotipchiir chaak dokin, ungta Jisu Khrista hinni owndokda mdo'arkhiik chaak dok rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
Naan athung inni plungnee le' plung kdai ungta vonsat avah koryou thang kcha' ikurthuwkso'.

Nei kvonsat'low rek, neiyi naan ahin nih, neen nkheng inni tothlowi chaakin, tkirliinna' ava' ki mleiyi tikjit rah kdung ngi kdongei chaak. Pdainu neiyi miikenje rek hinni, mpha ktai ki thenni veikhadaat thuh mdoparlaan dok lamrin ava' ki thenni naan nih kdung ngi adokarnaak qhi raan ava ngi msit ka'am bet tidit tih akoksow chaak inna.

Mleiya mmaan ki thenni hava' tupsulna', mduduh ngi mdokjit dok mii aangqhe rek avah naan arlak inni tuprut tih luwt dok lamda. Mmaan avah Isowr kbin kma' mii reklam, mmaan nih neenki Isowr plungnee avah tekterdeuna' thah perthleng pthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Kruwng Isowr khadaat chrel ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah mat chlamda,

Naan nih hava' mkheng avah choduduh ngi dei dok jown tih, neiyi veikhat adoktipbin phaak raan avah ngei chnuh. Mleiya, Kruwng ngi Mma' mii rek avah Egypt paam thungki qhi pthuwk chlamda, pdainu mdilthang vah lamkrin kma' rek mmaan avah tpenvei pthi lamda.

Tidit tah vaantamsi rekki mma' mma' hinni ruhtanna' mmunin avah kirkhi lam kmah ngi choduh ki mmunin avah mapthi lamda. Avaleiyi Mma ngi vaantamsi rek avah, kjiingnu thung ngi ktlangknai kma' thiirrii ngi bowlthida pau tpinditna' ki nit klinsi pardatda mdokhum pthi lam.

Anto'hep daat tih Sodom le' Gomorah ungta mmaan kpervel lih ka'am khuwpii rekki mdakin avah jowltpurjutna' rek thung ngi kirpii chlamda. Ungta mdetmdet ki daksa dongei thah chet chlamda. Mmaan avah kqiim knai liit kma' rang mei thung ngi tyatna' avah mraal suwkthuh naan nih kperteel chrang rekki thenni titinna' khat tih ka'am kcha'lam.
Anto'hep daat nowl lih hava' mer kmer rek ava ngi mdaksaan ki daksa rek avah topbor chlamda. Ungta tpaalna' ruhtan ksin rek tuksut lam mda ungta laarknei rek avah pthitda pauna' lamda.

Pdainu vaantamsi klinsi ungta mkulmlaar knei rek ava' 'leenni Maikhal lih tarnampii tu' Moses daksa leiyi, kalrai lamda. Ava' thung ngi mma' 'leenni pthitda mraal pii pchaang mda mthungta mma ngi, “Isowr rih ayuraiso,” dida.

Pdainu hava' mii rek ava ngi talutalu yoso, mdodeh maan dow rek avah pthit lamda. Ungta mmaan nih talutalu yoso mnowpaan nih mdodeh chaakin avah mlei kbin pchaang kma' saa rek heppi mdodeh chaakin. Hava' dow rek ava ngi mmaan avah mthinaan nih kporpqop chlam rah.

Mmaan 'leenni suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya mmaan nih, Kein 'lamqowi mqowi chaak inna. Ungta mmaan nih Balaam mih mthennemna' rang ki thenni mdohuwn chaakna' ava' thung ngi kakraam mih kchen kcha'lam a. Ungta Korah pauklena' thung ngi mmaan nah kenvei kcha'lam a.

Hava' mii rek avah naanki vonsatmaalna' thung ngi tongnehr kapkhau reklam, ungta naan tu' mmaalin thung rukku mningqitin ktaak ki kchalam. Ungta mmaan nah mthina kparmaal kcha' reklam. Mmaan nah khu kqhi kma', tirthli rekki mdoraan pthi armei rek ava' lam. Mmaan nah chuwrlaiyi mchei ktaak ding, murjung thah tphuipthi, vei'knii kdiyou ava' hep daat lam.

Mmaan nah truwnpii thungki kdungyou kcha' diinuk hep daat lam ungta mningkyanaan muhuwnin avah mdopthuh chaakin. Ungta mmaan nah konthot jowkjowk bursi rek hep daat lam. Ungta ktlangknai kma' kjiing ki kjiingnusi avah mmaan thenni mdopurtum dok ksa.
'Tunnu Adam ki ngi suruwl mtikhiuna' Enok rukku hava' mii rek leiyi, pau mdopurphuwn dok ksa. Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Asuwn, Kruwng nga Mma' miikenje, pun sowm rektu' kurjung nga.

Mleiya Mma ngi mii mkheng 'leenni paukpindit rah. Mma ngi Isowr ktaak ki ka'am mii mkheng rek avah mmaan nih Isowr ktaak ki ma'amnaan khimkhei thung ngi Isowr ktaak ki mnongtlotin mkheng thung ngi mdoparmaan mkheng rek 'leenni kupsul lamrah. Ungta Isowr ktaak ki ka'am pnu kervei rek mmaan ava ngi Mma' kepteng ngi mpaunaan mkheng rek 'leenni kupsul lamrah.”

Hava' mii rek avah nurnurnarnar rih kpau ungta mii kupsul tlit mii reklam. Mmaan nah mmaan ki daksa ngi mdongei 'in ava' dilkqowiyi kchet kcha' reklam. Ungta mmaan nah mthinaan ki mleiyi kpirlin nih kpau kcha' ungta mmaan changqhatna' rang ki thenni morson rek kpanpaak kcha' reklam.
Pdainu kvonsat'low rek naan, naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki tamsi rekki mduh ngi mdothe dokin pauna rek avah abinphaakin.
Mmaan nih, ‘mqutna' mpha thung ngu mikipnichaak kthuwk rah’ mdoditin. Mmaan avah rin'owimana' daksa dongei rek dilkqowiyi kchet lam mdoditin avah abinphaakin.
Hava' mii rek avah nowpa dongeiyi ka'am rek, ungta tkenqhenna' kupthuwk reklam, ungta mmaan thung ngi Pthla avah ka'am pemeh.
Pdainu kvonsat'low rek naan, naan nih adakin avah alamrinin kchiir ava' thung ngi ikapqhang chaan ungta Pthla kchiir rih rin'iktham chaan.
Naan nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii rang, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungqhat ardat chaakin chunni Isowr vonsat thung ngi adakin avah ikirkhi chaan.
Ungta plung kpelqen aangqhe rek hinni plungqhat ahordei chaan.
Pdainu ningqit tu' kilqhi ngi morson rek avah mei thung ki aqen pthuwkin rang ngi asan chaan. Ava' tu' kilqhi ngi pnu nowpa ngi mdotopbor dok buwdiir kpha rukka apder chaan.
'Tunnu naan nih khuhsiir adopirthitna' raan thungki akneeng pchaangin, ungta Mma' konlorna' aang ngi mdoparmana' ktaak ki plung kngam dok tu' kilqhi ngi naan akparlaan kchaan Mma' avah Isowr.
Mleiya neen Miksan Isowr chrel daat avah kinrit. Mma' hinni tkonlorna' le' laarneena'si ungta tpaalna' ruhtan le' ruhtanna' avah 'tun ruk ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.

Mma ngi msuwk rek hinni kbeisek ki kthuwk, rangkat dow rek ava' mdotedet lamna' rang ki thenni Isowr rih Mma' hinni mdopiik Jisu Khrista ki pauphuwn avah hava'. Ungta Mma ngi Mma' suwk Johon hinni Mma' vaantamsi avah pthlada ungta titinna' khat tih pandan piikda.
Johon nih Isowr pauna ungta Jisu Khrista ki rinpaumin ungta mmik ki mdodeh dow mkheng rek avah pandang chda.
Hava' pauphuwn kpa kcha' ungta karja kcha' ungta ava' thuh tikjit dok rek ava' kopqowi kcha' rek mmaan avah msuwkin kqha kcha' a. Mleiya mpha avah knaitek kcha' a.

Johon neiyi Asia paamkuwl thung ngi ka'am lamrinlop tikhiu rek hinni kikjit chaak a. Mleiya 'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh ka'am ksa ungta dil thah karvang rang, Mma' ava ngi ungta Mma' kruwng longkhom aang ngi, ka'am Pthla tikhiu rekki plungnee le' plung kdai naan ahinin nih ayupii chaanso!

Ungta trinchaak krow ngi rinpaumin kpii, kdiyou rek arlak ki mkhatna' kqou ungta hava' dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek 'leenni paamkpu Jisu Khrista ngi plungnee le' plung kdai ayupii chaanso. Ungta neen vonsat miklow kchaan ungta Mihii ngi. nupnu arve chaak rekin thungki mikulqhuh kchaan, Mma' avah aponlor chaan.

Ungta Mma ngi neenna Isowr le' Pa ava' hinni paamkruwng rekle' thimpu rek mipurthuh chaanda. Ungta Mma' hinni kumpung ngi ktlangknai kma' konlor ungta tpaalna' ruhtan ki ruhtan mukpu ikurthuwkso! Amen.

Asuwn! armei thuh Mmah kurjung kqum a. Ungta mik khimkheiyi Mmah kdei chlam rah. Ungta Mma' kthun rek mmaan rukku mmikin nih kdei chlam rah. Ungta dultipaam ki chaat mkheng rekki, Mma' leiyi, muplungin tpeeng lamdon nih kqap chlam rah. Ou, anto' ikurthuwkso! Amen.
Kruwng ngi theda: “Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping, tupqhunna' le' Tupqutna' ping. Neiya 'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh ka'am ksa ungta dil thah karvang rang, Kpaalkpusi ava' ping.”

Johon neiya naan tu' kdung ngi tyatna' kperteel sap kcha ungta kruwngpaalna' thuh ungta Jisu Khrista ki tidiil chaakna' 'leenni a'upaan khat ping. Ungta neiya Isowr pauna le' Jisu Khrista ki rinpaumin ki thenni Patmos mdodit diiloipaam thung ngi ka'am dok kcha' ping.
Kruwng Nit ava' thung ngi, neiya Pthla ngi am chnuh. Ungta kdilpang thah puwtit prin hep daat tih krowl klin langlang khat arjanu.

Ava ngi hanto'theda: “Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping, Mkhatna' ungta Mqutna' ping.” Ungta: “Nang ngi amik ki adodeh avah laikakuwl thung ngi akjit. Ungta Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am lamrinlop tikhiu rek, tidit tah Ephisia thah, Smairna thah, Pergamos thah, Thyatira thah, Sardis thah, Philadelphia thah, ungta Laodisia thah avah apthla.”
Ungta neiyi kihin nih kpau, krowl ava' ksuw rah dil kerheel nuh. Ungta neiyi ksut thungta jiiring meilakuwng tikhiutet deinu.
Ungta meilakuwng tikhiu rek arlak ki Mii Chapa hep daat khat tih mkhuh kpha ktolrown dona nada ungta jiiring arkowlke muplung thah pkehda.
Mluw le' msam avah saamul kpowl tbur heppi powlda ungta Mmik avah kquwng meek mei hep daatda.
Mkhuh avah jiichai kepleu deek ki meikuwng thuh tapkaak heppi pleuda. Ungta Mokrowl avah dii knempok kluwng archaang hep daatda.
Ungta mchang ki mkhut thung ngi bursi tikhiu sinda. Ungta mnehr thungki raal'kaang mahaa lechang ngi kraang pthuwkda. Ungta Mmai ruwngchen avah kni mlenkat thungki heppi lengda.

Ungta neiyi Mma' kdeh thungta kdiyou kcha' heppi mkhuhther rih tluw chnuh, Ungta Mma ngi mchang ki mkhut avah k'leen nih mthiikpiikda ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma': Neiya Mkhatna' ungta Mqutna' ava' ping.
Neiya kring daat ping ungta kdiyou dok ping. Ungta asuw! Neiya ktlangknai kmah ngi kring dok kcha' ping Amen. Ungta kihin nih Kdikhuw le' tidina' ki chungkamke avah ka'am.
Nang ngi amik ki adodeh dow rek avah akjit. Ungta 'tun ka'am dow rek ungta 'tundil thah karvang kthuwk bei rang dow rek avah akjit.

Nang ngi Nei kchang ki kukhut thuh adodeh bursi tikhiu rekki paukordowl ki mlei ungta jiiring meilakuwng tikhiu rekki mlei avah akjit. Bursi tikhiu rek avah lamrinlop tikhiu rekki pausikhu rek ava'. Ungta meilakuwng tikhiu adodeh rek avah lamrinlop tikhiu rek ava'.”
“Ephisia thuh ka'am lamrinlop rekki pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Bursi tikhiu Mchang ki mkhut tih ksin, jiiring meilakuwng tikhiu rek arlak ki kchet Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:

Neiyi nang anong rek ungta kdung ngi anonglow chaak rek ungta adodiil chaakna' rek avah kdeh. Ungta nang ngi kqha kma' rek avah diil pchaang lam mtih. Ungta nang ngi tamsi rek inping, kdi kcha' rek avah perteel lam tinu pdainu mmaan avah tamsi rek lam pemeh ungta mmaan avah pleiknei reklam tidit nang ngi deitinu.
Ungta nang ngi tidiil chaakna' 'leenni diiltlit chtinu. Ungta nang ngi Nei kmiing ki thenni nong lou chtinu ungta ning kepneel thlowi mtih.
Anto'daat yoso a'leen nih adokupsulna' dow mruk ka'am tidit tah nang ngi choduhrep ki avonsat avah amaakpthi a.

Avaleiyi, nang ngi atlukna' mun avah abinphaak cha', ungta plung aperthleng cha' ungta rukri ki anongtlot rek ava' atlow cha'. Mditma bih, Neiyi ahin nih kbei sek ki thleng nikdi'. Nang ngi plung aperthlen chaakma bih, ameilakuwng avah mmun thungki loupthi nikdi'.
Pdainu nang ngi havah adothlowi chaak, tidit tah nang ngi, Nei rukku kdopder chaak Nikolas lop rek nongtlot avah adopder chaak.

Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni pthla ngi modthe avah arja chso. Kapchaang mma' hinni, Neiyi rinkum dingchei avah mdochaak rah pii nikdi'. Ding avah Isowr ki kanpamun mmalai kat tih kmowng.”
“Ungta Smairna ki lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni kikjit. Mkhatna' ungta Mqutna' ungta diyou dokda kring kerheel dok Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:

Neiyi, nang anong rek avah kdeh ungta nang ngi tyat adoperteelna' ungta asraht thuhna' rek rukka kdeh. Pdainu nang nga svang ptih. Neiyi Jihudi kma' rekki Jihudi rek inping, dida pauleh kthe rek avah kdeh lam. Mmaan avah Seitan ki sinegog khat lam.

Nang ngi tyattraanna' rang dow rek avah qi chma'. Dakat tih, naan adotperteelna' raan ki thenni tarnampii ava ngi naan arlakin ki mii aangqhe rek avah rowng'inn thuh kvarpthi rah mthe a. Ungta naan nih niisowm thung ngi suwkthuh chiireelna' perteel naandi'. Nang ngi kdiyou kpha ngi trinchaak krow mii ikurthuwk. Ungta Neiyi rinkum ki luwkhum avah apii nikdi'.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni pthla ngi mdothe avah arja chso.” Ava' kapchaang mma' avah miknitna' kdiyou ava ngi tiplim pchaang nimeh.
“Ungta Pergamos thungki lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Maha lechang ngi kraang raal'kaang kthlowi Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:

Neiyi, nang anongtlot rek ungta a'amna' avah kdeh. Nang nga Seitan kruwng longkhom amna' thuh ka'am imptih. Mmaan nih Neiki trinchaak krow ngi rinpaumin kpii Antipas avah Seitan amna' naan arlak inni eyou lamda. Pdainu nang ngi ava' kpha thung ngi Nei kmiing avah knet tih kyowng chtinu ungta Neiki klamrin avah matcha' mtih.

Pdainu Neiyi, a'leen nih kdorot nuwmma dow mruk ka'am. Mleiya nang ngi Balaam dopurchuhna' ksinton mer rek adothlowi lam. Balaam mih Balaak hinni Isreel mii rek aang ngi ktaang mdopansamna' rah purchuk lamda. Ktaang avah dow pthla rek hinni rintparlaan dok dow rek tchaakna' rah ungta jowlmpurjutna' raan mdopurchuh lam, ava'.
Ungta naan arlak ki aangqhe rekki, Neiyi kdopder chaak Nikolas lop rek dopurchuhna' ksinton rek ka'am lam.
Nang ngi aplung aperthleng cha'. Mditma bih, kbeisek ki ahin nih Neiya arjung nikdi' ungta Neiyi mmaan avah knehr thungki raal'kaang ava ngi karnaakqhi lam nikdi'.

Maknapum mma' ava ngi Pthla ngi lamrinlop rek hinni mdothe avah arja chso. Kapchaang mma' ava' hinni kordowl lih ka'am manna mruk avah mdochaak rang ngi pii nikdi'. Neiyi mma' hinni kuwkhat leh ngi mdodehma, karlaang kcha' Mma' daat tih mdodeh m'leen nih miingren tikjit lung kpowl 'suwn khat pii nikdi'.”
“Ungta Thyatira thung ngi ka'am lamrinlop ki pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Isowr Chapa mmik mei kquwng heppi kquwng ungta mkhuh jiichai kepleu dang heppi kepleu Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:
Neiyi nang anongtlot, avonsat, anongsin, alamrin ungta adodiil chaakna' avah kdeh a. Neiyi anongtlot rek dilknau ki ava ngi rukri ki anong rek avah mepkheel a tidit kdeh a.

Pdainu Neiyi a'leen nih kdorotma dow mruk ka'am a. Mleiya nang ngi mthina ngi: Khulpii ping' kirdi kcha' Jejebel avah sutpthi daat tinu. Ungta mma ngi mii rekki jowlmpurjutna' raan ungta dow pthla rek hinni rinmdoparlaan dok dow rek mdochaakna' raan purchuk lamda. Ungta Nei ksuwk rek avah 'lamleh thah qhi lamda.
Mma ngi jowlmpurjutna' thungki plung mdoperthlen chaakna' rah mpha kdopiik pdainu mma ngi plung perthleng chmeh.
Asuw! Neiyi mmah kkowi kowm 'leenni varnikdi'. Ungta mma' tu' lowsang kilqhi rek mmaan avah mnongtlotin thungki plung mperthlen chaak maanbi, Neiyi suwkthuh chiireelna' klin thuh varlam nikdi'.
Ungta lamrinlop mkheng rekki Neiya, miiril le' plung rek ava' kdothlaam tidit mekdei lamrah. Ungta Neiyi, naan akhengin avah anongtlotin dilkqowiyi ayupenlet piik nikaandi'.

Neiyi havah naan ahin nih ungta Thyatira thung ngi ka'am mqhe rek hinni kdothe. Ungta hava' tpurchuhna' kthlowi kma' rek ungta Seitan ki kukthuwksi mdoditin ava' kdei kma' rek hin rukku kthe a. Ungta Neiyi a'leenin nih bowr krik morson daaltpom nimaang.
Pdainu Neiyi hava' kthe a, tidit tah Nei kurjun duh khimkhei naan nih adothlowiyin avah knettih akyowng chaan.
Ungta kapchaang mma' ava ngi Nei knong avah mqutna' kpha mirkhiik chaak a. Ungta mma' hinni Neiyi chaat mkheng rek 'leenni ruhtanna' pii nikdi'.

‘Ungta mma ngi thiir kchung ngi mmaan 'leenni mukpu kurthuwk rah. Beelksa rek beelsak mikqiik mikqiik ki tupkui heppi mmaan nah kupkui lamrah.’ (Luw. 2:9) Hava' ruhtanna' avah Nei rukku hanto' heppi Kpa hinki kdo'arlaan.
Ungta Neiyi khuvaar vaarpa avah mma' hinni pii nikdi'.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni Pthla ava ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”

“Ungta Sardis khuwpii thuh ka'am lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Isowr pthla tikhiu kthlowi ungta bursi tikhiu kthlowi Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a: Neiyi nang anong rek avah kdeh ungta nang nga kring daat tidit tih amiing nga ka'am pdainu nang nga kdiyou kcha' ptih.
Nang nga ikilrin tlit cha', ungta kdiyou rah kthemeek dow rek adothlowi avah mruh aptang cha'. Mleiya Neiyi nang anong rek avah Isowr aang ngi kurkhum mih deimaang.

Avaleiyi, nang ngi taluhep pih ado'arlaan ungta ado'arjaak tidit avah abinphaak cha'. Nang ngi avah arkhi cha' ungta plung aperthleng cha'. Ungta nang ngi akilrin tlit chaakma bih, Neiyi ahin nih kupru thlenhep pih thleng nikdi', ungta Neiyi nang ahin nih kurjunna' rang mpha avah teden rang tidit nang ngi deiliit nimtih.
Nang ngi Sardis khuwpii thung ngi mbuwmdiir ktobor kma' mii mruk athlowi a. Mmaan nih mtik kcha mkurthuhn leiyi, mmaan nah buwdiir kpowl nalamdon Nei tu' kchetsap lamrah.

Kapchaang kcha' mma' avah Neiyi buwdiir kpowl pnaak nikdi' ungta Neiyi mma' miing avah kring laika thungki knuwlpthi nimaang. Ungta Neiyi mma' miing avah Kpa aang ngi ungta Mma' vaantamsi rek aang ngi thethuh chnikdi'.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni Pthla ava ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”

Ungta Philadelphia khuwpii ki lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Kenje a Mma', Kindit tah Mma'. ‘David chungkamke kthlowi, Mma' dopvan kuwkhat leh do'arkam pchaanmah, Mma' do'arkam kuwkhat leh dopvan pchaanmah. (Is. 22:22) Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek avah mthe a:

‘Neiyi nang anong rek avah kdeh. Asuw! Neiyi a'aang ngi thurngut kparvang ngi kthiika. Kuwkhat tih avah arkam pchaang nimeh. Mleiya nang ngu ruhtan mruk'suwn daat adothlowi ungta nang ngi kpauna avah ado'arkhiik chaak ungta Nei kmiing avah adomat chaak pemeh.

Asuw! Seitan ki sinegog tidit tah Jihudi kma'pa rekki: ‘Jihudi rek inping', dida pleiknei rek mmaan avah ahin nih apii nikdi'. Asuw! Neiyi mmaan nih thleng lamdon akhuhther rih luwkbu lamrah sinikdi'.

Nang ngi Neiyi kdodiil chaakna' pauna ava' ado'arkhiik chaak leiyi, Nei rukku nang nga kepthleem amna' mpha thungki aneeng chnikdi'. Hava' kepthleem ki mpha avah dultipaam mkheng thungki mii rek 'leenni kthuwk bei rah mthe a. Dultipaam thuh ka'am mii mkheng rek ava' mdoperteelna' rah mpha avah karvang rah.
Asuw! Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'. Kuwkhat leh ngi nang alaar luwkhum ava' mdolow mana' rah, nang ngi adothlowi chaak dok avah knet tih akyowng cha'.

Kapchaang mma' avah Neiyi, Neiki Isowr luwbuk'inn ki kchow purthuh nikdi'. Ungta mma ngi duwn thuwk porson nimeh. Ungta Neiyi m'leen nih Neiki Isowr miing kjit nikdi'. Ungta Neiki Isowr ki khuwpii miing avah m'leen nih kjit nikdi'. Avah parvaan ki Neiki Isowr hinki kurjung, Jerusalem ren ava'. Ungta Neiyi mma' 'leenni Nei kmiing ren avah kjit nikdi'.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop hinni Pthla ava ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”
“Ungta Laodisia khuwpii ki lamrinlop ki pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Amen ungta trinchaak krow ungta Kindit Rinpaumin, Isowr dimlowna' rekki mdopqhunna', ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:
Neiyi nang anong rek avah kdeh tidit tah nang nga tadai ruk daimtih tulum ruk lum mtih. Neiyi adai rah mditmata alum rah kdongei.
Mleiya nang nga klum ruk klum kma' kdai ruk kdai kma' klumpuwm daat akurthuh leiyi, Neiyi nang nga knerh thungki akopthot pthi rah kthe a.

Nang ngi: ‘Neiya svang ping sum'alrou kthlowi dok, dow khatleh ruk kriing maang kirdi chtinu, Ungta nang ngi tsut mmeel kthi ngi ayat suwkthuhna', asraht thuhna', amikktot ungta ado'ana ktaak avah deicha' mtinuh.

Hava' leiyi Kihin ki mei thuh tipchiir dok ksa jiiring avah asvang thuhna' rang ki thenni arencha', dinuh akperseel a. Nang ngi adonaak chaak rang ki thenni, Kihin ki buwdiir kpowl arencha'. Ungta ava ngi nangki ado'ana naakma avah aningkyana ngi kandang nimeh. Ungta amik ki khu adodeh chaakna' rah mikpubul apubul cha'.
Neiyi vonsat kdolow chaak rek avah Neiyi rainu kdopurchuh lam. Avaleiyi, nang ngi plung apluwt ungta plung aperthleng cha'.

Asuw! Neiyi thurngut bulli rip nuh ungta thurngut kqhil a. Kuwmiikhat tih kokrowl arjaso thurngut mapvan chaak bih, Neiyi mma' hinni tlung nikdi' ungta Neiyi mma' tu' maal nikdi' ungta mmah Nei tu' kmaal rah.
Kapchaang mma' avah Neiyi, Neiki kruwng longkhom 'leenni tkonqhina' rah tlotpiik nikdi'. Anto' heppi Nei rukku ava' pchaang nuh Kpa tu' Mma' kruwng longkhom thuh kok'ongve dok inping.
Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop hinni Pthla ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”

Hava' dilli neiyi hava' dow rek avah suwnu. Asuwn! Parvaan thah thurngut khat kparvang deinu. Ungta rukrirep pih kdo'arjaak krowl avah puwtit prin heppi pringda, ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' thah arhung korsown, ungta Neiyi hava' dow rek ava' dilli kthuwk rang dow rek ava' ayupdeh nih.”
Ungta m'tunkat daat tih neiya Pthla ngi am chnuh. Ungta asuwn, Parvaan thah kruwng longkhom khat avah amdaatda, ungta Miikhat avah kruwng longkhom ava' 'leenni ko'ongda.
Ungta kok'ong daat Mma' ruwngchen avah jasper le' sardis lung hep daatda. Ungta mruwngchen avah emerald lung hep daat, kowlnisa ngi kruwng longkhom avah tkhulda.

Ungta Kruwng longkhom avah longkhom som'knii leiplii ngi tkhulda. Ungta ava' longkhom rek 'leenni kver rek som'knii leiplii ko'ong lamda. Ungta mmaan nih dona kpowl rek na lamda ungta mluw thaan nih jiiring laar luwkhum rek khum lamda.

Ungta Kruwng longkhom rek ava' thung ki kowl plekda ungta pqeek rek puwkda ungta marchaang kdung khat thuwkda. Ungta ava' kruwng longkhom aang ngi meila tikhiutet rek avah lengda. Mmaan avah Isowr Pthla tikhiu rek ava'.

Ungta kruwng longkhom ava' aang ngi kristal lung heppi kchiir likli truwnpii khat ka'am. Ungta kruwng longkhom ava' malaikat tih ungta kruwng longkhom ava' kloiyi kring daat saa chai plii tet ka'am lam. Mmaan avah mdil le' mduh ngi mmikin knempok ki ka'am.

Ungta mrukri ki kring daat saa avah humpu hep daat, ungta miknitna' kring daat saa ava ngi sil suwn hep daatda. Ungta mukdumna' kring daat saa ava ngi miilai mai hep daatda. Miplitna' kring daat saa ava ngi plimklin kyuwng meek hepdaatda.

Ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek avah mdakmdak ki thenni mapthla truk ruk amsapda. Mmaan avah korloijik ki ungta mthung thaan rukku mmikin knempok ki ka'am.
