Mmaan nih suwn le' jaan rukku karnga kmah ngi: “Kchiir, Kchiir, Kchiir, Kpaalkpusi ki Kruwng Isowr. Mma' avah choduh rukku ka'am ksa 'tun ruk ka'am daat ungta kurjung rang ava'.”
Ungta kring daat saa rek ava ngi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong, kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am daat Mma' hinni tponlorna' ungta takyat chaakna' ungta tpanpaakna' avah kpii chlam rah.

Ungta ava' ktai thung ngi kver rek som'knii leiplii rek ava ngi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am Mma' aang ngi tluw lamda Mhin nih luwbu chlamda. Ungta kruwng longkhom ava' aang ngi mmaan ki laar luwkhum rek avah pthla chlamda.

Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng, Nang nga tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna'ungta ruhtanna' karlaang kcha' mtik kcha ptih. Mleiya dow mkheng avah Nang adim yesang ungta mmaan mkheng avah Nang aplungbin ki then ungta Nang ngi ava' heppi adim adopurthuh chaak lam.”

Ungta neiyi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' machang ki mkhut thung ngi laikakuwl khat, mthung rukku ungta mdilpang thang rukku tikjit ava' ka'am daat avah deinu. Ungta ava' 'leenni kbihjiik tikhiutet kporlotda.
Audilli neiyi mruh ktang dok vaantamsi khat deinu. Mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi: “Laikakuwl ava' kapvang rang ungta m'leenki kbihjiik tolot rek ava' kperthlet ki mtik kcha kuw ka'am a?” dida ksamda.
Ungta parvaan ki mditmata dultipaam ki mditmata dultipaam kurduh ki kuwkhat leh ngi laikakuwl ava' kapvang pchaang ruk ammeh mditmata ava' ksuw pchaang ruk ammda.
Ungta laikakuwl ava' kapvang rah ungta ava' ksuw pchaang rah mtik kcha kuwkhat leh ruk ma'amma leiyi, kdung ngi qap chnuh.

Pdainu kver rek khat tih kihin nih theda: “Qapma'. Asuw o! Judah phung thungki Humpu ungta David Arjung ava ngi laikakuwl ava' kapvang rang ngi ungta m'leen ki kbihjiik tikhiu rek ava' kperthlet rang ki thenni mapchaan dok a.”

Ungta neiyi deinu. Ungta asuwn! Kruwng longkhom le' kring daat saa chai plii rekki mmalaiyin kat tih ungta kver rek arlak ki mmalai inni te'eyow dok ksa Yausuwn ava' heppi rip daatda. Ungta mirki tikhiu le' mmik tikhiu tonda, tidit tah avale' avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi mdopthlat Isowr Pthla tikhiu rek ava'.
Audilli Mma ngi arvangda kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' ava' machang ki laikakuwl avah louda.

'Tunnu Mma ngi laikakuwl ava' mlow thungta kring daat saa chai plii rekle' kver som'knii leiplii rekki Yausuwn ava' aang ngi tluw chlamda. Mmaan khatkhat tih miikenje rek rinkthamna' dumreng rek khatkhat le' namreng ngi kdim jiiring thleengkam khatkhat sinsap lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih laaren khat the lamda, ungta hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga laikakuwl klou rah mtik kcha ptih, ungta m'leen ki kbihjiik rek ava' kapvang rangkat ptih. Mleiya Nang nga adote'eyow doklam, ungta Isowr thenni neen avah Nang ahii ngi adotaktlan chaak dokin. Nang ngi neen avah phung khimkhei, ungta pau khimkhei thungki, ungta mii rek khimkhei hinki, ungta chaat khimkhei rek thungki, adotaktlan chaak dokin.
Ungta Nang ngi neen avah neenki Isowr hinni, paamkruwng rekle' thimpu rek adotupthut chaakin. Ungta neenna dultipaam thung ngi paal nikaandi'.”

Audilli neiyi suwnu ungta kruwng longkhom ava' ktukhul lih vaantamsi knempok rek krowl, ungta kring daat saa rek krowl ungta kver rek krowl avah arjanu. Ungta mmaan chai avah pun sowm, sowm veipun sowm ungta punki pun tyatya lam.

Ungta mmaan nih krowl kparthaang ngi owng lamda: “Te'eyow dok Yausuwn ava ngi laarruhtanna' ungta svangthuhna' ungta luwkinritna' ungta ruhtanna' ungta takyat chaakna' ungta tkonlorna' ungta suwqhatna' karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha a,” dilamda.

Ungta parvaan thah ka'am ungta dultipaam 'leenni ungta dulti kurduh thah ka'am ungta truwnpii thung ngi ka'am downkhaal mkheng ngi: “Suwqhat le' takyat chaakna,' ungta tkonlorna', ungta tpaalna' ruhtan' avah Kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong, Mma' ungta Yausuwn ava' hinni, kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am ikurthuwkso, mdoditin avah neiyi arja chnuh.
Audilli kring daat saa rek chai plii rekki: “Amen,” dilamda. Ungta kver rek som'knii leiplii rekki kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ringda ka'am Mma' aang ngi tluw chlamda ungta luwbuk chlamda.
Ungta Yausuwn ava ngi kbihjiik rek arlak ki khat mdopvan neiyi deinu. Ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek arlak ki khat tih mokrowl khu kipri heppi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit arjanu.

Neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, skowl kpowl khat amdaatda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat ava' vah jai khat sinda. Ungta mma' hinni laar luwkhum khat piida ungta mma ngi raal kapchaang ki kapchaang ngi raal kapchaang rah chetda.
Ungta Mma ngi miknitna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi miknitna' kring daat saa ava ngi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit arjanu.

Ungta skowl ksen morson khat vangthuwkda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat ava' hinni dultipaam thungki plung kdai mkheng ava' mdolow pthina' rah ungta mii rekki khat le' khat mker'eyowna' rah ruhtanna' avah mma' hinni piida. Ungta mma' hinni raal'kaang klinpa khat piida.

Ungta Mma ngi mukdumna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi mukdumna' kring daat saa ava ngi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit arjanu. Ungta neiyi deinu ungta asuwn! Skowl kvom khat deinu ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat mma' ava ngi mkhut thah kriktpertetna' khat sin daatda.

Ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek arlak ki krowl khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Chavui tum khat khon rang avah denarii khat apthut, ungta rukowl tum kdum khon ava'ruk denarii khat apthut. Ungta kruwndii le' thowldii avah kchou krepma'.”
Ungta Mma ngi miplitna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi miplitna' kring daat saa ava ngi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit krowl arjanu.

Ungta neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn! Skowl khat mipdit choiktroi kcha' khat amda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat khat ava' miing avah kdiyou. Ungta Kdikhuw tidit ava ngi mdil qowida. Ungta dultimii tum plii ki khat rek avah raal'kaang ngi powitham mih ungta kdiyou vih ungta dultipaam ki saa rekki mdo'eyowna' rah ruhtanna' avah mmaanve hinni piipthi lamda.

Ungta Yausuwn ava ngi mparngatna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi rintparlaanna' khaan ava' kurduh ngi Isowr pauna leiyi, ungta mmaan ki rinpaumin mdopiikin leiyi, mdo'eyown mii rekki plungrin rek ka'am avah neiyi deinu.

Ungta mmaan nih kdung ngi owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “O Mukpu! Kchiir ungta kindit khat Nang. Nang ngi hava' dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek 'leenni neen kihiin leiyi, paukpindit kmah ungta phuw klou kmah trek ksowt tih amnadi?”

Ungta mmaan khatkhat hinni phriktluwn kpowl pii lamda. Ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: ‘Tidit tah, mmaan mdo'eyown heppi mmaan tu' suwk kurthuwk kcha'sap rekle' mu'umnau rekin mdo'eyow raan avale' mkurkhum duh kpha ngi mmaan nah ksowtbong ngi mkarngat chaak raan.’
Ungta Mma' ngi mutrukna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi neiyi hava' deinu. Asuwn, ringnaang kdungyou kcha' khat thuwkda. Kni a saamul buwkvom heppi vom chda ungta thla avah hii heppi sen chda.
Ungta tirthli kdung ngi kraang ava ngi moknow lam thung ngi, mphaliit kma'pa thung ngi kchei kduwt rek cheiyi, jiilda mqut chaak heppi parvaan ki bursi rek avah dulti thah tlater chlamda.
Ungta parvaan avah laikakuwl tukyul heppi mkurjul chaak thungta lown rekle' diiloipaam rek khimkheiya mmun mmun thuwn ki korlou chlamda.

Ungta dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek ungta klin ksaang rek svang kthuwk mii rek ungta kenreel raalmii lopkqhi rek ungta mruh ktang mii rek, suwk'owr khimkhei le' mii'ol khimkhei rek ava ngi khor rek thuh ungta lown 'leenki lung rek thung ngi kordowl chlamda.

Ungta mmaan nih lown rekle' lung rek hinni: “Neen k'leen nih ichimin rang ngi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' mai thungki ungta Yausuwn ava' plungthit mei kquwng thungki mheidowl chaan,” kdi lamrah.
“Mleiya Mma' plungthit mei quwnna' nit klin avah karvang nga, ungta kuwda ava' thuh krip pchaang chrang nga?”

Ungta hava'le' ava' dilli neiyi dultipaam mirkil plii rek thung ngi vaantamsi chai plii krip daat deilam nuh. Mmaan nih dultipaam ki tirthlilam plii rek avah arkampthi lamda. Mleiya tirthli ngi dulti 'leen mraanmana' rah mditmata truwnpii 'leenni mraanmana' rah mditmata ding khadaat 'leen rukku mraanmana' rah mdo'artlunin.

Ungta neiyi vaantamsi morson khat, knithuhna' ki hangkkal deinu. Ungta mma' hinni kring Isowr ki kbihjiik avah ka'am. Ungta mma ngi owngda dulti le' truwnpii te'ekrena' ruhtan mdopiik vaantamsi chai plii rek hinni theda:
“Neen nih Isowr suwk rek pchal 'leenni kbihjiik klot dokduhn khimkheiyi, dultipaam mditmata truwnpii mditmata ding rek avah e'krep khotmaan,” dida.
Ungta neiyi kbihjiik mdolot dok rek chai avah arjanu. Ungta kbihjiik mdolot dok Isreel nau rekki phung mkheng rek chai avah pun arja khat somplii leipli.
Judah phung thungki mii rek chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Reuben phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda, Gad phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.
Asher phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Napthali phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Manasseh phung chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.
Simeon phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Levi phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Issakhar phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.
Jebulun phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Joseph phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Benjamin phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.

Hava' dilli neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, miipii knempa, kuwkhat leh ngi mdotai pchaanmah khat ka'am lam. Mmaan avah chaat mkheng rek thungki ungta phung rek ungta mii rek ungta pau rek thungki lam. Mmaan nih kruwng longkhom ungta Yausuwn aang ngi rip lamda. Mmaan nih dona kpowl hilna lamda ungta knuwt baak rek mkhutin nih sin lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih kdung ngi owng lamda: hanto' the lamda: “Tkirliinna' avah Kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong neenki Isowr ungta Yausuwn ava' dow,” dilamda.
Ungta vaantamsi mkheng ungta kver ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek avah Kruwng longkhom tarngat loisap lamda ungta mmaan nih Kruwng longkhom aang ngi tlutluw lamda Isowr luwbuk chlamda.

Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Amen! Suwqhat le' tkonlorna' ungta luwkinritna' ungta tpanpaakna' ungta takyat chaakna' ungta laarruhtanna' ungta ruhtanna' avah neenki Isowr thenni kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen!”
Ungta kver rek arlak ki khat ava ngi arthaangda, ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' dona kpowl kihil mii rekka kuw le'da, ungta tva'ki kthuwk lamda?”

Ungta neiyi mhin nih hanto' thenu: “Chukpu nang ngi avah adeh,” dinuh. Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Mmaan avah suwkthuh chiireelna' klin thungki kthuwk lam. Mmaan nih mdomnaan avah Yausuwn hii thung ngi arsu chlamda ava ngi mmaan avah mdoppowl lam.

Avaleiyi, mmaan nih Isowr Kruwng longkhom aang ngi am lamda. Suwn le' jaan nih Isowr amna' mmun kchiir thung ngi mmaan nih soplow chlamda ka'am kcha'lam. Ungta Kruwng longkhom 'leen kok'ong kcha' Mma' mdakkat tih mmaan 'leenni buw'inn heppi kupkhut chlam rah.
Mmaan nah veikhat mpowiyin tham nimeh ungta mningin veikhat raal nimeh. Ungta m'leenin nih knisat mditmata meisat khatleh ngi satvot lam nimeh.

Mleiya Kruwng longkhom mmalaiyi ka'am Yausuwn ava ngi mmaan ki Yaukqhi kurthuwkdon mmaan avah kqhi chlam rah. Mma ngi rinkum kpii diitlaang thung ngi kqhi chlam rah. Ungta Isowr rih mmikin 'leenki arthli khimkheiya kuknuwl piik lamrah.”
Ungta Yausuwn ava ngi mtikhiuna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi parvaan thang ngi qhang klek khat arveel lah dairimsida.
Ungta neiyi Isowr aang ngi krip vaantamsi tikhiu rek avah deinu ungta mmaan hinni puwtit tikhiu avah pii lamda.

Ungta vaantamsi morson khat thuwkda rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh namreng tapkaakna' jiiring thleengkam mkhut thuh sinda rip daatda. Ungta mma ngi miikenje rek rinkthamna' mkheng ava' tu' Kruwng longkhom aang ngi ka'am jiiring rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh mdoparlaan rang ki thenni mma' hinni namreng knempok ki piida.
Ungta namreng meikhut avah miikenje rek rinkthamna' tu' kilqhi ngi vaantamsi khut thungki korlouda Isowr aang thah hankhutda.

Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi namreng tapkaakna' avah louda ungta rintparlaanna' khaan 'leenki mei ava ngi pdimda, ungta avah dulti thah jukptla pthida. Ava' thung ngi archaang knei khat thuwkda ungta khuprida, kowl plekda ungta ringnaang thuwkda.
Ungta puwtit tikhiu ksin vaantamsi tikhiu rekki puwtit k'dum rah korthlong chlamda.

Mkhatna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta hii tu' korchou qil le' mei khuh ngi raada ungta avah dulti 'leen yukvarda. Ungta ding rekki kdum ki khat avah kbungpet chda ungta marna ke'er nowm mkheng kbung chda.
Audilli miknitna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda ungta mei kquwng meek lown klinpa khat hep daat avah truwnpii thung ngi yukvarda. Ungta truwnpii kdum ki khat avah hii heppi sen chda.
Ungta truwnpii thung ngi kring kcha' downkhaal rek kdum ki khat avah diyou chlamda. Ungta arkuwngpii rek kdum ki khat avah penveipthi terda.

Mukdumna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta bursi klinpa khat avah klachowi kquwng heppi parvaan ki tla chda. Ungta ava ngi kreng rekki kdum ki khat 'leenni ungta diina kpur khimkhei rek 'leenni tlada.
Bursi miing avah kkhasi mdit. Avaleiyi, dii rek kdum ki khat avah kha chda. Dii mdopkhat leiyi, mii knempok diyou chda.

Audilli miplitna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta kni le' thla ki ungta bursi rekki kdum ki khat avah prei pthida. Mleiya kdum ki khat mjiin chaakna' rah ungta suwn le' jaanki kdum ki khat ma'ammana' rah havah mdotlot.

Ungta neiyi parvaan mmalaiyi kyuwng vaantamsi khat kmik ki deinu ungta mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi hanto' mdothe arjanu. “Suwkthi a, suwkthi a, dultipaam 'leenni kring kcha' rekki thenni suwkthi a. Mleiya vaantamsi kdum rekki mdo'dum bei raan puwtit krowl ava'leiyi mmaan thenni suwkthi a.”
Mparngatna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta neiyi parvaan ki ngi dulti thah bursi khat ktla deinu. Ungta mma' hinni khor ava' tapvanna' chungkamke piida.
Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi ungta mdonna' ktaak khor avah pvangda ungta ava' thung ki meipii kka khut heppi meikhut arhang thuwkda. Ava' meikhut dokhut tih kni le' tirthli avah jiing chda.
Ungta meikhut arlak ki khausor rek avah dulti 'leenni thuwk lamda. Isowr rih mmaan hinni dultipaam ki silthum'artham ruhtanna' heppi mruhtanin avah mdopiik lam.

Ungta mmaan hinni hanto' paupiik khat pii lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih dulti 'leenki nowm rek mditmata dow ke'er rek mditmata ding rek mdo'ekre raan pemeh. Pdainu mapchalin 'leenni Isowr kbihjiik kton kma' mii rek daat chrel mdo'ekre raan.

Ungta mmaan hinni paupiik piida, tidit tah mmaan nih mii rek avah mdo'eyow raan pemeh pdainu thla parnga thung ngi kdung mdotperteel raan. Ungta mmaan 'dun avah silthum'artham mih mii mepke thung ngi mdunin ava' hepya ngi kdung lamrah.
Ungta nit rek ava' thung ngi mii rekki mdiyow chaakna' raan ktlow lamrah pdainu diyou pchaang lam nimeh. Mmaan nih tidiyow chaak rah kbinlam rah pdainu kdiyou ava ngi mmaan avah kchendaak lamrah.

Ungta khausor rek ruwngchen avah mii rekki raalkna rang ngi mdoporthlonin skowl rek hep daat lam. Ungta mluwchaiyin 'leenni jiiring nongqhat'lot, laar luwkhum mdodaarin ungta mmaiyin avah dultimii rek mai hep daat lam.
Ungta snu rek sam hep daat tih msamin ka'am ungta mahaan avah humpu haa hep daat lam.
Ungta mapthla rek archaang avah skowl tolai knempok rek raalkna rah kchen archaang hep daat.
Ungta mermei avah silthum'artham armei hep daat ungta mermei rekin 'leenni kru ka'am. Ungta thla parnga thung ngi mii rek mdo'ekrena' rah ruhtan avah mmaan hinni mdopiik lam.

Ungta mmaan nih m'leenin nih paamkruwng khat mdothlowi chaakin ungta mma' avah mdonna' ktaak khor thungki vaantamsi ava'. Ungta mma' miing avah Hibriu pau vih ‘Abaddon,’ mdit pdainu Grik pauvah, ‘Apollyon,’ mdit. Abaddon le' Apollyon mdodit tah ke'ekrep khat ava', mdoditna'.
Mkhatna' suwthitna'si avah kthleng dok a. Asuw! hava' dilli kerkheelset tih suwqhitna' morson 'knii karvang meeksli a.
Ungta mutrukna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda ungta neiyi Isowr aangki jiiring rintparlaanna' khaan 'leenki arki chai plii thungki archaang khat arjanu.
Ungta ava ngi mutrukna' vaantamsi puwtit ksin ava' hinni theda: “Euphrates kreng klin thung ngi tbowlpthi vaantamsi chai plii rek avah aperthlet lam.”

Ungta Isowr rih mpharit khat ungta niikhat ungta thla khat ungta kum khat ki thenni mdoporthlon vaantamsi chai plii rek avah perthlet lamda. Mmaan avah dultimii rekki kdum ki khat rek ke'eyou rang ki thenni mdoperthle lam.
Ungta skowl raalmii rek chai avah punpii klin arja 'kniilam. Mmaan chai rek avah neiyi arjanu.

Ungta neiyi rinmer rih skowl rekle' mmaan 'leenni kok'ong rek avah deilam nuh. Ungta mmaan plungkeh avah mei heppi ksen le' parvaan pdit le' mownaang ngi kquwng meek kantuk ava' pkeh lamda. Ungta skowl luwchai rek avah humpu mai hep daat ungta mnehrin thungki mei le' meikhut thuwkda.
Hava' kdum tidit tah meiyi, meikhut tih ungta kantuk kquwng meek ava ngi mmaan nih mii rek kdum ki khat avah eyou lamda. Hava'le' avah mnehrin thungki kthuwk.
Mleiya mmaan ruhtanna' avah mnehrin thung le' mermeiyin thung ngi ka'am. Mleiya mermeiyin avah pruwl rek armei hep daat ungta mluwchai rek ka'am ava ngi mii rek avah mdopdunin.

Pdainu hava' tidina' omlai rek ava ngi mdo'eyowma dultimii aangqhe rekki mmaan ki mkhutin nongtlot rek thungki plung perthleng chlammeh. tidit tah mmaan nih khu kdei kma', khu karja kma', kchet pchaang kma', jiiring le' jiipowl le' jiichai le' lung le' ding rekki tsak dow pthla rekle' tarnam rek luw mdobukin thungki plung perthleng chlam mda.
Ungta mmaan nih mii mdo'eyown mditmata mii mdokserin mditmata jowl mpurjutin mditmata muprutin thungki plung mdoperthlen chaakin pemeh.

Ungta neiyi mruh ktang dok vaantamsi morson khat armei dona nada parvaan ki arjung kqum deinu. Ungta mluw 'leenni kowlnisa thuwkda ungta mmai avah kni heppi lengda ungta mkhuh avah meikchow rek hep daatda.
Ungta mma ngi mkhut thuh tapvanksa laika 'suwn sinda. Ungta mma ngi mchang ki mkhuh paang khat avah truwnpii 'leenni therda ungta mmaleh ki mkhuh paang khat avah laan thah therda.
Ungta humpu kruwn heppi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda. Ungta mma' mo'own thungta pqeek tikhiu rekki arthaang lamda.

'Tunnu pqeek tikhiu rekki krowl marthaanin thung ngu, neiya kikjit rah kdothe meeksli. Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl khat arjanu. Ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Pqeek tikhiu rekki mdothe dow rek avah kbihjiik alotpthi ungta mmaan avah kjitma,” dida.
Ungta neiyi kdodeh vaantamsi truwnpii 'leenni ungta laan thah kther ava ngi mkhut avah parvaan thah hankhiingda.

Ungta kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am Mma' miing 'leenni ungta parvaan le' m'leen nih ka'am dow mkheng ungta dultipaam le' mthung ngi ka'am dow mkheng ungta truwnpii le' mthung ngi ka'am dow mkheng dim kupthuh kcha' miing 'leenni paureeltham thamda. hanto'theda: “'Tun dillu ksowtpa ngi toptobong nimeh.

Pdainu mtikhiuna' vaantamsi ava ngi k'dum rah mdothe meek mpuwtitsin mdodumna' nit rek ava' thung ngi Isowr ki paukordowl avah Mma ngi msuwk khulpu rek hinni mdopandan dok kqhapaumin ava' heppi avah kupqu dok rah.”

Audilli parvaan ki kdo'arjaak krowl ava ngi kihin nih veikhat the nowlda ungta hanto'theda: “Chet rang ngi truwnpii le' laan thah krip daat vaantamsi khut thungki tapvanksa ngi ka'am laika 'suwn avah alou.”

Ungta neiyi vaantamsi ava' hinni chetnu mhin nih hanto' thenu: “Laika 'suwn avah mheipii.” Ungta mma ngi kihin nih theda: “Alou rang ngi acha dok ungta ava ngi apowibuwr avah kapkha rah pdainu anehr thung ngu pkhuidii heppi kthlum rah,” dida.
Ungta neiyi vaantamsi khut thungki laika 'suwn avah lounu ungta avah chakdok nuh. Ungta knehr thung ngu avah pkhuidii heppi thlumda ungta neiyi kchaak dok daat le' kpowi thung ngi tkhat rah pqhunda.
Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi mii knempok leiyi, ungta chaat rek leiyi, ungta mdetmdet ki pau rek leiyi, ungta paamkruwng rek leiyi, veikhat adopurphuwn rah.”

Audilli kihin nih piipe hep daat tportolna' kchung khat mpiida. Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi ripda hanto'theda: “Nang ngi rip rang ngi Isowr luwbuk'inn le' rintparlaanna' khaan ungta ava' thung ngi luwkbu kcha' mii rek chai avah atailam.
Pdainu luwbuk'inn khulown avah portolma' mleiya avah Chaatktlei rek hinni mdopiik dok. Ungta mmaan nih kchiir khuwpii avah thla sompli lei'knii thung ngi mkhuhtherin kupthut lamrah.
Ungta Neiyi Neiki krinpaumin kpii 'knii rek hinni ruhtanna' piilam nikdi' ungta mmaanve ngi nit pun khat le' arja 'knii somtruk thung ngi dona kthi hilna lam donni pau kpurphuwng lamrah.”
Hava'le' avah kruwn ding 'knii avale' dultipaam ki Isowr aang ngi krip meilakuwng 'knii rek ava'.
Ungta kuwmiikhat tih mmaan me'ekre nuwm bih, mnehrin thungki mei thuwk donle mmiihal rekin avah kcha dok lamrah. Ungta kuwmiikhat tih mmaanve me'ekre nuwm bih mma' avah hava' heppi te'eyow rah.

Hava'le' ava ngi, mmaanve ngi pau mdopurphuwn naan nit rek thung ngi khu mratmana' rang ki thenni parvaan tarkam pthina' ki ruhtan mdothlowiyin. Ungta dii rek avah hii tpurthuhna' ki ruhtan ruk mdothlowiyin. Ungta mmaanve ngi mdongeiyinya ngi tidina' omlai rek mkheng avah dultipaam 'leenni veitya veitya thung ngi mdopthuh pchaanin.
'Tunnu mmaanve ngi mrinpauminin mpiik dokin dilli, mdonna' ktaak khor thungki kthuwk saa ava ngi mmaanve 'leenni raal ktlow rah. Ungta mma ngi mmaanve avah kapchaang chrah ungta ke'eyou lamrah.

Ungta mmaanve kluwng avah khuwpii klin 'lam thung ngi koplowm chrah. Ungta pthla 'lam thah nthe bih khuwpii miing rek avah Sodom le' Egypt, puh mdit ungta ava' thung ngi Neenki Kruwng ava' rukka mdopthowi yown.

Ungta phung rek ungta pau rek ungta chaat rek arlak ki mii aangqhe rekki niikdum mqim dilthang row ngi mmaanve kluwng avah kdei lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih mmaanve kluwng avah thlaan thuh tulruwl dok rah rowlam mda.

Ungta dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek ka mmaanve diyow chaak leiyi, kanpa chlam rah. Ungta porchong palrau donni khat le' khat hinni chla rek kporhor chlam rah, mleiya hava' khulpu 'knii rek ava ngi dultipaam thuh ka'am mii avah mdopdun mdopyat chaak lam.

Ungta niikdum mqim mphaak dilli Isowr hinki rinkum kpii pthla ava ngi mmaanve thung ngi luwtda ungta mmaanve ngi mkhuhn nih rip lamda. Ungta mmaanve kdei khimkhei rek 'leenni kdung ngi ningqitna' khat kurthuwkda.

Ungta mmaanve ngi parvaan ki krowl kdungyou kcha' khat arja lamda. Ava ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' thah arhangin.” Ungta mmaanve avah armei arlak ki parvaan thah hangkal chlamda ungta mmaanve miihal rek ava ngi avah dei lamda.

Mpha ava'kat thung ngi ringnaang klin khat thuwkda, ungta khuwpii sowm ki khat avah tluw chda. Ringnaang kthuwk ava ngi mii pun tikhiu eyouda ungta mqhe ka'am rek avah mninginqi chda ungta parvaan ki Isowr avah ponlor chlamda.
Miknitna' suwthitna' avah kthleng dok a ungta asuwn! mukdumna' suwthit avah kbeisek ki karvang rah

Audilli vaantamsi mtikhiuna' ava ngi mpuwtitsin avah 'dumda. Parvaan ki kdungyou kcha' krowl khat pringda ungta ava ngi hanto'theda: “Dultipaam ki Kruwngpaalna' rek avah neenki Kruwng ungta Mma' Khrista ki Kruwngpaalna' kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta Mma ngi kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah kpaal rah.”
Ungta kver rek som'knii leiplii Isowr aang ngi Kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong rek ava ngi mmai inni Isowr aang ngi tluw lamda luwbuk chlamda.

Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih Akpanpaak chaak inna. O, Kruwng Kpaalkpusi Isowr! Nang nga 'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh ka'am ksa ungta dil thah karvang rang ava' ptih. Mleiya Nang nga aruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi kpaal dok kcha' ptih.

Chaat rek avah raang lamda ungta Nang aplungthit mei kquwng arjuda. Ungta Nang ngi kdiyou rek 'leenni pau'adopindit dokna' rah mpha avah arvang chda. Nang ngi asuwk khulpu rek ungta amiing kqi kcha' rek ungta miikenje rek hinni mnongqhat'lotin adopiik lamna' rah mpha avah arvangda. Nang ngi klin le' kdil rek hinni mnongqhat'lotin piilamnadi'. Ungta dultipaam ki mii rek ke'ekrep mii rek ado'ekrena' rah mpha avah arvang chda.”

Audilli parvaan thah Isowr luwbuk'inn avah kparvangda. Ungta Mma' luwbuk'inn thung ngi Mma' pauqum ki paupiik buwr avah arjuk kandangda. Ungta ava' thung ngi kowl plekda ungta archaang kdung ngi thuwkda ungta pqeek puwkda ungta ringnaang thuwkda ungta qil klin nih tlada.

Ungta 'tunnu parvaan thah kdung ngi klin titinna' khat thuwkda. Mleiya snu khat tih kni avah dona ngi nada ungta thla avah mkhuhpya tii thah am chda ungta mluwchai 'leenni bursi sowm lei'knii avah laar luwkhum mih khumda.
Audilli mma ngi nau horda kupluw rah mdothe leiyi, mpowi kdung ngi dungda ungta mdun ava ngi owngda.

Ungta parvaan thah titinna' khat thuwk nowlda. Ungta asuwn, mapthlapum ruwlreu mei heppi ksen khat thuwkda ungta mluwchai tikhiu ka'am mirki sowm mowngda ungta mluwchai 'leenni laar luwkhum tikhiutet khumda.

Ungta mermeiyi parvaan ki bursi rek kdum ki khat avah hanqen ptlada dulti thah mmaan avah yuvar pthida. Mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi nau kupluw rah kthemeek snu ava' aang ngi, snu ava ngi mupluk daat le' Nau ava' kcha rang ngi ma'aang ngi rip daatda.
Ungta mma ngi Pselnau khat pluwda, Mma' avah chaat rek thiir kchung ngi kqhi rang Nau ava'. Ungta Isowr rih Nau avah arjukchom tengda Mma' Kruwng longkhom 'leen thah hunqhi dokda.
Audilli snu avah paamkbiik lai thah chen chda. Ungta Isowr rih mma' thenni mii rekki nit pun khat arja 'knii somtruk thung ngi mdosut pqowi chaak lamna' rah mmun khat porthlon piik chda.
Ungta parvaan thah raal thuwkda. Maikal le' mma' vaantamsi rekki mapthlapum ruwlreu ava' tu' raal karna lamda. Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu avale' mma' vaantamsi rekki mmaan avah karnaak qhi lamda.
Pdainu mapthlapum ruwlreu ava' lop pih raal lah pchaang lam mda. Avaleiyi, parvaan thah ma'amna' raan mmun ammda.

Isowr rih mapthlapum ruwlreu klin avah parvaan ki varpthida. Mma' avah choduh ki pruwl mmiing nga Tarnampii ungta Seitan, mdodit ava'. Isowr rih mmah mma' vaantamsi rektu' dultipaam thuh mdovar pthi lam.

Neiyi parvaan thah krowl klin khat arjanu ungta ava ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu tkirliinna' ungta ruhtanna' ungta neenki Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah kurjung dok a, ungta Mma' Khrista ki ruhtanna' avah kurjung dok a. Mleiya neenki nu'unnau rekin avah Isowr hinni, suwn le' jaan nih mraalin kpiikpii khat avah maptlaak pthi dok a.
Ungta mmaan nih Yausuwn hii ngi ungta mmaan ki rinpaumin rekki pauna ava ngi mma' avah mdopchaanin. Mmaan nih mrin chaakna' raan ki thenni mdiyow raan kpha rukka chang partlaak chlammeh.

Avaleiyi, parvaan nang ruk ungta ava' thuh ka'am rek naan ikanpa chaan. Pdainu dultipaam thuh ka'am ungta truwnpii thung ngi ka'am rek naan athenni suwqhitna' ka'am a! Mleiya tarnampii avah naan ahin nih mdo'arjuk ptlaakpthi. Mleiya mma' ki mpha avah ktowitek tidit mdodeh leiyi mmah mei kquwng ngi muplungkthi.”
Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi Isowr rih mmah dulti thah mheitvarpthi a tidit kerdeida avaleiyi mma ngi Pselnau kuplu snu avah tyat chiireelna' mdopiikda.

Pdainu snu ava ngi ma'amna' mun, paamkbiik lai thah myuwn chaakna' rang ki thenni mma' hinni plimklin pthla hep daat pthla 'knii pii chda. Mleiya pruwl ava' dodehma ngi ava' thah mii rekki mma' avah mpha khat ki ungta mpha rekki ungta mpha mqim ki thenni mdosut pqowi chaakna' raan ki then.
Ungta pruwl ava ngi mnehr thungki dii klinpa khat kreng heppi pthuwkda snu ava'dil pqowida. Mma ngi dii klin ava ngi snu avah mdopuwk dokna' rang ki thenni avah mdotlot.
Ungta dulti ava ngi snu avah bom chda ungta dulti ngi mnehr pvangda ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu vih mnehr thungki mdopthuh kreng avah prowpdokda.

Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu avah snu ava' 'leenni kdung ngi muplung thida ungta mma' rilam mqhe ka'am rek hinni raal ktlow rah chetda. Mmaan avah Isowr pauqum kopqowi rek ungta Jisu Khrista rinpaumin kohor kcha' rek avale' lam.
Ungta neiya truwnpii biingki sitphui 'leenni rip daatnu.
Ungta truwnpii thungki saa khat arhang kthuwk deinu, ungta mluw tikhiutet ka'am ungta mirki sowm tonda ungta mirki rek 'leenni laar luwkhum sowm khumda.

Ungta 'tunnu neiyi runu ruwngchen kduh daat saa khat deinu ungta mkhuh rek avah towm khuh hep daat, ungta mnehr rih humpu nehr hep daat. Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi mhin nih mma' ruhtanna' ungta mma' Kruwng longkhom ungta ruhtanna' klin avah mma' hinni piida.
Ungta neiyi mluwchai rek khat avah kdiyou chrang ngi klim kcha' khat deinu. Ungta kdiyou chrang ngi klim avah dam chda. Ungta dultipaam mkheng nga ngak chlamda ungta saa ava'dil qowi chlamda.

Mthungta mmaan nih saa ava' hinni ruhtanna' kpii mapthlapum ruwlreu avah luwbuk chlamda mmaan nih saa ava' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Kuwda hava' saa ava' hep daat rang nga? Ungta kuwda mma' tu' raal karnaakqhi pchaang daat rang nga?” dilamda.
Ungta mma' hinni dow klin tethena' ungta pthitda tpaupokna' nehr khat piida. Ungta thla somplii lei'knii thung ngi dow mdotlot tlit pchaanna' rang ki ruhtan piida.
Audilli mma ngi Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda tpauna' rah mnehr pvangda tidit tah mma ngi Mma' miing le' Mma' buw'inn ungta parvaan thah ka'am rek 'leenni pthitda pauda.

Ungta mma' hinni miikenje tu' raal mkarnaakna' rah ungta mmaan mdopchaanna' rah ruhtan avah mapthlapum ruwlreu vih mhin nih piida. Ungta mma' hinni phung rek ungta mii rek ungta chaat rek mkheng mdopchaanna' rah ruhtanna' avah piida.

Ungta dultipaam thuh ka'am mii mkheng ngi saa avah luwkbuk chlam rah. Mmaan avah dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih te'eyow dok Yausuwn ki rinkum laika thung ngi mmiing mdokjitma mii rek avale' lam.
Kuwmiikhat maknapum mma' ava ngi havah arja chso.

Paamsuwk ki ka'am rang mma' avah paamsuwk ki mche chaak rah. Ungta raal'kaang ngi mii ke'eyou mma' avah raal'kaang ngi te'eyow rah. Hava' ki mlei avah miikenje rek avah tidiil chaakna' le' lamrin nih ma'am chaak raan.
Audilli neiyi dultipaam ki hungkkal saa ktlok khat deinu. Ungta mmah Yausuwn heppi mirki 'knii kton ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu heppi kpau.

Ungta mma' thung ngi mma' duh ki mkhatna' saa ava' ki ruhtanna' mkheng avah ka'am. Ungta dultipaam le' ava' 'leenni ka'am mii rek avah mkhatna' saa, tidit tah kdiyou chrang ngi raal'kaang ngi lim thida kdam dok saa ava' hinni luwkbuk rah silamda.
Ungta mma ngi dultimii rek dodeh ngi klin nih titinna' nong rek avah pthuwkda. Tidit tah parvaan ki mei avah dultipaam thung ngi arjung kqum kpha ngi pthuwkda.

Ungta mkhatna' saa ava' dodeh ngi titinna' rek mdotlot pchaanna' ruhtan avah mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi mma' hinni mdopiik ava ngi dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek avah 'lamleh thah mdoqhi lam. Ungta mma ngi dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih raal'kaang ngi lim thida kring dok pchaang saa ava' pthla avah adotlot raan,” dilamda.

Ungta mma ngi saa ava' pthla ava' 'leenni rinkum tpiik pchaanna' ruhtanna' piida. Tidit tah saa ava' pthla ava ngi tpau ruk mpau pchaanna' rah ungta saa ava' pthla ava' hinni luwkbu kma' rek khimkhei avah mdope'eyow lamna' rah ruhtanna' avah mhin nih mdopiik.

Ungta mma ngi mii mkheng, tidit tah kenreel rek ruk, kenreel kma' rek ruk ungta svang rek ruk, srah rek ruk ungta mii'ol rek ruk suwk'owr rek rukku mchang ki mkhutin 'leenni mditmata mapchalin 'leenni titinna' kbih kporlotsap lamda.
Ungta saa ava' kbih kton mditmata mmiing mditmata mma' miing jiikchai kton kma'don dow tren mditmata tyur avah kuwkhat leh ngi mdopchaan mana' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.
Havah luwkinritna' ava': Kdeipindih kcha' mma' ava ngi saa ava' chai avah atai chso. Mleiya havah miikhat chai ava' ungta mma' miing chai avah arja truk somtruk lei truk.
Ungta neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, Yausuwn avah Jion Lown 'leenni ungta Mma' tu' mapchalin 'leenni Mpa miing tikjit mii pun arja khat somplii leiplii rektu' krip daat deinu.
Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl khat, dii knempa kluwng archaang hep daat ungta khu kdung ngi kipri archaang hep daat arjanu. Ungta neiyi dumreng k'dum rekki mdumrengin mdodumin krowl archaang arjanu.

Ungta mmaan nih kruwng longkhom aang ngi ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek aang ngi ungta kver rek aang ngi laaren khat kthe heppi laa the lamda. Ungta ava' laa avah dultipaam thungki mdoktlan dok pun arja khat somplii leiplii rek kma'don morson kuwkhat leh ngi kurchuk pchaang meh.

Hava'le' avah snu tu' ktobor liit kma' mii reklam tidit tah mmaan avah kinrim lam. Ungta tva'tva' thang yoso, Yausuwn ava' chena' thung ngi Mdil kqowi kcha' reklam. Hava'le' avah mii rek arlak ki Isowr thenni ungta Yausuwn ava' thenni mkhatna' mchei kurthuwk ki mdoktlan chaak dok rek ava' lam.
Ungta mmaan nehr thung ngu tkurhuwnna' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Isowr kruwng longkhom aang ngi mmaan nah mdoparmaan ka'am pemeh.

Ungta neiyi vaantamsi ktlok khat parvaan mmalai thah kyuwng kervel deinu. Ungta mma ngi dultipaam thung ngi ka'am rek hinni mdoparjaam rah ktlangknai kma' rah kqhapaumin ava' mdothlowi. Ungta chaat khimkhei ungta phung khimkhei ungta pau khimkhei ungta mii rek khimkhei hinni kqhapaumin avah mdoparjaam rah.

Krowl kparthaang ngi mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr aqi chaan ungta Mma' avah aponlor chaan. Mleiya pau mdopinditna' rang ki nit avah karvang kcha' a. Parvaan ungta dulti ungta truwnpii ungta diitlaang mkheng rek ava' dim kupthuh kcha' Mma' avah luw'abu chaan.”

Ungta mdilkqowi vaantamsi khat thuwk nowlda ungta ava ngi hanto'theda: “Khuwpii klin Babylon nah ktluw kcha' a, ktluw kcha' a. Mleiya mma ngi chaat mkheng rek avah mma' ki jowlpurjutna' plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii avah mdopneek doklam.”

Audilli mukdumna' vaantamsi khat tih mmaanve dil qowida ungta ava ngi krowl kparthaang ngi hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih saa ava' hinni ungta mma' pthla ava' luwmbuk chaak bih, ungta mapchal 'leenni mditmata mkhut 'leenni mma' kbih mlot chaak bih, plungthit kduh chrah.

Ungta mma'kat ava ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii avah knee chrah. Thowldii avah Mma' plungthit tu' tporchou dok ksa tong ava'. Ungta Mma ngi, kchiir vaantamsi rek aang le' Yausuwn ava' aang ngi mei le' kantuk kquwng ava ngi mma' avah suwk kupthuwk chrah.

Ungta mmaan suwkthuhna' meikhut avah kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah hang kkal rah. Ungta saa ava' ungta mma' pthla luwkbu kcha' ungta mma' miing kbih karlaang kcha' khimkhei rek avah kunthun ruk jaan rukku mkarngat chaaknaan amvot nimeh.”
Havah miikenje rek, tidit tah Isowr paupiik kopqowi kcha' rek ungta Jisu hinni lamkrin kcha' rekvah mdodiildeh chaak raan.

Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl khat tih kihin nih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Havah akjit: 'Tunki kupqhun nih Kruwng hinni kdiyou kcha' rek avah msuwkin kqha a. Pthla ava' rukku: ‘Ou, mmaan nih mnonglow chaakin thungki mkarngat chaak raan. Ungta mnonglow chaak rekin rukku, mdilin kqowi chrah,’ dida.”

Ungta neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, armei kpowl khat ungta armei ava' 'leenni Mii Chapa hep daat khat kok'ong daat deinu. Mma ngi mluw 'leenni jiiring laar luwkhum khumda ungta mkhut thung ngi tangkep kraang khat sinda.

Ungta vaantamsi ktlok khat avah luwbuk'inn thungki thuwkda ungta krowl kparthaang ngi armei 'leenni kok'ong khat ava' hinni theda: “Atangkep aptla rang ngi arkundok. Tidit tah Nang ngi ado'arkunna' rah mpha avah kvei dok a. Mleiya dultipaam turkunna' rah mpha avah kvei kcha' a.”
Ungta Mma ngi armei 'leenni ko'ongda ungta mtangkep avah dultipaam thuh arjuptlada ungta dultipaam avah arju'arkunda.
Audilli vaantamsi ktlok khat avah parvaan ki luwbuk'inn thungki thuwkda. Ungta mma' rukku tangkep kraang khat sinda.

Ungta rintparlaanna' khaan thungki vaantamsi ktlok khat thuwk nowlda. Mma' avah mei 'tun nih ruhtan kthlowi ungta mma ngi tangkep kraang ksin khat ava' hinni krowl kparthaang ngi hanto'theda: “Atangkep kraang ava' aptla rang ngi dultipaam ki riithlumnu baak rek avah apurkuwk dok. Tidit tah dultipaam le' riithlum chei rek avah kmin doklam a.”

Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi dultipaam thung ngi mtangkep avah arjuptlada. Ungta dultipaam ki riithlumnu rek avah arjupurkuwkda. Ungta Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki riithlum tekmerna' klin ava' thung ngi daal pthida.

Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii duwn thah riithlum rek avah riithlum tekmerna' thung ngi therchown lamda. Ungta riithlum tekmerna' thungki hii thuwkda. Ungta avah skowl haake pang ktlum mih ungta kilommitar arja kdum arveel kla ngi luwngda.

Audilli neiyi parvaan thah titinna' morson khat deinu ungta avah klin ungta kdung ngi tngana' khat. Vaantamsi tikhiu rek ava ngi mqutna' tidina' omlai tikhiu thlowi lamda. Mleiya Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah mmaan ava' thung ngi mkurkhumna'.

Ungta neiyi mei tu' korchou likli truwnpii hep daat khat deinu. Ungta muplungkthi saa ava' kapchaang rek ungta saa ava' pthla ungta mma' kbih ungta mma' miingchai rek ava' kapchaang rek mmaan ava ngi mkhutin thung ngi Isowr dumreng sin lamda likli truwnpii 'leenni ripdaat lamda.

Ungta mmaan nih Isowr suwk Moses laa ungta Yausuwn laa avah hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng Kpaalkpusi Isowr! Nang anong rek avah klin dok a ungta tngana' a. O miikenje rekki Kruwng! Nang a'lam rekka mrin kindit ungta kindit ava'.

O Kruwng! Kuwda Nang akqi kma' ungta akponlor kma' rang nga? Mleiya kchiir rah Nang daat, ungta chaat mkheng ngi Nang ahin nih thleng lamdon ungta a'aang ngi luwkbu chlam rah. Mleiya Nang arinkinditna' rek avah kandang dok a.”
Ungta hava' dilli neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, parvaan thah rinpaumin ki buw'inn, luwbuk'inn avah kparvangda.

Ungta tidina' omlai tikhiu kthlowi vaantamsi tikhiu rek avah ava' luwbuk'inn thung ki thuwk lamda. Mmaan nih buw ktarnaal kchiir deek ungta kepleu deek deek ki hilna lamda. Ungta muplungin 'leenni jiiring arkowlke pkeh lamda.

Audilli kring daat saa chai plii rek arlak ki khat tih vaantamsi tikhiu rek hinni jiiring thleengkam tikhiu parlaan lamda. Ungta avale' thung ngu kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah kring Isowr ki plungthit mei kquwng ngi kdim kdim mih ka'am.

Ungta luwbuk'inn avah Isowr tponlorna' le' Mma' ruhtanna' ki meikhut tih dim chda. Ungta vaantamsi tikhiu rek hinki tidina' omlai tikhiu rek ava' mqutduh khimkheiyi kuw khadaat ruk luwbuk'inn ava' thung ngi luwt pchaang meh.

Audilli neiyi luwbuk'inn thung ki ngi vaantamsi tikhiu rek hinni krowl kparthaang khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Naan nih chetin rang ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng thleengkam rek avah dultipaam thuh aperleiyin,” dida.

Mthungta mkhatna' ava ngi chetda thleengkam mdosin avah dultipaam thuh perleida. Ungta saa ava' kbih kthlowi rek ungta mma' pthla luwkbu kcha' rek 'leenni kdung ngi kdung, mmeel kthi ngi kpaan omlai khat qouda.

Audilli miknitna' vaantamsi ava ngi chetda thleengkam mdosin avah truwnpii 'leenni perleida. Ungta dii avah kdiyou hii hep daat kurthuwk chda. Ungta truwnpii ava' thung ngi kring kcha' rek khimkhei avah diyou chlamda.
Audilli mukdumna' vaantamsi ava ngi chetda thleengkam mdosin avah kreng rekle' diina rek khimkhei thung ngi perleida ungta dii rek avah hii kurthuwk ter chda.

Ungta neiyi dii rekki, vaantamsi ava ngi hanto' mdothe arjanu: “O Kruwng, Nang nga arinkindit! Nang nga 'tun'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh rukku ka'am ksa ungta Kchiir ava' ptih. Mleiya Nang ngi hanto ngi pau'apindit dok a.
Mleiya mmaan nih miikenje rekle' khulpu rek hii mdopthuhn leiyi, Nang ngi mmaan hinni hii tong avah tepneek lam tinu. Mleiya mmaan nah hava' kat kphang kcha' ki mtik kchalam.”
Ungta neiyi krowl morson khat rintparlaanna' thung ki ngi hanto' mdothe arjanu: “O Kruwng Kpaalkpusi Isowr! Nang apaupindit rek avah kindit ungta mrin kindit.”
Ungta mplitna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah kni 'leenni perleida. Ungta mii rek avah meiyi mkaak chaakna' rah kni hinni ruhtanna' piida.

Ungta mii rek avah kdung ngi ksa ava ngi pkada. Mmaan nih hava' omlai rek 'leenni mukpu ruhtanna' kthlowi, Isowr miing 'leenni pthitda pau lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' tponlorna' rang ki thennu plung perthleng chlam mda.

Ungta mparngatna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah saa ava' kruwng longkhom 'leenni perleida. Ungta mma' kruwngpaalna' avah kjiingnu ngi dim chda. Ungta mmaan nih kdungreen nih mdunin leiyi, mepleiyin pkei lamda.
Ungta mmaan nih mdunin ungta mpaanin leiyi, parvaan ki Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda pau lamda. Mmaan nih mnong rekin thung ki plung perthleng chlam mda.

Ungta mutrukna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah Euphrates Kreng klin thung ngi perleida ungta dii avah kang chda. Mleiya havah knithuhna' ktong ki paamkruwng rek thlenna' rah 'lam tporthlon pchaanna' rang ki then.
Ungta neiyi mapthlapum ruwlreu ava' nehr thung ki ungta saa ava' nehr thung ki ungta mlangkma' khulpu ava' nehr thung ki tarnam ktobor kdum rek avah uiqok rek heppi kthuwk deinu.

Tidit tah mmaan avah titinna ktlow rek tarnam pthla rek ava' lam. Mmaan nih dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek hinni chet lamda ungta dultipaam mkheng ki mii rek hinni chet lamda. Mleiya mmaan nah Kpaalkpusi Isowr ki nit klin ava' thung ngi raal tkurduk qhina' rang ki thenni mii kpurkuwk rah kchet lam.
“Asuwn! Neiya kupru thlen heppi thleng nikdi'.kilring chda ungta mdomna rek kirkhi kcha' mma' avah msuwkqha a. Mditma bih mma, ngi mdomna ktaak ki chetdon, mii rekki mningkyana' kdei lamrah.”
Ungta mma ngi mii rek avah Hibriu pau vih Armageddon mdodit mun ava' thung ngi kpurtuwl lamrah.

Ungta mtikhiuna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah tirthli 'leenni perleida. Ungta parvaan ki luwbuk'inn thung ki ungta kruwng longkhom thung ki krowl khat tih kparthaang dok ki owngda hanto'theda: “Havah kqudok a.”

Ungta ava' thung ngi kowl plekda, pqeek rek puwkda, archaang rek kdung ngi thuwkda, ungta ringnaang klin thuwkda. Ava' heppi kdung ngi ungta klin nih kthuwk ringnaang avah dultipaam thuh dultimii ma'am daat ki thuwk mlai.

Ungta khuwpii klin avah lop kdum mih kenqhen chda. Ungta chaat rekki khuwpii rek avah tlu chda. Ungta mma ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii tong ava' mdopiikna' rah khuwpii klin Babylon avah Isowr aang ngi tipbinphaak lamda.
Ungta diiloipaam khimkhei avah chen chda ungta lown tidit khatleh ammda.

Ungta dultimii rek 'leenni parvaan ki qil klin klin nih tlada. Qil chai khat tih kilo somkdum leiparnga arveel rikda. Pdainu dultimii rekki tidina' qil omlai ava'leiyi Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda pau lamda. Mleiya tidina' omlai avah kdung reen nih klin.

Audilli thleengkam tikhiu kthlowi vaantamsi tikhiu rek arlak ki khat ava ngi mbida ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Arvang, neiyi klinsi ngi mdakkurjur, dii knempok 'leenni kok'ong snu khat 'leen ki pautpinditna' avah ayupdeh nih.
Hava' dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mma' tu' jowlkpurju lamda. Ungta hava' dultipaam thuh ka'am rek avah mma' jowlpurjutna' thung ki thowldii ava ngi tipriter lamda.”

Mthungta mma ngi neiya paamkbiik lai thah mqhidokda ungta neiya pthla ngi am chnuh. Ungta neiyi kning ngi ksen saa khat 'leenni kok'ong daat snu khat deinu. Ungta saa ava' 'leenni pthitda tpauna' miing ngi kdim daat deinu ungta mluwchai tikhiu le' mirki sowm kton deinu.

Ungta snu avah kning ngi ksen le' ksen dona hilnada, ungta jiiring dona le' mkhon kekre lung rek ungta kchiir rih kpowl lung rekki korthlongda. Mkhut tih jiiring tong khat sinda. Ungta ava' thung ngi tepder kurhuwi dow rekle' ktobor ungta mjowlpurjutna' ngi avah dim chda.
Ungta mapchal 'leenni miing khat kjitda. “PAUKORDOWL. KHUWPII KLIN BABYLON. DAKKURJUR REKKI MNUH UNGTA DULTIPAAM KI TEPDER KUHUWI DOW REKKI MNUH” dida.
Neiyi snu avah deinu, ungta mma' avah miikenje rekki hii le' Jisu leiyi, rinpaumin kpii kcha' rekki hii mdoneek ki pri chda. Ungta neiyi mma' kdeh thung ngu kdung ngi ngak chnuh.

Pdainu vaantamsi ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi nang nga kngak imptih? Neiyi snu ava' ki mlei ungta mma' kpu, saa ava' ki mlei paukordowl avah ayuthepiik nih. Saa avah mluw tikhiu kpu ungta mirki sowm kton.

Nang ngi saa khat adodeh ungta 'tun ka'am kma' avah ktlangknai kmah tkenveina' thung ngi kluwt rang ngi, mdonna' ktaak khor thung ki kthuwk bei rah mthe a. Ungta dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kring laika thung ngi mmiingin tikjitma mii aangqhe ka'am lam. Dultipaam thuh ka'am mmaan ava ngi ungta 'tun ka'am ava ngi choduh ka'am ungta 'tun ka'am kma' ungta dil thah kthuwk rang saa ava' mdeh thung inni kngak lamrah.
Ungta havah luwkinrit ki plungreel ava': Luwchai tikhiu rek avah snu ava' ko'onna' lown tikhiu rek ava'.

Ungta paamkruwng tikhiu rek ka'am lam ungta parnga rekka ktluw dok kcha'lam ungta 'tun khat tah ka'am daat ungta morson khat tah dil thah karvang rang ava'. Ungta mma' mthlen thung ngu mma ngi mpha ktowitek ki thenni kpaal rah.
Ungta choduh ka'am ungta 'tun ka'am kma' saa avah metrehtna' paamkruwng ava' ungta mma' avah tikhiu rek hinki karvang ungta mmah tkenvei chaakna' thuh kchet chrah.

Ungta arki sowm adodeh rek pda 'tun kruwngpaalna' khadaat ruk karlaang kma' paamkruwng sowm rek ava'. Pdainu saa ava'tu' qhang khatpang ki thenni paamkruwng rek kurthuwk ki ruhtanna' karlaang kcha' rek ava'.
Hava' paamkruwng rek avah muplungrilin khadaat ka'am ungta mmaan nih ruhtan ungta ruhtanna' avah saa ava' hinni kpii lamrah.

Hava' paamkruwng rek ava ngi Yausuwn tung ngi raal kkarna lamrah ungta Yausuwn ava ngi kapchaang lamrah. Mleiya Mmah kruwng rekki kruwng ungta paamkruwng rekki Paamkruwng. Ungta Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi ka'am rek avah mdo'own chaak dok rek ungta mdokchol ksadok rek ungta trinchaak krow rek, mdodit avale' lam.”
Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi dakkurjur snu ko'onna' dii rek adodeh avah mii rek ungta miiloppii rek, chaat rekle' mii rek, ava'.

Ungta nang ngi saa ava' leenni mirki sowm adodeh rek ava ngi dakkurjur snu avah kepder chlam rah. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kpenvei pthi lamrah. Mmaan nih snu avah mdakchai kupthut lamrah ungta msadak avah kcha chlam rah ungta mei thuh kapka pthi lamrah.

Mleiya Isowr rih mmaan plung thung ngi Mma' dongei ava' mdoptlot lamna' rah mmaan avah plungril khadaat mdopthut lam. Mmaan nih mmaan ki kruwngpaalna' avah Isowr pauthe rek ava' mkurkhum duh khimkheiyi saa ava' hinni mdoparlaan chaak dokin.
Ungta nang ngi adodeh snu avah dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek 'leenni kpaal khuwpii klin ava'.”
Ungta hava'le' dilli neiyi vaantamsi ktlok khat parvaan ki arjung kqum deinu. Ungta mma ngi, mruhtanna' klin dok ki ungta dultipaam avah mma' konlorna' ava ngi plengda.

Ungta mma ngi kdung ngi ruhtan thlowida ungta krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Khuwpii klin Babylon avah ktluw kcha' a, ktluw kcha' a! Ungta tarnam amna' kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta tarnam ktobor khimkhei ki mbuw kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta mii rekki mdopder chaakin ktobor pva rek khimkhei ki mbuw kurthuwk kcha' a.

Mleiya chaat mkheng rek avah mma' jowlpurjutna' plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii ava ngi kipri kcha' lam a. Ungta dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mma' tu' jowlkpurju kcha' lam a. Ungta dultipaam ki sumnong ktlow rekki mma' kenthlet parnaakna' dona kepleet tih ka'am ava ngi svang thuhna' lamda.”

Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl morson khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu. “Nei kmii rek naan nih snu ava' hin ki arvang thuwk dokin. Mditma bih naan nih mma' tu' pnu kerveisap kurthuwk chnaandi'. Ungta mma' 'leenni kthuwk rang tidina' omlai rek ava' arlaang chnaandi'.
Mleiya mma' pnu arve avah parvaan kpha kurtuwl dok kcha' a. Ungta Isowr rih mma' rinkinditmana' avah mbinphaak dok a.

Mma ngi naan ahinin nih adotpiikin heppi mma' hinni apii perheelin. Ungta mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi ava' han'tun nih mtum 'knii kerkheel lih mhin nih aperheelin. Ungta mma ngi naan ahinin nih adotporchou piik dokin tong ava' han'tun nih, tum 'knii kerkheel lih, mhin nih aporchou piikin.

Mma ngi mthina ngi kponlor chda ungta kenthle kparnaak dok ki ma'am chaak ava' heppi naan nih mma' avah chii apreelin ungta plungyatna' apiin. Mleiya mma ngi muplungril thung ngi: ‘Neiya kruwngnu heppi kok'ong ping. Neiya meikhunu pmaang ungta tqatqeina' teden rukku dei nimaang,’ mdodit.

Avaleiyi, nii khat daat thung ngi mma' 'leenni tidina' omlai rek avah kthuwk rah. Mmaan rek avah tidiyowna', tqatqeina' ungta powitham. Ungta mmah meiyi ktluwm daat tih kka chrah. Mma' 'leenni paukpindit rang Kruwng Isowr rah Kpaalkpusi.

Ungta snu ava' ki jowlpurjutna' ungta kporchong kpalrau vih mma' tu' ka'am dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mma' kaakna' meikhut mdehn thung ngi mma' leiyi, kqap chlam rah. Ungta muplungin tpeeng lam donni archam klou chlam rah.

Mmaan nih snu ava ngi tyat mdoperteel ava' mdoqit chaakin leiyi, lamkla ngi rip lam thida hanto' the lamda: ‘Suwkthi a, suwkthi a. Khuwpii klin Babylon, mruh ktang khuwpii. Nang a'leen nih qhang khadaat thung ngi, pau tpinditna' avah kthuwk a neh!’ kdi lamrah.
Ungta dultipaam ki sumnong ktlow rekki mma' thenni kqapkqei chlam rah ungta plungkya ngi qap lamda. Mleiya 'tun dilvah kuwkhat leh ngi mmaan dona rek avah renporson piik lammeh.

Mmaan dona rek avah jiiring le' jiipowl, mkhon kekre lung rekle' lungpowl kchiir rek, ungta buw kperneem le' kning ngi ksen buw, ungta buw ktarnaal le' buwksen, ungta ding namreng rek, ungta mmaan avah mdet mdet ki psaihaa dona rek, ungta mdet mdet ki mkhon kekre ding dona rek, ungta jiichai, ungta thiir le' marble lung dona rek,

Ungta saade le' namreng, ungta tpurbul reidii le' dinghowk namreng, ungta thowldii le' reidii, ungta jaam kqha le' chavui, ungta inndown saa rek, ungta yau le' skowl rek, ungta tolai rek, ungta mii rek daksa le' plungrin rek, ava'.

‘Ungta aplungrin nih mdongei chaak mchei rek avah ahin ki ksun dok kcha' a. Ungta svang tuthuhna' ungta ningtlunna' dona rek mkheng avah nang ahin ki ksun dok kcha' a. Ungta nang ngi mmaan avah veikhat kurdutqhi vot lam nimtih,
Hava' dow rek 'leenni sumnong tlowda snu ava'leiyi svang kthuwk rekki mma' leiyi, kqap chlam rah ungta plungkya ngi kqap chlam rah.

Ungta mmaan nih hanto' kthe lamrah: ‘Suwkthi a, suwkthi a. Ava' khuwpii klin, ava' thung ngi buw kperneem kqha ngi ungta kning ngi ksen le' buwksen kihilkna kcha' ungta jiiring le' mkhon kekre lung rek ungta lungpowl kchiir rih korthlong kcha' nang avah asuwkthi a.’

Mleiya qhang khadaat thung ngi antoya klin nih svang kthuwk avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta arkuwngpii kqhi rekle' arkuwngpii ava' thuh kchet mii mkheng rek ungta arkuwngpii kthapmii ungta truwnpii 'leenni sumnong ktlow khimkhei rek avah lamkla ngi rip chlamda.
Ungta mmaan nih snu ava' kaakna' meikhut mdehn thung ngi owng lamdon. ‘Hava' khuwpii klin heppi khuwpii klin talu ka'am kdi lamrah?’

Ungta mmaan nih mluw thaan nih purvuwt karthlaak lamda ungta owng lamda qap lamda ungta plungkya ngi qap lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: ‘Suwkthi a suwkthi a. Neen nih svang tuthuh chaak naan khuwpii klin avah suwkthi a. Truwnpii 'leenni arkuwngpii kthlowi kcha' neen nkhengin avah mma' alrou vih svang tuthuh chaakin. Qhang khadaat thung ngi mma' avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a.
O, parvaan ungta miikenje rekle' tamsi rek, ungta khulpu rek naan nih snu ava'leiyi ikanpa chaan. Isowr rih naan athenni mma' 'leenni pau mpindit dok a.’ ”

Audilli mruh ktang vaantamsi khat tih buhsuk lung hep daat lung klinpa khat louda ungta truwnpii thung ngi varpthida ungta hanto'theda: “Hanto' heppi eeng rak ki khuwpii klin Babylon avah kvarpthi rah. Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi avah veikhat kurdutqhi nimeh.

Ungta nang athung ngi dumreng k'dum rek laakrowl ungta laakrowl kupthuwk rek, ungta spirthiil kmuwt rek, ungta puwtit k'dum rek krowl, veikhat tarjaak nimeh. Ungta nang athung ngi mdet mdet ki dim kdei mii rekki dim lou porson nimeh. Ungta nang athung ngi buhsuk lung archaang, veikhat tarjaak porsonliit nimeh.

Ungta nang athung ngi, meila kleng avah veikhat, leng porson vot nimeh. Ungta kmoukpu mditmata kmou krowl rek avah, nang athung ngi tarjaak porson nimeh. Mleiya nang ahin nih sumnong ktlow rek avah, dultipaam thung ki klin ksaang rek ava'. Ungta chaat mkheng ki mii rek avah nang akser rih 'lamleh thah adoqhi chaakter doklam.
Ungta khulpu rekle' miikenje rek, ungta dultipaam thung ngi te'eyow rek mkheng kihii avah, snu ava' thung ngi ka'am dei lamda.”

Ungta hava'le' dilli neiyi parvaan thah mii knempok ki hanto' mdotheen kdung youkcha' krowl khat arjanu: “Haleluiah! Tkirliinna' ungta tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ungta ruhtan' avah neen ki Kruwng Isowr ava' dow!

Mleiya Mma' pau pindit avah kindit ungta mrin kindit. Mma ngi dakkurjur klinsi snu, mma' jowlpurjutna' thung ngi dultipaam ktopbor mma' 'leen pau mpindit dok a. Mma ngi mma' khut thuh msuwk rek hii avah phuw mlowpiik dok lam a.”
Ungta mmaan nih mveiknitna' the nowl lamda: “Haleluiah! Ungta mma' kaakna' meikhut avah kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah kukhu tlit rah.”
Ungta kver som'knii leiplii rekle' kring daat saa chai plii rekki kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Isowr hinni tluw lamda luwbuk chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Amen. Haleluiah.”
Ungta kruwng longkhom thung ki krowl khat thuwkda hanto'theda: “Mma' suwk rek naan, ungta Mma' kqi kcha' kdilklin mii mkheng rek naan nih, neen ki Isowr avah apanpaak chaan.”

Ungta neiyi miipii klin krowl hep daat khat avah dii knempok kluwng archaang hep daat khat, ungta kdungyou kcha ngi khuh kipri archaang hep daat khat arjanu. Ava ngi hanto'theda: “Haleluiah! Mleiya Kpaalkpusi Kruwng Isowr, avah kpaal dok a!
Neenna kanpada kdung ngi tkanpat chaak raan, Ungta Mma' avah tponlor chaak raan. Mleiya Yausuwn ki kchiir inneena' rang nit avah karvang na. Ungta Mma' kmou rang avah korthlong dok kcha' a.
Ungta mma ngi buw kperneem kqha ungta kchiir deek ki kepleu, ungta kpowl deek mdonaakna' rah mhin nih ruhtan mpiik dok a.” Mleiya buw kperneem kqha avah miikenje rek rinkinditna' ava'!

Audilli mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Havah akjit: ‘Yausuwn ki kchiir inneena' thung ki kmaal ava' thung ngi’ mdo'own chaak rek mmaan avah msuwkin kqha.’ Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava'le' avah Isowr pauna kindit rek ava'.”

Ungta neiyi luwkbu chrah mkhuhther rih tluw chnuh. Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Kihin nih anto' tlowma' nang ngi havah tlowma',Tidit tah neiya nang ngi suwk adokurthuhqhi, Jisu ki rinpaumin kohor kcha' a'uanau khat ping. Isowr luw'abucha! Mleiya Jisu ki rinpaumin avah pauphuwnna' ki pthla ava'.”

Audilli neiyi parvaan kparvang deinu ungta asuwn, skowl kpowl khat am daatda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong Mma' avah Trinchaak krow ungta Kindit, mdodit ava'. Ungta Mma ngi rinkindit tih pau mdopindit ungta raal mdotlot.
Mma' mik avah meila kquwng heppi lengda ungta mluw 'leenni laar luwkhum rek khumda. Ungta m'leen nih kuwkhat leh ngi mdodehma Mma' daat tih mdodeh miing khat kjitda.
Ungta Mma ngi hii thung ngi tuplup dok dona nada ungta Mma' miing avah ‘Isowr Pauna,’ mdit.
Ungta parvaan raalmii rekki skowl kpowl 'leenni tuwng lamda Mma'dil qowi chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih buw kperneem kchiir rih kpowldang dona hilna chlamda.

Ungta Mnehr thung ngi raal'kaang kraang khat thuwkda. Mleiya ava ngi Mma ngi chaat rek avah mdosor rah. Ungta Mma ngi thiir kchung ngi mmaan avah qhidon ksutpqowi lamrah. Ungta Mma ngi Kpaalkpusi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki riithlum tsunna' avah Mkhuh ngi therda.
Ungta Mdona 'leen le' Mphei 'leenni Isowr rih mmiing hanto' mdokjit ka'am: “PAAMKRUWNG REKKI PAAMKRUWNG UNGTA KRUWNG REKKI KRUWNG” dida.

Ungta neiyi kni 'leenni ripda krowl kparthaang ngi hanto' kthe vaantamsi khat deinu. Parvaan laiyi juwngda ka'am pva mkheng rek hinni: “Arjung qumin rang ngi klin Isowr ki kmaal ava' thung ngi ikurkuwk chaan.

Mleiya naan nih paamkruwng rekki sadak, ungta raalmii kpu rekki sadak, ungta mruh ktang rekki sadak, ungta skowl rekki sadak, ungta mmaan 'leenni kok'ong rekki sadak, ungta mii mkheng ki sadak tidit tah mii'ol rek ungta suwk'owr rek ungta kdilklin mkheng ki sadak rek, avah cha chnaandi'.”
Ungta saa avale' dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek ungta mmaan raalmii rekki skowl 'leenni kok'ong Mma' hinni, ungta mma' raalmii rek hinni raalkna rah mkurkuwn avah neiyi deinu.

Audilli Mma ngi saa avale' mma' aang ngi titinna' nong rek tlowda saa ava' kbih kton kcha' mii rekle' mma' pthla luwkbu kcha' mii rek kuhuwng kcha', mlangkma' khulpu avah rowngmii ngi kyowng lamda. Hava' 'knii rek avah mikring inni kantuk ki kquwngmeek meiduwm thung ngi varpthi lamda.
Ungta mqhe ka'am rek avah skowl 'leenni kok'ong daat raal'kaang, Mnehr thung ki mdopthuh ava ngi sorpet lamda. Ungta pva mkheng rek avah mmaan sadak rekki mpowiyin tappaa chlamda.
Ungta neiyi parvaan ki arjung kqum parvaan tamsi khat deinu. Ungta mma ngi mdonna' ktaak khor ava' ki chungkamke le' thiirrii klinpa mkhut thung ngi sinda.
Ungta mma ngi mapthlapum ruwlreu avah kyowngda. Mma' avah alraang ki pruwl, tidit tah tarnampii ungta Seitan ava.' Ungta mmah kum pun khat ki thenni bowlpthida.

Ungta mdonna' ktaak khor thung ngi ptla pthida ava' thuh mmah arkam pthida ungta m'leen nih kbihjiik lotda. Mleiya havah kum pun khat ava' mkurkhum duh kpha thung ngi mma ngi chaat rek avah mdohuwn chaak porsonmana' rang ki then. Ungta ava' dilrow ngi mmah mpha mruk ki thenni kperthlet rah.

Ungta neiyi kruwng longkhom rek deinu ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih ko'ong lamda ungta pau tpinditna' ruhtan avah mmaan hinni mdopiik doklam. Ungta neiyi Jisu ki rinpaumin leiyi, ungta Isowr pauna leiyi, mii rekki mlowl reenda mdo'eyown pthlarin rek avah dei lam nuh. Ungta saa ava' mditmata ava' dow pthla ruk luwkbu kma' rek ungta mapchal 'leenin ruk ungta mkhut rekin 'leen rukku mma' kbih kton kma' rek avah dei lam nuh Hava' mii rek avah ring lamda Khrista tu' kum pun khat kpaalsap dok kcha' reklam.
Pdainu kdiyou morson rek avah kum pun khat mqut dokduh vah veikhat ringkerheel lammeh. Havah mkhatna' trin kerheelna' ava'.

Mkhatna' trin kerheelna' thung ngi kyau kcha' rek avah kchiir lam, mmaan nah msuwkin kqha. Hava' mii rek 'leenni miknitna' tidiyowna' ava ngi mdotlot pchaan rah dow khatleh ammeh. Pdainu mmaan nah Isowr ki ungta Khrista ki thimpu rek kurthuwk chlam rah. Ungta mmaan nih kum pun khat Mma' tu' kpaalsap lamrah.
Ungta kum pun khat ava' mqut chaak dilli, Seitan avah mrowng'inn thung ki kupthuwk pthi rah.

Ungta mma ngi dultipaam ki mirkil plii thuh ka'am chaat rek ava' kuhuwng chrang ngi kchet rah. Mmaan avah Gog le' Megog ava'. Mma ngi mmaan avah raalkna rah kpurkuwk lamrah. Ungta mmaan chai rek avah truwnpii biing ki sitphuiya ngi knem rah.

Ungta mmaan nih dultipaam mdung ktlungdek ki kchet lamrah ungta miikenje rek raalveen'inn le' Isowr rih vonsat mdolow khuwpii avah ktukhul dok lamrah. Ungta Isowr hinki mei parvaan ki arjung qumdon, mmaan avah kqiimdek ki kapkapet lamrah.

Ungta mmaan kuhuwng kcha' tarnampii avah saa avale' mlangkma' khulpu rek mdovarna' kantuk le' meiduwm thung ngi varpthida. Ungta mmaan nah ava' thung ngi suwn le' jaan nih kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah chiikreel lih ka'am chlam rah.
Ungta neiyi kruwng longkhom kpowl klinpa khat deinu ungta ava' 'leenni kok'ong Mma' mmai thung ki dulti le' parvaan avah chen chlamda. Ungta mmaan amna' rah mmun khatleh ammda.

Ungta neiyi kdiyou mii rek avah dei lam nuh ungta mmaan nih kdil ruk klin ruk Isowr aang ngi ripsap lamda. Ungta laika rek avah kparvangda ungta morson laika khat ruk kparvangda, tidit tah avah rinkum ki laika ava'. Ungta kdiyou rek avah ava' laika rek thung ngi mdokjit mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaakin ava ngi mtunin nih pau pinditda.

Ungta truwnpii ava ngi mthung ngi ka'am kdiyou rek avah arhan pthuwkda. Ungta Kdiyou le' Kdikhuw ava ngi mmaan thung ki kdiyou rek avah arhan pthuwk lamda. Ungta mii khimkheiya mnongtlot mnongtlotin ava ngi pau pinditda.
Ungta ‘Kdiyou le' Kdikhuw’ avah mei duwmpii thung ngi varpthida. Ungta havah miknitna' tidiyowna' ava'.
Ungta kuwku yoso rinkum ki laika thung ngi mmiing mdokjitma rek avah mei duwmpii thung ngi varpthida.
Ungta neiyi parvaan ren le' dultipaam ren avah deinu. Mleiya mkhatna' parvaan le' mkhatna' dultipaam avah qudok chda. Ungta truwnpii avah am porson mda.
Audilli Johon neiyi parvaan Isowr hinki kurjung khuwpii kchiir Jerusalem ren avah deinu. Ungta khuwpii avah kmou khat tih mi'innpu kpha rang ngi mkorthlon dang chaak heppi korthlong chda.

Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl klin khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Asuwn! Isowr buw'inn avah mii rek hinni ka'am kcha' a. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' ka'amsap chlam rah, ungta mmaan nah Mma' mii rek kurthuwk lamrah. Ungta Isowr mdakkat avah mmaan tu' ka'amsap chlam rah ungta mmaan Isowr kurthuwk chrah.

Ungta Isowr rih mmaan mik rek thung ki arthli mkheng rek avah kuknuwl piik chlam rah. Ungta ava' thuh kdiyou tidit veikhat am nimeh mditmata plungkya ngi kqap veikhat am nimeh mditmata kqap veikhat am nimeh. Ungta tudun tsaanna' veikhat am porson nimeh. Mleiya choduh ki dow rek avah kthleng dok kcha' a.”

Audilli kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' ava ngi hanto'theda: “Asuwn! Neiyi dow mkheng avah ren kpurthuh dok a.” Ungta Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Akjit: ‘Tidit tah hava' pauna rek avah kindit ungta trinchaak krow rek ava'.’”

Ungta Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “ 'Tunnu kqu a. Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping. Tupqhunna' le' Tupqutna' ping. Neiyi mning kakraal kcha' mma' ava' hinni rinkum kpii diitlaang ava' thung ki dii avah mkhon ktaak ki pii nikdi'.
Kapchaang mma' ava ngi dow mkheng avah kchom chrah. Ungta Neiyi mma' Isowr kurthuwk nikdi' ungta mmah Kchapa kurthuwk chrah.

Pdainu mningkqi rek ungta lamkrin kma' rek, Isowr dopder chaak rek ungta miike'eyou rek, jowlkpurju rek, mii kekser rek ungta dow pthla luwkbu kcha' rek ungta pleiknei kcha' mkheng rekka, mei le' kantuk ki kquwng meiduwm avah mmaan then kurthuwk chrah. Ungta havah miknitna' tidiyowna' ava'.”

Audilli mqutna' tidina' omlai tikhiu ngi kdim thleengkam tikhiu ksin vaantamsi tikhiu rek arlak ki khat ava ngi, kihin nih thlengda ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Arvang, neiyi Yausuwn ava' nuwn, kmou avah ayupdeh nih.”
Ungta Mma ngi neiya, Pthla ngi lown klin ungta kparthaang dok khat thah mqhida. Ungta mma ngi parvaan ki arjung kqum Isowr hinki khuwpii klin, kchiir Jerusalem avah mepdehda.
Ungta ava ngi Isowr konlorna' thlowida ungta mma' ar'aang avah kenreelsi lung ungta jasper lung ungta sethleng ngi kchiir lung rek heppi lengda.

Ungta mbang nga klin ungta kchuwng ungta mpaltong sowm lei'knii ka'am. Ungta mpaltong rek ava' thung ngi vaantamsi sowm lei'knii ka'am. Ungta m'leen nih Isreel nau rek phung sowm lei'knii miing rek ava' kjitda.
Ungta knithuhna' thah mpaltong kdum ungta karthak thah mpaltong kdum ungta kurduh thah mpaltong kdum ungta knitlaak thah mpaltong kdum ka'am.
Ungta khuwpii bang avah mi'innmun sowm lei'knii ka'am. Ungta m'leen nih Yausuwn tamsi sowm lei'knii rek miing ava' tikjit.
Ungta kihin nih ava' kthe mma' ava ngi khuwpii ava' mdopertetna' rah ungta mpaltong rekle' mbang rek mdopertetna' rah jiiring kchung khat mkhut thuh sinda.

Ungta khuwpii avah mirkil plii ka'am. Ungta mdung avah mkam tu' kinqim tetda. Mma ngi khuwpii avah kchung khat tih pertetda. Ungta avah kilommitar pun 'knii arja' knii kurthuwkda. Mdung le' mphei ungta mchuwn avah kinqimsapda.
Ungta mma ngi mbang avah pertetda ungta avah khuling arja khat somplii leiplii kurthuwkda. Ungta avah miikhat ki khuling saanya, tidit tah ava' vaantamsi ava' khulingya.
Ungta mbang avah jasper lung ungta mkhuwpii avah jiiring kenje likli kchiir dang heppi kchiir.

Ungta khuwpii bang ava' innmun avah mdetmdet ki mkhon kekre lung rekki mdopri. Mkhatna' innmun avah jasper lung, mi'knitna' ava ngi sapphire lung, mukdumna' ava ngi kalsedony lung ungta miplitna' ava ngi emerald lung.

Mparngatna' ava ngi sardius lung, mtikhiuna' ava ngi khrysolait lung ungta metrehtna' ava ngi beryl lung, mutkutna' ava ngi topaj lung, msowmna' ava ngi khrysoprasas lung, msowm leikhatna' ava ngi jasinth lung ungta msowm lei 'knitna' ava ngi amethyst lung.

Ungta mpaltong sowm lei'knii rek avah lungpowl kchiir, lung sowm lei'knii rek ava'. Ungta mpaltong khimkhei avah lungpowl kchiir khat ava'. Ungta khuwpii 'lam rek avah jiiring kenje likli sekerthleng hep daat lam.
Ungta neiyi ava' thuh luwbuk'inn kenje ka'am dei maang. Mleiya Kpaalkpusi Kruwng Isowr, ungta Yausuwn ava ngi ava' ki luwbuk'inn kenje ava'.
Ungta khuwpii avah ava' thuh kvaar rah kni mditmata thla ki msit amna' am nimeh. Mleiya Isowr konlorna' ava ngi mmun avah pvaarda ungta Yausuwn ava ngi mmun ava' ki meila ava' kurthuwk. kcha

Ungta Isowr rih mdosan chaak dok chaat rek ava ngi ava' ar'aang thung ngi kchet chlam rah. Ungta dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mmaan ki mkonlor chaakin le' takyat chaakna' avah ava' thuh ksin thuh chlam rah.
Ungta paltong rek avah kunthun niiluwn luwnni karkam liit nimeh mleiya ava' thuh jaan tidit am nimeh.
Mmaan nih chaat rekki konlorna' le' takyat chaakna' avah ava' thuh ksin thuh chlam rah.

Ungta ava' thuh kokchou krep rang khadaat ruk luwt nimeh. Isowr dopder chaak ungta pleiknei nong ktlow khadaat ruk ava' thuh luwt vot nimeh. Mleiya Isowr rih Yausuwn rinkum laika thung ngi mmiingin mdokjit dok rek mmaan chrel daat kluwt lamrah.
Ungta mma ngi rinkum ki dii kchiir dang khat mepdehda. Ungta avah sekerthleng ngi kchiir, lung heppi lengda. Ungta avah Isowr le' Yausuwn ava' kruwng longkhom thung ki arjung kluwng.

Ungta ava' 'lam ava' ningqim mih ungta kreng ava' maleh machang ngi rinkum ki dingbul avah mowngda. Ungta mchei avah sowm lei'knii ngi cheida. Ungta thla ktaiyi mchei avah chei kchokda. Ungta ding ava' arna rek avah chaat rek dam chaakna' dowidam kurthuwkda.
Ungta pauhor tidit veikhat am nimeh ungta Isowr le' Yausuwn kruwng longkhom avah ava' thuh ka'am rah. Ungta msuwk rekki Mmah sopklow chlam rah.
Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mai avah kdei chlam rah ungta Mma' miing avah mmaan pchal 'leenni ka'am rah.

Ungta ava' thuh jaan tidit am nimeh ungta mmaan nih meila le' kni ar'aang kriing lam nimeh. Mleiya Kruwng Isowr rih mmaan nah mar'aang kpii chlam rah ungta mmaan nih kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah anto ngi kpaal chlam rah.

Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' pauna rek avah trinchaak krow ungta mkindit kat ava'.” Ungta kchiir khulpu rekki Kruwng Isowr ava ngi Mma' suwk rek hinni kbeisek ki kthuwk kat rang dow rek ava' ktedet lam rang ki thenni Mma' vaantamsi avah mmaan hinni pthlada.
“Asuwn! Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'. Hava' laika thung ngi mdothe pauphuwn rek ava' kopqowi kcha' mma' avah msuwkqha kcha' a.”

Ungta Johon neiya hava' dow rek ava' mmik ki kdei ungta makna ngi karja kcha' khat ping. Ungta neiyi ava' karjaak ungta kmik ki kdeh thungta hava' dow rek kihin nih mkepdeh vaantamsi khuhther rih tluwnu luwbuk chnuh.

Audilli mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Kihin nih anto' tlowma'. Mleiya neiya nang le' a'uanau khulpu rek ungta hava' laika thuh mdothe pau ava' kopqowi kcha' rektu' suwk kurthuwk kcha'sap khat ping. Nang ngi Isowr hinni luw'abu kcha'.”
Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hava' laika thung ki pauphuwn ki pauna rek avah kbihjiik lotpthida thima'. Mleiya mpha avah knai kcha' a.

Mrin kindit kmah ngi ka'am kcha' mma' avah, mrinkindit kmah ngi i'am tlit chdaatso. Ungta ktobor rih ka'am kcha' mma' avah, ktobor rih i'am tlit chdaatso. Ungta mrinkindit kcha ngi ka'am kcha' mma' avah, mrinkindit tih i'am tlit chdaatso. Ungta kchiir rih ka'am kcha' mma' avah kchiir rih i'am tlit chdaatso.”
“Ungta asuwn! Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'. Ungta mii khimkhei hinni mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi kdopiik rang ngi, Nei ki nongqhat'lot ava' sin nuh kurjung imping.
Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping. Tupqhunna' le' Tupqutna' ping. Ungta Mkhatna' le' Mdonna' ping.”

Mma' paupiik rek ava' kopqowi kcha' mmaan avah msuwkin kqha a. Mleiya mmaan nih rinkum ki dingbul ava' mdochaakna' raan ungta paltong ava' thung ngi luwt lamdon khuwpii ava' thuh tuluw chaakna' rah ruhtanna' avah mthlowi chaak inna.
Pdainu uwi rek ungta mii kekser rek, jowlkpurju rek, mii ke'eyou rek, dow pthla luwkbuh rek ungta pleitenee rah kngei kcha' ungta pleiknei kcha' rek, khimkheiya khuwpii ava' duwn thah ka'am kcha'lam.

“Jisu, Neiyi lamrinlop rek thung ngi naan ahin nih hava' dow rek kthepindit rang ki thenni, Neiki vaantamsi avah kdopthlat. Neiya David Arjung ungta Charuwl ava' ping. Ungta Kepleu ungta Jiingsun ki Vaarpa ava' ping.”

Ungta Pthla le' kmou ava ngi “Arva:, ” dida. Ungta ava' karja mma' ava ngi:, “Arva,” adi chso. Ungta mning kakraal kcha' mma' avah arva chso. Ungta kuwku yoso kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi mkhon ktaak ki rinkum kpii pchaang dii avah anee chso.

Tidit tah hava' laika thung ki pauphuwn karja kcha' mii khimkhei hinni kthepindit chaak a. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih hava' dow rek 'leenni motpom chaak bih Isowr rih hava' laika thung ngi mdokjit dok tidina' omlai rek avah mma' 'leenni ktopom rah.

Ungta kuwmiikhat tih hava' pauphuwn thung ki pauna rek klou pthi ma'am bih, Isowr rih hava' rinkum ki laika thung ki ungta khuwpii kchiir thung ki ungta hava' laika thung ngi mdokjit mma' then rek avah klou pthi rah.
Hava' dow rek kthepindit Mma' ava ngi hanto'theda: “Dakat tih, Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'.” Amen, Dakkat tih, Kruwng Jisu arjungqum.
Neen ki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin 'leenni ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
